translation.en: How do covid-19
translation.ga: Cén chaoi a n-oibríonn

translation.en: Vaccines work?
translation.ga: Vacsaíní covid-19?

translation.en: December 2020
translation.ga: Mí na nollag 2020

translation.en: Vaccines work by preparing a person ’ s immune system (the body ’ s natural defences) to recognise and defend itself against a specific disease.
translation.ga: Córas imdhíonachta an duine a réiteach (is é sin an chosaint nádúrtha atá ag an gcolainn) le galar faoi leith a aithint agus le cosaint a thabhairt dó féin in aghaidh an ghalair sin, sin mar a oibríonn vacsaín.

translation.en: Building immunity
translation.ga: Neartú na himdhíonachta

translation.en: Most research on covid-19 vaccines involves generating responses to all or part of a protein that is unique to the virus that causes covid-19.
translation.ga: An chuid is mó den taighde ar vacsaíní covid-19, is éard atá i gceist leis freagairt a ghiniúint do chuid den phróitéin nó don phróitéin ina hiomláine, próitéin nach ann di ach amháin sa víreas is cúis le covid-19.

translation.en: When a person receives the vaccine, it will trigger an immune response.
translation.ga: Nuair a thugtar an vacsaín do dhuine, cuireann sé freagairt imdhíonachta ag forbairt ann.

translation.en: Most covid-19 vaccines require two doses to build immunity.
translation.ga: Formhór na vacsaíní covid-19, ní leor a gcaitheamh uair amháin ach faoi dhó leis an imdhíonacht a neartú.

translation.en: If the person is infected by the virus later on, the immune system recognises the virus.
translation.ga: Má dhéanann an víreas an duine a ionfhabhtú ina dhiaidh sin, aithneoidh an córas imdhíonachta an víreas.

translation.en: The system is then prepared to attack the virus.
translation.ga: Beidh an córas ullamh ansin leis an víreas a ionsaí.

translation.en: How do the vaccines bought by the european commission work?
translation.ga: Na vacsaíní a cheannaigh an coimisiún eorpach, cé mar a oibríonn siad sin?

translation.en: Nucleic acid vaccines (mrna)
translation.ga: Vacsaín ar aigéad núicléasach (mrna)

translation.en: Biontech / pfizer | moderna | curevac
translation.ga: Biontech / pfizer | moderna | curevac

translation.en: This type of vaccine contains part of the ‘ instructions ’ from the virus that causes covid-19.
translation.ga: Maidir leis an gcineál vacsaíne seo, tá cuid den ‘ treoir ’ a thugann an víreas istigh ann, an víreas is cúis le covid-19.

translation.en: This allows the body ’ s own cells to make a protein that is unique to the virus.
translation.ga: Ligeann sé sin do chealla na colainne próitéin dá gcuid féin a dhéanamh, próitéin nach ann di ach amháin sa víreas.

translation.en: The person ’ s immune system recognises that this unique protein should not be in the body and responds by producing natural defences against infection by covid-19.
translation.ga: An córas imdhíonachta atá ag an duine, aithníonn sé nach ceart don phróitéin uathúil sin a bheith sa cholainn, agus is é freagairt atá aige dó cosaint nádúrtha a tháirgeadh in aghaidh ionfhabhtú ó covid-19.

translation.en: Protein-based vaccines
translation.ga: Vacsaíní dar bunús próitéin:

translation.en: Sanofi / gsk
translation.ga: Sanofi / gsk

translation.en: This type of vaccine contains fragments of a protein that is unique to the virus.
translation.ga: An cineál seo vacsaíne, tá bloghanna de phróitéin ann, próitéin nach ann di ach amháin sa víreas.

translation.en: These are enough for the person ’ s immune system to recognise that the unique protein should not be in the body and to respond by producing natural defences against infection by covid-19.
translation.ga: Is leor sin do chóras imdhíonachta an duine lena aithint nach ceart go mbeadh an phróitéin uathúil sa cholainn, agus is é freagairt a dhéanann sé cosaint nádúrtha a tháirgeadh in aghaidh ionfhabhtú ó covid-19.

translation.en: Viral vector vaccines
translation.ga: Vacsaíní veicteoir víreasach:

translation.en: Astrazeneca ¦ johnson & johnson
translation.ga: Astrazeneca ¦ johnson & johnson

translation.en: This type of vaccine uses a different, harmless virus to deliver the ‘ instructions ’ from the virus that causes covid-19.
translation.ga: Maidir leis an gcineál seo vacsaín, is víreas eile a úsáideann sé, víreas gan dochar, leis an ‘ treoir ’ a chur in iúl ón víreas is cúis le covid-19.

translation.en: This allows the body ’ s own cells to make the protein unique to the covid-19 virus.
translation.ga: Ligeann sin do chealla na colainne an phróitéin a dhéanamh, is é sin próitéin uathúil víreas covid-19.

translation.en: The person ’ s immune system recognises that this unique protein should not be in the body and responds by producing natural defences against infection by covid-19.
translation.ga: An córas imdhíonachta atá ag an duine, aithníonn sé nach ceart don phróitéin uathúil sin a bheith sa cholainn, agus is é freagairt atá aige dó cosaint nádúrtha a tháirgeadh in aghaidh ionfhabhtú ó covid-19.

translation.en: If the vaccinated person is later exposed to the covid-19 virus, their natural defences are able to recognise the protein in covid-19.
translation.ga: Má thagann víreas covid-19 aniar aduaidh ar an duine vacsaínithe i ndiaidh an ama sin, féadfaidh an chosaint atá ann go nádúrtha an phróitéin sa covid-19 a aithint.

translation.en: The body ’ s defences are ready to kill the virus, and to prevent it from entering cells or spreading further.
translation.ga: An chosaint atá sa cholainn, tá sí ullamh leis an víreas a mharú, agus lena chosc ionas nach leathfaidh sé isteach sna cealla agus eile.

translation.en: More information on covid-19 vaccination
translation.ga: Tuilleadh faisnéise faoi vacsaíniú covid-19

translation.en: For more information about the vaccination programme in your country, see the ecdc vaccine scheduler and visit the official websites on vaccination of the countries of the european union and the european economic area.
translation.ga: Má tá tuilleadh faisnéise uait faoin gclár vacsaínithe i do thír féin, féach leat sceideal vacsaíne ecdc, agus déan cuairt na suíomhanna oifigiúla faoin vacsaíniú sna ballstáit agus sa limistéar eorpach eacnamaíoch.

translation.en: Vaccines protect people and communities against deadly diseases.
translation.ga: Is cosaint do dhaoine agus do phobail atá sna vacsaíní in aghaidh galair mharfacha.

translation.en: They have eradicated smallpox, and virtually eliminated other diseases like polio.
translation.ga: Tá an bholgach curtha den saol acu, agus is beag nach bhfuil galair eile curtha den saol acu, an póilió cuir i gcás.

translation.en: Vaccination builds up a person ’ s defences to common diseases that they are exposed to
translation.ga: Is éard a dhéanann an vacsaíniú cosaint agus imdhíon an duine a neartú in aghaidh galair choitianta a thagann aniar aduaidh orthu.

translation.en: Being vaccinated prevents people from catching the disease in the vast majority of cases.
translation.ga: Má tá vacsaíniú déanta ar dhuine, is é is dóigh i bhformhór na gcásanna nach dtolgfaidh sé an galar.

translation.en: In some cases, a person can still get a disease after being vaccinated.
translation.ga: Tá cásanna ann a bhféadfaidh duine galar a thógáil tar éis a vacsaínithe.

translation.en: The symptoms, however, are milder and recovery is faster.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, ní bhítear chomh tinn céanna, agus is túisce biseach.

translation.en: Some of the diseases that vaccines protect against
translation.ga: Seo cuid de na galair a dtugann vacsaín cosaint ina n-aghaidh

translation.en: Hepatitis b
translation.ga: Heipitítis b

translation.en: Human
translation.ga: An papalómai ­

translation.en: Papillomavirus
translation.ga: Víreas daonna

translation.en: Infection
translation.ga: An fliú

translation.en: (Hpv)
translation.ga: (Hpv)

translation.en: Influenza
translation.ga: An

translation.en: Measles,
translation.ga: Bhruitíneach,

translation.en: Mumps and
translation.ga: An plucamas

translation.en: Rubella
translation.ga: Agus rubella

translation.en: Polio
translation.ga: An póilió

translation.en: Tetanus
translation.ga: Teiteanas

translation.en: Tuberculosis
translation.ga: An eitinn

translation.en: Better for everyone
translation.ga: Feabhas do chách

translation.en: A vaccinated person is less likely to pass on an infectious disease to others. So, people who get vaccinated can help protect those who cannot be vaccinated themselves.
translation.ga: An té a bhfuil vacsaín faighte aige, is lú seans go dtógfaidh daoine eile galar tógálach uaidh, dá bhrí sin, daoine a fhaigheann vacsaín, is cúnamh é do chosaint daoine eile nach féidir vacsaín a thabhairt dóibh.

translation.en: This includes babies, children, older people and people with weak immune systems such as cancer patients.
translation.ga: Ina measc sin tá leanaí óga, leanaí eile, daoine aosta, agus daoine dar lag á gcóras imdhíonachta, othair a bhfuil ailse orthu, cuir i gcás.

translation.en: These groups benefit from others getting vaccinated, because the disease then cannot spread in the community.
translation.ga: Is é leas na ngrúpaí sin vacsaín a bheith faighte ag daoine eile, mar cuireann an vacsaín cosc le scaipeadh an ghalair i measc an phobail.

translation.en: Measles
translation.ga: Imdhíonacht

translation.en: Community
translation.ga: Ag an bpobal in

translation.en: Immunity
translation.ga: Aghaidh na bruitíní

translation.en: A high number of vaccinations is required to help create this community immunity.
translation.ga: Líon mór daoine a bheith á vacsaíniú, sin é atá ag teastáil ionas go mbeidh imdhíonacht ag an bpobal.

translation.en: When a high number of people are vaccinated, chains of infections are stopped.
translation.ga: Nuair atá vacsaíniú déanta ar líon mór daoine, coisctear na slabhraí ionfhabhtuithe ó dhuine go chéile.

translation.en: For example, according to the european centre for disease prevention and control (ecdc) 95% of people need to vaccinate against measles to prevent further spread in the community.
translation.ga: De réir mar a deir an lárionad eorpach um ghalair a chosc agus a rialú mar shampla, ní mór vacsaín a thabhairt do 95% de na daoine le leathadh na bruitíní a chosc i measc an phobail.

translation.en: 5% not vaccinated
translation.ga: 5% nach bhfuil vacsaínithe

translation.en: 95% vaccinated
translation.ga: 95% vacsaínithe

translation.en: Reducing the burden on people
translation.ga: Laghdú an ualaigh atá ar na daoine

translation.en: By helping keep more people healthy, vaccination helps reduce the social and psychological toll of illness on people and lessens the burden on hospitals and healthcare systems.
translation.ga: A sláinte a fhágáil ag oiread daoine agus is féidir, sin mar is cúnamh an vacsaíniú le lorg na heasláinte a laghdú go sóisialta agus ó thaobh na síceolaíochta de, agus is laghdú ualaigh é dá réir do na hospidéil agus na córais cúraim sláinte.

translation.en: This means that resources can go to fighting other diseases, such as cancer or alzheimer ’ s.
translation.ga: Fágann siad gur féidir cuid de na hacmhainní a chur i gcoinne galair eile, an ailse nó meath intinne alzheimer, cuir i gcás.

translation.en: Smallpox
translation.ga: An bholgach

translation.en: Thanks to vaccination, smallpox has been completely wiped out.
translation.ga: Tá an bholgach curtha den saol ar fad a bhuí leis an vacsaíniú.

translation.en: It was once a common disease that killed a third of people who contracted it.
translation.ga: Tráth dá raibh, is galar coitianta a bhí ann, galar a mharaíodh trian na ndaoine a tholg é.

translation.en: The last case of naturally contracted smallpox was in 1977 and it was eradicated in 1980.
translation.ga: Is in 1977 a bhí cás ann go deireanach den bholgach a tolgadh go nádúrtha, agus cuireadh deireadh leis ar fad in 1980.

translation.en: Polio is an infectious disease mostly contracted by children.
translation.ga: Is galar tógálach é an póilió, galar a bhíonn ar leanaí den chuid is mó.

translation.en: 1 person in 200 develops incurable paralysis after infection.
translation.ga: Tar éis tholgadh an ghalair, cailleann duine as gach dhá chéad lúth na ngéag, rud nach bhfuil leigheas air.

translation.en: A vaccine was developed in 1955 and widely introduced.
translation.ga: Tugadh vacsaín chun cinn in 1955, agus dáileadh go forleathan é.

translation.en: As of 2020, the only remaining cases of polio have been found in pakistan and afghanistan.
translation.ga: Ní raibh fágtha ar domhan den ghalar in 2020 ach cásanna sa phacastáin agus san afganastáin.

translation.en: The measles virus was identified in 1954 and a vaccine was introduced in 1963.
translation.ga: Tugadh sainaithint ar víreas na bruitíní in 1954, agus cuireadh víreas ar fáil in 1963.

translation.en: Thanks to vaccination, between 2000 and 2018, global deaths from measles fell by 73%.
translation.ga: A bhuí leis an vacsaíniú, idir 2000 agus 2018, tháinig laghdú 73% ar líon na ndaoine a fuair bás leis an mbruitíneach ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: 23 million deaths were prevented.
translation.ga: Tugadh 23 mhilliún duine slán ón mbás.

translation.en: The americas have been measles-free since 2002.
translation.ga: Ó 2002 i leith, tá meiriceá glan ar an mbruitíneach idir thuaidh, theas, agus láir.

translation.en: However, outbreaks of measles still occur in several european countries because vaccination coverage is insufficient in certain areas.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, bíonn ráigeanna den bhruitíneach ann i dtíortha éagsúla san eoraip fós, óir ní leor an leibhéal vacsaínithe i gceantair áirithe.

translation.en: Put an end to the covid-19 pandemic.
translation.ga: Chun deireadh a chur le paindéim covid-19.

translation.en: The european commission is building one of the broadest portfolios of different vaccines that are safe, effective and affordable.
translation.ga: Tá ceann de na punanna is leithne de vacsaíní éagsúla atá sábháilte, éifeachtach agus inacmhainne á cur le chéile ag an gcoimisiún eorpach go dtí seo, tá dáileoga de shé cinn de na vacsaíní is mó a bhfuil gealladh fúthu cinntithe ag an gcoimisiún.

translation.en: The commission secured doses of six of the most promising vaccines so far.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh níos mó ann amach anseo.

translation.en: More may come.
translation.ga: Tá roinnt de na vacsaíní

translation.en: Some of these future vaccines are based on new technologies, so we can develop and produce them rapidly in the face of the emergency.
translation.ga: A bheidh ann amach anseo bunaithe ar theicneolaíochtaí nua, mar sin is féidir linn iad a fhorbairt agus a tháirgeadh go tapa i bhfianaise na héigeandála.

translation.en: They are also based on different technologies, to improve our chances of finding effective ones rapidly.
translation.ga: Is ar theicneolaíochtaí éagsúla atá siad bunaithe freisin chun go mbeidh seans níos fearr againn cinn éifeachtacha a aimsiú go tapa.

translation.en: Vaccines only go on the market after a thorough and rigorous evaluation to prove they are safe for all.
translation.ga: Ní chuirtear vacsaíní ar an margadh go dtí go ndéantar meastóireacht chuimsitheach dian orthu chun a chruthú go bhfuil siad sábháilte do chách.

translation.en: Once authorised, the vaccines are made available to eu countries at the same time and at the same conditions.
translation.ga: A luaithe a údarófar iad, cuirtear na vacsaíní ar fáil do na ballstáit ag an am céanna agus faoi na coinníollacha céanna.

translation.en: So far, the commission has secured up to 4.4 billion doses biontech / pfizer up to 2.4 moderna up to 460 million doses billion doses
translation.ga: Go dtí seo, tá suas le 4.4 billiún dáileog faighte ag an gcoimisiún biontechpfizer moderna suas le 460 suas le 2.4 mhilliún dáileog billiún dáileog

translation.en: Option to purchase 900 million doses
translation.ga: An rogha ann suas le 900 milliún dáileog a cheannach

translation.en: To be effective, most vaccines are likely to need two doses per person.
translation.ga: Ionas go mbeidh sé éifeachtach, is dócha go mbeidh dhá dháileog in aghaidh an duine ag teastáil d ’ fhormhór na vacsaíní.

translation.en: We have secured sufficient doses of vaccines for eu citizens.
translation.ga: Tá dáileoga leordhóthanacha vacsaíní cinntithe againn do shaoránaigh an aontais.

translation.en: Vaccination is voluntary.
translation.ga: Is ar bhonn deonach a dhéantar an vacsaíniú.

translation.en: Europe is investing in vaccines not only for europeans.
translation.ga: Ní i vacsaíní do shaoránaigh na heorpa amháin atá infheistíocht á déanamh ag an eoraip.

translation.en: Eu countries may donate vaccine doses to vulnerable countries in the neighbourhood and beyond.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh na ballstáit dáileoga vacsaíne a bhronnadh ar thíortha comharsanachta agus ar thíortha níos faide i gcéin atá leochaileach.

translation.en: The european commission has granted marketing authorisations to the biontechpfizer, moderna, astrazeneca and johnson & johnson covid-19 vaccines based on positive scientific opinions by the european medicines agency.
translation.ga: Tá údaruithe margaíochta tugtha ag an gcoimisiún eorpach do vacsaíní biontech-pfizer, modern, astrazeneca agus johnson & johnson in aghaidh covid-19 ar bhonn tuairimí eolaíocha dearfacha ón ngníomhaireacht leigheasra eorpach.

translation.en: The first european citizens were vaccinated at the end of december 2020, during the eu vaccination days.
translation.ga: Rinneadh na chéad saoránaigh eorpacha a vacsaíniú ag deireadh mhí na nollag 2020, le linn laethanta eorpacha an vacsaínithe.

translation.ga: Ní dóigh liom go bhfuil brú fola ard agam

translation.ga: Mothaím pian sa chófra anseo sa chuid tosaigh den chófra

translation.ga: Bhí pian gearr géar agam i mo bhrollach

translation.ga: Atá déanta agam ar an gcorp timpeall an cheantair cófra?

translation.ga: Feicim é ag dul ó lár do bhrollach ag dul suas go dtí do mhuineál

translation.en: It is occurring right in the middle of my chest

translation.ga: Is cosúil go bhfuil an éagsúlacht gairdín fuar nó fliú agat

translation.en: Most of the time it is this type of chest pain
translation.ga: An chuid is mó den am is pian cófra den chineál seo é

translation.ga: Mar sin thosaigh do phian cófra ar maidin

translation.en: The fever started two days ago

translation.en: The muscle pains with the hay fever
translation.ga: Pianta na matáin leis an bhfiabhras féar

translation.en: Well from my point of view it is a little flu
translation.ga: Bhuel ó mo thaobh is fliú beag é

translation.en: Well madam from listening to your symptoms it sounds like you've got one of the flu viruses
translation.ga: Bhuel madam ó bheith ag éisteacht le do chuid comharthaí is cosúil go bhfuil ceann de na víris fliú agat

translation.en: You are probably having chest pain
translation.ga: Is dócha go bhfuil pian cófra ort

translation.en: Preliminary estimates of the prevalence of selected underlying health conditions among patients with coronavirus disease 2019 — united states, february 12 – march 28, 2020
translation.ga: Réamhmheastacháin ar leitheadúlacht coinníollacha sláinte bunúsacha roghnaithe i measc othair a bhfuil galar coronavirus 2019 - stáit aontaithe mheiriceá, 12 feabhra - 28 márta, 2020

translation.en: On march 11, 2020, the world health organization declared coronavirus disease 2019 (covid-19) a pandemic.
translation.ga: Ar 11 márta 2020, dhearbhaigh an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte galar coronavirus 2019 (covid-19) mar phaindéim.

translation.en: As of march 28, 2020, a total of 571,678 confirmed covid-19 cases and 26,494 deaths have been reported worldwide.
translation.ga: Amhail an 28 márta 2020, dearbhaíodh 571,678 cás covid-19 san iomlán agus tuairiscíodh 26,494 bás ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: Reports from china and italy suggest that risk factors for severe disease include older age and the presence of at least one of several underlying health conditions.
translation.ga: Tugann tuairiscí ón tsín agus ón iodáil le fios go n-áiríonn fachtóirí riosca do ghalair throm seanaois agus láithreacht ceann amháin ar a laghad de roinnt riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha.

translation.en: U.s. older adults, including those aged ≥ 65 years and particularly those aged ≥ 85 years, also appear to be at higher risk for severe covid-19 – associated outcomes; however, data describing underlying health conditions among u.s. covid-19 patients have not yet been reported.
translation.ga: Is cosúil go bhfuil daoine fásta níos sine na sa, lena n-áirítear daoine ≥ 65 bliana d ’ aois agus go háirithe daoine ≥ 85 mbliana d ’ aois, i mbaol níos airde i gcás torthaí troma a bhaineann le covid-19; áfach, níor tuairiscíodh sonraí a chuireann síos ar dhálaí bunúsacha sláinte i measc othair covid-19 na s.a.

translation.en: As of march 28, 2020, u.s. states and territories have reported 122,653 u.s. covid-19 cases to cdc, including 7,162 (5.8%) for whom data on underlying health conditions and other known risk factors for severe outcomes from respiratory infections were reported.
translation.ga: Amhail an 28 márta, 2020, thuairiscigh stáit agus críocha na stát aontaithe 122,653 cás covid-19 de chuid na stát aontaithe do cdc, lena n-áirítear 7,162 (5.8%) ar tuairiscíodh sonraí faoi dhálaí sláinte bunúsacha agus fachtóirí riosca aitheanta eile le haghaidh torthaí troma ó ionfhabhtuithe riospráide.

translation.en: Among these 7,162 cases, 2,692 (37.6%) patients had one or more underlying health condition or risk factor, and 4,470 (62.4%) had none of these conditions reported.
translation.ga: I measc na 7,162 cás seo, bhí riocht sláinte nó fachtóir riosca amháin nó níos mó ag 2,692 (37.6%) othar, agus níor tuairiscíodh 4,470 (62.4%) ar aon cheann de na coinníollacha seo.

translation.en: The percentage of covid-19 patients with at least one underlying health condition or risk factor was higher among those requiring intensive care unit (icu) admission (358 of 457, 78%) and those requiring hospitalization without icu admission (732 of 1,037, 71%) than that among those who were not hospitalized (1,388 of 5,143, 27%).
translation.ga: Bhí céatadán na n-othar covid-19 a raibh riocht sláinte bunúsach nó fachtóir riosca amháin acu ar a laghad níos airde i measc na ndaoine a raibh iontráil aonad dianchúraim (icu) ag teastáil uathu (358 as 457, 78%) agus iad siúd a raibh gá acu le hospidéal gan iontráil icu (732 de 1,037, 71%) ná sin i measc na ndaoine nach raibh san ospidéal (1,388 de 5,143, 27%).

translation.en: The most commonly reported conditions were diabetes mellitus, chronic lung disease, and cardiovascular disease.
translation.ga: Ba iad na coinníollacha is minice a tuairiscíodh diaibéiteas mellitus, galar scamhóg ainsealach, agus galar cardashoithíoch.

translation.en: These preliminary findings suggest that in the united states, persons with underlying health conditions or other recognized risk factors for severe outcomes from respiratory infections appear to be at a higher risk for severe disease from covid-19 than are persons without these conditions.
translation.ga: Tugann na réamhthorthaí seo le tuiscint gur cosúil go bhfuil daoine le riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha nó fachtóirí riosca aitheanta eile le haghaidh torthaí troma ó ionfhabhtuithe riospráide i mbaol níos airde do ghalair throm ó covid-19 ná mar atá ag daoine gan na coinníollacha seo.

translation.en: Data from laboratory-confirmed covid-19 cases reported to cdc from 50 states, four u.s. territories and affiliated islands, the district of columbia, and new york city with february 12 – march 28, 2020 onset dates were analyzed.
translation.ga: Rinneadh anailís ar shonraí ó chásanna covid-19 arna ndeimhniú ag saotharlann a tuairiscíodh do cdc ó 50 stát, ceithre chríoch de chuid na s.a. agus oileáin chleamhnaithe, dúiche columbia, agus cathair nua eabhrac le 12 feabhra - 28 márta, 2020.

translation.en: Cases among persons repatriated to the united states from wuhan, china, and the diamond princess cruise ship were excluded.
translation.ga: Cuireadh cásanna i measc daoine a cuireadh ar ais chuig na stáit aontaithe ó wuhan, an tsín, agus long cúrsála diamond princess as an áireamh.

translation.en: For cases with missing onset dates, date of onset was estimated by subtracting 4 days (median interval from symptom onset to specimen collection date among cases with known dates in these data) from the earliest specimen collection.
translation.ga: I gcás cásanna a raibh dátaí tosaithe in easnamh orthu, rinneadh an dáta a thosaigh a mheas trí 4 lá (eatramh airmheánach ó thús na siomtóm go dtí an dáta bailithe eiseamal a dhealú i measc cásanna a raibh dátaí aitheanta sna sonraí seo) ón mbailiúchán eiseamail is luaithe.

translation.en: Public health departments reported cases to cdc using a standardized case report form that captures information (yes, no, or unknown) on the following conditions and potential risk factors: Chronic lung disease (inclusive of asthma, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease [copd], and emphysema); diabetes mellitus; cardiovascular disease; chronic renal disease; chronic liver disease; immunocompromised condition; neurologic disorder, neurodevelopmental, or intellectual disability; pregnancy; current smoking status; former smoking status; or other chronic disease.
translation.ga: Thuairiscigh ranna sláinte poiblí cásanna do cdc ag baint úsáide as foirm chaighdeánaithe tuarascála cáis a ghlacann faisnéis (sea, níl, nó anaithnid) faoi na coinníollacha seo a leanas agus na fachtóirí riosca féideartha: Galar scamhóg ainsealach (lena n-áirítear asma, galar scamhógach bac ainsealach [copd], agus emphysema); diabéites; galar cardashoithíoch; galar duánach ainsealach; galar ae ainsealach; riocht imdhíontaithe; neamhord néareolaíoch, míchumas neurodevelopmental, nó intleachtúil; toircheas; stádas reatha caitheamh tobac; iar-stádas caitheamh tobac; nó galar ainsealach eile.

translation.en: Data reported to cdc are preliminary and can be updated by health departments over time; critical data elements might be missing at the time of initial report; thus, this analysis is descriptive, and no statistical comparisons could be made.
translation.ga: Is réamhshonraí iad na sonraí a thuairiscítear do cdc agus is féidir le ranna sláinte iad a nuashonrú le himeacht ama; d ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh eilimintí criticiúla sonraí in easnamh tráth na tuarascála tosaigh; dá bhrí sin, tá an anailís seo tuairisciúil, agus ní fhéadfaí aon chomparáid staitistiúil a dhéanamh.

translation.en: The percentages of patients of all ages with underlying health conditions who were not hospitalized, hospitalized without icu admission, and hospitalized with icu admission were calculated.
translation.ga: Ríomhadh céatadáin na n-othar de gach aois le riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha nach raibh san ospidéal, san ospidéal gan iontráil icu, agus san ospidéal le ligean isteach icu.

translation.en: Percentages of hospitalizations with and without icu admission were estimated for persons aged ≥ 19 years with and without underlying health conditions.
translation.ga: Measadh céatadáin na n-ospidéal le hiontráil icu agus gan é do dhaoine ≥ 19 mbliana d ’ aois a bhfuil riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha orthu agus nach raibh.

translation.en: This part of the analysis was limited to persons aged ≥ 19 years because of the small sample size of cases in children with reported underlying health conditions (n = 32).
translation.ga: Bhí an chuid seo den anailís teoranta do dhaoine ≥ 19 mbliana d ’ aois mar gheall ar mhéid an tsampla beag cásanna i leanaí a bhfuil riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha tuairiscithe orthu (n = 32).

translation.en: To account for missing data among these preliminary reports, ranges were estimated with a lower bound including cases with both known and unknown status for hospitalization with and without icu admission as the denominator and an upper bound using only cases with known outcome status as the denominator.
translation.ga: Chun cuntas a thabhairt ar shonraí a bhí in easnamh i measc na réamhthuairiscí seo, measadh go raibh raonta faoi cheangal níos ísle lena n-áirítear cásanna a raibh stádas aitheanta agus anaithnid acu san ospidéal le hiontráil icu agus gan é mar an t-ainmneoir agus faoi cheangal uachtarach ag úsáid cásanna amháin a raibh stádas toraidh aitheanta acu mar an t-ainmneoir.

translation.en: Because of small sample size and missing data on underlying health conditions among covid-19 patients who died, case-fatality rates for persons with and without underlying conditions were not estimated.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar mhéid na samplaí beaga agus sonraí in easnamh ar dhálaí bunúsacha sláinte i measc othair covid-19 a fuair bás, níor measadh rátaí básmhaireachta do dhaoine le coinníollacha bunúsacha agus gan iad.

translation.en: As of march 28, 2020, a total of 122,653 laboratory-confirmed covid-19 cases (figure) and 2,112 deaths were reported to cdc.
translation.ga: Amhail an 28 márta, 2020, tuairiscíodh 122,653 cás covid-19 (fíor) agus 2,112 bás arna ndeimhniú ag saotharlann do cdc.

translation.en: Case report forms were submitted to cdc for 74,439 (60.7%) cases.
translation.ga: Cuireadh foirmeacha tuarascála cáis faoi bhráid cdc le haghaidh 74,439 (60.7%) cás.

translation.en: Data on presence or absence of underlying health conditions and other recognized risk factors for severe outcomes from respiratory infections (i.e., smoking and pregnancy) were available for 7,162 (5.8%) patients (table 1).
translation.ga: Bhí sonraí maidir le láithreacht nó neamhláithreacht riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha agus fachtóirí riosca aitheanta eile le haghaidh torthaí troma ó ionfhabhtuithe riospráide (i.e. caitheamh tobac agus toircheas) ar fáil do 7,162 (5.8%) othar (tábla 1).

translation.en: Approximately one third of these patients (2,692, 37.6%), had at least one underlying condition or risk factor.
translation.ga: Bhí riocht bunúsach nó fachtóir riosca amháin ar a laghad ag thart ar aon trian de na hothair sin (2,692, 37.6%).

translation.en: Diabetes mellitus (784, 10.9%), chronic lung disease (656, 9.2%), and cardiovascular disease (647, 9.0%) were the most frequently reported conditions among all cases.
translation.ga: Ba iad diaibéiteas mellitus (784, 10.9%), galar scamhóg ainsealach (656, 9.2%), agus galar cardashoithíoch (647, 9.0%) na coinníollacha is minice a tuairiscíodh i measc na gcásanna go léir.

translation.en: Among 457 icu admissions and 1,037 non-icu hospitalizations, 358 (78%) and 732 (71%), respectively occurred among persons with one or more reported underlying health condition.
translation.ga: I measc 457 iontráil icu agus 1,037 ospidéal neamh-icu, tharla 358 (78%) agus 732 (71%), faoi seach i measc daoine a raibh riocht sláinte bunúsach amháin nó níos mó tuairiscithe orthu.

translation.en: In contrast, 1,388 of 5,143 (27%) covid-19 patients who were not hospitalized were reported to have at least one underlying health condition.
translation.ga: I gcodarsnacht leis sin, tuairiscíodh go raibh riocht sláinte bunúsach amháin ar a laghad ag 1,388 as 5,143 (27%) othar covid-19 nár cuireadh san ospidéal.

translation.en: Among patients aged ≥ 19 years, the percentage of non-icu hospitalizations was higher among those with underlying health conditions (27.3% – 29.8%) than among those without underlying health conditions (7.2% – 7.8%); the percentage of cases that resulted in an icu admission was also higher for those with underlying health conditions (13.3% – 14.5%) than those without these conditions (2.2% – 2.4%) (table 2).
translation.ga: I measc na n-othar ≥ 19 mbliana d ’ aois, bhí céatadán na n-ospidéal neamh-icu níos airde i measc iad siúd a raibh riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha orthu (27.3% – 29.8%) ná i measc na ndaoine sin nach raibh riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha orthu (7.2% -7.8%); bhí céatadán na gcásanna a raibh iontráil icu mar thoradh orthu níos airde freisin dóibh siúd a raibh riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha orthu (13.3% – 14.5%) ná iad siúd gan na coinníollacha seo (2.2% – 2.4%) (tábla 2).

translation.en: Small numbers of covid-19 patients aged & lt; 19 years were reported to be hospitalized (48) or admitted to an icu (eight).
translation.ga: Líon beag othar covid-19 in aois & lt; tuairiscíodh go raibh 19 mbliana san ospidéal (48) nó gur iontráladh chuig icu iad (ochtar).

translation.en: In contrast, 335 patients aged & lt; 19 years were not hospitalized and 1,342 had missing data on hospitalization.
translation.ga: I gcodarsnacht leis sin, 335 othar in aois & lt; níor cuireadh 19 mbliana san ospidéal agus bhí sonraí in easnamh ar 1,342 san ospidéal.

translation.en: Among all covid-19 patients with complete information on underlying conditions or risk factors, 184 deaths occurred (all among patients aged ≥ 19 years); 173 deaths (94%) were reported among patients with at least one underlying condition.
translation.ga: I measc na n-othar covid-19 go léir a raibh faisnéis iomlán acu faoi dhálaí bunúsacha nó fachtóirí riosca, tharla 184 bás (iad uile i measc othair ≥ 19 mbliana d ’ aois); tuairiscíodh 173 bás (94%) i measc othar a raibh riocht bunúsach amháin orthu ar a laghad.

translation.en: Among 122,653 u.s. covid-19 cases reported to cdc as of march 28, 2020, 7,162 (5.8%) patients had data available pertaining to underlying health conditions or potential risk factors; among these patients, higher percentages of patients with underlying conditions were admitted to the hospital and to an icu than patients without reported underlying conditions.
translation.ga: I measc 122,653 cás covid-19 de chuid na s.a. a tuairiscíodh do cdc amhail an 28 márta, 2020, bhí sonraí ar fáil ag 7,162 (5.8%) d ’ othair a bhain le riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha nó le fachtóirí riosca féideartha; i measc na n-othar seo, tugadh céatadáin níos airde d ’ othair le riochtaí bunúsacha chuig an ospidéal agus chuig icu ná othair gan coinníollacha bunúsacha tuairiscithe.

translation.en: These results are consistent with findings from china and italy, which suggest that patients with underlying health conditions and risk factors, including, but not limited to, diabetes mellitus, hypertension, copd, coronary artery disease, cerebrovascular disease, chronic renal disease, and smoking, might be at higher risk for severe disease or death from covid-19.
translation.ga: Tá na torthaí seo comhsheasmhach le torthaí ón tsín agus ón iodáil, a thugann le tuiscint go bhféadfadh othair a bhfuil riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha agus fachtóirí riosca orthu, lena n-áirítear, ach gan a bheith teoranta dóibh, diaibéiteas mellitus, hipirtheannas, copd, galar artaire corónach, galar cerebrovascular, galar duánach ainsealach, agus caitheamh tobac, a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith i mbaol níos airde do ghalar trom nó bás ó covid-19.

translation.en: This analysis was limited by small numbers and missing data because of the burden placed on reporting health departments with rapidly rising case counts, and these findings might change as additional data become available.
translation.ga: Bhí an anailís seo teoranta ag líon beag agus sonraí in easnamh mar gheall ar an ualach a cuireadh ar ranna sláinte a thuairisciú le comhaireamh cásanna atá ag ardú go tapa, agus d ’ fhéadfadh go dtiocfadh athrú ar na torthaí sin de réir mar a bheidh sonraí breise ar fáil.

translation.en: It is not yet known whether the severity or level of control of underlying health conditions affects the risk for severe disease associated with covid-19.
translation.ga: Ní fios fós an bhfuil tionchar ag déine nó leibhéal rialaithe na ndálaí sláinte bunúsacha ar an mbaol do ghalair thromchúiseacha a bhaineann le covid-19.

translation.en: Many of these underlying health conditions are common in the united states: Based on self-reported 2018 data, the prevalence of diagnosed diabetes among u.s. adults was 10.1%, and the u.s. age-adjusted prevalence of all types of heart disease (excluding hypertension without other heart disease) was 10.6% in 2017.
translation.ga: Tá go leor de na riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha seo coitianta sna stáit aontaithe: Bunaithe ar shonraí féintuairiscithe 2018, ba é leitheadúlacht diaibéiteas a ndearnadh diagnóis air i measc daoine fásta na sa ná 10.1%, agus leitheadúlacht gach cineál galar croí arna choigeartú de réir aoise na sa (gan hipirtheannas a áireamh gan galar croí eile) a bhí ag 10.6% in 2017.

translation.en: The age-adjusted prevalence of copd among u.s. adults is 5.9%, and in 2018, the u.s. estimated prevalence of current asthma among persons of all ages was 7.9%.
translation.ga: Is é an leitheadúlacht coigeartaithe de réir aoise de copd i measc daoine fásta na sa ná 5.9%, agus in 2018, ba é leitheadúlacht measta na sa i measc daoine de gach aois ná 7.9%.

translation.en: Cdc continues to develop and update resources for persons with underlying health conditions to reduce the risk of acquiring covid-19.
translation.ga: Leanann cdc ag forbairt agus ag nuashonrú acmhainní do dhaoine le riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha chun an riosca a bhaineann le covid-19 a fháil a laghdú.

translation.en: The estimated higher prevalence of these conditions among those in this early group of u.s. covid-19 patients and the potentially higher risk for more severe disease from covid-19 associated with the presence of underlying conditions highlight the importance of covid-19 prevention in persons with underlying conditions.
translation.ga: Aibhsíonn leitheadúlacht measta níos airde na gcoinníollacha seo i measc iad siúd sa ghrúpa luath seo d ’ othair covid-19 na sa agus an riosca a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith níos airde do ghalar níos déine ó covid-19 a bhaineann le láithreacht na ndálaí bunúsacha an tábhacht a bhaineann le cosc ​ ​ covid-19 i ndaoine a bhfuil coinníollacha bunúsacha.

translation.en: The findings in this report are subject to at least six limitations.
translation.ga: Tá torthaí na tuarascála seo faoi réir sé theorainn ar a laghad.

translation.en: First, these data are preliminary, and the analysis was limited by missing data related to the health department reporting burden associated with rapidly rising case counts and delays in completion of information requiring medical chart review; these findings might change as additional data become available.
translation.ga: Ar dtús, tá na sonraí seo réamhfhaisnéise, agus bhí an anailís teoranta trí shonraí a bheith in easnamh a bhaineann le hualach tuairiscithe na roinne sláinte a bhaineann le comhaireamh cásanna atá ag ardú go tapa agus moilleanna ar chríochnú na faisnéise a éilíonn athbhreithniú ar chairt leighis; d ’ fhéadfadh go dtiocfadh athrú ar na torthaí seo de réir mar a bheidh sonraí breise ar fáil.

translation.en: Information on underlying conditions was only available for 7,162 (5.8%) of 122,653 cases reported to cdc.
translation.ga: Ní raibh faisnéis faoi dhálaí bunúsacha ar fáil ach do 7,162 (5.8%) de 122,653 cás a tuairiscíodh do cdc.

translation.en: It cannot be assumed that those with missing information are similar to those with data on either hospitalizations or underlying health conditions.
translation.ga: Ní féidir glacadh leis go bhfuil na daoine a bhfuil faisnéis in easnamh orthu cosúil leo siúd a bhfuil sonraí acu faoi ospidéil nó faoi dhálaí sláinte bunúsacha.

translation.en: Second, these data are subject to bias in outcome ascertainment because of short follow-up time.
translation.ga: Ar an dara dul síos, tá na sonraí seo faoi réir claonta maidir le fionnachtana torthaí mar gheall ar am gairid leantach.

translation.en: Some outcomes might be underestimated, and long-term outcomes cannot be assessed in this analysis.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí roinnt torthaí a mheas faoina luach, agus ní féidir torthaí fadtéarmacha a mheas san anailís seo.

translation.en: Third, because of the limited availability of testing in many jurisdictions during this period, this analysis is likely biased toward more severe cases, and findings might change as testing becomes more widespread.
translation.ga: Ar an tríú dul síos, mar gheall ar infhaighteacht theoranta tástála i go leor dlínsí le linn na tréimhse seo, is dócha go mbeidh an anailís seo claonta i dtreo cásanna níos déine, agus d ’ fhéadfadh go n-athróidh na torthaí de réir mar a thiocfaidh tástáil níos forleithne.

translation.en: Fourth, because of the descriptive nature of these data, attack rates among persons with and without underlying health conditions could not be compared, and thus the risk difference of severe disease with covid-19 between these groups could not be estimated.
translation.ga: Ar an gceathrú dul síos, mar gheall ar nádúr tuairisciúil na sonraí seo, ní fhéadfaí comparáid a dhéanamh idir rátaí ionsaithe i measc daoine a bhfuil riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha orthu agus gan iad, agus dá bhrí sin ní fhéadfaí an difríocht riosca a bhaineann le galar trom le covid-19 idir na grúpaí seo a mheas.

translation.en: Fifth, no conclusions could be drawn about underlying conditions that were not included in the case report form or about different conditions that were reported in a single, umbrella category.
translation.ga: Cúigiú, ní fhéadfaí aon chonclúidí a dhéanamh faoi bhunchoinníollacha nár áiríodh i bhfoirm na tuarascála cáis nó faoi dhálaí éagsúla a tuairiscíodh in aon scáth-chatagóir amháin.

translation.en: For example, asthma and copd were included in a chronic lung disease category.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, cuireadh asma agus copd san áireamh i gcatagóir galar scamhóg ainsealach.

translation.en: Finally, for some underlying health conditions and risk factors, including neurologic disorders, chronic liver disease, being a current smoker, and pregnancy, few severe outcomes were reported; therefore, conclusions cannot be drawn about the risk for severe covid-19 among persons in these groups.
translation.ga: Mar fhocal scoir, i gcás roinnt riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha agus fachtóirí riosca, lena n-áirítear neamhoird néareolaíocha, galar ae ainsealach, a bheith ina chaiteoirí tobac reatha, agus toircheas, is beag torthaí troma a tuairiscíodh; dá bhrí sin, ní féidir conclúidí a dhéanamh faoin riosca do covid-19 trom i measc daoine sna grúpaí seo.

translation.en: Persons in the united states with underlying health conditions appear to be at higher risk for more severe covid-19, consistent with findings from other countries.
translation.ga: Is cosúil go bhfuil daoine sna stáit aontaithe a bhfuil riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha orthu i mbaol níos airde do covid-19 níos déine, i gcomhréir le torthaí ó thíortha eile.

translation.en: Persons with underlying health conditions who have symptoms of covid-19, including fever, cough, or shortness of breath, should immediately contact their health care provider.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do dhaoine le riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha a bhfuil comharthaí covid-19 orthu, lena n-áirítear fiabhras, casacht, nó giorra anála, teagmháil a dhéanamh láithreach lena soláthraí cúraim sláinte.

translation.en: These persons should take steps to protect themselves from covid-19, through washing their hands; cleaning and disinfecting high-touch surfaces; and social distancing, including staying at home, avoiding crowds, gatherings, and travel, and avoiding contact with persons who are ill.
translation.ga: Ba cheart do na daoine seo céimeanna a ghlacadh chun iad féin a chosaint ar covid-19, trína lámha a ní; dromchlaí ardteagmhála a ghlanadh agus a dhíghalrú; agus fadú sóisialta, lena n-áirítear fanacht sa bhaile, sluaite a sheachaint, cruinnithe agus taisteal, agus teagmháil le daoine atá tinn a sheachaint.

translation.en: Maintaining at least a 30-day supply of medication, a 2-week supply of food and other necessities, and knowledge of covid-19 symptoms are recommended for those with underlying health conditions.
translation.ga: Moltar soláthar 30 lá ar a laghad de chógas, soláthar coicíse bia agus riachtanais eile, agus eolas ar airíonna covid-19 dóibh siúd a bhfuil riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha orthu.

translation.en: All persons should take steps to protect themselves from covid-19 and to protect others.
translation.ga: Ba cheart do gach duine bearta a dhéanamh chun iad féin a chosaint ar covid-19 agus chun daoine eile a chosaint.

translation.en: All persons who are ill should stay home, except to get medical care; should not go to work; and should stay away from others.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do gach duine atá tinn fanacht sa bhaile, ach amháin cúram leighis a fháil; níor chóir dó dul ag obair; agus ba chóir dóibh fanacht amach ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: This is especially important for those who work with persons with underlying conditions or who otherwise are at high risk for severe outcomes from covid-19.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo tábhachtach go háirithe dóibh siúd a oibríonn le daoine le riochtaí bunúsacha nó atá i mbaol ard murach torthaí tromchúiseacha ó covid-19.

translation.en: Community mitigation strategies, which aim to slow the spread of covid-19, are important to protect all persons from covid-19, especially persons with underlying health conditions and other persons at risk for severe covid-19 – associated disease (https: / / www.cdc.gov / coronavirus / 2019-ncov / downloads / community-mitigation-strategy.pdf).
translation.ga: Tá straitéisí maolaithe pobail, a bhfuil sé mar aidhm acu scaipeadh covid-19 a mhoilliú, tábhachtach chun gach duine a chosaint ar covid-19, go háirithe daoine a bhfuil riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha orthu agus daoine eile atá i mbaol do ghalar tromchúiseach a bhaineann le covid-19 (https: / / www.cdc.gov / coronavirus / 2019-ncov / downloads / community-mitigation-strategy.pdf).

translation.en: What is already known about this topic?
translation.ga: Cad atá ar eolas cheana faoin ábhar seo?

translation.en: Published reports from china and italy suggest that risk factors for severe covid-19 disease include underlying health conditions, but data describing underlying health conditions among u.s. covid-19 patients have not yet been reported.
translation.ga: Tugann tuairiscí foilsithe ón tsín agus ón iodáil le fios go n-áiríonn fachtóirí riosca do dhroch-ghalar covid-19 riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha, ach níor tuairiscíodh sonraí a chuireann síos ar dhálaí bunúsacha sláinte i measc othair covid-19 na s.a.

translation.en: What is added by this report?
translation.ga: Cad a chuireann an tuarascáil seo leis?

translation.en: Based on preliminary u.s. data, persons with underlying health conditions such as diabetes mellitus, chronic lung disease, and cardiovascular disease, appear to be at higher risk for severe covid-19 – associated disease than persons without these conditions.
translation.ga: Bunaithe ar réamhshonraí na s.a., is cosúil go bhfuil daoine a bhfuil riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha orthu mar diaibéiteas mellitus, galar scamhóg ainsealach, agus galar cardashoithíoch, i mbaol níos airde do ghalar tromchúiseach a bhaineann le covid-19 ná daoine gan na coinníollacha seo.

translation.en: What are the implications for public health practice?
translation.ga: Cad iad na himpleachtaí do chleachtas sláinte poiblí?

translation.en: Strategies to protect all persons and especially those with underlying health conditions, including social distancing and handwashing, should be implemented by all communities and all persons to help slow the spread of covid-19.
translation.ga: Ba cheart do gach pobal agus duine aonair straitéisí a chur i bhfeidhm do gach duine agus go háirithe dóibh siúd a bhfuil riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha orthu, lena n-áirítear fadú sóisialta agus cuas láimhe chun scaipeadh covid-19 a mhoilliú.

translation.en: Emergence of a novel coronavirus (covid-19): Protocol for extending surveillance used by the royal college of general practitioners research and surveillance centre and public health england
translation.ga: Teacht chun cinn coronavirus úrscéal (covid-19): Prótacal um fhaireachas sínte arna úsáid ag ionad taighde agus faireachais choláiste ríoga na ndochtúirí teaghlaigh agus sláinte poiblí shasana

translation.en: The royal college of general practitioners (rcgp) research and surveillance centre (rsc) and public health england (phe) have successfully worked together on the surveillance of influenza and other infectious diseases for over 50 years, including three previous pandemics.
translation.ga: D' oibrigh ionad taighde agus faireachais choláiste ríoga na ndochtúirí teaghlaigh (rcgp) agus sláinte poiblí shasana (phe) le chéile ar fhaireachas an fhliú agus galair thógálacha eile le breis agus 50 bliain, lena n-áirítear trí phaindéim roimhe seo.

translation.en: With the emergence of the international outbreak of the coronavirus infection (covid-19), a uk national approach to containment has been established to test people suspected of exposure to covid-19.
translation.ga: Le teacht chun cinn an ráig idirnáisiúnta d ’ ionfhabhtú coronavirus (covid-19), bunaíodh cur chuige náisiúnta i leith coimeádta sa ra chun tástáil a dhéanamh ar dhaoine a bhfuil amhras fúthu go bhfuil siad nochtaithe do covid-19.

translation.en: At the same time and separately, the rcgp rsc ’ s surveillance has been extended to monitor the temporal and geographical distribution of covid-19 infection in the community as well as assess the effectiveness of the containment strategy.
translation.ga: Ag an am céanna agus ar leithligh, leathnaíodh faireachas rcgp rsc chun monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar am agus ar dháileadh geografach an ionfhabhtaithe covid-19 sa phobal chomh maith le héifeachtacht na straitéise coimeádta a mheas.

translation.en: The aims of this study are to surveil covid-19 in both asymptomatic populations and ambulatory cases with respiratory infections, ascertain both the rate and pattern of covid-19 spread, and assess the effectiveness of the containment policy.
translation.ga: Is iad aidhmeanna an staidéir seo monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar covid-19 i ndaonraí neamhshiomptómacha agus i gcásanna imshruthaithe a bhfuil ionfhabhtuithe riospráide orthu, ráta agus patrún scaipeadh covid-19 a chinneadh, agus éifeachtacht an bheartais coimeádta a mheas.

translation.en: The rcgp rsc, a network of over 500 general practices in england, extract pseudonymized data weekly.
translation.ga: Aisghabhann rsc rcgp, líonra de níos mó ná 500 cleachtas ginearálta i sasana, sonraí ainm bréige ar bhonn seachtainiúil.

translation.en: This extended surveillance comprises of five components: (1) recording in medical records of anyone suspected to have or who has been exposed to covid-19.
translation.ga: Tá cúig chomhpháirt sa fhaireachas leathnaithe seo: (1) taifid mhíochaine aon duine a bhfuil amhras faoi nó atá nochtaithe do covid-19.

translation.en: Computerized medical records suppliers have within a week of request created new codes to support this.
translation.ga: Laistigh de sheachtain ón iarratas, tá soláthraithe cód nua tar éis cóid nua a chruthú chun tacú leis seo.

translation.en: (2) extension of current virological surveillance and testing people with influenza-like illness or lower respiratory tract infections (lrti) — with the caveat that people suspected to have or who have been exposed to covid-19 should be referred to the national containment pathway and not seen in primary care.
translation.ga: . Agus nach bhfacthas i gcúram príomhúil.

translation.en: (3) serology sample collection across all age groups.
translation.ga: (3) bailiúchán samplach séireolaíoch thar gach aoisghrúpa.

translation.en: This will be an extra blood sample taken from people who are attending their general practice for a scheduled blood test.
translation.ga: Sampla fola breise a bheidh anseo a thógfar ó dhaoine a fhreastalaíonn ar a gcleachtadh ginearálta le haghaidh tástála fola sceidealta.

translation.en: The 100 general practices currently undertaking annual influenza virology surveillance will be involved in the extended virological and serological surveillance.
translation.ga: Beidh an 100 cleachtas ginearálta a dhéanann faireachas víreolaíoch fliú bliantúil faoi láthair nasctha leis an bhfaireachas víreolaíoch agus séireolaíoch leathnaithe.

translation.en: (4) collecting convalescent serum samples.
translation.ga: (4) samplaí serum aisghabhála a bhailiú.

translation.en: We have the opportunity to escalate the data extraction to twice weekly if needed.
translation.ga: Tá an deis againn an eastóscadh sonraí a mhéadú go dtí dhá uair sa tseachtain más gá.

translation.en: Swabs and sera will be analyzed in phe reference laboratories.
translation.ga: Déanfar anailís ar swabs agus sera i saotharlanna tagartha phe.

translation.en: General practice clinical system providers have introduced an emergency new set of clinical codes to support covid-19 surveillance.
translation.ga: Tá sraith nua de chóid chliniciúla tugtha isteach ag soláthraithe córais chliniciúla cleachtais ghinearálta chun tacú le faireachas covid-19.

translation.en: Additionally, practices participating in current virology surveillance are now taking samples for covid-19 surveillance from low-risk patients presenting with lrtis.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, tá cleachtais atá rannpháirteach san fhaireachas víreolaíoch reatha ag glacadh samplaí anois le haghaidh faireachais covid-19 ó othair a mbaineann riosca íseal leo agus atá i láthair le lrtianna.

translation.en: Within the first 2 weeks of setup of this surveillance, we have identified 3 cases: 1 through the new coding system, the other 2 through the extended virology sampling.
translation.ga: Laistigh den chéad 2 sheachtain ó bunaíodh an faireachas seo, tá 3 chás aitheanta againn: 1 tríd an gcóras códaithe nua, an 2 cheann eile tríd an sampláil víreolaíoch leathnaithe.

translation.en: We have rapidly converted the established national rcgp rsc influenza surveillance system into one that can test the effectiveness of the covid-19 containment policy.
translation.ga: Rinneamar an córas faireachais fliú rccp náisiúnta fadbhunaithe rsc a thiontú go tapa ina chóras a fhéadann éifeachtacht bheartas coimeádta covid-19 a thástáil.

translation.en: The extended surveillance has already seen the use of new codes with 3 cases reported.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh ar fhaireachas leathnaithe cheana féin úsáideadh cóid nua agus tuairiscíodh 3 chás.

translation.en: Rapid sharing of this protocol should enable scientific critique and shared learning.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go gcuirfeadh comhroinnt tapa an phrótacail seo cáineadh eolaíoch agus foghlaim chomhroinnte ar chumas.

translation.en: The royal college of general practitioners (rcgp) research and surveillance centre (rsc) is a network of general practices (gps) with a nationally representative population that provides pseudonymized data for weekly surveillance of infectious diseases.
translation.ga: Is líonra de chleachtais ghinearálta (dochtúirí teaghlaigh) é ionad taighde agus faireachais choláiste ríoga na ndochtúirí teaghlaigh (rcgp) le daonra ionadaíoch náisiúnta a sholáthraíonn sonraí ainm bréige chun faireachas seachtainiúil a dhéanamh ar ghalair thógálacha.

translation.en: The disease surveillance program is commissioned by public health england (phe) and covers 37 infectious diseases, including influenza.
translation.ga: Déanann public health england (phe) an clár faireachais ar ghalair a choimisiúnú agus clúdaíonn sé 37 galar tógálach, lena n-áirítear an fliú.

translation.en: The rcgp rsc and phe have an established collaboration of over 50 years in influenza and respiratory disease surveillance and are now in their 53rd season of surveillance and analysis.
translation.ga: Tá comhoibriú bunaithe ag rcgp rsc agus phe le breis agus 50 bliain i bhfaireachas ar ghalair fliú agus riospráide agus tá siad anois ina 53ú séasúr faireachais agus anailíse.

translation.en: The rcgp rsc extracts pseudonymized data from a nationally representative sample of over 500 urban and nonurban gps each week covering a population of over 4 million.
translation.ga: Baineann rsc rcgp sonraí ainm bréige as sampla ionadaíoch náisiúnta de níos mó ná 500 dochtúir teaghlaigh uirbeacha agus neamh-uirbeacha gach seachtain a chlúdaíonn daonra os cionn 4 mhilliún.

translation.en: Data from these practices are reported online in a weekly return, which includes monitoring weekly rates of influenza-like illness (ili) and other communicable and respiratory diseases in england.
translation.ga: Tuairiscítear sonraí ó na cleachtais seo ar líne i dtuairisceán seachtainiúil, lena n-áirítear monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar rátaí seachtainiúla breoiteachta cosúil le fliú (ili) agus galair theagmhálacha agus riospráide eile i sasana.

translation.en: We also produce an annual report.
translation.ga: Soláthraímid tuarascáil bhliantúil freisin.

translation.en: The rcgp rsc data set includes all coded data and all prescribed items including vaccine exposure.
translation.ga: Cuimsíonn tacar sonraí rccp an rsc na sonraí códaithe go léir agus gach earra forordaithe lena n-áirítear nochtadh vacsaíne.

translation.en: The rcgp rsc conducts virology surveillance each influenza season, with 100 gps participating in the 2019-2020 season (figure 1).
translation.ga: Déanann rsc rcgp faireachas víreolaíoch gach séasúr fliú, agus glacann 100 dochtúir teaghlaigh páirt sa séasúr 2019-2020 (fíor 1).

translation.en: These virology sampling practices are also recruited to be nationally representative (figure 1).
translation.ga: Earcaítear na cleachtais samplála víreolaíochta seo freisin chun a bheith ionadaíoch go náisiúnta (fíor 1).

translation.en: Gps take nasopharyngeal swabs from persons showing acute respiratory illness within 7 days of the onset of symptoms.
translation.ga: Tógann dochtúirí teaghlaigh swabanna nasopharyngeal ó dhaoine a bhfuil galar géarmhíochaine riospráide orthu laistigh de 7 lá ó theacht na hairíonna.

translation.en: Nasopharyngeal swabs are taken from children younger than 5 years showing symptoms of acute bronchitis or bronchiolitis.
translation.ga: Tógtar swabanna nasopharyngeal ó leanaí níos óige ná 5 bliana a léiríonn comharthaí bronchitis géarmhíochaine nó bronchiolitis.

translation.en: Additionally, nasopharyngeal samples are taken from anyone 5 years and older showing acute onset of ili and respiratory synctial virus.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, tógtar samplaí nasopharyngeal ó dhuine ar bith 5 bliana d ’ aois agus níos sine a léiríonn ili géarmhíochaine agus víreas synctial riospráide.

translation.en: Swabs are tested at the phe respiratory virus unit for influenza to monitor positivity rates and circulating strains, as well as for measuring vaccine effectiveness.
translation.ga: Déantar tástáil ar swabanna ag aonad víreas riospráide phe le haghaidh fliú chun monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar rátaí dearfacha agus brú, chomh maith le héifeachtacht vacsaín a thomhas.

translation.en: The rcgp rsc successfully conducted a pilot collecting serological samples from adults and linking them to a patient ’ s medical records during the 2018-2019 influenza season.
translation.ga: D' éirigh leis an csi rcgp píolótach a bhailiú ag bailiú samplaí séireolaíochta ó dhaoine fásta agus á nascadh le taifid mhíochaine othair le linn shéasúr an fhliú 2018-2019.

translation.en: This pilot was in collaboration with the phe seroepidemiology unit and added to the residual blood samples submitted to phe by national health service (nhs) laboratories.
translation.ga: Bhí an píolótach seo i gcomhar leis an aonad seroepidemiology phe agus cuireadh leis na samplaí fola iarmharacha a chuir saotharlanna phe na seirbhíse sláinte náisiúnta (sns) isteach.

translation.en: Serology can provide important information about background population immunity, and sentinel networks can provide a mechanism for systematic data collection and linkage to medical records and health outcomes.
translation.ga: Is féidir le séireolaíocht faisnéis thábhachtach a sholáthar faoi dhíolúine cúlra daonra, agus is féidir le líonraí sentinel meicníocht a sholáthar chun sonraí a bhailiú go córasach agus chun iad a nascadh le taifid mhíochaine agus torthaí sláinte.

translation.en: The serology pilot has demonstrated the ability of the network to collect serology samples in adults.
translation.ga: Léirigh an píolótach séireolaíochta cumas an líonra samplaí séireolaíochta a bhailiú in aosaigh.

translation.en: With the covid-19 outbreak, phe and rcgp rsc have adapted existing influenza surveillance to monitor the spread of covid-19 in the community, and this protocol sets out the basis for that collaboration.
translation.ga: Le ráig covid-19, tá phe agus rcgp rsc tar éis an faireachas fliú atá ann cheana a oiriúnú chun monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar scaipeadh covid-19 sa phobal, agus leagann an prótacal seo bunús an chomhair sin amach.

translation.en: The primary national strategy for covid-19 infection is containment, with patients who are at high risk managed via the telephone help system nhs111 and the phe health protection teams, but the rcgp rsc surveillance is entirely separate.
translation.ga: Is é an príomhstraitéis náisiúnta maidir le hionfhabhtú covid-19 ná cosc, le hothair ardriosca á mbainistiú trí chóras cabhrach teileafóin nhs111 agus foirne cosanta sláinte phe, ach tá faireachas rsc rcgp go hiomlán ar leithligh.

translation.en: The rcgp rsc, by extending its established work, will provide virological and serological surveillance to monitor the temporal and geographical distribution of covid-19 infection in the community, and assess the effectiveness of the containment strategy.
translation.ga: Cuirfidh rsc rcgp, trína chuid oibre seanbhunaithe a leathnú, faireachas víreolaíoch agus séireolaíoch ar fáil chun monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar am agus ar dháileadh geografach an ionfhabhtaithe covid-19 sa phobal, agus éifeachtacht na straitéise coimeádta a mheas.

translation.en: We would not be working in isolation on this research.
translation.ga: Ní bheimis ag obair inár n-aonar ar an taighde seo.

translation.en: We will share the protocol with uk colleagues and the i-move consortium who have recently obtained eu horizon 2020 funding from the stream “advancing knowledge for the clinical and public health response to the novel coronavirus epidemic ”.
translation.ga: Déanfaimid an prótacal a roinnt le comhghleacaithe sa ra agus le cuibhreannas i-move a fuair maoiniú ae horizon 2020 le déanaí ón sruth “faisnéis a chur chun cinn maidir leis an bhfreagairt chliniciúil agus shláinte phoiblí ar an eipidéim nua coronavirus ”.

translation.en: It is anticipated that great efficiencies in project management will result through this collaboration than that obtained from countries acting alone.
translation.ga: Meastar go mbeidh níos mó éifeachtúlachtaí i mbainistíocht tionscadail mar thoradh ar an gcomhoibriú seo ná tíortha atá ag gníomhú ina n-aonar.

translation.en: The aim of this study is to identify whether there is undetected community transmission of covid-19, estimate population susceptibility, and monitor the temporal and geographical distribution of covid-19 infection in the community.
translation.ga: Is é aidhm an staidéir seo láithreacht tarchuir anaithnid pobail de covid-19 a aithint, so-ghabháltacht an daonra a mheas, agus monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar am agus ar dháileadh geografach an ionfhabhtaithe covid-19 sa phobal.

translation.en: The objectives of this study are as follows:
translation.ga: Is iad cuspóirí an staidéir seo:

translation.en: To monitor the burden of suspected covid-19 activity in the community through primary care surveillance and clinical coding of possible covid-19 cases referred into the containment pathway
translation.ga: Monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar ualach na gníomhaíochta amhrasta covid-19 sa phobal trí fhaireachas cúraim phríomhúil agus códú cliniciúil cásanna féideartha covid-19 a atreoraíodh isteach sa chosán coimeádta

translation.en: To provide virological evidence on the presence and extent of undetected community transmission of covid-19 and monitor positivity rates among individuals presenting ili or acute respiratory tract infections to primary care
translation.ga: Fianaise víreolaíoch a sholáthar maidir le láithreacht agus méid an tarchuir pobail anaithnid de covid-19 agus monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar rátaí dearfacha i measc daoine aonair a bhfuil ionfhabhtuithe ili nó conaire riospráide géarmhíochaine orthu chuig cúram príomhúil

translation.en: To estimate baseline susceptibility to covid-19 in the community and estimate both symptomatic and asymptomatic exposure rates in the population through seroprevalence monitoring
translation.ga: Meastachán bunlíne ar covid-19 sa daonra agus measúnú ar rátaí nochta síntómacha agus neamhshiomptómacha sa daonra trí mhonatóireacht a dhéanamh ar seroprevalence

translation.en: To pilot implementation of a scheme for collection of convalescent sera with antibody profiles among recovered cases of covid-19 discharged to the community
translation.ga: Scéim a chur i bhfeidhm chun sera téarnaimh a bhailiú le próifílí antashubstaintí i measc cásanna aisghafa de covid-19 a scaoiltear don phobal

translation.en: We intend to capture the following.
translation.ga: Tá sé beartaithe againn na rudaí seo a leanas a ghabháil.

translation.en: Clinical workload related to reports of covid-19 using the codes created to flag cases, those being assessed and where the infection is located are excluded (figures 2- ​ -44)
translation.ga: Tá an t-ualach oibre cliniciúil a bhaineann le tuairiscí covid-19 ag baint úsáide as na cóid a cruthaíodh chun cásanna a bhratach, iad siúd atá á meas agus cá bhfuil an t-ionfhabhtú suite eisiata (fíoracha 2-44)

translation.en: Foreign countries visited in the last 28 days
translation.ga: Thug tíortha iasachta cuairt le 28 lá anuas

translation.en: Existing codes that may have utility (tables 1- ​ -3) .3).
translation.ga: Cóid atá ann cheana a bhféadfadh fóntais a bheith acu (táblaí 1-3 -3) .3).

translation.en: Many gps and primary care teams may not realize that important relevant data can be coded.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir nach dtuigeann go leor dochtúirí teaghlaigh agus foirne cúraim phríomhúil gur féidir sonraí ábhartha tábhachtacha a chódú.

translation.en: There is also the potential during any pandemic to monitor the effectiveness of any transmission control measures.
translation.ga: Tá an fhéidearthacht ann freisin le linn aon phaindéim monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar éifeachtacht aon bhearta rialaithe tarchurtha.

translation.en: Reliable coding of letters and test results that will show an infection has become either confirmed or excluded
translation.ga: Deimhnítear nó eisiatar códú iontaofa litreacha agus torthaí tástála a léiríonn ionfhabhtú

translation.en: The methods will follow the approach used in the current influenza surveillance system and recent serology study, and includes five components: (1) primary care clinical surveillance; (2) virological surveillance; (3) population serological surveillance; (4) convalescent sera in cases; and (5) data curation.
translation.ga: Leanfaidh na modhanna an cur chuige a úsáidtear sa chóras faireachais fliú reatha agus staidéir séireolaíochta le déanaí, agus beidh cúig chomhpháirt ann: (1) faireachas cliniciúil cúraim phríomhúil; (2) faireachas víreolaíoch; (3) faireachas séireolaíoch daonra; (4) sera aisghabhála i gcásanna; agus (5) leigheas sonraí.

translation.en: The nhs uses the systematized nomenclature of medicine clinical terms (snomed ct) system of coding, which is normally only updated twice annually.
translation.ga: Úsáideann an nhs an córas códaithe ainmníocht chórasach foirceanta cliniciúil (snomed ct), nach ndéantar a nuashonrú ach dhá uair sa bhliain de ghnáth.

translation.en: There was added complexity as some computerized medical record (cmr) suppliers use the read coding systems (read clinical terms version 3 – ctv3), which is no longer updated.
translation.ga: Bhí castacht bhreise ann toisc go n-úsáideann roinnt soláthraithe taifead míochaine ríomhairithe (cmr) na córais códaithe léigh (léigh téarmaí cliniciúla leagan 3 - ctv3), nach ndéantar a nuashonrú a thuilleadh.

translation.en: Additionally, there were no clinical codes to record covid-19 in early february 2020.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, ní raibh aon chóid chliniciúla ann chun covid-19 a thaifeadadh go luath i mí feabhra 2020.

translation.en: Therefore, the two main gp system suppliers added the five terms shown in table 4 as system-wide local codes.
translation.ga: Dá bhrí sin, chuir an dá phríomhsholáthraí córais dochtúirí teaghlaigh na cúig théarma a thaispeántar i dtábla 4 i láthair mar chóid áitiúla ar fud an chórais.

translation.en: A uk emergency release of snomed ct concepts for covid-19 was also subsequently made available across all cmr systems (table 4).
translation.ga: Cuireadh scaoileadh éigeandála na ra de choincheapa snomed ct do covid-19 ar fáil ina dhiaidh sin ar fud na gcóras cmr go léir (tábla 4).

translation.en: The intention is that these will eventually be mapped to the new snomed ct concepts as they become available, allowing recording of relevant data (multimedia appendix 1).
translation.ga: Tá sé beartaithe go ndéanfar iad seo a mhapáil sa deireadh chuig na coincheapa nua snomed ct de réir mar a bheidh siad ar fáil, rud a fhágfaidh go bhféadfar sonraí ábhartha a thaifeadadh (aguisín ilmheáin 1).

translation.en: The key requirements for this release were the ability to code (table 4) a case of covid-19, exposure to risk of infection (travel to an area where there may be a higher risk), contact with anyone infected with covid-19, a report that a person had been tested for covid-19, and that the disease had been excluded (likely a negative test).
translation.ga: Ba iad na príomhcheanglais don scaoileadh seo an cumas cód a dhéanamh (tábla 4) de chás covid-19, nochtadh do riosca ionfhabhtaithe (taisteal chuig limistéar riosca a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith níos airde), teagmháil le duine ar bith atá ionfhabhtaithe le covid-19, tuarascáil a thuairiscíonn duine rinneadh tástáil air le haghaidh covid-19, agus cuireadh an galar as an áireamh (tástáil dhiúltach is dócha).

translation.en: In addition, practices are now able to code any foreign travel undertaken, including the ability to record visits to multiple countries (implemented february 8, 2020).
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, tá cleachtais anois in ann aon taisteal eachtrach atá códaithe a chódú, lena n-áirítear an cumas cuairteanna ar iliomad tíortha a thaifeadadh (curtha i bhfeidhm 8 feabhra, 2020).

translation.en: Figures 2- ​ -44 show the emis web implementation.
translation.ga: Taispeánann figiúirí 2-44 cur i bhfeidhm an líonra emis.

translation.en: Currently, virology samples for influenza surveillance are accompanied by a standard request form.
translation.ga: Faoi láthair, tá foirm iarratais chaighdeánach ag gabháil le samplaí víreolaíochta le haghaidh faireachais fliú.

translation.en: For covid-19, we will create a new request form that will record:
translation.ga: Maidir le covid-19, cruthóimid foirm iarratais nua a thaifeadfaidh:

translation.en: Date of onset of symptoms
translation.ga: Dáta thosaigh na hairíonna

translation.en: Diagnosis of any of the following:
translation.ga: Diagnóis ar aon cheann díobh seo a leanas:

translation.en: Acute bronchitis / bronchiolitis in those younger than five years
translation.ga: Bronchitis géarmhíochaine / bronchiolitis sna daoine sin atá níos óige ná cúig bliana

translation.en: Lower respiratory tract infection (lrti)
translation.ga: Ionfhabhtú an chonair riospráide íochtarach (lrti)

translation.en: History of fever (y / n); measured (y / n); if yes, level
translation.ga: Stair an fhiabhrais (y / n); tomhaiste (y / n); má tá, leibhéal

translation.en: Shortness of breath (y / n), if measured: Oxygen saturation and respiratory rate
translation.ga: Giorracht anála (y / n), má thomhaistear é: Saturation ocsaigine agus ráta riospráide

translation.en: Recent travel (y / n); if yes, countries visited in last 14 days
translation.ga: Taisteal le déanaí (y / n); más ea, thug tíortha cuairt le 14 lá anuas

translation.en: Contact with a named person with confirmed covid-19 (y / n) with a free text comment about the level of certainty
translation.ga: Téigh i dteagmháil le duine ainmnithe deimhnithe covid-19 (y / n) le trácht saor in aisce faoin leibhéal cinnteachta

translation.en: These codes will be grouped ontologically into “definite ”,“ probable ”, “possible ”, and“ not a case ” using our standard approach to grouping codes (table 5), which has been used previously across disease areas.
translation.ga: Déanfar na cóid seo a ghrúpáil go teicneolaíochta i “áirithe ”,“ is dócha ”, “is féidir ”, agus“ ní hamhlaidh ” ag baint úsáide as ár gcur chuige caighdeánach i leith cóid a ghrúpáil (tábla 5), ​ ​ a úsáideadh roimhe seo thar réimsí galair.

translation.en: The rcgp rsc definition for ili is shown in multimedia appendix 2.
translation.ga: Taispeántar sainmhíniú rsc rcgp do ili in aguisín 2 ilmheáin.

translation.en: Public presentation of data using an observatory and dashboards
translation.ga: Sonraí a chur i láthair go poiblí ag úsáid an réadlann agus an painéal na nionstraimí

translation.en: We will develop an observatory to present data nationally and a dashboard for feedback to practices about their data quality and collection of virology and serology samples.
translation.ga: Forbróimid réadlann chun sonraí a chur i láthair go náisiúnta agus painéal le haghaidh aiseolais ar chleachtais maidir lena gcáilíocht sonraí agus chun samplaí víreolaíochta agus séireolaíocha a bhailiú.

translation.en: This is based on coding described in table 4.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo bunaithe ar chódú a thuairiscítear i dtábla 4.

translation.en: Definite case will be presented on our dashboard as “cases ” of covid-19.
translation.ga: Cuirfear cás deifnídeach faoi bhráid ár bpainéal mar “chásanna ” de covid-19.

translation.en: Possible cases will be presented as “under investigation ” (investigating).
translation.ga: Cuirfear cásanna féideartha i láthair mar “faoi imscrúdú ” (imscrúdú).

translation.en: “not a case ” will be presented as“ excluded ”.
translation.ga: Tíolacfar “ní cás ” mar“ eisiata ”.

translation.en: Online data has been established within the initial few weeks in the covid-19 observatory (figure 5), indicating the overall number of patients and rate per 10,000 patients of cases confirmed or under investigation, as well as where the virus is excluded.
translation.ga: Tá sonraí ar líne curtha ar bun laistigh de na seachtainí tosaigh i réadlann covid-19 (fíor 5), ag taispeáint líon foriomlán na n-othar agus an ráta in aghaidh gach 10,000 othar i gcásanna dearbhaithe nó faoi imscrúdú, chomh maith leis an áit a bhfuil an víreas eisiata.

translation.en: We have the option to move to twice weekly surveillance reports with a scope to change this to daily reporting.
translation.ga: Tá an rogha againn aistriú go tuarascálacha faireachais dhá uair sa tseachtain agus tá an scóip againn iad seo a athrú go tuairisciú laethúil.

translation.en: We will continue virology sampling from our sentinel practices, rather than discontinuing as seasonal influenza declines.
translation.ga: Leanfaimid orainn ag sampláil víreolaíochta ónár gcleachtais sentinel, seachas ag dul ar scor de réir mar a thagann laghdú ar fhliú séasúrach.

translation.en: Additionally, we will recruit more surveillance practices.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, earcóimid níos mó cleachtas faireachais.

translation.en: The rcgp rsc virology practices will aim to undertake 200-300 nasopharyngeal swabs per week across the rcgp rsc sentinel network, collecting specimens across all age bands.
translation.ga: Beidh sé mar aidhm ag cleachtais víreolaíochta rcgp rsc tabhairt faoi 200-300 swab nasopharyngeal in aghaidh na seachtaine ar fud líonra sentinel rsc rcgp, ag bailiú eiseamail ar fud gach banda aoise.

translation.en: In addition to the inclusion criteria for influenza virology surveillance (ili, acute bronchitis / bronchiolitis), participating practices will take nasopharyngeal swab samples from any people showing acute symptoms of lrti if the onset of symptoms is within 7 days.
translation.ga: Chomh maith leis na critéir chuimsithe maidir le faireachas víreolaíoch fliú (ili, bronchitis géarmhíochaine / bronchiolitis), tógfaidh cleachtais rannpháirteacha samplaí swab nasopharyngeal ó aon daoine a léiríonn comharthaí géarmhíochaine lrti má tharlaíonn na hairíonna laistigh de 7 lá.

translation.en: Rcgp rsc research officers and practice liaison staff will manage practices to achieve a total national sample of 200-300 swabs per week.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh oifigigh taighde rcgp rsc agus foireann idirchaidrimh cleachtais bainistíocht ar chleachtais chun sampla náisiúnta iomlán de 200-300 swab a bhaint amach in aghaidh na seachtaine.

translation.en: This could be increased if phe modelers require more samples.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí é seo a mhéadú má theastaíonn níos mó samplaí ó mhodhnóirí phe.

translation.en: Samples from each practice would be spread across the following age groups: & lt; 5 years, 5-17 years, 18-64 years, and 65 years and older
translation.ga: Dhéanfaí samplaí ó gach cleachtas a dháileadh ar fud na n-aoisghrúpaí seo a leanas: & lt; 5 bliana, 5-17 mbliana, 18-64 bliana, agus 65 bliana agus níos sine

translation.en: Samples (swabs or serum) collected will be sent via prepaid envelopes addressed to the appropriate phe laboratory for analysis.
translation.ga: Seolfar samplaí (swabs nó serum) a bhaileofar trí chlúdaigh réamhíoctha a dhíreofar chuig an tsaotharlann phe cuí le haghaidh anailíse.

translation.en: All samples collected will be tested for the presence of influenza and covid-19.
translation.ga: Déanfar gach sampla a bhaileofar a thástáil le haghaidh an fhliú agus láithreacht covid-19.

translation.en: Additionally, phe will retrospectively test any influenza virology samples collected between early and mid-february 2020 for covid-19.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, déanfaidh phe tástáil siarghabhálach ar aon samplaí víreolaíochta fliú a bailíodh idir luath agus lár mhí feabhra 2020 do covid-19.

translation.en: Practices will still follow the phe protocol for covid-19 with respect to people at risk of infection who should be signposted down the containment pathway, rather than physically attend their practice.
translation.ga: Leanfaidh cleachtais fós an prótacal phe do covid-19 do dhaoine atá i mbaol ionfhabhtaithe ar chóir iad a shíniú síos cosán na coimeádta, seachas freastal go fisiciúil ar a gcleachtas.

translation.en: Direct testing of those who attend surgery remains permitted, but we have also rolled out self-swabbing at home.
translation.ga: Ceadaítear tástáil dhíreach a dhéanamh orthu siúd atá ag freastal ar mháinliacht fós, ach tá féin-swabbing sa bhaile curtha i bhfeidhm againn freisin.

translation.en: Summary of processes are detailed in multimedia appendix 3.
translation.ga: Tugtar achoimre ar na próisis mhionsonraithe in aguisín 3 ilmheáin.

translation.en: Everyone with an ili or a respiratory illness who contacts a gp (eg, phones for an appointment) should be asked specifically about recent travel to china and other countries flagged in current phe advice, or if they have had contact with other people with covid-19.
translation.ga: Ba cheart ceisteanna a chur go sonrach ar gach duine le ili nó breoiteacht riospráide a dhéanann teagmháil le dochtúir teaghlaigh (m.sh., fóin le haghaidh coinne) faoi thaisteal chun na síne le déanaí agus chuig tíortha eile a luaitear sa chomhairle reatha phe, nó an raibh teagmháil acu le daoine eile le covid-19.

translation.en: If these screening enquiries are positive, the patient would be advised to not come to the practice but instead to follow the phe flow sheet.
