translation.ga: Má tá na fiosrúcháin scagadh dearfach, bheadh an t-othar a chur in iúl gan freastal ar an a fheidhmiú ach chun leanúint leis an gclár sreabhadh phe.

translation.en: This can be by a reception or clinician staff, depending on individual practice protocol.
translation.ga: Is féidir le fáilteoir nó cliniceoir é seo a dhéanamh, ag brath ar phrótacal cleachtais aonair.

translation.en: These calls should be coded into the gp cmr system and can be reported as part of the rcgp rsc weekly return.
translation.ga: Ba cheart na glaonna seo a chódú i gcóras cmr na ndochtúirí teaghlaigh agus is féidir iad a thuairisciú mar chuid de thuairisceán seachtainiúil rccp an rsc.

translation.en: We have developed training material to support this coding (multimedia appendix 4).
translation.ga: Tá ábhar oiliúna forbartha againn chun tacú leis an gcódú seo (aguisín ilmheáin 4).

translation.en: These include prompt cards for:
translation.ga: Ina measc seo tá cártaí pras le haghaidh:

translation.en: Practice reception or triage staff: For coding of any patients calling the practice with symptoms of acute respiratory infection with a history of travel to important areas based on phe advice
translation.ga: Foireann fáiltithe nó triage cleachtais: D ’ othar ar bith a ghlaonn an cleachtas le hairíonna d ’ ionfhabhtú géarmhíochaine riospráide le stair taistil chuig príomhréimsí bunaithe ar chomhairle phe

translation.en: Administrative staff or clinicians who code: To encourage consistent coding of results for any suspected cases, including coding of negative results for exclusion
translation.ga: Foireann riaracháin nó cliniceoirí a chódú: Spreagann códú comhsheasmhach torthaí aon chásanna amhrasacha, lena n-áirítear códú torthaí diúltacha le haghaidh eisiaimh

translation.en: Practices participating in virology surveillance will opportunistically collect blood samples from patients coming into the practice for a routine blood test.
translation.ga: Baileoidh cleachtais a ghlacann páirt i bhfaireachas víreolaíoch samplaí fola ó othair a thagann i gcleachtadh le haghaidh gnáththástála fola.

translation.en: Patients who attend their practice for a routine blood test will be asked to provide an additional sample for serology.
translation.ga: Iarrfar ar othair a fhreastalaíonn ar a gcleachtadh le haghaidh gnáththástála fola sampla breise a sholáthar don séireolaíocht.

translation.en: We have conducted initial searches within the rcgp rsc database to look at the number of full blood count (fbc) results and overall rates in adults and children (figures 6- ​ -9) .9).
translation.ga: Rinneamar cuardach tosaigh laistigh de bhunachar sonraí rccp an rsc chun breathnú ar líon iomlán na fola (fbc) agus na rátaí foriomlána in aosaigh agus leanaí (fíoracha 6-9) .9).

translation.en: An fbc is one of the most common tests performed, and we hope this will give an approximate indication of overall numbers of blood tests performed.
translation.ga: Tá fbc ar cheann de na tástálacha is coitianta a dhéantar, agus tá súil againn go dtabharfaidh sé seo léargas garbh ar líon foriomlán na dtástálacha fola a dhéantar.

translation.en: The sampling rate, per 100,000 patients was highest for children 15-17 years of age and 60 year or older in adults, with the lowest rates in children 0-4 years of age and 18-29 years of age in adults (figures 6- ​ -99).
translation.ga: Bhí an ráta samplála, in aghaidh gach 100,000 othar is airde do leanaí idir 15-17 mbliana d ’ aois agus 60 bliain d ’ aois nó níos sine i measc daoine fásta, agus bhí na rátaí is ísle i measc leanaí 0-4 bliana d ’ aois agus 18- 29 mbliana d ’ aois in aosaigh (fíoracha 6-99)).

translation.en: We will provide 1000 serology baseline samples across all ages that reflect the varying rates of attendance by age.
translation.ga: Cuirfimid 1000 sampla bunlíne séireolaíoch ar fáil thar gach aois ag taispeáint na rátaí tinrimh éagsúla de réir aoise.

translation.en: Additionally, we will test if we can obtain these all from virology practices to enhance the yield.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, déanfaimid tástáil féachaint an féidir linn iad seo go léir a fháil ó chleachtais víreolaíochta chun an toradh a fheabhsú.

translation.en: A good geographical spread is important, so phe can advise on areas where serology will most usefully be collected.
translation.ga: Tá scaipeadh geografach maith tábhachtach, mar sin is féidir le phe comhairle úsáideach a thabhairt ar réimsí ina mbailítear séireolaíocht.

translation.en: This will be followed by 800 samples monthly.
translation.ga: Leanfaidh 800 sampla é seo go míosúil.

translation.en: The sample will be stratified with 200 specimens for prepandemic survey (100 for monthly) in the following age groups: & lt; 5 years, 5-17 years, 18-64 years, and 65 years or older.
translation.ga: Tá an sampla srathaithe le 200 eiseamal le haghaidh suirbhé réamh-phaindéimeach (100 míosúil) sna haoisghrúpaí seo a leanas: & lt; 5 bliana, 5-17 mbliana, 18-64 bliana, agus 65 bliana nó níos sine.

translation.en: The younger patients, in many practices younger than 14 years, and in nearly all for children younger than 8 years will require pediatric serology surveillance.
translation.ga: Teastóidh faireachas séireolaíoch péidiatraice ar na hothair is óige, i go leor cleachtas níos óige ná 14 bliana, agus i mbeagnach gach ceann do leanaí atá níos óige ná 8 mbliana.

translation.en: We will develop a new request form for practices to capture recent travel and exposure to covid-19.
translation.ga: Forbróimid foirm iarratais nua le déanaí maidir le gabhálacha taistil agus nochtaithe do covid-19.

translation.en: We will pilot a scheme for collecting convalescent serology from people with confirmed cases and who have had an acute virology sample at the time of their infection.
translation.ga: Déanfaimid scéim a phíolótú chun séireolaíocht téarnaimh a bhailiú ó dhaoine le cásanna dearbhaithe a raibh sampla géarmhíochaine víreolaíoch acu tráth an ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: This is to identify a carrier state in patients who have recovered from the virus but may continue shedding the virus.
translation.ga: Déantar é seo chun stát iompróra a aithint in othair a tháinig slán ón víreas ach a d ’ fhéadfadh leanúint den víreas a shedding.

translation.en: If there are a small number of cases, this may assist in developing a test kit for patients to take to their own gp and explore its acceptability to patients.
translation.ga: Má tá líon beag cásanna ann, d ’ fhéadfadh sé seo cabhrú le trealamh tástála a fhorbairt d ’ othair le tabhairt chuig a ndochtúir teaghlaigh féin agus inghlacthacht an othair a iniúchadh.

translation.en: If there are a large number of covid-19 cases nationally, convalescent samples could be collected from rcgp rsc practices where there are confirmed cases, with the ability to link to the full medical record.
translation.ga: Má tá líon mór cásanna covid-19 go náisiúnta, d ’ fhéadfaí samplaí téarnaimh a bhailiú ó chleachtais rsc rcgp i gcás ina ndeimhnítear cásanna, agus an cumas nasc a dhéanamh leis an taifead leighis iomlán.

translation.en: This process may include checking pseudonymized nhs numbers for positive individuals at rcgp rsc practices, checking current phe guidance regarding considerations of infectiousness for confirmed cases, and offering the patient an appointment following the previously mentioned process.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go n-áireofaí sa phróiseas seo uimhreacha bréige ainmnithe an nhs a sheiceáil do dhaoine dearfacha ag cleachtais rsc rcgp, seiceáil treoir reatha phe maidir le hionfhabhtuithe a bhreithniú i gcásanna deimhnithe, agus coinne a thairiscint don othar tar éis an phróisis luaite cheana.

translation.en: This needs to be carefully coordinated nationally across the network and may require phe to ensure individuals are not contacted by multiple agencies.
translation.ga: Caithfear é seo a chomhordú go cúramach ar fud an líonra agus b ’ fhéidir go mbeidh phe ag teastáil chun a chinntiú nach ndéanann gníomhaireachtaí éagsúla teagmháil le daoine aonair.

translation.en: Rcgp rsc could provide a useful structure to channel the initial contact once phe has made a request.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh rcgp rsc struchtúr úsáideach a sholáthar chun an chéad teagmháil a threorú nuair a bheidh phe curtha i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: The rcgp rsc practices participating in the annual influenza virology surveillance have started sampling from patients showing symptoms of a lrti.
translation.ga: Tá sampláil déanta ar chleachtais rsc rcgp atá rannpháirteach i bhfaireachas víreolaíoch fliú bliantúil ó othair a léiríonn comharthaí lrti.

translation.en: All samples received are being tested for influenza and covid-19.
translation.ga: Tá na samplaí go léir a fuarthas á dtástáil le haghaidh an fhliú agus covid-19.

translation.en: The rcgp rsc will explore ways to collect convalescent samples from any patients tested positive for covid-19 through the extension of the virological surveillance.
translation.ga: Scrúdóidh rsc rcgp bealaí chun samplaí téarnaimh a bhailiú ó othair ar bith a ndearna tástáil dhearfach orthu le haghaidh covid-19 trí fhaireachas víreolaíoch a leathnú.

translation.en: From the start, we will be carefully curating data to ensure that it can be used for future studies.
translation.ga: Ón tús, beimid ag coimeádaíocht sonraí go cúramach lena chinntiú gur féidir iad a úsáid le haghaidh staidéir amach anseo.

translation.en: Our clinical data will be linked to virology.
translation.ga: Beidh ár sonraí cliniciúla nasctha le víreolaíocht.

translation.en: We will curate our data using the findable, accessible, interoperable, reusable principles.
translation.ga: Coinneoimid ár gcuid sonraí ag úsáid na bprionsabal infhaighteacht, inrochtaineacht, idir-inoibritheacht, in-athúsáidteacht.

translation.en: To facilitate this our data set is listed with health data research uk and the european health data evidence network.
translation.ga: Chun é seo a éascú tá ár tacar sonraí liostaithe le health data research uk agus líonra fianaise sonraí sláinte na heorpa.

translation.en: The statistical methodology is in support of a policy approach to widespread disease outbreak, where so-called nonpharmaceutical interventions (npis) are used to respond to an emerging pandemic to produce disease suppression.
translation.ga: Tacaíonn an mhodheolaíocht staidrimh go ginearálta le cur chuige beartais i leith ráigeanna galair, áit a n-úsáidtear idirghabhálacha neamh-chógaisíochta (npianna) mar a thugtar orthu chun freagairt do phaindéim atá ag teacht chun cinn chun an galar a bhaint.

translation.en: This policy aims to reduce contact rates in the population and thereby reduce transmission of the virus.
translation.ga: Tá sé mar aidhm ag an mbeartas seo rátaí teagmhála sa daonra a laghdú agus ar an gcaoi sin tarchur an víris a laghdú.

translation.en: To implement this the uk government has recently articulated the desire to implement population self-isolation measures.
translation.ga: Chun é seo a chur i bhfeidhm thug rialtas na ra le fios le déanaí go bhfuil sé ag iarraidh bearta féin-aonrúcháin daonra a chur i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: By targeting the reproduction number (r) (the average number of secondary cases each case generates) and aiming to reduce the r to below 1, the policy seeks to reduce case numbers to low levels or (as seen in previous outbreaks with severe acute respiratory syndrome and ebola) to eliminate human-to-human transmission.
translation.ga: Trí dhíriú ar an uimhir atáirgthe (r) (meánlíon na gcásanna tánaisteacha a ghineann gach cás) agus iarracht a dhéanamh an r a laghdú go dtí faoi bhun 1, féachann an beartas le líon na gcásanna a laghdú go leibhéil ísle nó (mar a fheictear i ngéar-riospráid roimhe seo ráigeanna (siondróm agus ebola) chun tarchur duine le duine a dhíchur.

translation.en: As the experience from the 2009 h1n1 pandemic has shown, npis can be a crucial component of pandemic mitigation.
translation.ga: Mar a léirigh taithí ó phaindéim h1n1 2009, is féidir le npianna a bheith ina gcuid ríthábhachtach de mhaolú paindéimeach.

translation.en: Key to the focus of our study will be the estimation of peak cases in the population and continual monitoring by data collection and modelling the potential growth and emergence of subsequent peaks in new cases as social distancing measures are relaxed.
translation.ga: Cuid lárnach d ’ fhócas ár staidéir tá meastachán ar bheanna sa daonra. agus monatóireacht leanúnach trí bhailiú sonraí agus samhaltú ar fhás agus teacht chun cinn beanna ina dhiaidh sin i gcásanna nua de réir mar a dhéantar bearta chun fadú sóisialta a mhaolú.

translation.en: There has already been publication of important disease epidemiological measures concerning the outbreak of covid-19 in mainland china.
translation.ga: Foilsíodh bearta eipidéimeolaíocha galair tábhachtacha don ráig covid-19 ar mhórthír na síne cheana féin.

translation.en: A further fundamental measure in pandemic dynamics is the length of time from infection to when a person is infectious to others and the mean duration of infectiousness.
translation.ga: Beart bunúsach eile i ndinimic phaindéimeach is ea an fad ama ó ionfhabhtú go hionfhabhtú agus meánfhad an ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: These factors, if estimated accurately, will give good predictions for the likely length of the pandemic, the final number of infected cases.
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh na tosca seo, má mheastar go cruinn iad, léargas maith ar fhad dóchúil na paindéime, an líon deiridh cásanna ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: We intend to apply approximate bayesian inference (abc) to (possibly spatially heterogeneous) susceptible-exposed- infectious-removed (seir) stochastic epidemic models.
translation.ga: Tá sé beartaithe againn tátal bayesian (abc) a chur i bhfeidhm ar mhúnlaí eipidéime stochastic ionfhabhtaithe-nochtadh-tógálach-eastósctha (seir).

translation.en: Such techniques are highly parallelizable and have been successfully applied to many fields including disease transmission modelling.
translation.ga: Tá teicnící den sórt sin an-chomhthreomhar agus cuireadh i bhfeidhm go rathúil iad i go leor réimsí lena n-áirítear samhaltú tarchuir galair.

translation.en: They are particularly suited to situations where likelihood functions are absent and where more traditional approaches such as markov chain monte carlo are impractical.
translation.ga: Tá siad oiriúnach go háirithe do chásanna ina bhfuil feidhmeanna dóchúlachta as láthair agus ina bhfuil cineálacha cur chuige níos traidisiúnta mar shlabhra markov monte carlo praiticiúil.

translation.en: Such an approach has been demonstrated to work effectively on the aspren surveillance data, a network of sentinel gps and nurse practitioners who report deidentified information on ilis and other conditions, where issues such as missing data and the need to model the observation process itself has been successfully addressed.
translation.ga: Taispeánadh go n-oibríonn cur chuige den sórt sin go héifeachtach ar shonraí faireachais aspren, líonra de dhochtúirí teaghlaigh faire agus cleachtóirí altranais a thuairiscíonn faisnéis aitheanta faoi ilianna agus riochtaí eile, áit a raibh saincheisteanna cosúil le sonraí in easnamh agus an gá atá leis an bpróiseas breathnóireacht féinmhúnlaithe tugadh aghaidh go rathúil air.

translation.en: Furthermore, peaks in new cases have been estimated by distributional methods.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, rinneadh beanna i gcásanna nua a mheas trí dháileadh.

translation.en: Estimates of the parameters of the seir model are tractable on large data sets because of parallelizability, and these methods have been implemented in several r libraries; we intend to use the libraries abseir (deposited on github: Https: / / tinyurl.com / vqu35cj) and abctools (https: / / tinyurl.com / tfjavz4) to estimate epidemic measures on a weekly basis.
translation.ga: Tá meastacháin ar pharaiméadair an tsamhail seir inrianaithe ar thacair sonraí mhóra mar gheall ar chomhthreomhaireacht, agus cuireadh na modhanna seo i bhfeidhm i roinnt leabharlann r; tá sé beartaithe againn leabharlanna abseir (a thaisceadh ar github: Https: / / tinyurl.com / vqu35cj) agus abctools (https: / / tinyurl.com / tfjavz4) a úsáid chun bearta eipidéime a mheas ar bhonn seachtainiúil.

translation.en: Since we are fitting an sir-epidemic model in the abc routine, we anticipate that our results will be robust against weekly case data containing relatively small counts.
translation.ga: Ó tharla go bhfuil samhail sir-eipidéim á fheistiú againn i ngnáthamh abc, táimid ag súil go mbeidh ár dtorthaí láidir i gcoinne sonraí cásanna seachtainiúla i gcás go bhfuil na comhaireamh réasúnta beag.

translation.en: For example, see for the abc methodology applied to the tristan da cunha common cold data from 1967, where counts of i (number of infectious cases) and r (number of recovered cases) are in the tens at most.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, féach ar an modheolaíocht abc a cuireadh i bhfeidhm ar shonraí fuar coitianta tristan da cunha ó 1967, áit a bhfuil i (comhaireamh cásanna tógálacha) agus r (líon na gcásanna aisghafa) san áireamh sna deicheanna ar a mhéad.

translation.en: Finally, in addition to the above methodology we will employ the kaplan-meier method with two outcomes (death and recovery) to estimate the case fatality ratio.
translation.ga: Faoi dheireadh, sa bhreis ar an modheolaíocht thuas úsáidfimid an modh kaplan-meier le dhá thoradh (bás agus aisghabháil) chun an cóimheas básmhaireachta cáis a mheas.

translation.en: This approach is independent of the abc methodology and will allow comparisons between estimates from the two modelling approaches to judge robustness of results.
translation.ga: Tá an cur chuige seo neamhspleách ar mhodheolaíocht abc agus ligfidh sé comparáid a dhéanamh idir meastacháin ón dá chur chuige samhaltaithe chun stóinseacht na dtorthaí a mheas.

translation.en: Rcgp rsc ’ s surveillance with phe is defined as health protection under regulation 3 of the health service (control of patient information) regulations 2002.
translation.ga: Sainmhínítear faireachas rcgp rsc le phe mar chosaint sláinte faoi rialachán 3 de rialacháin na seirbhíse sláinte (faisnéis othar a rialú) 2002.

translation.en: This has been confirmed by phe ’ s caldicott guardian ’ s office.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo deimhnithe ag oifig chaomhnóir phe caldicott.

translation.en: We do not see any increased risk to practices or practitioners taking part in this surveillance.
translation.ga: Ní fheicimid aon riosca méadaithe do chleachtais ná do chleachtóirí atá rannpháirteach san fhaireachas seo.

translation.en: Infection prevention and control advice will follow extant national guidance.
translation.ga: Leanfaidh comhairle um chosc agus rialú ionfhabhtaithe an treoir náisiúnta atá ann cheana.

translation.en: Any cases identified will be managed according to the phe / nhs guidance in force at the time, including advice for identified contacts.
translation.ga: Déanfar aon chásanna sainaitheanta a bhainistiú de réir na treorach phe / nhs a bhí i bhfeidhm ag an am, lena n-áirítear comhairle ar theagmhálacha aitheanta.

translation.en: However, our training will include reminders about safe handling of specimens and revision of infection control measures anticipated to be high in our practices.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, áireofar inár n-oiliúint meabhrúcháin ar láimhseáil shábháilte eiseamail agus athbhreithniú ar bhearta rialaithe ionfhabhtaithe a mheastar a bheith ard inár gcleachtais.

translation.en: It is a key part of regulation 12 about safe care and treatment, periodically inspected by the care quality commission.
translation.ga: Is cuid dhílis de rialachán 12 maidir le cúram agus cóireáil shábháilte, a ndéanann an coimisiún um chaighdeáin cúraim iniúchadh air go tréimhsiúil.

translation.en: Travel history and clinical descriptors of the covid-19 infections
translation.ga: Stair taistil agus tuairisceoirí cliniciúla ionfhabhtaithe covid-19

translation.en: The rcgp rsc practices have been advised on the clinical coding that has been made available for covid-19 across all cmr systems.
translation.ga: Cuireadh comhairle ar chleachtais rsc rcgp maidir leis an gcódú cliniciúil a chuirtear ar fáil do covid-19 ar fud na gcóras cmr go léir.

translation.en: This includes information on coding of clinical descriptors (table 4) and any recent travel history.
translation.ga: Cuimsíonn sé seo faisnéis maidir le códú tuarascálacha cliniciúla (tábla 4) agus aon stair taistil le déanaí.

translation.en: Establishment of extended virology sampling
translation.ga: Sampláil víreolaíoch leathnaithe a bhunú tá sampláil déanta ag

translation.en: The rcgp rsc practices participating in the annual influenza virology surveillance have started sampling from patients showing symptoms of lrti.
translation.ga: Cleachtais rcgp rsc atá rannpháirteach san fhaireachas víreolaíoch fliú bliantúil ó othair a léiríonn comharthaí lrti.

translation.en: All samples received are being tested for influenza and covid-19.
translation.ga: Tá na samplaí go léir a fuarthas á dtástáil le haghaidh an fhliú agus covid-19.

translation.en: This has led to initial early identification of background spread in low-risk patients.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh air seo sainaithníodh scaipeadh cúlra in othair a mbaineann riosca íseal leo go luath.

translation.en: As of march 7, 2020, the surveillance system has detected 2 cases of covid-19 in low-risk patients with no history of travel through extended virological sampling.
translation.ga: Amhail an 7 márta 2020, bhí 2 chás de covid-19 aimsithe ag an gcóras faireachais in othair a mbaineann riosca íseal leo agus nach raibh aon stair taistil acu trí shampláil víreolaíoch leathnaithe.

translation.en: This protocol describes how we have adapted a national influenza surveillance system to monitor community spread of an unexpected infection of covid-19.
translation.ga: Déantar cur síos sa phrótacal seo ar an gcaoi a bhfuil córas náisiúnta faireachais fliú curtha in oiriúint againn chun monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar scaipeadh poiblí ionfhabhtaithe gan choinne de covid-19.

translation.en: We have rapidly created and incorporated new codes to allow data recording, and are collecting data to monitor the effectiveness of containment strategies.
translation.ga: Táimid tar éis cóid nua a chruthú agus a ionchorprú go tapa chun taifeadadh sonraí a cheadú, agus táimid ag bailiú sonraí chun monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar éifeachtacht straitéisí coinneála.

translation.en: Through this surveillance, we intend to find out more about the epidemiology of covid-19 in ambulatory care.
translation.ga: Tríd an bhfaireachas seo, tá sé beartaithe againn níos mó a fhoghlaim faoi eipidéimeolaíocht covid-19 i gcúram siúlach.

translation.en: In particular, its rate of spread, both temporal and geographical.
translation.ga: Go háirithe, a ráta scaipthe, idir ama agus gheografach.

translation.en: Our testing of low-risk patients will also inform whether the containment strategy that is based on virology testing of high-risk patients and their contacts plus self-isolation is effective.
translation.ga: Cinnfidh ár dtástáil ar othair a mbaineann riosca íseal leo an bhfuil an straitéis choinneála bunaithe ar thástáil víreolaíoch d ’ othair ardriosca agus a dteagmhálacha móide féin-aonrú éifeachtach.

translation.en: Containment should slow the spread, and there may be benefits in the management of spread from intense surveillance.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go gcuirfeadh an coimeád moill ar scaipeadh, agus d ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh buntáistí ann maidir le leathadh ó dhianfhaireachas a bhainistiú.

translation.en: However, there may come a point at which the virus spreads more widely into the population, as has happened in italy.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, b ’ fhéidir go dtiocfaidh pointe nuair a scaipfidh an víreas níos fairsinge sa daonra, mar a tharla san iodáil.

translation.en: Surveillance of low-risk patients should inform when we reach this tipping point and when infection rates start to remit.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go gcuirfeadh faireachas ar othair a mbaineann riosca íseal leo eolas nuair a shroicheann muid an pointe tipeála seo agus nuair a thosaíonn rátaí ionfhabhtaithe speisialtacht a bhaint amach.

translation.en: The epidemiology of covid-19 remains emergent.
translation.ga: Tá eipidéimeolaíocht covid-19 fós ag teacht chun cinn.

translation.en: The registration-based nature of uk primary care means that we will be able to create a complete picture of the cumulative incidence and duration.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn nádúr cláraithe chúram príomhúil na ra go mbeimid in ann pictiúr iomlán a chruthú de mhinicíocht charnach agus de fhad.

translation.en: The surveillance system should be able to identify areas where covid-19 spread is taking place that might be suitable for trials of antiviral therapy.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh an córas faireachais in ann réimsí a shainaithint ina bhfuil tarchur covid-19 ar siúl a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith oiriúnach do thrialacha teiripe frithvíreas.

translation.en: We could also follow up on the effectiveness or any adverse reactions to these medicines or vaccinations.
translation.ga: Féadfaimid obair leantach a dhéanamh freisin ar éifeachtacht nó ar aon fhrithghníomhartha díobhálacha ar na cógais nó na vacsaínithe seo.

translation.en: Finally, early detection of a confirmed covid-19 case has exemplified the rapid implementation of this enhanced surveillance in the national network.
translation.ga: Faoi dheireadh, léirigh brath luath ar chás dearbhaithe covid-19 cur i bhfeidhm tapa an fhaireachais fheabhsaithe seo sa líonra náisiúnta.

translation.en: Safety of practices is our primary concern.
translation.ga: Is í sábháilteacht an chleachtais ár bpríomhchúram.

translation.en: The rcgp rsc has operated for over 50 years and has been involved in collecting samples to monitor disease and vaccine effectiveness through the hong kong flu pandemic of 1968 / 69, the russian flu of 1977 / 78, and the 2009 swine flu pandemic.
translation.ga: Tá rcgp an rsc i bhfeidhm le breis agus 50 bliain agus bhí baint aige le samplaí a bhailiú chun monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar éifeachtacht an ghalair agus na vacsaíne trí phaindéim fliú hong cong 1968 / 69, fliú na rúise 1977 / 78, agus paindéim fliú na muc. 2009.

translation.en: We are not aware of any increased risk to practice staff or other patients from involvement in surveillance.
translation.ga: Ní eol dúinn aon riosca méadaithe d ’ fhoireann cleachtaidh nó d ’ othair eile a bheith bainteach le faireachas.

translation.en: Pandemic preparedness is part of the role of the rcgp rsc.
translation.ga: Tá ullmhacht phaindéimeach mar chuid de ról an rcgp rsc.

translation.en: It is plausible that enhanced coding of information from contacts with the practices in rcgp rsc will reduce the likelihood of people who may be suspected covid-19 cases being brought to the surgery inadvertently.
translation.ga: Tá sé inchreidte go laghdóidh an códú feabhsaithe faisnéise ó theagmhálacha leis na cleachtais i rcgp rsc an dóchúlacht go dtabharfar daoine trí amhras faoi chásanna covid-19.

translation.en: Where cases are detected unexpectedly, it is probably helpful for that patient, their contacts, and the practice to know.
translation.ga: Sa chás go mbraitear cásanna gan choinne, is dóigh go mbeadh sé ina chuidiú go mbeadh a fhios ag an othar sin, a theagmhálacha agus an cleachtas.

translation.en: The impact on practices has been to close for a day, if a case is found, for deep cleaning and then reopen.
translation.ga: Is é an tionchar ar chleachtais ná dúnadh aon lae, má aimsítear cás, maidir le glanadh domhain agus ansin athoscailt.

translation.en: The principal limitations of our system are the number of data points.
translation.ga: Is iad príomhtheorainneacha ár gcóras líon na bpointí sonraí.

translation.en: We are collecting serology and virology data from 100 sites, which covers a small group of the population.
translation.ga: Táimid ag bailiú sonraí séireolaíocha agus víreolaíochta ó 100 láithreán, a chuimsíonn grúpa beag den daonra.

translation.en: This has been satisfactory for monitoring influenza, but we are not certain if this is a sufficiently large sample for the covid-19 outbreak.
translation.ga: Bhí sé seo sásúil chun monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar fhliú, ach nílimid cinnte an sampla mór é seo don ráig covid-19.

translation.en: Our sites (surveillance practices) are currently fixed, and it could be helpful to be able to rapidly onboard practices in regions where there are more cases.
translation.ga: Tá ár suíomhanna (cleachtais faireachais) i bhfeidhm faoi láthair, agus b ’ fhéidir go mbeadh sé ina chuidiú a bheith in ann dul ar bord cleachtais go tapa i réigiúin ina bhfuil níos mó cásanna.

translation.en: Currently, we will be reporting weekly.
translation.ga: Faoi láthair, beimid ag tuairisciú go seachtainiúil.

translation.en: Our existing system can be enhanced to twice weekly, but maybe daily or hourly data should be our current approach.
translation.ga: Is féidir ár gcóras a uasghrádú go dtí dhá uair sa tseachtain, ach d ’ fhéadfadh gur sonraí laethúla nó in aghaidh na huaire an cur chuige atá againn faoi láthair.

translation.en: Opportunistic sampling for serology in children younger than 10 years might be limited due to the overall reduced rate of blood tests in children.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sampláil deise do shéireolaíocht i leanaí atá níos óige ná 10 mbliana a bheith teoranta mar gheall ar an ráta laghdaithe foriomlán tástálacha fola i leanaí.

translation.en: The extended surveillance using the rcgp rsc-phe network for the emergent covid-19 outbreak has been established rapidly.
translation.ga: Tá an faireachas ag leathnú trí úsáid a bhaint as líonra rcgp rsc-phe don ráig covid-19 atá ag teacht chun cinn go tapa.

translation.en: The model of getting the appropriate informatics to enable capture of the required data has already been a success, with data recording starting the week the codes were created.
translation.ga: D ’ éirigh leis an tsamhail na faisnéisíocht chuí a fháil chun na sonraí riachtanacha a ghabháil, agus taifeadadh sonraí ag tosú an tseachtain a cruthaíodh na cóid.

translation.en: In addition, modifying the existing surveillance system to collect population data in a parallel way has also been effective.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, bhí sé éifeachtach freisin an córas faireachais atá ann a mhodhnú chun sonraí daonra a bhailiú ar bhealach comhthreomhar.

translation.en: However, we are at present unsure as to whether the scale of this surveillance provides sufficient data to drive local containment strategies or if reporting infrequently meets the need of our information age.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, nílimid cinnte faoi láthair an soláthraíonn scála an fhaireachais seo dóthain sonraí chun straitéisí srianta áitiúla a chur chun cinn nó an gcomhlíonann tuairisciú minic riachtanais ár n-aoise faisnéise.

translation.en: National basketball association suspends season due to covid-19 concerns
translation.ga: Cuireann an cumann náisiúnta cispheile an séasúr ar fionraí mar gheall ar imní faoi covid-19

translation.en: On wednesday, the united states' national basketball association (nba) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding covid-19.
translation.ga: Dé céadaoin, chuir cumann náisiúnta cispheile na stát aontaithe (nba) a séasúr cispheile gairmiúil ar fionraí mar gheall ar imní faoi covid-19.

translation.en: The nba's decision followed a utah jazz player testing positive for the covid-19 virus.
translation.ga: Tháinig cinneadh an nba tar éis d ’ imreoir utah jazz tástáil dhearfach a dhéanamh ar an víreas covid-19.

translation.en: The nba did not release the identity of the player in question in its announcement.
translation.ga: Níor scaoil an nba céannacht an imreora i dtrácht ina fhógra.

translation.en: They did say he was not present at chesapeake energy arena in oklahoma city, where the utah jazz were to play against the oklahoma city thunder.
translation.ga: Dúirt siad nach raibh sé i láthair ag chesapeake energy arena i gcathair oklahoma, áit a mbeadh an utah jazz ag imirt i gcoinne thunder oklahoma city.

translation.en: According to its press release, the nba was "suspending game play following the conclusion of [wednesday's] schedule of games until further notice."
translation.ga: De réir a phreaseisiúint, bhí an nba “ag imirt cluiche a chur ar fionraí tar éis sceideal cluichí [dé céadaoin] a bheith críochnaithe go dtí go dtabharfar fógra breise."

translation.en: The jazz's game was cancelled, as was another nba game wednesday between the sacramento kings and the new orleans pelicans.
translation.ga: Cuireadh an cluiche snagcheoil ar ceal, in éineacht le cluiche nba eile dé céadaoin idir na sacramento kings agus na new orleans pelicans.

translation.en: Other games scheduled for wednesday were still held, according to nbc news.
translation.ga: Tionóladh cluichí eile a bhí sceidealta don chéadaoin fós, de réir nbc news.

translation.en: The united states' other major basketball organization, the national collegiate athletic association, which runs college basketball, has cancelled its own tournament, march madness, for both men's and women's leagues.
translation.ga: Tá mór-eagraíocht cispheile eile de chuid na sa, an collegiate athletic association, a ritheann cispheil coláiste, tar éis a turas féin, march madness, a chur ar ceal do shraitheanna na bhfear agus na mban.

translation.en: According to johns hopkins university, as of wednesday, there were at least 1,279 confirmed cases of covid-19 in the united states.
translation.ga: De réir ollscoil johns hopkins, amhail dé céadaoin, bhí 1,279 cás dearbhaithe ar a laghad de covid-19 sna stáit aontaithe.

translation.en: Cnbc reported there were at least 118,381 cases worldwide.
translation.ga: Thuairiscigh cnbc go raibh 118,381 cás ar a laghad ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: Us president trump declares covid-19 national emergency
translation.ga: Dearbhaíonn uachtarán na stát aontaithe trump éigeandáil náisiúnta covid-19

translation.en: On friday, united states president donald trump declared a national emergency in response to the ongoing coronavirus outbreak.
translation.ga: Ar an aoine, d ’ fhógair uachtarán na stát aontaithe donald trump éigeandáil náisiúnta mar fhreagairt ar an ráig leanúnach coronavirus.

translation.en: The move came two days after the world health organization declared the outbreak, which causes the covid-19 disease, to be a pandemic.
translation.ga: Tháinig an t-aistriú dhá lá tar éis don eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte an ráig a dhearbhú, rud a d ’ fhág go raibh galar covid-19, paindéim.

translation.en: The move gives the federal government access to around us $50 billion in extra funding to combat the pandemic, according to nbc news.
translation.ga: Tugann an t-aistriú rochtain don rialtas cónaidhme ar thart ar us $50 billiún i maoiniú breise chun an paindéim a chomhrac, de réir nbc news.

translation.en: The proclamation specifically said "the covid-19 outbreak in the united states constitutes a national emergency" and said the national emergency began on march 1, almost two weeks before the proclamation itself.
translation.ga: Luaigh an forógra go sonrach gur “éigeandáil náisiúnta sna stáit aontaithe é an ráig covid-19 ” agus dúirt sé gur thosaigh an éigeandáil náisiúnta an 1 márta, beagnach coicís roimh an bhforógra féin.

translation.en: The united states department of health and human services declared the outbreak a "public health emergency" on january 31.
translation.ga: D' fhógair roinn sláinte agus seirbhísí daonna na sa an ráig mar "éigeandáil sláinte poiblí" an 31 eanáir.

translation.en: Trump did not place the federal emergency management agency (fema) in charge of the government's response to covid-19, which politico reported left some experts in disaster management disappointed.
translation.ga: Níor chuir trump an ghníomhaireacht bainistíochta éigeandála cónaidhme (fema) i gceannas ar fhreagra an rialtais ar covid-19, thuairiscigh politico a d ’ fhág go raibh díomá ar roinnt saineolaithe i mbainistíocht tubaiste.

translation.en: Politico quoted tim manning, formerly a deputy administrator at fema, as saying "fema has an important role in coordinating the larger response to the crisis" and "[i] f there's an emergency, fema needs to be involved."
translation.ga: Thug politico faoi deara go ndúirt tim manning, iar-leas-riarthóir ag fema, "tá ról tábhachtach le himirt ag fema maidir leis an bhfreagairt níos mó ar an ngéarchéim a chomhordú" agus "[i] má tá éigeandáil ann, caithfidh fema a bheith bainteach leis."

translation.en: Trump made the decision under provisions of the national emergencies act, amongst other governing authorities.
translation.ga: Rinne trump an cinneadh faoi fhorálacha an achta náisiúnta éigeandálaí, i measc údaráis rialála eile.

translation.en: The trump administration also announced other efforts in response to covid-19, including waiving the interest it collects on federal student loans and increasing u.s. strategic oil reserve oil purchases.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair riarachán trump iarrachtaí eile freisin mar fhreagairt ar covid-19, lena n-áirítear an t-ús a bhailíonn sé ar iasachtaí mac léinn cónaidhme a tharscaoileadh agus ceannacháin ola cúlchiste ola straitéiseach na sa a mhéadú.

translation.en: Impact of the 2019 – 20 coronavirus pandemic on education
translation.ga: Tionchar paindéime coronavirus 2019-20 ar oideachas

translation.en: The 2019 – 20 coronavirus pandemic has affected educational systems worldwide, leading to the widespread closures of schools and universities.
translation.ga: Tá paindéim coronavirus 2019-20 ag dul i bhfeidhm ar chórais oideachais ar fud an domhain, rud a fhágann go ndúnfar scoileanna agus ollscoileanna go forleathan.

translation.en: As of 8 april 2020, approximately 1.716 billion learners have been affected due to school closures in response to covid-19.
translation.ga: Amhail an 8 aibreán, 2020, chuir dúnadh scoileanna isteach ar thart ar 1.716 billiún foghlaimeoir mar fhreagairt ar covid-19.

translation.en: According to unesco monitoring, 188 countries have implemented nationwide closures and 5 have implemented local closures, impacting about 99.4% of the world's student population.
translation.ga: De réir monatóireachta unesco, tá dúnadh ar fud na tíre curtha i bhfeidhm ag 188 tír agus tá dúnadh áitiúil curtha i bhfeidhm ag 5 cinn, a chuaigh i bhfeidhm ar thart ar 99.4% de dhaonra mac léinn an domhain.

translation.en: On 23 march 2020, cambridge international examinations (cie) released a statement announcing the cancellation of cambridge igcse, cambridge o level, cambridge international as & amp; a level, cambridge aice diploma, and cambridge pre-u examinations for the may / june 2020 series across all countries.
translation.ga: Ar 23 márta 2020, d ’ eisigh cambridge international examinations (cie) ráiteas ag fógairt gur cealaíodh cambridge igcse, cambridge o level, cambridge international as & amp; scrúduithe a leibhéal, dioplóma cambridge aice, agus scrúduithe cambridge pre-u don tsraith bealtaine / meitheamh 2020 ar fud na dtíortha uile.

translation.en: International baccalaureate exams have also been cancelled.school closures impact not only students, teachers, and families, but have far-reaching economic and societal consequences.
translation.ga: Cuireadh scrúduithe baitsiléara idirnáisiúnta ar ceal freisin. Ní amháin go mbíonn tionchar ag dúnadh scoileanna ar mhic léinn, ar mhúinteoirí agus ar theaghlaigh, ach bíonn iarmhairtí forleathana eacnamaíocha agus sochaíocha acu freisin.

translation.en: School closures in response to covid-19 have shed light on various social and economic issues, including student debt, digital learning, food insecurity, and homelessness, as well as access to childcare, health care, housing, internet, and disability services.
translation.ga: Tá dúnadh scoileanna mar fhreagairt ar covid-19 tar éis solas a chaitheamh ar raon saincheisteanna sóisialta agus eacnamaíocha, lena n-áirítear fiachas mac léinn, foghlaim dhigiteach, neamhshábháilteacht bia, agus easpa dídine, chomh maith le rochtain ar sheirbhísí cúram leanaí, cúram sláinte, tithíochta, idirlín agus míchumais.

translation.en: The impact was more severe for disadvantaged children and their families, causing interrupted learning, compromised nutrition, childcare problems, and consequent economic cost to families who could not work.in response to school closures, unesco recommended the use of distance learning programmes and open educational applications and platforms that schools and teachers can use to reach learners remotely and limit the disruption of education.
translation.ga: Bhí an tionchar níos déine do leanaí faoi mhíbhuntáiste agus dá dteaghlaigh, ag cur isteach ar fhoghlaim isteach, ar chothú i mbaol, ar fhadhbanna cúram leanaí, agus ar an gcostas eacnamaíoch dá bharr sin do theaghlaigh nach raibh in ann obair a dhéanamh. Mar fhreagairt ar dhúnadh scoileanna, mhol unesco go n-úsáidfí cláir chianfhoghlama agus feidhmchláir agus ardáin oideachais oscailte is féidir le scoileanna agus múinteoirí a úsáid chun foghlaimeoirí a bhaint amach go cianda agus chun cur isteach ar oideachas a theorannú.

translation.en: Efforts to stem the spread of covid-19 through non-pharmaceutical interventions and preventive measures such as social-distancing and self-isolation have prompted the widespread closure of primary, secondary, and tertiary schooling in over 100 countries.previous outbreaks of infectious diseases have prompted widespread school closings around the world, with varying levels of effectiveness.
translation.ga: Spreag iarrachtaí chun stop a chur le leathadh covid-19 trí idirghabhálacha neamh-chógaisíochta agus bearta coisctheacha ar nós fadú sóisialta agus féin-aonrú dúnadh forleathan scolaíochta bunscoile, meánscoile agus treasach i mbreis agus 100 tír. Spreag ráigeanna follasacha de ghalair thógálacha dúnadh forleathan scoileanna ar fud an domhain, le leibhéil éagsúla éifeachtúlachta.

translation.en: Mathematical modelling has shown that transmission of an outbreak may be delayed by closing schools.
translation.ga: Taispeánann samhaltú matamaiticiúil gur féidir le scoileanna moill a chur ar tharchur ráige.

translation.en: However, effectiveness depends on the contacts children maintain outside of school.
translation.ga: Braitheann éifeachtúlacht, áfach, ar na teagmhálacha a choinníonn leanaí lasmuigh den scoil.

translation.en: School closures may be effective when enacted promptly.
translation.ga: Is féidir le scoileanna a dhúnadh a bheith éifeachtach nuair a achtaítear go pras iad.

translation.en: If school closures occur late relative to an outbreak, they are less effective and may not have any impact at all.
translation.ga: Má dhúnann scoileanna go déanach i gcoibhneas le ráig, ní bheidh siad chomh héifeachtach agus b ’ fhéidir nach mbeidh aon tionchar acu ar chor ar bith.

translation.en: Additionally, in some cases, the reopening of schools after a period of closure has resulted in increased infection rates.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, i gcásanna áirithe, tá rátaí ionfhabhtaithe méadaithe mar thoradh ar scoileanna a athoscailt tar éis tréimhse dúnta.

translation.en: As closures tend to occur concurrently with other interventions such as public gathering bans, it can be difficult to measure the specific impact of school closures.during the 1918-1919 influenza pandemic in the united states, school closures and public gathering bans were associated with lower total mortality rates.
translation.ga: Toisc go mbíonn claonadh ag dúnadh i gcomhthráth le hidirghabhálacha eile cosúil le toirmisc ar bhailiúcháin phoiblí, is féidir go mbeadh sé deacair tionchar sonrach dhúnadh scoileanna a thomhas. Le linn paindéime fliú 1918-1919 sna stáit aontaithe, bhí baint ag dúnadh scoileanna agus toirmisc ar bhailiúcháin phoiblí le rátaí ísle básmhaireachta foriomlána.

translation.en: Cities that implemented such interventions earlier had greater delays in reaching peak mortality rates.
translation.ga: Bhí moilleanna níos mó ag cathracha a chuir idirghabhálacha den sórt sin i bhfeidhm níos luaithe maidir le buaic-rátaí básmhaireachta a bhaint amach.

translation.en: Schools closed for a median duration of 4 weeks according to a study of 43 us cities' response to the spanish flu.
translation.ga: Dúnadh scoileanna ar feadh 4 seachtaine ar an meán de réir staidéir ar fhreagairt 43 cathair sna sa ar fhliú na spáinne.

translation.en: School closures were shown to reduce morbidity from the asian flu by 90% during the 1957 – 58 outbreak, and up to 50% in controlling influenza in the us, 2004 – 2008.multiple countries successfully slowed the spread of infection through school closures during the 2009 h1n1 flu pandemic.
translation.ga: Taispeánadh go ndúnann dúnadh scoileanna galracht ó fhliú na háise 90% le linn ráig 1957-58, agus suas le 50% i rialú an fhliú sna sa, 2004-2008. D' éirigh le tíortha ilchineálacha scaipeadh an ionfhabhtaithe a dhúnadh trí dhúnadh scoileanna le linn paindéime fliú h1n1.

translation.en: School closures in the city of oita, japan, were found to have successfully decreased the number of infected students at the peak of infection; however closing schools was not found to have significantly decreased the total number of infected students.
translation.ga: Fuarthas amach gur laghdaigh dúnadh scoileanna i gcathair oita, an tseapáin, líon na mac léinn ionfhabhtaithe ag buaic an ionfhabhtaithe; ach fuarthas amach gur laghdaigh dúnadh scoileanna líon na mac léinn ionfhabhtaithe go suntasach.

translation.en: Mandatory school closures and other social distancing measures were associated with a 29% to 37% reduction in influenza transmission rates.
translation.ga: Bhí baint ag dúnadh éigeantach scoileanna agus bearta achair shóisialta eile le laghdú 29% go 37% ar rátaí tarchuir fliú.

translation.en: Early school closures in the united states delayed the peak of the 2009 h1n1 flu pandemic.
translation.ga: Chuir dúnadh luath scoileanna sna stáit aontaithe moill ar bhuaic na paindéime fliú h1n1 2009.

translation.en: Despite the overall success of closing schools, a study of school closures in michigan found that "district level reactive school closures were ineffective." During the swine flu outbreak in 2009 in the uk, in an article titled "closure of schools during an influenza pandemic" published in the lancet infectious diseases, a group of epidemiologists endorsed the closure of schools in order to interrupt the course of the infection, slow further spread and buy time to research and produce a vaccine.
translation.ga: In ainneoin an rath foriomlán a bhí ar dhúnadh scoileanna, fuair staidéar ar dhúnadh scoileanna i michigan go raibh "dúnadh imoibríoch scoile ag leibhéal an cheantair neamhéifeachtach." Le linn ráig 2009 de fhliú na muc sa ríocht aontaithe, in alt dar teideal "scoileanna dúnta le linn paindéime fliú" a foilsíodh i lancet galair thógálacha, thacaigh grúpa eipidéimeolaithe le dúnadh scoileanna d ’ fhonn cur isteach ar chúrsa an ionfhabhtaithe, ag moilliú an leathadh ceannaigh níos mó agus am chun taighde agus vacsaín a tháirgeadh.

translation.en: Having studied previous influenza pandemics including the 1918 flu pandemic, the influenza pandemic of 1957 and the 1968 flu pandemic, they reported on the economic and workforce effect school closure would have, particularly with a large percentage of doctors and nurses being women, of whom half had children under the age of 16.
translation.ga: Tar éis dóibh staidéar a dhéanamh ar phaindéimí fliú roimhe seo lena n-áirítear paindéim fliú 1918, paindéim fliú 1957 agus paindéim fliú 1968, thuairiscigh siad ar thionchar eacnamaíoch agus fhórsa saothair dhúnadh scoileanna, go háirithe le céatadán mór dochtúirí. agus mná ab ea na haltraí, mná a bhí ina leath acu. bhí leanaí faoi 16 bliana d ’ aois.

translation.en: They also looked at the dynamics of the spread of influenza in france during french school holidays and noted that cases of flu dropped when schools closed and re-emerged when they re-opened.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéach siad freisin ar dhinimic scaipeadh an fhliú sa fhrainc le linn laethanta saoire scoile na fraince agus thug siad faoi deara gur thit cásanna fliú nuair a dhún scoileanna agus a tháinig siad chun cinn arís nuair a d ’ oscail siad arís.

translation.en: They noted that when teachers in israel went on strike during the flu season of 1999 – 2000, visits to doctors and the number of respiratory infections dropped by more than a fifth and more than two fifths respectively.
translation.ga: Thug siad dá n-aire nuair a chuaigh múinteoirí in iosrael ar stailc le linn shéasúr an fhliú 1999 – 2000, gur tháinig laghdú níos mó ná an cúigiú cuid agus níos mó ná dhá chúigiú faoi seach ar chuairteanna dochtúirí agus ar líon na n-ionfhabhtuithe riospráide.

translation.en: For schools and childcare facilities, the u.s. centers for disease control and prevention recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
translation.ga: Maidir le scoileanna agus saoráidí cúram leanaí, molann ionaid sam um rialú agus cosc ar ghalair dúnadh gearrthéarmach le haghaidh glantacháin nó díghalraithe má tá duine ionfhabhtaithe i bhfoirgneamh scoile beag beann ar scaipeadh an phobail.

translation.en: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as cancelling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
translation.ga: Nuair nach bhfuil ann ach tarchur pobail measartha go híseal, is féidir straitéisí sóisialta fadraoin mar thurais allamuigh, tionóil, agus cruinnithe móra eile mar chorpoideachas nó ranganna cór nó béilí caifitéire a chur ar ceal, ag méadú an spáis idir deasca, rochtain gan staonadh agus ócáidí dífhostú, cuairteoirí gan ghá a theorannú, agus suíomh oifige sláinte ar leithligh a úsáid do leanaí a bhfuil comharthaí cosúil leis an bhfliú orthu.

translation.en: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.
translation.ga: Sa chás go ndéantar tarchur substaintiúil sa phobal áitiúil, chomh maith le straitéisí síneadh sóisialta, féadfar dífhostú fada scoile a mheas.

translation.en: On 26 january, china instituted measures to contain the covid-19 outbreak which included extending the spring festival holiday to contain the outbreak.
translation.ga: An 26 eanáir, chuir an tsín tús le bearta chun an ráig covid-19 a choinneáil ann, lena n-áirítear saoire fhéile an earraigh a leathnú chun an ráig a choinneáil ann.

translation.en: Universities and schools around the country closed.
translation.ga: Dúnadh ollscoileanna agus scoileanna timpeall na tíre.

translation.en: On 23 february, iran's ministry of health announced the closure of universities, higher educational institutions and schools in several cities and provinces.
translation.ga: Ar 23 feabhra, d ’ fhógair aireacht sláinte na hiaráine go ndúnfaí ollscoileanna, institiúidí ardoideachais agus scoileanna i roinnt cathracha agus cúigí.

translation.en: On 3 march, unesco released the first global numbers on school closures and affected students.
translation.ga: Ar 3 márta, d ’ eisigh unesco na chéad uimhreacha domhanda ar dhúnadh scoileanna agus chuir sé isteach ar mhic léinn.

translation.en: It reported that 13 countries had enacted preventive measures including the temporary closure of schools and universities, impacting 290.5 million students around the world.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh go ndearna 13 tír bearta coisctheacha a achtú lena n-áirítear dúnadh sealadach scoileanna agus ollscoileanna, a chuaigh i bhfeidhm ar 290.5 milliún mac léinn ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: In reaction, unesco called on countries to support affected students and families and facilitate large-scale inclusive distance learning programmes.
translation.ga: Mar fhreagra air sin, d ’ iarr unesco ar thíortha tacú le mic léinn agus teaghlaigh atá buailte agus cláir chianfhoghlama uilechuimsithí ar scála mór a éascú.

translation.en: On 4 march, the italian government ordered the full closure of all schools and universities nationwide as italy reached 100 deaths.
translation.ga: Ar 4 márta, d ’ ordaigh rialtas na hiodáile go ndúnfaí gach scoil agus ollscoil ar fud na tíre de réir mar a shroich an iodáil 100 bás.

translation.en: In doing so, italy became one of 22 countries on three continents which had announced or implemented school closures.
translation.ga: Agus é sin á dhéanamh, tháinig an iodáil ar cheann de 22 tír ar thrí mhór-roinn a d ’ fhógair nó a chuir i bhfeidhm dúnadh scoileanna.

translation.en: On 5 march, the majority of learners affected by covid-19 emergency measures were located in china, with 233 million learners affected, followed by japan at 16.5 million and iran at 14.5 million.
translation.ga: Ar 5 márta, bhí formhór na bhfoghlaimeoirí a ndeachaigh bearta éigeandála covid-19 i bhfeidhm orthu lonnaithe sa tsín, agus bhí tionchar ag 233 milliún foghlaimeoir, agus an tseapáin ina dhiaidh sin ag 16.5 milliún agus an iaráin ag 14.5 milliún.

translation.en: By 10 march, one in five students worldwide was "staying away from school due to the covid-19 crisis" while another one in four was barred from higher education institutions.
translation.ga: Faoi 10 márta, bhí mac léinn as gach cúigear ar fud an domhain “ag fanacht lasmuigh den scoil mar gheall ar ghéarchéim covid-19 ” agus bhí duine eile as gach ceathrar faoi urchosc ó institiúidí ardoideachais.

translation.en: On 13 march, governments in 49 countries announced or implemented school closures, including 39 countries which closed schools nationwide and 22 countries with localised school closures.
translation.ga: Ar 13 márta, d ’ fhógair nó chuir rialtais i 49 tír dúnadh scoileanna i bhfeidhm, lena n-áirítear 39 tír a dhún scoileanna ar fud na tíre agus 22 tír le dúnadh scoileanna áitiúla.

translation.en: By 16 march, this figure increased from 49 to 73 countries according to unesco.
translation.ga: Faoi 16 márta, bhí an figiúr seo méadaithe ó 49 go 73 tír de réir unesco.

translation.en: By 19 march, 50% of students worldwide were affected by school closures, corresponding to nationwide closures in 102 countries and local closures in 11 countries affecting 850 million children and youth.
translation.ga: Faoi 19 márta, bhí tionchar ag dúnadh scoileanna ar 50% de mhic léinn ar fud an domhain, a fhreagraíonn do dhúnadh ar fud na tíre i 102 tír agus dúnadh áitiúil i 11 tír a raibh tionchar acu ar 850 milliún leanbh agus óige.

translation.en: By 20 march, over 70% of the world's learners were impacted by closures, with 124 country-wide school closures.
translation.ga: Faoi 20 márta, bhí níos mó ná 70% d ’ fhoghlaimeoirí an domhain dúnta ina n-áit, agus bhí 124 scoil ar fud na tíre dúnta.

translation.en: On 23 march, all nigerian school were found to have been closed down by nigerian government, markets as well as companies were closed down and children were forbidden by parents to step out of their homes.
translation.ga: An 23 márta, fuarthas amach gur dhún rialtas na nigéire scoileanna uile na nigéire, dúnadh margaí chomh maith le cuideachtaí agus chuir tuismitheoirí cosc ​ ​ ar leanaí céim a bhaint amach as a dtithe.

translation.en: On 26 march, all new zealand schools and universities have been closed down across the country.
translation.ga: An 26 márta, dúnadh gach scoil agus ollscoil sa nua-shéalainn ar fud na tíre.

translation.en: The government has imposed a two-week holiday, allowing schools to transition to forms of distant teaching as soon as possible.
translation.ga: Tá saoire coicíse curtha i bhfeidhm ag an rialtas, rud a ligeann do scoileanna aistriú chuig cineálacha teagaisc i bhfad i gcéin a luaithe is féidir.

translation.en: Universities have closed for one week, but resumed with online teaching afterwards.
translation.ga: Tá ollscoileanna dúnta ar feadh seachtaine, ach ina dhiaidh sin thosaigh siad le teagasc ar líne.

translation.en: Other school services remain open, but teaching is restricted to distant learning.
translation.ga: Tá seirbhísí scoile eile fós oscailte, ach tá an teagasc teoranta d ’ fhoghlaim i bhfad i gcéin.

translation.en: By 27 march, nearly 90 percent of the world's student population was out of class.
translation.ga: Faoi 27 márta, bhí beagnach 90 faoin gcéad de dhaonra mac léinn an domhain as rang.

translation.en: Regions with schools remaining open included taiwan, singapore, australia, sweden, and some u.s. states.
translation.ga: I measc na réigiún ina raibh scoileanna fós oscailte bhí taiwan, singeapór, an astráil, an tsualainn, agus roinnt stát sam

translation.en: By 29 march, more than 1.5 billion children and other students were affected by nationwide school closures.
translation.ga: Faoi 29 márta, bhí tionchar ag dúnadh scoileanna ar fud na tíre ar níos mó ná 1.5 billiún leanbh agus mac léinn eile.

translation.en: Others were disrupted by localized closures.
translation.ga: Chuir dúnadh áitiúil isteach ar dhaoine eile.

translation.en: Until april 6, holidays were extended in all secondary schools of turkmenistan.
translation.ga: Go dtí an 6 aibreán, síneadh laethanta saoire chuig gach meánscoil sa tuircméanastáin.

translation.en: An order signed by the ministry of education as a preventative measure aims to prevent the spread of respiratory diseases in connection with the who coronavirus pandemic.
translation.ga: Tá sé mar aidhm ag ordú arna shíniú ag an aireacht oideachais mar bheart coisctheach leathadh galair riospráide a chosc i dtaca le paindéim coronavirus who.

translation.en: 10 countries have localised schools closures, unesco estimates 473,933,356 learners are potentially at risk (pre-primary to upper-secondary education) and 77,938,904 learners are potentially at risk in tertiary education.
translation.ga: Dúnadh scoileanna áitiúla i 10 dtír, measann unesco go bhféadfadh 473,933,356 foghlaimeoir a bheith i mbaol (oideachas réamhscoile go meánscoil uachtarach) agus d ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh 77,938,904 foghlaimeoir i mbaol san oideachas treasach.

translation.en: Note: Figures correspond to total number of learners enrolled at pre-primary, primary, lower-secondary, and upper-secondary levels of education [isced levels 0 to 3], as well as at tertiary education levels [isced levels 5 to 8] who could be affected should localised closures become countrywide.
translation.ga: Nóta: Freagraíonn na figiúirí do líon iomlán na bhfoghlaimeoirí atá cláraithe ag leibhéil réamhscoile, bunscoile, meánscoile agus meánscoile níos ísle [leibhéil isced 0 go 3], chomh maith le leibhéil oideachais threasach [leibhéil isced 5 go 8] a d ’ fhéadfadh dul i bhfeidhm orthu más rud é rinneadh dúnadh áitiúil ar fud na tíre.

translation.en: Enrolment figures based on latest unesco institute of statistics data.
translation.ga: Figiúirí rollaithe bunaithe ar na sonraí is déanaí de chuid institiúid staidrimh unesco.

translation.en: School closures in response to the covid-19 pandemic have shed a light on numerous issues affecting access to education, as well as broader socio-economic issues.
translation.ga: Chuir dúnadh scoileanna mar fhreagairt ar phaindéim covid-19 béim ar go leor saincheisteanna a théann i bhfeidhm ar rochtain ar oideachas, chomh maith le saincheisteanna socheacnamaíocha níos leithne.

translation.en: As of march 12, more than 370 million children and youth are not attending school because of temporary or indefinite country wide school closures mandated by governments in an attempt to slow the spread of covid-19.
translation.ga: Amhail an 12 márta, níl níos mó ná 370 milliún leanbh agus óige ag freastal ar scoil mar gheall ar dhúnadh sealadach nó éiginnte rialtais atá sainordaithe ar fud na tíre mar iarracht scaipeadh covid-19 a mhoilliú.

translation.en: As of 29 march, nearly 90% of the world's learners were impacted by closures.even when school closures are temporary, it carries high social and economic costs.
translation.ga: Amhail an 29 márta, bhí tionchar ag dúnadh ar bheagnach 90% d ’ fhoghlaimeoirí an domhain. Gach uair a dhúnann scoileanna go sealadach, bíonn costais shóisialta agus eacnamaíocha arda air.

translation.en: The disruptions they cause affect people across communities, but their impact is more severe for disadvantaged children and their families including interrupted learning, compromised nutrition, childcare problems and consequent economic cost to families who cannot work.
translation.ga: Bíonn tionchar ag na suaitheadh ​ ​ a chruthaíonn siad ar dhaoine ar fud na bpobal, ach tá a dtionchar ar leanaí faoi mhíbhuntáiste agus a dteaghlaigh níos déine lena n-áirítear cur isteach ar fhoghlaim, cothú i mbaol, fadhbanna cúram leanaí agus an costas eacnamaíoch dá bharr sin do theaghlaigh nach féidir leo obair.

translation.en: Working parents are more likely to miss work when schools close in order to take care of their children, incurring wage loss in many instances and negatively impacting productivity.
translation.ga: Is dóichí go gcaillfidh tuismitheoirí atá ag obair obair nuair a dhúnann scoileanna d ’ fhonn aire a thabhairt dá gcuid leanaí, rud a thabhóidh caillteanas pá agus a mbeidh tionchar diúltach aige ar tháirgiúlacht.

translation.en: Localised school closures place burdens on schools as parents and officials redirect children to schools that are open.
translation.ga: Cuireann dúnadh scoileanna áitiúla ualaí ar scoileanna de réir mar a atreoraíonn tuismitheoirí agus oifigigh leanaí chuig scoileanna oscailte.

translation.en: Women often represent a large share of health-care workers and often cannot attend work because of childcare obligations that result from school closures.
translation.ga: Is minic a dhéanann mná ionadaíocht ar sciar mór d ’ oibrithe cúram sláinte agus go minic ní bhíonn siad in ann freastal ar obair mar gheall ar oibleagáidí cúram leanaí a éiríonn as dúnadh scoileanna.

translation.en: This means that many medical professionals are not at the facilities where they are most needed during a health crisis.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo nach bhfuil go leor gairmithe míochaine sna saoráidí ina bhfuil an gá is mó leo le linn géarchéime sláinte.

translation.en: Lack of access to technology or fast, reliable internet access can prevent students in rural areas and from disadvantaged families.
translation.ga: Féadann easpa rochtana ar theicneolaíocht nó rochtain thapa, iontaofa ar an idirlíon mic léinn i gceantair thuaithe agus ó theaghlaigh faoi mhíbhuntáiste a dhíspreagadh.

translation.en: Lack of access to technology or good internet connectivity is an obstacle to continued learning, especially for students from disadvantaged families.
translation.ga: Tá easpa rochtana ar theicneolaíocht nó nascacht mhaith idirlín ina chonstaic ar fhoghlaim leanúnach, go háirithe do mhic léinn ó theaghlaigh faoi mhíbhuntáiste.

translation.en: In response to school closures caused by covid-19, unesco recommends the use of distance learning programmes and open educational applications and platforms that schools and teachers can use to reach learners remotely and limit the disruption of education.to aid in slowing the transmission of covid-19, hundreds of libraries have temporarily closed.
translation.ga: Mar fhreagairt ar dhúnadh scoileanna mar gheall ar covid-19, molann unesco go n-úsáidfí cláir chianfhoghlama agus feidhmchláir agus ardáin oideachais oscailte is féidir le scoileanna agus múinteoirí a úsáid chun foghlaimeoirí a bhaint amach go cianda agus chun cur isteach ar oideachas a theorannú. Chun cabhrú le tarchur covid a mhoilliú. -19, déantar na céadta leabharlann a dhúnadh go sealadach.

translation.en: In the united states, numerous major cities announced public library closures, including los angeles, san francisco, seattle, and new york city, affecting 221 libraries.
translation.ga: Sna stáit aontaithe, d ’ fhógair go leor cathracha móra go ndúnfaí leabharlanna poiblí, lena n-áirítear los angeles, san francisco, seattle, agus cathair nua eabhrac, a rachadh i bhfeidhm ar 221 leabharlann.

translation.en: For students without internet at home, this increases the difficulty of keeping up with distance learning.
translation.ga: Maidir le mic léinn nach bhfuil an t-idirlíon acu sa bhaile, méadaíonn sé seo an deacracht atá ann coimeád suas le cianfhoghlaim.

translation.en: School closures puts a strain on parents and guardians to provide childcare and manage distance learning while children are out of school.
translation.ga: Cuireann dúnadh scoileanna brú ar thuismitheoirí agus ar chaomhnóirí cúram leanaí a sholáthar agus cianfhoghlaim a bhainistiú fad a bhíonn leanaí lasmuigh den scoil.

translation.en: In the absence of alternative options, working parents often leave children alone when schools close and this can lead to risky behaviours, including increased influence of peer pressure and substance abuse.
translation.ga: Cheal roghanna eile, is minic a fhágann tuismitheoirí atá ag obair leanaí ina n-aonar nuair a dhúnann scoileanna agus d ’ fhéadfadh iompraíochtaí contúirteacha a bheith mar thoradh air seo, lena n-áirítear tionchar méadaithe brú piaraí agus mí-úsáid substaintí.

translation.en: Many children worldwide rely on free or discounted meals at schools.
translation.ga: Tá go leor leanaí ar fud an domhain ag brath ar bhéilí saor in aisce nó ar lascaine i scoileanna.

translation.en: When schools close, nutrition is compromised.nutrition plays a critical role in cognitive development and academic performance for children.in washington state, around 45% of the states 1.1 million students enrolled in traditional public and charter schools qualify for subsidised school meals.
translation.ga: Nuair a dhúnann scoileanna, cuirtear an cothú i gcontúirt. Tá ról ríthábhachtach ag cothú i bhforbairt chognaíoch leanaí agus i bhfeidhmíocht acadúil. I stát washington, cáilíonn thart ar 45% de stáit 1.1 milliún mac léinn atá cláraithe i scoileanna traidisiúnta poiblí agus cairte le haghaidh béilí scoile fóirdheonaithe.

translation.en: At least 520,000 students and their families may be affected by food insecurity as a result of school closures.school lunch programmes are the second-biggest anti-hunger initiative in the united states after food stamps.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh neamhshlándáil scoile dul i bhfeidhm ar 520,000 dalta ar a laghad agus a dteaghlaigh mar thoradh ar dhúnadh scoileanna. Is iad cláir lóin scoile an dara tionscnamh frith-ocrais is mó sna stáit aontaithe tar éis stampaí bia.

translation.en: Every year, nearly 30 million children rely on schools to provide free or low-cost meals including breakfast, lunch, snacks, and even dinner.in alabama, where state-wide school closures as of 18 march have affected over 720,000 students, the state superintendent announced that staff in schools disproportionately affected by poverty would create meal distribution networks to provide food for students who rely on school lunches.
translation.ga: Gach bliain, bíonn beagnach 30 milliún leanbh ag brath ar scoileanna chun béilí saor in aisce nó ar chostas íseal a sholáthar lena n-áirítear bricfeasta, lón, sneaiceanna, agus fiú dinnéar. In alabama, áit a ndeachaigh dúnadh scoileanna ar fud an stáit an 18 márta i bhfeidhm ar níos mó ná 720,000 mac léinn, d ’ fhógair ceannfort an stáit go gcruthódh baill foirne i scoileanna a bhfuil tionchar díréireach ag an mbochtaineacht orthu líonraí dáilte béile-go-bia chun mic léinn atá ag brath ar lónta scoile a sholáthar.

translation.en: School closures negatively impact student learning outcomes.
translation.ga: Bíonn tionchar diúltach ag dúnadh scoileanna ar thorthaí foghlama na mac léinn.

translation.en: Schooling provides essential learning and when schools close, children and youth are deprived opportunities for growth and development.
translation.ga: Soláthraíonn an scolaíocht foghlaim riachtanach agus cuireann scoileanna a dhúnadh deiseanna ar fáil d ’ fhás agus d ’ fhorbairt do leanaí agus do dhaoine óga.

translation.en: The disadvantages are disproportionate for under-privileged learners who tend to have fewer educational opportunities beyond school.student drop-out rates tend to increase as an effect of school closures due to the challenge of ensuring all students return to school once school closures ends.
translation.ga: Tá na míbhuntáistí díréireach d ’ fhoghlaimeoirí faoi phribhléid a mbíonn níos lú deiseanna oideachais acu lasmuigh den scoil de ghnáth. Is gnách go dtiocfaidh méadú ar rátaí leanúnacha fágála mar thoradh ar dhúnadh scoile mar gheall ar an dúshlán a chinntiú go bhfillfidh gach dalta ar scoil nuair a dhúnann an scoil.

translation.en: This is especially true of protracted closures.schools are hubs of social activity and human interaction.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo fíor go háirithe maidir le dúnadh fada. Is moil iad scoileanna gníomhaíochtaí sóisialta agus idirghníomhaíocht dhaonna.

translation.en: When schools are closed, many children and youth miss out of on social contact that is essential to learning and development.when schools close parents are often asked to facilitate the learning of children at home and can struggle to perform this task.
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn scoileanna dúnta, cailleann a lán leanaí agus daoine óga an teagmháil shóisialta atá riachtanach don fhoghlaim agus don fhorbairt. Nuair a iarrtar go minic ar thuismitheoirí dlúth foghlaim leanaí a éascú sa bhaile agus bíonn sé deacair orthu an tasc seo a dhéanamh.

translation.en: This is especially true for parents with limited education and resources.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo fíor go háirithe i gcás tuismitheoirí a bhfuil oideachas agus acmhainní teoranta acu.

translation.en: Potential impacts of school closures and reliance on distance learning are not addressed in federal acts of legislation at this time.
translation.ga: Ní thugtar aghaidh ar na tionchair a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith ag dúnadh scoileanna agus ag brath ar chianfhoghlaim i ngníomhartha reachtaíochta cónaidhme ag an am seo.

translation.en: Formal education — as opposed to informal education or non-formal education — tends to refer to schools, colleges, universities and training institutions.
translation.ga: De ghnáth tagraíonn oideachas foirmiúil - seachas oideachas neamhfhoirmiúil nó neamhfhoirmiúil - do scoileanna, coláistí, ollscoileanna agus institiúidí oiliúna.

translation.en: A 1974 report by the world bank defined formal education as the following: Formal education: The hierarchically structured, chronologically graded ‘ education system ’, running from primary school through the university and including, in addition to general academic studies, a variety of specialised programmes and institutions for full-time technical and professional training.the majority of data collected on the number of students and learners impacted by covid-19 has been calculated based on the closure of formal education systems.
translation.ga: Shainigh tuarascáil ón mbanc domhanda i 1974 oideachas foirmiúil mar seo a leanas: Oideachas foirmiúil: An ‘ córas oideachais ’ struchtúrtha ordlathach, grádaithe go croineolaíoch, ag rith ón mbunscoil tríd an ollscoil agus lena n-áirítear, i dteannta le staidéir acadúla ghinearálta, speisialtóir réimse clár agus lánaimseartha oiliúint theicniúil agus ghairmiúil. Rinneadh tromlach na sonraí a bailíodh ar líon na mac léinn agus na bhfoghlaimeoirí a ndeachaigh covid-19 i bhfeidhm orthu a ríomh bunaithe ar dhúnadh na gcóras foirmiúil oideachais.

translation.en: The unesco institute for statistics provides figures on students impacted by covid-19 corresponding to the number of learners enrolled at pre-primary, primary, lower-secondary, and upper-secondary levels of education [isced levels 0 to 3], as well as at tertiary education levels [isced levels 5 to 8].
translation.ga: Soláthraíonn institiúid staidrimh unesco figiúirí ar mhic léinn a bhfuil tionchar ag covid-19 orthu a fhreagraíonn do líon na bhfoghlaimeoirí atá cláraithe ag leibhéil réamhscoile, bunscoile, meánscoile agus meánscoile [leibhéil isced 0 go 3], chomh maith le leibhéil oideachais threasach [leibhéil isced 5 go 8].

translation.en: Early childhood educational programmes are usually designed for children below the age of 3 and may refer to preschools, nursery schools, kindergartens, and some day care programmes.
translation.ga: De ghnáth déantar cláir oideachais luath-óige a dhearadh do leanaí faoi 3 bliana d ’ aois agus d ’ fhéadfadh tagairt a dhéanamh do réamhscoileanna, naíolanna, naíolanna, agus roinnt clár cúraim lae.

translation.en: While many primary and secondary schools have closed around the world due to covid-19, measures impacting early childhood educational programmes have varied.
translation.ga: Cé gur dhún go leor bunscoileanna agus meánscoileanna ar fud an domhain mar gheall ar covid-19, tá éagsúlacht sna bearta a théann i bhfeidhm ar chláir oideachais luath-óige.

translation.en: In some countries and territories, preschools and day cares are considered necessary services and have not closed in tandem with broader school closure measures.in the united states, the washington state department of children, youth, and families encouraged child care and early learning centres to stay open.
translation.ga: I roinnt tíortha agus críocha, meastar gur seirbhísí riachtanacha iad réamhscoileanna agus cúram lae agus níor dhún siad i gcomhar le bearta dúnta scoile níos leithne. Sna stáit aontaithe, spreag roinn leanaí, óige agus teaghlaigh stát washington ionaid chúraim leanaí agus luathfhoghlama chun fanacht oscailte.

translation.en: Some school districts may offer alternative child care options, prioritising the children of first responders and healthcare workers.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh roinnt ceantar scoile roghanna eile cúram leanaí a thairiscint, ag tabhairt tosaíochta do leanaí céadfhreagróirí agus oibrithe cúram sláinte.

translation.en: The governor of maryland mandated that specific child care services remain open for the children of emergency personnel while washington state and california have left it to the discretion of care providers.
translation.ga: D' ordaigh gobharnóir maryland go bhfanfadh sainseirbhísí cúraim leanaí ar oscailt do leanaí pearsanra éigeandála agus go bhfágfaí iad go washington state agus california de réir rogha na soláthraithe cúraim.

translation.en: California governor gavin newsom explained his state's position, saying “we need our child care facilities, our daycare centers, to operate to absorb the impact of these school closures. ”
translation.ga: Mhínigh gobharnóir california gavin newsom seasamh a stáit, ag rá "teastaíonn ár saoráidí cúraim leanaí, ár n-ionaid chúraim lae, chun oibriú chun tionchar na ndúnadh scoile seo a ionsú."

translation.en: Colorado has encouraged the development of "tool kits" for parents to use at home to emulate the lessons children would have received in their early learning programmes.in japan, prime minister shinzo abe closed all schools throughout the country until april 8, however, children's daycare facilities were excluded.
translation.ga: Spreag colorado forbairt “trealamh uirlisí ” a d ’ fhéadfadh tuismitheoirí a úsáid sa bhaile chun aithris a dhéanamh ar na ceachtanna a bheadh ​ ​ foghlamtha ag leanaí ina gcláir luathfhoghlama. Sa tseapáin, dhún an príomh-aire shinzo abe gach scoil ar fud na tíre go dtí an 8 aibreán, áfach, díbríodh leanaí as áiseanna cúraim lae.

translation.en: In early march, five adults associated with a nursing facility for preschool children in kobe tested positive for coronavirus.
translation.ga: Go luath i mí an mhárta, rinne cúigear daoine fásta a raibh baint acu le saoráid altranais do leanaí réamhscoile i kobe tástáil dhearfach ar coronavirus.

translation.en: After testing over one hundred children at the facility, a preschool student was found to be carrying the virus.
translation.ga: Tar éis níos mó ná céad leanbh a thástáil ag an áis, fuarthas go raibh mac léinn réamhscoile ag iompar an víris.

translation.en: Primary or elementary education typically consists of the first four to seven years of formal education.
translation.ga: Is gnách gurb é oideachas bunscoile nó bunscoile an chéad cheithre go seacht mbliana d ’ oideachas foirmiúil.

translation.en: The international baccalaureate organization (ibo) canceled the examinations for its diploma programme and career-related programme candidates scheduled between 30 april and 22 may 2020, reportedly affecting more than 200,000 students worldwide.
translation.ga: Chuir an eagraíocht idirnáisiúnta baitsiléir (ibo) na scrúduithe dá hiarrthóirí ar ceal don dioplóma agus don chlár gairme gaolmhar idir 30 aibreán agus 22 bealtaine, 2020, a thuairiscigh go raibh tionchar acu ar níos mó ná 200,000 mac léinn ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: The ibo stated that it would award candidates their diplomas or certificates based on "their coursework" and "the established assessment expertise, rigor, and quality control already built into the programme."
translation.ga: Dúirt an ibo go mbronnfadh sé a gcuid dioplómaí nó teastais d ’ iarrthóirí bunaithe ar “a gcuid obair chúrsa ” agus“ an saineolas fadbhunaithe measúnaithe, déine agus rialaithe cáilíochta atá mar chuid den chlár cheana féin. "

translation.en: Tertiary education, also known as higher education, refers to the non-compulsory educational levels that follow completion of secondary school or high school.
translation.ga: Tagraíonn oideachas treasach, ar a dtugtar ardoideachas freisin, do na leibhéil neamh-éigeantacha oideachais a leanann críochnú meánscoile nó ardscoile.

translation.en: Tertiary education is normally taken to include undergraduate and postgraduate education, as well as vocational education and training.
translation.ga: Glactar leis go ginearálta go gcuimsíonn oideachas treasach oideachas fochéime agus iarchéime, chomh maith le gairmoideachas agus oiliúint.

translation.en: Individuals who complete tertiary education generally receive certificates, diplomas, or academic degrees.
translation.ga: De ghnáth faigheann daoine a chríochnaíonn oideachas treasach teastais, dioplómaí nó céimeanna acadúla.

translation.en: Undergraduate education is education conducted after secondary education and prior to post-graduate education, for which the learner is typically awarded a bachelor's degree.
translation.ga: Is é oideachas fochéime oideachas a dhéantar tar éis na meánscoile agus roimh oideachas iarchéime, a mbronntar céim bhaitsiléara air de ghnáth.

translation.en: Students enrolled in higher education programmes at colleges, universities, and community colleges are often refereed to in countries such as united states as "college students." The closure of colleges and universities has widespread implications for students, faculty, administrators, and the institutions themselves.
translation.ga: Is minic a thugtar “mic léinn coláiste ” ar mhic léinn atá cláraithe i gcláir ardoideachais i gcoláistí, in ollscoileanna agus i gcoláistí pobail i dtíortha mar na stáit aontaithe.
