Tá impleachtaí forleathana ag dúnadh na gcoláistí agus na n-ollscoileanna do mhic léinn, dáimhe, riarthóirí agus na hinstitiúidí féin.

translation.en: Colleges and universities across the united states have been called upon to issue refunds to students for the cost of tuition and room and board.
translation.ga: Iarradh ar choláistí agus ollscoileanna ar fud na stát aontaithe aisíocaíochtaí a eisiúint do mhic léinn as costas an teagaisc agus an tseomra agus an bhoird.

translation.en: In the united states of america, colleges and universities operate as "mini-cities" which generate significant revenue for cities, states, and regions.
translation.ga: Sna stáit aontaithe, oibríonn coláistí agus ollscoileanna mar “mhionchathracha ” a ghineann ioncam suntasach do chathracha, stáit agus réigiúin.

translation.en: For example, princeton university contributed $1.58 billion usd to the new jersey economy and students spent about $60 million in off-campus spending.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, chuir ollscoil princeton $1.58 billiún usd le geilleagar new jersey agus chaith mic léinn thart ar $60 milliún i gcaiteachas lasmuigh den champas.

translation.en: College and university closures have a domino effect on economies with far-reaching implications.according to linda bilmes of the harvard kennedy school, "local hotels, restaurants, cafes, shops, car rental agencies and other local businesses obtain a significant share of annual revenue from graduation week and college reunions...
translation.ga: Tá tionchar domino ag dúnadh na gcoláistí agus na n-ollscoileanna ar gheilleagair a bhfuil impleachtaí forleathana acu. Ag teacht le linda bilmes ó scoil harvard kennedy, "faigheann óstáin áitiúla, bialanna, caiféanna, siopaí, gníomhaireachtaí fruilithe gluaisteán agus gnóthais áitiúla eile sciar suntasach den ioncam bliantúil ó sheachtain céime agus athaontaithe an choláiste...

translation.en: These communities will suffer a lot of economic damage if the colleges remain closed at that time. "Small towns which rely on college students to support the local economy and provide labour to local businesses are especially impacted by school closures and the exodus of students from campus.
translation.ga: Déanfar go leor damáiste do na pobail seo má fhanann na coláistí dúnta ag an am sin. “bíonn tionchar mór ag dúnadh scoileanna agus díbirt mac léinn ón gcampas ar bhailte beaga atá ag brath ar mhic léinn an choláiste tacú leis an ngeilleagar áitiúil agus saothair a sholáthar do ghnólachtaí áitiúla.

translation.en: In ithaca, new york, cornell university students spent at least $4 million a week in tompkins county.
translation.ga: In ithaca, nua eabhrac, chaith mic léinn ollscoil cornell $4 mhilliún sa tseachtain ar a laghad i gcontae tompkins.

translation.en: In the wake of cornell's decision to keep students home following spring break and transition to virtual instruction, the mayor of ithaca called for "immediate and forceful federal action — we will see a horrific economic impact as a result of cornell university closing."
translation.ga: Tar éis chinneadh cornell mic léinn a choinneáil sa bhaile tar éis shos an earraigh agus aistriú go teagasc fíorúil, d ’ iarr méara ithaca “gníomh láidir cónaidhme láithreach - feicfimid tionchar uafásach eacnamaíoch mar thoradh ar dhúnadh ollscoil cornell."

translation.en: Unesco is sharing 10 recommendations during this period:
translation.ga: Tá unesco ag roinnt 10 moladh le linn na tréimhse seo:

translation.en: Examine the readiness and choose the most relevant tools: Decide on the use high-technology and low-technology solutions based on the reliability of local power supplies, internet connectivity, and digital skills of teachers and students.
translation.ga: Scrúdaigh ullmhacht agus roghnaigh na huirlisí is ábhartha: Déan cinneadh réitigh ardteicneolaíochta agus ísealteicneolaíochta a úsáid bunaithe ar iontaofacht soláthairtí cumhachta áitiúla, nascacht idirlín, agus scileanna digiteacha múinteoirí agus mac léinn.

translation.en: This could range through integrated digital learning platforms, video lessons, moocs, to broadcasting through radios and tvs.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh raon a bheith ann trí ardáin chomhtháite foghlama digití, ceachtanna físe, moocanna, agus craoladh trí raidiónna agus teilifíseáin.

translation.en: Ensure inclusion of the distance learning programmes: Implement measures to ensure that students including those with disabilities or from low-income backgrounds have access to distance learning programmes, if only a limited number of them have access to digital devices.
translation.ga: A chinntiú go gcuirtear cláir chianfhoghlama san áireamh: Bearta a chur i bhfeidhm chun a chinntiú go mbeidh rochtain ag mic léinn, lena n-áirítear iad siúd faoi mhíchumas nó ó chúlraí ar ioncam íseal, ar chláir cianfhoghlama, mura bhfuil rochtain ag gairis dhigiteacha ar ghléasanna digiteacha ach líon teoranta díobh.

translation.en: Consider temporarily decentralising such devices from computer labs to families and support them with internet connectivity.
translation.ga: Smaoinigh ar fheistí den sórt sin a dhílárú go sealadach ó shaotharlanna ríomhaireachta go teaghlaigh agus tacú leo le nascacht idirlín.

translation.en: Protect data privacy and data security: Assess data security when uploading data or educational resources to web spaces, as well as when sharing them with other organisations or individuals.
translation.ga: Príobháideacht agus slándáil sonraí a chosaint: Smaoinigh ar shlándáil sonraí agus sonraí nó acmhainní oideachais á n-uaslódáil chuig spásanna gréasáin, chomh maith lena roinnt le heagraíochtaí nó le daoine aonair eile.

translation.en: Ensure that the use of applications and platforms does not violate students ’ data privacy.
translation.ga: A chinntiú nach sáraíonn úsáid feidhmchlár agus ardán príobháideacht sonraí mac léinn.

translation.en: Prioritize solutions to address psychosocial challenges before teaching: Mobilize available tools to connect schools, parents, teachers, and students with each other.
translation.ga: Tosaíocht a thabhairt do réitigh ar dhúshláin síceasóisialta sula ndéantar iad a theagasc: Na huirlisí atá ar fáil chun scoileanna, tuismitheoirí, múinteoirí agus mic léinn a nascadh.

translation.en: Create communities to ensure regular human interactions, enable social caring measures, and address possible psychosocial challenges that students may face when they are isolated.
translation.ga: Pobail a chruthú chun idirghníomhaíochtaí daonna rialta a chinntiú, bearta cúraim shóisialta a chumasú, agus aghaidh a thabhairt ar dhúshláin síceasóisialta a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith ag mic léinn nuair a bhíonn siad scoite amach.

translation.en: Plan the study schedule of the distance learning programmes: Organise discussions with stakeholders to examine the possible duration of school closures and decide whether the distance learning programme should focus on teaching new knowledge or enhance students ’ knowledge of prior lessons.
translation.ga: Sceideal staidéir na gclár cianfhoghlama a phleanáil: Plé a eagrú le páirtithe leasmhara chun scrúdú a dhéanamh ar an tréimhse a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith ag dúnadh scoileanna agus cinneadh a dhéanamh ar cheart don chlár cianfhoghlama díriú ar eolas nua a theagasc nó ar eolas na mac léinn feabhas a chur ar cheachtanna roimhe seo ar cheachtanna.

translation.en: Plan the schedule depending on the situation of the affected zones, level of studies, needs of students needs, and availability of parents.
translation.ga: Pleanáil an sceideal ag brath ar riocht na gcriosanna atá i gceist, leibhéal an staidéir, riachtanais na mac léinn, agus infhaighteacht na dtuismitheoirí.

translation.en: Choose the appropriate learning methodologies based on the status of school closures and home-based quarantines.
translation.ga: Roghnaigh na modheolaíochtaí foghlama iomchuí bunaithe ar stádas dúnta scoile agus coraintíní tí.

translation.en: Avoid learning methodologies that require face-to-face communication.
translation.ga: Seachain modheolaíochtaí foghlama a éilíonn cumarsáid duine le duine.

translation.en: Provide support to teachers and parents on the use of digital tools: Organise brief training or orientation sessions for teachers and parents as well, if monitoring and facilitation are needed.
translation.ga: Tacaíocht a sholáthar do mhúinteoirí agus do thuismitheoirí maidir le húsáid uirlisí digiteacha: Seisiúin oiliúna nó treoshuímh ghearra a eagrú do mhúinteoirí agus do thuismitheoirí freisin, más gá chun monatóireacht agus éascú a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Help teachers to prepare the basic settings such as solutions to the use of internet data if they are required to provide live streaming of lessons.
translation.ga: Cuidigh le múinteoirí na socruithe bunúsacha a ullmhú mar réitigh ar úsáid sonraí idirlín má éilítear orthu ceachtanna a shruthlú beo.

translation.en: Blend appropriate approaches and limit the number of applications and platforms: Blend tools or media that are available for most students, both for synchronous communication and lessons, and for asynchronous learning.
translation.ga: Cur chuige iomchuí a chumasc agus líon na bhfeidhmchlár agus na n-ardán a theorannú: Uirlisí nó meáin chumasc atá ar fáil d ’ fhormhór na mac léinn, le haghaidh cumarsáide sioncrónaí agus ceachtanna, agus le haghaidh foghlama neamhshioncrónaí.

translation.en: Avoid overloading students and parents by asking them to download and test too many applications or platforms.
translation.ga: Seachain ró-ualach a chur ar mhic léinn agus ar thuismitheoirí trí iarraidh orthu an iomarca aipeanna nó ardáin a íoslódáil agus a thástáil.

translation.en: Develop distance learning rules and monitor students ’ learning process: Define the rules with parents and students on distance learning.
translation.ga: Rialacha cianfhoghlama a fhorbairt agus monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar phróiseas foghlama na mac léinn: Sainmhínigh na rialacha le tuismitheoirí agus le mic léinn maidir le cianfhoghlaim.

translation.en: Design formative questions, tests, or exercises to monitor closely students ’ learning process.
translation.ga: Ceisteanna, tástálacha nó cleachtaí múnlaitheacha a dhearadh chun monatóireacht dhlúth a dhéanamh ar fhoghlaim na mac léinn.

translation.en: Try to use tools to support submission of students ’ feedback and avoid overloading parents by requesting them to scan and send students ’ feedback
translation.ga: Déan iarracht uirlisí a úsáid chun tacú le haiseolas mac léinn a chur isteach agus seachain ró-ualach ar thuismitheoirí trí iarraidh orthu aiseolas ó mhic léinn a scanadh agus a sheoladh isteach

translation.en: Define the duration of distance learning units based on students ’ self-regulation skills: Keep a coherent timing according to the level of the students ’ self-regulation and metacognitive abilities especially for livestreaming classes.
translation.ga: Sainmhínigh fad na n-aonad cianfhoghlama bunaithe ar scileanna féinrialála na mac léinn: Coinnigh uainiú comhsheasmhach de réir leibhéal neamhspleáchais agus meiteashonraí na mac léinn go háirithe do ranganna sruthú beo.

translation.en: Preferably, the unit for primary school students should not be more than 20 minutes, and no longer than 40 minutes for secondary school students.
translation.ga: Go hidéalach, níor chóir go mbeadh an t-aonad do dhaltaí bunscoile níos mó ná 20 nóiméad, agus níor chóir go mbeadh níos mó ná 40 nóiméad do dhaltaí meánscoile.

translation.en: Create communities and enhance connection: Create communities of teachers, parents, and school managers to address sense of loneliness or helplessness, facilitate sharing of experience and discussion on coping strategies when facing learning difficulties.
translation.ga: Pobail a chruthú agus nasc a fheabhsú: Pobail múinteoirí, tuismitheoirí agus bainisteoirí scoile a chruthú chun aghaidh a thabhairt ar uaigneas nó easpa cabhrach, straitéisí a thapú agus a phlé chun déileáil le deacrachtaí foghlama a éascú.

translation.en: 290 million students out of school due to covid-19: Unesco releases first global numbers and mobilizes response, unesco.
translation.ga: 290 milliún mac léinn lasmuigh den scoil mar gheall ar covid-19: Scaoileann unesco na chéad uimhreacha domhanda agus slógann sé freagra, unesco.

translation.en: Whereas on march 4, 2020, i proclaimed a state of emergency to exist in california as a result of the threat of covid-19;
translation.ga: De bhrí an 4 márta 2020, d ’ fhógair mé go raibh stát éigeandála ann i california mar thoradh ar bhagairt covid-19;

translation.en: And whereas in a short period of time, covid-19 has rapidly spread throughout california, necessitating updated and more stringent guidance from federal, state, and local public health officials;
translation.ga: Agus de bhrí i dtréimhse ghearr ama, tá covid-19 ag leathadh go tapa ar fud california, ag éileamh treorach nuashonraithe agus níos déine ó oifigigh sláinte poiblí cónaidhme, stáit agus áitiúla;

translation.en: And whereas for the preservation of public health and safety throughout the entire state of california, i find it necessary for all californians to heed the state public health directives from the department of public health.
translation.ga: Agus de bhrí d ’ fhonn sláinte agus sábháilteacht an phobail a chaomhnú ar fud stát california ar fad, creidim go gcaithfidh gach californians treoirlínte sláinte poiblí an stáit ón roinn sláinte poiblí a chomhlíonadh.

translation.en: Now, therefore, i, gavin newsom, governor of the state of california, in accordance with the authority vested in me by the state constitution and statutes of the state of california, and in particular, government code sections 8567, 8627, and 8665 do hereby issue the following order to become effective immediately:
translation.ga: Anois, mise, gavin newsom, gobharnóir stát california, de réir an údaráis atá dílsithe dom le bunreacht an stáit agus le reachtanna stát california, agus go háirithe, ailt 8567, 8627, agus 8665 de chuid cód rialtais. eisítear leis seo an tordú seo a leanas le héifeacht láithreach:

translation.en: It is hereby ordered that:
translation.ga: Ordú anseo:

translation.en: 1) to preserve the public health and safety, and to ensure the healthcare delivery system is capable of serving all, and prioritizing those at the highest risk and vulnerability, all residents are directed to immediately heed the current state public health directives, which i ordered the department of public health to develop for the current statewide status of covid-19.
translation.ga: 1) sláinte agus sábháilteacht an phobail a chaomhnú, agus a chinntiú go bhfuil an córas seachadta cúram sláinte inrochtana do chách, agus tosaíocht a thabhairt dóibh siúd atá ar an riosca agus an leochaileacht is airde, tugtar treoir do gach cónaitheoir treoracha láithreacha a thabhairt do shláinte phoiblí reatha an stáit.., a d ’ ordaigh mé don roinn sláinte poiblí stádas stáit reatha covid-19 a fhorbairt.

translation.en: Those directives are consistent with the march 19, 2020, memorandum on identification of essential critical infrastructure workers during covid-19 response, found at: Https: / / covid19.ca.gov /.
translation.ga: Tá na treoirlínte seo comhsheasmhach leis an meabhrán an 19 márta, 2020, maidir le hoibrithe bonneagair chriticiúil a aithint le linn fhreagairt covid-19, a fhaightear ag: Https: / / covid19.ca.gov /.

translation.en: Order of the state public health officer
translation.ga: Ordú an oifigigh sláinte poiblí stáit

translation.en: To protect public health, i as state public health officer and director of the california department of public health order all individuals living in the state of california to stay home or at their place of residence except as needed to maintain continuity of operations of the federal critical infrastructure sectors, as outlined at https: / / www.cisa.gov / critical-infrastructure-sectors.
translation.ga: Chun sláinte an phobail a chosaint, ordaím, mar oifigeach sláinte poiblí stáit agus stiúrthóir roinn sláinte poiblí california, do chónaitheoirí uile stát california fanacht sa bhaile nó ag a n-áit chónaithe ach de réir mar is gá chun leanúnachas oibríochtaí criticiúla cónaidhme criticiúla a chinntiú. earnálacha a choinneáil, mar atá sainmhínithe ag https: / / www.cisa.gov / critical-infrastructure-sectors.

translation.en: In addition, and in consultation with the director of the governor's office of emergency services, i may designate additional sectors as critical in order to protect the health and well-being of all californians.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, agus i gcomhairle le stiúrthóir oifig seirbhísí éigeandála an ghobharnóra, féadfaidh mé earnálacha breise a ainmniú mar earnálacha criticiúla d ’ fhonn sláinte agus folláine gach californians a chosaint.

translation.en: Pursuant to the authority under the health and safety code 120125, 120140, 131080, 120130 (c), 120135, 120145, 120175 and 120150, this order is to go into effect immediately and shall stay in effect until further notice.
translation.ga: De bhun an údaráis faoin gcód sláinte agus sábháilteachta 120125, 120140, 131080, 120130 (c), 120135, 120145, 120175 agus 120150, tiocfaidh an t-ordú seo i bhfeidhm láithreach agus fanfaidh sé i bhfeidhm go dtí go dtabharfar fógra breise dó. dó.

translation.en: The federal government has identified 16 critical infrastructure sectors whose assets, systems, and networks, whether physical or virtual, are considered so vital to the united states that their incapacitation or destruction would have a debilitating effect on security, economic security, public health or safety, or any combination thereof.
translation.ga: Tá 16 earnáil bonneagair chriticiúil aitheanta ag an rialtas cónaidhme a meastar go bhfuil a gcuid sócmhainní, córais, agus líonraí, cibé acu fisiceach nó fíorúil, chomh criticiúil do na stáit aontaithe go mbeadh éifeacht dhíobhálach ag a n-éagumas nó a scriosadh ar shlándáil, slándáil eacnamaíoch, sláinte phoiblí nó sábháilteacht, nó aon teaglaim de.

translation.en: I order that californians working in these 16 critical infrastructure sectors may continue their work because of the importance of these sectors to californians' health and well-being.
translation.ga: Ordaím go bhféadfadh californians atá ag obair sna 16 earnáil bonneagair chriticiúil seo leanúint dá gcuid oibre mar gheall ar thábhacht na n-earnálacha seo do shláinte agus folláine californians.

translation.en: This order is being issued to protect the public health of californians.
translation.ga: Tá an tordú seo á eisiúint chun sláinte poiblí californians a chosaint.

translation.en: The california department of public health looks to establish consistency across the state in order to ensure that we mitigate the impact of covid-19.
translation.ga: Féachann roinn sláinte poiblí california le comhsheasmhacht a bhunú ar fud an stáit d ’ fhonn a chinntiú go maolaimid tionchar covid-19.

translation.en: Our goal is simple, we want to bend the curve, and disrupt the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Tá ár gcuspóir simplí, ba mhaith linn an cuar a lúbadh, agus cur isteach ar scaipeadh an víris.

translation.en: The supply chain must continue, and californians must have access to such necessities as food, prescriptions, and health care.
translation.ga: Caithfidh an slabhra soláthair leanúint ar aghaidh, agus caithfidh rochtain a bheith ag californians ar riachtanais mar bhia, oideas agus cúram sláinte.

translation.en: When people need to leave their homes or places of residence, whether to obtain or perform the functions above, or to otherwise facilitate authorized necessary activities, they should at all times practice social distancing.
translation.ga: Nuair is gá do dhaoine a dtithe nó a n-áitribh a fhágáil, cibé acu na feidhmeanna thuas a fháil nó a chomhlíonadh, nó chun gníomhaíochtaí údaraithe riachtanacha a éascú ar bhealach eile, ba cheart dóibh síneadh sóisialta a chleachtadh i gcónaí.

translation.en: 2) the healthcare delivery system shall prioritize services to serving those who are the sickest and shall prioritize resources, including personal protective equipment, for the providers providing direct care to them.
translation.ga: 2) tabharfaidh an córas seachadta cúram sláinte tosaíocht do sheirbhísí chun freastal ar dhaoine breoite agus tabharfaidh sé tosaíocht d ’ acmhainní, lena n-áirítear trealamh cosanta pearsanta, do sholáthraithe a sholáthraíonn cúram díreach dóibh.

translation.en: 3) the office of emergency services is directed to take necessary steps to ensure compliance with this order.
translation.ga: 3) tugtar treoir d ’ oifig na seirbhísí éigeandála na céimeanna is gá a ghlacadh chun comhlíonadh an ordaithe seo a chinntiú.

translation.en: 4) this order shall be enforceable pursuant to california law, including, but not limited to, government code section 8665.
translation.ga: 4) beidh an tordú seo infheidhmithe de bhun dhlí california, lena n-áirítear, ach gan a bheith teoranta do, alt 8665 den chód rialtais.

translation.en: It is further ordered that as soon as hereafter possible, this order be filed in the office of the secretary of state and that widespread publicity and notice be given of this order.
translation.ga: De bhrí go ndéantar an tordú seo a chomhdú in oifig an rúnaí stáit a luaithe is féidir ina dhiaidh sin agus déanfar an tordú seo a phoibliú agus a phoibliú go forleathan.

translation.en: This order is not intended to, and does not, create any rights or benefits, substantive or procedural, enforceable at law or in equity, against the state of california, its agencies, departments, entities, officers, employees, or any other person.
translation.ga: Níl sé i gceist leis an ordú seo aon chearta nó sochair, substainteacha nó nós imeachta, atá infheidhmithe de réir dlí nó i gcothromas, a chruthú i gcoinne stát california, a ghníomhaireachtaí, a ranna, aonáin, oifigigh, fhostaithe, nó aon duine eile.

translation.en: In witness whereof i have hereunto set my hand and caused the great seal of the state of california to be affixed this 19th day of march 2020.
translation.ga: In fhianú de bhrí gur leag mé mo lámh leis seo agus ba chúis le séala mór stát california a ghreamú den 19ú lá seo de mhárta 2020.

translation.en: The sars-cov-2 virus is the cause of covid-19 (coronavirus disease 2019), a contagious respiratory disease that was first identified in december 2019, in wuhan, hubei, china.
translation.ga: Is víreas sars-cov-2 é covid-19 (galar coronavirus 2019), galar riospráide tógálach a sainaithníodh den chéad uair i mí na nollag 2019, i wuhan, hubei, an tsín.

translation.en: The disease is a type of coronavirus, the same family that includes sars, mers, and some varieties of the common cold.
translation.ga: Is cineál coronavirus é an galar, an teaghlach céanna a chuimsíonn sars, mers, agus cineálacha éagsúla den fhuacht coitianta.

translation.en: It was declared a pandemic by the world health organization (who) on 11 march 2020.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte paindéim an 11 márta 2020.

translation.en: While much about covid-19 is still unknown, preliminary data suggests that it is more virulent and contagious than the seasonal flu, and less virulent but more contagious than sars and mers.
translation.ga: Cé nach bhfuil mórán ar eolas faoi covid-19 fós, tugann réamhshonraí le tuiscint go bhfuil sé níos géire agus tógálach ná an fliú séasúrach, agus go bhfuil sé níos géire ach níos tógálaí ná sars agus mers.

translation.en: Older people and those with underlying conditions are the most at risk of serious complications including death.
translation.ga: Is iad na daoine scothaosta agus iad siúd a bhfuil riochtaí bunúsacha orthu is mó atá i mbaol deacrachtaí tromchúiseacha lena n-áirítear bás.

translation.en: Due to the spread of the disease, you are advised not to travel unless necessary, to avoid being infected, quarantined, or stranded by changing restrictions and cancelled flights.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar scaipeadh an ghalair, moltar duit gan taisteal mura bhfuil gá leis, chun a bheith ionfhabhtaithe, coraintín, nó gafa trí shrianta a athrú agus eitiltí a chealú.

translation.en: Avoid crowded places whenever possible.
translation.ga: Seachain áiteanna plódaithe nuair is féidir.

translation.en: This is not just to protect you, but also those you come in contact with.
translation.ga: Ní amháin chun tú a chosaint, ach freisin iad siúd a mbíonn tú i dteagmháil leo.

translation.en: As it happens, you probably aren't missing much by staying home, as many attractions around the world are closing their doors to avoid spreading the disease.
translation.ga: De réir mar a tharlaíonn sé, is dócha nach gcaillfidh tú mórán trí fanacht sa bhaile, mar tá a lán rudaí ar fud an domhain ag dúnadh a ndoirse chun an galar a scaipeadh.

translation.en: If you do need to travel, take precautions as you would for other infections: Wash your hands frequently, avoid touching your face, cough and sneeze into your elbow or a tissue, and avoid contact with sick people.
translation.ga: Más gá duit taisteal, déan réamhchúraimí mar a dhéanfá d ’ ionfhabhtuithe eile: Nigh do lámha go minic, seachain teagmháil le d ’ aghaidh, casacht agus sraothartach isteach i do uillinn nó d ’ fhíochán, agus seachain teagmháil le daoine breoite.

translation.en: Before traveling, read up on the extensive and fast-changing array of travel restrictions that have been imposed around the world.
translation.ga: Sula dtaistealaíonn tú, léigh suas ar an raon leathan srianta taistil a cuireadh i bhfeidhm ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: After travel, monitor your health and consider self-isolation for two weeks to avoid transmitting the disease to others.
translation.ga: Tar éis duit taisteal, déan monatóireacht ar do shláinte agus smaoinigh ar fhéin-aonrú ar feadh coicíse chun an galar a tharchur chuig daoine eile.

translation.en: Transportation from long-distance passenger flights to local buses has been curtailed or completely shut down in many countries due to low demand or government orders.
translation.ga: Tá iompar ó eitiltí paisinéirí fad-achair chuig busanna áitiúla laghdaithe nó dúnta go hiomlán i go leor tíortha mar gheall ar éileamh íseal nó orduithe rialtais.

translation.en: Many international and regional borders are closed.
translation.ga: Tá go leor teorainneacha idirnáisiúnta agus réigiúnacha dúnta.

translation.en: If you are away from home, and especially if you are in another country, consider returning home as soon as possible; this may get even more difficult as restrictions continue to change.
translation.ga: Má tá tú as baile, agus go háirithe má tá tú i dtír eile, smaoinigh ar fhilleadh abhaile a luaithe is féidir; d ’ fhéadfadh sé seo a bheith níos deacra fós de réir mar a leanann srianta ag athrú.

translation.en: In some cases it may simply not be possible, even if you're healthy and meet the legal requirements for entry.
translation.ga: I roinnt cásanna b ’ fhéidir nach mbeidh sé indéanta, fiú má tá tú sláintiúil agus má chomhlíonann tú na ceanglais dhlíthiúla maidir le ligean isteach.

translation.en: If you can't find a way back to your country, contact your nearest embassy or consulate for assistance.
translation.ga: Mura féidir leat bealach a fháil ar ais go dtí do thír dhúchais, déan teagmháil leis an ambasáid nó an chonsalacht is gaire duit chun cúnamh a fháil.

translation.en: They may be able to organize an evacuation, identify non-regularly scheduled flights, or give you an emergency loan to pay for transport.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go bhféadfaidís aslonnú a shocrú, eitiltí nach bhfuil sceidealta go rialta a aithint, nó iasacht éigeandála a thabhairt duit chun íoc as iompar.

translation.en: In case they can't, make preparations in case you need to stay where you are for an extended period.
translation.ga: Nuair nach féidir leo, ullmhóidí a dhéanamh ar eagla go gcaithfidh tú fanacht san áit a bhfuil tú ar feadh i bhfad.

translation.en: If you do find a way back home, be prepared that it may be expensive, inconvenient, and have unusual restrictions (such as no checked baggage).
translation.ga: Má aimsíonn tú bealach abhaile, bíodh a fhios agat go bhféadfadh sé a bheith costasach, deacair, agus srianta neamhghnácha a bheith ort (mar shampla gan aon bhagáiste seiceáilte).

translation.en: As of early april 2020, the number of confirmed cases of covid-19 is approaching one million.
translation.ga: Go luath i mí aibreáin 2020, tá líon na gcásanna dearbhaithe de covid-19 ag druidim le milliún.

translation.en: Though the disease started in mainland china, it has spread around the world and china has fewer confirmed cases and deaths than several other countries.
translation.ga: Cé gur tháinig an galar ar mhórthír na síne, tá sé scaipthe ar fud an domhain agus dhearbhaigh an tsín níos lú cásanna agus básanna ná roinnt tíortha eile.

translation.en: Europe is the new epicenter of the pandemic.
translation.ga: Is í an eoraip croí nua na paindéime.

translation.en: All but a handful of countries have reported at least one case, with the highest numbers of reported cases in the united states, spain, italy, germany, france, mainland china, iran, and the united kingdom.
translation.ga: Níor thuairiscigh ach dornán tíortha cás amháin ar a laghad, agus tuairiscíodh na huimhreacha is mó sna stáit aontaithe, sa spáinn, san iodáil, sa ghearmáin, sa fhrainc, i mórthír na síne, san iaráin agus sa ríocht aontaithe.

translation.en: Local transmission is established in many countries in all major inhabited regions of the world except some pacific island nations.
translation.ga: Bunaítear tarchur áitiúil i go leor tíortha i ngach mór-réigiún ina bhfuil daoine ina gcónaí ar domhan ach amháin i roinnt náisiúin oileáin an aigéin chiúin.

translation.en: (See updates from the who.)
translation.ga: (Féach nuashonruithe who.)

translation.en: The full extent of the spread is uncertain, due in part to limited testing.
translation.ga: Tá méid iomlán an scaipthe neamhchinnte, mar gheall go páirteach ar thástáil theoranta.

translation.en: Many countries are experiencing a severe shortage of test kits, and the authorities have not been able to test everybody who is at high risk, so the real number of cases is probably much higher than the official one.
translation.ga: Tá ganntanas mór trealaimh tástála ag go leor tíortha, agus theip ar na húdaráis gach duine atá i mbaol ard a thástáil, mar sin is dócha go bhfuil líon na gcásanna i bhfad níos airde ná an ceann oifigiúil.

translation.en: Countries also differ in their testing and reporting practices, so comparisons of the number of reported cases do not tell the full story of how the epidemic has progressed in different areas.
translation.ga: Tá difríochtaí idir tíortha ina gcleachtais tástála agus tuairiscithe, mar sin ní insíonn comparáidí idir líon na gcásanna a tuairiscíodh an scéal iomlán faoin gcaoi a ndeachaigh an eipidéim chun cinn i réimsí éagsúla.

translation.en: The virus is transmitted through respiratory droplets and through objects.
translation.ga: Tarchuirtear an víreas trí bhraoiníní riospráide agus trí rudaí.

translation.en: The coronavirus is a relatively large virus, meaning it is not truly airborne: It will settle down in respiratory droplets.
translation.ga: Is víreas réasúnta mór é an coronavirus, rud a chiallaíonn nach bhfuil sé san aer i ndáiríre: Socróidh sé síos i braoiníní riospráide.

translation.en: Staying two metres (six feet) away from other people is usually enough to prevent transmission through this route.
translation.ga: De ghnáth is leor fanacht dhá mhéadar (sé throigh) ó chinn eile chun tarchur tríd an mbealach seo a chosc.

translation.en: Transmission from objects can happen, for example, if someone sneezes, touches a doorknob, and then other people touch the doorknob and then touch their faces.
translation.ga: Is féidir tarchur ó rudaí a tharlú, mar shampla, má bhíonn duine ag sraothartach, ag baint doorknob, agus ansin téann daoine eile i dteagmháil leis an doorknob agus ansin déanann siad teagmháil lena n-aghaidheanna.

translation.en: The sars-cov-2 virus may last on cardboard for up to 24 hours and on plastic for up to 3 days.
translation.ga: Is féidir leis an víreas sars-cov-2 maireachtáil ar chairtchlár ar feadh suas le 24 uair an chloig agus ar phlaisteach ar feadh suas le 3 lá.

translation.en: Transmission via the fecal – oral route may also be possible.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh tarchur tríd an mbealach fecal-béil tarlú freisin.

translation.en: Evidence suggests that covid-19 is contagious even without symptoms, though to what extent is still being investigated.
translation.ga: Tugann fianaise le tuiscint go bhfuil covid-19 tógálach fiú gan comharthaí, ach tá a mhéid fós á imscrúdú.

translation.en: Common symptoms include a fever, dry cough, and fatigue.
translation.ga: I measc na n-airíonna coitianta tá fiabhras, casacht tirim, agus tuirse.

translation.en: Other less common symptoms include shortness of breath, a sore throat, headache, muscle pain, or sputum production.
translation.ga: I measc na n-airíonna eile nach bhfuil chomh coitianta tá giorracht anála, scornach tinn, tinneas cinn, pian sna matáin, nó táirgeadh sputum.

translation.en: Some patients have very mild symptoms, similar to a cold.
translation.ga: Tá comharthaí an-éadrom ag roinnt othar, mar shampla slaghdán.

translation.en: Serious complications include pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, and multi-organ failure leading to disability or death.
translation.ga: I measc na ndeacrachtaí tromchúiseacha tá niúmóine, siondróm anacair riospráide géarmhíochaine, agus cliseadh iolrach orgán as a dtagann míchumas nó bás.

translation.en: About 80% of infections result in mild symptoms, while the remaining may result in hospitalization.
translation.ga: Tá comharthaí éadroma mar thoradh ar thart ar 80% d ’ ionfhabhtuithe, agus féadfar an chuid eile a chur san ospidéal.

translation.en: Case fatality rate is estimated at 1-3% of infected individuals, most of whom are elderly with underlying health conditions.
translation.ga: Meastar go bhfuil ráta básmhaireachta cáis ag 1-3% de dhaoine ionfhabhtaithe, a bhformhór acu aosta le riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha.

translation.en: The fatality rate is much higher for those over 70 but significantly lower for those under 40.
translation.ga: Tá an ráta básmhaireachta i bhfad níos airde dóibh siúd os cionn 70 ach i bhfad níos ísle dóibh siúd faoi 40.

translation.en: Those most at risk of covid-19 infection and serious complications are the elderly and those with weakened immune systems or underlying health conditions like cardiovascular disease, diabetes, hypertension, chronic respiratory disease, and cancer.
translation.ga: Is iad na daoine is mó atá i mbaol ionfhabhtaithe covid-19 agus deacrachtaí tromchúiseacha ná daoine scothaosta agus iad siúd a bhfuil córais imdhíonachta lagaithe acu nó riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha mar ghalar cardashoithíoch, diaibéiteas, hipirtheannas, galar riospráide ainsealach, agus ailse.

translation.en: Not many cases are reported in children and most of these are mild or moderate, though a significant fraction do get pneumonia.
translation.ga: Is beag cásanna a thuairiscítear i leanaí agus tá an chuid is mó díobh seo éadrom nó measartha, cé go bhfaigheann an niúmóine codán suntasach.

translation.en: Occupationally, health care workers have higher risk compared to others with clusters of disease among workers and in health care settings.
translation.ga: Go gairmiúil, tá oibrithe cúram sláinte i mbaol níos airde i gcomparáid le daoine eile a bhfuil braislí galair acu i measc oibrithe agus i suíomhanna cúram sláinte.

translation.en: The time between being exposed to the virus and the emergence of symptoms (incubation period) is typically between 2 and 14 days, though there has been one reported case in china where symptoms appeared 27 days after exposure.
translation.ga: Is gnách go mbíonn an t-am idir nochtadh don víreas agus tosú na hairíonna (tréimhse goir) idir 2 agus 14 lá, cé gur tuairiscíodh cás amháin sa tsín inar tharla na hairíonna 27 lá tar éis an nochtaithe.

translation.en: As of february 2020, the period of infectiousness is unknown, but is likely most significant when people are symptomatic.
translation.ga: Amhail feabhra 2020, ní fios fad an ionfhabhtaithe, ach is dóigh go mbeidh sé suntasach nuair a bhíonn daoine siomptómach.

translation.en: There is evidence of transmission from people who don't have symptoms, although to what extent is still being investigated.
translation.ga: Tá fianaise ann faoi atreoruithe ó dhaoine nach bhfuil aon comharthaí orthu, ach a mhéid atá fós á imscrúdú.

translation.en: It is unclear whether it is possible to be reinfected with the virus after recovering from it the first time around.
translation.ga: Níl sé soiléir an féidir an víreas a thuairisciú tar éis dó maireachtáil ar dtús.

translation.en: Long-term effects for people who have recovered remain unclear, but there is evidence of reduced lung capacity in some recovered patients.
translation.ga: Níl na héifeachtaí fadtéarmacha ar ghnóthachain soiléir, ach tá fianaise ann go bhfuil acmhainn scamhóg laghdaithe i roinnt othar chun téarnamh.

translation.en: Testing for the virus usually consists of a swab inserted through the nose or a throat swab which is analysed in a laboratory for the virus.
translation.ga: De ghnáth bíonn swab a chuirtear isteach tríd an srón nó swab scornach a ndéantar anailís air i saotharlann don víreas i gceist le tástáil víris.

translation.en: The current "gold standard" test involves extracting the genetic material from the sample and analysing it for known genetic markers of the virus.
translation.ga: Is éard atá i gceist leis an tástáil “caighdeán óir ” reatha an t-ábhar géiniteach a bhaint den sampla agus anailís a dhéanamh air le haghaidh marcóirí géiniteacha aitheanta an víris.

translation.en: There is no established test assessing for the virus or antibodies in the blood, although tests are being developed.
translation.ga: Níl aon tástáil bhunaithe ann a dhéanann measúnú ar an víreas nó antasubstaintí san fhuil, cé go bhfuil tástálacha á bhforbairt.

translation.en: There is no test to establish immunity to the virus.
translation.ga: Níl aon tástáil ann chun díolúine a bhunú don víreas.

translation.en: Many governments around the world have advised their citizens not to travel unnecessarily amid the pandemic.
translation.ga: Chuir go leor rialtais ar fud an domhain comhairle ar a gcuid saoránach gan taisteal gan ghá i measc na paindéime.

translation.en: Lots of airlines and package holidays are making it easy for you by waiving cancellation and change fees.
translation.ga: Tá sé éasca duit go leor aerlínte agus laethanta saoire pacáiste trí chealú agus táillí athraithe a tharscaoileadh.

translation.en: Particularly avoid cruise ship travel.
translation.ga: Seachain taisteal ar longa cúrsála go háirithe.

translation.en: Older travelers and those with underlying health conditions are most at risk and should avoid travel that puts them at risk, such as long plane flights, visits to crowded places, and especially cruises, even outside of severely affected areas.
translation.ga: Is iad taistealaithe scothaosta agus iad siúd a bhfuil riochtaí sláinte bunúsacha orthu is mó atá i mbaol agus ba cheart dóibh taisteal a chuireann iad i mbaol a sheachaint, mar eitiltí fada, cuairteanna ar áiteanna plódaithe, agus go háirithe turais mhara, fiú lasmuigh. de cheantair a bhfuil drochthionchar orthu.

translation.en: In affected areas, most experts recommend a practice known as social distancing.
translation.ga: I gceantair atá buailte, molann mórchuid na saineolaithe cleachtas ar a dtugtar fadú sóisialta.

translation.en: This means minimising contact with others by keeping a distance of six feet or two meters from them and avoiding gathering together in groups.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo an teagmháil le daoine eile a íoslaghdú trí achar sé throigh nó dhá mhéadar a choinneáil agus bailiú i ngrúpaí a sheachaint.

translation.en: Some areas permit small groups; others prohibit all group gatherings.
translation.ga: Ligeann ceantair áirithe do ghrúpaí beaga; cuireann daoine eile cosc ​ ​ ar gach cruinniú grúpa.

translation.en: Measures you are encouraged to take include working from home whenever possible, avoiding crowds and avoiding leaving your home unless absolutely necessary.
translation.ga: I measc na mbeart a spreagtar duit a dhéanamh tá obair ón mbaile nuair is féidir, sluaite a sheachaint agus seachain do theach a fhágáil mura bhfuil gá leis.

translation.en: If you must go out, try to stay at least 2 meters (6 feet) away from other people.
translation.ga: Má tá ort dul amach, déan iarracht fanacht 2 mhéadar (6 throigh) ar a laghad ó áiteanna eile.

translation.en: In many places these measures are required.
translation.ga: Teastaíonn na bearta seo i go leor áiteanna.

translation.en: Follow hygiene practices like for flu prevention.
translation.ga: Lean cleachtais sláinteachais mar chosc ar fhliú.

translation.en: Frequently wash your hands with soap and warm water, and then dry your hands on a clean towel.
translation.ga: Go minic nigh do lámha le gallúnach agus uisce te, ansin triomaigh do lámha ar thuáille glan.

translation.en: As coronaviruses are enveloped viruses, washing your hands with soap kills the virus by disrupting the mostly fat-based viral envelope.
translation.ga: Toisc gur víris iad coronaviruses, maraíonn do lámha le níochán gallúnach an víreas trí chur isteach ar an gclúdach víreasach atá bunaithe ar saill den chuid is mó.

translation.en: Effective hand washing requires rubbing your hands for at least 20 seconds.
translation.ga: Éilíonn níochán láimhe éifeachtach do lámha a chuimilt ar feadh 20 soicind ar a laghad.

translation.en: Drying your washed hands physically removes some germs from your skin (so don't skip that step, and don't share towels).
translation.ga: Má dhéantar do lámha nite a thriomú baintear roinnt frídíní as do chraiceann go fisiciúil (mar sin ná scipeáil an chéim sin, agus ná roinn tuáillí).

translation.en: If soap and water are not available, then use a & gt; 60% alcohol-based hand sanitizer.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil gallúnach agus uisce ar fáil, ansin úsáid sláintitheoir láimhe 60% atá bunaithe ar alcól.

translation.en: Alcohol is a quick germ-killer, but it's not quite instant, so this still requires the same 20 seconds of rubbing your hands together, making sure that every single scrap of skin gets wet, and then you have to wait about another minute, for the alcohol to completely dry.
translation.ga: Is marú frídíní gasta é alcól, ach níl sé an-ghasta ar chor ar bith, mar sin ní mór duit an 20 soicind céanna de do lámha a chuimilt le chéile, ag cinntiú go bhfliuchfaidh gach dramh amháin den chraiceann, agus ansin go gcaithfidh tú fanacht timpeall nóiméad eile, chun an alcól a thriomú go hiomlán.

translation.en: Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth with your hands.
translation.ga: Seachain teagmháil a dhéanamh le do lámha le do shúile, do shrón agus do bhéal.

translation.en: Most people touch their faces every few minutes, all day long.
translation.ga: Téann mórchuid na ndaoine i dteagmháil lena n-aghaidh gach cúpla nóiméad, an lá ar fad.

translation.en: Try to do this less, and try to wash your hands before touching your face.
translation.ga: Déan iarracht é seo a dhéanamh níos lú, agus déan iarracht do lámha a ní sula dteagmháil leat d ’ aghaidh.

translation.en: Also, try to avoid touching surfaces you don't have to touch in the first place, at least with your bare hands.
translation.ga: Chomh maith leis sin, déan iarracht dromchlaí tadhlacha a sheachaint nach gá duit teagmháil a dhéanamh leo ar an gcéad dul síos, ar a laghad le do lámha loma.

translation.en: Cough and sneeze into your elbow or a tissue, and then immediately throw away the tissue and wash your hands.
translation.ga: Casacht agus sraothartach isteach i do uillinn nó fíochán, ansin caith an fíochán láithreach agus nigh do lámha.

translation.en: Don't stand or sit near people who might be sick.
translation.ga: Ná seas ná suí in aice le daoine a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith tinn.

translation.en: Stay at least one meter – and ideally two meters (six feet) – away.
translation.ga: Fan méadar amháin ar a laghad - agus go hidéalach dhá mhéadar (sé throigh) - ar shiúl.

translation.en: As a quick way to eyeball this distance, imagine that you and the other person both reached your hands towards each other.
translation.ga: Mar bhealach tapa chun an fad seo a ionsú, samhlaigh gur shroich tú féin agus an duine eile do lámha i dtreo a chéile.

translation.en: Could you touch the other person's hand without taking a step towards that person?
translation.ga: An bhféadfá teagmháil a dhéanamh le lámh an duine eile gan céim a thógáil i dtreo an duine sin?

translation.en: If the answer is yes, then you're too close.
translation.ga: Más ea, tá tú ró-ghar.

translation.en: Clean objects and surfaces that a lot of people touch, such as doorknobs, phones, and television remotes with regular household cleaner.
translation.ga: Rudaí agus dromchlaí glana a mbíonn a lán daoine i dteagmháil leo, mar shampla doorknobs, fóin, agus remotes teilifíse le glantóir tí rialta.

translation.en: Disinfect the surfaces with a suitable disinfectant, such as diluted household bleach.
translation.ga: Déan na dromchlaí a dhíghalrú le dífhabhtán oiriúnach, mar shampla bleach caolaithe tí.

translation.en: Stay home when you are sick, and avoid contact with other people until your symptoms are gone.
translation.ga: Fan sa bhaile nuair a bhíonn tú tinn, agus seachain teagmháil le daoine eile go dtí go mbeidh do chuid comharthaí imithe.

translation.en: Do not share personal items that come into contact with saliva, such as toothbrushes, eating utensils, drinks, water bottles, and towels.
translation.ga: Ná roinn earraí pearsanta a thagann i dteagmháil le seile, mar shampla scuaba fiacla, uirlisí ithe, deochanna, buidéil uisce, agus tuáillí.

translation.en: The practice of serving yourself from a common plate with your own chopsticks, common in china, should be avoided.
translation.ga: Ba cheart an cleachtas freastal ort féin ó phláta coiteann le do chopsticks féin, atá coitianta sa tsín, a sheachaint.

translation.en: Greet people without touching them.
translation.ga: Beannachtaí ar dhaoine gan teagmháil a dhéanamh leo.

translation.en: Avoid hugs, kisses, handshakes, fist bumps, and any other contact.
translation.ga: Seachain barróga, póga, croitheadh ​ ​ láimhe, dhorn agus aon teagmháil eile.

translation.en: If it's impossible to avoid contact, then wash your hands both before and after.
translation.ga: Mura féidir teagmháil a sheachaint, ansin nigh do lámha roimh agus tar éis.

translation.en: It won't protect you from the coronavirus, but it will partially protect you from the flu, which remains a greater risk than covid-19 in many areas.
translation.ga: Ní dhéanfaidh sé tú a chosaint ar an coronavirus, ach cosnóidh sé tú i bpáirt ón bhfliú, atá fós i mbaol níos mó ná covid-19 i go leor réimsí.

translation.en: This also saves you from unnecessary worry if you get the flu and think it might be the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Sábhálann sé seo tú freisin ó imní gan ghá má fhaigheann tú an fliú agus má cheapann tú go bhféadfadh sé a bheith ina coronavirus.

translation.en: If you are elderly or otherwise in a high-risk group and can be vaccinated for pneumonia, get that vaccination.
translation.ga: Má tá tú scothaosta nó eile i ngrúpa ardriosca agus más féidir vacsaíniú a fháil ar niúmóine, faigh an vacsaíniú sin.

translation.en: It won't protect you from viral pneumonia from covid-19, but some covid-19 patients have died of bacterial pneumonia that attacked their weakened lungs, so a pneumonia vaccination could save your life.
translation.ga: Ní chosnóidh sé tú ó niúmóine víreasach ó covid-19, ach fuair roinnt othar covid-19 bás de niúmóine baictéarach a d ’ ionsaigh a scamhóga lagaithe, agus mar sin d ’ fhéadfadh vacsaíniú niúmóine do shaol a shábháil.

translation.en: Wearing masks is recommended for those who are suspected of carrying of disease and those who are in close contact with those infected.
translation.ga: Moltar maisc dóibh siúd a bhfuil amhras orthu go bhfuil galar orthu agus dóibh siúd atá i ndlúth-thadhall leo siúd atá ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: For those who are asymptomatic, the who does not recommend masks, though some national governments do.
translation.ga: Dóibh siúd atá neamhshiomptómach, ní mholann an who maisc, cé go ndéanann roinnt rialtas náisiúnta.

translation.en: Wearing a mask of some kind is required in some countries and cities in an effort to reduce community transmission.
translation.ga: Caithfear masc de shaghas éigin a chaitheamh i roinnt tíortha agus i gcathracha mar iarracht tarchur pobail a laghdú.

translation.en: There are worldwide shortages of surgical masks.
translation.ga: Tá ganntanas maisc máinliachta ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: If you do wear a mask, make sure to use it correctly.
translation.ga: Má chaitheann tú masc, déan cinnte é a úsáid i gceart.

translation.en: The mask should cover your nose and mouth and fit without gaps.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go gclúdódh an masc do shrón agus do bhéal agus go n-oirfeadh sé gan bearnaí.

translation.en: Wash your hands before putting on the mask and avoid touching the mask while wearing it.
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha sula gcuireann tú an masc i bhfeidhm agus seachain teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an masc agus tú ag caitheamh.

translation.en: If you do touch it, wash your hands immediately afterwards.
translation.ga: Má dhéanann tú teagmháil leis, nigh do lámha díreach ina dhiaidh sin.

translation.en: When the mask becomes damp, discard and replace it.
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn an masc tais, déan é a scriosadh agus a athsholáthar.

translation.en: Remove it from the back, throw it away, and then wash your hands.
translation.ga: Bain é ón gcúl, caith uait é, agus ansin nigh do lámha.

translation.en: Remember that masks are not a substitute for good hygiene: Continue to wash your hands frequently.
translation.ga: Cuimhnigh nach féidir le maisc sláinteachas maith a chur ina ionad: Coinnigh do lámha go minic.

translation.en: Don't stock up on masks if you don't need them.
translation.ga: Ná déan stocaí ar mhaisc mura bhfuil siad uait.

translation.en: Mask shortages mean that healthcare workers are having trouble getting a hold of masks, which puts everyone at risk.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn ganntanas maisc go mbíonn sé deacair ar oibrithe cúram sláinte greim a fháil, gach duine a chur i mbaol.

translation.en: That includes n95 respirators, which are not recommended for the general public – these are specialist equipment which must be fitted to be optimally effective.
translation.ga: Áirítear leis seo riospróirí n95, nach moltar don phobal i gcoitinne - is trealamh speisialaithe iad seo nach mór a fheistiú le bheith éifeachtach go barrmhaith.

translation.en: Leave them for healthcare workers.
translation.ga: Fág iad chuig oibrithe cúram sláinte.

translation.en: Avoid crowded areas, especially enclosed areas without much air circulation, such as conferences, performances, shopping malls, public transportation, and religious services.
translation.ga: Seachain áiteanna plódaithe, go háirithe ceantair iata gan mórán aerchúrsaíochta, mar shampla comhdhálacha, taibhithe, malls siopadóireachta, iompar poiblí agus seirbhísí reiligiúnacha.

translation.en: Events which involve a large scale gathering of people, from religious pilgrimages to music concerts, are being canceled worldwide, in an effort to contain the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Tá imeachtaí ina raibh bailiú mór daoine, ó oilithreachtaí reiligiúnacha go ceolchoirmeacha ceoil, á gcur ar ceal ar fud an domhain mar iarracht an víreas a choinneáil ó scaipeadh.

translation.en: Tourist attractions, businesses, and transportation may be closed, especially in affected countries.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh díol spéise do thurasóirí, gnólachtaí agus iompar a bheith dúnta, go háirithe sna tíortha atá buailte.

translation.en: Some canceled events, especially performances, sporting events, and classes, are being moved online, which means you can experience them without traveling.
translation.ga: Tá roinnt imeachtaí a cuireadh ar ceal, go háirithe léirithe, imeachtaí spóirt, agus ranganna, á mbogadh ar líne, rud a chiallaíonn gur féidir leat dul i dtaithí orthu gan taisteal.

translation.en: At petrol / gas stations, use gloves or wipe down the handle with a disinfectant wipe if you can.
translation.ga: Ag stáisiúin pheitril / gháis, bain úsáid as lámhainní nó bain an láimhseáil le sreang díghalraithe más féidir.

translation.en: After filling up, clean your hands with hand sanitizer.
translation.ga: Tar éis duit a líonadh, glan do lámha le sanitizer láimhe.

translation.en: The u.s. and canadian governments recommend avoiding travel by cruise ship.
translation.ga: Molann rialtais na sa agus cheanada taisteal ar longa cúrsála a sheachaint.

translation.en: Infections spread easily on board, and medical care is limited.
translation.ga: Scaipeann ionfhabhtuithe go héasca ar bord, agus tá cúram míochaine teoranta.

translation.en: Amid a cruise ship outbreak, quarantines and docking are challenging partly due to the large number of people aboard.
translation.ga: I ráig na long cúrsála, tá coraintíní agus dugaireacht dúshlánach i bpáirt mar gheall ar an líon mór daoine atá ar bord.

translation.en: Even cruise ships without confirmed cases have been denied permission to dock due to virus fears, and in the high-profile case of the diamond princess in japan, hundreds of people were infected on the ship.
translation.ga: Diúltaíodh cead duga do longa cúrsála gan cásanna deimhnithe ar eagla an víris, agus i gcás ardphróifíle banphrionsa diamond sa tseapáin, bhí na céadta duine ionfhabhtaithe ar an long.

translation.en: If you believe you may be infected, call a hospital or local emergency medical services instead of going in person to avoid infecting others.
translation.ga: Má chreideann tú go bhféadfadh tú a bheith ionfhabhtaithe, glaoigh ar ospidéal nó ar sheirbhísí míochaine éigeandála áitiúla in ionad dul go pearsanta chun daoine eile a ionfhabhtú.

translation.en: Mention your symptoms and travel history.
translation.ga: Luaigh do chuid comharthaí agus do stair taistil.

translation.en: Wear a medical mask and follow the instructions of authorities and doctors.
translation.ga: Caith masc leighis agus lean treoracha na n-údarás agus na ndochtúirí.

translation.en: See also: Flight and health
translation.ga: Féach freisin: Eitilt agus sláinte

translation.en: On a plane, follow the same hygiene practices as anywhere else: Wash hands frequently, or use alcohol-based hand sanitizer if it's not convenient to leave your seat, and avoid touching your face.
translation.ga: Ar eitleán, lean na cleachtais sláinteachais chéanna le haon áit eile: Nigh do lámha go minic, nó bain úsáid as sláintitheoir láimhe alcól-bhunaithe mura bhfuil sé áisiúil do shuíochán a fhágáil, agus seachain teagmháil a dhéanamh le d ’ aghaidh.

translation.en: Researchers have found that passengers in window seats have less risk of contact with sick people.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ taighdeoirí amach gur lú an baol go mbeidh paisinéirí i suíocháin fuinneoige i dteagmháil le daoine breoite.

translation.en: Try to book a window seat, and avoid moving around the cabin during the flight.
translation.ga: Déan iarracht suíochán fuinneoige a chur in áirithe, agus seachain bogadh timpeall an chábáin le linn na heitilte.

translation.en: After washing your hands and before sitting down, use disinfectant wipes to wipe down the area around your seat.
translation.ga: Tar éis duit do lámha a ní agus sula suíonn tú síos, bain úsáid as cuimíní díghalraithe chun an limistéar timpeall do shuíocháin a fhilleadh.

translation.en: Wipe hard surfaces, and if your seat is leather you can wipe that too.
translation.ga: Wipe dromchlaí crua, agus más leathar do shuíochán is féidir leat é sin a scriosadh freisin.

translation.en: Don't wipe a cloth seat, as the moisture can make transmission easier.
translation.ga: Ná bruscar suíochán éadach, mar is féidir leis an taise tarchur a dhéanamh níos éasca.

translation.en: When using disinfectant wipes, follow the instructions on the packaging.
translation.ga: Agus tú ag úsáid wipes díghalraithe, lean na treoracha ar an bpacáistiú.

translation.en: And remember, viruses enter through your mouth, nose, and eyes – wiping down the area doesn't hurt, but it's not a substitute for proper hygiene.
translation.ga: Agus cuimhnigh, téann víris isteach trí do bhéal, srón agus súile - ní ghortaíonn an limistéar a scriosadh, ach ní chiallaíonn sé sláinteachas ceart.

translation.en: Wash your hands and avoid touching your face.
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha agus seachain teagmháil le d ’ aghaidh.

translation.en: And use a tissue to touch the touch screen or other controls.
translation.ga: Agus bain úsáid as fíochán chun teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an scáileán tadhaill nó le rialuithe eile.

translation.en: When using the lavatory, use paper towels to turn off the faucet and open the door, then throw them away.
translation.ga: Agus an leithreas á úsáid agat, bain úsáid as tuáillí páipéir chun an faucet a mhúchadh agus an doras a oscailt, ansin caith amach iad.

translation.en: Airlines in affected areas are taking steps to reduce transmission and keep passengers safe.
translation.ga: Tá aerlínte i gceantair buailte ag glacadh céimeanna chun tarchur a laghdú agus paisinéirí a choinneáil slán.

translation.en: For instance, these may include cleaning facilities more frequently, allowing flight attendants to wear masks, and serving prepackaged instead of freshly heated meals.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, d ’ fhéadfadh saoráidí glantacháin níos minice a bheith san áireamh anseo, ligean do lucht freastail eitilte maisc a chaitheamh, agus réamhphacáistiú a sheirbheáil in ionad béilí úr-théite.

translation.en: If a group of passengers is connecting from an area with a severe outbreak, the flight attendants may be able to seat them away from the rest of the passengers (and if you were recently in a high-risk area, consider telling the flight attendants for this reason).
translation.ga: Má tá grúpa paisinéirí ag nascadh ó limistéar a bhfuil ráig throm air, d ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh freastalaithe eitilte in ann iad a shuí ar shiúl ón gcuid eile de na paisinéirí (agus má bhí tú i gceantar ardriosca le déanaí, smaoinigh ar seo a insint do lucht freastail eitilte chúis).

translation.en: You may be prohibited from changing seats on the flight.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfá a bheith toirmiscthe suíocháin a athrú ar an eitilt.

translation.en: This is so that, if someone on the flight turns out to be infected, the authorities can track down the people who were sitting near them for testing or quarantine.
translation.ga: Déantar é seo ionas gur féidir le húdaráis cuardach a dhéanamh orthu siúd atá ina suí in aice leo le haghaidh tástála nó coraintín má tá duine ar an eitilt ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: Covid-19 is treated by relieving symptoms and preventing complications.
translation.ga: Déileáiltear le covid-19 trí na hairíonna a mhaolú agus deacrachtaí a chosc.

translation.en: There is no vaccine or specific treatment for the novel coronavirus.
translation.ga: Níl aon vacsaín nó cóireáil shonrach ann don coronavirus nua.

translation.en: Research into a vaccine or specific antiviral drug is underway.
translation.ga: Tá taighde ar bun faoi vacsaín ar leith nó druga frithvíreas.

translation.en: There are a variety of trials using hiv medications and other novel antiviral medications for treatment of covid-19.
translation.ga: Tá trialacha éagsúla ann a úsáideann cógais veid agus cógais frithvíreasacha núíosacha eile chun covid-19 a chóireáil.

translation.en: Mild symptoms may be relieved by taking paracetamol (acetaminophen).
translation.ga: Is féidir comharthaí éadroma a mhaolú trí paraicéiteamól (acetaminophen) a thógáil.

translation.en: If you are infected with covid-19, countries will isolate you until several consecutive tests for covid-19 are negative.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ionfhabhtaithe le covid-19, déanfaidh tíortha tú a leithlisiú go dtí go mbeidh roinnt tástálacha comhleanúnacha ar covid-19 diúltach.

translation.en: If you have been in close contact with someone infected with covid-19, many countries will quarantine you for 14 days since the last exposure and monitor you for signs and symptoms.
translation.ga: Má bhí tú i ndlúth-thadhall le duine atá ionfhabhtaithe le covid-19, déanfaidh go leor tíortha coraintín ort ar feadh 14 lá ón nochtadh deireanach agus déanfaidh siad monatóireacht ort le haghaidh comharthaí agus comharthaí.

translation.en: Some countries will also test you even if you don't have symptoms.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh roinnt tíortha tástáil ort fiú mura bhfuil aon comharthaí ort.

translation.en: In many countries, the healthcare system has been stretched to the point of not being able to handle the sheer number of patients, and there is a chance you may be refused treatment due to the lack of available medical staff, supplies or equipment.
translation.ga: I go leor tíortha, tá an córas cúram sláinte sínte go dtí nach bhfuil tú in ann líon na n-othar a láimhseáil, agus féadfar cóireáil a dhiúltú duit mar gheall ar an easpa foirne míochaine, soláthairtí nó trealaimh atá ar fáil.

translation.en: Many countries have shut down or severely limited flights, ships, and border crossings, especially to and from affected areas.
translation.ga: Tá eitiltí, longa agus trasrianta teorann dúnta nó srianta go mór ag go leor tíortha, go háirithe chuig agus ó na ceantair atá buailte.

translation.en: Even more countries have imposed restrictions on arriving travelers, either barring entry (maybe with an exception for local citizens and permanent residents) or requiring you to be quarantined, typically for 14 days.
translation.ga: Chuir níos mó tíortha srianta ar thaistealaithe atá ag teacht isteach, cibé acu a chuireann cosc ​ ​ ar iontráil (seachas saoránaigh áitiúla agus buanchónaitheoirí b ’ fhéidir) nó a éilíonn ort a bheith coraintín, ar feadh 14 lá de ghnáth.

translation.en: Even if a mandatory quarantine is not imposed, you may be asked to "self-quarantine" by staying at home and not interacting with other people.
translation.ga: Fiú mura bhforchuirtear coraintín éigeantach, féadfar go n-iarrfar ort “féin-choraintín ” a dhéanamh trí fanacht sa bhaile agus gan idirghníomhú le daoine eile.

translation.en: The most severe restrictions are on travellers who have recently been to affected areas, but increasingly many countries are applying them to incoming travellers overall.
translation.ga: Tá na srianta is déine ar thaistealaithe a chuaigh chuig ceantair a bhuail le déanaí, ach tá níos mó tíortha á gcur i bhfeidhm ar an lucht siúil atá ag teacht isteach ar an iomlán.

translation.en: Some countries have even prohibited all or almost all foreigners from entry or limited the ability of local citizens and residents to leave.
translation.ga: Chuir roinnt tíortha cosc ​ ​ nó srian ar iontráil gach eachtrannach nó chuir siad srian ar chumas saoránach agus cónaitheoirí áitiúla imeacht.

translation.en: What are the affected areas?
translation.ga: Cad iad na réimsí a bhfuil tionchar orthu?

translation.en: Well, this is a fast-changing situation, and each country / region / organization has its own list of what areas are subject to restrictions.
translation.ga: Bhuel, is cás é seo atá ag athrú go tapa, agus tá a liosta féin de réimsí faoi réir srianta ag gach tír / réigiún / eagraíocht.

translation.en: The city of wuhan is on every list and the rest of mainland china is on most.
translation.ga: Tá cathair wuhan ar gach liosta agus tá an chuid eile de mhórthír na síne ar an gcuid is mó.

translation.en: Other areas that are often included: France, germany, hong kong, iran, italy, japan, macau, singapore, south korea, spain, taiwan, the united kingdom, the united states, the schengen area as a whole, and sometimes various others.
translation.ga: Réimsí eile a chuimsítear go minic: An fhrainc, an ghearmáin, hong cong, an iaráin, an iodáil, an tseapáin, macao, singeapór, an chóiré theas, an spáinn, taiwan, an ríocht aontaithe, na stáit aontaithe, limistéar schengen ina iomláine, agus uaireanta réimsí eile.

translation.en: Some countries have imposed restrictions based on citizenship or residency from severely affected areas.
translation.ga: Chuir srianta áirithe srianta bunaithe ar shaoránacht nó cónaitheacht ó cheantair a bhfuil drochthionchar orthu.

translation.en: A detailed list of entry restrictions is maintained by the iata.
translation.ga: Coinníonn an iata liosta mionsonraithe de na srianta iontrála.

translation.en: It doesn't cover all the restrictions, but it's still useful.
translation.ga: Ní chlúdaíonn sé gach srian, ach tá sé úsáideach fós.

translation.en: Keep up to date — the outbreak and the travel restrictions are changing rapidly.
translation.ga: Coinnigh suas chun dáta - tá an ráig agus na srianta taistil ag athrú go tapa.

translation.en: For travel in the near future, consider making refundable reservations in case the changing situation forces you to change your plans.
translation.ga: Le haghaidh taistil luath, smaoinigh ar áirithintí inaisíoctha a dhéanamh ar eagla go gcuirfeadh an staid athraitheach ort do phleananna a athrú.

translation.en: Avoid buying tickets with a connection in an affected area – even changing planes can make you subject to restrictions.
translation.ga: Seachain ticéid a cheannach le nasc i limistéar buailte - d ’ fhéadfadh srianta a bheith ort fiú má athraíonn tú eitleáin.

translation.en: Flights may get canceled with little notice, either due to the disease's spread and ever-changing entry restrictions, or simply because fewer people are flying and airlines are having trouble filling seats.
translation.ga: Féadfar eitiltí a chur ar ceal gan mórán fógra, mar gheall ar scaipeadh an ghalair agus srianta iontrála atá ag síorathrú, nó toisc go bhfuil níos lú daoine ag eitilt agus bíonn sé deacair ar aerlínte suíocháin a líonadh.

translation.en: You might also be delayed for hours upon arrival waiting for temperature checks and related procedures and paperwork, or even get quarantined for two weeks.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí moill a chur ort ar feadh uaireanta an chloig ag fanacht ag fanacht le seiceálacha teochta agus nósanna imeachta gaolmhara agus páipéarachas, nó fiú coraintín ar feadh coicíse.

translation.en: Be prepared for the possibility of disruption to your travel plans, especially if traveling internationally.
translation.ga: Bí réidh go gcuirfear isteach ar do phleananna taistil, go háirithe má tá tú ag taisteal go hidirnáisiúnta.

translation.en: Even if you're nowhere near affected areas there's a risk that you'll have to stay at the destination longer than planned if you've shared a building or vessel with an infected person.
translation.ga: Fiú mura bhfuil tú gar do cheantair atá buailte tá an baol ann go mbeidh ort fanacht ag an gceann scríbe níos faide ná mar a bhí beartaithe má tá foirgneamh nó árthach roinnte agat le duine atá ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: For example, in late february an italian doctor on vacation in costa adeje (canary islands) was diagnosed with covid-19, and as a result all the guests in the hotel he stayed at were quarantined.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, go déanach i mí feabhra rinneadh diagnóisíodh le covid-19 ar dhochtúir iodálach a bhí ar saoire i costa adeje (oileáin chanáracha), agus mar thoradh air sin bhí coraintín na n-aíonna go léir san óstán inar fhan sé.

translation.en: Lockdowns and other internal restrictions
translation.ga: Lockdowns agus srianta inmheánacha eile

translation.en: Some countries and regions, especially severely affected ones, are implementing emergency lockdowns and restrictions on people's movements and activities, even for those who haven't recently been abroad.
translation.ga: Tá roinnt tíortha agus réigiúin, go háirithe tíortha a bhfuil drochthionchar orthu, ag cur glais éigeandála agus srianta ar ghluaiseachtaí agus ghníomhaíochtaí daoine i bhfeidhm, fiú dóibh siúd nach raibh thar lear le déanaí.

translation.en: These include the temporary reintroduction of some border controls, restrictions on travel within the country, closing or limiting service at restaurants and other establishments, banning large public events, and in the most severe cases prohibiting people from leaving the house except for essential reasons.
translation.ga: Ina measc seo tá roinnt rialuithe teorann a thabhairt isteach go sealadach, srianta ar thaisteal laistigh den tír, dúnadh nó teorannú seirbhíse i mbialanna agus i mbunaíochtaí eile, toirmeasc ar mhórimeachtaí poiblí, agus sna cásanna is déine do dhaoine an teach a fhágáil ar chúiseanna riachtanacha amháin.

translation.en: Beyond government restrictions, individual establishments are shutting their doors and cancelling events to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Lasmuigh de shrianta an rialtais, tá bunaíochtaí aonair ag dúnadh a ndoirse agus ag cealú imeachtaí mar iarracht scaipeadh an víris a laghdú.

translation.en: In china, there are extensive restrictions on transportation and activity, which vary widely by province, city, and even by district or village.
translation.ga: Sa tsín, tá srianta fairsinge ar iompar agus ar ghníomhaíocht, a athraíonn go mór de réir cúige, cathrach, agus fiú de réir ceantair nó sráidbhaile.

translation.en: Many governments recommend against traveling to china at this time.
translation.ga: Molann go leor rialtais gan taisteal go dtí an tsín ag an am seo.

translation.en: If you have no choice, do your research and get up-to-date information about the local situation wherever you are going.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil aon rogha agat, déan do chuid taighde agus faigh faisnéis cothrom le dáta faoin staid áitiúil cibé áit a bhfuil tú ag dul.

translation.en: People who have traveled to hubei face particularly severe restrictions.
translation.ga: Tá srianta an-trom ar dhaoine a thaistealaíonn go hubei.

translation.en: Examples of restrictions that you may encounter in some parts of china (this is not an exhaustive list):
translation.ga: Samplaí de shrianta a d ’ fhéadfadh teacht ort i roinnt áiteanna sa tsín (ní liosta uileghabhálach é seo):

translation.en: 14-day quarantine, self-quarantine, or covid-19 test upon arrival from other parts of china or from other countries, at your expense
translation.ga: Tástáil coraintín 14 lá, féin-coraintín, nó tástáil covid-19 ar theacht duit ó chodanna eile den tsín nó ó thíortha eile, ar do chostas féin

translation.en: Questions about your travel and medical history (lying can get you years in prison)
translation.ga: Ceisteanna faoi do chuid taistil agus stair mhíochaine (féadfaidh sé blianta a thógáil sa phríosún)

translation.en: Mandatory registration using an online or paper form
translation.ga: Clárú éigeantach ag úsáid foirm ar líne nó páipéir

translation.en: Requirement to wear a face mask in public
translation.ga: Gá masc aghaidh a chaitheamh go poiblí

translation.en: People who have been outside of china within 14 days not allowed into public places like malls
translation.ga: Ní cheadaítear daoine nach raibh lasmuigh den tsín laistigh de 14 lá in áiteanna poiblí cosúil le malls

translation.en: Shops only accept mobile payments, not cash
translation.ga: Ní ghlacann siopaí ach le híocaíochtaí soghluaiste, ní le hairgead tirim

translation.en: Restaurants, transportation and other establishments refusing service to non-chinese citizens
translation.ga: Bialanna, iompar agus bunaíochtaí eile a dhiúltaíonn seirbhís do shaoránaigh neamh-shíneacha

translation.en: Many forms of transportation reduced or shut down
translation.ga: Tá go leor cineálacha iompair laghdaithe nó múchta

translation.en: Mandatory real-name registration for public transit cards
translation.ga: Clárú éigeantach fíor-ainm do chártaí idirthurais phoiblí

translation.en: Access in and out of a town, village, or city completely blocked
translation.ga: Rochtain isteach agus amach as an mbaile, sráidbhaile nó cathair blocáilte go hiomlán

translation.en: Non-resident visitors prohibited from entering apartment complexes
translation.ga: Toirmeasc a chur ar chuairteoirí neamhchónaitheacha dul isteach i gcoimpléisc árasán

translation.en: Only allowed to go outside once every two days to get supplies
translation.ga: Ní cheadaítear dóibh dul lasmuigh ach uair amháin gach dhá lá chun soláthairtí a fháil

translation.en: Businesses, activities, and attractions closed
translation.ga: Dúnadh gnólachtaí, gníomhaíochtaí agus nithe is díol spéise

translation.en: Businesses need local government permission to re-open
translation.ga: Teastaíonn cead rialtais áitiúil ó ghnólachtaí chun athoscailt

translation.en: Restaurants (if they are even open) require a minimum distance between customers
translation.ga: Éilíonn bialanna (má tá siad oscailte fiú) íosfhad idir custaiméirí

translation.en: Selling substandard face masks has a maximum sentence of life imprisonment
translation.ga: Tá an phianbhreith uasta príosúnachta saoil as maisc aghaidhe a dhíol faoi bhun an chaighdeáin

translation.en: As of mid-march 2020, europe is the epicenter of the epidemic, and many european countries have closed their borders to international travel - only border commuters and freight are allowed to cross.
translation.ga: Faoi lár mhí an mhárta 2020, tá an eoraip i gcroílár na heipidéime, agus dúnann go leor tíortha eorpacha a dteorainneacha le taisteal idirnáisiúnta - ní cheadaítear ach do chomaitéirí teorainneacha agus lasta a thrasnú.

translation.en: Also businesses other than food stores and pharmacies are closed, and public transport has been reduced or stopped.
translation.ga: Dúnadh gnólachtaí seachas siopaí bia agus cógaslanna freisin, agus tá iompar poiblí laghdaithe nó stoptha.

translation.en: In the worst affected countries including italy, spain and france, lockdowns like in china in january, have been implemented.
translation.ga: Sna tíortha is measa a bhuail an iodáil, an spáinn agus an fhrainc, cuireadh glais ghlasa i bhfeidhm sa tsín i mí eanáir.

translation.en: As well the eu has closed its outer borders.
translation.ga: Tá a theorainneacha seachtracha dúnta ag an ae freisin.

translation.en: Covid-19 is prevalent also in north america.
translation.ga: Tá covid-19 forleithne i meiriceá thuaidh freisin.

translation.en: The borders between canada, the u.s., and mexico are closed to non-essential travel, and in many areas bans on big gatherings are in effect (this means places like restaurants are closed, and events are canceled).
translation.ga: Tá na teorainneacha idir ceanada, na stáit aontaithe, agus meicsiceo dúnta do thaisteal gan ghá, agus i go leor réimsí tá toirmisc chruinnithe móra i bhfeidhm (ciallaíonn sé seo go ndúnfar áiteanna mar bhialanna, agus go gcuirtear imeachtaí ar ceal).

translation.en: Numerous state, county, and municipal jurisdictions have issued stay-at-home orders that require all nonessential businesses to close.
translation.ga: D' eisigh go leor dlínsí stáit, contae agus cathrach orduithe fanacht sa bhaile ag éileamh ar gach gnóthas neamhriachtanach dúnadh.

translation.en: With lots of flights canceled, warnings issued, and restrictions imposed, flying in the time of coronavirus can be a challenge.
translation.ga: Le go leor eitiltí curtha ar ceal, rabhaidh eisithe, agus srianta curtha i bhfeidhm, is dúshlán é eitilt in aimsir an chorovirus.

translation.en: Some routes are not possible.
translation.ga: Ní féidir roinnt bealaí a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Others will require more inconvenient connections than usual — multiple stops and long waits between flights.
translation.ga: Beidh naisc níos dochreidte ag teastáil ó dhaoine eile ná mar is gnách - il stadanna agus fanacht fada idir eitiltí.

translation.en: In some cases that means more expensive tickets.
translation.ga: I roinnt cásanna ciallaíonn sé seo ticéid níos costasaí.

translation.en: On the other hand, the good news is that many flights are cheaper than usual due to decreased demand, and there's a decent chance you'll get an empty seat next to you.
translation.ga: Ar an láimh eile, is é an dea-scéal ná go bhfuil go leor eitiltí níos saoire ná mar is gnách mar gheall ar éileamh laghdaithe, agus tá seans maith ann go bhfaighidh tú suíochán folamh in aice leat.

translation.en: Build in extra time for your connections, especially if transferring from an international flight to a domestic flight and especially if your itinerary involves a country that's seriously affected.
translation.ga: Tabhair am breise do do naisc, go háirithe má tá tú ag bogadh ó eitilt idirnáisiúnta go heitilt intíre agus go háirithe má bhíonn tír a bhfuil tionchar mór uirthi i gceist le do chúrsa taistil.

translation.en: Screenings, temperature checks, extra paperwork, and the associated waiting around can add minutes or hours before you're allowed to continue on your journey.
translation.ga: Is féidir le scagthástálacha, seiceálacha teochta, páipéarachas breise, agus fanacht thart nóiméad nó uair an chloig a chur leis sula gceadaítear duit leanúint ar do thuras.

translation.en: You may find it harder than usual to buy a ticket to or from a destination subject to warnings and restrictions.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé a bheith níos deacra ná mar is gnách ticéad a cheannach chuig ceann scríbe nó uaidh faoi réir rabhaidh agus srianta.

translation.en: This is a real concern if you're trying to get out of an affected area.
translation.ga: Is ábhar mór imní é seo má tá tú ag iarraidh éirí as ceantar buailte.

translation.en: For instance, most aggregators are not selling tickets from china to the united states (presumably to avoid falling afoul of restrictions and being on the hook for a passenger's flight out).
translation.ga: Mar shampla, níl an chuid is mó de na comhiomlánóirí ag díol ticéid ón tsín go dtí na stáit aontaithe (is dócha go seachnóidh siad dul amú ó shrianta agus a bheith ar an mbóthar le haghaidh eitilt amach paisinéirí amach).

translation.en: To buy a ticket for an itinerary like this, you may have to contact the airline or use a lesser-known aggregator.
translation.ga: Chun ticéad a cheannach le haghaidh cúrsa taistil mar seo, b ’ fhéidir go mbeidh ort teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an aerlíne nó comhiomlánóir nach bhfuil chomh coitianta a úsáid.

translation.en: Another possibility is to buy two separate tickets (for instance, a ticket from china to cambodia and a second ticket from cambodia to the u.s.), but be careful you won't get quarantined or lose your luggage in between.
translation.ga: Féidearthacht eile is ea dhá thicéad ar leithligh a cheannach (mar shampla, ticéad ón tsín go dtí an chambóid agus an dara ticéad ón chambóid go dtí na stáit aontaithe), ach bí cúramach gan coraintín a fháil nó do bhagáiste a chailleadh eatarthu.

translation.en: Connecting flights can be a problem.
translation.ga: Is fadhb é eitiltí a nascadh.

translation.en: The risk of getting stuck in the connection city is higher than usual right now, due to delays for screening and testing as well as extensive cancellations.
