translation.ga: Tá an baol go rachaidh tú i bhfostú i gcathair an cheangail níos airde ná mar is gnách faoi láthair, mar gheall ar mhoilleanna i scagadh agus i dtástáil chomh maith le cealuithe fairsinge.

translation.en: Connecting in an affected area may lead to entry restrictions later on, and if you've been in an affected area recently some countries won't even let you change planes.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh srianta iontrála a bheith mar thoradh ar naisc i limistéar buailte níos déanaí, agus má bhí tú i limistéar a bhuail le déanaí ní ligfidh tíortha áirithe duit eitleáin a athrú.

translation.en: On certain itineraries there is a risk of getting quarantined somewhere along the way.
translation.ga: Tá an baol ann go mbeidh coraintín áit éigin ar an mbealach ar chúrsa taistil áirithe.

translation.en: So book a direct flight if you can, and if not, think carefully about where to connect.
translation.ga: Mar sin cuir eitilt dhíreach in áirithe más féidir leat, agus mura féidir, smaoineamh go cúramach faoin áit le nasc a dhéanamh.

translation.en: In uncertain times, plans can change.
translation.ga: In amanna éiginnte, is féidir le pleananna athrú.

translation.en: Many embassies and consulates have evacuated nonessential staff, and some have shut down operations completely.
translation.ga: Tá foireann neamhriachtanach aslonnaithe ag go leor ambasáidí agus consalachtaí, agus tá oibríochtaí dúnta go hiomlán ag cuid acu.

translation.en: Emergency assistance should still be available, though it's possible you may have to contact a further-away consulate if your local one has shut down.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh cúnamh éigeandála ar fáil fós, cé go mb ’ fhéidir go mbeidh ort teagmháil a dhéanamh le consalacht níos faide i gcéin má dhúnann do cheann áitiúil.

translation.en: If you have been stranded due to the pandemic, your nearest consulate may be able to help you find a flight home, arrange an emergency loan so you can buy a ticket, or provide an emergency passport.
translation.ga: Má bhí tú i bhfostú mar gheall ar an bpaindéim, b ’ fhéidir go mbeidh an chonsalacht is gaire in ann cabhrú leat eitilt a fháil abhaile, iasacht éigeandála a shocrú ionas gur féidir leat ticéad a cheannach, nó pas éigeandála a sholáthar.

translation.en: At the very least they can keep you informed about the local situation and notify you about recently introduced travel requirements and restrictions.
translation.ga: Ar a laghad is féidir leo tú a choinneáil ar an eolas faoin staid áitiúil agus fógra a thabhairt duit faoi riachtanais agus srianta taistil a tugadh isteach le déanaí.

translation.en: Ordinary consular services such as visa and passport processing may be suspended or restricted to urgent need, depending on the location and the consulate.
translation.ga: Féadfar gnáthsheirbhísí consalachta mar phróiseáil víosa agus pas a chur ar fionraí nó a theorannú do riachtanas práinneach, ag brath ar an áit agus ar an gconsalacht.

translation.en: Although some people call the disease "wuhan pneumonia" (武汉 (漢) 肺炎 / 武肺), "wuhan disease", or "chinese virus", the use of these terms is considered racist in china and by many people of chinese origin.
translation.ga: Cé go dtugann daoine áirithe “niúmóine wuhan ” (武汉 (漢) 肺炎 / 武肺),“ galar wuhan ”, nó “víreas síneach ” air, meastar go bhfuil úsáid na dtéarmaí seo ciníoch sa tsín agus ag go leor de bhunadh na síne.

translation.en: It is still common to refer the disease as "wuhan pneumonia" or "chinese virus" in places like hong kong and taiwan.
translation.ga: Tá sé fós coitianta an galar a tharchur mar “niúmóine wuhan ” nó“ víreas síneach ” in áiteanna mar hong cong agus taiwan.

translation.en: To be safe, use location-neutral terms when referring to the disease, such as "covid-19", "novel coronavirus", or just "the virus" or "the pandemic".
translation.ga: Le bheith sábháilte, bain úsáid as téarmaí atá neodrach ó thaobh suímh agus tú ag tagairt don ghalar, mar shampla "covid-19", "coronavirus núíosach", nó díreach "an víreas" nó "an paindéim".

translation.en: Particularly in developing countries where law enforcement are poorly trained, enforcement of curfew, lockdown or stay-at-home orders are often brutal, often using forces not proportionate against crowds.
translation.ga: Go háirithe i dtíortha i mbéal forbartha ina bhfuil droch-oiliúint ar fhorfheidhmiú an dlí, is minic a bhíonn forfheidhmiú cuirfiú, glais nó orduithe fanacht sa bhaile brúidiúil, go minic ag úsáid fórsaí díréireacha i gcoinne sluaite.

translation.en: Comply with these orders, and avoid crowds in public.
translation.ga: Géill do na horduithe seo, agus seachain sluaite go poiblí.

translation.en: As a result of the coronavirus pandemic, xenophobia has risen in many countries, primarily but not exclusively targeting people perceived to be chinese.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh ar an bpaindéim coronavirus, tá méadú tagtha ar an seineafóibe i go leor tíortha, go príomha ach gan díriú go heisiach ar dhaoine a fheictear gur sínigh iad.

translation.en: There has been a worldwide spike in racist incidents targeting people of east asian origin, including in major cities such as new york, london and san francisco.
translation.ga: Bhí eachtraí ciníocha a dhíríonn ar dhaoine de shliocht oirthear na háise, lena n-áirítear i gcathracha móra mar nua eabhrac, londain agus san francisco, ina spíosraí ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: In hong kong, sinophobia, which was already high to begin with, has intensified as a result of the pandemic, with the result that many shops and restaurants are now denying service to mainland chinese customers and banning mandarin speakers from their premises (with the exception of taiwanese).
translation.ga: I hong cong, tá sinophobia, a bhí ard cheana féin ar dtús, tar éis éirí níos déine mar thoradh ar an bpaindéim, agus mar thoradh air sin tá go leor siopaí agus bialanna ag séanadh seirbhíse do chustaiméirí mórthír na síne agus ag toirmeasc cainteoirí mandairínis óna gcuid tuairimí (seachas. Taiwan).

translation.en: Levels of xenophobia have also risen in east asia, with some restaurants and other businesses in japan and china refusing service to foreign customers.
translation.ga: Tá leibhéil na seineafóibe ardaithe in oirthear na háise freisin, agus dhiúltaíonn roinnt bialanna agus gnólachtaí eile sa tseapáin agus sa tsín seirbhís do chustaiméirí eachtracha.

translation.en: In china, there have been incidents of foreigners being refused rooms by hotel staff, and foreign residents, particularly black people, being kicked out of their apartments on short notice by their landlords.
translation.ga: Sa tsín, tharla eachtraí gur dhiúltaigh foireann óstáin seomraí d ’ eachtrannaigh, agus cónaitheoirí eachtracha, go háirithe daoine dubha, á gciceáil as a n-árasán ar ghearrfhógra ag a gcuid tiarnaí talún.

translation.en: Sources for further information on the coronavirus outbreak include:
translation.ga: I measc na bhfoinsí le haghaidh tuilleadh faisnéise faoin ráig coronavirus tá:

translation.en: The us government centers for disease control and prevention
translation.ga: Ionaid rialtas na sa um rialú agus cosc ar ghalair

translation.en: European centre for disease prevention and control (daily updates)
translation.ga: An lárionad eorpach um ghalair a chosc agus a rialú (nuashonruithe laethúla)

translation.en: United kingdom government, - foreign and commonwealth office advice for travellers
translation.ga: Rialtas na ríochta aontaithe, - comhairle na noifigeach eachtrach agus comhlathais don lucht siúil

translation.en: An online map and dashboard from the john hopkins university center for systems science and engineering with live updates
translation.ga: Léarscáil agus painéal ar líne ó lárionad eolaíochta córais agus innealtóireachta ollscoil john hopkins le nuashonruithe beo

translation.en: Partial lists of entry restrictions from iata and the new york times
translation.ga: Liostaí páirteach de shrianta iontrála ó iata agus the new york times

translation.en: A variety of misinformation and conspiracy theories about the virus are being promoted online and even by some government officials, so be careful which sources you check for information.
translation.ga: Tá éagsúlacht teoiricí mífhaisnéise agus comhcheilge faoin víreas á gcur chun cinn ar líne agus fiú ag roinnt oifigeach rialtais, mar sin bí cúramach cé na foinsí a ndéanann tú seiceáil ar fhaisnéis.

translation.en: Ensure that all information and advice you receive has been backed by reputable doctors and scientists.
translation.ga: Déan cinnte go dtacaíonn dochtúirí agus eolaithe measúla leis an bhfaisnéis agus an chomhairle uile a fhaigheann tú.

translation.en: In a crisis, it's natural to want to keep following the latest updates, but it may be better for your mental health to moderate the amount of news that you look at, and stick to reliable news sources.
translation.ga: I ngéarchéim, tá sé nádúrtha a bheith ag iarraidh na nuashonruithe is déanaí a leanúint, ach b ’ fhéidir go mbeadh sé níos fearr do do shláinte mheabhrach an méid nuachta a fhéachann tú a mhodhnú, agus cloí le foinsí iontaofa nuachta.

translation.en: If you normally watch the news twice per day then stick to this schedule and do something else, rather than having the 24-hour news on continuously.
translation.ga: Má fhéachann tú ar an nuacht faoi dhó sa lá de ghnáth, cloí leis an sceideal seo agus déan rud éigin seachas an nuacht 24 uair an chloig a bheith agat go leanúnach.

translation.en: B'bat sars-like coronavirus wiv1 (bat sl-cov-wiv1), also sometimes called sars-like coronavirus wiv1, is a strain of severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus (sarsr-cov) isolated from chinese rufous horseshoe bats (rhinolophus sinicus).
translation.ga: Is éard atá i coronavirus w '1 cosúil le sars siv wiv1 (ialtóg sl-cov-wiv1), ar a dtugtar uaireanta coronavirus wiv1 cosúil le siv, brú de víreas corónach géarmhíochaine a bhaineann le siondróm géarmhíochaine riospráide (sarsr-cov).) scoite amach ó ialtóga crú capaill na síne (rhinolophus sinicus).

translation.en: Like all coronaviruses, virions consist of single-stranded positive-sense rna enclosed within an envelope.
translation.ga: Cosúil le gach coronaviruses, is éard atá i virions rna ciall dearfach aon-shnáithe atá iata laistigh de chlúdach.

translation.en: The discovery confirms that bats are the natural reservoir of sars-cov.
translation.ga: Deimhníonn an fhionnachtain gur taiscumar nádúrtha de sars-cov iad ialtóga.

translation.en: Phylogenetic analysis shows the possibility of direct transmission of sars from bats to humans without the intermediary chinese civets, as previously believed.
translation.ga: Taispeánann anailís phylogenetic an fhéidearthacht sars a tharchur go díreach ó ialtóga chuig daoine gan civets idirmheánacha na síne, mar a chreidtear roimhe seo.

translation.en: B'covid-19 drug development is the research process to develop a preventative vaccine or therapeutic prescription drug that would alleviate the severity of 2019-20 coronavirus disease (covid-19).
translation.ga: Is é forbairt an druga cocoid-19 an próiseas taighde chun vacsaín coisctheach nó druga oideas teiripeach a fhorbairt a laghdódh déine an ghalair coronavirus 2019-20 (covid-19).

translation.en: The international clinical trials registry platform of the who recorded 536 clinical studies to develop post-infection therapies for covid-19 infections, with numerous established antiviral compounds for treating other infections under clinical research to be repurposed.
translation.ga: Thaifead ardán chlárlann idirnáisiúnta na dtrialacha cliniciúla who 536 staidéar cliniciúil chun teiripí iar-ionfhabhtaithe a fhorbairt d ’ ionfhabhtuithe covid-19, agus tá go leor comhdhúile frithvíreasacha le haghaidh cóireáil ionfhabhtuithe eile faoi thaighde cliniciúil lena n-athsholáthar.

translation.en: In march, the who initiated the "solidarity trial" in 10 countries, enrolling thousands of people infected with covid-19 to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
translation.ga: I mí an mhárta, sheol an who an “triail solidarity ” i 10 dtír, ag clárú na mílte duine atá ionfhabhtaithe le covid-19 chun éifeachtaí cóireála ceithre chomhdhúil frithvíreasacha atá ann cheana a mheas leis an ngealltanas éifeachtúlachta is mó.

translation.en: A dynamic, systematic review was established in april 2020 to track the progress of registered clinical trials for covid-19 vaccine and therapeutic drug candidates.vaccine and drug development is a multistep process, typically requiring more than five years to assure safety and efficacy of the new compound.
translation.ga: Bunaíodh athbhreithniú dinimiciúil, córasach in aibreán 2020 chun dul chun cinn trialacha cliniciúla cláraithe d ’ iarrthóirí vacsaín covid-19 agus drugaí teiripeacha a rianú. Is próiseas ildisciplíneach é forbairt vacsaín agus drugaí, a éilíonn níos mó ná cúig bliana de ghnáth chun sábháilteacht agus éifeachtúlacht an chomhdhúil nua a chinntiú.

translation.en: Drug development is the process of bringing a new infectious disease vaccine or therapeutic drug to the market once a lead compound has been identified through the process of drug discovery.
translation.ga: Is éard atá i bhforbairt drugaí an próiseas chun vacsaín nua galar tógálach nó druga teiripeach a thabhairt ar an margadh nuair a bhíonn comhdhúil luaidhe aitheanta tríd an bpróiseas fionnachtain drugaí.

translation.en: It includes laboratory research on microorganisms and animals, filing for regulatory status, such as via the fda, for an investigational new drug to initiate clinical trials on humans, and may include the step of obtaining regulatory approval with a new drug application to market the drug.
translation.ga: Cuimsíonn sé taighde saotharlainne ar mhiocrorgánaigh agus ar ainmhithe, comhdú le haghaidh stádas rialála, mar shampla tríd an fda, le haghaidh druga imscrúdaithe nua chun trialacha cliniciúla a thionscnamh i ndaoine, agus d ’ fhéadfadh go n-áireofaí ann an chéim chun ceadú rialála. feidhmchlár nua drugaí a fháil chun an druga a mhargú..

translation.en: Development of a covid-19 vaccine or therapeutic antiviral drug begins with matching a chemical concept to the potential prophylactic mechanism of the future vaccine or antiviral activity in vivo.
translation.ga: Tosaíonn forbairt vacsaín covid-19 nó druga frithvíreas teiripeach le coincheap ceimiceach chun meicníocht phróifiolacsach féideartha an vacsaín nó gníomhaíocht frithvíreasach in vivo a mheaitseáil.

translation.en: New chemical entities (nces, also known as new molecular entities or nmes) are compounds that emerge from the process of drug discovery to specify a vaccine or antiviral candidate.
translation.ga: Is comhdhúile iad eintitis cheimiceacha nua (ncenna, ar a dtugtar aonáin mhóilíneacha nua nó nmeanna freisin) a thagann as an bpróiseas fionnachtain drugaí chun vacsaín nó iarrthóir frithvíreas a aithint.

translation.en: These have promising activity against a biological target related to covid-19 disease.
translation.ga: Tá gníomhaíocht ghealltanach acu seo i gcoinne sprioc bhitheolaíoch an ghalair covid-19.

translation.en: At the beginning of vaccine or drug development, little is known about the safety, toxicity, pharmacokinetics, and metabolism of the nce in humans.
translation.ga: Ag tús na vacsaíne nó na forbartha drugaí, is beag atá ar eolas faoi shábháilteacht, thocsaineacht, chógaschinéitic agus mheitibileacht nce i ndaoine.

translation.en: It is the function and obligation of drug development to assess all of these parameters prior to human clinical trials to prove safety and efficacy.
translation.ga: Is í feidhm agus oibleagáid fhorbairt drugaí na paraiméadair seo go léir a mheas roimh thrialacha cliniciúla daonna chun sábháilteacht agus éifeachtúlacht a chruthú.

translation.en: A further major objective of drug development is to recommend the dose and schedule for the first use in a human clinical trial ("first-in-human" [fih] or first human dose [fhd], previously also known as "first-in-man" [fim]).
translation.ga: Príomhchuspóir eile d ’ fhorbairt drugaí is ea an dáileog agus an sceideal a mholadh lena n-úsáid den chéad uair i dtriail chliniciúil daonna (“an chéad duine ” [fih] nó an chéad dáileog daonna [fhd], ar a dtugtar“ céad-isteach ” roimhe seo - fear "[fim]).

translation.en: In addition, drug development must establish the physicochemical properties of the nce: Its chemical makeup, stability, and solubility.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, caithfidh forbairt drugaí airíonna fisiciceimiceacha an nce a bhunú: A chomhdhéanamh ceimiceach, a chobhsaíocht agus a intuaslagthacht.

translation.en: Manufacturers must optimize the process they use to make the chemical so they can scale up from a medicinal chemist producing milligrams, to manufacturing on the kilogram and ton scale.
translation.ga: Ní mór do mhonaróirí an próiseas a úsáideann siad chun an ceimiceán a dhéanamh a bharrfheabhsú ionas gur féidir leo scála suas ó cheimiceoir míochaine a tháirgeann milleagram, go déantúsaíocht ar an scála cileagraim agus tona.

translation.en: They further examine the product for suitability to package as capsules, tablets, aerosol, intramuscular injectable, subcutaneous injectable, or intravenous formulations.
translation.ga: Scrúdaíonn siad an táirge a thuilleadh maidir le hoiriúnacht le haghaidh pacáistiú mar capsúil, táibléad, aerasóil, instealltaí ionmhatánach, instealltaí subcutaneous, nó foirmlithe infhéitheacha.

translation.en: Together, these processes are known in preclinical and clinical development as chemistry, manufacturing, and control (cmc) .many aspects of drug development focus on satisfying the regulatory requirements of drug licensing authorities.
translation.ga: Le chéile, tugtar ceimic, déantúsaíocht agus rialú (cmc) ar na próisis seo i bhforbairt chliniciúil agus chliniciúil. Díríonn roinnt gnéithe d ’ fhorbairt drugaí ar riachtanais rialála na n-údarás ceadúnaithe drugaí a chomhlíonadh.

translation.en: These generally constitute tests designed to determine the major toxicities of a novel compound prior to first use in humans.
translation.ga: De ghnáth is tástálacha iad seo atá deartha chun príomhthocsaineachtaí comhdhúile núíosacha a chinneadh sula n-úsáidtear iad den chéad uair i ndaoine.

translation.en: The canadian government announced ca $275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against covid-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at canadian universities, with plans to establish a "vaccine bank" of new vaccines for implementation if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair rialtas cheanada maoiniú ca de $275 milliún do 96 tionscadal taighde ar fhrithbhearta míochaine i gcoinne covid-19, lena n-áirítear go leor iarrthóirí vacsaíne in ollscoileanna cheanada, le pleananna chun “banc vacsaíní ” vacsaíní nua a bhunú lena gcur i bhfeidhm i gcás ceann eile ráig corovirus.

translation.en: Clinical trial programs involve three, multiple-year stages toward product approval, and a fourth, post-approval stage for ongoing safety monitoring of the vaccine or drug therapy:
translation.ga: Tá trí chéim ilbhliana i dtreo ceadú táirgí i gceist le cláir thrialacha cliniciúla, agus an ceathrú céim iarcheadaithe chun monatóireacht leanúnach a dhéanamh ar an vacsaín nó ar theiripe drugaí:

translation.en: Phase i trials, usually in healthy volunteers, determine safety and dosing.
translation.ga: Cinneann trialacha chéim i, de ghnáth in oibrithe deonacha sláintiúla, sábháilteacht agus dáileog.

translation.en: Phase ii trials are used to establish an initial reading of efficacy and further explore safety in small numbers of people having the disease targeted by the nce.
translation.ga: Úsáidtear trialacha chéim ii chun léamh tosaigh éifeachtúlachta a bhunú agus chun sábháilteacht a iniúchadh tuilleadh i líon beag daoine a ndíríonn an nce orthu.

translation.en: Phase iii trials are large, pivotal trials to determine safety and efficacy in sufficiently large numbers of people with the covid-19 infection.
translation.ga: Is trialacha lárnacha móra iad trialacha chéim iii chun sábháilteacht agus éifeachtúlacht a chinneadh i líon mór daoine a bhfuil ionfhabhtú covid-19 orthu.

translation.en: If safety and efficacy are adequately proved, clinical testing may stop at this step and the nce advances to the new drug application (nda) stage to begin marketing.
translation.ga: Má tá sábháilteacht agus éifeachtúlacht cruthaithe go leordhóthanach, d ’ fhéadfadh tástáil chliniciúil stopadh ag an bpointe seo agus rachaidh an nce ar aghaidh go dtí an chéim nua d ’ fheidhmiú drugaí (nda) chun tús a chur le margaíocht.

translation.en: Phase iv trials are post-approval trials that may be a condition attached by the fda, also called post-market surveillance studies.
translation.ga: Is trialacha iarcheadaithe iad trialacha chéim iv a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith ina riocht faoi cheangal ag fda, ar a dtugtar staidéir faireachais iarmhargaidh freisin.

translation.en: In addition to the tests required to move a novel vaccine or antiviral drug into the clinic for the first time, manufacturers must ensure that any long-term or chronic toxicities are well-defined, including effects on systems not previously monitored (fertility, reproduction, immune system, among others).
translation.ga: Chomh maith leis na tástálacha a theastaíonn chun an chéad vacsaín núíosach nó druga frithvíreas a aistriú isteach sa chlinic, ní mór do mhonaróirí a chinntiú go bhfuil aon tocsainí fadtéarmacha nó ainsealacha sainmhínithe go maith, lena n-áirítear éifeachtaí ar chórais neamh-mhaoirsithe. roimhe seo (torthúlacht, atáirgeadh, córas imdhíonachta, i measc rudaí eile).

translation.en: In the united states, this process is called a "new drug application" or nda.
translation.ga: Sna stáit aontaithe, tugtar “feidhmchlár nua drugaí ” nó nda ar an bpróiseas seo.

translation.en: A clinical trial design in progress may be modified as an "adaptive design" if accumulating data in the trial provide early insights about positive or negative efficacy of the treatment.
translation.ga: Féadfar dearadh trialach cliniciúla leanúnaí a mhodhnú mar “dhearadh oiriúnaitheach ” má thugann carnadh sonraí sa triail léargas luath ar éifeachtúlacht dhearfach nó dhiúltach na cóireála.

translation.en: The global solidarity and european discovery trials of hospitalized people with severe covid-19 infection apply adaptive design to rapidly alter trial parameters as results from the four experimental therapeutic strategies emerge.
translation.ga: Dlúthpháirtíocht dhomhanda agus fionnachtana cuireann trialacha eorpacha daoine in ospidéal a bhfuil ionfhabhtú covid-19 trom orthu dearadh oiriúnaitheach i bhfeidhm chun paraiméadair thrialacha a athrú go tapa de réir mar a thagann torthaí ó na ceithre straitéis theiripeacha turgnamhacha chun cinn.

translation.en: Adaptive designs within ongoing phase ii-iii clinical trials on candidate therapeutics may shorten trial durations and use fewer subjects, possibly expediting decisions for early termination or success, and coordinating design changes for a specific trial across its international locations.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh dearaí oiriúnaitheacha laistigh de thrialacha cliniciúla leanúnacha chéim ii-iii ar theiripe iarrthóra tréimhsí trialach a ghiorrú agus níos lú ábhar a úsáid, b ’ fhéidir cinntí a bhrostú chun luathfhoirceannadh nó rath a bhaint amach, agus athruithe dearaidh do thriail shonrach a chomhordú ar fud a láithreacha idirnáisiúnta.

translation.en: Most novel drug candidates (nces) fail during drug development, either because they have unacceptable toxicity or because they simply do not prove efficacy on the targeted disease, as shown in phase ii-iii clinical trials.
translation.ga: Teipeann ar fhormhór na n-iarrthóirí drugaí núíosacha (nceanna) le linn forbairt drugaí, toisc go bhfuil tocsaineacht do-ghlactha acu nó toisc nach gcruthóidh siad éifeachtúlacht don ghalar spriocdhírithe, mar a thaispeántar i dtrialacha cliniciúla chéim ii-iii.

translation.en: The high failure rates associated with pharmaceutical development are referred to as an "attrition rate", requiring decisions during the early stages of drug development to "kill" projects early to avoid costly failures.
translation.ga: Tagraítear do na rátaí arda teip a bhaineann le forbairt cógaisíochta mar “ráta laghdaithe ”, a éilíonn cinntí le linn na gcéimeanna luatha d ’ fhorbairt drugaí tionscadail a“ mharú ” go luath chun teipeanna costasacha a sheachaint.

translation.en: One 2010 study assessed both capitalized and out-of-pocket costs for bringing a single new drug to market as about us $1.8 billion and $870 million, respectively.
translation.ga: Rinne staidéar amháin in 2010 measúnú ar na costais chaipitlithe agus as póca a bhaineann le druga nua amháin a thabhairt ar an margadh mar thart ar us $1.8 billiún agus $870 milliún, faoi seach.

translation.en: A median cost estimate of 2015-16 trials for development of 10 anti-cancer drugs was $648 million.
translation.ga: Ba é $648 milliún an meastachán airmheánach costais de thrialacha 2015-16 d ’ fhorbairt 10 ndrugaí frith-ailse.

translation.en: In a 2016 review of 106 drug candidates assessed through clinical trials, the total capital expenditure for a manufacturer having a drug approved through successful phase iii trials was $2.6 billion (in 2013 dollars), an amount increasing at an annual rate of 8.5%.
translation.ga: In athbhreithniú in 2016 ar 106 iarrthóir drugaí a ndearnadh measúnú orthu trí thrialacha cliniciúla, ba é an caiteachas caipitil iomlán do mhonaróir a cheadaigh druga trí thrialacha rathúla chéim iii ná $2.6 billiún (in dollar 2013), méadú ag ráta bliantúil de 8.5%.

translation.en: Seven trials were evaluating repurposed drugs already approved to treat malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine phosphate.
translation.ga: Bhí seacht dtriail ann a rinne meastóireacht ar dhrugaí athdhéanta a ceadaíodh cheana le haghaidh cóireáil maláire, lena n-áirítear ceithre staidéar ar hiodrocsaiclóirídquine nó fosfáit chlóirín.

translation.en: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the chinese research, with 9 phase iii trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of april.
translation.ga: Is drugaí frithvíreasacha athdhéanta an chuid is mó de thaighde na síne, agus beidh 9 dtriail chéim iii de remdesivir ar fud roinnt tíortha le tuairisciú faoi dheireadh mhí aibreáin.

translation.en: Led by the bill and melinda gates foundation with partners investing us $125 million and coordinating with the world health organization, the covid-19 therapeutics accelerator began in march, facilitating drug development researchers to rapidly identify, assess, develop, and scale up potential treatments.
translation.ga: Thosaigh bill agus melinda gates foundation le comhpháirtithe ag infheistiú us $125 milliún agus ag comhordú leis an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte, thosaigh luasaire teiripeach covid-19 i mí an mhárta, ag éascú do thaighdeoirí forbartha drugaí cóireálacha féideartha a aithint, a mheas, a fhorbairt agus a mhéadú go tapa.

translation.en: The covid-19 clinical research coalition formed to coordinate and expedite results from international clinical trials on the most promising post-infection treatments.
translation.ga: Cuireadh comhghuaillíocht taighde cliniciúil covid-19 le chéile chun torthaí ó thrialacha cliniciúla idirnáisiúnta de na cóireálacha iar-ionfhabhtaithe is geallta a chomhordú agus a luathú.

translation.en: In early 2020, numerous established antiviral compounds for treating other infections were being repurposed or developed in new clinical research efforts to alleviate the illness of covid-19.
translation.ga: Go luath in 2020, bhí go leor comhdhúile frithvíreasacha seanbhunaithe chun ionfhabhtuithe eile a chóireáil á n-athshlánú nó á bhforbairt in iarrachtaí taighde cliniciúla nua chun breoiteacht covid-19 a mhaolú.

translation.en: For an already-approved drug (such as hydroxychloroquine for malaria), phase iii-iv trials determine in hundreds to thousands of covid-19-infected people the possible extended use of an already-approved drug for treating covid-19 infection.
translation.ga: Maidir le druga atá ceadaithe cheana féin (mar hiodrocsaicloróicéin le haghaidh maláire), socraíonn trialacha chéim iii-iv sna céadta go mílte duine atá ionfhabhtaithe le covid-19 an úsáid leathnaithe fhéideartha de dhruga atá ceadaithe cheana féin chun ionfhabhtú covid-19 a chóireáil.

translation.en: As of early april 2020, 103 candidate therapeutics were in preclinical or a stage of phase i-iv development, with trial results for 29 drug candidates expected during april.
translation.ga: Go luath i mí aibreáin 2020, bhí 103 teiripeoir iarrthóra sa chéim réamhlíneach nó fhorbartha de chéim i-iv, agus bhíothas ag súil le torthaí trialach do 29 iarrthóir drugaí le linn mhí aibreáin.

translation.en: In march, the world health organization (who) launched the coordinated "solidarity trial" in 10 countries to rapidly assess in thousands of covid-19 infected people the potential efficacy of existing antiviral and anti-inflammatory agents not yet evaluated specifically for covid-19 illness.
translation.ga: I mí an mhárta, sheol an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte (who) an “triail dlúthpháirtíochta ” comhordaithe i 10 dtír chun na mílte duine atá ionfhabhtaithe le covid-19 a mheas go tapa maidir le héifeachtúlacht ionchasach gníomhairí frithvíreasacha agus frith-athlastacha. roimhe seo níor rinneadh meastóireacht shonrach orthu ar bhreoiteacht covid-19.

translation.en: Do any of the drugs reduce mortality?
translation.ga: An laghdaíonn aon cheann de na drugaí básmhaireacht?

translation.en: Do any of the drugs reduce the time a patient is hospitalized?
translation.ga: An laghdaíonn aon cheann de na drugaí an t-am a chuirtear othar san ospidéal?

translation.en: Do the treatments affect the need for people with covid-19-induced pneumonia to be ventilated or maintained in intensive care?
translation.ga: An gcuireann na cóireálacha isteach ar an ngá daoine le niúmóine spreagtha ag covid-19 a aeráil nó a chothabháil i ndianchúram?

translation.en: Could such drugs be used to minimize the illness of covid-19 infection in healthcare staff and people at high risk of developing severe illness? Enrolling people with covid-19 infection is simplified by using data entries, including informed consent, on a who website.
translation.ga: An bhféadfaí drugaí den sórt sin a úsáid chun galar tógálach covid-19 a íoslaghdú i measc na foirne cúram sláinte agus na ndaoine atá i mbaol mór tinnis a fhorbairt? Cláraítear daoine le hionfhabhtú covid-19 ag úsáid iontrálacha sonraí, lena n-áirítear toiliú feasach, ar shuíomh gréasáin who.

translation.en: After the trial staff determines the drugs available at the hospital, the who website randomizes the hospitalized subject to one of the trial drugs or to the hospital standard of care for treating covid-19.
translation.ga: Tar éis d ’ fhoireann na trialach na drugaí atá ar fáil san ospidéal a chinneadh, déanann suíomh gréasáin who an t-ospidéal a randamú faoi cheann de na drugaí trialach nó de réir chaighdeán cúraim an ospidéil chun covid-19 a chóireáil.

translation.en: The trial physician records and submits follow-up information about the subject status and treatment, completing data input via the who solidarity website.
translation.ga: Déanann dochtúir na trialach faisnéis leantach faoi stádas agus cóireáil an ábhair a thaifeadadh agus a chur isteach, ag comhlánú ionchur sonraí trí shuíomh gréasáin dlúthpháirtíochta who.

translation.en: A global safety monitoring board of who physicians examine interim results to assist decisions on safety and effectiveness of the trial drugs, and alter the trial design or recommend an effective therapy.
translation.ga: Scrúdaíonn bord monatóireachta sábháilteachta domhanda de lianna who torthaí eatramhacha chun cabhrú le cinntí a dhéanamh faoi shábháilteacht agus éifeachtúlacht drugaí trialach, agus dearadh trialach a athrú nó teiripe éifeachtach a mholadh.

translation.en: A similar web-based study to solidarity, called "discovery", was initiated in march across seven countries by inserm (paris, france) .during march, funding for the solidarity trial reached us $108 million from 203,000 individuals, organizations and governments, with 45 countries involved in financing or trial management.
translation.ga: Sheol inserm (páras, an fhrainc) staidéar bunaithe ar an ngréasán cosúil leis an dlúthpháirtíocht, ar a dtugtar “discovery ” i mí an mhárta ar fud seacht dtír. I mí an mhárta, shroich maoiniú don triail dlúthpháirtíochta us $108 milliún ó 203,000 duine, eagraíocht agus rialtas, agus bhí baint ag 45 tír le maoiniú nó bainistíocht trialach.

translation.en: Numerous candidate drugs under study as "supportive" treatments to relieve discomfort during illness, such as nsaids or bronchodilators, are not included in the table below.
translation.ga: Ní áirítear go leor drugaí iarrthóra a ndéantar staidéar orthu mar chóireálacha “tacúla ” chun míchompord a mhaolú le linn breoiteachta, mar nsaidanna nó bronchodilators, sa tábla thíos.

translation.en: Others in early-stage phase ii trials or numerous treatment candidates in phase i trials, are also excluded.
translation.ga: Tá daoine eile i dtrialacha luathchéime chéim ii nó go leor iarrthóirí cóireála i dtrialacha chéim i eisiata freisin.

translation.en: Drug candidates in phase i-ii trials have a low rate of success (under 12%) to pass through all trial phases to gain eventual approval.
translation.ga: Tá ráta rathúlachta íseal (faoi 12%) ag iarrthóirí drugaí i dtrialacha chéim i-ii chun dul trí gach céim trialach chun cead a fháil sa deireadh.

translation.en: Hydroxychloroquine is more commonly available than chloroquine in the united states.
translation.ga: Tá hidroxychloroquine ar fáil níos minice ná clóiríosychone sna stáit aontaithe.

translation.en: Although several countries use chloroquine or hydroxychloroquine for treatment of persons hospitalized with covid-19, as of march 2020 the drug has not been formally approved through clinical trials in the united states.
translation.ga: Cé go n-úsáideann roinnt tíortha clóirín nó clóiríd hiodrocsaile chun cóir leighis a chur ar dhaoine san ospidéal le covid-19, amhail márta 2020, níor ceadaíodh an druga go foirmiúil trí thrialacha cliniciúla sna stáit aontaithe.

translation.en: Chloroquine has been recommended by chinese, south korean and italian health authorities for the treatment of covid-19, although these agencies and the us cdc noted contraindications for people with heart disease or diabetes.
translation.ga: Tá údaráis sláinte na síne, na cóiré theas agus na hiodáile molta ag cloroquine maidir le cóireáil covid-19, cé go bhfuil contraindications tugtha faoi deara ag na gníomhaireachtaí seo agus cdc na sa do dhaoine le galar croí nó diaibéiteas.

translation.en: Both drugs have extensive interactions with prescription drugs, affecting the therapeutic dose and disease mitigation.
translation.ga: Tá idirghníomhaíochtaí fairsinge ag an dá dhruga le drugaí ar oideas, a théann i bhfeidhm ar an dáileog theiripeach agus ar mhaolú an ghalair.

translation.en: Some people have allergic reactions to these drugs.on 12 april, a preliminary clinical trial conducted at a hospital in brazil was stopped when several people given high doses of chloroquine for covid-19 infection developed irregular heart rates, causing 11 deaths.
translation.ga: Bíonn frithghníomhartha ailléirgeacha ag daoine áirithe ar na drugaí seo. Stopadh réamhthriail chliniciúil a rinneadh in ospidéal sa bhrasaíl nuair a d ’ fhorbair roinnt daoine dáileoga arda clóirín d ’ ionfhabhtú covid-19 le rátaí croí neamhrialta, agus 11 bás dá bharr.

translation.en: Chinese clinical trials in wuhan and shenzhen claimed to show that favipiravir was "clearly effective".
translation.ga: D' éiligh trialacha cliniciúla na síne i wuhan agus shenzhen go raibh favipiravir "soiléir éifeachtach".

translation.en: Of 35 patients in shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
translation.ga: Rinne 35 othar i shenzhen tástáil dhiúltach ar airmheán 4 lá, agus ba é fad an tinnis 11 lá sna 45 othar nach bhfuair é.

translation.en: In a study conducted in wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
translation.ga: I staidéar a rinneadh i wuhan tugadh 240 othar le niúmóine leath fabhrach agus fuair a leath umifenovir.

translation.en: The term "preclinical research" is defined by laboratory studies in vitro and in vivo, indicating a beginning stage for development of a vaccine, antiviral or monoclonal antibody therapy, such as experiments to determine effective doses and toxicity, before a candidate compound is advanced for safety and efficacy evaluation in humans.
translation.ga: Sainmhínítear an téarma "taighde réamhlíneach" le staidéir saotharlainne in vitro agus in vivo, a léiríonn céim tosaigh d ’ fhorbairt vacsaín, teiripe antashubstaintí frithvíreasacha nó monoclónacha, mar shampla turgnaimh chun dáileoga éifeachtacha agus tocsaineacht a chinneadh, sula ndéantar meastóireacht ar chomhdhúil an iarrthóra. sábháilteacht agus éifeachtúlacht i ndaoine.

translation.en: Some antibiotics may be repurposed as covid-19 treatments:
translation.ga: Féadfar roinnt antaibheathaigh a athsholáthar mar chóireálacha covid-19:

translation.en: In march 2020, the main protease of the sars-cov-2 virus was identified as a target for post-infection drugs.
translation.ga: I mí an mhárta 2020, sainaithníodh príomh-protease an víris sars-cov-2 mar sprioc do dhrugaí iar-ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: This enzyme is essential to the host cell to reproduce the ribonucleic acid of the virus.
translation.ga: Tá an einsím seo riachtanach don chill óstach chun aigéad ribonucleic an víris a atáirgeadh.

translation.en: To find the enzyme, scientists used the genome published by chinese researchers in january 2020 to isolate the main protease.
translation.ga: Chun an einsím a fháil, d ’ úsáid eolaithe an géanóm a d ’ fhoilsigh taighdeoirí na síne i mí eanáir 2020 chun an príomh-protease a leithlisiú.

translation.en: As a potential combination therapy, they are used together in two phase iii arms of the 2020 global solidarity project on covid-19.
translation.ga: Mar theiripe teaglaim féideartha, úsáidtear iad le chéile in dhá chéim de chéim iii den tionscadal domhanda dlúthpháirtíochta 2020 ar covid-19.

translation.en: A preliminary study in china of combined lopinavir and ritonavir found no effect in people hospitalized for covid-19.
translation.ga: Níor aimsigh réamhstaidéar sa tsín ar lopinavir agus ritonavir le chéile aon éifeacht ar dhaoine atá san ospidéal le haghaidh covid-19.

translation.en: It is unclear yet whether conditions arising during pregnancy including diabetes, cardiac failure, hypercoagulability or hypertension might represent additional risk factors for pregnant people as they do for nonpregnant people.from the limited data available, vertical transmission during the third trimester probably does not occur, or only occurs very rarely.
translation.ga: Níl sé soiléir fós an bhféadfadh na tosca a thagann chun cinn le linn toirchis lena n-áirítear diaibéiteas, cliseadh cairdiach, hipiríogaireacht nó hipirtheannas a bheith ina bhfachtóirí riosca breise do dhaoine torracha mar a dhéanann siad do dhaoine nach bhfuil ag iompar clainne. Mar gheall ar na sonraí teoranta atá ar fáil, ní dócha go dtarlóidh tarchur ingearach le linn an tríú ráithe, nó go hannamh.

translation.en: There is no data yet on early pregnancy.
translation.ga: Níl aon sonraí ann fós maidir le toircheas luath.

translation.en: Little evidence exists to permit any solid conclusions about the nature of covid-19 infection in pregnancy.
translation.ga: Níl mórán fianaise ann chun aon chonclúidí daingne a cheadú faoi nádúr an ionfhabhtaithe covid-19 le linn toirchis.

translation.en: A case series of 43 women from new york who tested positive for covid-19 showed similar patterns to non-pregnant adults: 86% had mild disease, 9.3% had severe disease and 4.7% developed critical disease.
translation.ga: Léirigh sraith cás de 43 bean as nua eabhrac a rinne tástáil dhearfach ar covid-19 patrúin cosúil le daoine fásta nach raibh ag iompar clainne: Bhí galar éadrom ag 86%, bhí galar trom ar 9.3% agus d ’ fhorbair 4.7% galar criticiúil.

translation.en: Fetal distress was reported in two.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh anacair féatais in dhá cheann.

translation.en: None of the women developed severe covid-19 pneumonia or died.
translation.ga: Níor fhorbair aon cheann de na mná niúmóine géarmhíochaine covid-19 nó ní bhfuair siad bás.

translation.en: All of them had live birth pregnancies and no severe neonatal asphyxia was observed.
translation.ga: Bhí toircheas breithe beo ag gach duine acu agus níor breathnaíodh aon asphyxia nuabheirthe.

translation.en: The samples of breast milk, amniotic fluid, cord blood and neonatal throat swab were tested for sars-cov-2, and all results were negative.in another study on 15 pregnant women, majority of the patients presented with fever and cough, while laboratory tests yielded lymphocytopenia in 12 patients.
translation.ga: Rinneadh tástáil ar na samplaí de bhainne cíche, sreabhán amniotic, fuil corda agus swab scornach nuabheirthe do sars-cov-2, agus bhí na torthaí go léir diúltach. I staidéar eile ar 15 bean torracha, d ’ fhorbair tromlach na n-othar fiabhras agus casacht, agus i saotharlann saotharlainne, fuarthas tástálacha lymphocytopenia i 12 othar.

translation.en: Computed tomography findings of these patients were consistent with previous reports of non-pregnant patients, consisting of ground-glass opacities at early stage.
translation.ga: Bhí torthaí ríofa tomagrafaíochta na n-othar seo comhsheasmhach le tuairiscí roimhe seo ar othair nach raibh ag iompar clainne, ar teochtaí gloine talún iad ag céim luath.

translation.en: Follow-up images after delivery showed no progression of pneumonia.media reports indicate that over 100 women with covid-19 might have delivered, and in march 2020, no maternal deaths were reported.
translation.ga: Níor léirigh íomhánna leantacha tar éis an tseachadta aon dul chun cinn ar niúmóine. Tugann tuairiscí sna meáin le fios go mb ’ fhéidir gur seachadadh níos mó ná 100 bean le covid-19, agus i márta 2020, níor tuairiscíodh aon bhás máthar.

translation.en: Their guidelines thus advise that any pregnant person admitted to hospital with a covid-19 infection should receive at least 10 days of prophylactic low-molecular-weight heparin after being discharged from the hospital.
translation.ga: Molann a dtreoirlínte dá bhrí sin gur chóir d ’ aon duine torrach a ligtear isteach san ospidéal le hionfhabhtú covid-19 10 lá ar a laghad de heparin próifiolachtach meáchan móilíneach íseal a fháil tar éis a scaoilte amach as an ospidéal.

translation.en: There are no data yet concerning the implications of covid-19 infections for labour.
translation.ga: Níl aon sonraí ann fós maidir le himpleachtaí ionfhabhtuithe covid-19 do shaothar.

translation.en: One infant girl born to a mother with covid-19 had elevated igm levels two hours after birth, suggesting that she had been infected in utero and supporting the possibility of vertical transmission in some cases.
translation.ga: D' ardaigh cailín naíonán amháin a rugadh do mháthair le covid-19 leibhéil igm dhá uair an chloig tar éis a breithe, ag tabhairt le tuiscint go raibh sí ionfhabhtaithe in utero agus ag tacú leis an bhféidearthacht tarchur ingearach i gcásanna áirithe.

translation.en: A small study involving 6 confirmed covid-19 mothers showed no indication of sars-cov-19 in their newborns' throats or serum but antibodies were present in neonatal blood sera samples, including igm in two of the infants.
translation.ga: Staidéar beag nár léirigh 6 mháthair deimhnithe ag covid-19 aon chomhartha de sars-cov-19 i scornach nó serum a nuabheirthe ach bhí antasubstaintí i láthair i samplaí séiream fola nuabheirthe, lena n-áirítear igm in dhá cheann de na naíonáin.

translation.en: This is not usually passed from mother to fetus so further research is required to know whether the virus crossed the placenta or whether placentas of women in the study were damaged or abnormal.
translation.ga: De ghnáth ní aistrítear é seo ón máthair go dtí an fhéatas agus mar sin teastaíonn tuilleadh taighde chun a fháil amach an dtrasnaigh an víreas an broghais nó an ndearnadh damáiste nó neamhghnácha do na mná sa staidéar.

translation.en: Since covid-19 shows similarities to sars-cov and mers-cov, it is likely that their effect on pregnancy are similar.
translation.ga: Toisc go léiríonn covid-19 cosúlachtaí le sars-cov agus mers-cov, is dóigh go mbeidh a n-éifeacht ar thoircheas cosúil.

translation.en: Four of seven had first trimester miscarriage, two of five had fetal growth restriction in the second trimester, and four of five had preterm birth.
translation.ga: Bhí breith anabaí ag ceathrar as gach seachtar sa chéad trimester, bhí fás féatais srianta ag beirt as gach cúigear sa dara ráithe, agus bhí breitheanna roimh am ag ceathrar as gach cúigear.

translation.en: None of the newborns were infected with sars-cov.
translation.ga: Ní raibh aon cheann de na nuabheirthe ionfhabhtaithe le sars-cov.

translation.en: A report of ten cases of mers- cov infection in pregnancy in saudi arabia showed that the clinical presentation is variable, from mild to severe infection.
translation.ga: Léirigh tuarascáil ar dheich gcás d ’ ionfhabhtú mers-cov i dtoircheas san araib shádach go bhfuil an cur i láthair cliniciúil athraitheach, ó ionfhabhtú éadrom go trom.

translation.en: The outcome was favorable in a majority of the cases, but the infant death rate was 27% .a recent review suggested that covid-19 appeared to be less lethal to mothers and infants than sars and mers but that there may be an increased risk of preterm birth after 28 weeks' gestation.
translation.ga: Bhí an toradh fabhrach i bhformhór na gcásanna, ach ba é an ráta básmhaireachta naíonán ná 27%. Tugadh le fios in athbhreithniú le déanaí gur chosúil go raibh covid-19 níos lú marfach do mháithreacha agus do naíonáin ná sars agus mers ach go bhféadfadh riosca méadaithe a bheith ann maidir le breith roimh am tar éis tréimhse iompair 28 seachtaine.

translation.en: The world health organization and centers for disease control and prevention of the united states advises pregnant women to do the same things as the general public to avoid infection, such as covering cough, avoid interacting with sick people, cleaning hands with soap and water or sanitizer.
translation.ga: Molann an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte agus ionaid sam um rialú agus cosc ar ghalair go ndéanann mná torracha an rud céanna leis an bpobal i gcoitinne chun ionfhabhtú a sheachaint, mar shampla casacht a chlúdach, idirghníomhaíochtaí le daoine breoite a sheachaint, lámha a ghlanadh le gallúnach agus uisce nó sanitizer.

translation.en: A survey conducted in shanghai among pregnant women in different trimesters of pregnancy identified a strong demand for online access to health information and services.
translation.ga: D' aithin suirbhé a rinneadh i shanghai i measc mná torracha ag céimeanna éagsúla an toirchis éileamh láidir ar rochtain ar líne ar fhaisnéis agus ar sheirbhísí sláinte.

translation.en: People expecting their first baby were more willing to have online consultation and guidance than who had previously given birth.the rcog and rcm recommend that in-person appointments be deferred by 7 days after the start of symptoms of covid-19 or 14 days if another person in the household has symptoms.
translation.ga: Bhí daoine a bhí ag súil lena gcéad leanbh níos sásta comhairliúchán agus treoir ar líne a bheith acu ná mar a rugadh roimhe seo. Molann rcog agus rcm go gcuirfí coinní pearsanta ar athló 7 lá tar éis tosú comharthaí covid-19 nó 14 lá má tá comharthaí ag ball teaghlaigh murach sin.

translation.en: Fever subsequently developed in three asymptomatic patients.
translation.ga: Forbraíodh fiabhras ina dhiaidh sin i dtrí othar neamhshiomptómach.

translation.en: One patient who had tested negative subsequently became symptomatic postpartum and tested positive three days after the initial negative test.
translation.ga: Rinneadh tástáil dhiúltach ar othar amháin ina dhiaidh sin agus rinneadh tástáil dhearfach air ar feadh trí lá tar éis na tástála diúltacha tosaigh.

translation.en: The doctors conducting the screening recommended that in order to reduce infection and allocate ppe, due to high numbers of patients presenting as asymptomatic, universal screening of pregnant patients should be conducted.
translation.ga: D ’ fhonn an t-ionfhabhtú a laghdú agus tcp a leithdháileadh, ba iad na dochtúirí a rinne an scagadh, mar gheall ar an líon ard othar a bhí i láthair mar scagthástáil neamhshiomptómach, uilíoch ar othair torracha.

translation.en: They also suggest that people with suspected or confirmed covid-19 should have continuous electronic fetal monitoring.
translation.ga: Molann siad freisin gur cheart go mbeadh monatóireacht leictreonach leanúnach féatais ar dhaoine a bhfuil amhras faoi nó a dhearbhaigh covid-19.

translation.en: The use of birthing pools is not recommended for suspected or confirmed cases of covid-19 due to the risk of infection via faeces.
translation.ga: Ní mholtar linnte breithe a úsáid i gcásanna amhrasta nó dearbhaithe de covid-19 mar gheall ar riosca ionfhabhtaithe ag faecas.

translation.en: In the uk, official recommendations state that precautionary separation of a mother and a healthy baby should not be undertaken lightly and that they should be kept together in the postpartum period where neonatal care is not required.literature from china recommended separation of infected mothers from babies for 14 days.
translation.ga: Sa ríocht aontaithe, luann moltaí oifigiúla nár cheart réamhchúram a dhéanamh go héadrom do mháthair agus do leanbh sláintiúil agus gur cheart iad a choinneáil le chéile sa tréimhse postpartum nuair nach gá cúram nuabheirthe. Mhol teocht ón tsín máithreacha atá ionfhabhtaithe a scaradh ó leanaí ar feadh 14 lá.

translation.en: In the us there is also the recommendation that newborns and mothers should be temporarily separated until transmission-based precautions are discontinued, and that where this is not possible the newborn should be kept 2 metres away from the mother.
translation.ga: Sna stáit aontaithe tá moladh ann freisin go ndéanfaí nuabheirthe agus máithreacha a scaradh go sealadach go dtí go scoirfidh réamhchúraimí tarchuir, agus nuair nach féidir é sin a dhéanamh ba chóir an nuabheirthe a choinneáil 2 mhéadar ón máthair.

translation.en: B'covid-19 surveillance involves monitoring the spread of the coronavirus disease in order to establish the patterns of disease progression.
translation.ga: Is éard atá i gceist le faireachas ar covid-19 ná monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar scaipeadh an ghalair coronavirus d ’ fhonn patrúin dul chun cinn an ghalair a chinneadh.

translation.en: The world health organization (who) recommends active surveillance, with focus of case finding, testing and contact tracing in all transmission scenarios.
translation.ga: Molann an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte (who) faireachas gníomhach, le fócas ar bhrath cásanna, tástáil agus rianú teagmhála i ngach atreorú.

translation.en: Covid-19 surveillance is expected to monitor epidemiological trends, rapidly detect new cases, and based on this information, provide epidemiological information to conduct risk assessment and guide disease preparedness.
translation.ga: Táthar ag súil go ndéanfaidh faireachas covid-19 monatóireacht ar threochtaí eipidéimeolaíocha, cásanna nua a bhrath go tapa, agus bunaithe ar an bhfaisnéis seo, faisnéis eipidéimeolaíoch a sholáthar chun riosca a mheas agus ullmhacht galair a threorú.

translation.en: Syndromic surveillance is done based on the symptoms of an individual that corresponds to covid-19.
translation.ga: Déantar faireachas ar shiondróm bunaithe ar na hairíonna atá ag duine ag freagairt do covid-19.

translation.en: As of march 2020, the who recommends the following case definitions:
translation.ga: Amhail márta 2020, molann an who na sainmhínithe cáis seo a leanas:

translation.en: Probable case: "A suspect case for whom testing for the covid-19 virus is inconclusive" or "a suspect case for whom testing could not be performed for any reason".
translation.ga: Cás dóchúil: "Cás amhrasta a bhfuil tástáil le haghaidh víreas covid-19 neamhchinntitheach" nó "cás amhrasta nach bhféadfaí a thástáil ar chúis ar bith".

translation.en: Confirmed case: "A person with laboratory confirmation of covid-19 infection, irrespective of clinical signs and symptoms".
translation.ga: Cás dearbhaithe: "Duine le deimhniú saotharlainne ar ionfhabhtú covid-19, beag beann ar chomharthaí agus comharthaí cliniciúla".

translation.en: Direct physical contact with a probable or confirmed case;
translation.ga: Teagmháil fhisiceach dhíreach le cás dóchúil nó dearbhaithe;

translation.en: Direct care for a patient with probable or confirmed covid-19 disease without using proper personal protective equipment;
translation.ga: Cúram díreach d ’ othar a bhfuil galar dóchúil dóchúil nó covid-19 air gan trealamh cosanta pearsanta ceart a úsáid;

translation.en: Other situations as indicated by local risk assessments ".who recommends reporting of probable and confirmed cases of covid-19 infection within 48 hours of identification.
translation.ga: Cásanna eile mar a léirítear i measúnuithe riosca áitiúla ". Molann who cásanna dóchúla a thuairisciú agus ionfhabhtú covid-19 a dhearbhú laistigh de 48 uair an chloig óna n-aithint.

translation.en: The countries should report on a case-by-case basis as far as possible, but in case of limitation in resources, aggregate weekly reporting is also possible.
translation.ga: Ba cheart do thíortha tuairisciú ar bhonn cás ar chás a mhéid is féidir, ach i gcás teorannú acmhainní, is féidir tuairisciú comhiomlán seachtainiúil a dhéanamh freisin.

translation.en: Some organizations have created crowdsourced apps for syndromic surveillance, where people can report their symptoms to help researchers map areas with concentration of covid-19 symptoms.
translation.ga: Chruthaigh eagraíochtaí áirithe aipeanna sluafhoinsithe le haghaidh faireachais siondróm, áit ar féidir le daoine a gcuid comharthaí a thuairisciú chun cabhrú le taighdeoirí ceantair a bhfuil comharthaí covid-19 orthu a mhapáil.

translation.en: Virological surveillance is done by using molecular tests for covid-19.
translation.ga: Déantar faireachas víreolaíoch ag baint úsáide as tástálacha móilíneacha do covid-19.

translation.en: Who has published resources for laboratories on how to perform testing for covid-19.
translation.ga: D ’ fhoilsigh who acmhainní do shaotharlanna ar conas tástáil a dhéanamh ar covid-19.

translation.en: In the european union, laboratory confirmed cases of covid-19 are reported within 24 hours of identification.
translation.ga: San aontas eorpach, tuairiscítear cásanna de covid-19 atá deimhnithe ag saotharlann laistigh de 24 uair an chloig óna sainaithint.

translation.en: At least 24 countries have established digital surveillance of their citizens.
translation.ga: Tá faireachas digiteach bunaithe ag 24 tír ar a laghad ar a gcuid saoránach.

translation.en: The digital surveillance technologies include apps, location data and electronic tags.
translation.ga: I measc na dteicneolaíochtaí faireachais dhigiteacha tá aipeanna, sonraí suímh agus clibeanna leictreonacha.

translation.en: The center for disease control and prevention in usa tracks the travel information of individuals using airline passenger data.
translation.ga: Rianaíonn ionad um rialú agus cosc galar na sa faisnéis taistil daoine aonair a úsáideann sonraí paisinéirí aerlíne.

translation.en: In hong kong, authorities are requiring a bracelet and an app for all travellers.
translation.ga: I hong cong, éilíonn na húdaráis bracelet agus aip do gach taistealaí.

translation.en: A gps app is used to track the locations of individuals in south korea to ensure against quarantine breach, sending alerts to the user and to authorities if people leave designated areas.
translation.ga: Úsáidtear aip gps chun láithreacha daoine aonair sa chóiré theas a rianú chun a chinntiú i gcoinne sárú coraintín, foláirimh a sheoladh chuig an úsáideoir agus chuig na húdaráis má fhágann daoine ceantair ainmnithe.

translation.en: In singapore, individuals have to report their locations with photographic proof.
translation.ga: I singeapór, ní mór do dhaoine aonair a gcuid suíomhanna a thuairisciú le cruthúnas grianghrafadóireachta.

translation.en: Thailand is using an app and sim cards for all travelers to enforce their quarantine.
translation.ga: Tá an téalainn ag úsáid aip agus cártaí sim do gach taistealaí chun a gcoraintín a fhorfheidhmiú.

translation.en: Human rights organizations have criticized some of these measures, asking the governments not to use the pandemic as a cover to introduce invasive digital surveillance.
translation.ga: Cháin eagraíochtaí cearta daonna cuid de na bearta seo, ag impí ar rialtais gan an paindéim a úsáid mar chlúdach chun faireachas digiteach ionrach a thabhairt isteach.

translation.en: B'coronaviruses are a group of related viruses that cause diseases in mammals and birds.
translation.ga: Is grúpa víris gaolmhara é coronaviruses a chruthaíonn galair i mamaigh agus éin.

translation.en: In humans, coronaviruses cause respiratory tract infections that can range from mild to lethal.
translation.ga: I ndaoine, bíonn coronaviruses ina gcúis le hionfhabhtuithe sa chonair riospráide a bhféadfadh raon a bheith acu ó éadrom go marfach.

translation.en: Mild illnesses include some cases of the common cold (which has other possible causes, predominantly rhinoviruses), while more lethal varieties can cause sars, mers, and covid-19.
translation.ga: I measc na dtinneas éadrom tá roinnt cásanna den fhuacht coitianta (le cúiseanna féideartha eile, riníteas víreasach den chuid is mó), agus is féidir le sars, mers, agus covid-19 a bheith ina gcúis le níos mó cineálacha marfacha.

translation.en: Symptoms in other species vary: In chickens, they cause an upper respiratory tract disease, while in cows and pigs they cause diarrhea.
translation.ga: Tá na comharthaí i speicis eile difriúil: I sicíní, tá galar an chonair riospráide uachtarach acu, agus i mbó agus i muca tá buinneach orthu.

translation.en: There are yet to be vaccines or antiviral drugs to prevent or treat human coronavirus infections.
translation.ga: Níl vacsaíní nó drugaí frithvíreasacha ar fáil fós chun ionfhabhtuithe coronavirus daonna a chosc nó a chóireáil.

translation.en: Coronaviruses constitute the subfamily orthocoronavirinae, in the family coronaviridae, order nidovirales, and realm riboviria.
translation.ga: Is éard atá i coronaviruses an orthocoronavirinae subfamily, sa teaghlach coronaviridae, ordú nidovirales, agus fearann ​ ​ riboviria.

translation.en: They are enveloped viruses with a positive-sense single-stranded rna genome and a nucleocapsid of helical symmetry.
translation.ga: Is víris iad atá clúdaithe le géanóm rna aon-shnáithe le tuiscint dhearfach agus núicléasíd siméadrachta helical.

translation.en: The genome size of coronaviruses ranges from approximately 26 to 32 kilobases, one of the largest among rna viruses.
translation.ga: Tá méid géanóm na víris corónacha idir 26 agus 32 cileavata, ceann de na víris rna is mó.

translation.en: They have characteristic club-shaped spikes that project from their surface, which in electron micrographs create an image reminiscent of the solar corona from which their name derives.
translation.ga: Tá spící sainiúla cruth club acu ag gobadh amach óna ndromchla, rud a chruthaíonn íomhá i micreafóin leictreon i gcuimhne ar an gcoróin gréine as a dtagann a n-ainm.

translation.en: Coronaviruses were first discovered in the 1930s when an acute respiratory infection of domesticated chickens was shown to be caused by infectious bronchitis virus (ibv).
translation.ga: Thángthas ar coronaviruses den chéad uair sna 1930idí nuair a léiríodh gur víreas bronchitis tógálach (ibv) ba chúis le hionfhabhtú géar riospráide ar sicíní ceansaithe.

translation.en: In the 1940s, two more animal coronaviruses, mouse hepatitis virus (mhv) and transmissible gastroenteritis virus (tgev), were isolated.human coronaviruses were discovered in the 1960s.
translation.ga: Sna 1940idí, bhí dhá choróivíreas ainmhithe eile, víreas heipitíteas luch (mhv) agus víreas gastroenteritis in-tarchurtha (tgev) scoite amach. Thángthas ar coronaviruses daonnúla sna 1960idí.

translation.en: The earliest ones studied were from human patients with the common cold, which were later named human coronavirus 229e and human coronavirus oc43.
translation.ga: Tháinig na cinn is luaithe a ndearnadh staidéar orthu ó othair dhaonna a raibh an slaghdán coitianta orthu, ar a tugadh coronavirus daonna 229e ina dhiaidh sin agus coronavirus daonna oc43.

translation.en: They were first imaged by scottish virologist june almeida at st. thomas hospital in london.
translation.ga: Rinne virologist na halban june almeida iad a íomháú ar dtús in ospidéal naomh muire. Thomas i londain.

translation.en: Other human coronaviruses have since been identified, including sars-cov in 2003, hcov nl63 in 2004, hku1 in 2005, mers-cov in 2012, and sars-cov-2 in 2019.
translation.ga: Aithníodh coronaviruses daonna eile ó shin, lena n-áirítear sars-cov i 2003, hcov nl63 i 2004, hku1 i 2005, mers-cov in 2012, agus sars-cov-2 in 2019.

translation.en: Most of these have involved serious respiratory tract infections.
translation.ga: Ba ionfhabhtuithe tromchúiseacha conaire riospráide an chuid is mó díobh seo.

translation.en: The name was first used in 1968 by an informal group of virologists in the journal nature to designate the new family of viruses.
translation.ga: D' úsáid grúpa neamhfhoirmiúil víreolaithe an t-ainm den chéad uair i 1968 chun an teaghlach nua víris a ainmniú.

translation.en: The name refers to the characteristic appearance of virions (the infective form of the virus) by electron microscopy, which have a fringe of large, bulbous surface projections creating an image reminiscent of a crown or of a solar corona.
translation.ga: Tagraíonn an t-ainm do chuma tréith virions (foirm thógálach an víris) trí mhicreascópacht leictreon, a bhfuil imeall réamh-mheastacháin bulging mhóra ar an dromchla ag cruthú íomhá a mheabhraíonn coróin nó corónach gréine.

translation.en: This morphology is created by the viral spike peplomers, which are proteins on the surface of the virus.
translation.ga: Cruthaítear an mhoirfeolaíocht seo ag na peplomers spike víreasacha, ar próitéiní iad ar dhromchla an víris.

translation.en: Coronaviruses are large pleomorphic spherical particles with bulbous surface projections.
translation.ga: Is cáithníní sféarúla pleomorfacha móra iad coronaviruses le réamh-mheastacháin dromchla bulbous.

translation.en: The envelope of the virus in electron micrographs appears as a distinct pair of electron dense shells.the viral envelope consists of a lipid bilayer where the membrane (m), envelope (e) and spike (s) structural proteins are anchored.
translation.ga: Is cosúil gur péire ar leith de bhlaosc dlúth leictreon é clúdach an víris i micreagraif leictreon. Is éard atá sa chlúdach víreasach diuretic lipid ina bhfuil próitéiní struchtúracha an membrane (m), an clúdach (e) agus an spíce (s) ar ancaire.

translation.en: The lipid bilayer envelope, membrane proteins, and nucleocapsid protect the virus when it is outside the host cell.
translation.ga: Cosnaíonn an clúdach bilayer lipid, próitéiní membrane, agus nucleocapsid an víreas nuair a bhíonn sé lasmuigh den chill óstach.

translation.en: Coronaviruses contain a positive-sense, single-stranded rna genome.
translation.ga: Tá géanóm rna aon-shnáithe ann le tuiscint dhearfach.

translation.en: The genome size for coronaviruses ranges from 26.4 to 31.7 kilobases.
translation.ga: Tá méid an ghéanóim do coronaviruses ó 26.4 go 31.7 cileavata.

translation.en: The genome size is one of the largest among rna viruses.
translation.ga: Tá méid an ghéanóim ar cheann de na cinn is mó i measc víris rna.

translation.en: The open reading frames 1a and 1b, which occupy the first two-thirds of the genome, encode the replicase / transcriptase polyprotein.
translation.ga: Ionchódaíonn na frámaí léitheoireachta oscailte 1a agus 1b, a áitíonn an chéad dá thrian den ghéanóma, an macasamhail / polapróitéin tras-scríofa.

translation.en: The replicase / transcriptase polyprotein self cleaves to form nonstructural proteins.the later reading frames encode the four major structural proteins: Spike, envelope, membrane, and nucleocapsid.
translation.ga: Glanann na polapróitéin féin macasamhla / athscríbhinní chun próitéiní neamhstruchtúrtha a fhoirmiú. Ionchódaíonn na frámaí léitheoireachta níos déanaí na ceithre mhór-phróitéin struchtúracha: Spíce, clúdach, membrane, agus núicléapíd.

translation.en: Interspersed between these reading frames are the reading frames for the accessory proteins.
translation.ga: Cuimsíonn na frámaí léitheoireachta seo na frámaí léitheoireachta do na próitéiní cúlpháirtí.

translation.en: The number of accessory proteins and their function is unique depending on the specific coronavirus.
translation.ga: Braitheann líon na próitéiní cúlpháirtí agus a bhfeidhm uathúil ar an coronavirus ar leith.

translation.en: Infection begins when the viral spike (s) glycoprotein attaches to its complementary host cell receptor.
translation.ga: Tosaíonn an t-ionfhabhtú nuair a ghabhann an glycoprotein spíce víreasach (s) lena ghabhdóir cille óstach comhlántach.

translation.en: After attachment, a protease of the host cell cleaves and activates the receptor-attached spike protein.
translation.ga: Tar éis é a cheangal, déanann protease den chill óstach an próitéin spíce atá ceangailte leis an receptor a ghlanadh agus a ghníomhachtú.

translation.en: Depending on the host cell protease available, cleavage and activation allows the virus to enter the host cell by endocytosis or direct fusion of the viral envelop with the host membrane.on entry into the host cell, the virus particle is uncoated, and its genome enters the cell cytoplasm.
translation.ga: Ag brath ar an protease cille óstach atá ar fáil, ceadaíonn scoilteachta agus gníomhachtú don víreas dul isteach sa chill óstach trí endocytosis nó an clúdach víreasach a chomhleá go díreach leis an membrane óstach. Nuair a théann sé isteach sa chill óstach, tá an cáithnín víris neamh-brataithe, agus téann a géanóm isteach. an cíteaplasma cille.

translation.en: The host ribosome translates the initial overlapping open reading frame of the virus genome and forms a long polyprotein.
translation.ga: Déanann an ribosóim óstach fráma léitheoireachta oscailte forluí ghéanóm an víris a thras-aistriú agus cruthaíonn sé polapróitéin fhada.

translation.en: The polyprotein has its own proteases which cleave the polyprotein into multiple nonstructural proteins.
translation.ga: Tá a phróitéiní féin ag an bpolapróitéin a ghlanann an polapróitéin i iliomad próitéiní neamhstruchtúrtha.

translation.en: A number of the nonstructural proteins coalesce to form a multi-protein replicase-transcriptase complex (rtc).
translation.ga: Comhcheanglaíonn roinnt de na próitéiní neamhstruchtúrtha chun coimpléasc tras-scríbhinn-choimpléascach neamhsháithithe (rtc) a dhéanamh.

translation.en: The main replicase-transcriptase protein is the rna-dependent rna polymerase (rdrp).
translation.ga: Is é an príomh-phróitéin macasamhail-transcriptase polaiméaráise rna atá spleách ar rna (rdrp).

translation.en: It is directly involved in the replication and transcription of rna from an rna strand.
translation.ga: Tá baint dhíreach aige le macasamhlú agus trascríobh rna ó shnáithe rna.

translation.en: The other nonstructural proteins in the complex assist in the replication and transcription process.
translation.ga: Cuidíonn na próitéiní neamhstruchtúrtha eile sa choimpléasc leis an bpróiseas macasamhlaithe agus trascríobh.

translation.en: The exoribonuclease nonstructural protein, for instance, provides extra fidelity to replication by providing a proofreading function which the rna-dependent rna polymerase lacks.one of the main functions of the complex is to replicate the viral genome.
translation.ga: Soláthraíonn an exoribonuclease próitéin neamhstruchtúrtha, mar shampla, dílseacht bhreise don mhacasamhlú trí fheidhm phróifílithe a sholáthar nach bhfuil ag an bpolaiméaráise atá spleách ar rna. Ceann de phríomhfheidhmeanna an choimpléasc is ea an géanóm víreasach a mhacasamhlú.

translation.en: Rdrp directly mediates the synthesis of negative-sense genomic rna from the positive-sense genomic rna.
translation.ga: Déanann rdrp idirghabháil go díreach ar shintéis rna géanóm céadfach-diúltach ón ngéanóm rna céadfach-céadfach.

translation.en: This is followed by the replication of positive-sense genomic rna from the negative-sense genomic rna.
translation.ga: Déantar macasamhlú rna géanóm dearfach ansin ón rna géanóm diúltach-chiall.

translation.en: The other important function of the complex is to transcribe the viral genome.
translation.ga: Feidhm thábhachtach eile den choimpléasc is ea trascríobh an ghéanóim víreasach.

translation.en: Rdrp directly mediates the synthesis of negative-sense subgenomic rna molecules from the positive-sense genomic rna.
translation.ga: Déanann rdrp idirghabháil go díreach ar shintéis na móilíní rna subgenómacha de chiall dhiúltach ón rna géanóm dearfach-chiall.

translation.en: This is followed by the transcription of these negative-sense subgenomic rna molecules to their corresponding positive-sense mrnas.
translation.ga: Déantar na móilíní rna céadfacha-diúltacha seo a thras-scríobh ina dhiaidh sin chuig a mrnanna céadfacha comhfhreagracha.

translation.en: The replicated positive-sense genomic rna becomes the genome of the progeny viruses.
translation.ga: Macasamhlaíonn an géanóm rna tuiscint dhearfach mar ghéanóma na víris sliocht.

translation.en: The mrnas are gene transcripts of the last third of the virus genome after the initial overlapping reading frame.
translation.ga: Is athscríbhinní géine iad mrnanna den tríú deireanach de ghéanóm an víris tar éis an fhráma léitheoireachta forluí tosaigh.

translation.en: These mrnas are translated by the host's ribosomes into the structural proteins and a number of accessory proteins.
translation.ga: Tiontaíonn na ribosóim óstacha na mrnanna seo ina bpróitéiní struchtúracha agus i roinnt próitéiní cúlpháirtí.

translation.en: Rna translation occurs inside the endoplasmic reticulum.
translation.ga: Tarlaíonn aistriúchán rna taobh istigh den reitine endoplasmach.

translation.en: The viral structural proteins s, e, and m move along the secretory pathway into the golgi intermediate compartment.
translation.ga: Bogann na próitéiní struchtúracha víreasacha s, e, agus m feadh an chosáin rúnda isteach in urrann idirmheánach golgi.

translation.en: There, the m proteins direct most protein-protein interactions required for assembly of viruses following its binding to the nucleocapsid.
translation.ga: Ansin díríonn na próitéiní m ar an gcuid is mó de na hidirghníomhaíochtaí próitéine-próitéine atá riachtanach chun víris a chur le chéile tar éis iad a cheangal leis an núicléapíd.

translation.en: Progeny viruses are then released from the host cell by exocytosis through secretory vesicles.
translation.ga: Ansin scaoiltear víris protogeny ón gcill óstach trí exocytosis trí veicilíní rúnda.

translation.en: The interaction of the coronavirus spike protein with its complement host cell receptor is central in determining the tissue tropism, infectivity, and species range of the virus.
translation.ga: Tá idirghníomhaíocht an phróitéin coronavirus spike lena ghabhdóir óstach cille comhlántach lárnach chun raon trófach fíocháin, ionfhabhtaithe agus raon speiceas an víris a chinneadh.

translation.en: The sars coronavirus, for example, infects human cells by attaching to the angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ace2) receptor.
translation.ga: Déanann an sars coronavirus, mar shampla, ionfhabhtú ar chealla daonna trí cheangal leis an receptor einsím 2 a thiontaíonn angiotensin (ace2).

translation.en: The scientific name for coronavirus is orthocoronavirinae or coronavirinae.
translation.ga: Is é an t-ainm eolaíoch do coronavirus orthocoronavirinae nó coronavirinae.

translation.en: Coronaviruses belong to the family of coronaviridae, order nidovirales, and realm riboviria.
translation.ga: Baineann coronaviruses leis an teaghlach coronaviridae, forordaíonn nidovirales, agus réimse riboviria.

translation.en: Genus betacoronavirus; type species: Murine coronavirus
translation.ga: Géineas betacoronavirus; speiceas de chineál: Murine coronavirus

translation.en: Species: Betacoronavirus 1 (bovine coronavirus, human coronavirus oc43), human coronavirus hku1, murine coronavirus, pipistrellus bat coronavirus hku5, rousettus bat coronavirus hku9, severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus (sars-cov, sars-cov-2), tylonycteris bat coronavirus hku4, middle east respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus, hedgehog coronavirus 1 (ericov)
translation.ga: Speicis coronavirus ialtóg hku4, coronavirus siondróm riospráide an mheánoirthir, coronavirus gráinneog 1 (ericov)

translation.en: Species: Beluga whale coronavirus sw1, infectious bronchitis virus
translation.ga: Speicis: Coronavirus míolta móra beluga sw1, víreas bronchitis tógálach

translation.en: The most recent common ancestor (mrca) of all coronaviruses is estimated to have existed as recently as 8000 bce, although some models place the common ancestor as far back as 55 million years or more, implying long term coevolution with bat and avian species.
translation.ga: Meastar go dtéann an sinsear coitianta is déanaí (mrca) de gach coróivíreas chomh fada le 8000 bce, cé go dtéann roinnt samhlacha den ghnáth-sinsear siar chomh fada le 55 milliún bliain nó níos mó, rud a thugann le tuiscint go bhfuil comhéifeacht fadtéarmach ialtóg agus éanúil ann speicis.

translation.en: The most recent common ancestor of the alphacoronavirus line has been placed at about 2400 bce, the betacoronavirus line at 3300 bce, the gammacoronavirus line at 2800 bce, and the deltacoronavirus line at about 3000 bce.
translation.ga: Is é an sinsear coitianta is déanaí den líne alfa-víreas ag thart ar 2400 bce, an líne betacoronavirus ag 3300 bce, an líne gammacoronavirus ag 2800 bce, agus an líne deltacoronavirus ag thart ar 3000 bce.

translation.en: The large number of host bat and avian species, and their global range, has enabled extensive evolution and dissemination of coronaviruses.many human coronavirus have their origin in bats.
translation.ga: Chuir líon mór na speiceas óstach ialtóg agus éanúil, agus a raon domhanda, ar chumas éabhlóid agus leathadh forleathan coronaviruses. Tá bunús a lán de na coronavirus daonna i sciatháin leathair.

translation.en: More recently, alpaca coronavirus and human coronavirus 229e diverged sometime before 1960.
translation.ga: Níos déanaí, rinneadh coronavirus alpaca agus coronavirus daonna 229e a leithlisiú tamall roimh 1960.

translation.en: Mers-cov emerged in humans from bats through the intermediate host of camels.
translation.ga: Tháinig mers-cov i ndaoine ó ialtóga trí óstach idirmheánach na hiománaíochta.

translation.en: Mers-cov, although related to several bat coronavirus species, appears to have diverged from these several centuries ago.
translation.ga: Dealraíonn sé gur imigh mers-cov, cé go raibh baint aige le roinnt speiceas coronavirus ialtóg, as seo roinnt céadta bliain ó shin.

translation.en: The most closely related bat coronavirus and sars-cov diverged in 1986.
translation.ga: Rinne an coronavirus ialtóg is dlúithe agus sars-cov difreáil i 1986.

translation.en: A possible path of evolution, of sars coronavirus and keen bat coronaviruses, suggests that sars related coronaviruses coevolved in bats for a long time.
translation.ga: Tugann cosán éabhlóideach a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith ann, de coronavirus sars agus coronaviruses ialtóg éanúil, le tuiscint gur cuireadh corvovirus a bhaineann le sars le chéile in ialtóga le fada an lá.

translation.en: In the 1790s, equine coronavirus diverged from the bovine coronavirus after a cross-species jump.
translation.ga: Sna 1790idí, chuaigh coronavirus eachaí ón coronavirus bó-ainmhithe tar éis léim tras-speicis.

translation.en: Later in the 1890s, human coronavirus oc43 diverged from bovine coronavirus after another cross-species spillover event.
translation.ga: Níos déanaí sna 1890idí, d ’ imigh an coronavirus daonna oc43 ó coronavirus bó-ainmhithe tar éis eachtra tionchair tras-speicis eile.

translation.en: It is speculated that the flu pandemic of 1890 may have been caused by this spillover event, and not by the influenza virus, because of the related timing, neurological symptoms, and unknown causative agent of the pandemic.
translation.ga: Tá tuairimíocht ann go bhféadfadh paindéim fliú 1890 a bheith mar chúis leis an teagmhas iarmhartach seo, agus ní mar gheall ar víreas fliú, mar gheall ar an uainiú a ghabhann leis, comharthaí néareolaíocha, agus gníomhaire cúiseach anaithnid an phaindéim.

translation.en: Human coronavirus oc43 besides causing respiratory infections is also suspected of playing a role in neurological diseases.
translation.ga: Tá amhras ann freisin go bhfuil ról ag corovirus daonna oc43 seachas ionfhabhtuithe riospráide i galair néareolaíocha a chur faoi deara.

translation.en: In the 1950s, the human coronavirus oc43 began to diverge into its present genotypes.
translation.ga: Sna 1950idí, thosaigh an coronavirus daonna oc43 ag dul isteach sna géinitíopaí reatha.

translation.en: Phylogentically, mouse hepatitis virus (murine coronavirus), which infects the mouse's liver and the central nervous system, is related to human coronavirus oc43 and bovine coronavirus.
translation.ga: Go húsáideach, tá baint ag víreas heipitíteas luch (murine coronavirus), a dhéanann ionfhabhtú ar ae na luiche agus ar an néarchóras lárnach, le coronavirus daonna oc43 agus coronavirus bó.

translation.en: Human coronavirus hku1, like the aforementioned viruses, also has its origins in rodents.
translation.ga: Is creimirí iad bunús coronavirus hku1 an duine, cosúil leis na víris a luaitear thuas.

translation.en: Coronaviruses vary significantly in risk factor.
translation.ga: Athraíonn an fachtóir riosca go mór i measc coronaviruses.

translation.en: Some can kill more than 30% of those infected, such as mers-cov, and some are relatively harmless, such as the common cold.
translation.ga: Féadann cuid acu níos mó ná 30% díobh siúd atá ionfhabhtaithe a mharú, mar shampla mers-cov, agus tá cuid acu neamhdhíobhálach go leor, amhail an fhuacht coitianta.

translation.en: Coronaviruses can cause colds with major symptoms, such as fever, and a sore throat from swollen adenoids.
translation.ga: Is féidir le coronaviruses slaghdáin a bhfuil comharthaí troma orthu mar fhiabhras, agus scornach tinn ó adenoidí ata.

translation.en: Coronaviruses can cause pneumonia (either direct viral pneumonia or secondary bacterial pneumonia) and bronchitis (either direct viral bronchitis or secondary bacterial bronchitis).
