translation.ga: Is féidir le coronaviruses niúmóine (niúmóine víreasach díreach nó niúmóine baictéarach tánaisteach) agus bronchitis (bronchitis víreasach díreach nó bronchitis baictéarach tánaisteach) a chur faoi deara.

translation.en: The human coronavirus discovered in 2003, sars-cov, which causes severe acute respiratory syndrome (sars), has a unique pathogenesis because it causes both upper and lower respiratory tract infections.six species of human coronaviruses are known, with one species subdivided into two different strains, making seven strains of human coronaviruses altogether.
translation.ga: Tá pataigineacht uathúil ag an coronavirus daonna a aimsíodh i 2003, sars-cov, is cúis le siondróm riospráide riospráide géarmhíochaine (sars), toisc go bhfuil sé ina chúis le hionfhabhtuithe sa chonair riospráide uachtarach agus íochtarach. Tá speicis coronaviruses daonna ar eolas, agus tá speiceas amháin roinnte ina dhá shraith dhifriúla, ag déanamh seacht dtréimhse de choróivíris daonna san iomlán.

translation.en: Four of these coronaviruses continually circulate in the human population and produce the generally mild symptoms of the common cold in adults and children worldwide: -oc43, -hku1, hcov-229e, -nl63.
translation.ga: Scaipeann ceithre cinn de na coronaviruses seo go leanúnach i ndaonra an duine agus cruthaíonn siad comharthaí éadroma den fhuacht coitianta i measc daoine fásta agus leanaí ar fud an domhain: -oc43, -hku1, hcov-229e, -nl63.

translation.en: Coronaviruses cause about 15% of commons colds.
translation.ga: Is cúis le corovirus thart ar 15% de na slaghdáin choitianta.

translation.en: The majority of colds are caused by rhinoviruses.
translation.ga: Rhinoviruses is cúis leis an gcuid is mó de na slaghdáin.

translation.en: The four mild coronaviruses have a seasonal incidence occurring in the winter months in temperate climates.
translation.ga: Bíonn minicíocht séasúrach ag na ceithre choróin víreasacha éadroma i míonna an gheimhridh i aeráidí measartha.

translation.en: There is no preference towards a particular season in tropical climates.
translation.ga: Níl aon rogha séasúir ar leith in aeráidí trópaiceacha.

translation.en: Four human coronaviruses produce symptoms that are generally mild:
translation.ga: Cruthaíonn ceithre choróivíreas daonna comharthaí atá éadrom go ginearálta:

translation.en: The virus was officially named the sars coronavirus (sars-cov).
translation.ga: Ainmníodh an víreas go hoifigiúil mar sars coronavirus (sars-cov).

translation.en: More than 8,000 people were infected, about ten percent of whom died.
translation.ga: Bhí níos mó ná 8,000 duine ionfhabhtaithe, agus fuair thart ar deich faoin gcéad díobh bás.

translation.en: In september 2012, a new type of coronavirus was identified, initially called novel coronavirus 2012, and now officially named middle east respiratory syndrome coronavirus (mers-cov).
translation.ga: I mí mheán fómhair 2012, sainaithníodh cineál nua coronavirus, ar a tugadh novel coronavirus 2012 ar dtús, agus ainmníodh go hoifigiúil anois coronavirus siondróm riospráide riospráide an mheánoirthir (mers-cov).

translation.en: The world health organization issued a global alert soon after.
translation.ga: D' eisigh an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte foláireamh domhanda go gairid ina dhiaidh sin.

translation.en: The who update on 28 september 2012 said the virus did not seem to pass easily from person to person.
translation.ga: Dúradh i nuashonrú who an 28 meán fómhair 2012 nár chosúil go rithfeadh an víreas go héasca ó dhuine go duine.

translation.en: However, on 12 may 2013, a case of human-to-human transmission in france was confirmed by the french ministry of social affairs and health.
translation.ga: Ar 12 bealtaine 2013, áfach, dhearbhaigh aireacht gnóthaí sóisialta agus sláinte na fraince cás atreoraithe duine le duine sa fhrainc.

translation.en: In addition, cases of human-to-human transmission were reported by the ministry of health in tunisia.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, thuairiscigh an aireacht sláinte cásanna atreoruithe duine-le-duine sa túinéis.

translation.en: Two confirmed cases involved people who seemed to have caught the disease from their late father, who became ill after a visit to qatar and saudi arabia.
translation.ga: Bhain dhá chás dearbhaithe le daoine ar chosúil go bhfuair siad an galar óna n-athair nach maireann, a tháinig tinn tar éis cuairte ar catar agus ar an araib shádach.

translation.en: Despite this, it appears the virus had trouble spreading from human to human, as most individuals who are infected do not transmit the virus.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, is cosúil go raibh trioblóid ag an víreas scaipeadh ó dhuine go duine, toisc nach dtarchuireann mórchuid na ndaoine atá ionfhabhtaithe an víreas.

translation.en: The final name for the virus is middle east respiratory syndrome coronavirus (mers-cov).
translation.ga: Is é siondróm riospráide an mheánoirthir (mers-cov) an t-ainm deireanach don víreas coronavirus.

translation.en: The only u.s. cases (both survived) were recorded in may 2014.in may 2015, an outbreak of mers-cov occurred in the republic of korea, when a man who had traveled to the middle east, visited four hospitals in the seoul area to treat his illness.
translation.ga: Níor taifeadadh ach cásanna sam (ar mhair an dá cheann acu) i mbealtaine 2014. I mbealtaine 2015, tharla ráig de mers-cov i bpoblacht na cóiré, nuair a thug fear a bhí ag taisteal go dtí an meánoirthear cuairt ar cheithre ospidéal i gceantar seoul chun cóir leighis a chur air tinneas.

translation.en: This caused one of the largest outbreaks of mers-cov outside the middle east.
translation.ga: Ba chúis leis seo ceann de na ráigeanna is mó de mers-cov lasmuigh den mheánoirthear.

translation.en: As of december 2019, 2,468 cases of mers-cov infection had been confirmed by laboratory tests, 851 of which were fatal, a mortality rate of approximately 34.5%.
translation.ga: Amhail nollaig 2019, bhí tástálacha saotharlainne deimhnithe ar 2,468 cás d ’ ionfhabhtú mers-cov, a raibh 851 díobh marfach, ráta básmhaireachta de thart ar 34.5%.

translation.en: In december 2019, a pneumonia outbreak was reported in wuhan, china.
translation.ga: I mí na nollag 2019, tuairiscíodh ráig de niúmóine i wuhan, an tsín.

translation.en: On 31 december 2019, the outbreak was traced to a novel strain of coronavirus, which was given the interim name 2019-ncov by the world health organization (who), later renamed sars-cov-2 by the international committee on taxonomy of viruses.
translation.ga: An 31 nollaig 2019, rinneadh an ráig a rianú ar bhrú nua coronavirus, a thug an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte (who) an t-ainm eatramhach 2019-ncov, a athainmníodh ina dhiaidh sin sars-cov-2 ag an gcoiste idirnáisiúnta um thacsanomaíocht víreas.

translation.en: Some researchers have suggested the huanan seafood wholesale market may not be the original source of viral transmission to humans.as of 17 april 2020, there have been at least 153,822 confirmed deaths and more than 2,240,191 confirmed cases in the coronavirus pneumonia pandemic.
translation.ga: Thug roinnt taighdeoirí le fios go mb ’ fhéidir nach é margadh mórdhíola bia mara na hungáire an bunfhoinse tarchuir víreasach chuig daoine. Amhail an 17 aibreán, 2020, dearbhaíodh 153,822 bás ar a laghad agus dearbhaíodh níos mó ná 2,240,191 cás i bpaindéim niúmóine coronavirus.

translation.en: The wuhan strain has been identified as a new strain of betacoronavirus from group 2b with approximately 70% genetic similarity to the sars-cov.
translation.ga: Tá an brú wuhan aitheanta mar bhrú nua de betacoronavirus ó ghrúpa 2b a bhfuil cosúlacht ghéiniteach thart ar 70% leis an sars-cov.

translation.en: The virus has a 96% similarity to a bat coronavirus, so it is widely suspected to originate from bats as well.
translation.ga: Tá an víreas 96% cosúil le coronavirus ialtóg, mar sin tá amhras forleathan ann gur ó ialtóga é freisin.

translation.en: The pandemic has resulted in travel restrictions and nationwide lockdowns in several countries.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh ar an bpaindéim tá srianta taistil agus frithdhúnadh ar fud na tíre i roinnt tíortha.

translation.en: Coronaviruses have been recognized as causing pathological conditions in veterinary medicine since the 1930s.
translation.ga: Tá sé ar eolas go bhfuil coróivíris ina gcúis le coinníollacha paiteolaíocha i míochaine tréidliachta ó na 1930idí.

translation.en: Except for avian infectious bronchitis, the major related diseases have mainly an intestinal location.
translation.ga: Seachas bronchitis tógálach éanúil, tá suíomh intestinal den chuid is mó ag na mór-ghalair bhainteacha.

translation.en: Coronaviruses primarily infect the upper respiratory and gastrointestinal tract of mammals and birds.
translation.ga: Den chuid is mó ionfhabhtaíonn coronaviruses an conradh riospráide agus gastrointestinal uachtarach de mhamaigh agus éin.

translation.en: They also cause a range of diseases in farm animals and domesticated pets, some of which can be serious and are a threat to the farming industry.
translation.ga: Cruthaíonn siad raon galair in ainmhithe feirme agus peataí ceansaithe freisin, agus d ’ fhéadfadh cuid acu a bheith tromchúiseach agus ina mbagairt don tionscal feirmeoireachta.

translation.en: In chickens, the infectious bronchitis virus (ibv), a coronavirus, targets not only the respiratory tract but also the urogenital tract.
translation.ga: I sicíní, díríonn an víreas bronchitis tógálach (ibv), coronavirus, ní amháin ar an gconair riospráide ach ar an gconair urogenital freisin.

translation.en: The virus can spread to different organs throughout the chicken.
translation.ga: Is féidir leis an víreas scaipeadh chuig orgáin éagsúla ar fud an sicín.

translation.en: Economically significant coronaviruses of farm animals include porcine coronavirus (transmissible gastroenteritis coronavirus, tge) and bovine coronavirus, which both result in diarrhea in young animals.
translation.ga: I measc coróivíris atá suntasach ó thaobh an gheilleagair d ’ ainmhithe feirme tá coronavirus muc (gastroenteritis coróivíreas in-tarchurtha, tge) agus coronavirus bó, a chuireann buinneach in ainmhithe óga.

translation.en: Feline coronavirus: Two forms, feline enteric coronavirus is a pathogen of minor clinical significance, but spontaneous mutation of this virus can result in feline infectious peritonitis (fip), a disease associated with high mortality.
translation.ga: Coronavirus feline: Dhá fhoirm, is pataigin a bhfuil tábhacht chliniciúil bheag ag baint le coronavirus feline enteric, ach d ’ fhéadfadh peritonitis tógálach feline (fip) a bheith mar thoradh ar sóchán spontáineach an víris seo, galar a bhaineann le básmhaireacht ard.

translation.en: Similarly, there are two types of coronavirus that infect ferrets: Ferret enteric coronavirus causes a gastrointestinal syndrome known as epizootic catarrhal enteritis (ece), and a more lethal systemic version of the virus (like fip in cats) known as ferret systemic coronavirus (fsc).
translation.ga: Ar an gcaoi chéanna, tá dhá chineál coronavirus ann a ionfhabhtaíonn ferrets: Mar thoradh ar shiondróm gastraistéigeach ar a dtugtar enteritis catarrhal epizootic (ece) tá coróivíreas ferret enteric, agus leagan sistéamach níos marfach den víreas (cosúil le fip i gcait). Coronavirus sistéamach ferret (fsc).

translation.en: There are two types of canine coronavirus (ccov), one that causes mild gastrointestinal disease and one that has been found to cause respiratory disease.
translation.ga: Tá dhá chineál coronavirus canine (ccov) ann, ceann is cúis le galar gastrointestinal éadrom agus ceann a bhfuarthas amach go bhfuil sé ina chúis le galar riospráide.

translation.en: Mouse hepatitis virus (mhv) is a coronavirus that causes an epidemic murine illness with high mortality, especially among colonies of laboratory mice.
translation.ga: Is coronavirus é víreas heipitíteas luiche (mhv) a chuireann le breoiteacht murine eipidéim le básmhaireacht ard, go háirithe i measc coilíneachtaí i lucha saotharlainne.

translation.en: Sialodacryoadenitis virus (sdav) is highly infectious coronavirus of laboratory rats, which can be transmitted between individuals by direct contact and indirectly by aerosol.
translation.ga: Is éard atá sa víreas sialodacryoadenitis (sdav) ná coronavirus an-tógálach de francaigh saotharlainne, ar féidir é a tharchur idir dhaoine aonair trí theagmháil dhíreach agus indíreach le haerasóil.

translation.en: Some strains of mhv cause a progressive demyelinating encephalitis in mice which has been used as a murine model for multiple sclerosis.
translation.ga: Tá roinnt cineálacha mhv ina gcúis le einceifilíteas dí-íograithe forásach i lucha a úsáideadh mar mhúnla murine le haghaidh scléaróis iolrach.

translation.en: Significant research efforts have been focused on elucidating the viral pathogenesis of these animal coronaviruses, especially by virologists interested in veterinary and zoonotic diseases.
translation.ga: Dhírigh iarrachtaí suntasacha taighde ar phataiginéime víreasach na coronaviruses ainmhithe seo a shoiléiriú, go háirithe ag víreolaithe ar spéis leo galair tréidliachta agus zónóiseacha.

translation.en: Porcine coronavirus (transmissible gastroenteritis coronavirus of pigs, tgev).
translation.ga: Víreas an cholera muiceola (gastroenteritis coronavirus muc-in-tarchurtha, tgev).

translation.en: Bovine coronavirus (bcv), responsible for severe profuse enteritis in of young calves.
translation.ga: Víreas choroid bó-ainmhithe (bcv), atá freagrach as géar-enteritis laonna óga.

translation.en: Feline coronavirus (fcov) causes mild enteritis in cats as well as severe feline infectious peritonitis (other variants of the same virus).
translation.ga: Is cúis le víreas an cholera feline (fcov) enteritis éadrom i gcait chomh maith le peritonitis tógálach dian feline (leaganacha eile den víreas céanna).

translation.en: The two types of canine coronavirus (ccov) (one causing enteritis, the other found in respiratory diseases).
translation.ga: An dá chineál coronavirus canine (ccov) (ceann amháin is cúis le enteritis, agus an ceann eile le fáil i galair riospráide).

translation.en: Turkey coronavirus (tcv) causes enteritis in turkeys.
translation.ga: Is cúis le coronavirus tuircis (tcv) enteritis i dturcaithe.

translation.en: Ferret enteric coronavirus causes epizootic catarrhal enteritis in ferrets.
translation.ga: Is cúis le coronavirus ferret enteric enteritis catarrhal epizootic i ferrets.

translation.en: Ferret systemic coronavirus causes fip-like systemic syndrome in ferrets.
translation.ga: Is cúis le coronavirus sistéamach ferret siondróm sistéamach cosúil le fip i bhfoirne.

translation.en: Rabbit enteric coronavirus causes acute gastrointestinal disease and diarrhea in young european rabbits.
translation.ga: Is cúis le coronavirus enteric coinín galar géarmhíochaine gastrointestinal agus buinneach i gcoiníní óga na heorpa.

translation.en: Porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (ped or pedv), has emerged around the world.
translation.ga: Tá víreas buinneach eipidéim muc (ped nó pedv), tagtha chun cinn ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: Rapidly increasing cumulative incidence of coronavirus disease (covid-19) in the european union / european economic area and the united kingdom, 1 january to 15 march 2020
translation.ga: Minicíocht charnach an ghalair coronavirus (covid-19) atá ag méadú go tapa san aontas eorpach / limistéar eacnamaíoch eorpach agus sa ríocht aontaithe, 1 eanáir go 15 márta 2020

translation.en: The cumulative incidence of coronavirus disease (covid-19) cases is showing similar trends in european union / european economic area countries and the united kingdom confirming that, while at a different stage depending on the country, the covid-19 pandemic is progressing rapidly in all countries.
translation.ga: Tá minicíocht charnach an ghalair coronavirus (covid-19) ag taispeáint treochtaí comhchosúla i dtíortha an aontais eorpaigh / limistéar eacnamaíoch na heorpa agus an ra ag dearbhú, cé go bhfuil sé ag céim dhifriúil ag brath ar an tír, go bhfuil an paindéim covid -19 ag dul chun cinn go gasta i ngach tír.

translation.en: Based on the experience from italy, countries, hospitals and intensive care units should increase their preparedness for a surge of patients with covid-19 who will require healthcare, and in particular intensive care.
translation.ga: Bunaithe ar an taithí ón iodáil, ba cheart do thíortha, ospidéil agus aonaid dianchúraim a n-ullmhacht a mhéadú le haghaidh borradh othar le covid-19 a mbeidh cúram sláinte de dhíth orthu, agus go háirithe dianchúram.

translation.en: On 31 december 2019, a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown aetiology was reported in wuhan, hubei province, china.
translation.ga: An 31 nollaig, 2019, tuairiscíodh braisle de chásanna niúmóine de phaiteolaíocht anaithnid i wuhan, cúige hubei, an tsín.

translation.en: On 9 january 2020, the china center for disease control and prevention reported the causative agent as being a novel coronavirus now referred to as severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (sars-cov-2).
translation.ga: Ar 9 eanáir, 2020, thuairiscigh ionad na síne um rialú agus cosc ar ghalair go bhfuil an gníomhaire cúiseach anois ina ghníomhaire corónach nua de shiondróm riospráide géarmhíochaine galar artaire corónach 2 (sars-cov-2).

translation.en: Since, the illness resulting from sars-cov-2 infection has been named coronavirus disease (covid-19).
translation.ga: Ó shin i leith, ainmníodh an tinneas a eascraíonn as ionfhabhtú sars-cov-2 mar ghalar coronavirus (covid-19).

translation.en: Evidence to date is that ca 80% of individuals with covid-19 have a mild disease, i.e. a respiratory tract infection with or without pneumonia, and most of these recover.
translation.ga: Is í an fhianaise go dtí seo ná go bhfuil galar éadrom ag thart ar 80% de dhaoine aonair a bhfuil covid-19 orthu, ie ionfhabhtú an chonair riospráide le niúmóine nó gan é, agus tagann an chuid is mó díobh seo arís.

translation.en: In ca 14% cases, covid-19 develops into a more severe disease requiring hospitalisation while the remaining 6% cases experience critical illness requiring intensive care.
translation.ga: I thart ar 14% de na cásanna, forbraíonn covid-19 go galar níos déine a éilíonn dul san ospidéal agus teastaíonn breoiteacht chriticiúil ón 6% eile de na cásanna a dteastaíonn dianchúram uathu.

translation.en: The mortality of patients hospitalised due to covid-19 is ca 4%.
translation.ga: Tá básmhaireacht othar san ospidéal de bharr covid-19 thart ar 4%.

translation.en: In this study, we assess the trends in the cumulative incidence of covid-19 in each european union / european economic area (eu / eea) country and the united kingdom (uk) and compare them to that of hubei province, china.
translation.ga: Sa staidéar seo, déanaimid measúnú ar na treochtaí i minicíocht charnach covid-19 i ngach tír san aontas eorpach / limistéar eacnamaíoch eorpach (ae / lee) agus sa ríocht aontaithe (ra) agus déanaimid comparáid idir iad agus treocht chúige hubei, an tsín..

translation.en: We also compare the current number of covid-19 cases in eu / eea countries and the uk with that in italy during 31 january – 15 march 2020.
translation.ga: Déanaimid comparáid freisin idir líon reatha na gcásanna covid-19 i dtíortha ae / lee agus na ríochta aontaithe leis an líon san iodáil le linn 31 eanáir - 15 márta 2020.

translation.en: Covid-19 cases in eu / eea countries and the uk
translation.ga: Cásanna covid-19 i dtíortha ae / lee agus sa ríocht aontaithe

translation.en: Subsequent to china, covid-19 underwent further geographical spread and the dynamic of the covid-19 pandemic in the rest of the world currently follows that of this country.
translation.ga: Tar éis na síne, leathnaigh covid-19 go leathadh geografach eile agus leanann dinimic an phaindéim covid-19 sa chuid eile den domhan dinimic na tíre seo.

translation.en: On 11 march 2020, the director general of the world health organization (who) declared covid-19 a pandemic.
translation.ga: Ar 11 márta 2020, dhearbhaigh ard-stiúrthóir na heagraíochta domhanda sláinte (who) paindéim ar covid-19.

translation.en: In the 5 march issue of eurosurveillance 2020, spiteri et al. reported on the first european confirmed covid-19 cases according to the who case definition.
translation.ga: In eagrán 5 márta de eurosurveillance 2020, spiteri et al. tuairiscíodh na chéad chásanna deimhnithe covid-19 eorpacha de réir shainmhíniú cáis who.

translation.en: In the eu / eea, the first three confirmed cases were reported by france on 24 january 2020 in persons returning from wuhan, hubei province, china.
translation.ga: San ae / lee, thuairiscigh an fhrainc na chéad trí chás dearbhaithe an 24 eanáir 2020 i measc filleadh ó wuhan, cúige hubei, an tsín.

translation.en: As at 15 march 2020, covid-19 cases had been detected in all 30 eu / eea countries and the united kingdom (uk), whereby between 31 december 2019 and that date included, 39,768 cases and 1,727 deaths had been reported, with 17,750 cases and 1,441 deaths from italy alone.
translation.ga: Amhail an 15 márta 2020, braitheadh ​ ​ cásanna covid-19 i ngach ceann de 30 tír ae / lee agus an ríocht aontaithe (ra), ag tuairisciú idir an 31 nollaig 2019 agus an dáta sin, 39,768 cás agus 1,727 bás, agus 17,750 cás agus 1,441 bás ón iodáil amháin.

translation.en: Obtaining cumulative number and cumulative incidence of covid-19 cases
translation.ga: Faigh líon carnach agus minicíocht cásanna covid-19

translation.en: At the european centre for disease prevention and control (ecdc), the notified covid-19 case counts in each country worldwide, obtained from only official sources such as the countries ’ ministry of health, national and regional health authorities and the who, are updated each day at 8: 00 a.m.
translation.ga: Ag an ionad eorpach um chosc agus rialú galar (ecdc), déantar cásanna covid-19 dá dtugtar a chomhaireamh i ngach tír ar domhan, a fhaightear ó fhoinsí oifigiúla mar aireacht sláinte na dtíortha, údaráis sláinte náisiúnta agus réigiúnacha agus an who, nuashonrú. gach lá ag 8: 00 am

translation.en: These data were used for assessing the trends of covid-19 in eu / eea and the uk, and comparing them to that in italy.
translation.ga: Úsáideadh na sonraí seo chun treochtaí covid-19 san ae / lee agus sa ríocht aontaithe a mheas, agus chun iad a chur i gcomparáid leo siúd san iodáil.

translation.en: As a proxy of the prevalence of active covid-19 cases, we calculated the 14-day truncated cumulative incidence of covid-19 cases, thus taking into account the natural course of covid-19, in each eu / eea country and the uk, during the 1 january – 15 march 2020 period.
translation.ga: Mar seachfhreastalaí ar leitheadúlacht cásanna gníomhacha covid-19, rinneamar an mhinicíocht teasctha carnach de 14 lá de chásanna covid-19 a ríomh, agus ar an gcaoi sin cúrsa nádúrtha covid-19 a chur san áireamh, i ngach tír ae / lee agus sna stáit aontaithe ríocht. Comhaontaithe, le linn na tréimhse 1 eanáir - 15 márta 2020.

translation.en: We also presented the cumulative number of notified cases of each country as at 15 march 2020 8: 00 a.m. compared with that of italy for the 31 january – 15 march 2020 period.
translation.ga: Chuireamar i láthair freisin an líon carnach cásanna ar tugadh fógra dóibh i ngach tír amhail an 15 márta 2020 8: 00 am i gcomparáid le huimhir na hiodáile don tréimhse 31 eanáir - 15 márta 2020.

translation.en: Trends of covid-19 in eu / eea countries and the uk
translation.ga: Treochtaí covid-19 i dtíortha ae / lee agus sa ríocht aontaithe

translation.en: The trends in the 14-day truncated cumulative incidence of covid-19 cases in eu / eea countries and the uk generally followed that of hubei province (china) (figure 1).
translation.ga: De ghnáth lean treochtaí sa mhinicíocht charnach teasctha 14 lá de chásanna covid-19 i dtíortha ae / lee agus na ra treocht chúige hubei (an tsín) (fíor 1).

translation.en: For the eu / eea and the uk overall, the cumulative incidence of covid-19 started to increase around 21 february and then increased sharply around 28 february 2020 (supplementary material).
translation.ga: Maidir leis an ae / lee agus an ríocht aontaithe ina iomláine, thosaigh minicíocht charnach covid-19 ag méadú timpeall 21 feabhra agus ansin mhéadaigh go géar timpeall an 28 feabhra 2020 (ábhar forlíontach).

translation.en: This was mostly driven by the rapid increase in the number of reported cases from italy, but all other eu / eea countries and the uk showed similar increasing trends of the cumulative incidence of covid-19 (supplementary material).
translation.ga: Bhí sé seo á thiomáint den chuid is mó ag an méadú gasta i líon na gcásanna a tuairiscíodh ón iodáil, ach léirigh gach tír eile ae / lee agus an ra treochtaí méadaitheacha cosúla i minicíocht charnach covid-19 (ábhar forlíontach).

translation.en: Figure 2 shows the cumulative number of covid-19 cases, in eu / eea countries and the uk compared with that in italy for the 31 january – 15 march 2020 period.
translation.ga: Taispeánann figiúr 2 líon carnach na gcásanna covid-19, i dtíortha ae / lee agus sa ríocht aontaithe i gcomparáid leis an líon san iodáil don tréimhse 31 eanáir - 15 márta 2020.

translation.en: It highlights that, as at 15 march 8: 00 a.m., 15 other eu / eea countries and the uk had already reported a total number of cases comparable to that of italy just 3 weeks prior or less.
translation.ga: Aibhsíonn sé, amhail an 15 márta 8: 00 am, gur thuairiscigh 15 tír eile ae / lee agus an ra líon iomlán cásanna a bhí inchomparáide le cás na hiodáile 3 seachtaine roimh ré nó níos lú.

translation.en: Our results indicate that the number of notified cases of covid-19 is rapidly increasing in the eu / eea and the uk.
translation.ga: Tugann ár dtorthaí le fios go bhfuil líon na gcásanna a thuairiscítear faoi covid-19 ag méadú go tapa san ae / lee agus sa ríocht aontaithe.

translation.en: The observed trends in the cumulative incidence of covid-19 suggest that the pandemic is progressing at a comparable speed in all countries.
translation.ga: Tugann na treochtaí a breathnaíodh i minicíocht charnach covid-19 le tuiscint go bhfuil an paindéim ag dul chun cinn ar luas inchomórtais i ngach tír.

translation.en: This is despite countries being at different stages, variations in national public health responses, and possibly different case definitions in countries and different protocols for selecting patients that must be tested for confirmation of covid-19, including catch-up testing.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo in ainneoin go bhfuil tíortha ag céimeanna difriúla, éagsúlachtaí i bhfreagraí náisiúnta sláinte poiblí, agus b ’ fhéidir sainmhínithe difriúla cásanna i dtíortha agus prótacail éagsúla chun othair a roghnú nach mór a thástáil chun covid-19 a dhearbhú, lena n-áirítear tástáil a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Early march 2020, doctors in the affected regions of italy described a situation in which ca 10% of patients with covid-19 required intensive care and media sources reported that hospitals and intensive care units in these regions had already reached their maximum capacity.
translation.ga: Go luath i mí an mhárta 2020, rinne dochtúirí sna réigiúin a raibh tionchar orthu san iodáil cur síos ar chás inar thuairiscigh ca 10% d ’ othair le covid-19 foinsí dian agus meánacha go raibh ospidéil agus aonaid dianchúraim sna réigiúin seo ag baint a n-acmhainneachta cheana féin.

translation.en: Data on admission of covid-19 cases in a hospital and / or an intensive care unit are currently available at eu / eea level for only 6% and 1% cases, respectively (data not shown).
translation.ga: Níl sonraí faoi chásanna covid-19 a ligtear isteach san ospidéal agus / nó aonad dianchúraim ar fáil faoi láthair ach ag leibhéal ae / lee do chásanna 6% agus 1% (sonraí nach dtaispeántar).

translation.en: They should, however, be collected in a systematic fashion to complement current surveillance data that focus on the number of reported cases and the number of deaths.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, ba cheart iad a bhailiú ar bhealach córasach chun sonraí faireachais reatha a chomhlánú ag díriú ar líon na gcásanna a tuairiscíodh agus líon na mbásanna.

translation.en: A study performed in 2010 – 11 showed a large variation in the availability of intensive care and intermediate care beds in europe, ranging from 29.2 in germany to 4.2 beds per 100,000 population in portugal.
translation.ga: Léirigh staidéar a rinneadh in 2010 – 11 éagsúlacht mhór in infhaighteacht leapacha dianchúraim agus idirmheánaigh san eoraip, idir 29.2 sa ghearmáin agus 4.2 leaba in aghaidh gach 100,000 den daonra sa phortaingéil.

translation.en: This means that countries may have more or less resources than italy (12.5 intensive care and intermediate care beds per 100,000 population in 2010 – 11).
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo go bhféadfadh níos mó nó níos lú acmhainní a bheith ag tíortha ná an iodáil (12.5 leaba dianchúraim agus idirmheánaigh in aghaidh gach 100,000 den daonra in 2010 – 11).

translation.en: Modelling scenarios related to healthcare capacity saturation, with estimates for each eu / eea country and the uk of the prevalence of hospitalised covid-19 cases associated with a & gt; 90% risk of exceeding intensive care bed capacity, are provided in the sixth update of the ecdc rapid risk assessment on covid-19.
translation.ga: Cásanna samhaltaithe a bhaineann le saturation acmhainní cúram sláinte, le meastacháin do gach tír ae / lee agus an ra ar leitheadúlacht cásanna ospidéil covid-19 a bhaineann le a & gt; soláthraíonn an séú nuashonrú ar mheasúnú riosca tapa ecdc ar covid-19 riosca 90% de shárú ar acmhainn leaba dianchúraim.

translation.en: Since cases have so far clustered in certain regions in eu / eea countries and the uk, and hospitals and intensive care units usually serve a defined regional catchment population, information about cases and intensive care beds should preferably be made available at the nomenclature of territorial units for statistics 2 (nuts-2) level.
translation.ga: Toisc go bhfuil cásanna cnuasaithe go dtí seo i roinnt réigiún de thíortha ae / lee agus an ríocht aontaithe, agus gur gnách go bhfreastalaíonn ospidéil agus aonaid dianchúraim ar dhaonra réigiúnach sainithe, ba cheart go gcuirfeadh ainmníocht na n-aonad críochach faisnéis cháis agus leapacha dianchúraim ar fáil. le haghaidh staitisticí leibhéal 2 (nuts-2).

translation.en: The experience from italy and the current trends in other countries show that the covid-19 pandemic is progressing rapidly in the eu / eea and the uk.
translation.ga: Taispeánann taithí ón iodáil agus treochtaí reatha i dtíortha eile go bhfuil an paindéim covid-19 ag dul chun cinn go tapa san ae / lee agus sa ríocht aontaithe.

translation.en: Countries, hospitals and intensive care units should thus prepare themselves for a scenario of sustained community transmission of sars-cov-2 and an increase in the number of patients with covid-19 requiring healthcare, and in particular intensive care, such as the one occurring in the affected regions of italy.
translation.ga: Dá bhrí sin, ba cheart do thíortha, ospidéil agus aonaid dianchúraim iad féin a ullmhú le haghaidh cás de tharchur pobail marthanach de sars-cov-2 agus méadú ar líon na n-othar le covid-19 a dteastaíonn cúram sláinte uathu, agus go háirithe dianchúram, mar an ceann a tharlaíonn i na réigiúin atá buailte san iodáil.

translation.en: As pointed out in the recent ecdc rapid risk assessment, a rapid, proactive and comprehensive approach is essential to delay the spread of sars-cov-2, with a shift from a containment to a mitigation approach, as the anticipated rapid increase in the number of cases may not provide decision makers and hospitals enough time to comprehend, accept and adapt their response accordingly if not implemented ahead of time.
translation.ga: Mar a tugadh faoi deara i measúnú tapa riosca ecdc le déanaí, tá gá le cur chuige tapa, réamhghníomhach agus cuimsitheach chun moill a chur ar scaipeadh sars-cov-2, le haistriú ó chur chuige teoranta go cur chuige maolaithe, mar an méadú tapa réamh-mheasta i go leor cásanna. ní fhéadfaidh siad dóthain ama a thabhairt do chinnteoirí agus ospidéil a bhfreagra a thuiscint, a ghlacadh agus a oiriúnú dá réir mura gcuirtear i bhfeidhm é roimh am.

translation.en: The rapid risk assessment also lists the public health measures to mitigate the impact of the pandemic.
translation.ga: Liostaíonn an measúnú gasta riosca na bearta sláinte poiblí freisin chun tionchar na paindéime a mhaolú.

translation.en: There is a short window of opportunity during which countries have the possibility to further increase their control efforts to slow down the spread of sars-cov-2 and decrease the pressure on healthcare.
translation.ga: Tá deis ghairid ann nuair a bhíonn an deis ag tíortha a n-iarrachtaí rialaithe a mhéadú tuilleadh chun scaipeadh sars-cov-2 a mhoilliú agus an brú ar chúram sláinte a laghdú.

translation.en: Failing this, it is likely that the healthcare systems of other eu / eea countries will face a surge of patients that require intensive care within the coming days or weeks.
translation.ga: Seachas sin, is dóigh go n-éireoidh le hothair a bhfuil dianchúram ag teastáil uathu laistigh de chúpla lá nó seachtainí roimh chórais chúram sláinte tíortha eile ae / lee.

translation.en: The outbreak of coronavirus disease 2019 (covid-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome (sars) coronavirus 2 (sars-cov-2), has thus far killed over 3,000 people and infected over 80,000 in china and elsewhere in the world, resulting in catastrophe for humans.
translation.ga: Go dtí seo, mharaigh ráig an ghalair coronavirus 2019 (covid-19), de bharr siondróm riospráide géarmhíochaine víreas corónach 2 (sars-2), os cionn 3,000 duine agus tá níos mó ná 80,000 ionfhabhtaithe sa tsín agus in áiteanna eile ar domhan, tubaiste do daoine mar thoradh air sin.

translation.en: Similar to its homologous virus, sars-cov, which caused sars in thousands of people in 2003, sars-cov-2 might also be transmitted from the bats and causes similar symptoms through a similar mechanism.
translation.ga: Cosúil lena víreas homalógach, sars-cov, a d ’ fhág go raibh sars sna mílte duine i 2003, d ’ fhéadfaí sars-cov-2 a tharchur ó ialtóga agus comharthaí den chineál céanna a chur faoi deara trí mheicníocht den chineál céanna.

translation.en: However, covid-19 has lower severity and mortality than sars but is much more transmissive and affects more elderly individuals than youth and more men than women.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, tá déine agus básmhaireacht níos ísle ag covid-19 ná sars ach tá sé i bhfad níos tarchuradóra agus bíonn tionchar aige ar níos mó daoine scothaosta ná an óige agus níos mó fear ná mná.

translation.en: In response to the rapidly increasing number of publications on the emerging disease, this article attempts to provide a timely and comprehensive review of the swiftly developing research subject.
translation.ga: Mar fhreagairt ar an líon foilseachán atá ag méadú go tapa ar an ngalar atá ag teacht chun cinn, féachann an t-alt seo le hathbhreithniú tráthúil cuimsitheach a sholáthar ar an ábhar taighde atá ag athrú go tapa.

translation.en: We will cover the basics about the epidemiology, etiology, virology, diagnosis, treatment, prognosis, and prevention of the disease.
translation.ga: Clúdóimid buneilimintí eipidéimeolaíochta, éiteolaíochta, víreolaíochta, diagnóis, cóireála, prognóis agus cosc ​ ​ an ghalair.

translation.en: Although many questions still require answers, we hope that this review helps in the understanding and eradication of the threatening disease.
translation.ga: Cé go bhfuil freagraí fós ag teastáil ó go leor ceisteanna, tá súil againn go gcuideoidh an t-athbhreithniú seo le tuiscint agus díothú an ghalair atá ag bagairt.

translation.en: The spring festival on january 25, 2020 has become an unprecedented and unforgettable memory to all chinese who were urged to stay indoors for all the holiday and for many weeks after due to the outbreak of a novel viral disease.
translation.ga: Is cuimhne gan fasach agus gan chuimhneamh í féile an earraigh an 25 eanáir, 2020 do gach síneach a iarradh orthu fanacht istigh ar feadh na saoire iomláine agus ar feadh roinnt seachtainí ina dhiaidh sin mar gheall ar ráig an ghalair víreasaigh úrscéil.

translation.en: The virus is highly homologous to the coronavirus (cov) that caused an outbreak of severe acute respiratory syndrome (sars) in 2003; thus, it was named sars-cov-2 by the world health organization (who) on february 11, 2020, and the associated disease was named cov disease-19 (covid-19).
translation.ga: Tá an víreas an-aonchineálach do coronavirus (cov) as a dtáinig ráig de shiondróm riospráide géarmhíochaine (sars) i 2003; mar sin, ainmníodh an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte (who) sars-cov-2 air an 11 feabhra 2020, agus ainmníodh an galar gaolmhar cov disease-19 (covid-19).

translation.en: The epidemic started in wuhan, china, and quickly spread throughout the entire country and to near 50 others all over the world.
translation.ga: Thosaigh an eipidéim i wuhan, an tsín, agus scaip sé go tapa ar fud na tíre agus chuig beagnach 50 duine eile ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: As of march 2, 2020, the virus has resulted in over 80,000 confirmed cases of covid-19, with more than 40,000 patients discharged and over 3,000 patients who died.
translation.ga: Amhail an 2 márta, 2020, bhí níos mó ná 80,000 cás dearbhaithe de covid-19 mar thoradh ar an víreas, agus bhí níos mó ná 40,000 othar agus os cionn 3,000 othar tar éis bás a fháil.

translation.en: Who warns that covid-19 is “public enemy number 1 ” and potentially more powerful than terrorism.
translation.ga: Tugann who foláireamh gur “namhaid poiblí uimhir 1 ” é covid-19 agus go bhféadfadh sé a bheith níos cumhachtaí ná an sceimhlitheoireacht.

translation.en: According to pubmed (https: / / www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov / pubmed /), in less than two months, over 200 papers have been published on covid-19 including its virology, epidemiology, etiology, diagnosis, and treatment since the first report on january 7, 2020 that determined the sequence of the virus isolated from multiple patients.
translation.ga: De réir pubmed (https: / / www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov / pubmed /), i níos lú ná dhá mhí, tá níos mó ná 200 páipéar foilsithe ar covid-19 lena n-áirítear a víreolaíocht, eipidéimeolaíocht, éiteolaíocht, diagnóis, agus cóireáil ón gcéad tuarascáil an 7 eanáir 2020 a shocraigh seicheamh an víris atá scoite amach ó iliomad othar.

translation.en: This review attempts to summarize the research progress in the new and swiftly developing subject area.
translation.ga: Féachann an t-athbhreithniú seo le hachoimre a dhéanamh ar an dul chun cinn taighde i réimse na n-ábhar nua atá ag athrú go tapa.

translation.en: Whenever possible, we will try to compare covid-19 with sars and another cov-caused disease, middle east respiratory syndrome (mers, an outbreak in 2012).
translation.ga: Déanfaimid iarracht covid-19 a chur i gcomparáid le sars agus galair eile de bharr cov, siondróm riospráide an mheánoirthir (mers, ráig in 2012) nuair is féidir.

translation.en: We will also discuss what we have learned so far regarding the prevention and prognosis of the disease as well as some remaining yet urgent questions.
translation.ga: Déanfaimid plé freisin ar a bhfuil foghlamtha againn go dtí seo faoi chosc agus prognóis an ghalair chomh maith le roinnt saincheisteanna atá fós práinneach.

translation.en: Covs have been traditionally considered nonlethal pathogens to humans, mainly causing approximately 15% of common colds 4.
translation.ga: Meastar go traidisiúnta gur pataiginí neamh-dhaonna iad covanna, agus go príomha is cúis le thart ar 15% de na slaghdáin choitianta 4.

translation.en: However, in this century, we have encountered highly pathogenic human covs twice, i.e., sars-cov and mers-cov, which caused an outbreak originally in china in 2003 and saudi arabia in 2012, respectively, and soon spread to many other countries with horrible morbidity and mortality.
translation.ga: San aois seo, áfach, fuaireamar covanna daonna an-phataigineacha faoi dhó, ie, sars-cov agus mers-cov, a d ’ fhág ráig sa tsín den chéad uair i 2003 agus san araib shádach in 2012, faoi seach, agus a scaipeadh go luath chuig go leor eile. tíortha a bhfuil galracht agus básmhaireacht uafásach iontu.

translation.en: Therefore, the current covid-19 is the third cov outbreak in the recorded history of humans.
translation.ga: Mar sin, is é an covid-19 reatha an tríú ráig cov i stair thaifeadta an duine.

translation.en: As shown in fig. ​ fig.1,1, clusters of pneumonia that had unknown origins were first reported from wuhan on december 31, 2019 to the china national health commission.
translation.ga: Mar a thaispeántar i bhfíor. Fig.1,1, tuairiscíodh braislí de niúmóine de bhunadh anaithnid ar dtús ó wuhan an 31 nollaig, 2019 chuig coimisiún sláinte náisiúnta na síne.

translation.en: Seven days later the sequence of the cov was released.
translation.ga: Seacht lá ina dhiaidh sin scaoileadh an seicheamh cov.

translation.en: On january 15, 2020 the first fatal case from wuhan was reported.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an chéad chás marfach ó wuhan an 15 eanáir 2020.

translation.en: Meanwhile, the epidemic rapidly spread to the neighboring cities, provinces, and countries.
translation.ga: Idir an dá linn, leathnaigh an eipidéim go tapa chuig cathracha, cúigí agus tíortha comharsanacha.

translation.en: On january 20, the infection of health-care providers was reported, suggesting that human-to-human transmission was possible.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh ionfhabhtú soláthraithe cúram sláinte an 20 eanáir, ag tabhairt le tuiscint go raibh tarchur duine le duine indéanta.

translation.en: On january 23, the city of wuhan was locked down with all its public transportation stopped.
translation.ga: Ar 23 eanáir, cuireadh cathair wuhan faoi ghlas agus cuireadh stop lena hiompar poiblí go léir.

translation.en: On january 24 the first clinical study on the disease reported that, out of 41 patients with confirmed cases, only 21 had direct contact with the wuhan seafood market that was considered the starting site of the infection from an unknown animal source.
translation.ga: Ar 24 eanáir thuairiscigh an chéad staidéar cliniciúil ar an ngalar nach raibh ach 21 as 41 othar le cásanna dearbhaithe i dteagmháil dhíreach le margadh bia mara wuhan a measadh a bheith mar shuíomh tosaigh an ionfhabhtaithe ó fhoinse anaithnid ainmhithe.

translation.en: On january 30, who declared the outbreak a global health emergency.
translation.ga: Ar 30 eanáir, dhearbhaigh an who an ráig mar éigeandáil sláinte domhanda.

translation.en: By the time of this report, the disease has already spread throughout china and near 50 other countries all over the world (fig. ​ (fig.2) .2).
translation.ga: Faoi am na tuarascála seo, bhí an galar scaipthe cheana féin ar fud na síne agus in aice le 50 tír eile ar domhan (fíor (fíor 2) .2).

translation.en: As the situation is rapidly evolving, the final scope and severity of the outbreak remain to be determined.
translation.ga: De réir mar a athraíonn an cás go gasta, tá scóip deiridh agus déine na ráige fós le cinneadh.

translation.en: On february 11, 2020, a multi-center study on 8,866 patients including 4,021 confirmed covid-19 patients presented a more updated illustration of the epidemic as follows (https: / / mp.weixin.qq.com / s / ulbi-hx _ rhpxa1qha2bhda).
translation.ga: An 11 feabhra 2020, léirigh staidéar il-ionaid ar 8,866 othar lena n-áirítear 4,021 othar covid-19 léargas níos nuashonraithe ar an eipidéim mar seo a leanas (https: / / mp.weixin.qq.com / s / ulbi-hx _ rhpxa1qha2bhda).

translation.en: Sars-cov-2 infected people of all ages, but mainly at the age of 30-65.
translation.ga: Daoine ionfhabhtaithe sars-cov-2 de gach aois, ach go príomha ag aois 30-65.

translation.en: Almost half (47.7%) of the infected individuals were over 50 years old, very few were under 20, and only 14 infected individuals were under the age of 10.
translation.ga: Bhí beagnach leath (47.7%) díobh siúd a bhí ionfhabhtaithe os cionn 50 bliain d ’ aois, is beag duine a bhí faoi 20, agus ní raibh ach 14 díobh ionfhabhtaithe faoi 10 mbliana d ’ aois.

translation.en: Sars-cov-2 infected more men (0.31 / 100,000) than women (0.27 / 100,000).
translation.ga: Tháirg sars-cov-2 níos mó fear (0.31 / 100,000) ná mná (0.27 / 100,000).

translation.en: Covid-19 expanded in clusters mainly in and around hubei.
translation.ga: Tá covid-19 scaipthe i mbraislí go príomha i hubei agus timpeall air.

translation.en: Covid-19 took an average of 5 (2-9) days from onset to diagnosis.
translation.ga: Thóg covid-19 5 (2-9) lá ar an meán ó thús go dtí an diagnóis.

translation.en: The average incubation period was 4.8 (3.0-7.2) days.
translation.ga: Ba é an meán-tréimhse goir ná 4.8 (3.0-7.2) lá.

translation.en: The average time from onset to death was 9.5 (4.8-13) days.
translation.ga: Ba é an meán-am ó thús go bás ná 9.5 (4.8-13) lá.

translation.en: The basic reproductive number (r0) was 3.77 (95% ci: 3.51-4.05), and the adjusted r0 was 2.23-4.82.
translation.ga: Ba é an uimhir atáirgthe bunaidh (r0) ná 3.77 (95% ci: 3.51 – 4.05), agus ba é an r0 coigeartaithe ná 2.23 – 4.82.

translation.en: The number of infected people increased exponentially before 23 jan. 2020, matching the time of massive transportation before the spring festival in china.
translation.ga: Mhéadaigh líon na ndaoine ionfhabhtaithe go heaspónantúil faoin 23 eanáir, 2020, ar aon dul le ham an iompair mhóir roimh fhéile an earraigh sa tsín.

translation.en: The mortality of patients with confirmed cases was 1.44% (95% ci: 1.10-1.86%), and the adjusted mortality of all the patients was 3.06% (95% ci: 2.02-4.59%).
translation.ga: Ba é básmhaireacht na n-othar le cásanna dearbhaithe ná 1.44% (95% ci: 1.10 – 1.86%), agus ba é básmhaireacht choigeartaithe na n-othar go léir ná 3.06% (95% ci: 2.02 – 4.59%).

translation.en: Three major risk factors for covid-19 were sex (male), age (≥ 60), and severe pneumonia.
translation.ga: Ba iad trí phríomhfhachtóir riosca do covid-19 ná gnéas (fireann), aois (≥ 60), agus niúmóine trom.

translation.en: Covs are a subfamily of large and enveloped viruses containing a single strand of sense rna.
translation.ga: Is fo-theaghlach de víris móra agus clúdaigh iad covanna ina bhfuil snáithe amháin de chiall rna.

translation.en: They can be divided into four genera, i.e., alpha, beta, gamma, and delta, of which alpha- and beta-covs are known to infect humans.
translation.ga: Is féidir iad a roinnt ina cheithre ghéinte, ie alfa, béite, gáma, agus deilt, ar eol go n-ionfhabhtaíonn siad daoine alfa- agus béite-covanna.

translation.en: The envelope spike (s) glycoprotein binds to its cellular receptors angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ace2) and dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (dpp4) for sars-cov and mers-cov, respectively, and then membrane fusion occurs.
translation.ga: Ceanglaíonn glycoprotein an spíce clúdaigh (s) lena ghabhdóirí cille einsím 2-chomhshóite angiotensin (ace2) agus dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (dpp4) le haghaidh sars-cov agus mers-cov, faoi seach, agus ansin tarlaíonn comhleá membrane.

translation.en: The viral rna genome is released into the cytoplasm; after replication of the viral genome, genomic rna accompanied by envelope glycoproteins and nucleocapsid proteins forms virion-containing vesicles, which then fuse with the plasma membrane to release the virus.
translation.ga: Scaoiltear rna an ghéanóim víreasach isteach sa chíteaplasma; tar éis an géanóm víreasach a mhacasamhlú, cruthaíonn rna géanómacha i gcomhcheangal le gliocrópróitéiní agus próitéiní núicléasídí víreasacha víris, a chomhleáíonn ansin leis an membrane plasma chun an víreas a scaoileadh.

translation.en: The first genomic sequence of sars-cov-2 was reported on january 10, 2020.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an chéad seicheamh géanóm de sars-cov-2 an 10 eanáir 2020.

translation.en: Sars-cov-2 was found to be a new type of beta-cov with more than 99.98% genetic identity among 10 sequenced samples collected from the original site of the outbreak, the huanan seafood market in wuhan.
translation.ga: Fuarthas amach gur cineál nua béite-cov é sars-cov-2 le haitheantas géiniteach níos mó ná 99.98% i measc 10 sampla seicheamhach a bailíodh ón suíomh ráige bunaidh, margadh bia mara na hungáire i wuhan.

translation.en: Sars-cov-2 is genetically more similar to sars-cov than to mers-cov.
translation.ga: Tá sars-cov-2 níos cosúla go géiniteach le sars-cov ná le mers-cov.

translation.en: Through transmission electron microscopy, sars-cov-2 particles were found in ultrathin sections of human airway epithelium.
translation.ga: Trí mhicreascópacht leictreon tarchuir, fuarthas cáithníní sars-cov-2 i gcodanna ultrathin den epitheliiam aerbhealaigh daonna.

translation.en: Human ace2 was found to be a receptor for sars-cov-2 as well as sars-cov.
translation.ga: Fuarthas go raibh ace2 daonna mar ghabhdóir do sars-cov-2 chomh maith le sars-cov.

translation.en: However, the s protein of sars-cov-2 binds to human ace2 more weakly than that of sars-cov, which is coincident with the fact that sars-cov-2 causes less severe infection in patients than sars-cov.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, ceanglaíonn próitéin s de sars-cov-2 le ace2 daonna níos laige ná próitéin sars-cov, atá i gcomhthráth leis an bhfíric go bhfuil sars-cov-2 ina chúis le hionfhabhtú níos déine in othair ná sars-cov.

translation.en: Sars-cov-2 can also form a novel short protein encoded by orf3b and a secreted protein encoded by orf8.
translation.ga: Is féidir le sars-cov-2 próitéin núíosach núíosach a fhoirmiú arna ionchódú ag orf3b agus próitéin rúnda atá ionchódaithe ag orf8.

translation.en: The orf3b of sars-cov-2 may play a role in the viral pathogenicity and inhibit the expression of ifnβ; however, orf8 does not contain any known functional domain or motif.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh ról a bheith ag an orf3b de sars-cov-2 i bpataigineacht víreasach agus cosc ​ ​ a chur ar léiriú ifnβ; áfach, níl aon fhearann ​ ​ feidhmiúil nó móitíf ar eolas ag orf8.

translation.en: On february 18, 2020, zhou, et al., reported the cryo-em structure of the full-length human ace2 at 2.9 å resolution in complex with the amino acid transporter b0at1.
translation.ga: Ar 18 feabhra, 2020, thuairiscigh zhou, et al., struchtúr cryo-em an ace2 daonna lánfhada ag taifeach 2.9 å i gcoibhneas leis an iompróir aimínaigéad b0at1.

translation.en: They found that the complex, which had open and closed conformations, was assembled as a dimer and the ace2-b0at1 complex can bind two s proteins, which provides evidence for cov recognition and infection.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ siad amach gur foirmíodh an coimpléasc, a raibh comhréireanna oscailte agus dúnta aige, mar laghdaitheoir agus gur féidir leis an gcoimpléasc ace2-b0at1 dhá phróitéin s a cheangal, ag soláthar fianaise maidir le cov a aithint agus a ionfhabhtú.

translation.en: B0at1 may become a therapeutic target for drug screening to suppress sars-cov-2 infection.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh b0at1 a bheith ina sprioc theiripeach do scagadh drugaí chun ionfhabhtú sars-cov-2 a scriosadh amach.

translation.en: The origin and intermediate host
translation.ga: An tionscnamh tionscnaimh agus idirmheánach

translation.en: It has been known that both sars-cov and mers-cov originated from bats and were transmitted to humans via civet cats and camels, respectively.
translation.ga: Is eol gur ó sars-cov agus mers-cov a tháinig ialtóga agus gur tarchuireadh chuig daoine iad trí chait civet agus camels, faoi seach.

translation.en: Through a phylogenetic comparison of sars-cov-2 with other covs, bats were considered the native host of sars-cov-2 as the new virus is 96% identical to two sars-like covs from bats called bat-sl-covzx45 and bat-sl-covzx21.
translation.ga: Trí chomparáid phylogenetic de sars-cov-2 le covanna eile, measadh go raibh ialtóga mar óstach dúchais sars-cov-2 toisc go bhfuil an víreas nua 96% comhionann le dhá cov cosúil le sv ó ialtóga ar a dtugtar bat-sl-covzx45 agus ialtóg. -sl-covzx21.

translation.en: However, what intermediate host helped the virus cross the species barrier to infect humans remains unknown, and the transmission route is yet to be elucidated.
translation.ga: Ní fios, áfach, cén óstach idirmheánach a chuidigh leis an víreas an bhacainn speicis ar dhaoine a ionfhabhtú a thrasnú, agus tá bealach an tarchuir le soiléiriú fós.

translation.en: Ji, et al., proposed snakes as a carrier of the virus from bats to humans which involved homologous recombination within the s protein.
translation.ga: Ji, et al., nathracha a mholtar mar iompróirí an víris ó ialtóga go daoine a raibh athmhúnlú homalógach laistigh den phróitéin s i gceist leo.

translation.en: According to a study, researchers in guangzhou, china, suggested that pangolins - long-snouted, ant-eating mammals often used in traditional chinese medicine - are the potential intermediate host of sars-cov-2 based on 99% genetic homology in a cov discovered in pangolins and sars-cov-2.
translation.ga: De réir staidéir, mhol taighdeoirí i guangzhou, an tsín, gurb iad pangoles - mamaigh frith-ithe deataithe fada a úsáidtear go coitianta i míochaine traidisiúnta na síne - an t-óstach idirmheánach féideartha de sars-cov-2 bunaithe ar homology géiniteach 99% i cov a bhraitear i pangóilí agus sars-cov-2.

translation.en: However, 1% difference spread all over two genomes is still a big difference; thus, conclusive results for concrete evidence are awaited (fig. ​ (fig.33).
translation.ga: Is difríocht mhór fós difríocht 1% atá scaipthe thar dhá ghéanóma; dá bhrí sin, táthar ag fanacht le torthaí dochloíte fianaise nithiúil (fíor (fíor 33)).

translation.en: The physicochemical properties of sars-cov-2 are largely not yet known.
translation.ga: Ní fios airíonna fisiciceimiceacha sars-cov-2 den chuid is mó.

translation.en: Sars-cov and mers-cov can survive in vitro for 48 hours in a dry environment and up to 5 days under 20 ° c and 40% -50% humidity.
translation.ga: Is féidir le sars-cov agus mers-cov maireachtáil in vitro ar feadh 48 uair i dtimpeallacht thirim agus suas le 5 lá faoi 20 ° c agus taise 40% -50%.

translation.en: Sars-cov-2 may possess similar properties.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh airíonna comhchosúla ag sars-cov-2.

translation.en: It has been reported that sars-cov-2 is sensitive to ultraviolet rays and heat at 56 ° c for 30 minutes; ether, 75% ethanol, chlorine-containing disinfectant, peracetic acid, chloroform, and other fatty solvents, but not chlorhexidine, can effectively inactivate the virus.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh go bhfuil sars-cov-2 íogair do ghhathanna ultraivialait agus teasa ag 56 ° c ar feadh 30 nóiméad; is féidir le éitear, 75% eatánól, dífhabhtán ina bhfuil clóirín, aigéad pericaric, clóraform, agus tuaslagóirí sailleacha eile, ach ní clorhexidine, an víreas a dhíghníomhachtú go héifeachtach.

translation.en: The entire human population generally lacks immunity to sars-cov-2 and hence is susceptible to the novel virus.
translation.ga: De ghnáth ní bhíonn sars-cov-2 díolmhaithe ó dhaonra iomlán an duine agus dá bhrí sin tá sé so-ghabhálach don víreas núíosach.

translation.en: Currently, no detailed study has been reported regarding the immunological response to sars-cov-2.
translation.ga: Faoi láthair, níor tuairiscíodh aon staidéar mionsonraithe ar an bhfreagairt imdhíoneolaíoch ar sars-cov-2.

translation.en: Thus, we can only refer to previous studies on other covs, especially sars-cov and mers-cov (fig. ​ (fig.4) .4).
translation.ga: Dá bhrí sin, ní féidir linn tagairt a dhéanamh ach do staidéir roimhe seo ar covanna eile, go háirithe sars-cov agus mers-cov (fíor (fíor 4) .4).

translation.en: In general, after a virus invades the host, it is first recognized by the host innate immune system through pattern recognition receptors (prrs) including c-type lectin-like receptors, toll-like receptor (tlr), nod-like receptor (nlr), and rig-i-like receptor (rlr).
translation.ga: Go ginearálta, tar éis do víreas ionradh a dhéanamh ar an óstach, déanann an córas imdhíonachta dúchasach óstach é a aithint ar dtús trí ghabhdóirí aitheantais patrún (prranna) lena n-áirítear gabhdóirí mar chineál c lectin, receptor cosúil le dola (tlr), receptor cosúil le nod (nlr), agus gabhdóir cosúil le rig-i (rlr).

translation.en: Through different pathways, the virus induces the expression of inflammatory factors, maturation of dendritic cells, and synthesis of type i interferons (ifns) which limit the spreading of the virus and accelerate macrophage phagocytosis of viral antigens.
translation.ga: Trí bhealaí éagsúla, spreagann an víreas léiriú ar fhachtóirí athlastacha, aibiú cille dendritic, agus sintéis interferons cineál i (ifnanna) a chuireann teorainn le scaipeadh an víris agus a luasghéadaíonn phagocytosis macrophage na n-antaiginí víreasacha.

translation.en: However, the n protein of sars-cov can help the virus escape from the immune responses.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, is féidir le próitéin n de sars-cov cuidiú leis an víreas na freagraí imdhíonachta a éalú.

translation.en: Soon, the adaptive immune response joins the fight against the virus.
translation.ga: I mbeagán focal, téann an freagra imdhíonachta oiriúnaitheach lámh ar láimh leis an gcomhrac i gcoinne an víris.

translation.en: T lymphocytes including cd4 + and cd8 + t cells play an important role in the defense.
translation.ga: Tá ról tábhachtach ag limficítí t lena n-áirítear cealla cd4 + agus cd8 + t sa chosaint.

translation.en: Cd4 + t cells stimulate b cells to produce virus-specific antibodies, and cd8 + t cells directly kill virus-infected cells.
translation.ga: Spreagann cealla cd4 + t cealla b chun antasubstaintí víreas-shonracha a tháirgeadh, agus maraíonn cealla cd8 + t cealla atá ionfhabhtaithe le víreas go díreach.

translation.en: T helper cells produce proinflammatory cytokines to help the defending cells.
translation.ga: Táirgeann cealla cúntóra t cytokines proinflammatory chun cuidiú leis na cealla imdhíonachta.

translation.en: However, cov can inhibit t cell functions by inducing apoptosis of t cells.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, is féidir le cov feidhmeanna cille t a chosc trí apoptóis de chealla t a aslú.

translation.en: The humoral immunity including complements such as c3a and c5a and antibodies is also essential in combating the viral infection.
translation.ga: Tá díolúine humoral lena n-áirítear comhlánú mar c3a agus c5a agus antasubstaintí riachtanach freisin chun an t-ionfhabhtú víreasach a chomhrac.

translation.en: For example, antibodies isolated from a recovered patient neutralized mers-cov.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, antasubstaintí atá scoite amach ó othar téarnaimh neodraithe mers-cov.

translation.en: On the other hand, an overreaction of the immune system generates a large number of free radicals locally that can cause severe damages to the lungs and other organs, and, in the worst scenario, multi-organ failure and even death.
translation.ga: Ar an láimh eile, gineann ró-obair an chórais imdhíonachta líon mór saorfhréamhacha go háitiúil a d ’ fhéadfadh damáiste mór a dhéanamh do na scamhóga agus d ’ orgáin eile, agus, sa chás is measa, cliseadh il-orgán agus fiú bás.

translation.en: The sars-cov-2 infection, featured by clustering onset, is more likely to affect elderly people with comorbidities and pregnant women.
translation.ga: Is é is dóichí go mbeidh tionchar ag an ionfhabhtú sars-cov-2, arna léiriú ag braisliú, ar dhaoine scothaosta a bhfuil comhoiriúlachtaí agus mná torracha orthu.

translation.en: It is common that for people who are exposed to a large number of viruses or whose immune functions are compromised, they have higher chance to be infected than others.
translation.ga: Tá sé coitianta go mbíonn seans níos airde ann go mbeidh siad ionfhabhtaithe ná a chéile ag daoine atá nochtaithe do líon mór víris nó a gcuirtear a gcuid feidhmeanna imdhíonachta i gcontúirt.

translation.en: The estimated mean incubation period of sars-cov-2 is 1-14 days, mostly 3-7 days based on a study of the first 425 cases in wuhan.
translation.ga: Is é an meán-tréimhse goir measta de sars-cov-2 ná 1-14 lá, 3-7 lá den chuid is mó bunaithe ar staidéar ar na chéad 425 cás i wuhan.

translation.en: However, a study on 1,099 cases demonstrates that the incubation period was 3 days on average and ranged from 0 to 24 days.
translation.ga: Taispeánann staidéar ar 1,099 cás, áfach, gur 3 lá ar an meán a bhí sa tréimhse goir agus go raibh sé idir 0 agus 24 lá.

translation.en: A more recent study, as described above, demonstrates that the incubation period was 4.8 (3.0-7.2) days based on the demography of 8,866 cases.
translation.ga: Taispeánann staidéar níos déanaí, mar a thuairiscítear thuas, go raibh an tréimhse goir 4.8 (3.0-7.2) lá bunaithe ar dhéimeagrafaic 8,866 cás.

translation.en: It is very important for health authorities to adjust the effective quarantine time based on the most accurate incubation period, thus preventing infected but symptomless people from transmitting the virus to others.
translation.ga: Tá sé an-tábhachtach d ’ údaráis sláinte an t-am coraintín éifeachtach a choigeartú bunaithe ar an tréimhse goir is cruinne, agus ar an gcaoi sin daoine ionfhabhtaithe a chosc ach gan an symptom víris a tharchur chuig daoine eile.

translation.en: As a common practice, individuals exposed to, or infected by, the virus are usually required to be quarantined for 14 days.
translation.ga: Mar ghnáthnós, is gnách go gceanglaítear ar dhaoine aonair atá nochtaithe don víreas, nó atá ionfhabhtaithe leis, a bheith coraintín ar feadh 14 lá.

translation.en: Should the quarantine time be extended to 24 days?
translation.ga: Ar chóir an t-am coraintín a leathnú go 24 lá?

translation.en: Fever is often the major and initial symptom of covid-19, which can be accompanied by no symptom or other symptoms such as dry cough, shortness of breath, muscle ache, dizziness, headache, sore throat, rhinorrhea, chest pain, diarrhea, nausea, and vomiting.
translation.ga: Is minic gurb é an fiabhras príomh-shíomptóim agus tosaigh covid-19, nach bhféadfadh aon comharthaí nó comharthaí eile cosúil le casacht tirim, giorra anála, pian sna matáin, meadhrán, tinneas cinn, scornach tinn, riníteas, pian cófra, buinneach, nausea, agus vomiting.

translation.en: Some patients experienced dyspnea and / or hypoxemia one week after the onset of the disease.
translation.ga: Bhí dyspnea agus / nó hypoxemia ag roinnt othar seachtainí tar éis don ghalar tosú.

translation.en: In severe cases, patients quickly progressed to develop acute respiratory syndrome, septic shock, metabolic acidosis, and coagulopathy.
translation.ga: I gcásanna tromchúiseacha, chuaigh othair ar aghaidh go tapa chuig forbairt siondróm géarmhíochaine riospráide, turraing seipteach, aigéadóis meitibileach, agus téachtadh.

translation.en: Patients with fever and / or respiratory symptoms and acute fever, even without pulmonary imaging abnormalities, should be screened for the virus for early diagnosis.
translation.ga: Ba chóir othair a bhfuil comharthaí fiabhras agus / nó fiabhras riospráide agus géarmhíochaine orthu, fiú gan neamhghnáchaíochtaí íomháithe scamhógacha, a scagadh don víreas le haghaidh diagnóis luath.

translation.en: A demographic study in late december of 2019 showed that the percentages of the symptoms were 98% for fever, 76% for dry cough, 55% for dyspnea, and 3% for diarrhea; 8% of the patients required ventilation support.
translation.ga: Léirigh staidéar déimeagrafach go déanach i mí na nollag 2019 gurb é céatadán na hairíonna 98% don fhiabhras, 76% don casacht tirim, 55% don dyspnea, agus 3% don bhuinneach; bhí tacaíocht aerála de dhíth ar 8% d ’ othair.

translation.en: Similar findings were reported in two recent studies of a family cluster and a cluster caused by transmission from an asymptomatic individual.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh torthaí comhchosúla in dhá staidéar le déanaí ar bhraisle teaghlaigh agus braisle mar gheall ar tharchur neamhshiomptómach.

translation.en: Comparably, a demographic study in 2012 showed that mers-cov patients also had fever (98%), dry cough (47%), and dyspnea (55%) as their main symptoms.
translation.ga: I gcomparáid leis sin, léirigh staidéar déimeagrafach in 2012 go raibh fiabhras (98%), casacht tirim (47%), agus dyspnea (55%) ar othair mers-cov mar a bpríomh-airíonna.

translation.en: However, 80% of them required ventilation support, much more than covid-19 patients and consistent with the higher lethality of mers than of covid-19.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, bhí tacaíocht aerála de dhíth ar 80% díobh, i bhfad níos mó ná othair covid-19 agus bhí siad ag teacht le marbhántacht mers níos airde ná covid-19.

translation.en: Diarrhea (26%) and sore throat (21%) were also observed with mers patients.
translation.ga: Breathnaíodh buinneach (26%) agus scornach tinn (21%) le hothair mers freisin.

translation.en: In sars patients, it has been demonstrated that fever (99% -100%), dry cough (29% -75%), dyspnea (40% -42%), diarrhea (20-25%), and sore throat (13-25%) were the major symptoms and ventilation support was required for approximately 14% -20% of the patients.
translation.ga: In othair sars, tá fiabhras (99% -100%), casacht tirim (29% -75%), dyspnea (40% -42%), buinneach (20-25%), agus scornach tinn (13 -25%) taispeánadh.%) na hairíonna is mó agus bhí tacaíocht aerála ag teastáil ó thart ar 14% -20% d ’ othair.

translation.en: By february 14, the mortality of covid-19 was 2% when the confirmed cases reached 66,576 globally.
translation.ga: Faoi 14 feabhra, bhí básmhaireacht covid-19 2% nuair a shroich cásanna dearbhaithe 66,576 ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: Comparably, the mortality of sars by november 2002 was 10% of 8,096 confirmed cases.
translation.ga: I gcomparáid leis sin, ba é básmhaireacht sars faoi shamhain 2002 ná 10% de 8,096 cás dearbhaithe.

translation.en: For mers, based on a demographic study in june 2012, the mortality was 37% of 2,494 confirmed cases.
translation.ga: Maidir le mers, bunaithe ar staidéar déimeagrafach i meitheamh 2012, ba é an básmhaireacht ná 37% de 2,494 cás dearbhaithe.

translation.en: An earlier study reported that the r0 of sars-cov-2 was as high as 6.47 with a 95% confidence interval (ci) of 5.71-7.23, whereas the r0 of sars-cov only ranged from 2 to 4.
translation.ga: Thuairiscigh staidéar níos luaithe go raibh an r0 de sars-cov-2 chomh hard le 6.47 le eatramh muiníne 95% (ci) de 5.71-7.23, ach nach raibh an r0 de sars-cov ach idir 2 agus 4.

translation.en: A comparison of sars-cov-2 with mers-cov and sara-cov regarding their symptoms, mortality, and r0 is presented in table ​ table1.1.
translation.ga: Cuirtear comparáid idir sars-cov-2 le mers-cov agus sara-cov i dtéarmaí a gcuid comharthaíochta, básmhaireachta agus r0 i láthair i dtábla 1.1.

translation.en: The above figures suggest that sars-cov-2 has a higher ability to spread than mers-cov and sars-cov, but it is less lethal than the latter two.
translation.ga: Tugann na figiúirí thuas le fios go bhfuil cumas scaipthe níos airde ag sars-cov-2 ná mers-cov agus sars-cov, ach go bhfuil sé níos lú marfach ná an dá cheann deiridh.

translation.en: Thus, it is much more challenging to control the epidemic of sars-cov-2 than those of mers-cov and sars-cov.
translation.ga: Dá bhrí sin, tá sé i bhfad níos dúshlánaí an eipidéim sars-cov-2 a rialú ná na heipidéimí mers-cov agus sars-cov.

translation.en: Clustered onset often happens in the same family or from the same gathering or vehicle such as a cruise ship.
translation.ga: Is minic a bhíonn braislí sa teaghlach céanna nó ón gcruinniú nó ón bhfeithicil chéanna ar nós long turais.

translation.en: Patients often have a history of travel or residence in wuhan or other affected areas or contact with infected individuals or patients in the recent two weeks before the onset.
translation.ga: Is minic go mbíonn stair taistil nó cónaithe ag othair i wuhan nó i gceantair eile atá buailte nó teagmháil le daoine nó othair atá ionfhabhtaithe le coicís anuas sula dtosaíonn siad.

translation.en: However, it has been reported that people can carry the virus without symptoms longer than two weeks and cured patients discharged from hospitals can carry the virus again, which sends out an alarm to increase the time for quarantine.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh, áfach, gur féidir le daoine an víreas a iompar gan comharthaí níos faide ná dhá sheachtain agus is féidir le hothair íocshláinte a scaoiltear ó ospidéil an víreas a iompar arís, rud a spreagann aláram chun an t-am le haghaidh coraintín a mhéadú..

translation.en: Patients have normal or reduced number of peripheral white blood cells (especially lymphocytes) at the early stage.
translation.ga: Tá líon luath nó laghdaithe de chealla fola bána imeallacha ag othair (go háirithe limficítí).

translation.en: For example, lymphopenia with white blood cell count & lt; 4 × 109 / l including lymphocyte count & lt; 1 × 109 / l, and elevated aspartate aminotransferase levels and viremia were found in 1,099 covid-19 patients.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, lymphopenia le comhaireamh cille fola bán & lt; 4 × 109 / l lena n-áirítear comhaireamh lymphocyte & lt; fuarthas 1 × 109 / l, agus leibhéil aminotransferase aspartate ardaithe agus viremia i 1,099 othar covid-19.

translation.en: The levels of liver and muscle enzymes and myoglobin were increased in the blood of some patients, and c-reactive protein and erythrocyte sedimentation were increased in the blood of most patients.
translation.ga: Méadaíodh leibhéil einsím ae agus matáin agus myoglobin i bhfuil roinnt othar, agus méadaíodh dríodrú próitéine c-imoibríoch agus erythrocyte i bhfuil an chuid is mó d ’ othair.

translation.en: In patients with severe cases, the level of d-dimer, a fibrin degradation product present in the blood, was elevated, and lymphocyte count was progressively reduced.
translation.ga: In othair a raibh cásanna tromchúiseacha acu, ardaíodh leibhéal d-dimer, táirge díghrádaithe fibrin atá san fhuil, agus laghdaíodh an líon lymphocyte de réir a chéile.

translation.en: Abnormalities in chest radiography are found in most covid-19 patients and featured by bilateral patchy shadows or ground glass opacity in the lungs.
translation.ga: Faightear neamhghnáchaíochtaí i radagrafaíocht cófra i bhformhór na n-othar covid-19 agus feictear iad le scáthanna déthaobhacha teimhneacht paiste nó gloine talún sna scamhóga.

translation.en: Patients often develop an atypical pneumonia, acute lung injury, and acute respiratory distress syndrome (ards).
translation.ga: Is minic a fhorbraíonn othair niúmóine aitíopúla, gortú scamhóg géarmhíochaine, agus siondróm anacair riospráide géarmhíochaine (ards).

translation.en: When ards happens, uncontrolled inflammation, fluid accumulation, and progressive fibrosis severely compromise the gas exchange.
translation.ga: Nuair a tharlaíonn ards, cuireann athlasadh neamhrialaithe, carnadh sreabhach, agus fiobróis fhorásach isteach go mór ar mhalartú gáis.

translation.en: Dysfunction of type-i and type-ii pneumocytes decreases the surfactant level and increases surface tension, thus reducing the ability of the lungs to expand and heightening the risk of lung collapse.
translation.ga: Laghdaíonn mífheidhmiú pneumococci cineál-i agus cineál-ii an leibhéal gníomhachtaithe dromchla agus méadaíonn sé teannas dromchla, agus ar an gcaoi sin laghdaítear cumas na scamhóga an baol go dtitfidh na scamhóga a leathnú.

translation.en: Therefore, the worst chest radiographic findings often parallel the most severe extent of the disease.
translation.ga: Dá bhrí sin, is minic a bhíonn na torthaí radagrafaíochta cófra is measa i gcomhthráth leis an bhfoirm is déine den ghalar.

translation.en: On february 18, 2020, the first pathological analysis of covid-19 demonstrated the desquamation of pneumocytes, hyaline membrane formation, and interstitial lymphocyte infiltration, and multinucleated syncytial cells in the lungs of a patient who died of the disease, consistent with the pathology of viral infection and ards and similar to that of sars and mers patients.
translation.ga: Ar 18 feabhra, 2020, nocht an chéad anailís phaiteolaíoch ar covid-19 díchoilíniú niúmóicítí, foirmiú membrane hiodráitithe, agus insíothlú lymphocyte interstitial, agus cealla syncytial ilcheallacha i scamhóga na n-othar a fuair bás den ghalar, i gcomhréir le paiteolaíocht na n-ionfhabhtuithe víreasacha agus ards agus mar ionfhabhtú othar sars agus mers.

translation.en: The detection of sars-cov-2 rna via reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (rt-pcr) was used as the major criteria for the diagnosis of covid-19.
translation.ga: Baineadh úsáid as rna sars-cov-2 a bhrath trí imoibriú slabhrúil polaiméaráise droim ar ais (rt-pcr) mar na príomhchritéir chun covid-19 a dhiagnóisiú.

translation.en: However, due to the high false-negative rate, which may accelerate the epidemic, clinical manifestations started to be used for diagnosis (which no longer solely relied on rt-pcr) in china on february 13, 2020.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar an ráta ard bréagach-diúltach a d ’ fhéadfadh dlús a chur leis an eipidéim, thosaigh léirithe cliniciúla á n-úsáid le haghaidh diagnóis (nach raibh ag brath go hiomlán ar rt-pcr a thuilleadh) sa tsín. 13 feabhra 2020.

translation.en: A similar situation also occurred with the diagnosis of sars.
translation.ga: Tharla cás den chineál céanna freisin le diagnóis sars.

translation.en: Therefore, a combination of disease history, clinical manifestations, laboratory tests, and radiological findings is essential and imperative for making an effective diagnosis.
translation.ga: Dá bhrí sin, tá meascán de stair ghalair, léirithe cliniciúla, tástálacha saotharlainne, agus torthaí raideolaíocha riachtanach agus riachtanach chun diagnóis éifeachtach a dhéanamh.

translation.en: On february 14, 2020, the feng zhang group described a protocol of using the crispr-based sherlock technique to detect sars-cov-2, which detects synthetic sars-cov-2 rna fragments at 20 × 10-18 mol / l to 200 × 10-18 mol / l (10-100 copies per microliter of input) using a dipstick in less than an hour without requiring elaborate instrumentation.
translation.ga: Ar 14 feabhra, 2020, thug grúpa feng zhang breac-chuntas ar phrótacal chun an teicníc crispr bunaithe ar sherlock a úsáid chun sars-cov-2 a bhrath, a aimsíonn blúirí sintéiseacha de rna sars-cov-2 ag 20 × 10-18 mol / l go 200 × 10-18 mol / l (10-100 cóip in aghaidh an mhicroliter ionchuir) ag úsáid dé-óid i níos lú ná uair an chloig gan gá le hionstraimíocht ilchasta.

translation.en: Hopefully, the new technique can dramatically enhance the sensitivity and convenience if verified in clinical samples.
translation.ga: Tá súil agam gur féidir leis an teicníc nua íogaireacht agus áisiúlacht a fheabhsú go suntasach má dhéantar í a fhíorú i samplaí cliniciúla.

translation.en: Due to the lack of experience with the novel cov, physicians can mainly provide supportive care to covid-19 patients, while attempting a variety of therapies that have been used or proposed before for the treatment of other covs such as sars-cov and mers-cov and other viral diseases (table ​ (table2) .2).
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar an easpa taithí leis an úrscéal cov, is féidir le lianna cúram tacaíochta a sholáthar go príomha d ’ othair covid-19, ag iarraidh teiripí éagsúla a úsáideadh nó a moladh roimhe seo chun covanna eile a chóireáil. mar sars-cov agus mers- cov agus galair víreasacha eile (tábla (tábla 2) .2).

translation.en: These therapies include current and potential treatments with antiviral drugs, immunosuppressants, steroids, plasma from recovered patients, chinese medicine, and psychological support.
translation.ga: Cuimsíonn na teiripí seo cóireálacha reatha agus féideartha le drugaí frithvíreasacha, frithdhúlagráin, stéaróidigh, plasma ó othair aisghafa, leigheas na síne, agus tacaíocht shíceolaíoch.

translation.en: Even plasma from recovered patients was proposed to be used for treatment.
translation.ga: Moladh fiú plasma ó othair aisghafa a úsáid le haghaidh cóireála.

translation.en: Pharmaceutical companies are racing to develop antibodies and vaccines against the virus.
translation.ga: Tá cuideachtaí cógaisíochta ag rásaíocht chun antasubstaintí agus vacsaíní a fhorbairt i gcoinne an víris.

translation.en: Sars-cov-2 mainly attacks the lungs in the beginning and probably also attacks, to a lesser degree, other organs that express ace2, such as the gastrointestinal system and the kidneys.
translation.ga: Ionsaíonn sars-cov-2 na scamhóga den chuid is mó i dtosach agus is dóigh go n-ionsaíonn sé freisin, go pointe níos lú, orgáin eile a chuireann ace2 in iúl, mar shampla an córas gastrointestinal agus na duáin.

translation.en: Nevertheless, respiratory dysfunction and failure are the major threat to the patients and the major cause of death.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, is é mífheidhm agus teip riospráide an bhagairt is mó d ’ othair agus príomhchúis an bháis.

translation.en: Thus, respiratory support is critical to relieve the symptoms and save lives and includes general oxygen therapy, high-flow oxygen, noninvasive ventilation, and invasive mechanical ventilation depending on the severity of the disease.
translation.ga: Dá bhrí sin, tá tacaíocht riospráide ríthábhachtach chun na hairíonna a mhaolú agus chun beatha a shábháil agus folaíonn sí teiripe ocsaigine ginearálta, ocsaigin ard-sreabhadh, aeráil neamh-ionrach, agus aeráil mheicniúil ionrach ag brath ar dhéine an ghalair.

translation.en: Patients with severe respiratory symptoms have to be supported by extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ecmo), a modified cardiopulmonary bypass technique used for the treatment of life-threatening cardiac or respiratory failure.
translation.ga: Ní mór othair a bhfuil comharthaí riospráide tromchúiseacha acu a thacú le ocsaiginiú membrane eachtardhomhanda (ecmo), teicníc sheachbhóthar cardiopulmonary modhnaithe a úsáidtear chun cliseadh croí nó riospráide atá bagrach don bheatha a chóireáil.

translation.en: In addition, the maintenance of electrolyte balance, the prevention and treatment of secondary infection and septic shock, and the protection of the functions of the vital organs are also essential for sars-cov-2 patients.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, tá sé riachtanach d ’ othair sars-cov-2 a chothabháil cothromaíocht leictrilít, ionfhabhtú tánaisteach agus turraing seipteach a chosc agus a chóireáil, agus feidhmeanna ríthábhachtach orgán a chosaint.

translation.en: It has been known that a cytokine storm results from an overreaction of the immune system in sars and mers patients.
translation.ga: Is eol go dtagann stoirm cytokine mar thoradh ar ró-fhreagairt ar an gcóras imdhíonachta in othair sars agus mers.

translation.en: Cytokine storm is a form of systemic inflammatory response featured by the release of a series of cytokines including tnfα, il-1β, il-2, il-6, ifnα, ifnβ, ifnγ, and mcp-1.
translation.ga: Is cineál freagartha athlastach sistéamach é stoirm cytokine a léirítear trí scaoileadh sraith cytokines lena n-áirítear tnfα, il-1β, il-2, il-6, ifnα, ifnβ, ifnγ, agus mcp-1.

translation.en: These cytokines induce immune cells to release a vast number of free radicals which are the major cause of ards and multiple organ failure.
