translation.ga: Léirithe cliniciúla: (1) fiabhras agus / nó comharthaí riospráide; (2) le gnéithe íomháithe d ’ ionfhabhtú covid-19; (3) comhaireamh iomlán na gcealla fola bána a thaispeánann comhaireamh lymphocyte gnáth, laghdaithe nó laghdaithe go luath.

translation.en: Diagnosing the confirmed case should base on suspected case with any one item of pathogenic or serological evidence as following: (1) real-time pcr test positive for sars-cov-2; (2) viral whole genome sequencing showing high homogeneity to the known novel coronaviruses; (3) positive for the specific igm antibody and igg antibody to sars-cov-2 in serum test; or a change of the sars-cov-2-specific igg antibody from negative to positive, or titer rising ≥ 4 times in the recovery phase above that in the acute phase.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go ndéanfadh diagnóis an cháis dheimhnithe bunús ar chás amhrasta le haon earra amháin d ’ fhianaise phataigineach nó séireolaíoch mar seo a leanas: (1) tástáil pcr fíor-ama dearfach do sars-cov-2; (2) seicheamh géanóm iomlán víreasach a thaispeánann aonchineálacht ard leis na coronaviruses úrscéal aitheanta; (3) dearfach don antashubstaint igm shonrach agus antashubstaint igg go sars-cov-2 i dtástáil serum; nó athrú ar an antashubstaint igg sars-cov-2-sonrach ó dhiúltach go dearfach, nó titer ag ardú ≥ 4 huaire sa chéim téarnaimh os cionn an chéim ghéarmhíochaine.

translation.en: We can see that the real-time pcr test for nucleic acid in respiratory tract or blood samples was added to the second (18 january 2020) and third (22 january 2020) editions.
translation.ga: Is féidir linn a fheiceáil gur cuireadh an tástáil pcr fíor-ama d ’ aigéad núicléasach i gconair riospráide nó i samplaí fola leis an dara heagrán (18 eanáir 2020) agus an tríú heagrán (22 eanáir 2020).

translation.en: The pathogenic detection of blood sample was added to the fourth (27 january 2020) and fifth (8 february 2020) editions; and then the serological evidence was added to the seventh edition.
translation.ga: Cuireadh braite pataigineach an tsampla fola leis an gceathrú eagrán (27 eanáir 2020) agus an cúigiú heagrán (8 feabhra 2020); agus ansin cuireadh an fhianaise séireolaíoch leis an seachtú heagrán.

translation.en: These modifications based on the researchers continued work that to search for an optimal nucleic acid detection kit for rapid diagnosis, as well as the samples from respiratory tract including blood sampling, which increased the availability of different specimens, and supported bringing the specific antibody positive result into the confirmed criteria.
translation.ga: Lean na modhnuithe seo bunaithe ar na taighdeoirí leis an obair chun an trealamh braite aigéad núicléach is fearr a chuardach le haghaidh diagnóis thapa, chomh maith leis na samplaí ón gconair riospráide lena n-áirítear sampláil fola, a mhéadaigh infhaighteacht eiseamail éagsúla, agus a thacaigh le toradh dearfach an antashubstaint shonrach a thabhairt. isteach sna critéir dheimhnithe.

translation.en: Besides, there are more and more evidence that remind us to caution with the atypical symptomatic and asymptomatic patients.
translation.ga: Thairis sin, tá níos mó agus níos mó fianaise ann a mheabhraíonn dúinn rabhadh a thabhairt leis na hothair aitíopúla síntómacha agus neamhshiomptómacha.

translation.en: Hence, the flow chart of zhou et al. should be updated, as they classified the person without clinical symptoms as “low risk ”.
translation.ga: Dá réir sin, sreabhchairt zhou et al. ba cheart iad a nuashonrú, toisc gur aicmigh siad an duine gan comharthaí cliniciúla mar “riosca íseal ”.

translation.en: The score system also needs to be verified in further clinical practice and studies.
translation.ga: Ní mór an córas scór a fhíorú freisin i gcleachtas agus staidéir chliniciúla bhreise.

translation.en: To conclude, we hope more direct evidence coming up and call for readers to provide their comments.
translation.ga: Mar fhocal scoir, tá súil againn go mbeidh fianaise níos dírí ag teacht aníos agus iarraimid ar léitheoirí a gcuid tuairimí a sholáthar.

translation.en: For the diagnosis of “suspected case ” and“ confirmed case ”, we suggest to trace and obey the newest guidelines of their home countries.
translation.ga: Chun “cás amhrasta ” agus“ cás dearbhaithe ” a dhiagnóisiú, molaimid na treoirlínte is nua dá dtíortha baile a rianú agus cloí leo.

translation.en: Our team will also timely update our guideline to offer help.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh ár bhfoireann ár dtreoirlíne a nuashonrú go tráthúil chun cabhair a thairiscint.

translation.en: Bangladesh reports five new deaths due to covid-19, a daily highest
translation.ga: Tuairiscíonn an bhanglaidéis cúig bhás nua mar gheall ar covid-19, an líon is airde go laethúil

translation.en: Yesterday, bangladesh has confirmed five new deaths due to covid-19 on the day.
translation.ga: Inné, dhearbhaigh an bhanglaidéis cúig bhás nua mar gheall ar covid-19 ar an lá.

translation.en: This is the highest number of fatalities in a day due to the virus.
translation.ga: Seo an líon is mó básanna in aghaidh an lae mar gheall ar an víreas.

translation.en: As of yesterday, bangladesh's institute of epidemiology, disease control and research (iedcr) reported the number of recorded infected cases included 114 active cases and 33 recovered cases who were staying home.
translation.ga: Amhail inné, thuairiscigh institiúid eipidéimeolaíochta, rialaithe agus taighde galar na banglaidéise (iedcr) go raibh 114 cás gníomhach san áireamh agus 33 cás aisghafa a bhí ag fanacht sa bhaile.

translation.en: A total of 17 deaths have been recorded.
translation.ga: Taifeadadh 17 bás san iomlán.

translation.en: In an online news briefing, the director of iedcr, dr meerjady sabrina flora, said the fatalities included four males and one female.
translation.ga: I gcruinniú faisnéise ar líne, dúirt stiúrthóir iedcr, an dr meerjady sabrina flora, go raibh ceathrar fear agus bean amháin ar na básanna.

translation.en: According to dr meerjady, two cases were aged above 60, two between 51 and 60, and one 41-50 years old.
translation.ga: De réir an dr meerjady, bhí dhá chás os cionn 60, dhá cheann idir 51 agus 60, agus cás amháin 41-50 bliain d ’ aois.

translation.en: She also said two of the victims were from dhaka.
translation.ga: Dúirt sí freisin gur as dhaka beirt de na híospartaigh.

translation.en: The world health organization (who) declared covid-19 a pandemic on march 11.
translation.ga: Dhearbhaigh an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte (who) paindéim ar covid-19 an 11 márta.

translation.en: A hospital official told anadolu agency, a local news outlet, that one of the deceased was jalal saifur rahman, a director of bengali anti-corruption commission, who was cared for at the kuwait maitree hospital.
translation.ga: Dúirt oifigeach ospidéil le gníomhaireacht anadolu, asraon nuachta áitiúil, gurbh é jalal saifur rahman, stiúrthóir ar choimisiún frith-éillithe na beangáilis, a raibh cúram air ag ospidéal cuáit maitree, duine de na daoine nach maireann.

translation.en: On saturday, in an online video announcement, bangladeshi road transport and bridges minister obaidul quader said public transport would be shut down for longer than initially planned, until this coming saturday.
translation.ga: Dé sathairn, i bhfógra físe ar líne, dúirt an taire iompair de bhóthar agus droichid bangladeshi, obaidul quader, go ndúnfaí iompar poiblí níos faide ná mar a bhí beartaithe i dtosach, go dtí an satharn seo chugainn.

translation.en: This public transport shutdown had initially started on march 26 and was planned to end on saturday, april 4.
translation.ga: Cuireadh tús leis an múchadh iompair phoiblí seo i dtosach an 26 márta agus beartaíodh go dtiocfadh deireadh leis dé sathairn, 4 aibreán.

translation.en: Transport of essential goods -- medical, fuel and food -- was still allowed.
translation.ga: Ceadaíodh fós earraí riachtanacha a iompar - leighis, breosla agus bia.

translation.en: The first recorded incidents of covid-19 infection in bangladesh were on march 8, in two people who returned from italy and also the wife of one of them.
translation.ga: Tharla na chéad eachtraí a taifeadadh d ’ ionfhabhtú covid-19 sa bhanglaidéis an 8 márta, i mbeirt daoine a d ’ fhill ón iodáil agus bean chéile duine acu freisin.

translation.en: As of march 19, these three had already recovered.
translation.ga: Amhail an 19 márta, bhí an triúr seo tar éis aisghabháil cheana féin.

translation.en: Sars-cov-2 surpasses one million infections worldwide
translation.ga: Sáraíonn sars-cov-2 aon mhilliún ionfhabhtú ar fud an domhain

translation.en: On thursday, the total number of cases of the sars-cov-2 coronavirus infections surpassed one million worldwide, johns hopkins university data indicated.
translation.ga: Ar an déardaoin, sháraigh líon iomlán na gcásanna d ’ ionfhabhtuithe coronavirus sars-cov-2 aon mhilliún ar fud an domhain, léirigh sonraí ollscoil johns hopkins.

translation.en: At least 52 thousand deaths were linked to covid-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Bhí 52 míle bás ar a laghad nasctha le covid-19, an galar ba chúis leis an coronavirus.

translation.en: The milestone came the same day malawi confirmed its first coronavirus infections and zambia had its first coronavirus-related death.
translation.ga: Tháinig an chloch mhíle an lá céanna a dhearbhaigh an mhaláiv a chéad ionfhabhtuithe coronavirus agus fuair an tsaimbia a chéad bhás a bhain le coronavirus.

translation.en: North korea claimed, as of thursday, it was one of the few countries remaining free of coronavirus infections.
translation.ga: Mhaígh an chóiré thuaidh, amhail déardaoin, go raibh sé ar cheann den bheagán tíortha a bhí saor ó ionfhabhtuithe coronavirus.

translation.en: By yesterday, the world health organization reported 1,051,635 confirmed cases, including 79,332 cases in the twenty four hours preceding 10 a.m. central european time (0800 utc) on april 4.
translation.ga: Faoi inné, thuairiscigh an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte 1,051,635 cás dearbhaithe, lena n-áirítear 79,332 cás sna ceithre huaire fichead roimh 10 a.m. am lár na heorpa (0800 utc) an 4 aibreán.

translation.en: In the united states, over 244 thousand coronavirus cases were recorded, linking to at least 5,900 deaths.
translation.ga: Sna stáit aontaithe, taifeadadh níos mó ná 244 míle cás coronavirus, ag nascadh le 5,900 bás ar a laghad.

translation.en: Cbs news reported, citing johns hopkins university data, there were over 1,000 us deaths on wednesday caused by coronavirus infections.
translation.ga: Thuairiscigh cbs news, ag lua sonraí ollscoil johns hopkins, go raibh níos mó ná 1,000 bás sna sa dé céadaoin de bharr ionfhabhtuithe coronavirus.

translation.en: Around the world, countries announced stricter measures to inhibit the disease from spreading.
translation.ga: Ar fud an domhain, d ’ fhógair tíortha bearta níos déine chun an galar a chosc ó scaipeadh.

translation.en: On thursday, sergei sobyanin, the mayor of moscow, extended the city lockdown to may 1.
translation.ga: Ar an déardaoin, chuir sergei sobyanin, méara moscó, glasáil na cathrach go 1 bealtaine.

translation.en: Nationally, president vladimir putin declared russians would continue to be paid without going to work until april 30.
translation.ga: Go náisiúnta, dhearbhaigh an tuachtarán vladimir putin go leanfaí ag íoc rúiseach gan dul ag obair go dtí an 30 aibreán.

translation.en: The parliament of portugal voted to extend the national state of emergency by 15 days; the vote passed with 215 votes in favor, ten abstentions, and one vote against.
translation.ga: Vótáil parlaimint na portaingéile an staid éigeandála náisiúnta a leathnú 15 lá; ritheadh ​ ​ an vótáil le 215 vóta i bhfabhar, deich staonadh ó vótáil, agus vóta amháin ina choinne.

translation.en: Saudi arabia extended curfews in the holy cities of mecca and medina to last the entire day; previously, the curfew was only in effect between 3 p.m. and 6 a.m.
translation.ga: Leathnaigh an araib shádach cuirfews i gcathracha naofa mecca agus medina chun go mairfeadh siad an lá ar fad; roimhe seo, ní raibh an cuirfiú i bhfeidhm ach idir 3 p.m. agus 6 a.m.

translation.en: Thailand planned to implement a curfew between 10 p.m. and 4 a.m.
translation.ga: Bhí sé beartaithe ag an téalainn cuirfiú a chur i bhfeidhm idir 10 p.m. agus 4 a.m.

translation.en: The governor of ohio, mike dewine, announced the state had extended its stay-at-home order until may 1.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair gobharnóir ohio, mike dewine, go raibh an stát tar éis a ordú fanacht sa bhaile a leathnú go dtí an 1 bealtaine.

translation.en: Stores in australia lower toilet paper limits per transaction
translation.ga: Íslíonn siopaí san astráil teorainneacha páipéar leithris in aghaidh an idirbhirt

translation.en: On sunday and saturday evening, australian store chains woolworths and coles lowered their purchase restrictions on toilet paper to two and one package per transaction in all stores on national level, respectively.
translation.ga: Tráthnóna dé domhnaigh agus dé sathairn, d ’ ísligh slabhraí siopaí na hastráile woolworths and coles a gcuid srianta ceannaigh ar pháipéar leithris go dtí dhá phacáiste amháin in aghaidh an idirbhirt i ngach siopa ar an leibhéal náisiúnta, faoi seach.

translation.en: Aldi also introduced a one-pack limit, on monday.
translation.ga: Thug aldi teorainn aon phacáiste isteach freisin, dé luain.

translation.en: These limitations were posted as messages on the checkouts, and on the chains' facebook pages.
translation.ga: Cuireadh na teorainneacha seo sa phost mar theachtaireachtaí ar na seiceálacha, agus ar leathanaigh facebook na slabhraí.

translation.en: Buyers were reportedly stocking up due to fears of covid-19 in case people need to self-isolate.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh go raibh ceannaitheoirí ag stocáil mar gheall ar eagla covid-19 ar eagla go mbeadh ar dhaoine iad féin a leithlisiú.

translation.en: On wednesday, woolworths also limited toilet paper purchases for home delivery to one pack per order.
translation.ga: Dé céadaoin, chuir woolworths teorainn le ceannacháin páipéar leithris le seachadadh sa bhaile chuig pacáiste amháin in aghaidh an ordaithe.

translation.en: These changes followed the previous four-pack per transaction restriction introduced by woolworths and coles on march 4 and 5 respectively.
translation.ga: Lean na hathruithe seo an srian ceithre phacáiste in aghaidh an idirbhirt roimhe seo a thug woolworths and coles isteach ar 4 agus 5 márta faoi seach.

translation.en: Coles, in its march 8 media release, reported that with the four-pack restriction in place, "many stores are still selling out within an hour of delivery", and called the demand "unprecedented", while aldi, in a facebook post on tuesday, called it "unexpected".
translation.ga: Thuairiscigh coles, ina eisiúint meán 8 márta, “leis an srian ceithre phacáiste atá i bhfeidhm,“ tá go leor siopaí fós ag díol amach laistigh d ’ uair an chloig ón seachadadh ”, agus ghlaoigh siad an t-éileamh “gan fasach ”, agus aldi, i bpost ar facebook ar dé máirt, ar a dtugtar" gan choinne "é.

translation.en: Sales went up in a "sharp increase" last week, according to a woolworths spokesperson.
translation.ga: Chuaigh díolacháin suas i “méadú géar ” an tseachtain seo caite, de réir urlabhraí woolworths.

translation.en: Costco's store in canberra also limited the allowed amount to two packs last week.
translation.ga: Chuir siopa costco i canberra an méid ceadaithe teoranta do dhá phacáiste an tseachtain seo caite.

translation.en: To further alleviate the shortage, coles ordered bigger packages from suppliers and increased delivery frequency, woolworths ordered extra stock, while aldi made stocks for a planned wednesday special available early.
translation.ga: Chun an ganntanas a mhaolú tuilleadh, d ’ ordaigh coles pacáistí níos mó ó sholáthraithe agus minicíocht seachadta méadaithe, d ’ ordaigh woolworths stoc breise, agus chuir aldi stoic le haghaidh speisialta beartaithe dé céadaoin ar fáil go luath.

translation.en: Russell zimmerman, executive director of the australian retailers association, said that retailers try to raise stock, but local council restrictions on the timing of truck-deliveries make it hard.
translation.ga: Dúirt russell zimmerman, stiúrthóir feidhmiúcháin chumann miondíoltóirí na hastráile, go ndéanann miondíoltóirí iarracht stoc a chruinniú, ach go mbíonn sé deacair srianta na comhairle áitiúla ar uainiú seachadtaí trucailí.

translation.en: He expects rising production costs, as suppliers try to meet demand, and fewer specials.
translation.ga: Tá sé ag súil le costais táirgthe ag ardú, de réir mar a dhéanann soláthraithe iarracht freastal ar an éileamh, agus níos lú earraí speisialta.

translation.en: On tuesday, aldi announced that following the early release of stock, some stores can't run the wednesday special.
translation.ga: Ar an máirt, d ’ fhógair aldi nach féidir le roinnt siopaí an speisialta dé céadaoin a reáchtáil tar éis an stoc a scaoileadh go luath.

translation.en: In a news.com.au report, dr gary mortimer, retail expert from queensland university of technology, said the stores fill the stock every night.
translation.ga: I dtuarascáil news.com.au, dúirt an dr gary mortimer, saineolaí miondíola ó ollscoil teicneolaíochta queensland, go líonann na siopaí an stoc gach oíche.

translation.en: He remarked toilet paper is a bulky item, leading to low quantity of stocks in numbers, and, when sold out, leaves vast shelf spaces empty, hardening the feeling of a shortage.
translation.ga: Dúirt sé gur mír toirtiúil é páipéar leithris, rud a fhágann go bhfuil líon íseal stoic ann, agus, nuair a dhíoltar amach é, fágann sé spásanna seilfeanna móra folamh, rud a fhágann go bhfuil ganntanas ann.

translation.en: Coles and woolworths have a view [that] if there was plenty of stuff on the shelf, if product like toilet rolls and sanitiser could be [bought] and are there in quantities, you would probably minimise the panic said russell zimmerman per abc news.
translation.ga: Tá tuairim ag coles agus woolworths [sin] dá mbeadh go leor rudaí ar an tseilf, dá bhféadfaí táirge cosúil le rollaí leithris agus sláintíocht a cheannach [agus má tá siad ann i gcainníochtaí, is dócha go laghdófá an scaoll a dúirt russell zimmerman in aghaidh abc news.

translation.en: Recycled toilet paper producer who gives a crap said on last wednesday they'd run out of stock.
translation.ga: Dúirt an léiritheoir páipéar leithris athchúrsáilte who gives a crap dé céadaoin seo caite go rithfidís as stoc.

translation.en: Kimberly-clark, which makes kleenex toilet tissue, and solaris paper which makes sorbent, emphasized they were working 24 / 7 to maintain the supply, according to the news.com.au report.
translation.ga: Chuir kimberly-clark, a dhéanann fíochán leithris kleenex, agus solaris paper a dhéanann sorbent, béim go raibh siad ag obair 24 / 7 chun an soláthar a chothabháil, de réir na tuarascála news.com.au.

translation.en: Domain.com, a real estate site, reported some property sellers offering free toilet paper to the first bidder on auctions in melbourne, when fewer auctions were held because of buyers having time off on the long weekend of labour day.
translation.ga: Thuairiscigh domain.com, láithreán eastáit réadaigh, roinnt díoltóirí réadmhaoine a thairgeann páipéar leithris saor in aisce don chéad tairgeoir ar cheantanna i melbourne, nuair a tionóladh níos lú ceantanna toisc go raibh am saor ag ceannaitheoirí ar an deireadh seachtaine fada de lá an lucht oibre.

translation.en: The thursday edition of nt news, a daily printed in darwin, included an eight-page insert meant to be cut up and used as toilet paper.
translation.ga: San eagrán déardaoin de nt news, a cuireadh i gcló go laethúil i darwin, bhí ionchur ocht leathanach a bhí le gearradh suas agus le húsáid mar pháipéar leithris.

translation.en: The stores were originally reluctant to impose restrictions, according to a report from abc australia on march 3 in which they said they had no plans to introduce restrictions on the purchases.
translation.ga: Bhí drogall ar na siopaí srianta a fhorchur ar dtús, de réir tuarascála ó abc australia an 3 márta inar dhúirt siad nach raibh aon phleananna acu srianta ar na ceannacháin a thabhairt isteach.

translation.en: Russell zimmerman added that other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitiser, dried goods, handwash and flour.
translation.ga: Dúirt russell zimmerman go bhfuil éileamh mór ar tháirgí eile freisin, lena n-áirítear maisc, sláintíocht, earraí triomaithe, cuas láimhe agus plúr.

translation.en: Similarly, outside of australia, on sunday evening online british supermarket ocado was observed limiting purchases of andres toilet paper to two 12-roll packs.
translation.ga: Ar an gcaoi chéanna, taobh amuigh den astráil, breathnaíodh ollmhargadh na breataine ocado tráthnóna dé domhnaigh ag teorannú ceannachán páipéar leithris andres go dhá phacáiste 12 rolla.

translation.en: World health organization declares covid-19 pandemic
translation.ga: Dearbhaíonn an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte paindéim covid-19

translation.en: On wednesday, the world health organization (who) declared the ongoing outbreak of covid-19 — the disease caused by coronavirus sars-cov-2 — to be a pandemic.
translation.ga: Ar an gcéadaoin, dhearbhaigh an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte (who) an ráig leanúnach de covid-19 - an galar de bharr coronavirus sars-cov-2 - a bheith ina phaindéim.

translation.en: Although the word "pandemic" only refers to how widely a disease has spread, not how dangerous specific cases are, the who noted the need to drive governments to action:
translation.ga: Cé nach dtagraíonn an focal "paindéimeach" ach do cé chomh forleathan agus atá galar scaipthe, ní chomh contúirteach agus atá cásanna sonracha, thug an who dá aire an gá atá le rialtais a chur chun gnímh:

translation.en: All countries can still change the course of this pandemic.
translation.ga: Is féidir le gach tír cúrsa na paindéime seo a athrú fós.

translation.en: If countries detect, test, treat, isolate, trace and mobilize their people in the response, said tedros adhanom ghebreyesus, the director-general of the who.
translation.ga: Má dhéanann tíortha a gcuid daoine a bhrath, a thástáil, a chóireáil, a leithlisiú, a rianú agus a shlógadh sa fhreagairt, a dúirt tedros adhanom ghebreyesus, ard-stiúrthóir an who.

translation.en: We are deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity and by the alarming levels of inaction.
translation.ga: Is cúis mhór imní dúinn na leibhéil scanrúil scaipthe agus déine agus na leibhéil scanrúil easpa gnímh.

translation.en: According to dr. tom frieden, formerly the director of the united states' centers for disease control and prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented."
translation.ga: Dar leis an dr. Tom frieden, a bhíodh ina stiúrthóir ar ionaid um rialú agus cosc galar na stát aontaithe, tá an paindéim "gan fasach."

translation.en: He said, in remarks published by cnn in february, "other than influenza, no other respiratory virus has been tracked from emergence to continuous global spread."
translation.ga: Dúirt sé, i ráitis a d ’ fhoilsigh cnn i mí feabhra, "seachas an fliú, níor rianaíodh aon víreas riospráide eile ó theacht chun cinn go scaipeadh domhanda leanúnach."

translation.en: Ghebreyesus expressed a similar view, saying "we have never before seen a pandemic sparked by a coronavirus."
translation.ga: Chuir ghebreyesus dearcadh den chineál céanna in iúl, ag rá "ní fhaca muid paindéim riamh a spreag coróin-víreas."

translation.en: He continued, "and we have never before seen a pandemic that can be controlled at the same time."
translation.ga: Lean sé air, "agus ní fhaca muid paindéim riamh is féidir a rialú ag an am céanna."

translation.en: The new status as a pandemic follows the who's decision in january to declare the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern.
translation.ga: Leanann an stádas nua mar phaindéim tar éis chinneadh an who i mí eanáir an ráig a dhearbhú mar éigeandáil sláinte poiblí is ábhar imní idirnáisiúnta.

translation.en: The united states' national institute of allergy and infectious disease's director, dr. anthony fauci, said of the outbreak, "bottom line, it's going to get worse."
translation.ga: Dúirt stiúrthóir institiúid náisiúnta ailléirge agus galair thógálacha na stát aontaithe, an dr. Anthony fauci, faoin ráig, "bunlíne, tá sé ag dul in olcas."

translation.en: As of thursday, associated press reported there were at least 126,000 cases of covid-19 worldwide, resulting in over 4,600 deaths.
translation.ga: Amhail an déardaoin, thuairiscigh associated press go raibh 126,000 cás ar a laghad de covid-19 ar fud an domhain, agus go raibh níos mó ná 4,600 bás mar thoradh air.

translation.en: The 2019 – 20 coronavirus pandemic is an ongoing pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (covid-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (sars-cov-2).
translation.ga: Is paindéim leanúnach de ghalar coronavirus 2019 (covid-19) é paindéim coronavirus 2019 – 20, de bharr coróinivíreas géar 2 siondróm riospráide 2 (sars-cov-2).

translation.en: The outbreak was identified in wuhan, china, in december 2019, declared to be a public health emergency of international concern on 30 january 2020, and recognized as a pandemic on 11 march 2020.
translation.ga: Aithníodh an ráig i wuhan, an tsín, i mí na nollag 2019, dearbhaíodh gur éigeandáil sláinte poiblí imní idirnáisiúnta í an 30 eanáir 2020, agus aithníodh gur paindéim í an 11 márta 2020.

translation.en: As of 10 april 2020, approximately 1.61 million cases of covid-19 have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in approximately 97,000 deaths.
translation.ga: Amhail an 10 aibreán 2020, tuairiscíodh thart ar 1.61 milliún cás de covid-19 i 210 tír agus críoch, agus mar thoradh air sin fuair thart ar 97,000 bás.

translation.en: About 364,000 people have recovered.
translation.ga: Tá thart ar 364,000 duine tar éis aisghabháil.

translation.en: The case fatality rate has been estimated to be 4% in china, while globally ranging from 13.04% in algeria to .08% in new zealand.
translation.ga: Meastar go bhfuil an ráta básmhaireachta cásanna 4% sa tsín, agus go domhanda ag dul ó 13.04% san ailgéir go .08% sa nua-shéalainn.

translation.en: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.
translation.ga: I measc na n-airíonna coitianta tá fiabhras, casacht agus giorra anála.

translation.en: Complications may include pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh niúmóine agus siondróm anacair riospráide géarmhíochaine a bheith san áireamh.

translation.en: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days, but may range from two to fourteen days.
translation.ga: De ghnáth bíonn an t-am ó nochtadh do theacht na hairíonna thart ar chúig lá, ach féadfaidh sé a bheith idir dhá lá agus ceithre lá dhéag.

translation.en: There is no known vaccine or specific antiviral treatment.
translation.ga: Níl aon vacsaín ar eolas ná cóireáil shonrach frithvíreas.

translation.en: Primary treatment is symptomatic and supportive therapy.recommended preventive measures include hand washing, covering one's mouth when coughing, maintaining distance from other people, and monitoring and self-isolation for people who suspect they are infected.
translation.ga: Is teiripe shíomptómach agus thacúil í an chóireáil phríomhúil. I measc na mbeart coisctheach a mholtar tá níochán láimhe, clúdach do bhéal agus tú ag casacht, an t-achar a choinneáil ó dhaoine eile, agus monatóireacht agus féin-aonrú do dhaoine a bhfuil amhras orthu go bhfuil siad ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: Authorities worldwide have responded by implementing travel restrictions, quarantines, curfews, workplace hazard controls, and facility closures.
translation.ga: D' fhreagair údaráis ar fud an domhain trí shrianta taistil, coraintíní, cuirfiú, rialuithe guaise san ionad oibre agus dúnadh saoráidí a chur i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: The pandemic has led to severe global socioeconomic disruption, the postponement or cancellation of sporting, religious, political and cultural events, and widespread shortages of supplies exacerbated by panic buying.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh ar an bpaindéim tá cur isteach mór socheacnamaíoch domhanda, imeachtaí spóirt, reiligiúnacha, polaitiúla agus cultúrtha a chur siar nó a chealú, agus ganntanas forleathan soláthairtí níos measa ag ceannach scaoll.

translation.en: Schools and universities have closed either on a nationwide or local basis in 193 countries, affecting approximately 99.4 percent of the world's student population.
translation.ga: Dúnadh scoileanna agus ollscoileanna ar fud na tíre nó ar bhonn áitiúil i 193 tír, ag dul i bhfeidhm ar thart ar 99.4 faoin gcéad de dhaonra mac léinn an domhain.

translation.en: Misinformation about the virus has spread online, and there have been incidents of xenophobia and discrimination against chinese people, other people of east and southeast asian descent and appearance, and others from areas with significant virus cases.
translation.ga: Tá mífhaisnéis faoin víreas scaipthe ar líne, agus tharla eachtraí de sheineafóibe agus idirdhealú i gcoinne mhuintir na síne, daoine eile de shliocht agus cuma oirthear agus oirdheisceart na háise, agus daoine eile ó cheantair a raibh cásanna suntasacha víris acu.

translation.en: Due to reduced travel and closures of heavy industry, there has been a decrease in air pollution and carbon emissions.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar laghdú ar thaisteal agus dúnadh an tionscail throm, tá laghdú tagtha ar thruailliú aeir agus ar astaíochtaí carbóin.

translation.en: Health authorities in wuhan, china (the capital of hubei province) reported a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 31 december 2019, and an investigation was launched in early january 2020.
translation.ga: Thuairiscigh údaráis sláinte i wuhan, an tsín (príomhchathair chúige hubei) braisle de chásanna niúmóine gan chúis anaithnid an 31 nollaig 2019, agus seoladh imscrúdú go luath i mí eanáir 2020.

translation.en: The cases mostly had links to the huanan seafood wholesale market and so the virus is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
translation.ga: Den chuid is mó bhí naisc ag na cásanna le margadh mórdhíola bia mara huanan agus mar sin ceaptar go bhfuil bunús zónóiseach ag an víreas.

translation.en: The virus that caused the outbreak is known as sars-cov-2, a newly discovered virus closely related to bat coronaviruses, pangolin coronaviruses, and sars-cov.the earliest known person with symptoms was later discovered to have fallen ill on 1 december 2019, and that person did not have visible connections with the later wet market cluster.
translation.ga: Tugtar sars-cov-2 ar an víreas ba chúis leis an ráig, víreas nua-aimsithe a bhfuil dlúthbhaint aige le coronaviruses ialtóg, coronaviruses pangolin, agus sars-cov. Fuarthas amach ina dhiaidh sin go raibh an duine is luaithe ar a bhfuil comharthaí tinn tinn an 1 nollaig 2019, agus ní raibh naisc infheicthe ag an duine sin leis an mbraisle margaidh fliuch níos déanaí.

translation.en: Of the early cluster of cases reported in december 2019, two-thirds were found to have a link with the market.
translation.ga: As an mbraisle luath cásanna a tuairiscíodh i mí na nollag 2019, fuarthas go raibh nasc ag dhá thrian leis an margadh.

translation.en: On 13 march 2020, an unverified report from the south china morning post suggested that a case traced back to 17 november 2019, in a 55-year-old from hubei province, may have been the first.on 26 february 2020, the who reported that, as new cases reportedly declined in china but suddenly increased in italy, iran, and south korea, the number of new cases outside china had exceeded the number of new cases within china for the first time.
translation.ga: An 13 márta 2020, mhol tuarascáil neamhdheimhnithe ón south china morning post go mb ’ fhéidir gurb é cás a rianaíodh siar go 17 samhain 2019, i bhfear 55 bliain d ’ aois ó chúige hubei, an chéad cheann. An 26 feabhra 2020, thuairiscigh an who de réir mar a tháinig laghdú ar chásanna nua sa tsín ach gur tháinig méadú tobann orthu san iodáil, san iaráin agus sa chóiré theas, gur sháraigh líon na gcásanna nua lasmuigh den tsín líon na gcásanna nua sa tsín den chéad uair.

translation.en: There may be substantial underreporting of cases, particularly among those with milder symptoms.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh tearc-thuairisciú suntasach ar chásanna, go háirithe ina measc siúd a bhfuil comharthaí níos séimhe acu.

translation.en: By 26 february, relatively few cases had been reported among youths, with those 19 and under making up 2.4% of cases worldwide.the united kingdom's chief scientific adviser, patrick vallance, estimated that 60% of the british population would need to become infected before effective herd immunity could be achieved.
translation.ga: Faoi 26 feabhra, ba bheag líon cásanna a tuairiscíodh i measc daoine óga, agus iad siúd faoi 19 agus níos óige ag déanamh suas 2.4% de chásanna ar fud an domhain. Mheas príomhchomhairleoir eolaíochta na ríochta aontaithe, patrick vallance, go gcaithfeadh 60% de dhaonra na breataine a bheith ionfhabhtaithe roimhe seo d ’ fhéadfaí díolúine éifeachtach tréada a bhaint amach.

translation.en: Cases refers to the number of people who have been tested for covid-19, and whose test has been confirmed positive according to official protocols.
translation.ga: Tagraíonn cásanna do líon na ndaoine a ndearnadh tástáil orthu le haghaidh covid-19, agus a ndeimhníodh go bhfuil a dtástáil dearfach de réir prótacal oifigiúil.

translation.en: As of 23 march, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries have had official policies not to test those with only mild symptoms, such as italy, the netherlands, spain, and switzerland.
translation.ga: Amhail an 23 márta, ní dhearna aon tír tástáil ar níos mó ná 3% dá daonra, agus bhí beartais oifigiúla ag go leor tíortha gan tástáil a dhéanamh orthu siúd nach bhfuil ach comharthaí éadroma orthu, mar an iodáil, an ísiltír, an spáinn agus an eilvéis.

translation.en: A study published on 16 march found that in china, up to 23 january, an estimated 86% of covid-19 infections had not been detected, and that these undocumented infections were the infection source for 79% of documented cases.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ staidéar a foilsíodh an 16 márta nár aimsíodh sa tsín, suas go 23 eanáir, thart ar 86% d ’ ionfhabhtuithe covid-19, agus gurb iad na hionfhabhtuithe gan cháipéisíocht seo foinse na n-ionfhabhtuithe do 79% de na cásanna doiciméadaithe.

translation.en: A statistical analysis published 30 march estimated that numbers of infections in italy were considerably greater than the reported cases.
translation.ga: Measadh in anailís staitistiúil a foilsíodh 30 márta go raibh líon na n-ionfhabhtuithe san iodáil i bhfad níos mó ná na cásanna a tuairiscíodh.

translation.en: The initial estimates of the basic reproduction number (r0) for covid-19 were 1.4 to 2.4.
translation.ga: Ba iad na meastacháin tosaigh ar an mbunuimhir atáirgthe (r0) do covid-19 ná 1.4 go 2.4.

translation.en: A study published by the us center for disease control and prevention has concluded that it may be 5.7.
translation.ga: Tháinig staidéar a d ’ fhoilsigh ionad na sa um rialú agus cosc ar ghalair chun críche go bhféadfadh sé a bheith 5.7.

translation.en: Most people with covid-19 recover.
translation.ga: Aisghabhann mórchuid na ndaoine le covid-19.

translation.en: For those who do not, the time from development of symptoms to death has been between 6 and 41 days, with the most common being 14 days.
translation.ga: Dóibh siúd nach ndéanann, bhí an t-am ó fhorbairt na hairíonna go dtí an bás idir 6 agus 41 lá, agus an ceann is coitianta 14 lá.

translation.en: As of 10 april 2020, approximately 97,000 deaths had been attributed to covid-19.
translation.ga: Amhail an 10 aibreán 2020, bhí thart ar 97,000 bás curtha i leith covid-19.

translation.en: In china, as of 5 february about 80% of deaths were in those over 60, and 75% had pre-existing health conditions including cardiovascular diseases and diabetes.official tallies of deaths from the covid-19 pandemic generally refer to dead people who tested positive for covid according to official protocols.
translation.ga: Sa tsín, amhail an 5 feabhra bhí thart ar 80% de na básanna i measc daoine os cionn 60, agus bhí riochtaí sláinte ann cheana ag 75% lena n-áirítear galair cardashoithíoch agus diaibéiteas. De ghnáth tagraíonn ardteochtaí básanna ó phaindéim covid-19 do dhaoine marbha a rinne tástáil dearfach do covid de réir prótacal oifigiúil.

translation.en: The number of true fatalities from covid-19 may be much higher, as it may not include people who die without testing - e.g. at home, in nursing homes, etc.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh líon na bhfíor-bhásanna ó covid-19 i bhfad níos airde, mar d ’ fhéadfadh nach gcuimseodh sé daoine a fhaigheann bás gan tástáil - e.g. sa bhaile, i dtithe altranais, srl.

translation.en: Partial data from italy found that the number of excess deaths during the pandemic exceeded the official covid death tally by a factor of 4-5x.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ sonraí páirteach ón iodáil gur sháraigh líon na mbásanna iomarcacha le linn na paindéime an scóir oifigiúil báis covid ag fachtóir 4-5x.

translation.en: A spokeswoman for the u.s. centers for disease control and prevention (cdc) acknowledged "we know that [the stated death toll] is an underestimation", a statement corroborated by anecdotal reports of undercounting in the u.s. such underestimation often occurs in pandemics, such as the 2009 h1n1 swine flu epidemic.the first confirmed death was in wuhan on 9 january 2020.
translation.ga: D' admhaigh urlabhraí de chuid ionaid na sa um rialú agus cosc ar ghalair (cdc) "tá a fhios againn gur tearcmheastachán é [an dola báis luaite]", ráiteas arna chomhthacú le tuairiscí scéalaíochta faoi thearc-chuntas sna sa is minic a tharlaíonn a leithéid de mheastachán i bpaindéimí, mar shampla eipidéim fliú muc h1n1 2009. Bhí an chéad bhás dearbhaithe i wuhan an 9 eanáir 2020.

translation.en: The first death outside mainland china occurred on 1 february in the philippines, and the first death outside asia was in france on 14 february.
translation.ga: Tharla an chéad bhás lasmuigh de mhórthír na síne an 1 feabhra sna hoileáin fhilipíneacha, agus bhí an chéad bhás lasmuigh den áise sa fhrainc an 14 feabhra.

translation.en: By 28 february, outside mainland china, more than a dozen deaths each were recorded in iran, south korea, and italy.
translation.ga: Faoin 28 feabhra, lasmuigh de mhórthír na síne, taifeadadh níos mó ná dosaen básanna san iaráin, sa chóiré theas agus san iodáil.

translation.en: By 13 march, more than forty countries and territories had reported deaths, on every continent except antarctica.several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
translation.ga: Faoi 13 márta, bhí básanna tuairiscithe ag níos mó ná daichead tír agus críocha, ar gach mór-roinn seachas antartaice. Úsáidtear bearta ginearálta go coitianta chun básmhaireacht a chainníochtú.

translation.en: These numbers vary by region and over time, and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak, and population characteristics such as age, sex, and overall health.the death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
translation.ga: Athraíonn na huimhreacha seo de réir réigiúin agus le himeacht ama, agus bíonn tionchar acu ar mhéid na tástála, cáilíocht an chórais chúraim shláinte, roghanna cóireála, an t-am ón ráig tosaigh, agus tréithe an daonra mar aois, gnéas, agus sláinte iomlán. An cóimheas báis-go-cás léiríonn sé líon na mbásanna arna roinnt ar líon na gcásanna a ndearnadh diagnóis orthu laistigh d' achar ama ar leith.

translation.en: Based on johns hopkins university statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.0% (97,039 / 1,617,204) as of 10 april 2020.
translation.ga: Bunaithe ar staitisticí ollscoil johns hopkins, is é an cóimheas domhanda bás-go-cás ná 6.0% (97,039 / 1,617,204) amhail an 10 aibreán 2020.

translation.en: The number varies by region.
translation.ga: Athraíonn an líon de réir réigiúin.

translation.en: In china, estimates for the death-to-case ratio decreased from 17.3% (for those with symptom onset 1 – 10 january 2020) to 0.7% (for those with symptom onset after 1 february 2020) .other measures include the case fatality rate (cfr), which reflects the percent of diagnosed people who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (ifr), which reflects the percent of infected (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
translation.ga: Sa tsín, tháinig laghdú ar mheastacháin don chóimheas báis-go-cás ó 17.3% (dóibh siúd a raibh siomptóm orthu tosú 1-10 eanáir 2020) go 0.7% (dóibh siúd a raibh siomptóim orthu tar éis 1 feabhra 2020). Cuimsíonn bearta eile an ráta básmhaireachta cáis (cfr), a léiríonn céatadán na ndaoine a ndearnadh diagnóis orthu a fhaigheann bás ó ghalar, agus an ráta básmhaireachta ionfhabhtaithe (ifr), a léiríonn céatadán na ndaoine atá ionfhabhtaithe (a ndearnadh diagnóis orthu agus nach ndearnadh diagnóis orthu) a fhaigheann bás ó ghalar.

translation.en: These statistics are not timebound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
translation.ga: Níl aon teorainn ama leis na staitisticí seo agus leanann siad daonra ar leith ó ionfhabhtú trí chás a réiteach.

translation.en: A number of academics have attempted to calculate these numbers for specific populations.
translation.ga: Tá iarracht déanta ag roinnt acadóirí na huimhreacha seo a ríomh do dhaonraí faoi leith.

translation.en: The university of oxford's centre for evidence-based medicine estimates that the infection fatality rate for the pandemic as a whole is between 0.1% and 0.39%.
translation.ga: Measann ionad leigheas fianaise-bhunaithe ollscoil oxford go bhfuil an ráta básmhaireachta ionfhabhtaithe don phaindéim ina iomláine idir 0.1% agus 0.39%.

translation.en: The upper estimate of this range is consistent with the results from the first random testing for covid-19 in germany, and a statistical study analysing the impact of testing on cfr estimates.
translation.ga: Tá meastachán uachtarach an raoin seo comhsheasmhach leis na torthaí ón gcéad tástáil randamach do covid-19 sa ghearmáin, agus staidéar staidrimh ag déanamh anailíse ar thionchar na tástála ar mheastacháin cfr.

translation.en: The who asserts that the pandemic can be controlled.
translation.ga: Dearbhaíonn an who gur féidir an paindéim a rialú.

translation.en: The peak and ultimate duration of the outbreak are uncertain and may differ by location.
translation.ga: Tá buaic-fhad agus deireadh na ráige neamhchinnte agus d ’ fhéadfadh siad a bheith difriúil de réir suímh.

translation.en: Maciej boni of penn state university stated, "left unchecked, infectious outbreaks typically plateau and then start to decline when the disease runs out of available hosts.
translation.ga: Dúirt maciej boni ó ollscoil stáit penn, “is gnách go mbíonn ráigeanna tógálacha neamhsheiceáilte ar ardchlár agus ansin tosaíonn siad ag meath nuair a ritheann an galar as na hóstach atá ar fáil.

translation.en: But it's almost impossible to make any sensible projection right now about when that will be ".
translation.ga: Ach tá sé beagnach dodhéanta aon teilgean ciallmhar a dhéanamh faoi láthair maidir le cathain a bheidh sé sin ".

translation.en: The chinese government's senior medical adviser zhong nanshan argued that "it could be over by june" if all countries can be mobilized to follow the who's advice on measures to stop the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: D' áitigh comhairleoir míochaine sinsearach rialtas na síne zhong nanshan "go bhféadfadh sé a bheith críochnaithe faoi mhí an mheithimh" más féidir gach tír a shlógadh chun comhairle an who ar bhearta a leanúint chun scaipeadh an víris a stopadh.

translation.en: On 17 march, adam kucharski of the london school of hygiene & amp; tropical medicine stated that sars-cov-2 "is going to be circulating, potentially for a year or two".
translation.ga: An 17 márta, adam kucharski ó scoil sláinteachais londain & amp; dúirt leigheas trópaiceach go bhfuil sars-cov-2 “ag dul i gcúrsaíocht, b ’ fhéidir ar feadh bliana nó dhó ”.

translation.en: According to the imperial college study led by neil ferguson, physical distancing and other measures will be required "until a vaccine becomes available (potentially 18 months or more)".
translation.ga: De réir staidéar an choláiste impiriúil faoi stiúir neil ferguson, beidh gá le fadú fisiceach agus bearta eile "go dtí go mbeidh vacsaín ar fáil (18 mí nó níos mó b ’ fhéidir)".

translation.en: William schaffner of vanderbilt university stated, "i think it's unlikely that this coronavirus — because it's so readily transmissible — will disappear completely" and it "might turn into a seasonal disease, making a comeback every year".
translation.ga: Dúirt william schaffner ó ollscoil vanderbilt, "sílim nach dócha go n-imeoidh an coronavirus seo - toisc go bhfuil sé chomh furasta a tharchur -" agus go bhféadfadh sé a bheith ina ghalar séasúrach, ag teacht ar ais gach bliain ".

translation.en: The virulence of the comeback would depend on herd immunity and the extent of mutation.
translation.ga: Braithfeadh gaireacht an teacht ar ais ar dhíolúine tréada agus ar mhéid an tsócháin.

translation.en: Symptoms of covid-19 can be relatively non-specific and infected people may be asymptomatic.
translation.ga: Is féidir le comharthaí covid-19 a bheith réasúnta neamhshonrach agus d ’ fhéadfadh daoine ionfhabhtaithe a bheith neamhshiomptómach.

translation.en: The two most common symptoms are fever (88%) and dry cough (68%).
translation.ga: Is iad an dá chomhartha is coitianta fiabhras (88%) agus casacht tirim (68%).

translation.en: Less common symptoms include fatigue, respiratory sputum production (phlegm), loss of the sense of smell, shortness of breath, muscle and joint pain, sore throat, headache, chills, vomiting, hemoptysis, diarrhea, or cyanosis.the who states that approximately one person in six becomes seriously ill and has difficulty breathing.
translation.ga: I measc na n-airíonna nach bhfuil chomh coitianta tá tuirse, táirgeadh sputum riospráide (phlegm), cailliúint an bholadh, giorra anála, pian sna matáin agus sa chomhpháirteacha, scornach tinn, tinneas cinn, chills, vomiting, hemoptysis, diarrhea, nó cianóis. Deir who go bhfuil thart ar éiríonn duine amháin as gach seisear go dona tinn agus bíonn deacrachtaí aige análú.

translation.en: The u.s. centers for disease control and prevention (cdc) lists emergency symptoms as difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, sudden confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.further development of the disease can lead to severe pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, sepsis, septic shock and death.
translation.ga: Liostaíonn ionaid um rialú agus cosc galar na sa (cdc) comharthaí éigeandála mar dheacracht análaithe, pian nó brú cófra leanúnach, mearbhall tobann, deacracht ag dúiseacht, agus aghaidh nó liopaí bluish; moltar aire leighis láithreach má tá na hairíonna seo i láthair. D ’ fhéadfadh niúmóine géar, siondróm anacair riospráide géarmhíochaine, sepsis, turraing seipteach agus bás a bheith mar thoradh ar fhorbairt bhreise an ghalair.

translation.en: Some of those infected may be asymptomatic, with no clinical symptoms but with test results that confirm infection, so researchers have issued advice that those with close contact to confirmed infected people should be closely monitored and examined to rule out infection.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh cuid de na daoine atá ionfhabhtaithe a bheith neamhshiomptómach, gan aon comharthaí cliniciúla ach le torthaí tástála a dhearbhaíonn ionfhabhtú, mar sin d ’ eisigh taighdeoirí comhairle gur cheart monatóireacht agus scrúdú dlúth a dhéanamh orthu siúd a bhfuil dlúth-theagmháil acu le daoine ionfhabhtaithe deimhnithe chun an ionfhabhtú a scriosadh amach.

translation.en: Chinese estimates of the asymptomatic ratio range from few to 44%.
translation.ga: Tá meastacháin na síne ar an gcóimheas neamhshiomptómach idir bheag agus 44%.

translation.en: The usual incubation period (the time between infection and symptom onset) ranges from one to 14 days; it is most commonly five days.as an example of uncertainty, the estimate of the fraction of people with covid-19 who lost their sense of smell was initially 30% and later fell to 15%.
translation.ga: Bíonn an ghnáth-thréimhse goir (an t-am idir ionfhabhtú agus tosú na siomtóm) idir lá amháin agus 14 lá; cúig lá is minice a bhíonn ann. mar shampla de neamhchinnteacht, ba é an meastachán ar chodán na ndaoine le covid-19 a chaill a mboladh boladh 30% i dtosach agus thit sé go 15% ina dhiaidh sin.

translation.en: Some details about how the disease is spread are still being determined.
translation.ga: Tá roinnt sonraí fós faoin gcaoi a scaiptear an galar.

translation.en: The disease is believed to be primarily spread during close contact and by small droplets produced during coughing, sneezing, or talking; with close contact being within 1 to 2 metres (3 to 6 feet).
translation.ga: Creidtear go scaiptear an galar go príomha le linn dlúth-theagmhála agus le braoiníní beaga a tháirgtear le linn casacht, sraothartach nó ag caint; le dlúth-theagmháil laistigh de 1 go 2 mhéadar (3 go 6 troigh).

translation.en: Studies have found that an uncovered coughing can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 metres (15 feet) to 8.2 metres (27 feet).
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ staidéir amach go bhféadfadh braoiníní taisteal suas le 4.5 méadar (15 troigh) go 8.2 méadar (27 troigh) a bheith mar thoradh ar casacht neamhnochta.

translation.en: Some have proposed that the virus may also be transmitted by small droplets that stay for more prolonged periods in the air, that may be generated during speech.respiratory droplets may also be produced during breathing out, including when talking, though the virus is not generally airborne.
translation.ga: Tá sé beartaithe ag cuid acu go bhféadfadh braoiníní beaga a fhanann ar feadh tréimhsí níos faide san aer an víreas a tharchur, a fhéadfaí a ghiniúint le linn cainte. Féadfar braoiníní riospráide a tháirgeadh le linn análaithe, lena n-áirítear agus iad ag caint, cé nach gnách go mbíonn an víreas ann aeriompartha.

translation.en: The droplets can land in the mouths or noses of people who are nearby or possibly be inhaled into the lungs.
translation.ga: Is féidir leis na braoiníní teacht i mbéal nó i srón daoine atá in aice láimhe nó b ’ fhéidir a ionanálú isteach sna scamhóga.

translation.en: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (cpr) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolized and thus result in airborne spread.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh roinnt nósanna imeachta míochaine ar nós ionghabháil agus athbheochan cardashoithíoch (cpr) a bheith ina gcúis le haeróiliú a dhéanamh ar rúin riospráide agus dá bhrí sin scaipeadh san aer.

translation.en: It may also spread when one touches a contaminated surface, including skin, and then touches their eyes, nose, or mouth.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh sé scaipeadh freisin nuair a théann duine i dteagmháil le dromchla éillithe, lena n-áirítear craiceann, agus ansin téann sé i dteagmháil lena shúile, lena srón nó lena mbéal.

translation.en: While there are concerns it may spread by faeces, this risk is believed to be low.
translation.ga: Cé go bhfuil imní ann go bhféadfadh sé faecas a scaipeadh, creidtear go bhfuil an riosca seo íseal.

translation.en: The government of china denied the possibility of faecal-oral transmission of sars-cov-2.the virus is most contagious during the first three days after onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.
translation.ga: Shéan rialtas na síne an fhéidearthacht go ndéanfaí tarchur faecach-béil ar sars-cov-2.tá an víreas an-tógálach le linn na chéad trí lá tar éis na hairíonna a bheith ann, cé go bhféadfadh scaipeadh a bheith ann sula mbíonn na hairíonna le feiceáil agus ag céimeanna níos déanaí den ghalar.

translation.en: People have tested positive for the disease up to three days before onset of symptoms suggesting transmission is possible before developing significant symptoms.
translation.ga: Tá tástáil dhearfach déanta ag daoine ar an ngalar suas le trí lá sula dtosaíonn na hairíonna a thugann le tuiscint go bhfuil sé indéanta tarchur sula ndéantar comharthaí suntasacha a fhorbairt.

translation.en: Only few reports of laboratory-confirmed asymptomatic cases exist, but asymptomatic transmission has been identified by some countries during contact tracing investigations.
translation.ga: Níl ach fíorbheagán tuairiscí ar chásanna neamhshiomptómacha deimhnithe ag saotharlann, ach d ’ aithin roinnt tíortha tarchur neamhshiomptómach le linn imscrúduithe ar rianú teagmhála.

translation.en: The european centre for disease prevention and control (ecdc) states that while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.the virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
translation.ga: Deir an lárionad eorpach um ghalair a chosc agus a rialú (ecdc) cé nach bhfuil sé soiléir go hiomlán cé chomh héasca agus a scaipeann an galar, is iondúil go ndéanann duine amháin dhá nó trí cinn eile a ionfhabhtú. Maireann an víreas ar feadh uaireanta go laethanta ar dhromchlaí.

translation.en: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and 304 stainless steel, for one day on cardboard, and for up to four hours on copper.
translation.ga: Go sonrach, fuarthas go raibh an víreas inbhraite ar feadh suas le trí lá ar phlaisteach (polapróipiléin) agus 304 cruach dhosmálta, ar feadh lae amháin ar chairtchlár, agus ar feadh suas le ceithre huaire an chloig ar chopar.

translation.en: This, however, varies based on the humidity and temperature.pets and other animals have tested positive for covid-19.
translation.ga: Athraíonn sé seo, áfach, bunaithe ar an taise agus an teocht. Tá tástáil dhearfach déanta ag covid-19 ar ainmhithe agus ar ainmhithe eile.

translation.en: There is no evidence animals can pass the virus on to humans, though british authorities advise washing one's hands after contact with animals, like after contact with other surfaces infected people could have touched.
translation.ga: Níl aon fhianaise ann gur féidir le hainmhithe an víreas a chur ar aghaidh chuig daoine, cé go dtugann údaráis na breataine comhairle dóibh lámha a ní tar éis dóibh teagmháil a dhéanamh le hainmhithe, cosúil le teagmháil a dhéanamh le dromchlaí eile a bhféadfadh daoine atá ionfhabhtaithe a bheith i dteagmháil léi.

translation.en: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (sars-cov-2) is a novel virus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in wuhan.
translation.ga: Is víreas núíosach é coronavirus géar siondróm riospráide géarmhíochaine 2 (sars-cov-2), scoite amach ar dtús ó thriúr le niúmóine ceangailte leis an mbraisle cásanna breoiteachta riospráide géarmhíochaine i wuhan.

translation.en: All features of the novel sars-cov-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which dissolves its protective envelope.sars-cov-2 is closely related to the original sars-cov.
translation.ga: Tá gach gné den víreas úrscéal sars-cov-2 le fáil i coronaviruses gaolmhara sa nádúr. Taobh amuigh de chorp an duine, maraítear an víreas le gallúnach tí, a dhíscaoileann a chlúdach cosanta. Tá dlúthbhaint ag sars-cov-2 leis an sars bunaidh- cov.

translation.en: It is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
translation.ga: Ceaptar go bhfuil bunús zónóiseach aige.

translation.en: Genetic analysis has revealed that the coronavirus genetically clusters with the genus betacoronavirus, in subgenus sarbecovirus (lineage b) together with two bat-derived strains.
translation.ga: Léirigh anailís ghéiniteach go mbraislíonn an coronavirus go géiniteach leis an ngéineas betacoronavirus, i subgenus sarbecovirus (líneáil b) mar aon le dhá shraith díorthaithe ó ialtóga.

translation.en: It is 96% identical at the whole genome level to other bat coronavirus samples (batcov ratg13).
translation.ga: Tá sé 96% comhionann ag leibhéal iomlán an ghéanóim le samplaí eile coronavirus ialtóg (batcov ratg13).

translation.en: In february 2020, chinese researchers found that there is only one amino acid difference in certain parts of the genome sequences between the viruses from pangolins and those from humans.
translation.ga: I mí feabhra 2020, fuair taighdeoirí na síne nach bhfuil ach difríocht aimínaigéad amháin i gcodanna áirithe de sheichimh an ghéanóim idir na víris ó phangóil agus iad siúd ó dhaoine.

translation.en: Whole-genome comparison to date has found at most 92% of genetic material shared between pangolin coronavirus and sars-cov-2, which is insufficient to prove pangolins to be the intermediate host.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ comparáid idir géanóm iomlán go dtí seo 92% ar a laghad den ábhar géiniteach arna roinnt idir coronavirus pangolin agus sars-cov-2, nach leor chun pangóil a chruthú mar óstach idirmheánach.

translation.en: Infection by the virus can be provisionally diagnosed on the basis of symptoms, though confirmation is ultimately by reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rrt-pcr) of infected secretions or ct imaging.
translation.ga: Is féidir ionfhabhtú an víris a dhiagnóisiú go sealadach ar bhonn na hairíonna, cé go ndéantar dearbhú sa deireadh trí imoibriú slabhrúil polaiméaráise tras-athscríobh (rrt-pcr) de rúin ionfhabhtaithe nó íomháú ct.

translation.en: A study comparing pcr to ct in wuhan has suggested that ct is significantly more sensitive than pcr, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
translation.ga: Thug staidéar a dhéanann comparáid idir pcr agus ct i wuhan le fios go bhfuil ct i bhfad níos íogaire ná pcr, cé nach bhfuil sé chomh sonrach, le go leor dá ghnéithe íomháithe ag forluí le próisis niúmóine agus galair eile.

translation.en: As of march 2020, the american college of radiology recommends that "ct should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose covid-19".
translation.ga: Amhail márta 2020, molann coláiste raideolaíochta mheiriceá “nár cheart ct a úsáid chun scagadh le haghaidh nó mar thástáil chéadlíne chun covid-19 a dhiagnóisiú ”.

translation.en: The who has published several rna testing protocols for sars-cov-2, with the first issued on 17 january.
translation.ga: D ’ fhoilsigh an who roinnt prótacal tástála rna do sars-cov-2, agus eisíodh an chéad cheann an 17 eanáir.

translation.en: The test uses real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rrt-pcr).
translation.ga: Úsáideann an tástáil imoibriú slabhrúil polaiméaráise tras-athscríobh fíor-ama (rrt-pcr).

translation.en: The test can be done on respiratory or blood samples.
translation.ga: Is féidir an tástáil a dhéanamh ar shamplaí riospráide nó fola.

translation.en: Results are generally available within a few hours to days.
translation.ga: De ghnáth bíonn torthaí ar fáil laistigh de chúpla uair an chloig go laethanta.

translation.en: Generally this test is carried out on a nasopharyngeal swab though a throat swab may also be used.a number of laboratories and companies are developing serological tests, which detect antibodies.
translation.ga: De ghnáth déantar an tástáil seo ar swab nasopharyngeal cé gur féidir swab scornach a úsáid freisin. Tá tástálacha séireolaíochta á bhforbairt ag líon saotharlann agus cuideachtaí, a aimsíonn antasubstaintí.

translation.en: As of 6 april 2020, none of these has been proved sufficiently accurate to be approved for widespread use.
translation.ga: Amhail an 6 aibreán 2020, níor cruthaíodh go raibh aon cheann acu seo cruinn go leor le go gceadófaí iad le húsáid go forleathan.

translation.en: In the us a serological test developed by cellex has been approved for emergency use by certified laboratories only.
translation.ga: Sna stáit aontaithe tá tástáil séireolaíoch a d ’ fhorbair cellex ceadaithe le haghaidh úsáide éigeandála ag saotharlanna deimhnithe amháin.

translation.en: Characteristic imaging features on radiographs and computed tomography (ct) of people who are symptomatic include asymmetric peripheral ground glass opacities and absent pleural effusions.
translation.ga: I measc na ngnéithe íomháithe tréithiúla ar radagrafaíochtaí agus tomagrafaíocht ríofa (ct) daoine atá siomptómach tá teochtaí gloine talún imeallacha neamhshiméadracha agus eisiltí pleuracha as láthair.

translation.en: The italian radiological society is compiling an international online database of imaging findings for confirmed cases.
translation.ga: Tá cumann raideolaíoch na hiodáile ag cur bunachar sonraí idirnáisiúnta ar líne le chéile maidir le torthaí íomháithe do chásanna dearbhaithe.

translation.en: Due to overlap with other infections such as adenovirus, imaging without confirmation by pcr is of limited specificity in identifying covid-19.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar fhorluí le hionfhabhtuithe eile mar adenovirus, tá sainiúlacht theoranta ag íomháú gan deimhniú ó pcr maidir le covid-19 a aithint.

translation.en: A large study in china compared chest ct results to pcr and demonstrated that though imaging is less specific for the infection, it is faster and more sensitive, suggesting its consideration as a screening tool in epidemic areas.
translation.ga: Rinne staidéar mór sa tsín comparáid idir torthaí ct cófra le pcr agus léirigh, cé nach bhfuil íomháú chomh sonrach don ionfhabhtú, go bhfuil sí níos gasta agus níos íogaire, ag moladh go mbreathnófaí uirthi mar uirlis scagtha i réimsí eipidéime.

translation.en: Artificial intelligence-based convolutional neural networks have been developed to detect imaging features of the virus with both radiographs and ct.
translation.ga: Forbraíodh líonraí neural diongbháilte atá bunaithe ar fhaisnéis shaorga chun gnéithe íomháithe den víreas a bhrath le radagrafaíochtaí agus le ct.

translation.en: Strategies for preventing transmission of the disease include maintaining overall good personal hygiene, washing hands, avoiding touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands, and coughing or sneezing into a tissue and putting the tissue directly into a waste container.
translation.ga: I measc na straitéisí chun tarchur an ghalair a chosc tá sláinteachas pearsanta maith foriomlán a choinneáil, lámha a ní, seachain teagmháil a dhéanamh leis na súile, an srón, nó an béal le lámha neamhfhite, agus casacht nó sraothartach isteach i bhfíochán agus an fíochán a chur go díreach i gcoimeádán dramhaíola.

translation.en: Those who may already have the infection have been advised to wear a surgical mask in public.
translation.ga: Tugadh comhairle dóibh siúd a bhféadfadh an t-ionfhabhtú a bheith acu masc máinliachta a chaitheamh go poiblí.

translation.en: Physical distancing measures are also recommended to prevent transmission.many governments have restricted or advised against all non-essential travel to and from countries and areas affected by the outbreak.
translation.ga: Moltar bearta um fhadú fisiceach freisin chun tarchur a chosc. Chuir rialtais éagsúla srian nó comhairle ar gach taisteal neamhriachtanach chuig agus ó thíortha agus ceantair a ndeachaigh an ráig i bhfeidhm orthu.

translation.en: However, the virus has reached the stage of community spread in large parts of the world.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, tá an víreas tar éis céim an leathadh pobail a bhaint amach i gcodanna móra den domhan.

translation.en: This means that the virus is spreading within communities, and some community members don't know where or how they were infected.health care providers taking care of someone who may be infected are recommended to use standard precautions, contact precautions, and eye protection.contact tracing is an important method for health authorities to determine the source of an infection and to prevent further transmission.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo go bhfuil an víreas ag leathadh laistigh de phobail, agus níl a fhios ag baill áirithe den phobal cá háit nó conas a bhí siad ionfhabhtaithe. Moltar do sholáthraithe cúraim sláinte a thugann aire do dhuine a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith ionfhabhtaithe réamhchúraimí caighdeánacha, réamhchúraimí teagmhála agus cosaint súl a úsáid. Is modh tábhachtach é rianú teagmhála d ’ údaráis sláinte chun foinse an ionfhabhtaithe a chinneadh agus chun tarchur breise a chosc.

translation.en: The use of location data from mobile phones by governments for this purpose has prompted privacy concerns, with amnesty international and over 100 other organizations issuing a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
translation.ga: Tá úsáid sonraí suímh ó fhóin phóca ag rialtais chun na críche seo tar éis imní faoi phríobháideacht a spreagadh, le amnesty international agus os cionn 100 eagraíocht eile ag eisiúint ráitis ag éileamh teorainneacha ar an gcineál seo faireachais.

translation.en: Various mobile apps have been implemented or proposed for voluntary use, and as of april 7, 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using bluetooth to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
translation.ga: Cuireadh aipeanna soghluaiste éagsúla i bhfeidhm nó moltar iad lena n-úsáid go deonach, agus amhail an 7 aibreán 2020, bhí níos mó ná dosaen sainghrúpaí ag obair ar réitigh a thacaíonn le príobháideacht, mar shampla bluetooth a úsáid chun gaireacht úsáideora do fhóin phóca eile a logáil.

translation.en: Users then receive a message if they've been in close contact with someone who has tested positive for covid-19.misconceptions are circulating about how to prevent infection; for example, rinsing the nose and gargling with mouthwash are not effective.
translation.ga: Ansin faigheann úsáideoirí teachtaireacht má bhí siad i ndlúth-thadhall le duine a ndearna tástáil dhearfach air maidir le covid-19. Tá míthuiscintí ag scaipeadh faoi conas ionfhabhtú a chosc; mar shampla, níl sé éifeachtach an srón a shruthlú agus gargáil le cuas béil.

translation.en: There is no covid-19 vaccine, though many organizations are working to develop one.
translation.ga: Níl aon vacsaín covid-19 ann, cé go bhfuil go leor eagraíochtaí ag obair chun ceann a fhorbairt.

translation.en: Hand washing is recommended to prevent the spread of the disease.
translation.ga: Moltar níocháin láimhe chun leathadh an ghalair a chosc.

translation.en: The cdc recommends that people wash hands often with soap and water for at least twenty seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty; before eating; and after blowing one's nose, coughing, or sneezing.
translation.ga: Molann an cdc go nighfeadh daoine a lámha go minic le gallúnach agus le huisce ar feadh fiche soicind ar a laghad, go háirithe tar éis dóibh dul go dtí an leithreas nó nuair a bhíonn na lámha salach salach; roimh ithe; agus tar éis srón duine a shéideadh, casacht nó sraothartach.

translation.en: This is because outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.
translation.ga: Tarlaíonn sé seo toisc go maraíonn an víreas taobh amuigh de chorp an duine gallúnach tí, a phléascann a mboilgeog chosanta.

translation.en: Cdc further recommended using an alcohol-based hand sanitizer with at least 60% alcohol by volume when soap and water are not readily available.
translation.ga: Mhol cdc a thuilleadh úsáid a bhaint as sláintitheoir láimhe alcól-bhunaithe le alcól 60% ar a laghad de réir toirte nuair nach bhfuil gallúnach agus uisce ar fáil go héasca.

translation.en: The who advises people to avoid touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands.
translation.ga: Molann an who do dhaoine teagmháil a dhéanamh leis na súile, an srón nó an béal le lámha neamhshruthaithe.

translation.en: Surfaces may be decontaminated with a number of solutions (within one minute of exposure to the disinfectant for a stainless steel surface), including 62 – 71% ethanol, 50 – 100% isopropanol, 0.1% sodium hypochlorite, 0.5% hydrogen peroxide, and 0.2 – 7.5% povidone-iodine.
translation.ga: Féadfar dromchlaí a dhí-éilliú le roinnt tuaslagán (laistigh de nóiméad amháin ón nochtadh don dífhabhtán do dhromchla cruach dhosmálta), lena n-áirítear eatánól 62 – 71%, isopropanol 50 – 100%, fochlóirít sóidiam 0.1%, sárocsaíd hidrigine 0.5%, agus 0.2 – 7.5% povidone-iaidín.

translation.en: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chrohexidine gluconate, are less effective.
translation.ga: Níl réitigh eile, mar shampla clóiríd benzalkonium agus gluconate chrohexidine, chomh héifeachtach.

translation.en: The cdc recommends that if a covid case is suspected or confirmed at a facility such as an office or day care, all areas such as offices, bathrooms, common areas, shared electronic equipment like tablets, touch screens, keyboards, remote controls, and atm machines used by the ill persons, should be disinfected.
translation.ga: Molann an cdc má tá amhras ann nó má dheimhnítear cás covid ag saoráid mar oifig nó cúram lae, gach réimse mar oifigí, seomraí folctha, comhlimistéir, trealamh leictreonach roinnte mar tháibléid, scáileáin tadhaill, méarchláir, cianrialtáin, agus bat ba chóir meaisíní a úsáideann daoine breoite a dhíghalrú.

translation.en: Health organizations recommended that people cover their mouth and nose with a bent elbow or a tissue when coughing or sneezing, and disposing of any tissue immediately.
translation.ga: Mhol eagraíochtaí sláinte go gclúdódh daoine a mbéal agus a srón le uillinn lúbtha nó le fíochán agus iad ag casacht nó ag sraothartach, agus aon fhíochán a dhiúscairt láithreach.

translation.en: Surgical masks are recommended for those who may be infected, as wearing a mask can limit the volume and travel distance of expiratory droplets dispersed when talking, sneezing, and coughing.
translation.ga: Moltar maisc mháinliachta dóibh siúd a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith ionfhabhtaithe, mar is féidir le masc a chaitheamh teorainn a chur le méid agus fad taistil braoiníní eisfheartha a scaiptear agus iad ag caint, ag sraothartach agus ag casacht.

translation.en: The who has issued instructions on when and how to use masks.
translation.ga: Tá treoracha eisithe ag an who maidir le cathain agus conas maisc a úsáid.

translation.en: According to stephen griffin, a virologist at the university of leeds, "wearing a mask can reduce the propensity [of] people to touch their faces, which is a major source of infection without proper hand hygiene." Masks have also been recommended for use by those taking care of someone who may have the disease.
translation.ga: Dar le stephen griffin, víreolaí in ollscoil leeds, “is féidir le caitheamh masc an claonadh atá ag daoine teagmháil a dhéanamh lena n-aghaidheanna a laghdú, ar foinse mhór ionfhabhtaithe é gan sláinteachas láimhe ceart." Moladh mascanna a úsáid freisin ag na daoine a thugann aire do dhuine a bhféadfadh an galar a bheith air.

translation.en: The who has recommended the wearing of masks by healthy people only if they are at high risk, such as those who are caring for a person with covid-19, although they also acknowledge that wearing masks may help people avoid touching their face.
translation.ga: Mhol an who go gcaithfeadh daoine sláintiúla maisc a chaitheamh má tá siad i mbaol ard, mar shampla iad siúd atá ag tabhairt aire do dhuine le covid-19, cé go n-admhaíonn siad freisin go bhféadfadh caitheamh maisc cabhrú le daoine gan a n-aghaidh a sheachaint.

translation.en: Several countries have started to encourage the use of face masks by members of the public.
translation.ga: Tá roinnt tíortha tar éis tús a chur le húsáid mascanna aghaidhe ag daoine den phobal.

translation.en: In the u.s., the cdc recommends wearing non-medical face mask made out of cloth.china has specifically recommended the use of disposable medical masks by healthy members of the public, particularly when coming into close contact (1 metre (3 ft) or less) with other people.
translation.ga: Sna stáit aontaithe, molann an cdc masc aghaidh neamh-leighis a chaitheamh as éadach. Mhol mol go sonrach go n-úsáidfeadh daoine sláintiúla maisc mhíochaine indiúscartha, go háirithe agus í i ndlúth-theagmháil (1 mhéadar (3 troigh) nó níos lú) le daoine eile.

translation.en: Hong kong recommends wearing a surgical mask when taking public transport or staying in crowded places.
translation.ga: Molann hong cong masc máinliachta a chaitheamh agus é ag iompar poiblí nó ag fanacht in áiteanna plódaithe.

translation.en: Thailand's health officials are encouraging people to make cloth facemasks at home and wash them daily.
translation.ga: Tá oifigigh sláinte na téalainne ag spreagadh daoine chun aghaidheanna éadach a dhéanamh sa bhaile agus iad a ní go laethúil.

translation.en: The czech republic and slovakia banned going out in public without wearing a mask or covering one's nose and mouth.
translation.ga: Chuir poblacht na seice agus an tslóvaic cosc ​ ​ ar dul amach go poiblí gan masc a chaitheamh nó srón agus béal duine a chlúdach.

translation.en: On 16 march, vietnam requested everyone to wear a face mask when going to public areas in order to protect themselves and others.
translation.ga: Ar 16 márta, d ’ iarr vítneam ar gach duine masc aghaidh a chaitheamh agus iad ag dul chuig áiteanna poiblí d ’ fhonn iad féin agus daoine eile a chosaint.

translation.en: The austrian government mandated that everyone entering a grocery store must wear a face mask.
translation.ga: Tá sainordú ag rialtas na hostaire go gcaithfidh gach duine a théann isteach i siopa grósaera masc aghaidh a chaitheamh.

translation.en: Israel has asked all residents to wear face masks when in public.
translation.ga: D' iarr iosrael ar gach cónaitheoir maisc aghaidhe a chaitheamh agus iad go poiblí.

translation.en: Taiwan, which has been producing ten million masks per day since mid-march, required passengers on trains and intercity buses to wear face masks on 1 april.
translation.ga: D' éiligh taiwan, atá ag táirgeadh deich milliún masc in aghaidh an lae ó lár mhí an mhárta, ar phaisinéirí ar thraenacha agus ar bhusanna idirchathrach maisc aghaidhe a chaitheamh an 1 aibreán.

translation.en: Panama has made it obligatory to wear a face mask whenever going outside, while also recommending the manufacture of a homemade face mask for those who cannot purchase face masks.
translation.ga: Chuir panama iallach air masc aghaidh a chaitheamh gach uair a théann sé lasmuigh, agus mhol sé freisin masc aghaidh homemade a mhonarú dóibh siúd nach féidir leo maisc aghaidhe a cheannach.

translation.en: Face masks have also been widely used in japan, south korea, malaysia, and singapore.
translation.ga: Baineadh úsáid fhorleathan as maisc aghaidhe sa tseapáin, sa chóiré theas, sa mhalaeisia agus i singeapór.

translation.en: Social distancing (also known as physical distancing) includes infection control actions intended to slow the spread of disease by minimizing close contact between individuals.
translation.ga: Cuimsíonn fadú sóisialta (ar a dtugtar fadú fisiceach freisin) gníomhartha rialaithe ionfhabhtaithe a bhfuil sé mar aidhm acu scaipeadh an ghalair a mhoilliú trí dhlúth-theagmháil idir daoine aonair a íoslaghdú.

translation.en: Methods include quarantines; travel restrictions; and the closing of schools, workplaces, stadiums, theatres, or shopping centres.
translation.ga: I measc na modhanna tá coraintíní; srianta taistil; agus scoileanna, ionaid oibre, staidiamaí, amharclanna nó ionaid siopadóireachta a dhúnadh.

translation.en: Individuals may apply social distancing methods by staying at home, limiting travel, avoiding crowded areas, using no-contact greetings, and physically distancing themselves from others.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh daoine modhanna faid shóisialta a chur i bhfeidhm trí fanacht sa bhaile, taisteal a theorannú, ceantair plódaithe a sheachaint, beannachtaí gan teagmháil a úsáid, agus iad féin a scaradh ó dhaoine eile go fisiciúil.

translation.en: Many governments are now mandating or recommending social distancing in regions affected by the outbreak.
translation.ga: Tá go leor rialtais anois ag sainordú nó ag moladh fadú sóisialta i réigiúin a ndeachaigh an ráig i bhfeidhm orthu.

translation.en: The maximum gathering size recommended by us government bodies and health organizations was swiftly reduced from 250 people (if there was no known covid-19 spread in a region) to 50 people, and later to 10 people.
translation.ga: Laghdaíodh an méid bailithe uasta a mhol comhlachtaí rialtais agus eagraíochtaí sláinte na sa go tapa ó 250 duine (mura raibh scaipeadh covid-19 ar eolas i réigiún) go 50 duine, agus níos déanaí go 10 duine.

translation.en: On 22 march 2020, germany banned public gatherings of more than two people.older adults and those with underlying medical conditions such as diabetes, heart disease, respiratory disease, hypertension, and compromised immune systems face increased risk of serious illness and complications and have been advised by the cdc to stay home as much as possible in areas of community outbreak.in late march 2020, the who and other health bodies began to replace the use of the term "social distancing" with "physical distancing", to clarify that the aim is to reduce physical contact while maintaining social connections, either virtually or at a distance.
translation.ga: Ar 22 márta 2020, chuir an ghearmáin cosc ​ ​ ar chruinnithe poiblí de níos mó ná beirt daoine. Tá baol méadaithe breoiteachta agus deacrachtaí tromchúisí ag daoine fásta níos sine agus iad siúd a bhfuil riochtaí míochaine bunúsacha orthu mar diaibéiteas, galar croí, galar riospráide, hipirtheannas, agus córais imdhíonachta comhréitigh agus bhí siad thug an cdc comhairle dóibh fanacht sa bhaile a oiread agus is féidir i réimsí ráige pobail. Go déanach i mí an mhárta 2020, thosaigh an who agus comhlachtaí sláinte eile in ionad úsáid an téarma “fadú sóisialta ” le“ fadú fisiceach ”, chun a shoiléiriú go bhfuil an tá sé mar aidhm teagmháil fhisiceach a laghdú agus naisc shóisialta a choinneáil, beagnach nó i gcéin.

translation.en: The use of the term "social distancing" had led to implications that people should engage in complete social isolation, rather than encouraging them to stay in contact with others through alternative means.some authorities have issued sexual health guidelines for use during the pandemic.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh ar úsáid an téarma “fadú sóisialta ” bhí impleachtaí ann gur cheart do dhaoine dul i mbun aonrú sóisialta iomlán, seachas iad a spreagadh chun fanacht i dteagmháil le daoine eile ar bhealaí malartacha. Tá treoirlínte sláinte gnéis eisithe ag údaráis áirithe le húsáid le linn na paindéime.

translation.en: These include recommendations to only have sex with someone you live with, who does not have the virus or symptoms of the virus.
