translation.ga: Ina measc seo tá moltaí gan gnéas a bheith agat ach le duine a bhfuil cónaí ort leis, nach bhfuil an víreas nó comharthaí an víris aige.

translation.en: Self-isolation at home has been recommended for those diagnosed with covid-19 and those who suspect they have been infected.
translation.ga: Moladh féin-aonrú sa bhaile dóibh siúd a ndearnadh diagnóis orthu le covid-19 agus dóibh siúd a bhfuil amhras orthu go bhfuil siad ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: Health agencies have issued detailed instructions for proper self-isolation.many governments have mandated or recommended self-quarantine for entire populations living in affected areas.
translation.ga: Tá treoracha mionsonraithe eisithe ag gníomhaireachtaí sláinte maidir le féin-aonrú ceart. Tá sainordú nó moladh ag rialtais éagsúla féin-coraintín do dhaonraí iomlána atá ina gcónaí i gceantair atá buailte.

translation.en: The strongest self-quarantine instructions have been issued to those in high risk groups.
translation.ga: Eisíodh na treoracha féin-coraintín is láidre dóibh siúd i ngrúpaí ardriosca.

translation.en: Those who may have been exposed to someone with covid-19 and those who have recently travelled to a country or region with widespread transmission have been advised to self-quarantine for 14 days from the time of last possible exposure.
translation.ga: Cuireadh in iúl dóibh siúd a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith nochtaithe do dhuine le covid-19 agus dóibh siúd a thaistil le déanaí go tír nó réigiún a bhfuil tarchur forleathan acu féin-choraintín a dhéanamh ar feadh 14 lá ó am an nochtaithe dheireanaigh is féidir.

translation.en: Strategies in the control of an outbreak are containment or suppression, and mitigation.
translation.ga: Is iad na straitéisí chun ráig a rialú srianadh nó cosc, agus maolú.

translation.en: Containment is undertaken in the early stages of the outbreak and aims to trace and isolate those infected as well as introduce other measures of infection control and vaccinations to stop the disease from spreading to the rest of the population.
translation.ga: Déantar an coimeád go luath sa ráig agus tá sé mar aidhm aige na daoine atá ionfhabhtaithe a rianú agus a leithlisiú chomh maith le bearta eile rialaithe ionfhabhtaithe agus vacsaínithe a thabhairt isteach chun an galar a chosc ó scaipeadh go dtí an chuid eile den daonra.

translation.en: When it is no longer possible to contain the spread of the disease, efforts then move to the mitigation stage: Measures are taken to slow the spread and mitigate its effects on the healthcare system and society.
translation.ga: Nuair nach féidir scaipeadh an ghalair a choinneáil a thuilleadh, aistrítear iarrachtaí ansin go dtí an chéim maolaithe: Tógtar bearta chun an scaipeadh a mhoilliú agus a éifeachtaí ar an gcóras cúram sláinte agus ar an tsochaí a mhaolú.

translation.en: A combination of both containment and mitigation measures may be undertaken at the same time.
translation.ga: Féadfar teaglaim de bhearta coimeádta agus maolaithe a dhéanamh ag an am céanna.

translation.en: Suppression requires more extreme measures so as to reverse the pandemic by reducing the basic reproduction number to less than 1.part of managing an infectious disease outbreak is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as flattening the epidemic curve.
translation.ga: Teastaíonn bearta níos foircní chun an paindéim a aisiompú tríd an mbunuimhir atáirgthe a laghdú go dtí níos lú ná 1. Tá an chuid de bhainistíocht ráige galar tógálach ag iarraidh buaic an eipidéim a laghdú, ar a dtugtar an cuar eipidéim a leathadh.

translation.en: This decreases the risk of health services being overwhelmed and provides more time for vaccines and treatments to be developed.
translation.ga: Laghdaíonn sé seo an baol go sáraítear seirbhísí sláinte agus soláthraíonn sé níos mó ama chun vacsaíní agus cóireálacha a fhorbairt.

translation.en: Non-pharmaceutical interventions that may manage the outbreak include personal preventive measures, such as hand hygiene, wearing face-masks, and self-quarantine; community measures aimed at physical distancing such as closing schools and cancelling mass gathering events; community engagement to encourage acceptance and participation in such interventions; as well as environmental measures such surface cleaning.more drastic actions aimed at containing the outbreak were taken in china once the severity of the outbreak became apparent, such as quarantining entire cities and imposing strict travel bans.
translation.ga: I measc na n-idirghabhálacha neamh-chógaisíochta a d ’ fhéadfadh an ráig a bhainistiú tá bearta coisctheacha pearsanta, mar shláinteachas láimhe, caitheamh maisc aghaidhe, agus féin-choraintín; bearta pobail atá dírithe ar fhadú fisiceach ar nós scoileanna a dhúnadh agus imeachtaí ollchruinnithe a chealú; rannpháirtíocht an phobail chun glacadh agus rannpháirtíocht in idirghabhálacha den sórt sin a spreagadh; chomh maith le bearta comhshaoil ​ ​ glanadh dromchla den sórt sin. Rinneadh níos mó gníomhartha diana a bhí dírithe ar an ráig a choinneáil sa tsín nuair a tháinig déine na ráige chun solais, mar shampla coraintín a dhéanamh ar chathracha iomlána agus toirmeasc dian taistil a fhorchur.

translation.en: Other countries also adopted a variety of measures aimed at limiting the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Ghlac tíortha eile bearta éagsúla freisin a bhí dírithe ar scaipeadh an víris a theorannú.

translation.en: South korea introduced mass screening and localized quarantines, and issued alerts on the movements of infected individuals.
translation.ga: Thug an chóiré theas isteach scagthástáil mais agus coraintíní áitiúla, agus d ’ eisigh sí foláirimh faoi ghluaiseachtaí daoine ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: Singapore provided financial support for those infected who quarantined themselves and imposed large fines for those who failed to do so.
translation.ga: Chuir singeapór tacaíocht airgeadais ar fáil dóibh siúd a bhí ionfhabhtaithe a rinne coraintín orthu féin agus a ghearr fíneálacha móra orthu siúd nár éirigh leo déanamh amhlaidh.

translation.en: Taiwan increased face mask production and penalized hoarding of medical supplies.simulations for great britain and the united states show that mitigation (slowing but not stopping epidemic spread) and suppression (reversing epidemic growth) have major challenges.
translation.ga: Mhéadaigh taiwan táirgeadh masc aghaidh agus clárlach pionósach soláthairtí míochaine. Taispeánann imoibrithe don bhreatain mhór agus do na stáit aontaithe go bhfuil dúshláin mhóra roimh mhaolú (moilliú ach gan stop a chur le scaipeadh eipidéim) agus faoi chois (fás eipidéim a aisiompú).

translation.en: Optimal mitigation policies might reduce peak healthcare demand by 2 / 3 and deaths by half, but still result in hundreds of thousands of deaths and health systems being overwhelmed.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh na beartais maolaithe is fearr an buaic-éileamh ar chúram sláinte a laghdú 2 / 3 agus básanna faoi leath, ach fós d ’ fhéadfadh na céadta mílte bás agus córais sláinte a bheith sáraithe.

translation.en: Suppression can be preferred but needs to be maintained for as long as the virus is circulating in the human population (or until a vaccine becomes available, if that comes first), as transmission otherwise quickly rebounds when measures are relaxed.
translation.ga: Is fearr an cosc ​ ​ a chur air ach caithfear é a choinneáil chomh fada agus a bhíonn an víreas ag scaipeadh i measc an duine (nó go dtí go mbeidh vacsaín ar fáil, má thagann sé sin ar dtús), toisc go n-athraíonn an tarchur go gasta nuair a dhéantar bearta a mhaolú.

translation.en: Long-term intervention to suppress the pandemic causes social and economic costs.
translation.ga: Tá costais shóisialta agus eacnamaíocha mar thoradh ar idirghabháil fhadtéarmach chun an paindéim a bhaint.

translation.en: There are no specific antiviral medications approved for covid-19, but development efforts are underway, including testing of existing medications.
translation.ga: Níl aon chógas frithvíreas ar leith ceadaithe do covid-19, ach tá iarrachtaí forbartha ar siúl, lena n-áirítear tástáil ar chógais atá ann cheana.

translation.en: Taking over-the-counter cold medications, drinking fluids, and resting may help alleviate symptoms.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh míochainí fuara thar an gcuntar, sreabháin óil, agus scíthe cabhrú le hairíonna a mhaolú.

translation.en: Depending on the severity, oxygen therapy, intravenous fluids, and breathing support may be required.
translation.ga: Ag brath ar an déine, d ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh gá le teiripe ocsaigine, sreabhán infhéitheach, agus tacaíocht análaithe.

translation.en: The use of steroids may worsen outcomes.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh úsáid stéaróidigh torthaí a dhéanamh níos measa.

translation.en: Several compounds that were previously approved for treatment of other viral diseases are being investigated for use in treating covid-19.
translation.ga: Tá imscrúdú á dhéanamh ar roinnt comhdhúile a ceadaíodh roimhe seo chun cóireáil a dhéanamh ar ghalair víreasacha eile le húsáid chun covid-19 a chóireáil.

translation.en: The who also stated that some "traditional and home remedies" can provide relief of the symptoms caused by sars-cov-19.
translation.ga: Dúirt an who freisin gur féidir le roinnt “leigheasanna traidisiúnta agus baile ” faoiseamh a thabhairt ó na hairíonna de bharr sars-cov-19.

translation.en: Increasing capacity and adapting healthcare for the needs of covid-19 patients is described by the who as a fundamental outbreak response measure.
translation.ga: Déanann an who cur síos ar acmhainn mhéadaithe agus cúram sláinte a oiriúnú do riachtanais othar covid-19 mar bheart bunúsach freagartha ráige.

translation.en: The ecdc and the european regional office of the who have issued guidelines for hospitals and primary healthcare services for shifting of resources at multiple levels, including focusing laboratory services towards covid-19 testing, cancelling elective procedures whenever possible, separating and isolating covid-19 positive patients, and increasing intensive care capabilities by training personnel and increasing the number of available ventilators and beds.
translation.ga: Tá treoirlínte eisithe ag an ecdc agus oifig réigiúnach eorpach an who d ’ ospidéil agus do sheirbhísí cúram sláinte príomhúil chun acmhainní a aistriú ar leibhéil iolracha, lena n-áirítear seirbhísí saotharlainne a dhíriú ar thástáil covid-19, nósanna imeachta roghnacha a chealú nuair is féidir, scaradh agus leithlisiú dearfach covid-19 othair, agus cumais dianchúraim a mhéadú trí phearsanra a oiliúint agus líon na n-aerálaithe agus na leapacha atá ar fáil a mhéadú.

translation.en: There are various theories about where the very first case (the so-called patient zero) may have originated.
translation.ga: Tá teoiricí éagsúla ann faoin áit ar tháinig an chéad chás (an t-othar mar a thugtar air).

translation.en: The first known case of the novel coronavirus may trace back to 1 december 2019 in wuhan, hubei, china.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh an chéad chás is eol den coronavirus úrscéal rianú siar go 1 nollaig 2019 i wuhan, hubei, an tsín.

translation.en: Within a month, the number of coronavirus cases in hubei gradually increased.
translation.ga: Laistigh de mhí, tháinig méadú de réir a chéile ar líon na gcásanna coronavirus i hubei.

translation.en: These were mostly linked to the huanan seafood wholesale market, which also sold live animals, and one theory is that the virus came from one of these kinds of animals; or, in other words, has a zoonotic origin.a pneumonia cluster of unknown cause was observed on 26 december and treated by the doctor zhang jixian in hubei provincial hospital, who informed the wuhan jianghan cdc on 27 december.
translation.ga: Bhí siad seo nasctha den chuid is mó le margadh mórdhíola bia mara huanan, a dhíol ainmhithe beo freisin, agus teoiric amháin gur tháinig an víreas ó cheann de na cineálacha ainmhithe seo; nó, i bhfocail eile, tá bunús zónóiseach aige. Breathnaíodh braisle niúmóine de chúis anaithnid an 26 nollaig agus chuir an dochtúir zhang jixian cóireáil air in ospidéal cúige hubei, a chuir cdc wuhan jianghan ar an eolas an 27 nollaig.

translation.en: On 30 december, a group of doctors at wuhan central hospital alerted their colleagues of a "sars-like coronavirus".
translation.ga: An 30 nollaig, thug grúpa dochtúirí in ospidéal lárnach wuhan foláireamh dá gcomhghleacaithe faoi “coronavirus cosúil le sars ”.

translation.en: Eight of these doctors, including li wenliang, were admonished by the police for spreading false rumours, and another, ai fen, was reprimanded by her superiors for raising the alarm.
translation.ga: D' admhaigh na póilíní ocht gcinn de na dochtúirí seo, lena n-áirítear li wenliang, as ráflaí bréagacha a scaipeadh, agus rinne a ceannasaithe iomardú ar cheann eile, ai fen, as an aláram a ardú.

translation.en: The wuhan municipal health commission later released a public notice on 31 december and informed the who.
translation.ga: Scaoil coimisiún sláinte bardasach wuhan fógra poiblí níos déanaí an 31 nollaig agus chuir sé an who ar an eolas.

translation.en: Enough cases of unknown pneumonia had been reported to health authorities in wuhan to trigger an investigation in early january.during the early stages of the outbreak, the number of cases doubled approximately every seven and a half days.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh go leor cásanna niúmóine anaithnid d ’ údaráis sláinte i wuhan chun imscrúdú a spreagadh go luath i mí eanáir. Le linn céimeanna luatha an ráig, dúbailt líon na gcásanna thart ar gach seacht lá go leith.

translation.en: In early and mid-january 2020, the virus spread to other chinese provinces, helped by the chinese new year migration and wuhan being a transport hub and major rail interchange.
translation.ga: Go luath agus i lár mhí eanáir 2020, leathnaigh an víreas go cúigí eile na síne, le cúnamh ó imirce bhliain nua na síne agus wuhan mar mhol iompair agus mór-acomhal iarnróid.

translation.en: On 20 january, china reported nearly 140 new cases in one day, including two people in beijing and one in shenzhen.
translation.ga: An 20 eanáir, thuairiscigh an tsín beagnach 140 cás nua in aon lá amháin, lena n-áirítear beirt i mbéising agus ceann i shenzhen.

translation.en: Later official data shows that 6,174 people had already developed symptoms by 20 january 2020.as of 26 march, the united states has overtaken china and italy with the highest number of confirmed cases in the world.as of 9 april 2020, more than 1.61 million cases have been reported worldwide; more than 97,000 people have died and more than 364,000 have recovered.
translation.ga: Taispeánann sonraí oifigiúla níos déanaí go raibh comharthaí forbartha cheana féin ag 6,174 duine faoin 20 eanáir 2020. An 26 márta, tá na stáit aontaithe tar éis an tsín agus an iodáil a shárú leis an líon is mó cásanna dearbhaithe ar domhan. An 9 aibreán 2020, níos mó ná 1.61 milliún tuairiscíodh cásanna ar fud an domhain; tá níos mó ná 97,000 duine tar éis bás a fháil agus níos mó ná 364,000 tar éis aisghabháil.

translation.en: Around 200 countries and territories have had at least one case.
translation.ga: Bhí cás amháin ar a laghad ag timpeall 200 tír agus críoch.

translation.en: Due to the pandemic in europe, many countries in the schengen area have restricted free movement and set up border controls.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar an bpaindéim san eoraip, tá saorghluaiseacht srianta ag go leor tíortha i limistéar schengen agus tá rialuithe teorann curtha ar bun acu.

translation.en: National reactions have included containment measures such as quarantines (known as stay-at-home orders, shelter-in-place orders, or lockdown) and curfews.as of 2 april, nearly 300 million people, or about 90% of the population, are under some form of lockdown in the united states, more than 50 million people are in lockdown in the philippines, about 59 million people are in lockdown in south africa, and 1.3 billion people are in lockdown in india.
translation.ga: Áiríodh ar fhrithghníomhartha náisiúnta bearta coimeádta mar choraintíní (ar a dtugtar orduithe fanacht sa bhaile, orduithe foscadh in áit, nó frithdhúnadh) agus cuirfews. An 2 aibreán, beagnach 300 milliún duine, nó thart ar 90% den daonra, faoi ​ ​ ghlasáil de chineál éigin sna stáit aontaithe, tá níos mó ná 50 milliún duine faoi ghlas sna hoileáin fhilipíneacha, tá thart ar 59 milliún duine faoi ghlas san afraic theas, agus tá 1.3 billiún duine faoi ghlas san india.

translation.en: On 26 march, 1.7 billion people worldwide were under some form of lockdown, which increased to 2.6 billion people two days later — around a third of the world's population.
translation.ga: An 26 márta, bhí 1.7 billiún duine ar fud an domhain faoi chineál éigin frithdhúnadh, a mhéadaigh go 2.6 billiún duine dhá lá ina dhiaidh sin - timpeall an tríú cuid de dhaonra an domhain.

translation.en: The first confirmed case of covid-19 has been traced back to 1 december 2019 in wuhan; one unconfirmed report suggests the earliest case was on 17 november.
translation.ga: Rianaíodh an chéad chás dearbhaithe de covid-19 siar go 1 nollaig 2019 i wuhan; tugann tuarascáil neamhdhearbhaithe amháin le fios gur ar 17 samhain a tharla an cás is luaithe.

translation.en: Doctor zhang jixian observed a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 26 december, upon which her hospital informed wuhan jianghan cdc on 27 december.
translation.ga: Thug an dochtúir zhang jixian faoi deara braisle de chásanna niúmóine gan chúis anaithnid an 26 nollaig, agus chuir a ospidéal in iúl do wuhan jianghan cdc an 27 nollaig.

translation.en: Initial genetic testing of patient samples on 27 december 2019 indicated the presence of a sars-like coronavirus.
translation.ga: Léirigh tástáil ghéiniteach tosaigh ar shamplaí othar an 27 nollaig 2019 go raibh coronavirus cosúil le sars i láthair.

translation.en: A public notice was released by wuhan municipal health commission on 31 december.
translation.ga: Scaoil coimisiún sláinte bardasach wuhan fógra poiblí an 31 nollaig.

translation.en: The who was informed on the same day.
translation.ga: Cuireadh an who ar an eolas an lá céanna.

translation.en: As these notifications occurred, doctors in wuhan were warned by police for "spreading rumours" about the outbreak.
translation.ga: De réir mar a tharla na fógraí seo, thug póilíní rabhadh do dhochtúirí i wuhan as “ráflaí a scaipeadh ” faoin ráig.

translation.en: The chinese national health commission initially claimed that there was no "clear evidence" of human-to-human transmission.
translation.ga: Mhaígh coimisiún sláinte náisiúnta na síne ar dtús nach raibh “fianaise shoiléir ” ann maidir le tarchur ó dhuine go duine.

translation.en: In late january, the chinese government launched a radical campaign later described by the chinese communist party general secretary xi jinping as a "people's war" to contain the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Go déanach i mí eanáir, sheol rialtas na síne feachtas radacach a ndearna rúnaí ginearálta pháirtí cumannach na síne xi jinping cur síos air ina dhiaidh sin mar “chogadh na ndaoine ” chun scaipeadh an víris a choinneáil ann.

translation.en: In what has been described as "the largest quarantine in human history", a cordon sanitaire was announced on 23 january stopping travel in and out of wuhan, which was extended to a total of 15 cities in hubei, affecting a total of about 57 million people.
translation.ga: Sa rud ar a tugadh "an coraintín is mó i stair an duine", fógraíodh cordita sanitaire an 23 eanáir ag stopadh taistil isteach agus amach as wuhan, a leathnaíodh go 15 chathair san iomlán i hubei, a raibh tionchar aige ar thart ar 57 milliún san iomlán. daoine.

translation.en: Private vehicle use was banned in the city.
translation.ga: Cuireadh cosc ​ ​ ar úsáid feithiclí príobháideacha sa chathair.

translation.en: Chinese new year (25 january) celebrations were cancelled in many places.
translation.ga: Cuireadh ceiliúradh bhliain nua na síne (25 eanáir) ar ceal i go leor áiteanna.

translation.en: The authorities also announced the construction of a temporary hospital, huoshenshan hospital, which was completed in 10 days.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair na húdaráis freisin go dtógfaí ospidéal sealadach, ospidéal huoshenshan, a críochnaíodh i gceann 10 lá.

translation.en: Another hospital was built afterwards, leishenshan hospital, to handle additional patients.
translation.ga: Tógadh ospidéal eile ina dhiaidh sin, ospidéal leishenshan, chun othair bhreise a láimhseáil.

translation.en: In addition to newly constructed hospitals, china also converted 14 other facilities in wuhan, such as convention centers and stadiums, into temporary hospitals.on 26 january, the government instituted further measures to contain the covid-19 outbreak, including issuing health declarations for travellers and extending the spring festival holiday.
translation.ga: Chomh maith le hospidéil nua-thógtha, d' iompaigh an tsín 14 saoráid eile i wuhan, mar ionaid choinbhinsiúin agus staidiamaí, ina n-ospidéil shealadacha. An 26 eanáir, thionscain an rialtas bearta breise chun an ráig covid-19 a chuimsiú, lena n-áirítear dearbhuithe sláinte a eisiúint do thaistealaithe. agus saoire fhéile an earraigh a leathnú.

translation.en: Universities and schools around the country were also closed.
translation.ga: Dúnadh ollscoileanna agus scoileanna timpeall na tíre freisin.

translation.en: The regions of hong kong and macau instituted several measures, particularly in regard to schools and universities.
translation.ga: Bhunaigh réigiúin hong cong agus macao roinnt beart, go háirithe maidir le scoileanna agus ollscoileanna.

translation.en: Remote working measures were instituted in several chinese regions.
translation.ga: Tionscnaíodh bearta oibre cianda i roinnt réigiún sa tsín.

translation.en: Travel restrictions were enacted in and outside of hubei.
translation.ga: Achtaíodh srianta taistil laistigh agus lasmuigh de hubei.

translation.en: Public transport was modified, and museums throughout china were temporarily closed.
translation.ga: Mionathraíodh iompar poiblí, agus dúnadh músaeim ar fud na síne go sealadach.

translation.en: Control of public movement was applied in many cities, and it has been estimated that about 760 million people (more than half the population) faced some form of outdoor restriction.after the outbreak entered its global phase in march, chinese authorities took strict measures to prevent the virus from "importing" from other countries.
translation.ga: Cuireadh rialú gluaiseachta poiblí i bhfeidhm i go leor cathracha, agus meastar go raibh srian de chineál éigin ar thart ar 760 milliún duine (níos mó ná leath an daonra). Tar éis don ráig dul isteach ina chéim dhomhanda i mí an mhárta, ghlac údaráis na síne bearta dochta chun an víreas a chosc ó "allmhairiú" ó thíortha eile.

translation.en: For example, beijing has imposed a 14-day mandatory quarantine for all international travellers entering the city.on 23 march, mainland china only one case had transmitted domestically in the five days prior, in this instance via a traveller returning to guangzhou from istanbul.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, chuir béising coraintín éigeantach 14 lá i bhfeidhm do gach taistealaí idirnáisiúnta a thagann isteach sa chathair. Ar an 23 márta, níor tharchuir mórthír na síne ach cás amháin sa bhaile sna cúig lá roimhe sin, sa chás seo trí thaistealaí ag filleadh ar guangzhou ó iostanbúl.

translation.en: On 24 march 2020, chinese premier li keqiang reported that the spread of domestically transmitted cases has been basically blocked and the outbreak has been controlled in china.
translation.ga: An 24 márta 2020, thuairiscigh premier na síne li keqiang gur cuireadh bac bunúsach ar scaipeadh cásanna a tharchuirtear sa bhaile agus go ndearnadh an ráig a rialú sa tsín.

translation.en: The same day travel restrictions were eased in hubei, apart from wuhan, two months after the lockdown was imposed.the chinese ministry of foreign affairs announced on 26 march 2020 that entry for visa or residence permit holders would be suspended from 28 march onwards, with no specific details on when this policy will end.
translation.ga: Maolaíodh srianta taistil an lá céanna i hubei, seachas wuhan, dhá mhí tar éis an glasáil a fhorchur. D ’ fhógair aireacht gnóthaí eachtracha na síne an 26 márta 2020 go gcuirfí iontráil do shealbhóirí cead víosa nó cónaithe ar fionraí ón 28 márta ar aghaidh, le aon sonraí ar leith maidir le cathain a thiocfaidh deireadh leis an mbeartas seo.

translation.en: Those who wish to enter china will have to apply for visas in chinese embassies or consulates.
translation.ga: Beidh orthu siúd ar mian leo dul isteach sa tsín iarratas a dhéanamh ar víosaí in ambasáidí nó consalachtaí na síne.

translation.en: The chinese government encouraged businesses and factories to re-open on 30 march, and provided monetary stimulus packages for firms.the state council declared a day of mourning to begin with a national three-minute moment of silence on 10: 00 4 april, coinciding with qingming festival, although the central government asked families to pay their respects online in observance of physical distancing as to avoid a renewed covid-19 outbreak.
translation.ga: Spreag rialtas na síne gnólachtaí agus monarchana chun athoscailt an 30 márta, agus chuir siad pacáistí spreagtha airgeadaíochta ar fáil do ghnólachtaí. Dhearbhaigh an chomhairle stáit lá caoineadh chun tosú le nóiméad náisiúnta tost trí nóiméad an 10: 00 4 aibreán, i gcomhthráth le qingming festival, cé gur iarr an rialtas láir ar theaghlaigh a meas a íoc ar líne agus iad ag urramú fadú corpartha chun ráig athnuaite covid-19 a sheachaint.

translation.en: Covid-19 was confirmed to have spread to south korea on 20 january 2020 from china.
translation.ga: Deimhníodh gur scaipeadh covid-19 go dtí an chóiré theas an 20 eanáir 2020 ón tsín.

translation.en: The nation's health agency reported a significant increase in confirmed cases on 20 february, largely attributed to a gathering in daegu of a new religious movement known as the shincheonji church of jesus.
translation.ga: Thuairiscigh gníomhaireacht sláinte an náisiúin méadú suntasach i gcásanna dearbhaithe an 20 feabhra, a cuireadh i leith den chuid is mó mar gheall ar ghluaiseacht reiligiúnach nua ar a dtugtar eaglais shincheonji íosa a bhailiú i daegu.

translation.en: Shincheonji devotees visiting daegu from wuhan were suspected to be the origin of the outbreak.
translation.ga: Bhí amhras ann gur de bhunadh na ráige iad tiomnaithe shincheonji a thug cuairt ar daegu ó wuhan.

translation.en: As of 22 february, among 9,336 followers of the church, 1,261 or about 13% reported symptoms.south korea declared the highest level of alert on 23 february 2020.
translation.ga: Amhail an 22 feabhra, i measc 9,336 leantóir na heaglaise, thuairiscigh 1,261 nó thart ar 13% comharthaí. Dhearbhaigh an chóiré theas an leibhéal airdeall is airde an 23 feabhra 2020.

translation.en: On 28 february, more than 2,000 confirmed cases were reported in korea, rising to 3,150 on 29 february.
translation.ga: An 28 feabhra, tuairiscíodh níos mó ná 2,000 cás dearbhaithe sa chóiré, ag ardú go 3,150 an 29 feabhra.

translation.en: All south korean military bases were quarantined after tests confirmed that three soldiers were positive for the virus.
translation.ga: Rinneadh coraintín ar bhunáiteanna míleata uile na cóiré theas tar éis do thástálacha a dhearbhú go raibh triúr saighdiúirí dearfach don víreas.

translation.en: Airline schedules were also affected and therefore they were changed.south korea introduced what was considered the largest and best-organized programme in the world to screen the population for the virus, and isolate any infected people as well as tracing and quarantining those who contacted them.
translation.ga: Bhí tionchar freisin ar sceidil aerlíne agus dá bhrí sin athraíodh iad. Thug an chóiré theas isteach an clár a measadh a bheith ar an gclár is mó agus is eagraithe ar domhan chun an daonra don víreas a scagadh, agus aon daoine ionfhabhtaithe a leithlisiú chomh maith le rianú agus coraintíniú a dhéanamh ar na daoine a rinne teagmháil leo.

translation.en: Screening methods included mandatory self-reporting of symptoms by new international arrivals through mobile application, drive-thru testing for the virus with the results available the next day, and increasing testing capability to allow up to 20,000 people to be tested every day.
translation.ga: I measc na modhanna scagtha bhí féintuairisciú éigeantach ar airíonna ag daoine nua idirnáisiúnta trí fheidhmchlár soghluaiste, tástáil tiomána tríd an víreas leis na torthaí ar fáil an lá dar gcionn, agus an cumas tástála a mhéadú chun ligean do suas le 20,000 duine a thástáil gach lá.

translation.en: South korea's programme is considered to be a success in controlling the outbreak despite not quarantining entire cities.the south korean society was initially polarized on president moon jae-in's response to the crisis.
translation.ga: Meastar gur éirigh go maith le clár na cóiré theas maidir leis an ráig a rialú ainneoin nach raibh sé ag coraintíniú cathracha iomlána. Rinneadh polarú ar shochaí na cóiré theas i dtosach ar fhreagra an uachtaráin moon jae-in ar an ngéarchéim.

translation.en: Many koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.
translation.ga: Shínigh go leor koreans achainíocha ag éileamh go ndéanfaí impeachment moon ar an méid a mhaígh siad a bheith ag mí-láimhseáil an rialtais ar an ráig, nó ag moladh a fhreagra.

translation.en: On 23 march, it was reported that south korea had the lowest one-day case total in four weeks.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an 23 márta, go raibh an cás aon lae is ísle ag an gcóiré theas i gceann ceithre seachtaine.

translation.en: On 29 march it was reported that beginning 1 april all new overseas arrivals will be quarantined for two weeks.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an 29 márta go gcuirfear coraintín ar feadh coicíse ag tosú an 1 aibreán.

translation.en: Per media reports on 1 april, south korea has received requests for virus testing assistance from 121 different countries.
translation.ga: De réir tuairiscí sna meáin an 1 aibreán, fuair an chóiré theas iarratais ar chúnamh tástála víris ó 121 tír éagsúil.

translation.en: Iran reported its first confirmed cases of sars-cov-2 infections on 19 february in qom, where, according to the ministry of health and medical education, two people died later that day.
translation.ga: Thuairiscigh an iaráin a céad chásanna deimhnithe d ’ ionfhabhtuithe sars-cov-2 an 19 feabhra i qom, áit a bhfuair beirt, de réir na haireachta sláinte agus oideachais leighis, bás níos déanaí an lá sin.

translation.en: Early measures announced by the government included the cancellation of concerts and other cultural events, sporting events, and friday prayers, and closures of universities, higher education institutions, and schools.
translation.ga: I measc na mbeart luath a d ’ fhógair an rialtas bhí ceolchoirmeacha agus imeachtaí cultúrtha eile, imeachtaí spóirt, agus paidreacha dé haoine, agus dúnadh ollscoileanna, institiúidí ardoideachais, agus scoileanna a chealú.

translation.en: Iran allocated five trillion rials to combat the virus.
translation.ga: Leithdháil an iaráin cúig trilliún rial chun an víreas a chomhrac.

translation.en: President hassan rouhani said on 26 february 2020 that there were no plans to quarantine areas affected by the outbreak, and only individuals would be quarantined.
translation.ga: Dúirt an tuachtarán hassan rouhani an 26 feabhra 2020 nach raibh aon phleananna ann do cheantair choraintín a ndeachaigh an ráig i bhfeidhm orthu, agus nach mbeadh ach daoine aonair coraintín.

translation.en: Plans to limit travel between cities were announced in march, although heavy traffic between cities ahead of the persian new year nowruz continued.
translation.ga: Fógraíodh pleananna chun taisteal idir cathracha a theorannú i mí an mhárta, cé gur lean trácht trom idir cathracha roimh bhliain nua na peirse nowruz.

translation.en: Shia shrines in qom remained open to pilgrims until 16 march 2020.iran became a centre of the spread of the virus after china during february.
translation.ga: D' fhan scrínte shia i qom ar oscailt d' oilithrigh go dtí an 16 márta 2020. Tháinig an lárionad chun bheith ina lárionad do scaipeadh an víris tar éis na síne i rith mhí feabhra.

translation.en: Amidst claims of a cover-up of the extent of the outbreak in iran, more than ten countries had traced their cases back to iran by 28 february, indicating that the extent of the outbreak may be more severe than the 388 cases reported by the iranian government by that date.
translation.ga: I measc na n-éileamh go ndearnadh clúdach ar mhéid na ráige san iaráin, rinne níos mó ná deich dtír a gcásanna a rianú ar ais go dtí an iaráin faoin 28 feabhra, rud a thugann le fios go bhféadfadh méid an ráig a bheith níos déine ná na 388 cás a thuairiscigh an iaráin rialtas faoin dáta sin.

translation.en: The iranian parliament was shut down, with 23 of its 290 members reported to have had tested positive for the virus on 3 march.
translation.ga: Dúnadh parlaimint na hiaráine, agus tuairiscíodh go ndearna 23 dá 290 ball tástáil dhearfach don víreas an 3 márta.

translation.en: On 12 march, the human rights watch urged the iranian prison authorities to unconditionally release the human rights defenders detained for peaceful dissent, and to also temporarily release all the eligible prisoners.
translation.ga: An 12 márta, áitigh an faire um chearta an duine ar údaráis phríosúin na hiaráine na cosantóirí cearta daonna a choinnítear as easaontú síochánta a scaoileadh gan choinníoll, agus na príosúnaigh incháilithe uile a scaoileadh go sealadach.

translation.en: It stated that there is a greater risk of the virus to spread in closed institutions like detention centres, which also lack adequate medical care.
translation.ga: Luaigh sé go bhfuil baol níos mó ann go scaipfidh an víreas in institiúidí iata cosúil le hionaid choinneála, nach bhfuil cúram míochaine leordhóthanach acu freisin.

translation.en: On 15 march, the iranian government reported 100 deaths in a single day, the most recorded in the country since the outbreak began.
translation.ga: An 15 márta, thuairiscigh rialtas na hiaráine 100 bás in aon lá amháin, an líon is mó a taifeadadh sa tír ó thosaigh an ráig.

translation.en: At least 12 sitting or former iranian politicians and government officials had died from the disease by 17 march.
translation.ga: Bhí 12 pholaiteoir ar a laghad nó iar-pholaiteoirí ón iaráin agus oifigigh rialtais tar éis bás a fháil ón ngalar faoin 17 márta.

translation.en: By 23 march, iran was experiencing 50 new cases every hour and one new death every ten minutes due to coronavirus.
translation.ga: Faoi 23 márta, bhí 50 cás nua ag an iaráin gach uair an chloig agus bás nua amháin gach deich nóiméad mar gheall ar coronavirus.

translation.en: According to a who official, there may be five times more cases in iran than what is being reported.
translation.ga: De réir oifigeach de chuid an who, d ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh cúig oiread níos mó cásanna san iaráin ná mar atá á thuairisciú.

translation.en: It is also suggested that u.s. sanctions on iran may be affecting the country's financial ability to respond to the viral outbreak.
translation.ga: Tugtar le tuiscint freisin go bhféadfadh smachtbhannaí na s.a. ar an iaráin a bheith ag dul i bhfeidhm ar chumas airgeadais na tíre freagairt don ráig víreasach.

translation.en: The un high commissioner for human rights has demanded economic sanctions to be eased for nations most affected by the pandemic, including iran.
translation.ga: D' éiligh ard-choimisinéir na náisiún aontaithe um chearta an duine go ndéanfaí smachtbhannaí eacnamaíocha a mhaolú do na náisiúin is mó a dtéann an paindéim i bhfeidhm orthu, an iaráin san áireamh.

translation.en: The outbreak was confirmed to have spread to italy on 31 january, when two chinese tourists tested positive for sars-cov-2 in rome.
translation.ga: Deimhníodh gur scaipeadh an ráig chun na hiodáile an 31 eanáir, nuair a rinne beirt thurasóirí ón tsín tástáil dhearfach ar sars-cov-2 sa róimh.

translation.en: Cases began to rise sharply, which prompted the italian government to suspend all flights to and from china and declare a state of emergency.
translation.ga: Thosaigh cásanna ag ardú go géar, rud a spreag rialtas na hiodáile gach eitilt chun na síne agus uaidh a chur ar fionraí agus staid éigeandála a dhearbhú.

translation.en: An unassociated cluster of covid-19 cases was later detected, starting with 16 confirmed cases in lombardy on 21 february.on 22 february, the council of ministers announced a new decree-law to contain the outbreak, including quarantining more than 50,000 people from 11 different municipalities in northern italy.
translation.ga: Braitheadh ​ ​ braisle neamhchaidrimh de chásanna covid-19 ina dhiaidh sin, ag tosú le 16 chás dearbhaithe sa lombardia an 21 feabhra. Ar 22 feabhra, d ’ fhógair comhairle na nairí dlí foraithne nua chun an ráig a chuimsiú, lena n-áirítear coraintín a dhéanamh ar níos mó ná 50,000 duine as 11 bardais éagsúla i dtuaisceart na hiodáile.

translation.en: Prime minister giuseppe conte said, "in the outbreak areas, entry and exit will not be provided.
translation.ga: Dúirt an príomh-aire giuseppe conte, "sna ceantair ráige, ní sholáthrófar iontráil agus imeacht.

translation.en: Suspension of work activities and sports events has already been ordered in those areas. "On 4 march, the italian government ordered the full closure of all schools and universities nationwide as italy reached 100 deaths.
translation.ga: Ordaíodh gníomhaíochtaí oibre agus imeachtaí spóirt a chur ar fionraí cheana féin sna réimsí sin. "An 4 márta, d' ordaigh rialtas na hiodáile go ndúnfaí gach scoil agus ollscoil ar fud na tíre de réir mar a shroich an iodáil 100 bás.

translation.en: All major sporting events, including serie a football matches, were to be held behind closed doors until april, but on 9 march, all sport was suspended completely for at least one month.
translation.ga: Bhí gach mórimeacht spóirt, lena n-áirítear cluichí peile serie a, le reáchtáil taobh thiar de dhoirse dúnta go dtí aibreán, ach an 9 márta, cuireadh an spórt ar fad ar fionraí go hiomlán ar feadh míosa ar a laghad.

translation.en: On 11 march, prime minister conte ordered stoppage of nearly all commercial activity except supermarkets and pharmacies.on 6 march, the italian college of anaesthesia, analgesia, resuscitation and intensive care (siaarti) published medical ethics recommendations regarding triage protocols that might be employed.
translation.ga: An 11 márta, d ’ ordaigh an príomh-aire conte stop a chur le beagnach gach gníomhaíocht tráchtála seachas ollmhargaí agus cógaslanna. An 6 márta, d ’ fhoilsigh coláiste ainéistéise na hiodáile, analgesia, athbheochana agus dianchúraim (siaarti) moltaí eitice míochaine maidir le prótacail triage a d ’ fhéadfaí a úsáid.

translation.en: On 19 march, italy overtook china as the country with the most coronavirus-related deaths in the world after reporting 3,405 fatalities from the pandemic.
translation.ga: An 19 márta, ghabh an iodáil an tsín ar aghaidh mar an tír leis na básanna is mó a bhaineann le coronavirus ar domhan tar éis di 3,405 bás a fháil ón bpaindéim.

translation.en: On 22 march, it was reported that russia had sent nine military planes with medical equipment to italy.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh ar 22 márta gur sheol an rúis naoi bplána míleata le trealamh leighis chun na hiodáile.

translation.en: As of 5 april, there were 128,948 confirmed cases, 15,887 deaths, and 21,815 recoveries in italy, with the majority of those cases occurring in the lombardy region.
translation.ga: Amhail an 5 aibreán, bhí 128,948 cás dearbhaithe, 15,887 bás, agus 21,815 gnóthú san iodáil, agus tharla formhór na gcásanna sin i réigiún na lombaird.

translation.en: A cnn report indicated that the combination of italy's large elderly population and inability to test all who have the virus to date may be contributing to the high fatality rate.
translation.ga: Thug tuarascáil cnn le fios go bhféadfadh an teaglaim de dhaonra mór scothaosta na hiodáile agus a neamhábaltacht gach duine a bhfuil an víreas orthu go dtí seo a bheith ag cur leis an ráta ard básmhaireachta.

translation.en: The united kingdom's response to the virus first emerged as one of the most relaxed of the affected countries, and until 18 march 2020, the british government did not impose any form of social distancing or mass quarantine measures on its citizens.
translation.ga: Tháinig freagra na ríochta aontaithe ar an víreas chun cinn den chéad uair mar cheann de na tíortha is suaimhní sna tíortha lena mbaineann, agus go dtí an 18 márta 2020, níor chuir rialtas na breataine aon chineál faid shóisialta nó ollbhearta coraintín i bhfeidhm ar a saoránaigh.

translation.en: As a result, the government received criticism for the perceived lack of pace and intensity in its response to concerns faced by the public.on 16 march, prime minister boris johnson made an announcement advising against all non-essential travel and social contact, suggesting people work from home where possible and avoid venues such as pubs, restaurants, and theatres.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh air sin, fuair an rialtas cáineadh as an easpa luais agus déine a fheictear ina fhreagra ar ábhair imní atá os comhair an phobail. An 16 márta, rinne an príomh-aire boris johnson fógra ag tabhairt comhairle i gcoinne gach taistil neamhriachtanach agus teagmháil shóisialta, ag moladh daoine obair ón mbaile nuair is féidir agus seachain ionaid mar thithe tábhairne, bialanna agus amharclanna.

translation.en: On 20 march, the government announced that all leisure establishments such as pubs and gyms were to close as soon as possible, and promised to pay up to 80% of workers' wages to a limit of £2,500 per month to prevent unemployment in the crisis.on 23 march, the prime minister announced tougher social distancing measures, banning gatherings of more than two people and restricting travel and outdoor activity to that deemed strictly necessary.
translation.ga: Ar 20 márta, d ’ fhógair an rialtas go raibh gach bunaíocht fóillíochta ar nós tithe tábhairne agus gyms le dúnadh chomh luath agus is féidir, agus gheall siad suas le 80% de phá na n-oibrithe a íoc go teorainn £2,500 in aghaidh na míosa chun dífhostaíocht sa ghéarchéim a chosc ar an 23 márta, d ’ fhógair an príomh-aire bearta faid shóisialta níos déine, ag toirmeasc cruinnithe de níos mó ná beirt agus ag srianadh taistil agus gníomhaíochta lasmuigh go dtí an méid a mheastar a bheith riachtanach.

translation.en: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions were enforceable by police through the issuing of fines and the dispersal of gatherings.
translation.ga: Murab ionann agus bearta roimhe seo, bhí na srianta seo infheidhmithe ag póilíní trí fhíneálacha a eisiúint agus cruinnithe a scaipeadh.

translation.en: Most businesses were ordered to close, with exceptions for businesses deemed "essential", including supermarkets, pharmacies, banks, hardware shops, petrol stations, and garages.
translation.ga: Ordaíodh d ’ fhormhór na ngnólachtaí dúnadh, ach amháin eisceachtaí do ghnólachtaí a mheastar a bheith “riachtanach ”, lena n-áirítear ollmhargaí, cógaslanna, bainc, siopaí crua-earraí, stáisiúin pheitril, agus garáistí.

translation.en: On 20 january, the first known case of covid-19 was confirmed in the pacific northwest state of washington in a man who had returned from wuhan on 15 january.
translation.ga: An 20 eanáir, deimhníodh an chéad chás de covid-19 ar a dtugtar i stát an aigéin chiúin thiar thuaidh i washington i bhfear a d ’ fhill ar ais ó wuhan an 15 eanáir.

translation.en: The white house coronavirus task force was established on 29 january.
translation.ga: Bunaíodh tascfhórsa coronavirus an tí bháin an 29 eanáir.

translation.en: On 31 january, the trump administration declared a public health emergency, and placed restrictions on entry for travellers from china.
translation.ga: An 31 eanáir, dhearbhaigh riarachán trump éigeandáil sláinte poiblí, agus chuir sé srianta ar iontráil do thaistealaithe ón tsín.

translation.en: On 28 january 2020, the center for disease control — the leading public health institute of the u.s. government — announced they had developed their own testing kit.
translation.ga: An 28 eanáir 2020, d ’ fhógair an lárionad um rialú galar - príomhinstitiúid sláinte poiblí rialtas na sa - go raibh a dtrealamh tástála féin forbartha acu.

translation.en: Despite doing so, the united states had a slow start in testing, which obscured the true extent of the outbreak at the time.
translation.ga: In ainneoin é sin a dhéanamh, bhí tús mall ag na stáit aontaithe sa tástáil, rud a chuir fíor-mhéid an ráig amach ag an am.

translation.en: Testing was marred by defective test kits produced by the federal government in february, a lack of federal government approval for non-government test kits (by academia, companies and hospitals) until the end of february, and restrictive criteria for people to qualify for a test until early march (a doctor's order was required thereafter).
translation.ga: Maraíodh an tástáil le trealamh tástála lochtacha a chuir an rialtas cónaidhme ar fáil i mí feabhra, easpa ceadú rialtais cónaidhme do threalamh tástála neamhrialtasach (ag an saol acadúil, cuideachtaí agus ospidéil) go dtí deireadh mhí feabhra, agus critéir sriantacha do dhaoine chun cáiliú le haghaidh a tástáil go dtí tús mhí an mhárta (bhí ordú dochtúra ag teastáil ina dhiaidh sin).

translation.en: By 27 february, the washington post reported fewer than 4,000 tests had been conducted in the united states.
translation.ga: Faoi 27 feabhra, thuairiscigh an washington post go raibh níos lú ná 4,000 tástáil déanta sna stáit aontaithe.

translation.en: By 13 march, the atlantic reported that less than 14,000 tests had been conducted.
translation.ga: Faoi 13 márta, thuairiscigh an tatlantach go raibh níos lú ná 14,000 tástáil déanta.

translation.en: On 22 march, the associated press reported: "Many people who have symptoms and a doctor's order have waited hours or days for a test." After the first death in the united states was reported in washington state on 29 february, governor jay inslee declared a state of emergency, an action that was soon followed by other states.
translation.ga: Ar 22 márta, thuairiscigh an associated press: “d ’ fhan a lán daoine a bhfuil comharthaí agus ordú dochtúra orthu uaireanta nó laethanta le haghaidh tástála. ” tar éis an chéad bhás sna stáit aontaithe a thuairisciú i stát washington an 29 feabhra, dhearbhaigh an gobharnóir jay inslee staid éigeandála, gníomh a lean stáit eile go luath.

translation.en: Schools in the seattle area cancelled classes on 3 march, and by mid-march, schools across the country were shutting down.on 6 march 2020, the united states was advised of projections for the impact of the new coronavirus on the country by a group of epidemiologists at imperial college london.
translation.ga: Chuir scoileanna i gceantar seattle ranganna ar ceal an 3 márta, agus faoi lár mhí an mhárta, bhí scoileanna ar fud na tíre ag dúnadh síos. An 6 márta 2020, chuir grúpa in iúl do na stáit aontaithe réamh-mheastacháin maidir le tionchar an choróivíreas nua ar an tír. eipidéimeolaithe ag imperial college london.

translation.en: On the same day president trump signed the coronavirus preparedness and response supplemental appropriations act, which provided $8.3 billion in emergency funding for federal agencies to respond to the outbreak.
translation.ga: An lá céanna shínigh an tuachtarán trump an tacht um leithreasaí forlíontacha ullmhachta agus freagartha coronavirus, a chuir $8.3 billiún ar fáil i maoiniú éigeandála do ghníomhaireachtaí cónaidhme chun freagairt don ráig.

translation.en: Corporations imposed employee travel restrictions, cancelled conferences, and encouraged employees to work from home.
translation.ga: Chuir corparáidí srianta taistil ar fhostaithe, chuir siad comhdhálacha ar ceal, agus spreag siad fostaithe chun obair ón mbaile.

translation.en: Sports events and seasons were cancelled.on 11 march, trump announced travel restrictions for most of europe, excluding the united kingdom, for 30 days, effective 13 march.
translation.ga: Cuireadh imeachtaí agus séasúir spóirt ar ceal. An 11 márta, d ’ fhógair trump srianta taistil d ’ fhormhór na heorpa, gan an ríocht aontaithe a áireamh, ar feadh 30 lá, le héifeacht ón 13 márta.

translation.en: The following day, he expanded the restrictions to include the united kingdom and ireland.
translation.ga: An lá dar gcionn, leathnaigh sé na srianta chun an ríocht aontaithe agus éire a áireamh.

translation.en: On 13 march, he declared a national emergency, which made federal funds available to respond to the crisis.
translation.ga: An 13 márta, dhearbhaigh sé éigeandáil náisiúnta, a chuir cistí cónaidhme ar fáil chun freagairt don ghéarchéim.

translation.en: Beginning on 15 march, many businesses closed or reduced hours throughout the u.s. to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Ag tosú an 15 márta, dhún nó laghdaigh go leor gnólachtaí uaireanta ar fud na sa chun iarracht a dhéanamh scaipeadh an víris a laghdú.

translation.en: By 17 march, the epidemic had been confirmed in all 50 states and in the district of columbia.on 23 march, it was reported that new york city had 10,700 cases of the coronavirus, more than the total number of cases in south korea.
translation.ga: Faoi 17 márta, bhí an eipidéim deimhnithe i ngach ceann de na 50 stát agus i gceantar columbia.an 23 márta, tuairiscíodh go raibh 10,700 cás den coronavirus i gcathair nua eabhrac, níos mó ná líon iomlán na gcásanna sa chóiré theas.

translation.en: On 25 march, the governor said that social distancing seemed to be working, as estimates of case doubling slowed from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.
translation.ga: An 25 márta, dúirt an gobharnóir gur chosúil go raibh an fadú sóisialta ag obair, toisc gur mhoilligh meastacháin ar dhúbailt cásanna ó 2.0 lá go 4.7 lá.

translation.en: As of 28 march, there were 32,308 confirmed cases in new york city, and 672 people had died from the virus.on 26 march, the united states was reported to have more confirmed coronavirus infection cases than any other country in the world, including china and italy.as of 8 april, 400,335 cases have been confirmed in the united states, and 12,841 people have died.
translation.ga: Amhail an 28 márta, bhí 32,308 cás dearbhaithe i gcathair nua eabhrac, agus fuair 672 duine bás ón víreas. An 26 márta, tuairiscíodh go raibh níos mó cásanna ionfhabhtaithe coronavirus deimhnithe ag na stáit aontaithe ná aon tír eile ar domhan, an tsín san áireamh. agus an iodáil. An 8 aibreán, dearbhaíodh 400,335 cás sna stáit aontaithe, agus fuair 12,841 duine bás.

translation.en: Per media reports on 30 march, u.s. president trump has decided to extend social distancing guidelines until 30 april.
translation.ga: In aghaidh na dtuairiscí sna meáin an 30 márta, tá cinneadh déanta ag uachtarán na sa treoirlínte maidir le fadú sóisialta a leathnú go dtí an 30 aibreán.

translation.en: On the same day, the usns comfort, a hospital ship with about 1000 beds, made anchor in new york.
translation.ga: Ar an lá céanna, rinne an usns comfort, long ospidéil le thart ar 1000 leaba, ancaire i nua eabhrac.

translation.en: On 3 april, the u.s. had a record 884 deaths due to the coronavirus in a 24-hour period.
translation.ga: An 3 aibreán, bhí 884 bás riamh ag na stáit aontaithe mar gheall ar an coronavirus i dtréimhse 24 uair an chloig.

translation.en: In the state of new york the cases have exceeded 100,000 people on 3 april.the white house has been criticized for downplaying the threat and controlling the messaging by directing health officials and scientists to coordinate public statements and publications related to the virus with the office of vice-president mike pence.
translation.ga: I stát nua eabhrac sháraigh na cásanna 100,000 duine an 3 aibreán. Cáineadh an teach bán as an mbagairt a íoslaghdú agus as na teachtaireachtaí a rialú trí ordú a thabhairt d ’ oifigigh sláinte agus d ’ eolaithe ráitis phoiblí agus foilseacháin a bhaineann leis an víreas a chomhordú le hoifig leas-uachtarán mike pence.

translation.en: Overall approval of trump's management of the crisis has been polarized along partisan lines.
translation.ga: Tá ceadú foriomlán bhainistíocht trump ar an ngéarchéim polaraithe ar bhealach páirtíneach.

translation.en: Some u.s. officials and commentators criticized the u.s. reliance on importation of critical materials, including essential medical supplies, from china.
translation.ga: Cháin roinnt oifigeach agus tráchtairí na sa spleáchas na sa ar allmhairiú ábhar criticiúil, lena n-áirítear soláthairtí míochaine riachtanacha, ón tsín.

translation.en: An analysis of air travel patterns was used to map and predict patterns of spread and was published in the journal of travel medicine in mid-january 2020.
translation.ga: Úsáideadh anailís ar phatrúin aerthaistil chun patrúin scaipthe a mhapáil agus a thuar agus foilsíodh í in the journal of travel medicine i lár mhí eanáir 2020.

translation.en: Based on 2018 information from the international air transport association, bangkok, hong kong, tokyo, and taipei had the largest volume of travellers from wuhan.
translation.ga: Bunaithe ar fhaisnéis 2018 ón gcumann idirnáisiúnta aeriompair, bhí an líon is mó taistealaithe ó wuhan ag bancác, hong cong, tóiceo, agus taipei.

translation.en: Dubai, sydney, and melbourne were also reported as popular destinations for people travelling from wuhan.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh go raibh dubai, sydney agus melbourne mar chinn scríbe móréilimh do dhaoine atá ag taisteal ó wuhan.

translation.en: Bali was reported as least able among the 20 most popular destination cities in terms of preparedness, while cities in australia were considered most able.australia released its emergency response plan for novel coronavirus (covid-19) on 7 february.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh go raibh bali ar a laghad in ann i measc na 20 cathair cinn scríbe is mó éilimh i dtéarmaí ullmhachta, agus measadh go raibh cathracha san astráil is cumasaí. Scaoil an astráil a plean freagartha éigeandála do coronavirus úrscéal (covid-19) an 7 feabhra.

translation.en: It stated that much was yet to be discovered about covid-19, and that australia would emphasize border control and communication in its response to the pandemic.
translation.ga: Luaigh sé go raibh go leor le fáil amach fós faoi covid-19, agus go gcuirfeadh an astráil béim ar rialú teorann agus ar chumarsáid ina freagra ar an bpaindéim.

translation.en: On 21 march, a human biosecurity emergency was declared in australia.
translation.ga: Ar 21 márta, fógraíodh éigeandáil bithshlándála daonna san astráil.

translation.en: Owing to the effective quarantine of public transport in wuhan and hubei, several countries have planned to evacuate their citizens and diplomatic staff from the area, primarily through chartered flights of the home nation, with chinese authorities providing clearance.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar choraintín éifeachtach an iompair phoiblí i wuhan agus hubei, tá sé beartaithe ag roinnt tíortha a gcuid saoránach agus foireann taidhleoireachta a aslonnú ón gceantar, go príomha trí eitiltí cairte den náisiún baile, le húdaráis na síne ag soláthar imréitigh.

translation.en: Canada, the united states, japan, india, sri lanka, australia, france, argentina, germany, and thailand were among the first to plan the evacuation of their citizens.
translation.ga: Bhí ceanada, na stáit aontaithe, an tseapáin, an india, srí lanca, an astráil, an fhrainc, an airgintín, an ghearmáin agus an téalainn i measc na chéad daoine a rinne aslonnú a gcuid saoránach a phleanáil.

translation.en: Pakistan has said that it will not be evacuating any citizens from china.
translation.ga: Dúirt an phacastáin nach mbeidh sí ag aslonnú saoránach ar bith ón tsín.

translation.en: On 7 february, brazil evacuated 34 brazilians or family members in addition to four poles, a chinese person, and an indian citizen.
translation.ga: An 7 feabhra, aslonnaigh an bhrasaíl 34 brasaíleach nó ball teaghlaigh i dteannta le ceathrar polannach, duine síneach, agus saoránach indiach.

translation.en: The citizens of poland, china, and india deplaned in poland, where the brazilian plane made a stopover before following its route to brazil.
translation.ga: Phléadáil saoránaigh na polainne, na síne agus na hindia sa pholainn, áit ar stad eitleán na brasaíle sular lean sé a bhealach chun na brasaíle.

translation.en: Brazilian citizens who went to wuhan were quarantined at a military base near brasília.
translation.ga: Cuireadh saoránaigh na brasaíle a chuaigh go wuhan i gcoraintín ag bunáit mhíleata gar do brasília.

translation.en: On the same day, 215 canadians (176 from the first plane, and 39 from a second plane chartered by the u.s. government) were evacuated from wuhan to cfb trenton to be quarantined for two weeks.
translation.ga: An lá céanna, aslonnaíodh 215 ceanadach (176 ón gcéad eitleán, agus 39 ón dara eitleán arna gcairtiú ag rialtas na sa) ó wuhan go cfb trenton le coraintín ar feadh coicíse.

translation.en: On 11 february, another plane of 185 canadians from wuhan landed at cfb trenton.
translation.ga: An 11 feabhra, tháinig eitleán eile de 185 ceanadach as wuhan i dtír ag cfb trenton.

translation.en: Australian authorities evacuated 277 citizens on 3 and 4 february to the christmas island detention centre, which had been repurposed as a quarantine facility, where they remained for 14 days.
translation.ga: D' imigh údaráis na hastráile 277 saoránach ar 3 agus 4 feabhra chuig ionad coinneála oileán na nollag, a cuireadh ar ais mar áis coraintín, áit ar fhan siad ar feadh 14 lá.

translation.en: A new zealand evacuation flight arrived in auckland on 5 february; its passengers (including some from australia and the pacific) were quarantined at a naval base in whangaparoa, north of auckland.
translation.ga: Tháinig eitilt aslonnaithe ón nua-shéalainn go auckland an 5 feabhra; coraintíníodh a phaisinéirí (lena n-áirítear cuid ón astráil agus an taigéan ciúin) ag bunáit chabhlaigh i whangaparoa, ó thuaidh ó auckland.

translation.en: On 15 february, the united states announced that it would evacuate americans aboard the cruise ship diamond princess.
translation.ga: An 15 feabhra, d ’ fhógair na stáit aontaithe go ndéanfadh sé meiriceánaigh a aslonnú ar bord na loinge cúrsála diamond princess.

translation.en: On 21 february, a plane carrying 129 canadian passengers who had been evacuated from diamond princess landed in trenton, ontario.
translation.ga: An 21 feabhra, tháinig eitleán ag iompar 129 paisinéir ceanadach a aslonnaíodh as diamond princess i trenton, ontario.

translation.en: In early march, the indian government began evacuating its citizens from iran.on 14 march a south african airways aircraft chartered by the south african government repatriated 112 south african citizens.
translation.ga: Go luath i mí an mhárta, thosaigh rialtas na hindia a shaoránaigh a aslonnú ón iaráin. Ar 14 márta, chuir aerárthach airways na hafraice theas, a bhí cairte ag rialtas na hafraice theas, 112 saoránach ón afraic theas ar ais.

translation.en: Medical screening was performed prior to departure, and four south africans who were showing signs of coronavirus were left behind to mitigate risk.
translation.ga: Rinneadh scagadh míochaine sular imigh siad, agus fágadh ceathrar afracach theas a bhí ag taispeáint comharthaí coróivíreas chun riosca a mhaolú.

translation.en: Only south africans who tested negative were repatriated.
translation.ga: Níor cuireadh ar ais ach na hafraice theas a rinne tástáil dhiúltach.

translation.en: Test results cleared all the south africans, including the flight crew, pilots, hotel staff, police and soldiers involved in the humanitarian mission who, as a precautionary measure, all remained under observation and in quarantine for a 14-day period at the ranch resort.
translation.ga: Ghlan torthaí tástála na hafraice theas go léir, lena n-áirítear an criú eitilte, píolótaí, foireann óstáin, póilíní agus saighdiúirí a raibh baint acu leis an misean daonnúil a d' fhan, mar bheart réamhchúraim, faoi bhreathnóireacht agus i gcoraintín ar feadh tréimhse 14 lá ag an ranch resort.

translation.en: On 20 march, the united states began to partially withdrawal its troops from iraq due to the pandemic.
translation.ga: An 20 márta, thosaigh na stáit aontaithe a gcuid trúpaí a tharraingt siar ón iaráic mar gheall ar an bpaindéim.

translation.en: On 5 february, the chinese foreign ministry stated that 21 countries (including belarus, pakistan, trinidad and tobago, egypt, and iran) had sent aid to china.
translation.ga: An 5 feabhra, luaigh aireacht eachtrach na síne gur chuir 21 tír (lena n-áirítear an bhealarúis, an phacastáin, oileán na tríonóide agus tobága, an éigipt agus an iaráin) cúnamh chun na síne.

translation.en: Some chinese students at american universities joined together to help send aid to virus-stricken parts of china, with a joint group in the greater chicago area reportedly managing to send 50,000 n95 masks to hospitals in the hubei province on 30 january.the humanitarian aid organization direct relief, in coordination with fedex, sent 200,000 face masks along with other personal protective equipment, including gloves and gowns, by emergency airlift to the wuhan union hospital by 30 january.
translation.ga: Tháinig roinnt mac léinn síneach in ollscoileanna mheiriceá le chéile chun cúnamh a sheoladh chuig codanna den tsín a bhfuil víreas orthu, agus de réir cosúlachta d ’ éirigh le comhghrúpa i mórcheantar chicago 50,000 masc n95 a sheoladh chuig ospidéil i gcúige hubei an 30 eanáir. An eagraíocht um chúnamh daonnúil chuir direct relief, i gcomhordú le fedex, 200,000 masc aghaidh in éineacht le trealamh cosanta pearsanta eile, lena n-áirítear lámhainní agus fallaingeacha, trí aer-ardaitheoir éigeandála chuig ospidéal an aontais wuhan faoin 30 eanáir.

translation.en: On 5 february, bill and melinda gates announced a $100 million donation to the who to fund vaccine research and treatment efforts along with protecting "at-risk populations in africa and south asia".
translation.ga: Ar 5 feabhra, d ’ fhógair bill agus melinda gates síntiús $100 milliún don who chun iarrachtaí taighde agus cóireála vacsaíne a mhaoiniú mar aon le “daonraí atá i mbaol san afraic agus san áise theas ” a chosaint.

translation.en: Interaksyon reported that the chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the philippines on 6 february, after senator richard gordon shipped 3.16 million masks to wuhan.
translation.ga: Thuairiscigh interaksyon gur bhronn rialtas na síne 200,000 masc ar na hoileáin fhilipíneacha an 6 feabhra, tar éis don seanadóir richard gordon 3.16 milliún maisc a sheoladh chuig wuhan.

translation.en: On 19 february, the singapore red cross announced that it would send $2.26 million worth of aid to china.
translation.ga: Ar 19 feabhra, d ’ fhógair crois dhearg singeapór go seolfadh sí cúnamh de luach $2.26 milliún chun na síne.

translation.en: Japan donated one million face masks to wuhan, turkey dispatched medical equipment, russia sent more than 13 tonnes of medical supplies to wuhan, malaysia announced a donation of 18 million medical gloves to china, germany delivered various medical supplies including 10,000 hazmat suits, and the united states donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to china and promised an additional $100 million in financial support to affected countries.after cases in china seemed to stabilize, the country has been sending aid to various nations hit by the pandemic.
translation.ga: Bhronn an tseapáin aon mhilliún aghaidh ar wuhan, sheol an tuirc trealamh míochaine, sheol an rúis níos mó ná 13 thonna de sholáthairtí míochaine chuig wuhan, d ’ fhógair an mhalaeisia síntiús 18 milliún lámhainní míochaine chun na síne, sheachaid an ghearmáin soláthairtí míochaine éagsúla lena n-áirítear 10,000 oireann hazmat, agus an thug na stáit aontaithe 17.8 tonna de sholáthairtí míochaine don tsín agus gheall siad $100 milliún breise i dtacaíocht airgeadais do thíortha a raibh tionchar orthu. Más cosúil go gcobhsaíonn cásanna sa tsín, tá an tír ag cur cúnaimh chuig náisiúin éagsúla atá buailte ag an bpaindéim.

translation.en: In march, china, cuba and russia sent medical supplies and experts to help italy deal with its coronavirus outbreak.
translation.ga: I mí an mhárta, sheol an tsín, cúba agus an rúis soláthairtí míochaine agus saineolaithe chun cabhrú leis an iodáil déileáil lena ráig coronavirus.

translation.en: Businessman jack ma sent 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, and 60,000 protective suits to addis ababa, ethiopia for distribution by the african union.
translation.ga: Sheol an fear gnó jack ma 1.1 milliún feiste tástála, 6 mhilliún aghaidh, agus 60,000 culaith chosanta chuig addis ababa, an aetóip lena ndáileadh ag aontas na hafraice.

translation.en: He later sent 5,000 testing kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to panama.
translation.ga: Ina dhiaidh sin sheol sé 5,000 feiste tástála, 100,000 masc aghaidh agus 5 aerálaí chuig panama.

translation.en: Ma also donated medical supplies to canada.the netherlands, spain, turkey, georgia, and the czech republic expressed their concerns over chinese-made masks and test kits.
translation.ga: Thug ma soláthairtí míochaine do cheanada freisin. Chuir an ísiltír, an spáinn, an tuirc, an tseoirsia, agus poblacht na seice a n-imní in iúl maidir le maisc agus trealamh tástála de dhéantús na síne.

translation.en: For instance, spain withdrew 58,000 chinese-made coronavirus testing kits with an accuracy rate of just 30%, meanwhile, the netherlands recalled 600,000 chinese face masks which were defective.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, tharraing an spáinn 58,000 feiste tástála coronavirus de dhéantús na síne siar le ráta cruinnis de díreach 30%, idir an dá linn, mheabhraigh an ísiltír 600,000 masc aghaidh síneach a bhí lochtach.

translation.en: Belgium recalled 100,000 unusable masks, thought to be from china, but were in fact from colombia.
translation.ga: Mheabhraigh an bheilg 100,000 maisc nach féidir a úsáid, a cheaptar a tháinig ón tsín, ach a tháinig ón gcolóim i ndáiríre.

translation.en: On the other hand, chinese aid has been well-received in parts of latin america and africa.on 2 april, the world bank launched emergency support operations for developing countries.
translation.ga: Ar an láimh eile, tá fáilte mhór curtha roimh chúnamh na síne i gcodanna de mheiriceá laidineach agus san afraic. An 2 aibreán, sheol an banc domhanda oibríochtaí tacaíochta éigeandála do thíortha i mbéal forbartha.

translation.en: The who has commended the efforts of chinese authorities in managing and containing the epidemic.
translation.ga: Mhol an who iarrachtaí údaráis na síne an eipidéim a bhainistiú agus a choinneáil.

translation.en: The who noted the contrast between the 2002 – 2004 sars outbreak, where chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that impeded prevention and containment efforts, and the current crisis where the central government "has provided regular updates to avoid panic ahead of lunar new year holidays".
translation.ga: Thug an who dá haire an chodarsnacht idir ráig sars 2002-2004, áit ar cúisíodh údaráis na síne as rúndacht a chuir bac ar iarrachtaí coiscthe agus coimeádta, agus an ghéarchéim reatha ina ndearna an rialtas láir "nuashonruithe rialta a sholáthar chun scaoll a sheachaint roimh shaoire na hathbhliana lunar".

translation.en: On 23 january, in reaction to the central authorities' decision to implement a transportation ban in wuhan, who representative gauden galea remarked that while it was "certainly not a recommendation the who has made", it was also "a very important indication of the commitment to contain the epidemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history" .on 30 january, following confirmation of human-to-human transmission outside china and the increase in the number of cases in other countries, the who declared the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern (pheic), the sixth pheic since the measure was first invoked during the 2009 swine flu pandemic.
translation.ga: An 23 eanáir, mar fhreagairt ar chinneadh na n-údarás láir toirmeasc iompair a chur i bhfeidhm i wuhan, dúirt ionadaí who, gauden galea, cé nach raibh sé “cinnte mar mholadh a rinne an who ”, ba léiriú an-tábhachtach é freisin ar an tiomantas an eipidéim a choinneáil san áit is comhchruinnithe" agus ar a dtugtar "gan fasach i stair na sláinte poiblí". An 30 eanáir, tar éis deimhniú go bhfuil tarchur duine-le-duine lasmuigh den tsín agus an méadú ar líon na gcásanna i gcásanna eile. tíortha, dhearbhaigh an who an ráig mar éigeandáil sláinte poiblí ar imní idirnáisiúnta (pheic), an séú pheic ó agraíodh an beart den chéad uair le linn paindéime fliú na muc 2009.

translation.en: Who director-general tedros adhanom said that the pheic was due to "the risk of global spread, especially to low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems.
translation.ga: Dúirt ard-stiúrthóir who tedros adhanom go raibh an pheic mar gheall ar “an riosca a bhaineann le leathadh domhanda, go háirithe i dtíortha ar ioncam íseal agus meánioncaim gan chórais sláinte láidre.

translation.en: In response to the implementations of travel restrictions, tedros stated that "there is no reason for measures that unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and that the "who doesn't recommend limiting trade and movement."
translation.ga: Mar fhreagairt ar chur i bhfeidhm srianta taistil, luaigh tedros "níl aon chúis le bearta a chuireann isteach go neamhriachtanach ar thaisteal agus ar thrádáil idirnáisiúnta" agus nach molann an "who trádáil agus gluaiseacht a theorannú."

translation.en: On 5 february, the who appealed to the global community for a $675 million contribution to fund strategic preparedness in low-income countries, citing the urgency to support those countries which "do not have the systems in place to detect people who have contracted the virus, even if it were to emerge".
translation.ga: An 5 feabhra, rinne an who achomharc leis an bpobal domhanda ar ranníocaíocht $675 milliún chun ullmhacht straitéiseach a mhaoiniú i dtíortha ar ioncam íseal, ag lua na práinne tacú leis na tíortha sin “nach bhfuil na córais i bhfeidhm acu chun daoine a bhfuil an víreas ar conradh acu a bhrath., fiú dá dtiocfadh sé chun cinn".

translation.en: Tedros further made statements declaring that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later" .on 11 february, the who in a press conference established covid-19 as the name of the disease.
translation.ga: Rinne tedros ráitis freisin ag dearbhú “nílimid ach chomh láidir leis an nasc is laige againn ” agus áitigh sé ar an bpobal idirnáisiúnta“ infheistíocht a dhéanamh inniu nó íoc níos déanaí ”. An 11 feabhra, bhunaigh an who i preasagallamh covid-19 mar ainm an galar.

translation.en: On the same day, tedros stated that un secretary-general antónio guterres had agreed to provide the "power of the entire un system in the response".
translation.ga: An lá céanna, luaigh tedros gur aontaigh ard-rúnaí na náisiún aontaithe antónio guterres “cumhacht chóras iomlán na náisiún aontaithe a sholáthar sa fhreagra ”.

translation.en: A un crisis management team was activated as a result, allowing coordination of the entire united nations response, which the who states will allow them to "focus on the health response while the other agencies can bring their expertise to bear on the wider social, economic and developmental implications of the outbreak".
translation.ga: Cuireadh foireann bainistíochta géarchéime na náisiún aontaithe i ngníomh dá bharr, rud a cheadaigh comhordú ar fhreagairt iomlán na náisiún aontaithe, a ligfidh stáit who dóibh "díriú ar an bhfreagairt sláinte fad is féidir leis na gníomhaireachtaí eile a gcuid saineolais a thabhairt ar an tionchar sóisialta, eacnamaíoch níos leithne. agus impleachtaí forbartha na ráige".

translation.en: On 14 february, a who-led joint mission team with china was activated to provide international and who experts on the ground in china to assist in the domestic management and evaluate "the severity and the transmissibility of the disease" by hosting workshops and meetings with key national-level institutions and to conduct field visits to assess the "impact of response activities at provincial and county levels, including urban and rural settings" .on 25 february, the who declared that "the world should do more to prepare for a possible coronavirus pandemic," stating that while it was still too early to call it a pandemic, countries should nonetheless be "in a phase of preparedness".
translation.ga: An 14 feabhra, gníomhaíodh comhfhoireann misin faoi stiúir who leis an tsín chun saineolaithe idirnáisiúnta agus who a sholáthar ar an talamh sa tsín chun cabhrú leis an mbainistíocht intíre agus chun "déine agus in-tarchurtha an ghalair a mheas" trí cheardlanna agus cruinnithe a óstáil le príomhinstitiúidí ar leibhéal náisiúnta agus cuairteanna allamuigh a dhéanamh chun “tionchar na ngníomhaíochtaí freagartha ar leibhéil chúige agus chontae, lena n-áirítear suíomhanna uirbeacha agus tuaithe ” a mheas. An 25 feabhra, dhearbhaigh an who“ gur cheart don domhan níos mó a dhéanamh chun ullmhú le haghaidh féideartha paindéim coronavirus, "á rá, cé go raibh sé fós ró-luath chun paindéim a ghlaoch air, gur cheart go mbeadh tíortha" i gcéim ullmhachta "mar sin féin.

translation.en: In response to a developing outbreak in iran, the who sent a joint mission team there to assess the situation.on 28 february, who officials said that the coronavirus threat assessment at the global level would be raised from "high" to "very high", its highest level of alert and risk assessment.
translation.ga: Mar fhreagairt ar ráig a bhí ag forbairt san iaráin, sheol an who comhfhoireann misin ansin chun an cás a mheas. An 28 feabhra, dúirt oifigigh who go n-ardófaí an measúnú bagairt coróivíreas ar an leibhéal domhanda ó “ard ” go“ an-ard ”, an leibhéal is airde airdeall agus measúnaithe riosca.

translation.en: Mike ryan, executive director of the who's health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "this is a reality check for every government on the planet: Wake up.
translation.ga: Thug mike ryan, stiúrthóir feidhmiúcháin chlár éigeandálaí sláinte who, foláireamh i ráiteas “seiceáil réaltachta é seo do gach rialtas ar an phláinéid: Múscail.

translation.en: This virus may be on its way and you need to be ready, "urging that the right response measures could help the world avoid" the worst of it ".
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go bhfuil an víreas seo ar a bhealach agus ní mór duit a bheith réidh, “ag áiteamh go bhféadfadh na bearta freagartha cearta cuidiú leis an domhan“ an ceann is measa de ” a sheachaint.

translation.en: Ryan further stated that the current data did not warrant public health officials to declare a global pandemic, saying that such a declaration would mean "we're essentially accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to that virus."
translation.ga: Dúirt ryan freisin nár thug na sonraí reatha barántas d ’ oifigigh sláinte poiblí paindéim dhomhanda a dhearbhú, ag rá go gciallódh dearbhú den sórt sin "táimid ag glacadh leis go bunúsach go mbeidh gach duine ar an phláinéid nochtaithe don víreas sin."

translation.en: On 11 march, the who declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic.
translation.ga: Ar 11 márta, dhearbhaigh an who ráig paindéimeach an ráig coronavirus.

translation.en: The director-general said that the who was "deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity, and by the alarming levels of inaction" .the who has faced significant criticism for what is seen as inadequate handling of the pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a pandemic.
translation.ga: Dúirt an tard-stiúrthóir go raibh “imní mhór ar an who maidir leis na leibhéil scanrúil scaipthe agus déine, agus leis na leibhéil scanrúla easpa gnímh ”. Tá cáineadh suntasach déanta ar an who as an láimhseáil neamhleor ar an bpaindéim, lena n-áirítear an dearbhú déanach ar éigeandáil sláinte poiblí agus aicmiú an víris mar phaindéim.

translation.en: The backlash included a petition for the who director-general tedros adhanom to tender his resignation, signed by 733,000 people as of 6 april.
translation.ga: Áiríodh ar an gcúllach achainí ar ard-stiúrthóir who tedros adhanom chun a éirí as a thairiscint, sínithe ag 733,000 duine amhail an 6 aibreán.

translation.en: On 26 march 2020, dozens of un human rights experts emphasized respecting the rights of every individual during the covid-19 pandemic.
translation.ga: An 26 márta 2020, chuir mórán de shaineolaithe cearta daonna na náisiún aontaithe béim ar urramú cearta gach duine le linn na paindéime covid-19.

translation.en: The expert group stated that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and the government holds this responsibility.
translation.ga: Dúirt an grúpa saineolaithe go bhfuil gach duine i dteideal idirghabhálacha tarrthála agus tá an fhreagracht seo ar an rialtas.

translation.en: The group stressed that the lack of resources or health insurance should never serve as a justification for discrimination against a specific group.
translation.ga: Chuir an grúpa i dtreis nár cheart go mbeadh an easpa acmhainní nó árachas sláinte riamh mar údar le hidirdhealú i gcoinne grúpa ar leith.

translation.en: The experts underscored that every individual has the right to health, including people with disabilities, belonging to minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, the homeless, those living in extremely poor conditions, people in detention, as well as refugees and other unspecified groups in need of government support.
translation.ga: Chuir na saineolaithe i bhfios go láidir go bhfuil sé de cheart ag gach duine sláinte, lena n-áirítear daoine faoi mhíchumas, a bhaineann le grúpaí mionlaigh, daoine scothaosta, daoine díláithrithe go hinmheánach, daoine gan dídean, iad siúd atá ina gcónaí i ndálaí an-lag, daoine atá faoi choinneáil, chomh maith le dídeanaithe agus daoine neamhshonraithe eile. grúpaí a bhfuil tacaíocht rialtais de dhíth orthu.

translation.en: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the covid-19 crisis.
translation.ga: Tá eagraíochtaí rialtais idirnáisiúnta ag tabhairt aghaidh ar thionchair eacnamaíocha agus sóisialta na géarchéime covid-19.

translation.en: The organisation for economic co-operation and development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses in countries around the world, as well as viewpoints and advice.
translation.ga: Tá ardán seolta ag an eagraíocht um chomhar agus fhorbairt eacnamaíochta chun faisnéis thráthúil agus chuimsitheach a sholáthar ar fhreagairtí beartais i dtíortha ar fud an domhain, chomh maith le dearcaí agus comhairle.
