translation.en: From policies to strengthen health systems and the world economy to addressing the effects of lockdown and restrictions on travel, the digital hub includes a country policy tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and to facilitate a co-ordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.
translation.ga: Ó bheartais chun córais sláinte agus geilleagar an domhain a neartú go dtí aghaidh a thabhairt ar éifeachtaí frithdhúnadh agus srianta ar thaisteal, cuimsíonn an mol digiteach rianaithe beartais tíre, agus tá sé mar aidhm aige cabhrú le tíortha foghlaim óna chéile agus freagairt dhomhanda chomhordaithe ar an dúshlán coronavirus.

translation.en: The chinese government has been criticized by the united states, uk minister for the cabinet office michael gove, and brazil president jair bolsonaro's son eduardo bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic, which began in the chinese province of hubei.
translation.ga: Cháin rialtas na síne na stáit aontaithe, aire na ra d ’ oifig na comh-aireachta michael gove, agus mac uachtarán na brasaíle jair bolsonaro, eduardo bolsonaro, as an gcaoi ar láimhseáil sé an paindéim, a thosaigh i gcúige hubei na síne.

translation.en: A number of provincial-level administrators of the communist party of china (cpc) were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine efforts in central china, a sign of discontent with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.
translation.ga: Briseadh roinnt riarthóirí ar leibhéal cúige de chuid pháirtí cumannach na síne (cpc) as a láimhseáil ar na hiarrachtaí coraintín i lár na síne, comhartha míshástachta le freagra na bunaíochta polaitiúla ar an ráig sna réigiúin sin.

translation.en: Some commentators believe that this move was intended to protect chinese communist party general secretary xi jinping from the public's anger over the coronavirus outbreak.
translation.ga: Creideann roinnt tráchtairí go raibh sé i gceist ag an mbogadh seo rúnaí ginearálta pháirtí cumannach na síne xi jinping a chosaint ar fearg an phobail faoin ráig coronavirus.

translation.en: Some chinese officials, e.g. zhao lijian rejected an earlier acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak starting in wuhan, in favour of conspiracy theories about the covid-19 originating from the u.s. or italy.
translation.ga: Roinnt oifigeach síneach, e.g. dhiúltaigh zhao lijian admháil níos luaithe faoin ráig coronavirus ag tosú i wuhan, i bhfabhar teoiricí comhcheilge faoin covid-19 a tháinig as na stáit aontaithe nó an iodáil.

translation.en: The u.s. administration of donald trump has referred to the coronavirus as "chinese virus" or "wuhan virus" saying that china's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which has in turn been criticized by some critics as racism and "distract [ing] from his administration's failure to contain the disease".
translation.ga: Thagair riarachán na stát aontaithe donald trump don coronavirus mar “víreas síneach ” nó“ víreas wuhan ” ag rá gur “ghearr cinsireacht na síne víreas atá anois ina phaindéim dhomhanda ”, a cháin roinnt criticeoirí ina dhiaidh sin mar chiníochas agus" aird a tharraingt ar mhainneachtain a riaracháin an galar a bheith ann ".

translation.en: The daily beast obtained a u.s. government cable outlining a communications stratagem with apparent origins in the national security council, with the strategy being quoted as "everything is about china.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ an daily beast cábla rialtais na sa ag imlíniú stratagem cumarsáide le bunús dealraitheach sa chomhairle slándála náisiúnta, agus luaitear an straitéis mar "tá gach rud faoin tsín.

translation.en: We're being told to try and get this messaging out in any way possible, including press conferences and television appearances. "Outlets such as politico, foreign policy, and bloomberg have claimed that china's efforts to send aid to virus-stricken countries is part of a propaganda push for global influence.
translation.ga: Iarrtar orainn iarracht a dhéanamh na teachtaireachtaí seo a chur amach ar bhealach ar bith is féidir, lena n-áirítear preasagallaimh agus láithrithe teilifíse. "D' éiligh asraonta mar politico, beartas eachtrach, agus bloomberg gur cuid d ’ iarrachtaí na síne cúnamh a sheoladh chuig tíortha atá faoi bhrú víris de bhrú bolscaireachta ar thionchar domhanda.

translation.en: Eu foreign policy chief josep borrell warned that there is "a geo-political component including a struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of generosity'".
translation.ga: Thug príomhfheidhmeannach bheartas eachtrach an ae, josep borrell, foláireamh go bhfuil “comhpháirt gheo-pholaitiúil ann lena n-áirítear streachailt ar son tionchair trí sníomh agus ‘ polaitíocht na flaithiúlachta ’ ”.

translation.en: Borrell also said that "china is aggressively pushing the message that, unlike the us, it is a responsible and reliable partner."
translation.ga: Dúirt borrell freisin go bhfuil "an tsín ag brú go láidir ar an teachtaireacht gur comhpháirtí freagrach iontaofa í murab ionann agus na sa."

translation.en: China has also called for the us to lift its sanctions off of syria, venezuela and iran, while reportedly sending aid to the latter two countries.
translation.ga: D' iarr an tsín freisin ar na sa a smachtbhannaí a bhaint den tsiria, veiniséala agus an iaráin, agus cúnamh á sheoladh chuig an dá thír dheireanacha.

translation.en: Jack ma's donation of 100,000 masks to cuba was blocked by us sanctions on 3 april.
translation.ga: Chuir smachtbhannaí na sa bac ar dheonú jack ma de 100,000 maisc do chúba an 3 aibreán.

translation.en: Us authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
translation.ga: Cúisíodh údaráis na sa freisin as cúnamh atá i gceist do náisiúin eile a atreorú chuig a dtír féin.

translation.en: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as germany, austria and switzerland; and the czech republic and italy.
translation.ga: Agus tuairiscíodh díospóidí a bhaineann le masc idir tíortha eile, mar an ghearmáin, an ostair agus an eilvéis; agus poblacht na seice agus an iodáil.

translation.en: In addition, turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for spain.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, ghabh an tuirc na céadta aerálaí a bhí beartaithe don spáinn.

translation.en: In early march, the italian government criticized the european union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected italy.
translation.ga: Go luath i mí an mhárta, cháin rialtas na hiodáile easpa dlúthpháirtíochta an aontais eorpaigh leis an iodáil a raibh tionchar ag coronavirus uirthi.

translation.en: Maurizio massari, italy's ambassador to the eu, said that "only china responded bilaterally.
translation.ga: Dúirt maurizio massari, ambasadóir na hiodáile don ae, "níor fhreagair ach an tsín go déthaobhach.

translation.en: Certainly, this is not a good sign of european solidarity. "
translation.ga: Cinnte, ní comhartha maith é seo de dhlúthpháirtíocht na heorpa. "

translation.en: On 22 march, after a phone call with italian prime minister giuseppe conte, russian president vladimir putin arranged the russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to italy.
translation.ga: An 22 márta, tar éis glao gutháin le príomhaire na hiodáile giuseppe conte, shocraigh uachtarán na rúise vladimir putin d ’ arm na rúise dochtúirí míleata, feithiclí díghalrúcháin speisialta, agus trealamh leighis eile a sheoladh chuig an iodáil.

translation.en: Italy's la stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of russia's aid was "useless or of little use to italy".
translation.ga: Luaigh nuachtán la stampa na hiodáile “foinse pholaitiúil ardleibhéil ” gan ainm go raibh 80 faoin gcéad de chúnamh na rúise“ gan úsáid nó ar bheagán úsáide don iodáil ”.

translation.en: The source accused russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
translation.ga: Chuir an foinse cúisí ar an rúis go ndeachaigh sí i gcion ar charm maslach "geo-pholaitiúil agus taidhleoireachta".

translation.en: The president of lombardy, attilio fontana, and italian foreign minister luigi di maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
translation.ga: Chaith uachtarán na lombardia, attilio fontana, agus aire gnóthaí eachtracha na hiodáile luigi di maio tuairiscí na meán agus chuir siad a mbuíochas in iúl.

translation.en: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the united states.
translation.ga: Chuir an rúis eitleán lasta le cúnamh míochaine chuig na stáit aontaithe freisin.

translation.en: Kremlin spokesman dmitry peskov said that "when offering assistance to us colleagues, [putin] assumes that when us manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
translation.ga: Dúirt urlabhraí kremlin dmitry peskov "nuair a bhíonn cúnamh á thairiscint aige do chomhghleacaithe sna stáit aontaithe, glacann [putin] leis nuair a ghnóthaíonn déantúsóirí trealaimh agus ábhair mhíochaine móiminteam, go mbeidh siad in ann cómhalartú más gá."

translation.en: The planned nato "defender 2020" military exercise in germany, poland, and the baltic states, the largest nato war exercise since the end of the cold war, will be held on a reduced scale.
translation.ga: Tionólfar cleachtadh míleata beartaithe nato “defender 2020 ” sa ghearmáin, sa pholainn, agus sna stáit bhaltacha, an cleachtadh cogaidh nato is mó ó dheireadh an chogaidh fhuair, ar scála laghdaithe.

translation.en: The campaign for nuclear disarmament's general secretary kate hudson criticized the defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the us and the many european countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating." The iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
translation.ga: Cháin rúnaí ginearálta an fheachtais um dhí-armáil núicléach kate hudson cleachtadh defender 2020: "Sa ghéarchéim reatha sláinte poiblí, cuireann sé beatha na trúpaí as na sa agus an iliomad tíortha eorpacha atá rannpháirteach i mbaol ach áitritheoirí na dtíortha ina bhfuil siad tá siad ag feidhmiú." Chuaigh an víreas i bhfeidhm go mór ar rialtas na hiaráine, le timpeall dhá dhosaen ball parlaiminte ionfhabhtaithe chomh maith le cúig dhuine dhéag eile atá ann faoi láthair nó a bhí ann roimhe seo.

translation.en: Iran's president hassan rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 march 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the united states sanctions against iran.the outbreak has prompted calls for the united states to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
translation.ga: Scríobh uachtarán na hiaráine hassan rouhani litir phoiblí chuig ceannairí domhanda ag lorg cabhrach an 14 márta 2020, ag rá go bhfuil a thír ag streachailt chun an ráig a throid mar gheall ar easpa rochtana ar mhargaí idirnáisiúnta mar thoradh ar smachtbhannaí na stát aontaithe i gcoinne na hiaráine. Spreag sé glaonna ar na stáit aontaithe beartais shóisialta a ghlacadh atá coitianta i dtíortha saibhre eile, lena n-áirítear cúram sláinte uilíoch, cúram leanaí uilíoch, saoire teaghlaigh íoctha, agus leibhéil níos airde maoinithe do shláinte an phobail.

translation.en: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect donald trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.diplomatic relations between japan and south korea worsened due to the pandemic.
translation.ga: Bhí anailísithe polaitiúla ag súil go bhféadfadh sé tionchar diúltach a imirt ar sheans donald trump atoghadh i dtoghchán uachtaránachta 2020. Mhéadaigh caidreamh dé-óid idir an tseapáin agus an chóiré theas mar gheall ar an bpaindéim.

translation.en: South korea criticized japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after japan announced anybody coming from south korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
translation.ga: Cháin an chóiré theas “iarrachtaí coraintín débhríoch agus éighníomhach ” na seapáine tar éis don tseapáin a fhógairt go gcuirfear aon duine a thiocfaidh ón gcóiré theas i gcoraintín coicíse ag suíomhanna atá ainmnithe ag an rialtas.

translation.en: The south korean society was initially polarized on president moon jae-in's response to the crisis.
translation.ga: Rinneadh polarú ar shochaí na cóiré theas ar dtús ar fhreagra an uachtaráin moon jae-in ar an ngéarchéim.

translation.en: Many koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.the pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
translation.ga: Shínigh go leor koreans achainíocha ag éileamh go ndéanfaí impeachment moon ar an méid a mhaígh siad a bheith ag mí-láimhseáil an rialtais ar an ráig, nó ag moladh a fhreagra. Lig an paindéim do thíortha reachtaíocht éigeandála a rith mar fhreagairt.

translation.en: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
translation.ga: Chuir roinnt tráchtairí imní in iúl go bhféadfadh sé ligean do rialtais a gcuid greim ar chumhacht a neartú.

translation.en: In hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, viktor orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
translation.ga: San ungáir, vótáil a pharlaimint chun ligean don phríomh-aire, viktor orbán, rialú a dhéanamh le foraithne ar feadh tréimhse éiginnte, an pharlaimint a chur ar fionraí chomh maith le toghcháin agus pionós a ghearradh orthu siúd a mheastar a scaip faisnéis bhréagach faoin víreas agus an chaoi ar láimhseáil an rialtas an ghéarchéim.

translation.en: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
translation.ga: Cuireadh an milleán ar an ráig coronavirus as roinnt cásanna de ghanntanas soláthair, ag eascairt as úsáid mhéadaithe trealaimh ar fud an domhain chun dul i ngleic leis na ráigeanna, ceannach scaoll, agus cur isteach ar oibríochtaí monarchan agus lóistíochta.

translation.en: The united states food and drug administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
translation.ga: Tá rabhaidh eisithe ag riarachán bia agus drugaí na stát aontaithe faoi ghanntanas drugaí agus trealamh míochaine mar gheall ar éileamh méadaithe tomhaltóirí agus cur isteach ar sholáthraithe.

translation.en: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
translation.ga: Chonaic roinnt áiteanna freisin ceannach scaoll a d ’ fhág gur glanadh seilfeanna buneilimintí grósaera mar bhia, páipéar leithris, agus uisce i mbuidéil, rud a d ’ fhág go raibh ganntanas soláthair ann.

translation.en: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
translation.ga: Tá rabhadh tugtha ag tionscal na teicneolaíochta go háirithe faoi mhoilleanna ar lastais earraí leictreonacha.

translation.en: According to who director-general tedros adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
translation.ga: Dar le tedros adhanom, ard-stiúrthóir who, tá méadú 100 huaire tagtha ar an éileamh ar threalamh cosanta pearsanta.

translation.en: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh ar an éileamh seo tá méadú de suas le fiche oiread an ghnáthphraghais ar phraghsanna agus spreag sé moilleanna freisin ar sholáthar earraí míochaine ar feadh ceithre go sé mhí.

translation.en: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the who warning that this will endanger health workers.
translation.ga: Tá ganntanas trealaimh chosanta pearsanta ina chúis leis ar fud an domhain freisin, le rabhadh who go gcuirfidh sé seo oibrithe sláinte i mbaol.

translation.en: In australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell australian products into china.
translation.ga: San astráil, thug an paindéim deis nua do shiopadóirí daigou táirgí na hastráile a dhíol sa tsín.

translation.en: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the australian government.despite the high prevalence of covid-19 cases in northern italy and the wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
translation.ga: Chruthaigh an ghníomhaíocht ganntanas foirmle do leanaí i roinnt ollmhargaí agus chuir rialtas na hastráile toirmeasc air ina dhiaidh sin. Cuir síos ar leitheadúlacht ard cásanna covid-19 i dtuaisceart na hiodáile agus i réigiún wuhan, agus an t-éileamh ard ar tháirgí bia ina dhiaidh sin spáráladh iad ó ghanntanas bia.

translation.en: Measures by china and italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in europe as well as in north america.
translation.ga: D ’ éirigh go maith le bearta ón tsín agus ón iodáil i gcoinne clárlach agus trádáil aindleathach táirgí criticiúla, ag seachaint ganntanas bia géar a rabhthas ag súil leis san eoraip chomh maith le i meiriceá thuaidh.

translation.en: Northern italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
translation.ga: Ní fhaca laghdú mór i dtuaisceart na hiodáile lena táirgeadh suntasach talmhaíochta, ach d ’ fhéadfadh praghsanna ardú de réir ionadaithe an tionscail.

translation.en: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in wuhan city, while chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
translation.ga: Níor aimsíodh seilfeanna bia folamh ach go sealadach, fiú amháin i gcathair wuhan, agus scaoil oifigigh rialtais na síne cúlchistí muiceola chun a ndóthain cothaithe a thabhairt don daonra.

translation.en: Similar laws exist in italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
translation.ga: Tá dlíthe comhchosúla ann san iodáil lena gceanglaítear ar tháirgeoirí bia cúlchistí a choinneáil d ’ éigeandálaí den sórt sin.

translation.en: Damage to the global economy has been felt in china: According to a media report on 16 march, the economy in china was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
translation.ga: Braitheadh ​ ​ damáiste don gheilleagar domhanda sa tsín: De réir tuarascála sna meáin an 16 márta, bhuail an geilleagar sa tsín an-deacair sa chéad dá mhí de 2020 mar gheall ar na bearta a rinne an rialtas chun scaipeadh víris a chiorrú, agus miondíol thit díolacháin 20.5%.

translation.en: As mainland china is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
translation.ga: Toisc gur mór-gheilleagar agus mol déantúsaíochta í mórthír na síne, chonacthas go bhfuil an ráig víreasach ina bhagairt mhór dhíchobhsaí don gheilleagar domhanda.

translation.en: Agathe demarais of the economist intelligence unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
translation.ga: Tá tuartha ag agathe demarais ón aonad faisnéise eacnamaí go bhfanfaidh margaí luaineach go dtí go dtiocfaidh íomhá níos soiléire chun cinn maidir le torthaí féideartha.

translation.en: In january 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002 – 2004 sars outbreak.
translation.ga: I mí eanáir 2020, mheas roinnt anailísithe go bhféadfadh toradh eacnamaíoch an eipidéim ar fhás domhanda dul thar an ráig sars 2002-2004.

translation.en: One estimate from an expert at washington university in st. louis gave a $300 + billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
translation.ga: Thug meastachán amháin ó shaineolaí in ollscoil washington i st louis tionchar $300 + billiún ar shlabhra soláthair an domhain a d ’ fhéadfadh maireachtáil suas le dhá bhliain.

translation.en: The organization of the petroleum exporting countries (opec) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from china.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh go raibh eagraíocht na dtíortha onnmhairithe peitriliam (opec) “scrofa ” tar éis laghdú géar i bpraghsanna ola mar gheall ar éileamh níos ísle ón tsín.

translation.en: Global stock markets fell on 24 february due to a significant rise in the number of covid-19 cases outside mainland china.
translation.ga: Thit margaí stoc domhanda an 24 feabhra mar gheall ar ardú suntasach i líon na gcásanna covid-19 lasmuigh de mhórthír na síne.

translation.en: On 27 february, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various u.s. stock indexes including the nasdaq-100, the s & amp; p 500 index, and the dow jones industrial average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007 – 08.
translation.ga: An 27 feabhra, mar gheall ar imní mhéadaitheach faoin ráig coronavirus, phostáil innéacsanna stoic éagsúla na sa lena n-áirítear nasdaq-100, innéacs s & amp; p 500, agus meán tionscail dow jones na titimí is géire ó 2008, agus thit an dow 1,191 pointe, an titim lae is mó ó ghéarchéim airgeadais 2007 – 08.

translation.en: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
translation.ga: Chríochnaigh na trí innéacs go léir an tseachtain síos níos mó ná 10%.

translation.en: On 28 february, scope ratings gmbh affirmed china's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a negative outlook.
translation.ga: Ar 28 feabhra, dhearbhaigh scope ratings gmbh rátáil chreidmheasa ceannasach na síne, ach choinnigh sé ionchas diúltach.

translation.en: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 march.
translation.ga: Stoic plunged arís bunaithe ar eagla coronavirus, an titim is mó ar 16 márta.

translation.en: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
translation.ga: Measann go leor daoine gur dócha go mbeidh cúlú eacnamaíochta ann.

translation.en: Economist mohamed el-erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
translation.ga: Mhol an t-eacnamaí mohamed el-erian bearta éigeandála tráthúla na mbanc ceannais agus deir sé.

translation.en: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
translation.ga: Tá bainc cheannais ag freagairt níos gasta ná mar a rinne siad ar thimpiste airgeadais 2008.

translation.en: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
translation.ga: Tá an turasóireacht ar cheann de na hearnálacha is measa atá buailte mar gheall ar thoirmisc taistil, dúnadh áiteanna poiblí lena n-áirítear nithe taistil, agus comhairle ó rialtais i gcoinne aon taistil ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including british airways, china eastern airlines, and qantas, while british regional airline flybe collapsed.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh air sin, chuir go leor aerlínte eitiltí ar ceal mar gheall ar éileamh níos ísle, lena n-áirítear british airways, china eastern airlines, agus qantas, agus thit aerlíne réigiúnach na breataine flybe as a chéile.

translation.en: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
translation.ga: Bhí an tionchar ar thionscal na líne cúrsála ag leibhéal nach bhfacthas riamh cheana.

translation.en: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
translation.ga: Dúnadh roinnt stáisiún traenach agus calafoirt farantóireachta freisin.

translation.en: The epidemic coincided with the chunyun, a major travel season associated with the chinese new year holiday.
translation.ga: Tharla an eipidéim ag an am céanna leis an chunyun, séasúr mór taistil a bhaineann le saoire bhliain nua na síne.

translation.en: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual new year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as hong kong disneyland and shanghai disneyland.
translation.ga: Chuir rialtais náisiúnta agus réigiúnacha roinnt imeachtaí a raibh sluaite móra ar ceal iontu, lena n-áirítear féilte bliantúla na hathbhliana, agus dhún cuideachtaí príobháideacha a gcuid siopaí agus díol spéise do thurasóirí mar hong cong disneyland agus shanghai disneyland go neamhspleách.

translation.en: Many lunar new year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the forbidden city in beijing and traditional temple fairs.
translation.ga: Dúnadh go leor imeachtaí don bhliain nua lunar agus díol spéise do thurasóirí chun ollchruinnithe a chosc, lena n-áirítear an chathair toirmiscthe i mbéising agus aontaí teampall traidisiúnta.

translation.en: In 24 of china's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the new year's holiday to 10 february, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
translation.ga: I 24 de 31 chúige, bhardas agus réigiún na síne, leathnaigh údaráis saoire na hathbhliana go dtí an 10 feabhra, ag treorú d ’ fhormhór na n-ionad oibre gan athoscailt go dtí an dáta sin.

translation.en: These regions represented 80% of the country's gdp and 90% of exports.
translation.ga: B' ionann na réigiúin seo agus 80% de oti na tíre agus 90% d' onnmhairí.

translation.en: Hong kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until march and cancelling its new year celebrations.the retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
translation.ga: D' ardaigh hong cong a leibhéal freagartha galar tógálach go dtí an leibhéal is airde agus dhearbhaigh sé éigeandáil, ag dúnadh scoileanna go dtí mí an mhárta agus ag ceiliúradh na hathbhliana a chealú. Bhí tionchar domhanda ag an earnáil mhiondíola, le laghduithe ar uaireanta stórais nó dúnadh sealadach.

translation.en: Visits to retailers in europe and latin america declined by 40%.
translation.ga: Tháinig laghdú 40% ar chuairteanna ar mhiondíoltóirí san eoraip agus i meiriceá laidineach.

translation.en: North america and middle east retailers saw a 50 – 60% drop.
translation.ga: Tháinig laghdú 50-60% ar mhiondíoltóirí mheiriceá thuaidh agus an mheánoirthir.

translation.en: This also resulted in a 33 – 43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in march compared to february.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh air seo freisin thit titim 33 – 43% i dtrácht coise chuig ionaid siopadóireachta i mí an mhárta i gcomparáid le feabhra.

translation.en: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.according to a united nations economic commission for latin america estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in latin america than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
translation.ga: Chuir oibreoirí ionad siopadóireachta ar fud an domhain bearta breise i bhfeidhm, amhail sláintíocht mhéadaithe, suiteáil scanóirí teirmeacha chun teocht siopadóirí a sheiceáil, agus imeachtaí a chealú. Ag teacht le meastachán choimisiún eacnamaíochta na náisiún aontaithe do mheiriceá laidineach, d ’ fhéadfadh an cúlú a tharlódh de bharr paindéime imeacht idir 14 agus 22 milliún níos mó daoine i bhfíor-bhochtaineacht i meiriceá laidineach ná mar a bheadh ​ ​ sa chás sin gan an paindéim.

translation.en: In january and february 2020, during the height of the epidemic in wuhan, about 5 million people in china lost their jobs.
translation.ga: I mí eanáir agus feabhra 2020, le linn airde na heipidéime i wuhan, chaill thart ar 5 mhilliún duine sa tsín a gcuid post.

translation.en: Many of china's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in hubei province.in march 2020, more than 10 million americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
translation.ga: Tá go leor de bheagnach 300 milliún oibrí imirceach tuaithe sa tsín sáinnithe sa bhaile i gcúigí intíre nó gafa i gcúige hubei. I mí an mhárta 2020, chaill níos mó ná 10 milliún meiriceánach a gcuid post agus chuir siad isteach ar chúnamh rialtais.

translation.en: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the united states and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the federal reserve bank of st. louis.the lockdown in india has left tens of millions of indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.the survey from the angus reid institute found that 44% of canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in spain since it went into lockdown in mid-march 2020.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go gcosnódh an ráig coronavirus 47 milliún post sna stáit aontaithe agus d ’ fhéadfadh ráta dífhostaíochta bualadh 32%, de réir meastacháin ó bhanc cúlchiste feidearálach naomh louis. D ’ fhág an glasáil san india na mílte milliún d ’ oibrithe imirceacha indiach (a íoctar trí phá laethúil) dífhostaithe. Fuair ​ ​ an suirbhé ó institiúid angus reid go raibh dífhostaíocht de chineál éigin ag 44% de theaghlaigh cheanada. Chaill 900,000 oibrí a gcuid post sa spáinn ó chuaigh sé faoi ghlas i lár mhí an mhárta 2020.

translation.en: During the second half of march, 4 million french workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million british workers applied for a universal credit scheme.almost half a million companies in germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as kurzarbeit.
translation.ga: Le linn an dara leath de mhárta, chuir 4 mhilliún oibrí francach isteach ar shochair dhífhostaíochta shealadacha agus chuir 1 mhilliún oibrí briotanach isteach ar scéim chreidmheasa uilíoch. Sheol leathmhilliún cuideachta sa ghearmáin a gcuid oibrithe ar scéimeanna oibre gearrthéarmacha fóirdheonaithe ag an rialtas ar a dtugtar mar kurzarbeit.

translation.en: The german short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by france and britain.
translation.ga: Ghlac an fhrainc agus an bhreatain le scéim chúitimh oibre gearr-ama na gearmáine.

translation.en: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals — both employed and independent — globally.
translation.ga: Chuaigh an paindéim i bhfeidhm go mór ar earnálacha na n-ealaíon taibhithe agus na hoidhreachta cultúrtha, a raibh tionchar acu ar oibríochtaí na n-eagraíochtaí chomh maith le daoine aonair - fostaithe agus neamhspleácha araon - ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
translation.ga: Rinne eagraíochtaí na hearnála ealaíon agus cultúir iarracht seasamh lena misean (maoinithe go minic go poiblí) chun rochtain ar oidhreacht chultúrtha a sholáthar don phobal, sábháilteacht a gcuid fostaithe agus an phobail a choinneáil, agus tacú le healaíontóirí nuair is féidir.

translation.en: By march 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
translation.ga: Faoi mhárta 2020, ar fud an domhain agus go céimeanna éagsúla, bhí músaeim, leabharlanna, ionaid taibhithe agus institiúidí cultúrtha eile dúnta ar feadh tréimhse éiginnte agus cuireadh a dtaispeántais, a n-imeachtaí agus a dtaibhithe ar ceal nó curtha siar.

translation.en: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
translation.ga: Mar fhreagairt, rinneadh dianiarrachtaí seirbhísí malartacha a sholáthar trí ardáin dhigiteacha. Is é an toradh atá ar an ngalar le déanaí agus atá ag luasghéarú go tapa ná seirbhísí reiligiúnacha, mórimeachtaí i spóirt, agus imeachtaí sóisialta eile a chealú, mar shampla féilte ceoil agus ceolchoirmeacha, comhdhálacha teicneolaíochta, agus seónna faisin.

translation.en: The film industry has also experienced disruption.the vatican announced that holy week observances in rome, which occur during the last week of the christian penitential season of lent, have been cancelled.
translation.ga: Tá cur isteach ar thionscal na scannán freisin. D ’ fhógair an vatacáin go bhfuil breathnóireachtaí na seachtaine naofa sa róimh, a tharlaíonn le linn na seachtaine deireanaí de shéasúr peannaireachta críostaí an charghais, curtha ar ceal.

translation.en: Many dioceses have recommended older christians to stay at home rather than attending mass on sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
translation.ga: Mhol go leor deoise do chríostaithe níos sine fanacht sa bhaile seachas freastal ar aifreann ar an domhnach; chuir roinnt eaglaisí seirbhísí eaglaise ar fáil ar an raidió, sruthú beo ar líne nó teilifís agus tá adhradh tiomáinte á thairiscint ag cuid eile.

translation.en: With the roman catholic diocese of rome closing its churches and chapels and st. peter's square emptied of christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
translation.ga: Le deoise caitliceach rómhánach na róimhe ag dúnadh a n-eaglaisí agus a séipéal agus cearnóg naomh peadar folamh d ’ oilithrigh chríostaí, chuir comhlachtaí reiligiúnacha eile seirbhísí ar ceal agus cruinnithe poiblí teoranta in eaglaisí, moscanna, sionagóga, teampaill agus gurdwaras.

translation.en: Iran's health ministry announced the cancellation of friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while saudi arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in mecca and medina.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair aireacht sláinte na hiaráine go gcuirfí paidreacha dé haoine ar ceal i gceantair a ndeachaigh an ráig i bhfeidhm orthu agus dúnadh na scrínte níos déanaí, agus chuir an araib shádach cosc ​ ​ ar iontráil oilithrigh eachtracha chomh maith lena gcónaitheoirí chuig láithreáin naofa i mecca agus i medina.

translation.en: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the second world war.
translation.ga: Is é an paindéim ba chúis leis an gcur isteach is suntasaí ar an bhféilire spóirt ar fud an domhain ón dara cogadh domhanda.

translation.en: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019 – 20 uefa champions league, 2019 – 20 premier league, uefa euro 2020, 2019 – 20 nba season, and 2019 – 20 nhl season.
translation.ga: Cuireadh an chuid is mó d ’ imeachtaí móra spóirt ar ceal nó cuireadh siar iad, lena n-áirítear sraith seaimpíní uefa 2019 – 20, premier league 2019 – 20, euro 2020 uefa, séasúr nba 2019-20, agus séasúr nhl 2019 – 20.

translation.en: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 summer olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of july; the international olympic committee announced on 24 march that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021" .casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
translation.ga: Chuir an ráig isteach ar phleananna do chluichí oilimpeacha an tsamhraidh 2020, a bhí beartaithe ar dtús tosú ag deireadh mhí iúil; d ’ fhógair an coiste oilimpeach idirnáisiúnta an 24 márta go ndéanfar an ócáid ​ ​ a “athsceidealú go dtí dáta níos faide ná 2020 ach tráth nach déanaí ná samhradh 2021 ”. Dúnadh ceasaíneonna agus ionaid chearrbhachais eile ar fud an domhain agus cuireadh comórtais poker beo ar athló nó curtha ar ceal.

translation.en: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.the entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh air seo bhog go leor gamblers ar líne, agus thuairiscigh go leor suíomhanna cearrbhachais ar líne méaduithe suntasacha ar a rátaí sínithe nua. Bhí tionchar freisin ar thionscal na siamsaíochta, le grúpaí ceoil éagsúla ag cur turais ceolchoirme ar fionraí nó ag cealú.

translation.en: Many large theatres such as those on broadway also suspended all performances.
translation.ga: Chuir go leor amharclanna móra mar iad siúd ar broadway gach léiriú ar fionraí freisin.

translation.en: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
translation.ga: Tá iniúchadh déanta ag roinnt ealaíontóirí ar bhealaí chun leanúint ar aghaidh ag táirgeadh agus ag roinnt oibre ar an idirlíon mar mhalairt ar léiriú beo traidisiúnta, mar shampla ceolchoirmeacha sruthú beo nó “féilte ” bunaithe ar an ngréasán a chruthú d ’ ealaíontóirí chun a gcuid oibre a dhéanamh, a dháileadh agus a phoibliú.

translation.en: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
translation.ga: Ar líne, tá go leor memes idirlín ar théama coronavirus scaipthe mar a théann a lán daoine chun greann agus seachráin i measc éiginnteachta.

translation.en: Since the outbreak of covid-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of chinese and east asian descent, and against people from hotspots in europe, the united states and other countries.
translation.ga: Ó thosaigh covid-19, tugadh claontacht níos airde, seineafóibe agus ciníochas faoi deara i dtreo daoine de shliocht na síne agus oirthear na háise, agus i gcoinne daoine ó áiteanna teo san eoraip, sna stáit aontaithe agus i dtíortha eile.

translation.en: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in europe, east asia, north america, and the asia-pacific region.
translation.ga: Tugadh faoi deara eachtraí eagla, amhrais agus naimhdeas i go leor tíortha, go háirithe san eoraip, in oirthear na háise, i meiriceá thuaidh, agus i réigiún na háise-aigéan ciúin.

translation.en: Reports from february (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to china) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
translation.ga: Tá tuairiscí ó mhí feabhra (nuair a bhí formhór na gcásanna teoranta don tsín fós) doiciméadaithe ar mhothúcháin chiníocha a cuireadh in iúl i ngrúpaí éagsúla ar fud an domhain de dhaoine síneach atá tuillte ag an víreas nó a fhaigheann an méid a maíodh mar iarchúiteamh.

translation.en: Some countries in africa have also seen a rise in anti-chinese sentiment.
translation.ga: Tá méadú tagtha ar mheon frith-síneach i roinnt tíortha san afraic freisin.

translation.en: Many residents of wuhan and hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
translation.ga: Thuairiscigh go leor cónaitheoirí wuhan agus hubei idirdhealú bunaithe ar a mbunús réigiúnach.

translation.en: There has been support for the chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
translation.ga: Tugadh tacaíocht do na sínigh, ar líne agus as líne, agus dóibh siúd i gceantair atá faoi bhrú víris.

translation.en: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from italy, the first country in europe to experience a serious outbreak of covid-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.citizens in countries including malaysia, new zealand, singapore, and south korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
translation.ga: Tar éis dul chun cinn na ráige go tíortha nua le hotspot, d ’ fhéadfadh daoine ón iodáil, an chéad tír san eoraip a d ’ fhulaing ráig thromchúiseach de covid-19, a bheith faoi réir amhras agus seineafóibe freisin. Saoránaigh i dtíortha lena n-áirítear an mhalaeisia, an nua-shéalainn, singeapór, agus shínigh an chóiré theas achainíocha ar dtús ag stocaireacht chun cosc ​ ​ a chur ar mhuintir na síne dul isteach ina dtíortha mar iarracht an galar a stopadh.

translation.en: In japan, the hashtag # chinesedontcometojapan trended on twitter.
translation.ga: Sa tseapáin, bhí an hashtag # chinesedontcometojapan ag claonadh ar twitter.

translation.en: Chinese people as well as other asians in the united kingdom and the united states have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
translation.ga: Thuairiscigh muintir na síne chomh maith le asánaigh eile sa ríocht aontaithe agus sna stáit aontaithe leibhéil mhéadaitheacha mí-úsáide ciníocha, chomh maith le hionsaithe.

translation.en: U.s. president donald trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "chinese virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-chinese.
translation.ga: Tá cáineadh os comhair uachtarán na stát aontaithe donald trump as tagairt a dhéanamh don coronavirus mar an “víreas síneach ”, téarma a mheas criticeoirí a bheith ciníoch agus frith-síneach.

translation.en: Protesters in ukraine attacked buses carrying ukrainian and foreign evacuees from wuhan to novi sanzhary.
translation.ga: D ’ ionsaigh lucht agóide san úcráin busanna a bhí ag iompar aslonnaithe úcránacha agus eachtrannacha ó wuhan go novi sanzhary.

translation.en: Students who come from northeast india, which shares a border with china, and study in major indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh go bhfuil ciapadh a bhaineann leis an ráig coronavirus ag mic léinn a thagann ó oirthuaisceart na hindia, a roinneann teorainn leis an tsín, agus a dhéanann staidéar i gcathracha móra na hindia.

translation.en: The bharatiya janata party's state unit president in west bengal dilip ghosh stated that the chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the god took revenge against them."
translation.ga: Dúirt uachtarán aonad stáit pháirtí bharatiya janata in iarthar bengal dilip ghosh gur scrios na sínigh an dúlra agus "sin an fáth gur ghlac an dia díoltas ina gcoinne."

translation.en: The remarks were later condemned by the chinese consulate in kolkata, calling it "erroneous" .in china, xenophobia and racism agains non-chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
translation.ga: Cháin consalacht na síne i kolkata na ráitis ina dhiaidh sin, ag rá go raibh sé “earráideach ”. Sa tsín, tá an phaindéim sáraithe ag seineafóibe agus ciníochas arís agus arís eile ar chónaitheoirí neamh-shíneacha iad, agus eachtrannaigh á gcur síos mar“ truflais eachtrach ” agus dírithe ar “dhiúscairt ”.

translation.en: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
translation.ga: Chuir go leor nuachtán le ballaí pá iad as cuid dá gclúdach coronavirus nó cuid díobh.

translation.en: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
translation.ga: Chuir go leor foilsitheoirí eolaíochta páipéir eolaíochta a bhain leis an ráig ar fáil le rochtain oscailte.

translation.en: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as biorxiv.
translation.ga: Roghnaigh eolaithe áirithe a dtorthaí a roinnt go tapa ar fhreastalaithe réamhphriontála mar biorxiv.

translation.en: Emerging infectious disease – infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
translation.ga: Galar tógálach atá ag teacht chun cinn - galar tógálach pataigin atá ag teacht chun cinn, go minic núíosach ina raon ráige nó ina mhodh tarchuir

translation.en: Globalization and disease – overview of globalization and disease transmission
translation.ga: Domhandú agus galar - forbhreathnú ar dhomhandú agus tarchur galair

translation.en: List of epidemics and pandemics – a list of death tolls due to infectious disease
translation.ga: Liosta eipidéimí agus paindéimí - liosta de dholaí báis mar gheall ar ghalar tógálach

translation.en: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
translation.ga: Smuigleáil agus zónóisí fiadhúlra - rioscaí sláinte a bhaineann leis an trádáil i bhfiadhúlra coimhthíocha

translation.en: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (covid-19) and the associated sars-cov-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
translation.ga: Cuimsíonn tástáil saotharlainne don ghalar coronavirus riospráide 2019 (covid-19) agus an víreas sars-cov-2 gaolmhar modhanna a bhraitheann láithreacht víris agus iad siúd a bhraitheann antasubstaintí a tháirgtear mar fhreagairt ar ionfhabhtú.

translation.en: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by rt-pcr, which detects the coronavirus' rna.
translation.ga: Deimhníonn rt-pcr láithreacht víris i samplaí, a aimsíonn rna an coronavirus.

translation.en: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the rna of the sars-cov-2 virus.
translation.ga: Tá an tástáil seo sonrach agus tá sí deartha chun rna an víris sars-cov-2 a bhrath.

translation.en: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
translation.ga: Úsáidtear é chun ionfhabhtuithe gníomhacha le déanaí nó gníomhacha a dhearbhú.

translation.en: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
translation.ga: Is féidir antasubstaintí (séireolaíocht) a bhrath a úsáid le haghaidh diagnóis agus faireachas daonra.

translation.en: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
translation.ga: Taispeánann tástálacha antashubstaintí cé mhéad duine a raibh an galar orthu, lena n-áirítear iad siúd a raibh a gcuid comharthaí ró-bheag le tuairisciú nó a bhí neamhshiomptómach.

translation.en: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
translation.ga: Is féidir ráta básmhaireachta cruinn an ghalair agus leibhéal imdhíonachta tréada sa daonra a chinneadh ó thorthaí na tástála seo.

translation.en: Due to limited testing, as of march 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar thástáil theoranta, amhail márta 2020 ní raibh sonraí iontaofa ag aon tír ar leitheadúlacht an víris ina ndaonra.

translation.en: By 23 march, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
translation.ga: Faoin 23 márta, ní dhearna aon tír tástáil ar níos mó ná 3% dá ndaonra, agus tá éagsúlachtaí ollmhóra ann maidir leis an méid tástála a rinneadh ar fud tíortha.

translation.en: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
translation.ga: Is dóigh go mbeidh tionchar suntasach ag an inathraitheacht seo ar rátaí básmhaireachta cásanna a thuairiscítear, ar dóigh go ndéanfar ró-mheastachán suntasach orthu i roinnt tíortha.

translation.en: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rrt-pcr) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
translation.ga: Ag baint úsáide as imoibriú slabhrúil polaiméaráise tras-athscríobh fíor-ama (rrt-pcr) is féidir an tástáil a dhéanamh ar shamplaí riospráide a fhaightear trí mhodhanna éagsúla, lena n-áirítear swab nasopharyngeal nó sampla sputum.

translation.en: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
translation.ga: De ghnáth bíonn torthaí ar fáil laistigh de chúpla uair an chloig go 2 lá.

translation.en: The rt-pcr test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
translation.ga: Níl an tástáil rt-pcr a dhéantar le swabs scornach iontaofa ach sa chéad seachtain den ghalar.

translation.en: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
translation.ga: Níos déanaí is féidir leis an víreas imeacht sa scornach agus é ag méadú i gcónaí sna scamhóga.

translation.en: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
translation.ga: Maidir le daoine ionfhabhtaithe a ndearnadh tástáil orthu sa dara seachtain, mar mhalairt air sin is féidir ábhar samplach a thógáil ó na haerbhealaí doimhne trí chaititéar trí shúchán nó trí ábhar casachta (sputum) a úsáid.

translation.en: One of the early pcr tests was developed at charité in berlin in january 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rrt-pcr), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the world health organization (who).
translation.ga: Forbraíodh ceann de na tástálacha pcr luatha ag charité i mbeirlín i mí eanáir 2020 ag baint úsáide as imoibriú slabhrúil polaiméaráise tras-athscríobh fíor-ama (rrt-pcr), agus bhí sé mar bhunús le 250,000 feiste le dáileadh ag an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte (who).

translation.en: The united kingdom had also developed a test by 23 january 2020.the south korean company kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, pcr-based sars-cov-2 detection kit (powerchek coronavirus) on 28 january 2020.
translation.ga: Bhí tástáil forbartha ag an ríocht aontaithe freisin faoin 23 eanáir 2020. D ’ fhorbair an chuideachta cóiré theas kogenebiotech grád braite, trealamh braite sars-cov-2 bunaithe ar pcr (powerchek coronavirus) an 28 eanáir 2020.

translation.en: It looks for the "e" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the rdrp gene specific to sars-cov-2.in china, bgi group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from china's national medical products administration for a pcr-based sars-cov-2 detection kit.in the united states, the centers for disease control and prevention (cdc) is distributing its 2019-novel coronavirus (2019-ncov) real-time rt-pcr diagnostic panel to public health labs through the international reagent resource.
translation.ga: Lorgaíonn sé an géine "e" arna roinnt ag gach coronaviruses béite, agus an géine rdrp a bhaineann go sonrach le sars-cov-2.an tsín, bhí grúpa bgi ar cheann de na chéad chuideachtaí a fuair ceadú úsáide éigeandála ó riarachán náisiúnta táirgí leighis na síne le haghaidh a trealamh braite sars-cov-2 pcr-bhunaithe. Sna stáit aontaithe, tá na hionaid um rialú agus cosc ar ghalair (cdc) ag dáileadh a bpainéal diagnóiseach fíor-ama rt-pcr 2019-úrscéal (2019-ncov) ar shaotharlanna sláinte poiblí tríd an acmhainn imoibrí idirnáisiúnta.

translation.en: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the cdc in atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of february 2020.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh ar cheann de thrí thástáil ghéiniteacha i leaganacha níos sine de na trealamh tástála bhí torthaí neamhchinntithe mar gheall ar imoibrithe lochtacha, agus tranglam tástála ag an cdc in atlanta; mar thoradh air seo, próiseáladh go rathúil níos lú ná 100 sampla in aghaidh an lae ar feadh mhí feabhra 2020 ar fad.

translation.en: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 february 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
translation.ga: Níor socraíodh go mbeadh tástálacha a úsáideann dhá chomhpháirt iontaofa go dtí an 28 feabhra 2020, agus ní go dtí sin a ceadaíodh do shaotharlanna stáit agus áitiúla tús a chur le tástáil.

translation.en: The test was approved by the food and drug administration under an emergency use authorization.us commercial labs began testing in early march 2020.
translation.ga: Cheadaigh an riarachán bia agus drugaí an tástáil faoi údarú um úsáid éigeandála. Thosaigh saotharlanna tráchtála ag tástáil go luath i mí an mhárta 2020.

translation.en: As of 5 march 2020 labcorp announced nationwide availability of covid-19 testing based on rt-pcr.
translation.ga: Amhail an 5 márta 2020 d ’ fhógair labcorp go mbeadh tástáil covid-19 ar fáil ar fud na tíre bunaithe ar rt-pcr.

translation.en: Quest diagnostics similarly made nationwide covid-19 testing available as of 9 march 2020.
translation.ga: Mar an gcéanna chuir quest diagnostics tástáil covid-19 ar fud na tíre ar fáil amhail an 9 márta 2020.

translation.en: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to cdc requirements.
translation.ga: Níor fógraíodh aon teorainneacha cainníochta; caithfear bailiú agus próiseáil eiseamal de réir riachtanais cdc.

translation.en: In russia, the covid-19 test was developed and produced by the state research center of virology and biotechnology vector.
translation.ga: Sa rúis, rinne ionad taighde stáit víreolaíochta agus biteicneolaíochta vector an tástáil covid-19 a fhorbairt agus a tháirgeadh.

translation.en: On 11 february 2020 the test was registered by the federal service for surveillance in healthcare.on 12 march 2020, mayo clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect covid-19 infection.on 13 march 2020, roche diagnostics received fda approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
translation.ga: An 11 feabhra 2020 chláraigh an tseirbhís chónaidhme um fhaireachas i gcúram sláinte an tástáil. Ar 12 márta 2020, tuairiscíodh go ndearna tástáil i gclinic mhaigh eo chun ionfhabhtú covid-19 a bhrath. Ar 13 márta 2020, fuair roche diagnostics ceadú fda le haghaidh a tástáil a d ’ fhéadfaí a dhéanamh laistigh de 3.5 uair an chloig i méid ard, rud a ligfeadh do mheaisín amháin thart ar 4,128 tástáil a dhéanamh i dtréimhse 24 uair an chloig.

translation.en: On 19 march 2020, the fda issued emergency use authorization (eua) to abbott laboratories for a test on abbott's m2000 system; the fda had previously issued similar authorization to hologic, labcorp, and thermo fisher scientific.
translation.ga: An 19 márta 2020, d ’ eisigh an fda údarú úsáide éigeandála (eua) chuig abbott laboratories le haghaidh tástála ar chóras m2000 abbott; roimhe seo d' eisigh an fda údarú cosúil le hologic, labcorp, agus thermo fisher scientific.

translation.en: On 21 march 2020, cepheid similarly received eua from the fda for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
translation.ga: An 21 márta 2020, fuair cepheid eua ón fda ar an gcaoi chéanna le haghaidh tástála a thógann thart ar 45 nóiméad.

translation.en: The fda has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of pcr.
translation.ga: Tá tástáil ceadaithe ag an fda a úsáideann teicneolaíocht aimplithe aigéad núicléasach isiteirmeach in ionad pcr.

translation.en: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
translation.ga: Ós rud é nach n-éilíonn sé seo sraith timthriallta malartacha teochta is féidir leis an modh seo torthaí dearfacha a sholáthar chomh beag le cúig nóiméad agus torthaí diúltacha i 13 nóiméad.

translation.en: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the u.s. and abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.a test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (n protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
translation.ga: Faoi láthair tá thart ar 18,000 de na meaisíní seo sna sa agus tá abbott ag súil le rampáil a dhéanamh ar an déantúsaíocht chun 50,000 tástáil a sheachadadh in aghaidh an lae. Tá tástáil a úsáideann antashubstaint monoclonal a cheanglaíonn go sonrach le próitéin núiclipapsíd (próitéin n) an coronavirus nua á fhorbairt. i taiwan, le súil go bhféadann sé torthaí a sholáthar i gceann 15 go 20 nóiméad díreach cosúil le tástáil tapa fliú.

translation.en: A march 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas ct [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
translation.ga: Ba é tátal athbhreithniú litríochta i mí an mhárta 2020 “gur beag luach diagnóiseach atá ag radagrafaíochtaí cófra go luath, ach d ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh torthaí ct [tomagrafaíocht ríofa] i láthair fiú sula dtosaíonn an symptom."

translation.en: For example, posters with "correct hand washing techniques" were hung up next to hand washing sinks in public toilets and in the toilets of office buildings and airports in germany.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, crochadh póstaeir le “teicnící níocháin láimhe cearta ” in aice le doirteal níocháin láimhe i leithris phoiblí agus i leithris foirgneamh oifige agus aerfort sa ghearmáin.

translation.en: The phrase "washing one's hands of" something, means declaring one's unwillingness to take responsibility for the thing or share complicity in it.
translation.ga: Is éard atá i gceist leis an bhfrása “níocháin do lámha de rud ”, a dhearbhú go bhfuil tú toilteanach freagracht a ghlacadh as an rud nó castacht a roinnt ann.

translation.en: It originates from the bible passage in matthew where pontius pilate washed his hands of the decision to crucify jesus christ, but has become a phrase with a much wider usage in some english communities.
translation.ga: Eascraíonn sé as sliocht an bhíobla i matha inar nigh pontius pilat a lámha faoin gcinneadh íosa críost a chéasadh, ach tá sé anois ina abairt le húsáid i bhfad níos leithne i roinnt pobail shasana.

translation.en: In shakespeare's macbeth, lady macbeth begins to compulsively wash her hands in an attempt to cleanse an imagined stain, representing her guilty conscience regarding crimes she had committed and induced her husband to commit.
translation.ga: I macbeth de chuid shakespeare, tosaíonn an bhantiarna macbeth ag níochán a lámha go héigeantach in iarracht stain shamhlaithe a ghlanadh, ag léiriú a coinsiasa ciontach maidir le coireanna a rinne sí agus a spreag a fear céile le déanamh.

translation.en: It has also been found that people, after having recalled or contemplated unethical acts, tend to wash hands more often than others, and tend to value hand washing equipment more.
translation.ga: Fuarthas amach freisin go mbíonn claonadh ag daoine, tar éis dóibh gníomhartha mí-eiticiúla a mheabhrú nó machnamh a dhéanamh orthu, lámha a ní níos minice ná a chéile, agus go mbíonn claonadh acu luach níos mó a chur ar threalamh níocháin láimhe.

translation.en: Furthermore, those who are allowed to wash their hands after such a contemplation are less likely to engage in other "cleansing" compensatory actions, such as volunteering.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, is lú an seans dóibh siúd a bhfuil cead acu a lámha a ní tar éis a leithéid de mhachnamh dul i mbun caingean cúitimh “glantacháin ” eile, mar shampla obair dheonach.

translation.en: Religions prescribe hand washing for both hygienic and symbolic purposes.symbolic hand washing, using water but no soap to wash hands, is a part of ritual hand washing featured in many religions, including bahá'í faith, hinduism, tevilah and netilat yadayim in judaism, lavabo in christianity, and wudhu in islam.religions also prescribe hygienic hand washing, especially after certain actions.
translation.ga: Forordaíonn reiligiúin níochán láimhe chun críocha sláinteachais agus siombalacha araon. Is cuid de níochán láimhe deasghnátha é níochán láimhe neamhshiméadrach, ag úsáid uisce ach gan gallúnach chun lámha a ní, atá le feiceáil i go leor reiligiúin, lena n-áirítear creideamh bahá' í, hiondúchas, tevilah agus netilat yadayim sa ghiúdachas, lavabo sa chríostaíocht, agus wudhu san ioslam. Forordaíonn rúin níocháin láimhe sláinteachais freisin, go háirithe tar éis gníomhartha áirithe.

translation.en: Hinduism, judaism and islam mandate washing of hands after using the toilet.
translation.ga: Sainordú hiondúchas, giúdachas agus ioslam níocháin lámha tar éis an leithreas a úsáid.

translation.en: And, hinduism, buddhism, sikhism, judaism and islam mandate washing of hands before and after every meal.
translation.ga: Agus sainordaíonn an hiondúchas, an búdachas, an sikhism, an giúdachas agus ioslam lámha a ní roimh agus i ndiaidh gach béile.

translation.en: Workplace hazard controls for covid-19
translation.ga: Rialuithe guaise san ionad oibre do covid-19

translation.en: Workplace hazard controls for covid-19 are the application of occupational safety and health methodologies for hazard controls to the prevention of coronavirus disease 2019 (covid-19).
translation.ga: Is éard atá i rialuithe guaise san ionad oibre do covid-19 modheolaíochtaí sábháilteachta ceirde agus sláinte a chur i bhfeidhm maidir le rialuithe guaise chun galar coronavirus 2019 (covid-19) a chosc.

translation.en: The proper hazard controls in the workplace depend on the worksite and job task, based on a risk assessment of sources of exposure, disease severity in the community, and risk factors of individual workers who may be vulnerable to contracting covid-19.
translation.ga: Braitheann na rialuithe guaise cearta san ionad oibre ar an láthair oibre agus ar an tasc poist, bunaithe ar mheasúnú riosca ar fhoinsí nochta, déine galair sa phobal, agus ar fhachtóirí riosca oibrithe aonair a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith i mbaol covid-19 a chonradh.

translation.en: According to the u.s. occupational safety and health administration (osha), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers, for which basic infection prevention measures are recommended, including hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
translation.ga: De réir riarachán sábháilteachta agus sláinte ceirde na stát aontaithe (osha), is beag teagmháil cheirde a bhíonn ag poist le riosca nochta níos ísle leis an bpobal agus le hoibrithe bó eile, a moltar bearta bunúsacha chun ionfhabhtú a chosc, lena n-áirítear níocháin láimhe, oibrithe a spreagadh chun fanacht sa bhaile má tá siad tinn, béasaíocht riospráide, agus gnáth-ghlanadh agus díghalrú na timpeallachta oibre a chothabháil.

translation.en: Medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact with people who are not known or suspected with covid-19, but may be infected due to ongoing community transmission or international travel.
translation.ga: I measc na bpost riosca nochta meánach tá poist a dteastaíonn teagmháil go minic nó go dlúth leo le daoine nach bhfuil eolas nó amhras orthu le covid-19, ach a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith ionfhabhtaithe mar gheall ar tharchur leanúnach pobail nó taisteal idirnáisiúnta.

translation.en: This includes workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.
translation.ga: Áirítear leis seo oibrithe a mbíonn teagmháil acu leis an bpobal i gcoitinne, mar shampla i scoileanna, i dtimpeallachtaí oibre ard-dlúis daonra, agus i roinnt suíomhanna miondíola ardtoirte.

translation.en: Hazard controls for this group, in addition to basic infection prevention measures, include ventilation using high-efficiency air filters, sneeze guards, and having personal protective equipment available in case a person with covid-19 is encountered.
translation.ga: I measc na rialuithe guaise don ghrúpa seo, i dteannta le bearta bunúsacha chun ionfhabhtuithe a chosc, tá aeráil ag baint úsáide as scagairí aeir ardéifeachtúlachta, gardaí sraothartach, agus trealamh cosanta pearsanta a bheith ar fáil ar eagla go dtiocfaí ar dhuine le covid-19.

translation.en: Osha considers healthcare and mortuary workers exposed to known or suspected person with covid-19 to be at high exposure risk, which increases to very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected person with covid-19.
translation.ga: Measann osha go bhfuil oibrithe cúram sláinte agus marbhlainne atá nochtaithe do dhuine aitheanta nó amhrasta le covid-19 i mbaol ard nochta, a ardaíonn go riosca nochta an-ard má dhéanann oibrithe nósanna imeachta giniúna aerasóil ar, nó má bhailíonn nó má láimhseálann siad eiseamail ó, duine aitheanta nó amhrasta. le covid-19.

translation.en: Hazard controls appropriate for these workers include engineering controls such as negative pressure ventilation rooms, and personal protective equipment appropriate to the job task.
translation.ga: I measc na rialuithe guaise atá oiriúnach do na hoibrithe seo tá rialuithe innealtóireachta ar nós seomraí aerála brú diúltacha, agus trealamh cosanta pearsanta atá oiriúnach don tasc poist.

translation.en: Covid-19 outbreaks can have several effects within the workplace.
translation.ga: Is féidir go mbeidh roinnt éifeachtaí ag ráigeanna covid-19 san ionad oibre.

translation.en: Workers may be absent from work due to becoming sick, needing to care for others, or from fear of possible exposure.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh oibrithe as láthair ón obair mar gheall ar a bheith tinn, go gcaithfidh siad aire a thabhairt do dhaoine eile, nó ar eagla go nochtfaí iad.

translation.en: Patterns of commerce may change, both in terms of what goods are demanded, and the means of acquiring these goods (such as shopping at off-peak hours or through delivery or drive-through services).
translation.ga: Féadfaidh patrúin tráchtála athrú, i dtéarmaí na n-earraí a éilítear, agus na bealaí chun na hearraí sin a fháil (mar shampla siopadóireacht ag uaireanta seachbhuaice nó trí sheirbhísí seachadta nó tiomána tríd).

translation.en: Lastly, shipments of items from geographic areas severely affected by covid-19 may be interrupted.an infectious disease preparedness and response plan can be used to guide protective actions.
translation.ga: Faoi dheireadh, féadfar cur isteach ar lastais earraí ó cheantair gheografacha a ndéanann covid-19 difear mór dóibh. Is féidir plean ullmhachta agus freagartha galar tógálach a úsáid chun gníomhaíochtaí cosanta a threorú.

translation.en: Plans address the levels of risk associated with various worksites and job tasks, including sources of exposure, risk factors arising from home and community settings, and risk factors of individual workers such as old age or chronic medical conditions.
translation.ga: Pléann pleananna leis na leibhéil riosca a bhaineann le hionaid oibre agus tascanna poist éagsúla, lena n-áirítear foinsí nochta, fachtóirí riosca a eascraíonn as suíomhanna baile agus pobail, agus fachtóirí riosca oibrithe aonair mar sheanaois nó riochtaí míochaine ainsealacha.

translation.en: They also outline controls necessary to address those risks, and contingency plans for situations that may arise as a result of outbreaks.
translation.ga: Tugann siad breac-chuntas freisin ar na rialuithe is gá chun aghaidh a thabhairt ar na rioscaí sin, agus ar phleananna teagmhasacha do chásanna a d ’ fhéadfadh teacht chun cinn mar thoradh ar ráigeanna.

translation.en: Infectious disease preparedness and response plans may be subject to national or subnational recommendations.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh pleananna ullmhachta agus freagartha galar tógálach a bheith faoi réir mholtaí náisiúnta nó fo-náisiúnta.

translation.en: Objectives for response to an outbreak include reducing transmission among staff, protecting people who are at higher risk for adverse health complications, maintaining business operations, and minimizing adverse effects on other entities in their supply chains.
translation.ga: I measc na gcuspóirí maidir le freagairt ar ráig tá tarchur i measc na foirne a laghdú, daoine atá i mbaol níos airde as deacrachtaí díobhálacha sláinte a chosaint, oibríochtaí gnó a chothabháil, agus éifeachtaí díobhálacha ar aonáin eile ina slabhraí soláthair a íoslaghdú.

translation.en: The disease severity in the community where the business is located affects the responses taken.
translation.ga: Bíonn tionchar ag déine an ghalair sa phobal ina bhfuil an gnó suite ar na freagraí a glacadh.

translation.en: The hierarchy of hazard controls is a framework widely used in occupational safety and health to group hazard controls by effectiveness.
translation.ga: Is creat é ordlathas na rialuithe guaise a úsáidtear go forleathan i sábháilteacht agus sláinte ceirde chun rialuithe guaise a ghrúpáil de réir éifeachtúlachta.

translation.en: Where covid-19 hazards cannot be eliminated, the most effective controls are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and lastly personal protective equipment.
translation.ga: I gcás nach féidir deireadh a chur le guaiseacha covid-19, is iad na rialuithe is éifeachtaí rialuithe innealtóireachta, agus rialuithe riaracháin ina dhiaidh sin, agus trealamh cosanta pearsanta ar deireadh.

translation.en: Engineering controls involve isolating employees from work-related hazards without relying on worker behavior, and can be the most cost-effective solution to implement.
translation.ga: Is éard atá i gceist le rialuithe innealtóireachta fostaithe a scaradh ó ghuaiseacha a bhaineann leis an obair gan a bheith ag brath ar iompar oibrithe, agus is féidir leo a bheith ar an réiteach is cost-éifeachtaí le cur i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: Administrative controls are changes in work policy or procedures that require action by the worker or employer.
translation.ga: Is éard is rialuithe riaracháin ann athruithe ar bheartas nó nósanna imeachta oibre a éilíonn gníomh ón oibrí nó ón bhfostóir.

translation.en: Personal protective equipment (ppe) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent some exposures.
translation.ga: Meastar nach bhfuil trealamh cosanta pearsanta (tcp) chomh héifeachtach ná rialuithe innealtóireachta agus riaracháin, ach féadann sé cabhrú le roinnt risíochtaí a chosc.

translation.en: All types of ppe must be selected based upon the hazard to the worker, properly fitted as applicable (e.g., respirators), consistently and properly worn, regularly inspected, maintained, and replaced, as necessary, and properly removed, cleaned, and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination.
translation.ga: Caithfear gach cineál tcp a roghnú bunaithe ar an nguais don oibrí, a fheistiú i gceart de réir mar is infheidhme (m.sh., análaithe), a chaitheamh go comhsheasmhach agus i gceart, a iniúchadh, a chothabháil agus a athsholáthar go rialta, de réir mar is gá, agus a bhaint, a ghlanadh, agus a stóráil i gceart nó a dhiúscairt chun éilliú a sheachaint.

translation.en: According to the u.s. occupational safety and health administration (osha), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers.
translation.ga: De réir riarachán sábháilteachta agus sláinte ceirde na stát aontaithe (osha), is beag teagmháil cheirde a bhíonn ag poist le riosca nochta níos ísle leis an bpobal agus le hoibrithe bó eile.

translation.en: Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette including covering coughs and sneezes, providing tissues and trash receptacles, preparing for telecommuting or staggered shifts if needed, discouraging workers from using others' tools and equipment, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
translation.ga: I measc na mbeart bunúsach um chosc ar ionfhabhtú a mholtar do gach ionad oibre tá níochán láimhe go minic agus go críochnúil, oibrithe a spreagadh chun fanacht sa bhaile má tá siad tinn, béasaíocht riospráide lena n-áirítear casacht agus sraothartach a chlúdach, fíocháin agus gabhdáin bruscar a sholáthar, ullmhú le haghaidh teileachumarsáide nó sealanna tuislithe más gá, oibrithe a dhíspreagadh. ó uirlisí agus trealamh daoine eile a úsáid, agus gnáth-ghlanadh agus díghalrú na timpeallachta oibre a choinneáil.

translation.en: Prompt identification and isolation of potentially infectious individuals is a critical step in protecting workers, customers, visitors, and others at a worksite.
translation.ga: Is céim ríthábhachtach chun oibrithe, custaiméirí, cuairteoirí agus daoine eile a chosaint ag láthair oibre é sainaithint agus aonrú pras daoine a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith tógálach.

translation.en: The u.s. centers for disease control and prevention (cdc) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness are to stay home until they are free of fever, signs of a fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing or other symptom-altering medicines, and that sick leave policies are flexible, permit employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies.
translation.ga: Molann ionaid na sa um rialú agus cosc ar ghalair (cdc) go gcaithfidh fostaithe a bhfuil comharthaí géarmhíochaine riospráide orthu fanacht sa bhaile go dtí go mbeidh siad saor ó fhiabhras, comharthaí fiabhras, agus aon comharthaí eile ar feadh 24 uair an chloig ar a laghad gan úsáid a bhaint as cógais a laghdaíonn fiabhras nó cógais eile a athraíonn siomptóm, agus go bhfuil beartais saoire bhreoiteachta solúbtha, lig d ’ fhostaithe fanacht sa bhaile chun aire a thabhairt do bhall breoite den teaghlach, agus go bhfuil fostaithe ar an eolas faoi na beartais seo.

translation.en: According to osha, medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact within six feet (1.8 m) of people who are not known or suspected covid-19 patients, but may be infected with sars-cov-2 due to ongoing community transmission around the business location, or because the individual has recent international travel to a location with widespread covid-19 transmission.
translation.ga: De réir osha, cuimsíonn poist riosca nochta meánach iad siúd a dteastaíonn teagmháil go minic nó go dlúth laistigh de shé throigh (1.8 m) de dhaoine nach bhfuil othair covid-19 ar eolas nó a bhfuil amhras fúthu, ach a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith ionfhabhtaithe le sars-cov-2 mar gheall ar an bpobal leanúnach tarchur timpeall ar shuíomh an ghnó, nó toisc go bhfuil taisteal idirnáisiúnta déanta ag an duine aonair le déanaí chuig láthair le tarchur forleathan covid-19.

translation.en: These include workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.engineering controls for this and higher risk groups include installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic sneeze guards, and installing a drive-through window for customer service.administrative controls for this and higher risk groups include encouraging sick workers to stay at home, replacing face-to-face meetings with virtual communications, establishing staggered shifts, discontinuing nonessential travel to locations with ongoing covid-19 outbreaks, developing emergency communications plans including a forum for answering workers ’ concerns, providing workers with up-to-date education and training on covid-19 risk factors and protective behaviors, training workers who need to use protecting clothing and equipment how to use it, providing resources and a work environment that promotes personal hygiene, requiring regular hand washing, limiting customers' and the public's access to the worksite, and posting signage about hand washing and other covid-19 protective measures.depending on the work task, workers with at least medium exposure risk may need to wear personal protective equipment including some combination of gloves, a gown, a face shield or face mask, or goggles.
translation.ga: Ina measc seo tá oibrithe a mbíonn teagmháil acu leis an bpobal i gcoitinne, mar shampla i scoileanna, i dtimpeallachtaí oibre ard-dlúis daonra, agus i roinnt suíomhanna miondíola ardtoirte. I measc na rialuithe margaíochta don ghrúpa seo agus do ghrúpaí riosca níos airde tá scagairí aeir ardéifeachtúlachta a shuiteáil, rátaí aerála a mhéadú, bacainní fisiciúla a shuiteáil ar nós gardaí sraothaithe plaisteacha soiléire, agus fuinneog tiomána a shuiteáil le haghaidh seirbhíse do chustaiméirí.
