I measc na rialuithe riaracháin don ghrúpa seo agus do ghrúpaí riosca níos airde tá oibrithe breoite a spreagadh chun fanacht sa bhaile, cumarsáid fhíorúil a chur in ionad cruinnithe duine le duine, sealanna tuislithe a bhunú, deireadh a chur le taisteal neamhriachtanach chuig láithreacha le ráigeanna leanúnacha covid-19, pleananna cumarsáide éigeandála a fhorbairt lena n-áirítear fóram chun imní oibrithe a fhreagairt, oideachas agus oiliúint suas chun dáta a sholáthar d ’ oibrithe ar fhachtóirí riosca covid-19 agus iompraíochtaí cosanta, oiliúint a chur ar oibrithe ar gá dóibh éadaí agus trealamh cosanta a úsáid conas é a úsáid, ag soláthar acmhainní agus timpeallacht oibre a chuireann sláinteachas pearsanta chun cinn, a éilíonn níochán láimhe go rialta, rochtain na gcustaiméirí agus an phobail ar an láthair oibre a theorannú, agus comharthaíocht a phostáil faoi níochán láimhe agus bearta cosanta eile covid-19. Ag brath ar an tasc oibre, oibrithe le meán ar a laghad b ’ fhéidir go gcaithfidh riosca nochta trealamh cosanta pearsanta a chaitheamh lena n-áirítear teaglaim éigin de lámhainní, gúna, sciath aghaidh nó masc aghaidh, nó gloiní cosanta.

translation.en: Workers in this risk group rarely require use of respirators.
translation.ga: Is annamh a éilíonn oibrithe sa ghrúpa riosca seo análaithe a úsáid.

translation.en: If a person becomes sick on an airplane, proper controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by a distance of 6 feet, designating one crew member to serve the sick person, and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues when coughing or sneezing.
translation.ga: Má éiríonn duine tinn ar eitleán, áirítear ar rialuithe cearta chun oibrithe agus paisinéirí eile a chosaint an duine tinn a scaradh ó dhaoine eile achar 6 throigh, ball foirne amháin a ainmniú chun freastal ar an duine tinn, agus masc aghaidh a thairiscint don duine tinn nó ag iarraidh ar an duine tinn a bhéal agus a shrón a chlúdach le fíocháin agus iad ag casacht nó ag sraothartach.

translation.en: Cabin crew should wear disposable medical gloves when tending to a sick traveler or touching body fluids or potentially contaminated surfaces, and possibly additional personal protective equipment if the sick traveler has fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do chriú cábáin lámhainní míochaine indiúscartha a chaitheamh agus iad ag tabhairt aire do thaistealaí breoite nó ag teagmháil le sreabhán coirp nó le dromchlaí a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith éillithe, agus b ’ fhéidir trealamh cosanta pearsanta breise má tá fiabhras, casacht leanúnach, nó deacracht análaithe air.

translation.en: Gloves and other disposable items should be disposed of in a biohazard bag, and contaminated surfaces should be cleaned and disinfected afterwards.for commercial shipping, including cruise ships and other passenger vessels, hazard controls include postponing travel when sick, and self-isolating and informing the onboard medical center immediately if one develops a fever or other symptoms while on board.
translation.ga: Ba chóir lámhainní agus earraí indiúscartha eile a dhiúscairt i mála biohazard, agus ba cheart dromchlaí éillithe a ghlanadh agus a dhíghalrú ina dhiaidh sin. Maidir le loingseoireacht tráchtála, lena n-áirítear longa cúrsála agus árthaí paisinéirí eile, áirítear ar rialuithe guaise taisteal a chur siar nuair a bhíonn siad tinn, agus iad féin a aonrú agus a chur ar an eolas. an t-ionad leighis ar bord láithreach má fhorbraíonn fiabhras nó comharthaí eile agus é ar bord.

translation.en: Ideally, medical follow-up should occur in the isolated person's cabin.for schools and childcare facilities, cdc recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
translation.ga: Go hidéalach, ba cheart go ndéanfaí obair leantach leighis i gcábán an duine iargúlta. Maidir le scoileanna agus saoráidí cúraim leanaí, molann cdc dúnadh gearrthéarmach le glanadh nó le díghalrú má bhí duine ionfhabhtaithe i bhfoirgneamh scoile beag beann ar scaipeadh an phobail.

translation.en: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
translation.ga: Nuair nach bhfuil ach tarchur pobail íosta go measartha ann, is féidir straitéisí fadraoin shóisialta a chur i bhfeidhm ar nós turais allamuigh, tionóil, agus cruinnithe móra eile a chur ar ceal mar chorpoideachas nó ranganna cór nó béilí i gcaifitéire, ag méadú an spáis idir deasca, teacht gan staonadh agus dífhostú uaireanta, cuairteoirí neamhriachtanacha a theorannú, agus suíomh oifige sláinte ar leithligh a úsáid do leanaí a bhfuil comharthaí cosúil leis an bhfliú orthu.

translation.en: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.for law enforcement personnel performing daily routine activities, the immediate health risk is considered low by cdc.
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn tarchur substaintiúil sa phobal áitiúil, i dteannta le straitéisí um fhaid shóisialta, féadfar dífhostú scoile leathnaithe a mheas. Maidir le pearsanra forfheidhmithe dlí a dhéanann gnáthghníomhaíochtaí laethúla, measann cdc go bhfuil an riosca sláinte láithreach íseal.

translation.en: Law enforcement officials who must make contact with individuals confirmed or suspected to have covid-19 are recommended to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical technicians, including proper personal protective equipment.
translation.ga: Moltar d ’ oifigigh forfheidhmithe dlí a chaithfidh teagmháil a dhéanamh le daoine aonair a ndeimhnítear nó a bhfuil amhras orthu go bhfuil covid-19 acu na treoirlínte céanna a leanúint le teicneoirí míochaine éigeandála, lena n-áirítear trealamh cosanta pearsanta ceart.

translation.en: If close contact occurs during apprehension, workers should clean and disinfect their duty belt and gear prior to reuse using a household cleaning spray or wipe, and follow standard operating procedures for the containment and disposal of used ppe and for containing and laundering clothes.
translation.ga: Má tharlaíonn dlúth-theagmháil le linn na gabhála, ba cheart d ’ oibrithe a gcreasa dualgais agus a bhfearas a ghlanadh agus a dhíghalrú sula n-athúsáidtear iad trí spraeire nó wipe glantacháin tí a úsáid, agus nósanna imeachta oibríochta caighdeánacha a leanúint chun tcp úsáidte a choinneáil agus a dhiúscairt agus chun éadaí a choinneáil agus a sciúradh.

translation.en: Osha considers certain healthcare and mortuary workers to be at high or very high categories of exposure risk.
translation.ga: Measann osha go bhfuil oibrithe cúram sláinte agus marbhlainne áirithe i gcatagóirí ard nó an-ard riosca nochta.

translation.en: High exposure risk jobs include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to known or suspected covid-19 patients.
translation.ga: I measc na bpost ardriosca nochta tá seachadadh cúram sláinte, tacaíocht, saotharlann, agus oibrithe iompair leighis atá nochtaithe d ’ othair aitheanta nó amhrasta covid-19.

translation.en: These become very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected covid-19 patients.
translation.ga: Bíonn riosca nochtaithe an-ard acu seo má dhéanann oibrithe nósanna imeachta giniúna aerasóil ar, nó má bhailíonn nó má láimhseálann siad eiseamail ó othair aitheanta nó amhrasta covid-19.

translation.en: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection.
translation.ga: I measc na nósanna imeachta a ghineann aerasóil tá ionghabháil, nósanna imeachta ionduchtaithe casachta, bronchoscópachtaí, roinnt nósanna imeachta agus scrúduithe fiaclóireachta, nó bailiú eiseamal ionrach.

translation.en: High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of covid-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected covid-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed.
translation.ga: I measc na bpost marfach ardriosca riosca tá oibrithe a raibh baint acu le hullmhú corp daoine a raibh cásanna covid-19 ar eolas acu nó a raibh amhras fúthu tráth a mbáis; bíonn riosca nochta an-ard acu seo má dhéanann siad autopsy. I measc na rialuithe innealtóireachta breise do na grúpaí riosca seo tá seomraí aonrúcháin d ’ othair a bhfuil covid-19 aitheanta nó amhrasta orthu, lena n-áirítear nuair a dhéantar nósanna imeachta giniúna aerasóil.

translation.en: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh aeráil speisialaithe brú diúltach oiriúnach i roinnt suíomhanna cúram sláinte agus marbhlainne.

translation.en: Specimens should be handled with biosafety level 3 precautions.
translation.ga: Ba chóir eiseamail a láimhseáil le réamhchúraimí bithshábháilteachta leibhéal 3.

translation.en: The world health organization (who) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected covid-19 case.in addition to other ppe, osha recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with sars-cov-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
translation.ga: Molann an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte (who) go ndéanfaí othair atá ag teacht isteach a dheighilt i limistéir feithimh ar leith ag brath ar cibé an cás amhrasta covid-19 iad. Chomh maith le tcp eile, molann osha riospróirí dóibh siúd a oibríonn laistigh de 6 throigh d ’ othair ar eol dóibh a bheith, nó má tá amhras ort go bhfuil sé, ionfhabhtaithe le sars-cov-2, agus iad siúd a dhéanann nósanna imeachta giniúna aerasóil.

translation.en: In the united states, niosh-approved n95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
translation.ga: Sna stáit aontaithe, caithfear riospróirí aghaidhe scagtha n95 atá formheasta ag niosh nó níos fearr a úsáid i gcomhthéacs clár cuimsitheach cosanta riospráide i scríbhinn a chuimsíonn tástáil aclaíochta, oiliúint agus scrúduithe míochaine.

translation.en: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.the who does not recommend coveralls, as covid-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
translation.ga: Is féidir le cineálacha eile análaithe níos mó cosanta a sholáthar agus compord na n-oibrithe a fheabhsú. Ní mholann an who coveralls, toisc gur galar riospráide é covid-19 seachas é a tharchur trí shreabháin choirp.

translation.en: Who recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
translation.ga: Molann who ach masc máinliachta do phearsanra scagtha pointe iontrála.

translation.en: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting covid-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, who recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
translation.ga: Dóibh siúd atá ag bailiú eiseamail riospráide ó othair covid-19, ag tabhairt aire dóibh, nó á n-iompar gan aon nósanna imeachta a ghineann aerasóil, molann who masc máinliachta, gloiní cosanta, nó sciath aghaidh, gúna, agus lámhainní.

translation.en: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an n95 or ffp2 respirator.
translation.ga: Má dhéantar nós imeachta giniúna aerasóil, cuirtear análóir n95 nó ffp2 in ionad na masc máinliachta.

translation.en: Given that the global supply of ppe is insufficient, who recommends minimizing the need for ppe through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a covid-19 patient, using only the ppe necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the ppe supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
translation.ga: Ós rud é nach leor an soláthar domhanda tcp, molann who an gá atá le tcp a íoslaghdú trí theileiteiripe, bacainní fisiciúla ar nós fuinneoga soiléire, rud a ligeann dóibh siúd a bhfuil baint acu le cúram díreach dul isteach i seomra le hothar covid-19, agus an tcp riachtanach amháin a úsáid. don tasc sonrach, úsáid leanúnach an riospráide céanna gan é a bhaint agus cúram a thabhairt d ’ othair iolracha a bhfuil an diagnóis chéanna orthu, monatóireacht agus comhordú a dhéanamh ar an slabhra soláthair tcp, agus úsáid maisc do dhaoine aonair neamhshiomptómacha a dhíspreagadh.

translation.en: From: Katherine maher, wikimedia foundation ceo
translation.ga: Ó: Katherine maher, pof fhondúireacht wikimedia

translation.en: To: All wikimedia foundation staff
translation.ga: Go: Foireann uile fhondúireacht wikimedia

translation.en: Subject line: [Covid-19] lightening the load and preparing for the future
translation.ga: Líne ábhar: [Covid-19] an t-ualach a éadromú agus ullmhú don todhchaí

translation.en: Send date / time: 14 march, 2020, 00: 24 utc
translation.ga: Seol dáta / am: 14 márta, 2020, 00: 24 utc

translation.en: Licensing: Cc0: No rights reserved
translation.ga: Ceadúnas: Cc0: Níl aon chearta curtha in áirithe

translation.en: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
translation.ga: Faighimid féin in imthosca suntasacha an mhí seo.

translation.en: The covid-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
translation.ga: Is é an eipidéim covid-19 rud a léiríonn go soiléir ár n-idirnascthacht dhaonna dhomhanda agus na freagrachtaí atá orainn i leith a chéile.

translation.en: We don ’ t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
translation.ga: Níl fasach againn dá dhúshláin, ach tá a fhios againn go mbraitheann ár bhfreagra is fearr ar an gcineál ionbhá domhanda, comhoibrithe agus tógála pobail atá i gcroílár na heagraíochta seo.

translation.en: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
translation.ga: Is bailíochtú suntasach é an cairdeas agus an cúram a chonaiceamar i measc ár gcomhghleacaithe go léir maidir le ríomhphost, glaonna agus comhráite ar na daoine dochreidte a bhfuil an t-ádh linn oibriú leo.

translation.en: I couldn ’ t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
translation.ga: Ní fhéadfainn a bheith níos buíoch agus bródúil as tú a chomhaireamh mar chomhghleacaithe.

translation.en: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
translation.ga: An tseachtain seo caite, roinn duine éigin liom an meas atá acu ar ár gcuid oibre.

translation.en: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
translation.ga: Mheabhraigh siad dom cé chomh ciallmhar is atá sé don domhan a bheith in ann casadh ar wikipedia anois, agus cén tsiombail chumhachtach atá ann don acmhainn chriticiúil seo fanacht ar líne agus a bheith ar fáil do chách.

translation.en: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
translation.ga: Féadann sé seo a dhéanamh de bharr do chuid oibre, cibé an gcoinníonn tú na suíomhanna ag fanacht suas nó go n-íoctar ár gcomhghleacaithe nó ár bpobail sábháilte.

translation.en: The world needs the information that wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
translation.ga: Teastaíonn an fhaisnéis ón domhan a sholáthraíonn wikipedia, anois níos mó ná riamh.

translation.en: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
translation.ga: Is nóiméad é seo ina mbeidh tionchar suntasach ag an méid a dhéanaimid, agus conas a dhéanaimid é, ar an domhan.

translation.en: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar thábhacht an mhisin seo agus an ról atá agat ann, beimid ag déanamh roinnt athruithe suntasacha ar an gcaoi a n-oibrímid le chéile, ag tosú an tseachtain seo chugainn.

translation.en: Adjustments to our work and schedules
translation.ga: Coigeartuithe ar ár gcuid oibre agus sceidil

translation.en: As robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
translation.ga: Mar a luaigh robyn roimhe seo, tháinig an c-fhoireann le chéile aréir chun ár gcur chuige agus ár sceideal do na laethanta agus na míonna amach romhainn a phlé.

translation.en: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we ’ re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
translation.ga: Sa chomhrá sin, rinneamar machnamh ar fhreagairt oiriúnach don rud a bhí romhainn agus an bealach is fearr chun an eagraíocht a choinneáil inbhuanaithe le linn na tréimhse seo, dar linn.

translation.en: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
translation.ga: Go mór mór bhíomar ag iarraidh strus a bhaint agus tacú lenár misean go fadtéarmach.

translation.en: If you need to dial back, that ’ s okay.
translation.ga: Más gá duit dhiailiú ar ais, tá sin ceart go leor.

translation.en: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
translation.ga: Do gach ball foirne, conraitheoir agus oibrí conartha:

translation.en: Our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
translation.ga: Beidh ár n-ionchais laethúla oibre thart ar 4 uair an chloig in aghaidh an lae, nó 20 uair sa tseachtain go dtí go dtabharfar fógra breise.

translation.en: We ’ re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
translation.ga: Níl saoire á dhearbhú againn - má tá tú in ann níos mó gnáthuaireanta oibre a oibriú, is féidir leis an misean tú a úsáid.

translation.en: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, tá an domhan intuartha anois, agus cibé an gcaithfidh tú aire a thabhairt do ghaolta, earraí grósaera a fháil, nó dul chuig an dochtúir, is é do leas ár dtosaíocht.

translation.en: We are not tracking your time.
translation.ga: Níl muid ag rianú do chuid ama.

translation.en: If you are sick, do not work.
translation.ga: Má tá tú tinn, ná bí ag obair.

translation.en: This should go without saying, but we ’ re saying it.
translation.ga: Níor cheart é seo a rá, ach táimid á rá.

translation.en: No sick days or pto required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
translation.ga: Níl aon laethanta breoiteachta nó pto de dhíth - ní gá ach insint do do bhainisteoir agus cabhrú le d ’ fhoireann féilirí agus sceidil a athbhreithniú chun a chinntiú go gcumhdaítear príomhréimsí oibre.

translation.en: (If you are diagnosed positive for covid-19, please let bryan within t & amp; c ops know so t & amp; c can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
translation.ga: (Má dhéantar diagnóisiú dearfach ort maidir le covid-19, cuir bryan laistigh de t & amp; c ops ar an eolas ionas gur féidir le t & amp; c cabhrú le tacaíocht agus a chinntiú go bhfaigheann an bhainistíocht aird chuí ar do chás).

translation.en: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
translation.ga: Íocfar folks in aghaidh na huaire go hiomlán.

translation.en: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
translation.ga: Dúirt muid cheana, agus táimid ag moladh onóir a thabhairt dár ngealltanais dár gconraitheoirí agus dár gcomhghleacaithe foirne in aghaidh na huaire.

translation.en: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
translation.ga: Íocfar gach duine ar bhonn a ngnáthuaireanta a oibrítear le linn gnáththosca.

translation.en: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
translation.ga: Áirítear leis seo má tá tú tinn agus mura bhfuil tú in ann obair a dhéanamh.

translation.en: If you want to work, we support you.
translation.ga: Más mian leat obair, tacaímid leat.

translation.en: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
translation.ga: Baineann go leor daoine úsáid as obair mar bhealach chun a gcuid strus a dhíriú ar an domhan timpeall orainn.

translation.en: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
translation.ga: Is fiú go mór an rud a dhéanaimid, go háirithe le linn amanna mar seo.

translation.en: Again, this is about your self-care.
translation.ga: Arís, baineann sé seo le do fhéinchúram.

translation.en: The covid-19 pandemic, also known as the coronavirus pandemic, is an ongoing global pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (covid-19), which is caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (sars-cov-2).
translation.ga: Is paindéim dhomhanda leanúnach de ghalar coronavirus 2019 (covid-19) é an paindéim covid-19, ar a dtugtar paindéim coronavirus leanúnach, a tharlaíonn de bharr coronavirus 2 siondróm riospráide géarmhíochaine géarmhíochaine 2 (sars-cov-2).

translation.en: The virus was first identified in december 2019 in wuhan, china.
translation.ga: Aithníodh an víreas den chéad uair i mí na nollag 2019 i wuhan, an tsín.

translation.en: The world health organization declared a public health emergency of international concern on 30 january 2020, and later declared a pandemic on 11 march 2020.
translation.ga: An eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte dearbhaithe éigeandáil sláinte poiblí na idirnáisiúnta concern an 30 eanáir 2020, agus ina dhiaidh sin dearbhaithe paindéimeach an 11 márta 2020.

translation.en: As of 24 june 2021, more than 179 million cases have been confirmed, with more than 3.89 million confirmed deaths attributed to covid-19, making it one of the deadliest pandemics in history.
translation.ga: Amhail an 24 meitheamh 2021, níos mó ná 179 milliún cás bheith daingnithe, le níos mó ná 3.89 milliún bás deimhnithe curtha i leith covid-19, rud a chiallaíonn go bhfuil sé ar cheann de na paindéimí is marbh sa stair.

translation.en: The severity of covid-19 symptoms is highly variable, ranging from unnoticeable to life-threatening.
translation.ga: Déine na covid-19 comharthaí go bhfuil an-athraitheach, ó unnoticeable go bagrach don bheatha.

translation.en: Severe illness is more likely in elderly covid-19 patients, as well as those who have underlying medical conditions.
translation.ga: Is dóichí go mbeidh breoiteacht thromchúiseach in othair scothaosta covid-19, chomh maith leo siúd a bhfuil riochtaí míochaine bunúsacha orthu.

translation.en: Covid-19 transmits when people breathe in air contaminated by droplets and small airborne particles.
translation.ga: Tarchuireann covid-19 nuair a bhíonn daoine ag breathe aer atá éillithe ag braoiníní agus cáithníní beaga aeriompartha.

translation.en: The risk of breathing these in is highest when people are in close proximity, but they can be inhaled over longer distances, particularly indoors.
translation.ga: Is airde an riosca go ndéanfar iad seo a análú nuair a bhíonn daoine cóngarach dóibh, ach is féidir iad a ionanálú thar achair níos faide, go háirithe laistigh.

translation.en: Transmission can also occur if splashed or sprayed with contaminated fluids, in the eyes, nose or mouth, and, rarely, via contaminated surfaces.
translation.ga: Is féidir tarchur a tharlú freisin má dhéantar sreabhán éillithe nó spraeáilte le sreabhán éillithe, sna súile, sa srón nó sa bhéal, agus, go hannamh, trí dhromchlaí éillithe.

translation.en: People remain contagious for up to 20 days, and can spread the virus even if they do not develop any symptoms.
translation.ga: Fanann daoine tógálach ar feadh suas le 20 lá, agus is féidir leo an víreas a scaipeadh fiú mura bhforbraíonn siad aon comharthaí.

translation.en: Recommended preventive measures include social distancing, wearing face masks in public, ventilation and air-filtering, hand washing, covering one's mouth when sneezing or coughing, disinfecting surfaces, and monitoring and self-isolation for people exposed or symptomatic.
translation.ga: Molta bearta coisctheacha measc distancing shóisialta, ag caitheamh masks aghaidh go poiblí, aeraithe agus aer-scagadh, lámha a, ag clúdach amháin béal iad ag sraothartach nó casacht, dromchlaí díghalrú, agus monatóireacht agus féin-iargúltacht do dhaoine nochta nó siomptómach.

translation.en: Several vaccines have been developed and widely distributed in most developed countries since december 2020.
translation.ga: Forbraíodh agus dáileadh go forleathan roinnt vacsaíní i bhformhór na dtíortha forbartha ó mhí na nollag 2020.

translation.en: Current treatments focus on addressing symptoms, but work is underway to develop medications that inhibit the virus.
translation.ga: Díríonn na cóireálacha reatha ar aghaidh a thabhairt ar na hairíonna, ach tá obair ar bun chun cógais a fhorbairt a chuireann cosc ​ ​ ar an víreas.

translation.en: Authorities worldwide have responded by implementing travel restrictions, lockdowns and quarantines, workplace hazard controls, and business closures.
translation.ga: D' fhreagair údaráis ar fud an domhain trí shrianta taistil a chur i bhfeidhm, glasáil agus coraintíní, rialuithe guaise san ionad oibre, agus dúnadh gnó.

translation.en: Numerous jurisdictions have also worked to increase testing capacity and trace contacts of the infected.
translation.ga: D' oibrigh go leor dlínsí freisin chun acmhainn tástála a mhéadú agus teagmhálacha na ndaoine atá ionfhabhtaithe a rianú.

translation.en: The pandemic has resulted in significant global social and economic disruption, including the largest global recession since the great depression of the 1930s.
translation.ga: Tá cur isteach suntasach sóisialta agus eacnamaíoch domhanda mar thoradh ar an bpaindéim, lena n-áirítear an cúlú domhanda is mó ó dhúlagar mór na 1930idí.

translation.en: It has led to widespread supply shortages exacerbated by panic buying, agricultural disruption, and food shortages.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh air seo tá ganntanas forleathan soláthair níos measa mar gheall ar cheannach scaoll, cur isteach talmhaíochta agus ganntanas bia.

translation.en: However, there have also been decreased emissions of pollutants and greenhouse gases.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, tháinig laghdú ar astaíochtaí truailleán agus gás ceaptha teasa.

translation.en: Numerous educational institutions and public areas have been partially or fully closed, and many events have been cancelled or postponed.
translation.ga: Dúnadh go leor institiúidí oideachais agus áiteanna poiblí go páirteach nó go hiomlán, agus cuireadh go leor imeachtaí ar ceal nó curtha ar athló.

translation.en: Misinformation has circulated through social media and mass media, and political tensions have been exacerbated.
translation.ga: Tá mífhaisnéis scaipthetrí na meáin shóisialta agus na meáin chumarsáide, agus tá teannas polaitiúil níos measa.

translation.en: The pandemic has raised issues of racial and geographic discrimination, health equity, and the balance between public health imperatives and individual rights.
translation.ga: D' ardaigh an paindéim ceisteanna faoi idirdhealú ciníoch agus geografach, cothromas sláinte, agus an chothromaíocht idir riachtanais sláinte poiblí agus cearta an duine aonair.

translation.en: Although the exact origin of the virus is still unknown, the first outbreak started in wuhan, hubei, china in late 2019.
translation.ga: Cé nach eol bunús cruinn an víris go fóill, thosaigh an chéad ráig i wuhan, hubei, an tsín ag deireadh 2019.

translation.en: Many early cases of covid-19 were linked to people who had visited the huanan seafood wholesale market in wuhan, but it is possible that human-to-human transmission was already happening before this.
translation.ga: Bhí go leor cásanna luatha de covid-19 nasctha le daoine a thug cuairt ar mhargadh mórdhíola bia mara na hungáire i wuhan, ach is féidir go raibh tarchur duine-go-duine ag tarlú cheana féin roimhe seo.

translation.en: On 11 february 2020, the world health organization (who) named the disease "covid-19", which is short for coronavirus disease 2019.
translation.ga: An 11 feabhra 2020, d ’ ainmnigh an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte (who) an galar “covid-19 ”, atá gearr do ghalar coronavirus 2019.

translation.en: The virus that caused the outbreak is known as severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (sars-cov-2), a newly discovered virus closely related to bat coronaviruses, pangolin coronaviruses, and sars-cov.
translation.ga: Tugtar an víreas ba chúis leis an ráigcoronavirus géar siondróm riospráide géarmhíochaine 2 (sars-cov-2), víreas nua-aimsithe a bhfuil dlúthbhaint aige le coronaviruses ialtóg, coronaviruses pangolin, agus sars-cov.

translation.en: The current scientific consensus is that the virus is most likely of zoonotic origin, from bats or another closely-related mammal.
translation.ga: Is é an comhdhearcadh eolaíoch atá ann faoi láthair gur dóichí gur de bhunadh zónóiseach an víreas, ó ialtóga nó ó mhamach dlúthghaolmhar eile.

translation.en: Despite this, the subject has generated a significant amount of speculation and conspiracy theories, which were amplified by rapidly growing online echo chambers.
translation.ga: Ina ainneoin sin, ghin an t-ábhar méid suntasach teoiricí tuairimíochta agus comhcheilge, a mhéadaíodh trí sheomraí macalla ar líne a bhí ag fás go tapa.

translation.en: Global geopolitical divisions, notably between the united states and china, have been heightened because of this issue.
translation.ga: Méadaíodh rannáin gheo-pholaitiúla dhomhanda, go háirithe idir na stáit aontaithe agus an tsín, mar gheall ar an gceist seo.

translation.en: The earliest known person with symptoms was later discovered to have fallen ill on 1 december 2019, and that person did not have visible connections with the later wet market cluster.
translation.ga: Fuarthas amach ina dhiaidh sin go raibh an duine is luaithe a raibh comharthaí air tinn tinn an 1 nollaig 2019, agus ní raibh naisc infheicthe ag an duine sin leis an mbraisle margaidh fliuch níos déanaí.

translation.en: However, an earlier case of infection could have occurred on 17 november.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, d ’ fhéadfadh cás níos luaithe ionfhabhtaithe a bheith ann an 17 samhain.

translation.en: Of the early cluster of cases reported that month, two-thirds were found to have a link with the market.
translation.ga: As an mbraisle luath cásanna a tuairiscíodh an mhí sin, fuarthas go raibh nasc ag dhá thrian leis an margadh.

translation.en: Molecular clock analysis suggests that the index case is likely to have been infected with the virus between mid-october and mid-november 2019.
translation.ga: Tugann anailís ar chlog mhóilíneach le tuiscint gur dóigh go raibh an cás innéacs ionfhabhtaithe leis an víreas idir lár mhí dheireadh fómhair agus lár mhí na samhna 2019.

translation.en: Official case counts refer to the number of people who have been tested for covid-19 and whose test has been confirmed positive according to official protocols.
translation.ga: Tagraíonn comhaireamh cásanna oifigiúla do líon na ndaoine a ndearnadh tástáil orthu le haghaidh covid-19 agus a ndeimhníodh go bhfuil a dtástáil dearfach de réir prótacal oifigiúil.

translation.en: Many countries, early on, had official policies to not test those with only mild symptoms.
translation.ga: Bhí beartais oifigiúla ag go leor tíortha, go luath, gan iad siúd nach raibh ach comharthaí éadroma orthu a thástáil.

translation.en: An analysis of the early phase of the outbreak up to 23 january estimated 86 per cent of covid-19 infections had not been detected, and that these undocumented infections were the source for 79 per cent of documented cases.
translation.ga: Meastar in anailís ar chéim luath na ráige suas go 23 eanáir nár braitheadh ​ ​ 86 faoin gcéad d ’ ionfhabhtuithe covid-19, agus gurb iad na hionfhabhtuithe gan cháipéisíocht seo an fhoinse do 79 faoin gcéad de na cásanna doiciméadaithe.

translation.en: Several other studies, using a variety of methods, have estimated that numbers of infections in many countries are likely to be considerably greater than the reported cases.
translation.ga: Meastar i roinnt staidéir eile, agus modhanna éagsúla á n-úsáid, gur dócha go mbeidh líon na n-ionfhabhtuithe i go leor tíortha i bhfad níos mó ná na cásanna a tuairiscíodh.

translation.en: On 9 april 2020, preliminary results found that 15 per cent of people tested in gangelt, the centre of a major infection cluster in germany, tested positive for antibodies.
translation.ga: An 9 aibreán 2020, fuair réamhthorthaí go ndearna 15 faoin gcéad de na daoine a ndearnadh tástáil orthu i gangelt, lár braisle mór ionfhabhtaithe sa ghearmáin, tástáil dhearfach ar antasubstaintí.

translation.en: Screening for covid-19 in pregnant women in new york city, and blood donors in the netherlands, has also found rates of positive antibody tests that may indicate more infections than reported.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ scagadh do covid-19 i mná torracha i gcathair nua eabhrac, agus deontóirí fola san ísiltír, rátaí tástálacha dearfacha antashubstaintí a d ’ fhéadfadh níos mó ionfhabhtuithe a léiriú ná mar a tuairiscíodh.

translation.en: Seroprevalence based estimates are conservative as some studies show that persons with mild symptoms do not have detectable antibodies.
translation.ga: Tá meastacháin bunaithe ar seroprevalence coimeádach toisc go léiríonn roinnt staidéir nach bhfuil antasubstaintí inbhraite ag daoine le hairíonna éadroma.

translation.en: Some results (such as the gangelt study) have received substantial press coverage without first passing through peer review.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ roinnt torthaí (mar shampla staidéar gangelt) clúdach suntasach sna meáin gan athbhreithniú piaraí a dhéanamh ar dtús.

translation.en: An analysis in early 2020 of cases by age in china indicated that a relatively low proportion of cases occurred in individuals under 20.
translation.ga: Léirigh anailís go luath in 2020 ar chásanna de réir aoise sa tsín gur tharla cion réasúnta íseal cásanna i ndaoine aonair faoi bhun 20 bliain d' aois.

translation.en: It was not clear whether this was because young people were less likely to be infected, or less likely to develop serious symptoms and seek medical attention and be tested.
translation.ga: Ní raibh sé soiléir an raibh sé seo toisc gur lú an seans go mbeadh daoine óga ionfhabhtaithe, nó gur lú an seans go bhforbróidís comharthaí tromchúiseacha agus aire leighis a lorg agus a thástáil.

translation.en: A retrospective cohort study in china found that children and adults were just as likely to be infected.
translation.ga: Fuair staidéar cohóirt siarghabhálach sa tsín go raibh leanaí agus daoine fásta chomh dóchúil go mbeadh siad ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: Initial estimates of the basic reproduction number (r0) for covid-19 in january were between 1.4 and 2.5, but a subsequent analysis concluded that it may be about 5.7 (with a 95 per cent confidence interval of 3.8 to 8.9).
translation.ga: Bhí na meastacháin tosaigh ar an mbunuimhir atáirgthe (r 0) do covid-19 i mí eanáir idir 1.4 agus 2.5, ach tháinig anailís ina dhiaidh sin ar an gconclúid go bhféadfadh sé a bheith thart ar 5.7 (le eatramh muiníne 95 faoin gcéad de 3.8 go 8.9).

translation.en: R0 can vary across populations and is not to be confused with the effective reproduction number (commonly just called r), which takes into account effects such as social distancing and herd immunity.
translation.ga: Is féidir le r 0 athrú ar fud na ndaonraí agus ní gá é a mheascadh leis an uimhir atáirgthe éifeachtach (ar a dtugtar r de ghnáth), a chuireann éifeachtaí mar fhadú sóisialta agus díolúine tréada san áireamh.

translation.en: By mid-may 2020, the effective r was close to or below 1.0 in many countries, meaning the spread of the disease in these areas at that time was stable or decreasing.
translation.ga: Faoi lár mhí na bealtaine 2020, bhí an r éifeachtach gar do nó faoi bhun 1.0 i go leor tíortha, rud a chiallaíonn go raibh scaipeadh an ghalair sna ceantair sin ag an am sin seasmhach nó ag laghdú.

translation.en: Official deaths from covid-19 generally refer to people who died after testing positive according to protocols.
translation.ga: De ghnáth tagraíonn básanna oifigiúla ó covid-19 do dhaoine a fuair bás tar éis tástáil dhearfach a dhéanamh de réir prótacal.

translation.en: These counts may ignore deaths of people who die without having been tested.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh na comhaireamh seo neamhaird a dhéanamh ar bhásanna daoine a fhaigheann bás gan tástáil a dhéanamh orthu.

translation.en: Conversely, deaths of people who had underlying conditions may lead to over-counting.
translation.ga: Os a choinne sin, d ’ fhéadfadh ró-chomhaireamh a bheith mar thoradh ar bhásanna daoine a raibh riochtaí bunúsacha orthu.

translation.en: Comparisons of statistics for deaths for all causes versus the seasonal average indicate excess mortality in many countries.
translation.ga: Léiríonn comparáidí staitisticí maidir le básanna ar gach cúis i gcomparáid leis an meán séasúrach básmhaireacht iomarcach i go leor tíortha.

translation.en: This may include deaths due to strained healthcare systems and bans on elective surgery.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go n-áireofaí air seo básanna mar gheall ar chórais chúraim shláinte faoi bhrú agus toirmisc ar mháinliacht roghnach.

translation.en: The first confirmed death was in wuhan on 9 january 2020.
translation.ga: Ba i wuhan an chéad bhás dearbhaithe an 9 eanáir 2020.

translation.en: The first reported death outside of china occurred on 1 february in the philippines, and the first reported death outside asia was in the united states on 6 february.
translation.ga: Tharla an chéad bhás a tuairiscíodh lasmuigh den tsín an 1 feabhra sna hoileáin fhilipíneacha, agus sna stáit aontaithe an chéad bhás a tuairiscíodh lasmuigh den áise an 6 feabhra.

translation.en: More than 95 per cent of the people who contract covid-19 recover.
translation.ga: Aisghabhann níos mó ná 95 faoin gcéad de na daoine a dhéanann conradh ar covid-19.

translation.en: Otherwise, the time between symptoms onset and death usually ranges from 6 to 41 days, typically about 14 days.
translation.ga: Seachas sin, de ghnáth bíonn an t-am idir comharthaí a thosaíonn agus a bhás idir 6 agus 41 lá, thart ar 14 lá de ghnáth.

translation.en: As of 24 june 2021, more than 3.89 million deaths have been attributed to covid-19.
translation.ga: Amhail an 24 meitheamh 2021, bhí níos mó ná 3.89 milliún bás curtha i leith covid-19.

translation.en: People at the greatest risk of mortality from covid-19 tend to be those with underlying conditions, such as those with a weakened immune system, serious heart or lung problems, severe obesity, or the elderly (including individuals age 65 years or older).
translation.ga: Is gnách gurb iad na daoine is mó atá i mbaol básmhaireachta ó covid-19 iad siúd a bhfuil riochtaí bunúsacha orthu, mar shampla daoine le córas imdhíonachta lagaithe, fadhbanna croí nó scamhóg tromchúiseacha, murtall mór, nó daoine scothaosta (lena n-áirítear daoine aonair 65 bliana d ’ aois nó níos sine).

translation.en: Multiple measures are used to quantify mortality.
translation.ga: Úsáidtear bearta iomadúla chun básmhaireacht a chainníochtú.

translation.en: These numbers vary by region and over time, influenced by testing volume, healthcare system quality, treatment options, government response, time since the initial outbreak, and population characteristics, such as age, sex, and overall health.
translation.ga: Athraíonn na huimhreacha seo de réir réigiúin agus le himeacht ama, faoi thionchar méid tástála, cáilíocht an chórais cúram sláinte, roghanna cóireála, freagairt an rialtais, am ón ráig tosaigh, agus tréithe daonra, mar aois, gnéas, agus sláinte iomlán.

translation.en: Countries like belgium include deaths from suspected cases of covid-19, regardless of whether the person was tested, resulting in higher numbers compared to countries that include only test-confirmed cases.
translation.ga: I measc tíortha mar an bheilg tá básanna ó chásanna amhrasta de covid-19, is cuma an ndearnadh tástáil ar an duine, agus líon níos airde mar thoradh air sin i gcomparáid le tíortha nach n-áirítear ach cásanna deimhnithe tástála.

translation.en: The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths attributed to covid-19 divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
translation.ga: Léiríonn an cóimheas bás-go-cás líon na mbásanna a chuirtear i leith covid-19 arna roinnt ar líon na gcásanna a ndearnadh diagnóis orthu laistigh de eatramh ama ar leith.

translation.en: Based on johns hopkins university statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 2.2 percent (3,890,437 deaths for 179,541,481 cases) as of 24 june 2021.
translation.ga: Bunaithe ar staitisticí ollscoil johns hopkins, is é an cóimheas domhanda bás-go-cás ná 2.2 faoin gcéad (3,890,437 bás do 179,541,481 cás) amhail an 24 meitheamh 2021.

translation.en: The number varies by region
translation.ga: Athraíonn an líon de réir réigiúin.

translation.en: The official death counts have been criticised for underreporting the actual death toll, because comparisons of death rates before and during the pandemic show an increase in deaths that is not explained by covid-19 deaths alone.
translation.ga: Cáineadh comhaireamh oifigiúil na mbásanna as tearc-thuairisciú a dhéanamh ar an dola báis iarbhír, toisc go léiríonn comparáidí idir rátaí báis roimh agus le linn na paindéime méadú ar bhásanna nach míníonn básanna covid-19 amháin.

translation.en: Using such data, estimates of the true number of deaths from covid-19 worldwide have included a range from 7 to 13 million by the economist, as well as over 9 million by the institute for health metrics and evaluation.
translation.ga: Agus sonraí den sórt sin á n-úsáid, tá raon ó 7 go 13 milliún ag the economist, chomh maith le breis agus 9 milliún ag an institiúid um méadrachtaí sláinte agus meastóireacht, i meastacháin ar fhíorlíon na mbásanna ó covid-19 ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: On 24 march 2020, the centers for disease control and prevention (cdc) of the united states, indicated the who had provided two codes for covid-19: U07.1 when confirmed by laboratory testing and u07.2 for clinically or epidemiological diagnosis where laboratory confirmation is inconclusive or not available.
translation.ga: An 24 márta 2020, thug na hionaid um rialú agus cosc ar ghalair (cdc) sna stáit aontaithe, le fios gur chuir an who dhá chód ar fáil do covid-19: U07.1 nuair a deimhníodh iad trí thástáil saotharlainne agus u07.2 le haghaidh diagnóis chliniciúil nó eipidéimeolaíoch i gcás tá deimhniú saotharlainne neamhchinntitheach nó níl sé ar fáil.

translation.en: The cdc noted that "because laboratory test results are not typically reported on death certificates in the u.s., [the national center for health statistics (nchs)] is not planning to implement u07.2 for mortality statistics" and that u07.1 would be used "if the death certificate reports terms such as' probable covid-19 'or' likely covid-19 '."
translation.ga: Thug an cdc faoi deara "toisc nach ndéantar torthaí tástála saotharlainne a thuairisciú go hiondúil ar dheimhnithe báis sna sa, [an lárionad náisiúnta um staidreamh sláinteníl sé beartaithe ag (nchs)] u07.2 a chur i bhfeidhm maidir le staitisticí básmhaireachta" agus go n-úsáidfí u07.1 "má thuairiscíonn an deimhniú báis téarmaí mar 'covid-19 is dócha' nó 'covid-19 is dócha'.

translation.en: The cdc also noted "it is not likely that nchs will follow up on these cases" and while the "underlying cause depends upon what and where conditions are reported on the death certificate,...
translation.ga: An cdc tugadh faoi deara freisin ní dócha go leanfaidh nchs ar na cásanna seo "agus cé go mbraitheann an" chúis bhunúsach ar na coinníollacha ar an deimhniú báis agus cá háit a ndéantar tuairisc orthu,...

translation.en: The rules for coding and selection of the... cause of death are expected to result in covid – 19 being the underlying cause more often than not. "
translation.ga: Na rialacha maidir le códú agus roghnú na... cúise táthar ag súil go mbeidh covid-19 mar bhunchúis níos minice ná a mhalairt.

translation.en: On 16 april 2020, the who, in its formal publication of the two codes, u07.1 and u07.2, "recognized that in many countries detail as to the laboratory confirmation... will not be reported [and] recommended, for mortality purposes only, to code covid-19 provisionally to code u07.1 unless it is stated as' probable 'or' suspected '."
translation.ga: An 16 aibreán 2020, d ’ aithin an who, ina fhoilsiú foirmiúil ar an dá chód, u07.1 agus u07.2, “nach ndéanfar mionsonraí maidir le deimhniú saotharlainne... a thuairisciú [agus] a mholadh, maidir le go leor tíortha. críocha básmhaireachta amháin, chun covid-19 a chódú go sealadach le cód u07.1 mura ndeirtear go bhfuil sé 'dóchúil' nó 'amhrasta'.

translation.en: It was also noted that the who "does not distinguish" between infection by sars-cov-2 and covid-19.
translation.ga: Tugadh faoi deara freisin nach ndéanann an who “idirdhealú ” idir ionfhabhtú ag sars-cov-2 agus covid-19.

translation.en: A crucial metric in assessing the severity of a disease is the infection fatality ratio (ifr), which is the cumulative number of deaths attributed to the disease divided by the cumulative number of infected individuals (including asymptomatic and undiagnosed infections) as measured or estimated as of a specific date.
translation.ga: Méadrach ríthábhachtach chun déine galair a mheas is ea an cóimheas básmhaireachta ionfhabhtaithe (ifr), is é sin líon carnach na mbásanna a chuirtear i leith an ghalair arna roinnt ar líon carnach na ndaoine ionfhabhtaithe (lena n-áirítear ionfhabhtuithe neamhshiomptómacha agus neamh-dhiagnóisithe) arna dtomhas nó arna meas mar de dháta faoi leith.

translation.en: Epidemiologists frequently refer to this metric as the 'infection fatality rate' to clarify that it is expressed in percentage points (not as a decimal).
translation.ga: Is minic a thagraíonn eipidéimeolaithe don mhéadracht seo mar an 'ráta básmhaireachta ionfhabhtaithe' chun a shoiléiriú go gcuirtear in iúl é i bpointí céatadáin (ní mar deachúil).

translation.en: Other published studies refer to this metric as the 'infection fatality risk'.
translation.ga: Tagraíonn staidéir fhoilsithe eile don mhéadracht seo mar an 'riosca básmhaireachta ionfhabhtaithe'.

translation.en: In november 2020, a review article in nature reported estimates of population-weighted ifrs for a number of countries, excluding deaths in elderly care facilities, and found a median range of 0.24% to 1.49%.
translation.ga: I mí na samhna 2020, thuairiscigh alt athbhreithnithe in nature meastacháin ar ifranna a bhí ualaithe ag an daonra do roinnt tíortha, gan básanna in áiseanna cúraim do dhaoine scothaosta a áireamh, agus fuarthas raon airmheánach 0.24% go 1.49%.

translation.en: In december 2020, a systematic review and meta-analysis published in the european journal of epidemiology estimated that population-weighted ifr was 0.5% to 1% in some countries (france, netherlands, new zealand, and portugal), 1% to 2% in several other countries (australia, england, lithuania, and spain), and about 2.5% in italy; these estimates included fatalities in elderly care facilities.
translation.ga: I mí na nollag 2020, mheas athbhreithniú córasach agus meiteashonrú a foilsíodh san iris eorpach eipidéimeolaíochta go raibh ifr ualaithe daonra 0.5% go 1% i roinnt tíortha (an fhrainc, an ísiltír, an nua-shéalainn, agus an phortaingéil), 1% go 2% i roinnt tíortha eile (an astráil, sasana, an liotuáin, agus an spáinn), agus thart ar 2.5% san iodáil; áiríodh sna meastacháin seo básanna in áiseanna cúraim do dhaoine scothaosta.

translation.en: This study also found that most of the differences in ifr across locations reflected corresponding differences in the age composition of the population and the age-specific pattern of infection rates, due to very low ifrs for children and younger adults (e.g., 0.002% at age 10 and 0.01% at age 25) and progressively higher ifrs for older adults (0.4% at age 55, 1.4% at age 65, 4.6% at age 75, and 15% at age 85).
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ an staidéar seo amach freisin gur léirigh an chuid is mó de na difríochtaí in ifr ar fud na láithreacha difríochtaí comhfhreagracha i gcomhdhéanamh aoise an daonra agus patrún aois-shonrach rátaí ionfhabhtaithe, mar gheall ar ifranna an-íseal do leanaí agus do dhaoine fásta níos óige (m.sh., 0.002% ag aois 10 agus 0.01% ag aois 25) agus ifranna níos airde de réir a chéile d ’ aosaigh aosta (0.4% ag aois 55, 1.4% ag aois 65, 4.6% ag aois 75, agus 15% ag aois 85).

translation.en: These results were also highlighted in a december 2020 report issued by the world health organization.
translation.ga: Tarraingíodh aird ar na torthaí seo freisin i dtuarascáil i mí na nollag 2020 a d ’ eisigh an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte.

translation.en: An analysis of those ifr rates indicates that covid-19 is hazardous not only for the elderly but also for middle-aged adults, for whom a fatal covid-19 infection is two orders of magnitude more likely than the annualised risk of a fatal automobile accident and far more dangerous than seasonal influenza
translation.ga: Tugann anailís ar na rátaí ifr sin le fios go bhfuil covid-19 guaiseach ní amháin do dhaoine scothaosta ach do dhaoine fásta meánaosta freisin, a bhfuil ionfhabhtú marfach covid-19 dhá ordú méide níos dóchúla ná an riosca bliantúil de thimpiste marfach gluaisteán agus i bhfad níos contúirtí ná an fliú séasúrach.

translation.en: Another metric in assessing death rate is the case fatality ratio (cfr), [a] which is deaths attributed to disease divided by individuals diagnosed to-date.
translation.ga: Méadrach eile agus an ráta báis á mheasúnú is ea an cóimheas básmhaireachta cáis (cfr), [a] is é sin básanna a chuirtear i leith galair arna roinnt ar dhaoine aonair a ndearnadh diagnóis orthu go dtí seo.

translation.en: This metric can be misleading because of the delay between symptom onset and death and because testing focuses on individuals with symptoms (and particularly on those manifesting more severe symptoms).
translation.ga: Is féidir leis an méadracht seo a bheith míthreorach mar gheall ar an moill idir tosú na siomptóm agus bás agus toisc go ndíríonn an tástáil ar dhaoine aonair a bhfuil comharthaí orthu (agus go háirithe orthu siúd a léiríonn comharthaí níos déine).

translation.en: On 4 august 2020, who indicated "at this early stage of the pandemic, most estimates of fatality ratios have been based on cases detected through surveillance and calculated using crude methods, giving rise to widely variable estimates of cfr by country – from less than 0.1% to over 25%."
translation.ga: An 4 lúnasa 2020, thug who le fios "ag an gcéim luath seo den phaindéim, tá an chuid is mó de na meastacháin ar chóimheasa básmhaireachta bunaithe ar chásanna a braitheadh ​ ​ trí fhaireachas agus a ríomhadh ag úsáid modhanna amh, as ar eascair meastacháin inathraithe go forleathan ar cfr de réir tíre - ó níos lú ná 0.1% go dtí os cionn 25%.

translation.en: Symptoms of covid-19 are variable, ranging from mild symptoms to severe illness.
translation.ga: Tá comharthaí covid-19 athraitheach, idir comharthaí éadroma agus breoiteacht throm.

translation.en: Common symptoms include headache, loss of smell and taste, nasal congestion and runny nose, cough, muscle pain, sore throat, fever, diarrhea, and breathing difficulties.
translation.ga: I measc na n-airíonna coitianta tá tinneas cinn, cailliúint boladh agus blas, plódú nasal agus srón runny, casacht, pian sna matáin, scornach tinn, fiabhras, buinneach, agus deacrachtaí análaithe.

translation.en: People with the same infection may have different symptoms, and their symptoms may change over time.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh comharthaí difriúla ag daoine a bhfuil an t-ionfhabhtú céanna orthu, agus d ’ fhéadfadh go n-athróidh a gcuid comharthaí le himeacht ama.

translation.en: Three common clusters of symptoms have been identified: One respiratory symptom cluster with cough, sputum, shortness of breath, and fever; a musculoskeletal symptom cluster with muscle and joint pain, headache, and fatigue; a cluster of digestive symptoms with abdominal pain, vomiting, and diarrhea.
translation.ga: Aithníodh trí bhraisle coitianta comharthaí: Braisle siomptóm riospráide amháin le casacht, sputum, giorra anála agus fiabhras; braisle siomptóim mhatánchnámharlaigh le pian sna matáin agus sna comhpháirteacha, tinneas cinn, agus tuirse; braisle de chomharthaí díleácha le pian bhoilg, vomiting, agus buinneach.

translation.en: In people without prior ear, nose, and throat disorders, loss of taste combined with loss of smell is associated with covid-19.
translation.ga: I ndaoine gan neamhoird chluas, srón agus scornach roimh ré, tá baint ag cailliúint blas in éineacht le cailliúint boladh le covid-19.

translation.en: Of people who show symptoms, 81% develop only mild to moderate symptoms and can get amnesia after recovery (up to mild pneumonia), while 14% develop severe symptoms (dyspnea, hypoxia, or more than 50% lung involvement on imaging) and 5% of patients suffer critical symptoms (respiratory failure, shock, or multiorgan dysfunction).
translation.ga: De na daoine a léiríonn comharthaí, ní fhorbraíonn 81% ach comharthaí éadrom go measartha agus is féidir leo amnesia a fháil tar éis téarnamh (suas le niúmóine éadrom), agus forbraíonn 14% comharthaí troma (dyspnea, hypoxia, nó níos mó ná 50% baint na scamhóg le híomháú) agus 5 fulaingíonn% d ’ othair comharthaí criticiúla (teip riospráide, turraing, nó mífheidhm multiorgan).

translation.en: At least a third of the people who are infected with the virus do not develop noticeable symptoms at any point in time.
translation.ga: Ní fhorbraíonn trian ar a laghad de na daoine atá ionfhabhtaithe leis an víreas comharthaí suntasacha ag am ar bith.

translation.en: These asymptomatic carriers tend not to get tested and can spread the disease.
translation.ga: Is gnách nach bhfaigheann na hiompróirí neamhshiomptómacha seo tástáil agus is féidir leo an galar a scaipeadh.

translation.en: Other infected people will develop symptoms later, called "pre-symptomatic", or have very mild symptoms and can also spread the virus.
translation.ga: Forbróidh daoine ionfhabhtaithe eile comharthaí níos déanaí, ar a dtugtar "réamh-shíomptómach", nó beidh comharthaí an-éadrom orthu agus féadfaidh siad an víreas a scaipeadh freisin.

translation.en: As is common with infections, there is a delay between the moment a person first becomes infected and the appearance of the first symptoms.
translation.ga: Mar is gnách le hionfhabhtuithe, tá moill idir an nóiméad a bhíonn duine ionfhabhtaithe ar dtús agus cuma na gcéad airíonna.

translation.en: The median delay for covid-19 is four to five days.
translation.ga: Is é an mhoill airmheánach do covid-19 ná ceithre go cúig lá.

translation.en: Most symptomatic people experience symptoms within two to seven days after exposure, and almost all will experience at least one symptom within 12 days.
translation.ga: Bíonn comharthaí ag an gcuid is mó de dhaoine síntómacha laistigh de dhá go seacht lá tar éis nochtaithe, agus beidh symptom amháin ar a laghad ag beagnach gach duine laistigh de 12 lá.

translation.en: Most people recover from the acute phase of the disease.
translation.ga: Tagann formhór na ndaoine ar ais ó chéim ghéar an ghalair.

translation.en: However, some people continue to experience a range of effects for months after recovery — named long covid — and damage to organs has been observed.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, leanann raon daoine ar aghaidh ag fulaingt raon éifeachtaí ar feadh míonna tar éis téarnamh - covid fada ainmnithe - agus tugadh faoi deara damáiste d ’ orgáin.

translation.en: Multi-year studies are underway to further investigate the long-term effects of the disease.
translation.ga: Tá staidéir ilbhliana ar siúl chun tuilleadh imscrúdaithe a dhéanamh ar éifeachtaí fadtéarmacha an ghalair.

translation.en: The disease is mainly transmitted via the respiratory route when people inhale droplets and particles that infected people release as they breathe, talk, cough, sneeze, or sing.
translation.ga: Tarchuirtear an galar go príomha tríd an mbealach riospráide nuair a ionanálann daoine braoiníní agus cáithníní a scaoileann daoine ionfhabhtaithe agus iad ag análú, ag caint, ag casacht, ag sraothartach nó ag canadh.

translation.en: Infected people are more likely to transmit covid-19 the when they are physically close.
translation.ga: Is mó an seans go dtarchuirfidh daoine ionfhabhtaithe covid-19 nuair a bhíonn siad gar go fisiciúil.

translation.en: However, infection can occur over longer distances, particularly indoors.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, féadann ionfhabhtú tarlú thar achair níos faide, go háirithe laistigh.

translation.en: Infectivity begins as early as three days before symptoms appear, and people are most infectious just prior to and during the onset of symptoms.
translation.ga: Tosaíonn an t- ionfhabhtú chomh luath agus is trí lá sula mbíonn na hairíonna le feiceáil, agus bíonn daoine an-tógálach díreach roimh agus le linn na hairíonna.

translation.en: It declines after the first week, but infected people remain contagious for up to 20 days.
translation.ga: Laghdaíonn sé tar éis na chéad seachtaine, ach fanann daoine ionfhabhtaithe tógálach ar feadh suas le 20 lá.

translation.en: People can spread the disease even if they are asymptomatic.
translation.ga: Is féidir le daoine an galar a scaipeadh fiú má tá siad neamhshiomptómach.

translation.en: Infectious particles range in size from aerosols that remain suspended in the air for long periods of time to larger droplets that remain airborne or fall to the ground.
translation.ga: Tá raon cáithníní tógálach i méid ó aerasóil a fhanann ar fionraí san aer ar feadh tréimhsí fada go braoiníní níos mó a fhanann san aer nó a thiteann go talamh.

translation.en: Various groups utilise terms such as "airborne" and "droplet" both in technical and general ways, leading to confusion around terminology.
translation.ga: Baineann grúpaí éagsúla úsáid as téarmaí mar "aeriompartha" agus "braoinín" ar bhealaí teicniúla agus ginearálta, rud a fhágann go mbíonn mearbhall ann maidir le téarmaíocht.

translation.en: Additionally, covid-19 research has redefined the traditional understanding of how respiratory viruses transmit.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, tá taighde covid-19 tar éis an tuiscint thraidisiúnta ar an gcaoi a dtarchuireann víris riospráide a athshainiú.

translation.en: The largest droplets of respiratory fluid do not travel far, and can be inhaled or land on mucous membranes on the eyes, nose, or mouth to infect.
translation.ga: Ní thaistealaíonn na braoiníní is mó de shreabhán riospráide i bhfad, agus is féidir iad a ionanálú nó teacht i dtír ar sheicní múcasacha ar na súile, na srón nó an béal chun ionfhabhtú a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Aerosols are highest in concentration when people are in close proximity, which leads to easier viral transmission when people are physically close, but airborne transmission can occur at longer distances, mainly in locations that are poorly ventilated; in those conditions small particles can remain suspended in the air for minutes to hours.
translation.ga: Tá an tiúchan is airde ag aerasóil nuair a bhíonn daoine cóngarach dó, rud a fhágann go mbíonn tarchur víreasach níos éasca nuair a bhíonn daoine gar go fisiciúil, ach is féidir tarchur aeriompartha a dhéanamh ag achair níos faide, go príomha in áiteanna nach bhfuil aeráil go dona; sna coinníollacha sin is féidir cáithníní beaga a chur ar fionraí san aer ar feadh nóiméid go huaireanta.

translation.en: The number of people generally infected by one infected person varies; with only 10 to 20% of people responsible for the diseases spread.
translation.ga: Athraíonn líon na ndaoine atá ionfhabhtaithe go ginearálta ag duine ionfhabhtaithe amháin; agus níor scaipeadh ach 10 go 20% de na daoine atá freagrach as na galair.

translation.en: It often spreads in clusters, where infections can be traced back to an index case or geographical location.
translation.ga: Is minic a scaipeann sé i mbraislí, áit ar féidir ionfhabhtuithe a rianú siar go cás innéacs nó suíomh geografach.

translation.en: Often in these cases, superspreading events occur, where many people are infected by one person.
translation.ga: Go minic sna cásanna seo, tarlaíonn imeachtaí forshuiteála, nuair a bhíonn a lán daoine ionfhabhtaithe ag duine amháin.

translation.en: Sars ‑ cov ‑ 2 belongs to the broad family of viruses known as coronaviruses.
translation.ga: Baineann sars-cov-2 leis an teaghlach leathan víris ar a dtugtar coronaviruses.

translation.en: It is a positive-sense single-stranded rna (+ ssrna) virus, with a single linear rna segment.
translation.ga: Is víreas rna (+ ssrna) aon-shnáithe dearfach é, le deighleog líneach rna amháin.

translation.en: Coronaviruses infect humans, other mammals, and avian species, including livestock and companion animals.
translation.ga: Ionfhabhtaíonn coronaviruses daoine, mamaigh eile, agus speicis éanacha, lena n-áirítear beostoic agus ainmhithe compánaigh.

translation.en: Human coronaviruses are capable of causing illnesses ranging from the common cold to more severe diseases such as middle east respiratory syndrome (mers, fatality rate ~ 34%).
translation.ga: Tá coróivíris dhaonna in ann tinnis a chur ar siúl ón bhfuar coitianta go galair níos déine mar shiondróm riospráide an mheánoirthir (mers, ráta báis ~ 34%).

translation.en: Sars-cov-2 is the seventh known coronavirus to infect people, after 229e, nl63, oc43, hku1, mers-cov, and the original sars-cov.
translation.ga: Is é sars-cov-2 an seachtú coróinivíreas is eol do dhaoine a ionfhabhtú, tar éis 229e, nl63, oc43, hku1, mers-cov, agus an sars-cov bunaidh.

translation.en: Viral genetic sequence data can provide critical information about whether viruses separated by time and space are likely to be epidemiologically linked.
translation.ga: Féadann sonraí seicheamh géiniteach víreasach faisnéis chriticiúil a sholáthar maidir le cibé an dóchúil go mbeidh víris scartha de réir ama agus spáis nasctha go heipidéimeolaíoch.

translation.en: With a sufficient number of sequenced genomes, it is possible to reconstruct a phylogenetic tree of the mutation history of a family of viruses.
translation.ga: Le líon leordhóthanach géanóm seicheamhach, is féidir crann fóineolaíoch a athchruthú de stair sócháin teaghlach víris.

translation.en: By 12 january 2020, five genomes of sars ‑ cov ‑ 2 had been isolated from wuhan and reported by the chinese center for disease control and prevention (ccdc) and other institutions; the number of genomes increased to 42 by 30 january 2020.
translation.ga: Faoi 12 eanáir 2020, bhí cúig ghéanóma de sars-cov-2 scoite ó wuhan agus thuairiscigh ionad na síne um rialú agus cosc ar ghalair (ccdc) agus institiúidí eile iad; mhéadaigh líon na ngéanóma go 42 faoin 30 eanáir 2020.

translation.en: A phylogenetic analysis of those samples showed they were "highly related with at most seven mutations relative to a common ancestor", implying that the first human infection occurred in november or december 2019.
translation.ga: Léirigh anailís phylogenetic ar na samplaí sin go raibh “an-bhaint acu le seacht sóchán ar a mhéad i gcoibhneas le asinsear coiteann", ag tabhairt le tuiscint gur tharla an chéad ionfhabhtú daonna i mí na samhna nó i mí na nollag 2019.

translation.en: Examination of the topology of the phylogenetic tree at the start of the pandemic also found high similarities between human isolates.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ scrúdú ar topology an chrainn phylogenetic ag tús na paindéime cosúlachtaí arda idir aonrú daonna.

translation.en: As of 7 may 2020, 4,690 sars ‑ cov ‑ 2 genomes sampled on six continents were publicly available.
translation.ga: Amhail an 7 bealtaine 2020, bhí 4,690 géanóm sars-cov-2 a sampláladh ar sé mhór-roinn ar fáil go poiblí.

translation.en: The standard methods of testing for presence of sars-cov-2 are nucleic acid tests, which detects the presence of viral rna fragments.
translation.ga: Is iad na modhanna caighdeánacha tástála le haghaidh láithreacht sars-cov-2 ná tástálacha aigéad núicléacha, a bhraitheann láithreacht blúirí víreasacha rna.

translation.en: As these tests detect rna but not infectious virus, its "ability to determine duration of infectivity of patients is limited." The test is typically done on respiratory samples obtained by a nasopharyngeal swab; however, a nasal swab or sputum sample may also be used.
translation.ga: De réir mar a bhraitheann na tástálacha seo víreas rna ach ní víreas tógálach, tá a "chumas chun fad ionfhabhtaitheachta othar a chinneadh teoranta." De ghnáth déantar an tástáil ar shamplaí riospráide a fhaigheann swab nasopharyngeal; áfach, féadfar sampla swab nasal nó sputum a úsáid freisin.

translation.en: Results are generally available within hours.
translation.ga: De ghnáth bíonn torthaí ar fáil laistigh de uaireanta an chloig.

translation.en: The who has published several testing protocols for the disease.
translation.ga: D ’ fhoilsigh an who roinnt prótacal tástála don ghalar.

translation.en: Chest ct scans may be helpful to diagnose covid-19 in individuals with a high clinical suspicion of infection but are not recommended for routine screening.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh scanadh ct cófra ina chuidiú chun covid-19 a dhiagnóisiú i ndaoine aonair a bhfuil amhras cliniciúil ard ionfhabhtaithe iontu ach ní mholtar iad le haghaidh gnáthscagthástála.

translation.en: Bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacities with a peripheral, asymmetric, and posterior distribution are common in early infection.
translation.ga: Tá teochtaí gloine talún iltaobhacha déthaobhacha le dáileadh forimeallach, neamhshiméadrach agus posterior coitianta in ionfhabhtú luath.

translation.en: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving (lobular septal thickening with variable alveolar filling), and consolidation may appear as the disease progresses.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh ceannas subpleural, pábháil craiceáilte (ramhrú septal lobular le líonadh alveolar inathraithe), agus comhdhlúthú le feiceáil de réir mar a théann an galar ar aghaidh.

translation.en: Characteristic imaging features on chest radiographs and computed tomography (ct) of people who are symptomatic include asymmetric peripheral ground-glass opacities without pleural effusions.
translation.ga: Gnéithe íomháithe tréithiúla ar radagrafaíochtaí cófra agus tomagrafaíocht ríofai measc na ndaoine a bhfuil siomptóm orthu (ct) tá teimhneachtaí neamhshiméadracha gloine talún forimeallach gan eisiltí pleura.

translation.en: Preventive measures to reduce the chances of infection include getting vaccinated, staying at home, wearing a mask in public, avoiding crowded places, keeping distance from others, ventilating indoor spaces, managing potential exposure durations, washing hands with soap and water often and for at least twenty seconds, practising good respiratory hygiene, and avoiding touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands.
translation.ga: I measc na mbeart coisctheach chun na seansanna ionfhabhtaithe a laghdú tá vacsaíniú, fanacht sa bhaile, masc a chaitheamh go poiblí, áiteanna plódaithe a sheachaint, fad a choinneáil ó áiteanna eile, aeráil a dhéanamh ar spásanna faoi dhíon, bainistíocht a dhéanamh ar thréimhsí nochta féideartha, lámha a ní le gallúnach agus uisce go minic agus ar feadh fiche soicind ar a laghad, dea-shláinteachas riospráide a chleachtadh, agus gan teagmháil a dhéanamh leis na súile, an srón, nó an béal le lámha neamhfhuascailte.

translation.en: Those diagnosed with covid-19 or who believe they may be infected are advised by the cdc to stay home except to get medical care, call ahead before visiting a healthcare provider, wear a face mask before entering the healthcare provider's office and when in any room or vehicle with another person, cover coughs and sneezes with a tissue, regularly wash hands with soap and water and avoid sharing personal household items.
translation.ga: Molann an cdc dóibh siúd a ndearnadh diagnóis orthu le covid-19 nó a chreideann go bhféadfadh siad a bheith ionfhabhtaithe fanacht sa bhaile ach amháin chun cúram leighis a fháil, glaoch ar aghaidh sula dtugann siad cuairt ar sholáthraí cúram sláinte, masc aghaidh a chaitheamh sula dtéann tú isteach in oifig an tsoláthraí cúram sláinte agus nuair atá sé in aon seomra nó feithicil le duine eile, clúdaigh casacht agus sraothartach le fíochán, nigh do lámha go rialta le gallúnach agus le huisce agus seachain earraí pearsanta tí a roinnt.

translation.en: In phase iii trials, several covid ‑ 19 vaccines have demonstrated efficacy as high as 95% in preventing symptomatic covid ‑ 19 infections.
translation.ga: I dtrialacha chéim iii, léirigh roinnt vacsaíní covid-19 éifeachtúlacht chomh hard le 95% maidir le hionfhabhtuithe síntómacha covid-19 a chosc.

translation.en: As of june 2021, 18 vaccines are authorized by at least one national regulatory authority for public use: Two rna vaccines (pfizer – biontech and moderna), nine conventional inactivated vaccines (bbibp-corv, chinese academy of medical sciences, coronavac, covaxin, covivac, coviran barakat, minhai-kangtai, qazvac, and wibp-corv), five viral vector vaccines (sputnik light, sputnik v, oxford – astrazeneca, convidecia, and johnson & johnson), and two protein subunit vaccines (epivaccorona and rbd-dimer).
translation.ga: Amhail meitheamh 2021, údaraíonn údarás rialála náisiúnta amháin 18 vacsaín lena n-úsáid ag an bpobal: Dhá vacsaín rna (pfizer-biontech agus moderna), naoi vacsaín traidisiúnta neamhghníomhachtaithe (bbibp-corv, acadamh eolaíochtaí leighis na síne, coronavac, covaxin, covivac, coviran barakat, minhai-kangtai, qazvac, aguswibp-corv), cúig vacsaín veicteora víreasach (sputnik light, sputnik v, oxford-astrazeneca, convidecia, agus johnson & johnson), agus dhá vacsaín subunit próitéine (epivaccorona agus rbd-dimer).

translation.en: In total, as of march 2021, 308 vaccine candidates are in various stages of development, with 73 in clinical research, including 24 in phase i trials, 33 in phase i – ii trials, and 16 in phase iii development.
translation.ga: San iomlán, amhail márta 2021, tá 308 iarrthóir vacsaín i gcéimeanna éagsúla forbartha, le 73 i dtaighde cliniciúil, lena n-áirítear 24 i dtrialacha chéim i, 33 i dtrialacha chéim i - ii, agus 16 i gcéim. Iii forbairt.

translation.en: Many countries have implemented phased distribution plans that prioritize those at highest risk of complications, such as the elderly, and those at high risk of exposure and transmission, such as healthcare workers.
translation.ga: Tá pleananna dáileacháin céimnithe curtha i bhfeidhm ag go leor tíortha a thugann tosaíocht dóibh siúd atá i mbaol níos mó deacrachtaí, mar shampla daoine scothaosta, agus iad siúd atá i mbaol ard nochta agus tarchuir, amhail oibrithe cúram sláinte.

translation.en: Single dose interim use is under consideration to extend vaccination to as many people as possible until vaccine availability improves.
translation.ga: Tá úsáid eatramhach dáileog aonair á mheas chun an vacsaíniú a leathnú chuig an oiread daoine agus is féidir go dtí go bhfeabhsaíonn infhaighteacht na vacsaíne.

translation.en: On 21 december 2020, the european union approved the pfizer biontech vaccine.
translation.ga: An 21 nollaig 2020, cheadaigh an taontas eorpach an vacsaín pfizer biontech.

translation.en: Vaccinations began to be administered on 27 december 2020.
translation.ga: Cuireadh tús le vacsaínithe a riaradh an 27 nollaig 2020.

translation.en: The moderna vaccine was authorised on 6 january 2021 and the astrazeneca vaccine was authorised on 29 january 2021.
translation.ga: Údaraíodh an vacsaín moderna an 6 eanáir 2021 agus údaraíodh an vacsaín astrazeneca an 29 eanáir 2021.

translation.en: On 4 february 2020, us secretary of health and human services alex azar published a notice of declaration under the public readiness and emergency preparedness act for medical countermeasures against covid-19, covering "any vaccine, used to treat, diagnose, cure, prevent, or mitigate covid-19, or the transmission of sars-cov-2 or a virus mutating therefrom", and stating that the declaration precludes "liability claims alleging negligence by a manufacturer in creating a vaccine, or negligence by a health care provider in prescribing the wrong dose, absent willful misconduct".
translation.ga: An 4 feabhra 2020, d ’ fhoilsigh rúnaí sláinte agus seirbhísí daonna na sa alex azar fógra dearbhaithe faoin acht um ullmhacht poiblí agus ullmhacht éigeandála le haghaidh frithbhearta míochaine i gcoinne covid-19, ag clúdach “aon vacsaín, a úsáidtear chun cóireáil, diagnóis, leigheas, cosc, nó maolú a dhéanamh ar covid-19, nó tarchur sars-cov-2 nó víreas a shóchán uaidh", agus á rá go gcuireann an dearbhú cosc ​ ​ ar "éilimh dliteanais a líomhnaíonn faillí ó mhonaróir vacsaín a chruthú, nó faillí ó sholáthraí cúraim sláinte agus é ag forordú an dáileog mhícheart, mí-iompar toiliúil as láthair ”.

translation.en: The declaration is effective in the united states through 1 october 2024.
translation.ga: Beidh éifeacht leis an dearbhú sna stáit aontaithe an 1 deireadh fómhair 2024.

translation.en: On 8 december it was reported that the astrazeneca vaccine is about 70% effective, according to a study.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an 8 nollaig go bhfuil an vacsaín astrazeneca thart ar 70% éifeachtach, de réir staidéir.

translation.en: By mid-june 2021, 85 percent of vaccinations have been administered in high- and upper-middle-income countries.
translation.ga: Faoi lár mhí an mheithimh 2021, bhí 85 faoin gcéad de na vacsaínithe curtha i dtíortha ardioncaim agus meánioncaim.

translation.en: Only 0.3 percent of doses have been administered in low-income countries.
translation.ga: Níor tugadh ach 0.3 faoin gcéad de na dáileoga i dtíortha ar ioncam íseal.

translation.en: There is no specific, effective treatment or cure for coronavirus disease 2019 (covid-19), the disease caused by the sars-cov-2 virus.
translation.ga: Níl aon chóireáil nó leigheas sonrach, éifeachtach ann do ghalar coronavirus 2019 (covid-19), an galar is cúis leis an víreas sars-cov-2.

translation.en: Thus, the cornerstone of management of covid-19 is supportive care, which includes treatment to relieve symptoms, fluid therapy, oxygen support and prone positioning as needed, and medications or devices to support other affected vital organs.
translation.ga: Dá bhrí sin, is é atá mar bhunchloch bainistíochta covid-19 ná cúram tacúil, lena n-áirítear cóireáil chun comharthaí, teiripe sreabhach, tacaíocht ocsaigine agus suíomh seans maith a mhaolú de réir mar is gá, agus cógais nó gairis chun tacú le horgáin ríthábhachtacha eile atá buailte.

translation.en: A critically ill patient receiving invasive ventilation in the intensive care unit of the heart institute, university of são paulo.
translation.ga: Othar criticiúil tinn a fhaigheann aeráil ionrach in aonad dianchúraim institiúid an chroí, ollscoil são paulo.

translation.en: Due to a shortage of mechanical ventilators, a bridge ventilator is being used to automatically actuate a bag valve mask.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar ghanntanas aerálaithe meicniúla, tá aerálaí droichead á úsáid chun masc comhla mála a ghníomhachtú go huathoibríoch.

translation.en: Most cases of covid-19 are mild.
translation.ga: Tá an chuid is mó de chásanna covid-19 éadrom.

translation.en: In these, supportive care includes medication such as paracetamol or nsaids to relieve symptoms (fever, body aches, cough), proper intake of fluids, rest, and nasal breathing.
translation.ga: Ina measc seo, cuimsíonn cúram tacúil cógais ar nós paraicéiteamól nó nsaidanna chun comharthaí (fiabhras, aclaí coirp, casacht) a mhaolú, iontógáil ceart sreabhán, scíth agus análú nasal.

translation.en: Good personal hygiene and a healthy diet are also recommended.
translation.ga: Moltar sláinteachas pearsanta maith agus aiste bia sláintiúil freisin.

translation.en: The u.s. centers for disease control and prevention (cdc) recommend that those who suspect they are carrying the virus isolate themselves at home and wear a face mask.
translation.ga: Molann ionaid sam um rialú agus cosc ar ghalair (cdc) go ndéanfadh na daoine a bhfuil amhras orthu go bhfuil an víreas á n-iompar acu iad féin a leithlisiú sa bhaile agus masc aghaidh a chaitheamh.

translation.en: People with more severe cases may need treatment in hospital.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh cóireáil san ospidéal de dhíth ar dhaoine le cásanna níos déine.

translation.en: In those with low oxygen levels, use of the glucocorticoid dexamethasone is strongly recommended, as it can reduce the risk of death.
translation.ga: Dóibh siúd a bhfuil leibhéil ísle ocsaigine acu, moltar go láidir an dexamethasone glucocorticoid a úsáid, mar is féidir leis an riosca báis a laghdú.

translation.en: Noninvasive ventilation and, ultimately, admission to an intensive care unit for mechanical ventilation may be required to support breathing.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh gá le haeráil neamh-ionrach agus, sa deireadh, ligean isteach in aonad dianchúraim d ’ aeráil mheicniúil chun tacú leis an anáil.

translation.en: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ecmo) has been used to address the issue of respiratory failure, but its benefits are still under consideration.
translation.ga: Baineadh úsáid as ocsaiginiú membrane eisfheartha (ecmo) chun aghaidh a thabhairt ar cheist na teipe riospráide, ach tá a buntáistí fós á mbreithniú.

translation.en: Several experimental treatments are being actively studied in clinical trials.
translation.ga: Tá staidéar gníomhach á dhéanamh ar roinnt cóireálacha turgnamhacha i dtrialacha cliniciúla.
