translation.en: Others were thought to be promising early in the pandemic, such as hydroxychloroquine and lopinavir / ritonavir, but later research found them to be ineffective or even harmful.
translation.ga: Ceapadh go raibh daoine eile geallta go luath sa phaindéim, mar shampla hiodrocsaicloróicín agus lopinavir / ritonavir, ach fuair taighde níos déanaí go raibh siad neamhéifeachtach nó díobhálach fiú.

translation.en: Despite ongoing research, there is still not enough high-quality evidence to recommend so-called early treatment.
translation.ga: In ainneoin taighde leanúnach, níl go leor fianaise ardcháilíochta ann fós chun cóireáil luath mar a thugtar air a mholadh.

translation.en: Nevertheless, in the united states, two monoclonal antibody-based therapies are available for early use in cases thought to be at high risk of progression to severe disease.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, sna stáit aontaithe, tá dhá theiripe monoclónacha atá bunaithe ar antasubstaintí ar fáil le húsáid go luath i gcásanna a gceaptar go bhfuil siad i mbaol mór dul ar aghaidh chuig galar trom.

translation.en: The antiviral remdesivir is available in the u.s., canada, australia, and several other countries, with varying restrictions; however, it is not recommended for people needing mechanical ventilation, and is discouraged altogether by the world health organization (who), due to limited evidence of its efficacy.
translation.ga: Tá an remdesivir frithvíreas ar fáil i sam, i gceanada, san astráil, agus i roinnt tíortha eile, le srianta éagsúla; ní mholtar é, áfach, do dhaoine a dteastaíonn aeráil mheicniúil uathu, agus déanann an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte (who), é a dhíspreagadh ar fad mar gheall ar fhianaise theoranta ar a éifeachtúlacht.

translation.en: Several variants of sars-cov-2 have emerged that are spreading globally.
translation.ga: Tá roinnt leaganacha de sars-cov-2 tagtha chun cinn atá ag scaipeadh ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: The most currently prevalent, all of which share the more infectious d614g mutation, are:
translation.ga: Is iad na cinn is forleithne faoi láthair, a bhfuil an sóchán d614g níos tógálach acu:

translation.en: B.1.1.7, first detected in the uk, which has spread to over 120 countries
translation.ga: B.1.1.7, a braitheadh ​ ​ den chéad uair sa ra, atá scaipthe go breis agus 120 tír

translation.en: P.1, first detected in brazil, which has spread to more than 50 countries
translation.ga: P.1, a braitheadh ​ ​ den chéad uair sa bhrasaíl, atá scaipthe go níos mó ná 50 tír

translation.en: B.1.351, first detected in south africa, which has spread to over 80 countries
translation.ga: B.1.351, a braitheadh ​ ​ den chéad uair san afraic theas, atá scaipthe go breis agus 80 tír

translation.en: The severity of covid-19 varies.
translation.ga: Ní hionann déine covid-19.

translation.en: The disease may take a mild course with few or no symptoms, resembling other common upper respiratory diseases such as the common cold.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh an galar cúrsa éadrom a dhéanamh gan mórán comharthaí nó gan aon airíonna, cosúil le galair riospráide uachtaracha coitianta eile cosúil leis an bhfuar coitianta.

translation.en: In 3 – 4% of cases (7.4% for those over age 65) symptoms are severe enough to cause hospitalization.
translation.ga: I 3 – 4% de na cásanna (7.4% dóibh siúd os cionn 65 bliana d ’ aois) tá na hairíonna dian go leor chun a bheith san ospidéal.

translation.en: Mild cases typically recover within two weeks, while those with severe or critical diseases may take three to six weeks to recover.
translation.ga: Cásanna éadrom a ghnóthú de ghnáth laistigh de dhá sheachtain, cé go mb' fhéidir iad siúd a bhfuil galair tromchúiseacha nó criticiúil trí go sé seachtaine a ghnóthú.

translation.en: Among those who have died, the time from symptom onset to death has ranged from two to eight weeks.
translation.ga: Ina measc siúd a fuair bás, tá an t-am ó thús na siomtóm go bás idir dhá sheachtain agus ocht seachtaine.

translation.en: The italian istituto superiore di sanità reported that the median time between the onset of symptoms and death was twelve days, with seven being hospitalised.
translation.ga: An iodáilis istituto superiore di sanitàtuairiscíodh gur dhá lá dhéag an t-airmheán idir tosú na hairíonna agus an bás, agus seacht gcinn san ospidéal.

translation.en: However, people transferred to an icu had a median time of ten days between hospitalisation and death.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, bhí meántréimhse deich lá ag daoine a aistríodh chuig icu idir an t-ospidéal agus an bás.

translation.en: Prolonged prothrombin time and elevated c-reactive protein levels on admission to the hospital are associated with severe course of covid-19 and with a transfer to icu.
translation.ga: Tá baint ag am prothrombin fada agus leibhéil ardaithe próitéine c-imoibríocha ar iontráil chuig an ospidéal le dianchúrsa covid-19 agus le haistriú chuig icu.

translation.en: Speed and scale are key to mitigation, due to the fat-tailed nature of pandemic risk and the exponential growth of covid-19 infections.
translation.ga: Tá luas agus scála ríthábhachtach maidir le maolú, mar gheall ar nádúr tailed saille an riosca paindéime agus an fás easpónantúil atá ag ionfhabhtuithe covid-19.

translation.en: For mitigation to be effective, (a) chains of transmission must be broken as quickly as possible through screening and containment, (b) health care must be available to provide for the needs of those infected, and (c) contingencies must be in place to allow for effective rollout of (a) and (b).
translation.ga: Ionas go mbeidh maolú éifeachtach, (a) caithfear slabhraí tarchuir a bhriseadh chomh tapa agus is féidir trí scagadh agus srianadh, (b) caithfidh cúram sláinte a bheith ar fáil chun freastal ar riachtanais na ndaoine atá ionfhabhtaithe, agus (c) ní mór teagmhais a bheith i bhfeidhm chun rolladh amach éifeachtach (a) agus (b) a cheadú.

translation.en: Strategies in the control of an outbreak are screening, containment (or suppression), and mitigation.
translation.ga: Is iad na straitéisí chun ráig a rialú ná scagadh, srianadh (nó cosc) agus maolú.

translation.en: Screening is done with a device such as a thermometer to detect the elevated body temperature associated with fevers caused by the infection.
translation.ga: Déantar an scagadh le feiste cosúil le teirmiméadar chun teocht an choirp ardaithe a bhaineann le fiabhras de bharr an ionfhabhtaithe a bhrath.

translation.en: Containment is undertaken in the early stages of the outbreak and aims to trace and isolate those infected as well as introduce other measures to stop the disease from spreading.
translation.ga: Déantar an coimeád go luath sa ráig agus tá sé mar aidhm aige na daoine atá ionfhabhtaithe a rianú agus a leithlisiú chomh maith le bearta eile a thabhairt isteach chun an galar a chosc ó scaipeadh.

translation.en: When it is no longer possible to contain the disease, efforts then move to the mitigation stage: Measures are taken to slow the spread and mitigate its effects on the healthcare system and society.
translation.ga: Nuair nach féidir an galar a choinneáil a thuilleadh, aistrítear iarrachtaí ansin go dtí an chéim maolaithe: Tógtar bearta chun an scaipeadh a mhoilliú agus a éifeachtaí ar an gcóras cúram sláinte agus ar an tsochaí a mhaolú.

translation.en: A combination of both containment and mitigation measures may be undertaken at the same time.
translation.ga: Féadfar teaglaim de bhearta coimeádta agus maolaithe a dhéanamh ag an am céanna.

translation.en: Suppression requires more extreme measures so as to reverse the pandemic by reducing the basic reproduction number to less than 1.
translation.ga: Teastaíonn bearta níos foircní chun an paindéim a aisiompú tríd an mbunuimhir atáirgthe a laghdú go dtí níos lú ná 1.

translation.en: Part of managing an infectious disease outbreak is trying to delay and decrease the epidemic peak, known as flattening the epidemic curve.
translation.ga: Tá cuid de ráig de ghalair thógálacha a bhainistiú ag iarraidh moill agus laghdú a dhéanamh ar bhuaic na heipidéime, ar a dtugtar an cuar eipidéim a leathadh.

translation.en: This decreases the risk of health services being overwhelmed and provides more time for vaccines and treatments to be developed.
translation.ga: Laghdaíonn sé seo an baol go sáraítear seirbhísí sláinte agus soláthraíonn sé níos mó ama chun vacsaíní agus cóireálacha a fhorbairt.

translation.en: Non-pharmaceutical interventions that may manage the outbreak include personal preventive measures such as hand hygiene, wearing face masks, and self-quarantine; community measures aimed at physical distancing such as closing schools and cancelling mass gathering events; community engagement to encourage acceptance and participation in such interventions; as well as environmental measures such surface cleaning.
translation.ga: I measc na n -idirghabhálacha neamh-chógaisíochta a d ’ fhéadfadh an ráig a bhainistiú tá bearta coisctheacha pearsanta mar shláinteachas láimhe, caitheamh maisc aghaidhe, agus féin-choraintín; bearta pobail atá dírithe ar fhadú fisiceach ar nós scoileanna a dhúnadh agus imeachtaí ollchruinnithe a chealú; rannpháirtíocht an phobail chun glacadh agus rannpháirtíocht in idirghabhálacha den sórt sin a spreagadh; chomh maith le bearta comhshaoil ​ ​ glanadh dromchla den sórt sin.

translation.en: Some measures, particularly those that focus on cleaning surfaces rather than preventing airborne transmission, have been criticised as hygiene theatre.
translation.ga: Cáineadh roinnt beart, go háirithe iad siúd a dhíríonn ar dhromchlaí a ghlanadh seachas tarchur aeriompartha a chosc, mar amharclann sláinteachais.

translation.en: More drastic actions aimed at containing the outbreak were taken in china once the severity of the outbreak became apparent, such as quarantining entire cities and imposing strict travel bans.
translation.ga: Rinneadh bearta níos déine a raibh sé mar aidhm acu an ráig a choinneáil sa tsín nuair a tháinig déine na ráige chun solais, mar shampla coraintín a dhéanamh ar chathracha iomlána agus toirmeasc dian taistil a fhorchur.

translation.en: Other countries also adopted a variety of measures aimed at limiting the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Ghlac tíortha eile bearta éagsúla freisin a bhí dírithe ar scaipeadh an víris a theorannú.

translation.en: South korea introduced mass screening and localised quarantines and issued alerts on the movements of infected individuals.
translation.ga: Thug an chóiré theas isteach scagthástáil mais agus coraintíní áitiúla agus d ’ eisigh siad foláirimh faoi ghluaiseachtaí daoine ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: Singapore provided financial support for those infected who quarantined themselves and imposed large fines for those who failed to do so.
translation.ga: Chuir singeapór tacaíocht airgeadais ar fáil dóibh siúd a bhí ionfhabhtaithe a rinne coraintín orthu féin agus a ghearr fíneálacha móra orthu siúd nár éirigh leo déanamh amhlaidh.

translation.en: Taiwan increased face mask production and penalised the hoarding of medical supplies.
translation.ga: Mhéadaigh taiwan táirgeadh masc aghaidh agus chuir sí pionós ar chlárú soláthairtí míochaine.

translation.en: Simulations for great britain and the united states show that mitigation (slowing but not stopping epidemic spread) and suppression (reversing epidemic growth) have major challenges.
translation.ga: Taispeánann insamhaltaí don bhreatain mhór agus do na stáit aontaithe go bhfuil dúshláin mhóra roimh mhaolú (maolú ach gan stop a chur le scaipeadh eipidéim) agus faoi chois (fás eipidéim a aisiompú).

translation.en: Optimal mitigation policies might reduce peak healthcare demand by two-thirds and deaths by half, but still result in hundreds of thousands of deaths and overwhelmed health systems.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh na beartais maolaithe is fearr an buaicéileamh ar chúram sláinte a laghdú faoi dhá thrian agus básanna faoi leath, ach d ’ fhéadfadh na céadta mílte bás agus córais sláinte sáraithe a bheith mar thoradh orthu fós.

translation.en: Suppression can be preferred but needs to be maintained for as long as the virus is circulating in the human population (or until a vaccine becomes available), as transmission otherwise quickly rebounds when measures are relaxed.
translation.ga: Is fearr an cosc ​ ​ a chur air ach caithfear é a choinneáil chomh fada agus a bhíonn an víreas ag scaipeadh i measc an duine (nó go dtí go mbeidh vacsaín ar fáil), toisc go n-athraíonn an tarchur go gasta nuair a dhéantar bearta a mhaolú.

translation.en: Long-term intervention to suppress the pandemic has considerable social and economic costs.
translation.ga: Tá costais mhóra shóisialta agus eacnamaíocha ag baint le hidirghabháil fhadtéarmach chun an paindéim a bhaint.

translation.en: Contact tracing is an important method for health authorities to determine the source of infection and to prevent further transmission.
translation.ga: Is modh tábhachtach é rianú teagmhála d ’ údaráis sláinte chun foinse an ionfhabhtaithe a chinneadh agus chun tarchur breise a chosc.

translation.en: The use of location data from mobile phones by governments for this purpose has prompted privacy concerns, with amnesty international and more than a hundred other organisations issuing a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
translation.ga: Spreag rialtais chun na críche seo imní maidir le príobháideacht le sonraí suímh ó fhóin phóca, le amnesty international agus níos mó ná céad eagraíocht eile ag eisiúint ráitis ag éileamh teorainneacha ar an gcineál seo faireachais.

translation.en: Several mobile apps have been implemented or proposed for voluntary use, and as of 7 april 2020 more than a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions such as using bluetooth to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
translation.ga: Tá roinnt aipeanna soghluaiste curtha i bhfeidhm nó beartaithe le haghaidh úsáide deonaí, agus amhail an 7 aibreán 2020 bhí níos mó ná dosaen sainghrúpaí ag obair ar réitigh a thacaíonn le príobháideacht mar bluetooth a úsáid chun gaireacht úsáideora do fhóin phóca eile a logáil.

translation.en: (Users are alerted if they have been near someone who subsequently tests positive.)
translation.ga: (Tugtar foláireamh d ’ úsáideoirí má bhí siad in aice le duine a thástálann dearfach ina dhiaidh sin.)

translation.en: On 10 april 2020, google and apple jointly announced an initiative for privacy-preserving contact tracing based on bluetooth technology and cryptography.
translation.ga: Ar 10 aibreán 2020, d ’ fhógair google agus apple i gcomhpháirt tionscnamh chun rianú teagmhála a chaomhnaíonn príobháideacht bunaithe ar theicneolaíocht bluetooth agus cripteagrafaíocht.

translation.en: The system is intended to allow governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracking apps, with the eventual goal of integration of this functionality directly into the ios and android mobile platforms.
translation.ga: Tá sé i gceist leis an gcóras ligean do rialtais aipeanna oifigiúla rianaithe coronavirus a chaomhnú le príobháideacht a chruthú, agus é mar aidhm sa deireadh an fheidhmiúlacht seo a chomhtháthú go díreach leis na hardáin soghluaiste ios agus android.

translation.en: In europe and in the u.s., palantir technologies is also providing covid-19 tracking services.
translation.ga: San eoraip agus sna sa, tá palantir technologies ag soláthar seirbhísí rianaithe covid-19 freisin.

translation.en: Increasing capacity and adapting healthcare for the needs of covid-19 patients is described by the who as a fundamental outbreak response measure.
translation.ga: Déanann an who cur síos ar acmhainn mhéadaithe agus cúram sláinte a oiriúnú do riachtanais othar covid-19 mar bheart bunúsach freagartha ráige.

translation.en: The ecdc and the european regional office of the who have issued guidelines for hospitals and primary healthcare services for shifting of resources at multiple levels, including focusing laboratory services towards covid-19 testing, cancelling elective procedures whenever possible, separating and isolating covid-19 positive patients, and increasing intensive care capabilities by training personnel and increasing the number of available ventilators and beds.
translation.ga: D' eisigh an ecdc agus oifig réigiúnach eorpach an who treoirlínte d' ospidéil agus do sheirbhísí cúram sláinte príomhúil chun acmhainní a aistriú ar leibhéil éagsúla, lena n-áirítear seirbhísí saotharlainne a dhíriú ar thástáil covid-19, nósanna imeachta roghnacha a chealú nuair is féidir, covid a scaradh agus a aonrú-19 othar dearfach, agus cumais dianchúraim a mhéadú trí phearsanra a oiliúint agus líon na n- aerálaithe agus na leapacha atá ar fáil a mhéadú.

translation.en: In addition, in an attempt to maintain physical distancing, and to protect both patients and clinicians, in some areas non-emergency healthcare services are being provided virtually.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, in iarracht fadú fisiceach a choinneáil, agus othair agus cliniceoirí a chosaint, tá seirbhísí cúram sláinte neamh-éigeandála á gcur ar fáil beagnach i roinnt réimsí.

translation.en: Due to capacity limitations in the standard supply chains, some manufacturers are 3d printing healthcare material such as nasal swabs and ventilator parts.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar theorainneacha acmhainne sna slabhraí soláthair caighdeánacha, is ábhar cúram sláinte priontála 3d iad roinnt déantúsóirí mar swabs nasal agus páirteanna aerálaí.

translation.en: In one example, when an italian hospital urgently required a ventilator valve, and the supplier was unable to deliver in the timescale required, a local startup received legal threats due to alleged patent infringement after reverse-engineering and printing the required hundred valves overnight.
translation.ga: I sampla amháin, nuair a bhí comhla aerálaí de dhíth go práinneach ar ospidéal san iodáil, agus nach raibh an soláthróir in ann seachadadh laistigh den scála ama a bhí ag teastáil, fuair tosaithe áitiúil bagairtí dlí mar gheall ar shárú líomhnaithe paitinne tar éis innealtóireacht droim ar ais agus priontáil an céad comhla ag teastáil thar oíche.

translation.en: On 23 april 2020, nasa reported building, in 37 days, a ventilator which is currently undergoing further testing.
translation.ga: An 23 aibreán 2020, thuairiscigh nasa go raibh aerálaí á thógáil, i 37 lá, atá faoi thástáil bhreise faoi láthair.

translation.en: Nasa is seeking fast-track approval.
translation.ga: Tá nasa ag lorg cead mear.

translation.en: Individuals and groups of makers around the world also assisted in the efforts by creating and sharing open source designs, and manufacturing devices using locally sourced materials, sewing, and 3d printing.
translation.ga: Chabhraigh daoine aonair agus grúpaí déantúsóirí ar fud an domhain leis na hiarrachtaí trí dhearaí foinse oscailte a chruthú agus a roinnt, agus gairis déantúsaíochta ag úsáid ábhair a fhoinsítear go háitiúil, fuála agus priontáil 3d.

translation.en: Millions of face shields, protective gowns, and masks were made.
translation.ga: Rinneadh na milliúin sciath aghaidh, fallaingeacha cosanta, agus maisc.

translation.en: Other medical supplies were made such as shoes covers, surgical caps, powered air-purifying respirators, and hand sanitizer.
translation.ga: Rinneadh soláthairtí míochaine eile cosúil le clúdaigh bróga, caipíní máinliachta, riospróirí aer-íonaithe cumhachtaithe, agus sláintitheoir láimhe.

translation.en: Novel devices were created such as ear savers, non-invasive ventilation helmets, and ventilator splitters.
translation.ga: Cruthaíodh gairis núíosacha ar nós sábhálaithe cluaise, clogaid aerála neamh-ionracha, agus scoilteoirí aerálaí.

translation.en: Based on the retrospective analysis, starting from december 2019, the number of covid-19 cases in hubei gradually increased, reaching 60 by 20 december and at least 266 by 31 december.
translation.ga: Bunaithe ar an anailís siarghabhálach, ag tosú ó mhí na nollag 2019, tháinig méadú de réir a chéile ar líon na gcásanna covid-19 i hubei, ag sroicheadh ​ ​ 60 faoin 20 nollaig agus 266 ar a laghad faoin 31 nollaig.

translation.en: On 24 december 2019, wuhan central hospital sent a bronchoalveolar lavage fluid (bal) sample from an unresolved clinical case to sequencing company vision medicals.
translation.ga: An 24 nollaig 2019, sheol ospidéal lárnach wuhan sampla sreabhán lavage bronchoalveolar (bal) ó chás cliniciúil gan réiteach chuig an gcuideachta seicheamh vision medicals.

translation.en: On 27 and 28 december, vision medicals informed the wuhan central hospital and the chinese cdc of the results of the test, showing a new coronavirus.
translation.ga: An 27 agus an 28 nollaig, chuir vision medicals in iúl d ’ ospidéal lárnach wuhan agus do cdc na síne torthaí na tástála, ag taispeáint coronavirus nua.

translation.en: A pneumonia cluster of unknown cause was observed on 26 december and treated by the doctor zhang jixian in hubei provincial hospital, who informed the wuhan jianghan cdc on 27 december.
translation.ga: Breathnaíodh braisle niúmóine de chúis anaithnid an 26 nollaig agus chuir an dochtúir zhang jixian cóireáil air in ospidéal cúige hubei, a chuir cdc wuhan jianghan ar an eolas an 27 nollaig.

translation.en: On 30 december 2019, a test report addressed to wuhan central hospital, from company capitalbio medlab, stated that there was an erroneous positive result for sars, causing a group of doctors at wuhan central hospital to alert their colleagues and relevant hospital authorities of the result.
translation.ga: An 30 nollaig 2019, dúradh i dtuarascáil tástála a díríodh ar ospidéal lárnach wuhan, ón gcuideachta capitalbio medlab, go raibh toradh dearfach earráideach ann do sars, rud a chuir faoi deara do ghrúpa dochtúirí in ospidéal lárnach wuhan a dtoradh a chur in iúl dá gcomhghleacaithe agus d ’ údaráis ospidéil ábhartha faoin toradh..

translation.en: Eight of those doctors, including li wenliang (who was also punished on 3 january), were later admonished by the police for spreading false rumours; and another doctor, ai fen, was reprimanded by her superiors for raising the alarm.
translation.ga: D' admhaigh na póilíní ocht gcinn de na dochtúirí sin, lena n-áirítear li wenliang (a gearradh pionós air freisin ar 3 eanáir), as ráflaí bréagacha a scaipeadh; agus iompaigh dochtúir eile dochtúir eile, ai fen, as an aláram a ardú.

translation.en: That evening, the wuhan municipal health commission issued a notice to various medical institutions about "the treatment of pneumonia of unknown cause".
translation.ga: An tráthnóna sin, d ’ eisigh coimisiún sláinte bardasach wuhan fógra d ’ institiúidí leighis éagsúla faoi “cóireáil niúmóine ar chúis anaithnid ”.

translation.en: The next day, the wuhan municipal health commission made the first public announcement of a pneumonia outbreak of unknown cause, confirming 27 cases — enough to trigger an investigation.
translation.ga: An lá dar gcionn, rinne coimisiún sláinte bardasach wuhan an chéad fhógra poiblí faoi ráig niúmóine de chúis anaithnid, ag dearbhú 27 cás - go leor chun imscrúdú a spreagadh.

translation.en: The following day, on 31 december, the who office in china was informed of cases of pneumonia of unknown cause in wuhan.
translation.ga: An lá dar gcionn, an 31 nollaig, cuireadh oifig who sa tsín ar an eolas faoi chásanna niúmóine de chúis anaithnid i wuhan.

translation.en: An investigation was launched at the start of january 2020.
translation.ga: Seoladh imscrúdú ag tús eanáir 2020.

translation.en: According to official chinese sources, the early cases were mostly linked to the huanan seafood wholesale market, which also sold live animals.
translation.ga: De réir foinsí oifigiúla na síne, bhí na cásanna luatha nasctha den chuid is mó le margadh mórdhíola bia mara na huanáine, a dhíol ainmhithe beo freisin.

translation.en: However, in may 2020, george gao, the director of the chinese center for disease control and prevention, said animal samples collected from the seafood market had tested negative for the virus, indicating the market was not the source of the initial outbreak.
translation.ga: I mbealtaine 2020, áfach, dúirt george gao, stiúrthóir ionad na síne um rialú agus cosc ar ghalair, go ndearna samplaí ainmhithe a bailíodh ón margadh bia mara tástáil dhiúltach don víreas, ag tabhairt le fios nárbh é an margadh foinse na ráige tosaigh.

translation.en: In march 2021, the who published their report on the potential zoonotic source of the virus.
translation.ga: I mí an mhárta 2021, d ’ fhoilsigh an who a dtuarascáil ar fhoinse zónóiseach féideartha an víris.

translation.en: The who concluded that human spillover via an intermediate animal host was the most likely explanation, with direct spillover from bats next most likely and introduction through the food supply chain as another possible explanation.
translation.ga: Tháinig an who ar an gconclúid gurb é an t-iarmhairt dhaonna trí óstach idirmheánach ainmhithe an míniú is dóichí, agus is dócha go ndéanfaí iarmhairt dhíreach ó ialtóga agus tabhairt isteach tríd an slabhra soláthair bia mar mhíniú eile a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith ann.

translation.en: On 11 january, who received further information from the chinese national health commission that the outbreak is associated with exposures in one seafood market in wuhan, and that the chinese authorities had identified a new type of coronavirus, which was isolated on 7 january.
translation.ga: An 11 eanáir, fuair who tuilleadh faisnéise ó choimisiún sláinte náisiúnta na síne go bhfuil baint ag an ráig le neamhchosaintí i margadh bia mara amháin i wuhan, agus gur shainaithin údaráis na síne cineál nua coronavirus, a bhí scoite amach an 7 eanáir.

translation.en: During the early stages of the outbreak, the number of cases doubled approximately every seven and a half days.
translation.ga: Le linn na gcéimeanna luatha den ráig, dúbailt líon na gcásanna thart ar gach seacht lá go leith.

translation.en: In early and mid-january, the virus spread to other chinese provinces, helped by the chinese new year migration and wuhan being a transport hub and major rail interchange.
translation.ga: Go luath agus i lár mhí eanáir, leathnaigh an víreas go cúigí eile na síne, le cúnamh ó imirce bhliain nua na síne agus wuhan mar mhol iompair agus mór-acomhal iarnróid.

translation.en: On 10 january, the sars-cov-2 genetic sequence data was shared through gisaid.
translation.ga: An 10 eanáir, roinneadh sonraí seicheamh géiniteach sars-cov-2 trí gisaid.

translation.en: On 20 january, china reported nearly 140 new cases in one day, including two people in beijing and one in shenzhen.
translation.ga: An 20 eanáir, thuairiscigh an tsín beagnach 140 cás nua in aon lá amháin, lena n-áirítear beirt i mbéising agus ceann i shenzhen.

translation.en: A retrospective official study published in march found that 6,174 people had already developed symptoms by 20 january (most of them would be diagnosed later) and more may have been infected.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ staidéar oifigiúil siarghabhálach a foilsíodh i mí an mhárta go raibh comharthaí forbartha ag 6,174 duine faoin 20 eanáir (dhéanfaí an chuid is mó díobh a dhiagnóisiú níos déanaí) agus d ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh níos mó ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: A report in the lancet on 24 january indicated human transmission, strongly recommended personal protective equipment for health workers, and said testing for the virus was essential due to its "pandemic potential".
translation.ga: Léirigh tuarascáil in the lancet an 24 eanáir tarchur daonna, mhol sé trealamh cosanta pearsanta d ’ oibrithe sláinte go láidir, agus dúirt sí go raibh tástáil don víreas riachtanach mar gheall ar a “acmhainneacht phaindéimeach ”.

translation.en: On 31 january the lancet would publish the first modelling study explicitly warning of inevitable "independent self-sustaining outbreaks in major cities globally" and calling for "large-scale public health interventions."
translation.ga: An 31 eanáir d ’ fhoilseodh an lancet an chéad staidéar samhaltaithe ag tabhairt foláireamh go sainráite faoi “ráigeanna neamhspleácha féinchothabhálacha i gcathracha móra ar fud an domhain ” agus ag éileamh“ idirghabhálacha sláinte poiblí ar mhórscála. ”

translation.en: On 30 january, with 7,818 confirmed cases across 19 countries, the who declared the covid-19 outbreak a public health emergency of international concern (pheic), and then a pandemic on 11 march 2020 as italy, iran, south korea, and japan reported increasing numbers of cases.
translation.ga: An 30 eanáir, agus 7,818 cás dearbhaithe ar fud 19 tír, dhearbhaigh an who an ráig covid-19 mar éigeandáil sláinte poiblí a bhfuil imní idirnáisiúnta air (pheic), agus ansin paindéim an 11 márta 2020 [242] mar a thuairiscigh an iodáil, an iaráin, an chóiré theas, agus an tseapáin líon méadaitheach cásanna.

translation.en: On 31 january, italy had its first confirmed cases, two tourists from china.
translation.ga: An 31 eanáir, bhí a chéad chásanna deimhnithe ag an iodáil, beirt thurasóirí ón tsín.

translation.en: On 19 march, italy overtook china as the country with the most reported deaths.
translation.ga: An 19 márta, ghabh an iodáil an tsín ar aghaidh mar an tír leis na básanna is mó a tuairiscíodh.

translation.en: By 26 march, the united states had overtaken china and italy with the highest number of confirmed cases in the world.
translation.ga: Faoin 26 márta, bhí na stáit aontaithe tar éis an tsín agus an iodáil a shárú leis an líon is mó cásanna dearbhaithe ar domhan.

translation.en: Research on sars-cov-2 genomes indicates the majority of covid-19 cases in new york came from european travellers, rather than directly from china or any other asian country.
translation.ga: Léiríonn taighde ar ghéanóim sars-cov-2 gur ó thaistealaithe eorpacha a tháinig formhór na gcásanna covid-19 i nua eabhrac, seachas go díreach ón tsín nó ó aon tír eile san áise.

translation.en: Retesting of prior samples found a person in france who had the virus on 27 december 2019 and a person in the united states who died from the disease on 6 february 2020.
translation.ga: Nuair a rinneadh samplaí roimhe seo a athscrúdú fuarthas duine sa fhrainc a raibh an víreas air an 27 nollaig 2019 agus duine sna stáit aontaithe a fuair bás ón ngalar an 6 feabhra 2020.

translation.en: On 11 june, after 55 days without a locally transmitted case being officially reported, the city of beijing reported a single covid-19 case, followed by two more cases on 12 june.
translation.ga: An 11 meitheamh, tar éis 55 lá gan cás a tarchuireadh go háitiúil a thuairisciú go hoifigiúil, thuairiscigh cathair beijing cás amháin covid-19, agus dhá chás eile ina dhiaidh sin an 12 meitheamh.

translation.en: As of 15 june 2020, 79 cases were officially confirmed.
translation.ga: Amhail an 15 meitheamh 2020, deimhníodh 79 cás go hoifigiúil.

translation.en: Most of these patients went to xinfadi wholesale market.
translation.ga: Chuaigh formhór na n-othar seo chuig margadh mórdhíola xinfadi.

translation.en: On 29 june, who warned that the spread of the virus was still accelerating as countries reopened their economies, despite many countries having made progress in slowing down the spread.
translation.ga: An 29 meitheamh, thug who foláireamh go raibh scaipeadh an víris fós ag luasghéarú de réir mar a d ’ athoscail tíortha a ngeilleagair, in ainneoin go bhfuil dul chun cinn déanta ag go leor tíortha maidir leis an leathadh a mhoilliú.

translation.en: On 15 july, one covid-19 case was officially reported in dalian in more than three months.
translation.ga: An 15 iúil, tuairiscíodh cás amháin covid-19 go hoifigiúil i dalian i níos mó ná trí mhí.

translation.en: The patient did not travel outside the city in the 14 days before developing symptoms, nor did he have contact with people from "areas of attention."
translation.ga: Níor thaistil an t-othar lasmuigh den chathair sna 14 lá sular fhorbair sé comharthaí, ná ní raibh teagmháil aige le daoine ó "réimsí aird."

translation.en: In october, the who stated, at a special meeting of who leaders, that one in ten people around the world may have been infected with covid-19.
translation.ga: I mí dheireadh fómhair, luaigh an who, ag cruinniú speisialta de cheannairí who, go bhféadfadh duine as gach deichniúr ar fud an domhain a bheith ionfhabhtaithe le covid-19.

translation.en: At the time, that translated to 780 million people being infected, while only 35 million infections had been confirmed.
translation.ga: Ag an am, d ’ aistrigh sé sin go 780 milliún duine a bhí ionfhabhtaithe, agus níor dearbhaíodh ach 35 milliún ionfhabhtú.

translation.en: In early november, denmark reported on an outbreak of a unique mutated variant being transmitted to humans from minks in its north jutland region.
translation.ga: Go luath i mí na samhna, thug an danmhairg tuairisc ar ráig d ’ athróg uathúil mutated a tharchuirtear chuig daoine ó mhioncanna ina réigiún jutland thuaidh.

translation.en: All twelve human cases of the mutated variant were identified in september 2020.
translation.ga: Aithníodh an dá chás déag ar fad den athraitheach mutated i meán fómhair 2020.

translation.en: The who released a report saying the variant "had a combination of mutations or changes that have not been previously observed." In response, prime minister mette frederiksen ordered for the country – the world's largest producer of mink fur – to cull its mink population by as many as 17 million.
translation.ga: Scaoil an who tuarascáil ag rá go raibh “sóchán nó athruithe nár tugadh faoi deara roimhe seo ag an athraitheach." Mar fhreagra, d ’ ordaigh an príomh-aire mette frederiksen don tír - an táirgeoir fionnaidh mionc is mó ar domhan - a daonra mionc a mhaolú chomh hard le 17 milliún.

translation.en: On 9 november, pfizer released their trial results for a candidate vaccine, showing that it is 90% effective against the virus.
translation.ga: An 9 samhain, scaoil pfizer a dtorthaí trialach le haghaidh vacsaín iarrthóra, ag taispeáint go bhfuil sé 90% éifeachtach i gcoinne an víris.

translation.en: Later that day, novavax entered an fda fast track application for their vaccine.
translation.ga: Níos déanaí an lá sin, rinne novavax iarratas mear-rian fda ar a vacsaín.

translation.en: Virologist and u.s. national institute of allergy and infectious diseases director anthony fauci indicated that the pfizer vaccine targets the spike protein used to infect cells by the virus.
translation.ga: Thug víreolaí agus stiúrthóir institiúid náisiúnta ailléirge agus galair thógálacha na stát aontaithe anthony fauci le fios go ndíríonn an vacsaín pfizer ar an próitéin spíce a úsáideann an víreas chun cealla a ionfhabhtú.

translation.en: Some issues left to be answered are how long the vaccine offers protection, and if it offers the same level of protection to all ages.
translation.ga: Roinnt saincheisteanna nach mór a fhreagairt ná cá fhad a thairgeann an vacsaín cosaint, agus má thairgeann sí an leibhéal céanna cosanta do gach aois.

translation.en: Initial doses will likely go to healthcare workers on the front lines.
translation.ga: Is dócha go rachaidh dáileoga tosaigh chuig oibrithe cúram sláinte ar na línte tosaigh.

translation.en: On 9 november 2020, the united states surpassed 10 million confirmed cases of covid-19, making it the country with the most cases worldwide by a large margin.
translation.ga: An 9 samhain 2020, sháraigh na stáit aontaithe 10 milliún cás dearbhaithe de covid-19, rud a fhágann gurb í an tír í leis an líon is mó cásanna ar fud an domhain le corrlach mór.

translation.en: It was reported on 27 november, that a publication released by the centers for disease control and prevention indicated that the current numbers of viral infection are via confirmed laboratory test only.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an 27 samhain, gur léirigh foilseachán a d ’ eisigh na hionaid um rialú agus cosc ar ghalair gur trí thástáil saotharlainne deimhnithe amháin a dhéantar líon reatha an ionfhabhtaithe víreasaigh.

translation.en: However, the true number could be about eight times the reported number; the report further indicated that the true number of virus infected cases could be around 100 million in the u.s.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, d ’ fhéadfadh an fhíoruimhir a bheith thart ar ocht n-uaire an líon tuairiscithe; léirigh an tuarascáil freisin go bhféadfadh fíorlíon na gcásanna atá ionfhabhtaithe le víreas a bheith thart ar 100 milliún sna sa

translation.en: On 14 december, public health england reported a new variant had been discovered in the south east of england, predominantly in kent.
translation.ga: An 14 nollaig, thuairiscigh sláinte poiblí shasana go bhfuarthas leagan nua in oirdheisceart shasana, i kent den chuid is mó.

translation.en: The variant, named variant of concern 202012 / 01, showed changes to the spike protein which could make the virus more infectious.
translation.ga: Léirigh an t-athróg, darb ainm variant of concern 202012 / 01, athruithe ar an próitéin spíce a d ’ fhéadfadh an víreas a dhéanamh níos tógálach.

translation.en: As of 13 december, there were 1,108 cases identified.
translation.ga: Amhail an 13 nollaig, aithníodh 1,108 cás.

translation.en: Many countries halted all flights from the uk; france-bound eurotunnel service was suspended and ferries carrying passengers and accompanied freight were cancelled as the french border closed to people on 20 december.
translation.ga: Chuir go leor tíortha stop le gach eitilt ón ra; cuireadh seirbhís eurotunnel faoi ​ ​ cheangal na fraince ar fionraí agus cuireadh báid farantóireachta a bhí ag iompar paisinéirí agus lasta tionlacain ar ceal de réir mar a dhún teorainn na fraince do dhaoine an 20 nollaig.

translation.en: On 2 january, voc-202012 / 01, a variant of sars-cov-2 first discovered in the uk, had been identified in 33 countries around the world, including pakistan, south korea, switzerland, taiwan, norway, italy, japan, lebanon, india, canada, denmark, france, germany, iceland, and china.
translation.ga: An 2 eanáir, sainaithníodh voc-202012 / 01, malairt de sars-cov-2 a aimsíodh den chéad uair sa ra, i 33 tír ar fud an domhain, lena n-áirítear an phacastáin, an chóiré theas, an eilvéis, taiwan, an iorua, an iodáil, an tseapáin, an liobáin, an india, ceanada, an danmhairg, an fhrainc, an ghearmáin, an íoslainn, agus an tsín.

translation.en: On 6 january, the p.1 variant was first identified in japanese travellers who had just returned from brazil.
translation.ga: An 6 eanáir, aithníodh an leagan p.1 den chéad uair i dtaistealaithe na seapáine a bhí díreach tar éis filleadh ón mbrasaíl.

translation.en: On 12 january, it was reported that a team of scientists from the world health organization would arrive in wuhan on the 14th of the month; this is to ascertain the origin of sars-cov-2 and determine what were the intermediate hosts between the original reservoir and humans.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an 12 eanáir go dtiocfadh foireann eolaithe ón eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte go wuhan ar an 14ú den mhí; déantar é seo chun bunús sars-cov-2 a fháil amach agus chun a fháil amach cad iad na hóstach idirmheánach idir an taiscumar bunaidh agus daoine.

translation.en: On the following day, two of the who members were barred from entering china because, according to the country, antibodies for the virus were detected in both.
translation.ga: An lá dar gcionn, cuireadh cosc ​ ​ ar bheirt de bhaill an who dul isteach sa tsín mar, de réir na tíre, braitheadh ​ ​ antasubstaintí don víreas sa dá cheann.

translation.en: On 29 january, it was reported that the novavax vaccine was only 49% effective against the 501.v2 variant in a clinical trial in south africa.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an 29 eanáir, nach raibh an vacsaín novavax ach 49% éifeachtach i gcoinne an athraitheora 501.v2 i dtriail chliniciúil san afraic theas.

translation.en: The china covid-19 vaccine coronavac indicated 50.4% effectivity in a brazil clinical trial.
translation.ga: Léirigh coronavac vacsaín covid-19 na síne éifeachtúlacht 50.4% i dtriail chliniciúil sa bhrasaíl.

translation.en: On 12 march, it was reported that several countries including thailand, denmark, bulgaria, norway, and iceland had stopped using the oxford-astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine due to what was being called severe blood clotting problems, a cerebral venous sinus thrombosis (cvst).
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh ar 12 márta gur stop roinnt tíortha lena n-áirítear an téalainn, an danmhairg, an bhulgáir, an iorua, agus an íoslainn an vacsaín oxford-astrazeneca covid-19 a úsáid mar gheall ar fhadhbanna téachtadh fola troma, thrombóis sinus venous cheirbreach (cvst).

translation.en: Additionally, austria halted the use of one batch of the aforementioned vaccine as well.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, chuir an ostair stop le húsáid bhaisc amháin den vacsaín thuasluaite freisin.

translation.en: On 20 march, the who and european medicines agency found no link between thrombus (a blood clot of clinical importance), leading several european countries to resume administering the astrazeneca vaccine.
translation.ga: An 20 márta, níor aimsigh an who agus an ghníomhaireacht leigheasra eorpach aon nasc idir thrombus (téachtán fola a bhfuil tábhacht chliniciúil leis), rud a thug ar roinnt tíortha eorpacha atosú ag riaradh an vacsaín astrazeneca.

translation.en: On 29 march, it was reported that the u.s. government was planning to introduce covid-19 vaccination 'passports' to allow those who have been vaccinated the ability to board aeroplanes, cruise ships as well as other activities.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh go raibh rialtas na sa ag pleanáil 'pasanna' vacsaínithe covid-19 a thabhairt isteach chun an 29 márta a thabhairt isteach chun ligean dóibh siúd a bhí vacsaínithe dul ar bord eitleáin, longa cúrsála chomh maith le gníomhaíochtaí eile.

translation.en: As of 24 june 2021, more than 179 million cases have been reported worldwide due to covid-19; more than 3.89 million have died.
translation.ga: Amhail an 24 meitheamh 2021, tuairiscíodh níos mó ná 179 milliún cás ar fud an domhain mar gheall ar covid-19; tá níos mó ná 3.89 milliún tar éis bás a fháil.

translation.en: Due to the pandemic in europe, many countries in the schengen area have restricted free movement and set up border controls.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar an bpaindéim san eoraip, tá saorghluaiseacht srianta ag go leor tíortha i limistéar schengen agus tá rialuithe teorann curtha ar bun acu.

translation.en: National reactions have included containment measures such as quarantines and curfews (known as stay-at-home orders, shelter-in-place orders, or lockdowns).
translation.ga: Áiríodh ar fhrithghníomhartha náisiúnta bearta coimeádta mar choraintíní agus cuirfiú (ar a dtugtar orduithe fanacht sa bhaile, orduithe foscadh in áit, nó glasanna glasála).

translation.en: The who's recommendation on curfews and lockdowns is that they should be short-term measures to reorganise, regroup, rebalance resources, and protect health workers who are exhausted.
translation.ga: Is é moladh an who maidir le cuirfiú agus glasáil gur chóir gur bearta gearrthéarmacha iad chun acmhainní a atheagrú, a athghrúpáil, a athchothromú, agus chun oibrithe sláinte atá ídithe a chosaint.

translation.en: To achieve a balance between restrictions and normal life, the long-term responses to the pandemic should consist of strict personal hygiene, effective contact tracing, and isolating when ill.
translation.ga: Chun cothromaíocht a bhaint amach idir srianta agus gnáthshaol, ba cheart go mbeadh sláinteachas pearsanta docht, rianú teagmhála éifeachtach, agus aonrú nuair a bhíonn siad tinn sna freagraí fadtéarmacha ar an bpaindéim.

translation.en: By 26 march 2020, 1.7 billion people worldwide were under some form of lockdown, which increased to 3.9 billion people by the first week of april — more than half the world's population.
translation.ga: Faoi 26 márta 2020, bhí 1.7 billiún duine ar fud an domhain faoi chineál éigin frithdhúnadh, a mhéadaigh go 3.9 billiún duine faoin gcéad seachtain d' aibreán - níos mó ná leath de dhaonra an domhain.

translation.en: By late april 2020, around 300 million people were under lockdown in nations of europe, including but not limited to italy, spain, france, and the united kingdom, while around 200 million people were under lockdown in latin america.
translation.ga: Faoi dheireadh mhí aibreáin 2020, bhí thart ar 300 milliún duine faoi ghlas i náisiúin na heorpa, lena n-áirítear an iodáil, an spáinn, an fhrainc agus an ríocht aontaithe, ach gan a bheith teoranta dóibh, agus bhí timpeall 200 milliún duine faoi ghlas i meiriceá laidineach.

translation.en: Nearly 300 million people, or about 90 per cent of the population, were under some form of lockdown in the united states, around 100 million people in the philippines, about 59 million people in south africa, and 1.3 billion people have been under lockdown in india.
translation.ga: Bhí beagnach 300 milliún duine, nó thart ar 90 faoin gcéad den daonra, faoi ghlasáil de chineál éigin sna stáit aontaithe, timpeall 100 milliún duine sna hoileáin fhilipíneacha, thart ar 59 milliún duine san afraic theas, tá agus 1.3 billiún duine faoi ghlas san india.

translation.en: As of 30 april 2020, cases have been reported in all asian countries except for turkmenistan and north korea, although these countries likely also have cases.
translation.ga: Amhail an 30 aibreán 2020, tuairiscíodh cás i ngach tír san áise seachas an tuircméanastáin agus an chóiré thuaidh, cé gur dócha go mbeidh cásanna ag na tíortha seo freisin.

translation.en: Despite being the first area of the world hit by the outbreak, the early wide-scale response of some asian states, particularly bhutan, singapore, taiwan and vietnam has allowed them to fare comparatively well.
translation.ga: D' ainneoin gurb é an chéad limistéar ar domhan a bhuail an ráig é, ba é freagairt luath-scála roinnt stát san áise, go háirithe an bhútáin, singeapór, taiwan agus vítneam. lig dóibh táille réasúnta maith a íoc.

translation.en: China is criticised for initially minimising the severity of the outbreak, but the delayed wide-scale response has largely contained the disease since march 2020.
translation.ga: Cáineadh an tsín as déine na ráige a íoslaghdú i dtosach, ach tá an galar den chuid is mó sa fhreagra ar mhoill ar scála mór ó mhárta 2020.

translation.en: In japan, the pandemic has been believed to have caused direct side effects in regards to mental health.
translation.ga: Sa tseapáin, creidtear gur chruthaigh an paindéim fo-iarsmaí díreacha maidir le sláinte mheabhrach.

translation.en: According to the report by the country's national police agency, suicides had increased to 2,153 in october.
translation.ga: De réir na tuarascála ó ghníomhaireacht náisiúnta póilíní na tíre, bhí féinmharú méadaithe go 2,153 i mí dheireadh fómhair.

translation.en: Experts also state that the pandemic has worsened mental health issues due to lockdowns and isolation from family members, among other issues.
translation.ga: Deir saineolaithe freisin go bhfuil an paindéim tar éis saincheisteanna sláinte meabhrach a dhéanamh níos measa mar gheall ar ghlasáil agus aonrú ó bhaill teaghlaigh, i measc saincheisteanna eile.

translation.en: As of 14 july 2020, there are 83,545 cases confirmed in china — excluding 114 asymptomatic cases, 62 of which were imported, under medical observation; asymptomatic cases have not been reported prior to 31 march 2020 — with 4,634 deaths and 78,509 recoveries, meaning there are only 402 cases.
translation.ga: Amhail an 14 iúil 2020, dearbhaíodh 83,545 cás sa tsín - gan 114 cás neamhshiomptómach a áireamh, ar allmhairíodh 62 acu, faoi bhreathnóireacht leighis; níor tuairiscíodh cásanna neamhshiomptómacha roimh 31 márta 2020 - le 4,634 bás agus 78,509 aisghabháil, rud a chiallaíonn nach bhfuil ach 402 cás ann.

translation.en: Hubei has the most cases, followed by xinjiang.
translation.ga: Tá an líon is mó cásanna ag hubei, agus xinjiang ina dhiaidh sin.

translation.en: By march 2020, covid-19 infections have largely been put under control in china, with minor outbreaks since.
translation.ga: Faoi mhárta 2020, bhí ionfhabhtuithe covid-19 curtha faoi smacht den chuid is mó sa tsín, le ráigeanna beaga ó shin.

translation.en: It was reported on 25 november, that some 1 million people in the country of china have been vaccinated according to china's state council; the vaccines against covid-19 come from sinopharm which makes two and one produced by sinovac.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an 25 samhain, go ndearnadh vacsaíniú ar thart ar 1 mhilliún duine i dtír na síne de réir chomhairle stáit na síne; tagann na vacsaíní in aghaidh covid-19 ó sinopharm a dhéanann dhá cheann agus ceann a tháirgeann sinovac.

translation.en: The first case of covid-19 in india was reported on 30 january 2020.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an chéad chás de covid-19 san india an 30 eanáir 2020.

translation.en: India ordered a nationwide lockdown for the entire population starting 24 march 2020, with a phased unlock beginning 1 june 2020.
translation.ga: D' ordaigh an india frithdhúnadh ar fud na tíre don daonra iomlán ag tosú 24 márta 2020, agus díghlasáil chéimnithe ag tosú 1 meitheamh 2020.

translation.en: Six cities account for around half of all reported cases in the country — mumbai, delhi, ahmedabad, chennai, pune and kolkata.
translation.ga: Tá sé chathair i gceist le timpeall leath de na cathracha go léir cásanna tuairiscithe sa tír — mumbai, delhi, ahmedabad, chennai, pune agus kolkata.

translation.en: On 10 june 2020, india's recoveries exceeded active cases for the first time.
translation.ga: An 10 meitheamh 2020, sháraigh gnóthachain na hindia cásanna gníomhacha den chéad uair.

translation.en: On 30 august 2020, india surpassed the us record for the most cases in a single day, with more than 78,000 cases, and set a new record on 16 september 2020, with almost 98,000 cases reported that day.
translation.ga: An 30 lúnasa 2020, sháraigh an india taifead na sa don chuid is mó de na cásanna in aon lá amháin, le níos mó ná 78,000 cás, agus shocraigh sí taifead nua an 16 meán fómhair 2020, agus tuairiscíodh beagnach 98,000 cás an lá sin.

translation.en: As of 30 august 2020, india's case fatality rate is relatively low at 2.3%, against the global 4.7%.
translation.ga: Amhail an 30 lúnasa 2020, bhí ráta básmhaireachta cáis na hindia réasúnta íseal ag 2.3%, i gcomparáid leis an 4.7% domhanda.

translation.en: As of september 2020, india had the largest number of confirmed cases in asia; and the second-highest number of confirmed cases in the world, behind the united states, with the number of total confirmed cases breaching the 100,000 mark on 19 may 2020, 1,000,000 on 16 july 2020, and 5,000,000 confirmed cases on 16 september 2020.
translation.ga: Amhail meán fómhair 2020, bhí an líon is mó cásanna dearbhaithe san áise san india; agus an dara líon is airde cásanna dearbhaithe ar domhan, taobh thiar de na stáit aontaithe, agus líon na gcásanna dearbhaithe iomlána ag sárú an mharc 100,000 an 19 bealtaine 2020, 1,000,000 an 16 iúil, 2020, agus 5,000,000 cás dearbhaithe an 16 meán fómhair 2020.

translation.en: On 19 december 2020, india crossed the total number of 10,000,000 confirmed cases but with a slow pace.
translation.ga: An 19 nollaig 2020, thrasnaigh an india an líon iomlán 10,000,000 cás dearbhaithe ach le luas mall.

translation.en: The indian ministry of science initiated a mathematical simulation of the pandemic, the so-called "indian supermodel", which correctly predicted the decrease of active cases starting in september 2020.
translation.ga: Chuir aireacht eolaíochta na hindia tús le insamhalta matamaiticiúil den phaindéim, an “supermodel indiach ” mar a thugtar air, a thuar i gceart an laghdú ar chásanna gníomhacha ag tosú i meán fómhair 2020.

translation.en: A second wave hit india in april 2021, placing healthcare services under severe strain.
translation.ga: Bhuail an dara tonn an india in aibreán 2021, ag cur seirbhísí cúram sláinte faoi bhrú mór.

translation.en: By late april, the government was reporting over 300,000 new infections and 2,000 deaths per day, with concerns of undercounting.
translation.ga: Faoi dheireadh mhí aibreáin, bhí an rialtas ag tuairisciú go raibh níos mó ná 300,000 ionfhabhtú nua agus 2,000 bás in aghaidh an lae, agus imní ann faoi ró-chuntas.

translation.en: Iran reported its first confirmed cases of sars-cov-2 infections on 19 february 2020 in qom, where, according to the ministry of health and medical education, two people had died that day.
translation.ga: Thuairiscigh an iaráin a céad chásanna deimhnithe d ’ ionfhabhtuithe sars-cov-2 an 19 feabhra 2020 i qom, áit a bhfuair beirt daoine bás an lá sin, de réir na haireachta sláinte agus oideachais leighis.

translation.en: Early measures announced by the government included the cancellation of concerts and other cultural events, sporting events, friday prayers, and closures of universities, higher education institutions, and schools.
translation.ga: I measc na mbeart luath a d ’ fhógair an rialtas bhí ceolchoirmeacha agus imeachtaí cultúrtha eile a chealú, imeachtaí spóirt, paidreacha dé haoine, agus dúnadh ollscoileanna, institiúidí ardoideachais, agus scoileanna.

translation.en: Iran allocated 5 trillion rials (equivalent to us $120,000,000) to combat the virus.
translation.ga: Leithdháil an iaráin 5 trilliún rial (arb ionann é agus us $120,000,000) chun an víreas a chomhrac.

translation.en: President hassan rouhani said on 26 february 2020 there were no plans to quarantine areas affected by the outbreak, and only individuals would be quarantined.
translation.ga: Uachtarán hassan rouhania dúradh an 26 feabhra 2020 nach raibh aon phleananna ann chun ceantair choraintín a ndeachaigh an ráig i bhfeidhm orthu, agus nach mbeadh ach daoine aonair coraintín.

translation.en: Plans to limit travel between cities were announced in march 2020, although heavy traffic between cities ahead of the persian new year nowruz continued.
translation.ga: Fógraíodh pleananna chun taisteal idir cathracha a theorannú i márta 2020, cé gur lean trácht trom idir cathracha roimh bhliain nua na peirse nowruz.

translation.en: Shia shrines in qom remained open to pilgrims until 16 march.
translation.ga: D' fhan scrínte shia i qom ar oscailt d' oilithrigh go dtí an 16 márta.

translation.en: Iran became a centre of the spread of the virus after china in february 2020.
translation.ga: Tháinig an iaráin chun bheith ina lárionad scaipeadh an víris tar éis na síne i mí feabhra 2020.

translation.en: More than ten countries had traced their cases back to iran by 28 february, indicating the outbreak may have been more severe than the 388 cases reported by the iranian government by that date.
translation.ga: Bhí níos mó ná deich dtír tar éis a gcásanna a rianú ar ais go dtí an iaráin faoin 28 feabhra, rud a thugann le fios go bhféadfadh an ráig a bheith níos déine ná na 388 cás a tuairiscíodh.

translation.en: The iranian parliament was shut down, with 23 of its 290 members reported to have had tested positive for the virus on 3 march 2020.
translation.ga: Ag rialtas na hiaráine faoin dáta sin.

translation.en: On 15 march 2020, the iranian government reported a hundred deaths in a single day, the most recorded in the country since the outbreak began.
translation.ga: An parlaimint natural tugadh t síos, le 23 de na 290 ball iomlán a bheith go raibh toradh dearfach don víreas an 3 márta 2020, ar an 15 márta 2020, thuairiscigh an rialtas natural céad básanna i lá amháin, an líon is mó a taifeadadh sa tír ó thosaigh an ráig.

translation.en: At least twelve sitting or former iranian politicians and government officials had died from the disease by 17 march 2020.
translation.ga: Bhí dhá dhuine dhéag ar a laghad ina suí nó iar-pholaiteoirí na hiaráine agus oifigigh rialtais tar éis bás a fháil ón ngalar faoin 17 márta 2020.

translation.en: By 23 march 2020, iran was experiencing fifty new cases every hour and one new death every ten minutes due to covid-19.
translation.ga: Faoi 23 márta 2020, bhí caoga cás nua ag an iaráin gach uair an chloig agus bás nua amháin gach deich nóiméad mar gheall ar covid-19.

translation.en: According to a who official, there may be five times more cases in iran than what is being reported.
translation.ga: Dar le hoifigeach de chuid an who, d ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh cúig oiread níos mó cásanna san iaráin ná mar atá á thuairisciú.

translation.en: It is also suggested that u.s. sanctions on iran may be affecting the country's financial ability to respond to the viral outbreak.
translation.ga: Tugtar le tuiscint freisin go bhféadfadh smachtbhannaí na sa ar an iaráin a bheith ag dul i bhfeidhm ar chumas airgeadais na tíre freagairt don ráig víreasach.

translation.en: On 20 april 2020, iran reopened shopping malls and other shopping areas across the country.
translation.ga: An 20 aibreán 2020, d ’ oscail an iaráin malls siopadóireachta agus ceantair siopadóireachta eile ar fud na tíre.

translation.en: After reaching a low in new cases in early may, a new peak was reported on 4 june 2020, raising fear of a second wave.
translation.ga: Tar éis dó leibhéal íseal a bhaint amach go luath i mí na bealtaine, tuairiscíodh buaic nua an 4 meitheamh 2020, ag ardú eagla roimh an dara tonn.

translation.en: On 18 july 2020, president rouhani estimated that 25 million iranians had already become infected, which is considerably higher than the official count.
translation.ga: An 18 iúil 2020, mheas an tuachtarán rouhani go raibh 25 milliún iaránach ionfhabhtaithe cheana féin, rud atá i bhfad níos airde ná an comhaireamh oifigiúil.

translation.en: Leaked data suggest that 42,000 people had died with covid-19 symptoms by 20 july 2020, nearly tripling the 14,405 officially reported by that date.
translation.ga: Tugann sonraí sceite le fios go raibh 42,000 duine tar éis bás a fháil le hairíonna covid-19 faoin 20 iúil 2020, beagnach faoi thrí an 14,405 a tuairiscíodh go hoifigiúil faoin dáta sin.

translation.en: Covid-19 was confirmed to have spread to south korea on 20 january 2020 from china.
translation.ga: Deimhníodh gur scaipeadh covid-19 go dtí an chóiré theas an 20 eanáir 2020 ón tsín.

translation.en: The nation's health agency reported a significant increase in confirmed cases on 20 february, largely attributed to a gathering in daegu of the shincheonji church of jesus.
translation.ga: Thuairiscigh gníomhaireacht sláinte an náisiúin méadú suntasach i gcásanna deimhnithe an 20 feabhra, a cuireadh i leith den chuid is mó mar gheall ar bhailiúchán in daegu d ’ eaglais íosa shincheonji.

translation.en: Shincheonji devotees visiting daegu from wuhan were suspected to be the origin of the outbreak.
translation.ga: Bhí amhras ann gur de bhunadh na ráige iad tiomnaithe shincheonji a thug cuairt ar daegu ó wuhan.

translation.en: By 22 february, among 9,336 followers of the church, 1,261 or about 13 per cent reported symptoms.
translation.ga: Faoi 22 feabhra, i measc 9,336 leantóir na heaglaise, thuairiscigh 1,261 nó thart ar 13 faoin gcéad comharthaí.

translation.en: South korea declared the highest level of alert on 23 february 2020.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an chóiré theas an leibhéal airdeall is airde an 23 feabhra 2020.

translation.en: On 29 february, more than 3,150 confirmed cases were reported.
translation.ga: An 29 feabhra, tuairiscíodh níos mó ná 3,150 cás dearbhaithe.

translation.en: All south korean military bases were quarantined after tests showed three soldiers had the virus.
translation.ga: Rinneadh coraintín ar bhunáiteanna míleata uile na cóiré theas tar éis do thástálacha a thaispeáint go raibh an víreas ag triúr saighdiúirí.

translation.en: Airline schedules were also changed.
translation.ga: Athraíodh sceidil aerlíne freisin.

translation.en: South korea introduced what was considered the largest and best-organised programme in the world to screen the population for the virus, isolate any infected people, and trace and quarantine those who contacted them.
translation.ga: Thug an chóiré theas isteach an clár a measadh a bheith ar an gclár is mó agus is eagraithe ar domhan chun an daonra a scagadh don víreas, aon daoine ionfhabhtaithe a leithlisiú, agus iad siúd a rinne teagmháil leo a rianú agus a choraintín.

translation.en: Screening methods included mandatory self-reporting of symptoms by new international arrivals through mobile application, drive-through testing for the virus with the results available the next day, and increasing testing capability to allow up to 20,000 people to be tested every day.
translation.ga: I measc na modhanna scagtha bhí féintuairisciú éigeantach ar airíonna ag daoine nua idirnáisiúnta trí chur i bhfeidhm soghluaiste, tástáil tiomána tríd an víreas leis na torthaí ar fáil an lá dar gcionn, agus an cumas tástála a mhéadú chun ligean suas le 20,000 duine le tástáil gach lá.

translation.en: Despite some early criticisms of president moon jae-in's response to the crisis, south korea's programme is considered a success in controlling the outbreak without quarantining entire cities.
translation.ga: In ainneoin roinnt cáineadh luath ar fhreagra an uachtaráin moon jae-in ar an ngéarchéim, meastar gur éirigh le clár na cóiré theas an ráig a rialú gan coraintíní a dhéanamh ar chathracha iomlána.

translation.en: On 23 march, it was reported that south korea had the lowest one-day case total in four weeks.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an 23 márta, go raibh an cás aon lae is ísle ag an gcóiré theas i gceann ceithre seachtaine.

translation.en: On 29 march, it was reported that beginning 1 april all new overseas arrivals will be quarantined for two weeks.
translation.ga: An 29 márta, tuairiscíodh go gcuirfear coraintín ar feadh coicíse ar feadh 1 aibreán ag tosú an 1 aibreán.

translation.en: Per media reports on 1 april, south korea has received requests for virus testing assistance from 121 different countries.
translation.ga: De réir tuairiscí sna meáin an 1 aibreán, fuair an chóiré theas iarratais ar chúnamh tástála víris ó 121 tír éagsúil.

translation.en: Persistent local groups of infections in the greater seoul area continued to be found, which led to korea's cdc director saying in june that the country had entered the second wave of infections, although a who official disagreed with that assessment.
translation.ga: Leanadh le grúpaí áitiúla leanúnacha d ’ ionfhabhtuithe i mórcheantar seoul a fháil, rud a d ’ fhág go ndúirt stiúrthóir cdc na cóiré i mí an mheithimh go ndeachaigh an tír isteach sa dara tonn d ’ ionfhabhtuithe, cé gur easaontaigh oifigeach who leis an measúnú sin.

translation.en: By 13 march 2020, when the number of reported new cases of covid-19 became greater than those in china, the world health organization (who) began to consider europe the active centre of the covid-19 pandemic.
translation.ga: Faoi 13 márta 2020, nuair a tháinig líon na gcásanna nua tuairiscithe de covid-19 níos mó ná iad siúd sa tsín, thosaigh an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte (who) ag smaoineamh ar an eoraip mar lárionad gníomhach na paindéime covid-19.

translation.en: By 22 may 2020, the who said that south america was now experiencing a worse outbreak.
translation.ga: Faoin 22 bealtaine 2020, dúirt an who go raibh ráig níos measa anois i meiriceá theas.

translation.en: By 17 march 2020, all countries within europe had a confirmed case of covid-19, with montenegro being the last european country to report at least one case.
translation.ga: Faoi 17 márta 2020, bhí cás dearbhaithe de covid-19 ag gach tír san eoraip, agus montainéagró ar an tír eorpach deireanach a thuairiscigh cás amháin ar a laghad.

translation.en: At least one death has been reported in all european countries, apart from the vatican city.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh bás amháin ar a laghad i ngach tír eorpach, seachas cathair na vatacáine.

translation.en: By 18 march 2020, more than 250 million people were in lockdown in europe.
translation.ga: Faoi 18 márta 2020, bhí níos mó ná 250 milliún duine faoi ghlas san eoraip.

translation.en: On 24 may 2020, 68 days since its first recorded case, montenegro became the first covid-free country in europe, but this situation lasted only 44 days before a newly imported case was identified there.
translation.ga: An 24 bealtaine 2020, 68 lá ón gcéad chás a taifeadadh, ba í montainéagró an chéad tír saor ó covid san eoraip, ach níor mhair an cás seo ach 44 lá sular aithníodh cás nua-allmhairithe ansin.

translation.en: European countries with the highest number of confirmed covid-19 cases are russia, the united kingdom, france, spain, and italy.
translation.ga: Is iad na tíortha eorpacha leis an líon is mó cásanna dearbhaithe covid-19 ná an rúis, an ríocht aontaithe, an fhrainc, an spáinn agus an iodáil.

translation.en: On 21 august, it was reported the covid-19 cases were climbing among younger individuals across europe.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an 21 lúnasa, go raibh cásanna covid-19 ag dreapadh i measc daoine óga ar fud na heorpa.

translation.en: On 21 november, it was reported by the voice of america that europe is the worst hit area by the covid-19 virus, with numbers exceeding 15 million cases.
translation.ga: An 21 samhain, thuairiscigh guth mheiriceá gurb í an eoraip an limistéar is measa a bhuail an víreas covid-19, le líon níos mó ná 15 milliún cás.

translation.en: Although it was originally thought the pandemic reached france on 24 january 2020, when the first covid-19 case in europe was confirmed in bordeaux, it was later discovered that a person near paris had tested positive for the virus on 27 december 2019 after retesting old samples.
translation.ga: Cé gur ceapadh ar dtús gur shroich an paindéim an fhrainc an 24 eanáir 2020, nuair a deimhníodh an chéad chás covid-19 san eoraip i bordeaux, fuarthas amach ina dhiaidh sin go ndearna duine in aice le páras tástáil dhearfach don víreas an 27 nollaig 2019 tar éis dó sean-athscrúdú a dhéanamh samplaí.

translation.en: A key event in the spread of the disease in the country was the annual assembly of the christian open door church between 17 and 24 february in mulhouse, which was attended by about 2,500 people, at least half of whom are believed to have contracted the virus.
translation.ga: Príomhócáid ​ ​ i leathadh an ghalair sa tír ba ea tionól bliantúil na heaglaise doras oscailte críostaí idir 17 agus 24 feabhra i mulhouse, ar fhreastail thart ar 2,500 duine air, a bhfuil a leath acu ar a laghad a chreidtear a rinne an víreas a chonradh.

translation.en: On 13 march, prime minister édouard philippe ordered the closure of all non-essential public places, and on 16 march, french president emmanuel macron announced mandatory home confinement, a policy which was extended at least until 11 may.
translation.ga: An 13 márta, d ’ ordaigh an príomh-aire édouard philippe go ndúnfaí gach áit phoiblí neamhriachtanach, agus an 16 márta, d ’ fhógair uachtarán na fraince emmanuel macron luí seoil éigeantach tí, beartas a leathnaíodh go dtí an 11 bealtaine ar a laghad.

translation.en: As of 14 september, france has reported more than 402,000 confirmed cases, 30,000 deaths, and 90,000 recoveries, ranking fourth in number of confirmed cases.
translation.ga: Amhail an 14 meán fómhair, thuairiscigh an fhrainc níos mó ná 402,000 cás dearbhaithe, 30,000 bás, agus 90,000 gnóthú, sa cheathrú háit i líon na gcásanna dearbhaithe.

translation.en: In april, there were riots in some paris suburbs.
translation.ga: I mí aibreáin, bhí círéibeacha i roinnt bruachbhailte i bpáras.

translation.en: On 18 may, it was reported that schools in france had to close again after reopening, due to covid-19 case flare-ups.
translation.ga: An 18 bealtaine, tuairiscíodh go raibh ar scoileanna sa fhrainc dúnadh arís tar éis dóibh athoscailt, mar gheall ar lasracha cás covid-19.

translation.en: On 12 november, it was reported that france had become the worst-hit country by the covid-19 pandemic, in all of europe, in the process surpassing russia.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an 12 samhain, go raibh an fhrainc ar an tír is measa a bhuail paindéim covid-19, san eoraip go léir, sa phróiseas a sháraigh an rúis.

translation.en: The new total of confirmed cases was more than 1.8 million and counting; additionally it was indicated by the french government that the current national lockdown would remain in place.
translation.ga: Bhí iomlán na gcásanna dearbhaithe níos mó ná 1.8 milliún agus ag comhaireamh; ina theannta sin thug rialtas na fraince le fios go bhfanfadh an frithdhúnadh náisiúnta reatha i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: The outbreak was confirmed to have spread to italy on 31 january 2020, when two chinese tourists tested positive for sars-cov-2 in rome.
translation.ga: Deimhníodh gur scaipeadh an ráig chun na hiodáile an 31 eanáir 2020, nuair a rinne beirt thurasóirí ón tsín tástáil dhearfach ar sars-cov-2 sa róimh.

translation.en: Cases began to rise sharply, which prompted the italian government to suspend all flights to and from china and declare a state of emergency.
translation.ga: Thosaigh cásanna ag ardú go géar, rud a spreag rialtas na hiodáile gach eitilt chuig an tsín agus uaidh a chur ar fionraí agus staid éigeandála a dhearbhú.

translation.en: An unassociated cluster of covid-19 cases was later detected, starting with 16 confirmed cases in lombardy on 21 february 2020.
translation.ga: Braitheadh ​ ​ braisle neamhchaidrimh de chásanna covid-19 ina dhiaidh sin, ag tosú le 16 chás dearbhaithe sa lombaird ar 21 feabhra 2020.

translation.en: On 22 february 2020, the council of ministers announced a new decree-law to contain the outbreak, including quarantining more than 50,000 people from eleven different municipalities in northern italy.
translation.ga: Ar 22 feabhra 2020, d ’ fhógair comhairle na nairí dlí foraithne nua chun an ráig a chuimsiú, lena n-áirítear coraintín a dhéanamh ar níos mó ná 50,000 duine as aon bhardas dhéag dhifriúla i dtuaisceart na hiodáile.

translation.en: Prime minister giuseppe conte said, "in the outbreak areas, entry and exit will not be provided.
translation.ga: Dúirt an príomh-aire giuseppe conte, "sna ceantair ráige, ní chuirfear iontráil agus imeacht ar fáil.

translation.en: Suspension of work activities and sports events has already been ordered in those areas. "
translation.ga: Ordaíodh gníomhaíochtaí oibre agus imeachtaí spóirt a chur ar fionraí cheana féin sna réimsí sin. "

translation.en: On 4 march 2020, the italian government ordered the full closure of all schools and universities nationwide as italy reached a hundred deaths.
translation.ga: An 4 márta 2020, d ’ ordaigh rialtas na hiodáile go ndúnfaí gach scoil agus ollscoil ar fud na tíre de réir mar a fuair an iodáil céad bás.

translation.en: All major sporting events were to be held behind closed doors until april, but on 9 march, all sport was suspended completely for at least one month.
translation.ga: Bhí na mórimeachtaí spóirt go léir le reáchtáil taobh thiar de dhoirse dúnta go dtí aibreán, ach an 9 márta, cuireadh an spórt ar fad ar fionraí go hiomlán ar feadh míosa ar a laghad.

translation.en: On 11 march 2020, prime minister conte ordered stoppage of nearly all commercial activity except supermarkets and pharmacies.
translation.ga: An 11 márta 2020, d ’ ordaigh an príomh-aire conte stop a chur le beagnach gach gníomhaíocht tráchtála seachas ollmhargaí agus cógaslanna.

translation.en: On 6 march 2020, the italian college of anaesthesia, analgesia, resuscitation and intensive care (siaarti) published medical ethics recommendations regarding triage protocols.
translation.ga: An 6 márta 2020, d ’ fhoilsigh coláiste ainéistéise, analgesia, athbheochana agus dianchúraim na hiodáile moltaí maidir le heitic leighis maidir le prótacail triage.

translation.en: On 19 march 2020, italy overtook china as the country with the most covid-19-related deaths in the world after reporting 3,405 fatalities from the pandemic.
translation.ga: An 19 márta 2020, ghabh an iodáil an tsín ar aghaidh mar an tír leis na básanna is mó a bhaineann le covid-19 ar domhan tar éis 3,405 bás a fháil ón bpaindéim.

translation.en: On 22 march 2020, it was reported that russia had sent nine military planes with medical equipment to italy.
translation.ga: An 22 márta 2020, tuairiscíodh gur sheol an rúis naoi bplána míleata le trealamh leighis chun na hiodáile.

translation.en: As of 28 march, there were 3,532,057 confirmed cases, 107,933 deaths, and 2,850,889 recoveries in italy, with a large number of those cases occurring in the lombardy region.
translation.ga: Amhail an 28 márta, bhí 3,532,057 cás dearbhaithe, 107,933 bás, agus 2,850,889 aisghabháil san iodáil, agus tharla líon mór de na cásanna sin i réigiún na lombaird.

translation.en: A cnn report indicated that the combination of italy's large elderly population and inability to test all who have the virus to date may be contributing to the high fatality rate.
translation.ga: Thug tuarascáil cnn le fios go bhféadfadh an teaglaim de dhaonra mór scothaosta na hiodáile agus a neamhábaltacht gach duine a bhfuil an víreas orthu go dtí seo a bheith ag cur leis an ráta ard básmhaireachta.

translation.en: On 19 april 2020, it was reported that the country had its lowest deaths at 433 in seven days and some businesses were asking for a loosening of restrictions after six weeks of lockdown.
translation.ga: An 19 aibreán 2020, tuairiscíodh go raibh na básanna is ísle ag an tír ag 433 i seacht lá agus bhí roinnt gnólachtaí ag iarraidh go scaoilfí srianta tar éis sé seachtaine de ghlasáil.

translation.en: On 13 october 2020, the italian government again issued restrictive rules to contain a rise in infections.
translation.ga: An 13 deireadh fómhair 2020, d ’ eisigh rialtas na hiodáile rialacha sriantacha arís chun méadú ar ionfhabhtuithe a bheith ann.

translation.en: On 11 november, it was reported that silvestro scotti, president of the italian federation of general practitioners indicated that all of italy should come under restrictions due to the spread of covid-19.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh ar 11 samhain, gur thug silvestro scotti, uachtarán chónaidhm dochtúirí teaghlaigh na hiodáile le fios gur chóir go mbeadh srianta ar an iodáil go léir mar gheall ar scaipeadh covid-19.

translation.en: A couple of days prior filippo anelli, president of the national federation of doctor's guilds (fnomceo) asked for a complete lockdown of the peninsular nation due to the pandemic.
translation.ga: Cúpla lá roimhe seo d ’ iarr filippo anelli, uachtarán chónaidhm náisiúnta guild na ndochtúirí (fnomceo) go ndéanfaí an náisiún leithinis a ghlasáil go hiomlán mar gheall ar an bpaindéim.

translation.en: On the 10th, a day before, italy surpassed 1 million confirmed covid-19 cases.
translation.ga: Ar an 10ú, lá roimhe sin, sháraigh an iodáil 1 mhilliún cás dearbhaithe covid-19.

translation.en: On 23 november, it was reported that the second wave of the virus has caused some hospitals in italy to stop accepting patients.
translation.ga: An 23 samhain, tuairiscíodh gur chuir an dara tonn den víreas faoi deara go stopann roinnt ospidéal san iodáil glacadh le hothair.

translation.en: The virus was first confirmed to have spread to spain on 31 january 2020, when a german tourist tested positive for sars-cov-2 in la gomera, canary islands.
translation.ga: Deimhníodh ar dtús gur scaipeadh an víreas go dtí an spáinn an 31 eanáir 2020, nuair a rinne turasóir gearmánach tástáil dhearfach do sars-cov-2 i la gomera, na hoileáin chanáracha.

translation.en: Post-hoc genetic analysis has shown that at least 15 strains of the virus had been imported, and community transmission began by mid-february.
translation.ga: Taispeánann anailís ghéiniteach iar-hoc gur allmhairíodh 15 shraith den víreas ar a laghad, agus cuireadh tús le tarchur pobail faoi ​ ​ lár mhí feabhra.

translation.en: By 13 march, cases had been confirmed in all 50 provinces of the country.
translation.ga: Faoin 13 márta, bhí cásanna deimhnithe i ngach ceann de na 50 cúigí sa tír.

translation.en: A lockdown was imposed on 14 march 2020.
translation.ga: Gearradh frithdhúnadh an 14 márta 2020.

translation.en: On 29 march, it was announced that, beginning the following day, all non-essential workers were ordered to remain at home for the next 14 days.
translation.ga: An 29 márta, fógraíodh, ag tosú an lá dar gcionn, gur ordaíodh do gach oibrí neamhriachtanach fanacht sa bhaile ar feadh na 14 lá dar gcionn.

translation.en: By late march, the community of madrid has recorded the most cases and deaths in the country.
translation.ga: Faoi dheireadh mhí an mhárta, bhí an líon is mó cásanna agus básanna sa tír taifeadta ag comhphobal mhaidrid.

translation.en: Medical professionals and those who live in retirement homes have experienced especially high infection rates.
translation.ga: Tá rátaí arda ionfhabhtaithe ag gairmithe míochaine agus iad siúd a bhfuil cónaí orthu i dtithe scoir.

translation.en: On 25 march, the official death toll in spain surpassed that of mainland china.
translation.ga: An 25 márta, sháraigh an dola báis oifigiúil sa spáinn dola mórthír na síne.

translation.en: On 2 april, 950 people died of the virus in a 24-hour period — at the time, the most by any country in a single day.
translation.ga: An 2 aibreán, fuair 950 duine bás den víreas i dtréimhse 24 uair an chloig - ag an am, an tír ba mhó in aon lá amháin.

translation.en: On 17 may, the daily death toll announced by the spanish government fell below 100 for the first time, and 1 june was the first day without deaths by covid-19.
translation.ga: An 17 bealtaine, thit an dola báis laethúil a d ’ fhógair rialtas na spáinne faoi bhun 100 den chéad uair, agus ba é 1 meitheamh an chéad lá gan básanna ag covid-19.

translation.en: The state of alarm ended on 21 june.
translation.ga: Tháinig deireadh le staid an aláraim an 21 meitheamh.

translation.en: However, the number of cases increased again in july in a number of cities including barcelona, zaragoza and madrid, which led to reimposition of some restrictions but no national lockdown.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, mhéadaigh líon na gcásanna arís i mí iúil i roinnt cathracha lena n-áirítear barcelona, zaragoza agus maidrid, rud a d ’ fhág go raibh roinnt srianta ann ach nach raibh aon ghlasáil náisiúnta ann.

translation.en: Studies have suggested that the number of infections and deaths may have been underestimated due to lack of testing and reporting, and many people with only mild or no symptoms were not tested.
translation.ga: Thug staidéir le fios go mb ’ fhéidir go raibh líon na n-ionfhabhtuithe agus na mbásanna tearc-mheasta mar gheall ar easpa tástála agus tuairiscithe, agus níor tástáladh go leor daoine nach raibh ach comharthaí éadroma nó gan aon airíonna orthu.

translation.en: Reports in may suggested that, based on a sample of more than 63,000 people, the number of infections may be ten times higher than the number of confirmed cases by that date, and madrid and several provinces of castilla – la mancha and castile and león were the most affected areas with a percentage of infection greater than 10%.
