translation.ga: Tugadh le fios i dtuarascálacha i mí na bealtaine, bunaithe ar shampla de níos mó ná 63,000 duine, go bhféadfadh líon na n-ionfhabhtuithe a bheith deich n-uaire níos airde ná líon na gcásanna dearbhaithe faoin dáta sin, agus maidrid agus roinnt cúigí de castilla-la ba iad mancha agus castile agus león na ceantair ba mhó a raibh tionchar orthu agus bhí céatadán den ionfhabhtú níos mó ná 10%.

translation.en: There may also be as many as 15,815 more deaths according to the spanish ministry of health monitoring system on daily excess mortality (sistema de monitorización de la mortalidad diaria – momo).
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh oiread agus 15,815 bás níos mó ann de réir chóras monatóireachta aireacht sláinte na spáinne go laethúilbásmhaireacht iomarcach (sistema de monitorización de la mortalidad diaria - momo).

translation.en: On 6 july 2020, the results of a government of spain nationwide seroprevalence study showed that about two million people, or 5.2% of the population, could have been infected during the pandemic.
translation.ga: An 6 iúil 2020, léirigh torthaí staidéir ar seroprevalence ar fud na tíre de chuid rialtas na spáinne go bhféadfadh thart ar dhá mhilliún duine, nó 5.2% den daonra, a bheith ionfhabhtaithe le linn na paindéime.

translation.en: Spain was the second country in europe (behind russia) to record half a million cases.
translation.ga: Ba í an spáinn an dara tír san eoraip (taobh thiar den rúis) a thaifead leath mhilliún cás.

translation.en: On 21 october, spain passed 1 million covid-19 cases, with 1,005,295 infections and 34,366 deaths reported, a third of which occurred in madrid.
translation.ga: An 21 deireadh fómhair, rith an spáinn 1 mhilliún cás covid-19, agus tuairiscíodh 1,005,295 ionfhabhtú agus 34,366 bás, agus tharla an tríú cuid díobh i maidrid.

translation.en: Sweden differed from most other european countries in that it mostly remained open.
translation.ga: Bhí an tsualainn difriúil ó fhormhór na dtíortha eorpacha eile sa mhéid gur fhan sí oscailte den chuid is mó.

translation.en: Per the swedish constitution, the public health agency of sweden has autonomy which prevents political interference and the agency's policy favoured forgoing a lockdown.
translation.ga: De réir bhunreacht na sualainne, tá uathriail ag gníomhaireacht sláinte poiblí na sualainne a choisceann cur isteach polaitiúil agus b ’ fhearr le beartas na gníomhaireachta frithdhúnadh a dhéanamh.

translation.en: The swedish strategy focused on measures that could be put in place over a longer period of time, based on the assumption that the virus would start spreading again after a shorter lockdown.
translation.ga: Dhírigh straitéis na sualainne ar bhearta a d ’ fhéadfaí a chur i bhfeidhm thar thréimhse níos faide, bunaithe ar an toimhde go dtosódh an víreas ag scaipeadh arís tar éis glasáil níos giorra.

translation.en: The new york times said that, as of may 2020, the outbreak had been far deadlier there but the economic impact had been reduced as swedes have continued to go to work, restaurants, and shopping.
translation.ga: Dúirt an new york times, ó bhealtaine 2020, go raibh an ráig i bhfad níos marbhánaí ansin ach gur laghdaíodh an tionchar eacnamaíoch de réir mar a lean sualainnigh orthu ag dul ag obair, ag bialanna agus ag siopadóireacht.

translation.en: On 19 may, it was reported that the country had in the week of 12 – 19 may the highest per capita deaths in europe, 6.25 deaths per million per day.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an 19 bealtaine go raibh na básanna per capita is airde san eoraip ag an tír sa tseachtain 12-19 bealtaine, 6.25 bás in aghaidh an mhilliúin in aghaidh an lae.

translation.en: In the end of june, sweden no longer had excess mortality.
translation.ga: Ag deireadh mhí an mheithimh, ní raibh an iomarca básmhaireachta ag an tsualainn a thuilleadh.

translation.en: Devolution in the united kingdom meant that each of the four countries of the uk had its own different response to covid-19, and the uk government, on behalf of england, moved quicker to lift restrictions.
translation.ga: Cineachadh sa ríocht aontaithe chiallaigh sé sin go gach ceann de na ceithre thír na ríochta aontaithe a bhí a fhreagra éagsúil féin le covid-19, agus rialtas na ríochta aontaithe, thar ceann shasana, ar athraíodh a ionad níos tapúla a srianta tharscaoileadh.

translation.en: The uk government started enforcing social distancing and quarantine measures on 18 march 2020 and was criticised for a perceived lack of intensity in its response to concerns faced by the public.
translation.ga: An rialtas na ríochta aontaithe a thosaigh a fhorfheidhmiú distancing shóisialta agus bearta coraintín ar 18 márta, 2020 agus cáineadh le haghaidh go bhfeictear dóibh déine ina fhreagra ar imní a bhíonn ag an bpobal.

translation.en: On 16 march, prime minister boris johnson advised against non-essential travel and social contact, suggesting people work from home and avoid venues such as pubs, restaurants, and theatres.
translation.ga: An 16 márta, thug an príomh-aire boris johnson comhairle i gcoinne taistil neamhriachtanach agus teagmháil shóisialta, ag moladh do dhaoine oibriú ón mbaile agus ionaid mar thithe tábhairne, bialanna agus amharclanna a sheachaint.

translation.en: On 20 march, the government ordered all leisure establishments to close as soon as possible, and promised to prevent unemployment.
translation.ga: An 20 márta, d ’ ordaigh an rialtas do gach bunaíocht fóillíochta dúnadh a luaithe is féidir, agus gheall siad dífhostaíocht a chosc.

translation.en: On 23 march, johnson banned gatherings of multiple people and restricting non-essential travel and outdoor activity.
translation.ga: An 23 márta, chuir johnson cosc ​ ​ ar bhailiúcháin daoine iolracha agus srian a chur ar thaisteal agus ar ghníomhaíocht lasmuigh neamhriachtanach.

translation.en: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions were enforceable by police through fines and dispersal of gatherings.
translation.ga: Murab ionann agus bearta roimhe seo, bhí na srianta seo infheidhmithe ag póilíní trí fhíneálacha agus scaipthe cruinnithe.

translation.en: Most non-essential businesses were ordered to close.
translation.ga: Ordaíodh don chuid is mó de ghnólachtaí neamhriachtanacha dúnadh.

translation.en: On 24 april, it was reported that a promising vaccine trial had begun in england; the government pledged more than £50 million towards research.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh go raibh triail gealladh vacsaín tosaithe i sasana an 24 aibreán; gheall an rialtas níos mó ná £50 milliún i dtreo taighde.

translation.en: A number of temporary critical care hospitals were built.
translation.ga: Tógadh roinnt ospidéal sealadach cúraim chriticiúil.

translation.en: The first operating was the 4,000-bed nhs nightingale hospital london, constructed for over nine days.
translation.ga: Ba é an chéad oibríocht ná ospidéal nightingale nhs 4,000 leaba londain, a tógadh le breis agus naoi lá.

translation.en: On 4 may, it was announced that it would be placed on standby and remaining patients transferred to other facilities; 51 patients had been treated in the first three weeks.
translation.ga: An 4 bealtaine, fógraíodh go gcuirfí ar fuireachas é agus go n-aistreofaí na hothair eile chuig saoráidí eile; cuireadh cóireáil ar 51 othar sa chéad trí seachtaine.

translation.en: On 16 april, it was reported that the uk would have first access to the oxford vaccine, due to a prior contract; should the trial be successful, some 30 million doses in the uk would be available.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an 16 aibreán go mbeadh rochtain ag an ríocht aontaithe ar an vacsaín oxford ar dtús, mar gheall ar chonradh roimh ré; dá n-éireodh leis an triail, bheadh ​ ​ thart ar 30 milliún dáileog sa ra ar fáil.

translation.en: On 2 december, the uk became the first western country to approve the pfizer vaccine against the covid-19 virus; 800,000 doses would be immediately available for use.
translation.ga: An 2 nollaig, ba í an ra an chéad tír san iarthar a cheadaigh an vacsaín pfizer i gcoinne an víris covid-19; bheadh ​ ​ 800,000 dáileog ar fáil láithreach le húsáid.

translation.en: It was reported on 5 december, that the united kingdom would begin vaccination against the virus on 8 december, less than a week after having been approved.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an 5 nollaig, go dtosódh an ríocht aontaithe ar vacsaíniú i gcoinne an víris an 8 nollaig, níos lú ná seachtain tar éis í a bheith ceadaithe.

translation.en: On 9 december, mhra stated that any individual with a significant allergic reaction to a vaccine, such as an anaphylactoid reaction, should not take the pfizer vaccine for covid-19 protection.
translation.ga: An 9 nollaig, luaigh mhra nár cheart d ’ aon duine a bhfuil imoibriú ailléirgeach suntasach acu ar vacsaín, mar shampla imoibriú anaifiolachtach, an vacsaín pfizer a ghlacadh le haghaidh cosanta covid-19.

translation.en: The first cases in north america were reported in the united states on the 23 january 2020.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh na chéad chásanna i meiriceá thuaidh sna stáit aontaithe an 23 eanáir 2020.

translation.en: Cases were reported in all north american countries after saint kitts and nevis confirmed a case on 25 march, and in all north american territories after bonaire confirmed a case on 16 april.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh cásanna i ngach tír i meiriceá thuaidh tar éis do saint kitts agus nevis cás a dhearbhú an 25 márta, agus i ngach críoch i meiriceá thuaidh tar éis do bonaire cás a dhearbhú ar 16 aibreán.

translation.en: As of 24 may 2021, canada has reported 1,361,564 cases and 25,265 deaths, while mexico has reported 2,396,604 cases and 221,647 deaths.
translation.ga: Amhail an 24 bealtaine 2021, bhí ceanada tar éis 1,361,564 cás agus 25,265 bás a thuairisciú, agus thuairiscigh meicsiceo 2,396,604 cás agus 221,647 bás.

translation.en: The most cases by state is california with 3,778,711 cases and 62,945 deaths as of 24 may 2021.
translation.ga: Is é california an líon is mó cásanna de réir stáit le 3,778,711 cás agus 62,945 bás amhail an 24 bealtaine 2021.

translation.en: More than 33.5 million confirmed cases have been reported in the united states since january 2020, resulting in more than 602,000 deaths, the most of any country, and the twentieth-highest per capita worldwide.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh níos mó ná 33.5 milliún cás dearbhaithe sna stáit aontaithe ó eanáir 2020, agus mar thoradh air sin fuair níos mó ná 602,000 bás, an chuid is mó d ’ aon tír, agus an fichiú is airde per capita ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: As many infections have gone undetected, the centers for disease control estimated that, as of march 2021, there are a total 114.6 million infections in the united states, or more than a third of the total population.
translation.ga: De réir mar a tugadh faoi deara go leor ionfhabhtuithe, mheas na hionaid um rialú galar go raibh 114.6 milliún ionfhabhtú sna stáit aontaithe, amhail márta 2021, nó níos mó ná an tríú cuid den daonra iomlán.

translation.en: The u.s. has about one-fifth of the world's confirmed cases and deaths.
translation.ga: Tá timpeall an cúigiú cuid de chásanna agus básanna dearbhaithe an domhain ag sam.

translation.en: Covid-19 became the third-leading cause of death in the u.s. in 2020, behind heart disease and cancer.
translation.ga: Ba é covid-19 an tríú príomhchúis bháis sna sa in 2020, taobh thiar de ghalar croí agus ailse.

translation.en: U.s.life expectancy dropped from 78.8 years in 2019 to 77.8 years in the first half of 2020.
translation.ga: Thit ionchas saoil na sa ó 78.8 mbliana in 2019 go 77.8 mbliana sa chéad leath de 2020.

translation.en: The first american case was reported on january 20, and president donald trump declared the u.s. outbreak a public health emergency on january 31.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an chéad chás meiriceánach an 20 eanáir, agus dhearbhaigh an tuachtarán donald trump gur ráig na stát aontaithe éigeandáil sláinte poiblí an 31 eanáir.

translation.en: Restrictions were placed on flights arriving from china, but the initial u.s. response to the pandemic was otherwise slow, in terms of preparing the healthcare system, stopping other travel, and testing.
translation.ga: Cuireadh srianta ar eitiltí a tháinig ón tsín, ach ba é freagra tosaigh na sa ar an bpaindéim mall ar shlí eile, maidir leis an gcóras cúram sláinte a ullmhú, taisteal eile a stopadh agus tástáil a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Meanwhile, trump remained optimistic and was accused by his critics of underestimating the severity of the virus.
translation.ga: Idir an dá linn, d' fhan trump dóchasach agus chuir a chriticeoirí i leith é a mheas faoina luach déine an víris.

translation.en: The first known american deaths occurred in february.
translation.ga: Tharla na chéad bhásanna is eol do mheiriceá i mí feabhra.

translation.en: On march 6, 2020, trump signed the coronavirus preparedness and response supplemental appropriations act, which provided $8.3 billion in emergency funding for federal agencies to respond to the outbreak.
translation.ga: An 6 márta 2020, shínigh trump an tacht leithreasaí forlíontacha ullmhachta agus freagartha coronavirus, a chuir maoiniú éigeandála $8.3 billiún ar fáil do ghníomhaireachtaí cónaidhme chun freagairt don ráig.

translation.en: On march 13, president trump declared a national emergency.
translation.ga: An 13 márta, d ’ fhógair an tuachtarán trump éigeandáil náisiúnta.

translation.en: In mid-march, the trump administration started to purchase large quantities of medical equipment, and in late march, it invoked the defense production act of 1950 to direct industries to produce medical equipment.
translation.ga: I lár mhí an mhárta, thosaigh riarachán trump ag ceannach cuid mhór de threalamh míochaine, agus go déanach i mí an mhárta, rinne sé agairt ar an acht um tháirgeadh cosanta 1950 chun tionscail a threorú chun trealamh leighis a tháirgeadh.

translation.en: By april 17, the federal government approved disaster declarations for all states and territories.
translation.ga: Faoi 17 aibreán, cheadaigh an rialtas cónaidhme dearbhuithe tubaiste do gach stát agus críoch.

translation.en: By mid-april, cases had been confirmed in all fifty u.s.states, and by november in all inhabited u.s.territories.
translation.ga: Faoi lár mhí aibreáin, bhí cásanna deimhnithe i ngach caoga stát de chuid na sa, agus faoi mhí na samhna i ngach críoch ina raibh daoine ina gcónaí.

translation.en: The pandemic was confirmed to have reached south america on 26 february 2020 when brazil confirmed a case in são paulo.
translation.ga: Deimhníodh gur shroich an paindéim meiriceá theas an 26 feabhra 2020 nuair a dhearbhaigh an bhrasaíl cás i são paulo.

translation.en: By 3 april, all countries and territories in south america had recorded at least one case.
translation.ga: Faoin 3 aibreán, bhí cás amháin ar a laghad taifeadta ag gach tír agus críoch i meiriceá theas.

translation.en: On 13 may 2020, it was reported that latin america and the caribbean had reported over 400,000 cases of covid-19 infection with, 23,091 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an 13 bealtaine 2020, gur thuairiscigh meiriceá laidineach agus an mhuir chairib os cionn 400,000 cás d ’ ionfhabhtú covid-19 le, 23,091 bás.

translation.en: On 22 may 2020, citing the rapid increase of infections in brazil, the who declared south america the epicentre of the pandemic.
translation.ga: An 22 bealtaine 2020, ag lua méadú tapa na n-ionfhabhtuithe sa bhrasaíl, dhearbhaigh an who meiriceá theas croílár na paindéime.

translation.en: As of 22 june 2021, south america had recorded 31,876,078 confirmed cases and 977,452 deaths from covid-19.
translation.ga: Amhail an 22 meitheamh 2021, bhí 31,876,078 cás dearbhaithe agus 977,452 bás ó covid-19 taifeadta ag meiriceá theas.

translation.en: Due to a shortage of testing and medical facilities, it is believed that the outbreak is far larger than the official numbers show.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar ghanntanas áiseanna tástála agus míochaine, creidtear go bhfuil an ráig i bhfad níos mó ná mar a thaispeánann na huimhreacha oifigiúla.

translation.en: On 20 may, it was reported that brazil had a record 1,179 deaths in a single day, for a total of almost 18,000 fatalities.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh an 20 bealtaine go raibh 1,179 bás riamh ag an mbrasaíl in aon lá amháin, as beagnach 18,000 bás.

translation.en: With a total number of almost 272,000 cases, brazil became the country with the third-highest number of cases, following russia and the united states.
translation.ga: Le líon iomlán de bheagnach 272,000 cás, tháinig an bhrasaíl ar an tír leis an tríú líon is airde cásanna, tar éis na rúise agus na stát aontaithe.

translation.en: On 25 may, brazil exceeded the number of reported cases in russia when they reported that 11,687 new cases had been confirmed over the previous 24 hours, bringing the total number to over 374,800, with more than 23,400 deaths.
translation.ga: An 25 bealtaine, sháraigh an bhrasaíl líon na gcásanna a tuairiscíodh sa rúis nuair a thuairiscigh siad gur dearbhaíodh 11,687 cás nua le linn na 24 uair an chloig roimhe sin, rud a thug an líon iomlán go dtí os cionn 374,800, agus níos mó ná 23,400 bás.

translation.en: President jair bolsonaro has created controversy by referring to the virus as a "little flu" and frequently speaking out against preventive measures such as lockdowns and quarantines.
translation.ga: Uachtarán jair bolsonarochruthaigh conspóid trí thagairt a dhéanamh don víreas mar “fhliú beag ” agus labhairt go minic i gcoinne bearta coisctheacha ar nós glasáil agus coraintíní.

translation.en: His attitude towards the outbreak has been likened to that of former u.s.
translation.ga: Tá a dhearcadh i leith na ráige cosúil le dearcadh iar-uachtarán na stát aontaithe trump, agus bolsonaro mar “trump of the tropics ”.

translation.en: President trump, with bolsonaro being called the "trump of the tropics".
translation.ga: Rinne bolsonaro tástáil dearfach ar an víreas ina dhiaidh sin.

translation.en: Bolsonaro later tested positive for the virus.
translation.ga: I mí an mheithimh 2020, rinne rialtas na brasaíle iarracht figiúirí iarbhír na gcásanna gníomhacha agus na mbásanna covid-19 a cheilt, mar stop sé ag foilsiú líon iomlán na n-ionfhabhtuithe agus na mbásanna.

translation.en: In june 2020, the government of brazil attempted to conceal the actual figures of the covid-19 active cases and deaths, as it stopped publishing the total number of infections and deaths.
translation.ga: An 5 meitheamh, chuir aireacht sláinte na brasaíle síos an suíomh gréasáin oifigiúil ag léiriú líon iomlán na n-ionfhabhtuithe agus na mbásanna.

translation.en: On 5 june, brazil's health ministry took down the official website reflecting the total numbers of infections and deaths.
translation.ga: Bhí an suíomh gréasáin beo an 6 meitheamh, agus ní raibh ach líon na n-ionfhabhtuithe sna 24 uair an chloig roimhe sin.

translation.en: The website was live on 6 june, with only the number of infections of the previous 24 hours.
translation.ga: Thuairiscigh na huimhreacha oifigiúla deireanacha thart ar 615,000 ionfhabhtú agus os cionn 34,000 bás.

translation.en: The last official numbers reported about 615,000 infections and over 34,000 deaths.
translation.ga: An 15 meitheamh, tuairiscíodh go raibh na cásanna ar fud an domhain tar éis léim ó seacht go hocht milliún in aon seachtain amháin, ag lua meiriceá laidineach, an bhrasaíl go sonrach mar cheann de na tíortha ina bhfuil cásanna ag borradh, sa chás seo, i dtreo 1 mhilliún cás.

translation.en: On 15 june, it was reported that the worldwide cases had jumped from seven to eight million in one week, citing latin america, specifically brazil as one of the countries where cases are surging, in this case, towards 1 million cases.
translation.ga: Chuir an bhrasaíl sos gairid ar thrialacha chéim iii don vacsaín coronavac covid-19 an 10 samhain tar éis féinmharú a dhéanamh ar oibrí deonach sular atosaíodh an 11 samhain.

translation.en: Brazil briefly paused phase iii trials for the coronavac covid-19 vaccine on 10 november after the suicide of a volunteer before resuming on 11 november.
translation.ga: Faoi thús 2021, bhí an dola báis ardaithe go 231,534.

translation.en: By early 2021, the death toll had climbed to 231,534.
translation.ga: Sháraigh líon iomlán na gcásanna an 7 feabhra 9.5 milliún.

translation.en: The total number of cases on 7 february exceeded 9.5 million.
translation.ga: Ba iad an india agus na stáit aontaithe na tíortha amháin a raibh ráigeanna níos measa acu.

translation.en: The only countries with worse outbreaks were india and the united states.
translation.ga: Deimhníodh gur scaipeadh an paindéim chun na hafraice an 14 feabhra 2020, agus fógraíodh an chéad chás dearbhaithe san éigipt.

translation.en: The pandemic was confirmed to have spread to africa on 14 february 2020, with the first confirmed case announced in egypt.
translation.ga: Fógraíodh an chéad chás dearbhaithe san afraic fho-shahárach sa nigéir ag deireadh mhí feabhra 2020.

translation.en: The first confirmed case in sub-saharan africa was announced in nigeria at the end of february 2020.
translation.ga: Laistigh de thrí mhí, bhí an víreas scaipthe ar fud na mór-roinne, mar a rinne leosóta, an stát ceannasach deireanach san afraic chun d' fhan siad saor ón víreas, thuairiscigh siad cás an 13 bealtaine 2020.

translation.en: Within three months, the virus had spread throughout the continent, as lesotho, the last african sovereign state to have remained free of the virus, reported a case on 13 may 2020.
translation.ga: Faoin 26 bealtaine, bhí an chuma ar an scéal go raibh tarchur pobail ag formhór na dtíortha san afraic, cé go raibh an cumas tástála teoranta.

translation.en: By 26 may, it appeared that most african countries were experiencing community transmission, although testing capacity was limited.
translation.ga: Tháinig an chuid is mó de na cásanna iompórtáilte aitheanta ón eoraip agus ó na stáit aontaithe seachas ón tsín as ar tháinig an víreas.

translation.en: Most of the identified imported cases arrived from europe and the united states rather than from china where the virus originated.
translation.ga: Go luath i mí an mheithimh 2021, thug an afraic aghaidh ar an tríú tonn d ’ ionfhabhtuithe covid agus cásanna ag ardú i 14 tír.

translation.en: In early june 2021, africa faced a third wave of covid infections with cases rising in 14 countries.
translation.ga: Creidtear go bhfuil tearc-thuairisciú forleathan i go leor tíortha san afraic a bhfuil córais chúram sláinte neamhfhorbartha acu.

translation.en: It is believed that there is widespread under-reporting in many african countries with less developed healthcare systems.
translation.ga: De réir staidéar seroprevalence an fhómhair 2020 i juba sa tsúdáin theas, tuairiscíodh níos lú ná 1% de na daoine ionfhabhtaithe i ndáiríre.

translation.en: According to the autumn 2020 seroprevalence study in juba in south sudan, less than 1% of infected were actually reported.
translation.ga: Deimhníodh gur shroich an paindéim an aigéine an 25 eanáir 2020 agus tuairiscíodh an chéad chás dearbhaithe i melbourne, san astráil.

translation.en: The pandemic was confirmed to have reached oceania on 25 january 2020 with the first confirmed case reported in melbourne, australia.
translation.ga: Tá sé scaipthe ó shin in áiteanna eile sa réigiún, cé gur sheachain go leor náisiúin bheaga oileáin an aigéin chiúin an ráig go dtí seo trína dteorainneacha idirnáisiúnta a dhúnadh.

translation.en: It has since spread elsewhere in the region, although many small pacific island nations have thus far avoided the outbreak by closing their international borders.
translation.ga: Níor thuairiscigh trí stát ceannasacha aigéine cás fós: Nárú, tonga, agus tuvalu.

translation.en: Three oceania sovereign states have yet to report a case: Nauru, tonga, and tuvalu.
translation.ga: Moladh an astráil agus an nua-shéalainn as an gcaoi ar láimhseáil siad an paindéim i gcomparáid le náisiúin eile an iarthair, agus chuir an nua-shéalainn agus gach ceann de stáit na hastráile deireadh le tarchur pobail an víris arís agus arís eile fiú tar éis iad a thabhairt isteach arís sa phobal.

translation.en: Australia and new zealand have been praised for their handling of the pandemic compared to other western nations, with both new zealand and each of australia's states wiping out all community transmission of the virus several times even after being re-introduced into the community.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar a iargúltacht agus a dhaonra tanaí, ba é antartaice an mhór-roinn dheireanach a dhearbhaigh cásanna de covid-19 agus bhí sí ar cheann de na réigiúin dheireanacha den domhan a ndeachaigh an paindéim i bhfeidhm go díreach air.

translation.en: Due to its remoteness and sparse population, antarctica was the last continent to have confirmed cases of covid-19 and was one of the last regions of the world affected directly by the pandemic.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh na chéad chásanna i mí na nollag 2020, beagnach bliain tar éis na chéad chásanna de covid-19 a bhrath sa tsín.

translation.en: The first cases were reported in december 2020, almost a year after the first cases of covid-19 were detected in china.
translation.ga: Deimhnítear go bhfuil 36 duine ar a laghad ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: At least 36 people are confirmed to have been infected.
translation.ga: Fiú sular tuairiscíodh na chéad chásanna ar an mór-roinn, bhí tionchar indíreach ag gníomhaíocht dhaonna san antartaice.

translation.en: Even before the first cases on the continent were reported, human activity in antarctica was indirectly impacted.
translation.ga: Chroith paindéim covid-19 geilleagar an domhain, agus rinneadh damáiste mór eacnamaíochta sna stáit aontaithe, san eoraip agus i meiriceá laidineach.

translation.en: The covid-19 pandemic shook the world's economy, with especially severe economic damage in the united states, europe, and latin america.
translation.ga: Cuireadh i gcrích i dtuarascáil chomhthoil ó ghníomhaireachtaí faisnéise mheiriceá in aibreán 2021, "tá iarrachtaí chun an víreas a choinneáil agus a bhainistiú treisithe náisiúnaithe ar fud an domhain, mar a chas roinnt stát isteach chun a gcuid saoránach a chosaint agus uaireanta chuir siad an milleán ar ghrúpaí imeallaithe." Ina theannta sin, tá covid-19 tar éis páirtíneacht agus polaraíocht a chur ar fud an domhain de réir mar a phléasc argóintí searbh maidir le cé leis an scapegoat agus cé leis a chabhróidh ar dtús.

translation.en: A consensus report by american intelligence agencies in april 2021 concluded, "efforts to contain and manage the virus have reinforced nationalist trends globally, as some states turned inward to protect their citizens and sometimes cast blame on marginalized groups." Furthermore, covid-19 has inflamed partisanship and polarisation around the world as bitter arguments explode over whom to scapegoat and whom to help first.
translation.ga: I measc na rioscaí tá cur isteach breise ar thrádáil idirnáisiúnta agus foirmiú iamh iontrála.

translation.en: The risks include further disruption of international trade and the formation of no-entry enclaves.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh ar an bpaindéim, chuir go leor tíortha agus réigiúin coraintíní, toirmisc iontrála, nó srianta eile, ar shaoránaigh, ar thaistealaithe le déanaí chuig ceantair a raibh tionchar orthu, nó ar gach taistealaí.

translation.en: As a result of the pandemic, many countries and regions imposed quarantines, entry bans, or other restrictions, either for citizens, recent travellers to affected areas, or for all travellers.
translation.ga: In éineacht le toilteanas laghdaithe taistil, bhí tionchar diúltach eacnamaíoch agus sóisialta aige seo ar an earnáil taistil.

translation.en: Together with a decreased willingness to travel, this had a negative economic and social impact on the travel sector.
translation.ga: Ardaíodh imní maidir le héifeachtacht na srianta taistil chun leathadh covid-19 a choinneáil.

translation.en: Concerns have been raised over the effectiveness of travel restrictions to contain the spread of covid-19.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ staidéar in eolaíocht nach raibh ach tionchar measartha beag ag srianta taistil ar scaipeadh tosaigh covid-19, mura gcomhcheanglaítear iad le bearta um chosc agus rialú ionfhabhtaithe chun tarchuir a laghdú go mór.

translation.en: A study in science found that travel restrictions had only modestly affected the initial spread of covid-19, unless combined with infection prevention and control measures to considerably reduce transmissions.
translation.ga: Tháinig taighdeoirí ar an gconclúid go bhfuil "srianta taistil an-úsáideach i gcéim luath agus dhéanach eipidéim" agus "ar an drochuair tháinig srianta taistil ó wuhan ró-mhall".

translation.en: Researchers concluded that "travel restrictions are most useful in the early and late phase of an epidemic" and "restrictions of travel from wuhan unfortunately came too late".
translation.ga: An taontas eorpach dhiúltaigh an smaoineamh na fionraí schengen crios taisteal saor in aisce.

translation.en: The european union rejected the idea of suspending the schengen free travel zone.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar ghlasáil éifeachtach wuhan agus hubei, d ’ imigh roinnt tíortha a saoránaigh agus a bhfoireann taidhleoireachta ón gceantar, go príomha trí eitiltí cairte den náisiún baile, le húdaráis na síne ag soláthar imréitigh.

translation.en: Owing to the effective lockdown of wuhan and hubei, several countries evacuated their citizens and diplomatic staff from the area, primarily through chartered flights of the home nation, with chinese authorities providing clearance.
translation.ga: Bhí ceanada, na stáit aontaithe, an tseapáin, an india, srí lanca, an astráil, an fhrainc, an airgintín, an ghearmáin agus an téalainn i measc na chéad daoine a rinne aslonnú a gcuid saoránach a phleanáil.

translation.en: Canada, the united states, japan, india, sri lanka, australia, france, argentina, germany, and thailand were among the first to plan the evacuation of their citizens.
translation.ga: D' imigh an bhrasaíl agus an nua-shéalainn a náisiúnaigh féin agus roinnt daoine eile freisin.

translation.en: Brazil and new zealand also evacuated their own nationals and some other people.
translation.ga: An 14 márta 2020, chuir an afraic theas 112 afracach theas ar ais a rinne tástáil dhiúltach don víreas ó wuhan, agus fágadh ceathrar a léirigh comharthaí chun riosca a mhaolú.

translation.en: On 14 march 2020, south africa repatriated 112 south africans who tested negative for the virus from wuhan, while four who showed symptoms were left behind to mitigate risk.
translation.ga: Dúirt an phacastáin nach ndéanfadh sí saoránaigh ón tsín a aslonnú.

translation.en: Pakistan said it would not evacuate citizens from china.
translation.ga: An 15 feabhra 2020, d ’ fhógair na sa go n-aslonnódh siad meiriceánaigh ar bord na loinge cúrsála diamond princess, agus an 21 feabhra, aslonnaigh ceanada 129 paisinéir ceanadach ón long.

translation.en: On 15 february 2020, the u.s. announced it would evacuate americans aboard the cruise ship diamond princess, and on 21 february, canada evacuated 129 canadian passengers from the ship.
translation.ga: Go luath i mí an mhárta, thosaigh rialtas na hindia a shaoránaigh a aslonnú ón iaráin.

translation.en: In early march, the indian government began evacuating its citizens from iran.
translation.ga: An 20 márta, thosaigh na stáit aontaithe a gcuid trúpaí a tharraingt siar ón iaráic mar gheall ar an bpaindéim.

translation.en: On 20 march, the united states began to partially withdraw its troops from iraq due to the pandemic.
translation.ga: I mí an mheithimh 2020, sheol ard-rúnaí na náisiún aontaithe "freagra cuimsitheach na náisiún aontaithe ar covid-19".

translation.en: In june 2020, the secretary-general of the united nations launched the "un comprehensive response to covid-19".
translation.ga: An comhdháil na náisiún aontaithe ar thrádáil agus forbairt tá (csna) cáineadh le haghaidh freagairt chomhordaithe mall, go háirithe maidir leis na na sos cogaidh domhanda, a bhfuil aidhmeanna a oscailt suas rochtain dhaonnúil ar an domhan is leochailí i gcriosanna coimhlinte.

translation.en: The united nations conference on trade and development (unsc) has been criticised for a slow coordinated response, especially regarding the un's global ceasefire, which aims to open up humanitarian access to the world's most vulnerable in conflict zones.
translation.ga: Is eagraíocht cheannródaíoch í an who a bhfuil baint aici leis an gcomhordú domhanda chun an paindéim a mhaolú.

translation.en: The who is a leading organisation involved in the global coordination for mitigating the pandemic.
translation.ga: Tá an who tar éis roinnt tionscnamh a threorú mar chiste freagartha dlúthpháirtíochta covid-19 chun airgead a bhailiú don fhreagairt phaindéimeach, tascfhórsa slabhra soláthair na náisiún aontaithe covid-19, agus an triail dlúthpháirtíochta chun roghanna cóireála féideartha don ghalar a imscrúdú.

translation.en: The who has spearheaded several initiatives like the covid-19 solidarity response fund to raise money for the pandemic response, the un covid-19 supply chain task force, and the solidarity trial for investigating potential treatment options for the disease.
translation.ga: Tá sé mar aidhm ag clár roinnte vacsaín covax who 2 bhilliún dáileog den vacsaín covid-19 a dháileadh saor in aisce nó ar chostas laghdaithe faoi dheireadh 2021, agus tá sé tosaithe ag dáileadh orthu.

translation.en: The who's covax vaccine-sharing program aims to distribute 2 billion doses of covid-19 vaccine for free or at a reduced cost by the end of 2021, and has begun distributing them.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar láimhseáil an who ar an ráig tosaigh den phaindéim bhí “gníomh cothromaithe taidhleoireachta ” idir na ballstáit, go háirithe idir na stáit aontaithe agus an tsín.

translation.en: The who's handling of the initial outbreak of the pandemic has required a "diplomatic balancing act" between member states, in particular between the united states and china.
translation.ga: An 27 lúnasa, d ’ fhógair an who bunú coiste athbhreithnithe saineolaithe neamhspleách chun scrúdú a dhéanamh ar ghnéithe den chonradh idirnáisiúnta a rialaíonn ullmhacht agus freagairt d ’ éigeandálaí sláinte.

translation.en: On august 27, the who announced the setting up of an independent expert review committee to examine aspects of the international treaty that governs preparedness and response to health emergencies.
translation.ga: Tháinig misean idirnáisiúnta faoi stiúir who chun na síne i mí eanáir 2021 chun bunús na paindéime covid-19 a imscrúdú agus scaoileadh réamhthorthaí i mí feabhra 2021.

translation.en: A who-led international mission arrived in china in january 2021 to investigate the origins of the covid-19 pandemic and released preliminary findings in february 2021.
translation.ga: I roinnt tíortha, tá agóidí méadaithe i gcoinne freagraí sriantacha rialtais ar phaindéim covid-19, mar shampla glasáil.

translation.en: In several countries, protests have risen against governmental restrictive responses to the covid-19 pandemic, such as lockdowns.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ staidéar i mí feabhra 2021 gur dóigh go méadóidh slógaí agóide móra i gcoinne bearta covid-19 scaipeadh na víris go díreach, lena n-áirítear covid-19.

translation.en: A february 2021 study found that large protest rallies against covid-19 measures are likely to directly increase the spread of viruses, including covid-19.
translation.ga: Bagairt mhór dhíchobhsaí don gheilleagar domhanda is ea an ráig.

translation.en: The outbreak is a major destabilising threat to the global economy.
translation.ga: Thug meastachán amháin ó shaineolaí in ollscoil washington i st louis tionchar $300 + billiún ar shlabhra soláthair an domhain a d ’ fhéadfadh maireachtáil suas le dhá bhliain.

translation.en: One estimate from an expert at washington university in st.
translation.ga: Thit margaí stoc domhanda an 24 feabhra mar gheall ar ardú suntasach i líon na gcásanna covid-19 lasmuigh den tsín.

translation.en: Louis gave a $300 + billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
translation.ga: An 27 feabhra, mar gheall ar imní mhéadaitheach faoin ráig covid-19, phost innéacsanna stoic na sa na titimí is géire acu ó 2008, agus thit an dow 1,191 pointe (an titim lae is mó ó ghéarchéim airgeadais 2007 – 08) agus tháinig laghdú níos mó ná 10 faoin gcéad ar na trí mhórinnéacs dar críoch an tseachtain.

translation.en: Global stock markets fell on 24 february due to a significant rise in the number of covid-19 cases outside china.
translation.ga: An 28 feabhra, dhearbhaigh scope ratings gmbh rátáil chreidmheasa ceannasach na síne ach choinnigh sé léargas diúltach.

translation.en: On 27 february, due to mounting worries about the covid-19 outbreak, u.s.stock indexes posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the dow falling 1,191 points (the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007 – 08) and all three major indexes ending the week down more than 10 per cent.
translation.ga: Stoic plunged arís mar gheall ar eagla coronavirus, an titim is mó ar 16 márta.

translation.en: On 28 february, scope ratings gmbh affirmed china's sovereign credit rating but maintained a negative outlook.
translation.ga: Mheas lloyd' s of london go nglacfaidh an tionscal árachais dhomhanda caillteanais de us $204 billiún, ag dul thar na caillteanais ó shéasúr hairicín an atlantaigh 2017 agus ó ionsaithe an 11 meán fómhair, ag tabhairt le tuiscint gur dócha go rachaidh an paindéim covid-19 síos sa stair mar an tubaiste is costasaí riamh i ndaoine stair.

translation.en: Stocks plunged again due to coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 march.
translation.ga: Tá an turasóireacht ar cheann de na hearnálacha is measa atá buailte mar gheall ar thoirmisc taistil, dúnadh áiteanna poiblí lena n-áirítear nithe taistil, agus comhairle ó rialtais i gcoinne taistil.

translation.en: Lloyd's of london estimated that the global insurance industry will absorb losses of us $204 billion, exceeding the losses from the 2017 atlantic hurricane season and 11 september attacks, suggesting the covid-19 pandemic will likely go down in history as the costliest disaster ever in human history.
translation.ga: Chuir a lán aerlínte eitiltí ar ceal mar gheall ar éileamh níos ísle, agus thit aerlíne réigiúnach na breataine flybe.

translation.en: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against travel.
translation.ga: Bhuail tionscal na líne cúrsála go crua, agus dúnadh roinnt stáisiún traenach agus calafoirt farantóireachta freisin.

translation.en: Numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, and british regional airline flybe collapsed.
translation.ga: Stopadh nó cuireadh moill ar phost idirnáisiúnta idir roinnt tíortha mar gheall ar iompar laghdaithe eatarthu nó seirbhís baile a chur ar fionraí.

translation.en: The cruise line industry was hard hit, and several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
translation.ga: Bhí tionchar domhanda ag an earnáil mhiondíola, le laghduithe ar uaireanta stórais nó dúnadh sealadach.

translation.en: International mail between some countries stopped or was delayed due to reduced transportation between them or suspension of domestic service.
translation.ga: Tháinig laghdú 40 faoin gcéad ar chuairteanna ar mhiondíoltóirí san eoraip agus i meiriceá laidineach.

translation.en: The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
translation.ga: Tháinig laghdú 50-60 faoin gcéad ar mhiondíoltóirí mheiriceá thuaidh agus an mheánoirthir.

translation.en: Visits to retailers in europe and latin america declined by 40 per cent.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh air seo thit titim 33 – 43 faoin gcéad sa trácht coise chuig ionaid siopadóireachta i mí an mhárta i gcomparáid le feabhra.

translation.en: North america and middle east retailers saw a 50 – 60 per cent drop.
translation.ga: Chuir oibreoirí ionad siopadóireachta ar fud an domhain bearta breise i bhfeidhm, mar shampla sláintíocht mhéadaithe, suiteáil scanóirí teirmeacha chun teocht na siopadóirí a sheiceáil, agus imeachtaí a chealú.

translation.en: This also resulted in a 33 – 43 per cent drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in march compared to february.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí na céadta milliún post a chailleadh ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such as increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.
translation.ga: Chaill níos mó ná 40 milliún meiriceánach a gcuid post agus chomhdaigh siad éilimh árachais dífhostaíochta.

translation.en: Hundreds of millions of jobs could be lost globally.
translation.ga: Tá an tionchar agus mais dífhostaíochta eacnamaíocha a thug bpaindéim eagla de mhais ardaithe géarchéim eviction, le hanailís ag an institiúid aspen in iúl idir 30 agus 40 milliún meiriceánaigh atá i mbaol le haghaidh díshealbhaithe faoi dheireadh de 2020.

translation.en: More than 40 million americans lost their jobs and filed unemployment insurance claims.
translation.ga: De réir tuarascála ag yelp, fanfaidh thart ar 60% de ghnólachtaí na sa atá dúnta ó thús na paindéime dúnta go buan.

translation.en: The economic impact and mass unemployment caused by the pandemic has raised fears of a mass eviction crisis, with an analysis by the aspen institute indicating between 30 and 40 million americans are at risk for eviction by the end of 2020.
translation.ga: De réir meastachán de chuid choimisiún eacnamaíochta na náisiún aontaithe do mheiriceá laidineach, d ’ fhéadfadh an cúlú eacnamaíochta de bharr paindéime 14 – 22 milliún níos mó daoine a fhágáil i mbochtaineacht mhór i meiriceá laidineach ná a bheadh ​ ​ sa chás sin gan an paindéim.

translation.en: According to a report by yelp, about 60% of u.s. businesses that have closed since the start of the pandemic will stay shut permanently.
translation.ga: Dar leis an mbanc domhanda, d ’ fhéadfadh suas le 100 milliún duine níos mó ar fud an domhain titim i mbochtaineacht mhór mar gheall ar na múchadh.

translation.en: According to a united nations economic commission for latin america estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave 14 – 22 million more people in extreme poverty in latin america than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
translation.ga: Chuir an eagraíocht idirnáisiúnta saothair (ilo) ar an eolas gur thit an t-ioncam a gineadh sa chéad naoi mí de 2020 as obair ar fud an domhain faoi 10.7 faoin gcéad, nó $3.5 trilliún, i measc na ráige covid-19.

translation.en: According to the world bank, up to 100 million more people globally could fall into extreme poverty due to the shutdowns.
translation.ga: Cuireadh an milleán ar an ráig as roinnt cásanna de ghanntanas soláthair, ag eascairt as úsáid mhéadaithe trealaimh ar fud an domhain chun ráigeanna a chomhrac, ceannach scaoll (rud a d ’ fhág gur glanadh seilfeanna buneilimintí grósaera mar bhia, páipéar leithris agus uisce i mbuidéil in áiteanna áirithe), agus cur isteach ar oibríochtaí monarchan agus lóistíochta.

translation.en: The international labour organization (ilo) informed that the income generated in the first nine months of 2020 from work across the world dropped by 10.7 per cent, or $3.5 trillion, amidst the covid-19 outbreak.
translation.ga: Fuarthas amach go dtagann scaipeadh ceannach scaoll ó bhagairt bhraite, ganntanas a bhraitear, eagla roimh an anaithnid, iompar déileála agus fachtóirí síceolaíochta sóisialta (e.g.

translation.en: The spread of panic buying has been found to stem from perceived threat, perceived scarcity, fear of the unknown, coping behaviour and social psychological factors (e.g.
translation.ga: Tá foláireamh tugtha ag tionscal na teicneolaíochta, go háirithe, faoi mhoilleanna ar lastais earraí leictreonacha.

translation.en: Social influence and trust).
translation.ga: Dar le tedros adhanom, ard -stiúrthóir who, tá méadú faoi dhó tagtha ar an éileamh ar threalamh cosanta pearsanta, rud a d ’ fhág go raibh praghsanna suas le fiche oiread an ghnáthphraghais agus moill freisin ar sholáthar earraí míochaine idir ceithre agus sé mhí.

translation.en: The technology industry, in particular, has warned of delays to shipments of electronic goods.
translation.ga: Tá ganntanas trealaimh chosanta pearsanta ann ar fud an domhain freisin, le rabhadh who go gcuirfidh sé seo oibrithe sláinte i mbaol.

translation.en: According to the who director-general tedros adhanom, demand for personal protection equipment has risen a hundredfold, leading to prices up to twenty times the normal price and also delays in the supply of medical items of four to six months.
translation.ga: Bhí tionchar na ráige covid-19 ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the who warning that this will endanger health workers.
translation.ga: Chruthaigh an víreas ganntanas réamhtheachtaithe (amhábhar) a úsáidtear i ndéantúsaíocht fentanyl agus methamphetamine.

translation.en: The impact of the covid-19 outbreak was worldwide.
translation.ga: Tugadh faoi deara méaduithe praghais agus ganntanas sna drugaí mídhleathacha seo ar shráideanna na ra.

translation.en: The virus created a shortage of precursors (raw material) used in the manufacturing of fentanyl and methamphetamine.
translation.ga: Chuir an paindéim isteach ar sholáthairtí bia domhanda agus tá sé ag bagairt géarchéim bia nua a spreagadh.

translation.en: Price increases and shortages in these illegal drugs have been noticed on the streets of the uk.
translation.ga: Dúirt david beasley, ceann an chláir bia domhanda (wfp), "d ’ fhéadfaimis a bheith ag tabhairt aghaidh ar ghorta iolracha de chomhréir an bhíobla laistigh de chúpla mí ghearr." Mheas oifigigh shinsearacha sna náisiúin aontaithe in aibreán 2020 go bhféadfadh 130 milliún duine breise ocras a dhéanamh, ar feadh 265 milliún san iomlán faoi dheireadh 2020.

translation.en: The pandemic has disrupted global food supplies and threatens to trigger a new food crisis.
translation.ga: Go luath i mí feabhra 2020, rinne eagraíocht na dtíortha onnmhairithe peitriliam (opec) "scramáil" tar éis laghdú géar i bpraghsanna ola mar gheall ar éileamh níos ísle ón tsín.

translation.en: David beasley, head of the world food programme (wfp), said "we could be facing multiple famines of biblical proportions within a short few months." Senior officials at the united nations estimated in april 2020 that an additional 130 million people could starve, for a total of 265 million by the end of 2020.
translation.ga: Dé luain, 20 aibreán, chuaigh praghas west texas intermediate (wti) diúltach agus thit sé go dtí an leibhéal is ísle riamh (lúide $37.63 an bairille) mar gheall ar ghabháltais díluchtaithe trádálaithe ionas nach dtógfadh siad seachadadh agus go dtabhódh siad costais stórála.

translation.en: In early february 2020, organization of the petroleum exporting countries (opec) "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from china.
translation.ga: Bhí praghsanna mhí an mheithimh laghdaithe ach sa raon dearfach, le bairille de west texas ag trádáil os cionn $20.

translation.en: On monday, 20 april, the price of west texas intermediate (wti) went negative and fell to a record low (minus $37.63 a barrel) due to traders' offloading holdings so as not to take delivery and incur storage costs.
translation.ga: Chuaigh an paindéim i bhfeidhm go mór ar earnálacha na n-ealaíon taibhithe agus na hoidhreachta cultúrtha, a raibh tionchar acu ar oibríochtaí eagraíochtaí chomh maith le daoine aonair - fostaithe agus neamhspleácha araon - ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: June prices were down but in the positive range, with a barrel of west texas trading above $20.
translation.ga: Faoi mhárta 2020, ar fud an domhain agus go céimeanna éagsúla, bhí músaeim, leabharlanna, ionaid taibhithe agus institiúidí cultúrtha eile dúnta ar feadh tréimhse éiginnte agus cuireadh a dtaispeántais, a n-imeachtaí agus a dtaibhithe ar ceal nó curtha siar.

translation.en: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organisations' operations as well as individuals — both employed and independent — globally.
translation.ga: Lean roinnt seirbhísí ar aghaidh trí ardáin dhigiteacha, mar cheolchoirmeacha sruthú beo nó féilte ealaíon bunaithe ar an ngréasán.

translation.en: By march 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
translation.ga: Cuireadh breathnóireachtaí na seachtaine naofa sa róimh, a tharlaíonn le linn na seachtaine deireanaí de shéasúr peannaireachta críostaí an charghais, ar ceal.

translation.en: Some services continued through digital platforms, such as live streaming concerts or web-based arts festivals.
translation.ga: Mhol go leor deoise go ndéanfadh críostaithe níos sine fanacht sa bhaile seachas freastal ar aifreann ar an domhnach; cuireadh seirbhísí ar fáil trí raidió, sruthú beo ar líne agus teilifís, cé go bhfuil forálacha déanta ag roinnt pobail maidir le adhradh tiomána isteach.

translation.en: Holy week observances in rome, which occur during the last week of the christian penitential season of lent, were cancelled.
translation.ga: Le deoise caitliceach rómhánach na róimhe ag dúnadh a heaglaisí agus a séipéil agus cearnóg naomh peadar folamh d ’ oilithrigh chríostaí, chuir comhlachtaí reiligiúnacha eile seirbhísí duine ar ceal agus cruinnithe poiblí teoranta in eaglaisí, moscanna, sionagóga, teampaill agus gurdwaras.

translation.en: Many dioceses have recommended older christians stay home rather than attend mass on sundays; services have been made available via radio, online live streaming and television, though some congregations have made provisions for drive-in worship.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair aireacht sláinte na hiaráine go gcuirfí paidreacha dé haoine ar ceal i gceantair a ndeachaigh an ráig i bhfeidhm orthu agus dúnadh na scrínte níos déanaí, agus chuir an araib shádach cosc ​ ​ ar oilithrigh eachtracha chomh maith lena cónaitheoirí a iontráil chuig láithreáin naofa i mecca agus medina.

translation.en: With the roman catholic diocese of rome closing its churches and chapels and st.
translation.ga: Bhí hajj 2020 teoranta do thart ar 1,000 oilithrigh roghnaithe, i gcodarsnacht leis an ngnáthlíon os cionn 2 mhilliún.

translation.en: Peter's square emptied of christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled in-person services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
translation.ga: Is é an paindéim ba chúis leis an gcur isteach is suntasaí ar an bhféilire spóirt ar fud an domhain ón dara cogadh domhanda.

translation.en: Iran's health ministry announced the cancellation of friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while saudi arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in mecca and medina.
translation.ga: Cuireadh an chuid is mó d ’ imeachtaí móra spóirt ar ceal nó cuireadh siar iad, lena n-áirítear sraith seaimpíní uefa 2019 – 20, 2019 – 20 premier league, uefa euro 2020, 2020 séasúr baseball major league, 2019-20 séasúr nba, séasúr nhl 2019 – 20, agus cluichí geimhridh artach 2020.

translation.en: The 2020 hajj was limited to around 1,000 selected pilgrims, in contrast to the usual number of over 2 million.
translation.ga: Chuir an ráig isteach ar phleananna do chluichí oilimpeacha an tsamhraidh 2020i dtóiceo, an tseapáin, a bhí beartaithe le tosú ar dtús an 24 iúil 2020, agus a chuir an coiste oilimpeach idirnáisiúnta ar atráth go 23 iúil 2021.

translation.en: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the second world war.
translation.ga: Bhí tionchar freisin ar thionscal na siamsaíochta, le go leor grúpaí ceoil ag cur turais ceolchoirme ar fionraí nó ag cealú.

translation.en: Most major sporting events have been cancelled or postponed, including the 2019 – 20 uefa champions league, 2019 – 20 premier league, uefa euro 2020, 2020 major league baseball season, 2019 – 20 nba season, 2019 – 20 nhl season, and 2020 arctic winter games.
translation.ga: Cuireadh comórtas amhrán eurovision, a bhí le bheith ar siúl i rotterdam, an ísiltír i mí na bealtaine, ar ceal; coinníodh an ísiltír mar óstach do 2021., áfach, chuir go leor amharclanna móra mar iad siúd ar broadway gach léiriú ar fionraí freisin.

translation.en: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 summer olympics in tokyo, japan, which were originally scheduled to start at 24 july 2020, and were postponed by the international olympic committee to 23 july 2021.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh ar an líon mór daoine atá ag obair nó ag foghlaim ón mbaile trí bhogearraí físchomhdhála, tháinig laghdú ar roinnt téarmaí agus treochtaí nua, lena n-áirítear "zoom tuirse", laghdú san éileamh ar éadaí foirmiúla, agus fócas faisin méadaithe ar mhaisc agus ar éadaí don chorp uachtarach.

translation.en: The entertainment industry has also been affected, with many music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
translation.ga: (De ghnáth ní bhíonn an corp íochtarach le feiceáil ar fhíschomhdháil).

translation.en: The eurovision song contest, which was due to be held in rotterdam, the netherlands in may, was cancelled; however, the netherlands was retained as host for 2021.
translation.ga: Baineadh úsáid níos forleithne as an téarma "doomscrolling".

translation.en: Many large theatres such as those on broadway also suspended all performances.
translation.ga: Ar líne, tá go leor memes idirlín ar théama covid-19 scaipthe agus an oiread sin daoine ag casadh le greann agus seachrán i measc na héiginnteachta.

translation.en: The large number of people working or learning from home via videoconferencing software led to several new terms and trends, including "zoom fatigue", a decline in demand for formal clothing, and increased fashion focus on masks and clothes for the upper body (the lower body generally not being visible on a videoconference).
translation.ga: Tá tionchar ag an bpaindéim ar chórais pholaitiúla il tíortha, ag cur fionraí ar ghníomhaíochtaí reachtacha, aonrú nó básanna polaiteoirí iolracha, agus athsceidealú toghchán mar gheall ar eagla go scaipfear an víreas.

translation.en: The term "doomscrolling" became more widely used.
translation.ga: Cé go bhfuil tacaíocht leathan acu i measc eipidéimeolaithe, bhí bearta faid shóisialta conspóideach go polaitiúil i go leor tíortha.

translation.en: Online, numerous covid-19-themed internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid the uncertainty.
translation.ga: Tháinig freasúra intleachtúil i gcoinne fadú sóisialta go príomha ó scríbhneoirí réimsí eile, cé go bhfuil cúpla eipidéimeolaí heitodóideach ann.

translation.en: The pandemic has affected the political systems of multiple countries, causing suspensions of legislative activities, isolations or deaths of multiple politicians, and rescheduling of elections due to fears of spreading the virus.
translation.ga: An 23 márta 2020, d ’ eisigh ard-rúnaí na náisiún aontaithe antónio manuel de oliveira guterres achomharc ar shos cogaidh domhanda mar fhreagairt ar an bpaindéim; 172 shínigh ballstáit agus breathnóirí na náisiún aontaithe ráiteas neamhcheangailteach mar thaca leis an achomharc i mí an mheithimh, agus rith comhairle slándála na náisiún aontaithe rún ag tacú leis i mí iúil.

translation.en: Although they have broad support among epidemiologists, social distancing measures have been politically controversial in many countries.
translation.ga: Cháin na stáit aontaithe rialtas na síne, aire na ra d ’ oifig na comh-aireachta michael gove, agus daoine eile as an gcaoi ar láimhseáil sé an paindéim.

translation.en: Intellectual opposition to social distancing has come primarily from writers of other fields, although there are a few heterodox epidemiologists.
translation.ga: Briseadh roinnt riarthóirí ar leibhéal cúige de chuid pháirtí cumannach na síne as a láimhseáil ar na bearta coraintín sa tsín, comhartha míshástachta lena bhfreagra ar an ráig.

translation.en: On 23 march 2020, united nations secretary-general antónio manuel de oliveira guterres issued an appeal for a global ceasefire in response to the pandemic; 172 un member states and observers signed a non-binding statement in support of the appeal in june, and the un security council passed a resolution supporting it in july.
translation.ga: Chreid roinnt tráchtairí go raibh sé i gceist ag an aistriú seo rúnaí ginearálta an chontrapháirtí lárnaigh xi jinping a chosaint ar an gconspóid.

translation.en: The government of china has been criticised by the united states, the uk minister for the cabinet office michael gove, and others for its handling of the pandemic.
translation.ga: An pobal faisnéis uséilíonn an tsín nár thuairiscigh sí go hintinneach a líon cásanna covid-19.

translation.en: A number of provincial-level administrators of the communist party of china were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine measures in china, a sign of discontent with their response to the outbreak.
translation.ga: Áitíonn rialtas na síne gur ghníomhaigh sé go tapa agus go trédhearcach.

translation.en: Some commentators believed this move was intended to protect ccp general secretary xi jinping from the controversy.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, choinnigh údaráis iriseoirí agus gníomhaígh a thuairiscigh ar an bpaindéim, mar zhang zhan, a gabhadh agus a céasadh as tuairisciú ar an bpaindéim agus ar choinneáil neamhspleách eile.

translation.en: The u.s. intelligence community claims china intentionally under-reported its number of covid-19 cases.
translation.ga: Iriseoirí.

translation.en: The chinese government maintains it has acted swiftly and transparently.
translation.ga: Go luath i mí an mhárta, cháin rialtas na hiodáile easpa dlúthpháirtíochta an ae leis an iodáil a raibh tionchar ag coronavirus uirthi — maurizio massari, ambasadóir na hiodáile don ae, dúirt “nár fhreagair ach an tsín go déthaobhach ”, ní an ae.

translation.en: However, journalists and activists who have reported on the pandemic have been detained by authorities, such as zhang zhan, who was arrested and tortured for reporting on the pandemic and the detainment of other independent journalists.
translation.ga: An 22 márta, tar éis glao gutháin le príomhaire na hiodáile giuseppe conte, thug uachtarán na rúise vladimir putin ar arm na rúise dochtúirí míleata, feithiclí díghalraithe, agus trealamh leighis eile a sheoladh chuig an iodáil.

translation.en: In early march, the italian government criticised the eu's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected italy — maurizio massari, italy's ambassador to the eu, said "only china responded bilaterally", not the eu.
translation.ga: Chuir uachtarán lombardia attilio fontana agus aire gnóthaí eachtracha na hiodáile luigi di maio a mbuíochas in iúl as an gcabhair.

translation.en: On 22 march, after a phone call with italian prime minister giuseppe conte, russian president vladimir putin had the russian army send military medics, disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to italy.
translation.ga: Chuir an rúis eitleán lasta le cúnamh míochaine chuig na stáit aontaithe freisin.

translation.en: President of lombardy attilio fontana and italian foreign minister luigi di maio expressed their gratitude for the aid.
translation.ga: Dúirt urlabhraí kremlin dmitry peskov "nuair a thairgeann sé cúnamh do chomhghleacaithe sna stáit aontaithe, glacann [putin] leis nuair a ghnóthaíonn déantúsóirí trealaimh agus ábhair mhíochaine na sa móiminteam, go mbeidh siad in ann cómhalartú más gá." Go luath i mí aibreáin, thosaigh stáit na hiorua agus an ae mar an rómáin agus an ostair ag tairiscint cabhrach trí phearsanra liachta agus dífhabhtán a sheoladh, agus thairg ursula von der leyen leithscéal oifigiúil don tír.

translation.en: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the united states.
translation.ga: An ráig spreag glaonna ar na stáit aontaithe a ghlacadh beartais shóisialta coitianta i dtíortha saibhre eile, lena n-áirítear cúram uilíoch sláinte, cúram leanaí uilíoch, saoire bhreoiteachta íoctha, agus leibhéil níos airde de mhaoiniú do shláinte an phobail.

translation.en: Kremlin spokesman dmitry peskov said "when offering assistance to u.s. colleagues, [putin] assumes that when u.s. manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary." In early april, norway and eu states like romania and austria started to offer help by sending medical personnel and disinfectant, and ursula von der leyen offered an official apology to the country.
translation.ga: Creideann anailísithe polaitiúla go mb ’ fhéidir gur chuir sé le caillteanas donald trump i dtoghchán uachtaránachta 2020.

translation.en: The outbreak prompted calls for the united states to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid sick leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
translation.ga: Ag tosú i lár mhí aibreáin 2020, bhí agóidí i roinnt stát de chuid na sa i gcoinne dúnadh gnó a fhorchuirtear leis an rialtas agus gluaiseacht agus comhlachas pearsanta srianta.

translation.en: Political analysts believe it may have contributed to donald trump's loss in the 2020 presidential election.
translation.ga: Ag an am céanna, rinne agóidí ina dhiaidhoibrithe riachtanacha i bhfoirm stailc ghinearálta.

translation.en: Beginning in mid-april 2020, there were protests in several u.s. states against government-imposed business closures and restricted personal movement and association.
translation.ga: Go luath i mí dheireadh fómhair 2020, rinneadh diagnóisiú ar donald trump, baill a theaghlaigh, agus go leor oifigeach rialtais eile le covid-19, ag cur isteach ar pholaitíocht na tíre a thuilleadh.

translation.en: Simultaneously, protests ensued by essential workers in the form of a general strike.
translation.ga: Tionóladh an cleachtadh míleata beartaithe nato "defender 2020" sa ghearmáin, sa pholainn, agus sna stáit bhaltacha, an cleachtadh cogaidh nato is mó ó dheireadh an chogaidh fhuair, ar scála laghdaithe.

translation.en: In early october 2020, donald trump, his family members, and many other government officials were diagnosed with covid-19, further disrupting the country's politics.
translation.ga: Cháin rúnaí ginearálta an fheachtais um dhí-armáil núicléach kate hudson an cleachtadh, ag rá "cuireann sé beatha na trúpaí as na sa agus an iliomad tíortha eorpacha atá rannpháirteach i mbaol ach áitritheoirí na dtíortha ina bhfuil siad ag feidhmiú.

translation.en: The planned nato "defender 2020" military exercise in germany, poland, and the baltic states, the largest nato war exercise since the end of the cold war, was held on a reduced scale.
translation.ga: Chuaigh an víreas i bhfeidhm go mór ar rialtas na hiaráine, agus thart ar dhá dhosaen ball parlaiminte agus cúig fhigiúr déag reatha nó iar-fhigiúr polaitiúil ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: The campaign for nuclear disarmament's general secretary kate hudson criticised the exercise, saying "it jeopardises the lives not only of the troops from the u.s. and the many european countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."
translation.ga: Scríobh uachtarán na hiaráine hassan rouhani litir phoiblí chuig ceannairí domhanda ag iarraidh cabhrach an 14 márta 2020, ag rá go raibh siad ag streachailt an ráig a throid mar gheall ar easpa rochtana ar mhargaí idirnáisiúnta ó smachtbhannaí na stát aontaithe i gcoinne na hiaráine.

translation.en: The iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with about two dozen parliament members and fifteen current or former political figures infected.
translation.ga: Dhearbhaigh an araib shádach, a sheol idirghabháil mhíleata in éimin i mí an mhárta 2015, sos cogaidh.

translation.en: Iran's president hassan rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 march 2020, saying they were struggling to fight the outbreak due to a lack of access to international markets from the united states sanctions against iran.
translation.ga: Mhéadaigh caidreamh taidhleoireachta idir an tseapáin agus an chóiré theas mar gheall ar an bpaindéim.

translation.en: Saudi arabia, which launched a military intervention in yemen in march 2015, declared a ceasefire.
translation.ga: Cháin an chóiré theas “iarrachtaí coraintín débhríoch agus éighníomhach ” na seapáine tar éis don tseapáin a fhógairt go gcuirfí aon duine a thagann ón gcóiré theas i gcoraintín ar feadh coicíse ag suíomhanna atá ainmnithe ag an rialtas.

translation.en: Diplomatic relations between japan and south korea worsened due to the pandemic.
translation.ga: Rinneadh polarú ar shochaí na cóiré theas ar dtús ar fhreagra an uachtaráin moon jae-in ar an ngéarchéim; shínigh go leor koreans achainíocha ag iarraidh impeachment moon nó ag moladh a fhreagra.

translation.en: South korea criticised japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after japan announced anyone coming from south korea would be placed in quarantine for two weeks at government-designated sites.
translation.ga: Tá reachtaíocht éigeandála rite ag roinnt tíortha mar fhreagairt ar an bpaindéim.

translation.en: South korean society was initially polarised on president moon jae-in's response to the crisis; many koreans signed petitions either calling for moon's impeachment or praising his response.
translation.ga: Chuir roinnt tráchtairí imní in iúl go bhféadfadh sé ligean do rialtais a gcuid greim ar chumhacht a neartú.

translation.en: Some countries have passed emergency legislation in response to the pandemic.
translation.ga: Sna hoileáin fhilipíneacha, bhronn lucht déanta dlí cumhachtaí éigeandála sealadacha ar an uachtarán rodrigo duterte le linn na paindéime.

translation.en: Some commentators have expressed concern that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
translation.ga: San ungáir, vótáil an pharlaimint chun ligean don phríomh-aire, viktor orbán, rialú a dhéanamh le foraithne ar feadh tréimhse éiginnte, an pharlaimint chomh maith le toghcháin a chur ar fionraí, agus pionós a ghearradh orthu siúd a mheastar a scaip faisnéis bhréagach faoin víreas agus an chaoi ar láimhseáil an rialtas an ghéarchéim..

translation.en: In the philippines, lawmakers granted president rodrigo duterte temporary emergency powers during the pandemic.
translation.ga: I roinnt tíortha, an éigipt san áireamh, an tuirc, gabhadh agus an téalainn, gníomhaígh freasúra agus criticeoirí rialtaisas líomhain gur scaipeadh nuacht bhréige faoin bpaindéim covid-19.

translation.en: In hungary, the parliament voted to allow the prime minister, viktor orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections, and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
translation.ga: San india, ghabh póilíní agus údaráis rabhaidh nó eisíodh iriseoirí a bhí ag cáineadh freagra an rialtais.

translation.en: In some countries, including egypt, turkey, and thailand, opposition activists and government critics have been arrested for allegedly spreading fake news about the covid-19 pandemic.
translation.ga: Mhéadaigh rátaí iriseoirí i bpríosún nó faoi choinneáil ar fud an domhain, agus bhain cuid acu leis an bpaindéim.

translation.en: In india, journalists criticising the government's response were arrested or issued warnings by police and authorities.
translation.ga: Chuir paindéim covid-19 isteach ar chórais talmhaíochta agus bia ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: Rates of imprisoned or detained journalists increased worldwide, with some being related to the pandemic.
translation.ga: Bhuail covid-19 ag am nuair a bhí ocras nó tearc-chothú ag dul i méid arís ar domhan, agus meastar go raibh ocras ar 690 milliún duine cheana féin i 2019.

translation.en: The covid-19 pandemic has disrupted agricultural and food systems worldwide.
translation.ga: Bunaithe ar na meastacháin is déanaí de chuid na náisiún aontaithe, ba chúis leis an gcúlú eacnamaíochta de bharr na paindéime d ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh ocras ar 83 milliún duine eile, agus b ’ fhéidir oiread agus 132 milliún, in 2020.

translation.en: Covid-19 hit at a time when hunger or undernourishment was once again on the rise in the world, with an estimated 690 million people already going hungry in 2019.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo go príomha mar gheall ar easpa rochtana ar bhia - nasctha le hioncam ag titim, seoltáin caillte agus, i gcásanna áirithe, ardú i bpraghsanna bia.

translation.en: Based on the latest un estimates, the economic recession triggered by the pandemic may lead to another 83 million people, and possibly as many as 132 million, going hungry in 2020.
translation.ga: I dtíortha atá ag fulaingt cheana féin ag leibhéil arda neamhshlándála bia géarmhíochaine, ní ceist rochtana ar bhia amháin í a thuilleadh, ach tá táirgeadh bia ag éirí níos mó freisin.

translation.en: This is mainly due to a lack of access to food – linked to falling incomes, lost remittances and, in some cases, a rise in food prices.
translation.ga: Chuir an paindéim, in éineacht le glasáil agus srianta taistil, cosc ​ ​ ar ghluaiseacht cúnaimh agus chuaigh sé i bhfeidhm go mór ar tháirgeadh bia.

translation.en: In countries that already suffer from high levels of acute food insecurity, it is no longer an issue of access to food alone, but increasingly also one of food production.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh air sin, tá roinnt gorta á thuar, ar a thug na náisiúin aontaithe géarchéim "de chomhréir an bhíobla," nó "paindéim ocrais." Meastar go bhféadfadh 30 milliún duine bás den ocras gan idirghabháil, agus oxfam ag tuairisciú go bhféadfadh "12,000 duine in aghaidh an lae bás a fháil ó ocras nasctha covid-19" faoi dheireadh 2020.

translation.en: The pandemic, alongside lockdowns and travel restrictions, has prevented movement of aid and greatly impacted food production.
translation.ga: Meastar go mbeidh an paindéim seo, i gcomhar le inmhíolú locust 2019 – 2021 agus roinnt coimhlintí armtha leanúnacha, ar an tsraith is measa de ghorta ó ghorta mór na síne, a dhéanann difear ar bhealach éigin do idir 10 agus 20 faoin gcéad den daonra domhanda.

translation.en: As a result, several famines are forecast, which the un called a crisis "of biblical proportions," or "hunger pandemic." It is estimated that without intervention 30 million people may die of hunger, with oxfam reporting that "12,000 people per day could die from covid-19 linked hunger" by the end of 2020.
translation.ga: Tuairiscítear go bhfuil 55 tír i mbaol, agus trí dhosaen ag géilleadh do ghorta ar leibhéal géarchéime nó os a chionn sa chás is measa.

translation.en: This pandemic, in conjunction with the 2019 – 2021 locust infestations and several ongoing armed conflicts, is predicted to form the worst series of famines since the great chinese famine, affecting between 10 and 20 per cent of the global population in some way.
translation.ga: Meastar go mbeidh 265 milliún duine i ndálaí gorta, méadú de 125 milliún mar gheall ar an bpaindéim.

translation.en: 55 countries are reported to be at risk, with three dozen succumbing to crisis-level famines or above in the worst-case scenario.
translation.ga: Bhí tionchar mór ag an bpaindéim ar chórais oideachais ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: 265 million people are forecast to be in famine conditions, an increase of 125 million due to the pandemic.
translation.ga: Tá institiúidí oideachais dúnta go sealadach ag mórchuid na rialtas, agus aistríonn go leor acu chuig oideachas ar líne.

translation.en: The pandemic has severely impacted educational systems globally.
translation.ga: Amhail meán fómhair 2020, bhí tionchar ag thart ar 1.077 billiún foghlaimeoir mar gheall ar dhúnadh scoileanna mar fhreagairt ar an bpaindéim.

translation.en: Most governments have temporarily closed educational institutions, with many switching to online education.
translation.ga: De réir monatóireachta unicef, amhail márta 2020, dhún 53 tír gach scoil agus 27 scoil, ag dul i bhfeidhm ar thart ar 61.6 faoin gcéad de dhaonra mac léinn an domhain.

translation.en: As of september 2020, approximately 1.077 billion learners were affected due to school closures in response to the pandemic.
translation.ga: Ní amháin go mbíonn tionchar ag dúnadh scoileanna ar mhic léinn, ar mhúinteoirí agus ar theaghlaigh ach tá iarmhairtí forleathana eacnamaíocha agus sochaíocha acu.

translation.en: According to unicef monitoring, as of march 2020, 53 countries had closed all schools and 27 some, impacting about 61.6 per cent of the world's student population.
translation.ga: Caitheann siad solas ar shaincheisteanna sóisialta agus eacnamaíocha, lena n-áirítear fiachas mac léinn, foghlaim dhigiteach, neamhshábháilteacht bia, aguseaspa dídine, chomh maith le rochtain ar chúram leanaí, cúram sláinte, tithíocht, idirlíon agus seirbhísí míchumais.

translation.en: School closures impact not only students, teachers, and families but have far-reaching economic and societal consequences.
translation.ga: Bhí an tionchar níos déine ar leanaí faoi mhíbhuntáiste agus ar a dteaghlaigh.

translation.en: They shed light on social and economic issues, including student debt, digital learning, food insecurity, and homelessness, as well as access to childcare, health care, housing, internet, and disability services.
translation.ga: [Lua ag teastáil]

translation.en: The impact has been more severe for disadvantaged children and their families. [Citation needed]
translation.ga: Rinne an institiúid um beartas ardoideachais tuarascáil a fuair amach gur mhaígh timpeall 63% de mhic léinn go raibh a sláinte meabhrach níos measa mar thoradh ar phaindéim covid-19, agus in éineacht leis seo léirigh 38% sástacht le hinrochtaineacht seirbhísí sláinte meabhrach.

translation.en: The higher education policy institute conducted a report which discovered that around 63% of students claimed that their mental health had been worsened as a result of the covid-19 pandemic, and alongside this 38% demonstrated satisfaction with the accessibility of mental health services.
translation.ga: Ina ainneoin sin, mhínigh an stiúrthóir beartais agus abhcóideachta san institiúid nach bhfuil sé soiléir fós conas agus cathain a atosóidh an normáltacht do mhic léinn maidir lena staid oideachais agus maireachtála.

translation.en: Despite this, the director for policy and advocacy at the institute has explained that it is still unclear as to how and when normality will resume for students regarding their education and living situation.
translation.ga: Is iomaí tionchar a bhí ag an bpaindéim ar shláinte an domhain seachas iad siúd ba chúis leis an ngalar covid-19 féin.

translation.en: The pandemic has had many impacts on global health beyond those caused by the covid-19 disease itself.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh air seo tháinig laghdú ar chuairteanna ar ospidéil ar chúiseanna eile.

translation.en: It has led to a reduction in hospital visits for other reasons.
translation.ga: Tugadh 38 faoin gcéad níos lú cuairteanna ar ospidéil le haghaidh comharthaí taom croí sna stáit aontaithe agus 40 faoin gcéad níos lú sa spáinn.

translation.en: There have been 38 per cent fewer hospital visits for heart attack symptoms in the united states and 40 per cent fewer in spain.
translation.ga: Dúirt ceann na cairdeolaíochta in ollscoil arizona, "is cúis imní dom go bhfuil cuid de na daoine seo ag fáil bháis sa bhaile mar go bhfuil an iomarca eagla orthu dul chuig an ospidéal." Tá imní ann freisin nach bhfuil daoine a bhfuil strócanna agus aipindicíteas á lorg acu go tráthúil.

translation.en: The head of cardiology at the university of arizona said, "my worry is some of these people are dying at home because they're too scared to go to the hospital." There is also concern that people with strokes and appendicitis are not seeking timely treatment.
translation.ga: Bhí tionchar ag ganntanas soláthairtí míochaine ar dhaoine le riochtaí éagsúla.

translation.en: Shortages of medical supplies have impacted people with various conditions.
translation.ga: I roinnt tíortha tá laghdú suntasach tagtha ar scaipeadh na n- ionfhabhtuithe gnéas-tarchurtha, lena n-áirítear veid / seif, atá inchurtha i leith coraintíní covid-19, bearta um fhadú sóisialta, agus moltaí gan dul i mbun gnéis ócáideach.

translation.en: In several countries there has been a marked reduction of spread of sexually transmitted infections, including hiv / aids, attributable to covid-19 quarantines, social distancing measures, and recommendations to not engage in casual sex.
translation.ga: Mar an gcéanna, i roinnt áiteanna, tháinig laghdú suntasach ar rátaí tarchuir an fhliú agus víris riospráide eile le linn na paindéime.

translation.en: Similarly, in some places, rates of transmission of influenza and other respiratory viruses significantly decreased during the pandemic.
translation.ga: Bhí tionchar diúltach ag an bpaindéim ar shláinte mheabhrach ar fud an domhain, lena n-áirítear uaigneas méadaithe mar thoradh ar fhadú sóisialta agus dúlagar agus foréigean teaghlaigh ó ghlasanna glasála.

translation.en: The pandemic has also negatively impacted mental health globally, including increased loneliness resulting from social distancing and depression and domestic violence from lockdowns.
translation.ga: Amhail meitheamh 2020, bhí comharthaí díobhálacha sláinte meabhrach ag 40% d ’ aosaigh na sa, agus 11% tar éis machnamh dáiríre a dhéanamh ar iad féin a mharú le mí anuas.

translation.en: As of june 2020, 40% of u.s. adults were experiencing adverse mental health symptoms, with 11% having seriously considered trying to kill themselves in the past month.
translation.ga: Is gá cheana féin aird a thabhairt agus bearta a dhéanamh chun fadhbanna sláinte meabhrach agus siondróm strus iar-thrámach a chosc, go háirithe i measc na mban.

translation.en: Paying attention and taking measures to prevent mental health problems and post-traumatic stress syndrome, particularly in women, is already a need.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh ar an gcur isteach ar fud an domhain de bharr na paindéime tá go leor éifeachtaí dearfacha ar an gcomhshaol agus ar an aeráid.

translation.en: The worldwide disruption caused by the pandemic has resulted in numerous positive effects to the environment and climate.
translation.ga: Cuireadh anthropause le chéile mar gheall ar an laghdú domhanda ar ghníomhaíocht dhaonna nua-aimseartha, mar shampla an laghdú suntasach ar thaisteal pleanáilte, agus tá titim mhór i dtruailliú aeir agus truailliú uisce ina chúis le go leor réigiún.

translation.en: The global reduction in modern human activity such as the considerable decline in planned travel was coined anthropause and has caused a large drop in air pollution and water pollution in many regions.
