translation.ga: Sa tsín, mar thoradh ar ghlasanna glas agus bearta eile tháinig laghdú 25 faoin gcéad ar astaíochtaí carbóin agus laghdú 50 faoin gcéad ar astaíochtaí ocsaídí nítrigine, a chóraisíonn domhan amháin.

translation.en: In china, lockdowns and other measures resulted in a 25 percent reduction in carbon emissions and 50 percent reduction in nitrogen oxides emissions, which one earth systems scientist estimated may have saved at least 77,000 lives over two months.
translation.ga: Meastar go bhféadfadh eolaí 77,000 beatha ar a laghad a shábháil thar dhá mhí.

translation.en: Other positive effects on the environment include governance-system-controlled investments towards a sustainable energy transition and other goals related to environmental protection such as the european union's seven-year €1 trillion budget proposal and €750 billion recovery plan "next generation eu" which seeks to reserve 25% of eu spending for climate-friendly expenditure.
translation.ga: I measc na n-éifeachtaí dearfacha eile ar an gcomhshaol tá rialachas - infheistíochtaí faoi rialú an chórais i dtreo trasdul fuinnimh inbhuanaithe agus spriocanna eile a bhaineann le cosaint an chomhshaoil ​ ​ amhail togra buiséid seacht mbliana €1 trilliún an aontais eorpaigh agus plean téarnaimh €750 billiún "next generation eu" a fhéachann le 25% de chaiteachas an ae a chaomhnú le haghaidh caiteachais atá neamhdhíobhálach don aeráid.

translation.en: However, the pandemic has also provided cover for illegal activities such as deforestation of the amazon rainforest and increased poaching in africa.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, chuir an paindéim clúdach ar fáil do ghníomhaíochtaí mídhleathacha mar dhífhoraoisiú foraoise báistí an amazon agus póitseáil mhéadaithe san afraic.

translation.en: The hindering of environmental diplomacy efforts in combination of late capitalism also created economic fallout that some predict will slow investment in green energy technologies.
translation.ga: An chuireann bac ar an taidhleoireacht comhshaoil iarrachtaí i meascán de chaipitleachas déanach a cruthaíodh freisin fallout eacnamaíochta go bhfuil roinnt thuar mall infheistíocht i fuinneamh glas teicneolaíochtaí.

translation.en: Heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been documented around the world toward people of chinese and east asian descent.
translation.ga: Tá claontacht níos airde, seineafóibe agus ciníochas doiciméadaithe ar fud an domhain i dtreo daoine de shliocht na síne agus oirthear na háise.

translation.en: Reports from february 2020 (when most confirmed cases were confined to china) documented racist sentiments expressed in groups worldwide about chinese people 'deserving' the virus.
translation.ga: Tuarascálacha ó mhí feabhra 2020 (nuair a bhí an chuid is mó de na cásanna deimhnithe teoranta don tsín) meon ciníoch doiciméadaithe a cuireadh in iúl i ngrúpaí ar fud an domhain faoi dhaoine na síne atá ‘ tuillte ’ ag an víreas.

translation.en: Chinese people and other asian peoples in the united kingdom and united states have reported increasing levels of racist abuse and assaults.
translation.ga: Thuairiscigh muintir na síne agus pobail áiseacha eile sa ríocht aontaithe agus sna stáit aontaithe leibhéil mhéadaitheacha mí-úsáide agus ionsaithe ciníocha.

translation.en: Former u.s. president donald trump was criticised for referring to the covid-19 as the "chinese virus" and "kung flu", which has been condemned as racist and xenophobic.
translation.ga: Cáineadh iar-uachtarán na stát aontaithe donald trump as tagairt a dhéanamh don covid-19 mar "víreas na síne" agus "kung flu", a cáineadh mar chiníoch agus seineafóbach.

translation.en: On 14 march, an asian family, including a two-year-old girl, was attacked at knifepoint in texas in what the fbi has called a covid-19 related hate crime.
translation.ga: An 14 márta, ionsaíodh teaghlach na háise, lena n-áirítear cailín dhá bhliain d ’ aois, ag pointe scian i texas sa rud ar a thug an fbi coir fuatha a bhaineann le covid-19.

translation.en: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from italy (the first country in europe to experience a serious outbreak of covid-19) were also subjected to suspicion and xenophobia, as were people from hotspots in other countries.
translation.ga: Tar éis dul chun cinn na ráige go tíortha nua le hotspot, cuireadh daoine ón iodáil (an chéad tír san eoraip a raibh ráig thromchúiseach de covid-19 orthu) faoi amhras agus faoi sheineafóibe, mar a rinne daoine ó áiteanna teo i tíortha eile.

translation.en: Discrimination against muslims in india escalated after public health authorities identified an islamic missionary (tablighi jamaat) group's gathering in new delhi in early march 2020 as a source of spread.
translation.ga: Mhéadaigh an t-idirdhealú i gcoinne moslamach san india tar éis d ’ údaráis sláinte poiblí cruinniú grúpa misinéirí ioslamacha (tablighi jamaat) a aithint i new delhi go luath i mí an mhárta 2020 mar fhoinse scaipthe.

translation.en: As of late april 2020, paris had seen riots break out over police treatment of marginalised ethnic groups during the then in-place lockdown.
translation.ga: Amhail deireadh mhí aibreáin 2020, bhí círéibeacha i bpáras tar éis cóireáil na bpóilíní ar ghrúpaí eitneacha imeallaithe le linn an ghlasála a bhí ann ag an am.

translation.en: Racism and xenophobia towards southern and south east asians increased in the arab states of the persian gulf.
translation.ga: Ciníochas agus seineafóibe i dtreo an deiscirtagus mhéadaigh asians an oirdheiscirt i stáit arabacha mhurascaill na peirse.

translation.en: South korea's lgbtq community was blamed by some for the spread of covid-19 in seoul.
translation.ga: Chuir cuid an milleán ar phobal lgbtq na cóiré theas as scaipeadh covid-19 i seoul.

translation.en: In china, some people of african descent were evicted from their homes and told to leave china within 24 hours, due to disinformation that they and other foreigners were spreading the virus.
translation.ga: Sa tsín, díshealbhaíodh daoine áirithe de shliocht na hafraice óna dtithe agus dúradh leo an tsín a fhágáil laistigh de 24 uair an chloig, mar gheall ar dhífhoirmiú go raibh siad féin agus eachtrannaigh eile ag scaipeadh an víris.

translation.en: This racism and xenophobia was criticised by some foreign governments, diplomatic corps, and the chinese ambassador to zimbabwe.
translation.ga: Cháin roinnt rialtas eachtrach, cór taidhleoireachta, agus ambasadóir na síne chun na siombáibe an ciníochas agus an seineafóibe seo.

translation.en: Age-based discrimination against older adults, while already present before the pandemic, was more prevalent during the pandemic.
translation.ga: Bhí idirdhealú bunaithe ar aois i gcoinne daoine fásta níos sine, cé go raibh sé i láthair cheana féin roimh an bpaindéim, níos forleithne le linn na paindéime.

translation.en: This has been attributed to their perceived vulnerability to the virus and subsequent physical and social isolation measures, which, coupled with their already reduced social activity, has increased dependency on others.
translation.ga: Cuireadh é seo i leith a leochaileachta a fheictear don víreas agus na bearta leithlise fisiciúla agus sóisialta ina dhiaidh sin, a mhéadaigh spleáchas ar dhaoine eile, i dteannta lena ngníomhaíocht shóisialta atá laghdaithe cheana féin.

translation.en: Similarly, limited digital literacy has left the elderly more vulnerable to the effects of isolation, depression, and loneliness.
translation.ga: Ar an gcaoi chéanna, d ’ fhág litearthacht dhigiteach theoranta daoine scothaosta níos leochailí i leith éifeachtaí aonraithe, dúlagair agus uaigneas.

translation.en: The pandemic has resulted in many people adapting to massive changes in life, from increased internet commerce activity to the job market.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh ar an bpaindéim tá go leor daoine ag oiriúnú d ’ athruithe ollmhóra sa saol, ó ghníomhaíocht thráchtála idirlín méadaithe go dtí an margadh fostaíochta.

translation.en: Social distancing has caused increased sales from large e-commerce companies such as amazon, alibaba, and coupang.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar fhadú sóisialta tá díolacháin mhéadaithe ó chuideachtaí móra ríomhthráchtála mar amazon, alibaba, agus coupang.

translation.en: Online retailers in the us posted 791.70 billion dollars in sales in 2020, an increase of 32.4% from 598.02 billion dollars from the year before.
translation.ga: Phost miondíoltóirí ar líne sna sa 791.70 billiún dollar i ndíolacháin in 2020, méadú 32.4% ó 598.02 billiún dollar ón mbliain roimhe sin.

translation.en: The trend of home delivery orders have increased due to the pandemic, with indoor dining restaurants shutting down due to lockdown orders or low sales.
translation.ga: Tá méadú tagtha ar threocht na n-orduithe seachadta tí mar gheall ar an bpaindéim, agus bialanna bialainne faoi dhíon ag stopadh mar gheall ar orduithe frithdhúnadh nó díolacháin ísle.

translation.en: Hackers and cybercriminals / scammers have started targeting people due to the massive changes, with some pretending to be part of the cdc, and others using different phishing schemes.
translation.ga: Tá hackers agus cybercriminals / scammers tar éis tosú ag díriú ar dhaoine mar gheall ar na hathruithe ollmhóra, agus tá cuid acu ag ligean orthu féin a bheith mar chuid den cdc, agus cuid eile ag úsáid scéimeanna iascaireachta éagsúla.

translation.en: Education worldwide has increasingly shifted from physical attendance to video conferencing apps such as zoom as lockdown measures have resulted in schools being forced to shut down.
translation.ga: Tá oideachas ar fud an domhain ag athrú níos mó ó fhreastal fisiceach go feidhmchláir físechomhdhála mar zoom mar gheall ar bhearta glasála tá iallach ar scoileanna dúnadh síos.

translation.en: Due to the pandemic, mass layoffs have occurred in the airline, travel, hospitality, and some other industries.
translation.ga: Mar gheall ar an bpaindéim, tharla mais layoffs san aerlíne, taisteal, fáilteachas agus roinnt tionscail eile.

translation.en: (There were no signs of permanent recovery as of may 2021.)
translation.ga: (Ní raibh aon chomharthaí d ’ athshlánú buan amhail bealtaine 20.19.)

translation.en: Ongoing covid-19 research is indexed and searchable in the nih covid-19 portfolio.
translation.ga: Tá taighde leanúnach covid-19 innéacsaithe agus inchuardaithe i bpunann nih covid-19.

translation.en: Some newspaper agencies removed their online paywalls for some or all of their covid-19-related articles and posts, while scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
translation.ga: Tá roinnt gníomhaireachtaí nuachtán a bhaint a gcuid ar líne paywalls do roinnt nó gach ceann dá earraí agus poist covid-19-a bhaineann, agus rinneadh foilsitheoirí eolaíochta páipéir eolaíochta a bhaineann leis an ráig ar fáil le rochtain oscailte.

translation.en: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as biorxiv.
translation.ga: Roghnaigh eolaithe áirithe a dtorthaí a roinnt go tapa ar fhreastalaithe réamhphriontála mar biorxiv.

translation.en: Maps have played a key role in disseminating information concerning the spatial distribution of the disease, especially with the development of dashboards to present data in near real-time.
translation.ga: Bhí ról lárnach ag léarscáileanna maidir le faisnéis a scaipeadh maidir le dáileadh spásúil an ghalair, go háirithe le forbairt dashboards chun sonraí a chur i láthair i bhfíor-am.

translation.en: Methods of data visualisation have drawn some criticism, however, in the over-simplification of geographical patterns indicated by choropleth maps that adopt national, rather than local, map scales.
translation.ga: Tá roinnt cáineadh tarraingthe ag modhanna léirshamhlaithe sonraí, áfach, maidir le ró-shimpliú na bpatrún geografach a léirítear le léarscáileanna coropleth a ghlacann le scálaí léarscáileanna náisiúnta seachas áitiúla.

translation.en: The covid-19 pandemic has resulted in misinformation and conspiracy theories about the scale of the pandemic and the origin, prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of the disease.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh ar an bpaindéim covid-19 tá teoiricí mífhaisnéise agus comhcheilge ann faoi ​ ​ scála na paindéime agus bunús, cosc, diagnóis agus cóireáil an ghalair.

translation.en: False information, including intentional disinformation, has been spread through social media, text messaging, and mass media.
translation.ga: Scaipeadh faisnéis bhréagach, lena n-áirítear dífhoirmiú d ’ aon ghnó, trí na meáin shóisialta, teachtaireachtaí téacs, agus na meáin chumarsáide.

translation.en: Journalists have been arrested for allegedly spreading fake news about the pandemic.
translation.ga: Gabhadh iriseoirí as líomhain gur scaipeadh nuacht bhréige faoin bpaindéim.

translation.en: False information has also been propagated by celebrities, politicians, and other prominent public figures.
translation.ga: Tá faisnéis bhréagach iomadaithe ag daoine cáiliúla, polaiteoirí agus daoine mór le rá poiblí eile.

translation.en: The spread of covid-19 misinformation by governments has also been significant.
translation.ga: Bhí scaipeadh na mífhaisnéise covid-19 suntasach ag rialtais freisin.

translation.en: Commercial scams have claimed to offer at-home tests, supposed preventives, and "miracle" cures.
translation.ga: D' éiligh camscéimeanna tráchtála tástálacha sa bhaile, coisctheacha ceaptha agus leigheasanna "míorúilt" a thairiscint.

translation.en: Several religious groups have claimed their faith will protect them from the virus.
translation.ga: D' éiligh roinnt grúpaí reiligiúnacha go gcosnóidh a gcreideamh iad ón víreas.

translation.en: Without evidence, some people have claimed the virus is a bioweapon accidentally or deliberately leaked from a laboratory, a population control scheme, the result of a spy operation, or the side effect of 5g upgrades to cellular networks.
translation.ga: Gan fianaise, mhaígh daoine áirithe gur bioweapon é an víreas a sceitheadh ​ ​ de thaisme nó d ’ aon ghnó ó shaotharlann, scéim rialaithe daonra, toradh oibríochta spiaireachta, nó fo-iarmhairt uasghrádú 5g ar líonraí ceallacha.

translation.en: The world health organization (who) declared an "infodemic" of incorrect information about the virus that poses risks to global health.
translation.ga: Dhearbhaigh an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte (who) “infodemic ” faisnéise mícheart faoin víreas a chruthaíonn rioscaí do shláinte dhomhanda.

translation.en: While belief in conspiracy theories is not a new phenomenon, in the context of the covid-19 pandemic, this can lead to adverse health effects.
translation.ga: Cé nach feiniméan nua é an creideamh i dteoiricí comhcheilge, i gcomhthéacs na paindéime covid-19, d ’ fhéadfadh drochthionchar sláinte a bheith mar thoradh air seo.

translation.en: Cognitive biases, such as jumping to conclusions and confirmation bias, may be linked to the occurrence of conspiracy beliefs.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh claontachtaí cognaíocha, mar shampla léim go conclúidí agus claontacht dearbhaithe, a bheith nasctha le creideamh comhcheilge a bheith ann.

translation.en: 1 january
translation.ga: 1 eanáir

translation.en: A further 1,754 cases and 11 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 93,532 cases and 2,248 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 1,754 cás agus 11 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 93,532 cás agus 2,248 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: Minister for children, equality, disability, integration and youth roderic o'gorman announced that the resumption of pre-school programmes would be delayed until 11 january, in line with the reopening of primary and secondary schools.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taire leanaí, comhionannas, míchumas, comhtháthú agus an óige roderic o ’ gorman go gcuirfí moill ar atosú clár réamhscoile go dtí an 11 eanáir, ar aon dul le hathoscailt na mbunscoileanna agus na meánscoileanna.

translation.en: 2 january
translation.ga: 2 eanáir

translation.en: A further 3,394 cases and 4 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 96,926 cases and 2,252 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 3,394 cás agus 4 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 96,926 cás agus 2,252 bás.

translation.en: It was revealed that there were approximately 9,000 positive covid-19 tests not yet logged on the hse's it systems, due to both limitations in the software; and lack of staff to check and input details, meaning there is an effective ceiling of approximately 1,700 to 2,000 cases that can be logged each day.
translation.ga: Tugadh le fios go raibh tuairim is 9,000 deimhneach covid-19 tástálacha nach bhfuil logáilte fóill ar an fss 's córais tf, mar gheall ar an dá teorainneacha sna bogearraí; agus easpa foirne chun sonraí a sheiceáil agus a ionchur, rud a chiallaíonn go bhfuil uasteorainn éifeachtach de thart ar 1,700 go 2,000 cás ar féidir iad a logáil gach lá.

translation.en: The director of the national virus reference laboratory cillian de gascun announced that a further 9 cases of the uk variant of covid-19 had been detected in the republic of ireland from 23 december to 29 december, bringing the total number of cases identified to 16.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair stiúrthóir na saotharlainne náisiúnta tagartha víreas cillian de gascun gur braitheadh 9 gcás eile d ’ athróg na ra de covid-19 i bpoblacht na héireann ón 23 nollaig go dtí an 29 nollaig, rud a d ’ fhág go raibh 16 líon iomlán na gcásanna a sainaithníodh.

translation.en: 3 january – a further 4,962 cases and 7 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 101,887 cases and 2,259 deaths.
translation.ga: 3 eanáir - tuairiscíodh 4,962 cás eile agus 7 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 101,887 cás agus 2,259 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: 4 january – a further 6,110 cases and 6 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 107,997 cases and 2,265 deaths.
translation.ga: 4 eanáir - tuairiscíodh 6,110 cás agus 6 bhás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 107,997 cás agus 2,265 bás.

translation.en: 5 january
translation.ga: 5 eanáir

translation.en: A further 5,325 cases and 17 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 113,322 cases and 2,282 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 5,325 cás agus 17 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 113,322 cás agus 2,282 bás.

translation.en: A 95-year-old woman became the first nursing home resident in the republic of ireland to receive the pfizer / biontech covid-19 vaccine.
translation.ga: Ba í bean 95 bliain d ’ aois an chéad teach altranais a chónaigh i bpoblacht na héireann a fuair an vacsaín pfizer / biontech covid-19.

translation.en: An infectious diseases consultant became the first healthcare worker in the mater university hospital to receive the covid-19 vaccine.
translation.ga: Ba é sainchomhairleoir galair thógálacha an chéad oibrí cúram sláinte in ospidéal ollscoile mater a fuair an vacsaín covid-19.

translation.en: Taoiseach micheál martin announced that up to 135,000 people would be vaccinated nationwide by the end of february 2021.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taoiseach micheál martin go ndéanfaí suas le 135,000 duine a vacsaíniú ar fud na tíre faoi dheireadh mhí feabhra 2021.

translation.en: The irish prison service announced that five prisoners in loughan house open centre in county cavan tested positive for covid-19.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair seirbhís phríosúin na héireann go ndearna cúigear príosúnach in ionad oscailte theach loughan i gcontae an chabháin tástáil dhearfach do covid-19.

translation.en: 6 january
translation.ga: 6 eanáir

translation.en: A further 7,836 cases and 17 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 121,154 cases and 2,299 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 7,836 cás eile agus 17 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 121,154 cás agus 2,299 bás.

translation.en: 4 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 4 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The government of ireland agreed a number of new lockdown measures including the closure of all schools until february with leaving certificate students allowed to attend school for three days a week, the closure of all non-essential construction sites with certain exceptions at 6pm on 8 january, the requirement from 9 january for all passengers from the uk and south africa to have a negative pcr test that they acquired within 72 hours of travelling and the prohibition of click-and-collect services for non-essential retail.
translation.ga: An rialtas na héireann aontaithe roinnt beart lockdown nua lena n-áirítear dúnadh na scoileanna go dtí feabhra le hardteistiméireachta daltaí cead ag scoil freastal ar feadh trí lá sa tseachtain, a dhúnadh gach suíomh tógála neamhriachtanacha maille le heisceachtaí áirithe ar 06: 00 an 8 eanáir, an ceanglas ón 9 eanáir go gcaithfidh gach paisinéir ón ra agus ón afraic theas tástáil dhiúltach pcr a dhéanamh a fuair siad laistigh de 72 uair an chloig ó thaisteal agus toirmeasc ar sheirbhísí cliceáil-agus-bailithe le haghaidh miondíola neamhriachtanach.

translation.en: Following the approval of the moderna covid-19 vaccine by the european medicines agency on 6 january 2021, tánaiste leo varadkar announced that the vaccine would allow 10,000 more people in ireland to be vaccinated per week.
translation.ga: Tar éis don ghníomhaireacht leigheasra eorpach an vacsaín moderna covid-19 a fhormheas an 6 eanáir 2021, d ’ fhógair tánaiste leo varadkar go gceadódh an vacsaín vacsaíniú do 10,000 duine níos mó in éirinn in aghaidh na seachtaine.

translation.en: It was announced that minister for justice helen mcentee tested positive for covid-19.
translation.ga: Fógraíodh go ndearna an taire dlí agus cirt helen mcentee tástáil dhearfach ar covid-19.

translation.en: 7 january
translation.ga: 7 eanáir

translation.en: A further 6,521 cases and 10 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 127,657 cases and 2,307 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 6,521 cás agus 10 mbás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 127,657 cás agus 2,307 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified deaths were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 2 bhás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The national public health emergency team confirmed that the backlog of cases due to a delay in reporting positive laboratory results have been cleared.
translation.ga: An fhoireann náisiúnta um shláinte phoiblí éigeandála dhearbhaigh go bhfuil an riaráiste cásanna de bharr moill thuairisciú torthaí saotharlainne dearfacha réitithe.

translation.en: The government of ireland was forced to abandon plans for leaving certificate students to attend school on three days a week, and instead students would return to homeschooling along with other students until february, after the association of secondary teachers, ireland (asti) directed its members not to return to in-school teaching.
translation.ga: An rialtas na héireann cuireadh iachall pleananna thréigean do na hardteistiméireachta daltaí ar scoil freastal ar trí lá sa tseachtain, agus ina ionad sin go mbeadh daltaí ar ais chuig múineadh sa bhaile chomh maith le mic léinn eile go dtí feabhra, tar éis an cumann na meánmhúinteoirí, éire ordaigh (asti) a chomhaltaí gan filleadh ar theagasc inscoile.

translation.en: The rollout of the pfizer / biontech covid-19 vaccine in private and voluntary nursing homes began nationwide, with 22 nursing homes of 3,000 residents and staff to be vaccinated.
translation.ga: Cuireadh tús le rolladh amach an vacsaín pfizer / biontech covid-19 i dtithe altranais príobháideacha agus deonacha ar fud na tíre, agus vacsaíníodh 22 teach altranais le 3,000 cónaitheoir agus ball foirne.

translation.en: Tánaiste leo varadkar announced that the government would consider banning the sale of alcohol after a certain time in a day, while all pubs, restaurants and other businesses were set to remain closed until april.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an tánaiste leo varadkar go mbreithneodh an rialtas toirmeasc a chur ar dhíol alcóil tar éis am áirithe in aghaidh an lae, agus bhí sé beartaithe go bhfanfadh gach teach tábhairne, bialann agus gnóthas eile dúnta go dtí mí aibreáin.

translation.en: 8 january
translation.ga: 8 eanáir

translation.en: A further 8,248 cases (the highest number of confirmed cases recorded in a single day since the pandemic began) and 20 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 135,884 cases and 2,327 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 8,248 cás eile (an líon is mó cásanna dearbhaithe a taifeadadh in aon lá amháin ó thosaigh an paindéim) agus 20 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 135,884 cás agus 2,327 bás.

translation.en: 21 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 21 cás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: In a statement from the national public health emergency team, chief medical officer tony holohan confirmed that three cases of the south african variant of covid-19 had been detected in the republic of ireland by whole genome sequencing associated with travel from south africa.
translation.ga: I ráiteas ón bhfoireann náisiúnta éigeandála sláinte poiblí, dheimhnigh an príomhoifigeach leighis tony holohan gur aimsíodh trí chás d ’ athróg na hafraice theas de covid-19 i bpoblacht na héireann trí sheicheamh géanóm iomlán a bhaineann le taisteal ón afraic theas.

translation.en: 9 january – a further 4,824 cases (including 1 probable case) and 9 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 140,727 cases and 2,336 deaths.
translation.ga: 9 eanáir - tuairiscíodh 4,824 cás eile (lena n-áirítear 1 chás dóchúil) agus 9 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 140,727 cás agus 2,336 bás.

translation.en: 10 january – a further 6,888 cases and 8 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 147,613 cases and 2,344 deaths.
translation.ga: 10 eanáir - tuairiscíodh 6,888 cás agus 8 mbás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 147,613 cás agus 2,344 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 2 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: 11 january
translation.ga: 11 eanáir

translation.en: A further 4,929 cases and 8 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 152,539 cases and 2,352 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 4,929 cás agus 8 mbás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 152,539 cás agus 2,352 bás.

translation.en: 3 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 3 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The purchase of alcohol with supermarket vouchers as well as a number of multi-buy schemes were banned under new legislation that came into effect.
translation.ga: Cuireadh cosc ​ ​ ar alcól a cheannach le dearbháin ollmhargaidh chomh maith le roinnt scéimeanna ilcheannaigh faoi reachtaíocht nua a tháinig i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: Figures revealed by the our world in data organisation showed that ireland had the highest daily number of new confirmed covid-19 cases in the world for every million people.
translation.ga: Léirigh figiúirí a nocht an eagraíocht our world in data go raibh an líon laethúil is airde de chásanna dearbhaithe covid-19 ar domhan in éirinn do gach milliún duine.

translation.en: Gardaí received new covid-19 enforcement powers, including the power to fine people €100 in breach in the 5 km travel limit.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ gardaí cumhachtaí nua forfheidhmithe covid-19, lena n-áirítear an chumhacht fíneáil €100 a ghearradh ar dhaoine sa sárú taistil 5 km.

translation.en: 12 january
translation.ga: 12 eanáir

translation.en: A further 3,086 cases and 46 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 155,591 cases and 2,397 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 3,086 cás eile agus 46 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 155,591 cás agus 2,397 bás.

translation.en: 34 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 34 cás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The government of ireland agreed that all passengers arriving into ireland would need a negative pcr covid-19 test taken 72 hours before departure from saturday 16 january.
translation.ga: An rialtas na héireann aontaíodh go mbeadh ort gach paisinéir ag teacht go héirinn diúltach pcr covid-19 tástála a glacadh 72 uair an chloig roimh imeacht ó dé sathairn 16 eanáir.

translation.en: The first shipment of the moderna covid-19 vaccine arrived in the republic of ireland.
translation.ga: Tháinig an chéad loingsiú den vacsaín moderna covid-19 go poblacht na héireann.

translation.en: The irish prison service announced that three prisoners in portlaoise and mountjoy prisons tested positive for covid-19.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair seirbhís phríosúin na héireann go raibh tástáil dhearfach ar covid-19 ag triúr príosúnach i bpríosúin phort laoise agus mountjoy.

translation.en: 13 january
translation.ga: 13 eanáir

translation.en: A further 3,569 cases and 63 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 159,144 cases and 2,460 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 3,569 cás eile agus 63 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 159,144 cás agus 2,460 bás.

translation.en: 16 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 16 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The irish nurses and midwives organisation (inmo) called for the government to declare a national emergency and for all private hospital capacity to be fully nationalised into the public healthcare system as the number of hospitalisations doubled the peak of april 2020.
translation.ga: D 'iarr eagraíocht altraí agus cnáimhseacha na héireann (inmo) ar an rialtas éigeandáil náisiúnta a dhearbhú agus go ndéanfaí gach acmhainn ospidéil phríobháidigh a náisiúnú go hiomlán sa chóras cúram sláinte poiblí de réir mar a tháinig méadú faoi dhó ar líon na n-ospidéal faoi bhuaicphointe aibreán 2020.

translation.en: 14 january
translation.ga: 14 eanáir

translation.en: A further 3,955 cases and 28 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 163,057 cases and 2,488 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 3,955 cás eile agus 28 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 163,057 cás agus 2,488 bás.

translation.en: 42 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 42 cás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Gardaí issued 29 fines to people breaching the 5 km travel limit over the previous 7 days including three people who travelled 80 km to "collect burgers from a takeaway" in ringsend, dublin.
translation.ga: D' eisigh gardaí 29 fíneáil do dhaoine a sháraigh an teorainn taistil 5 km thar na 7 lá roimhe sin lena n-áirítear triúr a thaistil 80 km chun "borgairí a bhailiú ó beir leat" i ringsend, baile átha cliath.

translation.en: The national transport authority announced that reduced timetables for bus operators in dublin (including dublin bus and go-ahead ireland) would recommence from monday 18 january and would run at 80% capacity.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an túdarás náisiúnta iompair go dtosódh amchláir laghdaithe d ’ oibreoirí bus i mbaile átha cliath (lena n-áirítear bus átha cliath agus go-ahead ireland) ó dé luain 18 eanáir agus go rithfeadh sé ag toilleadh 80%.

translation.en: 15 january
translation.ga: 15 eanáir

translation.en: A further 3,498 cases and 50 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 166,548 cases and 2,536 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 3,498 cás eile agus 50 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 166,548 cás agus 2,536 bás.

translation.en: 7 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 7 gcás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The chief medical officers of ireland and northern ireland tony holohan and michael mcbride issued a joint statement urging everyone to stay at home.
translation.ga: D 'eisigh príomh-oifigigh leighis na héireann agus thuaisceart éireann tony holohan agus michael mcbride comhráiteas ag impí ar gach duine fanacht sa bhaile.

translation.en: 16 january
translation.ga: 16 eanáir

translation.en: A further 3,231 cases and 60 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 169,780 cases and 2,595 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 3,231 cás eile agus 60 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 169,780 cás agus 2,595 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death and 7 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo agus 7 gcás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: Around 1,800 healthcare workers received the moderna covid-19 vaccine at three mass vaccination centres that opened in dublin, galway and portlaoise.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ timpeall 1,800 oibrí cúram sláinte an vacsaín moderna covid-19 ag trí mhórionad vacsaínithe a d ’ oscail i mbaile átha cliath, gaillimh agus port laoise.

translation.en: The department of health announced the suspension of all nursing and midwifery student placements for two weeks due to the impact of the covid-19 pandemic on staffing levels.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an roinn sláinte go gcuirfí gach socrúchán mac léinn altranais agus cnáimhseachais ar fionraí ar feadh coicíse mar gheall ar thionchar na paindéime covid-19 ar leibhéil foirne.

translation.en: 17 january
translation.ga: 17 eanáir

translation.en: A further 2,944 cases and 13 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 172,726 cases and 2,608 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 2,944 cás eile agus 13 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 172,726 cás agus 2,608 bás.

translation.en: The government of ireland requested early deliveries of the oxford – astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine as discussions to secure early delivery of the vaccine got underway.
translation.ga: D 'iarr rialtas na héireann an vacsaín oxford-astrazeneca covid-19 a sheachadadh go luath de réir mar a cuireadh tús le díospóireachtaí chun an vacsaín a sheachadadh go luath.

translation.en: The irish nurses and midwives organisation (inmo) called for further clarity on the decision to suspend nursery and midwifery student placements for two weeks.
translation.ga: D 'iarr eagraíocht altraí agus cnáimhseacha na héireann (inmo) tuilleadh soiléireachta maidir leis an gcinneadh socrúcháin mac léinn naíolann agus cnáimhseachais a chur ar fionraí ar feadh coicíse.

translation.en: 18 january
translation.ga: 18 eanáir

translation.en: A further 2,121 cases and 8 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 174,843 cases and 2,616 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 2,121 cás eile agus 8 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 174,843 cás agus 2,616 bás.

translation.en: 4 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 4 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The number of patients with covid-19 being treated in hospitals around the country reached a record 2,023, with 200 in icus and over 400 people receiving high-grade ventilation and respiratory support.
translation.ga: Shroich líon na n-othar le covid-19 a ndearnadh cóireáil orthu in ospidéil timpeall na tíre an líon is airde ná 2,023, agus fuair 200 in icuanna agus os cionn 400 duine aeráil agus tacaíocht riospráide ardghráid.

translation.en: 19 january
translation.ga: 19 eanáir

translation.en: A further 2,001 cases and 93 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 176,839 cases and 2,708 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 2,001 cás eile agus 93 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 176,839 cás agus 2,708 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death and 5 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo agus 5 chás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: The government of ireland was forced to abandon plans to reopen special schools on thursday 21 january for thousands of children with special educational needs following safety concerns among staff unions.
translation.ga: An rialtas na héireann cuireadh iachall pleananna a athoscailt scoileanna speisialta ar an déardaoin 21 eanáir ar feadh na mílte leanaí a bhfuil riachtanais speisialta oideachais acu seo a leanas ar ábhair imní sábháilteachta i measc ceardchumainn fhoirne thréigean.

translation.en: 20 january
translation.ga: 20 eanáir

translation.en: A further 2,488 cases and 61 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 179,324 cases and 2,768 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 2,488 cás eile agus 61 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 179,324 cás agus 2,768 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified deaths and 3 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo agus 3 chás.

translation.en: The st patrick's day parade in dublin was cancelled for a second year.
translation.ga: Cuireadh paráid lá fhéile pádraig i mbaile átha cliath ar ceal don dara bliain.

translation.en: 21 january – a further 2,608 cases and 51 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 181,922 cases and 2,818 deaths.
translation.ga: 21 eanáir - tuairiscíodh 2,608 cás agus 51 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 181,922 cás agus 2,818 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 bhás a tugadh fógra roimhe seo.

translation.en: 22 january
translation.ga: 22 eanáir

translation.en: A further 2,371 cases and 52 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 184,279 cases and 2,870 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 2,371 cás eile agus 52 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 184,279 cás agus 2,870 bás.

translation.en: 14 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 14 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Taoiseach micheál martin confirmed that there would be no easing of level 5 lockdown restrictions at the end of january and suggested the current restrictions would be in place for at least another four weeks.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh an taoiseach micheál martin nach ndéanfaí maolú ar shrianta frithdhúnadh leibhéal 5 ag deireadh mhí eanáir agus mhol sé go mbeadh na srianta reatha i bhfeidhm go ceann ceithre seachtaine eile ar a laghad.

translation.en: Gardaí issued 771 fines to people breaching the 5 km travel limit since 11 january with the majority issued in wicklow, cork, laois and longford, while 30 fines were issued for the non-wearing of face coverings in certain locations.
translation.ga: D' eisigh gardaí 771 fíneáil do dhaoine a sháraigh an teorainn taistil 5 km ó 11 eanáir agus eisíodh a bhformhór i gcill mhantáin, corcaigh, laois agus an longfort, agus eisíodh 30 fíneáil as gan cumhdaigh aghaidhe a chaitheamh in áiteanna áirithe.

translation.en: Speaking on rté's morning ireland, chief clinical officer of the health service executive (hse) colm henry stated that covid-19 transmission levels remain too high for schools to reopen in february.
translation.ga: Ag labhairt di ar rté 's morning ireland, príomhoifigeach cliniciúil na fheidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte (hse) colm henry dúirt bhfanfaidh leibhéil covid-19 tarchuir ró-ard do scoileanna a oscailt arís i mí feabhra.

translation.en: The health service executive (hse) confirmed that 11 residents of a nursing home in north county dublin died after testing positive for covid-19.
translation.ga: An feidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte dheimhnigh (hse) gur 11 cónaitheoirí i dteach altranais i north chontae bhaile átha cliath a fuair bás tar éis tástáil dearfach don covid-19.

translation.en: 23 january
translation.ga: 23 eanáir

translation.en: A further 1,910 cases and 77 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 186,184 cases and 2,947 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 1,910 cás eile agus 77 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 186,184 cás agus 2,947 bás.

translation.en: 5 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 5 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Speaking on rté's brendan o'connor programme, taoiseach micheál martin stated that covid-19 vaccinations for people over the age of 70 may be delayed due to issues with the supply of the oxford – astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine, and also stated that covid-19 restrictions would be in place for at least the first six months of the year and that not all of the 1 million students nationwide would be back in school before st patrick's day.
translation.ga: Ag labhairt di ar rté 's clár brendan o' connor, taoiseach micheál martin dúirt gur féidir covid-19 vacsaíní do dhaoine atá os cionn 70 go gcuirfí moill mar gheall ar cheisteanna le soláthar an oxford-astrazeneca covid-19 vacsaín, agus freisin dúirt bheadh ​ ​ srianta covid-19 i bhfeidhm don chéad sé mhí den bhliain ar a laghad agus nach mbeadh gach ceann de na 1 mhilliún mac léinn ar fud na tíre ar ais ar scoil roimh lá fhéile pádraig.

translation.en: 24 january – a further 1,378 cases and 23 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 187,554 cases and 2,970 deaths.
translation.ga: 24 eanáir - tuairiscíodh 1,378 cás eile agus 23 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 187,554 cás agus 2,970 bás.

translation.en: 8 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 8 gcás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: 25 january
translation.ga: 25 eanáir

translation.en: A further 1,372 cases and 7 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 188,923 cases and 2,977 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 1,372 cás agus 7 mbás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 188,923 cás agus 2,977 bás.

translation.en: 3 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 3 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Gardaí warned that foreign holidays were not deemed essential as 1,500 fines were issued to people breaching the 5 km travel limit in the previous two weeks.
translation.ga: Thug gardaí foláireamh nár measadh go raibh laethanta saoire eachtracha riachtanach mar eisíodh 1,500 fíneáil do dhaoine a sháraigh an teorainn taistil 5 km sa choicís roimhe sin.

translation.en: Minister for health stephen donnelly announced that community vaccination of people aged 70 and over would begin in mid-february.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taire sláinte stephen donnelly go dtosódh vacsaíniú pobail daoine 70 bliain d ’ aois agus níos sine i lár mhí feabhra.

translation.en: A meat processing plant in bunclody, county wexford confirmed 42 cases of covid-19 following screening of all staff on 15 january.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh monarcha próiseála feola i bunclody, contae loch garman 42 cás de covid-19 tar éis an fhoireann go léir a scagadh an 15 eanáir.

translation.en: The garda síochána, health service executive (hse) and the department of health warned the public to be aware of possible scam text messages and phone calls relating to the covid-19 vaccine.
translation.ga: Thug an garda síochána, feidhmeannach na seirbhíse sláinte (fss) agus an roinn sláinte rabhadh don phobal a bheith ar an eolas faoi theachtaireachtaí téacs scam agus glaonna teileafóin a bhaineann leis an vacsaín covid-19.

translation.en: 26 january
translation.ga: 26 eanáir

translation.en: A further 928 cases and 90 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 189,851 cases and 3,066 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 928 cás eile agus 90 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 189,851 cás agus 3,066 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 bhás a tugadh fógra roimhe seo.

translation.en: In a statement from the national public health emergency team, chief medical officer tony holohan confirmed that a further 6 cases of the south african variant of covid-19 had been detected in the republic of ireland.
translation.ga: I ráiteas ón bhfoireann náisiúnta éigeandála sláinte poiblí, dheimhnigh an príomhoifigeach leighis tony holohan gur aimsíodh 6 chás eile d ’ athróg na hafraice theas de covid-19 i bpoblacht na héireann.

translation.en: The government of ireland announced the extension of the level 5 lockdown restrictions until 5 march, along with a number of new measures including a mandatory 14-day quarantine period for all people travelling into the country without a negative covid-19 test, including all arrivals from brazil and south africa.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair rialtas na héireann síneadh na srianta glasála leibhéal 5 go dtí 5 márta, mar aon le roinnt beart nua lena n-áirítear tréimhse éigeantach coraintín 14 lá do gach duine a thaistealaíonn isteach sa tír gan tástáil dhiúltach covid-19, lena n-áirítear gach duine a thagann isteach ón mbrasaíl agus ón afraic theas.

translation.en: The government made the wearing of face coverings in all banks, credit unions and post offices mandatory.
translation.ga: Chuir an rialtas éigeantach cumhdaigh aghaidhe a dhéanamh i ngach banc, comhar creidmheasa agus oifig poist.

translation.en: Talks between the department of education and unions continued with hopes that schools would be able to reopen on a phased basis between february and march.
translation.ga: Lean cainteanna idir an roinn oideachais agus ceardchumainn le súil go mbeadh scoileanna in ann athoscailt ar bhonn céimnithe idir feabhra agus márta.

translation.en: 27 january – a further 1,335 cases and 54 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 191,182 cases and 3,120 deaths.
translation.ga: 27 eanáir - tuairiscíodh 1,335 cás eile agus 54 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 191,182 cás agus 3,120 bás.

translation.en: 4 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 4 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: 28 january – a further 1,466 cases and 47 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 192,645 cases and 3,167 deaths.
translation.ga: 28 eanáir - tuairiscíodh 1,466 cás eile agus 47 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 192,645 cás agus 3,167 bás.

translation.en: 3 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 3 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: 29 january
translation.ga: 29 eanáir

translation.en: A further 1,254 cases and 48 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 193,892 cases and 3,214 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 1,254 cás agus 48 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 193,892 cás agus 3,214 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death and 7 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo agus 7 gcás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: Ireland was expected to receive 300,000 fewer doses of the oxford – astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine by the end of march as a result of a shortfall in deliveries to the eu.
translation.ga: Bhíothas ag súil go bhfaigheadh ​ ​ éire 300,000 dáileog níos lú den vacsaín oxford-astrazeneca covid-19 faoi ​ ​ dheireadh mhí an mhárta mar thoradh ar easnamh i seachadtaí chuig an ae.

translation.en: Gardaí issued more than 2,400 fines to people breaching the 5 km travel limit in the previous two weeks, including a man who travelled 200 km to "collect a puppy as a gift" in cork.
translation.ga: D' eisigh gardaí níos mó ná 2,400 fíneálacha do dhaoine a sháraigh an teorainn taistil 5 km sa choicís roimhe sin, lena n-áirítear fear a thaistil 200 km chun "cuileog a bhailiú mar bhronntanas" i gcorcaigh.

translation.en: 30 january
translation.ga: 30 eanáir

translation.en: A further 1,414 cases and 79 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 195,303 cases and 3,292 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 1,414 cás eile agus 79 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 195,303 cás agus 3,292 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death and 3 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo agus 3 chás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: Chief medical officer tony holohan announced that more cases had been confirmed in one month than throughout 2020 with over 1,000 deaths and more than 100,000 cases confirmed in january.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an príomhoifigeach leighis tony holohan gur deimhníodh níos mó cásanna in aon mhí amháin ná i rith 2020 le níos mó ná 1,000 bás agus níos mó ná 100,000 cás dearbhaithe i mí eanáir.

translation.en: Speaking on rté radio 1's saturday with katie hannon, the director of the national virus reference laboratory cillian de gascun stated that there was no significant transmission of the south african covid-19 variant in ireland as cases of the variant identified had been contained.
translation.ga: Ag labhairt di ar rté radio 1 's dé sathairn le katie hannon, stiúrthóir an víreas náisiúnta tagartha saotharlainne cillian de gascun dúirt nach raibh aon tarchur suntasach ar an hafraice theas covid-19 athraitheach in éirinn mar chásanna den leagan aithníodh bhí le fáil.

translation.en: 31 january – a further 1,247 cases and 15 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 196,547 cases and 3,307 deaths.
translation.ga: 31 eanáir - tuairiscíodh 1,247 cás agus 15 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 196,547 cás agus 3,307 bás.

translation.en: 3 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 3 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: February 2021
translation.ga: Feabhra 2021

translation.en: 1 february
translation.ga: 1 feabhra

translation.en: A further 1,062 cases and 10 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 197,553 cases and 3,317 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 1,062 cás eile agus 10 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 197,553 cás agus 3,317 bás.

translation.en: 57 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 57 cás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The department of education agreed to reopen special schools with 50% capacity on thursday 11 february and special classes in mainstream schools on monday 22 february.
translation.ga: Chomhaontaigh an roinn oideachais scoileanna speisialta a athoscailt le toilleadh 50% déardaoin 11 feabhra agus ranganna speisialta i scoileanna príomhshrutha dé luain 22 feabhra.

translation.en: Europol warned travellers to watch for organised crime gangs selling fake negative covid-19 certificates at airports.
translation.ga: Thug europol rabhadh do thaistealaithe féachaint ar bhuíonta coireachta eagraithe a dhíolann teastais bhréige diúltacha covid-19 ag aerfoirt.

translation.en: Latest figures showed that in the last 4 days of january, gardaí fined 280 people at dublin airport for leaving the country for non-essential travel, while more than 3,500 fines had been issued in total for breaches of covid-19 regulations, with 2,100 fines for travelling without a reasonable excuse.
translation.ga: Thaispeáin na figiúirí is déanaí gur ghearr gardaí fíneáil ar 280 duine ag aerfort bhaile átha cliath sa 4 lá deiridh d ’ eanáir as an tír a fhágáil le haghaidh taistil neamhriachtanach, agus gur eisíodh níos mó ná 3,500 fíneáil san iomlán as sáruithe ar rialacháin covid-19, le 2,100 fíneáil as taisteal gan leithscéal réasúnach.

translation.en: A nursing home in tuam, county galway appealed for help from qualified nurses following the deaths of 12 residents due to covid-19.
translation.ga: Rinne teach altranais i dtuaim, contae na gaillimhe achomharc ar chabhair ó altraí cáilithe tar éis bás 12 cónaitheoir mar gheall ar covid-19.

translation.en: It was announced that more than 30 residents of 4 cork nursing homes and a community hospital in kerry died in the previous two weeks following covid-19 outbreaks.
translation.ga: Fógraíodh go bhfuair níos mó ná 30 cónaitheoir i 4 theach altranais i gcorcaigh agus ospidéal pobail i gciarraí bás sa choicís roimhe sin tar éis ráigeanna covid-19.

translation.en: 2 february
translation.ga: 2 feabhra

translation.en: A further 879 cases and 101 deaths (the highest number of confirmed deaths recorded in a single day since the pandemic began) were reported, bringing the totals to 198,424 cases and 3,418 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 879 cás eile agus 101 bás (an líon is mó básanna dearbhaithe a taifeadadh in aon lá amháin ó thosaigh an paindéim), rud a thug na hiomláin go 198,424 cás agus 3,418 bás.

translation.en: 8 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 8 gcás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Latest figures showed a total of 1,543 staff and residents in nursing homes died during the pandemic with 369 in january alone.
translation.ga: Léirigh na figiúirí is déanaí go bhfuair 1,543 ball foirne agus cónaitheoir i dtithe altranais bás le linn na paindéime le 369 i mí eanáir amháin.

translation.en: Over 2,000 students who sat the postponed written leaving certificate exams in november 2020 received their results, with over 40% of the grades higher than the calculated grades students had received.
translation.ga: Fuair níos mó ná 2,000 mac léinn a rinne na scrúduithe scríofa ardteistiméireachta i bhfeidhm i mí na samhna 2020 a dtorthaí, agus bhí níos mó ná 40% de na gráid níos airde ná na gráid ríofa a fuair na mic léinn.

translation.en: 3 february
translation.ga: 3 feabhra

translation.en: A further 1,013 cases and 94 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 199,430 cases and 3,512 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 1,013 cás eile agus 94 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 199,430 cás agus 3,512 bás.

translation.en: 7 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 7 gcás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Another outbreak of covid-19 at a direct provision centre in newbridge, county kildare was confirmed.
translation.ga: Deimhníodh ráig eile de covid-19 ag ionad soláthair dhírigh i ndroichead nua, contae chill dara.

translation.en: The department of public health expressed concern over increases in covid-19 transmission linked to social gatherings involving the student population in the mid-west region.
translation.ga: Chuir an roinn sláinte poiblí imní in iúl faoi mhéaduithe ar tharchur covid-19 atá nasctha le cruinnithe sóisialta ina bhfuil daonra na mac léinn i réigiún an iarthair thiar.

translation.en: 4 february
translation.ga: 4 feabhra

translation.en: A further 1,318 cases and 75 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 200,744 cases and 3,586 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 1,318 cás eile agus 75 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 200,744 cás agus 3,586 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death and 4 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo agus 4 chás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: The total number of covid-19 cases in ireland surpassed 200,000 cases, with over half confirmed in 2021.
translation.ga: Sháraigh líon iomlán na gcásanna covid-19 in éirinn 200,000 cás, agus dearbhaíodh níos mó ná a leath in 2021.

translation.en: Minister for health stephen donnelly signed new regulations that empower gardaí to call to the homes of people who arrive from international travel and ensure that they are abiding by mandatory quarantine rules, with a €2,500 fine or an imprisonment sentence of 6 months for non-compliance.
translation.ga: Shínigh an taire sláinte stephen donnelly rialacháin nua a thugann cumhacht do ghardaí glaoch chuig tithe daoine a thagann ó thaisteal idirnáisiúnta agus a chinntíonn go bhfuil siad ag cloí le rialacha éigeantacha coraintín, le fíneáil €2,500 nó pianbhreith príosúnachta 6 mhí as neamhchomhlíonadh.

translation.en: 5 february
translation.ga: 5 feabhra

translation.en: A further 1,047 cases and 35 deaths were reported, bringing the totals 201,763 cases and 3,621 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 1,047 cás agus 35 bás eile, rud a thug iomlán de 201,763 cás agus 3,621 bás.

translation.en: 28 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 28 cás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Minister for education norma foley announced a new phase of planning for the leaving certificate examinations.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taire oideachais norma foley céim nua sa phleanáil do na scrúduithe ardteistiméireachta.

translation.en: Gardaí issued more than 375 fines to people breaching the 5 km travel limit over the previous 7 days, bringing the total number of breaches to over 4,600.
translation.ga: D' eisigh gardaí níos mó ná 375 fíneáil ar dhaoine a sháraigh an teorainn taistil 5 km thar na 7 lá roimhe sin, rud a thug líon iomlán na sáruithe go dtí os cionn 4,600.

translation.en: Minister for health stephen donnelly announced that the first batches of 21,600 doses of the astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine would arrive in the weekend, with 190,000 doses expected to arrive by the end of february.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taire sláinte stephen donnelly go sroichfeadh na chéad bhaisc de 21,600 dáileog den vacsaín astrazeneca covid-19 an deireadh seachtaine, agus táthar ag súil go dtiocfaidh 190,000 dáileog faoi dheireadh mhí feabhra.

translation.en: 6 february
translation.ga: 6 feabhra

translation.en: A further 827 cases and 55 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 202,548 cases and 3,674 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 827 cás agus 55 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 202,548 cás agus 3,674 bás.

translation.en: 42 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 42 cás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The first shipment of 21,600 astrazeneca covid-19 vaccines arrived in the republic of ireland.
translation.ga: Tháinig an chéad loingsiú de 21,600 vacsaín astrazeneca covid-19 go poblacht na héireann.

translation.en: 7 february – a further 1,024 cases and 12 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 203,568 cases and 3,686 deaths.
translation.ga: 7 feabhra - tuairiscíodh 1,024 cás agus 12 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 203,568 cás agus 3,686 bás.

translation.en: 4 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 4 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: 8 february
translation.ga: 8 feabhra

translation.en: A further 829 cases and 6 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 204,397 cases and 3,687 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 829 cás agus 6 bhás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 204,397 cás agus 3,687 bás.

translation.en: 5 previously notified deaths were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 5 bhás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo in iúl.

translation.en: Minister for housing, local government and heritage darragh o'brien confirmed that the government is working to reopen the construction sector on 5 march.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh an taire tithíochta, rialtais áitiúil agus oidhreachta darragh o' brien go bhfuil an rialtas ag obair chun an earnáil tógála a athoscailt an 5 márta.

translation.en: People living in northern ireland who cross the border without a reasonable excuse face a €100 fine from today.
translation.ga: Gearrtar fíneáil €100 ar dhaoine atá ina gcónaí i dtuaisceart éireann a thrasnaíonn an teorainn gan leithscéal réasúnach ón lá inniu.

translation.en: 9 february
translation.ga: 9 feabhra

translation.en: A further 556 cases and 68 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 204,940 cases and 3,752 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 556 cás eile agus 68 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 204,940 cás agus 3,752 bás.

translation.en: 3 previously notified deaths and 13 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 3 bhás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo agus 13 chás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: The government of ireland announced funding of €160 million in additional supports for businesses affected by covid-19.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair rialtas na héireann maoiniú de €160 milliún i dtacaí breise do ghnólachtaí a bhfuil tionchar ag covid-19 orthu.

translation.en: Tánaiste leo varadkar announced that the government is working on a revised version of the "living with covid-19" plan which he hoped would be announced in the week of 22 february.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an tánaiste leo varadkar go bhfuil an rialtas ag obair ar leagan athbhreithnithe den phlean “living with covid-19 ” a raibh súil aige a fhógrófaí i seachtain an 22 feabhra.

translation.en: Latest figures released by the national public health emergency team showed that more than one in three deaths from covid-19 in february reported were associated with outbreaks in nursing homes.
translation.ga: Léirigh na figiúirí is déanaí a d ’ eisigh an fhoireann éigeandála náisiúnta sláinte poiblí go raibh baint ag níos mó ná bás amháin as gach triúr ó covid-19 i mí feabhra le ráigeanna i dtithe altranais.

translation.en: 10 february
translation.ga: 10 feabhra

translation.en: A further 1,006 cases and 54 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 205,939 cases and 3,794 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 1,006 cás eile agus 54 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 205,939 cás agus 3,794 bás.

translation.en: 12 previously notified deaths and 7 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 12 bhás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo agus 7 gcás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: Taoiseach micheál martin announced that fines for non-essential travel abroad would be increased from €500 to €2,000, after a request was made to minister for health stephen donnelly to sign off on the increase.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taoiseach micheál martin go méadófaí fíneálacha as taisteal neamhriachtanach thar lear ó €500 go €2,000, tar éis iarraidh a dhéanamh ar an aire sláinte stephen donnelly an t-ardú a shíniú.

translation.en: Minister for education norma foley and minister of state for special education and inclusion josepha madigan announced details of a return to in-school teaching and learning for students attending special classes in secondary schools from monday 22 february, after a deal was agreed between teacher and sna trade unions and the department of education.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taire oideachais norma foley agus an taire stáit um oideachas speisialta agus cuimsiú josepha madigan mionsonraí maidir le filleadh ar theagasc agus foghlaim inscoile do mhic léinn atá ag freastal ar ranganna speisialta i meánscoileanna ón luan 22 feabhra, tar éis do chomhaontú idir an múinteoir agus crs comhaontú a fháil, ceardchumainn agus an roinn oideachais.

translation.en: Speaking on rté's today with claire byrne, director of the national virus reference laboratory cillian de gascun stated that the government should be vaccinated as soon as possible and that taoiseach micheál martin should receive his vaccine ahead of travel if he is to visit the united states for st patrick's day.
translation.ga: Ag labhairt di ar rté sa lá atá inniu le claire byrne, stiúrthóir ar an víreas náisiúnta tagartha saotharlainne cillian de gascun gur cheart don rialtas a vacsaíniú a luaithe is féidir agus go taoiseach micheál martin ba cheart go bhfaigheadh a vacsaín chun tosaigh ar taistil má tá sé chun cuairt a thabhairt ar an stát aontaithe do lá fhéile pádraig.

translation.en: The world health organization praised ireland's recovery from the third wave of covid-19 but warned of the danger of a fourth wave.
translation.ga: Mhol an eagraíocht dhomhanda sláinte téarnamh na héireann ó an tríú sraith de covid-19 ach rabhadh ar an mbaol a ceathrú tonn

translation.en: 11 february
translation.ga: 11 feabhra

translation.en: A further 866 cases and 52 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 206,801 deaths 3,846 cases.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 866 cás eile agus 52 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 206,801 bás 3,846 cás.

translation.en: 4 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 4 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Up to 4,000 children with additional educational needs returned to in-person education as special schools nationwide reopened their doors, under plans agreed between the department of education and teacher and sna trade unions.
translation.ga: D ’ fhill suas le 4,000 leanbh le riachtanais bhreise oideachais ar oideachas pearsanta mar a d ’ oscail scoileanna speisialta ar fud na tíre a ndoirse, faoi phleananna a comhaontaíodh idir an roinn oideachais agus ceardchumainn múinteoirí agus crs.

translation.en: The association of secondary teachers, ireland (asti) withdrew from discussions with the department of education on the leaving certificate 2021 after it said that the plan being developed would not provide a "meaningful leaving certificate" for students.
translation.ga: Tharraing cumann na múinteoirí meánscoile, éire (asti) siar ó phlé leis an roinn oideachais ar ardteistiméireacht 2021 tar éis a rá nach gcuirfeadh an plean atá á fhorbairt “ardteistiméireacht bhríoch ” ar fáil do mhic léinn.

translation.en: Speaking on rté's morning ireland, taoiseach micheál martin stated that the majority of the current level 5 lockdown restrictions were set to be extended until the easter period, with only schools and the construction sector likely to be allowed to reopen before easter.
translation.ga: Ag labhairt dó ar morning ireland ar rté, dúirt an taoiseach micheál martin go raibh sé beartaithe formhór na srianta glasála reatha leibhéal 5 a leathnú go dtí tréimhse na cásca, agus ní dócha go gceadófaí ach do scoileanna agus don earnáil tógála athoscailt roimh an gcáisc.

translation.en: Director-general of the health service executive (hse) paul reid suggested that healthcare workers who refuse to take the covid-19 vaccine may be removed from their frontline duties.
translation.ga: Mhol ard-stiúrthóir fheidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte (fss) paul reid go bhféadtar oibrithe cúram sláinte a dhiúltaíonn an vacsaín covid-19 a ghlacadh óna ndualgais túslíne.

translation.en: 12 february
translation.ga: 12 feabhra

translation.en: A further 921 cases and 23 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 207,720 cases and 3,865 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 921 cás eile agus 23 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 207,720 cás agus 3,865 bás.

translation.en: 4 previously notified deaths and 2 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Rinneadh 4 bhás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo agus 2 chás a dhífhógairt.

translation.en: The department of health added a further 18 countries to the government's covid-19 "high-risk" list for international travel.
translation.ga: Chuir an roinn sláinte 18 tír eile le liosta “ardriosca ” covid-19 an rialtais le haghaidh taistil idirnáisiúnta.

translation.en: The countries added were: Angola, austria, botswana, burundi, cape verde, democratic republic of the congo, lesotho, malawi, eswatini, mauritius, mozambique, namibia, rwanda, seychelles, tanzania, united arab emirates, zambia and zimbabwe.
translation.ga: Ba iad na tíortha a cuireadh leis: Angóla, an ostair, an bhotsuáin, an bhurúin, rinn verde, poblacht dhaonlathach an chongó, leosóta, an mhaláiv, eswatini, oileán mhuirís, mósaimbíc, an namaib, ruanda, na séiséil, an tansáin, aontas na néimíríochtaí arabacha, an tsaimbia agus an tsiombáib.

translation.en: Speaking on rté's morning ireland, chair of the nphet irish epidemiological modelling advisory group philip nolan stated that it would be at least six weeks before covid-19 cases drop to around 100 a day and that the country should be at around 200 – 400 cases a day heading into march and approaching 100 – 200 cases a day by the end of march.
translation.ga: Ag labhairt dó ar morning ireland ar rté, dúirt cathaoirleach ghrúpa comhairleach um shamhaltú eipidéimeolaíoch na héireann philip nolan go mbeadh sé seachtaine ar a laghad sula dtitfeadh cásanna covid-19 go dtí timpeall 100 in aghaidh an lae agus gur chóir go mbeadh an tír ag thart ar 200 – 400 cás a lá ag dul isteach i mí an mhárta agus ag druidim le 100-200 cás in aghaidh an lae faoi dheireadh mhí an mhárta.

translation.en: Gardaí issued more than 6,500 fines to people breaching covid-19 regulations over the past month, with over 4,900 fines issued for non-essential travel.
translation.ga: D' eisigh gardaí níos mó ná 6,500 fíneáil ar dhaoine a sháraigh rialacháin covid-19 le mí anuas, agus eisíodh níos mó ná 4,900 fíneáil as taisteal neamhriachtanach.

translation.en: It was confirmed that the traditional st patrick's day meeting between us president joe biden and taoiseach micheál martin at the white house would take place virtually due to the covid-19 pandemic.
translation.ga: Deimhníodh go mbeadh an cruinniú traidisiúnta lá fhéile pádraig idir uachtarán na stát aontaithe joe biden agus an taoiseach micheál martin ag an teach bán ar siúl beagnach mar gheall ar an bpaindéim covid-19.

translation.en: 13 february
translation.ga: 13 feabhra

translation.en: A further 1,078 cases and 66 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 208,796 cases and 3,931 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 1,078 cás eile agus 66 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 208,796 cás agus 3,931 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 2 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The association of secondary teachers, ireland (asti) re-joined discussions with the department of education on the leaving certificate 2021 after pulling out on 11 february.
translation.ga: Chuaigh cumann múinteoirí meánscoile, éire (asti) isteach arís i bplé leis an roinn oideachais ar ardteistiméireacht 2021 tar éis tarraingt amach an 11 feabhra.

translation.en: The pace of the covid-19 vaccine rollout in ireland was set to increase from monday 15 february with the first doses administered to over-85s in the community and the first widespread use of the astrazeneca vaccine.
translation.ga: Bhí sé beartaithe go méadóidh luas rolladh amach na vacsaíne covid-19 in éirinn ón luan 15 feabhra agus na chéad dáileoga á riaradh do dhaoine os cionn 85 sa phobal agus an chéad úsáid fhorleathan den vacsaín astrazeneca.

translation.en: 14 february – a further 788 cases and 17 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 209,582 cases and 3,948 deaths.
translation.ga: 14 feabhra - tuairiscíodh 788 cás eile agus 17 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 209,582 cás agus 3,948 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 2 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: 15 february
translation.ga: 15 feabhra

translation.en: A further 821 cases and no deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 210,402 cases and 3,948 deaths.
translation.ga: Níor tuairiscíodh 821 cás eile agus níor tuairiscíodh aon bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 210,402 cás agus 3,948 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: Minister for health stephen donnelly confirmed locations for 37 vaccination centres across all counties as part of the country's covid-19 vaccination programme.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh an taire sláinte stephen donnelly suíomhanna do 37 ionad vacsaínithe ar fud na gcontaetha go léir mar chuid de chlár vacsaínithe covid-19 na tíre.

translation.en: Vaccines officially began for the third cohort in ireland's prioritisation list, with over 80,000 people expected to receive covid-19 vaccines.
translation.ga: Thosaigh vacsaíní go hoifigiúil don tríú cohórt ar liosta tosaíochta na héireann, agus táthar ag súil go bhfaighidh níos mó ná 80,000 duine vacsaíní covid-19.

translation.en: It was announced that two universities in galway and limerick had been hit by major covid-19 outbreaks of up to nearly 250 confirmed cases due to students breaching level 5 lockdown regulations, which caused clusters of infection involving up to 40 people.
translation.ga: Fógraíodh go raibh ráigeanna móra covid-19 de suas le beagnach 250 cás dearbhaithe buailte ag dhá ollscoil i ngaillimh agus i luimneach mar gheall ar mhic léinn a sháraigh rialacháin frithdhúnadh leibhéal 5, a d ’ fhág go raibh braislí ionfhabhtaithe ina raibh suas le 40 duine páirteach.

translation.en: 16 february – a further 744 cases and 33 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 211,113 cases and 3,980 deaths.
translation.ga: 16 feabhra - tuairiscíodh 744 cás eile agus 33 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 211,113 cás agus 3,980 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death and 33 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo agus 33 cás ar an eolas.

translation.en: 17 february
translation.ga: 17 feabhra

translation.en: A further 650 cases and 57 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 211,751 cases and 4,036 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 650 cás eile agus 57 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 211,751 cás agus 4,036 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death and 12 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo agus 12 chás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: Ireland's covid-19 death toll surpassed 4,000 as deputy chief medical officer ronan glynn announced that 90% of covid-19 cases in ireland were the uk variant of covid-19.
translation.ga: Sháraigh dola báis covid-19 na héireann 4,000 mar a d ’ fhógair leas-phríomhoifigeach leighis ronan glynn gurb é 90% de chásanna covid-19 in éirinn an leagan ra de covid-19.

translation.en: Minister for education norma foley confirmed that leaving certificate examinations would proceed with students given the option between a modified version of calculated grades or written exams, while junior certificate examinations were cancelled for a second year in a row.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh an taire oideachais norma foley go rachadh scrúduithe ardteistiméireachta ar aghaidh le mic léinn i bhfianaise na rogha idir leagan modhnaithe de ghráid ríofa nó scrúduithe scríofa, agus cuireadh scrúduithe an teastais shóisearaigh ar ceal don dara bliain as a chéile.

translation.en: Four people, including two politicians, were expected to face charges over alleged breaches of covid-19 regulations during an oireachtas golf society event in clifden, galway in august 2020.
translation.ga: Bhíothas ag súil go mbeadh ceathrar, lena n-áirítear beirt pholaiteoirí, os comhair cúisimh maidir le sáruithe líomhnaithe ar rialacháin covid-19 le linn imeachta de chuid chumann gailf an oireachtais i gclochán, gaillimh i mí lúnasa 2020.

translation.en: 18 february – a further 901 cases and 47 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 212,647 cases and 4,082 deaths.
translation.ga: 18 feabhra - tuairiscíodh 901 cás eile agus 47 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 212,647 cás agus 4,082 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death and 5 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo agus 5 chás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: 19 february
translation.ga: 19 feabhra

translation.en: A further 763 cases and 28 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 213,400 cases and 4,109 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 763 cás eile agus 28 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 213,400 cás agus 4,109 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death and 10 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo agus 10 gcás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: In a statement from the national public health emergency team, deputy chief medical officer ronan glynn confirmed that three cases of the brazilian variant of covid-19 had been detected in the republic of ireland all associated with travel from brazil.
translation.ga: I ráiteas ón bhfoireann náisiúnta éigeandála sláinte poiblí, dhearbhaigh an leas-phríomhoifigeach leighis ronan glynn gur braitheadh trí chás den leagan brasaíle de covid-19 i bpoblacht na héireann agus iad go léir bainteach le taisteal ón mbrasaíl.

translation.en: Strict level 5 restrictions were expected to remain in place until may as all primary school students were to return by 15 march, with the first four classes in primary schools and leaving certificate students the first to return on 1 march.
translation.ga: Bhíothas ag súil go bhfanfadh srianta dochta leibhéal 5 i bhfeidhm go dtí mí na bealtaine mar go mbeadh gach dalta bunscoile ag filleadh faoin 15 márta, agus na chéad cheithre rang i mbunscoileanna agus mic léinn ardteistiméireachta an chéad cheann le filleadh ar 1 márta.

translation.en: Latest figures showed that as of 18 february, gardaí had issued over 8,000 fines to people breaching covid-19 regulations, with over 6,500 fines issued for non-essential travel and 944 fines issued for attending or hosting house parties.
translation.ga: Thaispeáin na figiúirí is déanaí gur eisigh gardaí, amhail an 18 feabhra, os cionn 8,000 fíneáil do dhaoine a sháraigh rialacháin covid-19, agus eisíodh níos mó ná 6,500 fíneáil as taisteal neamhriachtanach agus 944 fíneáil eisithe as freastal ar pháirtithe tí nó iad a óstáil.

translation.en: Taoiseach micheál martin expressed his condolences to chief medical officer tony holohan and his family after his wife, emer, died following a long illness with multiple myeloma.
translation.ga: Chuir an taoiseach micheál martin a chomhbhrón in iúl don phríomhoifigeach leighis tony holohan agus dá theaghlach tar éis dá bhean chéile, emer, bás a fháil tar éis breoiteachta fada le myeloma iolrach.

translation.en: 20 february
translation.ga: 20 feabhra

translation.en: A further 988 cases and 26 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 214,378 cases and 4,135 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 988 cás agus 26 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 214,378 cás agus 4,135 bás.

translation.en: 10 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 10 gcás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Speaking on rté's raidió na gaeltachta, taoiseach micheál martin stated that pubs and restaurants would likely not reopen until the middle of the summer.
translation.ga: Ag labhairt dó ar raidió na gaeltachta de chuid rté, dúirt an taoiseach micheál martin gur dócha nach n-athosclódh tithe tábhairne agus bialanna go dtí lár an tsamhraidh.

translation.en: Nearly 1,000 patients over the age of 85 received their first dose of a covid-19 vaccine at the country's first mass vaccination centre at the helix in dublin city university.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ beagnach 1,000 othar os cionn 85 bliana d ’ aois a gcéad dáileog de vacsaín covid-19 ag an gcéad ionad oll-vacsaínithe sa tír ag an helix in ollscoil chathair bhaile átha cliath.

translation.en: Following a request from the health service executive (hse), the irish air corps delivered the first consignment of covid-19 vaccines to the aran islands in county galway and to árainn mhór in county donegal.
translation.ga: Tar éis iarratas a fháil ó fheidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte (fss), sheachaid aerchór na héireann an chéad choinsíneacht de vacsaíní covid-19 chuig oileáin árann i gcontae na gaillimhe agus chuig árainn mhór i gcontae dhún na ngall.

translation.en: The department of foreign affairs announced that the passport service had suspended most of its operations due to level 5 restrictions, with holidaymakers facing delays of up to two months in securing a passport.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an roinn gnóthaí eachtracha go raibh an tseirbhís pas tar éis an chuid is mó dá hoibríochtaí a chur ar fionraí mar gheall ar shrianta leibhéal 5, agus lucht saoire ag tabhairt aghaidh ar mhoilleanna suas le dhá mhí chun pas a fháil.

translation.en: 21 february
translation.ga: 21 feabhra

translation.en: A further 679 cases and 1 death were reported, bringing the totals to 215,057 cases and 4,136 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 679 cás eile agus 1 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 215,057 cás agus 4,136 bás.

translation.en: Facebook shut down and restricted access to a number of instagram accounts that were advertising an illegal "lockdown rave" on st patrick's day.
translation.ga: Dhún facebook agus chuir sé srian ar rochtain ar roinnt cuntas instagram a bhí ag fógairt “rave frithdhúnadh ” mídhleathach ar lá fhéile pádraig.

translation.en: 22 february
translation.ga: 22 feabhra

translation.en: A further 686 cases and 1 death were reported, bringing the totals to 215,743 cases and 4,137 deaths.
