translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 686 cás eile agus 1 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 215,743 cás agus 4,137 bás.

translation.en: The cabinet covid-19 sub-committee agreed that level 5 restrictions would remain in place until 5 april at the earliest under the government's revised living with covid-19 plan, due to be published on 23 february.
translation.ga: Chomhaontaigh fochoiste covid-19 na comh-aireachta go bhfanfadh srianta leibhéal 5 i bhfeidhm go dtí an 5 aibreán ar a luaithe faoi phlean athbhreithnithe an rialtais maireachtáil le covid-19, atá le foilsiú an 23 feabhra.

translation.en: Special classes in mainstream primary and secondary schools reopened as the phased reopening of schools continued.
translation.ga: Athosclaíodh ranganna speisialta i mbunscoileanna agus i meánscoileanna príomhshrutha de réir mar a athosclaíodh scoileanna de réir a chéile.

translation.en: 23 february
translation.ga: 23 feabhra

translation.en: A further 575 cases and 45 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 216,300 cases and 4,181 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 575 cás eile agus 45 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 216,300 cás agus 4,181 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death and 8 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo agus 8 gcás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: Taoiseach micheál martin announced the extension of level 5 lockdown restrictions for another six weeks until 5 april (easter monday) at the earliest as the government of ireland published its new revised living with covid-19 plan called "the path ahead", which includes the phased reopening of schools and childcare and the extension of the covid-19 pandemic unemployment payment and the employment wage subsidy scheme.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taoiseach micheál martin síneadh srianta glasála leibhéal 5 ar feadh sé seachtaine eile go dtí 5 aibreán (luan cásca) ar a luaithe mar a d ’ fhoilsigh rialtas na héireann a phlean nua athbhreithnithe living with covid-19 darb ainm “the path ahead ”, a chuimsíonn an athoscailt chéimnithe scoileanna agus cúram leanaí agus leathnú íocaíocht dífhostaíochta phaindéimeach covid-19 agus an scéim fóirdheontais pá fostaíochta.

translation.en: Minister for health stephen donnelly announced an update to the covid-19 vaccine allocation strategy with people aged between 16 and 69 who are at very high risk of developing severe covid-19 moved up the priority list, after the national public health emergency team endorsed recommendations by the national immunisation advisory committee.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taire sláinte stephen donnelly nuashonrú ar straitéis leithdháilte vacsaín covid-19 le daoine idir 16 agus 69 atá i mbaol an-mhór covid-19 trom a fhorbairt bhog siad suas an liosta tosaíochta, tar éis don fhoireann éigeandála náisiúnta sláinte poiblí moltaí a fhormhuiniú ag an gcoiste comhairleach náisiúnta imdhíonta.

translation.en: 24 february
translation.ga: 24 feabhra

translation.en: A further 574 cases and 56 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 216,870 cases and 4,237 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 574 cás eile agus 56 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 216,870 cás agus 4,237 bás.

translation.en: Among the deaths confirmed was a 16-year-old teenager.
translation.ga: I measc na mbásanna a dearbhaíodh bhí déagóir 16 bliana d ’ aois.

translation.en: 4 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 4 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Minister for health stephen donnelly announced that ireland had ordered enough vaccines to vaccinate 10.3 million people with 18.5 million doses of covid-19 vaccines ordered.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taire sláinte stephen donnelly gur ordaigh éire dóthain vacsaíní chun 10.3 milliún duine a vacsaíniú agus 18.5 milliún dáileog de vacsaíní covid-19 ordaithe.

translation.en: Tánaiste leo varadkar addressed a meeting of fine gael tds, senators and meps and stated that criticism of how the government had been communicating was reasonable, had been heard loud and clear, and would be taken onboard, after a number of fine gael politicians launched an attack on taoiseach micheál martin over his handling of the covid-19 pandemic.
translation.ga: Thug an tánaiste leo varadkar aitheasc ag cruinniú de tdanna, seanadóirí agus fpeanna fine gael agus luaigh sé go raibh cáineadh faoin gcaoi a raibh an rialtas ag cumarsáid réasúnta, gur chuala sé os ard agus go soiléir é, agus go dtabharfaí aird air, tar éis do roinnt polaiteoirí fine gael seoladh a dhéanamh ionsaí ar an taoiseach micheál martin faoina láimhseáil ar phaindéim covid-19.

translation.en: Minister of state for international and road transport and logistics hildegarde naughton announced a further extension to the expiry dates of driving licences in light of the disruption to licencing services caused by covid-19 across the european union, as national driver licence service (ndls) centres remain open to essential workers during the extended level 5 restrictions.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taire stáit um iompar agus lóistíocht idirnáisiúnta agus bóthair hildegarde naughton síneadh breise ar dhátaí éaga ceadúnais tiomána i bhfianaise an chur isteach ar sheirbhísí ceadúnaithe de bharr covid-19 ar fud an aontais eorpaigh, mar ionaid na seirbhíse náisiúnta um cheadúnas tiomána (ndls) fanacht oscailte d ’ oibrithe riachtanacha le linn na srianta leathnaithe leibhéal 5.

translation.en: 25 february
translation.ga: 25 feabhra

translation.en: A further 613 cases and 35 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 217,478 cases and 4,271 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 613 cás agus 35 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 217,478 cás agus 4,271 bás.

translation.en: 5 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 5 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The director of the national virus reference laboratory cillian de gascun confirmed that the first case of the b.1.525 variant of covid-19, first identified in the united kingdom and nigeria, had been detected in the republic of ireland, while a further four cases of the south african variant had been detected, bringing the total to 15.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh stiúrthóir na saotharlainne náisiúnta tagartha víreas cillian de gascun gur braitheadh an chéad chás den leagan b.1.525 de covid-19, a sainaithníodh den chéad uair sa ríocht aontaithe agus sa nigéir, i bpoblacht na héireann, agus ceithre chás eile an leagan hafraice theas a bhí curtha faoi deara, rud a fhágann go 15.

translation.en: 26 february
translation.ga: 26 feabhra

translation.en: A further 776 cases and 29 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 218,251 cases and 4,300 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 776 cás eile agus 29 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 218,251 cás agus 4,300 bás.

translation.en: 3 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 3 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The department of health added a further 13 countries to the government's covid-19 "high-risk" list for international travel, which brought the total number of countries added to 33.
translation.ga: Chuir an roinn sláinte 13 tír eile le liosta “ardriosca ” covid-19 an rialtais le haghaidh taistil idirnáisiúnta, rud a thug líon iomlán na dtíortha a cuireadh le 33.

translation.en: The countries added were: Argentina, bolivia, chile, colombia, ecuador, french guiana, guyana, panama, paraguay, peru, suriname, uruguay and venezuela.
translation.ga: Ba iad na tíortha a cuireadh leis: An airgintín, an bholaiv, an tsile, an cholóim, eacuadór, guáin na fraince, an ghuáin, panama, paragua, peiriú, suranam, uragua agus veiniséala.

translation.en: Deputy chief medical officer ronan glynn issued a letter appealing to parents to adhere to public health guidelines and not to congregate at school gates or to organise play dates, ahead of schools reopening and the return of 320,000 students from monday 1 march.
translation.ga: D ’ eisigh an leas-phríomhoifigeach leighis ronan glynn litir ag achomharc chuig tuismitheoirí cloí le treoirlínte sláinte poiblí agus gan teacht le chéile ag geataí na scoile nó dátaí súgartha a eagrú, sula n-athosclóidh scoileanna agus go bhfillfidh 320,000 dalta ó dé luain 1 márta.

translation.en: Latest figures released by the central statistics office showed that dublin, donegal, limerick, louth and monaghan were the hardest hit counties in terms of cases, while cavan, dublin, kildare, mayo and monaghan were the counties with the most deaths.
translation.ga: Léirigh na figiúirí is déanaí a d ’ eisigh an phríomh-oifig staidrimh gurb iad baile átha cliath, dún na ngall, luimneach, lú agus muineachán na contaetha ba deacra a bhuail cásanna, agus gurbh iad an cabhán, baile átha cliath, cill dara, maigh eo agus muineachán na contaetha ba mhó a fuair bás.

translation.en: Latest figures showed that as of 25 february, gardaí had issued over 9,800 fines to people breaching covid-19 regulations, with over 7,566 fines issued for non-essential travel and 1,386 fines issued for attending or hosting house parties.
translation.ga: Thaispeáin na figiúirí is déanaí go raibh gardaí, amhail an 25 feabhra, tar éis níos mó ná 9,800 fíneálacha a eisiúint do dhaoine a sháraigh rialacháin covid-19, agus eisíodh níos mó ná 7,566 fíneálacha as taisteal neamhriachtanach agus 1,386 fíneáil eisithe as freastal ar pháirtithe tí nó iad a óstáil.

translation.en: 27 february
translation.ga: 27 feabhra

translation.en: A further 738 cases and 13 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 218,980 cases and 4,313 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 738 cás agus 13 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 218,980 cás agus 4,313 bás.

translation.en: 9 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 9 gcás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: 23 people were arrested and 3 gardaí were injured (including one hospitalised), as around 500 protesters took part in an anti-lockdown protest in dublin city centre, with fireworks being fired at gardaí, while st stephen's green and the iveagh gardens closed in advance of the protest.
translation.ga: Gabhadh 23 duine agus gortaíodh 3 gharda (ospidéal san áireamh), mar ghlac thart ar 500 agóide páirt in agóid frithdhúnadh i lár chathair bhaile átha cliath, agus tinte ealaíne á lasadh ag gardaí, agus dúnadh faiche stiabhna agus gairdíní iveagh roimh ré.den agóid.

translation.en: The protest was widely condemned by the gardaí and politicians, including the taoiseach, tánaiste and minister for justice.
translation.ga: Cháin na gardaí agus na polaiteoirí an agóid go forleathan, lena n-áirítear an taoiseach, tánaiste agus an taire dlí agus cirt.

translation.en: 28 february
translation.ga: 28 feabhra

translation.en: A further 612 cases and 6 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 219,592 cases and 4,319 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 612 cás eile agus 6 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 219,592 cás agus 4,319 bás.

translation.en: Ireland officially marked one year since the first case of covid-19 in the country was confirmed on 29 february 2020.
translation.ga: Bhí éire marcáilte go hoifigiúil bliain amháin ó dearbhaíodh an chéad chás de covid-19 sa tír an 29 feabhra 2020.

translation.en: 13 people, including 12 men and 1 woman, were charged and remanded in custody for public order offences after anti-lockdown protests in dublin city centre turned violent on 27 february, while tánaiste leo varadkar stated that the violence on the streets of dublin was "not a protest and was a riot".
translation.ga: Cúisíodh agus athchuireadh 13 duine, lena n-áirítear 12 fear agus bean amháin, faoi choimeád as cionta oird phoiblí tar éis agóidí frithdhúnadh i lár chathair bhaile átha cliath a bheith foréigneach an 27 feabhra, agus dúirt an tánaiste leo varadkar go raibh an foréigean ar shráideanna bhaile átha cliath "ní agóid agus círéib a bhí ann".

translation.en: March 2021
translation.ga: Márta 2021

translation.en: 1 march
translation.ga: 1 márta

translation.en: A further 687 cases and 1 death were reported, bringing the totals to 220,273 cases and 4,319 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 687 cás eile agus 1 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 220,273 cás agus 4,319 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death and 6 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo agus 6 chás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: Over 320,000 junior primary school pupils and leaving certificate students nationwide returned to school for the first time since christmas.
translation.ga: D ’ fhill os cionn 320,000 dalta bunscoile sóisearach agus mac léinn ardteistiméireachta ar fud na tíre ar scoil den chéad uair ón nollaig.

translation.en: A school in north dublin confirmed a case of covid-19 on the first day of reopening schools nationwide as parents received an urgent letter from the school.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh scoil i dtuaisceart bhaile átha cliath cás de covid-19 ar an gcéad lá d ’ athoscailt scoileanna ar fud na tíre mar go bhfuair tuismitheoirí litir phráinneach ón scoil.

translation.en: 2 march
translation.ga: 2 márta

translation.en: A further 359 cases and 14 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 220,630 cases and 4,333 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 359 cás eile agus 14 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 220,630 cás agus 4,333 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 2 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: A man in his 30s was arrested in connection with a firework attack on gardaí at a violent anti-lockdown protest in dublin city centre on 27 february.
translation.ga: Gabhadh fear ina 30idí i dtaca le hionsaí tine ealaíne ar ghardaí ag agóid fhoréigneach frithdhúnadh i lár chathair bhaile átha cliath an 27 feabhra.

translation.en: Three men in their 20s were arrested and more than 50 fixed payment notices were issued in limerick after gardaí broke up a street party involving large groups of students drinking, dancing, singing and setting of fireworks, near the university of limerick.
translation.ga: Gabhadh triúr fear ina 20idí agus eisíodh níos mó ná 50 fógra íocaíochta seasta i luimneach tar éis do na gardaí cóisir sráide a bhriseadh ina raibh grúpaí móra mac léinn ag ól, ag damhsa, ag canadh agus ag lasadh tinte ealaíne, in aice le hollscoil luimnigh.

translation.en: A secondary school in cork confirmed a case of covid-19 while a south dublin school announced its closure due to a confirmed case of covid-19 just one day after schools reopened.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh meánscoil i gcorcaigh cás de covid-19 agus d ’ fhógair scoil i ndeisceart bhaile átha cliath go ndúnfaí í mar gheall ar chás dearbhaithe de covid-19 lá amháin tar éis do scoileanna athoscailt.

translation.en: 3 march
translation.ga: 3 márta

translation.en: A further 566 cases and 25 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 221,189 cases and 4,357 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 566 cás eile agus 25 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 221,189 cás agus 4,357 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death and 7 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo agus 7 gcás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: One of the three men arrested following a street party in castletroy, limerick on the night of 2 march was charged with public order offences, as the university of limerick warned that any student who were found breaking the university's code of conduct could face temporary suspension or expulsion, while minister for justice helen mcentee urged young people to comply with covid-19 restrictions.
translation.ga: Cúisíodh duine den triúr fear a gabhadh tar éis cóisir sráide i gcaisleán rua, luimneach oíche an 2 márta i gcionta oird phoiblí, mar a thug ollscoil luimnigh foláireamh go bhféadfadh fionraí sealadach a bheith ar mhac léinn ar bith a fuarthas ag briseadh cód iompair na hollscoile díbirt, agus d ’ áitigh an taire dlí agus cirt helen mcentee ar dhaoine óga cloí le srianta covid-19.

translation.en: Jake merriman, a 30-year-old man, appeared in court charged in connection with a firework attack on gardaí at an anti-lockdown protest in dublin city centre on 27 february.
translation.ga: Tháinig jake merriman, fear 30 bliain d ’ aois, i láthair sa chúirt cúisithe i dtaca le hionsaí tinte ealaíne ar ghardaí ag agóid frithdhúnadh i lár chathair bhaile átha cliath an 27 feabhra.

translation.en: 4 march
translation.ga: 4 márta

translation.en: A further 462 cases and 39 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 221,649 cases and 4,396 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 462 cás eile agus 39 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 221,649 cás agus 4,396 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 2 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Deputy chief medical officer ronan glynn announced that the department of health was made aware of four preliminary reports of stillbirths in ireland that could potentially be associated with a condition called covid placentitis.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an leas-phríomhoifigeach leighis ronan glynn go raibh an roinn sláinte ar an eolas faoi cheithre réamhthuairisc ar bhreitheanna marbh-bhreithe in éirinn a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith bainteach le riocht ar a dtugtar placentitis covid.

translation.en: The health service executive (hse) confirmed that a single outbreak of covid-19 among students in the west of the country had led to more than 442 further cases in more than 200 separate household outbreaks, involving young adults aged 18 to 24.
translation.ga: An feidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte dheimhnigh (hse) gur ráig amháin de covid-19 i measc daltaí sa iarthar na tíre a bhí mar thoradh ar níos mó ná 442 cás breise i níos mó ná 200 ráig tí ar leith, a bhaineann le daoine fásta óga idir 18 agus 24.

translation.en: 5 march – a further 522 cases and 9 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 222,160 cases and 4,405 deaths.
2 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: 5 márta - tuairiscíodh 522 cás eile agus 9 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 222,160 cás agus 4,405 bás.

translation.en: 6 march
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 2 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: 9 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 539 cás eile agus 14 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 222,699 cás agus 4,419 bás.

translation.en: Taoiseach micheál martin announced that ireland had reached the milestone of half a million covid-19 vaccines administered.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 9 gcás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Gardaí arrested 6 people (5 men and 1 woman) as around 450 people attended an anti-lockdown protest in cork city centre that ended without incident.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taoiseach micheál martin go raibh an chloch mhíle bainte amach ag éire de leath mhilliún vacsaín covid-19 a tugadh.

translation.en: 5 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 525 cás agus 3 bhás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 223,219 cás agus 4,422 bás.

translation.en: President michael d.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 5 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Higgins signed into law the legislation to bring in mandatory hotel quarantine for certain passengers entering the country from high-risk countries.
translation.ga: Shínigh an tuachtarán michael d. higgins ina dhlí an reachtaíocht chun coraintín éigeantach óstáin a thabhairt isteach do phaisinéirí áirithe a thagann isteach sa tír ó thíortha ardriosca.

translation.en: 8 march
translation.ga: 8 márta

translation.en: A further 437 cases and no deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 223,651 cases and 4,422 deaths.
translation.ga: Níor tuairiscíodh 437 cás eile agus níor tuairiscíodh aon bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 223,651 cás agus 4,422 bás.

translation.en: 5 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 5 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The health information and quality authority (hiqa) advised the national public health emergency team that the duration of immunity following covid-19 infection should be considered to be six months.
translation.ga: Chuir an túdarás um fhaisnéis agus cáilíocht sláinte (hiqa) in iúl don fhoireann náisiúnta éigeandála sláinte poiblí gur cheart a mheas gur sé mhí an díolúine tar éis ionfhabhtú covid-19.

translation.en: Around 100,000 children returned to pre-school under the early childhood care and education scheme.
translation.ga: D ’ fhill timpeall 100,000 leanbh ar an réamhscoil faoin scéim cúraim agus oideachais luath-óige.

translation.en: The department of education and the health service executive (hse) confirmed that the gradual phased reopening of schools would proceed as planned with all primary pupils and fifth year students returning to school on 15 march.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh an roinn oideachais agus feidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte (fss) go leanfaí le hathoscailt de réir a chéile na scoileanna mar a bhí beartaithe agus gach dalta bunscoile agus gach mac léinn sa chúigiú bliain ag filleadh ar scoil an 15 márta.

translation.en: 9 march
translation.ga: 9 márta

translation.en: A further 311 cases and 30 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 223,957 cases and 4,452 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 311 cás eile agus 30 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 223,957 cás agus 4,452 bás.

translation.en: 5 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 5 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: A further three cases of the brazilian variant were detected in the country, bringing the total to 6.
translation.ga: Braitheadh ​ ​ trí chás eile den leagan brasaíle sa tír, rud a thug an t-iomlán go 6.

translation.en: Minister for education norma foley lost her appeals against findings that two home-schooled students were unfairly excluded from the leaving certificate calculated grades process.
translation.ga: Chaill an taire oideachais norma foley a hachomhairc i gcoinne fionnachtana go raibh beirt mhac léinn a bhí ag foghlaim tí eisiata go héagórach ó phróiseas gráid ríofa an ardteistiméireachta.

translation.en: 10 march
translation.ga: 10 márta

translation.en: A further 631 cases and 47 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 224,588 cases and 4,499 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 631 cás eile agus 47 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 224,588 cás agus 4,499 bás.

translation.en: Taoiseach micheál martin confirmed that ireland was to receive a further 46,500 doses of the pfizer – biontech covid-19 vaccine before the end of march.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh an taoiseach micheál martin go raibh éire chun 46,500 dáileog eile den vacsaín pfizer-biontech covid-19 a fháil roimh dheireadh mhí an mhárta.

translation.en: 11 march
translation.ga: 11 márta

translation.en: A further 592 cases and 10 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 225,179 cases and 4,509 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 592 cás eile agus 10 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 225,179 cás agus 4,509 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: Ireland officially marked one year since the first death of covid-19 in the country was confirmed on 11 march 2020, the same day when covid-19 was declared a pandemic.
translation.ga: Bhí éire marcáilte go hoifigiúil bliain amháin ó dearbhaíodh an chéad bhás de covid-19 sa tír an 11 márta 2020, an lá céanna nuair a fógraíodh go raibh covid-19 ina phaindéim.

translation.en: Under new nursing home visitation guidance approved by the national public health emergency team, residents in nursing homes would be permitted two visits per week on general compassionate grounds from 22 march.
translation.ga: Faoi threoir nua cuairteanna ar thithe altranais a d ’ fhormheas an fhoireann náisiúnta éigeandála sláinte poiblí, cheadófaí dhá chuairt in aghaidh na seachtaine do chónaitheoirí i dtithe altranais ar fhorais ghinearálta atruacha ón 22 márta.

translation.en: 12 march
translation.ga: 12 márta

translation.en: A further 646 cases and 10 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 225,820 cases and 4,518 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 646 cás eile agus 10 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 225,820 cás agus 4,518 bás.

translation.en: 5 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 5 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Latest figures showed that as of 11 march, gardaí had issued over 13,600 fines to people breaching covid-19 regulations, with over 10,013 fines issued for non-essential travel and 2,040 fines issued for attending or hosting house parties.
translation.ga: Thaispeáin na figiúirí is déanaí gur eisigh gardaí, amhail an 11 márta, os cionn 13,600 fíneálacha do dhaoine a sháraigh rialacháin covid-19, agus eisíodh níos mó ná 10,013 fíneálacha as taisteal neamhriachtanach agus eisíodh 2,040 fíneáil as freastal ar pháirtithe tí nó iad a óstáil.

translation.en: Gardaí confirmed that two people were arrested and more than 80 fines were issued after around 300 people gathered for the funeral of a young traveller man in carrick-on-shannon on 11 march, despite level 5 restrictions limiting mourners to 10 people.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh gardaí gur gabhadh beirt agus gur eisíodh níos mó ná 80 fíneáil tar éis do thart ar 300 duine teacht le chéile le haghaidh sochraid fear óg den lucht siúil i gcarraig na sionainne an 11 márta, in ainneoin srianta leibhéal 5 ag teorannú caoineoirí go 10 duine.

translation.en: Nine residents at a nursing home with an outbreak of covid-19 in trim, county meath died after the first doses of a covid-19 vaccine were administered there.
translation.ga: Fuair naonúr cónaitheoirí i dteach altranais le ráig de covid-19 i baile átha troim, contae na mí bás tar éis na chéad dáileoga de vacsaín covid-19 a riar ansin.

translation.en: 13 march – a further 543 cases and 16 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 226,358 cases and 4,534 deaths.
translation.ga: 13 márta - tuairiscíodh 543 cás agus 16 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 226,358 cás agus 4,534 bás.

translation.en: 5 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 5 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: 14 march
translation.ga: 14 márta

translation.en: A further 384 cases and no deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 226,741 cases and 4,534 deaths.
translation.ga: Níor tuairiscíodh 384 cás eile agus níor tuairiscíodh aon bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 226,741 cás agus 4,534 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: The administration of the astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine was suspended in ireland by the national immunisation advisory committee (niac) as a precautionary measure following concerns over serious blood clots in norway.
translation.ga: Chuir an coiste comhairleach náisiúnta imdhíonta (niac) riarachán an vacsaín astrazeneca covid-19 ar fionraí in éirinn mar bheart réamhchúraim tar éis imní faoi téachtáin fola tromchúiseacha san iorua.

translation.en: Two men in their 20s were charged after three gardaí were assaulted following a house party in milford, county donegal on 13 march.
translation.ga: Cúisíodh beirt fhear ina 20idí tar éis ionsaí a dhéanamh ar thriúr gardaí tar éis cóisir tí i mbaile na ngallóglach, contae dhún na ngall an 13 márta.

translation.en: 15 march
translation.ga: 15 márta

translation.en: A further 575 cases and no deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 227,316 cases and 4,534 deaths.
translation.ga: Níor tuairiscíodh 575 cás eile agus níor cailleadh aon bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 227,316 cás agus 4,534 bás.

translation.en: Over 350,000 remaining primary school pupils and fifth year students nationwide returned to school for the first time since christmas.
translation.ga: D ’ fhill níos mó ná 350,000 dalta bunscoile agus mic léinn cúigiú bliana ar fud na tíre ar scoil den chéad uair ón nollaig.

translation.en: 30,000 fewer people received a covid-19 vaccine from 15 march due to the temporary suspension of the astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine in ireland.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ 30,000 níos lú daoine vacsaín covid-19 ón 15 márta mar gheall ar an vacsaín astrazeneca covid-19 a chur ar fionraí go sealadach in éirinn.

translation.en: 16 march
translation.ga: 16 márta

translation.en: A further 349 cases and 18 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 227,663 cases and 4,552 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 349 cás eile agus 18 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 227,663 cás agus 4,552 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 2 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The garda síochána urged people to stay at home for st patrick's day as a significant policing operation was put in place to deal with planned protests in dublin city with 2,500 gardaí being deployed across the country.
translation.ga: D 'áitigh an garda síochána ar dhaoine fanacht sa bhaile le haghaidh lá fhéile pádraig mar gur cuireadh oibríocht phóilíneachta shuntasach ar bun chun déileáil le hagóidí pleanáilte i gcathair bhaile átha cliath agus 2,500 garda á n-imscaradh ar fud na tíre.

translation.en: Latest figures released by the health service executive (hse) showed that 1,842 tests for covid-19 were carried out in 108 schools in the past 7 days, with 44 positive cases confirmed in primary, secondary and special schools across the country.
translation.ga: Léirigh na figiúirí is déanaí a d ’ eisigh feidhmeannas na seirbhíse sláinte (fss) go ndearnadh 1,842 tástáil le haghaidh covid-19 i 108 scoil le 7 lá anuas, agus dearbhaíodh 44 cás dearfach i mbunscoileanna, i meánscoileanna agus i scoileanna speisialta ar fud na tíre.

translation.en: 17 march
translation.ga: 17 márta

translation.en: A further 557 cases and 17 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 228,215 cases and 4,566 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 557 cás agus 17 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 228,215 cás agus 4,566 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 2 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Gardaí arrested 21 people after around 700 protestors took part in a number of anti-lockdown protests in dublin city centre, herbert park and at the rté campus in donnybrook.
translation.ga: Gabhadh gardaí 21 duine tar éis do thart ar 700 agóide páirt a ghlacadh i roinnt agóidí frithdhúnadh i lár chathair bhaile átha cliath, páirc herbert agus ar champas rté i ndomhnach broc.

translation.en: 18 march
translation.ga: 18 márta

translation.en: A further 582 cases and no deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 228,796 cases and 4,566 deaths.
translation.ga: Níor tuairiscíodh 582 cás eile agus níor cailleadh aon bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 228,796 cás agus 4,566 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: It was confirmed that 7 gardaí were injured (including five hospitalised) after being kicked, punched and spat at in separate violent anti-lockdown protests which took place in dublin on st patrick's day.
translation.ga: Deimhníodh gur gortaíodh 7 ngarda (cúigear san ospidéal san áireamh) tar éis dóibh a bheith ciceáilte, punched agus spat in agóidí frith-ghlasála foréigneacha ar leithligh a tharla i mbaile átha cliath ar lá fhéile pádraig.

translation.en: 19 march
translation.ga: 19 márta

translation.en: A further 507 cases (including 3 probable cases) and 10 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 229,360 cases and 4,576 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 507 cás eile (lena n-áirítear 3 chás dóchúla) agus 10 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 229,360 cás agus 4,576 bás.

translation.en: 57 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 57 cás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The national immunisation advisory committee (niac) recommended that the astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine could continue to be used in ireland following approval from the european medicines agency (ema) on 18 march.
translation.ga: Mhol an coiste comhairleach náisiúnta um imdhíonadh (niac) go bhféadfaí leanúint den vacsaín astrazeneca covid-19 a úsáid in éirinn tar éis cead a fháil ón ngníomhaireacht leigheasra eorpach (ema) an 18 márta.

translation.en: Latest figures showed that as of 18 march, gardaí had issued over 15,358 fines to people breaching covid-19 regulations, with over 11,072 fines issued for non-essential travel and over 2,300 fines issued for attending or hosting house parties.
translation.ga: Thaispeáin na figiúirí is déanaí gur eisigh gardaí, amhail an 18 márta, níos mó ná 15,358 fíneálacha ar dhaoine a sháraigh rialacháin covid-19, agus eisíodh níos mó ná 11,072 fíneálacha as taisteal neamhriachtanach agus eisíodh os cionn 2,300 fíneáil as freastal ar pháirtithe tí nó iad a óstáil.

translation.en: 20 march
translation.ga: 20 márta

translation.en: A further 525 cases and 9 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 229,831 cases and 4,585 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 525 cás eile agus 9 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 229,831 cás agus 4,585 bás.

translation.en: The health service executive (hse) resumed administering the astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine at a number of hospitals across the country after a precautionary pause.
translation.ga: D 'athchromaigh feidhmeannas na seirbhíse sláinte (fss) ag riaradh an vacsaín astrazeneca covid-19 ag roinnt ospidéal ar fud na tíre tar éis sos réamhchúraim.

translation.en: Gardaí arrested 11 people and issued a number of fines after around 200 protestors took part in an anti-lockdown protest in the phoenix park in dublin city centre.
translation.ga: Ghabh gardaí 11 duine agus d ’ eisigh siad roinnt fíneálacha tar éis do thart ar 200 agóide páirt a ghlacadh in agóid frithdhúnadh i bpáirc an fhionnuisce i lár chathair bhaile átha cliath.

translation.en: 21 march
translation.ga: 21 márta

translation.en: A further 769 cases and 2 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 230,599 cases and 4,587 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 769 cás eile agus 2 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 230,599 cás agus 4,587 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: Minister for public expenditure and reform michael mcgrath stated that mandatory hotel quarantine for travellers arriving into ireland from designated countries would come into effect by the end of the week.
translation.ga: Dúirt an taire caiteachais phoiblí agus athchóirithe michael mcgrath go dtiocfadh coraintín éigeantach óstáin do thaistealaithe a thagann isteach go héirinn ó thíortha ainmnithe i bhfeidhm faoi dheireadh na seachtaine.

translation.en: 22 march
translation.ga: 22 márta

translation.en: A further 520 cases and 1 death were reported, bringing the totals to 231,119 cases and 4,588 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 520 cás eile agus 1 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 231,119 cás agus 4,588 bás.

translation.en: Speaking on rté's morning ireland, professor martin cormican warned that ireland could be facing another wave of covid-19 cases and described case numbers as "stuck" and possibly rising, while chief clinical officer colm henry described the situation as "disheartening".
translation.ga: Ag labhairt di ar rté 's morning ireland, rabhadh an tollamh martin cormican go bhféadfaí éire a bheith os comhair tonn eile de covid-19 cás agus cur síos líon na gcásanna mar "bhfostú" agus, b' fhéidir, ag ardú, cé go príomhoifigeach cliniciúil colm henry cur síos ar an staid mar "disheartening".

translation.en: It was announced that president michael d.
translation.ga: Fógraíodh go bhfuair an tuachtarán michael d.

translation.en: Higgins and his wife sabina higgins received their first doses of a covid-19 vaccine on 19 march.
translation.ga: Higgins agus a bhean sabina higgins a gcéad dáileoga de vacsaín covid-19 an 19 márta.

translation.en: A primary school in carrick-on-suir, county tipperary closed after two positive cases of covid-19 were confirmed.
translation.ga: Dúnadh bunscoil i gcarraig na siúire, contae thiobraid árann tar éis dhá chás dearfach de covid-19 a dhearbhú.

translation.en: 23 march
translation.ga: 23 márta

translation.en: A further 371 cases and 24 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 231,484 cases and 4,610 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 371 cás agus 24 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 231,484 cás agus 4,610 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified deaths and 6 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 2 bhás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo agus 6 chás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: The booking portal for mandatory hotel quarantine in ireland opened for those arriving into the country from friday 26 march, with a 12-night stay for passengers arriving from high risk countries costing €1,875 each.
translation.ga: Osclaíodh an tairseach áirithinte do choraintín éigeantach óstáin in éirinn dóibh siúd a thagann isteach sa tír ón aoine 26 márta, agus d ’ fhan fanacht 12 oíche do phaisinéirí a thagann ó thíortha ardriosca a chosain €1,875 an ceann.

translation.en: Six classes were sent home from a primary school in county longford after five cases of covid-19 were confirmed.
translation.ga: Cuireadh sé rang abhaile ó bhunscoil i gcontae an longfoirt tar éis cúig chás de covid-19 a dhearbhú.

translation.en: A class was sent home following an outbreak of covid-19 at a primary school in dublin.
translation.ga: Cuireadh rang abhaile tar éis ráig de covid-19 i mbunscoil i mbaile átha cliath.

translation.en: 24 march
translation.ga: 24 márta

translation.en: A further 683 cases and 18 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 232,164 cases and 4,628 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 683 cás agus 18 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 232,164 cás agus 4,628 bás.

translation.en: 4 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 4 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The government of ireland announced that five new walk-in covid-19 test centres would open in dublin and offaly on 25 march in an effort to bring down cases that are high in certain areas.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair rialtas na héireann go n-osclófaí cúig ionad tástála nua covid-19 siúil isteach i mbaile átha cliath agus in uíbh fhailí an 25 márta mar iarracht cásanna atá ard i gceantair áirithe a thabhairt anuas.

translation.en: The national public health emergency team (nphet) postponed a key meeting on deciding whether any level 5 restrictions could be eased from 5 april so that latest trends in covid-19 data could be taken into account in its final analysis for the government.
translation.ga: Chuir an fhoireann náisiúnta éigeandála sláinte poiblí (nphet) príomhchruinniú ar athló maidir le cinneadh a dhéanamh an bhféadfaí aon srianta leibhéal 5 a mhaolú ón 5 aibreán ionas go bhféadfaí na treochtaí is déanaí i sonraí covid-19 a chur san áireamh ina hanailís dheiridh don rialtas.

translation.en: The state examinations commission and minister for education norma foley issued new guidelines to schools advising that face coverings would be required during the leaving certificate oral exams, which begin on friday 26 march.
translation.ga: An coimisiún na scrúduithe stáit agus an taire oideachais norma foley d' eisigh treoirlínte nua do scoileanna comhairle go mbeadh clúdaigh aghaidh teastáil le linn na hardteistiméireachta scrúduithe béil, a thosóidh ar an aoine 26 márta.

translation.en: A man was arrested after €140,000 worth of suspected cannabis herb was seized during a checkpoint operation in county cork.
translation.ga: Gabhadh fear tar éis gur gabhadh luibh cannabais amhrasta de luach €140,000 le linn oibríochta seicphointe i gcontae chorcaí.

translation.en: 25 march
translation.ga: 25 márta

translation.en: A further 606 cases and 3 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 232,758 cases and 4,631 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 606 cás eile agus 3 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 232,758 cás agus 4,631 bás.

translation.en: Nearly 1,700 people attended the five new temporary walk-in covid-19 testing centres for people with no symptoms operated by the national ambulance service that opened in dublin and offaly.
translation.ga: D ’ fhreastail beagnach 1,700 duine ar na cúig ionad tástála sealadach siúil isteach covid-19 do dhaoine nach raibh aon comharthaí orthu a d ’ oibrigh an tseirbhís náisiúnta otharchairr a d ’ oscail i mbaile átha cliath agus in uíbh fhailí.

translation.en: Tánaiste leo varadkar told the dáil that getting daily covid-19 cases to the low numbers achieved last year was "not a prospect" due to the b.1.1.7 variant and that it was "very hard to see" how it was possible to secure a rate lower than 500 cases per day, despite "the enormous efforts of the irish people".
translation.ga: Dúirt an tánaiste leo varadkar leis an dáil nach “ionchas ” a bhí ann cásanna laethúla covid-19 a bhaint amach anuraidh mar gheall ar an leagan b.1.1.7 agus go raibh sé“ an-deacair a fheiceáil ” conas a bhí sé indéanta ráta níos ísle ná 500 cás in aghaidh an lae a chinntiú, in ainneoin “iarrachtaí ollmhóra mhuintir na héireann ”.

translation.en: 26 march
translation.ga: 26 márta

translation.en: A further 584 cases and 20 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 233,327 cases and 4,651 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 584 cás eile agus 20 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 233,327 cás agus 4,651 bás.

translation.en: 15 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 15 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Ireland's mandatory hotel quarantine system for all passengers arriving into the country from high-risk countries came into force at 4 am.
translation.ga: Tháinig córas éigeantach coraintín óstáin do gach paisinéir a thagann isteach sa tír ó thíortha ardriosca i bhfeidhm ag 4 am.

translation.en: The leader of the labour party alan kelly called for the chief executive of the beacon hospital to resign after it gave 20 leftover covid-19 vaccines to a number of teachers and staff at a private secondary school in bray, county wicklow on 23 march.
translation.ga: D 'iarr ceannaire pháirtí an lucht oibre alan kelly ar phríomhfheidhmeannach ospidéal beacon éirí as a phost tar éis dó 20 vacsaín covid-19 a bhí fágtha a thabhairt do roinnt múinteoirí agus foirne ag meánscoil phríobháideach i mbré, contae chill mhantáin an 23 márta.

translation.en: Latest figures showed that as of 25 march, gardaí had issued over 16,834 fines to people breaching covid-19 regulations, with over 12,336 fines issued for non-essential travel and over 2,700 fines issued for attending or hosting house parties.
translation.ga: Thaispeáin na figiúirí is déanaí go raibh gardaí, amhail an 25 márta, tar éis níos mó ná 16,834 fíneálacha a eisiúint do dhaoine a sháraigh rialacháin covid-19, agus eisíodh níos mó ná 12,336 fíneálacha as taisteal neamhriachtanach agus eisíodh os cionn 2,700 fíneáil as freastal ar pháirtithe tí nó iad a óstáil.

translation.en: The department of education confirmed that the final phase of the gradual reopening of schools would proceed as planned with all remaining secondary school students returning to school after the easter holidays on 12 april.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh an roinn oideachais go rachfaí ar aghaidh leis an gcéim dheiridh d ’ athoscailt scoileanna de réir a chéile agus gach mac léinn meánscoile atá fágtha ag filleadh ar scoil tar éis laethanta saoire na cásca an 12 aibreán.

translation.en: A number of students were asked to stay at home after multiple cases of covid-19 were confirmed at a secondary school in limerick.
translation.ga: Iarradh ar roinnt mac léinn fanacht sa bhaile tar éis do chásanna iomadúla de covid-19 a bheith deimhnithe ag meánscoil i luimneach.

translation.en: 27 march
translation.ga: 27 márta

translation.en: A further 624 cases and 2 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 233,937 cases and 4,653 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 624 cás agus 2 bhás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 233,937 cás agus 4,653 bás.

translation.en: 14 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 14 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Minister for health stephen donnelly requested the health service executive (hse) to suspend vaccine operations at the beacon hospital following controversy after 20 teachers received covid-19 vaccines at the private hospital.
translation.ga: D 'iarr an taire sláinte stephen donnelly ar fheidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte (fss) oibríochtaí vacsaíne in ospidéal beacon a chur ar fionraí tar éis conspóide tar éis do 20 múinteoir vacsaíní covid-19 a fháil san ospidéal príobháideach.

translation.en: Gardaí began an investigation after three people absconded from a mandatory hotel quarantine facility near dublin airport while on a smoking break outside under supervision, with one person located.
translation.ga: Chuir gardaí tús le himscrúdú tar éis do thriúr éalú ó shaoráid éigeantach coraintín in aice le haerfort bhaile átha cliath agus iad ar sos caitheamh tobac lasmuigh faoi mhaoirseacht, le duine amháin lonnaithe.

translation.en: A family of five renewed their appeal against their mandatory hotel quarantine after they claimed the facilities were not fit for purpose, following the rejection of their appeal by the department of justice.
translation.ga: Rinne teaghlach de chúigear a n-achomharc a athnuachan i gcoinne a gcoraintín éigeantach óstáin tar éis dóibh a éileamh nach raibh na saoráidí oiriúnach don fheidhm, tar éis don roinn dlí agus cirt a n-achomharc a dhiúltú.

translation.en: 28 march
translation.ga: 28 márta

translation.en: A further 604 cases and 13 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 234,541 cases and 4,666 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 604 cás agus 13 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 234,541 cás agus 4,666 bás.

translation.en: A second person who absconded from a mandatory hotel quarantine facility on 27 march was located, while a search for the third male continued.
translation.ga: Bhí an dara duine a d ’ éalaigh as saoráid éigeantach coraintín óstáin an 27 márta, agus leanadh ar aghaidh ag cuardach an tríú fear.

translation.en: 29 march
translation.ga: 29 márta

translation.en: A further 539 cases and 1 death were reported, bringing the totals to 235,078 cases and 4,667 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 539 cás eile agus 1 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 235,078 cás agus 4,667 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 2 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Latest figures released by the central statistics office showed that serious crime dropped by over a third in 2020 during the pandemic, while over 1,000 breaches of covid-19 regulations were classified as crimes by gardaí including the non-wearing of face coverings and international travel.
translation.ga: Léirigh na figiúirí is déanaí a d ’ eisigh an phríomh-oifig staidrimh gur thit coireacht thromchúiseach os cionn an tríú cuid in 2020 le linn na paindéime, agus rangaíodh gardaí lena n-áirítear neamh-chaitheamh cumhdaigh aghaidhe agus taisteal idirnáisiúnta os cionn 1,000 sárú ar rialacháin covid-19.

translation.en: 30 march
translation.ga: 30 márta

translation.en: A further 368 cases and 14 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 235,444 cases and 4,681 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 368 cás agus 14 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 235,444 cás agus 4,681 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 2 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The government of ireland announced a phased easing of level 5 restrictions from monday 12 april, with people allowed to travel within their county, two households allowed to meet socially outdoors, people who are fully vaccinated against covid-19 allowed to meet other fully vaccinated people indoors, and the resumption of all residential construction projects from that date.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair rialtas na héireann maolú céimnithe ar shrianta leibhéal 5 ón luan 12 aibreán, agus cead ag daoine taisteal laistigh dá gcontae, dhá theaghlach a bhfuil cead acu bualadh go sóisialta lasmuigh, cead ag daoine atá vacsaínithe go hiomlán i gcoinne covid-19 bualadh le daoine eile atá vacsaínithe go hiomlán laistigh, agus gach tionscadal tógála cónaithe a atosú ón dáta sin.

translation.en: From 19 april:
translation.ga: Ón 19 aibreán:

translation.en: Elite-level senior gaa matches and training could resume
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí cluichí agus oiliúint clg sinsearach ar leibhéal mionlach a atosú

translation.en: From 26 april:
translation.ga: Ón 26 aibreán:

translation.en: Outdoor sports facilities (such as pitches, golf courses and tennis courts) could reopen
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí áiseanna spóirt lasmuigh (mar pháirceanna imeartha, cúrsaí gailf agus cúirteanna leadóige) a athoscailt

translation.en: Outdoor visitor attractions (such as zoos, open pet farms, heritage sites) could reopen
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí díol spéise do chuairteoirí lasmuigh (mar shampla zúnna, feirmeacha peataí oscailte, láithreáin oidhreachta) a athoscailt

translation.en: Maximum attendance at funerals would increase from 10 to 25 on compassionate grounds
translation.ga: Mhéadódh an tinreamh uasta ar shochraidí ó 10 go 25 ar fhorais atruacha

translation.en: From 4 may:
translation.ga: Ón 4 bealtaine:

translation.en: Full reopening of construction activity
translation.ga: Athoscailt iomlán na gníomhaíochta tógála

translation.en: Phased reopening of non-essential retail and personal services
translation.ga: Athoscailt céimnithe ar sheirbhísí miondíola agus pearsanta neamhriachtanacha

translation.en: Religious services, museums and galleries could reopen and resume
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh seirbhísí reiligiúnacha, músaeim agus dánlanna athoscailt agus atosú

translation.en: The united states and a number of eu countries, including france, germany and italy, were recommended for inclusion in ireland's mandatory hotel quarantine list in advice given to minister for health stephen donnelly by the national public health emergency team.
translation.ga: Na stáit aontaithe agus roinnt tíortha san ae, lena n-áirítear an fhrainc, an ghearmáin agus an iodáil moladh, le cur san áireamh in éirinn liosta coraintín óstán éigeantach i gcomhairle a tugadh aire sláinte stephen donnelly ag an fhoireann náisiúnta um shláinte phoiblí éigeandála.

translation.en: Minister for health stephen donnelly announced an update to the covid-19 vaccine allocation strategy with priority groups being changed to an age-based system after vulnerable people with underlying conditions were vaccinated.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taire sláinte stephen donnelly nuashonrú ar straitéis leithdháilte vacsaín covid-19 agus grúpaí tosaíochta á n-athrú go córas aoisbhunaithe tar éis do dhaoine leochaileacha a bhfuil riochtaí bunúsacha orthu vacsaíniú.

translation.en: The health service executive (hse) confirmed that three passengers staying in mandatory hotel quarantine tested positive for covid-19.
translation.ga: An feidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte dheimhnigh (hse) gur tástáladh trí paisinéirí ag fanacht ar coraintín óstán éigeantach dearfach do covid-19.

translation.en: 31 march
translation.ga: 31 márta

translation.en: A further 411 cases and 6 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 235,854 cases and 4,687 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 411 cás eile agus 6 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 235,854 cás agus 4,687 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: Taoiseach micheál martin confirmed that shoe shops would be allowed to sell children's footwear by appointment only.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh an taoiseach micheál martin go gceadófaí do shiopaí bróg coisbheart leanaí a dhíol trí choinne amháin.

translation.en: The taoiseach told the dáil that a national portal allowing for everyone to register for a covid-19 vaccine would be available by the third week in april.
translation.ga: Dúirt an taoiseach leis an dáil go mbeadh tairseach náisiúnta a ligfeadh do gach duine clárú le haghaidh vacsaín covid-19 ar fáil faoin tríú seachtain i mí aibreáin.

translation.en: The health service executive (hse) announced that seven new walk-in covid-19 testing centres for asymptomatic people would open from april in dublin, meath, westmeath, kildare and galway in an effort to bring down cases that are high in certain areas.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair feidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte (fss) go n-osclófaí seacht n-ionad tástála covid-19 nua siúil isteach do dhaoine neamhshiomptómacha ó aibreán i mbaile átha cliath, sa mhí, san iarmhí, i gcill dara agus i ngaillimh mar iarracht cásanna atá ard i gceantair áirithe a thabhairt anuas.

translation.en: April 2021
translation.ga: Aibreán 2021

translation.en: 1 april
translation.ga: 1 aibreán

translation.en: A further 761 cases and 18 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 236,600 cases and 4,705 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 761 cás eile agus 18 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 236,600 cás agus 4,705 bás.

translation.en: 15 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 15 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Deputy chief medical officer ronan glynn and northern ireland chief medical officer michael mcbride issued a joint statement urging the public across ireland to continue to follow public health advice to ensure everyone can have a safe easter.
translation.ga: D 'eisigh leas-phríomhoifigeach leighis ronan glynn agus príomhoifigeach leighis thuaisceart éireann michael mcbride comhráiteas ag impí ar an bpobal ar fud na héireann leanúint de chomhairle sláinte poiblí a leanúint chun a chinntiú go mbeidh cásca sábháilte ag gach duine.

translation.en: An independent review of the covid-19 vaccination programme at the coombe hospital found that a consultant brought two leftover vaccine doses home to administer them to two family members.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ athbhreithniú neamhspleách ar an gclár vacsaínithe covid-19 ag ospidéal coombe gur thug comhairleoir dhá dháileog vacsaín fágtha abhaile chun iad a riar ar dhá bhall teaghlaigh.

translation.en: Dublin gaa suspended senior football manager dessie farrell for 12 weeks after a number of dublin footballers were photographed attending a training session on the morning of 31 march in breach of covid-19 regulations.
translation.ga: Chuir clg bhaile átha cliath an bainisteoir peile sinsearach dessie farrell ar fionraí ar feadh 12 sheachtain tar éis grianghraf a thógáil de roinnt peileadóirí as baile átha cliath ag freastal ar sheisiún oiliúna ar maidin an 31 márta de shárú ar rialacháin covid-19.

translation.en: Plans by the department of health to expand mandatory hotel quarantine to 43 additional countries, including the united states, germany and france, sparked a major row within government, after the attorney general, the european union and a number of ministers expressed concerns about the plans.
translation.ga: Spreag pleananna na roinne sláinte coraintín éigeantach óstáin a leathnú go 43 tír bhreise, lena n-áirítear na stáit aontaithe, an ghearmáin agus an fhrainc, as a chéile laistigh den rialtas, tar éis don ard-aighne, an taontas eorpach agus roinnt airí imní a chur in iúl faoi na pleananna.

translation.en: The department of health added a further 26 countries to the government's covid-19 "high-risk" list for international travel and removed one country, which brought the total number of countries added to 59.
translation.ga: Chuir an roinn sláinte 26 tír eile le liosta “ardriosca ” covid-19 an rialtais le haghaidh taistil idirnáisiúnta agus bhain sí tír amháin, rud a thug líon iomlán na dtíortha a cuireadh le 59.

translation.en: The countries added were: Albania, andorra, aruba, bahrain, bonaire, sint eustatius, ethiopia, israel, jordan, kosovo, kuwait, lebanon, moldova, monaco, montenegro, nigeria, north macedonia, oman, palestine, philippines, puerto rico, qatar, saint lucia, san marino, serbia, somalia and wallis and futuna islands.
translation.ga: Ba iad na tíortha a cuireadh leis: An albáin, andóra, aruba, bairéin, bonaire, sint eustatius, an aetóip, iosrael, an iordáin, an chosaiv, cuáit, an liobáin, an mholdóiv, monacó, montainéagró, an nigéir, macadóine thuaidh, oman, an phalaistín, na hoileáin fhilipíneacha, pórtó ríce, catar, saint lucia, san mairíne, an tseirbia, an tsomáil agus oileáin wallis agus futuna.

translation.en: Mauritius was removed from the list.
translation.ga: Baineadh oileán mhuirís ón liosta.

translation.en: 2 april
translation.ga: 2 aibreán

translation.en: A further 591 cases and 8 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 237,187 cases and 4,713 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 591 cás eile agus 8 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 237,187 cás agus 4,713 bás.

translation.en: 4 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 4 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Two women in their 30s were arrested and charged after refusing to enter mandatory hotel quarantine upon arrival in dublin airport from dubai.
translation.ga: Gabhadh agus cúisíodh beirt bhan ina 30í tar éis dóibh diúltú dul isteach i gcoraintín éigeantach óstáin nuair a shroich siad aerfort bhaile átha cliath ó dubai.

translation.en: A covid-19 outbreak of 15 cases was confirmed in a special school in clontarf, dublin.
translation.ga: Deimhníodh ráig de 15 cás de covid-19 i scoil speisialta i gcluain tarbh, baile átha cliath.

translation.en: 3 april
translation.ga: 3 aibreán

translation.en: A further 511 cases and 2 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 237,695 cases and 4,715 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 511 cás eile agus 2 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 237,695 cás agus 4,715 bás.

translation.en: 3 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 3 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Around 300 protestors took part in an anti-lockdown protest at the national monument on the grand parade in cork city centre.
translation.ga: Ghlac timpeall 300 agóide páirt in agóid frithdhúnadh ag an séadchomhartha náisiúnta ar an bparáid mhór i lár chathair chorcaí.

translation.en: 4 april
translation.ga: 4 aibreán

translation.en: A further 457 cases and 3 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 238,148 cases and 4,718 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 457 cás agus 3 bhás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 238,148 cás agus 4,718 bás.

translation.en: 4 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 4 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The high court made orders allowing two women who refused to enter mandatory hotel quarantine after arriving into dublin airport following their return from a trip to dubai for cosmetic procedures to leave mountjoy women's prison and continue to quarantine at a designated hotel.
translation.ga: Rinne an ard-chúirt orduithe ag ligean do bheirt bhan a dhiúltaigh dul isteach i gcoraintín éigeantach óstáin tar éis dóibh teacht go haerfort bhaile átha cliath tar éis dóibh filleadh ar thuras go dubai le haghaidh nósanna imeachta cosmaideacha chun príosún na mban mountjoy a fhágáil agus leanúint ar aghaidh ag coraintín ag óstán ainmnithe.

translation.en: Gardaí arrested 8 people as part of a policing plan around an anti-lockdown protest planned in dublin city centre.
translation.ga: Ghabh gardaí 8 duine mar chuid de phlean póilíneachta timpeall ar agóid frithdhúnadh a bhí beartaithe i lár chathair bhaile átha cliath.

translation.en: 5 april – a further 320 cases and no deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 238,466 cases and 4,718 deaths.
translation.ga: 5 aibreán - tuairiscíodh 320 cás eile agus níor tuairiscíodh aon bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 238,466 cás agus 4,718 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 2 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: 6 april
translation.ga: 6 aibreán

translation.en: A further 443 cases and 9 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 238,907 cases and 4,727 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 443 cás eile agus 9 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 238,907 cás agus 4,727 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 2 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: A number of gardaí were forced to self-isolate after a guest staying at a quarantine hotel tested positive for covid-19.
translation.ga: Cuireadh iallach ar roinnt gardaí iad féin a leithlisiú tar éis d ’ aíonna a bhí ag fanacht in óstán coraintín tástáil dhearfach a dhéanamh do covid-19.

translation.en: Minister for education norma foley defended the government decision to change the vaccine roll-out schedule to an aged-based system stating it was "not a value judgement on any given profession", as teachers' unions continued to call for their members to be prioritised.
translation.ga: Chosain an taire oideachais norma foley cinneadh an rialtais an sceideal rolladh amach vacsaíní a athrú go córas bunaithe ar aois ag rá nach raibh sé “ina bhreithiúnas luacha ar aon ghairm ar leith ”, mar lean ceardchumainn na múinteoirí ag éileamh go dtabharfaí tosaíocht dá mbaill.

translation.en: Three women who absconded from a mandatory hotel quarantine facility in dublin were found by gardaí almost 200 km away near loughrea, county galway.
translation.ga: D' aimsigh gardaí triúr ban a d' éalaigh as saoráid éigeantach coraintín óstáin i mbaile átha cliath beagnach 200 km uaidh gar do bhaile locha riach, contae na gaillimhe.

translation.en: 7 april
translation.ga: 7 aibreán

translation.en: A further 423 cases and 5 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 239,325 cases and 4,732 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 423 cás eile agus 5 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 239,325 cás agus 4,732 bás.

translation.en: 5 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 5 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The three teacher unions voted for an emergency motion backing industrial action, up to and including strike action, if they were not prioritised for vaccination.
translation.ga: Vótáil na trí cheardchumann múinteoirí ar son tairiscint éigeandála a thacaíonn le gníomhaíocht thionsclaíoch, suas go dtí stailc stailc agus lena n-áirítear, mura dtabharfaí tosaíocht dóibh le haghaidh vacsaínithe.

translation.en: Minister for health stephen donnelly confirmed that a failure to follow vaccination reserve list protocols led to teachers and special needs assistants (snas) in a number of special needs schools in dublin and wicklow to receive covid-19 vaccinations from the health service executive (hse) on 6 april.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh an taire sláinte stephen donnelly gur theip ar mhúinteoirí agus cúntóirí riachtanas speisialta (crsanna) i roinnt scoileanna riachtanas speisialta i mbaile átha cliath agus chill mhantáin vacsaíní covid-19 a fháil ó fheidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte (fss) mar thoradh ar mhainneachtain prótacail liosta cúlchistí vacsaínithe a leanúint an 6 aibreán.

translation.en: 8 april
translation.ga: 8 aibreán

translation.en: A further 400 cases and 7 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 239,723 cases and 4,737 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 400 cás eile agus 7 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 239,723 cás agus 4,737 bás.

translation.en: Monaghan gaa suspended senior football manager séamus mcenaney for 12 weeks after a dossier sent to the department of justice showed video and photographic evidence of a training session taking place in breach of covid-19 regulations.
translation.ga: Chuir clg mhuineacháin fionraí ar bhainisteoir peile sinsearach séamus mcenaney ar feadh 12 sheachtain tar éis sainchomhad a seoladh chuig an roinn dlí agus cirt fianaise físe agus grianghrafadóireachta a thaispeáint go raibh seisiún oiliúna ar siúl ag sárú rialacháin covid-19.

translation.en: The ceo of the health service executive (hse) paul reid announced that ireland had reached the milestone of one million covid-19 vaccines administered.
translation.ga: An pof an fheidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte (hse) paul reid fhógair go raibh bainte amach in éirinn an chloch mhíle de aon mhilliún amháin ar covid-19 vacsaíní á riaradh.

translation.en: The health products regulatory authority (hpra) began an investigation after the first case of a very rare blood clot in the brain of a person after vaccination with the astrazeneca vaccine was confirmed in a 40-year-old dublin woman.
translation.ga: Chuir an túdarás rialála táirgí sláinte (hpra) tús le himscrúdú tar éis an chéad chás de téachtán fola an-annamh in inchinn duine tar éis an vacsaíniú leis an vacsaín astrazeneca a dhearbhú i mbean 40 bliain d ’ aois i mbaile átha cliath.

translation.en: Latest figures from the hse showed that 10 confirmed cases of covid-19 had been detected among arrivals into ireland who were in mandatory hotel quarantine.
translation.ga: Léirigh na figiúirí is déanaí ó fss gur aimsíodh 10 gcás dearbhaithe de covid-19 i measc daoine a tháinig go héirinn a bhí i gcoraintín éigeantach óstáin.

translation.en: 9 april
translation.ga: 9 aibreán

translation.en: A further 473 cases and 34 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 240,192 cases and 4,769 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 473 cás agus 34 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 240,192 cás agus 4,769 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death and 4 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo agus 4 chás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: The health service executive (hse) announced that five new walk-in covid-19 testing centres for asymptomatic people would open from 10 april in dublin, limerick and waterford in an effort to bring down cases that are high in certain areas.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair feidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte (fss) go n-osclófaí cúig ionad tástála nua siúl isteach covid-19 do dhaoine neamhshiomptómacha ón 10 aibreán i mbaile átha cliath, luimneach agus port láirge mar iarracht cásanna atá ard i gceantair áirithe a thabhairt anuas.

translation.en: Following an incorporeal cabinet meeting, the department of health added a further 16 countries to the government's covid-19 "high-risk" list for international travel and removed three countries, which would come into effect from 4 am on thursday 15 april.
translation.ga: Tar éis cruinniú comh-aireachta neamhchorpraithe, chuir an roinn sláinte 16 tír eile le liosta “ardriosca ” covid-19 an rialtais le haghaidh taistil idirnáisiúnta agus bhain sí trí thír, a thiocfadh i bhfeidhm ón 4 am déardaoin 15 aibreán.

translation.en: The countries added were: Bangladesh, belgium, france, italy, kenya, luxembourg, pakistan, turkey, the usa, canada, armenia, bermuda, bosnia and herzegovina, curaçao, maldives and ukraine.
translation.ga: Ba iad na tíortha a cuireadh leis: An bhanglaidéis, an bheilg, an fhrainc, an iodáil, an chéinia, lucsamburg, an phacastáin, an tuirc, sam, ceanada, an airméin, beirmiúda, an bhoisnia agus an heirseagaivéin, curaçao, oileáin mhaildíve agus an úcráin.

translation.en: Albania, israel and saint lucia were removed from the list.
translation.ga: Baineadh albáin, iosrael agus saint lucia den liosta.

translation.en: A fully vaccinated woman quarantining in a dublin hotel after her arrival into the country from israel asked the high court for an inquiry into what she claimed amounted to unlawful detention.
translation.ga: D 'iarr bean lán-vacsaínithe ag coraintín in óstán i mbaile átha cliath tar éis di teacht isteach sa tír ó iosrael fiosrúchán a dhéanamh leis an ard-chúirt faoi ​ ​ na rudaí a mhaígh sí a bhí faoi choinneáil neamhdhleathach.

translation.en: Latest figures showed that as of 8 april, gardaí had issued over 19,865 fines to people breaching covid-19 regulations, with over 13,972 fines issued for non-essential travel and over 3,300 fines issued for attending or hosting house parties.
translation.ga: Thaispeáin na figiúirí is déanaí gur eisigh gardaí, amhail an 8 aibreán, níos mó ná 19,865 fíneálacha ar dhaoine a sháraigh rialacháin covid-19, agus eisíodh níos mó ná 13,972 fíneálacha as taisteal neamhriachtanach agus os cionn 3,300 fíneáil eisithe as freastal ar pháirtithe tí nó óstáil.

translation.en: 10 april – a further 455 cases and 14 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 240,643 cases and 4,783 deaths.
translation.ga: 10 aibreán - tuairiscíodh 455 cás eile agus 14 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 240,643 cás agus 4,783 bás.

translation.en: 4 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 4 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: 11 april
translation.ga: 11 aibreán

translation.en: A further 303 cases (the lowest number of daily cases recorded since mid-december 2020) and 2 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 240,945 cases and 4,785 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 303 cás eile (an líon is lú cásanna laethúla a taifeadadh ó lár mhí na nollag 2020) agus 2 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 240,945 cás agus 4,785 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: An irish man and an israeli woman who challenged their detention in mandatory hotel quarantine and claimed they had been fully vaccinated against covid-19 were released pending court hearings.
translation.ga: Scaoileadh fear éireannach agus bean iosrael a thug dúshlán a gcoinneála i gcoraintín éigeantach óstáin agus a mhaígh go raibh siad vacsaínithe go hiomlán i gcoinne covid-19 ar feitheamh éisteachtaí cúirte.

translation.en: 12 april
translation.ga: 12 aibreán

translation.en: A further 394 cases and no deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 241,330 cases and 4,785 deaths.
translation.ga: Níor tuairiscíodh 394 cás eile agus níor cailleadh aon bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 241,330 cás agus 4,785 bás.

translation.en: 9 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 9 gcás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The phased easing of level 5 restrictions began with the 5 km travel limit lifted, the resumption of all residential construction work, two households could meet up outdoors and the full reopening of all schools.
translation.ga: Cuireadh tús le maolú céimnithe na srianta leibhéal 5 agus an teorainn taistil 5 km ardaithe, atosú na hoibre tógála cónaithe go léir, d ’ fhéadfadh dhá theaghlach teacht le chéile lasmuigh agus athoscailt iomlán na scoileanna go léir.

translation.en: Following a lengthy meeting, the national immunisation advisory committee (niac) recommend that only people over 60 years of age should get the astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine and that a second dose of the vaccine should not be given to anyone who developed unusual blood clots with low platelets after the first dose.
translation.ga: Tar éis cruinnithe fada, molann an coiste comhairleach náisiúnta imdhíonta (niac) nár cheart ach do dhaoine os cionn 60 bliain d ’ aois an vacsaín astrazeneca covid-19 a fháil agus nár cheart an dara dáileog den vacsaín a thabhairt d ’ aon duine a d ’ fhorbair téachtáin fola neamhghnácha le pláitíní ísle tar éis an chéad dáileog.

translation.en: Minister for health stephen donnelly announced that arrivals from israel, albania and st lucia were no longer required to complete their quarantine period in a hotel and could quarantine at home instead.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taire sláinte stephen donnelly nár ghá do dhaoine a tháinig isteach ó iosrael, ón albáin agus ó st lucia a dtréimhse coraintín a chríochnú in óstán agus go bhféadfadh siad coraintín a dhéanamh sa bhaile ina ionad.

translation.en: According to the irish times, six stillbirths in ireland had been linked to covid-19-related infection of the placenta.
translation.ga: De réir the irish times, bhí sé marbh-bhreith in éirinn nasctha le hionfhabhtú a bhain le covid-19 ar an broghais.

translation.en: 13 april
translation.ga: 13 aibreán

translation.en: A further 358 cases and 18 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 241,684 cases and 4,803 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 358 cás agus 18 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 241,684 cás agus 4,803 bás.

translation.en: 4 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 4 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The health service executive (hse) announced that all astrazeneca clinics were cancelled for the rest of the week, except for those arranged for certain people aged over 60.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair feidhmeannas na seirbhíse sláinte (fss) gur cuireadh gach clinic astrazeneca ar ceal an chuid eile den tseachtain, ach amháin iad siúd a socraíodh do dhaoine áirithe os cionn 60 bliain d ’ aois.

translation.en: Minister for health stephen donnelly announced that mandatory hotel quarantine bookings were paused on a precautionary basis, in order to ramp up capacity in the system.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taire sláinte stephen donnelly gur cuireadh áirithintí éigeantacha coraintín óstáin ar sos ar bhonn réamhchúraim, d ’ fhonn acmhainn sa chóras a mhéadú.

translation.en: 14 april
translation.ga: 14 aibreán

translation.en: A further 431 cases and 12 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 242,105 cases and 4,812 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 431 cás eile agus 12 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 242,105 cás agus 4,812 bás.

translation.en: 10 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 10 gcás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Ireland was set to receive 545,000 additional doses of the pfizer – biontech covid-19 vaccine from april to june as part of a wider eu agreement.
translation.ga: Bhí sé beartaithe go bhfaighidh éire 545,000 dáileog breise den vacsaín pfizer-biontech covid-19 ó aibreán go meitheamh mar chuid de chomhaontú ae níos leithne.

translation.en: 15 april
translation.ga: 15 aibreán

translation.en: A further 309 cases and 8 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 242,402 cases and 4,820 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 309 cás agus 8 mbás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 242,402 cás agus 4,820 bás.

translation.en: 12 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 12 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Over 26,000 people registered for a covid-19 vaccination after the online portal for 69-year-olds went live.
translation.ga: Chláraigh níos mó ná 26,000 duine le haghaidh vacsaínithe covid-19 tar éis don tairseach ar líne do dhaoine 69 bliain d ’ aois dul beo.

translation.en: The health service executive (hse) announced that four new walk-in covid-19 testing centres for asymptomatic people would open from 22 april in dublin and tipperary in an effort to bring down cases that are high in certain areas.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair feidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte (fss) go n-osclófaí ceithre ionad tástála covid-19 nua siúil isteach do dhaoine neamhshiomptómacha ón 22 aibreán i mbaile átha cliath agus i dtiobraid árann mar iarracht cásanna a bhfuil leibhéal ard acu i gceantair áirithe a thabhairt anuas.

translation.en: 16 april
translation.ga: 16 aibreán

translation.en: A further 420 cases and 11 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 242,819 cases and 4,831 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 420 cás eile agus 11 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 242,819 cás agus 4,831 bás.

translation.en: 3 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 3 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The european commission urged the government of ireland to amend or possibly scrap mandatory hotel quarantine for eu citizens and sought clarifications as to why a number of eu member states were subject to the rules.
translation.ga: D 'áitigh an coimisiún eorpach ar rialtas na héireann coraintín éigeantach óstáin do shaoránaigh an ae a leasú nó, b ’ fhéidir, agus lorg sé soiléirithe maidir le cén fáth go raibh roinnt ballstát ae faoi ​ ​ réir na rialacha.

translation.en: Latest figures showed that as of 15 april, gardaí had issued over 20,280 fines to people breaching covid-19 regulations, with over 14,650 fines issued for non-essential travel and over 3,500 fines issued for attending or hosting house parties.
translation.ga: Thaispeáin na figiúirí is déanaí go raibh gardaí, amhail an 15 aibreán, tar éis níos mó ná 20,280 fíneálacha a eisiúint do dhaoine a sháraigh rialacháin covid-19, agus eisíodh os cionn 14,650 fíneáil as taisteal neamhriachtanach agus eisíodh os cionn 3,500 fíneáil as freastal ar pháirtithe tí nó iad a óstáil.

translation.en: 17 april – a further 420 cases and 4 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 243,238 cases and 4,835 deaths.
translation.ga: 17 aibreán - tuairiscíodh 420 cás agus 4 bhás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 243,238 cás agus 4,835 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: 18 april – a further 269 cases and 1 death were reported, bringing the totals to 243,508 cases and 4,836 deaths.
translation.ga: 18 aibreán - tuairiscíodh 269 cás eile agus 1 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 243,508 cás agus 4,836 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: 19 april
translation.ga: 19 aibreán

translation.en: A further 403 cases and no deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 243,911 cases and 4,836 deaths.
translation.ga: Níor tuairiscíodh 403 cás eile agus níor tuairiscíodh aon bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 243,911 cás agus 4,836 bás.

translation.en: The director of the national virus reference laboratory cillian de gascun confirmed that three cases of the b.1.617 variant of covid-19, first identified in india, had been detected in the republic of ireland.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh stiúrthóir na saotharlainne náisiúnta tagartha víreas cillian de gascun gur aimsíodh trí chás den leagan b.1.617 de covid-19, a aithníodh den chéad uair san india, i bpoblacht na héireann.

translation.en: 20 april
translation.ga: 20 aibreán

translation.en: A further 390 cases and 11 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 244,297 cases and 4,847 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 390 cás eile agus 11 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 244,297 cás agus 4,847 bás.

translation.en: 4 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 4 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: A nursing home in county louth suspended all indoor visits after two staff members who had been fully vaccinated tested positive for covid-19.
translation.ga: Chuir teach altranais i gcontae lú gach cuairt faoi dhíon ar fionraí tar éis do bheirt bhall foirne a bhí vacsaínithe go hiomlán tástáil dhearfach a dhéanamh ar covid-19.

translation.en: The department of health confirmed that chief medical officer tony holohan had returned to work after taking leave following the death of his wife.
