translation.ga: Dheimhnigh an roinn sláinte go raibh an príomhoifigeach leighis tony holohan tar éis filleadh ar an obair tar éis dó saoire a thógáil tar éis bhás a mhná céile.

translation.en: 21 april – a further 401 cases and 15 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 244,695 cases and 4,856 deaths.
translation.ga: 21 aibreán - tuairiscíodh 401 cás agus 15 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 244,695 cás agus 4,856 bás.

translation.en: 6 previously notified deaths and 3 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 6 bhás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo agus 3 chás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: 22 april
translation.ga: 22 aibreán

translation.en: A further 617 cases and 10 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 245,310 cases and 4,866 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 617 cás eile agus 10 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 245,310 cás agus 4,866 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 2 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: An outbreak of at least 70 covid-19 cases was confirmed at intel's construction site in leixlip, county kildare.
translation.ga: Deimhníodh ráig de 70 cás covid-19 ar a laghad ag láithreán tógála intel i leixlip, contae chill dara.

translation.en: 23 april
translation.ga: 23 aibreán

translation.en: A further 434 cases and 1 death were reported, bringing the totals to 245,743 cases and 4,867 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 434 cás eile agus 1 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 245,743 cás agus 4,867 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: Latest figures showed that as of 22 april, gardaí had issued over 20,566 fines to people breaching covid-19 regulations, with over 14,730 fines issued for non-essential travel and over 3,600 fines issued for attending or hosting house parties.
translation.ga: Thaispeáin na figiúirí is déanaí gur eisigh gardaí, amhail an 22 aibreán, os cionn 20,566 fíneálacha do dhaoine a sháraigh rialacháin covid-19, agus eisíodh níos mó ná 14,730 fíneálacha as taisteal neamhriachtanach agus eisíodh os cionn 3,600 fíneáil as freastal ar pháirtithe tí nó iad a óstáil.

translation.en: The health products regulatory authority reported a number of serious blood clotting events associated with the astrazeneca vaccine in people who received the vaccine.
translation.ga: An túdarás rialála táirgí sláinte thuairiscigh roinnt imeachtaí tromchúiseacha téachtadh fola a bhaineann leis an vacsaín astrazeneca i ndaoine a fuair an vacsaín.

translation.en: A covid-19 outbreak resulted in all leaving certificate students being sent home from a secondary school in letterkenny, county donegal.
translation.ga: Mar thoradh ar ráig de covid-19 cuireadh gach mac léinn ardteistiméireachta abhaile ó mheánscoil i leitir ceanainn, contae dhún na ngall.

translation.en: 24 april
translation.ga: 24 aibreán

translation.en: A further 461 cases and 5 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 246,204 cases and 4,872 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 461 cás eile agus 5 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 246,204 cás agus 4,872 bás.

translation.en: According to the chair of the high-level task force on covid-19 vaccination brian maccraith, one in four adults (25%) in ireland had received at least their first dose of a covid-19 vaccine.
translation.ga: Dar le cathaoirleach an tascfhórsa ardleibhéil ar vacsaíniú covid-19 brian maccraith, fuair duine as gach ceathrar duine fásta (25%) in éirinn a gcéad dáileog ar a laghad den vacsaín covid-19.

translation.en: 25 april
translation.ga: 25 aibreán

translation.en: A further 429 cases and 1 death were reported, bringing the totals to 246,633 cases and 4,873 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 429 cás eile agus 1 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 246,633 cás agus 4,873 bás.

translation.en: Speaking on rté's the week in politics, taoiseach micheál martin stated that the government was moving cautiously on the reopening of society and that outdoor activities would be the "theme for the summer".
translation.ga: Ag labhairt di ar rté 's the week in politics, taoiseach micheál martin dúirt go raibh an rialtas a bhí ag gluaiseacht cúramach ar athoscailt na sochaí agus go mbeadh gníomhaíochtaí amuigh faoin aer a bheith ar an "téama an tsamhraidh".

translation.en: Taoiseach micheál martin announced that ireland had reached the milestone of one million first doses of covid-19 vaccines administered.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taoiseach micheál martin go raibh an chloch mhíle de mhilliún chéad dáileog de vacsaíní covid-19 a riaradh in éirinn.

translation.en: 26 april
translation.ga: 26 aibreán

translation.en: A further 437 cases and 1 death were reported, bringing the totals to 247,069 cases and 4,874 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 437 cás eile agus 1 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 247,069 cás agus 4,874 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: The further easing of level 5 restrictions came into effect with all sports pitches, golf courses, tennis courts, zoos, pet farms and heritage sites reopening.
translation.ga: Tháinig maolú breise srianta leibhéal 5 i bhfeidhm agus athosclaíodh na páirceanna spóirt, na cúrsaí gailf, na cúirteanna leadóige, na zúnna, na bhfeirmeacha peataí agus na suíomhanna oidhreachta go léir.

translation.en: Minister for health stephen donnelly announced that ireland was to donate 700 oxygen concentrators to india as part of efforts to assist with the covid-19 outbreak in the country.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taire sláinte stephen donnelly go raibh éire chun 700 comhchruinnitheoir ocsaigine a bhronnadh ar an india mar chuid d ’ iarrachtaí cabhrú leis an ráig covid-19 sa tír.

translation.en: The health service executive (hse) announced that two new walk-in covid-19 testing centres for asymptomatic people would open in kildare and offaly in an effort to bring down cases that are high in certain areas.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair feidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte (fss) go n-osclófaí dhá ionad tástála nua covid-19 do dhaoine neamhshiomptómacha i gcill dara agus in uíbh fhailí mar iarracht cásanna atá ard i gceantair áirithe a thabhairt anuas.

translation.en: 27 april
translation.ga: 27 aibreán

translation.en: A further 426 cases and 10 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 247,489 cases and 4,884 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 426 cás eile agus 10 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 247,489 cás agus 4,884 bás.

translation.en: 6 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 6 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: New recommendations by niac were approved by the government of ireland with the johnson & johnson and astrazeneca covid-19 vaccines recommended for people aged 50 and older, pregnant women offered an mrna vaccine between 14 and 36 weeks gestation, and people aged under 50 years who had a covid-19 infection receiving just one vaccine dose and be considered fully-vaccinated.
translation.ga: Cheadaigh rialtas na héireann moltaí nua ó niac agus mhol na vacsaíní johnson & johnson agus astrazeneca covid-19 do dhaoine 50 bliain d ’ aois agus níos sine, mná torracha vacsaín mrna a thairiscint idir tréimhse iompair 14 agus 36 seachtaine, agus do dhaoine faoi 50 bliain d ’ aois atá go raibh ionfhabhtú covid-19 aige nach bhfuair ach dáileog vacsaín amháin agus a mheas go raibh sé vacsaínithe go hiomlán.

translation.en: A primary school in county offaly closed following confirmation of 23 cases of covid-19.
translation.ga: Dúnadh bunscoil i gcontae uíbh fhailí tar éis 23 cás de covid-19 a dhearbhú.

translation.en: 28 april – a further 371 cases and 13 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 247,857 cases and 4,896 deaths.
translation.ga: 28 aibreán - tuairiscíodh 371 cás eile agus 13 bás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 247,857 cás agus 4,896 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death and 3 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo agus 3 chás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: 29 april
translation.ga: 29 aibreán

translation.en: A further 474 cases and 3 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 248,326 cases and 4,899 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 474 cás agus 3 bhás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 248,326 cás agus 4,899 bás.

translation.en: 5 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 5 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The government of ireland announced a reopening plan for the country throughout may and june from 10 may, with inter-county travel allowed, the reopening of all hairdressers, libraries, museums and galleries, up to 50 people allowed to attend religious services, the resumption of click-and-collect services and the allowances of three households to meet outdoors (including in private gardens) and a vaccinated household to meet an unvaccinated household indoors from that date.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair rialtas na héireann plean athoscailte don tír i rith mhí na bealtaine agus an mheithimh ón 10 bealtaine, le taisteal idirchontae ceadaithe, athoscailt gach gruagaire, leabharlainne, músaem agus dánlann, cead ag suas le 50 duine freastal ar sheirbhísí reiligiúnacha, an atosú seirbhísí cliceáil-agus-bailithe agus liúntais trí theaghlach le bualadh le chéile lasmuigh (lena n-áirítear i ngairdíní príobháideacha) agus teaghlach vacsaínithe chun bualadh le teaghlach gan vacsaíniú laistigh ón dáta sin.

translation.en: From 17 may
translation.ga: Ón 17 bealtaine

translation.en: All retail could reopen
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh gach miondíol athoscailt

translation.en: From 2 june
translation.ga: Ón 2 meitheamh

translation.en: Hotels, b & bs, self-catering and hostels could reopen but services must be restricted to overnight guests and residents
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí óstáin, leaba agus bricfeasta, féinfhreastail agus brúnna a athoscailt ach caithfear seirbhísí a theorannú d ’ aíonna agus do chónaitheoirí thar oíche

translation.en: From 7 june
translation.ga: Ón 7 meitheamh

translation.en: Outdoor sports matches could recommence with no spectators permitted
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh cluichí spóirt lasmuigh tosú arís gan aon lucht féachana a cheadú

translation.en: Gyms, swimming pools and leisure centres could reopen for individual training only
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh giomnáisíní, linnte snámha agus ionaid fóillíochta athoscailt le haghaidh oiliúna aonair amháin

translation.en: Outdoor services in restaurants and bars could recommence, with groups limited to a maximum of 6 people
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí tús a chur le seirbhísí lasmuigh i mbialanna agus i mbeáir, agus grúpaí teoranta do 6 dhuine ar a mhéad

translation.en: The numbers of guests attending wedding celebrations / receptions could increase to 25
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh líon na n-aíonna a fhreastalaíonn ar cheiliúradh / fáiltithe bainise a mhéadú go 25

translation.en: Visitors from one other household could be permitted in private homes
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí cuairteoirí ó theaghlach amháin eile a cheadú i dtithe príobháideacha

translation.en: 30 april
translation.ga: 30 aibreán

translation.en: A further 545 cases and 4 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 248,870 cases and 4,903 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 545 cás agus 4 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 248,870 cás agus 4,903 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: Minister for health stephen donnelly announced that nearly 150 cases of variants of concern had been identified in ireland, including: 71 cases of the south african variant, 27 cases of the brazilian variant, 8 cases of the indian variant, 6 cases of the new york variant and 20 cases of the nigerian variant.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taire sláinte stephen donnelly gur aithníodh beagnach 150 cás d ’ athruithe imní in éirinn, lena n-áirítear: 71 cás d ’ athróg na hafraice theas, 27 cás d ’ athróg na brasaíle, 8 gcás den leagan indiach, 6 chás de nua eabhrac leagan athraitheach agus 20 cás den leagan nigéir.

translation.en: The department of health added a further 5 countries to the government's covid-19 "high-risk" list for international travel and removed 6 countries, which would come into effect from 4 am on tuesday 4 may.
translation.ga: Chuir an roinn sláinte 5 thír eile le liosta “ardriosca ” covid-19 an rialtais le haghaidh taistil idirnáisiúnta agus bhain sí 6 thír amach, a thiocfadh i bhfeidhm ó 4 am dé máirt 4 bealtaine.

translation.en: The countries added were: Costa rica, georgia, india, iran and mongolia.
translation.ga: Ba iad na tíortha a cuireadh leis: Costa rica, georgia, an india, an iaráin agus an mhongóil.

translation.en: Bonaire, sint eustatius and saba, san marino, monaco, wallis and futuna islands, and moldova were removed with immediate effect.
translation.ga: Baineadh bonaire, sint eustatius agus saba, san mairíne, monacó, oileáin wallis agus futuna, agus an mholdóiv le héifeacht láithreach.

translation.en: Chief medical officer tony holohan stated that there were concerns around the level of covid-19 in donegal and that there were outbreaks occurring in lots of different settings in the county.
translation.ga: Dúirt an príomhoifigeach leighis tony holohan go raibh imní ann faoi leibhéal covid-19 i ndún na ngall agus go raibh ráigeanna ag tarlú i go leor suíomhanna éagsúla sa chontae.

translation.en: Latest figures showed that as of 29 april, gardaí had issued over 20,974 fines to people breaching covid-19 regulations, with over 14,749 fines issued for non-essential travel and over 3,900 fines issued for attending or hosting house parties.
translation.ga: Thaispeáin na figiúirí is déanaí gur eisigh gardaí, amhail an 29 aibreán, os cionn 20,974 fíneálacha do dhaoine a sháraigh rialacháin covid-19, agus eisíodh níos mó ná 14,749 fíneálacha as taisteal neamhriachtanach agus eisíodh os cionn 3,900 fíneáil as freastal ar pháirtithe tí nó iad a óstáil.

translation.en: 1 may
translation.ga: 1 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 569 cases and 3 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 249,437 cases and 4,906 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 569 cás agus 3 bhás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 249,437 cás agus 4,906 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 2 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Around 370 protestors took part in an anti-lockdown protest at the national monument on the grand parade in cork city centre.
translation.ga: Ghlac timpeall 370 agóide páirt in agóid frithdhúnadh ag an séadchomhartha náisiúnta ar an bparáid mhór i lár chathair chorcaí.

translation.en: The health service executive (hse) announced that seven new walk-in covid-19 testing centres for asymptomatic people would open in dublin, cork, kildare and mayo in an effort to bring down cases that are high in certain areas.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair feidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte (fss) go n-osclófaí seacht n-ionad tástála covid-19 nua siúil isteach do dhaoine neamhshiomptómacha i mbaile átha cliath, corcaigh, chill dara agus maigh eo mar iarracht cásanna atá ard i gceantair áirithe a thabhairt anuas.

translation.en: 2 may – a further 402 cases and 1 death were reported, bringing the totals to 249,838 cases and 4,906 deaths.
translation.ga: 2 bealtaine - tuairiscíodh 402 cás eile agus 1 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 249,838 cás agus 4,906 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death and 1 previously notified case were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo agus 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: 3 may
translation.ga: 3 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 453 cases and no deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 250,290 cases and 4,906 deaths.
translation.ga: Níor tuairiscíodh 453 cás eile agus níor tuairiscíodh aon bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 250,290 cás agus 4,906 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: In an open letter to those who had been fully vaccinated, chief medical officer tony holohan praised the sacrifices people had made over the past year and advised those who were vaccinated to make the most of socialising outdoors.
translation.ga: I litir oscailte dóibh siúd a bhí vacsaínithe go hiomlán, mhol an príomhoifigeach leighis tony holohan na híobairtí a rinne daoine le bliain anuas agus mhol sé dóibh siúd a bhí vacsaínithe an leas is fearr a bhaint as sóisialú lasmuigh.

translation.en: 4 may
translation.ga: 4 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 383 cases and 2 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 250,672 cases and 4,908 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 383 cás eile agus 2 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 250,672 cás agus 4,908 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: A special hotline to allow the public to inform the gardaí about illegal parties or gatherings in county donegal was set up in response to a spike in the number of covid-19 cases in the county in recent days.
translation.ga: Cuireadh beolíne speisialta ar bun chun ligean don phobal na gardaí a chur ar an eolas faoi pháirtithe nó cruinnithe mídhleathacha i gcontae dhún na ngall mar fhreagairt ar spíce i líon na gcásanna covid-19 sa chontae le cúpla lá anuas.

translation.en: The covid-19 vaccine registration portal opened to people aged between 50 and 59 on a phased basis, starting with people aged 59.
translation.ga: Osclaíodh tairseach cláraithe vacsaín covid-19 do dhaoine idir 50 agus 59 bliain d ’ aois ar bhonn céimnithe, ag tosú le daoine 59.

translation.en: 5 may – a further 418 cases and 7 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 251,087 cases and 4,915 deaths.
translation.ga: 5 bealtaine - tuairiscíodh 418 cás eile agus 7 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 251,087 cás agus 4,915 bás.

translation.en: 3 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 3 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: 6 may
translation.ga: 6 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 393 cases and 8 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 251,474 cases and 4,921 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 393 cás agus 8 mbás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 251,474 cás agus 4,921 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified deaths and 6 cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Cuireadh 2 bhás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo agus 6 chás dí-fhógra.

translation.en: The first doses of the johnson & johnson covid-19 vaccine were administered through homeless services at a temporary vaccination clinic set up in dublin.
translation.ga: Riaradh na chéad dáileoga den vacsaín johnson & johnson covid-19 trí sheirbhísí do dhaoine gan dídean i gclinic vacsaínithe sealadach a bunaíodh i mbaile átha cliath.

translation.en: Around 120 revellers defied an emergency court order after attending a post-wedding celebration involving members of the traveller community in a marquee in county longford on 5 may.
translation.ga: Sháraigh timpeall 120 nochtóir ordú cúirte éigeandála tar éis dóibh freastal ar cheiliúradh tar éis bainise ina raibh baill de phobal an lucht siúil i marquee i gcontae an longfoirt an 5 bealtaine.

translation.en: 7 may
translation.ga: 7 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 434 cases and 4 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 251,904 cases and 4,918 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 434 cás eile agus 4 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 251,904 cás agus 4,918 bás.

translation.en: 4 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 4 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The department of tourism, culture, arts, gaeltacht, sport and media announced that all summer irish language college courses in the gaeltacht were cancelled for a second year running.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an roinn turasóireachta, cultúir, ealaíon, gaeltachta, spóirt agus na meán gur cuireadh gach cúrsa coláiste gaeilge samhraidh sa ghaeltacht ar ceal don dara bliain as a chéile.

translation.en: 8 may
translation.ga: 8 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 408 cases and 1 death were reported, bringing the totals to 252,303 cases and 4,919 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 408 cás eile agus 1 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 252,303 cás agus 4,919 bás.

translation.en: 9 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 9 gcás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The department of health added a further 2 countries to the government's covid-19 "high-risk" list for international travel and removed 11 countries, which would come into effect from 4 am on wednesday 12 may.
translation.ga: Chuir an roinn sláinte 2 thír eile le liosta “ardriosca ” covid-19 an rialtais le haghaidh taistil idirnáisiúnta agus bhain sí 11 tír, a thiocfadh i bhfeidhm ó 4 am dé céadaoin 12 bealtaine.

translation.en: The countries added were: Nepal and anguilla.
translation.ga: Ba iad na tíortha a cuireadh leis: Neipeal agus anguilla.

translation.en: Armenia, aruba, austria, bosnia and herzegovina, curaçao, italy, jordan, kosovo, lebanon, north macedonia and ukraine were removed with immediate effect.
translation.ga: Baineadh an airméin, aruba, an ostair, an bhoisnia agus an heirseagaivéin, curaçao, an iodáil, an iordáin, an chosaiv, an liobáin, macadóine thuaidh agus an úcráin le héifeacht láithreach.

translation.en: 9 may
translation.ga: 9 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 514 cases and 2 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 252,809 cases and 4,921 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 514 cás eile agus 2 bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 252,809 cás agus 4,921 bás.

translation.en: 8 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 8 gcás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: Taoiseach micheál martin received his first dose of a covid-19 vaccine in cork city hall and urged people to get vaccinated to protect themselves, while a record 52,278 doses were administered on friday 7 may.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ an taoiseach micheál martin a chéad dáileog de vacsaín covid-19 i halla na cathrach i gcorcaigh agus d ’ áitigh sé ar dhaoine vacsaíniú a fháil chun iad féin a chosaint, agus tugadh 52,278 dáileog is airde riamh dé haoine 7 bealtaine.

translation.en: 10 may
translation.ga: 10 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 381 cases and no deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 253,189 cases and 4,921 deaths.
translation.ga: Níor tuairiscíodh 381 cás eile agus níor tuairiscíodh aon bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 253,189 cás agus 4,921 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified case was de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 chás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo.

translation.en: The further easing of level 5 restrictions came into effect with all hairdressers, barbers, beauticians, galleries, museums, libraries and other cultural attractions reopening, the resumption of non-essential retail on a phased basis, inter-county travel and in-person religious services, and the allowance of three households (or six people) from individual households to meet outdoors.
translation.ga: Tháinig maolú breise ar shrianta leibhéal 5 i bhfeidhm agus athosclaíodh na gruagairí, na bearbóirí, na háilleoirí, na dánlanna, na músaeim, na leabharlanna agus na nithe cultúrtha eile, atosú miondíola neamhriachtanach ar bhonn céimnithe, taisteal idirchontae agus reiligiúnach pearsanta seirbhísí, agus liúntas trí theaghlach (nó seisear) ó theaghlaigh aonair chun bualadh le chéile lasmuigh.

translation.en: The irish prison service confirmed that an outbreak of 19 cases of covid-19 had been identified at mountjoy prison.
translation.ga: An seirbhís phríosúin na héireann dheimhnigh go raibh ráig de 19 cás de covid-19 aitheanta ag príosún mhuinseo.

translation.en: 11 may – a further 379 cases and 9 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 253,567 cases and 4,929 deaths.
translation.ga: 11 bealtaine - tuairiscíodh 379 cás agus 9 mbás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 253,567 cás agus 4,929 bás.

translation.en: 1 previously notified death and 1 case were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 1 bhás ar tugadh fógra dó roimhe seo agus 1 chás.

translation.en: 12 may – a further 448 cases and 8 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 254,013 cases and 4,937 deaths.
translation.ga: 12 bealtaine - tuairiscíodh 448 cás eile agus 8 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 254,013 cás agus 4,937 bás.

translation.en: 2 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 2 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: 13 may – a further 456 cases and no deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 254,450 cases and 4,937 deaths.
translation.ga: 13 bealtaine - 456 cás eile agus níor tuairiscíodh aon bhás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 254,450 cás agus 4,937 bás.

translation.en: 19 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 19 gcás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: 14 may
translation.ga: 14 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 425 cases and 4 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 254,870 cases and 4,940 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 425 cás agus 4 bhás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 254,870 cás agus 4,940 bás.

translation.en: 5 previously notified cases were de-notified.
translation.ga: Dífhógraíodh 5 chás ar tugadh fógra dóibh roimhe seo.

translation.en: The health service executive (hse) shut down all of its it systems after a major ransomware attack, with ireland's gp and close contact referral system and the covid-19 vaccine registration portal down, while the covid-19 vaccination programme had not been affected by the attack.
translation.ga: An fheidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte (hse) t síos gach ceann dá chórais tf tar éis mór- ionsaí ransomware, le córas atreoraithe dg agus dún teagmháil héireann agus an covid-19 clárú vacsaín síos tairseach, agus an clár vacsaínithe covid-19 nach raibh tionchar ag an ionsaí.

translation.en: The 2021 national ploughing championships, due to have taken place in county laois in september, was cancelled for a second year due to uncertainty over covid-19 restrictions.
translation.ga: Cuireadh craobh náisiúnta treabhdóireachta 2021, a bhí le bheith ar siúl i gcontae laois i mí mheán fómhair, ar ceal don dara bliain mar gheall ar éiginnteacht faoi shrianta covid-19.

translation.en: 15 may
translation.ga: 15 bealtaine

translation.en: The department of health announced that there would be no daily covid-19 figures update provided due to the health service executive cyberattack, with backdated figures being published "when possible".
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an roinn sláinte nach gcuirfí aon nuashonrú laethúil ar fhigiúirí covid-19 ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fheidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte, agus foilsíodh figiúirí siardhátaithe “nuair is féidir ”.

translation.en: The hse stated that there was "substantial cancellations across all outpatient services with widespread cancellation of radiology services" following a ransomware attack on its it systems.
translation.ga: Dúirt fss go raibh “cealuithe suntasacha ar fud na seirbhísí othar seachtrach go léir le seirbhísí raideolaíochta a chealú go forleathan ” tar éis ionsaí ransomware ar a chórais tf.

translation.en: The department of health removed 5 countries from the government's covid-19 "high-risk" list for international travel with immediate effect.
translation.ga: Chuir an roinn sláinte 5 thír ar liosta “ardriosca ” covid-19 an rialtais le haghaidh taistil idirnáisiúnta le héifeacht láithreach.

translation.en: The countries removed were: Bermuda, iran, montenegro, palestine and serbia.
translation.ga: Ba iad na tíortha a baineadh: Beirmiúda, an iaráin, montainéagró, an phalaistín agus an tseirbia.

translation.en: 16 may
translation.ga: 16 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 802 cases were reported in the past 48 hours, with 447 cases reported on 15 may and 355 cases reported on 16 may.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 802 cás eile le 48 uair an chloig anuas, agus tuairiscíodh 447 cás an 15 bealtaine agus tuairiscíodh 355 cás an 16 bealtaine.

translation.en: The department of health confirmed that it had been the victim of a separate cyber attack similar to the ransomware attack on the health service executive, prompting the shutting down of much of its it infrastructure.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh an roinn sláinte gur íospartach cibear-ionsaí ar leithligh í a bhí cosúil leis an ionsaí ransomware ar fheidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte, ag spreagadh go ndúnfaí cuid mhaith dá bonneagar tf.

translation.en: 17 may
translation.ga: 17 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 360 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 360 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: The further easing of level 5 restrictions came into effect with the reopening of all non-essential retail for the first time in over four months.
translation.ga: Tháinig maolú breise na srianta leibhéal 5 i bhfeidhm nuair a athosclaíodh gach miondíol neamhriachtanach den chéad uair le breis agus ceithre mhí.

translation.en: The national immunisation advisory committee (niac) confirmed that people in their 40s would be given a choice to accept the johnson & johnson or astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine or opt to wait for another vaccine.
translation.ga: An coiste náisiúnta comhairleach imdhíonadh deimhnithe (niac) go mbeadh daoine i n-40s a thabhairt do rogha a glacadh leis an johnson & johnson nó astrazeneca covid-19 vacsaín nó rogha an diúltaithe chun fanacht ar vacsaín eile.

translation.en: 18 may – a further 358 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: 18 bealtaine - tuairiscíodh 358 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: 19 may
translation.ga: 19 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 503 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 503 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: The covid-19 vaccine registration portal opened to people aged between 45 and 49 on a phased basis, starting with people aged 49.
translation.ga: Osclaíodh tairseach cláraithe vacsaín covid-19 do dhaoine idir 45 agus 49 bliain d ’ aois ar bhonn céimnithe, ag tosú le daoine 49 bliain d ’ aois.

translation.en: Pfizer announced that it would begin using its west dublin facility as part of its supply chain for its covid-19 vaccine.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair pfizer go dtosódh sé ag úsáid a shaoráide in iarthar bhaile átha cliath mar chuid dá shlabhra soláthair dá vacsaín covid-19.

translation.en: 20 may
translation.ga: 20 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 469 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 469 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: It was reported that the organised cyber crime group that attacked the hse and the department of health it systems provided a decryption key, while the public was advised to be aware of a number of call and text scams in the wake of the cyber attack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh go raibh an grúpa coireachta cíbear eagraithe a ionsaigh an hse agus an roinn sláinte ar fáil ar chórais tf eochair dhíchriptiú, agus cuireadh comhairle ar an bpobal a bheith ar an eolas ar roinnt glao agus téacs scams i ndiaidh an ionsaí cíbear.

translation.en: 21 may
translation.ga: 21 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 524 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 524 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: Minister for rural and community development heather humphreys announced the return of the tidy towns competition after it was cancelled in 2020 due to the pandemic.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an taire forbartha tuaithe agus pobail heather humphreys go bhfuil comórtas na mbailte slachtmhara ar ais tar éis é a chur ar ceal in 2020 mar gheall ar an bpaindéim.

translation.en: 22 may
translation.ga: 22 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 381 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 381 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: The department of health removed 6 countries from the government's covid-19 "high-risk" list for international travel with immediate effect.
translation.ga: Chuir an roinn sláinte 6 thír ar liosta “ardriosca ” covid-19 an rialtais le haghaidh taistil idirnáisiúnta le héifeacht láithreach.

translation.en: The countries removed were: Andorra, georgia, kuwait, mongolia, nigeria and puerto rico.
translation.ga: Ba iad na tíortha a baineadh: Andóra, an tseoirsia, cuáit, an mhongóil, an nigéir agus pórtó ríce.

translation.en: 23 may – a further 438 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: 23 bealtaine - tuairiscíodh 438 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: 24 may – a further 345 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: 24 bealtaine - tuairiscíodh 345 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: 25 may – a further 365 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: 25 bealtaine - tuairiscíodh 365 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: 26 may
translation.ga: 26 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 448 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 448 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: Under new covid-19 safety guidelines issued by fáilte ireland, a maximum of six people aged 13 years and over would be allowed per table when restaurants, pubs and cafés open in june, with up to 15 people allowed when accompanying children under the age of 12.
translation.ga: Faoi threoirlínte sábháilteachta nua covid-19 arna n-eisiúint ag fáilte ireland, cheadófaí seisear ar a mhéad 13 bliana d ’ aois agus níos sine in aghaidh an tábla nuair a osclaítear bialanna, tithe tábhairne agus caiféanna i mí an mheithimh, agus ceadófar suas le 15 duine agus iad in éineacht le leanaí faoi bhun bliana d ’ aois 12.

translation.en: 27 may
translation.ga: 27 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 436 cases and 8 deaths were reported, however data relating to the total number of cases and deaths were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 436 cás eile agus 8 mbás, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhain le líon iomlán na gcásanna agus na mbásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat an fss.

translation.en: The chief executive of the health service executive (hse) paul reid stated that the cost of the cyber attack on its it systems could exceed €100 million.
translation.ga: Dúirt príomhfheidhmeannach fheidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte (fss) paul reid go bhféadfadh costas an chibear-ionsaí ar a chórais tf a bheith níos mó ná €100 milliún.

translation.en: 28 may
translation.ga: 28 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 467 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 467 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: The hse confirmed that data relating to 520 patients, including sensitive information, was published online following the ransomware attack on 14 may.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh fss gur foilsíodh sonraí a bhaineann le 520 othar, lena n-áirítear faisnéis íogair, ar líne tar éis an ionsaí ransomware an 14 bealtaine.

translation.en: The department of health removed 4 countries from the government's covid-19 "high-risk" list for international travel with immediate effect.
translation.ga: Chuir an roinn sláinte 4 thír ar liosta “ardriosca ” covid-19 an rialtais le haghaidh taistil idirnáisiúnta le héifeacht láithreach.

translation.en: The countries removed were: Belgium, france, luxembourg and the united states.
translation.ga: Ba iad na tíortha a baineadh: An bheilg, an fhrainc, lucsamburg agus na stáit aontaithe.

translation.en: The government of ireland announced a further reopening plan for the country throughout june, july and august, with the reopening of all hotels from 2 june, outdoor hospitality, cinemas, swimming pools, gyms from 7 june, and indoor hospitality from 5 july.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair rialtas na héireann plean athoscailte eile don tír i rith mhí an mheithimh, iúil agus lúnasa, agus athosclófar na hóstáin go léir ón 2 meitheamh, fáilteachas lasmuigh, pictiúrlanna, linnte snámha, gyms ón 7 meitheamh, agus fáilteachas faoi dhíon ón 5 iúil.

translation.en: From 2 june:
translation.ga: Ón 2 meitheamh:

translation.en: Reopening of accommodation services including hotels, b & bs, self-catering and hostels
translation.ga: Seirbhísí cóiríochta a athoscailt lena n-áirítear óstáin, leaba agus bricfeasta, féinfhreastail agus brúnna

translation.en: From 7 june:
translation.ga: Ón 7 meitheamh:

translation.en: The numbers permitted at organised outdoor events could increase to a maximum of 100 for the majority of venues, with a maximum of 200 for outdoor venues with a minimum accredited capacity of 5,000
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh na huimhreacha a cheadaítear ag imeachtaí eagraithe lasmuigh méadú go huasmhéid 100 d ’ fhormhór na n-ionad, agus uasmhéid de 200 d ’ ionaid lasmuigh le hacmhainn chreidiúnaithe íosta de 5,000

translation.en: Reopening of all cinemas, theatres, gyms, swimming pools and leisure centres
translation.ga: Athoscailt gach pictiúrlann, amharclann, giomnáisiam, linnte snámha agus ionad fóillíochta

translation.en: Reopening of outdoor amusement parks, theme parks and funfairs
translation.ga: Páirceanna siamsaíochta lasmuigh, páirceanna téama agus crainn spraoi a athoscailt

translation.en: Resumption of outdoor services in restaurants and pubs
translation.ga: Seirbhísí lasmuigh a atosú i mbialanna agus i dtithe tábhairne

translation.en: Visiting indoors in private homes
translation.ga: Cuairt laistigh i dtithe príobháideacha

translation.en: Partial reopening of driver theory test services
translation.ga: Athoscailt pháirteach ar sheirbhísí tástála teoirice tiománaithe

translation.en: Resumption of outdoor sports matches
translation.ga: Cluichí spóirt faoin aer a atosú

translation.en: From 5 july:
translation.ga: Ón 5 iúil:

translation.en: Up to three households permitted to meet indoors in private homes in line with level 2
translation.ga: Ceadaítear do suas le trí theaghlach bualadh le chéile i dtithe príobháideacha de réir leibhéal 2

translation.en: Resumption of organised indoor events
translation.ga: Imeachtaí eagraithe faoi dhíon a atosú

translation.en: The numbers permitted at outdoor organised events could further increase to a maximum of 200 for the majority of venues, with a maximum of 500 for outdoor stadia / venues with a minimum accredited capacity of 5,000
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh na huimhreacha a cheadaítear ag imeachtaí eagraithe lasmuigh méadú níos mó go 200 ar a mhéad i gcás fhormhór na n-ionad, le 500 ar a mhéad do staidiam / ionaid lasmuigh le hacmhainn chreidiúnaithe íosta de 5,000

translation.en: Resumption of indoor services in restaurants and pubs
translation.ga: Seirbhísí faoi dhíon a atosú i mbialanna agus i dtithe tábhairne

translation.en: Reopening of bowling alleys, snooker halls, amusement arcades, ice-skating / roller skating rinks and indoor waterparks
translation.ga: Oscailt ailléil babhlála, hallaí snúcair, stuaraí siamsaíochta, scátáil oighir / rinc scátáil sorcóir agus páirceanna uisce faoi dhíon

translation.en: From 19 july:
translation.ga: Ón 19 iúil:

translation.en: International non-essential travel would be allowed with the eu digital covid-19 certificate for travel coming into force in ireland
translation.ga: Cheadófaí taisteal neamhriachtanach idirnáisiúnta le teastas digiteach covid-19 an ae le haghaidh taistil a thiocfaidh i bhfeidhm in éirinn

translation.en: 29 may
translation.ga: 29 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 464 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 464 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: Four people were arrested for public order offences after large crowds gathered in parts of dublin city centre, while chief medical officer tony holohan stated that he was "absolutely shocked" by the crowds that gathered.
translation.ga: Gabhadh ceathrar daoine as cionta oird phoiblí tar éis do sluaite móra teacht le chéile i gcodanna de lár chathair bhaile átha cliath, agus dúirt an príomhoifigeach leighis tony holohan go raibh “iontas mór air ” ag na sluaite a bhailigh.

translation.en: 30 may – a further 374 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: 30 bealtaine - tuairiscíodh 374 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: 31 may
translation.ga: 31 bealtaine

translation.en: A further 378 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 378 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: It was announced that the 2021 edition of the rose of tralee would be cancelled for the second year in a row.
translation.ga: Fógraíodh go gcuirfí eagrán 2021 de rose of tralee ar ceal don dara bliain as a chéile.

translation.en: 1 june
translation.ga: 1 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 337 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 337 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: According to a new study published by the irish medical journal, medics reported what they believed to be the first case of covid-19 reinfection in ireland in a 40-year-old female healthcare worker.
translation.ga: De réir staidéir nua a d ’ fhoilsigh an irish medical journal, thuairiscigh dochtúirí an rud a chreid siad a bheith ar an gcéad chás d ’ ath-athshlánú covid-19 in éirinn in oibrí cúram sláinte mná 40 bliain d ’ aois.

translation.en: The government of ireland launched a €3.5 billion economic recovery plan to achieve rapid job creation and economic growth after the pandemic, with the covid-19 pandemic unemployment payment and the employment wage subsidy scheme extended until september 2021, when gradual reductions would begin.
translation.ga: Sheol rialtas na héireann plean téarnaimh eacnamaíoch €3.5 billiún chun cruthú post tapa agus fás eacnamaíoch a bhaint amach tar éis na paindéime, agus leathnaíodh íocaíocht dífhostaíochta phaindéimeach covid-19 agus an scéim fóirdheontais pá fostaíochta go dtí meán fómhair 2021, nuair a chuirfí tús le laghduithe de réir a chéile.

translation.en: 2 june
translation.ga: 2 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 407 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 407 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: The covid-19 vaccine registration portal opened to people aged between 40 and 44 on a phased basis, starting with people aged 44.
translation.ga: Osclaíodh tairseach cláraithe vacsaín covid-19 do dhaoine idir 40 agus 44 bliain d ’ aois ar bhonn céimnithe, ag tosú le daoine 44 bliain d ’ aois.

translation.en: The gradual easing of covid-19 restrictions on the tourism and hospitality sector came into effect with the reopening of all hotels, b & bs, self-catering accommodation and hostels.
translation.ga: Tháinig maolú de réir a chéile ar shrianta covid-19 ar earnáil na turasóireachta agus an fháilteachais nuair a athosclaíodh gach óstán, leaba agus leaba, cóiríocht féinfhreastail agus brúnna.

translation.en: A probationary garda avoided a jail sentence for breaching covid-19 restrictions, and instead received a €1,000 fine for the breach along with a charge for being intoxicated in public.
translation.ga: Sheachain garda promhaidh pianbhreith príosúin as srianta covid-19 a shárú, agus ina ionad sin fuair sé fíneáil €1,000 as an sárú mar aon le muirear as a bheith ar meisce go poiblí.

translation.en: The director of the national virus reference laboratory cillian de gascun confirmed that there had been 115 cases of the indian variant of covid-19 detected in ireland.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh stiúrthóir na saotharlainne náisiúnta tagartha víreas cillian de gascun go bhfuarthas 115 cás den leagan indiach de covid-19 a braitheadh ​ ​ in éirinn.

translation.en: The department of education announced that leaving certificate results would be delayed for a second year in a row, with students to receive their results on 3 september.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair an roinn oideachais go gcuirfí moill ar thorthaí an ardteistiméireachta don dara bliain as a chéile, agus go bhfaigheadh ​ ​ mic léinn a dtorthaí an 3 meán fómhair.

translation.en: 3 june
translation.ga: 3 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 465 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 465 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: The health information and quality authority (hiqa) advised the national public health emergency team that the duration of immunity following covid-19 infection should be extended from six to nine months.
translation.ga: Chuir an túdarás um fhaisnéis agus cáilíocht sláinte (hiqa) in iúl don fhoireann náisiúnta éigeandála sláinte poiblí gur chóir fad na díolúine tar éis ionfhabhtú covid-19 a shíneadh ó sé go naoi mí.

translation.en: The government's emergency covid-19 powers including additional garda powers introduced to deal with covid-19 was extended until november 2021.
translation.ga: Leathnaíodh cumhachtaí éigeandála covid-19 an rialtais lena n-áirítear cumhachtaí breise garda a tugadh isteach chun déileáil le covid-19 go dtí samhain 2021.

translation.en: Speaking on rté's morning ireland, minister for further and higher education simon harris stated that he expected students and staff to be back on campus for the new academic year of 2021 / 22.
translation.ga: Ag labhairt dó ar morning ireland ar rté, dúirt an taire breisoideachais agus ardoideachais simon harris go raibh sé ag súil go mbeadh mic léinn agus baill foirne ar ais ar an gcampas don bhliain acadúil nua 2021 / 22.

translation.en: The national immunisation advisory committee (niac) advised that the gap between two doses of the astrazeneca vaccine could be reduced from 12 weeks to 8 weeks.
translation.ga: Thug an coiste comhairleach náisiúnta um imdhíonadh (niac) le fios go bhféadfaí an bhearna idir dhá dháileog den vacsaín astrazeneca a laghdú ó 12 sheachtain go 8 seachtaine.

translation.en: 4 june
translation.ga: 4 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 529 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 529 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: Minister of state with responsibility for the office of public works patrick o'donovan appealed to people visiting st stephen's green in dublin to respect the site after reckless behaviour was witnessed on 3 june when a group of people gained access to the bandstand which had been fenced off for health and safety reasons.
translation.ga: Rinne an taire stáit le freagracht as oifig na noibreacha poiblí patrick o' donovan achomharc chuig daoine a thug cuairt ar fhaiche stiabhna i mbaile átha cliath chun meas a bheith acu ar an láithreán tar éis dó iompar meargánta a fheiceáil an 3 meitheamh nuair a fuair grúpa daoine rochtain ar an seastán a bhí fálaithe as ar chúiseanna sláinte agus sábháilteachta.

translation.en: 5 june
translation.ga: 5 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 416 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 416 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: 14 people (including 5 juveniles) were arrested for public order offences and a garda received hospital treatment on the night of 4 june, after violence broke out in dublin city centre in which glass bottles were thrown at gardaí, which resulted in a patrol car being damaged.
translation.ga: Gabhadh 14 duine (5 ógánach san áireamh) mar gheall ar chionta oird phoiblí agus fuair garda cóireáil ospidéil oíche an 4 meitheamh, tar éis foréigean a bhriseadh amach i lár chathair bhaile átha cliath inar caitheadh ​ ​ buidéil ghloine ag gardaí, agus mar thoradh air sin cuireadh carr patróil damáiste.

translation.en: Minister for health stephen donnelly described the incidents as "thuggish behaviour and completely unacceptable".
translation.ga: Chuir an taire sláinte stephen donnelly síos ar na heachtraí mar “iompar thuggish agus go hiomlán do-ghlactha ”.

translation.en: Minister for health stephen donnelly received his first dose of a covid-19 vaccine in greystones, county wicklow.
translation.ga: Fuair ​ ​ an taire sláinte stephen donnelly a chéad dáileog de vacsaín covid-19 sna clocha liatha, contae chill mhantáin.

translation.en: The department of health added a further 5 countries to the government's covid-19 "high-risk" list for international travel, which would come into effect from 4 am on tuesday 8 june.
translation.ga: Chuir an roinn sláinte 5 thír eile le liosta “ardriosca ” covid-19 an rialtais le haghaidh taistil idirnáisiúnta, a thiocfadh i bhfeidhm ó 4 am dé máirt 8 meitheamh.

translation.en: The countries added were: Afghanistan, egypt, sri lanka, sudan and trinidad and tobago.
translation.ga: Ba iad na tíortha a cuireadh leis: An afganastáin, an éigipt, srí lanca, an tsúdáin agus oileán na tríonóide agus tobága.

translation.en: 6 june
translation.ga: 6 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 313 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 313 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: 19 people (including 2 juveniles) were arrested for public order offences and two gardaí received hospital treatment on the night of 5 june, after violence broke out in dublin's south city centre for a second consecutive night in which a person was assaulted, a bin was set on fire and glass bottles were thrown, which resulted in a patrol car being damaged.
translation.ga: Gabhadh 19 duine (2 ógánach san áireamh) as cionta oird phoiblí agus fuair beirt ghardaí cóireáil ospidéil oíche an 5 meitheamh, tar éis don fhoréigean briseadh amach i lár chathair theas bhaile átha cliath don dara oíche as a chéile inar ionsaíodh duine, rinneadh bosca bruscair caitheadh ​ ​ buidéil tine agus gloine a cuireadh, agus rinneadh damáiste do charr patróil dá bharr.

translation.en: 7 june
translation.ga: 7 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 377 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 377 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: The gradual easing of covid-19 restrictions continued with the reopening of all bars, restaurants and cafés for outdoor service, gyms, swimming pools, leisure centres, cinemas and theatres, the partial resumption of driver theory test services, and the allowance of an unvaccinated household to visit another unvaccinated household indoors.
translation.ga: Leanadh de mhaolú de réir a chéile ar shrianta covid-19 le hathoscailt na mbeár, na mbialann agus na gcaiféanna go léir le haghaidh seirbhíse lasmuigh, giomnáisíní, linnte snámha, ionaid fóillíochta, pictiúrlanna agus amharclanna, atosú páirteach ar sheirbhísí tástála teoirice tiománaithe, agus lamháltas neamh-vacsaínithe teaghlach chun cuairt a thabhairt ar theaghlach neamh-vacsaínithe eile laistigh.

translation.en: 14 people (including 3 juveniles) were arrested for public order offences on the night of 6 june, after violence broke out in dublin's south city centre for a third consecutive night, while gardaí arrested 8 people in cork.
translation.ga: Gabhadh 14 duine (3 ógánach san áireamh) as cionta oird phoiblí oíche an 6 meitheamh, tar éis don fhoréigean briseadh amach i lár chathair theas bhaile átha cliath don tríú oíche as a chéile, agus ghabh gardaí 8 duine i gcorcaigh.

translation.en: 8 june – a further 271 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: 8 meitheamh - tuairiscíodh 271 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: 9 june – a further 259 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: 9 meitheamh - tuairiscíodh 259 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: 10 june
translation.ga: 10 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 398 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 398 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: The first in a series of live pilot concerts took place at the iveagh gardens, dublin, with james vincent mcmorrow and special guest sorcha richardson playing to 500 people at the show.
translation.ga: Bhí an chéad cheann i sraith de cheolchoirmeacha píolótacha beo ar siúl i ngairdíní iveagh, baile átha cliath, le james vincent mcmorrow agus an t-aoi speisialta sorcha richardson ag seinm le 500 duine ag an seó.

translation.en: 11 june – a further 319 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: 11 meitheamh - tuairiscíodh 319 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: 12 june – a further 431 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: 12 meitheamh - tuairiscíodh 431 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: 13 june
translation.ga: 13 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 315 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 315 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: The department of health added one additional country to the government's covid-19 "high-risk" list for international travel, which would come into effect from 4 am on wednesday 16 june.
translation.ga: Chuir an roinn sláinte tír amháin breise le liosta “ardriosca ” covid-19 an rialtais le haghaidh taistil idirnáisiúnta, a thiocfadh i bhfeidhm ó 4 am dé céadaoin 16 meitheamh.

translation.en: The country added was: Uganda.
translation.ga: Seo a leanas an tír: Uganda.

translation.en: 14 june – a further 242 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: 14 meitheamh - tuairiscíodh 242 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: 15 june
translation.ga: 15 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 283 cases were reported, however data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths and total number of cases were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 283 cás eile, ach ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 agus líon iomlán na gcásanna ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat fss.

translation.en: The government of ireland agreed to increase the self-isolation period for travellers arriving in ireland from britain from 5 to 10 days for those who are not fully vaccinated amid delta variant concerns.
translation.ga: An rialtas na héireann d' aontaigh chun cur leis an tréimhse féin-iargúltacht do thaistealaithe atá ag teacht in éirinn ón mbreatain ó 5 go 10 lá le haghaidh siúd nach bhfuil vacsaínithe go hiomlán i measc athraitheach delta imní.

translation.en: 16 june – a further 329 cases were reported, bringing the total number of cases to 267,576.
translation.ga: 16 meitheamh - tuairiscíodh 329 cás eile, rud a thug líon iomlán na gcásanna go 267,576.

translation.en: Data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat an fss.

translation.en: 17 june
translation.ga: 17 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 373 cases and 26 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 267,949 cases and 4,979 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 373 cás agus 26 bás eile, rud a thug na hiomláin go 267,949 cás agus 4,979 bás.

translation.en: Hse chief clinical officer colm henry confirmed that there had been 180 cases of the delta variant detected in ireland.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh príomhoifigeach cliniciúil fss, colm henry, go bhfuarthas 180 cás den leagan delta in éirinn.

translation.en: 18 june
translation.ga: 18 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 313 cases were reported, bringing the total number of cases to 268,251.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 313 cás eile, rud a thug líon iomlán na gcásanna go 268,251.

translation.en: Data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat an fss.

translation.en: The department of health added one country and removed one country to the government's covid-19 "high-risk" list for international travel, which would come into effect from 4 am on tuesday 22 june.
translation.ga: Chuir an roinn sláinte tír amháin leis agus bhain sí tír amháin ar liosta “ardriosca ” covid-19 an rialtais le haghaidh taistil idirnáisiúnta, a thiocfadh i bhfeidhm ó 4 am dé máirt 22 meitheamh.

translation.en: The country added was: Mongolia.
translation.ga: Seo a leanas an tír: An mhongóil.

translation.en: Canada was removed from the list.
translation.ga: Baineadh ceanada den liosta.

translation.en: 19 june
translation.ga: 19 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 393 cases were reported, bringing the total number of cases to 268,644.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 393 cás eile, rud a thug líon iomlán na gcásanna go 268,644.

translation.en: Data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat an fss.

translation.en: A primary school in county offaly confirmed a suspected case of the delta variant with the children told to self isolate at home.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh bunscoil i gcontae uíbh fhailí cás amhrasta den leagan delta leis na leanaí a ndeirtear leo iad féin a leithlisiú sa bhaile.

translation.en: After discussing the evolving profile of covid-19 across the island, the chief medical officers of ireland and northern ireland tony holohan and michael mcbride issued a joint statement reminding people who intended to travel across the border to be alert to the epidemiological situation in the relevant local areas and to ensure that they avoid activities which could place them or their families at risk of covid-19 infection.
translation.ga: Tar éis dóibh próifíl éabhlóideach covid-19 a phlé ar fud an oileáin, d ’ eisigh príomhoifigigh leighis na héireann agus thuaisceart éireann tony holohan agus michael mcbride comhráiteas ag meabhrú do dhaoine a raibh sé ar intinn acu taisteal trasna na teorann a bheith ar an airdeall faoin staid eipidéimeolaíoch san ábhar ábhartha ceantair áitiúla agus a chinntiú go seachnaíonn siad gníomhaíochtaí a d ’ fhéadfadh iad féin nó a dteaghlaigh a chur i mbaol ionfhabhtaithe covid-19.

translation.en: 20 june
translation.ga: 20 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 288 cases were reported, bringing the total number of cases to 269,037.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 288 cás eile, rud a thug líon iomlán na gcásanna go 269,037.

translation.en: Data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat an fss.

translation.en: The covid-19 vaccine registration portal opened to people aged between 35 and 39 on a phased basis, starting with people aged 39.
translation.ga: Osclaíodh tairseach cláraithe vacsaín covid-19 do dhaoine idir 35 agus 39 bliain d ’ aois ar bhonn céimnithe, ag tosú le daoine atá 39 bliana d ’ aois.

translation.en: 21 june
translation.ga: 21 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 284 cases were reported, bringing the total number of cases to 269,321.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 284 cás eile, rud a thug líon iomlán na gcásanna go 269,321.

translation.en: Data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat an fss.

translation.en: Chief medical officer tony holohan stated that the latest data showed a "concerning increase in transmission" of the delta variant of covid-19 in ireland.
translation.ga: Dúirt an príomhoifigeach leighis tony holohan gur léirigh na sonraí is déanaí “méadú buartha maidir le tarchur ” an leagan delta de covid-19 in éirinn.

translation.en: Minister for justice heather humphreys spoke to garda commissioner drew harris about the legal issues around outdoor drinking and pledged to take legislative action to facilitate outdoor hospitality if it was required, after gardaí warned that alcohol licences were not valid for areas outside pubs and restaurants.
translation.ga: Labhair an taire dlí agus cirt heather humphreys le coimisinéir an gharda síochána drew harris faoi ​ ​ na saincheisteanna dlí a bhaineann le hól lasmuigh agus gheall sé gníomh reachtach a dhéanamh chun fáilteachas lasmuigh a éascú más gá, tar éis do na gardaí rabhadh a thabhairt nach raibh ceadúnais alcóil bailí do cheantair lasmuigh de thithe tábhairne agus bialanna.

translation.en: 22 june
translation.ga: 22 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 294 cases were reported, bringing the total number of confirmed cases to 269,495.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 294 cás eile, rud a thug líon iomlán na gcásanna dearbhaithe go 269,495.

translation.en: Data relating to the number of covid-19 deaths were not available due to the hse cyberattack.
translation.ga: Ní raibh sonraí a bhaineann le líon na mbásanna covid-19 ar fáil mar gheall ar chibearshlat an fss.

translation.en: The hse's director of public health for the midlands una fallon announced that a covid-19 outbreak in athlone had been identified as "probably" the delta variant after a cluster of 14 primary cases associated with socialising by the river shannon were confirmed on friday 11 june.
translation.ga: D ’ fhógair stiúrthóir sláinte poiblí fss do lár na tíre una fallon gur sainaithníodh ráig covid-19 i mbaile átha luain mar an leagan delta “is dócha ” tar éis braisle de 14 chás bunscoile a bhaineann le sóisialú ag abhainn na sionainne dé haoine 11 meitheamh.

translation.en: An online booking system for covid-19 test referral opened for people in all counties.
translation.ga: Osclaíodh córas áirithinte ar líne le haghaidh atreorú tástála covid-19 do dhaoine i ngach contae.

translation.en: 23 june
translation.ga: 23 meitheamh

translation.en: A further 348 cases and 10 deaths were reported, bringing the totals to 269,793 cases and 4,989 deaths.
translation.ga: Tuairiscíodh 348 cás eile agus 10 mbás, rud a thug na hiomláin go 269,793 cás agus 4,989 bás.

translation.en: It was confirmed that at least three quarters of the hse's it servers had been decrypted and 70% of computer devices were back in use, following the cyber attack in may.
translation.ga: Deimhníodh go ndearnadh trí cheathrú ar a laghad de fhreastalaithe tf fss a dhíchriptiú agus go raibh 70% de ghléasanna ríomhaireachta ar ais in úsáid, tar éis an chibear-ionsaí i mí na bealtaine.

translation.en: Vaccines are the most effective way to prevent infectious diseases.
translation.ga: Is vacsaíní an bealach is éifeachtaí chun galair thógálacha a chosc.

translation.en: They prepare your immune system (the body's natural defence) to recognize a particular virus and protect against that virus.
translation.ga: Ullmhaíonn siad do chóras imdhíonachta (cosaint nádúrtha an choirp) chun víreas ar leith a aithint agus cosaint a thabhairt in aghaidh an víris sin.

translation.en: The janssen vaccine is also known as the 'johnson & johnson vaccine'.
translation.ga: Tugtar ‘ vacsaín johnson & johnson freisin ’ ar an vacsaín janssen.

translation.en: This vaccine is produced by johnson & johnson.
translation.ga: Is é an comhlacht johnson & johnson a tháirgeann an vacsaín seo.

translation.en: This vaccine is given as an injection into the upper arm.
translation.ga: Tugtar an vacsaín seo mar instealladh in uachtar na láimhe.

translation.en: It only takes a few minutes.
translation.ga: Ní thógann sé ach cúpla nóiméad.

translation.en: Doses
translation.ga: Dáileoga

translation.en: Only one dose of the janssen covid-19 vaccine is required for long-term protection.
translation.ga: Ní theastaíonn ach dáileog amháin den vacsaín covid-19 janssen chun cosaint fadtéarmach a fháil.

translation.en: The vaccine takes full effect after 14 days.
translation.ga: Bíonn éifeacht iomlán ag an vacsaín tar éis 14 lá.

translation.en: You will then be fully vaccinated.
translation.ga: Beidh tú vacsaíníthe go h-iomlán ansin.

translation.en: Immunity
translation.ga: Imdhíonacht

translation.en: Vaccines enable your immune system to protect you from disease.
translation.ga: Cuireann vacsaíní ar chumas do chóras imdhíonachta tú a chosaint ó ghalair.

translation.en: It would be best if your immune system could protect you with the vaccine instead of getting covid-19.
translation.ga: B ’ fhearr duit dá mbeadh sé ar chumas do chóras imdhíonachta tú a chosaint leis an vacsaín in ionad covid-19 a fháil.

translation.en: Safety
translation.ga: Sábháilteacht

translation.en: The janssen covid-19 vaccine was developed according to international safety standards.
translation.ga: Forbraíodh vacsaín covid-19 janssen de réir caighdeáin idirnáisiúnta sábháilteachta.

translation.en: The vaccine has been tested on thousands of people during clinical trials
translation.ga: Tástáladh an vacsaín ar na mílte duine le linn trialacha cliniciúla

translation.en: Side effects
translation.ga: Fo-iarmhairtí

translation.en: Vaccines, like all other medicines, can have side effects.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh fo-iarmhairtí a bheith i gceist le vacsaín ar nós gach cógas leighis eile.

translation.en: Most of these are mild or moderate and do not last long.
translation.ga: Bíonn an chuid is mó díobh seo éadrom nó measartha, agus ní mhaireann siad i bhfad.

translation.en: Not everyone gets side effects.
translation.ga: Ní fhaigheann gach duine fo-iarmhairtí.

translation.en: Getting your vaccine
translation.ga: Ag fáil do vacsaín

translation.en: Most people will be given the vaccine at a gp surgery or vaccination center.
translation.ga: Tabharfar an vacsaín d ’ fhormhór na ndaoine i lialann dochtúra teaghlaigh nó in ionad vacsaíníthe.

translation.en: You are getting your vaccine - more information here.
translation.ga: Ag fáil do vacsaín – tuilleadh eolais anseo.

translation.en: The best vaccine
translation.ga: An vacsaín is fearr

translation.en: All vaccines are tested for safety and efficacy before use.
translation.ga: Déantar tástáil ar gach vacsaín ar mhaithe le sábháilteacht agus éifeachtacht sula n-úsáidtear iad.

translation.en: The hse only uses a vaccine if it meets the required safety and efficacy standards.
translation.ga: Ní úsáideann fnass vacsaín ach amháin má chomhlíonann sí na caighdeáin riachtanacha i dtaobh sábháilteachta agus éifeachtúlachta.

translation.en: You should take whatever covid-19 vaccine is offered to you.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit glacadh le pé vacsaín covid-19 a thairgtear duit.

translation.en: Find out more about the development of covid-19 vaccines
translation.ga: Tuileadh eolais faoi fhorbairt na vacsaíní covid-19

translation.en: If you are pregnant
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag iompar clainne

translation.en: The cossid-19 janssen vaccine is not recommended for pregnant women.
translation.ga: Ní mholtar an vacsaín covid-19 janssen do mhná atá ag iompar clainne.

translation.en: You will be offered another vaccine.
translation.ga: Tairgfear vacsaín eile duit.

translation.en: Talk to your gp or obstetrician about getting your covid-19 vaccine.
translation.ga: Labhair le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh nó obstatraí faoi do vacsaín covid-19 a fháil.

translation.en: Find out more about covid-19 vaccines during pregnancy
translation.ga: Tuilleadh eolais faoi vacsaíní covid-19 le linn toirchis

translation.en: If you are feeding your child yourself
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag beathú do pháiste tú féin

translation.en: You can get the covid-10 vaccine if you are feeding your baby yourself.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an vacsaín covid-10 a fháil má tá tú ag ag beathú do pháiste tú féin.

translation.en: The covid-19 vaccine will not be given to your baby.
translation.ga: Ní thabharfaidh an vacsaín covid-19 do do leanbh.

translation.en: Find out more about covid-19 vaccines if you are breastfeeding
translation.ga: Tuilleadh eolais faoi vacsaíní covid-19 má tá tú ag cothú linbh ar an gcíoch

translation.en: If you are aged between 56 and 69, you can register now to receive your covid-19 vaccine.
translation.ga: Má tá tú idir56 agus 69 bliain d' aois is féidir leat clárú anois chun do vacsaín covid-19 a fháil.

translation.en: Vaccines are the most effective way to prevent infectious diseases.
translation.ga: Is vacsaíní an bealach is éifeachtaí chun galair thógálacha a chosc.

translation.en: They prepare your immune system (the body's natural defence) to recognize a particular virus and protect against that virus.
translation.ga: Ullmhaíonn siad do chóras imdhíonachta (cosaint nádúrtha an choirp) chun víreas ar leith a aithint agus cosaint a thabhairt in aghaidh an víris sin.

translation.en: The astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine is effective for any age group.
translation.ga: Tá an vacsaín covid-19 astrazeneca éifeachtach d ’ aon aoisghrúpa.

translation.en: If you have been vaccinated, you will be protected against covid-19.
translation.ga: Má fuair tú do vacsaín, cosnófar thú i gcoinne covid-19.

translation.en: The risk of illness if you get covid-19 far outweighs any risk associated with the vaccine.
translation.ga: Tá an baol tinnis má fhaigheann tú covid-19 i bhfad níos mó ná aon riosca a bhaineann leis an vacsaín.

translation.en: Astrazeneca is not recommended for people under 60 years of age due to an abnormal risk of low platelet blood clots after receiving the vaccine.
translation.ga: Ní mholtar astrazeneca do dhaoine faoi 60 bliain d ’ aois mar gheall ar riosca neamh-ghnácha de théachtaí fola le pláitíní íseal tar éis an vacsaín a fháil.

translation.en: It is a precaution because people under 60 are less likely to get a severe covid-19 illness and other vaccines are available.
translation.ga: Is réamhchúram é seo toisc gur lú an seans go bhfaighidh daoine faoi 60 bliain d ’ aois tinneas covid-19 tromchúiseach agus go bhfuil vacsaíní eile ar fáil.

translation.en: Learn more about uncommon side effects and the new guide
translation.ga: Tuilleadh eolais faoi fho-iarmhairtí neamh-choitianta agus an treoir nua

translation.en: Doses
translation.ga: Dáileoga

translation.en: You will need two doses of the astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine.
translation.ga: Beidh ort 2 dáileog den vacsaín astrazeneca covid-19 a fháil.

translation.en: You will receive the second dose 12 weeks after the first dose if
translation.ga: Gheobhaidh tú an dara dáileog 12 seachtaine tar éis an chéad dháileog má

translation.en: You are 60 years of age or older
translation.ga: Tá tú 60 bliain d' aois nó níos sine

translation.en: You have a health condition that puts you at high or very high risk from covid-19
translation.ga: Go bhfuil riocht sláinte ort a fhágann go bhfuil tú i mbaol mór nó baol an-mhór ó covid-19

translation.en: If you are under 60 and do not have a health condition that puts you at high or very high risk from covid-19, you should wait 16 weeks to receive a second dose.
translation.ga: Má tá tú faoi bhun 60 bliain agus nach bhfuil riocht sláinte ort a fhágann go bhfuil tú i mbaol mór nó baol an-mhór ó covid-19, ba chóir duit fanacht 16 seachtaine chun an dara dáileog a fháil.

translation.en: This has increased from 12 weeks.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo méadaithe ó 12 sheachtain.

translation.en: This extra time allows us to do more research as more evidence becomes available.
translation.ga: Cuireann an t-am breise seo ar ár gcumas níos mó taighde a dhéanamh de réir mar a bhíonn níos mó fianaise ar fáil.

translation.en: Vaccine 'bonus'
translation.ga: ‘ bónas ’ na vacsaíne

translation.en: 28 days after your first dose of the astrazeneca vaccine, you can follow the same 'vaccine bonus' public health advice as people who have been fully vaccinated.
translation.ga: 28 lá tar éis do chéad dáileog den vacsaín astrazeneca, is féidir leat an chomhairle sláinte poiblí ‘ bónas vacsaín ’ céanna a leanúint le daoine atá vacsaínithe go hiomlán.

translation.en: This does not include travel abroad.
translation.ga: Ní chuimsíonn sé seo taisteal thar lear.

translation.en: You still need to get your second dose to make sure your vaccine protection lasts.
translation.ga: Ní mór duit do dhara dáileog a fháil fós chun a chinntiú go maireann do chosaint vacsaíne.

translation.en: Read government advice on the vaccine bonus
translation.ga: Léigh comhairle ón rialtas maidir le bónas na vacsaíne

translation.en: Safety
translation.ga: Sábháilteacht

translation.en: Astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine was developed according to international safety standards.
translation.ga: Forbraíodh vacsaín covid-19 astrazeneca de réir caighdeáin idirnáisiúnta sábháilteachta.

translation.en: The vaccine has been tested on thousands of people during clinical trials
translation.ga: Tástáladh an vacsaín ar na mílte duine le linn trialacha cliniciúla

translation.en: Learn more about the safety of the astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine
translation.ga: Tuilleadh eolais faoi shábháilteacht na vacsaíne astrazeneca covid-19

translation.en: Side effects
translation.ga: Fo-iarmhairtí

translation.en: Vaccines, like all other medicines, can have side effects.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh fo-iarmhairtí a bheith i gceist le vacsaín ar nós gach cógas leighis eile.

translation.en: Most of these are mild or moderate and do not last long
translation.ga: Bíonn an chuid is mó díobh seo éadrom nó measartha, agus ní mhaireann siad i bhfad

translation.en: Not everyone gets side effects.
translation.ga: Ní fhaigheann gach duine fo-iarmhairtí.

translation.en: More eoalis about side effects after vaccination covid-19 astrazeneca to find
translation.ga: Tuilleadh eoalis faoi fo-iarmhairtí tar éis na vacsaíne covid-19 astrazeneca a fháil

translation.en: The best vaccine
