translation.ga: An vacsaín is fearr

translation.en: All vaccines are tested for safety and efficacy before use.
translation.ga: Déantar tástáil ar gach vacsaín ar mhaithe le sábháilteacht agus éifeachtacht sula n-úsáidtear iad.

translation.en: The hse only uses a vaccine if it meets the required safety and efficacy standards.
translation.ga: Ní úsáideann fnass vacsaín ach amháin má chomhlíonann sí na caighdeáin riachtanacha i dtaobh sábháilteachta agus éifeachtúlachta.

translation.en: You should take whatever covid-19 vaccine is offered to you.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit glacadh le pé vacsaín covid-19 a thairgtear duit.

translation.en: Find out more about the development of covid-19 vaccines
translation.ga: Tuileadh eolais faoi fhorbairt na vacsaíní covid-19

translation.en: If you are pregnant or nursing your child yourself
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag iompar clainne nó ag cothú do pháiste tú fhéin

translation.en: If you have not yet been vaccinated, you will be offered a covid-19 vaccine other than astrazeneca.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil vacsaín tugtha duit go fóill, tairgfear vacsaín covid-19 eile duit seachas astrazeneca.

translation.en: If you are pregnant or breastfeeding and have received your first dose of the astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine, wait at least 12 weeks before receiving the second dose.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag iompar clainne nó ag cothú linbh ar an gcíoch agus go bhfuil do chéad dháileog den vacsaín astrazeneca covid-19 fáighte agat, fan ar a laghad 12 seachtaine sula bhfaigheann tú an dara dáileog.

translation.en: You will be at greater risk of serious illness if you do not receive your second dose.
translation.ga: Beidh tú i mbaol níos mó de thinneas tromchúiseach más rud é nach bhfaigheann tú do dhara dáileog.

translation.en: The benefits outweigh the harms of getting a vaccine.
translation.ga: Is mó an sochar ná an dochar a bhaineann le vacsaín a fháil.

translation.en: Getting two vaccines will reduce your chances of becoming very ill because of covid-19.
translation.ga: Laghadófar an seans go n-éireoidh tú an-tinn de bharr covid-19 má fhaigheann tú do dhá vacsaín.

translation.en: For adults, self-isolation means staying inside and staying away from others altogether.
translation.ga: Do dhaoine fásta, ciallaíonn féin-aonrú fanacht istigh agus fanacht amach ó dhaoine eile go h-iomlán.

translation.en: But there is other advice for children.
translation.ga: Ach tá comhairle éagsúl ann do pháistí.

translation.en: Children cannot be asked to self-isolate on their own, especially if they are very young.
translation.ga: Ní féidir iarradh ar pháistí féin-aonrú leo féin, go mór mór má tá siad an-óg.

translation.en: An adult will need to care for a child and help the child reduce the risk of the virus spreading.
translation.ga: Beidh ar dhuine fásta aire a thabhairt do pháiste agus cabhrú leis an bpáiste an bhaol go scaipfear an víreas a laghdú.

translation.en: The child and adult should stay away from others, especially those who live with them.
translation.ga: Ba chóir don pháiste agus don duine fásta fanacht amach ó dhaoine eile, go mór mór na daoine atá ina chónaí leo.

translation.en: Choose one carer to care for the child.
translation.ga: Roghnaigh cúramóir amháin chun aire a thabhairt don pháiste

translation.en: One person should take care of the child when self-isolating.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do dhuine amháin aire a thabhairt don pháiste nuair atáthar ag féin-aonrú.

translation.en: That person must be in good health.
translation.ga: Ní mór don duine sin sláinte mhaith a bheith aige / aici.

translation.en: One should not choose to:
translation.ga: Níor chóir duine a roghnú a:

translation.en: They have a long-term illness
translation.ga: Bhfuil tinneas fadtéarmach orthu

translation.en: They have a weak immune system
translation.ga: Bhfuil córas imdhíonta lag acu

translation.en: Over 70 years old
translation.ga: Atá níos sine ná 70 bliain d ’ aois

translation.en: People in these groups are at high risk from covid-19
translation.ga: Tá daoine sna grúpaí seo i mbaol mór ó covid-19

translation.en: When should your child stay away from others
translation.ga: Cathain ar chóir dod ’ pháiste fanacht amach ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Your child must be kept out of others if:
translation.ga: Ní mór do pháiste a choinneáil amach ó daoine eile eile má:

translation.en: They have a temperature of 38 degrees celsius or higher
translation.ga: Bhíonn teocht 38céim celsius nó níos airde orthu

translation.en: They get a new cough
translation.ga: Bhíonn casacht nua orthu

translation.en: There is a change in taste or smell
translation.ga: Bhíonn athrú ar bhlaiseadh nó boladh

translation.en: Are breathlessness them
translation.ga: Bhíonn giorra anála orthu

translation.en: They already have a worsening breathing condition - asthma, for example
translation.ga: Bhíonn riocht análaithe orthu cheana féin atá ag éirí níos measa – asma mar shampla

translation.en: Call your gp.
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: Your child may need a covid-19 (coronavirus) test.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go dteastóidh tástáil covid-19 (coróinvíreas) ó do pháiste.

translation.en: Read advice for self-isolated people
translation.ga: Léigh comhairle do dhaoine atá ag féin-aonrú

translation.en: Your child does not have to isolate:
translation.ga: Ní gá dod ’ pháiste aonrú:

translation.en: If they have had direct contact with a covid-19 case that is confirmed but has no symptoms on the plate
translation.ga: Má bhí gartheagmháil acu le cás covid-19 atá deimhnithe ach nach bhfuil comharthaí ar an bpláiste

translation.en: If the child is living with someone who is ill and may be infected with the virus.
translation.ga: Má tá cónaí ar an bpáiste le duine atá tinn agus agus go bhféadfaí go bhfuil an víreas air / uirthi.

translation.en: But in these situations, they will have to restrict their movements.
translation.ga: Ach beidh orthu srian a chur ar a ngluaiseachtaí sna cásanna seo.

translation.en: The difference between isolation and restriction of movements
translation.ga: An difríocht idir aonrú agus srian a chur ar ghluaiseachtaí

translation.en: Self-isolation and restricting movements are two different things.
translation.ga: Dhá rud éagsúla is ea féin-aonrú agus a bheith ag cur srian ar ghluaiseachtaí.

translation.en: In both cases, the child should not go to school or childcare.
translation.ga: Sa dá chás, níor chóir don pháiste dul ar scoil nó cúram leanaí.

translation.en: Everyone who lives with the child should stay home.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do gach duine a bhfuil cónaí orthu leis an bpáiste fanacht sa mbaile.

translation.en: Your child or the people living with them may have been asked to restrict their movements.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir gur iarradh ar do pháiste nó na daoine atá ina chónaí leis srian a chur ar a ngluaiseachtaí.

translation.en: It means that they should stay at home and stay away from the others in the household.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn seo gur chóir dóibh fanacht sa mbaile agus fanacht amach ó na daoine eile sa líon tí.

translation.en: Read more about the difríoctaí between self-isolation and restrict your movement is
translation.ga: Léigh níos mó faoi na difríoctaí idir féin-aonrú agus srian a chur ar do ghluaiseachtaí

translation.en: Everyone in the household should restrict their movements
translation.ga: Ba chóir do gach duine sa líon tí srian a chur ar a ngluaiseachtaí

translation.en: Your child may need help with daily activities such as washing, eating or going to the toilet.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go dteastóidh cabhair ó do pháiste le gníomhaíochtaí laethúla mar níocháin, ithe nó dul ag an leithreas.

translation.en: As a result, everyone should take extra care to reduce the risk of the virus spreading.
translation.ga: Dá bharr seo, ba chóir do gach duine cúram breise a ghlacadh chun an bhaol go scaipfear an víreas a laghdú.

translation.en: You and everyone in the household must restrict your movements for 17 days.
translation.ga: Ní mór duitse agus gach duine sa líon tí srian a chur ar bhur ngluaiseachtaí ar feadh 17 lá.

translation.en: This includes the ten days your child will be isolated and seven days later.
translation.ga: Áirítear leis seo an 10 lá a mbeidh do pháiste ag aonrú agus 7 lá ina dhiaidh.

translation.en: As everyone in the household is close contact, everyone must be tested for covid-19.
translation.ga: Mar gur gartheagmhálaithe gach duine sa líon tí, ní mór do gach duine tástáil covid-19 a fháil.

translation.en: How long your child should stay away from others
translation.ga: Cén fhad ar chóir dod ’ pháiste fanacht amach ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: If your child has to isolate, they will have to stay isolated until they receive test results.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn ar do pháiste aonrú, beidh air / uirthi fanacht ag aonrú go dtí go bhfaigheann sé / sí torthaí tástála.

translation.en: If the test is positive, your child will need to continue to isolate until both of the following conditions apply:
translation.ga: Má bhíonn toradh dearfach ar an tástáil beidh ar do pháiste leanacht ar aghaidh ag aonrú go dtí go mbeidh feidhm ag an dá choinníoll seo:

translation.en: Has not had a high temperature (38 degrees celsius or more) for 5 days
translation.ga: Nach raibh teocht ard air / uirthi (38 céim celsius nó níos mó) ar feadh 5 lá

translation.en: That 10 days have elapsed since the symptoms occurred
translation.ga: Go bhfuil 10 lá caite ó tháinig na comharthaí air / uirthi

translation.en: If your child has no signs of illness but has been tested because they were a close contact, isolation can be stopped ten days from the day they were tested.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil comharthaí tinnis ar do pháiste ach go ndearnadh tástáil de bharr go rabhadar ina ngartheagmhálaí, is féidir stop a chur leis an aonrú 10 lá ón lá go ndearnadh an tástáil orthu.

translation.en: Read here about what to do if your child has a negative test result.
translation.ga: Léigh anseo faoi cad atá le déanamh má tá toradh diúltach ar thástáil do pháiste.

translation.en: If anyone else in the house gets symptoms or becomes ill
translation.ga: Má thagann comharthaí ar aon duine eile sa teach nó má éiríonn aon duine tinn

translation.en: If anyone else in the household becomes sick, self-isolated and call the gp.
translation.ga: Má éiríonn aon duine eile sa líon tí tinn, déan féin-aonrú agus glaoigh ar an dochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: There is specific advice for adults and children over the age of 13 on self-isolation.
translation.ga: Tá comhairle ar leith ann do dhaoine fásta agus páistí os cionn 13 bliain d ’ aois maidir le féin-aonrú

translation.en: You may need a covid-19 test and treat your symptoms at home
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go dteastóidh tástáil covid-19 uait agus do chomharthaí a chóireáil sa bhaile

translation.en: You can get a free covid-19 trial at a walk-in test centre if you have no symptoms.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat tástáil covid-19 saor in aisce a fháil ag ionad tástála siúil isteach mura bhfuil comharthaí ort.

translation.en: You do not need a gp appointment or referral.
translation.ga: Ní theastaíonn coinne ná atreorú ó dhochtúir teaghlaigh uait.

translation.en: If you have covid-19 symptoms, do not go to a walk-in centre.
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí covid-19 ort, ná téigh chuig ionad siúil isteach.

translation.en: Stay alone (stay in your room) and call a gp immediately.
translation.ga: Fan asat féin (fan i do sheomra) agus glaoigh ar dhochtúir teaghlaigh láithreach.

translation.en: Who can use the walk-in service
translation.ga: Cé atá in ann an tseirbhís siúil isteach a úsáid

translation.en: You can use the covid-19 walk-in test service if you do not have covid-19 signs and:
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an tseirbhís tástála siúil isteach covid-19 a úsáid mura bhfuil comharthaí covid-19 ort agus:

translation.en: If you are aged 16 or over
translation.ga: Má tá tú 16 bliana d ’ aois nó os a cionn

translation.en: If you live in an area where there is a walk-in test centre
translation.ga: Má tá cónaí ort sa cheantar ina bhfuil ionad tástála siúil isteach

translation.en: If you have not tested positive for covid-19 in the last six months
translation.ga: Mura bhfuair tú toradh dearfach ar an tástáil do covid-19 le 6 mhí anuas

translation.en: Each test will be one test.
translation.ga: Is tástáil amháin a dhéanfar ar gach duine.

translation.en: Talk to your gp if you think you need another test.
translation.ga: Labhair le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh má cheapann tú go dteastaíonn tástáil eile uait.

translation.en: What you need to bring with you
translation.ga: Cad is gá duit a thabhairt leat

translation.en: You must bring a photo id and a mobile phone number.
translation.ga: Ní mór duit aitheantas grianghraf a thabhairt leat agus uimhir fón póca a chur ar fáil.

translation.en: Venues, dates and times
translation.ga: Ionaid, dátaí agus amanna

translation.en: Do not come to a test centre before opening time.
translation.ga: Ná tar chuig ionad tástála roimh an t-am oscailte.

translation.en: Test centres are bustling, and you may have to wait.
translation.ga: Bíonn ionaid tástála an-ghnóthach agus b ’ fhéidir go mbeidh ort fanacht.

translation.en: If you come close to closing time and there is a queue, chances are you will not be tested that day.
translation.ga: Má thagann tú gar don am atáthar ag dúnadh agus go bhfuil scuaine ann, tá seains ann nach ndéanfar tástáil ort an lá sin.

translation.ga: Oscailte luan go domhnach 10r.n. go 5 i.n.

translation.en: Sources are explored when trying to find out how or when someone first contracted covid-19 (coronavirus).
translation.ga: Déantar iniúchadh foinsí nuair atáthar ag iarraidh a fháil amach conas nó cén uair ar tholg duine éigin covid-19 (coróinvíreas) i dtosach.

translation.en: A person, place or event can be a source of infection.
translation.ga: Is féidir le duine, áit nó imeacht a bheith ina fhoinse ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: An investigation of the source gives us information about sites and cases where covid-19 is disseminated.
translation.ga: Tugann imscrúdú ar an bhfoinse eolas dúinn faoi shuímh agus faoi chásanna ina scaiptear covid-19.

translation.en: It helps us identify and prevent the developing covid-19 clusters in the community.
translation.ga: Cabhraíonn sé linn na braislí covid-19 atá ag forbairt sa phobal a aimsiú agus a chosc.

translation.en: The difference between source exploration and contact tracking
translation.ga: An difríocht idir iniúchadh foinsí agus rianú teagmhála

translation.en: Contact tracking
translation.ga: Rianú teagmhála

translation.en: People who have been in close contact with a person with covid-19 are identified.
translation.ga: Aithnítear daoine a bhí i ngartheagmháil le duine a raibh covid-19 air / uirthi.

translation.en: During contact tracing, the timeline, in that case, will depend on whether they had symptoms of illness when tested for covid-19.
translation.ga: Le linn rianaithe teagmhála brathfaidh an t-amlíne sa chás sin ar pé acu an raibh comharthaí tinnis orthu nuair a rinneadh tástáil covid-19 orthu.

translation.en: Read about contact tracking
translation.ga: Léigh faoi rianú teagmhála

translation.en: Exploration of sources
translation.ga: Iniúchadh foinsí

translation.en: The investigation will find a citation:
translation.ga: Aimseoidh an t-imscrúdú foinse:

translation.en: A case in which a person may become infected
translation.ga: Cás ina bhféadfadh duine a bheith ionfhabhtaithe

translation.en: Who may infect them
translation.ga: Cé a d ’ fhéadfadh iad a ionfhabhtú

translation.en: We will ask people with covid-19 if they have been in contact with someone who has covid-19.
translation.ga: Faifróidh muid de dhaoine a bhfuil covid-19 orthu an raibh siad i dteagmháil le duine a raibh covid-19 air.

translation.en: If not, we will ask them about events or places they were in the week before they became ill.
translation.ga: Mura raibh, fiafróidh muid díobh faoi imeachtaí nó áiteanna a raibh siad an tseachtain sular tháinig comharthaí tinnis orthu.

translation.en: If they did not show signs of illness, we would ask them about events they attended or where they were tested the week before for covid-19.
translation.ga: Mura raibh comharthaí tinnis orthu, fiafróidh muid díobh faoi imeachtaí a d ’ fhreastal siad orthu nó áiteanna a raibh siad an tseachtain sula bhfuair siad an tástáil do covid-19.

translation.en: The source of infection can be traced that way.
translation.ga: Is féidir an fhoinse ionfhabhtaithe a aimsiú ar an mbealach sin.

translation.en: Other infections from the same source may stop.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaidh ionfhabhtaithe eile ón bhfoinse chéanna a stopadh.

translation.en: People in the same place or at the same event that the person with covid-19 attended could be contacted.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí dul i dteagmháil le daoine a bhí san áit chéanna nó ag an imeacht céanna a d ’ fhreastal an duine a bhfuil covid-19 air.

translation.en: If you have received a text message
translation.ga: Má fuair tú teachtaireacht téacs

translation.en: If you have received a text message from the source audit team, a free covid-19 test will be arranged for you.
translation.ga: Má fuair tú teachtaireacht téacs ón bhfoireann iniúchta foinsí, socrófar tástáil covid-19 saor in aisce duit.

translation.en: You will be sent a text message with details of your test appointment.
translation.ga: Cuirfear teachtaireacht téacs chugat le sonraí do choinne tástála.

translation.en: If you do not have covid-19 symptoms, you do not need to restrict your movements (stay at home).
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil comharthaí covid-19 ort, ní gá duit srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí (fanacht sa bhaile).

translation.en: If you have covid-19 symptoms, you must self-isolate (stay in your room) and call your gp immediately.
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí covid-19 ort, ní mór duit féin-aonrú (fanacht i do sheomra) agus glaoch ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh láithreach.

translation.en: If you are pregnant, you should get your covid-19 vaccine when it is offered to you.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag iompar clainne, ba chóir duit do vacsaín covid-19 a fháil nuair a thairgfear duit é.

translation.en: It reduces the chances of you getting sick.
translation.ga: Laghdóigh sé an seans go n-éireoidh tú tinn.

translation.en: It may also reduce the chances of you having complications during pregnancy, such as giving birth prematurely.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé freisin go laghdódh sé an seans go mbeadh deacrachtaí agat le linn toirchis, ar nós breith ró-luath.

translation.en: That could happen if you are very ill with covid-19. (Coronavirus).
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé sin tarlú má tá tú an-tinn le covid-19. (Coróinvíreas).

translation.en: Covid-19 vaccines are new vaccines.
translation.ga: Is vacsaíní nua iad na vacsaíní covid-19.

translation.en: We are still learning about the safety of the vaccine during pregnancy and when a mother is breastfeeding.
translation.ga: Táimid fós ag foghlaim faoi shábháilteacht na vacsaíne le linn toirchis agus nuair atá máthar ag cothú cíche.

translation.en: The vaccines have not been tested on pregnant or breastfeeding women.
translation.ga: Níor tástálaíodh na vacsaíní ar mhná torracha nó ar mhná a bhí ag cothú cíche.

translation.en: Our knowledge to date shows that the astrazeneca, moderna and pfizer / biontech vaccines have no adverse effects on unborn babies.
translation.ga: Léiríonn an t-eolas atá againn go dtí seo nach bhfuil aon tionchar diúltach ag na vacsaíní astrazeneca, moderna agus pfizer / biontech ar leanaí sa bhroinn.

translation.en: They are not live vaccines, so neither the mother nor the baby can be infected with covid-19.
translation.ga: Ní vacsaíní beo iad, mar sin ní féidir an mháthair ná an leanbh a ionfhabhtú le covid-19.

translation.en: Vaccines break down quickly in the body and cannot be part of the dna of the mother or baby.
translation.ga: Briseann na vacsaíní síos go tapa sa gcorp agus ní féidir leo a bheith mar chuid de dna an mháthair ná an linbh.

translation.en: All covid-19 vaccines can be given to women who are breastfeeding.
translation.ga: Is féidir gach vacsaín covid-19 a thabhairt do mhná atá ag cothú linbh.

translation.en: They have no effect on children on the breast.
translation.ga: Níl aon tionchar acu ar leanaí ar an mbrollach.

translation.en: Read about the first groups to get the covid-19 vaccine
translation.ga: Léigh faoi na chéad ghrúpaí atá chun vacsaín covid-19 a fháil

translation.en: Covid-19 vaccine doses
translation.ga: Dáileoga vacsaíne covid-19

translation.en: When you receive your covid-19 vaccine, you will need two doses.
translation.ga: Nuair a gheobhaidh tú do vacsaín covid-19, beidh 2 dáileog ag teastáil uait.

translation.en: You should receive the first dose at or after 14 weeks of pregnancy.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go bhfaighfeá an chéad dháileog ag 14 seachtaine toirchis nó ina dhiaidh.

translation.en: You should receive a second dose before the end of 36 weeks of pregnancy.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go bhfaighfeá an dara dáileog roimh dheireadh 36 seachtaine toirchis.

translation.en: If you are not given a second dose by the end of 36 weeks, it should be postponed until you have your baby.
translation.ga: Mura dtugtar an dara dáileog duit faoi dheireadh 36 seachtaine, ba cheart go gcuirfí siar é go dtí go mbeidh do leanbh agat.

translation.en: This is recommended because you may get a fever after the second dose.
translation.ga: Moltar é seo mar gur féidir leat fiabhras a fháil tar éis an dara dáileog.

translation.en: Find out more about your covid-19 vaccine
translation.ga: Tuilleadh eolais faoi do vacsaín covid-19 a fháil

translation.en: Side effects
translation.ga: Fo-iarmhairtí

translation.en: Like all medicines, vaccines can cause side effects.
translation.ga: Cosúil le gach leigheas, is féidir le vacsaíní fo-iarmhairtí a chruthú.

translation.en: Most are mild or moderate and short-term.
translation.ga: Tá an chuid is mó díobh éadrom nó measartha agus gearrthéarmach.

translation.en: Not everyone gets side effects.
translation.ga: Ní fhaigheann gach duine fo-iarmhairtí

translation.en: Read about side effects after covid-19 vaccines
translation.ga: Léigh faoi fo-iarmhairtí tar éis vacsaíní covid-19

translation.en: Pregnant women are at high risk
translation.ga: Mná torracha atá i mbaol mór

translation.en: You should talk to your obstetrician or gp about getting your covid-19 vaccine if:
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit labhairt le do obstatraí nó le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh i dtaobh do vacsaín covid-19 a fháil más:

translation.en: You are a pregnant healthcare worker
translation.ga: Oibrí cúraim sláinte thú atá torrach

translation.en: You are at greater risk from covid-19
translation.ga: Tá baol níos mó duit ó covid-19

translation.en: Pregnant after your covid-19 vaccine
translation.ga: Ag iompar clainne i ndiaidh do vacsaín covid-19

translation.en: You do not need to leave any gap between having your covid-19 vaccine and getting pregnant.
translation.ga: Ní gá duit aon bhearna a fhágáil idir do vacsaín covid-19 a bheith agat agus a bheith ag iompar clainne.

translation.en: If you become pregnant after receiving the first dose
translation.ga: Má éiríonn tú torrach i ndiadh an chéad dháileog a fháil

translation.en: If you become pregnant after receiving the first dose of your covid-19 vaccine, you should wait 14 weeks or later to receive the second dose.
translation.ga: Má éiríonn tú torrach tar éis an chéad dháileog de do vacsaín covid-19 a fháil, ba chóir duit fanacht 14 seachtaine nó ina dhiadh go bhfaighidh tú an dara dáileog.

translation.en: Don't worry if you get your vaccine before you know you are pregnant.
translation.ga: Ná bíodh imní ort má fhaigheann tú do vacsaín sula bhfuil fhios agat an bhfuil tú ag iompar clainne.

translation.en: To be careful, you should wait 14 weeks or later to get your vaccine.
translation.ga: Le bheith cúramach, ba chóir duit fanacht 14 seachtaine nó ina dhiaidh chun do vacsaín a fháil.

translation.en: This is recommended to avoid any possible link between the vaccine and miscarriage.
translation.ga: Moltar seo ar mhaithe le haon bhaint a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith idir an vacsaín agus le breith anabaí a sheachaint.

translation.en: Other vaccines during pregnancy
translation.ga: Vacsaíní eile le linn toirchis

translation.en: You will need other vaccines during pregnancy.
translation.ga: Beidh vacsaíní eile ag teastáil uait le linn toirchis.

translation.en: These are:
translation.ga: Is iad sin:

translation.en: Pertussis vaccine
translation.ga: Vacsaín treacha (pertussis)

translation.en: Flu vaccine - if you are pregnant during the flu season from october to the end of april
translation.ga: Vacsaín an fhliú - má tá tú ag iompar clainne le linn an tséasúir fliú ó dheireadh fómhair go deireadh mhí aibreáin

translation.en: Leave a 14-day gap between your covid-19 vaccination and any other vaccine.
translation.ga: Fág bearna 14 lá idir do vacsaíniú covid-19 agus aon vacsaín eile.

translation.en: Read more about vaccines needed during pregnancy
translation.ga: Léigh tuilleadh faoi vacsaíní atá ag teastáil le linn toirchis

translation.en: Fertility treatment
translation.ga: Cóireáil torthúlachta

translation.en: There is no evidence that covid-19 vaccination affects fertility.
translation.ga: Níl aon fhianaise ann go bhfuil tionchar ag vacsaíniú covid-19 ar thorthúlacht.

translation.en: You do not have to leave any gap after receiving your covid-19 vaccine and your fertility treatment such as ivf.
translation.ga: Ní gá duit aon bhearna a fhágáil tar éis duit do vacsaín covid-19 a fháil agus do chóireáil thorthúlachta ar nós ivf.

translation.en: But you may want to wait until you are fully vaccinated before attempting to conceive or undergo fertility treatment.
translation.ga: Ach b ’ fhéidir gur mhaith leat fanacht go bhfuil tú go hiomlán vacsaínithe roimh thabhairt faoi iarrachtaí leanbh a ghiniúint nó tabhairt faoi chóireáil torthúlachta.

translation.en: This is recommended because you may get a fever in the 48 hours after receiving your vaccine, especially the second dose.
translation.ga: Moltar seo toisc gur féidir leat fiabhras a fháil sa 48 uair an chloig tar éis do vacsaín a fháil, go háirithe an dara dáileog.

translation.en: Breastfeeding after your covid-19 vaccine
translation.ga: Ag cothú cíche i ndiaidh do vacsaín covid-19

translation.en: If you are breastfeeding, you should get your covid-19 vaccine when it is offered to you.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag cothú cíche, ba chóir duit do vacsaín covid-19 a fháil nuair a thairgfear duit í.

translation.en: You can breastfeed your baby after your vaccination.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat brollach a thabhairt do do leanbh tar éis do vacsaíniú.

translation.en: The covid-19 vaccines have not been tested on breastfeeding women.
translation.ga: Níor tástáladh na vacsaíní covid-19 ar mhná atá ag cothú linbh ar an gcíoch.

translation.en: But there is no known reason to avoid breastfeeding if you have been vaccinated.
translation.ga: Ach níl aon chúis aitheanta ann chun cothú cíche a sheachaint má tá tú vacsaínithe.

translation.en: If very small portions of vaccine enter your breast milk, they will be digested in your baby's stomach.
translation.ga: Má thagann codanna an-bheag de vacsaín isteach i do bhainne cíche, beidh siad á ndíleá i mbolg do linbh.

translation.en: Your vaccine breaks down quickly in your body and cannot be part of your child's dna.
translation.ga: Bristear síos do vacsaín go tapa i do chorp agus ní féidir leis a bheith mar chuid de dna do linbh.

translation.en: Your baby cannot be infected with covid-19 in this way.
translation.ga: Ní féidir do leanbh a ionfhabhtú le covid-19 ar an mbealach seo.

translation.en: If you have been vaccinated while pregnant, your breast milk may contain antibodies against covid-19 and may give the baby some protection.
translation.ga: Má bhí tú vacsaínithe agus tú ag iompar clainne, d ’ fhéadfadh antasubstaintí i gcoinne covid-19 a bheith i do bhainne cíche agus go mbeadh roinnt cosaint ag an leanbh dá bharr.

translation.en: This advice is for infants and children of primary and secondary school age - usually 18 years old.
translation.ga: Is do naíonáin agus páistí in aois bunscoile agus meánscoile - 18 bliain d ’ aois de ghnáth, an chomhairle seo.

translation.en: If your child has symptoms of covid-19 (coronavirus) or has had close contact with someone with covid-19, do not let them go to school or attend childcare.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn comharthaí covid-19 (coróinvíreas) ar do pháiste nó má bhí gartheagmháil ag do pháiste le duine a bhfuil covid-19 air / uirthi, ná lig dó / di dul ar scoil ná freastal ar chúram leanaí.

translation.en: Covid-19 testing may be required
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí go mbeidh gá le tástáil covid-19

translation.en: Read more about when your child should be kept home from school.
translation.ga: Léigh níos mó faoi cathain ar chóir do pháiste a choinneáil sa mbaile ón scoil.

translation.en: When is it ok to let your child attend school or childcare?
translation.ga: Cathain a bhfuil sé ceart go leor ligean dod ’ pháiste freastal ar scoil nó cúram leanaí

translation.en: If he / she is not a close contact, it is usually ok to let a child go to school:
translation.ga: Murar gartheagmhálaí é / í, bíonn sé ceart go leor páiste a ligean ar scoil de ghnáth:

translation.en: If they have only one nasal symptom, such as a runny or sneezing nose
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil acu ach comharthaí sróine amháin, mar shampla srón ag sileadh nó sraothartach

translation.en: If they do not have a high temperature, as long as their temperature has not been lowered by taking any form of paracetamol or ibuprofen - this can hide a high temperature
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil teocht ard orthu, chomh fada agus nár íslíodh a dteocht trí aon chineál paraicéiteamól nó iobúproiféin a ghlacadh – is féidir leis seo teocht ard a cheilt

translation.en: Unless they have a new cough
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil casacht nua orthu

translation.en: If they do not live with anyone who is ill and may have covid-19
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil cónaí orthu le duine ar bith atá tinn agus a bhféadfadh go bhfuil covid-19 orthu

translation.en: If a gp has said that their illness is caused by something else, it is not covid-19.
translation.ga: Má dúirt dochtúir teaghlaigh gur rud éigin eile is cúis lena dtinneas, nach covid-19 atá i gceist.

translation.en: Your gp will tell you when they can return to school or attend childcare after an illness.
translation.ga: Inseoidh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh cathain is féidir leo filleadh ar scoil nó freastal ar chúram leanaí tar éis tinnis.

translation.en: The child tested negative for the covid-19 test, and the child had no symptoms of illness for 48 hours.
translation.ga: Go bhfuair an páiste toradh diúltach ar thástáil covid-19 agus nach raibh comharthaí tinnis ar an bpáiste ar feadh 48 uair a ’ chloig

translation.en: If the child has not had diarrhoea for 48 hours
translation.ga: Mura raibh buinneach ar an bpáiste le 48 uair a ’ chloig

translation.en: If they are being tested as part of a series testing program and are not showing signs of illness and are not a close contact.
translation.ga: Má tá tástáil á dhéanamh orthu mar chuid de chlár sraiththástála agus nach bhfuil comharthaí tinnis orthu agus nach gartheagmhálaí é / í.

translation.en: For example, some children live indirect supply centres
translation.ga: Mar shampla, roinnt páistí a bhfuil cónaí orthu in ionaid soláthair dhírigh

translation.en: If the child is regularly tested as a member of a vulnerable group.
translation.ga: Má dhéantar tástáil rialta ar an bpáiste mar gur ball de ghrúpa leochailleach é / í.

translation.en: A gp certificate is not required.
translation.ga: Ní theastaíonn teastas dochtúra teaghlaigh

translation.en: You do not need a gp certificate or gp note to return to school.
translation.ga: Ní theastaíonn teastas dochtúra teaghlaigh nó nóta ó dhochtúir teaghlaigh chun filleadh ar scoil.

translation.en: The school may ask you to sign a form confirming that your child is fit to attend.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh an scoil iarraidh ort foirm a shíniú le dearbhú go bhfuil do leanbh sách sláintiúil le freastal air.

translation.en: Thorny or sneezing nose
translation.ga: Srón smaoiseach nó sraothartach

translation.en: It's okay to take your child to school or childcare if they have symptoms of a runny nose or sneezing.
translation.ga: Tá sé ceart go leor do pháiste a chur ar scoil nó chuig cúram leanaí más srón smaoiseach nó sraothartach amháin na comharthaí atá orthu.

translation.en: A runny nose or sneezing alone is more likely to be a sign of a cold or other viral infection.
translation.ga: Is dóichí go mbeidh srón smaoiseach nó sraothartach leo féin ina comharthaí d ’ ionfhabhtú slaghdáin nó ionfhabhtú víreasach eile.

translation.en: But if they have a high temperature (38 degrees celsius or higher); lost smell or taste; cough; or shortness of breath:
translation.ga: Ach má bhíonn teocht ard orthu (38 céim celsius nó níos airde); boladh nó blas caillte; casacht; nó giorra anála:

translation.en: Separate your child from others
translation.ga: Scar do pháiste amach ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Call your gp
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh

translation.en: Restrict your movements
translation.ga: Cuir srian ar do ghluaiseachtaí

translation.en: Most of the time, you do not need to call your gp if your child has symptoms of a runny nose or sneezing.
translation.ga: An chuid is mó den am, ní gá duit glaoch ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh más é srón smaoiseach nó sraothartach na comharthaí atá ag do páiste.

translation.en: It is best to talk to your pharmacist.
translation.ga: Is fearr duit labhairt le do chógaiseoir.

translation.en: Teach the child to sneeze and cough in their elbow.
translation.ga: Múin don pháiste a bheith ag sraothartach agus ag casacht ina lámh nó ina uillinn.

translation.en: Have them also use a paper towel to clean their nose and throw it in the bin after use.
translation.ga: Abair leo ciarsúr páipéar a úsáid freisin agus an srón á ghlanadh acu agus caith sa bhosca bruscair í tar éis í a úsáid.

translation.en: Covid-19 (coronavirus) is spread by sneezing or coughing.
translation.ga: Scaiptear covid-19 (coróinvíreas) le sraothartach nó casacht.

translation.en: It must pass from the nose or mouth of an infected person into your eyes, nose or mouth to get the virus.
translation.ga: Caithfidh sé dul ó shrón nó ó bhéal duine atá ionfhabhtaithe isteach i do shúile, do shrón nó do bhéal chun go bhfaighfeá an víreas.

translation.en: This can happen if someone with the virus coughs or sneezes near you or touches an object or surface they have come in contact with them.
translation.ga: Is féidir leis seo tarlú má bhíonn duine a bhfuil an víreas air / uirthi ag casacht nó ag sraothartach in aice leat nó má leagann tú lámh ar rud nó dromchla a raibh teagmháil acu leis.

translation.en: It is essential to:
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach:

translation.en: Wash your hands often and adequately
translation.ga: Do lámha a ní i gceart agus go minic

translation.en: Practice social separation
translation.ga: Scaradh sóisialta a chleachtadh

translation.en: Covers coughs and sneezes
translation.ga: Clúdaigh casachtaí agus sraothanna

translation.en: Follow government guidance on restrictions
translation.ga: Lean treoir an rialtais maidir le srianta

translation.en: Follow the advice on this page as much as possible and encourage others to do the same.
translation.ga: Lean an chomhairle ar an leathanach seo an oiread agus is féidir agus spreag daoine eile chun an rud céanna dhéanamh.

translation.en: People at greater risk from covid-19
translation.ga: Daoine atá i mbaol níos mó ó covid-19

translation.en: Covid-19 can cause serious illness to anyone.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh covid-19 a bheith ina chúis le tinneas tromchúiseach do dhuine ar bith.

translation.en: For some people, the risk is more significant.
translation.ga: Do roinnt daoine tá an bhaol níos mó.

translation.en: People who are at greater risk from covid-19 should be more careful.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do dhaoine atá i mbaol níos mó ó covid- 19 a bheith níos cúramaí.

translation.en: Read advice for people who are more at risk from the virus
translation.ga: Léigh comhairle do dhaoine atá faoi bhaol níos mó ón víreas

translation.en: Wash your hands
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha

translation.en: Proper and frequent handwashing will help prevent the spread of covid-19.
translation.ga: Cabhróidh níochán láimhe i gceart agus go minic le cosc a chur le scaipeadh covid-19.

translation.en: Use soap and water or a hand sanitiser with alcohol to clean your hands:
translation.ga: Úsáid gallúnach agus uisce nó díghalrán láimhe le halcól chun do lámha a ghlanadh:

translation.en: After coughing or sneezing
translation.ga: Tar éis casachta nó sraothartach

translation.en: If you have been in contact with someone who has a fever or respiratory symptoms (cough, shortness of breath, difficulty breathing)
translation.ga: Má bhí tú i dteagmháil le duine a bhfuil fiabhras nó comharthaí riospráide air / uirthí (casacht, giorra anála, deacracht análaithe)

translation.en: Before and after you are on public transport, if you have to use it
translation.ga: Roimh agus tar éis duit a bheith ar iompar poiblí, má bhíonn ort é a úsáid

translation.en: Before and after being in a crowd (especially an indoor crowd)
translation.ga: Roimh agus tar éis a bheith i slua (go háirithe slua faoi dhíon)

translation.en: When you enter and leave buildings, your own home or anyone else ’ s house
translation.ga: Nuair a théann tú isteach agus nuair a fhágann tú foirgnimh, do theach féin nó teach aon duine eile

translation.en: Before you smoke a cigarette or a cigarette
translation.ga: Sula gcaitheann tú toitín nó galthoitín

translation.en: Even if you don ’ t see dirt on your hands
translation.ga: Fiú mura bhfeiceann tú salachar ar do lámha

translation.en: After using the toilet
translation.ga: Tar éis an leithreas a úsáid

translation.en: Take care of your hands.
translation.ga: Tabhair aire do do lámha.

translation.en: Apply moisturizer often.
translation.ga: Cuir maothóir orthu go minic.

translation.en: Any product will make a reason, a basic one without perfume or colour.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh aon táirge cúis, ceann bunúsach gan cumhrán nó dath.

translation.en: Read about how to clean your hands properly
translation.ga: Léigh faoi chonas do lámha a ghlanadh i gceart

translation.en: Facial covers
translation.ga: Clúdaigh aghaidhe

translation.en: Wear face cover on public transport, in shops and all indoor locations.
translation.ga: Caith clúdach aghaidhe ar iompar phoiblí, sna siopaí agus gach láthair atá faoi dhíon.

translation.en: That's the law.
translation.ga: Sin an dlí.

translation.en: You could be fined or refused entry if you do not wear one.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí fíneáil a ghearradh ort nó diúltú duit dul isteach mura gcaitheann tú ceann.

translation.en: You should also wear face cover in crowded workplaces, places of worship and outdoor spaces where many people gather.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit clúdach aghaidh a chaitheamh freisin in ionaid oibre atá plódaithe, in ionaid adhartha agus i spásanna amuigh faoin spéir ina bhfuil go leor daoine ag teacht le chéile.

translation.en: Read more about face masks, medical masks and disposable gloves
translation.ga: Léigh níos mó faoi chlúdaigh aghaidh, maisc leighis agus miotóga aon-uaire

translation.en: Sneezes and coughs
translation.ga: Sraothanna agus casachtaí

translation.en: When you cough or sneeze, cover your mouth and nose with a paper towel or sleeve.
translation.ga: Nuair a dhéanann tú casacht nó sraoth, clúdaigh do bhéal agus do shrón le ciarsúr páipéir nó do mhuinchille.

translation.en: Put the handkerchief in the bin and wash your hands.
translation.ga: Cuir an ciarsúir sa mbosca brúscar agus nigh na lámha.

translation.en: Do not touch your eyes, nose or mouth unless they are clean.
translation.ga: Ná leag do lámha ar do shúile, ar do shrón ná ar do bhéal mura bhfuil siad glan.

translation.en: By some things
translation.ga: Ag roinnt rudaí

translation.en: Do not share items that come in contact with your mouth, for example, bottles or cups.
translation.ga: Ná roinn rudaí a bhíonn i dteagmháil le do bhéal, mar shampla, buidéil nó cupáin.

translation.en: Clean and disinfect all surfaces and handles frequently.
translation.ga: Glan agus díghalraigh gach dromchla agus gach ní a leagtar lámh go minic orthu.

translation.en: Social separation
translation.ga: Scaradh sóisialta

translation.en: Social separation is important to delay the spread of covid-19 by keeping infected people and healthy people apart.
translation.ga: Tá scaradh sóisialta tábhachtach chun moill a chur ar scaipeadh covid-19 trí daoine atá ionfhabhtaithe agus daoine sláintiúla a choinneáil ó chéile.

translation.en: This will reduce the contact between infected and healthy people.
translation.ga: Laghdóidh an méid seo an teagmháil a bheidh idir daoine atá ionfhabhtaithe agus daoine sláintiúla.

translation.en: You should:
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit:

translation.en: Stay 2 meters (6 feet) away from others,
translation.ga: Fanacht amach 2 mhéadar (6 troithe) ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Avoid shared sleeping areas,
translation.ga: Seachain áiteanna codlata atá roinnte

translation.en: Avoid crowded places,
translation.ga: Seachain áiteanna plódaithe

translation.en: Do not shake hands or make close contact with others, if possible
translation.ga: Ná croith lámha nó ná bíodh gartheagmháil agat le daoine eile, más féidir

translation.en: There is little danger if you are passing someone.
translation.ga: Is beag baol atá ann má tá tú díreach ag dul thar dhuine.

translation.en: But try to stay 2 meters away as much as possible.
translation.ga: Ach déan iarracht fanacht 2 mhéadar uathu an oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: When you can't wait for 2 meters from others
translation.ga: Nuair nach féidir leat fanacht 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Try to stay clear of places that do not allow you to stay 2 meters away from others.
translation.ga: Déan iarracht fanacht glan ar na háiteanna nach ligean duit fanacht 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: If you are in a public place where it is too difficult to wait for 2 meters from others, you should wear a face cover.
translation.ga: Má tá tú in áit phoiblí ina bhfuil sé ró-dheacair fanacht 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile, ba chóir duit clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: Meeting others
translation.ga: Ag bualadh le daoine eile

translation.en: At level 5, no visitor to your home is allowed except:
translation.ga: Ag leibhéal a 5, ní cheadaítear aon chuairteoir chuig do theach ach amháin:

translation.en: If there is an essential family cause
translation.ga: Má tá cúis riachtanach teaghlaigh i gceist

translation.en: People in your support bulbs
translation.ga: Daoine i do bholgáin thacaíochta

translation.en: Support bulbs
translation.ga: Bolgáin tacaíochta

translation.en: People living alone or with one parent can pair with one other family for support.
translation.ga: Is féidir le daoine atá ina gcónaí ina n-aonar nó le tuismitheoirí amháin péireáil le teaghlach amháin eile chun tacaíocht a fháil.

translation.en: These are called 'support bulbs'.
translation.ga: ‘ bolgáin tacaíochta ’ a thugtar orthu sin.

translation.en: The people in your 'support bulb' can be visited, and they can visit you.
translation.ga: Is féidir cuairt a thabhairt ar na daoine atá i do ‘ bholgán tacaíochta ’ agus is féidir leosan cuairt a thabhairt ortsa.

translation.en: You can meet outside and elsewhere.
translation.ga: Is féidir libh bualadh le chéile lasmuigh agus in áiteanna eile.

translation.en: Read more about the support bulbs on gov.ie
translation.ga: Léigh níos mó faoi na bolgáin tacaíochta ar gov.ie

translation.en: If visitors can come to your home
translation.ga: Más féidir le cuairteoirí teacht chuig do theach

translation.en: If the current restrictions allow you, visitors, tell them to wash their hands when they enter.
translation.ga: Má cheadaíonn na srianta reatha cuairteoirí duitse, abair leo a lámha a ní nuair a thagann siad isteach.

translation.en: When they disappear, clean all surfaces they have been in contact with them.
translation.ga: Nuair a imíonn siad, glan gach dromchla a raibh siad i dteagmháil leo.

translation.en: Use for routine household cleaning and disinfectants.
translation.ga: Úsáid do ghnáth ghlantacháin tí agus díghalráin.

translation.en: Do not wear disposable gloves instead of cleaning your hands.
translation.ga: Ná caith miotóga aon-uaire in ionad do lámha a ghlanadh.

translation.en: The virus affects them the same way it gets on your hands.
translation.ga: Téann an víreas orthu an bealach céanna agus a dtéann sé ar do lámha.

translation.en: Corruption can get on the hands when you remove them.
translation.ga: Is féidir le héilliú dul ar na lámha nuair a bhaineann tú díot iad.

translation.en: Wear face coverage when visiting people who are 70 years of age or older or people who are at greater risk from covid-19.
translation.ga: Caith clúdach aghaidh nuair a thugann tú cuairt ar dhaoine atá 70 bliain d ’ aois nó níos sine nó daoine atá i mbaol níos mó ó covid-19.

translation.en: When to meet others
translation.ga: An uair nár chóir bualadh le daoine eile

translation.en: Do not visit others if:
translation.ga: Ná téigh ar cuairt chuig daoine eile má:

translation.en: You have any sign of covid-19
translation.ga: Tá aon chomhartha den covid-19 ort

translation.en: If the contact trackers have told you that you are a close contact
translation.ga: Má dúirt na rianairí teagmhála leat gur gartheagmhálaí thú

translation.en: Check with people in advance before you visit that they have no symptoms and are feeling well.
translation.ga: Cinntigh le daoine roimh ré sula dtéann tú ar cuairt chucu nach bhfuil aon chomhartha orthu agus go bhfuil siad ag aireachtáil go maith.

translation.en: Read advice on those at greater risk
translation.ga: Léigh comhairle maidir leo sin atá i mbaol níos mó

translation.en: Travel
translation.ga: Taisteal

translation.en: Avoid public transport.
translation.ga: Seachain iompar poiblí.

translation.en: Walk or cycle instead of using public transport, if possible.
translation.ga: Siúl nó déan rothaíocht in áit iompar poiblí a úsáid, más féidir.

translation.en: Read about the current restrictions on public transport or inland travel
translation.ga: Léigh faoi na srianta atá i bhfeidhm maidir leis an gcóras iompair poiblí nó ar thaisteal intíre i láthair na huaire

translation.en: Do not share vehicles with people who are not members of your household.
translation.ga: Ná bí ag roinnt feithiclí le daoine nach baill ded ’ líon tí iad.

translation.en: If you do, wear a face cover
translation.ga: Má dhéanann tú sin, caith clúdach aghaidhe

translation.en: Work
translation.ga: Obair

translation.en: Do your work from home if possible.
translation.ga: Déan do chuid oibre ón mbaile más féidir.

translation.en: Only essential workers should be going to workplaces.
translation.ga: Níor chóir ach oibrithe riachtanach a bheith ag dul chuig ionaid oibre.

translation.en: Face covers are recommended in crowded workplaces.
translation.ga: Moltar clúdaigh aghaidh a chaitheamh in ionaid oibre atá plódaithe.

translation.en: Read more about the current restrictions on work on gov.ie
translation.ga: Léigh níos mó faoi na srianta reatha ar chúrsaí oibre ar gov.ie

translation.en: Social separation at work
translation.ga: Scaradh sóisialta ag an obair

translation.en: Follow the advice on social segregation everywhere outside your home, including your workplace.
translation.ga: Lean an chomhairle maidir le scaradh sóisialta i ngach áit lasmuigh de do theach, d ’ ionad oibre san áireamh.

translation.en: Get advice
translation.ga: Faigh comhairle

translation.en: Contact the health and safety authority (hsa) by email wcu @ hsa.ie:
translation.ga: Déan teagmháil leis an údarás sláinte agus sábháilteachta (hsa) ar ríomhphost wcu @ hsa.ie:

translation.en: You are concerned about the implementation of social segregation measures in the workplace
translation.ga: Tá imní ort faoin gcaoi a bhfuil na bearta maidir le scaradh sóisialta agus a leithéid á gcur i bhfeidhm san áit oibre

translation.en: If you are the employer and need advice on preventing covid-19 in the workplace
translation.ga: Más tú an fostóir agus má theastaíonn comhairle uait maidir le covid-19 a chosc sa láthair oibre

translation.en: If you are returning to work, read information about returning to work safely.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag filleadh ar an láthair oibre, léigh eolas faoi fhilleadh ar an obair go sábháilte.

translation.en: Use the covid tracker
translation.ga: Úsáid an rianaire covid

translation.en: The covid tracker is a free and easy to use app and:
translation.ga: Is aip saor in aisce agus atá éasca le húsáid atá sa rianaire covid agus:

translation.en: Will send you an immediate contact alert if someone you have had close contact with gets a positive result for covid -19
translation.ga: Cuirfidh sé foláireamh maidir le gartheagmháil chugat má fhaigheann duine a raibh gartheagmháil agat leis / léi toradh dearfach do covid -19

translation.en: It will give you advice on how to protect yourself and others
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh sé comhairle duit conas tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint

translation.en: It will alert other users of the app you contacted directly if you get a positive result for covid-19
translation.ga: Cuirfidh sé foláireamh chuig úsáideoirí eile an aip a raibh gartheagmháil agat leo má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach do covid-19

translation.en: The app is part of our contact tracking.
translation.ga: Is cuid dár rianú teagmhála atá san aip.

translation.en: Contact tracking is very important to prevent the spread of covid-19.
translation.ga: Tá an rianú teagmhála an-tábhachtach chun cosc a chur le scaipeadh covid-19.

translation.en: The more people who find and use the app, the better the contact tracking.
translation.ga: Más mó daoine a fhaigheann an aip agus a úsáideann é, is ea is fearr a dhéanfar an rianú teagmhála.

translation.en: If you are aged between 65 and 69, you can register now to receive your covid-19 vaccine.
translation.ga: Má tá tú idir 65 agus 69 bliain d' aois is féidir leat clárú anois chun do vacsaín covid-19 a fháil.

translation.en: A vaccine is the most effective way to prevent infectious diseases.
translation.ga: Is vacsaín an rud is éifeachtaí chun galair tógálacha a chosc.

translation.en: They prepare your immune system (your body's natural defence) to recognize and fight a particular virus.
translation.ga: Ullmhaíonn siad do chóras imdhíonachta (cosaint nádúrtha do cholainn) chun víreas ar leith a aithint agus a throid.

translation.en: All vaccines do this.
translation.ga: Déanann gach vacsaín an méid seo.

translation.en: Different vaccines work in different ways.
translation.ga: Oibríonn vacsaíní dhifriúla ar bhealaí éagsúla.

translation.en: Some vaccines contain a live virus.
translation.ga: Bíonn víreas beo i roinnt vacsaíní.

translation.en: Some types of the vaccine contain live virus.
translation.ga: Tá víreas beo i roinnt cineálacha vacsaín.

translation.en: For example, the flu vaccine contains a small amount of the flu virus.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, tá méid beag den víreas fliú sa vacsaín fliú.

translation.en: But none of the covid-19 vaccines in use contains the covid-19 virus.
translation.ga: Ach níl an víreas covid-19 in aon cheann de na vacsaíní covid-19 atá in úsáid.

translation.en: They work differently.
translation.ga: Oibríonn siad ar bhealach difriúil.

translation.en: There are two types of covid-19 vaccine in use:
translation.ga: Tá 2 chineál vacsaín covid-19 in úsáid:

translation.en: Mrna
translation.ga: Mrna

translation.en: Viral vector
translation.ga: Veicteoir víreasach

translation.en: Mrna vaccines
translation.ga: Vacsaíní mrna

translation.en: The pfizer / biontech covid-19 vaccine and the moderna covid-19 vaccine are mrna vaccines.
translation.ga: Is vacsaín mrna atá san vacsaín covid-19 pfizer / biontech agus san vacsaín covid-19 moderna.

translation.en: Mrna vaccines enable your body to make the protein that stimulates an immune response without using a live virus.
translation.ga: Cuireann vacsaíní mrna ar chumas do chorp próitéin a dhéanamh a spreagann freagra imdhíonachta gan víreas beo a úsáid.

translation.en: After receiving an mrna vaccine, your body produces antibodies that help you fight infection if a virus enters your body in the future.
translation.ga: Tar éis duit vacsaín mrna a fháil, cruthaíonn do cholainn antasubstaintí a chabhraíonn leat ionfhabhtú a throid má théann víreas isteach i do cholainn sa todhchaí.

translation.en: Researchers have been studying and working with mrna vaccines for years
translation.ga: Tá taighdeoirí ag staidéar agus ag obair le vacsaíní mrna ar feadh na mblianta

translation.en: How covid-19 mrna vaccines work
translation.ga: Conas a oibríonn vacsaíní mrna covid-19

translation.en: The surface of the covid-19 virus is intertwined with proteins known as “spike proteins ”.
translation.ga: Tá dromchla an víris covid-19, fite fuaite le próitéiní ar a dtugtar "próitéiní spíce".

translation.en: The virus uses these spikes to enter human cells, giving you a covid-19 infection.
translation.ga: Úsáideann an víreas na spící seo chun dul isteach i gcealla daonna, rud a thugann ionfhabhtú covid-19 duit.

translation.en: The instructions for making this spice protein are contained in the covid-19 mrna vaccines.
translation.ga: Tá na treoir chun an próitéin spíce seo a dhéanamh istigh sna vacsaíní covid-19 mrna.

translation.en: When you get the vaccine, your immune system recognizes that the protein is not involved.
translation.ga: Nuair a fhaigheann tú an vacsaín, aithníonn do chóras imdhíonachta nach mbaineann an próitéin leis.

translation.en: Then your body starts the immune response to fight against what it thinks is an infection.
translation.ga: Ansin tosaíonn do chorp an freagairt imdhíonachta chun troid in aghaidh an rud a shíleann sé atá ina ionfhabhtú.

translation.en: This immune response makes antibodies.
translation.ga: Déanann an freagra imdhíonachta seo antasubstaintí.

translation.en: The antibodies protect you against covid-19.
translation.ga: Tugann na hantaisubstaintí cosaint duit in aghaidh covid-19.

translation.en: It is much safer for the immune system to learn how to protect you from covid-19 by getting vaccinated instead of getting the virus.
translation.ga: Tá sé i bhfad níos sábháilte don chóras imdhíonachta foghlaim conas tú a chosaint ó covid-19 trí vacsaíniú seachas an víreas a fháil.

translation.en: Your cells then break down the instructions on making the spice protein and expel them from your body.
translation.ga: Ansin briseann do chealla na treoir faoi chonas an próitéin spíce a dhéanamh agus díbrítear amach as do cholainn iad.

translation.en: Viral vector vaccines
translation.ga: Vacsaíní veicteora víreasacha

translation.en: The astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine is a viral vector vaccine.
translation.ga: Is vacsaín veicteorach víreasach an vacsaín covid-19 astrazeneca.

translation.en: Virus viral vaccines use another harmless virus as a delivery system.
translation.ga: Úsáideann vacsaíní veicteorach víreasach víreas eile atá neamhdhíobhálach mar chóras seachadta.

translation.en: This vaccine allows your body to make the protein that stimulates an immune response.
translation.ga: Cuireann an vacsaín seo ar chumas do chorp próitéin a dhéanamh a spreagann freagra imdhíonachta.

translation.en: Hundreds of scientific studies on viral vector vaccines have been conducted and published worldwide.
translation.ga: Tá na céadta staidéar eolaíoch ar vacsaíní veicteoracha víreasacha déanta agus foilsithe ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: Several recently used vaccines for ebola outbreaks have used the viral vector technology.
translation.ga: D' úsáid roinnt vacsaíní a úsáideadh le déanaí le haghaidh ráigeanna ebola an teicneolaíocht veicteorach víreasach.

translation.en: Other studies have focused on a viral vector vaccine against zika, influenza and hiv.
translation.ga: Dhírigh staidéir eile ar vacsaín veicteorach víreasach i gcoinne zika, fliú agus veid.

translation.en: How covid-19 viral vector vaccines work
translation.ga: Cén chaoi a n-oibríonn vacsaíní veicteora víreasacha covid-19

translation.en: Viral vector vaccines are like messengers.
translation.ga: Tá vacsaíní veicteora víreasacha cosúil le teachtairí.

translation.en: They use a weakened version of another virus (the vector) to guide the cells in your body,
translation.ga: Baineann siad úsáid as leagan lagaithe de víreas (an veicteoir) eile chun treoir a thabhairt do na cealla i do cholainn,

translation.en: Covid-19 vaccines use the adenovirus as a vector.
translation.ga: Úsáideann vacsaíní covid-19 an adanaivíreas mar veicteoir.

translation.en: Adenovirus is the virus that causes the common cold.
translation.ga: Is é adanaivíreas an víreas is cúis leis an gnáth slaghdán.

translation.en: The surface of the covid-19 virus is intertwined with proteins known as “spike proteins ”.
translation.ga: Tá dromchla an víris covid-19, fite fuaite le próitéiní ar a dtugtar "próitéiní spíce".

translation.en: The virus uses these spikes to enter human cells, giving you a covid-19 infection.
translation.ga: Úsáideann an víreas na spící seo chun dul isteach i gcealla daonna, rud a thugann ionfhabhtú covid-19 duit.

translation.en: When you receive a viral vector vaccine, the vector (adenovirus) enters a cell in your body.
translation.ga: Nuair a fhaigheann tú vacsaín veicteora víreasach, téann an veicteoir (adanaivíreas) isteach i gceall i do cholainn.

translation.en: It teaches the cell how to produce covid-19 spice protein.
translation.ga: Múineann sé don cheall conas protéin spíce covid-19 a tháirgeadh.

translation.en: After receiving the vaccine, your immune system recognizes that the protein is not involved.
translation.ga: Tar éis duit an vacsaín a fháil, aithníonn do chóras imdhíonachta nach mbaineann an próitéin leis.

translation.en: Then your body starts the immune response to fight against what it thinks is an infection.
translation.ga: Ansin tosaíonn do chorp an freagairt imdhíonachta chun troid in aghaidh an rud a shíleann sé atá ina ionfhabhtú.

translation.en: This immune response makes antibodies.
translation.ga: Déanann an freagra imdhíonachta seo antasubstaintí.

translation.en: The antibodies protect you against covid-19.
translation.ga: Tugann na hantaisubstaintí cosaint duit in aghaidh covid-19.

translation.en: It is much safer for the immune system to learn how to protect you from covid-19 by getting vaccinated instead of getting the virus.
translation.ga: Tá sé i bhfad níos sábháilte don chóras imdhíonachta foghlaim conas tú a chosaint ó covid-19 tríd vacsaíniú seachas an víreas a fháil.

translation.en: This topic has been examined by vaccine experts working in ireland.
translation.ga: Scrúdaigh saineolaithe vaicsaíne atá ag obair in éirinn an t-ábhar seo.

translation.en: Covid tracker app
translation.ga: Aip an rianaire covid

translation.en: Why use the covid tracker app?
translation.ga: Cén fáth ar chóir an aip rianaire covid a úsáid?

translation.en: If you receive a call alert
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú foláireamh maidir le gartheagmháil

translation.en: Using the covid tracking app if you get a positive result on your test
translation.ga: Ag úsáid an aip rianaithe covid má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach ar do thástáil

translation.en: Tracking your signals
translation.ga: Ag rianú do chomharthaí

translation.en: The technology used by the covid tracker app
translation.ga: An teicneolaíocht a úsáideann aip an rianaire covid

translation.en: Privacy and how we use your data
translation.ga: Príobháideachas agus conas a bhainimid úsáid as do shonraí

translation.en: The covid tracker app is part of our contact tracking campaign.
translation.ga: Is cuid dar bhfeachtas rianaithe teagmhála atá in aip an rianaire covid.

translation.en: It uses a technology developed by apple and google called the disclosure notification system (ens).
translation.ga: Tá teicneolaíocht a d ’ fhorbair apple agus google ar a dtugtar córas um fhógartha nochtuithe (ens) in úsáid ann.

translation.en: Ens is free and is available on almost all mobile phones under 5 years of age.
translation.ga: Tá ens saor in aisce agus tá sé ar beagnach gach fón póca atá faoi 5 bliana d ’ aois.

translation.en: You need to update your phone's operating system to make sure it has ens.
translation.ga: Ní mór duit córas oibriúcháin d ’ fhón a uasdátú le bheith cinnte go bhfuil ens air.

translation.en: Ens uses bluetooth and randomly generated ids to log anonymously on:
translation.ga: Úsáideann ens bluetooth agus aitheantais a chruthaítear go randamach chun logáil anaithnid a dhéanamh ar:

translation.en: Any mobile phone with which you have direct contact and which has the app.
translation.ga: Aon fhón póca a bhfuil gartheagmháil agat leis agus a bhfuil an aip air.

translation.en: The distance between your mobile phone and another app user's mobile phone
translation.ga: An t-achar atá idir d ’ fhón póca agus fón póca úsáideora eile aipe

translation.en: The length of time your cell phone stays next to another app user's cell phone
translation.ga: An tréimhse ama a bhíonn d ’ fhón póca in aice le fón póca úsáideora eile aipe

translation.en: It does not track where you are or use that information.
translation.ga: Ní rianaíonn sé an áit ina bhfuil tú ná ní úsáideann sé an t-eolas sin.

translation.en: The app will never know where you were or who was with you.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh a fhios ag an aip cá raibh tú ná cé a bhí in éineacht leat.

translation.en: The app works with other similar apps used by other health services such as northern ireland, germany, italy, denmark, spain, hungary and latvia.
translation.ga: Oibríonn an aip le haipeanna eile atá cosúil leis agus atá á úsáid ag seirbhísí sláinte eile ar nós i dtuaisceart na héireann, an ghearmáin, an iodáil, an danmhairg, an spáinn, an ungáir agus an laitvia.

translation.en: How the app works
translation.ga: Conas a oibríonn an aip

translation.en: The app downloads a list of random ids every 2 hours.
translation.ga: Íoslódálann an aip liosta d ’ aitheantais randamacha gach 2 uair an chloig.

translation.en: These ids are shared anonymously with app users who tested positive for covid-19 (coronavirus).
translation.ga: Roinntear na haitheantais seo go hanaithnid le húsáideoirí aipe a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19 (coróinvíreas).

translation.en: If you have been within 2 meters of anyone for more than 15 minutes, you will receive an alert that you are a close contact.
translation.ga: Má bhí tú i bhfoisceacht 2 mhéadar d ’ aon duine ar feadh tréimhse níos faide ná 15 nóiméad, gheobhaidh tú foláireamh gur gartheagmhálaí tú.

translation.en: The app does this work in the background.
translation.ga: Déanann an aip an obair seo sa chúlra.

translation.en: This means you can use your mobile phone as usual.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn seo gur féidir leat d ’ fhón póca a úsáid mar is gnách.

translation.en: Bluetooth
translation.ga: Bluetooth

translation.en: The bluetooth on your mobile phone must be turned on in order for the contact tracking system to function.
translation.ga: Ní mór an bluetooth ar d ’ fhón póca a bheith ar siúl ionas gur féidir leis an gcóras rianaithe teagmhála feidhmiú.

translation.en: You will be asked to give the app your permission to use the ens once you start using the app.
translation.ga: Iarrfar ort do chead a thabhairt don aip an ens a úsáid nuair a thosaíonn tú ag úsáid na haipe.

translation.en: This will also turn on bluetooth.
translation.ga: Casfaidh sé seo ar an bluetooth freisin.

translation.en: The app uses low energy bluetooth (le) to estimate the distance and time between app users.
translation.ga: Úsáideann an aip fuinneamh íseal bluetooth (le) chun an t-achar agus an t-am a mheas idir úsáideoirí na haipe.

translation.en: It would be able to tell you precisely if you spent 15 minutes or more near someone who tested positive for the virus.
translation.ga: Beidh sé in ann insint duit go beacht má chaith tú 15 nóiméad nó níos faide in aice le duine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil don víreas.

translation.en: It will tell exactly how far you were from the other app user most of the time.
translation.ga: Beidh sé in ann a rá go cruinn cén fhad a bhí tú ón úsáideoir aipe eile an chuid is mó den am.

translation.en: But this or any other tracking method is not entirely accurate.
translation.ga: Ach níl sé seo ná aon mhodh rianaithe eile cruinn go hiomlán.

translation.en: That's why we use 2 contact tracking methods - the contact tracking team and the covid tracker app.
translation.ga: Sin an fáth go mbaineann muid úsáid as 2 mhodh rianaithe teagmhála – an fhoireann rianaithe teagmhála agus aip an rianaire covid.

translation.en: Random identities
translation.ga: Aitheantais randamacha

translation.en: Ens enables mobile phones to share random ids using bluetooth.
translation.ga: Cuireann ens ar chumas na bhfón póca aitheantais randamacha a roinnt trí bluetooth a úsáid.

translation.en: These ids contain information about how far you have been from another app user and how much time you have spent near it.
translation.ga: Tá eolas sna haitheantais seo maidir le cén fhad a bhí tú ó úsáideoir eile aipe agus cé mhéad ama a chaith tú in aice leis.

translation.en: These codes are letters and numbers.
translation.ga: Is litreacha agus uimhreacha atá sna cóid seo.

translation.en: You never see them.
translation.ga: Ní fheiceann tú iad riamh.

translation.en: They cannot be used to identify users or their cell phones.
translation.ga: Ní féidir iad a úsáid chun úsáideoirí nó a gcuid fón póca a aithint.

translation.en: By using random identifications, all information is collected anonymously.
translation.ga: Trí aitheantais randamacha a úsáid bailítear gach eolas go hanaithnid.

translation.en: No one, even the hse, will know your details unless you choose to share them.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh do shonraí pearsanta ar eolas ag aon duine fiú amháin fss, ach amháin má roghnaíonn tusa iad a roinnt.

translation.en: Use of mobile data
translation.ga: Úsáid sonraí móibíleacha

translation.en: The app uses around 1mb of data per day.
translation.ga: Úsáideann an aip timpeall 1mb sonraí in aghaidh an lae.

translation.en: This is the same amount of data you would use if you were browsing the internet for 6 minutes.
translation.ga: Seo an méid céanna sonraí a d ’ úsáidfeá dá mbeifeá ag brabhsáil ar feadh 6 nóiméad ar an idirlíon.

translation.en: Battery life
translation.ga: Saol cadhnra

translation.en: Using the app should not make any difference to the battery life of your mobile phone.
translation.ga: Níor chóir go ndéanfadh úsáid an aip aon difríocht do shaolré cadhnra d ’ fhón póca.

translation.en: The app uses low energy bluetooth.
translation.ga: Úsáideann an aip fuinneamh íseal bluetooth.

translation.en: This is the same technology used in smart watches or wireless headphones.
translation.ga: Seo an teicneolaíocht chéanna atá in úsáid in uaireadóir cliste nó i gcluasáin gan sreang.

translation.en: It is designed to be energy efficient.
translation.ga: Dearadh é chun nach n-úsáidfí mórán fuinnimh.

translation.en: Why use the covid tracker app?
translation.ga: Cén fáth ar chóir an aip rianaire covid a úsáid?

translation.en: If you receive a call alert
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú foláireamh maidir le gartheagmháil

translation.en: Using the covid tracking app if you get a positive result on your test
translation.ga: Ag úsáid an aip rianaithe covid má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach ar do thástáil

translation.en: Tracking your signals
translation.ga: Ag rianú do chomharthaí

translation.en: The technology used by the covid tracker app
translation.ga: An teicneolaíocht a úsáideann aip an rianaire covid

translation.en: Privacy and how we use your data
translation.ga: Príobháideachas agus conas a bhainimid úsáid as do shonraí

translation.en: Covid tracking app
translation.ga: Aip rianaithe covid

translation.en: If you test positive for your covid-19 (coronavirus detected) test, you can use the app to share your close contacts with the contact tracking team.
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach ar do thástáil covid-19 (coróinvíreas aimsithe) is féidir leat an aip a úsáid chun do ghartheagmhálacha a roinnt leis an bhfoireann rianaithe teagmhála.

translation.en: This is done anonymously using random ids.
translation.ga: Déantar é seo go hanaithnid ag baint úsáide as idanna randamacha.

translation.en: You will not know any details relating to your immediate contacts and will not know your own details.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh aon sonraí a bhaineann le do ghartheagmhálacha ar eolas agat agus ní bheidh do shonraí féin ar eolas acu.

translation.en: Sharing your direct contacts via the app ensures that those you have been in close contact with are alerted.
translation.ga: Nuair a roinntear do ghartheagmhálaithe tríd na haipe, cinntítear go dtugtar foláireamh dóibh sin a raibh tú i ngartheagmháil leo.

translation.en: This speeds up contact tracking.
translation.ga: Cuireann seo luas faoin rianú teagmhála.

translation.en: It ’ s up to you if you want to do this.
translation.ga: Is fút féin atá sé más mian leat é seo a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Get an upload code
translation.ga: Faigh cód uaslódála

translation.en: The contact tracking team will call you and ask for your contact details.
translation.ga: Cuirfidh an fhoireann rianaithe teagmhála glaoch ort agus iarrfar sonraí do ghartheagmhálacha ort.

translation.en: You will also be asked if you are using the app.
translation.ga: Iarrfar ort freisin an bhfuil an aip á úsáid agat.

translation.en: If you have the app, you will be sent a unique text upload code.
translation.ga: Má tá an aip agat, seolfar cód uaslódála ar leith chugat ar théacs.

translation.en: This code allows you to upload your direct contacts anonymously.
translation.ga: Cuireann an chód seo ar do chumas do ghartheagmhálacha a uaslódáil go hainaithnid.

translation.en: Upload codes are issued only by members of the contact tracking team.
translation.ga: Is iad baill den fhoireann rianaithe teagmhála amháin a eisíonn na códanna uaslódála.

translation.en: Uploading your contacts
translation.ga: Ag uaslódáil do ghartheagmhálaithe

translation.en: When you receive the upload code:
translation.ga: Nuair a fhaigheann tú an cód uaslódála:

translation.en: Open the app
translation.ga: Oscail an aip

translation.en: Click on the 'contact tracker' icon at the bottom of the app
translation.ga: Cniog ar an íocón ‘ rianaire teagmhála ’ ag bun na haipe

translation.en: Scroll down and click on 'upload your random ids
translation.ga: Scróláil síos agus cniog ar ‘ uaslódáil d ’ idanna randamacha

translation.en: Enter your unique code (you can copy and paste this from text)
translation.ga: Cuir isteach do chód uathúil (is féidir leat seo a chóipeáil agus a ghreamú ón téacs)

translation.en: The random ids collected by your phone in the last 14 days will be uploaded.
translation.ga: Uaslódálfar na idanna randamacha a bhailigh do fón le 14 lá anuas.

translation.en: These ids tell how close you were to other users of the app and how close you were to them.
translation.ga: Insíonn na idanna seo cé chomh gar agus a raibh tú d ’ úsáideoirí eile den aip agus an fhad a raibh tú gar dóibh.

translation.en: Your privacy is protected
translation.ga: Tá do phríobháideachas faoi chosaint

translation.en: Your random ids are anonymous and protect your privacy when you upload them.
translation.ga: Tá do idanna randamach anaithnid agus cosnaíonn siad do phríobháideachas nuair a uaslódálann tú iad.

translation.en: No one will know your personal details unless they share them with you, including the hse.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh do shonraí phearsanta ar eolas ag aon duine ach amháin má roinneann tú féin iad, fss san áireamh.

translation.en: No one will know:
translation.ga: Ní bheidh a fhios ag aon duine:

translation.en: Your name
translation.ga: D ’ ainm

translation.en: Who met you or was in close contact with you.
translation.ga: Cé a bhuail leat nó a raibh i ngartheagmháil leat.

translation.en: The places you were
translation.ga: Na háiteanna a raibh tú

translation.en: Who tested positive for covid-19 (virus detected)
translation.ga: Cé fuair toradh tástála dearfach do covid-19 (vírís aimsithe)

translation.en: Privacy and how we use your data
translation.ga: Príobháideachas agus conas a bhainimid úsáid as do shonraí

translation.en: Privacy and data security are vital to the hse.
translation.ga: Tá príobháideachas agus slándáil sonraí an-tábhachtach do fss.

translation.en: The covid tracking app protects the privacy of everyone who uses the app.
translation.ga: Cosnaíonn an aip rianaithe covid príobháideachas gach duine a úsáideann an aip.

translation.en: Protecting your privacy
translation.ga: Ag cosaint do phríobháideachais

translation.en: An aip:
translation.ga: An aip:

translation.en: The app does not collect your name, age or address
translation.ga: Ní bhailíonn an aip d ’ ainm, d ’ aois ná do sheoladh

translation.en: It only keeps your phone number if you choose to share it
translation.ga: Ní choinníonn sé d ’ uimhir fóin ach amháin má roghnaíonn tusa é a roinnt

translation.en: It cannot be used to track where you are
translation.ga: Ní féidir é a úsáid chun an áit a bhfuil tú a rianú

translation.en: It cannot be used to check whether you should be self-isolating
translation.ga: Ní féidir é a úsáid chun seiceáil ar chóir duit a bheith ag féin-aonrú

translation.en: It can only access information on the phone of your choice
translation.ga: Ní féidir leis rochtain a fháil ach ar fhaisnéis ar do ghuthán a roghnaíonn tú a cheadú

translation.en: It cannot be used to identify your immediate contacts
translation.ga: Ní féidir é a úsáid chun do ghartheagmhálacha a aithint

translation.en: It cannot be used to identify people who have tested positive for covid-19 (coronavirus)
translation.ga: Ní féidir é a úsáid chun daoine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19 (coróinvíreas) a aithint

translation.en: You choose the data you share
translation.ga: Roghnaíonn tú na sonraí a roinneann tú

translation.en: It's always your choice:
translation.ga: Is do rogha i gcónaí:

translation.en: Using or not using the app
translation.ga: An aip a úsáid nó gan é a úsáid

translation.en: Sharing data and information with or without us
translation.ga: Sonraí agus faisnéis a roinnt linn nó gan é a roinnt

translation.en: You can:
translation.ga: Is féidir leat:

translation.en: Change your preference at any time in the app settings
translation.ga: Do rogha a athrú ag am ar bith sna socrúcháin aipe

translation.en: Use part of the app without sharing data at all
translation.ga: Cuid den aip a úsáid gan sonraí a roinnt ar chor ar bith

translation.en: Use or not use features of the app independently
translation.ga: Gnéithe den aip a úsáid nó gan a úsáid go neamhspleach

translation.en: Delete or update the information you provide to the app at any time
translation.ga: Faisnéis a thug tú don aip a scriosadh nó a uasdátú ag am ar bith

translation.en: The data collected by the app is stored on your phone only.
translation.ga: Tá na sonraí a bhailíonn an aip stóráilte ar do fón amháin.

translation.en: No one else can access them unless you choose to share them.
translation.ga: Ní féidir le haon duine eile rochtain a fháil orthu ach amháin má roghnaíonn tusa é iad a roinnt.

translation.en: The data you share gives health professionals more information about the virus and helps prevent the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Tugann na sonraí a roinneann tú níos mó eolas do ghairmithe sláinte faoin víreas agus cabhraíonn sé cosc a chur ar scaipeadh an víris.

translation.en: The data collected
translation.ga: Na sonraí a bhailítear

translation.en: The app collects and uses a combination of personal and anonymous data.
translation.ga: Bailíonn agus úsáideann an aip meascán de shonraí pearsanta agus de shonraí anaithnid.

translation.en: Personal details
translation.ga: Sonraí pearsanta

translation.en: You can choose to share your phone number, demographics and data related to your health.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat roghnú d ’ uimhir fóin, déimeagrafaic agus sonraí a bhaineann le do shláinte a roinnt.

translation.en: You do not have to provide these details unless you wish.
translation.ga: Ní chaithfidh tú na sonraí seo a chur ar fáil mura mian leat.

translation.en: Your phone automatically shares your ip address.
translation.ga: Roinneann d ’ fhón do sheoladh ip go huathoibríoch.

translation.en: We do not need your ip address.
translation.ga: Ní theastaíonn do sheoladh ip uainn.

translation.en: We delete this data as soon as your phone sends it to us.
translation.ga: Scriosann muid na sonraí seo chomh luath agus a sheolann do fón chugainn iad.

translation.en: Your phone number
translation.ga: D ’ uimhir fóin

translation.en: We will only know your phone number if you choose to share it with us.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh d ’ uimhir fóin ar eolas againn ach amháin má roghnaíonn tusa é a roinnt linn.

translation.en: You may choose to share it if you need to receive a call if you are a close contact for someone who has tested positive for covid-19.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go roghnóidh tú é a roinnt má theastaíonn uait glaoch a fháil má tá tú i do ghartheagmhálaí do dhuine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19.

translation.en: This placement can be changed at any time.
translation.ga: Is féidir an socrúchán seo a athrú ag am ar bith.

translation.en: The app will only share your phone number with the hse if you are a close contact.
translation.ga: Ní roinnfidh an aip d ’ uimhir fóin le fss ach má bhíonn tú i do ghartheagmhálaí.

translation.en: A contact tracking team will then call you to arrange a covid-19 test.
translation.ga: Cuirfidh foireann rianaithe teagmhála glaoch ort ansin chun tástáil covid-19 a eagrú.

translation.en: The app will share the latest date you were in close contact with someone who tested positive for covid-19.
translation.ga: Roinnfidh an aip an dáta is déanaí a raibh tú i ngartheagmháil le duine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19.

translation.en: This is done so that we can give you the appropriate health advice based on how long ago you were unprotected by the virus.
translation.ga: Déantar seo ionas gur féidir linn an chomhairle sláinte chuí a chur ort bunaithe ar cé chomh fada ó shin a bhí tú gan chosaint ar an víreas.

translation.en: The contact tracking team is given immediate contact phone numbers when talking to people who have tested positive for covid-19.
translation.ga: Tugtar uimhreacha fóin na ngartheagmhálacha don fhoireann rianaithe teagmhála nuair a labhraíonn siad le daoine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19.
