translation.en: This means you can get a call from them even if you do not share your phone number in the app.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn seo go bhféadfá glaoch a fháil uathu fiú mura roinneann tú d ’ uimhir fóin san aip.

translation.en: Health and demographic information
translation.ga: Faisnéis sláinte agus déimeagrafach

translation.en: If you use the covid-19 app to check your signals, please share the following with us:
translation.ga: Má úsáideann tú an aip covid-19 chun do chomharthaí a sheiceáil, iarrfar ort na nithe seo a roinnt linn:

translation.en: The county or town in which you live
translation.ga: An contae nó baile ina bhfuil tú i do chónaí

translation.en: Old group
translation.ga: D ’ aois ghrúpa

translation.en: D'inscne
translation.ga: D ’ inscne

translation.en: Your symptoms of illness
translation.ga: Do chomharthaí tinnis

translation.en: If you share the information with us, it will be uploaded to the hse and shared anonymously with the central statistics office (cso).
translation.ga: Má roinneann tú an fhaisnéis linn, uaslódálfar é chuig fss agus roinnfear é go hanaithnid leis an phríomh-oifig staidrimh (cso).

translation.en: This information helps us to understand more about the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Cabhraíonn an fhaisnéis seo linn níos mó a thuiscint faoi scaipeadh an víreas.

translation.en: Whether or not you want to share this data with us is always your choice.
translation.ga: Is do rogha atá ann i gcónaí má theastaíonn uait nó mura dteastaíonn uait na sonraí seo a roinnt linn.

translation.en: You can change the information you need to share with us at any time.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an fhaisnéis a theastaíonn uait a roinnt linn a athrú ag am ar bith.

translation.en: Read more about the data collected and processed.
translation.ga: Léigh tuilleadh faoi na sonraí a bailíodh agus a próiseáladh.

translation.en: Ip address
translation.ga: Seoladh ip

translation.en: Your ip address is a unique collection of numbers that identifies your phone or computer when you use the internet.
translation.ga: Is bailiúchán uathúil uimhreacha é do sheoladh ip a shainaithníonn do ghuthán nó do ríomhaire nuair a úsáideann tú an t-idirlíon.

translation.en: Ip addresses are used so that you can send and receive information online.
translation.ga: Úsáidtear seoltaí ip ionas gur féidir leat faisnéis a sheoladh agus a fháil ar líne.

translation.en: Your ip address is automatically shared each time you use an app or visit a website.
translation.ga: Roinntear do sheoladh ip go huathoibríoch gach uair a úsáideann tú aip nó a thugann tú cuairt ar láithreán gréasán.

translation.en: We do not need your ip address.
translation.ga: Ní theastaíonn do sheoladh ip uainn.

translation.en: We delete it from the server as soon as we receive the data you share with us from the app.
translation.ga: Scriosann muid den seirbheálaí é chomh luath agus a fhaigheann muid na sonraí a roinneann tú linn ón aip.

translation.en: Unknown data
translation.ga: Sonraí anaithnide

translation.en: Anonymous data we collect includes:
translation.ga: I measc na sonraí anaithnide a bhailímid tá:

translation.en: Details of how you use the app
translation.ga: Sonraí faoin gcaoi a n-úsáideann tú an aip

translation.en: Data we use for contact tracking
translation.ga: Sonraí a úsáideann muid don rianú teagmhála

translation.en: Details on how you use the app
translation.ga: Sonraí faoin gcaoi a n-úsáideann tú an aip

translation.en: We collect data about how you use the app.
translation.ga: Bailíonn muid sonraí faoi gcaoi a n-úsáideann tú an aip.

translation.en: This is called 'app metric data'.
translation.ga: Tugtar ‘ sonraí méadracha na haipe ’ ar seo.

translation.en: We collect this data in order to improve the app and to understand:
translation.ga: Bailímid na sonraí seo ar mhaithe le feabhas a chur ar an aip agus chun tuiscint a fháil ar:

translation.en: How the app is used
translation.ga: An gcaoi a úsáidtear an aip

translation.en: Its effect on slowing the spread of the virus
translation.ga: An tionchar atá aige ar scaipeadh an víris a mhoilliú

translation.en: Metric data of this app does not reveal your name.
translation.ga: Ní nochtann sonraí méadracha an aip seo d ’ ainm.

translation.en: But it is your choice whether or not you want to share this data.
translation.ga: Ach is é do rogha féin más mian nó nach mian leat na sonraí seo a roinnt.

translation.en: Contact tracking details
translation.ga: Sonraí don rianú teagmhála

translation.en: To enable contact tracking, the covid tracker uses a technology developed by apple and google called disclosure notification.
translation.ga: Chun rianú teagmhála a chumasú, úsáideann an rianaire covid teicneolaíocht a d ’ fhorbair apple agus google ar a dtugtar fógra nochtadh.

translation.en: The disclosure notification enables your phone to create and share random ids.
translation.ga: Cumasaíonn an fógra nochtúcháin do fón chun idanna randamacha a chruthú agus a roinnt.

translation.en: These random ids are shared when you are in close contact with other users of the app.
translation.ga: Roinntear na idanna randamacha seo nuair atá tú i ngartheagmháil le húsáideoirí eile na haipe.

translation.en: You can read more about the disclosure notification system on the apple or google website.
translation.ga: Is féidir níos mó a léamh faoin gcóras um fhógra nochtadh ar láithreán gréasán apple nó google.

translation.en: The app uses this anonymous data to notify you of:
translation.ga: Baineann an aip úsáid as na sonraí anaithnide seo chun tú a chur ar an eolas faoi:

translation.en: The time you spent with another unknown user of the app
translation.ga: An tréimhse a chaith tú in éineacht le úsáideoir anaithnid eile den aipe

translation.en: The strength of the bluetooth signal of the other user of the other app and how to work out how close you were to them
translation.ga: Láidreacht an chomhartha bluetooth atá ag an úsáideoir eile den aipe eile agus conas oibriú amach cé chomh gar is a bhí tú dóibh

translation.en: That data stays on your phone.
translation.ga: Fanann na sonraí sin ar do fón.

translation.en: No one can access them unless you choose to share them.
translation.ga: Ní féidir le haon duine rochtain a fháil orthu ach amháin má roghnaíonn tú iad a roinnt.

translation.en: You will be asked if you wish to share the data with the hse if you test positive for covid-19.
translation.ga: Iarrfar ort má theastaíonn uait na sonraí a roinnt le fss má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19.

translation.en: Random ids shared with the hse are deleted every 14 days.
translation.ga: Scriostar na idanna randamacha a roinntear le fss gach 14 lá.

translation.en: You can delete the app as well as the data collected on it whenever you want.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an aip a scriosadh chomh maith leis na sonraí atá bailithe air aon uair gur mian leat.

translation.en: We have worked with apple and google to ensure that contact tracking functionality works effectively for as many phones as possible.
translation.ga: D ’ oibrigh muid le apple agus google chun a chinntiú go n-oibríonn feidhmiúlacht rianú teagmhála go héifeacht don líon is mó fóin gur féidir.

translation.en: Third party bodies
translation.ga: Comhlachtaí tríú páirtí

translation.en: For the functionality of the app, we use services from a number of companies.
translation.ga: Ar mhaithe le feidhmiú na haipe, baineann muid úsáide as seirbhísí ó roinnt chomhlachtaí.

translation.en: These third-party companies process some data from the app, including your anonymous information.
translation.ga: Déanann na comhlachtaí tríú páirtí seo próiseáil ar roinnt sonraí ón aip, ina n-áirítear d ’ fhaisnéis anaithnid.

translation.en: Safe, secure and compliant
translation.ga: Sábháilte, slán agus géilliúil

translation.en: We created the app based on eu guidelines, eu recommendations on privacy, hse standards and data protection law.
translation.ga: Chruthaíomar an aip bunaithe ar threoirlínte ae, moltaí an ae maidir le príobháideachas, caighdeáin fss agus an dlí um chosaint sonraí.

translation.en: This means that the app:
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn seo go bhfuil an aip:

translation.en: Safe and secure to use
translation.ga: Sábháilte agus slán le húsáid

translation.en: Law-abiding
translation.ga: Géilliúil don dlí

translation.en: Meets the standards expected to keep data secure and confidential
translation.ga: Go gcomhlíonann sé na caighdeáin a bhfuiltear ag súil leis chun sonraí a choinneál slán agus faoi rún

translation.en: Contact tracking on the entire app is decentralized.
translation.ga: Tá rianú teagmhála ar an aip iomlán díláraithe.

translation.en: The random ids on your phone are matched.
translation.ga: Déantar an meaitseáil ar na idanna randamacha ar d ’ fhón.

translation.en: This means that no one can track your location, your movements or the people you have contacted.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn seo nach féidir le haon duine do shuíomh, do ghluaiseachtaí ná na daoine a ndearna tú teagmháil leo a rianú.

translation.en: Read more about compliance and security.
translation.ga: Léigh tuilleadh faoi chomhlíonadh agus faoi shlándáil.

translation.en: Deleting your data
translation.ga: Ag scriosadh do shonraí

translation.en: You can choose to delete the app and delete your data at any time.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat rogha a dhéanamh an aip agus do shonraí a scriosadh ag am ar bith.

translation.en: To do this:
translation.ga: Chun seo a dhéanamh:

translation.en: Go to 'settings' in the app.
translation.ga: Téigh chuig ‘ socrúcháin ’ san aip.

translation.en: Select 'leave'.
translation.ga: Roghnaigh ‘ fág ’.

translation.en: Click on 'i want to leave'.
translation.ga: Cliceáil ar 'ba mhaith liom imeacht'.

translation.en: This will delete the app and your data.
translation.ga: Scriosfaidh sé seo an aip agus do shonraí.

translation.en: When the government announces the outbreak is over, the app will no longer work.
translation.ga: Nuair a fhógraíonn an rialtas go bhfuil an ráig thart, ní oibreoidh an aip níos mó.

translation.en: You will be prompted to delete the app and all data.
translation.ga: Molfar duit an aip agus na sonraí ar fad a scriosadh.

translation.en: It will no longer be available on the app stores either.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh sé ar fáil níos mó ar na siopaí aip ach an oiread.

translation.en: Contact the data protection officer
translation.ga: Déan teagmháil leis an oifigeach cosanta sonraí

translation.en: The hse data protection officer can be contacted at dpo @ hse.ie.
translation.ga: Is féidir teagmháil a dhéanamh le oifigeach cosanta sonraí fss ag dpo @ hse.ie.

translation.en: Transparency
translation.ga: Trédhearcacht

translation.en: As part of our commitment to transparency, the following links can be considered:
translation.ga: Mar chuid dár dtiomantas don trédhearcacht, is féidir breathnú ar na nascanna seo:

translation.en: Data protection impact assessment
translation.ga: Measúnú tionchar ar chosaint sonraí

translation.en: Data protection information notice
translation.ga: Fógra faisnéise um chosaint sonraí

translation.en: Privacy designs
translation.ga: Dearaí príobháideachta

translation.en: Source code
translation.ga: Cód foinseach

translation.en: Github the covid tracker
translation.ga: Github an rianaire covid

translation.en: Read more about how we keep your data secure.
translation.ga: Léigh tuilleadh faoin gcaoi a gcoimeádaimid do shonraí slán.

translation.en: Partner organizations
translation.ga: Eagraíochtaí comhpháirtíochta

translation.en: Organizations from ireland and around the world worked together to develop the covid tracker app.
translation.ga: D ’ oibrigh eagraíochtaí as éirinn agus ó áiteanna timpeall na cruinne le chéile chun an aip rianaire covid a fhorbairt.

translation.en: This includes partnerships for:
translation.ga: Áirítear anseo comhpháirtíochtaí maidir le:

translation.en: Project governance and delivery
translation.ga: Rialachas agus seachadadh tionscadail

translation.en: Research
translation.ga: Taighde

translation.en: Technology
translation.ga: Teicneolaíocht

translation.en: Commerce
translation.ga: Tráchtáil

translation.en: Project governance and delivery
translation.ga: Rialachas agus seachadadh tionscadail

translation.en: Department of health
translation.ga: An roinn sláinte

translation.en: Fss
translation.ga: Fss

translation.en: Office of the chief government information officer, department of public expenditure and reform (opofr, dper)
translation.ga: Oifig phríomh-oifigeach faisnéise an rialtais, an roinn caiteachais phoiblí agus athchóirithe (opofr, rcpa)

translation.en: The police
translation.ga: An garda síochána

translation.en: Research
translation.ga: Taighde

translation.en: Science foundation ireland (sfi)
translation.ga: Fondúireacht eolaíochta éireann (feé)

translation.en: Behavioral research unit of the economic and social research institute t (ati ites)
translation.ga: Aonad taighde iompraíochta na hinstitiúide taighde eacnamaíochta agus sóisialta t (ati ites)

translation.en: Irish government economic and assessment services (semré)
translation.ga: Seirbhísí eacnamaíoch agus measúnachta rialtas na héireann (semré)

translation.en: Privacy-proximity decentralization tracking (dp3t, switzerland)
translation.ga: Rianú díláraithe príobháideachas-cóngaracht a chaomhnú (dp3t, an eilvéis)

translation.en: Massachusetts institute of technology - automated private contact tracking (mit-pact)
translation.ga: Institiúid teicneolaíochta massachusetts – lorgaireacht teagmhála uathoibrithe príobháideacha (mit-pact)

translation.en: Tracking your signals
translation.ga: Ag rianú do chomharthaí

translation.en: Why use the covid tracker app?
translation.ga: Cén fáth ar chóir an aip rianaire covid a úsáid?

translation.en: If you receive a call alert
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú foláireamh maidir le gartheagmháil

translation.en: Using the covid tracking app if you get a positive result on your test
translation.ga: Ag úsáid an aip rianaithe covid má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach ar do thástáil

translation.en: Tracking your signals
translation.ga: Ag rianú do chomharthaí

translation.en: The technology used by the covid tracker app
translation.ga: An teicneolaíocht a úsáideann aip an rianaire covid

translation.en: Privacy and how we use your data
translation.ga: Príobháideachas agus conas a bhainimid úsáid as do shonraí

translation.en: You can use the covid tracker app to find out:
translation.ga: Is féidir aip an rianaire covid a úsáid chun fáil amach:

translation.en: How you feel every day
translation.ga: Conas a mhothaíonn tú gach lá

translation.en: Are you showing signs of covid-19 (coronavirus)
translation.ga: An bhfuil comharthaí covid-19 (coróinvíreas) ort

translation.en: What you should do
translation.ga: Cad ba chóir duit a dhéanamh

translation.en: Why you should track your signs
translation.ga: Cén fáth ar chóir duit do chomharthaí a rianú

translation.en: When you keep a record of your symptoms every day:
translation.ga: Nuair a choinníonn tú taifead ar do chomharthaí gach lá:

translation.en: You will be able to remember when you became ill
translation.ga: Beidh tú in ann cuimhneamh cén uair a d ’ éirigh tú tinn

translation.en: It will be useful if you have to talk to your gp
translation.ga: Beidh sé úsáideach má bhíonn ort labhairt le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh

translation.en: It will help you get reliable advice quickly
translation.ga: Cabhróidh sé leat comhairle iontaofa a fháil go tapaidh

translation.en: It will help us map the virus and predict how it will spread.
translation.ga: Cabhróidh sé linn an víreas a mhapáil agus conas a scaipfidh sé a thuar.

translation.en: The app will keep a record of your daily check-in for 28 days so you can review them.
translation.ga: Coinneoidh an aip taifead ar do sheiceálacha-isteach laethúla ar feadh 28 lá ionas gur féidir leat athbhreithniú a dhéanamh orthu.

translation.en: Any health information you share will be anonymous.
translation.ga: Beidh aon eolas sláinte a roinneann tú anaithnid.

translation.en: You do not need to track your signals for other app functions to work.
translation.ga: Ní gá duit do chomharthaí a rianú chun go n-oibreodh feidhmeanna eile na haipe.

translation.en: How covid check-in works
translation.ga: Conas a oibríonn seiceáil-isteach covid

translation.en: Press the 'check-in covid' button at the bottom of the app.
translation.ga: Brúigh an cnaipe 'seiceáil-isteach covid' ag bun na haipe.

translation.en: You will be given 2 options:
translation.ga: Tabharfar 2 rogha duit:

translation.en: 'i'm fine, i have no sign '.
translation.ga: 'tá mé go maith, níl aon chomhartha orm '.

translation.en: 'i don't feel well today '.
translation.ga: 'ní airím go maith inniu '.

translation.en: If you have no symptoms
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil comharthaí ort

translation.en: When you select 'i'm fine, i have no sign', your check-in will end
translation.ga: Nuair a roghnaíonn tú 'tá mé go maith, níl aon chomhartha orm', tiocfaidh deireadh le do sheiceáil-isteach

translation.en: If you have symptoms
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí ort

translation.en: If you choose 'i don't feel well today', you will be asked 4 questions about normal covid-19 signals.
translation.ga: Má roghnaíonn tú 'ní airím go maith inniu', cuirfear 4 cheist ort faoi ghnáthchomharthaí covid-19.

translation.en: You will be given the latest advice based on your symptoms.
translation.ga: Tabharfar an chomhairle is déanaí duit bunaithe ar do chomharthaí.

translation.en: But if you have covid-19 symptoms, stay away from yourself and call your gp.
translation.ga: Ach má tá comharthaí covid-19 ort, fan asat féin agus glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: Optional sharing of information
translation.ga: Eolas a roinnt go roghnach

translation.en: When you first use the app, you will have the option to share information about:
translation.ga: Nuair a úsáideann tú an aip don chéad uair, beidh rogha agat eolas a roinnt faoi:

translation.en: The county and town in which you live
translation.ga: An contae agus baile ina bhfuil cónaí ort

translation.en: For age group
translation.ga: D ’ aoisghrúpa

translation.en: D'inscne
translation.ga: D ’ inscne

translation.en: Covid tracker app
translation.ga: Aip an rianaire covid

translation.en: Why use the covid tracker app?
translation.ga: Cén fáth ar chóir an aip rianaire covid a úsáid?

translation.en: If you receive a call alert
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú foláireamh maidir le gartheagmháil

translation.en: Using the covid tracking app if you get a positive result on your test
translation.ga: Ag úsáid an aip rianaithe covid má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach ar do thástáil

translation.en: Tracking your signals
translation.ga: Ag rianú do chomharthaí

translation.en: The technology used by the covid tracker app
translation.ga: An teicneolaíocht a úsáideann aip an rianaire covid

translation.en: Privacy and how we use your data
translation.ga: Príobháideachas agus conas a bhainimid úsáid as do shonraí

translation.en: If you have been in close contact with another app user who tested positive for covid-19 you will receive an alert on your mobile phone.
translation.ga: Má bhí tú i ngartheagmháil le húsáideoir eile aipe a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19 gheobhaidh tú foláireamh ar d ’ fhón póca.

translation.en: What is the meaning of an immediate contact alert?
translation.ga: Cén chiall atá le foláireamh gartheagmhála

translation.en: An immediate contact alert means that you have been within 2 meters of a person with the virus for a relatively long time (more than 15 minutes) and that you could get the virus.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn foláireamh gartheagmhála go raibh tú i bhfoisceacht 2 mhéadar do dhuine a bhfuil an víreas air ar feadh tréimhse sách fada (níos mó ná 15 nóiméad) agus go bhféadfá an víreas a fháil.

translation.en: You will never know who is infected or where the first contact occurred.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh a fhios agat cén duine atá ionfhabhtaithe nó cén áit ar tharla an ghartheagmháil.

translation.en: You will need to act as you could spread the virus to others.
translation.ga: Beidh ort gníomhú mar go bhféadfá an víreas a scaipeadh ar dhaoine eile.

translation.en: What you should do
translation.ga: Cad ba chóir duit a dhéanamh

translation.en: The alert will advise you to:
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh an foláireamh comhairle duit:

translation.en: Restrict your movements if you have no symptoms.
translation.ga: Srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí mura bhfuil comharthaí ort.

translation.en: Self-isolation if you have symptoms.
translation.ga: Féin-aonrú má tá comharthaí ort.

translation.en: Get a covid-19 test.
translation.ga: Tástáil covid-19 a fháil.

translation.en: It is important to follow this advice to protect yourself and others.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach an chomhairle seo a leanacht chun tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint.

translation.en: Arrange a test appointment
translation.ga: Coinne tástála a shocrú

translation.en: You will be asked if you want to share your phone number when you first launch the app on your mobile phone and when you receive an alert.
translation.ga: Iarrfar ort an mian leat d ’ uimhir fóin a roinnt nuair a chuireann tú an aip ar d ’ fhón póca i dtosach agus nuair a fhaigheann tú foláireamh.

translation.en: If you give us your phone number, the contact tracking team will be able to call you.
translation.ga: Má thugann tú d ’ uimhir fóin dúinn, beidh an fhoireann rianaithe teagmhála in ann glaoch a chur ort.

translation.en: They will be able to arrange a free covid-19 test for you.
translation.ga: Beidh siad in ann tástáil covid-19 saor in aisce a shocrú duit.

translation.en: If you decide not to give us your phone number on the app, call the covid helpline.
translation.ga: Má shocraíonn tú gan d ’ uimhir fóin a thabhairt dúinn ar an aip, glaoigh ar chabhairlíne covid.

translation.en: They will take your data so that someone can call you and arrange a test for you.
translation.ga: Tógfaidh siad do shonraí chun gur féidir le duine éigin glaoch a chur ort agus tástáil a shocrú duit.

translation.en: You may receive a call from the contact tracking team even if you do not provide your phone number.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfá glaoch a fháil ón bhfoireann rianaithe teagmhála fiú mura dtugann tú d ’ uimhir fóin.

translation.en: Sometimes this happens if someone else who tested positive for covid-19 gives your staff phone number because you are a close contact.
translation.ga: Uaireanta tarlaíonn sé seo má thugann duine eile a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19 d ’ uimhir fóin don fhoireann de bhrí gur gartheagmhálaí tú.

translation.en: How to view the immediate contact alert
translation.ga: Cén chaoi a bhfeicfidh tú an foláireamh gartheagmhála

translation.en: You will see an instant contact alert in 2 places on your mobile phone.
translation.ga: Feicfidh tú foláireamh gartheagmhála i 2 áit ar d ’ fhón póca.

translation.en: You will see it:
translation.ga: Feicfidh tú é:

translation.en: As a screen notification for a mobile phone
translation.ga: Mar fhógra ar scáileán d ’ fhón póca

translation.en: When you open the covid tracker app
translation.ga: Nuair a osclaíonn tú aip an rianaire covid

translation.en: Notice on the home screen
translation.ga: Fógra ar an scáileáin baile

translation.en: This is how you will see the alert notification on the home screen of your mobile phone.
translation.ga: Is mar seo a fheicfidh tú an fógra foláirimh ar scáileán baile d ’ fhón póca.

translation.en: The message in the notification will be: 'Close contact alert: Please see the covid tracker app now'.
translation.ga: Is í an teachtaireacht a bheidh sa bhfógra ná: ‘ foláireamh gartheagmhálaí: Féach ar aip an rianaire covid anois le do thoil ’.

translation.en: Maybe it will go away after a while.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go n-imeodh sé tar éis tamaill.

translation.en: Alert within the covid administrator app
translation.ga: Foláireamh laistigh d ’ aip an rianaire covid

translation.en: This is how you will see the alert notification when you open the covid tracker app.
translation.ga: Is mar seo a fheicfidh tú an fógra foláirimh nuair a osclaíonn tú aip an rianaire covid.

translation.en: This alert will be in a red box: 'Close contact alert: The app detects that you were in close contact with someone who tested positive for covid-19'.
translation.ga: Beidh an foláireamh seo i mbosca dearg: ‘ foláireamh gartheagmhálaí: Braitheann an aip go raibh tú i ngartheagmháil le duine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19 ’.

translation.en: This alert will remain on your phone for 14 days.
translation.ga: Fanfaidh an foláireamh seo ar d ’ fhón ar feadh 14 lá.

translation.en: It will be on the screen for this period whenever you open the app.
translation.ga: Beidh sé ar an scáileán ar feadh na tréimhse seo aon uair a osclaíonn tú an aip.

translation.en: The alert can be cleared in the app's contact tracking settings.
translation.ga: Is féidir an foláireamh a ghlanadh i socruithe rianaithe teagmhála na haipe.

translation.en: Potential disclosure alert
translation.ga: Foláireamh faoi nochtú féideartha

translation.en: You will only see this alert if you are using an older version of the mobile phone operating system.
translation.ga: Ní fheicfidh tú an foláireamh seo ach amháin má tá sean-leagan den chóras oibriúcháin fóin póca á úsáid agat.

translation.en: You should update your software and get the latest version of ios or android for free.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit uasdátú a dhéanamh ar do bhogearra agus an leagan is déanaí den ios nó android a fháil saor in aisce.

translation.en: A potential exposure alert is not the same as an immediate contact alert.
translation.ga: Ní hionann foláireamh faoi nochtú féideartha agus foláireamh gartheagmhála.

translation.en: You don ’ t have to do anything.
translation.ga: Ní gá duit aon rud a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Potential exposure means that you may have been close to someone who tested positive for covid-19 but were not close enough for a long time to be a close contact.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn nochtú féideartha go bhféadfadh sé go raibh tú gar do dhuine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19 ach nach raibh tú sách gar ar feadh tréimhse fada go leor le bheith i do ghartheagmhálaí.

translation.en: Therefore there is little risk of you getting the virus.
translation.ga: Dá bhrí sin níl mórán baol ann go bhfaighidh tú an víreas.

translation.en: For example, it could be someone who passed by on the street or queued them for less than 15 minutes.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, d ’ fhéadfaí gur duine a chuaigh tharat ar an tsráid a bhí ann nó go raibh tú i scuaine leo ar feadh tréimhse níos lú ná 15 nóiméad.

translation.en: If you work in a healthcare setting or school
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag obair i suíomh cúraim sláinte nó i scoil

translation.en: There is little risk of you getting the virus if the people around you are wearing personal protective equipment, such as in a hospital or school.
translation.ga: Níl mórán baol ann go bhfaighfidh tú an víreas má tá na daoine thart ort ag caitheamh trealamh cosanta pearsanta, mar shampla in ospidéal nó scoil.

translation.en: However, you may receive an immediate contact alert anyway.
translation.ga: Ach, d ’ fhéadfá foláireamh gartheagmhála a fháil ar aon nós.

translation.en: Healthcare workers
translation.ga: Oibrithe cúraim sláinte

translation.en: Read advice for healthcare workers who use the app and wear personal protective equipment.
translation.ga: Léigh comhairle d ’ oibrithe cúraim sláinte a úsáideann an aip agus a chaitheann trealamh cosanta pearsanta.

translation.en: Schools
translation.ga: Scoileanna

translation.en: If a covid-19 case has been confirmed in your school, you will be contacted by your local public health team.
translation.ga: Má dearbhaíodh cás covid-19 i do scoil, déanfaidh d ’ fhoireann sláinte poiblí áitiúil teagmháil leat.

translation.en: They will tell you if you need to do anything.
translation.ga: Inseoidh siad duit más gá duit aon rud a dhéanamh.

translation.en: If you receive an immediate contact alert and you receive a call from a contact tracker, tell them where you work.
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú foláireamh gartheagmhála agus má fhaigheann tú glaoch ó rianaire teagmhála, inis dóibh cá bhfuil tú ag obair.

translation.en: If there has been a case recently, tell them.
translation.ga: Má bhí cás ann le déanaí, inis dóibh é.

translation.en: They will be able to tell you what you should do.
translation.ga: Beidh siad in ann insint duit cad ba chóir duit a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Why use the covid tracker app?
translation.ga: Cén fáth ar chóir an aip rianaire covid a úsáid?

translation.en: If you receive a call alert
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú foláireamh maidir le gartheagmháil

translation.en: Using the covid tracking app if you get a positive result on your test
translation.ga: Ag úsáid an aip rianaithe covid má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach ar do thástáil

translation.en: Tracking your signals
translation.ga: Ag rianú do chomharthaí

translation.en: The technology used by the covid tracker app
translation.ga: An teicneolaíocht a úsáideann aip an rianaire covid

translation.en: Privacy and how we use your data
translation.ga: Príobháideachas agus conas a bhainimid úsáid as do shonraí

translation.en: The covid tracking app is a free and easy-to-use phone application that:
translation.ga: Is feidhmchlár fóín an aip rianaithe covid atá saor in aisce agus éasca a úsáid agus:

translation.en: It alerts you if you have been in close contact with someone who tested positive for covid-19 (coronavirus)
translation.ga: Tugann sé foláireamh duit má bhí tú i ngartheagmháil le duine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19 (coróinvíreas)

translation.en: It will keep other app users safe as it alerts them if you test positive for covid-19
translation.ga: Coinneoidh sé úsáideoirí na haipe eile sábháilte mar go dtugann sé foláireamh dóibh má fhaigheann tusa toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19

translation.en: He will advise you on what to do if you have symptoms
translation.ga: Cuirfidh sé comhairle ort faoi cad atá le déanamh má tá comharthaí ort

translation.en: Where the app is available
translation.ga: Cén áit a bhfuil an aip ar fáil

translation.en: Download the free app from apple's appstore or googleplay store.
translation.ga: Íoslódáil an aip saor in aisce ó stóras aipe apple (apple' s appstore) nó googleplay store.

translation.en: You should be able to use the app if your phone:
translation.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh tú in ann an aip a úsáid má tá do fón:

translation.en: Under 5 years old
translation.ga: Faoi bhun 5 bliana d ’ aois

translation.en: Using ios 13.5 or higher if it's apple or from android 6.0 upwards in the case of google
translation.ga: Ag baint úsáide as ios 13.5 nó níos airde más apple atá i gceist nó ón android 6.0 suas i gcás google

translation.en: You will need to declare that you are 16 years of age or older.
translation.ga: Beidh ort a dhearbhú go bhfuil tú 16 bliain d ’ aois nó níos sine.

translation.en: This is the age of digital consent.
translation.ga: Seo an aois thoilithe digiteach.

translation.en: Bluetooth must be turned on for the app to work.
translation.ga: Ní mór bluetooth a bheith ar siúl chun an aip a chur ag obair.

translation.en: Warning if you are a close contact
translation.ga: Ag tabhairt foláireamh más gartheagmhálaí tú

translation.en: Your phone will be alerted if you have been in close contact with another user of the app who tested positive for covid-19.
translation.ga: Tiocfaidh foláireamh ar do fón má bhí tú i ngartheagmháil le húsáideoir eile den aip a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19.

translation.en: You will be advised to:
translation.ga: Cuirfear comhairle ort:

translation.en: Restrict your movements if you have no symptoms.
translation.ga: Srian a chur ar do ghluaiseachtaí mura bhfuil comharthaí ort.

translation.en: Self-isolation if you have symptoms
translation.ga: Féin-aonrú má tá comharthaí ort

translation.en: Get a covid-19 test.
translation.ga: Tástáil covid-19 a fháil.

translation.en: Read about an immediate contact alert and what you should do if you get one.
translation.ga: Léigh faoi fholáireamh gartheagmhála agus cad ba chóir duit a dhéanamh má fhaigheann tú ceann.

translation.en: Protect others if you get a positive test result
translation.ga: Cosain daoine eile má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach ar thástáil

translation.en: If you test positive for covid-19, you can use the app to alert others you have been in close contact with.
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19, is féidir leat an aip a úsáid chun foláireamh a thabhairt do dhaoine eile a raibh tú i ngartheagmháil leo.

translation.en: This is done anonymously.
translation.ga: Déantar seo go hainaithnid.

translation.en: No one will know that you tested your test positively.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh a fhios ag aon duine go bhfuair tú toradh dearfach ar do thástáil.

translation.en: But your contacts will be able to take action to prevent the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Ach beidh do ghartheagmhálacha in ann gníomhú chun cosc a chur ar scaipeadh an víris.

translation.en: Track your signs
translation.ga: Rianaigh do chuid comharthaí

translation.en: You can check into the covid app to track your signals and get advice on them.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat seiceáil isteach ar an aip covid chun do chuid comharthaí a rianú agus chun comhairle a fháil futhu.

translation.en: It's up to you if you want to track your signals.
translation.ga: Fút féin atá sé más mian leat do chuid comharthaí a rianú.

translation.en: You do not need to track your signals for the other functions of the app to work.
translation.ga: Ní gá duit do chuid comharthaí a rianú chun go n-oibreodh na feidhmeanna eile ar an aip.

translation.en: Your privacy is protected
translation.ga: Cosnaítear do phríobháideachas

translation.en: The app is designed to protect your privacy at all times.
translation.ga: Tá an aip deartha chun do phríobháideachas a chosaint i gcónaí.

translation.en: It's up to you
translation.ga: Fút féin atá sé

translation.en: Using or not using the app
translation.ga: An aip a úsáid nó gan é a úsáid

translation.en: Decide whether or not you want to share the information you want to share
translation.ga: Cinneadh a dhéanamh faoin t-eolas atá tú ag iarraidh a roinnt nó gan a roinnt

translation.en: Your name and address are never asked.
translation.ga: Ní iarrtar d ’ ainm ná do sheoladh ariamh.

translation.en: The app does not track where you are.
translation.ga: Ní dhéanann an aip rianú ar an áit a bhfuil tú.

translation.en: You will remain anonymous - other users of the app will not know who you are.
translation.ga: Beidh tú gan ainm – ní bheidh a fhios ag úsáideoirí eile na haipe cé tú féin.

translation.en: The latest news and information
translation.ga: An nuacht agus an fhaisnéis is déanaí

translation.en: You can use the app to get the latest facts and figures about covid-19 in ireland.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an aip a úsáid chun na fíricí agus figiúirí is déanaí faoi covid-19 in éireann a fháil.

translation.en: You will be able to find information that will help you take care of yourself if you are ill.
translation.ga: Beidh tú in ann eolas a fháil a chabhróidh leat aire a thabhairt duit féin má tá tú tinn.

translation.en: Prioritize public health advice
translation.ga: Tabhair tús áite do chomhairle sláinte poiblí

translation.en: The covid tracking app is designed to make the best use of the best available health advice and technology.
translation.ga: Tá an aip rianaithe covid deartha chun an úsáid is fearr a bhaint as an chomhairle sláinte agus as an teicneolaíocht is fearr atá ar fáil.

translation.en: But it ’ s not perfect.
translation.ga: Ach níl sé foirfe.

translation.en: It is just one of our ways to delay the spread of covid-19, and current public health guidelines should not be ignored.
translation.ga: Níl ann ach ceann de na bealaí atá againn chun moill a chur ar scaipeadh covid-19 agus níor chóir neamhaird a dhéanamh ar na treoirlínte reatha sláinte poiblí.

translation.en: It is still important to:
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach fós:

translation.en: Follow social separation advice - keep 2 meters (6.5 feet) away from others
translation.ga: An chomhairle maidir le scaradh sóisialta a leanacht – coinnigh achar 2 mhéadar (6.5 feet) amach ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Wash your hands often and adequately
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha i gceart agus go minic

translation.en: Cover your mouth with a handkerchief or sleeve when you cough or sneeze
translation.ga: Clúdaigh do bhéal le ciarsúr nó le do mhuinchille nuair a dhéanann tú casacht nó sraothartach

translation.en: Wear a face cover
translation.ga: Caith clúdach aghaidhe

translation.en: Get tested if you have symptoms or have been in close contact with someone who has tested positive for covid-19
translation.ga: Faigh tástáil má bhíonn comharthaí ort nó má bhí tú i ngartheagmháil le duine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19

translation.en: If you are unable to use the app
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil tú in ann an aip a úsáid

translation.en: The app is just one aspect of our contact tracking operation.
translation.ga: Níl san aip ach gné amháin den oibriúchán rianaithe teagmhálacha atá againn.

translation.en: The contact tracking centre is always open.
translation.ga: Tá an ionad rianaithe teagmhálacha oscailte i gcónaí.

translation.en: Everyone is included in that process, whether you use the app or not.
translation.ga: Áirítear gach duine sa phróiseas sin, is cuma má úsáideann tú an aip nó nach ndéanann.

translation.en: We hope that more people will have access to the updated versions of the app in the future.
translation.ga: Tá súil againn go mbeidh rochtain ag níos mó daoine ar na leaganacha uasdátaithe den aip amach anseo.

translation.en: We continue to look at solutions to include everyone over the age of 16.
translation.ga: Táimid ag leanúint ar aghaidh ag féachaint ar réitigh chun gach duine os cionn 16 bliana d ’ aois a chur san áireamh.

translation.en: Keep your child at home
translation.ga: Coinnigh do pháiste sa bhaile

translation.en: If your child has had close contact with someone with covid-19, if your child lives with someone with covid-19 symptoms or has been abroad, do not allow them to go to school or attend childcare
translation.ga: Má bhí gartheagmháil ag do pháiste le duine a bhfuil covid-19 air / uirthi, má tá cónaí ar do pháiste le duine a bhfuil comharthaí covid-19 orthu nó a bhí thar lear, ná lig dóibh dul ar scoil ná freastal ar chúram leanaí

translation.en: They will have to restrict their movements for 14 days even if they have no signs of illness.
translation.ga: Beidh orthu srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí ar feadh 14 lá fiú mura bhfuil comharthaí tinnis orthu.

translation.en: They may stop restricting their movements when both of the following conditions apply:
translation.ga: Féadfaidh siad stop a chur lena gcuid gluaiseachtaí a shrianadh nuair a bhíonn feidhm ag an dá choinníol seo:

translation.en: When they tested negative (covid-19 was not detected) 10 days after contact with the person who tested positive.
translation.ga: Nuair atá toradh diúltach ar thástáil acu (níor aimsíodh covid-19) 10 lá tar éis dóibh a bheith i dteagmháil leis an duine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil.

translation.en: When they do not have covid-19 symptoms.
translation.ga: Nuair nach bhfuil comharthaí covid-19 orthu.

translation.en: If your child is in close contact with covid-19
translation.ga: Más gartheagmhálaí do pháiste le covid-19

translation.en: If your child has covid-19 symptoms and is in close contact with someone who has tested positive, he / she should:
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí covid-19 ar do pháiste agus gur gartheagmhálaí le é / í le duine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil, ba chóir dó / di:

translation.en: Stay away from others immediately
translation.ga: Fanacht amach ó dhaoine eile láithreach

translation.en: Call your gp
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh

translation.en: Follow the advice for children with covid-19 symptoms.
translation.ga: Lean an chomhairle do pháistí a bhfuil comharthaí covid-19 orthu.

translation.en: If your child is a close contact but does not have covid-19 symptoms:
translation.ga: Más gartheagmhálaí do pháiste ach nach bhfuil comharthaí covid-19 air / uirthi:

translation.en: Restrict your movements for 14 days - don't go to school either
translation.ga: Srian a chur lena ghluaiseachtaí ar feadh 14 lá – ná téigh ar scoil ach an oiread

translation.en: Get a covid-19 test - this will be arranged by a contact administrator when he / she calls you
translation.ga: Faigh tástáil covid-19 – socróidh rianaire teagmhála é seo nuair a ghlaonn sé / sí ort

translation.en: The child can stop restricting their movements if:
translation.ga: Is féidir leis an bpáiste stadadh den srian a chur ar a ghluaiseachtaí má:

translation.en: If they test negative (covid-19 was not detected) 10 days after contact with the person who tested positive
translation.ga: Má bhíonn toradh diúltach acu ar thástáil (níor aimsíodh covid-19) 10 lá tar éis teagmháil a bheith acu leis an duine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil

translation.en: If they do not have covid-19 symptoms
translation.ga: Mura mbíonn comharthaí covid-19 orthu

translation.en: People living with the child, including siblings, do not need to restrict their movements.
translation.ga: Ní gá do na daoine a chónaíonn leis an bpáiste, deartháireacha agus deirfiúracha san áireamh, srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí.

translation.en: If your child lives with someone suspected of having covid-19
translation.ga: Má tá cónaí ar do pháiste le duine a bhfuil amhras go bhfuil covid-19 air / uirthi

translation.en: Your child will need to restrict their movements.
translation.ga: Beidh ar do pháiste srian a chur lena ghluaiseachtaí.

translation.en: If your child has symptoms, keep them away from others and call your doctor.
translation.ga: Má thagann comharthaí ar do pháiste, coinnigh amach é ó dhaoine eile agus glaoigh ar do dhochtúir.

translation.en: If your child was abroad
translation.ga: Má bhí do pháiste thar lear

translation.en: Your child will have to restrict their movements for 14 days if they have returned from a foreign country.
translation.ga: Beidh ar do pháiste srian a chur lena ghluaiseachtaí ar feadh 14 lá má tá sé tar éis filleadh ó thír thar lear.

translation.en: He will have to stay home and not attend school, even if he does not feel ill.
translation.ga: Beidh air fanacht sa bhaile agus gan freastal ar an scoil, fiú mura n-airíonn sé tinn.

translation.en: They only need to go to the gp if they have symptoms of illness.
translation.ga: Ní gá dóibh dul ag an dochtúir teaghlaigh ach amháin má bhíonn comharthaí tinnis orthu.

translation.en: A swab is taken from your nose during the covid-19 antigen test. The sample does not need to be taken to the laboratory.
translation.ga: Tógtar sampla le maipín ó do shrón le linn na tástála antaiginí covid-19 ní gá an sampla a thabhairt chun na saotharlainne.

translation.en: The test results are faster than the covid-19 pcr test, but it is limited.
translation.ga: Tá torthaí na tástála níos tapúla ná an tástáil pcr covid-19, ach tá sé teoranta.

translation.en: Antigen testing is also known as rapid antigen diagnostic testing (radt).
translation.ga: Tugtar mearthástáil diagnóiseach antaigín (radt) ar thástáil antaiginí freisin.

translation.en: Where the covid-19 antigen tests are used
translation.ga: Cá mbaintear úsáid as na tastálacha antaigíní covid-19

translation.en: Antigen tests are provided for:
translation.ga: Cuirtear tástálacha antaiginí ar fáil do:

translation.en: Some hospital patients with covid-19 symptoms, including those attending the emergency department (ed)
translation.ga: Roinnt othar ospidéal a bhfuil comharthaí covid-19 orthu, ina measc daoine atá ag freastal ar an rannóg éigeandála (ed)

translation.en: People in locations where there is an outbreak of covid-19
translation.ga: Daoine i láithreacha ina bhfuil ráig de covid-19

translation.en: What happens during the test
translation.ga: Cad a tharlaíonn le linn na tástála

translation.en: The tester will give you a mask to explain what will happen and ask you some questions.
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh an tástálaí masc duit le cur ort, míneoidh sé cad a tharlóidh agus cuirfidh sé roinnt ceisteanna ort.

translation.en: You will be asked to clean your hands properly with a hand disinfectant.
translation.ga: Iarrfar ort do lámha a ghlanadh i gceart le díghalrán lámh.

translation.en: The tester will take some personal data from you, including your telephone number.
translation.ga: Tógfaidh an tástálaí roinnt sonraí pearsanta uait, d ’ uimhir theileafóin san áireamh.

translation.en: Make sure they have the correct number.
translation.ga: Déan cinnte go bhfuil an uimhir cheart acu.

translation.en: The tester will use a swab to take a sample from your nose.
translation.ga: Úsáidfidh an tástálaí maipín chun sampla a thógáil ó do shrón.

translation.en: This may be uncomfortable, but it will not be painful.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé seo a bheith míchompordach ach ní bheidh sé pianmhar.

translation.en: The tester will test the sample on-site.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh an tástálaí an sampla a thástáil ar an láthair.

translation.en: If you get a positive result on your antigen test
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach ar do thástáil antaiginí

translation.en: Within 1 hour of your trial, you will be notified if a positive impact (covid-19 is found) on your test.
translation.ga: Cuirfear in iúl duit laistigh de 1 uair an chloig tar éis do thástála, má bhíonn toradh dearfach (covid-19 aimsithe), ar do thástáil.

translation.en: This means that the virus was detected in your sample.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo gur aimsíodh an víreas i do shampla.

translation.en: You will have to stay on your own because there is a real risk that you will pass on the virus to others.
translation.ga: Beidh ort fanacht asat féin de bhrí go bhfuil baol mór ann go dtabharfá an vireas do dhaoine eile.

translation.en: What you need to do if you have a positive covid-19 test result
translation.ga: What you need to do if you have a positive covid-19 test result

translation.en: If you get a negative or invalid result on your antigen test
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú toradh diúltach nó neamhbhailí ar do thástáil antaiginí

translation.en: A negative result indicates that the virus was not detected in your sample.
translation.ga: Is ionann toradh diúltach agus nár aimsíodh an víreas i do shampla.

translation.en: Sometimes a positive or negative result is not detected on the antigen test.
translation.ga: Uaireanta ní aimsítear toradh dearfach nó diúltach ar an tástáil antaigíni.

translation.en: This is called an 'invalid result'.
translation.ga: Tugtar ‘ toradh neamhbhailí ’ air seo.

translation.en: If the first sample is negative or invalid, we will send the second sample to a laboratory for covid-19 pcr testing.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn toradh diúltach nó neamhbhailí ar an chéad shampla, seolfaimid an dara sampla chuig saotharlann le haghaidh tástála pcr covid-19.

translation.en: If the second test is positive
translation.ga: Má bhíonn toradh dearfach ar an dara tástáil

translation.en: You will receive a text message with the result of the covid-19 pcr test.
translation.ga: Gheobhaidh tú teachtaireacht téacs le toradh na tástála pcr covid-19.

translation.en: If the result is positive, you will receive a phone call from a contact tracker.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn an toradh dearfach, gheobhaidh tú glaoch fóin ó rianaitheoir teagmhála.

translation.en: Contact tracing
translation.ga: Contact tracing

translation.en: How to self-isolate (stay in your room)
translation.ga: How to self-isolate (stay in your room)

translation.en: There is a limit to what the antigen test for covid-19 can do
translation.ga: Tá teorainn leis an méid is féidir leis an tástáil antaigíní do covid-19 a dhéanamh

translation.en: No complete test is accurate.
translation.ga: Níl aon tástáil iomlán cruinn.

translation.en: There is a limit to what any test can do,
translation.ga: Tá teorainn leis an méid is féidir le haon tástáil a dhéanamh,

translation.en: Antigen testing is less accurate than pcr testing for covid-19.
translation.ga: Níl an tástáil antaigíní chomh cruinn le tástáil pcr do covid-19.

translation.en: The test will detect the virus in most people with symptoms of illness
translation.ga: Aimseoidh an tástáil an víreas i bhformhór na ndaoine a bhfuil comharthaí tinnis orthu

translation.en: But in some cases, the test will not detect the virus.
translation.ga: Ach i gcásanna áirithe ní aimseoidh an tástáil an víreas.

translation.en: Tell the healthcare worker immediately if you have covid-19 symptoms.
translation.ga: Inis don oibrí cúram sláinte láithreach má tá comharthaí covid-19 ort.

translation.en: The hse only accepts polymerase chain reaction (pcr) tests to diagnose covid-19.
translation.ga: Ní ghlacann fss ach le tástálacha um imoibriú slabhrúil polaiméaráise (pcr) chun covid-19 a dhiagnóisiú.

translation.en: This is the most reliable way to test.
translation.ga: Is é seo an bealach is iontaofa chun tástáil a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Private companies can offer other types of tests.
translation.ga: Is féidir le comhlachtaíí príobháideacha cineálacha eile tástálacha a thairiscint.

translation.en: We do not recommend any particular test provider.
translation.ga: Níl aon soláthraí tástála ar leith á mholadh againn.

translation.en: If you have covid-19 symptoms, you should isolate yourself immediately.
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí covid-19 ort, ba cheart duit féin aonrú láithreach.

translation.en: Call your doctor, and they will arrange a free hse test for you.
translation.ga: Cuir glaoch ar do dhochtúir agus eagróidh sé tástáil fss duit atá saor in aisce.

translation.en: Read about how to test for covid-19.
translation.ga: Léigh faoi conas tástáil le haghaidh covid-19.

translation.en: Read about what to do if you are a close contact
translation.ga: Léigh faoi cad atá le déanamh má tá tú i do ghartheagmhálaí

translation.en: Polymerase chain reaction test
translation.ga: Tástáil um imoibriú slabhrúil polaiméaráise

translation.en: This is the most reliable covid-19 test available because it looks at the genetic material of the virus.
translation.ga: Is é seo an tástáil covid-19 is iontaofa atá ar fáil mar go mbreathnaíonn sé ar ábhar géiniteach an víris.

translation.en: The test is done in a laboratory and can be relied upon if you need to know if you have covid-19.
translation.ga: Déantar an tástáil i saotharlann agus is féidir brath air má theastaíonn uait a fháil amach an bhfuil covid-19 ort.

translation.en: If you receive an isp test from a private company and test positive for covid-19, the laboratory must report this to the health service executive.
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú tástáil isp ó chomhlacht phríobháideach agus má fhaigheann tú toradh dhearfach covid-19, ní mór don tsaotharlann é sin a thuairisciú d' fheidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte.

translation.en: This information is required so that the contact tracking team can access your immediate contacts.
translation.ga: Teastaíonn an t-eolas sin sa gcaoi go mbeidh an fhoireann rianú teagmhála ábalta a theacht ar do ghartheagmhálaithe.

translation.en: Read more about contact tracking.
translation.ga: Léigh tuilleadh faoi rianú teagmhála.

translation.en: Antigen testing
translation.ga: Tástáil antaiginí

translation.en: Antigen testing is faster than isp testing but not as reliable.
translation.ga: Tá tástáil antaiginí níos tapúla ná tástáil isp ach níl sé chomh hiontaofa céanna.

translation.en: This type of test does not require a laboratory.
translation.ga: Ní theastaíonn saotharlann don chineál tástáil seo.

translation.en: The hse does not currently accept antigen testing.
translation.ga: Ní ghlacann fss le tástáil antaiginí i láthair na huaire.

translation.en: If your antigen test is positive
translation.ga: Má tá do thástáil antaigine dearfach

translation.en: If you receive an antigen test from a private company and test positive for covid-19, the laboratory will not report this to the hse.
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú tástáil antaiginí ó chomhlacht phríobháideach agus má fhaigheann tú toradh dhearfach covid-19, ní thuairisceoidh an tsaotharlann é sin do fss.

translation.en: This means that your immediate contacts will not be notified and may spread covid-19 to others.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo nach gcuirfear do ghartheagmhálaithe ar an eolas agus go bhféadfadh siad covid-19 a scaipeadh ar dhaoine eile.

translation.en: If you have tested positive, you should self-isolate and call your gp.
translation.ga: Má fuair tú toradh dearfach ar thástáil, ba chóir duit féin-aonrú agus glaoch ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: He / she will arrange for you a free isp test.
translation.ga: Socróidh sé / sí tástáil isp duit atá saor in aisce.

translation.en: Find a doctor in your area.
translation.ga: Aimsigh dochtúir i do cheantar.

translation.en: You will need to show proof of the covid-19 test result to the doctor.
translation.ga: Beidh ort cruthúnas an toradh tástála covid-19 a thaispeáint don dochtúir.

translation.en: You will need one of the following:
translation.ga: Beidh ceann acu seo uait:

translation.en: Text message
translation.ga: Teachtaireacht téacs

translation.en: Email
translation.ga: Ríomhphost

translation.en: Printed report
translation.ga: Tuarascáil chlóite

translation.en: If you have symptoms of illness but your test for covid-19 was negative
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí tinnis ort ach go raibh do thástáil do covid- 19 diúltach

translation.en: If you have covid-19 symptoms, you should self-isolate even if your antigen test result is negative.
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí covid-19 ort ba chóir duit féin-aonrú fiú amháin má tá do thoradh tástála antaigine diúltach.

translation.en: Call your doctor, and they will arrange a free isp test for you.
translation.ga: Cuir glaoch ar do dhochtúir agus socróidh sé / sí tástáil isp saor in aisce duit.

translation.en: Mas gartheagmhálaí animal
translation.ga: Más gartheagmhálaí thú

translation.en: If you are a close contact, you should continue to restrict your movements even if your test was negative.
translation.ga: Más gartheagmhálaí tú, ba chóir duit leanúint ar aghaidh ag cur srian ar do ghluaiseachtaí fiú amháin má bhí toradh diúltach ar do thástáil.

translation.en: Continue to restrict your movements for 14 days from the last time you were in contact with the person who tested positive for the covid-19 test.
translation.ga: Lean ort ag cur srian ar do ghluaiseachtaí ar feadh 14 lá ón uair dheireanach a bhí tú i dteagmháil leis an duine a fuair toradh dhearfach ar thástáil covid-19.

translation.en: Antibody tests
translation.ga: Tástálacha antasubstainte

translation.en: Antibody tests check for antibodies if a person has had the virus in the past.
translation.ga: Déanann tástálacha antasubstaintí seiceáil i dtaobh antasubstaintí sa gcás is go raibh an víreas ar dhuine san am atá caite.

translation.en: A blood sample is required to perform this test.
translation.ga: Tá sampla fola ag teastáil chun an tástáil seo a dhéanamh.

translation.en: The hse does not currently offer these tests.
translation.ga: Ní thairgeann fss na tástálacha seo i láthair na huaire.

translation.en: If you came to ireland from brazil or south africa:
translation.ga: Má tháinig tú go héirinn ó bhrasáil nó ón afraic theas:

translation.en: You should isolate yourself (stay in your room) for 14 days from the date you arrived in ireland
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit féin aonrú (fanacht i do sheomra) ar feadh 14 lá ón dáta a dtáinig tú go héirinn

translation.en: Call your gp to arrange a covid-19 test - the test should be done five days after you arrive in ireland or as soon as you can after that five days.
translation.ga: Glaoch a chur ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh chun tástáil covid-19 a shocrú – ba chóir an tástáil a dhéanamh 5 lá tar éis duit a theacht go héirinn nó chomh luath agus is féidir leat tar éis an 5 lá sin.

translation.en: If you do not have a gp, any doctor, or an out-of-hours doctor service, we can arrange a free covid-19 test for you.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil dochtúir teaghlaigh agat, is féidir le dochtúir ar bith, nó an tseirbhís dochtúra lasmuigh de ghnáthuaireanta, tástáil covid-19 saor in aisce a shocrú duit.

translation.en: This advice is being given because there are new strains of covid-19 in these countries.
translation.ga: Tá an chomhairle seo á tabhairt de bhrí go bhfuil cineálacha nua covid-19 sna tíortha seo.

translation.en: These new strains of covid-19 are spreading faster than the other strains and are therefore more dangerous.
translation.ga: Tá na cineálacha nua seo de covid-19 ag scaipeadh níos tapúla ná na cineálacha eile, agus dá bhrí sin tá níos mó contúirt ag baint leo.

translation.en: Positive test result
translation.ga: Toradh dearfach tástála

translation.en: The following information is for people who have tested positive for covid-19:
translation.ga: Is do dhaoine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil do covid-19 an t-eolas seo:

translation.en: People who recently arrived from south africa and brazil or
translation.ga: Daoine a tháinig ón afraic theas agus ón bhrasaíl le déanaí nó

translation.en: People living or working with a person who has come from south africa or brazil in the last 14 days
translation.ga: Daoine a chónaíonn nó a oibríonn le duine a tháinig ón afraic theas nó ón bhrasaíl le 14 lá anuas

translation.en: What you should do
translation.ga: Cad ba chóir duit a dhéanamh

translation.en: Stay alone (stay in your room) for 14 days.
translation.ga: Fan asat féin (fan i do sheomra) ar feadh 14 lá.

translation.en: What your close contacts should do
translation.ga: Cad ba chóir do do gartheagmhálaithe a dhéanamh

translation.en: All your contacts will need to be tested for covid-19.
translation.ga: Beidh ar do chuid ghartheagmhálaithe uile tástáil an covid-19 a fháil.

translation.en: They will have to wait on their own for 14 days.
translation.ga: Beidh orthu fanacht astu féin a feadh 14 lá.

translation.en: Tell your close contacts to call their doctor and explain that they are in close contact with someone who has travelled from brazil or south africa.
translation.ga: Abair le do dhlúththeagmhálaithe glaoch a chur ar a ndochtúir agus mínigh gur gartheagmháil iad le duine a thaistil ó bhrasaíl nó ón afraic theas.

translation.en: The doctor will prioritize them for a covid-19 test.
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh an dochtúir tús áite dóibh le tástáil covid-19 a fháil.

translation.en: When a face cover should be worn
translation.ga: Cén uair ar chóir clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh

translation.en: If they develop symptoms, they will have to stay alone (stay in their rooms) and call their gps immediately.
translation.ga: Má thagann comharthaí orthu beidh orthu fanacht astu féin (fanacht ina seomraí) agus glaoch a chur ar a ndochtúirí teaghlaigh láithreach.

translation.en: Close contacts of close contacts
translation.ga: Gartheagmhálaithe na ngartheagmhálaithe

translation.en: If you live with someone who has had close contact with someone who has tested positive for covid-19 and recently came from south africa or brazil:
translation.ga: Má tá tú i do chónaí le duine a raibh gartheagmháil aige le duine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19 agus a tháinig ón afraic theas nó ón bhrasaíl le déanaí:

translation.en: Please restrict your ghlauiseachtaí (stay at home) for 14 days
translation.ga: Cuir srian le do ghlauiseachtaí (fan sa bhaile) ar feadh 14 lá

translation.en: You do not need to take the covid-19 test
translation.ga: Ní gá duit an tástáil covid-19 a fháil

translation.en: If they develop symptoms, they will have to stay alone (stay in their rooms) and call their gps immediately
translation.ga: Má thagann comharthaí orthu beidh orthu fanacht astu féin (fanacht ina seomraí) agus glaoch a chur ar a ndochtúirí teaghlaigh láithreach

translation.en: Negative test result
translation.ga: Toradh tástála diúltach

translation.en: If your test is negative (covid-19 not detected), there will be no need to test your immediate contacts.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn toradh diúltach ar do thástáil (nár aimsíodh covid-19), ní bheidh aon ghá tástáil a chur ar do ghartheagmhálaithe.

translation.en: You need to do a full 14 days of self-isolation, even if your test result is negative.
translation.ga: Ní mór duit 14 lá iomlán de fhéin-aonrú a dhéanamh, fiú amháin má tá do thoradh tástála diúltach.

translation.en: People living with you will have to restrict their movements (stay at home) for four days.
translation.ga: Beidh ar na daoine a chónaíonn leat srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí (fanacht sa bhaile) ar feadh 4 lá.

translation.en: They should do this from the date they last contacted you.
translation.ga: Ba chóir dóibh é seo a dhéanamh ón data is déanaí a raibh teagmháil acu leat.

translation.en: If you have received a private test for covid-19
translation.ga: Má fuair tú tástáil phríobháideach do covid-19

translation.en: If you have already had a private test for covid-19, you will have to wait on your own for 14 days regardless of the result.
translation.ga: Má fuair tú tástáil phríobháideach do covid-19 cheana, beidh ort fanacht asat féin ar feadh 14 lá is cuma cén toradh a bhí air.

translation.en: You should arrange another test for covid-19 through the out-of-hours doctor service or your gp.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit tástáil eile do covid-19 a shocrú tríd an tseirbhís dochtúra lasmuigh de ghnáthuaireanta nó trí do dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: If you develop symptoms of covid-19
translation.ga: Má thagann comharthaí de covid-19 ort

translation.en: Call your doctor to book a test for covid-19 and tell them that you have recently been to brazil or south africa and are showing signs of covid-19.
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do dhochtúir chun tástáil a chur in áirithe do covid-19 agus inis dóibh go raibh tú i bhrasaíl nó san afraic theas le déanaí agus go bhfuil comharthaí de covid-19 ort.

translation.en: Do this even if your test was negative (covid-19 not detected).
translation.ga: Déan é seo fiú amháin más toradh diúltach a bhí ar do thástáil (nár aimsíodh covid-19).

translation.en: If you do not have a doctor, you can call any doctor or the out-of-hours doctor service.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil dochtúr agat, is féidir leat glaoch ar dochtúir ar bith nó ar an tseirbhís dochtúra taobh amuigh de ghnáthuaireanta.

translation.en: You can also seek advice through the ffs helpline.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat comhairle a lorg freisin tríd líne chúnaimh ffs.

translation.en: If you do not have a pps number
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil uimhir psp agat

translation.en: When you call a gp to arrange a test, the doctor will ask you for your pps number.
translation.ga: Nuair a ghlaonn tú ar dhochtúir teaghlaigh chun tástáil a shocrú iarrfaidh an docthúir d ’ uimhir psp ort.

translation.en: If you do not have a pps number, you can give the number from any of the following:
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil uimhir psp agat, is féidir leat an uimhir ó aon cheann díobh seo a thabhairt:

translation.en: European health insurance card (ehic)
translation.ga: An cárta eorpach um árachas sláinte (ehic)

translation.en: Driving license
translation.ga: Ceadúnas tiomána

translation.en: Not
translation.ga: Pas

translation.en: National insurance
translation.ga: Árachas náisiúnta

translation.en: National health service
translation.ga: Seirbhís sláinte náisiúnta

translation.en: Medical card
translation.ga: Cárta leighis

translation.en: Gp visit card
translation.ga: Cárta cuairte dochtúra teaghlaigh

translation.en: Vaccines undergo safety and efficacy tests before use.
translation.ga: Déantar tástálacha sábháilteachta agus éifeachtúlachta ar vacsaíní sular n-úsáidtear iad.

translation.en: The hse only uses a vaccine if it meets the appropriate safety and efficacy standards.
translation.ga: Ní bhaineann fnass úsáid as vacsaín ach amháin má shásaíonn siad na caighdeáin sábháilteachta agus éifeachtúlachta cuí.

translation.en: Development of the covid-19 vaccines
translation.ga: Forbairt na vacsaíní covid-19

translation.en: This vaccine was developed in a shorter time frame than usual.
translation.ga: Forbraíodh an vacsaín seo i réimse ama ní ba ghiorra ná mar a dhéantaí de ghnáth.

translation.en: They went through all stages of development at the same time and not in succession in order to be available as soon as possible.
translation.ga: Chuaigh siad tríd gach céim forbartha ag an am céanna, agus ní i ndiaidh a chéile, chun go mbeadh siad ar fáil chomh luath agus is féidir.

translation.en: How the vaccines were made so fast.
translation.ga: Conas a rinneadh na vacsaíní chomh tapa.

translation.en: Work on the covid-19 vaccines was carried out more quickly than usual to make them available as soon as possible.
translation.ga: Rinneadh an obair ar na vacsaíní covid-19 níos tapúla ná mar a dhéantaí de ghnáth le go mbeidís ar fáil chomh luath agus ab fhéidir.

translation.en: The usual steps required to provide a safe and effective vaccine were followed.
translation.ga: Leanadh na gnáthchéimeanna is gá chun vacsaín sábháilte éifeachtach a chur ar fáil.

translation.en: No shortcut was taken.
translation.ga: Níor glacadh aon aicearra.

translation.en: The covid-19 vaccines are approved
translation.ga: Na vacsaíní covid-19 atá ceadaithe

translation.en: There are two covid-19 vaccines approved in the state:
translation.ga: Tá dhá vacsaín covid-19 ceadaithe sa stát:

translation.en: Astrazeneca vaccine
translation.ga: Vacsaín astrazeneca

translation.en: Pfizer / biontech vaccine
translation.ga: Vacsaín pfizer / biontech

translation.en: Moderna vaccine
translation.ga: Vacsaín moderna

translation.en: All clinical trials and safety checks have been carried out in accordance with international safety standards.
translation.ga: Rinneadh gach triail chliniciúil agus seiceáil sábháilteachta de réir na gcaighdeán sábháilteachta idirnáisiúnta orthu.

translation.en: The following was done:
translation.ga: Rinneadh mar a leanas:

translation.en: They have been tested on thousands of people during clinical trials
translation.ga: Tástáladh iad ar na mílte duine le linn trialacha cliniciúla

translation.en: They met strict standards of safety, quality and efficiency
translation.ga: Shásaigh siad dianchaighdeáin sábháilteacha, cáilíochta agus éifeachtúlachta

translation.en: They have been approved and licensed by the european medicines agency (ema)
translation.ga: Cheadaigh agus cheadúnaigh an ghníomhaireacht leigheasra eorpach (ema) iad

translation.en: Covid-19 astrazeneca vaccine
translation.ga: Vacsaín covid-19 astrazeneca

translation.en: Astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine is the third vaccine approved by the ema in this state.
translation.ga: Is vacsaín covid-19 astrazeneca an tríú vacsaín a cheadaigh an ema sa stát seo.

translation.en: It is a viral vector vaccine.
translation.ga: Is vacsaín veicteorach víreasach í.

translation.en: The viral vector vaccine contains an impaired version of a different virus (the vector).
translation.ga: Tá leagan lagaithe de víreas difriúil (an veicteoir) sa vacsaín veicteorach víreasach.

translation.en: This mrna vaccine enables your body to make protein that stimulates an immune response.
translation.ga: Cuireann an vacsaín mrna seo ar chumas do chorp próitéin a dhéanamh a spreagann freagra imdhíonachta.

translation.en: Your body will then make antibodies to help you fight an infection if the virus enters your body in the future.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh do chorp antasubstaintí ansin chun cabhrú leat ionfhabhtú a throid dá rachadh an víreas isteach i do chorp sa todhchaí.

translation.en: 60% of those who received the astrazeneca vaccine during trials were protected against covid-19.
translation.ga: Bhí cosaint ag 60% de na daoine a fuair vacsaín astrazeneca le linn trialacha, i gcoinne covid-19.

translation.en: The vaccine has been tested in people 18 years of age and older.
translation.ga: Tástáladh an vacsaín ar dhaoine, 18 bliain d ’ aois agus níos sine.

translation.en: Ingredient of the vaccine astrazeneca covid-19
translation.ga: Comhábhar na vacsaíne astrazeneca covid-19

translation.en: The covid-19 vaccine from astrazeneca covid-19 contains no eggs, nutrients or latex.
translation.ga: Níl uibheacha, cothaithigh ná laitéis sa vacsaín covid-19 ó astrazeneca covid-19.

translation.en: The complete list of ingredients is available in the astrazeneca covid-19 vaccine factsheet.
translation.ga: Tá liosta iomlán na gcomhábhar ar fáil i mbileog eolais na vacsaíne covid-19 astrazeneca.

translation.en: Covid-19 moderna vaccine
translation.ga: Vacsaín covid-19 moderna

translation.en: The covid-19 moderna vaccine is the second vaccine approved by the ema in this state.
translation.ga: Is vacsaín covid-19 moderna an dara vacsaín a cheadaigh an ema sa stát seo.

translation.en: It is an mrna vaccine.
translation.ga: Is vacsaín mrna í.

translation.en: This mrna vaccine enables your body to make a protein that stimulates an immune response but does not use the live virus that causes covid-19.
translation.ga: Cuireann an vacsaín mrna seo ar chumas do chorp próitéin a dhéanamh a spreagann freagra imdhíonachta ach ní úsáideann sé an víreas beo is cúis le covid-19.

translation.en: Your body will then make antibodies to help you fight an infection if the virus enters your body in the future.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh do chorp antasubstaintí ansin chun cabhrú leat ionfhabhtú a throid dá rachadh an víreas isteach i do chorp sa todhchaí.

translation.en: 94.5% of those who received the moderna vaccine during trials were protected against covid-19.
translation.ga: Bhí cosaint ag 94.5% de na daoine a fuair vacsaín moderna le linn trialacha, i gcoinne covid-19.

translation.en: 94.5% efficacy rate
translation.ga: Ráta éifeachtúlachta 94.5%

translation.en: The vaccine has been tested in people 18 years of age and older.
translation.ga: Tástáladh an vacsaín ar dhaoine, 18 bliain d ’ aois agus níos sine.

translation.en: Ingredient of the moderna vaccine
translation.ga: Comhábhar na vacsaíne moderna

translation.en: The covid-19 vaccine from moderna contains no eggs, nutrients or latex.
translation.ga: Níl uibheacha, cothaithigh ná laitéis sa vacsaín covid-19 ó moderna.

translation.en: The full list of ingredients is available in the covid-19 moderna vaccine information leaflet.
translation.ga: Tá liosta iomlán na gcomhábhar ar fáil i mbileog eolais na vacsaíne covid-19 moderna.

translation.en: Covid-19 pfizer / biontech vaccine
translation.ga: Vacsaín covid-19 pfizer / biontech

translation.en: The covid-19 pfizer / biontech vaccine was the first vaccine approved by the ema for use in the state.
translation.ga: Ba í an vacsaín covid-19 pfizer / biontech an chéad vacsaín a cheadaigh an ema le húsaid sa stát.

translation.en: It is "comirnaty".
translation.ga: Is "comirnaty".

translation.en: Its official name.
translation.ga: An t-ainm ofigiúil atá uirthi.

translation.en: It is an mrna vaccine.
translation.ga: Is vacsaín mrna atá inti.

translation.en: This mrna vaccine enables your body to make a protein that stimulates an immune response but does not use the live virus that causes covid-19.
translation.ga: Cuireann an vacsaín mrna seo ar chumas do chorp próitéin a dhéanamh a spreagann freagra imdhíonachta ach ní úsáideann sé an víreas beo is cúis le covid-19.

translation.en: Your body will then make antibodies to help you fight an infection if the virus enters your body in the future.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh do chorp antasubstaintí ansin chun cabhrú leat ionfhabhtú a throid dá rachadh an víreas isteach i do chorp sa todhchaí.

translation.en: Millions of people have received the cofid-19 pfizer / biontech vaccine in britain and the us.
translation.ga: Tá na milliúin duine tar éis an vacsaín covid-19 pfizer / biontech a fháil sa bhreatain agus sam.

translation.en: 95% of those who received the pfizer / biontech vaccine during trials were protected against covid-19.
translation.ga: Bhí cosaint ag 95% de na daoine a fuair vacsaín pfizer / biontech le linn trialacha, i gcoinne covid-19.

translation.en: 95% efficacy rate
translation.ga: Ráta éifeachtúlachta 95%

translation.en: The vaccine has been tested in people aged 16 and over.
translation.ga: Tástáladh an vacsaín ar dhaoine, 16 bliain d ’ aois agus níos sine.

translation.en: Ingredient of the covid-19 pfizer / biontech vaccine
translation.ga: Comhábhar na vacsaíne covid-19 pfizer / biontech

translation.en: The covid-19 vaccine from pfizer / biontech contains no eggs, nutrients or latex
translation.ga: Níl uibheacha, cothaithigh ná laitéis sa vacsaín covid-19 ó pfizer / biontech

translation.en: The complete list of ingredients is available in the vaccine information leaflet for the pfizer / biontech covid-19 vaccine (comirnaty).
translation.ga: Tá liosta iomlán na gcomhábhar ar fáil i mbileog eolais na vacsaíne patient information leaflet for the pfizer / biontech covid-19 vaccine (comirnaty).

translation.en: Other vaccines
translation.ga: Vacsaíní eile

translation.en: The final stages of licensing and approving other covid-19 vaccines are currently underway.
translation.ga: Tá na céimeanna deiridh maidir le ceadúnú agus faomhadh vacsaíní covid-19 eile á ndéanamh faoi láthair.

translation.en: We will publish more information about the moderna covid-19 vaccine when it becomes available.
translation.ga: Foilseoidh muid níos mó eolais faoi vacsaín covid-19 moderna nuair a bheidh sé ar fáil.

translation.en: This topic has been examined by vaccine experts working in ireland.
translation.ga: Scrúdaigh saineolaithe vaicsaíne atá ag obair in éirinn an t-ábhar seo.

translation.en: By law, you must wear a face mask:
translation.ga: De réir an dlí, caithfidh tú clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh:

translation.en: On public transport
translation.ga: Ar iompar poiblí

translation.en: In shops, shopping malls and a number of other indoor locations
translation.ga: I siopaí, ionaid siopadóireachta agus roinnt suíomhanna eile lastigh

translation.en: In banks, post offices and credit unions
translation.ga: I mbainc, oifigí poist agus comhair chreidmheasa

translation.en: Face cover should also be worn:
translation.ga: Ba chóir clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh freisin:

translation.en: When it is not possible to stay away 2 meters from others
translation.ga: Nuair nach féidir fanacht amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: In hospitals, doctor's dispensary, nursing homes and at the dentist and other health centres
translation.ga: In ospidéil, íoclann dochtúra, tithe altranais agus ag an bhfiaclóir agus ionaid sláinte eile

translation.en: When people are visiting people who are at greater risk from covid-19 - e.g. people over the age of 70 or people who are vulnerable to health
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn daoine ar cuairt ag daoine atá i mbaol níos mó ón covid-19 – m.sh daoine atá os cionn 70 bliain nó daoine atá leochaileach ó thaobh na sláinte de

translation.en: In crowded workplaces, places of worship and busy outdoor places where many people gather
translation.ga: In áiteanna oibre plódaithe, in áiteanna adhartha agus in áiteanna gnóthacha lasmuigh ina mbailíonn go leor daoine

translation.en: There are people who should not / cannot wear face cover.
translation.ga: Tá daoine ann nár chóir dóibh / nach féidir leo clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: Read about those who should not wear one.
translation.ga: Léigh fúthu siúd nár chóir dóibh ceann a chaitheamh.

translation.en: When a disposable mask should be worn
translation.ga: Cathain ar chóir masc aonúsáide a chaitheamh

translation.en: A single-use mask is also called a surgical mask.
translation.ga: Tugtar masc máinliachta freisin ar masc aonúsáide.

translation.en: This is the usual type of face mask that is typically sold in pharmacies and other stores.
translation.ga: Seo é an gnáth chineál masc aghaidhe a dhíoltar go hiondúil i gcógaslanna agus i siopaí eile.

translation.en: Wear a single-use mask instead of a face mask if you are at increased risk of contracting a serious illness caused by covid-19.
translation.ga: Caith masc aon úsáide in áit clúdach aghaidhe má tá tú i mbaol níos mó tinnis tromchúiseach a tholg de bharr covid-19.

translation.en: It is not the same as a face cover and gives you better protection.
translation.ga: Níl sé mar a chéile le clúdach aghaidhe agus tugann sé cosaint níos fearr duit.

translation.en: You should wear a disposable mask at home
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit masc aonúsáide a chaitheamh sa mbaile

translation.en: If you are self-isolated
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag féin-aonrú

translation.en: If you tested positive for covid-19 - you must stay in your room
translation.ga: Má fuair tú toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19 - ní mór duit fanacht i do sheomra

translation.en: If you live with someone with covid-19
translation.ga: Má tá tú i do chónaí le duine a bhfuil covid-19 air / uirthi

translation.en: Read about face masks, masks and cellulite here
translation.ga: Léigh faoi chlúdaigh aghaidhe, mascanna agus cealtair anseo

translation.en: Why a face cover should be worn
translation.ga: Cén fáth gur chóir clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh

translation.en: Covid-19 is mainly spread by direct contact and droplets coming from your nose and mouth.
translation.ga: Scaiptear covid-19 go príomha trí ghartheagmháil agus braoiníní a thagann ó do shrón agus ó do bhéal.

translation.en: For example, when you are coughing, sneezing or talking loudly.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, nuair a bhíonn tú ag casacht, ag sraothartach nó ag caint os ard.

translation.en: Wearing a facial cover reduces the spread of these droplets.
translation.ga: Laghdaíonn caitheamh clúdach aghaidhe scaipeadh na braoiníní seo.

translation.en: It also helps prevent people who do not know they have the virus from spreading it.
translation.ga: Cuidíonn sé freisin le cosc a chur ar dhaoine nach bhfuil a fhios acu go bhfuil an víreas orthu é a scaipeadh.

translation.en: If you wear a face mask, you should do the other important things to prevent the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Má chaitheann tú clúdach aghaidhe, ba chóir duit na rudaí tábhachtacha eile a dhéanamh chun cosc a chur ar scaipeadh an víreas.

translation.en: These include:
translation.ga: Ina measc seo:

translation.en: Social separation
translation.ga: Scaradh sóisialta

translation.en: Covering your mouth and nose with a handkerchief or sleeve while coughing and sneezing
translation.ga: Ag clúdach do bhéal agus do shrón le ciarsúr nó le do mhuinchille agus tú ag casacht agus ag sraothartach

translation.en: Wash your hands properly, and often
translation.ga: Do lámha a ní i gceart agus go minic

translation.en: Not to touch your eyes, nose or mouth unless your hands are clean
translation.ga: Gan teagmháil a dhéanamh le do shúile, do shrón ná do bhéal mura bhfuil do lámha glan

translation.en: Read the advice on how to protect yourself and others.
