translation.ga: Léigh an chomhairle maidir le conas tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint.

translation.en: When a face cover should be worn.
translation.ga: Cén uair ar chóir clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: By law, you must wear face cover on public transport, and:
translation.ga: De réir an dlí, caithfidh tú clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh ar iompar poiblí, agus:

translation.en: Shops and pharmacies and i
translation.ga: Siopaí agus cógaslanna agus i

translation.en: Shopping centres
translation.ga: Ionaid siopadóireachta

translation.en: Libraries
translation.ga: Leabharlanna

translation.en: Cinemas
translation.ga: Pictiúrlanna

translation.en: Theaters
translation.ga: Amharclanna

translation.en: Concert halls
translation.ga: Ceolárais

translation.en: Bingo halls
translation.ga: Hallaí biongó

translation.en: Museums
translation.ga: Músaeim

translation.en: Nail salon
translation.ga: Salon ingne

translation.en: Hair salon and barbers
translation.ga: Salon gruaige agus bearbóirí

translation.en: Tattoo and piercing shops
translation.ga: Siopaí tatú agus pollta

translation.en: Travel agents and tour operators
translation.ga: Gníomhairí taistil agus tionscnóirí turais

translation.en: Laundry and dry cleaners
translation.ga: Ionad níocháin agus tirimghlantóirí

translation.en: Bookmakers
translation.ga: Geallghlacadóirí

translation.en: When you can remove the face cover
translation.ga: Cén uair ar féidir leat an clúdach aghaidhe a bhaint díot

translation.en: You can remove the face cover to:
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an clúdach aghaidhe a bhaint díot chun:

translation.en: Talk to someone who has communication difficulties
translation.ga: Labhairt le duine a bhfuil deacrachtaí cumarsáide aige / aici

translation.en: Providing emergency assistance or care to a vulnerable person
translation.ga: Cúnamh nó cúram éigeandála a thabhairt do dhuine leochaileach

translation.en: Taking medication
translation.ga: Cógais a thógáil

translation.en: You may be asked to remove your face cover to confirm your age or identity.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí iarraidh ort do chlúdach aghaidhe a bhaint chun d ’ aois nó d ’ aitheantas a dhearbhú.

translation.en: You can also remove your face cover when you are:
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú do chlúdach aghaidhe a bhaint freisin nuair atá tú:

translation.en: Eating and drinking in a restaurant or café - throw one when you're not at your table
translation.ga: Ag ithe agus ag ól i mbialann nó i gcaifé – caith ceann nuair nach bhfuil tú ag do bhord

translation.en: When you are receiving medical or dental treatment
translation.ga: Nuair atá cóireáil leighis nó fiaclóireachta a fháil agat

translation.en: You do not need to wear a face cover if you have an illness or weakness that would make it difficult for you to wear a face cover.
translation.ga: Ní gá duit clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh má tá tinneas nó lagú ort a d ’ fhágfadh go mbeadh sé deacair ort clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: People who should not wear a face cover
translation.ga: Daoine nár chóir dóibh clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh

translation.en: Face masks are not recommended for the following:
translation.ga: Ní mholtar clúdaigh aghaidhe dóibh seo a leanas:

translation.en: Someone who has trouble breathing
translation.ga: Duine a bhfuil trioblóid acu ag análú

translation.en: Unconscious person or speech
translation.ga: Duine gan aithne nó urlabhra

translation.en: A person who is unable to remove it without help
translation.ga: Duine nach bhfuil in ann é a bhaint gan chabhair

translation.en: A person with special needs or hearing difficulties or who is deaf
translation.ga: Duine le riachtanais speisialta nó deacrachtaí éisteachta nó atá bodhar

translation.en: A person who communicates with a person with learning difficulties or who is hard of hearing or deaf
translation.ga: Duine a dhéanann cumarsáid le duine le deacrachtaí foghlama nó atá lagéisteachta nó bodhar

translation.en: In cases like this, the person will get some protection from the cellar if they are able to wear it.
translation.ga: I gcásanna mar seo gheobhaidh an duine cosaint áirithe ón gcealtair má tá siad in ann é a chaitheamh.

translation.en: But it is only in these cases that cells should be consumed.
translation.ga: Ach is sna cásanna seo amháin gur chóir cealtair a chaitheamh.

translation.en: It is best to wear a face cover made of cloth to protect yourself from covid-19.
translation.ga: Is fearr clúdach aghaidhe déanta as éadach a chaitheamh chun tú féin a chosaint ó covid-19.

translation.en: Letters of exemption
translation.ga: Litreacha díolúine

translation.en: Some workplaces or schools may request a medical certificate.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh roinnt áiteanna oibre nó scoileanna teastas leighis a iarraidh.

translation.en: But generally, you do not need to ask for a letter from a gp about your reason for not wearing a face cover.
translation.ga: Ach go ginearálta, ní gá duit litir a iarraidh ó dhochtúir teaghlaigh faoi do chúis nár chaith tú clúdach aghaidhe.

translation.en: Children and face covers
translation.ga: Leanaí agus clúdaigh aghaidhe

translation.en: Children under the age of 13 are not advised to wear face masks, but some children may choose to wear one.
translation.ga: Ní mholtar do pháistí faoi 13 bliana d ’ aois clúdaigh aghaidhe a chaitheamh ach is féidir le páistí áirithe roghnú ceann a chaitheamh.

translation.en: There is a good chance that young children will not follow the advice on how to wear face masks properly.
translation.ga: Tá seans maith nach leanfadh páistí óga an chomhairle faoin gcaoi cheart le clúdaigh aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: But children under 13 should wear face cover if their doctor or healthcare worker recommends they do so.
translation.ga: Ach ba chóir do pháistí faoi 13 a bheith ag caitheamh clúdach aghaidhe má mholann a ndochtúir nó a n-oibrí cúram sláinte dóibh sin a dhéanamh.

translation.en: For example, some children may be encouraged to do this while attending a hospital clinic for example.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, b ’ fhéidir go mholfaí do roinnt leanaí é seo a dhéanamh agus iad ag freastal ar chlinic ospidéil mar shampla.

translation.en: Children who may be under 13 in their first year of secondary school should wear face cover while attending school.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do leanaí a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith faoi 13 ina gcéad bhliain den mheánscoil clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh agus iad ag freastal ar scoil.

translation.en: This is because they are at the same stage of development as their peers and can follow the advice on using face masks properly.
translation.ga: Is toisc go bhfuil siad ag an gcéim fhorbartha chéanna lena gcomhghleacaithe agus gur féidir leo an chomhairle maidir le clúdaigh aghaidhe a úsáid i gceart a leanacht.

translation.en: There is no evidence that a coronavirus can be sexually transmitted.
translation.ga: Níl aon fhianaise gur féidir coróinvíreas a tharchur go gnéasach.

translation.en: However, it can be spread through close contact with someone who has the virus.
translation.ga: Ach is féidir é a scaipeadh trí dhlúth-theagmháil le duine a bhfuil an víreas air / uirthi.

translation.en: Reducing your risk of contracting the coronary virus
translation.ga: Ag laghdú do riosca an choróinvíreas a tholg

translation.en: You may not know if someone has a coronavirus.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir nach mbeidh a fhios agat an bhfuil coróinvíreas ar dhuine.

translation.en: There is some risk of getting the virus if you are sexually active with another person.
translation.ga: Bíonn roinnt riosca ann go bhfaighidh tú an víreas má bhíonn tú gníomhach go gnéasach le duine eile.

translation.en: You can reduce this risk by:
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú an riosca seo a laghdú trí:

translation.en: Have sexual intercourse with a partner you live with and who does not have the virus or symptoms of the virus
translation.ga: Caidreamh collaí a bheith agat le comhpháirtí a bhfuil tú i do chónaí leis / léi agus nach bhfuil an víreas nó comharthaí den víreas air / uirthi

translation.en: Don't kiss anyone outside your family and anyone with symptoms - it's easy to spread the crown virus by kissing
translation.ga: Gan póg a thabhairt d ’ aon duine taobh amuigh de do theaghlach agus d ’ aon duine a bhfuil na comharthaí air / uirthi – tá sé éasca an choróinvíreas a scaipeadh trí phógadh

translation.en: Wash your hands properly before and after sex
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha i gceart roimh agus tar éis gnéas

translation.en: If you decide to have sex with someone who does not live with you, limit it to a few partners as possible, one regular partner if possible.
translation.ga: Má shocraíonn tú caidreamh collaí a bheith agat le duine nach bhfuil ina chónaí leat, déan é a theorannú don laghad comhpháirtithe agus is féidir, comhpháirtí rialta amháin más féidir.

translation.en: Read more about sex and the crown virus on sexual wellbeing. ie
translation.ga: Léigh níos mó faoi ghnéas agus an choróinvíreas ar sexualwellbeing.ie

translation.en: Read more about how the coronavirus is spread.
translation.ga: Léigh níos mó faoi chonas a scaiptear an choróinvíreas.

translation.en: Restriction on sexually transmitted infection (sti) services
translation.ga: Srian ar sheirbhísí ionfhabhtuithe gnéas-tarchurtha (igt)

translation.en: Many sti services are currently restricted due to the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Tá srian ar go leor seirbhísí igt ag an am seo de bharr an choróinvíreas.

translation.en: Telephone support is available in some services.
translation.ga: Tá tacaíocht teileafóin ar fáil i roinnt seirbhísí.

translation.en: Further information is available on the hiv ireland website.
translation.ga: Tá tuilleadh eolais ar fáil ar láithreán gréasáin hiv ireland.

translation.en: Contraception
translation.ga: Frithghiniúint

translation.en: Pharmacies are open as usual and can give you your usual contraceptive prescription.
translation.ga: Tá cógaslanna oscailte mar is gnáth agus féadann siad do ghnáth-oideas frithghiniúna a thabhairt duit.

translation.en: If your hormonal contraceptive prescription is to be renewed, your pharmacist may be able to provide you with extra supplies if it is safe and appropriate to do so.
translation.ga: Má tá d ’ oideas frithghiniúna hormónach le hathnuachan, b ’ fhéidir go mbeidh do chógaiseoir in ann soláthairtí breise a sholáthar duit má tá sé sábháilte agus oiriúnach déanamh amhlaidh.

translation.en: Emergency contraception
translation.ga: Frithghiniúint éigeandála

translation.en: You can get emergency (hormonal) contraception without a prescription from your local pharmacy.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú frithghiniúint éigeandála (hormónach) a fháil gan oideas ó do chógaslann áitiúil.

translation.en: Call your pharmacist to see if they can do the consultation over the phone.
translation.ga: Cuir glaoch ar do chógaiseoir chun fáil amach an féidir leo an comhairliúchán a dhéanamh ar an bhfón.

translation.en: This reduces the amount of time you have to spend in the pharmacy.
translation.ga: Laghdaíonn sé seo an méid ama a chaithfidh tú a chaitheamh sa chógaslann.

translation.en: Emergency hormonal contraception can be taken up to 5 days after unprotected sex.
translation.ga: Is féidir frithghiniúint hormónach éigeandála a thógáil suas le 5 lá tar éis gnéas gan chosaint.

translation.en: The sooner you take it, the more effective it becomes.
translation.ga: Dá luaithe a ghlacann tú é, is amhlaidh is éifeachtaí é.

translation.en: Read more about emergency contraception on sexual wellbeing. ie.
translation.ga: Léigh níos mó faoi fhrithghiniúint éigeandála ar sexualwellbeing.ie.

translation.en: Support for unplanned pregnancy
translation.ga: Tacaíocht don toirchis neamhphleanáilte

translation.en: My options provides information and support for unplanned pregnancies.
translation.ga: Cuireann my options eolas agus tacaíocht ar fáil do thoirchis neamhphleanáilte.

translation.en: This service is operating as normal.
translation.ga: Tá an tseirbhís seo ag feidhmiú mar is gnáth.

translation.en: Freephone:
translation.ga: Saorghlao:

translation.en: The hse-funded one-to-one unplanned pregnancy counseling services have moved their services to telephone or remote support.
translation.ga: Tá seirbhísí comhairleoireachta toirchis neamhphleanáilte duine-le-duine maoinithe ag fss tar éis a gcuid seirbhísí a aistriú chuig tacaíocht teileafóin nó tacaíocht cianda.

translation.en: Find contact details for one-to-one unplanned pregnancy counseling services:
translation.ga: Aimsigh sonraí teagmhála do sheirbhísí comhairleoireachta toirchis neamhphleanáilte duine-le-duine:

translation.en: Find contact details for face-to-face unplanned pregnancy counselling services
translation.ga: Find contact details for face-to-face unplanned pregnancy counselling services

translation.en: Abortion services are still available abortion services.
translation.ga: Tá seirbhísí ginmhilleadh ar fáil fós abortion services.

translation.en: During the coronavirus pandemic it is possible to have pre-abortion consultations by phone or video link with a doctor.
translation.ga: Faoi láthair, le linn na paindéime coróinvíris is féidir go chomhairliúchain réamh-ghinmhilleadh a bheith agat ar an bhfón nó ar nasc físe le dochtúir.

translation.en: When to call your gp immediately
translation.ga: Cén uair ar chóir glaoch láithreach a chur ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh

translation.en: Call your gp immediately if you have:
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh láithreach má tá:

translation.en: Your child is between 3 and 6 months old with a temperature of 38 degrees celsius or higher, or if you think they have a fever
translation.ga: Do pháiste idir 3 agus 6 mhí d ’ aois agus teocht de 38 céim celsius nó níos airde aige, nó má cheapann tú go bhfuil fiabhras air

translation.en: He has difficulty breathing while pulling his abdomen under the ribs if he observes that the muscles of his neck are moving when he breathes or that his head is moving up and down while breathing
translation.ga: Deacrachtaí análaithe aige agus é ag tarraingt a bhoilg isteach faoi na heasnacha, má bhreathnaíonn sé go bhfuil matáin a mhuinéil ag bogadh nuair a tharraingíonn sé anáil nó go bhfuil a chloigeann ag bogadh suas agus síos agus é ag análú

translation.en: Your child dehydrated - - a nappy that is not too wet, eyes watering in his head, mouth dry or no tears in his eyes while crying
translation.ga: Do pháiste díhiodráidithe - – clúidín nach bhfuil ró-fhliuch, súile báite ina cheann, béal tirim nó gan aon deor ina shúile agus é ag caoineadh

translation.en: Your child is tired (very tired) or irritable and can't calm down with toys, food, tv or if you pick it up - and especially if this happens after their temperature has dropped
translation.ga: Do pháiste tuirseach (an-tuirseach) nó cantalach agus ní féidir é a chiúnú le bréagáin, bia, teilifís nó má thógann tú suas é- agus go háirithe má tharlaíonn sé seo tar éis dá theocht ísliú

translation.en: Your child shaking badly or complaining of muscle aches
translation.ga: Do pháiste ag crith go dona nó ag gearán faoi phianta sna matáin

translation.en: Your child constantly having constant nausea or pain in his stomach
translation.ga: Do pháiste ag cur amach de shíor nó drochphian ina bholg seasta

translation.en: The test for covid-19 may be done on your child
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí an tástáil don covid-19 a dhéanamh ar do pháiste

translation.en: There are many possible causes for your child to become ill suddenly.
translation.ga: Is iomaí cúis a d ’ fhéadfadh a bheith le tinneas teacht go tobann ar do pháiste.

translation.en: Covid-19 does not usually cause serious illness in children, but it sometimes does.
translation.ga: Ní bhíonn droch thinneas ar pháistí de gnáth de bharr an covid-19 ach bíonn uaireanta.

translation.en: That's why your doctor would have to rule out covid-19.
translation.ga: Sin an fáth go mbeadh ar do dhochtúir an covid-19 a chur as an áireamh.

translation.en: Your gp will ask your child to test for covid-19 if they have been in contact with someone who has had a negative result.
translation.ga: Iarrfaidh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh tástáil an covid-19 do do pháiste má bhí sé i dteagmháil le duine a fuair duine a fuair toradh diúltach.

translation.en: Your child may also need to be tested for covid-19 in the following situations:
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh tástáil don covid-19 a bheidh ag teastáil ó do pháiste freisin sna cásanna seo:

translation.en: Unless your gp is unsure of your child 's illness
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil do dhochtúir teaghlaigh cinnte cén tinneas atá ar do pháiste

translation.en: Someone else in the house is sick but does not know why
translation.ga: Tá duine eile sa teach tinn ach nach fios cén fáth

translation.en: What will happen next?
translation.ga: Cén chéad rud eile a tharlóidh?

translation.en: Your gp will assess your child and recommend treatment for their symptoms of illness.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh measúnú ar do pháiste agus molfaidh sé cóir leighis dá chomharthaí tinnis.

translation.en: You will be asked to keep an eye on your child in case it gets worse.
translation.ga: Iarrfar ort súil a choinneáil ar do pháiste ar eagla go n-éireodh sé níos measa.

translation.en: Your child will need to stay away from others until they know for sure that they do not have covid-19 by:
translation.ga: Beidh ar do pháiste fanacht amach ó dhaoine eile go dtí go mbeidh a fhios go cinnte nach bhfuil an covid-19 air trí:

translation.en: Different diagnosis or
translation.ga: Diagnóis dhifriúil nó

translation.en: Negative test result
translation.ga: Toradh diúltach ar an tástáil

translation.en: Staying away from others is like keeping your child at home and separated from others.
translation.ga: Is ionann fanacht amach ó dhaoine eile agus do pháiste a choinneáil sa bhaile agus scartha amach ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: Do not allow any visitors.
translation.ga: Ná lig aon chuairteoir isteach.

translation.en: Read advice on how to care for a child who has to self-isolate.
translation.ga: Read advice on how to care for a child who has to self-isolate.

translation.en: Make sure your child continues to wash their hands properly and regularly and follow the cough and sneezing advice; wash their hands properly and regularly and follow hygiene advice around coughing and sneezing.
translation.ga: Déan cinnte go leanann do pháiste air ag ní a lámha mar is ceart agus go rialta agus lean an chomhairle maidir le casacht agus sraothartach wash their hands properly and regularly and follow hygiene advice around coughing and sneezing.

translation.en: If your child is not tested and your doctor does not know what their illness is, they will be treated as if they had covid-19.
translation.ga: Mura dtástáiltear do pháiste agus mura a bhfuil a fhios ag do dhochtúir cén tinneas atá air, caithfear leis amhail agus go bhfuil an covid-19 air.

translation.en: Everyone who has been in contact with your child should be aware of the symptoms of covid-19 in case the symptoms occur.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh gach duine a bhí i dteagmháil le do pháiste ar an eolas faoi chomharthaí an covid-19 ar eagla go dtiocfadh na comharthaí orthu.

translation.en: Pediatric multiple inflammatory syndrome (pims)
translation.ga: Siondróm ilchóras athlastach péidiatraice (pims)

translation.en: A small number of children with coronavirus had to undergo hospital treatment for an inflammatory syndrome known as pediatric multiple systemic inflammatory syndrome (pims).
translation.ga: Bhí ar líon beag páistí a raibh coróinvíreas orthu cóir leighis ospidéil a fháil le haghaidh siondróm athlastach ar a dtugtar siondróm ilchóras athlastach péidiatraiceach (pims).

translation.en: Pims is a life-threatening disorder.
translation.ga: Is neamhord é pims a d ’ fhéadfadh beatha duine a chur i mbaol.

translation.en: It is caused by an abnormal response of the body's immune system to infection.
translation.ga: Tarlaíonn sé de bharr freagra neamhghnách a thugann córas imdhíonachta an choirp ar ionfhabhtú.

translation.en: It is similar to kawasaki disease or toxic disturbance syndrome and is uncommon.
translation.ga: Tá sé cosúil leis an ngalar kawasaki nó siondróm suaite thocsainigh agus tá sé neamh-choitianta.

translation.en: We do not know if these children received pims because they had covid-19.
translation.ga: Níl a fhios againn an bhfuair na leanaí seo pims toisc go raibh covid-19 orthu.

translation.en: It is too early to see if there is any connection.
translation.ga: Tá sé ró-luath a fháil amach an bhfuil aon cheangal ann.

translation.en: Children who require hospital treatment for pims are now being tested for the virus.
translation.ga: Tá leanaí a dteastaíonn cóir leighisl ospidéil uathu anois le haghaidh pims á dtástáil don víreas.

translation.en: This is a precaution.
translation.ga: Is réamhchúram é seo.

translation.en: It is important that your children are involved in your plans to deal with the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach go mbeadh do phaistí páirteach i do phleananna chun déileáil leis an gcoróinvíreas.

translation.en: Think about how they feel.
translation.ga: Smaoinigh ar cén chaoi a n-airíonn siad.

translation.en: Give children and young people time and space to talk about the outbreak.
translation.ga: Tabhair am agus spás do pháistí agus do dhaoine óga labhairt faoin ráig.

translation.en: Share the facts with them in a way that suits their age and attitude, and do not be afraid.
translation.ga: Roinn na fíricí leo ar bhealach a oireann dá n-aois agus dá meoin, agus ná cuir eagla orthu.

translation.en: Talk to your children about covid-19 (coronavirus).
translation.ga: Labhair le do pháistí faoi covid-19 (coróinvíreas).

translation.en: Restrict what news and social media they see.
translation.ga: Cuir srian ar an méid nuachta agus meáin shóisialta a fheiceann siad.

translation.en: This is especially important for older children as they spend more time online.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo tábhachtach go háirithe do pháistí níos sine mar caitheann siad níos mó ama ar líne.

translation.en: It could be a cause for concern for them.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé a bheith mar chúis imní dóibh.

translation.en: If they are online, tell them where to find accurate information.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn siad ar líne, inis dóibh cá bhfaighidh siad eolas cruinn.

translation.en: Children with autism and intellectual disabilities
translation.ga: Páistí le huathachas agus míchumais intleachtúil

translation.en: Use stories to help children with autism understand coronavirus - from the autism charity 'as i am'.
translation.ga: Úsáid stories to help children with autism understand coronavirus – ón gcarthanacht uathachais ‘ as i am ’.

translation.en: Gps, hospitals and other health services are open and providing care to patients.
translation.ga: Tá dochtúirí teaghlaigh, ospidéil agus seirbhísí sláinte eile oscailte agus ag cur cúram ar fáil d ’ othair.

translation.en: You can get medical help and prescriptions online or over the phone.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat cabhair leighis agus oidis a fháil ar líne nó ar an bhfón.

translation.en: All health services have precautions in place to restrict the spread of covid-19 (coronavirus).
translation.ga: Tá réamhchúraimí i bhfeidhm ag gach seirbhís sláinte chun srian a chur le scaipeadh covid-19 (coróinvíreas).

translation.en: The steps we are taking to keep everyone safe may lead to changes in appointments and services.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go mbeidh athruithe ar choinní agus seirbhísí de bharr na gcéimeanna atá á dtógáil againn chun gach duine a choinneáil slán.

translation.en: But you should get medical treatment if you need it.
translation.ga: Ach ba chóir duit cóir leighis a fháil má theastaíonn sé uait.

translation.en: If you don't feel well
translation.ga: Mura n-airíonn tú go maith

translation.en: Discuss your symptoms of illness with your gp over the phone.
translation.ga: Pléigh do chuid comharthaí tinnis le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh ar an bhfón.

translation.en: You may be able to get advice over the phone or arrange an appointment.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go bhfaighfeá comhairle ar an bhfón nó go socróidh sé / sí coinne leat.

translation.en: Urgent medical assistance
translation.ga: Cúnamh leighis a bhfuil práinn leis

translation.en: If you are not feeling well and need help urgently, call 112 or 999 to get an ambulance.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil tú ag aireachtáil go maith agus má tá cúnamh uait go práinneach glaoigh ar 112 nó 999 chun otharcharr a fháil.

translation.en: You can also go to your local emergency department.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat dul go dtí do rannóg éigeandála áitiúil freisin.

translation.en: Symptoms of a heart attack
translation.ga: Comharthaí taom tinnis croí

translation.en: Your chest is tight or heavy.
translation.ga: Tá do chliabhrach teann nó trom.

translation.en: You have pain that spreads to your hands, back, neck and jaws
translation.ga: Tá pian ort atá ag scaipeadh go dtí do lámha, droim, muinéal agus giall

translation.en: You are feeling sick or out of breath.
translation.ga: Tá tú ag aireachtáil tinn nó ag cur amach.

translation.en: A heart attack is an urgent medical condition.
translation.ga: Is cás leighis práinneach atá i dtaom croí.

translation.en: Don't worry if you're not sure.
translation.ga: Ná bí buartha mura bhfuil tú cinnte.

translation.en: Ambulance staff always prefer to save lives.
translation.ga: Is fearr leis an bhfoireann otharchairr beatha duine a shábháil i gcónaí.

translation.en: Stroke symptoms - fast
translation.ga: Comharthaí stróc - fast

translation.en: Stroke is an urgent medical condition.
translation.ga: Is cás leighis práinneach atá i stróc.

translation.en: Getting treatment for a stroke on time is the least damaging.
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann duine cóir leighis do stróc in am is ea is lú dochair a dhéanfar.

translation.en: The acronym fast has been developed to help you think about the main warning signs of a stroke.
translation.ga: Ullmhaíodh an t-acrainm fast chun cabhrú leat smaoineamh ar na príomhchomharthaí rabhaidh a bhaineann le stróc.

translation.en: If you see them call 112 or 999 immediately fast stands for:
translation.ga: Má fheiceann tú iad glaoigh ar 112 nó 999 láithreach seasann fast do:

translation.en: Face - this is the person's face falling to one side.
translation.ga: Aghaidh (face) - an bhfuil aghaidh an duine ag titim ar thaobh amháin.

translation.en: Can he laugh?
translation.ga: An féidir leis gáire a dhéanamh?

translation.en: Wings - can lift both hands and hold them up
translation.ga: Sciatháin (arms) - an féidir leis a dhá lámh a thógáil agus iad a choinneáil suas

translation.en: Speech - is his speech choked?
translation.ga: Urlabhra (speech) – an bhfuil a chuid cainte tachta?

translation.en: Time (time ~) - call 112 or 999 if you see any of these signs
translation.ga: Am (time ~) – glaoigh ar 112 nó 999 má fheiceann tú aon chomhartha díobh seo

translation.en: Cancer symptoms
translation.ga: Comharthaí ailse

translation.en: Treating cancer better if it is detected on time.
translation.ga: Bíonn toradh níos fearr ar chóir leighis d ’ ailse má aimsítear in am é.

translation.en: Call your gp if you notice any of them:
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh má thugann tú faoi deara aon cheann acu:

translation.en: A new lump or tumor
translation.ga: Cnapán nó meall nua

translation.en: A node or tumor that has changed
translation.ga: Cnapán nó meall a bhfuil athrú tagtha air

translation.en: Abnormal bleeding
translation.ga: Cur fola neamhghnáth

translation.en: Changes in your skin
translation.ga: Athruithe ar do chraiceann

translation.en: Losing weight for no reason
translation.ga: Ag cailleadh meáchain gan chúis

translation.en: You are constantly tired
translation.ga: Tuirse ort seasta

translation.en: Be ready
translation.ga: Bí ullamh

translation.en: Prepare for the coming months:
translation.ga: Ullmhaigh do na míonna amach romhainn:

translation.en: Keep an eye on your medications
translation.ga: Coinnigh súil ar do chógais

translation.en: Get your prescription on time
translation.ga: Faigh d ’ oideas in am

translation.en: Know how to find any health service you need
translation.ga: Bíodh a fhios agat conas teacht ar aon seirbhís sláinte a theastaíonn uait

translation.en: Prescriptions and collecting medicines
translation.ga: Oidis agus ag bailiú cógais

translation.en: Prescriptions and collecting medicines
translation.ga: Oidis agus ag bailiú cógais

translation.en: The temporary changes made during the covid-19 outbreak mean that your gp can send your prescription to your pharmacist.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn na hathruithe sealadacha atá déanta le linn ráig covid-19 gur féidir le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh d ’ oideas a sheoladh chuig do chógaslannaí.

translation.en: A paper copy is not required.
translation.ga: Níl cóip páipéir ag teastáil.

translation.en: There may be a short delay in sending the prescription to the pharmacy.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go mbeadh moill ghearr ann nuair a bheadh an t-oideas á sheoladh chuig an chógaslann.

translation.en: It may be launched later in the day.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go seolfaí é níos déanaí sa lá.

translation.en: Call the pharmacy to make sure it is ready for collection before you leave the house.
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar an gcógaslann chun a chinntiú go bhfuil sé réidh le bailiú sula bhfágann tú an teach.

translation.en: Do not go to the pharmacy
translation.ga: Ná téigh chuig an chógaslann

translation.en: If you have covid-19
translation.ga: Má tá covid-19 ort

translation.en: If you have covid-19 symptoms
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí covid-19 ort

translation.en: If you are waiting for a test or covid-19 test results
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag fanacht ar thástáil nó ar thorthaí tástála covid-19

translation.en: If close contact with covid-19 case
translation.ga: Más gartheagmhálaí le cás covid-19

translation.en: If you are restricting your movements
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag cur srian le do ghluaiseachtaí

translation.en: Call your pharmacist and tell one of your family to collect the prescription.
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do chógaslannaí agus abair le duine de do chlann an t-oideas a bhailiú.

translation.en: Medical supplies
translation.ga: Soláthairtí leighis

translation.en: There is no disruption to the supply of medication.
translation.ga: Níl aon chur isteach ar sholáthar cógais.

translation.en: No need to prescribe more medication than you need.
translation.ga: Ní gá níos mó cógais a ordú ná mar a theastaíonn uait.

translation.en: If you do this, it will affect the supply of medication to others.
translation.ga: Má dhéanann tú é seo, beidh tionchar aige ar sholáthar cógais do dhaoine eile.

translation.en: Stay safe.
translation.ga: Fanaigí sábháilte.

translation.en: Keep each other safe
translation.ga: Coinnigí a chéile slán

translation.en: The covid tracker is a free app for your mobile phone.
translation.ga: Is aip saor in aisce é an rianaire covid do d ’ fhón póca.

translation.en: It will help us protect each other and curb the spread of the coronavirus (covid-19) in ireland.
translation.ga: Cuideoidh sé linn a chéile a chosaint agus srian a chur le scaipeadh an choróinvíris (covid-19) in éirinn.

translation.en: The covid tracking app combined with existing public health measures, helps us stay safe when we meet, socially, at work or travelling.
translation.ga: Cuidíonn an aip rianaithe covid in éineacht leis na bearta sláinte poiblí atá ann cheana linn go léir fanacht sábháilte nuair a chasann muid le chéile, go sóisialta, ag an obair nó ag taisteal.

translation.en: Direct contact alert
translation.ga: Foláireamh faoi ghartheagmháil

translation.en: If you use the app:
translation.ga: Má úsáideann tú an aip:

translation.en: You will receive an alert when you make close contact with another app user who has tested positive for the crown virus test
translation.ga: Gheobhaidh tú foláireamh nuair a bheidh gartheagmháil agat le húsáideoir eile aip a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil don choróinvíreas

translation.en: You will be able to track any sign and get advice on how to protect yourself and others
translation.ga: Beidh tú ábalta aon chomhartha a rianú agus comhairle a fháil conas tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint

translation.en: If you get a positive test result for the crown virus, you will be able to send an anonymous alert to other app users you have come into the close with their contact.
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach ar thástáil don choróinvíreas, beidh tú ábalta foláireamh a chur go hanaithnid chuig úsáideoirí eile aipe a raibh gartheagmháil agat leo.

translation.en: Immediate contact alert - this is how it looks and how to contact tracking works
translation.ga: Foláireamh gartheagmhála – seo mar a bhreathnaíonn sé agus mar a oibríonn an rianú teagmhála

translation.en: Check into covid
translation.ga: Seiceáil isteach covid

translation.en: Track how you feel every day, find out if you have symptoms of coronavirus and get reliable information.
translation.ga: Rianigh conas a airíonn tú gach lá, faigh amach an bhfuil comharthaí an choróinvíris ort agus faigh eolas iontaofa.

translation.en: Why would you use the app
translation.ga: Cén fáth a n-úsáidfeá an aip

translation.en: Privacy protected
translation.ga: Príobháideacht faoi chosaint

translation.en: The covid tracker app protects the privacy of all users.
translation.ga: Tugann aip an rianaire covid cosaint do phríobháideacht na n-úsáideoirí uilig.

translation.en: It is designed to protect your privacy.
translation.ga: Dearadh í le do phríobháideacht a chosaint.

translation.en: How your data will be used
translation.ga: Conas a úsáidfear do shonraí

translation.en: The technology in use
translation.ga: An teicneolaíocht atá in úsáid

translation.en: The app uses bluetooth and anonymous to collect contact information on any phone using the app.
translation.ga: Baineann an aip úsáid as bluetooth agus aitheantais anaithnid chun eolas a bhailiú faoi gartheagmháil le fón ar bith atá ag úsáid an aip.

translation.en: The technology used in the app
translation.ga: An teicneolaíocht a úsáidtear san aip

translation.en: Download the app today
translation.ga: Íoslódáil an aip inniu

translation.en: Get the app from your normal app store
translation.ga: Faigh an aip ó do ghnáth stór aipe

translation.en: Select the information you want to share or not share
translation.ga: Roghnaigh an t-eolas ar mian leat a roinnt nó gan a roinnt

translation.en: Get involved in this work and control the spread of the crown virus and keep each other safe.
translation.ga: Bí páirteach san obair seo agus cuir srian le scaipeadh an choróinvíris agus coinnigí a chéile slán.

translation.en: You may be in immediate contact if you come into close contact with someone who has tested positive for covid-19 (coronavirus):
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfá a bheith i do ghartheagmhálaí má bhíonn tú i ngartheagmháil le duine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19 (coróinvíreas):

translation.en: Direct contact
translation.ga: Gartheagmháil

translation.en: Immediate contact means:
translation.ga: Is ionann gartheagmháil agus:

translation.en: Contact about 2 meters with an infected person for more than 15 minutes, indoors or outdoors
translation.ga: Teagmháil faoi 2 mhéadar le duine atá ionfhabhtaithe ar feadh níos mó ná 15 nóiméad, laistigh nó amuigh

translation.en: Living in the same house or accommodation as an infected person
translation.ga: Ag maireachtáil sa teach nó sa lóistín céanna le duine atá ionfhabhtaithe

translation.en: Sitting in the vicinity of an infected person on two seats on public transport or an airplane
translation.ga: A bheith i do shuí i bhfoisceacht 2 shuíochán do dhuine ionfhabhtaithe ar iompar poiblí nó ar eitleá

translation.en: You may also be your immediate or casual contact if you spend more than 2 hours indoors in an office or classroom with an infected person.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfá a bheith i do ghartheagmhálaí nó i do theagmhálaí fánach freisin dá gcaithfeá níos mó ná 2 uair an chloig faoi dhíon in oifig nó i seomra ranga, in éineacht le duine ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: This will depend on the size of the room and other circumstances.
translation.ga: Braithfidh sé seo ar mhéid an tseomra agus ar chúinsí eile.

translation.en: The health officials or contact administrator will tell you if you are at risk.
translation.ga: Inseoidh na hoifigigh sláinte nó an rianaire teagmhála duit an bhfuil tú i mbaol nó nach bhfuil.

translation.en: Advice for healthcare workers
translation.ga: Comhairle d' oibrithe cúraim sláinte

translation.en: Healthcare workers should follow specific advice:
translation.ga: Ba chóir d ’ oibrithe cúraim sláinte comhairle ar leith a leanúint:

translation.en: Healthcare workers who are wearing ppe when alerted through the covid tracker app
translation.ga: Oibrithe cúraim sláinte a bhfuil ppe á chaitheamh acu nuair a fhaigheann foláireamh tríd an aip rianaire covid

translation.en: How to find out if you are a close contact
translation.ga: Conas a gheobhaidh tú amach gur gartheagmhálaí tú

translation.en: You will usually find out if you are a close contact:
translation.ga: De ghnáth gheobhaidh tú amach más gartheagmhálaí tú:

translation.en: Our contact tracking team
translation.ga: Ónár bhfoireann rianaithe teagmhála

translation.en: On the covid tracker app
translation.ga: Ar an aip rianaire covid

translation.en: From the public health team investigating a certified case in a specific setting.
translation.ga: Ón bhfoireann sláinte poiblí atá ag déanamh iniúchadh ar chás deimhnithe i suíomh ar leith.

translation.en: For example nursing home or workplace or school.
translation.ga: Mar shampla: Teach altranais nó ionad oibre nó scoil.

translation.en: When you are in your immediate contact
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn tú i do ghartheagmhálaí

translation.en: You will be your immediate contact if you have been in contact with:
translation.ga: Beidh tú i do ghartheagmhálaí má bhí teagmháil agat le:

translation.en: A person who developed covid-19 symptoms and started self-isolation within 48 hours of being contacted
translation.ga: Duine ar tháinig comharthaí covid-19 air agus a thosaigh ag féin-aonrú laistigh de 48 uair an chloig tar éis duit a bheith i dteagmháil leis

translation.en: A person who had no symptoms but tested positive for the virus within 24 hours of being contacted.
translation.ga: Duine nach raibh comharthaí air ach a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil don víreas laistigh de 24 uair an chloig tar éis duit a bheith i dteagmháil leis.

translation.en: If you are a close contact but no contact has been made
translation.ga: Más gartheagmhálaí thú ach nach ndearnadh aon teagmháil leat

translation.en: If you think you are a close contact but have not heard from the contact tracking team:
translation.ga: Má shíleann tú gur gartheagmhálaí thú ach nár chuala tú ón fhoireann rianaithe teagmhála:

translation.en: Restrict your movements (stay at home)
translation.ga: Cuir srian le do ghluaiseachtaí (fan sa bhaile)

translation.en: Call the covid-19 helpline and tell them that you have been in close contact with someone who has tested positive (covid-19)
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar an líne chabhrach covid-19 agus abair leo go raibh tú i ngartheagmháil le duine a fuair toradh tástála dearfach (covid-19 aimsithe)

translation.en: What to do if you are a close contact
translation.ga: Cad tá le déanamh más gartheagmhálaí tú

translation.en: Fix covid-19 test
translation.ga: Tástáil covid-19 a shocrú

translation.en: Restrict your movements (stay at home).
translation.ga: Srian a chur ar do ghluaiseachtaí (fan sa bhaile).

translation.en: Read about what to do if you are a close contact
translation.ga: Léigh faoi chéard ba chóir duit a dhéanamh más gartheagmhálaí thú

translation.en: Living with someone who is a positive close contact
translation.ga: Ag maireachtáil le duine atá ina ghartheagmhálaí dearfach

translation.en: You do not have to restrict your movements if you live with, or have been in close contact with, someone who has been told to be a close contact.
translation.ga: Ní gá duit srian a chur ar do ghluaiseachtaí má tá cónaí ort le, nó má bhí tú i ngartheagmháil le duine ar dúradh leis gur gartheagmhálaí é / í.

translation.en: You can go to work, school, preschool or childcare if you have no symptoms.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat dul ag an obair, scoil, réamhscoil nó ionad cúraim leanaí mura bhfuil comharthaí ort.

translation.en: If the immediate contact has symptoms, they will need to self-isolate and call the gp.
translation.ga: Má thagann comharthaí ar an ngartheagmhálaí, beidh air féin-aonrú agus glaoch a chur ar an dochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: You will need to restrict your movements.
translation.ga: Beidh ortsa srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí.

translation.en: Random contact
translation.ga: Teagmháil fhánach

translation.en: You may have been in contact with someone with covid-19, but you are not a close contact by definition.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go raibh tú i dteagmháil le duine a bhfuil covid-19 air, ach nach gartheagmhálaí thú de réir an tsainmhíniú.

translation.en: This is a trivial touch.
translation.ga: Is teagmháil fhánach é seo.

translation.en: If you are a casual contact, you do not need to restrict your movements.
translation.ga: Más teagmhálaí fhánach tú, ní gá duit srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí.

translation.en: Follow the health advice on how to protect yourself and others, if you are a casual contact, there is no need to take the test.
translation.ga: Lean an chomhairle sláinte maidir le conas tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint más teagmhálaí fánach thú, níl aon ghá an tástáil a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Invitations are now being sent to eligible people on a phased basis.
translation.ga: Tá cuirí á seoladh chuig daoine incháilithe anois ar bhonn céimnithe.

translation.en: Bowelscreen is serving those whose appointments have been postponed due to covid19.
translation.ga: Tá bowelscreen ag freastal ar na daoine sin a cuireadh a gcoinní siar de bharr covid19.

translation.en: Home screening equipment and laboratory reports will be processed.
translation.ga: Próiseálfar trealamh scagthástála baile agus tuarascálacha saotharlainne.

translation.en: We will continue to monitor public health advice to ensure that the process is safe for you and our staff.
translation.ga: Leanfaimid orainn ag coinneáil súil ar an chomhairle sláinte poiblí chun a chinntiú go mbeidh an phróiseas sábháilte duitse agus dár bhfoireann.

translation.en: You can call bowelscreen on freephone
translation.ga: Is féidir glaoch a chur ar bowelscreen ar saorghlao

translation.en: Endoscopic appointments
translation.ga: Coinní ionscópachta

translation.en: A nurse will contact you to arrange your endoscopy and to advise you about the covid-19 measures in the hospital.
translation.ga: Rachaidh altra i dteagmháil leat chun d ’ ionscópacht a shocrú agus chun comhairle a chur ort faoi na bearta covid-19 san ospidéal.

translation.en: These changes may include:
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh na hathruithe seo i gceist:

translation.en: Your nurse or doctor wearing personal protective equipment (ppe)
translation.ga: D ’ altra nó do dhochtúir ag caitheamh trealamh cosanta pearsanta (tcp)

translation.en: You would have to stay outside until it is time for your appointment
translation.ga: Go mbeadh ort fanacht taobh amuigh go dtí go mbeidh sé in am do do choinne

translation.en: Have fewer people in your healthcare building
translation.ga: Go mbeadh níos lú daoine i d ’ fhoirgneamh cúram sláinte

translation.en: You may have to wait longer for your appointment follow hospital and public health advice on attending hospital appointments.
translation.ga: Go mbeadh ort fanacht níos faide ar do choinnelean comhairle an ospidéil agus sláinte poiblí maidir le freastal ar choinní ospidéil.

translation.en: Exoscopy after bowel screening
translation.ga: Ionscópacht tar éis scagthástáil phutóige

translation.en: Signs of illness - call your gp
translation.ga: Comharthaí tinnis – glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh

translation.en: It is important to remember that 9 out of 10 people who have blood in their bowel movements (shit) will not have cancer.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach a mheabhrú nach mbeidh ailse ar 9 as gach 10 duine a bhfuil fuil ina ngluaiseachtaí putóige (cac).

translation.en: A small growth called polyps or other illnesses such as ficus (hemorrhoids) can cause blood in your shit.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh fás beag ar a dtugtar polaipí nó tinneas eile ar nós fíocas (haemaróidí) a bheith mar chúis le fuil i do chac.

translation.en: It is very important to be aware of the symptoms of bowel cancer.
translation.ga: Tá sé an-tábhachtach a bheith ar an eolas faoi chomharthaí tinnis na hailse putóige.

translation.en: Signs include:
translation.ga: I measc na gcomharthaí tá:

translation.en: The constant change in normal bowel movements.
translation.ga: Athrú leanúnach ar ghnáth-ghluaiseachtaí na bputóg.

translation.en: Going more often, with diarrhoea with pain in the stomach sometimes
translation.ga: Ag dul níos minice, le buinneach le pian sa bholg uaireanta

translation.en: Blood in your shit, especially if it is mixed through the shit.
translation.ga: Fuil i do chac go háirithe má bhíonn sé measctha tríd an gcac.

translation.en: This makes it unlikely that hemorrhoids are the cause
translation.ga: Fágann sin nach dócha gur haemaróidí an chúis atá leis

translation.en: Stomach pain, discomfort, or abdomen that is constant after eating.
translation.ga: Pian boilg, míchompord, nó bolg atá i gcónaí tar éis ithe.

translation.en: Sometimes you don't eat as much, or you lose weight
translation.ga: Uaireanta ní íosfaidh tú an oiread nó caillfidh tú meáchan dá bharr

translation.en: Symptoms of bowel cancer are also prevalent, and most people who have these symptoms do not have cancer. For example:
translation.ga: Tá comharthaí ailse phutóige an-choitianta freisin, agus ní bhíonn ailse ar fhormhór na ndaoine a mbíonn na comharthaí seo orthu. Mar shampla:

translation.en: A change in normal bowel movements is usually caused by something eaten by a person
translation.ga: De ghnáth is de bharr rud éigin a d ’ ith duine is cúis le hathrú ar ghnáth-ghluaiseachtaí na bputóg

translation.en: You probably don't have a lousy illness if you don't go to the toilet as often, or if the shit gets harder.
translation.ga: Ní dócha gur droch thinneas atá ort mura dtéann tú go dtí an leithreas chomh minic, nó má bhíonn an cac níos crua.

translation.en: It may be worth trying laxatives before going to the doctor.
translation.ga: B ’ fhiú purgóidí a thríáil sula dtéann tú go dtí an dochtúir.

translation.en: Rarely hard and shit
translation.ga: Iatacht agus cac crua go hannamh

translation.en: Fresh blood not in the shit itself or covering the shit.
translation.ga: Fuil úr nach mbíonn sa chac féin nó ag clúdach an chaca.

translation.en: This is often seen in pain due to hemorrhoids or minor cuts
translation.ga: Feictear é seo go minic in dteanna pian de bharr haemoráidí nó gearradh beag

translation.en: You should be more careful about these symptoms as you age and if they persist despite simple treatments.
translation.ga: Ba cheart a bheith níos cúraimí faoi na comharthaí seo agus tú ag dul in aois agus má mhaireann siad in ainneoin cóireálacha simplí.

translation.en: If you notice any of them, please contact your gp.
translation.ga: Má thugann tú aon cheann acu faoi deara, déan teagmháil le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh le do thoil.

translation.en: Signs of bowel cancer
translation.ga: Comharthaí ailse phutóige

translation.en: Screening will resume according to public health advice as coronary virus restrictions are mitigated.
translation.ga: Tosóidh an scagthástáil arís de réir na comhairle sláinte poiblí mar a mhaolaítear srianta an choróinvíris.

translation.en: We will continue to keep a close eye on this guide to ensure that you and our staff are safe.
translation.ga: Leanfaimid orainn ag coinneáil súil ghéar ar an treoir seo lena chinntiú go mbeidh tusa agus ár bhfoireann sábháilte.

translation.en: If you would like to contact us, please call freephone.
translation.ga: Más mian leat teagmháil a dhéanamh linn, cuir glaoch ar saorghlao.

translation.en: The people who will be tested first
translation.ga: Na daoine a thástálfar ar dtús

translation.en: We will start with the longest waiting for breast screening.
translation.ga: Tosóidh muid leis na daoine is faide atá ag fanacht ar scagthástáil cíoch.

translation.en: These letters will be sent out during september / october.
translation.ga: Seolfar na litreacha seo amach i rith mí mheán fómhair / deireadh fómhair.

translation.en: Following this, we will send out invitations to people for routine screening.
translation.ga: Ina dhiaidh seo, seolfaidh muid cuireadh amach chuig daoine le haghaidh gnáth scagthástáil.

translation.en: It will take us several months to catch up on the waiting list as the tests were discontinued in march.
translation.ga: Tógfaidh sé roinnt míonna orainn breith suas ar an liosta feithimh de bharr gur cuireadh deireadh leis na tástálacha i mí an mhárta.

translation.en: We will not be able to do the same number of tests every day because social separation has to be practised.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh muid in ann an oiread céanna tástálacha a dhéanamh gach lá mar go gcaithfear an scaradh sóisialta a chleachtadh.

translation.en: Please be patient and wait for your letter asking you to book your test again.
translation.ga: Bí foighdeach le do thoil agus fan go bhfaighidh tú do litir ag iarraidh ort do thástáil a chur in áirithe arís.

translation.en: If you are aged between 50 and 52 and coming for your test for the first time, please check the register here to make sure we have all the details we need to arrange your test appointment.
translation.ga: Má tá tú idir 50 agus 52 bliain d ’ aois agus ag teacht le haghaidh do thástála den chéad uair, féach ar an gclár anseo, le do thoil, chun a chinntiú go bhfuil na sonraí go léir a theastaíonn againn chun do choinne tástála a shocrú.

translation.en: Going for a screening
translation.ga: Ag dul le haghaidh scagthástála

translation.en: While your breast test will be the same, there may be some changes when you go to your clinic or mobile unit for your next screening appointment.
translation.ga: Cé go mbeidh do thástáil cíoch mar an gcéanna, d ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh roinnt athruithe i gceist nuair a théann tú chuig do chlinic nó aonad soghluaiste le haghaidh do chéad choinne scagthástála eile.

translation.en: Our clinics and mobile units are working hard to make changes to keep you safe when you go for your appointment.
translation.ga: Tá ár gclinicí agus ár n-aonad soghluaiste ag obair go crua chun athruithe a dhéanamh chun tú a choinneáil slán nuair a théann tú le haghaidh do choinne.

translation.en: These changes may include:
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh na hathruithe seo a bheith i gceist:

translation.en: Talking on the phone with the breastcheck team before your appointment
translation.ga: Ag caint ar an bhfón le foireann breastcheck roimh do choinne

translation.en: Your radiographer or doctor wearing personal protective equipment (ppe)
translation.ga: Do radagrafaí nó do dhochtúir ag caitheamh trealamh cosanta pearsanta (tcp)

translation.en: Wearing a mask during your appointment
translation.ga: Ag caitheamh masc le linn do choinne

translation.en: Waiting outside until it's time to go to your appointment
translation.ga: Ag fanacht taobh amuigh go dtí go mbeidh sé in am dul go dtí do choinne

translation.en: Fewer people in the healthcare building or mobile unit
translation.ga: Níos lú daoine san fhoirgneamh cúram sláinte nó aonad soghluaiste

translation.en: Waiting a little longer for your appointment because the unit must be completely disinfected between each screening
translation.ga: Ag fanacht beagán níos faide le do choinne toisc go gcaithfear an t-aonad a dhíghalrú go hiomlán idir gach scagthástáil

translation.en: Coming into the unit or clinic without someone from your family with you
translation.ga: Ag teacht isteach san aonad nó sa chlinic gan duine ó do chlann leat

translation.en: Entering and exiting your clinic through various doors.
translation.ga: Ag dul isteach agus amach as do chlinic trí dhoirse éagsúla.

translation.en: For this reason, you are advised to:
translation.ga: Mar gheall air seo, moltar duit:

translation.en: Make sure you have enough time to park if you are driving
translation.ga: A chinntiú go bhfuil go leor ama agat chun páirceáil má tá tú ag tiomáint

translation.en: Be prepared to spend more time at the test
translation.ga: Bheith réidh le níos mó ama a chaitheamh ag an tástáil

translation.en: Check your transport options for returning home
translation.ga: Na roghanna iompair atá agat maidir le filleadh abhaile a sheiceáil

translation.en: Bring proper clothing and a raincoat if you do not arrive by car
translation.ga: Éadaí cearta agus cóta báistí a thabhairt leat mura dtagann tú i gcarr

translation.en: Bring your own pen to sign the required forms
translation.ga: Do pheann féin a thabhairt leat chun foirmeacha a theastaíonn a shíniú

translation.en: Stay in touch with your clinic before your visit and follow their advice
translation.ga: Fanacht i dteagmháil le do chlinic roimh do chuairt agus a gcomhairle a leanacht

translation.en: Toilets may not be available in some test centres
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé nach mbeadh leithris ar fáil i gcuid de na hionaid tástála

translation.en: Due to covid-19 restrictions, it is taking us longer to do the tests.
translation.ga: De bharr srianta covid-19, tá sé ag tógáil níos faide orainn na tástálacha a dhéanamh.

translation.en: It is therefore important to come to your appointment when you are called.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach mar sin teacht chuig do choinne nuair a ghlaofar ort.

translation.en: You will receive one breastcheck appointment letter during this screening round.
translation.ga: Gheobhaidh tú litir choinne breastcheck amháin le linn an bhabhta scagthástála seo.

translation.en: If you are unable to attend your appointment, please contact us to change your appointment.
translation.ga: Mura féidir leat freastal ar do choinne, déan teagmháil linn le do choinne a athrú.

translation.en: You will not receive a reminder letter.
translation.ga: Ní bhfaighidh tú litir mheabhrúcháin.

translation.en: Follow-up treatment
translation.ga: Cóireáil leantach

translation.en: Hospital clinics are available for people if the results of screening and follow-up tests show that they need hospital treatment.
translation.ga: Tá clinicí ospidéil ar fáil do dhaoine má léiríonn toradh na scagthástála agus tástálacha leantacha go dteastaíonn cóireáil ospidéil uathu.

translation.en: There may be changes when you go to your hospital clinic for your next appointment.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh athruithe i gceist nuair a théann tú chuig do chlinic ospidéil le haghaidh do chéad choinne eile.

translation.en: Do your best to make changes to keep you safe during your appointment.
translation.ga: Tá na clinicí ospidéil ar a ndícheall ag déanamh athruithe chun tú a choinneáil slán le linn do choinne.

translation.en: These changes may include:
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh na hathruithe seo i gceist:

translation.en: Your nurse or doctor wearing personal protective equipment (ppe)
translation.ga: Do bhanaltra nó do dhochtúir ag caitheamh trealamh cosanta pearsanta (tcp)

translation.en: Waiting outside until it ’ s time for your appointment
translation.ga: Ag fanacht taobh amuigh go dtí go mbeidh sé in am do choinne

translation.en: Fewer people in your healthcare building
translation.ga: Níos lú daoine i d ’ fhoirgneamh cúram sláinte

translation.en: Waiting longer for your appointment while the treatment rooms are being disinfected
translation.ga: Ag fanacht níos faide le do choinne fad agus atá na seomraí cóireála á ndíghalrú

translation.en: Your hospital clinic will contact you before your appointment to tell you what to expect when you come to the clinic.
translation.ga: Beidh do chlinic ospidéil i dteagmháil leat roimh do choinne chun a insint duit cad ar chóir duit a bheith ag súil agus tú ag teacht chuig an gclinic.

translation.en: You can contact breastcheck on freephone.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú teagmháil a dhéanamh le breastcheck ar saorghlao.

translation.en: Ask to speak to one of our head nurses.
translation.ga: Iarr labhairt le duine dár bpríomh-altraí.

translation.en: If you are ill or waiting on your own
translation.ga: Má tá tú tinn nó ag fanacht asat féin

translation.en: We ask that you do not come to your appointment if you are ill or waiting on your own because you have symptoms of covid-19.
translation.ga: Iarraimid ort gan teacht chuig do choinne má tá tú tinn nó ag fanacht asat féin de bharr go bhfuil comharthaí covid-19 ort.

translation.en: Follow the latest guidelines for staying alone after traveling abroad before attending your appointment.
translation.ga: Lean na treoirlínte is déanaí maidir le fanacht asat féin tar éis taisteal thar lear sula bhfreastalaíonn tú ar do choinne.

translation.en: Starting again safely
translation.ga: Ag tosú arís go sábháilte

translation.en: Breastcheck permanent units continue to help their host hospitals assess and treat women with cancer symptoms and prioritize patients with advanced or aggressive cancer.
translation.ga: Tá aonaid bhuana breastcheck ag leanúint ar aghaidh ag cabhrú lena n-óst-ospidéil le mná a bhfuil comharthaí ailse orthu a mheas agus cóir leighis a chur orthu agus ag tabhairt tús áite d ’ othair a bhfuil ailse d ’ ardghrád nó ionsaitheach orthu.

translation.en: During this work, all breastcheck mobile units are being adapted so that they can provide a safe environment for patients and staff when breast screening resumes.
translation.ga: Le linn na hoibre seo, táthar ag cur gach aonad soghluaiste breastcheck in oiriúint ionas gur féidir leo timpeallacht shábháilte a chur ar fáil do na hothair agus don fhoireann nuair a thosóidh an scagthástáil cíoch arís.

translation.en: The resumption of screening will depend on the state of covid-19 and the easing of government restrictions.
translation.ga: Braithfidh atosú na scagthástálacha ar conas atá cúrsaí covid-19 agus de réir mar a mhaolaítear srianta an rialtais.

translation.en: We will continue to check that the screening system is functioning well during the restart period in the interests of your safety and the safety of our staff.
translation.ga: Leanfaimid orainn ag seiceáil go bhfuil an córas scagthástála ag feidhmiú go maith le linn na tréimhse atosaithe, ar mhaithe le do shábháilteacht agus sábháilteacht ár bhfoireann.

translation.en: If you have symptoms - call your gp
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí ort – cuir glaoch ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh

translation.en: Contact your gp immediately if you have any signs of breast cancer.
translation.ga: Téigh i dteagmháil le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh gan mhoill má tá aon chomhartha ailse chíche ort.

translation.en: Never ignore the symptoms.
translation.ga: Ná déan neamhaird de na comharthaí choíche.

translation.en: Symptoms of breast cancer include:
translation.ga: I measc na gcomharthaí a bhaineann le hailse chíche tá:

translation.en: Lump in the breast
translation.ga: Cnap sa chíoch

translation.en: Leakage from your nipples (this may contain blood)
translation.ga: Sileadh ó do shiní (d ’ fhéadfadh fuil a bheith sa sileadh seo)

translation.en: A lump under your armpit
translation.ga: Cnap faoi d ’ ascaill

translation.en: Change in size or shape in either breast
translation.ga: Athrú ar mhéid nó ar chruth i gceachtar den dá chíoch

translation.en: Patches on the skin of your breasts
translation.ga: Loigíní ar chraiceann do bhrollaigh

translation.en: Rash on or around your shin
translation.ga: Gríos ar do shine nó timpeall air

translation.en: Change the appearance of your shine, or squeeze it into your breast
translation.ga: Athrú ar chuma do shine, nó í brúite isteach i do chíoch

translation.en: Attend anywhere is an online facility for patients to get a video consultation with a pre-arranged appointment.
translation.ga: Is áis ar líne atá in attend anywhere d ’ othair chun comhairliúchán físe a fháil le coinne réamh-shocraithe.

translation.en: It can be used on any computer, tablet or smartphone with the latest version of the google chrome or safari web browser
translation.ga: Is féidir é a úsáid ar aon ríomhaire, taibléad nó fón cliste a bhfuil an leagan is déanaí den bhrabhsálaí idirlín google chrome nó safari orthu

translation.en: It will not work with internet explorer.
translation.ga: Ní oibreoidh sé le internet explorer.

translation.en: You will be able to go to a virtual waiting area on time and the day of your appointment with an internet connection.
translation.ga: Beidh tú in ann dul go dtí áit fheithimh fhíorúil ar am agus lá do choinne le nasc idirlín.

translation.en: Your hospital or outpatient clinic will give you an internet connection.
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh d ’ ospidéal nó do chlinic d ’ othair sheachtracha an nasc idirlín duit.

translation.en: Bí in the waiting room ten minutes before your appointment.
translation.ga: Bí sa seomra feithimh deich nóimead roimh do choinne.

translation.en: Only people with arranged appointments can be in the waiting area.
translation.ga: Ní féidir ach le daoine a bhfuil coinní socraithe dóibh a bheith san áit feithimh.

translation.en: You will not be seen unexpectedly.
translation.ga: Ní fheicfear tú gan coinne.

translation.en: Make sure you give all the details, including your date of birth and phone number.
translation.ga: Déan cinnte go dtugann tú gach sonra, ina measc, do dháta breithe agus uimhir fóin.

translation.en: We will be able to call you if there is any difficulty.
translation.ga: Beidh muid in ann glaoch a chur ort má bhíonn aon deacracht ann.

translation.en: We will not retain the details you provide after the call.
translation.ga: Ní choinneoidh muid na sonraí a thugann tú tar éis an ghlaoch.

translation.en: How to use attend anywhere
translation.ga: Conas attend anywhere a úsáid

translation.en: It is recommended that you view this video before using attend anywhere for the first time.
translation.ga: Moltar duit amharc ar an bhfís seo sula n-úsáideann tú attend anywhere den chéad uair.

translation.en: This will give you an insight into the layout of your video consultation
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh sé seo léargas duit faoi leagan amach do chomhairliúchán fise.

translation.en: This information is for people living in dublin city and county.
translation.ga: Is do dhaoine a bhfuil cónaí orthu i gcathair agus contae bhaile átha cliath an t-eolas seo.

translation.en: This is being done to prevent the spread of the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Tá seo á dhéanamh chun scaipeadh an choróinvíris a chosc.

translation.en: If you live outside dublin, you should only travel for education, work and other basic needs.
translation.ga: Má tá cónaí ort lasmuigh de bhaile átha cliath, níor chóir taisteal ann ach amháin chun críocha oideachas, oibre agus bunriachtanais eile.

translation.en: You can travel through dublin to another county.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat taisteal tríd bhaile átha cliath le dul chuig contae eile.

translation.en: Level of constraints
translation.ga: Leibhéal na srianta

translation.en: Dublin is at level 3 of the restrictions.
translation.ga: Tá baile átha cliath ag leibhéal 3 de na srianta.

translation.en: Pubs that do not provide food in dublin will remain closed.
translation.ga: Fanfaidh na tithe tabhaire nach soláthraíonn bia i mbaile átha cliath dúnta.

translation.en: Eating within restaurants and cafes will also be prohibited.
translation.ga: Beidh cosc ar ithe laistigh de bhialanna agus caife freisin.

translation.en: The rest of ireland is at level 2 of the restrictions.
translation.ga: Tá an chuid eile d ’ éire ag leibhéal 2 de na srianta.

translation.en: Read more about the levels of restrictions on www.gov.ie
translation.ga: Léigh níos mó faoi na leibhéil de shrianta ar www.gov.ie

translation.en: Travel
translation.ga: Taisteal

translation.en: You should only travel within county dublin.
translation.ga: Níor chóir duit taisteal ach laistigh de chontae bhaile átha cliath.

translation.en: Stay in dublin unless you have to leave for educational, work and other basic needs.
translation.ga: Fan i mbaile átha cliath mura gcaithfidh tú imeacht chun críocha oideachais, oibre agus bunriachtanais eile.

translation.en: Where possible, do not share your car or other private vehicles with people from outside your family.
translation.ga: Nuair is féidir, ná déan do charr nó feithiclí príobháideacha eile a roinnt le daoine ó lasmuigh de do theaghlach.

translation.en: Do not use public transport unless absolutely necessary - walk or cycle instead if possible.
translation.ga: Ná húsáid iompar poiblí mura bhfuil sé riachtanach go hiomlán - déan siúl nó rothaíocht ina áit más féidir.

translation.en: By law, you must wear a face cover on public transport.
translation.ga: De réir an dlí, caithfidh tú clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh ar iompar poiblí.

translation.en: Hotels and guest houses
translation.ga: Óstáin agus tithe lóistín

translation.en: Hotels, guest houses and bed and breakfasts (b & bs) will remain open.
translation.ga: Fanfaidh óstáin, tithe lóistín agus tithe leaba agus bricfeásta (b & b) ar oscailt.

translation.en: Only residents can use their services.
translation.ga: Ní féidir ach le cónaitheoirí a gcuid seirbhísí a úsáid.

translation.en: Work
translation.ga: Obair

translation.en: Do your work from home unless it is necessary to go to your workplace in person.
translation.ga: Déan do chuid oibre ón baile mura bhfuil se riachtanach chun dul chuig d ’ áit oibre go pearsanta.

translation.en: Social meetings
translation.ga: Cruinnithe sóisialta

translation.en: A maximum of 6 people from 1 other family can visit your home.
translation.ga: Is féidir le 6 dhuine ar a mhéad as 1 teaghlach eile cuairt a thabhairt ar do theach.

translation.en: This includes indoor and outdoor spaces in your home.
translation.ga: Cuimsionn sé seo spásanna laistigh agus lasmuigh i do theach.

translation.en: Keep 2 meters away from people you do not live with those.
translation.ga: Coinnigh 2 mhéadar amach ó dhaoine nach bhfuil cónaí ort leo.

translation.en: Social or family gatherings should not take place in other settings.
translation.ga: Níor chóir go mbeadh cruinnithe sóisialta nó teaghlaigh ar siúl i suíomhanna eile.

translation.en: Over 70 or medically vulnerable
translation.ga: Os cionn 70 nó leochaileach ó thaobh míochaine

translation.en: People living in dublin who are over 70 or medically vulnerable should take extra care to protect themselves.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do dhaoine atá ina gcónaí i mbaile átha cliath atá os cionn 70 bliain d ’ aois nó leochaileach ó thaobh míochaine cúram breise a ghlacadh chun iad féin a chosaint.

translation.en: This is due to the high level of the virus in the county.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo mar gheall ar leibhéal ard an víris sa chontae.

translation.en: Stay home as much as possible and limit social contact.
translation.ga: Fan sa bhaile a oiread agus is féidir agus déan teagmháil shóisialta a theorannú.

translation.en: Use your best judgment to stay safe when meeting others and to leave your home.
translation.ga: Úsáid an breithiúnas is fearr atá agat chun fanacht sábháilte agus tú ag bualadh le daoine eile agus ag fágáil do theach.

translation.en: Read about how to protect yourself if you cook.
translation.ga: Léigh faoi conas tú féin a chosaint má tá tú ag cocúnú.

translation.en: Schools, colleges and childcare
translation.ga: Scoileanna, coláistí agus cúram leanaí

translation.en: Playgroups, schools and colleges in dublin can remain open to protective measures.
translation.ga: Is féidir le naíonraí, scoileanna agus coláistí i mbaile átha cliath fanacht oscailte le bearta cosanta.

translation.en: Staff and students can move in and out of dublin to attend these places.
translation.ga: Is féidir le baill foirne agus mic léinn bogadh isteach agus amach as baile átha cliath chun freastal ar na háiteanna seo.

translation.en: Outdoor playgrounds, playgrounds and parks
translation.ga: Clóis súgartha lasmuigh, áiteanna súgartha agus páirceanna

translation.en: Outdoor playgrounds, playgrounds and parks can stay open.
translation.ga: Is féidir le clóis súgartha lasmuigh, áiteanna súgartha agus páirceanna fanacht oscailte.

translation.en: Be sure to follow advice on social separation.
translation.ga: Déan cinnte comhairle a leanúint maidir le scaradh sóisialta.

translation.en: Read about protecting your baby from the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Léigh faoi do leanbh a chosaint ón gcoróinvíreas.

translation.en: Cafes and restaurants, including food service bars
translation.ga: Caiféanna agus bialanna lena n-áirítear beáir a fhreastalaionn ar bhia

translation.en: All cafes and restaurants, including catering bars, can stay open for:
translation.ga: Is féidir le gach caifé agus bialann lena n-áirítear beáir a fhreastalaíonn ar bhia fanacht oscailte do:

translation.en: Bring food
translation.ga: Bia beir leat

translation.en: Deliveries
translation.ga: Seachadtaí

translation.en: Outdoor dining for a maximum of 15 people - with social separation
translation.ga: Bia lasmuigh do 15 dhuine ar a mhéad - le scaradh sóisialta

translation.en: A ban on indoor food is currently in place.
translation.ga: Tá cosc ​ ​ ar bhia faoi dhíon i bhfeidhm faoi láthair.

translation.en: Pubs that do not sell food (wet pubs)
translation.ga: Tithe tabhairne nach ndíolann bia (tithe tabhairne fliuch)

translation.en: Bars that don't serve food (wet pubs) remain closed in dublin.
translation.ga: Bars that don' t serve food (wet pubs) remain closed in dublin.

translation.en: Pubs in dublin that do not sell food (wet pubs) must remain closed.
translation.ga: Ní mór do thithe tabhairne i mbaile átha cliath nach ndiolann bia (tithe tabhairne fliuch) fanacht dúnta.

translation.en: Shops and services
translation.ga: Siopaí agus seirbhísí

translation.en: Shops, shopping malls and services like hairdressers can stay open with protective measures.
translation.ga: Is féidir le siopaí, ionaid siopadóireachta agus seirbhísí cosúil le gruagairí fanacht oscailte le bearta cosanta.

translation.en: By law, you must wear face cover in these places.
translation.ga: De réir an dlí, caithfidh tú clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh sna háiteanna seo.

translation.en: Read about safe shopping during the crown virus outbreak.
translation.ga: Léigh faoi siopadóireacht go sábháilte le linn ráig an choróinvíris.

translation.en: Organized events
translation.ga: Imeachtaí eagraithe

translation.en: These are a controlled venue with a designated event organizer, owner or manager.
translation.ga: Is láthair rialaithe iad seo le heagraitheoir imeachta, úinéir nó bainisteoir ainmnithe.

translation.en: Cinemas and theater events
translation.ga: Pictiúrlanna agus imeachtaí amharclainne

translation.en: Arts events
translation.ga: Imeachtaí ealaíon

translation.en: Business and training events (other than sport)
translation.ga: Imeachtaí gnó agus oiliúna (seachas spórt)

translation.en: Conference
translation.ga: Comhdháil

translation.en: Indoor events
translation.ga: Imeachtaí faoi dhíon

translation.en: No indoor event should take place.
translation.ga: Níor chóir aon imeacht faoi dhíon a chur ar siúl.

translation.en: Outdoor events
translation.ga: Imeachtaí lasmuigh

translation.en: Outdoor events for up to 15 people can be held.
translation.ga: Is féidir imeachtaí lasmuigh le suas le 15 duine a reachtáil.

translation.en: This does not include social gatherings.
translation.ga: Ní chuimsíonn sé seo cruinnithe sóisialta.

translation.en: Social or family gatherings should not take place.
translation.ga: Níor chóir go mbeadh cruinnithe sóisialta nó teaghlaigh ar siúl.

translation.en: Museums, galleries and other cultural attractions
translation.ga: Músaeim, dánlanna agus nithe cultúrtha eile

translation.en: All indoor cultural centres are closed.
translation.ga: Tá gach ionad cultúrtha faoi dhíon dúnta.

translation.en: Libraries
translation.ga: Leabharlanna

translation.en: Libraries will be available for e-services and call and collection.
translation.ga: Beidh leabharlanna ar fáil le haghaidh ríomhsheirbhísí agus glao agus bailiú.

translation.en: Sport
translation.ga: Spórt

translation.en: No sporting events or games can be run.
translation.ga: Ní féidir aon imeachtaí nó cluichí spóirt a reáchtáil.

translation.en: The exceptions are:
translation.ga: Is iad na heisceachtaí ná:

translation.en: Non-contact training, but outside only with a maximum group of 15 people
translation.ga: Oilliúint neamhtheagmhála, ach lasmuigh amháin le huasghrúpa de 15 duine

translation.en: Professional and elite sports, inter-county and club championships, and horse racing can continue behind closed doors
translation.ga: Is féidir le spóirt ghairmiúla agus scothaicme, craobhchomórtais idirchontae agus club, agus rásaíocht capall leanacht ar aghaidh taobh thiar de dhoirse dúnta

translation.en: Gyms, leisure centres and swimming pools
translation.ga: Spórtlanna, ionaid fóillíochta agus linnte snámha

translation.en: These will remain open for individual training only and with protective measures.
translation.ga: Fanfaidh siad seo ar oscailt le haghaidh oiliúna aonair amháin agus le bearta cosanta.

translation.en: No fitness or dance classes should be done indoors.
translation.ga: Níor chóir aon ranganna aclaíochta nó damhsa a dhéanamh laistigh.

translation.en: Marriages
translation.ga: Póstaí

translation.en: Up to 50 people can attend a wedding ceremony and reception.
translation.ga: Is féidir le suas le 50 duine freastal ar shearmanas bainise agus fáiltiú.

translation.en: From monday 21 september, up to 25 people can attend a wedding ceremony and reception.
translation.ga: Ón luan 21 meán fómhair, is féidir le suas le 25 duine freastal ar shearmanas bainise agus fáiltiú.

translation.en: Funerals
translation.ga: Socraidí

translation.en: A maximum of 25 mourners may attend a funeral service, burial or cremation ceremony.
translation.ga: Is féidir le 25 caointeoir ar a mhéad freastal ar sheirbhís sochraide, searmanas adhlactha nó créamtha.

translation.en: Long-term residential care facilities - nursing and care homes
translation.ga: Áiseanna cúraim chónaithe fadtéarmacha - tithe altranais agus cúraim

translation.en: Visiting is suspended.
translation.ga: Tá cuartaíocht ar fionraí.

translation.en: The only exceptions to this are critical and compassionate circumstances.
translation.ga: Is iad na heisceachtaí amháin as seo ná cúinsí criticiúla agus atruacha.

translation.en: For example, the end of her life.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, deireadh a saoil.

translation.en: Churches and other places of worship
translation.ga: Eaglaisí agus áiteanna adhartha eile

translation.en: Churches and other places of worship can only remain open for private prayer.
translation.ga: Ní féidir le heaglaisí agus áiteanna adhartha eile fanacht oscailte ach le haghaidh urnaí príobháideach.

translation.en: Services will be available online.
translation.ga: Beidh seirbhísí ar fáil ar líne.

translation.en: Advice for everyone across the country
translation.ga: Comhairle do gach duine ar fud na tíre

translation.en: Everyone across the country should continue to:
translation.ga: Ba chóir do gach duine ar fud na tíre leanúint ar aghaidh ag:

translation.en: Wash your hands properly and often
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha i gceart agus go minic

translation.en: To cover cough and sneezing
translation.ga: Casacht agus sraothartach a chlúdach

translation.en: Avoid contact with eyes, nose and mouth
translation.ga: Seachain teagmháil leis na súile, an srón agus an béal

translation.en: Regularly clean and disinfect surfaces
translation.ga: Dromchlaí a ghlanadh agus a dhíghalrú go rialta

translation.en: Keep a safe distance of 2 meters from others
translation.ga: Achar sábháilte 2 mhéadar a choinneáil ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Wear face cover when using public transport, in shops, shopping centres or any indoor location that cannot sustain social extension
translation.ga: Clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh agus tú ag úsáid iompar poiblí, i siopaí, in ionaid siopadóireachta nó in aon suíomh faoi dhíon nach féidir fadú sóisialta a choinneáil

translation.en: Gain knowledge and self-monitor the signs of coronavirus
translation.ga: Eolas a fháil agus féinmhonatóireacht a dhéanamh ar chomharthaí an choróinvíris

translation.en: Self-isolation and call your gp immediately for a coronavirus test if you have symptoms of coronavirus
translation.ga: Féin-aonrú a dhéanamh agus glaoch a chur ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh láithreach chun tástáil coróinvíris a fháil má bhíonn comharthaí coróinvíris ort

translation.en: Download the covid tracking app
translation.ga: An aip rianaithe covid a íoslódáil

translation.en: Minimize the number of close contacts as much as possible
translation.ga: Líon na ngartheagmhálacha a íoslaghdú a oiread agus is féidir

translation.en: Keep a record of your daily contacts to help track contact if you are diagnosed with a coronary virus
translation.ga: Taifead a choinneáil de do theagmhálacha laethúla chun cabhrú le rianú teagmhála má dhéantar diagnóisiú ort le coróinvíreas

translation.en: The outbreak of covid 19 (coronavirus) puts extra stress on people with special needs, people with disabilities and family carers.
translation.ga: Cuireann ráig an covid 19 (coróinvíreas) breis strus ar dhaoine a bhfuil riachtanais speisialta acu, ar dhaoine atá faoi mhíchumas agus ar chúramóirí teaghlaigh.

translation.en: This advice may help carers and families care for someone with special needs during this period.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh an chomhairle seo cabhrú le cúramóirí agus le teaghlaigh aire a thabhairt do dhuine le riachtanais speisialta le linn na tréimhse seo.

translation.en: Explaining what is in the covid-19
translation.ga: Ag míniú cad atá sa covid-19

translation.en: Make sure the person understands what is happening at the moment.
translation.ga: Cinntigh go dtuigeann an duine cad ag tarlú i láthair na huaire.

translation.en: Use these to help explain the coronavirus:
translation.ga: Úsáid iad seo chun cabhrú leat an coróinvíreas a mhíniú:

translation.en: Covid-19 test
translation.ga: Tástáil covid-19

translation.en: Talk about the test for covid 19 and explain what happens if they need to be tested.
translation.ga: Labhair faoin tástáil do covid 19 agus mínigh cad a tharlóidh má bhíonn gá le tástáil a dhéanamh air / uirthi.

translation.en: If he or she has to go to a test center, the role of activity may help explain the testing process in advance.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn air nó uirthi dul chuig ionad tástala, d ‘ fhéadfadh ról ghníomhaíocht cabhrú leis an bpróiseas tástála a mhíniú roimh ré.

translation.en: This will ensure that nothing unexpected happens on the day of the test.
translation.ga: Cinnteoidh sé seo nach dtarlóidh aon ní nach rabhthas ag súil leis ar lá na tástála.
