translation.en: Supports available to you
translation.ga: Tacaíochtaí atá ar fáil duit

translation.en: Contact your service provider for information on how they can help you.
translation.ga: Déan teagmháil le do sholáthróir seirbhíse chun eolas a fháil conas ar féidir leo cabhrú leat.

translation.en: If you do not have a service provider, call your local public health nurse or hse disability manager.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil soláthróir seirbhíse agat, glaoigh ar d ’ altra sláinte poiblí nó bainisteoir míchumais fnass áitiúil.

translation.en: Contact details for the hse service for people with disabilities by county
translation.ga: Sonraí teagmhála do sheirbhís fnass do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas de réir chontae

translation.en: Your county council may be able to help you if you need food or medical supplies.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go mbeadh do chomhairle contae in ann cabhrú leat má theastaíonn bia nó soláthairtí leighis uait.

translation.en: Understand the danger to the person you are supporting
translation.ga: Bíodh tuiscint agat ar an mbaol don duine a bhfuil tú ag tacú leis / léi

translation.en: The person you are caring for may be at greater risk of serious illness if they get covid 19.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh an duine a bhfuil tú ag tabhairt aire dó i mbaol níos mó ó thinneas tromchúiseach dá bhfaigheadh sé covid 19.

translation.en: They may have a long-term illness or a weakened immune system.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh go mbeadh tinneas fadthéarmach orthu nó córas imdhíonachta lagaithe acu.

translation.en: Advice for people at greater risk from covid-19
translation.ga: Comhairle do dhaoine atá i mbaol níos mó ó covid-19

translation.en: Find out what their needs are other than medical needs.
translation.ga: Faigh amach cad iad a riachtanais eile seachas riachtanais leighis.

translation.en: If they are worried about anything, think of ways to support them.
translation.ga: Má tá imní orthu faoi aon rud, smaoinigh ar bhealaí chun tacú leo.

translation.en: For example, having regular video chats with people if it is not possible to meet them in person.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, comhrá físe a bheith acu go rialta le daoine mura féidir bualadh leo go pearsanta.

translation.en: You may have already received a call from your standard service if the person you are caring for is at high risk.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé go bhfuair tú glaoch ó do ghnáth sheirbhís cheana féin má tá an duine a bhfuil tú ag tabhairt aire dó / di i mbaol mór.

translation.en: If not, you should call your service provider to discuss an emergency plan.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuair, ba chóir duit glaoch a chur ar do sholáthróir seirbhíse chun plean éigeandála a phlé.

translation.en: If you do not have a service provider, call your public health nurse or the disability manager at local hse disability services.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil soláthróir seirbhíse agat, glaoigh ar d ’ altra sláinte poiblí nó ar an mbainisteoir míchumais sna seirbhísí míchumais áitiúla fnass.

translation.en: Contact details for the hse service for people with disabilities by county
translation.ga: Sonraí teagmhála do sheirbhís fnass do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas de réir chontae

translation.en: Children with disabilities
translation.ga: Páistí faoi mhíchumas

translation.en: Preparations and the normal course of the day
translation.ga: Ullmhúcháin agus gnáthchúrsa an lae

translation.en: Do as much preparation as you can when making changes to the normal course of the day
translation.ga: Déan an méid ullmhúcháin is féidir leat nuair atá tú ag déanamh athruithe ar ghnáthchúrsa an lae

translation.en: Use visual aids where possible, such as:
translation.ga: Bain úsáid as áiseanna amhairc más féidir, ar nós:

translation.en: First and then charts - a way to show the child that they will be able to do their favourite activity if they complete the first activity
translation.ga: Cairteanna "ar dtús agus ansin" - bealach chun a thaispeáint don pháiste go mbeidh siad ábalta an ghníomhaíocht is fearr leo a dhéanamh má chríochnaíonn siad an chéad ghníomhaíocht

translation.en: A calendar with pictures explaining what will be happening
translation.ga: Féilire le pictiúir ag míniú cad a bheidh ag tarlú

translation.en: A personalized book with a summary of what will be happening
translation.ga: Leabhar pearsantaithe ina bhfuil coimriú de cad a bheidh ag tarlú

translation.en: Visual aid with a schedule of the child's daily activities
translation.ga: Áis amhairc le sceideal d ’ imeachtaí laethúla an pháiste

translation.en: The normal course of the day helps your child feel safe.
translation.ga: Cabhraíonn gnáthchúrsa an lae le do pháiste mothú go bhfuil siad sábháilte.

translation.en: The normal course of the day can help them feel more in control of things.
translation.ga: Is féidir le gnáthchúrsa an lae cabhrú leo mothú go bhfuil níos mó smachta acu ar rudaí.

translation.en: The normal course of the day can give your child confidence that nothing bad will happen to him / her.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh gnáthchúrsa an lae muinín a thabhairt do do pháiste nach dtarlóidh aon drochrud dó / di.

translation.en: Follow the normal course of the day as much as you can.
translation.ga: Cloigh le gnáthchúrsa an lae an oiread agus is féidir leat.

translation.en: You should continue with:
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit leanacht ar aghaidh leis:

translation.en: The same sleep and wake time
translation.ga: An am codlata agus dúisithe céanna

translation.en: The same meal times
translation.ga: Na hamanna béilí céanna

translation.en: The outdoor times if appropriate
translation.ga: Na hamanna amuigh faoin aer más cuí

translation.en: The times to relax and have fun
translation.ga: Na hamanna chun scíth a ligean agus spraoi

translation.en: Don't encourage them too much if possible.
translation.ga: Ná spreag an iomarca iad más féidir.

translation.en: Give the child one thing to do at a time, such as stickers, coloring or picture books.
translation.ga: Tabhair rud amháin don pháiste le déanamh ag an am, mar shampla greamáin, dathú nó pictiúirleabhair.

translation.en: Sort things up at home
translation.ga: Cuir eagar ar rudaí sa mbaile

translation.en: Health passport
translation.ga: Pas sláinte

translation.en: Check that the health passport of the person you care for is up to date.
translation.ga: Seiceáil go bhfuil pas sláinte an té atá faoi do chúram suas chun dáta.

translation.en: This is a physical document that shows the supports a person needs if they have to attend a test or go into hospital.
translation.ga: Is cáipéis fhisiciúil é seo a léiríonn na tacaíochtaí a theastaíonn ón duine má bhíonn air / uirthi freastal ar thástáil nó dul isteach san ospidéal.

translation.en: Here may be a special guide to help
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh treoir speisialta a bheith anseo mar chabhair le

translation.en: Movement
translation.ga: Gluaiseacht

translation.en: The
translation.ga: Ithe

translation.en: Dressing
translation.ga: Gléasadh

translation.en: Go to the toilet
translation.ga: Dul ag an leithreas

translation.en: Checking supplies
translation.ga: Ag seiceáil soláthairtí

translation.en: Have a plan for who you can call if you need essentials.
translation.ga: Bíodh plean agat maidir leis na daoine ar féidir leat glaoch orthu má theastaíonn nithe riachtanacha uait.

translation.en: Prepare what you will need for this period.
translation.ga: Ullmhaigh na nithe a theastóidh uait don tréimhse seo.

translation.en: Essential supplies for a week or two, including groceries and cleaning supplies
translation.ga: Soláthairtí riachtanacha do sheachtain nó coicís, earraí bia agus glantacháin ina measc

translation.en: Over-the-counter medicines and medicines
translation.ga: Cógais leighis agus cógais a cheannaítear thar an chuntar

translation.en: Continence aids, flies, catheters, feeding tubes lasting one month.
translation.ga: Áiseanna coinneálachta, cuimleoga, cataitéir, feadáin beathaithe a mhairfidh mí.

translation.en: If you normally receive detention products from the health service executive, this should continue.
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú táirgí coinneálacha ó fheidhmeannacht na seirbhíse sláinte de ghnáth, ba cheart go leanfadh sé sin ar aghaidh.

translation.en: Contact your detention officer if you have any questions.
translation.ga: Déan teagmháil le d ’ oifigeach coinneálachta má bhíonn aon cheist agat.

translation.en: Hospital appointments
translation.ga: Coinní ospidéil

translation.en: The number of hospital appointments for patients have changed due to the outbreak of covid 19.
translation.ga: Tá roinnt coinní ospidéil d ’ othair athraithe de bharr ráig an covid 19.

translation.en: The normal course of the day
translation.ga: Gnáth chúrsa an lae

translation.en: Prepare a routine course of the day.
translation.ga: Ullmhaigh clár gnáthchúrsa an lae.

translation.en: Write down the normal events that take place each day and make sure the person understands them.
translation.ga: Scríobh síos na gnáth imeachtaí a dhéantar gach lá agus déan cinnte go dtuigeann an duine é.

translation.en: This advice will help your plan:
translation.ga: Cabhróidh an chomhairle seo le do phlean:

translation.en: Write the normal course of the day for each day of the week
translation.ga: Gnáthchúrsa an lae a scríobh do gach lá den tseachtain

translation.en: Always adhering to the same sleep and wake time
translation.ga: Ag cloí leis an am codlata agus dúisithe céanna i gcónaí

translation.en: Physical activity and rest time during the day
translation.ga: Gníomhaíochta fisiciúla agus am scíthe i rith an lae

translation.en: Healthy food, snacks and hydration
translation.ga: Bia sláintiúil, sneaiceanna agus híodráitiú

translation.en: Activities that they can do on their own if possible - for example, yoga or painting
translation.ga: Gníomhaíochtaí ar féidir leo a dhéanamh astu féin más féidir – mar shampla, ióga nó péinteáil

translation.en: Any activities you include must adhere to the social separation guidelines.
translation.ga: Ní mór d ’ aon gníomhaíochtaí a chuireann tú san áireamh cloí leis na treoirlínte um scaradh sóisialta.

translation.en: Take care of yourself
translation.ga: Tabhair aire duit féin

translation.en: You need to take care of yourself so that you can take care of others.
translation.ga: Ní mór duit aire a thabhairt duit féin ionas gur féidir leat aire a thabhairt do dhaoine eile.

translation.en: Stay fit and take care of your mental health and accept any help that is offered to you.
translation.ga: Fan aclaí agus tabhair aire do do mheabhairshláinte agus glac le haon chabhair a thairgtear duit.

translation.en: Protecting your child from covid-19
translation.ga: Ag cosaint do pháiste ó covid-19

translation.en: Covid-19 (coronavirus) can affect children as well as adults.
translation.ga: Is féidir le covid-19 (coróinvíreas) dul i bhfeidhm ar leanaí chomh maith le daoine fásta.

translation.en: But few cases have been reported in children worldwide.
translation.ga: Ach is beag cásanna a tuairiscíodh i leanaí ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: Children also appear to get a milder infection than adults or the elderly.
translation.ga: Is cosúil freisin go bhfaigheann leanaí ionfhabhtú níos séimhe ná mar a bhíonn ag daoine fásta nó ag daoine scothaosta.

translation.en: They often have no symptoms.
translation.ga: Go minic ní bhíonn comharthaí ar bith orthu.

translation.en: Children do not spread the virus more than adults, and they rarely cause the virus to spread in families.
translation.ga: Ní scaipeann leanaí an víreas níos mó ná daoine fásta agus is annamh a bhíonn siad ina gcúis leis an víreas a scaipeadh i dteaghlaigh.

translation.en: Read here what to do if your child has covid-19 symptoms.
translation.ga: Léigh anseo cad ba chóir a dhéanamh má bhíonn comharthaí covid-19 ar do pháiste.

translation.en: If you are worried about your child's health, call your gp.
translation.ga: Má tá imní ort faoi shláinte do pháiste, cuir glaoch ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: Protecting your child
translation.ga: Ag cosaint do pháiste

translation.en: The most important things you can do to protect your child are:
translation.ga: Is iad na rudaí is tabhachtaí gur féidir leat a dhéanamh chun do pháiste a chosaint ná:

translation.en: Follow the advice on how to protect yourself and others from covid-19
translation.ga: Lean an chomhairle faoi conas tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint ó covid-19

translation.en: Watch out for covid-19 symptoms - if your child has covid-19 symptoms, they will need to isolate themselves and call their gp
translation.ga: Bí ag faire amach do chomharthaí covid-19 - má bhíonn comharthaí covid-19 ar do pháiste beidh air féin-aonrú agus ní mór glaoch a chur ar an dochtúir teaghlaigh

translation.en: Encourage your child to wash their hands regularly and properly
translation.ga: Spreag do pháiste a lámha a ní go rialta agus i gceart

translation.en: Clean and disinfect all surfaces in your home and all areas where people touch them.
translation.ga: Glan agus díghalraigh gach dromchla i do theach agus gach áit a mbíonn daoine ag leagan lámh orthu.

translation.en: Do not forget the hands of the doors, the remote control and the toilet.
translation.ga: Ná déan dearmad ar lámha na ndoirse, an cianrialtán agus an leithreas.

translation.en: Follow the advice to prevent your child from getting or spreading viral infections
translation.ga: Lean comhairle chun cosc a chur ar do pháiste ionfhabhtuithe víreasacha a fháil nó a scaipeadh

translation.en: Face and child covers
translation.ga: Clúdaigh aghaidhe agus leanaí

translation.en: Face covers are not recommended for children under 13.
translation.ga: Ní mholtar clúdaigh aghaidh do pháistí faoi 13 bliain.

translation.en: Young children may not be able to follow the advice of wearing a mask properly.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí nach mbeidh leanaí óga in ann cloí leis an an gcomhairle faoi mhasc a chaitheamh i gceart.

translation.en: They should wear a face mask if advised to do so by a doctor or healthcare worker, for example, when attending a hospital clinic.
translation.ga: Ba chóir dóibh clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh má mholann dochtúir nó oibrí cúram sláinte dóibh sin a dhéanamh, mar shampla, nuair atáthar ag freastal ar chlinic san ospidéal.

translation.en: Children over 13 should follow the advice given to adults about wearing face masks.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do leanaí os cionn 13 an chomairle a tugtar do dhaoine fásta faoi chaitheamh na clúdaigh aghaidhe a leanacht.

translation.en: They must wear face covers when entering a shop or when travelling on public transport and should wear a face cover whenever it is difficult to stay 2 meters away from others.
translation.ga: Ní mór dóibh clúdaigh aghaidhe a chaitheamh nuair a ghabhann siad isteach i siopa nó nuair a bhíonn siad ag taisteal ar iompar phoiblí, agus ba chóir dóibh clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh aon uair go mbíonn sé deacair fanacht amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: All secondary school children should wear face cover in secondary school, even if they are under 13.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do gach páiste meánscoile clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh sa mheánscoil, fiú má tá siad faoi 13.

translation.en: It is because they are at the same stage of development as their peers and can follow the advice on face cover properly.
translation.ga: Is toisc go bhfuil siad ag an gcéim fhorbartha chéanna lena gcomhghleacaithe agus gur féidir leo an chomhairle maidir le clúdaigh aghaidhe a leanacht i gceart.

translation.en: See how your children should wash their hands
translation.ga: Féach ar an gcaoi gur chóir dod ’ pháistí na lámha a ní

translation.en: If your child has symptoms of coronavirus
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí an choróinvíris ar do pháiste

translation.en: This advice is usually for infants and children under 12 or 13 years of age attending primary school.
translation.ga: Is do naíonáin agus leanaí atá faoi 12 nó 13 bliain atá ag freastal ar an mbunscoil de ghnáth an chomhairle seo.

translation.en: Secondary school children with symptoms should follow the adults' advice on when to contact their gp for a covid-19 (coronavirus) test.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do leanaí meánscoile a bhfuil comharthaí orthu comhairle na ndaoine fásta a leanúint maidir le cathain ar chóir dóibh dul i dteagmháil lena ndochtúir teaghlaigh maidir le tástáil covid-19 (coróinvíreas).

translation.en: Keep your child at home
translation.ga: Coinnigh do pháiste sa bhaile

translation.en: Do not allow your child to go to school or attend a childcare centre if they have covid-19 symptoms.
translation.ga: Ná lig do do pháiste dul ar scoil nó freastal ar ionad cúraim leanaí má tá comharthaí covid-19 air.

translation.en: He may have to stay away from others.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go mbeadh air fanacht amach ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: This will depend on the symptoms.
translation.ga: Braithfidh sé seo ar na comharthaí atá air.

translation.en: Read more about when a child should be kept home from school or a childcare centre.
translation.ga: Léigh tuilleadh faoi cathain ar cheartdo pháiste a choinneáil sa bhaile ón scoil nó ó ionad cúraim leanaí.

translation.en: When to seek emergency medical help
translation.ga: Cathain ar chóir cabhair leighis éigeandála a fháil

translation.en: Read more about the symptoms in children and infants who need emergency medical help.
translation.ga: Léigh tuilleadh faoi na comharthaí i leanaí agus i bpáistí a dteastaíonn cabhair leighis éigeandála uathu.

translation.en: If your child suddenly becomes very ill, it is unlikely to be a coronary virus.,
translation.ga: Má éiríonn do pháiste an-tinn go tobann ní dócha gur coróinvíreas atá air.,

translation.en: The symptoms may be caused by another illness.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé gur tinneas eile is cúis leis na comharthaí.

translation.en: If your baby is under three months old and has a high temperature (38 degrees celsius or more), call 999 or 112.
translation.ga: Má tá do leanbh faoi 3 mhí d ’ aois agus má tá teocht ard air (38 céim celsius nó níos mó), glaoigh ar 999 nó 112.

translation.en: If your baby is between 3 and 6 months old and has a high temperature, contact your gp immediately.
translation.ga: Má tá do leanbh idir 3 agus 6 mhí d ’ aois agus má tá teocht ard air, cuir glaoch ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh láithreach.

translation.en: If your child has common symptoms of covid-19
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí coitianta covid-19 ar do pháiste

translation.en: Common symptoms of covid-19 are:
translation.ga: Is iad comharthaí coitianta covid-19 ná:

translation.en: Temperature 38 degrees celsius or more
translation.ga: Teocht 38 céim celsius nó níos mó

translation.en: New cough - they can be coughs of any kind, not just dry
translation.ga: Casacht nua - is féidir casacht de chineál ar bith a bheith orthu, ní tirim amháin

translation.en: Loss or change in taste or smell
translation.ga: Caillteanas nó athrú ar bhlas nó boladh

translation.en: Shortness of breath
translation.ga: Giorra anála

translation.en: If your child has common symptoms of covid-19:
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí coitianta covid-19 ar do pháiste:

translation.en: Keep your child away from others - this means you have to keep them in a room by themselves without any contact with others as much as possible.
translation.ga: Coinnigh do pháiste amach ó dhaoine eile - ciallaíonn sé seo go gcaithfidh tú é a choinneáil i seomra leis féin gan aon teagmháil le daoine eile an oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: Call a gp - they will tell you if your child needs a covid-19 test.
translation.ga: Cuir glaoch ar dhochtúir teaghlaigh - inseoidh siad duit má tá tástáil covid-19 de dhíth ar do pháiste.

translation.en: Everyone living with your child should restrict their movements.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do gach duine atá ina gcónaí le do pháiste srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí.

translation.en: This means they cannot go to school, childcare or work until it is safe.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo nach féidir leo dul ar scoil, chuig ionad cúraim leanaí nó chuig an obair go dtí go mbeidh sé sábháilte.

translation.en: Test your child's symptoms at home.
translation.ga: Déan cóireáil ar chomharthaí do pháiste sa bhaile.

translation.en: The child should only leave the house to be tested or to see a doctor.
translation.ga: Níor chóir don pháiste an teach a fhágáil ach amháin chun tástáil a dhéanamh nó chun cuairt a thabhairt ar dhochtúir.

translation.en: Call your gp first.
translation.ga: Cuir glaoch ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh ar dtús.

translation.en: Do not take your child to the doctor unless the doctor says so.
translation.ga: Ná tabhair do leanbh chuig an dochtúir mura ndeireann an dochtúir sin.

translation.en: If your child has other symptoms that a person with covid-19 does not normally have
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí eile ar do pháiste nach mbíonn ar dhuine a bhfuil covid-19 air de ghnáth

translation.en: Less common covid-19 symptoms include:
translation.ga: I measc na gcomharthaí covid-19 nach bhfuil chomh coitianta tá:

translation.en: Sore throat
translation.ga: Scornach thinn

translation.en: Headache
translation.ga: Tinneas cinn

translation.en: Feeling sick or vomiting
translation.ga: Mothú tinn nó urlacan

translation.en: If your child has any of these symptoms, keep them at home for at least 48 hours.
translation.ga: Má tá aon cheann de na comharthaí seo ar do pháiste, coinnigh sa bhaile é ar feadh 48 uair an chloig ar a laghad.

translation.en: It is unlikely to contain covid-19, but maybe a sign of another infectious infection.
translation.ga: Ní dócha go bhfuil covid-19 air, ach d ’ fhéadfadh gur comhartha iad d ’ ionfhabhtú tógálach eile.

translation.en: The people living with your child do not need to restrict their movements unless they are sick.
translation.ga: Ní gá do na daoine atá ina gcónaí le do pháiste srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí mura bhfuil siad tinn.

translation.en: After 48 hours, your child can return to school or a childcare centre as long as:
translation.ga: Tar éis 48 uair an chloig is féidir le do pháiste dul ar ais ar scoil nó chuig ionad cúraim leanaí an fhad agus:

translation.en: His symptoms do not get worse
translation.ga: Nach n-eiríonn a chomharthaí níos measa

translation.en: It does not come with new signs
translation.ga: Nach dtagannn comharthaí nua air

translation.en: Does not require paracetamol or ibuprofen for 48 hours - this may mask a fever if it is
translation.ga: Nach dteastaíonn paraicéiteamól nó iobúpróifein uaidh ar feadh 48 uair an chloig- d ’ fhéadfadh sé seo fiabhras a cheilt má tá sé air

translation.en: No one else living with it has been ill or has tested positive for covid-19
translation.ga: Nach bhfuil aon duine eile a chónaíonn leis tinn nó toradh dearfach faighte acu ar thástáil covid-19

translation.en: Thorny or sneezing nose
translation.ga: Srón smaoiseach nó sraothartach

translation.en: If your child only has a runny nose or sneezes, it's okay to let them go to school.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil ach srón smaoiseach ar do pháiste nó má tá sé ag sraothartach, tá sé ceart go leor iad a ligean ar scoil.

translation.en: Read more advice on sneezing or sneezing and why it's okay to let your child go to school or a childcare centre
translation.ga: Léigh tuilleadh comhairle faoi shrón smaoiseach nó sraothartach agus cén fáth go bhfuil sé ceart go leor do pháiste a ligean ar scoil nó chuig ionad cúraim leanaí

translation.en: If your child has diarrhoea
translation.ga: Má tá buinneach ar do pháiste

translation.en: If your child has diarrhoea, they should stay home.
translation.ga: Má tá buinneach ar do pháiste, ba chóir dó fanacht sa bhaile.

translation.en: He should not go to school until the diarrhoea has gone 48 hours.
translation.ga: Níor chóir dó dul ar scoil go mbíonn an bhuinneach imithe 48 uair an chloig.

translation.en: People living with your child do not need to restrict their movements as long as they feel ok.
translation.ga: Ní gá do na daoine atá ina gcónaí le do pháiste srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí an fhad agus a bhraitheann siad ceart go leor.

translation.en: Diarrhoea is not a common covid-19 symptom.
translation.ga: Ní comhartha coitianta covid-19 atá sa mbuinneach.

translation.en: But it is a sign of infection.
translation.ga: Ach is comhartha ionfhabhtaithe é.

translation.en: It may pass this infection to other children.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé an t-ionfhabhtú seo a thabhairt do pháistí eile.

translation.en: If your child has a long-term breathing illness getting worse
translation.ga: Má tá tinneas fadtéarmach análaithe ar do pháiste ag éirí níos measa

translation.en: If your child has a long-term breathing illness that has brought worse:
translation.ga: Má tá tinneas fadtéarmach análaithe ar do pháiste atá tar éis éirí níos measa:

translation.en: Keep your child away from others
translation.ga: Coinnigh do pháiste amach ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Everyone living with your child should restrict their movements
translation.ga: Ba chóir do gach duine atá ina chónaí le do pháiste srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí

translation.en: If your child has undiagnosed symptoms but does not need a covid-19 test
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí neamh-dhiagnóisithe ar do pháiste ach mura bhfuil tástáil covid-19 de dhíth air

translation.en: Sometimes your gp may not know why your child is ill.
translation.ga: Uaireanta, b ’ fhéidir nach mbeadh a fhios ag do dhochtúir teaghlaigh cén fáth go bhfuil do pháiste tinn.

translation.en: He may not be able to diagnose his symptoms.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir nach mbeadh sé in ann a chomharthaí a dhiagnóisiú.

translation.en: He may decide based on his symptoms that your child does not need to take the covid-19 test.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé cinneadh a dhéanamh bunaithe ar a chuid comharthaí nach gá do do pháiste an tástáil covid-19 a dhéanamh.

translation.en: If this happens, your child should behave as if they have covid-19.
translation.ga: Má tharlaíonn sé seo, ba chóir do do pháiste é féin a iompar amhail is go bhfuil covid-19 air.

translation.en: This is done to keep others safe.
translation.ga: Déantar é seo chun daoine eile a choinneáil slán.

translation.en: It is not possible to be sure that your child does not have the virus.
translation.ga: Ní féidir a bheith cinnte nach bhfuil an víreas ar do pháiste.

translation.en: He will have to continue to stay away from others.
translation.ga: Beidh air leanacht ar aghaidh ag fanacht amach ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: He will have to remain alone until he meets both of these conditions:
translation.ga: Beidh air fanacht ina aonar go dtí go sásaíonn sé an dá coinníoll seo:

translation.en: Without high temperature (38 degrees celsius or more) for five days
translation.ga: Gan teocht ard air (38 céim celsius nó níos mó) le 5 lá

translation.en: It has been ten days since symptoms first appeared
translation.ga: Tá 10 lá caite ó tháinig comharthaí air i dtosach

translation.en: Community assessment hubs for coronavirus
translation.ga: Moil mheasúnaithe pobail don choróinvíreas

translation.en: Community assessment hubs help manage the increase in coronary virus cases in the community.
translation.ga: Cuidíonn moil mheasúnaithe pobail le méadú na gcásanna coróinvíreas sa phobal a bhainistiú.

translation.en: Who are for these hubs? These hubs are for people:
translation.ga: Cé dó na moil seo? Tá na moil seo ann do dhaoine:

translation.en: Who is very ill
translation.ga: Atá an-tinn

translation.en: That they have tested positive for the coronavirus
translation.ga: Go bhfuil tástáil dhearfach déanta acu don choróinvíreas

translation.en: Likely to carry a coronavirus
translation.ga: Ar dóigh go mbeidh coróinvíreas orthu

translation.en: They need a face-to-face appointment with a gp
translation.ga: A theastaíonn coinne duine le duine uathu le dochtúir teaghlaigh

translation.en: Your gp may refer you to a hub for face-to-face assessment if:
translation.ga: Féadfaidh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh tú a atreorú chuig mol le haghaidh measúnaithe duine le duine má:

translation.en: You feel your symptoms are getting worse
translation.ga: Bhraitheann tú go bhfuil do chuid comharthaí ag éirí níos measa

translation.en: You think that you cannot manage your symptoms of illness at home
translation.ga: Bhraitheann tú nach féidir leat do chuid comharthaí tinnis a bhainistiú sa bhaile

translation.en: You are worried about your breathing - such as shortness of breath or pain or distress
translation.ga: Tá imní ort faoi do chuid análú - mar shampla giorra anála nó go bhfuil pian nó anacair ort

translation.en: You are concerned about other diseases you already have
translation.ga: Go bhfuil imní ort faoi thinnis eile atá ort cheana féin

translation.en: The hubs are for people aged 16 and over.
translation.ga: Tá na moil ann do dhaoine atá 16 bliana d ’ aois agus níos sine.

translation.en: If you are worried about your child or the symptoms of their illness, call your gp.
translation.ga: Má tá imní ort faoi do leanbh nó na comharthaí tinnis atá air / uirthi, cuir glaoch ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: The community assessment hubs help to manage an increasing number of cases of coronavirus in the community.
translation.ga: Cabhraíonn na moil mheasúnaithe pobail chun líon méadaithe de chásanna den choróinvíreas sa phobal a bhainistiú.

translation.en: When to call your gp
translation.ga: Cén uair ar chóir glaoch ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh

translation.en: Your gp or out-of-hours gp will decide if you need a face-to-face consultation at a hub.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh nó do dhochtúir teaghlaigh lasmuigh d ’ uaireanta cinneadh an bhfuil comhairliúchán duine le duine ag teastáil uait ag mol.

translation.en: Call your gp:
translation.ga: Cuir glaoch ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh:

translation.en: If your symptoms of illness get worse - especially if your breathing is harder or faster
translation.ga: Má éiríonn do chomharthaí tinnis níos measa – go háirithe má bhíonn d ’ analú níos deacra nó níos tapaidh

translation.en: If you feel you cannot manage your symptoms of illness yourself
translation.ga: Má bhraitheann tú nach féidir leat do chomharthaí tinnis a bhainistiú tú féin

translation.en: As soon as your gp refers to a hub, we will send you a text with details of your appointment as soon as possible.
translation.ga: Chomh luath agus a dhéanann do dhochtúir teaghlaigh atreorú chuig mol, cuirfimid téacs chugat le sonraí air faoi do choinne a luaithe is féidir.

translation.en: Make sure your gp has an up-to-date telephone number.
translation.ga: Déan cinnte go bhfuil d ’ uimhir theileafóin cothrom le dáta ag do dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: Medications
translation.ga: Cógais

translation.en: Bring a list of your medications to your assessment appointment.
translation.ga: Tabhair leat liosta de do chuid cógais chuig do choinne mheasúnaithe.

translation.en: What happens at a hub
translation.ga: Cad a tharlaíonn ag mol

translation.en: A gp will examine you and decide on a treatment plan.
translation.ga: Scrúdóidh dochtúir teaghlaigh tú agus socróidh sé ar phlean cóireála.

translation.en: A referral must be obtained from a gp.
translation.ga: Ní mór atreorú a fháil ó dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: We cannot accept people who do 'walk-in'.
translation.ga: Ní féidir linn glacadh le daoine a dhéanann ‘ siúl-isteach ’.

translation.en: Coronavirus test
translation.ga: Tástáil coróinvíreas

translation.en: Hubs do not provide crown virus testing.
translation.ga: Ní sholáthraíonn moil tástáil coróinvíreas.

translation.en: Opening hours
translation.ga: Uaireanta oscailte

translation.en: The hubs will be open from 8 am to 8 pm, seven days a week.
translation.ga: Beidh na moil ar oscailt ó 8 r.n. go 8 i.n., 7 lá na seachtaine.

translation.en: They will be continued for as long as they are needed.
translation.ga: Leanfar ar aghaidh leo chomh fada agus a bheidh siad ag teastáil.

translation.en: Your assessment
translation.ga: Do mheasúnú

translation.en: We will take your contact details, then a nurse and gp will make a full assessment.
translation.ga: Tógfaimid do chuid sonraí teagmhála, ansin déanfaidh altra agus dochtúir teaghlaigh measúnú iomlán.

translation.en: Each appointment lasts about an hour.
translation.ga: Maireann gach coinne timpeall uair an chloig.

translation.en: The team will decide if:
translation.ga: Déanfaidh an fhoireann cinneadh más rud é:

translation.en: That you need to go to the hospital for extra support and treatment
translation.ga: Gur gá duit dul chuig an ospidéal chun tacaiocht agus cóireail bhreise a fháil

translation.en: That you are able to recover at home
translation.ga: Go bhfuil tú in ann téarnamh sa bhaile

translation.en: It would help if you had extra support to help you recover in the community or spend some time in an isolation facility.
translation.ga: Go bhfuil tacaíochtaí breise de dhíth ort chun cabhrú leat téarnamh sa phobal nó roinnt ama a chaitheamh i saoráid leithlise.

translation.en: Read more about coronavirus isolation facilities.
translation.ga: Léigh níos mó faoi shaoráidí leithlise coróinvíreas.

translation.en: You and your gp will be given a copy of the assessment report.
translation.ga: Tabharfar cóip den tuairisc mheasúnaithe duitse agus dod ’ dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: Restricted movements (stay at home)
translation.ga: Gluaiseachtaí srianta (fan sa bhaile)

translation.en: Restricting your movements means not having as much contact with others as possible.
translation.ga: Is ionann srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí agus gan aon teagmháil a bheith agat le daoine eile an oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: This is done to prevent the spread of covid-19 (coronavirus).
translation.ga: Is ar mhaithe le cosc a chur ar scaipeadh covid-19 (coróinvíreas) a déantar seo.

translation.en: When you should restrict your movements
translation.ga: Cathain ba chóir duit srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí

translation.en: You will need to restrict your movements for 14 days if:
translation.ga: Beidh ort srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí ar feadh 14 lá má:

translation.en: You have had direct contact with someone who has been diagnosed with covid -19
translation.ga: Bhí gartheagmháil agat le duine a deimhníodh go raibh an covid -19 air / uirthi

translation.en: You live with someone who has symptoms of covid -19 illness even though you feel well
translation.ga: Tá tú i do chónaí le duine a bhfuil comharthaí tinnis an covid -19 air / uirthi cé go mothaíonn tú féin go maith

translation.en: If you came to ireland from another country, in most cases
translation.ga: Má tháinig tú go héirinn ó thír eile, i bhformhór cásanna

translation.en: There is special advice for people coming to ireland from high-risk countries - see the list on gov.ie
translation.ga: Tá comhairle ar leith do dhaoine a thagann go héirinn ó thíortha d ’ ardriosca – féach an liosta ar gov.ie

translation.en: You should restrict your movements as you may have covid-19.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí mar go bhféadfadh covid-19 a bheith ort.

translation.en: You can spread the virus even if you have no symptoms.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an víreas a scaipeadh fiú mura bhfuil comharthaí ort.

translation.en: If you follow this advice, you will keep others safe.
translation.ga: Má leanann tú an chomhairle seo, coinneoidh tú daoine eile slán.

translation.en: How to restrict your movements:
translation.ga: Conas srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí:

translation.en: Stay away from others and other social occasions as much as possible.
translation.ga: Fan amach ó dhaoine eile agus ó ócáidí sóisialta eile an oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: Stay at home or in your accommodation as much as possible.
translation.ga: Fan sa mbaile nó i do lóistín an oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: You can exercise outdoors as long as you stay 2 meters away from others.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat aclaíocht a dhéanamh faoin aer an fhad agus go bhfanann tú amach 2 mheádar ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: Don't
translation.ga: Ná déan

translation.en: Do not go to the workplace unless you are working alone and can avoid others altogether.
translation.ga: Ná téigh go dtí an láthair oibre, mura bhfuil tú ag obair leat féin agus gur féidir leat daoine eile a sheachaint go hiomlán.

translation.en: If you are an essential worker and have no signs of illness, talk to your employer.
translation.ga: Más oibrí riachtanach thú agus mura bhfuil aon comharthaí tinnis ort, labhair le d ’ fhostóir.

translation.en: Do not attend school or college
translation.ga: Ná freastal ar scoil ná coláiste

translation.en: Do not use a public transport system
translation.ga: Ná húsáid córas iompar poiblí

translation.en: Do not invite others home
translation.ga: Ná tabhair cuireadh chun tí do dhaoine eile

translation.en: Do not visit others, even if you usually care for them.
translation.ga: Ná tabhair cuairt ar dhaoine eile, fiú má thugann tú aire dóibh de ghnáth.

translation.en: Don't go to the shops or the pharmacy - if possible, order your groceries online or ask your family or friends to collect them for you.
translation.ga: Ná téigh chuig na siopaí nó chuig an gcógaslann - más féidir, ordaigh d ’ earraí grósaera ar líne nó iarr ar do mhuintir nó do chairde iad a bhailiú duit.

translation.en: Do not go to schools to collect your children unless necessary.
translation.ga: Ná téigh chuig na scoileanna chun do pháistí a bhailiú mura bhfuil sin riachtanach.

translation.en: Ask your family or friends to collect the children from school.
translation.ga: Iarr ar do chlann nó do chairde na páistí a bhailiú ón scoil.

translation.en: If you have to collect them, stay away from others and stay in your car.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn ort iad a bhailiú fan amach ó dhaoine eile agus fan i do charr.

translation.en: Don't go to a funeral or wedding -
translation.ga: Ná téigh chuig sochraid nó chuig bainis -

translation.en: Read more about grief and death during covid-19
translation.ga: Léigh tuilleadh faoi méala agus bás le linn covid-19

translation.en: Keep away from the elderly, anyone with a long-term illness and pregnant women.
translation.ga: Coinnigh ar shiúl ó dhaoine aosta, aon duine le tinneas fadthéarmach agus mná torracha.

translation.en: When can you stop restricting your movements
translation.ga: Cathain a fhéadfaidh tú stopadh ag cur srian ar do ghluaiseachtaí

translation.en: If you are a close contact for someone who has tested positive for covid 19, you must restrict your movements for 14 days.
translation.ga: Más gartheagmhálaí tú do dhuine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid 19, ní mór duit srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí ar feadh 14 lá.

translation.en: Do this from the date you were last in contact with that person.
translation.ga: Déan é seo ón dáta is déanaí a raibh tú i dteagmháil leis an duine sin.

translation.en: If you are unsure of the date, restrict your movements to the date given to you by the contact tracker.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil tú cinnte faoin dáta, cuir srian le do ghluaiseachtaí go dtí an dáta a thugann an rianaire teagmhála duit.

translation.en: You can stop restricting your movements when you meet the following conditions:
translation.ga: Is féidir stopadh ag srianadh do ghluaiseachtaí nuair a shásaíonn tú na coinníollacha seo:

translation.en: You have tested negative (covid-19 was not detected), and 10 days have passed since you were in contact with someone who tested positive.
translation.ga: Tá tástáil diúltach faighte agat (níor aimsíodh covid-19) agus 10 lá imithe ón am a bhí tú i dteagmháil le duine a fuair tástáil dearfach.

translation.en: You have no signs of illness
translation.ga: Níl aon chomharthaí tinnis ort

translation.en: Caring for someone who is not capable of self-isolation
translation.ga: Ag tabhairt aire do dhuine nach bhfuil in ann féin -aonrú

translation.en: If you are caring for someone who is unable to self-isolate themselves, you and the others in the house must restrict your movements for 17 days.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag tabhairt aire do dhuine nach bhfuil in ann féin-aonrú iad féin ní mór duitse agus na daoine eile sa teach srian a chur le bhur ngluaiseachtaí ar feadh 17 lá.

translation.en: Read about the difference between self-isolation and restricting movements
translation.ga: Leigh faoin difríocht idir féin-aonrú agus srian a chur le gluaiseachtaí

translation.en: If you live with someone who is restricting their movements
translation.ga: Má tá cónaí ort le duine atá ag cur srian lena ghluaiseachtaí

translation.en: If you live with someone who is restricting their movements, you do not need to restrict your movements as long as that person has no symptoms.
translation.ga: Má tá cónaí ort le duine atá ag cur srian lena ghluaiseachtaí, ní gá duitse srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí an fhad is nach dtagann comharthaí ar an duine sin.

translation.en: If you live with someone who has covid-19 symptoms
translation.ga: Má tá cónaí ort le duine a bhfuil comharthaí covid-19 air / uirthi

translation.en: Restrict your movements, even if you are not sick.
translation.ga: Cuir srian ar do ghluaiseachtaí, fiú mura bhfuil tú tinn.

translation.en: The person with the symptoms should behave as if they have the coronary virus and:
translation.ga: Ba chóir don duine a bhfuil na comharthaí air / uirthi iad féin a iompar amhail is go bhfuil an coróinvíreas air / uirthi agus:

translation.en: Immediate self-isolation
translation.ga: Féin-aonrú láithreach

translation.en: Call your gp for advice
translation.ga: Glaoch ar an dochtúir teaghlaigh chun comhairle a fháil

translation.en: A covid-19 test may be arranged for the person you live with
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go socrófaí tastáil covid-19 don duine atá ina chónaí leat

translation.en: If that test is positive, you will be in close contact and need to restrict your movements.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn an tástáil sin dearfach beidh tusa i do ghartheagmhálaí agus beidh ort srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí.

translation.en: If the virus is not detected (negative result), you no longer need to restrict your movements.
translation.ga: Mura n-aimsítear an víreas (toradh diúltach) ní gá duit srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí níos mó.

translation.en: Continue to adhere to the advice on protecting yourself and others
translation.ga: Lean ort ag cloí leis an gcomhairle maidir le cosaint a thabhairt duit féin agus do dhaoine eile

translation.en: If someone living with you is waiting for a test result
translation.ga: Má tá duine a chónaíonn leat ag fanacht ar thoradh tástála

translation.en: Read advice on what to do if you live with someone who is waiting for a test result.
translation.ga: Léigh comhairle faoi cad ba chóir a dhéanamh má tá cónaí ort le duine atá ag fanacht ar thoradh tástála.

translation.en: Travel to ireland from another country
translation.ga: Taisteal go héirinn ó thír eile

translation.en: Restrict your movements for 14 days if you come from a non-high-risk country.
translation.ga: Cuir srian ar do ghluaiseachtaí ar feadh 14 lá má thagann tú ó thír nach bhfuil ardriosca ag baint léi.

translation.en: This means staying at home or in your accommodation.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo fanacht sa bhaile nó i do lóistín.

translation.en: Do not attend events such as funerals, parties or weddings.
translation.ga: Ná téigh chuig ócáidí ar nós sochraid, cóisir nó chuig bainis.

translation.en: Those from the green / orange regions of northern ireland do not have to restrict their movements.
translation.ga: Ní gá dóibh siúd a thagann ó réigiúin glas / oráiste nó ó thuaisceart na héireann srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí.

translation.en: Visit gov.ie for more information on travel and testing before coming to ireland.
translation.ga: Téigh chuig gov.ie le haghaidh eolas breise faoi thaistil agus tástáil roimh theacht go héirinn.

translation.en: There is different advice for people coming to ireland from high-risk countries. –
translation.ga: Tá comhairle difriúil do dhaoine a thagann go héirinn ó thíortha d ’ ardriosca. –

translation.en: See the list on gov.ie.
translation.ga: Féach an liosta ar gov.ie

translation.en: Treat the symptoms of coronavirus at home
translation.ga: Cóir leighis do chomharthaí an choróinvíris sa bhaile

translation.en: No vaccine is yet available, and no specific treatment is available for covid-19 (coronavirus).
translation.ga: Níl aon vacsaín ar fáil fós agus níl aon chóir leighis ar leith ar fáil le haghaidh covid-19 (coróinvíreas).

translation.en: But many of the symptoms of illness can be treated at home.
translation.ga: Ach is féidir cóir leighis a chur ar go leor de na comharthaí tinnis sa bhaile.

translation.en: 80% of people will be able to recover from the coronary virus at home and will not need to go to the hospital.
translation.ga: Beidh 80% de na daoine ábalta biseach a fháil ón choróinvíreas sa bhaile agus ní bheidh aon ghá dóibh dul isteach san ospidéal.

translation.en: The vaccines will be made available gradually to the whole community.
translation.ga: Cuirfear na vaicsaíní ar fáil de réir a chéile don phobal uilig.

translation.en: Find out more about the covid-19 vaccine
translation.ga: Tuilleadh eolais faoin vacsaín covid-19

translation.en: You should stay away if you develop symptoms to control the spread of covid-19.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit fanacht asat féin má thagann comharthaí ort chun srian a chur le scaipeadh covid-19.

translation.en: Call your gp or out-of-hours doctor and talk to them about getting a covid-19 test.
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh nó an dochtúir atá ar dualgas lasmuigh de ghnáthuaireanta agus labhair leis faoi thástáil covid-19 a fháil.

translation.en: Most importantly, protect others from covid-19.
translation.ga: An rud is tábhachtaí ná daoine eile a chosaint ó covid-19.

translation.en: Protecting those in vulnerable groups from the coronavirus is very important.
translation.ga: Tá sé rí-thábhachtach iad siúd atá i ngrúpaí atá i mbaol a chosaint ón gcoróinvíreas.

translation.en: You should:
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit:

translation.en: Self-isolation
translation.ga: Féin-aonrú

translation.en: Get enough sleep and rest time
translation.ga: Faigh dóthain codlata agus am scíthe

translation.en: Drink plenty of water to avoid dehydration.
translation.ga: Ól neart uisce chun díhiodráitiú a sheachaint.

translation.en: Your urine should be bright yellow or bright
translation.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh d ’ fhual geal-buí nó geal

translation.en: Eat healthily
translation.ga: Ith go sláintiúil

translation.en: Do not smoke
translation.ga: Ná caith tobac

translation.en: Fan you
translation.ga: Fan te

translation.en: Keep an eye out for signs of illness and treat them.
translation.ga: Coinnigh súil ar do chomharthaí tinnis agus glac cóir leighis lena n-aghaidh

translation.en: More information about the signs of the coronavirus:
translation.ga: Tuilleadh eolais faoi chomharthaí an choróinvírs:

translation.en: Fever
translation.ga: Fiabhras

translation.en: Cough
translation.ga: Casacht

translation.en: Shortness of breath
translation.ga: Giorra anála

translation.en: Lost or altered smell
translation.ga: Boladh caillte nó athraithe

translation.en: If your symptoms of illness get worse
translation.ga: Má éiríonn do chomharthaí tinnis níos measa

translation.en: Call your gp if your symptoms of illness do not improve
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh mura dtagann feabhas ar do chomharthai tinnis

translation.en: If you are over 60 or have a disease that puts you at greater risk for coronavirus, you should keep a close eye on your signs of illness..
translation.ga: Má tá tú os cionn 60 bliain d ’ aois nó má tá tinneas ort a fhágann go bhfuil tú i mbaol níos mó ón gcoróinvíreas, ba chóir duit súil ghéar a choimeád ar do chomharthai tinnis..

translation.en: Call your gp if the symptoms of illness get worse.
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh má éiríonn na comharthai tinnis níos measa.

translation.en: Medication for treatment
translation.ga: Cógas um chóir leighis

translation.en: The best medicine depends on your sympotoms:
translation.ga: Braitheann an cógas is fearr ar do:

translation.en: Symptoms of illness
translation.ga: Comharthaí tinnis

translation.en: Other health complications
translation.ga: Deacrachtaí sláinte eile

translation.en: Any other medical treatment you are receiving
translation.ga: Aon chóir leighis eile atá á fháil agat

translation.en: Paracetamol or ibuprofen may help lower your temperature and give you relief from your pains.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh paraicéiteamól nó ibuprofen cabhrú chun do theocht a ísliú agus faoiseamh a thabhairt duit ó do phianta.

translation.en: Paracetamol is recommended as the first line of treatment for most people.
translation.ga: Moltar paraicéiteamól mar an chéad chóir leighis don chuid is mó de na daoine.

translation.en: Read all the guidelines in the package before taking any medication.
translation.ga: Léigh na treoirlínte uilig sa bpacáiste sula dtógann tú aon chógas.

translation.en: Take advice from any health professional.
translation.ga: Glac le comhairle a thugann aon ghairmí sláinte duit.

translation.en: Antibiotics
translation.ga: Antaibheathaigh

translation.en: Antibiotics do not work against coronavirus or any other viruses.
translation.ga: Ní oibríonn antaibheathaigh in aghaidh coróinvíris ná aon víris eile.

translation.en: They will not give you relief from your symptoms of illness or help you to recover.
translation.ga: Ní thabharfaidh siad faoiseamh duit ó do chomharthaí tinnis ná ní chabhróidh siad leat biseach a fháil.

translation.en: Coronavirus is a virus that is not helped by antibiotics.
translation.ga: Is víreas atá sa choróinvíreas agus ní chabhraíonn antaibheathaigh leis.

translation.en: Ibuprofen
translation.ga: Ibuprofen

translation.en: It is okay to take anti-inflammatory medications (nsaids) if you have a coronary virus.
translation.ga: Tá sé ceart go leor cógais frith-athlastacha (nsaid) a thógáil má tá coróinvíreas ort.

translation.en: There is no evidence that it is dangerous.
translation.ga: Níl aon fhianaise ann go bhfuil baol ag baint leis.

translation.en: Only take one anti-inflammatory medication at a time.
translation.ga: Ná tóg ach cógas frith-athlastach amháin ag aon am.

translation.en: It is okay to take paracetamol and anti-inflammatory drugs such as ibuprofen together.
translation.ga: Tá sé ceart go leor paraicéiteamól agus cógas frith-athlastach ar nós ibuprofen a thógáil le chéile.

translation.en: Anti-inflammatory medications include:
translation.ga: I measc na gcógas frith-athlastach tá:

translation.en: Ibuprofen - brand names: Nurofen, actiprofen, advil, brufen, brupro, buplex, easofen, and fenopine.
translation.ga: Iobúpróifein – ainmneacha branda: Nurofen, actiprofen, advil, brufen, brupro, buplex, easofen, agus fenopine.

translation.en: Ibuprofen gel may contain the names: Nurofen, melfen, phorpain, ibugel and ibuleve
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh na hainmeacha: Nurofen, melfen, phorpain, ibugel agus ibuleve a bheith ar ghlóthach ibuprofen

translation.en: Naproxen - ainm branda: Naprosyn
translation.ga: Naproxen – ainm branda: Naprosyn

translation.en: Diclofenac - brand names: Voltarol, diclo, diclac, cataflam, difene and flector
translation.ga: Diclofenac – ainmneacha branda: Voltarol, diclo, diclac, cataflam, difene agus flector

translation.en: Visiting nursing homes and residential care centres
translation.ga: Ag dul ar cuairt chuig tithe altranais agus ionaid cúraim cónaitheacha

translation.en: People living in nursing homes and residential care facilities can have two of your le 4 have a weekly visit, provided the facility has a high level of vaccination.
translation.ga: Is féidir le daoine atá ina gcónaí i dtithe altranais agus i saoráidí cúraim chónaithe dhá suas le 4 chuairt a bheith acu sa tseachtain, ar an gcoinníoll go bhfuil leibhéal ard vacsaínithe ag an tsaoráid.

translation.en: This is done in compassionate circumstances under level 5 restrictions.
translation.ga: Déantar é seo ar chuinsí atruacha faoi shrianta leibhéal 5.

translation.en: Covid-19 can spread quickly and can do a lot of harm if received in a nursing home or residential care centre (scf).
translation.ga: Is féidir le covid-19 scaipeadh go gasta agus is féidir leis go leor dochair a dhéanamh má fhaigheann duine é i dteach altranais nó in ionad cúraim cónaitheach (scf).

translation.en: You can spread the virus, even if you only have mild symptoms, or if you have no symptoms or even if you feel well.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an víreas a scaipeadh, fiú mura bhfuil ort ach comharthaí éadroma, nó mura bhfuil aon chomhartha ort nó fiú má airíonn tú go maith.

translation.en: If you have recently arrived in ireland from britain or south africa, stay alone for 14 days and not visit a nursing home or residential care centre.
translation.ga: Má tháinig tú go héirinn ón bhreatain nó ón afraic theas le déanaí, fan asat féin ar feadh 14 lá agus ná tabhair cuairt ar theach altranais nó ar ionad cúraim cónaitheach.

translation.en: Visits
translation.ga: Cuairteanna

translation.en: The arrangements for visiting residents in nursing homes and residential care centres are as follows:
translation.ga: Is mar seo a leanas na socruithe maidir le cuairt a thabhairt ar chónaitheoirí i dtithe altranais agus ionaid cúraim cónaitheacha:

translation.en: One visit per week from one person under level 3 and level 4 restrictions
translation.ga: Cuairt amháin sa tseachtain ó dhuine amháin faoi shrianta leibhéal 3 agus leibhéal 4

translation.en: One fortnightly visit from one person under level 5 - for critical and compassionate reasons only
translation.ga: Cuairt amháin gach coicís ó dhuine amháin faoi leibhéal 5 – ar chúinsí criticiúla agus atruacha amháin

translation.en: Level 5 restrictions apply in the state.
translation.ga: Tá srianta leibhéal 5 i bhfeidhm sa stát.

translation.en: The visit should only last an hour.
translation.ga: Níor cheart go mairfeadh an chuairt ach uair an chloig.

translation.en: It is not necessary to visit the same person every time.
translation.ga: Ní gá gur an duine céanna a thiocfadh ar cuairt gach am.

translation.en: It is the resident 's choice whether or not to admit a visitor.
translation.ga: Is é rogha an chónaitheora cuairteoir a ligean isteach nó gan a ligean isteach.

translation.en: Talk to staff if a more extended visit is required, for example, at the end of life.
translation.ga: Labhair leis an bhfoireann má bhíonn cuairt níos faide de dhíth mar shampla ag deireadh saoil.

translation.en: In cases like this, more than one visitor may arrive.
translation.ga: I gcásanna mar seo d ’ fhéadfadh níos mó ná cuairteoir amháin teacht.

translation.en: If you have to visit in critical and compassionate circumstances, you should follow the advice below in the interests of keeping everyone safe.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn ort cuairt a thabhairt ar chúinsí criticiúla agus atruacha, ba chóir duit an chomhairle thíos a leanacht ar mhaithe le gach duine a choinneáil slán.

translation.en: Critical and compassionate visits
translation.ga: Cuairteanna criticiúla agus atruacha

translation.en: Additional visits for critical and compassionate circumstances may be permitted in cases such as:
translation.ga: Is féidir cuairteanna breise ar chúinsí criticiúla agus atruacha a cheadú i gcásanna mar seo:

translation.en: End of life
translation.ga: Deireadh saoil

translation.en: If a resident is very worried or upset and a visit from someone close to them may put them at ease
translation.ga: Má tá cónaitheoir an-bhuartha nó trína chéile agus go bhféadfadh cuairt ó dhuine gar dóibh é a chur ar a shuaimhneas

translation.en: If there is an important event in the life of the resident
translation.ga: Má tá ócáid thábhachtach i saol an chónaitheora

translation.en: If you do not have the opportunity to visit again for a few months or years, for example, if you are leaving the country or nearing the end of your life.
translation.ga: Mura mbeidh deis agat cuairt a thabhairt arís go ceann roinnt míonna nó blianta, mar shampla, má tá tú ag fágáil na tíre nó ag druidim le deireadh do shaoil.

translation.en: If you have to make financial or other arrangements or to advocate on behalf of the resident
translation.ga: Má bhíonn ort socruithe airgeadais nó eile a dhéanamh nó chun abhcóideacht a dhéanamh ar son an chónaitheora

translation.en: Outdoor visits
translation.ga: Cuairteanna lasmuigh

translation.en: Outdoor visits are permitted, as long as people stay two meters apart (social separation) at all times and if the resident is able to get outdoors.
translation.ga: Tá cuairteanna lasmuigh ceadaithe, an fhad agus go bhfanann daoine dhá mhéadar óna chéile (scaradh sóisialta) i gcónaí agus má tá an cónaitheoir in ann dul amach faoin aer.

translation.en: Such visits must be arranged in advance.
translation.ga: Ní mór cuairteanna mar seo a shocrú roimh ré.

translation.en: Visits at the window
translation.ga: Cuairteanna ag an bhfuinneog

translation.en: It is always possible to talk to residents outside of their open windows or on the phone but stay a safe distance from each other.
translation.ga: Is féidir i gcónaí labhairt le cónaitheoirí lasmuigh dá bhfuinneoga oscailte nó ar an bhfón ach fanacht achar sábháilte óna chéile.

translation.en: Such visits must be arranged in advance.
translation.ga: Caithfear cuairteanna den chineál seo a shocrú roimh ré.

translation.en: Before you visit
translation.ga: Sula dtugann tú cuairt

translation.en: The nursing home will usually seek the contact details of named visitors in advance.
translation.ga: Lorgóidh an teach altranais sonraí teagmhála na gcuairteoirí ainmnithe de ghnáth, roimh ré.

translation.en: Check in advance if it is ok to visit.
translation.ga: Seiceáil roimh ré an bhfuil sé ceart go leor cuairt a thabhairt.

translation.en: The staff will probably give you a specific time.
translation.ga: Is dócha go dtabharfaidh an fhoireann am ar leith duit.

translation.en: You will have to come and go at the agreed times.
translation.ga: Beidh ort teacht agus imeacht ag na hamanna atá aontaithe.

translation.en: You will be asked a number of questions before you visit to make sure you have no covid 19 sign.
translation.ga: Cuirfear roinnt ceisteanna ort sula dtagann tú ar cuairt chun a chinntiú nach bhfuil aon chomhartha covid 19 ort.

translation.en: Your temperature may be raised before you enter the centre.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go dtógfaí do theocht sula dtéann tú isteach san ionad.

translation.en: The management of the centre has the right to decide whether or not you can visit.
translation.ga: Tá sé de cheart ag bainistíocht an ionaid cinneadh a dhéanamh an féidir leat cuairt a thabhairt nó nach féidir.

translation.en: If you are unable to visit your relative, it may worry you.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé imní a chur ort mura mbíonn tú in ann cuairt a thabhairt ar do dhuine muinteartha.

translation.en: The restrictions are in place to keep you, your family member and the healthcare staff safe.
translation.ga: Tá na srianta i bhfeidhm chun tusa, do dhuine muinteartha agus an fhoireann chúraim sláinte a choinneáil slán.

translation.en: Sometimes a resident may have to leave with the visitor to deal with something very important such as some personal need, the death of a family member or a visit to a family grave.
translation.ga: Uaireanta d ’ fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh ar chónaitheoir fágáil leis an gcuairteoir chun déileáil le rud atá an-tábhachtach ar nós riachtanas pearsanta éigin, bás duine muinteartha nó cuairt ar uaigh duine clainne.

translation.en: A plan will be prepared to keep the resident as safe as possible for themselves and other residents.
translation.ga: Ullmhófar plean chun gur féidir an cónaitheoir a choinneáil chomh sábháilte agus is féidir ar mhaithe leis féin agus cónaitheoirí eile.

translation.en: Read about how to take care of your mental health during a coronary virus outbreak.
translation.ga: Léigh faoi conas aire a thabhairt do do mheabhairshláinte le linn ráig an choróinvíris.

translation.en: During your visit
translation.ga: Le linn do chuairte

translation.en: You will need to wear a face cover or medical mask during your visit.
translation.ga: Beidh ort clúdach aghaidhe nó masc leighis a chaitheamh le linn do chuairte.

translation.en: The cover should be left on you even if you are alone and 2 meters apart.
translation.ga: Ba chóir an clúdach a fhágáil ort fiú má bhíonn sibh libh féin agus 2 mhéadar óna chéile.

translation.en: In some cases, it is best to remove the mask:
translation.ga: I roinnt cásanna, b ’ fhearr an masc a bhaint díot:

translation.en: If it is too difficult to communicate with your family and wear the mask
translation.ga: Má bhíonn sé ró-dheacair cumarsáid a dhéanamh le do dhuine muinteartha agus an masc ort

translation.en: If your relative is unable to identify you with the mask on you
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil do dhuine muinteartha in ann tú a aithint leis an masc ort

translation.en: If the mask offends your loved one
translation.ga: Má chuireann an masc as do do dhuine muinteartha

translation.en: If you have trouble wearing a face mask, you can wear face masks.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn deacracht agat ag caitheamh clúdach aghaidhe, is féidir leat cealtair aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: Cells are not as good as face cover and may not give you or your family the same protection, but they will give you some protection.
translation.ga: Níl cealtair chomh maith le clúdach aghaidhe agus d ’ fhéadfadh nach dtabharfadh sé an chosaint chéanna duitse ná do do dhuine muinteartha ach tabharfaidh sé cosaint áirithe duit.

translation.en: You may also be asked to wear a protective apron.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go n-iarrfaí ort naprún cosanta a chaitheamh freisin.

translation.en: You must adhere to the advice on protecting yourself and others against covid-19
translation.ga: Ní mór duit cloí leis an chomhairle maidir le cosaint a thabhairt duit féin agus do dhaoine eile in aghaidh covid-19

translation.en: Wash your hands properly when entering and leaving patients
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha mar is ceart nuair a théann tú isteach agus amach as an áit a bhfuil na hothair

translation.en: You can bring a gift or anything else they want.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat bronntanas nó aon rud eile atá ag teastáil uathu a thabhairt isteach.

translation.en: Each visit usually lasts 1 hour.
translation.ga: Mairfidh gach cuairt 1 uair an chloig de ghnáth.

translation.en: If you need a more extended visit for compassionate circumstances, talk to staff about it.
translation.ga: Má tá cuairt níos faide uait ar chúinsí atruacha labhair leis an bhfoireann faoi.

translation.en: If an outbreak of the crown virus breaks out
translation.ga: Má bhriseann ráig den choróinvíreas amach

translation.en: If a covid-19 outbreak breaks out at the centre or facility, visits will be suspended for some time.
translation.ga: Má bhriseann ráig covid-19 amach san ionad nó san áis cuirfear stop leis na cuairteanna go ceann tamaill.

translation.en: One person will be able to make one fortnightly visit to residents under level 5 restrictions.
translation.ga: Beidh duine amháin in ann cuairt amháin a thabhairt sa choicís ar chónaitheoirí faoi shrianta leibhéal 5.

translation.en: Exceptions will be made in special cases, for example, if a person is in danger of death or if the outbreak is in a particular place.
translation.ga: Déanfar eisceachtaí i gcásanna speisialta, mar shampla, má tá duine i mbaol báis nó más in áit faoi leith atá an ráig san ionad.

translation.en: You can discuss this with the team.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat é seo a phlé leis an bhfoireann.

translation.en: Times you should not visit
translation.ga: Amanna nár chóir duit teacht ar cuairt

translation.en: Do not visit if:
translation.ga: Ná tabhair cuairt má:

translation.en: You have been told that you are a close contact with someone with the coronavirus
translation.ga: Dúradh leat gur gartheagmhálaí tú le duine a bhfuil an coróinvíreas air

translation.en: You have any signs of coronavirus or any other infection such as a cold or flu
translation.ga: Tá aon chomhartha den choróinvíress nó aon ionfhabhtú eile ar nós slaghdán nó fliú ort

translation.en: You have signs of gastroenteritis, such as diarrhea and vomiting
translation.ga: Tá comharthaí gaistreintríteas ort, mar shampla buinneach agus caitheamh amach

translation.en: If you have any of these illnesses, you should wait at least 2 days after the signal has gone before you visit.
translation.ga: Má tá aon cheann de na tinnis seo ort, ba chóir duit fanacht ar feadh 2 lá ar a laghad tar éis do na comhartha imeacht sula dtagann tú ar cuairt.

translation.en: If you are a close contact, you will need to stay alone for 14 days.
translation.ga: Más gartheagmhálaí tú, beidh ort fanacht asat féin ar feadh 14 lá.

translation.en: If you have been tested for covid-19, do not visit until you have been told that it is safe to do so.
translation.ga: Má fuair tú tástáil covid-19, ná tabhair cuairt go dtí go gcuirfear in iúl duit go bhfuil sé sábháilte é sin a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Last reviewed on: 07 / 01 / 2021
translation.ga: Rinneadh an t-athbhreithniú deireanach ar an leathanach: 07 / 01 / 2021

translation.en: Next review: 30 / 11 / 2023
translation.ga: Déanfar an chéad athbhreithniú eile: 30 / 11 / 2023

translation.en: Travel and the coronavirus
translation.ga: Taisteal agus an coróinvíreas

translation.en: Travel in ireland
translation.ga: Taisteal in éirinn

translation.en: The latest travel guide is available on gov.ie
translation.ga: Tá an treoir is déanaí maidir le taisteal ar fáil ar gov.ie

translation.en: How to set up a test
translation.ga: Conas tástáil a shocrú

translation.en: Stay at home - level 5 restrictions apply in ireland.
translation.ga: Fan sa bhaile – tá srianta leibhéal 5 i bhfeidhm in éirinn.

translation.en: Read about the restrictions at gov.ie
translation.ga: Léigh faoi na srianta ag gov.ie

translation.en: You can get a covid-19 (coronavirus) test, free of charge, if you have covid-19 symptoms and your gp thinks it is needed.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat tástáil covid-19 (coróinvíreas) a fháil, saor in aisce má tá comharthaí covid-19 ort agus má cheapann do dhochtúir teaghlaigh go bhfuil sé ag teastáil.

translation.en: If you are a close contact, you will receive a text message with a link to book a test online.
translation.ga: Más dlúth-theagmhálaí tú, gheobhaidh tú teachtaireacht téacs le nasc air chun tástáil a chur in áirithe ar líne.

translation.en: If you do not arrange an online test appointment, the contact tracking team will call you to arrange one.
translation.ga: Mura socraíonn tú coinne tástála ar líne, cuirfidh an fhoireann rianaithe teagmhála glaoch ort chun ceann a shocrú.

translation.en: Free gp assessment
translation.ga: Measúnú dochtúra teaghlaigh saor in aisce

translation.en: There will be no charge for the test or assessment by the gp or the out-of-hours gp service.
translation.ga: Ní ghearrfar aon táille ar an tástáil ná ar mheasúnú an dochtúra teaghlaigh nó ón tseirbhís dochtúra lasmuigh de gnáthuaireanta.

translation.en: Call your gp.
translation.ga: Cuir glaoch ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: Do not go to a gp clinic, pharmacy, or hospital.
translation.ga: Ná téigh chuig clinic dochtúra teaghlaigh, cógaslann, ná ospidéal.

translation.en: The gp will assess you over the phone.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh an dochtúir teaghlaigh measúnú ort ar an bhfón.

translation.en: If you do not have a gp, any gp can arrange the test for you.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil dochtúir teaghlaigh agat, is féidir le haon dochtúir teaghlaigh an tástáil a shocrú duit.

translation.en: The gp out-of-hours service can also arrange a test.
translation.ga: Is féidir leis an tseirbhís dochtúir teaghlaigh lasmuigh de ghnáthuaireanta tástáil a shocrú freisin.

translation.en: Hselive cannot order tests for covid-19.
translation.ga: Ní féidir le hselive tástálacha a ordú do covid-19.

translation.en: This is one line of information.
translation.ga: Is líne eolais amháin é seo.

translation.en: If you need to have a covid-19 test
translation.ga: Más gá tástáil covid-19 a dhéanamh ort

translation.en: If your gp decides you need to be tested, they will arrange a test appointment for you.
translation.ga: Má chinneann do dhochtúir teaghlaigh gur gá tástáil a dhéanamh ort, socróidh siad coinne tástála duit.

translation.en: You will need to self-isolate while waiting for your test.
translation.ga: Beidh ort féin-aonrú a dhéanamh agus tú ag fanacht le do thástáil.

translation.en: The people in your family will have to restrict their movements and not go to school or work.
translation.ga: Beidh ar na daoine i do theaghlach srian a chur ar a ngluaiseachtaí agus gan dul ar scoil ná ag an obair.

translation.en: You should have the test if your doctor decides that one is needed.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit an tástáil a dhéanamh má chinneann do dhochtúir go bhfuil ceann ag teastáil.

translation.en: You will know if you have covid-19 and the steps you should take to make sure you do not spread the virus.
translation.ga: Beidh a fhios agat an bhfuil covid-19 ort nó nach bhfuil agus na céimeanna gur chóir duit a thógail chun a chinntiú nach scaipfidh tú an víreas.

translation.en: It will help us find out how widespread the virus is spreading and make arrangements to combat the added pressure in the health system.
translation.ga: Cabhróidh sé linn fáil amach cé chomh fairsing agus atá an víreas ag scaipeadh agus socruithe a dhéanamh chun dul i ngleic leis an mbrú breise sa gcóras sláinte.

translation.en: Direct contacts
translation.ga: Gartheagmhálaithe

translation.en: We are not currently arranging tests for garter contacts.
translation.ga: Níl muid ag socrú tástálacha do gharteagmhálaithe i láthair na huaire.

translation.en: Priority is being given to people with symptoms of coronavirus.
translation.ga: Táthar ag tabhairt tús áite do dhaoine a bhfuil comharthaí an choróinvíris orthu.

translation.en: If you are a close contact, you need to restrict your movements (stay at home), even if you feel well.
translation.ga: Más gartheagmhálaí tú, caithfidh tú srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí (fan sa bhaile), fiú amháin má airíonn tú go maith.

translation.en: If you experience symptoms of covid-19, you need to self-isolate (stay in your room) and call your doctor for advice.
translation.ga: Má thagann comharthaí covid-19 ort, ní mór duit féin-aonrú (fan i do sheomra) agus glaoch a chur ar do dhochtúir chun comhairle a fháil.

translation.en: Details of your test appointment
translation.ga: Sonraí do choinne tástála

translation.en: You will receive a text message with the time and test centre details.
translation.ga: Gheobhaidh tú teachtaireacht téacs le sonraí ama agus an ionad tástála.

translation.en: The text will contain your reference number.
translation.ga: Beidh d ’ uimhir thagartha sa téacs.

translation.en: You will need to bring this with you to your appointment.
translation.ga: Beidh ort é seo a thabhairt leat ag do choinne.

translation.en: Most people will be tested in a public test centre - some are car service test centres.
translation.ga: Is in ionad tástála poiblí a ndéanfar an tástáil ar fhormhór na ndaoine - is ionaid thástála carrsheirbhíse cuid acu.

translation.en: Testing is by appointment only.
translation.ga: Is trí choinne amháin a dhéantar tástáil.

translation.en: Don't go to an unexpected test centre - you will not be tested.
translation.ga: Ná téigh chuig ionad tástála gan coinne - ní dhéanfar tástáil ort.

translation.en: Neither your doctor nor hselive has access to your reference number.
translation.ga: Níl teacht ag do dhochtúir ná ag hselive ar d ’ uimhir thagartha.

translation.en: Bring your phone
translation.ga: Tabhair leat d ’ fhón

translation.en: Bring your phone to the test centre or car service centre.
translation.ga: Tabhair leat d ’ fhón chuig an ionad tástála nó ionad carrsheirbhíse.

translation.en: If a garda stops you on your way to a test centre, display the text message about your appointment.
translation.ga: Má stopann garda tú ar do bhealach chuig ionad tástála, taispeáin an teachtaireacht téacs maidir le do choinne.

translation.en: Do not open your car window.
translation.ga: Ná hoscail fuinneog do chairr.

translation.en: Hold your phone by the window to show the details of your appointment to the garda.
translation.ga: Coinnigh d ’ fhón le hais na fuinneoige chun sonraí do choinne a thaispeáint don gharda.

translation.en: If you do not receive a text with test data
translation.ga: Mura bhfaigheann tú téacs le sonraí tástála

translation.en: If you do not receive a text within a day of going to your gp, call your gp.
translation.ga: Mura bhfaigheann tú téacs faoi cheann lá tar éis duit dul chuig do dhochtúir teaghlaigh, glaoigh ar an dochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: Make sure your mobile number is correct.
translation.ga: Déan cinnte go bhfuil d ’ uimhir fóin póca ceart aige.

translation.en: Changing a test appointment
translation.ga: Ag athrú coinne tástála

translation.en: The date or location of your test appointment can be changed using the text message you received with the details of your test appointment.
translation.ga: Is féidir dáta nó láthair do choinne tástála a athrú ag baint úsáide as an téacsteachtaireacht a fuair tú le sonraí do choinne tástála.

translation.en: You can also cancel your appointment.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat do choinne a chur ar ceal freisin.

translation.en: To change or cancel your test appointment:
translation.ga: Chun do choinne tástála a athrú nó a chur ar ceal:

translation.en: Open the text message.
translation.ga: Oscail an téacsteachtaireacht.

translation.en: Click on the link 'for more information...'
translation.ga: Gliogáil ar an nasc 'for more information...'

translation.en: A web page with details of your test appointment will open.
translation.ga: Osclóidh leathanach gréasáin le sonraí do choinne tástála air.

translation.en: Click on the appropriate link to change or cancel your appointment.
translation.ga: Gliogáil ar an nasc chuí chun do choinne a athrú nó a chur ar ceal.

translation.en: If your symptoms of illness get worse
translation.ga: Má éiríonn do chomharthaí tinnis nios measa

translation.en: If you get worse while waiting for your test, call your gp.
translation.ga: Má éiríonn tú níos measa agus tú ag fanacht le do thástáil, glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: If you have difficulty breathing or are not feeling well, call 112 or 999 and tell them about your symptoms.
translation.ga: Má bhionn deacrachtaí análaithe agat nó mura n-airíonn tú go maith cuir glaoch ar 112 nó 999 agus inis dóibh faoi na comharthaí atá ort.

translation.en: If your gp decides you do not need to be tested
translation.ga: Má shocraíonn do dhochtúir teaghlaigh nach gá tástáil a dhéanamh ort

translation.en: If your gp decides that you do not need a test, you will be asked to stay home until you are free of symptoms for 48 hours.
translation.ga: Má shocraionn do dhochtúir teaghlaigh nach gá tástáil a dhéanamh ort, iarrfar ort fanacht sa bhaile go dtí go mbeidh tú saor ó chomharthaí ar feadh 48 uair an chloig

translation.en: However, if you are in close contact with someone with covid-19, you should follow the advice on restricting your movements.
translation.ga: Ach, má bhíonn tú i ngartheagmháil le duine a bhfuil covid-19 air / uirthi, ba chóir duit an chomhairle maidir le srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí a leanacht.

translation.en: Stay home for two weeks, even if your test was negative or the doctor thinks another test is not needed.
translation.ga: Fan sa bhaile ar feadh coicíse, fiú más toradh diúltach a bhí ar do thástáil nó má shíleann an dochtúir nach bhfuil tástáil eile ag teastáil.

translation.en: If you are not a close contact, you can return to your normal daily activities:
translation.ga: Mura gartheagmhálaí thú, is féidir leat filleadh ar do ghnáth gníomhaíochtaí laethúla:

translation.en: Unless you have a temperature of 38 degrees celsius or more (as long as the temperature is not lowered by paracetamol or ibuprofen)
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil teocht 38 céim celsius nó níos mó ort (an fhad is nach bhfuil an teocht íslíthe ag paraicéiteamól nó iobúproiféin)

translation.en: Unless you have a new cough
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil casacht nua agat

translation.en: Unless you live with someone who is ill and may have covid-19
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil cónaí ort le duine atá tinn agus go bhféadfadh covid-19 a bheith air / uirthi

translation.en: If your gp has told you that your illness is caused by something other than covid-19,
translation.ga: Má d ’ inis dochtúir teaghlaigh duit gur rud éigin eile seachas covid-19 is cúis le do thinnis,

translation.en: If you tested negative for covid-19 and have not had symptoms for 48 hours
translation.ga: Má fuair tú toradh tástála diúltach ar thástáil covid-19 agus mura bhfuil comharthaí ort le 48 uair an chloig

translation.en: Unless you have had diarrhea for 48 hours
translation.ga: Mura raibh buinneach ort le 48 uair an chloig

translation.en: There is a limit to what the test for covid-19 can do
translation.ga: Tá teorainn leis an méid is féidir leis an tástáil don covid-19 a dhéanamh

translation.en: No complete test is accurate.
translation.ga: Níl aon tástáil iomlán cruinn.

translation.en: There is a limit to what any test can do, including the test for covid-19.
translation.ga: Tá teorainn leis an méid is féidir le haon tástáil a dhéanamh, an tástáil don covid-19 ina measc.

translation.en: The test will detect the virus in most people with symptoms of illness.
translation.ga: Aimseoidh an tástáil an víreas i bhformhór na ndaoine a bhfuil comharthaí tinnis orthu.

translation.en: However, in some cases, the test will not detect the virus.
translation.ga: Ach i gcásanna áirithe ní aimseoidh an tástáil an víreas.

translation.en: Not all cases of coronavirus are detected.
translation.ga: Ní aimsítear gach cás den choróinvíreas.

translation.en: Some samples may be misplaced, or the patient may not be identifiable.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh cuid de na samplaí dul amú nó nach bhféadaí an t-othar a aithint.

translation.en: This can happen due to human error.
translation.ga: Is féidir leis seo tarlú de bharr earráid dhaonna.

translation.en: Everything is done to ensure that this does not happen and every effort is made to connect the samples to the correct patient.
translation.ga: Déantar gach rud chun a chinntiú nach dtarlóidh seo agus déantar gach iarracht na samplaí a cheangal leis an othar ceart.

translation.en: Before you are tested
translation.ga: Sula ndéanfar an tástáil ort

translation.en: While you are waiting for your test appointment, you should behave as if you have the virus and stay alone for 14 days.
translation.ga: An fhad is atá tú ag fanacht le do choinne tástála, ba chóir duit tú féin a iompar ar nós go bhfuil an víreas ort agus fanacht asat féin ar feadh 14 lá.

translation.en: People in your family will have to restrict their movements.
translation.ga: Beidh ar dhaoine i do theaghlach srian a chur ar a ngluaiseachtaí.
