translation.en: Treat your symptoms of illness at home.
translation.ga: Cuir cóir leighis ar do chomharthaí tinnis sa bhaile.

translation.en: Drink plenty of water to avoid dehydration - your urine should be light or clean yellow.
translation.ga: Ól neart uisce chun díhiodráitiúchán a sheachaint - ba chóir dath buí éadrom nó glan a bheith ar do chuid fuail.

translation.en: Paracetamol or ibuprofen may help with symptoms such as pain or fever.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh paraicéiteamól nó iobúpróifein cabhrú le comharthaí cosúil le pian nó fiabhras.

translation.en: Series tests
translation.ga: Sraiththástálacha

translation.en: Covid-19 serial tests are performed on several groups of uninfected people.
translation.ga: Déantar sraiththástálacha covid-19 ar roinnt grúpaí daoine nach bhfuil ionfhabhtú orthu.

translation.en: The series tests are carried out on a voluntary basis, sometimes periodically and weekly,
translation.ga: Déantar na sraiththástálacha ar bhonn dheonach, arís go tréimhsiúil agus go seachtainiúil uaireanta,

translation.en: The series test is provided to people in specific locations where infection may occur.
translation.ga: Cuirtear an sraiththástáil ar fáil do dhaoine i láthreacha ar leith ina bhféadfadh ionfhabhtú tarlú iontu.

translation.en: For example, workplaces (meat factory) or other establishments such as a residential care centre or direct provision centre).
translation.ga: Mar shampla, láithreacha oibre (monarcha feola) nó ionaid eile ar nós ionad cúraim cónaitheach nó ionad soláthair dhírigh).

translation.en: If you have a series test, you can go to school or work as usual if you do not have covid-19 symptoms or if you test positive for covid-19.
translation.ga: Má tá sraiththástáil á dhéanamh ort, is féidir leat dul ar scoil nó chuig an obair mar is gnáth muradtagann comharthaí covid-19 ort nó má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19.

translation.en: If this is the case, you will need to be self-isolated, and your close contacts will need to restrict their movements.
translation.ga: Más amhlaidh an cás, beidh ort féin-aonrú agus beidh ar do ghartheagmhálaithe srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí.

translation.en: Why diet and nutrition help your health
translation.ga: An fáth a gcuidíonn aiste bia agus cothú le do shláinte

translation.en: It is important for all of us to eat healthy food.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach dúinn uilig bia folláin a ithe.

translation.en: It helps us stay as healthy as we can.
translation.ga: Cabhraíonn sé linn fanacht chomh sláintiúil agus is féidir linn.

translation.en: But eating healthy food is sometimes not easy.
translation.ga: Ach níl sé éasca uaireanta bia folláin a ithe.

translation.en: Only a third of the irish population eat the recommended amount of vegetables, salads and fruit every day.
translation.ga: Ní itheann ach trian de dhaonra na héireann an méid glasraí, sailéid agus torthaí atá molta gach lá.

translation.en: Many people eat unhealthy food, such as chocolate, cakes and biscuits, every day.
translation.ga: Itheann go leor daoine bia nach bhfuil folláin, ar nós seacláid, cácaí agus brioscaí gach lá.

translation.en: In ireland, 62% of the adult population is overweight or obese.
translation.ga: In éirinn, tá 62% den daonra fásta róthrom nó murtallach.

translation.en: One in four children is seven years old, overweight or obese.
translation.ga: Tá páiste as gach ceathrar seacht mbliana d ’ aois, róthrom nó murtallach.

translation.en: Benefits of healthy eating
translation.ga: Buntáistí a bhaineann le bia folláin

translation.en: Healthy eating will help you avoid certain diseases.
translation.ga: Cabhróidh bia folláin leat galair áirithe a sheachaint.

translation.en: If you have kids, they will follow your good example of eating healthy food.
translation.ga: Má tá páistí agat, leanfaidh siad do dhea-shample maidir le bia folláin a ithe.

translation.en: Eating healthy food can lead to the following.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh na rudaí seo a leanas a bheith mar thoradh ar bhia folláin a ithe.

translation.en: Healthy weight
translation.ga: Meáchan sláintiúil

translation.en: Healthy weightless risk of developing type 2 diabetes, heart disease and cancer
translation.ga: Níos lú baol go bhfaigheadh duine diaibéiteas cineál 2, galar croí agus ailse

translation.en: Healthy cholesterol level
translation.ga: Leibhéal colaistéaróil folláin

translation.en: A better understanding of well-being
translation.ga: Tuiscint níos fearr ar fholláine

translation.en: Diet, nutrition and your body
translation.ga: Aiste bia, cothú agus do chorp

translation.en: Food contains nutrients such as protein, fat and vitamins.
translation.ga: Tá cothaithigh mar phróitéin, saill agus vitimíní i mbia.

translation.en: Your body needs the right mix of nutrients to be healthy and wholesome.
translation.ga: Teastaíonn an meascán ceart de chothaithigh ó do chorp chun a bheith sláintiúil agus folláin.

translation.en: Different foods contain different nutrients.
translation.ga: Tá cothaithigh éagsúla i mbianna éagsúla.

translation.en: If you choose a combination of foods every day, you will be able to get all the nutrients you need to grow and be healthy.
translation.ga: Má roghnaíonn tú meascán de bhia gach lá, beidh tú ábalta na cothaithigh go léir a theastaíonn uait a fháil chun fás agus a bheith folláin.

translation.en: That ’ s what a balanced diet means.
translation.ga: Sin an chiall atá le haiste bia chothrom.

translation.en: The same types of nutrients are grouped as follows:
translation.ga: Cuirtear na cineálacha céanna cothaithigh i ngrúpaí mar a leanas:

translation.en: Vegetables, salads and fruit
translation.ga: Glasraí, sailéid agus torthaí

translation.en: Wholegrain cereals and bread, potatoes, pasta and rice
translation.ga: Gránaigh agus arán lánghráin, prátaí, pasta agus rís

translation.en: Low-fat milk, yoghurt and cheese
translation.ga: Bainne ar bheagán saille, iógart agus cáis

translation.en: Fat-free meat, poultry, fish, eggs, beans and nuts
translation.ga: Feoil gan gheir, éineoil, éisc, uibheacha, pónairí agus cnónna

translation.en: Fats, spreads and oils
translation.ga: Saillte, leatháin agus olaí

translation.en: The body gets energy (calories) from the food you eat.
translation.ga: Faigheann an corp fuinneamh (calraí) ón mbia a itheann tú.

translation.en: If you take in more calories than you use, you will gain weight and become overweight.
translation.ga: Má ghlacann tú níos mó calraí isteach ná mar a úsáideann tú, cuirfidh tú meáchan suas agus beidh tú róthrom.

translation.en: If you do not take in enough calories, you will be below normal weight.
translation.ga: Mura nglacann tú go leor calraí isteach, beidh tú faoi bhun an ghnáthmheáchain.

translation.en: Either of these is bad for your health.
translation.ga: Tá ceachtar acu seo go dona do do shláinte.

translation.en: Eat healthy food
translation.ga: Bia folláin a ithe

translation.en: Making small changes to your diet can make a big difference to your health now and in the future.
translation.ga: Dá ndéanfá athruithe beaga ar d ’ aiste bia, d ’ fhéadfadh sé difríochtaí móra a dhéanamh do do shláinte anois agus sa todhchaí.

translation.en: Treat the symptoms of coronavirus at home
translation.ga: Déan cóireáil ar chomharthaí an choróinvíris sa bhaile

translation.en: There is no specific treatment for covid-19, but some covid-19 symptoms can be treated at home.
translation.ga: Níl cóireáil ar leith ann do covid-19 ach is féidir cóireáil a dhéanamh ar roinnt chomharthaí covid-19 a chóireáil sa bhaile.

translation.en: 80% of people will recover at home - they will not have to go to the hospital.
translation.ga: Tiocfaidh biseach ar 80% de na daoine sa bhaile – ní bheidh orthu dul go dtí an ospidéal.

translation.en: The vaccines will be delivered in stages, and therefore, it will take some time to vaccinate the entire population.
translation.ga: Beidh na vacsaíní á sheachadadh i gcéimeanna agus dá bhrí sin tógfaidh sé tamall chun an daonra iomlán a vacsaíniú.

translation.en: If you experience symptoms of illness, you should self-isolate to prevent the spread of covid-19.
translation.ga: Má thagann comharthaí tinnis ort, ba chóir duit féin-aonrú chun cosc a chur ar scaipeadh covid-19.

translation.en: Call your gp or gp out of hours to discuss your symptoms of illness and find out if a covid-19 test is needed.
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh nó dochtúir teaghlaigh lasmuigh de ghnáthuaireanta, chun do chomharthaí tinnis a phlé agus fáil amach an bhfuil gá le tástáil covid-19.

translation.en: The most important thing you can do is make sure you do not spread the coronavirus to others.
translation.ga: Is é an rud is tábhachtaí gur féidir leat a dhéanamh ná a chinntiú nach scaipeann tú an choróinvíreas ar dhaoine eile.

translation.en: It is extremely important to protect people at the greatest risk.
translation.ga: Tá sé thar a bheith tábhachtach chun daoine sa bhaol is mó a chosaint.

translation.en: You should:
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit:

translation.en: Remaining in self-isolation
translation.ga: Fanacht asat féin féin-aonrú

translation.en: Plenty of sleep
translation.ga: Neart codladh a dhéanamh

translation.en: Drink plenty of water to avoid dehydration.
translation.ga: Ól do dhothain uisce chun díhíodráitiú a sheachaint.

translation.en: The color of your urine should be light yellow or clean
translation.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh dath do mhún buí éadrom nó glan

translation.en: Eat healthy
translation.ga: Ith go sláintiúil

translation.en: Do not smoke
translation.ga: Ná bí ag caitheamh tobac

translation.en: Keep warm
translation.ga: Coimead te

translation.en: Keep an eye on and treat your symptoms
translation.ga: Bí ag coinneáil súil ar agus ag cóireáil do chomharthaí

translation.en: Read more about:
translation.ga: Léigh níos mó faoi:

translation.en: Fever
translation.ga: Fiabhras

translation.en: Cough - any cough is not just a dry cough
translation.ga: Casacht – casacht ar bith ní casacht thirim amháin

translation.en: Shortness of breath
translation.ga: Giorra anála

translation.en: Altered or lost smell
translation.ga: Boladh athraithe nó caillte

translation.en: If your symptoms get worse
translation.ga: Má éiríonn do chomharthaí níos measa

translation.en: Call your gp if you do not feel well.
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh mura dtagann feabhas ort.

translation.en: If you are over 60 or have a condition that puts you at greater risk from coronavirus, keep a close eye on your symptoms.
translation.ga: Má tá tú os cionn 60 bliain nó go bhfuil riocht ort a chiallaíonn go bhfuil baol níos mó ann duit ón gcoróinvíreas, coinnigh súil gear ar do chomharthaí.

translation.en: Call your gp immediately if they do not get worse.
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar an dochtúir teaghlaigh láithreach ná éiríonn siad níos measa.

translation.en: Medications to treat symptoms of illness
translation.ga: Cógais leighis chun comharthaí tinnis a chóireáil

translation.en: The medicines used will depend on:
translation.ga: Beidh na cógais a úsáidtear ag brath ar:

translation.en: The symptoms of illness
translation.ga: Na comharthaí tinnis

translation.en: You have another medical condition
translation.ga: Riocht leighis eile atá ort

translation.en: Any other medications you are taking
translation.ga: Aon chógais eile atá á thógáil agat

translation.en: Paracetamol or ibuprofen will help to lower your temperature and treat your pains.
translation.ga: Cabhróidh paraicéiteamól nó iobúproifein chun do theocht a ísliú agus cóireáil a dhéanamh ar do phianta.

translation.en: Paracetamol is the main medication recommended as a medical treatment for most people.
translation.ga: Is paraicéiteamól an phríomh chógais a moltar mar chóireáil leighis d ’ fhormhór na ndaoine.

translation.en: Before taking any medication, be sure to read the information on the accompanying leaflet.
translation.ga: Sula dtógann tú aon chógais, bí cinnte an t-eolas ar an mbileog a thagann leis a léamh.

translation.en: Follow the advice given to you by a health professional.
translation.ga: Lean an chomhairle a chuireann gairmí sláinte ort.

translation.en: Antibiotics
translation.ga: Antaibheathaigh

translation.en: Antibiotics do not kill the crown virus or any other virus.
translation.ga: Ní mharaíonn antaibheathaigh an coróinvíreas ná aon víreas eile.

translation.en: They will not help your symptoms of illness and will not speed up your recovery.
translation.ga: Ní chabhróidh siad le do chomharthaí tinnis agus ní bhrostóidh siad do théarnamh.

translation.en: Coronavirus is a virus, and antibiotics cannot treat viruses.
translation.ga: Is víreas atá sa choróinvíreas agus ní féidir le hantaibheathaigh víris a chóireáil.

translation.en: Iobúproifein
translation.ga: Iobúproifein

translation.en: It is okay to take ibuprofen or other anti-inflammatory drugs (nsaids) if you have the coronary virus.
translation.ga: Tá sé ceart go leor iobúproifein nó drugaí frith-athlastacha (nsaid) eile a thógáil má tá an choróinvíreas ort.

translation.en: There is no evidence that they are unsafe.
translation.ga: Níl aon fhianaise ann nach bhfuil siad sábháilte.

translation.en: Only take one of the anti-inflammatory drugs at a time.
translation.ga: Ná tóg ach aon cheann amháin de na drugaí frith-athlastacha ag an am.

translation.en: It is okay to take paracetamol and an anti-inflammatory drug at the same time.
translation.ga: Tá sé ceart go leor paraicéiteamól agus druga frith-athlastach a thógáil ag an am céanna.

translation.en: Anti-inflammatory drugs include:
translation.ga: Áirítear na drugaí frith-athlastacha:

translation.en: Iobúproifein - brand names: Nurofen, actiprofen, advil, brufen, brupro, buplex, easofen, and fenopine.
translation.ga: Iobúproifein – ainmneacha branda: Nurofen, actiprofen, advil, brufen, brupro, buplex, easofen, and fenopine.

translation.en: Ibuprofen gel is called nurofen, melfen, porpain, ibugel and ibuleve
translation.ga: Tugtar nurofen, melfen, phorpain, ibugel agus ibuleve ar glóthach iobúproifein

translation.en: Naproxen - ainm branda: Naprosyn
translation.ga: Naproxen – ainm branda: Naprosyn

translation.en: Diclofenac - brand name: Voltarol, diclo, diclac, cataflam, difene and flector
translation.ga: Diclofenac – ainm branda: Voltarol, diclo, diclac, cataflam, difene agus flector

translation.en: Healthy food for families
translation.ga: Bia sláintiúil do theaghlaigh

translation.en: Children grow fast, so they need food to get the right amount of energy, protein and other nutrients.
translation.ga: Fásann páistí go gasta, agus mar sin teastaíonn bia uathu chun an méid ceart fuinnimh, próitéine agus cothaithigh eile a fháil.

translation.en: Eating healthy food will help children grow, learn and play.
translation.ga: Cabhróidh sé leis na páistí fás, foghlaim agus súgradh má itheann siad bia folláin.

translation.en: It will also help prevent various illnesses, such as heart disease, type 2 diabetes and cancer when they grow up.
translation.ga: Cabhróidh sé freisin le tinnis éagsúla a sheachaint, cosúil le galar croí, diaibéiteas cineál 2 agus ailse nuair a bheidh siad fásta suas.

translation.en: You can use the food pyramid to plan meals and snacks for children over 5 years old.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat pirimid an bhia a úsáid chun béilí agus sneaiceanna a phleanáil do pháistí atá os cionn 5 bliana d ’ aois.

translation.en: How to eat well
translation.ga: Conas ithe go maith

translation.en: Types of healthy food
translation.ga: Cineálacha bia folláin

translation.en: Sometimes it is difficult for busy families to eat good food every day.
translation.ga: Uaireanta bíonn sé deacair ar theaghlaigh gnóthacha bia maith a ithe gach lá.

translation.en: But good habits that children learn at home will stay with them for the rest of their lives.
translation.ga: Ach fanfaidh dea-nósanna a fhoghlaimíonn páistí sa mbaile leo ar feadh a saoil.

translation.en: What children are advised to eat according to the food pyramid:
translation.ga: Céard a mholtar do pháistí a ithe de réir phirimid an bhia:

translation.en: Healthy food for children
translation.ga: Bia sláintiúil do leanaí

translation.en: Every parent wants the best for their child as they grow up.
translation.ga: Tá gach tuismitheoir ag iarraidh an rud is fearr dá leanbh agus iad ag fás.

translation.en: What young children eat and drink is important for their health now and in the future.
translation.ga: Tá an méid a itheann agus a ólann leanaí óga tábhachtach dá sláinte anois agus sa todhchaí.

translation.en: Healthy school lunch
translation.ga: Lón scoile sláintiúil

translation.en: It is sometimes difficult to provide a healthy, interesting lunch that school children would enjoy. Children get one-third of their daily nutritional needs from their lunch, so it ’ s important to do some thinking and planning about it.
translation.ga: Bíonn sé deacair uaireanta lón sláintiúil, suimiúil a thaitneodh le leanaí scoile a chur ar fáilfaigheann leanaí aon trian dá riachtanais chothaithe laethúla óna lón, mar sin tá sé tábhachtach roinnt machnaimh agus pleanála a dhéanamh faoi.

translation.en: How to make healthier choices
translation.ga: Conas roghanna níos sláintiúla a dhéanamh

translation.en: Making healthy choices is often not easy.
translation.ga: Ní bhíonn sé éasca roghanna sláintiúla a dhéanamh go minic.

translation.en: It doesn ’ t have to be perfect.
translation.ga: Ní gá a bheith foirfe.

translation.en: It involves making changes.
translation.ga: Tús a chur le hathruithe atá i gceist leis.

translation.en: Stick with them, and you will succeed.
translation.ga: Coinnigh leo agus éireoidh leat.

translation.en: Good habits that our children learn at home will stay with them for a lifetime.
translation.ga: Fanfaidh dea-nósanna a fhoghlaimíonn ár leanaí sa bhaile leo ar feadh a saoil.

translation.en: Small changes in diet and activity for children can make a big difference to their future health.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh athruithe beaga ar an aiste bia agus ar ghníomhaíocht do leanaí difríochtaí móra a dhéanamh dá sláinte sa todhchaí.

translation.en: If your kids see that you are active and eating healthy food at all times, they are more likely to do the same.
translation.ga: Má fheiceann do pháistí go bhfuil tú gníomhach agus ag ithe bia sláintiúil i gcónaí is dócha go ndéanfaidh siad mar a chéile.

translation.en: The right weight for your child
translation.ga: An meáchan cuí do do pháiste

translation.en: Many children in ireland (about one in five) are overweight.
translation.ga: Tá go leor páistí in éirinn (thart ar dhuine as cúigear) róthrom.

translation.en: Many parents are unaware that their children are carrying too much weight.
translation.ga: Níl a fhios ag a lán tuismitheoirí go bhfuil an iomarca meáchain á iompar ag a bpáistí.

translation.en: For the most part, eating more food than they need to grow and activity will add up weight.
translation.ga: I gcás a bhformhór, má itheann siad níos mó bia ná mar a theastaíonn uathu chun fás agus do ghníomhaíocht cuirfidh siad suas meáchan.

translation.en: If children are overweight, it can create health problems for them in the future.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn páistí róthrom d ’ fhéadfadh sé fadhbanna sláinte a chruthú dóibh amach anseo.

translation.en: Ask your gp or nurse to measure your child's weight and height during your next visit.
translation.ga: Iarr ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh nó altra meáchan agus airde do pháiste a thomhais le linn do chéad chuairt eile.

translation.en: They will be able to tell you if your child is overweight or obese.
translation.ga: Beidh siad in ann a rá leat an bhfuil do pháiste róthrom nó murtallach.

translation.en: They will use a growth chart to find out if your child is currently overweight or overweight.
translation.ga: Úsáidfidh siad cairt fáis le fáil amach an bhfuil meáchan ceart ar do pháiste i láthair na huaire nó an bhfuil sé / sí ró-throm.

translation.en: If your child is overweight if they reduce the amount of food they eat and become more active, they will achieve the right weight.
translation.ga: Má tá do pháiste róthrom, má laghdaítear an méid bia a itheann sé agus má bhíonn sé níos gníomhaí éireoidh leis an meáchan cuí a bhaint amach.

translation.en: Check your child's body mass index (bmi) on the nhs healthy weight calculator.
translation.ga: Seiceáil innéacs corpmhaise do linbh (bmi) ar áireamhán meáchain sláintiúil an nhs.

translation.en: You can also use this calculator to check your own bmi to see if you have a healthy weight.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an t-áireamhán seo a úsáid freisin chun do bmi féin a sheiceáil le fáil amach an bhfuil meáchan sláintiúil agat féin.

translation.en: It becomes difficult to talk to your child about weight.
translation.ga: Bíonn sé deacair labhairt le do pháiste faoi mheáchan.

translation.en: When talking about weight with your child, it is important to emphasize health.
translation.ga: Nuair bhíonn tú ag caint faoi mheáchan le do pháiste, tá sé tábhachtach an bhéim a chur ar an tsláinte.

translation.en: Balance exercises
translation.ga: Cleachtaí cothromaíochta

translation.en: These balance exercises can be done at home to help your health and to improve your mobility.
translation.ga: Is féidir na cleachtaí cothromaíochta seo a dhéanamh sa bhaile chun cabhrú le do shláinte agus chun do shoghluaisteacht a fheabhsú.

translation.en: Don't worry if you haven't done much in a while- this exercise is easy.
translation.ga: Ná bí buartha mura ndearna tú mórán le tamall anuas- tá an aclaíocht seo éasca.

translation.en: Wear loose, comfortable clothing and keep a water bottle near you.
translation.ga: Caith éadaí scaoilte, compordach agus coinnigh buidéal uisce in aice leat.

translation.en: Take it easy at first and gradually increase the amount of exercise you do.
translation.ga: Tóg go bog é i dtosach agus méadaigh an méid aclaíochta a dhéanann tú de réir a chéile.

translation.en: Try to do this exercise at least twice a week and do it with:
translation.ga: Déan iarracht an aclaíocht seo a dhéanamh dhá uair sa tseachtain ar a laghad agus déan iad in éineacht le:

translation.en: Exercises in your sitting
translation.ga: Cleachtaí i do shuí

translation.en: Flexibility exercises
translation.ga: Cleachtaí solúbthachta

translation.en: Agility to strengthen you
translation.ga: Aclaíocht le tú a láidriú

translation.en: Walking aside
translation.ga: Ag siúl go leataobh

translation.en: Stand with your legs together and your knees slightly bent.
translation.ga: Seas le do chosa le chéile, agus do ghlúine lúbtha beagáinín.

translation.en: Take a slow, slow step aside, move one leg aside at first.
translation.ga: Tóg coiscéim go mall réidh ar leataobh, bog cos amháin ar leataobh i dtosach.

translation.en: Move your other foot as far as her
translation.ga: Bog do chos eile chomh fada léi

translation.en: Do not lower your hips while doing this.
translation.ga: Ná scaoil do chorróga síos agus tú á dhéanamh seo.

translation.en: Take 10 steps in each direction or move from one side of the room to the other
translation.ga: Tóg 10 gcoiscéim i ngach treo nó bog ó thaobh amháin den seomra go dtí an taobh eile

translation.en: Simple fines
translation.ga: Finiúna simplí

translation.en: This involves walking aside while putting one foot over your other.
translation.ga: S éard atá i gceist leis seo ná siúl ar leataobh agus tú ag cur cos thar do chos eile.

translation.en: First, place your right foot over your left foot
translation.ga: Ar dtús, cuir do chos dheas thar do chos chlé

translation.en: Then place your left foot over your right foot
translation.ga: Ansin, cuir do chos chlé thar do chos dheas

translation.en: Make five cross-steps on each side.
translation.ga: Déan 5 chros-chéim ar gach taobh.

translation.en: If necessary, place your fingers against the wall to keep you in your position.
translation.ga: Más gá, cuir do mhéara i gcoinne an bhalla le tú a choinneáil i do sheasamh.

translation.en: It is best to take small steps, as you will work more on your balance this way.
translation.ga: Is fearr céimeanna beaga a thógáil, mar deanfaidh tú níos mó oibre ar do chothromaíocht ar an mbealach seo.

translation.en: Heel-to-toe walk
translation.ga: Siúlóid sáil-le-barraicín

translation.en: Stand up straight, place your right heel on the floor just in front of your left toe.
translation.ga: Seas suas go díreach, cuir do sháil dheas ar an urlár díreach os comhair do ladhar chlé.

translation.en: Then do the same with your left heel.
translation.ga: Ansin déan an rud céanna le do sháil chlé.

translation.en: Make sure you are looking straight ahead.
translation.ga: Déan cinnte go bhfuil tú ag féachaint díreach romhat.

translation.en: If necessary, place your fingers against the wall to keep you in your position.
translation.ga: Más gá, cuir do mhéara i gcoinne an bhalla le tú a choinneáil i do sheasamh.

translation.en: Take at least five steps.
translation.ga: Tóg 5 chéim ar a laghad.

translation.en: Move away from the wall as you get better.
translation.ga: Bog amach ón mballa de réir mar a thagann feabhas ort.

translation.en: Standing on one leg
translation.ga: Ag seasamh ar leathchos

translation.en: First, stand in front of the wall, with your hands outstretched and your fingers hitting the wall.
translation.ga: Ar dtús, seas os comhair an bhalla, le do lámha sínte amach agus do mhéara ag bualadh an bhalla.

translation.en: Lift your left leg, keep your hips flat and bend the other leg slightly.
translation.ga: Tóg do chos chlé, coinnigh do chorróga cothrom agus lúb an chos eile beagán.

translation.en: Gently place your foot back on the floor.
translation.ga: Cuir do chos ar ais go réidh ar an urlár.

translation.en: Hold your foot up for 5 to 10 seconds and do three exercises on each side.
translation.ga: Coinnigh do chos in airde ar feadh 5 go 10 soicind agus déan 3 chleachtadh ar gach taobh.

translation.en: Step-up
translation.ga: Céim-suas

translation.en: Use a step with a railing or stay near a wall if possible.
translation.ga: Úsáid céim le ráille nó fan in aice le balla más féidir.

translation.en: Stand up on the step with your right foot.
translation.ga: Seas suas ar an gcéim le do chos dheas.

translation.en: Stand up there with your left foot
translation.ga: Seas suas ansin le do chos chlé

translation.en: Stand down again and repeat
translation.ga: Seas síos arís agus déan arís é

translation.en: To improve your balance, the steps need to be taken slowly and in a controlled manner.
translation.ga: Chun do chothromaíocht a fheabhsú caithfear na céimeanna a thógáil go mall agus ar bhealach rialaithe.

translation.en: Repeat up to 5 steps on each leg.
translation.ga: Déan suas le 5 chéim ar gach cos.

translation.en: The death of a person and the grief that follows during the outbreak of the coronavirus
translation.ga: Bás duine agus an brón a leanann le linn ráig an choróinvíris

translation.en: We need to adhere to the social separation and other measures caused by the outbreak of the coronavirus (covid-19). Things have to be done differently now that someone related to us dies.
translation.ga: Caithfimid cloí leis an scaradh sóisialta agus bearta eile de bharr ráig an choróinvíris (covid-19) caithfear rudaí a dhéanamh ar bhealach difriúil anois nuair a fhaigheann duine a bhaineann linn bás.

translation.en: A confidential support line is available from the irish hospice foundation and the hse.
translation.ga: Tá líne tacaíochta faoi rún ar fáil ó fhorais ospíse na héireann agus fss.

translation.en: If you need more support, use one of the telephone or online mental health support services available to you.
translation.ga: Má theastaíonn tuilleadh tacaíochta uait, bain úsáide as ceann de na seirbhísí tacaíochta mheabhairshláinte ar an bhfón nó ar líne atá ar fáil duit.

translation.en: If your grief is getting worse, or you are having trouble sleeping, talk to your gp.
translation.ga: Má tá do bhrón ag éirí ró-mhór, nó má tá deacrachtaí codladh agat, labhair le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: Talk to your gp, if you are seriously worried or have difficulty sleeping.
translation.ga: Labhair le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh, má tá tú go mór faoi bhuairt, nó má tá deacrachtaí codlata agat.

translation.en: Funeral / funeral
translation.ga: Tórramh / sochraid

translation.en: We cannot spend time together in groups during the outbreak.
translation.ga: Ní féidir linn am a chaitheamh lena chéile i ngrúpaí le linn na ráige.

translation.en: This means that we cannot have a grand funeral / funeral.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo nach féidir linn tórramh / sochraid mhór a bheith againn.

translation.en: Those at the funeral must also follow the guidelines for social separation.
translation.ga: Caithfidh na daoine atá ar an tsochraid na treoirlínte um scaradh sóisialta a leanúint freisin.

translation.en: This means that people have to wait for two meters (6.5 feet) apart.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo go gcaithfidh daoine fanacht dhá mhéadar (6.5 troigh) óna chéile.

translation.en: You should not go to a funeral if you are self-isolated or need to restrict your movements.
translation.ga: Níor chóir dul ag sochraid má tá tú ag féin-aonrú nó más gá duit srian a chur ar do chuid gluaiseachtaí.

translation.en: Death affects every family.
translation.ga: Goilleann bás ar gach teaghlach.

translation.en: We know that these arrangements make matters even more difficult, but we are trying to protect everyone.
translation.ga: Tá a fhios againn go ndéanann na socruithe seo cúrsaí níos deacra fós ach táthar ag iarraidh gach duine a chosaint.

translation.en: The funeral director and your priest, minister etc, will know what to do.
translation.ga: Beidh a fhios ag an stiúrthóir sochraide agus do shagart, ministéir agus ’ rl céard a ba chóir a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Advice for those who are sad at this time
translation.ga: Comhairle do dhaoine atá faoi bhrón ag an am seo

translation.en: The death of someone close to us hurts us all.
translation.ga: Goilleann bás duine atá gar dúinn orainn ar fad.

translation.en: It can affect your mental health.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé cur isteach ar do mheabhair shláinte.

translation.en: There is no right or wrong way to deal with death.
translation.ga: Níl aon bhealach ceart nó contráilte ann le déileáil leis an mbás.

translation.en: You may feel many different emotions.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé go mothódh tú go leor mothúcháin dhifriúla.

translation.en: Release your feelings and handle them in a way that suits you best.
translation.ga: Scaoil le do chuid mothúchán agus láimhseáil iad ar bhealach is oiriúnaí duit féin.

translation.en: This is part of the way we deal with death.
translation.ga: Seo páirt den bhealach a ndéileálann muid leis an mbás.

translation.en: Stay in touch with others.
translation.ga: Fan i dteagmháil le daoine eile

translation.en: We cannot be together in groups at this time.
translation.ga: Ní féidir linn a bheith lena chéile i ngrúpaí ag an am seo.

translation.en: Because of this, you may not be able to meet people who want to sympathize with you.
translation.ga: Mar gheall air seo b ’ fhéidir nach mbeadh tú in ann buaileadh le daoine atá ag iarraidh comhbhrón a dhéanamh leat.

translation.en: While you may be physically separated from your normal support network, do not cut yourself off from them.
translation.ga: Cé go bhféadfá a bheith scartha go fisiciúil ó do ghnáth-ghréasán tacaíochta, ná gearr tú féin amach uathu.

translation.en: Let people express their sympathy and let them support you in different ways.
translation.ga: Lig do dhaoine a gcomhbhrón a chur in iúl agus lig dóibh tacú leat ar bhealaí éagsúla.

translation.en: Phone calls, texts, emails, and support messages on social media from the people closest to you can comfort you.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh glaonna teileafóin, téacsanna, ríomhphoist agus teachtaireachtaí tacaíochta ar na meáin shóisialta, ó na daoine is gaire duit, sólás éigin a thabhairt duit.

translation.en: Contact them and make sure to contact someone every day.
translation.ga: Déan teagmháil leo agus déan cinnte teagmháil a dhéanamh le duine éigin gach lá.

translation.en: Answer their calls and answer their messages.
translation.ga: Freagair a gcuid glaonna agus freagair a dteachtaireachtaí.

translation.en: Stay in touch with the people who offend you, but if the messages of support are excessive for you, there is no need to reply to them.
translation.ga: Fan i dteagmháil leis na daoine a bhfuil cion acu ort, ach má bhíonn na teachtaireachtaí tacaíochta iomarcach duit, ní gá iad a fhreagairt.

translation.en: While it is important to stay in touch, do not do so until you are ready.
translation.ga: Cé go bhfuil sé tábhachtach fanacht i dteagmháil, ná déan é sin go dtí go mbeidh tú réidh.

translation.en: Eat healthy food
translation.ga: Ith bia folláin

translation.en: Try not to neglect what is necessary.
translation.ga: Déan iarracht gan faillí a dhéanamh ar na rudaí atá riachtanach.

translation.en: Even if your stomach is not good, try to eat healthy food and drink plenty of water.
translation.ga: Fiú mura bhfuil do ghoile go maith, déan iarracht bia folláin a ithe agus neart uisce a ól.

translation.en: This will help you stay physically fit while you are sad.
translation.ga: Cabhróidh sé seo leat coinneáil go maith go fisiciúil agus tú faoi bhrón.

translation.en: Do the daily routines
translation.ga: Déan na gnáthrudaí laethúla

translation.en: It may help you to maintain normal habits.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé cuidiú leat gnáthnósanna a choinneáil.

translation.en: Try to do the things you normally do every day, as much as you can.
translation.ga: Déan iarracht na rudaí a dhéanann tú gach lá de ghnáth, a dhéanamh an oiread agus is féidir leat.

translation.en: It is important that you do these things at the same times, eat a meal, get up and go to bed and so on.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach go ndéanfá na nithe seo ag na hamanna céanna, béile a ithe, éirí agus dul a chodladh agus ‘ rl.

translation.en: Go out in the garden or on your balcony to get some fresh air, if you can.
translation.ga: Téigh amach sa ghairdín nó ar do bhalcóin le haer úr a fháil, más féidir leat.

translation.en: Live day today
translation.ga: Mair ó lá go lá

translation.en: You may feel okay on certain days, and the sadness may not be as bad as on other days - that's normal.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go n-aireofá ceart go leor laethanta áirithe agus nach mbeadh an brón chomh dona agus a bheadh laethanta eile – is gnáth rud é sin.

translation.en: Some people may feel guilty when this happens, but there is no need for that.
translation.ga: Is féidir le roinnt daoine aireachtáil ciontach nuair a tharlaíonn sé seo, ach níl aon ghá leis sin.

translation.en: Try to be nice to yourself and understand your feelings every day.
translation.ga: Déan iarracht a bheith go deas leat féin agus do mhothúcháin a thuiscint, ó lá go lá.

translation.en: This happens naturally when a person is grieving a death.
translation.ga: Tarlaíonn sé seo go nádúrtha nuair a bhíonn duine faoi bhrón de bharr báis.

translation.en: Caring for bereaved children
translation.ga: Ag tabhairt aire do pháistí atá faoi bhrón

translation.en: If children in your family are sad, keep an eye on them.
translation.ga: Má tá páistí i do theaghlach faoi bhrón, coinnigh súil orthu.

translation.en: Answer their questions honestly.
translation.ga: Freagair a gcuid ceisteanna go macánta.

translation.en: Children are better able to handle a sad story when they are told the truth.
translation.ga: Bíonn páistí in ann scéal brónach a láimhseáil níos fearr nuair a insítear an fhírinne dóibh.

translation.en: Children may be sad one minute and happy the next.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh leanaí a bheith brónach nóiméid amháin agus a bheith sásta an chéad nóiméid eile.

translation.en: Let them follow their own course.
translation.ga: Lig dóibh a gcúrsa féin a leanacht.

translation.en: There is no right or wrong way to show their sadness.
translation.ga: Níl aon bhealach ceart nó contráilte ann lena mbrón a thaispeáint.

translation.en: Try to give honest, age-appropriate information about death.
translation.ga: Déan iarracht eolas ionraic, a oireann dá n-aois, a thabhairt faoin mbás.

translation.en: Let the kids guide you.
translation.ga: Lig do na páistí tú a threorú.

translation.en: Let their questions guide the conversation.
translation.ga: Lig dá gceisteanna an comhrá a threorú.

translation.en: Don ’ t worry if you can ’ t answer every question they ask.
translation.ga: Ná bíodh imní ort mura féidir leat gach ceist a chuireann siad a fhreagairt.

translation.en: Tell them you will get the information for them and try to start the conversation again when you have the answers.
translation.ga: Abair leo go bhfaighidh tú an t-eolas dóibh agus déan iarracht an comhrá a thosú arís nuair atá na freagraí agat.

translation.en: If you think it's timely, start talking about the person who died and their memories of that person.
translation.ga: Má cheapann tú go bhfuil sé tráthúil, tosaigh ag caint faoin duine a fuair bás agus a gcuimhní cinn ar an duine sin.

translation.en: Limit news and social media
translation.ga: Cuir teorainn leis an nuacht agus leis na meáin shóisialta

translation.en: Try to limit the amount of news and social media you watch.
translation.ga: Déan iarracht srian a chur ar an méid nuachta agus meáin shóisialta a mbreathnaíonn tú orthu.

translation.en: When you are sad, the news may upset you and make you or your family even sadder.
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn tú faoi bhrón, d ’ fhéadfadh an nuacht cur isteach ort agus tuilleadh bróin a chur ort féin nó ar do theaghlach.

translation.en: Ways to help others who are grieving
translation.ga: Bealaí chun cabhrú le daoine eile atá faoi bhrón

translation.en: To help a friend or family member of you who is grieving, think about how you can extend your condolences to them at this time.
translation.ga: Chun cuidiú le cara nó duine muinteartha leat atá faoi bhrón, smaoinigh ar conas is féidir leat do chomhbhrón a dhéanamh leo ag an am seo.

translation.en: There are other ways you can comfort them if you are not in their company.
translation.ga: Tá bealaí eile ann ar féidir leat sólás a thabhairt dóibh mura bhfuil tú ina gcuideachta.

translation.en: Text or call - ask your friend how they are, ask them what could help them and listen carefully
translation.ga: Téacs nó glaoch a chur - fiafraigh do do chara cén chaoi a bhfuil siad, fiafraigh díobh céard iad na rudaí a d ’ fhéadfadh cabhrú leo agus éist go cúramach leo

translation.en: Leave food or a gift at the door as a sign of consolation
translation.ga: Fág bia nó bronntanas ag an doras mar chomhartha sóláis

translation.en: Offer practical help, for example, shopping
translation.ga: Tairg cúnamh praiticiúil, siopadóireacht mar shampla

translation.en: Offer assistance with technology such as video calls, whatsapp or other ways to keep in touch
translation.ga: Tairg cúnamh leis an teicneolaíocht, mar shampla glaonna físe, whatsapp nó bealaí eile le coinneáil i dteagmháil

translation.en: Express your condolences online on rip.ie or similar
translation.ga: Déan comhbhrón ar líne ar rip.ie nó a leithéid

translation.en: Write a card
translation.ga: Scríobh cárta

translation.en: Whichever way you choose to express your sympathy, be sure to contact them.
translation.ga: Cibé bealach a roghnaíonn tú do chomhbhrón a chur in iúl, déan cinnte dul i dteagmháil leo.

translation.en: Let them know that you are available not only in the short term but in the coming weeks and months.
translation.ga: Bíodh a fhios acu go bhfuil tú ar fáil ní amháin sa ghearrthéarma ach sna seachtainí agus míonna amach romhainn.

translation.en: Remember that the person may not always want to talk to you.
translation.ga: Cuimhnigh go mb ’ fhéidir nach mbeadh an duine i gcónaí ag iarraidh labhairt leat.

translation.en: That's okay too - it's important to give them space.
translation.ga: Tá sé sin ceart go leor freisin - tá sé tábhachtach spás a thabhairt dóibh.

translation.en: It is also important for them to know that you are there when they need you most.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach freisin go mbeadh a fhios acu go bhfuil tú ann an uair is mó a theastaíonn tú uathu.

translation.en: Indoor fitness for the elderly
translation.ga: Aclaíocht faoi dhíon do dhaoine scothaosta

translation.en: It is important to stay active while staying home or staying alone during the coronary virus outbreak.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach bheith gníomhach agus tú ag fanacht sa bhaile nó ag fanacht asat féin le linn ráig an choróinvíris.

translation.en: Anyone can be active, it ’ s easy to get started, and it ’ s never too late.
translation.ga: Is féidir le duine ar bith a bheith gníomhach, tá sé éasca tosú agus ní bhíonn sé ró-mhall choíche.

translation.en: Anything that encourages you to move is physical activity and will benefit you no matter what age you are.
translation.ga: Is gníomhaíocht choirp é aon rud a spreagann tú chun gluaiseacht agus rachaidh sé chun leasa duit is cuma cén aois thú.

translation.en: Encourage yourself to be more agile.
translation.ga: Spreag tú féin le bheith níos aclaí.

translation.en: It may be challenging to motivate yourself, especially if it is cold and raining.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go mbeadh sé deacair tú féin a spreagadh, go háirithe má bhíonn sé fuar agus ag cur báistí.

translation.en: But, you can exercise and be active anywhere - at home or in your garden.
translation.ga: Ach, is féidir leat aclaíocht a dhéanamh agus a bheith gníomhach áit ar bith - sa bhaile nó i do ghairdín.

translation.en: Activities for older people
translation.ga: Gníomhaíochtaí do dhaoine níos sine

translation.en: All adults should be as active as they can be every day.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh gach duine fásta chomh gníomhach agus is féidir leo a bheith gach lá.

translation.en: For example:
translation.ga: Mar shampla:

translation.en: At least 150 minutes of moderate aerobic activity each week, such as: Walking, dancing or even mowing the grass.
translation.ga: 150 nóiméad ar a laghad de ghníomhaíocht aeróbach mheasartha gach seachtain ar nós: Siúl, damhsa nó fiú an féar a ghearradh.

translation.en: Exercises to strengthen the muscles -2 days or more a week - for example, digging in the garden, step aerobics, exercises with hand weights or yoga
translation.ga: Cleachtaí chun na matáin a neartú -2 lá nó níos mó sa tseachtain - mar shampla, tochailt sa ghairdín, aeróbaic chéime, cleachtaí le meáchain láimhe nó ióga

translation.en: Even housework like cooking and not sitting down all the time.
translation.ga: Fiú obair tí mar chócaireacht agus gan a bheith i do shuí síos an t-am ar fad.

translation.en: You are more at risk of falling if you are an older person.
translation.ga: Tá baol níos mó go dtitfeá más duine tú atá níos sine.

translation.en: Try to do one of these every day:
translation.ga: Déan iarracht ceann díobh seo a dhéanamh gach lá:

translation.en: Try these:
translation.ga: Bain triail astu seo:

translation.en: Exercises for balance
translation.ga: Cleachtaí le hagaidh cothromaíochta

translation.en: Exercises to strengthen you
translation.ga: Cleachtaí le tú a láidriú

translation.en: Exercises for flexibility
translation.ga: Cleachtaí le haghaidh solúbthachta

translation.en: Exercises while you are sitting
translation.ga: Cleachtaí agus tú i do shuí

translation.en: Flexibility exercises
translation.ga: Cleachtaí solúbthachta

translation.en: These flexibility exercises can be done at home to help your health and improve your mobility.
translation.ga: Is féidir na cleachtaí solúbthachta seo a dhéanamh sa bhaile chun cabhrú le do shláinte agus chun do shoghluaisteacht a fheabhsú.

translation.en: Don't worry if you haven't done much in a while- this exercise is easy.
translation.ga: Ná bí buartha mura ndearna tú mórán le tamall anuas- tá an aclaíocht seo éasca.

translation.en: Wear loose, comfortable clothing and keep a water bottle near you.
translation.ga: Caith éadaí scaoilte, compordach agus coinnigh buidéal uisce in aice leat.

translation.en: Take it easy at first and gradually increase the amount of exercise you do.
translation.ga: Tóg go bog é i dtosach agus méadaigh an méid aclaíochta a dhéanann tú de réir a chéile.

translation.en: Try to do this exercise at least twice a week and do it with:
translation.ga: Déan iarracht an aclaíocht seo a dhéanamh dhá uair sa tseachtain ar a laghad agus déan iad in éineacht le:

translation.en: Exercises for balance
translation.ga: Cleachtaí i gcomhair cothromaíochta

translation.en: Exercises in your sitting
translation.ga: Cleachtaí i do shuí

translation.en: Agility to strengthen you
translation.ga: Aclaíocht le tú a láidriú

translation.en: Neck rotation
translation.ga: Rothlú muiníl

translation.en: This helps with the rotation and flexibility of the neck.
translation.ga: Cabhraíonn sé seo le rothlú agus solúbthacht an mhuiníl.

translation.en: Sit up straight and keep your shoulders down.
translation.ga: Suigh suas díreach agus coinnigh do ghuaillí síos.

translation.en: Look straight ahead.
translation.ga: Féach díreach ar aghaidh.

translation.en: Turn your head slowly towards your left shoulder as far as you can.
translation.ga: Iompaigh do cheann go mall i dtreo do ghualainn chlé chomh fada is atá in ann.

translation.en: Repeat for 5 seconds and start again.
translation.ga: Déan é ar feadh 5 soicind agus tosaigh arís.

translation.en: Turn your head slowly towards your right shoulder, then.
translation.ga: Iompaigh do cheann go mall i dtreo do ghualainn dheas, ansin.

translation.en: Make 3 rotations on each side.
translation.ga: Déan 3 rothlú ar gach taobh.

translation.en: Neck extension
translation.ga: Síneadh muiníl

translation.en: It helps to release stiff muscles in the neck.
translation.ga: Cuidíonn sé le matáin atá righin sa mhuinéal a scaoileadh.

translation.en: Sit up straight, look straight ahead and keep your left shoulder down with your right hand.
translation.ga: Suigh suas díreach, féach díreach romhat agus coinnigh do ghualainn chlé síos le do lámh dheas.

translation.en: Slowly tilt your head to the right and your shoulders down.
translation.ga: Claon do cheann go mall ar dheis agus do ghualainn síos.

translation.en: Do the same on the other side.
translation.ga: Déan an rud céanna ar an taobh eile.

translation.en: Hold each stretch for 5 seconds and do it - 3 times on each side.
translation.ga: Coinnigh gach síneadh ar feadh 5 soicind agus déan é - 3 huaire ar gach taobh.

translation.en: Crouching aside
translation.ga: Ag cromadh ar do leataobh

translation.en: It helps with flexibility in the lower back
translation.ga: Cabhraíonn sé le solúbthacht in íochtar an droma

translation.en: Stand up straight with your feet hip-width apart and your hands down to your sides.
translation.ga: Seas suas díreach le do chosa leithead na gcorróg óna chéile agus do lámha síos le do thaobh.

translation.en: Slide your left hand down to your side as far as you can.
translation.ga: Sleamhnaigh do lámh chlé síos le do thaobh chomh fada is atá in ann.

translation.en: As you lower your arm, you should feel a tightness in the hip on the other side.
translation.ga: De réir mar a íslíonn tú do lámh, ba chóir go mbraithfeadh tú teannadh sa gcorróg ar an taobh eile.

translation.en: Do the same with your right hand.
translation.ga: Déan an rud céanna le do lámh dheas.

translation.en: Repeat each extension for 2 seconds, 3 times on both sides.
translation.ga: Déan gach síneadh ar feadh 2 shoicind, 3 huaire ar an dá thaobh.

translation.en: Stretching your buttocks
translation.ga: Ag síneadh do chuid cholpaí

translation.en: It is good for muscles that are stiff in the buttocks.
translation.ga: Tá sé go maith do mhatáin atá righin sna colpaí.

translation.en: Place your hands against a wall, so you don't fall.
translation.ga: Cuir do lámha i gcoinne balla ionas nach dtitfidh tú.

translation.en: Bend the right foot and take a step back with your left foot, about one foot, and keep it straight.
translation.ga: Lúb an chos dheas agus tóg céim siar le do chos chlé, thart ar throigh amháin, agus coinnigh díreach í.

translation.en: Both feet should be flat on the floor.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh an dá chos cothrom ar an urlár.

translation.en: The muscle of the left heel is stretched if the left foot is kept as straight as possible with the left heel on the floor.
translation.ga: Déantar matán an cholpa chlé a shíneadh má choinnítear an chos chlé chomh díreach agus is féidir agus an tsáil chlé ar an urlár.

translation.en: Do the same with the other leg.
translation.ga: Déan an rud céanna leis an gcos eile.

translation.en: Eating healthy food
translation.ga: Ag ithe bia folláin

translation.en: Eating a wide range of healthy foods will give you the energy and nutrients you need to be healthy.
translation.ga: Má itheann tú réimse leathan de bhia folláin gheobhaidh tú an fuinneamh agus na cothaithigh atá ag teastáil le bheith sláintiúil.

translation.en: Planning and preparation
translation.ga: Pleanáil agus ullmhú

translation.en: Here are some tips for eating healthy food:
translation.ga: Seo a leanas comhairle maidir le bia sláintiúil a ithe:

translation.en: Plan your meals - this will help you eat different and nutritious foods.
translation.ga: Pleanáil do bhéilí roimh ré - cuideoidh sé seo leat bianna éagsúla agus cothaitheach a ithe.

translation.en: It will also save you money and reduce your reliance on convenience or processed food.
translation.ga: Sábhálfaidh tú airgead freisin agus ní bheith tú ag braith chomh mór ar bhia saoráideach nó ar bhia atá próiseáilte.

translation.en: Prepare your meals mainly using fresh ingredients and choose fruits, salads and vegetables as snacks.
translation.ga: Réitigh do bhéilí ag baint úsáide as comhábhair úra den chuid is mó agus roghnaigh torthaí, sailéid agus glasraí mar shneaiceanna.

translation.en: Use healthier cooking methods such as grilling or evaporating rather than frying or roasting with oil or fat.
translation.ga: Úsáid modhanna cócaireachta níos sláintiúla cosúil le griolladh nó galú seachas a bheith ag friochadh nó ag róstadh le hola nó saill.

translation.en: Use the food pyramid as a guide to what you put on your plate.
translation.ga: Úsáid pirimid an bhia mar threoir don mhéid chuireann tú ar do phláta.

translation.en: Sit at the table and enjoy your meals.
translation.ga: Suigh ag an mbord agus bain sult as do bhéilí.

translation.en: Try not to eat in front of the tv or computer.
translation.ga: Déan iarracht gan a bheith ag ithe os comhair na teilifíse nó ríomhaire.

translation.en: Make healthy choices
translation.ga: Déan roghanna sláintiúla

translation.en: Use the food pyramid as a guide to the types and amount of food you need each day.
translation.ga: Úsáid pirimid an bhia mar threoir maidir leis na cineálacha agus an méid bia a theastaíonn uait gach lá.

translation.en: Eat plenty of vegetables, salads and fruit - up to half of your plate or bowl at each meal.
translation.ga: Ith neart glasraí, sailéid agus torthaí - suas le leath de do phláta nó do bhabhla ag gach béile.

translation.en: Choose food in different colors.
translation.ga: Roghnaigh bia ar dhathanna éagsúla.

translation.en: Choose wholemeal and wholegrain pieces of bread, cereals, pasta and brown rice.
translation.ga: Roghnaigh aráin caiscín agus lánghráin, gránaigh, pasta agus rís dhonn.

translation.en: Be aware of the difference in calories - different types have more calories than others.
translation.ga: Bí ar an eolas faoin difríocht i gcalraí - tá níos mó calraí i gcineálacha éagsúla thar a chéile.

translation.en: Choose low-fat milk, yoghurt or cheese.
translation.ga: Roghnaigh bainne, iógart nó cáis atá ar bheagán saille.

translation.en: Choose milk and yogurt more often than cheese.
translation.ga: Roghnaigh bainne agus iógart níos minice ná cáis.

translation.en: Read more about that here:
translation.ga: Léigh tuilleadh faoi sin anseo:

translation.en: Eat a few of the following twice a day: Poultry, fish, eggs, nuts, beans or meat.
translation.ga: Ith beagán díobh seo a leanas dhá uair sa lá: Éineoil, iasc, uibheacha, cnónna, pónairí nó feoil.

translation.en: Choose fish twice a week - oily fish is best.
translation.ga: Roghnaigh iasc faoi dhó sa tseachtain - is fearr iasc olúil.

translation.en: Cut back on the chips and fast food as much as possible.
translation.ga: Gearr siar ar na sceallóga agus bia gasta an oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: They are high in fat, salt and calories.
translation.ga: Tá a lán saille, salann agus calraí iontu.

translation.en: Don't eat the following every day:
translation.ga: Ná hith iad seo a leanas gach lá:

translation.en: Sweet drinks
translation.ga: Deochanna atá lán siúcra

translation.en: Biscuits, cakes, desserts, chocolate, sweets.
translation.ga: Brioscaí, cácaí, milseoga, seacláid, milseáin.

translation.en: Processed salted meats such as sausages, bacon and ham.
translation.ga: Feoil shaillte phróiseáilte cosúil le hispíní, bagún agus liamhás.

translation.en: Salty snacks like crisps.
translation.ga: Sneaiceanna goirt ar nós criospaí.

translation.en: How much food do you need?
translation.ga: Cé mhéad bia a theastaíonn uait

translation.en: Use the food pyramid as a guide to the types and amount of food you need each day.
translation.ga: Bain úsáid as pirimid an bhia mar threoir do na cineálacha agus an méid bia a theastaíonn uait gach lá.

translation.en: The amount of food you need to eat depends on your age and activity level.
translation.ga: Braitheann an méid bia is gá duit a ithe ar d ’ aois agus do leibhéal gníomhaíochta.

translation.en: Healthy food
translation.ga: Bia folláin

translation.en: See how these people used the food pyramid as a guide to understanding healthy eating.
translation.ga: Féach conas a d ’ úsáid na daoine seo pirimid an bhia mar threoir le tuiscint a fháil ar bhia folláin.

translation.en: Healthy food for life
translation.ga: Bia folláin ar feadh do shaoil

translation.en: Introductory six-week cookery courses on nutrition and nutrition are run throughout the country.
translation.ga: Reáchtáiltear bunchúrsaí cócaireachta sé seachtainí faoi chothú agus faoi chothaithe ar fud na tíre.

translation.en: Fitness to strengthen you
translation.ga: Aclaíocht le tú a láidriú

translation.en: This type of exercise can be done at home to strengthen you and improve your health and mobility.
translation.ga: Is féidir aclaíocht den chineál seo a dhéanamh sa bhaile le tú a láidriú agus chun do shláinte agus do ghluaiseacht a fheabhsú.

translation.en: Don't worry if you haven't done much in a while- this exercise is easy.
translation.ga: Ná bí buartha mura ndearna tú mórán le tamaill anuas- tá an aclaíocht seo éasca.

translation.en: If you are seated, do the exercise on a sturdy, sturdy, wheelless chair.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn tú i do shuí déan an aclaíocht ar chathaoir láidir, shocair, gan rothaí.

translation.en: You should be able to sit with your feet on the floor and your knees bent at a 90 degree angle.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go mbeifeá in ann suí le do chosa ar an urlár agus le do ghlúine lúbtha ar uillinn 90 céim.

translation.en: Avoid an angled chair, as this will restrict your movement.
translation.ga: Seachain cathaoir uilleach, mar cuirfidh sí seo srian ar do ghluaiseacht.

translation.en: Wear loose, comfortable clothing and keep a water bottle near you.
translation.ga: Caith éadaí scaoilte, compordach agus coinnigh buidéal uisce in aice leat.

translation.en: Take it easy at first and gradually increase the amount of exercise you do.
translation.ga: Tóg go bog é i dtosach agus méadaigh an méid aclaíochta a dhéanann tú de réir a chéile.

translation.en: Try to do this exercise at least twice a week and do it with:
translation.ga: Déan iarracht an aclaíocht seo a dhéanamh dhá uair sa tseachtain ar a laghad agus déan iad in éineacht le:

translation.en: Exercises for balance
translation.ga: Cleachtaí i gcomhair cothromaíochta

translation.en: Exercises in your sitting
translation.ga: Cleachtaí i do shuí

translation.en: Flexibility exercises
translation.ga: Cleachtaí solúbthachta

translation.en: Getting in your position
translation.ga: Ag éirí i do sheasamh

translation.en: Sit on the edge of the chair with your feet hip-width apart.
translation.ga: Suigh ar chiumhais na cathaoireach le do chosa leithead-na gcorróga óna chéile.

translation.en: Stretch forward slightly.
translation.ga: Sín chun tosaigh beagán.

translation.en: Stand up slowly putting your feet in contact.
translation.ga: Seas suas go mall ag cur na gcos i dtaca.

translation.en: Look straight ahead and don ’ t look down.
translation.ga: Féach díreach romhat agus ná féach síos.

translation.en: Stand up straight and then sit down slowly on your ass.
translation.ga: Seas suas díreach agus ansin suigh síos go mall ar do thóin.

translation.en: Do this 5 times in a row- the sooner you do it, the better.
translation.ga: Déan é seo 5 uaire i ndiaidh a chéile- más moille a dhéanann tú é is amhlaidh is fearr.

translation.en: Going down on your goggles
translation.ga: Ag dul síos ar do ghogaide

translation.en: Place your hands on the back of the chair to keep it steady and stand with your feet hip-width apart.
translation.ga: Cuir do lámha ar chúl na cathaoireach lena coinneáil socair agus seas le do chosa leithead na gcorróg óna chéile.

translation.en: Bend your knees slowly as far as you can, and keep them focused forward.
translation.ga: Lúb do ghlúine síos go mall chomh fada agus atá in ann, agus coinnigh iad dírithe chun tosaigh.

translation.en: Try bending them over your big toe.
translation.ga: Déan iarracht iad a lúbadh thar do ladhar mhór.

translation.en: Always keep your back straight.
translation.ga: Coinnigh do dhroim díreach i gcónaí.

translation.en: Stand up nice and smooth, squeezing your buttocks all the time.
translation.ga: Seas suas go deas réidh, agus tú ag fáisceadh do mhása i rith an ama.

translation.en: Repeat 5 times.
translation.ga: Déan é 5 huaire.

translation.en: Raising the claws when you are sitting
translation.ga: Ag ardú na gcolpaí nuair atá tú i do shuí

translation.en: Place your hands on the back of the chair for stability.
translation.ga: Cuir do lámha ar chúl na cathaoirach le haghaidh seasmhachta.

translation.en: Lift your heels off the floor for as long as you can.
translation.ga: Tóg do shála den urlár chomh fada is atá tú in ann.

translation.en: Do this slowly, gently.
translation.ga: Déan é seo go mall, réidh.

translation.en: Repeat 5 times.
translation.ga: Déan é 5 huaire.

translation.en: To make this more difficult, do this exercise without the chair.
translation.ga: Chun é seo a dhéanamh níos deacra, déan an cleachtadh seo gan an chathaoir.

translation.en: Raising your foot out to the side.
translation.ga: Ag ardú do chos amach ar leataobh

translation.en: Place your hands on the back of the chair for stability
translation.ga: Cuir do lámha ar chúl na cathaoireach le haghaidh seasmhachta

translation.en: Raise your left leg and stretch it aside as far as you can, keeping your back and hips straight.
translation.ga: Ardaigh do chos chlé agus sín amach ar leataobh í chomh fada agus atá tú in ann, ag coinneáil do dhroim agus do chorróga díreach.

translation.en: Do not loop to the right.
translation.ga: Ná lúb ar dheis.

translation.en: Return to where you started.
translation.ga: Fill ar ais go dtí an áit ar thosaigh tú.

translation.en: Now raise your right foot and stretch it aside as far as you can.
translation.ga: Anois ardaigh do chos dheas agus sín mach ar leataobh í chomh fada agus atá tú in ann.

translation.en: Raise and lower both legs 5 times.
translation.ga: Ardaigh agus ísligh an dá chos 5 huaire.

translation.en: Stretching your legs
translation.ga: Ag síneadh do chosa

translation.en: Place your hands on the back of the chair for stability.
translation.ga: Cuir do lámha ar chúl na cathaoireach le haghaidh seasmhachta.

translation.en: Stand up straight, stretch your left leg out behind, and keep it straight.
translation.ga: Seas suas díreach, sín do chos chlé amach ar cúl, agus coinnigh díreach í.

translation.en: Keep your back straight when stretching your leg.
translation.ga: Coinnigh do dhroim díreach nuair atá tú ag síneadh do chos.

translation.en: Keep your back straight as you lower your leg again.
translation.ga: Coinnigh do dhroim díreach tú ag ísliú do chos arís.

translation.en: You should feel the pressure in the back of your quarters and buttocks.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go n-aireofá an brú i gcúl do cheathrú agus do thóin.

translation.en: Do the same with the right leg.
translation.ga: Déan an rud céanna leis an gcos dheas.

translation.en: Hold the leg up for 5 seconds and do it 5 times with both feet.
translation.ga: Coinnigh an chos in airde ar feadh 5 soicind agus déan é 5 huaire leis an dá chos.

translation.en: Push-up from the wall
translation.ga: Brú-aníos ón mballa

translation.en: Keep the length of your wings away from the wall.
translation.ga: Coiinnigh fad do sciatháin ón mballa.

translation.en: Place your hands against the flat wall of your chest, with your fingers stretched straight up.
translation.ga: Cuir do lámha i gcoinne an bhalla cothrom le do chliabhrach, agus do mhéara sínte suas díreach.

translation.en: Bend your wings slowly, with your elbows to your sides and your back straight.
translation.ga: Lúb do sciatháin go mall, le d ’ uillinneacha le do thaobh agus le do dhroim díreach.

translation.en: Lie down to the wall as far as you can.
translation.ga: Luigh isteach leis an mballa chomh fada agus is féidir leat.

translation.en: Return slowly to where you started.
translation.ga: Fill ar ais go mall go dtí an áit ar thosaigh tú.

translation.en: Do these 3 exercises between 5 and 10 times.
translation.ga: Déan na 3 cleachtadh seo idir 5 agus 10 n-uaire.

translation.en: Curling the biceps
translation.ga: Ag cuachadh na mbícéips

translation.en: Keep a few light weights near you (e.g. bottles full of water) and stand with your feet hip-width apart.
translation.ga: Coimeád cúpla meáchan éadrom in aice leat (m.sh.buidéil lán le huisce) agus seas le do chosa leithead na gcorróg óna chéile.

translation.en: Keep your wings by your side, lift the weights up to your shoulders.
translation.ga: Coinnigh do sciatháin le do thaobh, tóg na meáchain aníos go dtí do ghualainn.

translation.en: Slowly lower again.
translation.ga: Ísligh arís go mall.

translation.en: This can also be done while you are sitting.
translation.ga: Is féidir é seo a dhéanamh freisin agus tú i do shuí.

translation.en: Repeat these 3 exercises 5 times with both hands.
translation.ga: Déan na 3 cleachtaí seo 5 huaire leis an dá lámh.

translation.en: What happens during a test for the coronavirus
translation.ga: Cad a tharlaíonn le linn tástáil don choróinvíreas

translation.en: There are 28 test centers nationwide.
translation.ga: Tá 28 ionad tástála ar fud na tíre.

translation.en: Most centers are in a building or clinic.
translation.ga: Tá formhór na n-ionad i bhfoirgneamh nó i gclinic.

translation.en: Some have a drive-in service.
translation.ga: Tá seirbhís tiomáin-isteach ar fáil i gcuid acu.

translation.en: The test takes about 15 minutes.
translation.ga: Tógann an tástáil thart ar 15 nóiméad.

translation.en: If you do not feel well enough to drive to the test centre, someone in your family can drive you there.
translation.ga: Mura mbraitheann tú sách maith chun tiomáint chuig an ionad tástála, is féidir le duine i do theaghlach tú a thiomáint ann.

translation.en: If your child has a test appointment, you can drive them to the test centre.
translation.ga: Má tá coinne tástála ag do pháiste, is féidir leat é / í a thíomáint chuig an ionad tástála.

translation.en: Follow the advice on respiratory hygiene and social separation and wear a face mask in the test centre and on your way to the test center and home.
translation.ga: Lean an chomhairle maidir le sláinteachas riospráide agus scaradh sóisialta agus caith clúdach aghaidhe san ionad tástála agus ar do bhealach chuig an ionad tástála agus ar an mbealach abhaile.

translation.en: Test centre
translation.ga: Ionad tástála

translation.en: Don't go to a test centre unless you have an appointment - you will not be tested.
translation.ga: Ná téigh chuig ionad tástála mura bhfuil coinne agat - ní dhéanfar tástáil ort.

translation.en: Park and stay in your car.
translation.ga: Páirceáil agus fan i do charr.

translation.en: A healthcare worker will come to you.
translation.ga: Tiocfaidh oibrí cúram sláinte chugat.

translation.en: You will be given a mask to put on, they will explain to you what will happen, they will ask you some questions, and you will be taken to the test centre.
translation.ga: Tabharfar masc duit le cur ort, míneoidh siad duit céard a tharlóidh, cuirfidh siad roinnt ceisteanna ort agus tabharfar isteach san ionad tástála tú.

translation.en: You will be asked to wash your hands properly.
translation.ga: Iarrfar ort do chuid lámha a níochán i gceart.

translation.en: Healthcare staff will take some personal details from you, including your telephone number.
translation.ga: Tógfaidh baill foirne cúram sláinte roinnt sonraí pearsanta uait, d ’ uimhir fón san áireamh.

translation.en: This will be done to contact you with your results.
translation.ga: Déanfar é seo chun dul i dteagmháil leat le do chuid torthaí.

translation.en: You will be asked to blow your nose into a tissue and then place the tissue in a bin.
translation.ga: Iarrfar ort do shrón a shéideadh isteach i gciarsúr páipéir agus an ciarsúr a chur i mbosca bruscair ansin.

translation.en: A healthcare worker will take a sample inside your mouth and from your nose with a swab.
translation.ga: Tógfaidh oibrí cúram sláinte sampla taobh istigh de do bhéal agus ó do shrón le maipín.

translation.en: This will be sent to a laboratory for testing.
translation.ga: Seolfar é seo chuig saotharlann lena thástáil.

translation.en: You will then have to drive home and stay alone.
translation.ga: Beidh ort tiomáint abhaile ansin agus fanacht i d' aonar.

translation.en: Car service test centre
translation.ga: Ionad tástála carrsheirbhíse

translation.en: Some have a drive-in service.
translation.ga: Tá seirbhís tiomáin-isteach ar fáil i gcuid acu.

translation.en: You can drive yourself if you feel good enough.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat féin tiomáint má airíonn tú sách maith.

translation.en: If not, you can be driven by someone else, maybe someone in your family.
translation.ga: Mura n-airíonn, is féidir le duine eile tú a thiomáint, b ’ fhéidir duine i do theaghlach.

translation.en: If you have a child who has a test appointment, you can drive them to the test center.
translation.ga: Má tá leanbh agat a bhfuil coinne tástála aige / aici, is féidir leat iad a thiomáint chuig an ionad tástála.

translation.en: Do not go to a car service test centre unless you are in a car with an appointment - you will not be tested unexpectedly.
translation.ga: Ná téigh chuig ionad tástála carrsheirbhíse mura bhfuil tú i gcarr agus coinne agat - ní dhéanfar tástáil ort gan coinne.

translation.en: Stay in your car at all times.
translation.ga: Fan i do charr i rith an ama.

translation.en: Follow staff signs and instructions.
translation.ga: Lean comharthaí agus treoracha na foirne.

translation.en: A healthcare worker will ask you to open your window.
translation.ga: Iarrfaidh oibrí cúram sláinte ort d ’ fhuinneog a oscailt.

translation.en: You will be given a mask to put on your face - covering your nose and mouth.
translation.ga: Tabharfar masc duit le cur ar d ’ aghaidh - ag clúdú do shrón agus do bhéal.

translation.en: They will direct you to a test bay to take your test sample - stay in your car.
translation.ga: Treoróidh siad chuig bá tástála thú chun do shampla tástála a thógáil – fan i do charr.

translation.en: One healthcare worker will take your personal data - these will be required so that we can send you your results.
translation.ga: Tógfaidh oibrí cúram sláinte amháin do chuid sonraí pearsanta – beidh siad seo ag teastáil le go féidir linn do chuid thorthaí a sheoladh chugat.

translation.en: Another will take two swabs inside your mouth and nose.
translation.ga: Tógfaidh duine eile dhá mhaipín taobh istigh de do bhéal agus de do shrón.

translation.en: Then you will have to drive home and stay alone.
translation.ga: Ansin beidh ort tiomáint abhaile agus fanacht i d' aonar.

translation.en: Home testing
translation.ga: Tástáil sa bhaile

translation.en: If you cannot attend a test centre, you can be tested at home.
translation.ga: Mura féidir leat freastal ar ionad tástála, is féidir tástáil a dhéanamh ort sa bhaile.

translation.en: A healthcare worker will come to your home with test kits.
translation.ga: Tiocfaidh oibrí cúram sláinte chuig do theach le trealamh tástála.

translation.en: They will use a swab to take a sample inside your mouth and nose.
translation.ga: Úsáidfidh siad maipín chun sampla a thógáil taobh istigh de do bhéal agus do shrón.

translation.en: You will be asked to provide them with some personal details - these will be required so that we can send you your results.
translation.ga: Iarrfar ort roinnt sonraí pearsanta a thabhairt dóibh - beidh siad seo ag teastáil le go féidir linn do chuid torthaí a sheoladh chugat.

translation.en: Test results
translation.ga: Torthaí tástála

translation.en: You will receive your test results on text, but if you get a positive result, you will also be called.
translation.ga: Gheobhaidh tú do thorthaí tástála ar théacs ach má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach, cuirfear glaoch ort freisin.

translation.en: When you get your results
translation.ga: Nuair a fhaigheann tú do thorthaí

translation.en: Most people get test results within 2 days but sometimes it takes longer.
translation.ga: Faigheann formhór na ndaoine torthaí tástála laistigh de 2 lá ach uaireanta tógann sé níos faide.

translation.en: People who are seriously ill in hospital will get their results first.
translation.ga: Gheobhaidh daoine atá go dona tinn san ospidéal a dtorthaí ar dtús.

translation.en: Do not call your gp to get the test results.
translation.ga: Ná glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh chun na torthaí tástála a fháil.

translation.en: It is important to keep the phone lines free for people seeking advice on symptoms of illness.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach na línte fóin a choinneáil saor do dhaoine atá ag iarraidh comhairle faoi chomharthaí tinnis.

translation.en: If you did the test because you had symptoms
translation.ga: Má rinne tú an tástáil de bharr go raibh comharthaí ort

translation.en: If you have not received your test results, you can stop self-isolation if you meet both of these conditions:
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil do thorthaí tástála faighte agat is féidir leat stopadh ag féin-aonrú má shásaíonn tú an dá choinníoll seo:

translation.en: Have you not had a fever (38 degrees celsius or above) in the last 5 days
translation.ga: Nach raibh fiabhras ort (38 céim celsius nó os a cionn) le 5 lá anuas

translation.en: That 10 days have passed since the symptoms first came to you
translation.ga: Go bhfuil 10 lá caite ó tháinig na comharthaí ort ar dtús

translation.en: If you took the test because you were a close contact
translation.ga: Má rinne tú an tástáil de bharr gur gartheagmhálaí a bhí ionat

translation.en: If you are a close contact and have no symptoms continue to restrict your movements (stay at home) for 14 days.
translation.ga: Más gartheagmhálaí tú agus mura bhfuil aon chomhartha ort lean ar aghaidh ag cur srian le do ghluaiseachtaí (fan sa bhaile) ar feadh 14 lá.

translation.en: Do this from the last date you were in contact with the person who tested positive for covid-19.
translation.ga: Déan é seo ón dáta deireannach a raibh tú i dteagmháil leis an duine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil do covid-19.

translation.en: If you are unsure of the date, restrict your movements to the date the contact tracking team told you to do so.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil tú cinnte cén dáta é sin, cuir srian le do ghluaiseachtaí go dtí an dáta a dúirt an fhoireann rianaithe teagmhála leat é sin a dhéanamh.

translation.en: You can stop restricting your movements when both of these conditions apply:
translation.ga: Is féidir leat stopadh ag cuir srian le do ghluaiseachtaí nuair atá an dá choinníoll seo i bhfeidhm:

translation.en: You tested negative for your test (covid-19 was not detected) 10 days after you last contacted the person who tested positive.
translation.ga: Fuair tú toradh diúltach ar do thástáil (níor aimsíodh covid-19) 10 lá tar éis duit a bheith i dteagmháil go deireanach leis an té a fuair toradh dearfach.

translation.en: You do not have covid-19 symptoms
translation.ga: Níl comharthaí covid-19 ort

translation.en: Living with a close contact
translation.ga: Ag maireachtáil le gartheagmhálaí

translation.en: If you live with a close contact, you do not have to restrict your movements while waiting for their test or test results.
translation.ga: Má tá cónaí ort le gartheagmhálaí, ní gá duit srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí agus iad ag fanacht ar a dtástáil nó ar thorthaí tástála.

translation.en: Pregnancy and covid-19
translation.ga: Toircheas agus covid-19

translation.en: We are still learning about covid-19 (coronavirus).
translation.ga: Táimid fós ag foghlaim faoi covid-19 (coróinvíreas).

translation.en: We don ’ t really understand how it hurts pregnant women and their babies.
translation.ga: Ní thuigeann muid i gceart conas a ghoileann sé ar mhná torracha agus a gcuid naíonán.

translation.en: Our knowledge to date indicates that pregnant women are not at risk if they receive covid-19.
translation.ga: Léiríonn an t-eolas atá againn go dtí seo nach bhfuil mná torracha i mbaol má fhaigheann siad covid-19.

translation.en: Our knowledge to date shows that the risk of getting the virus during pregnancy is no greater than for women of the same age who are not pregnant.
translation.ga: Léiríonn an t-eolas atá againn go dtí seo nach bhfuil an bhaol go bhfaighidh tú an víreas le linn toirchis níos mó ná mná den aois chéanna nach bhfuil ag iompar clainne.

translation.en: Contact your local hospital if you are worried that your baby is not moving as much as usual or if you are worried about their well-being.
translation.ga: Déan teagmháil le d ’ ospidéal áitiúil má tá imní ort nach bhfuil do leanbh ag bogadh an oiread agus is gnách nó má tá imní ort faoina folláine.

translation.en: The hospital will perform tests to confirm that your baby is ok.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh an t-ospidéal tástálacha chun a dhearbhú go bhfuil do leanbh ceart go leor.

translation.en: Protecting yourself and your baby
translation.ga: Cosaint duit féin agus dod ’ leanbh

translation.en: To protect yourself and your baby, you should carefully follow the advice below:
translation.ga: Chun tú féin agus do naíonán a chosaint, ba chóir duit an chomhairle thíos a leanacht go cúramach:

translation.en: Wash hands properly
translation.ga: Na lámha a ní i gceart

translation.en: Social separation
translation.ga: Scaradh sóisialta

translation.en: Stay at home
translation.ga: Fanacht sa mbaile

translation.en: Call your gp for advice if you have any of the symptoms of the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh chun comhairle a fháil má bhíonn aon cheann de na comharthaí den choróinvíreas ort.

translation.en: If you get covid-19
translation.ga: Má thagann covid-19 ort

translation.en: If you test positive for covid-19, contact your maternity unit or hospital.
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach ar thástáil covid-19, déan teagmháil le d ’ aonad máithreachais nó d ’ ospidéal.

translation.en: The hospital will be able to monitor your pregnancy if you get the virus properly.
translation.ga: Beidh an t-ospidéal ábaltacht monatóireacht cheart a dhéanamh ar do thoircheas má fhaigheann tú an víreas.

translation.en: Pregnant women usually have mild symptoms when they receive covid-19.
translation.ga: Is comharthaí séimhe a bhíonn ar mhná torracha de ghnáth nuair a fhaigheann siad covid-19.

translation.en: They have a normal birth and are at low risk of giving their infants covid-19.
translation.ga: Bíonn gnáth breith acu agus níl ach baol beag ann go dtabharfaidh siad covid-19 dá naíonáin.

translation.en: Contact your local hospital if you are worried that your baby is not moving as much as usual or if you are worried about their well-being.
translation.ga: Déan teagmháil le d ’ ospidéal áitiúil má tá imní ort nach bhfuil do leanbh ag bogadh an oiread agus is gnách nó má tá imní ort faoina folláine.

translation.en: The hospital will perform tests to confirm that your baby is ok.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh an t-ospidéal tástálacha chun a dhearbhú go bhfuil do leanbh ceart go leor.

translation.en: If you have covid-19 symptoms, you will most likely need to go into hospital and the intensive care unit.
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí covid-19 ort, is dóichí go mbeidh ort dul isteach san ospidéal agus san aonad dianchúram.

translation.en: You may be at greater risk of becoming prematurely or having a stillbirth, if you have symptoms than if you have no symptoms.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh baol níos mó ann go mbeadh tinnis clainne ort ró-luath nó go mbeadh marbh-bhreith agat, má bhíonn comharthaí ort ná mura mbeadh comharthaí ort.

translation.en: Covid plaintitis and stillbirth
translation.ga: Plaicintíteas covid agus marbh-bhreith

translation.en: There is a link between a tiny number of stillbirths and an illness known as covid plasticitis.
translation.ga: Tá nasc idir líon an-bheag de mharbh-bhreitheanna agus tinneas ar a dtugtar plaicintíteas covid.

translation.en: Covid plasticitis occurs when the plaque is infected with covid-19.
translation.ga: Tarlaíonn plaicintíteas covid nuair a ionfhabhtaítear an plaicint le covid-19.

translation.en: This interferes with the placenta's ability to give the baby oxygen and nutrients.
translation.ga: Cuireann sé seo isteach ar chumas an phlaicint ocsaigin agus cothaithigh a thabhairt don naíonán.

translation.en: Stillbirth is mostly linked to covid plaquepox when covid-19 infection rates are very high.
translation.ga: Nasctar marbh-bhreith le plaicintíteas covid don chuid is mó nuair a bhíonn rátaí ionfhabhtuithe covid-19 an-ard.

translation.en: As the covid-19 infection rate falls, this will not be a concern.
translation.ga: De réir mar a thiteann an ráta ionfhabhtaithe covid-19 ní bheidh sé seo ina ábhar imní.

translation.en: Contact your maternity unit or hospital immediately if you notice that your baby is not moving normally.
translation.ga: Déan teagmháil le d ’ aonad máithreachais nó ospidéal láithreach má thugann tú faoi deara nach bhfuil do pháiste ag bogadh mar is gnáth.

translation.en: A high fever during pregnancy
translation.ga: Fiabhras ard le linn toirchis

translation.en: Symptoms of coronavirus include fever (high temperature).
translation.ga: I measc comharthaí an choróinvíris tá fiabhras (teocht ard).

translation.en: This may create difficulties for you during the first trimester (weeks 0 to 13).
