translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh seo deacrachtaí a chruthú duit le linn an chéad ráithe (seachtain 0 go 13).

translation.en: If you experience a high temperature during your pregnancy, call your gp or midwife.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn teocht ard ort le linn do thoirchis, glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh nó do bhean glúine.

translation.en: When you become pregnant, your body's immune system gradually changes.
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn tú torrach, tagann athrú ar chóras imdhíonta do choirp de réir a chéile.

translation.en: This happens in order for your pregnancy to have a successful outcome.
translation.ga: Tarlaíonn sé seo chun go mbeidh toradh rathúil ar do thoircheas.

translation.en: You could get more infections more quickly because you are pregnant.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfá níos mó ionfhabhtuithe a fháil níos éasca de bharr go bhfuil tú torrach.

translation.en: All pregnant women should get the following vaccines:
translation.ga: Ba chóir do gach bean torrach na vacsaín seo a fháil:

translation.en: Whooping cough vaccine
translation.ga: Vacsaín an triuch

translation.en: Flu vaccine
translation.ga: Vacsaín an fhliú

translation.en: Covid-19 vaccine - when you get the offer
translation.ga: Vacsaín covid-19 – nuair a fhaigheann tú an tairiscint

translation.en: Before your child is born
translation.ga: Sula dtagann do pháiste ar an saol

translation.en: The staff caring for you should make sure that you are involved in all decisions that are made.
translation.ga: Ba chóir don fhoireann atá ag tabhairt cúraim duit cinntiú go bhfuil tusa páirteach i ngach cinneadh a dhéantar.

translation.en: If you are worried about your pregnancy, call your hospital for advice.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn imní ort faoi do thoirchis, glaoigh ar d ’ ospidéal chun comhairle a fháil.

translation.en: Maternity hospitals have helplines open to advise you at any time.
translation.ga: Tá línte cabhracha oscailte ag na hospidéil máithreachais chun comhairle a chur ort ag am ar bith.

translation.en: That said, you should go to the hospital if you have any concerns about the movement of your unborn baby.
translation.ga: É sin ráite, ba chóir duit dul chuig an ospidéal má bhíonn aon imní ort faoi ghluaiseacht do naíonán sa mbroinn.

translation.en: More information on: Mychild.ie
translation.ga: Tuilleadh eolais ar: Mychild.ie

translation.en: Appointments and scanning
translation.ga: Coinní agus scanadh

translation.en: Antenatal care continues to be provided in hospitals.
translation.ga: Tá cúram réamhbhreithe á chur ar fáil sna hospidéil i gcónaí.

translation.en: If you are receiving care in the hospital and from your gp, continue with this.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag fáil cúraim san ospidéal agus ó do dhochtúir teaghlaigh, lean ar aghaidh leis seo.

translation.en: A number of appointments are made over the phone, followed by a short hospital visit.
translation.ga: Tá roinnt coinní á ndéanamh ar an bhfón mar aon le cuairt ghearr ina dhiaidh san ospidéal.

translation.en: You will need to go to the hospital for examinations, a blood test and an ultrasound scan.
translation.ga: Beidh ort dul chuig an ospidéal chun scrúduithe, tástála fola agus scanadh ultrafhuaime a fháil.

translation.en: You should go it alone to reduce the number of people in the hospital.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit dul i d ’ aonar chun líon na ndaoine san ospidéal a laghdú.

translation.en: Fetal anatomy scan - scanned at 20 weeks
translation.ga: Scanadh anatamaíochta féatais – scanadh ag 20 seachtain

translation.en: The fetal anatomical scan is usually performed between 18 and 22 weeks of pregnancy.
translation.ga: De ghnáth déantar an scanadh anatamaíochta féatais idir 18 agus 22 seachtain den toirchis.

translation.en: It is also called an anomaly scan.
translation.ga: Tugtar scanadh aimhrialtachta air freisin.

translation.en: A birth partner is usually able to attend the fetal anatomy scan with you.
translation.ga: De ghnáth bíonn páirtí breithe in ann freastal ar an scanadh anatamaíocht féatais leat.

translation.en: This will depend on the hospital and current government restrictions.
translation.ga: Beidh seo ag brath ar an ospidéal agus na srianta reatha rialtais.

translation.en: A prior check with the hospital is required.
translation.ga: Ní mór seiceáil roimh ré leis an ospidéal.

translation.en: If your birth partner is unable to attend, you will be explained why.
translation.ga: Mura féidir le do pháirtí breithe a bheith i láthair míneofar duit cén fáth.

translation.en: If you have a coronary virus before your baby is born
translation.ga: Má bhíonn coróinvíreas ort sula saolaítear do pháiste

translation.en: If you have a coronary virus, your healthcare team will be much more careful.
translation.ga: Má tá coróinvíreas ort, beidh d ’ fhoireann cúraim sláinte i bhfad níos cúramaí.

translation.en: This will continue before, during and after the birth of your baby.
translation.ga: Leanfaidh seo ar aghaidh roimh, le linn agus tar éis bhreith do linbh.

translation.en: Your obstetrician or midwife will talk to you about the safest way and time to give birth.
translation.ga: Labhróidh do chnáimhseoir nó bean glúine leat faoin tslí agus an t-am is sábháilte chun do leanbh a thabhairt ar an saol.

translation.en: Other doctors with expertise may be involved in your care.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh dochtúirí eile le saineolas a bheith páirteach i do chúram.

translation.en: This could be a doctor dealing with infectious diseases and a neonatal doctor - that is, a doctor who deals with newborn babies.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh dochtúir a bhíonn ag plé le galair thógálacha agus lia nua-naíochta a bheith ansin – sin dochtúir a bhionn ag plé le naíonáin nua-bheirthe.

translation.en: You may be cared for in an isolation room with an en-suite during your labour.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go mbeadh cúram á thabhairt duit i seomra leithlise le en-suite le linn do luí seoil.

translation.en: You may have to stay in this room while you are in hospital.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go mbeidh ort fanacht sa seomra seo an fhad is a bhíonn tú san ospidéal.

translation.en: During the birth of your baby and the childbirth
translation.ga: Le linn breith do linbh agus an luí seoil

translation.en: In most cases, your partner will be able to be present during the birth of your child.
translation.ga: I bhformhór na gcásanna, beidh do pháirtí in ann a bheith i láthair le linn breith do linbh.

translation.en: Every effort will be made to ensure that your partner is present at the birth, but in some hospitals, your partner may not be able to attend.
translation.ga: Déanfar gach iarracht a chinntiú go mbeidh do pháirtí i láthair ag an bhreith ach i roinnt ospidéil d ’ fhéadfadh sé tarlú nach mbeadh do pháirtí in ann a bheith ansin.

translation.en: There are restrictions to keep everyone safe.
translation.ga: Tá srianta ann chun gach duine a choinneáil slán.

translation.en: If your partner can be with you, they will need to wear personal protective clothing to reduce the risk of infection.
translation.ga: Más féidir le do pháirtí phairtí a bheith in éineacht leat, beidh orthu éadach cosanta pearsanta a chaitheamh chun an baol ionfhabhtaithe a laghdú.

translation.en: You will not need to wear a face mask during childbirth and birth.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh ort masc aghaidhe a chaitheamh le linn an luí seoil agus breith do linbh.

translation.en: But, you will need to wear a mask when you are outside your room.
translation.ga: Ach, beidh ort masc a chaitheamh nuair a bheidh tú lasmuigh de do sheomra.

translation.en: After the birth of your child
translation.ga: Tar éis breith do linbh

translation.en: Visitors to the hospital
translation.ga: Cuairteoirí san ospidéal

translation.en: No visitor is allowed in any maternity unit.
translation.ga: Níl cead ag aon chuairteoir a bheith in aon aonad máithreachais.

translation.en: These restrictions are in the interests of your safety and the safety of your child.
translation.ga: Tá na srianta seo ann ar mhaithe le do shábháilteacht agus sábháilteacht do linbh.

translation.en: These restrictions will be lifted as soon as possible.
translation.ga: Cuirfear deireadh leis na srianta seo chomh luath agus is féidir.

translation.en: Going home early
translation.ga: Ag dul abhaile luath

translation.en: Many women choose to go home early because of the restrictions on hospital visitors.
translation.ga: Roghnaíonn a lán ban dul abhaile luath de bharr na srianta ar chuairteoirí san ospidéal.

translation.en: Phone support from postpartum midwives is available from some hospitals.
translation.ga: Tá tacaíocht fóin ó mhná glúine iarbhreithe ar fáil ó chuid de na hospidéil.

translation.en: Community midwives will be making home visits wherever this is available.
translation.ga: Beidh mná glúine pobail ag déanamh cuairteanna baile aon áit a bhfuil sé seo ar fáil.

translation.en: Neonatal care in the neonatal intensive care unit
translation.ga: Cúram nuabheirthe san aonad dianchúraim nuabheirthe

translation.en: In most neonatal intensive care units (nicus), only a 15-minute visit is now allowed.
translation.ga: I bhformhór na n-aonad dianchúraim nuabheirthe (nicu), níl ach cuairt 15 nóiméad ceadaithe anois.

translation.en: This is being done to protect vulnerable infants.
translation.ga: Tá seo á dhéanamh le cosaint a thabhairt do naíonáin atá leochaileach.

translation.en: These restrictions will be lifted when it is safe to do so.
translation.ga: Cuirfear deireadh leis na srianta seo nuair atá sé sábháilte sin a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Some units have the technology to enable parents to have contact with their infants.
translation.ga: Tá teicneolaíocht ag roinnt aonaid chun cur ar chumas thuismitheoirí teagmháil a bheith acu lena gcuid naíonán.

translation.en: If you have a coronary virus after the birth of your baby
translation.ga: Má tá coróinvíreas ort, tar éis breith do linbh

translation.en: If you have covid-19, your doctor or midwife will discuss your options after giving birth.
translation.ga: Má tá covid-19 ort, pléifidh do dhochtúir nó bean glúine na roghanna atá agat tar éis breith do linbh.

translation.en: One option is for someone else to take care of your baby until the covid-19 is gone.
translation.ga: Rogha amháin atá ann ná go mbeidh duine éigin eile ag tabhairt aire do do leanbh go dtí go mbeidh an covid-19 imithe.

translation.en: This is recommended to protect your baby from covid-19.
translation.ga: Is ar mhaithe le do leanbh a chosaint ó covid-19 a mholtar é seo.

translation.en: This care could be provided by a family member or healthcare worker.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh ball clainne nó oibrí cúraim sláinte an cúram seo a chur ar fáil.

translation.en: This could be provided at home or in hospital.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí é seo a chur ar fáil sa bhaile nó san ospidéal.

translation.en: It is not known how long this will last.
translation.ga: Níl a fhios cén fhad a mhairfidh seo.

translation.en: The advice will depend on your symptoms of illness and the results of the test you will have.
translation.ga: Braithfidh an chomhairle ar do chomharthaí tinnis agus torthaí na tástála a dhéanfar ort.

translation.en: Taking care of your baby if you have covid-19
translation.ga: Ag tabhairt aire do do leanbh má bhíonn covid-19 ort

translation.en: If you choose to take care of your baby, the doctor or midwife will explain the danger to you.
translation.ga: Má roghnaíonn tú aire a thabhairt do do leanbh, míneoidh an dochtúir nó bean glúine duit faoin bhaol atá ann.

translation.en: You and your baby will be placed in an isolation room with an en-suite bathroom.
translation.ga: Cuirfear tusa agus do leanbh i seomra leithlise le seomra folctha en-suite.

translation.en: Your baby will be inside an incubator in your room.
translation.ga: Beidh do leanbh istigh i ngoradán i do sheomra.

translation.en: This is a unique cradle made of plastic.
translation.ga: Is cliabhán speisialta é seo atá déanta as plaisteach.

translation.en: It keeps the lovely infant warm.
translation.ga: Coinníonn sé an naíonán deas teolaí.

translation.en: You will be able to see your baby inside the incubator.
translation.ga: Beidh tú in ann do leanbh a fheiceáil istigh sa ghoradán.

translation.en: When you take your baby out of the incubator to be fed, washed, or otherwise cared for, you must:
translation.ga: Nuair a thógann tú do leanbh amach as an ngoradán chun é a chothú, a ní, nó cúram eile a thabhairt dó, ní mór duit:

translation.en: Dress with long sleeves and wear a surgical mask
translation.ga: Gúna le muinchillí fada agus masc máinliachta a chaitheamh

translation.en: Wash your hands properly and often with soap and water or rubbing alcohol - before and after handling your baby
translation.ga: Do lámha a ní i gceart agus go minic le gallúnach agus uisce nó le h-alcól cuimilte – roimh agus tar éis a bheith ag plé do leanbh

translation.en: Your child should be monitored for signs of infection.
translation.ga: Ba chóir súil a choinneáil amach do chomharthaí ionfhabhaithe ar do leanbh.

translation.en: This will continue for 14 days from the last time you had contact with your baby.
translation.ga: Leanfaidh seo ar feadh 14 lá ón uair dheireannach a raibh teagmháil agat le do leanbh.

translation.en: If your child shows any signs of infection, they will need to be tested.
translation.ga: Má thagann aon chomhartha ionfhabhtaithe ar do leanbh beidh gá le tástáil a dhéanamh air.

translation.en: Mental health
translation.ga: Meabhairshláinte

translation.en: Perinatal mental health services are available for women with mental health problems and:
translation.ga: Tá seirbhísí meabhairshláinte imbhreithe ann do mhná a bhfuil fadhbanna meabhairshláinte acu agus:

translation.en: Planning a pregnancy
translation.ga: Atá ag pleanáil toirchis

translation.en: Who is pregnant
translation.ga: Atá torrach

translation.en: Having a child under one year of age
translation.ga: A bhfuil leanbh faoi aon bhliain d ’ aois acu

translation.en: Signs of the crown virus
translation.ga: Comharthaí an choróinvíris

translation.en: Restrictions remain in place to protect us from covid-19.
translation.ga: Tá srianta fós i bhfeidhm chun muid a chosaint ar covid-19.

translation.en: Read about current government restrictions on gov.ie
translation.ga: Léigh faoi shrianta reatha an rialtais ar gov.ie

translation.en: If you have any signs of covid-19 (coronavirus) you should stay alone and call your gp immediately.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn aon chomhartha covid-19 (coróinvíreas) ort ba chóir duit fanacht asat féin agus glaoch a chur ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh láithreach.

translation.en: Your doctor will tell you if a covid -19 test needs to be fixed.
translation.ga: Déarfaidh do dhochtúir leat an bhfuil gá tástáil covid -19 a shocrú.

translation.en: Read about how to set up a test.
translation.ga: Léigh faoi chonas tástáil a shocrú.

translation.en: The others in the house will have to restrict their movements (stay at home).
translation.ga: Beidh ar na daoine eile sa teach srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí (fanacht sa bhaile).

translation.en: Common signs
translation.ga: Gnáthchomharthaí

translation.en: The most common symptoms of coronavirus are:
translation.ga: Is iad na comharthaí is coitianta den coróinvíreas ná:

translation.en: Fever (high temperature 38 degrees celsius or more)
translation.ga: Fiabhras (teocht ard 38 céim celsius nó níos mó)

translation.en: Cough - any kind of cough, it does not have to be dry
translation.ga: Casacht - aon saghas casacht, ní gá go mbeadh sé tirim

translation.en: Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing
translation.ga: Giorra anála nó deacrachtaí anála

translation.en: Things are not the same taste or smell – this means that you have noticed that you are not getting the smell or taste of anything or that you are not getting a normal smell or taste
translation.ga: Níl an blas nó an boladh céanna ar rudaí – ciallaíonn sé seo gur thug tú faoi deara nach bhfuil tú ag fáil boladh nó blas ar aon rud, nó nach bhfaigheann tú gnáthbholadh nó blas

translation.en: You may have no symptoms for 14 days.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé nach mbeadh aon chomhartha ort go ceann14 lá.

translation.en: The symptoms are very similar to those of a cold or flu.
translation.ga: Tá na comharthaí an- chosúil le comharthaí slaghdáin nó fliú.

translation.en: If your gp detects the virus in time, you will be able to take steps to control the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Má aimsíonn do dhochtúir teaghlaigh an víreas in am beidh sibh in ann céimeanna a thógáil le srian a chur le scaipeadh an víris.

translation.en: Call the emergency services at 112 or 999 if you have shortness of breath.
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar na seirbhísí éigeandála ag 112 nó 999 má tá giorra anála ort.

translation.en: For example, if your breath is so bad, you can't finish a sentence.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, má tá d ’ anáil chomh dona sin nach féidir leat abairt a chríochnú.

translation.en: Meadow fever
translation.ga: Fiabhras léana

translation.en: Meadow fever is an allergic reaction caused by pollen coming into contact with your mouth, nose, eyes and throat.
translation.ga: Is frithghníomhú ailléirgeach atá sa fiabhras léana a tharlaíonn de bharr pailin ag dul i dt eagmháil le do bhéal, do shrón, do shúile agus do scornach.

translation.en: Pollen is a delicate plant powder.
translation.ga: Is púdar mín ó phlandaí atá sa phailin.

translation.en: Meadow fever worsens between march and september, and especially when it is hot, humid and windy.
translation.ga: Bíonn fiabhras léana níos measa idir mí mhárta agus mí meán fómhair, agus nuair a bhíonn sé te, tais agus gaofar ach go h-áirithe.

translation.en: This range has the highest pollen count.
translation.ga: Bíonn an t-áireamh pailine is airde ann sa reímhse seo.

translation.en: Symptoms of meadow fever
translation.ga: Comharthaí sóirt an fhiabhrais léana

translation.en: Symptoms of fever include:
translation.ga: I measc na gcomharthaí fiabhrais tá:

translation.en: Sneezing and coughing
translation.ga: Sraothartach agus casacht

translation.en: Smoky or stuffy nose
translation.ga: Srón smaoiseach nó plúchta

translation.en: Itchy eyes, red or watery
translation.ga: Súile tochasacha, dearg nó uisciúil

translation.en: Itchy throat, mouth, nose and ears
translation.ga: Scornach, béal, srón agus cluasa tochasacha

translation.en: Not to smell odharhrath
translation.ga: Gan boladh a thabhairt faoi dearahrath

translation.en: Pain around your forehead and forehead (forehead)
translation.ga: Pian timpeall d ’ uisinn agus baithis (clár d ’ éadan)

translation.en: Headache
translation.ga: Tinneas cinn

translation.en: Ear pain
translation.ga: Tinneas cluaise

translation.en: Tiredness
translation.ga: Tuirse

translation.en: Asthma and hay fever
translation.ga: Asma agus fiabhras léana

translation.en: If you have asthma, you may have:
translation.ga: Má tá asma ort, b ’ fhéidir go mbeadh:

translation.en: Tension in the chest on you
translation.ga: Teannas sa chliabhrach ort

translation.en: Shortness of breath
translation.ga: Giorra anála ort

translation.en: Cough and cough
translation.ga: Cársán agus casacht

translation.en: Hay fever can last for weeks and months.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh fiabhras léana maireachtáil ar feadh seachtainí agus míonna.

translation.en: A cold disappears after 1 to 2 weeks.
translation.ga: Imíonn slaghdán tar éis 1 go 2 seachtain.

translation.en: Treatment for meadow fever
translation.ga: Cóir leighis d ’ fhiabhras léana

translation.en: There is currently no cure for hay fever, and you cannot avoid it.
translation.ga: Níl aon chóir leighis ann faoi láthair d ’ fhiabhras léana agus ní féidir leat é a sheachaint.

translation.en: Various things can be done to tame the symptoms of illness during a period of high pollen count.
translation.ga: Is féidir rudaí éagsúla a dhéanamh chun na comharthaí tinnis a cheansú le linn tréimhse áireamh pailine ard.

translation.en: To tame the symptoms of hay fever:
translation.ga: Chun comharthaí fiabhras léana a cheansú:

translation.en: Vaseline around your pores to catch the pollen
translation.ga: Cuir veasailín (vaseline) timpeall do pholláirí chun breith ar an bpailin

translation.en: Wear wrapped sunglasses to protect the eyes from pollen
translation.ga: Caith spéaclaí gréine timfhillte chun na súile a chosaint ón bpailin

translation.en: Have a shower after being outdoors, and change your clothes to get rid of pollen
translation.ga: Bíodh cithfholcadh agat tar éis a bheith amuigh faoin aer, agus athraigh do chuid éadaigh chun fáil réidh leis an bpailin

translation.en: Stay inside if possible
translation.ga: Fan istigh más féidir

translation.en: Keep windows and doors closed if possible
translation.ga: Coinnigh fuinneoga agus doirse dúnta más féidir

translation.en: Vacuum clean frequently
translation.ga: Déan folúsghlanadh go minic

translation.en: Dusting with a damp cloth
translation.ga: Dustáil le héadach tais

translation.en: Buy a pollen filter for car vents
translation.ga: Ceannaigh scagaire pailine le haghaigh gaothairí an chairr

translation.en: Buy a vacuum cleaner with a hepa filter (high-efficiency air particulate filter) (these can catch the pollutants)
translation.ga: Ceannaigh folúsghlantóir le scagaire hepa (scagaire ardéifeachtúil cáithníní aeir) (is féidir leo seo breith ar na truailleáin)

translation.en: To tame the symptoms of hay fever:
translation.ga: Ar mhaithe le comharthaí fiabhras léana a cheansú:

translation.en: Do not cut grass or walk on grass
translation.ga: Ná bain féar nó ná siúl ar an bhféar

translation.en: Don't spend too much time outside
translation.ga: Ná caith an iomarca ama amuigh

translation.en: Do not keep in the house
translation.ga: Ná coinnigh sa teach

translation.en: Don't smoke and stay away from smokers - it makes the symptoms worse
translation.ga: Ná caith tobac agus fan amach ó dhaoine atá ag caitheamh – bíonn na comharthaí níos measa da bharr

translation.en: Do not dry your clothes outdoors - for fear of falling into pollen
translation.ga: Ná triomaigh d ’ éadaí amuigh faoin aeir – ar eagla go dtitfeadh pailin orthu

translation.en: Do not let pets into the house if possible - they may bring pollen into the house
translation.ga: Ná lig peataí isteach sa teach más féidir – d ’ fhéadfadh siad pailin a thabhairt isteach sa teach

translation.en: When to go to a pharmacy
translation.ga: Cén uair ar chóir dul chuig cógaslannaí

translation.en: Talk to your pharmacist if you have hay fever.
translation.ga: Labhair le do chógaslannai má tá fiabhras léana ort.

translation.en: They can advise you and recommend the best treatment e.g. antihistamine droplets, tablets or nasal spray.
translation.ga: Is féidir leo comhairle a chur ort agus an chóir leoghis is fearr a mholadh m.sh braoiníní frith-hiostaimín, taibléidí nó sprae sróine.

translation.en: They can help with:
translation.ga: Is féidir leo cabhrú le:

translation.en: Itchy and watery eyes and sneezing
translation.ga: Súile tochasacha agus uisciúil agus le sraothartach

translation.en: A stuffy nose
translation.ga: Srón plúchta

translation.en: When to go to your gp
translation.ga: Cén uair ar chóir dul chuig do dhochtúir teaghlaigh

translation.en: If you do not get better after taking the pharmacy treatment, your gp may be able to help.
translation.ga: Mura dtagann aon fheabhas ort tar éis an chóir leighis ón gcógaslannaía thógáil, b ’ fhéidir go mbeidh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh in ann cabhrú leat

translation.en: Visit your gp:
translation.ga: Tabhair cuairt ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh:

translation.en: If your symptoms of illness get worse
translation.ga: Má bhíonn do chomharthaí tinnis ag éirí níos measa

translation.en: If you do not get better after taking medicines from the pharmacy
translation.ga: Mura dtagann aon fheabhas ort tar éis cógais ón gcógaslann a thógáil

translation.en: Treatment from your gp
translation.ga: Cóir leighis ó do dhochtúir teaghlaigh

translation.en: Your gp may prescribe steroids for you.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí do dhochtúir teaghlaigh stéaróidigh a ordú duit.

translation.en: If steroids and other medications for hay fever do not work for you, your gp may refer you for immunotherapy.
translation.ga: Mura n-oibríonn na stéaróidigh agus cógais eile d ’ fhiabhras léana duit, b ’ fhéidir go n-atreoródh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh tú chun imdhion-teiripe a fháil.

translation.en: You will be given small doses of pollen by injection or in tablets.
translation.ga: Tabharfar dáileoga beaga pailin duit le h instealladh nó i dtaibléid.

translation.en: You will gradually gain immunity from the pollen..
translation.ga: Eireoidh leat tú imdhíonacht a fháil ón bpailín de réir a chéile..

translation.en: This treatment is usually done in the winter about 3 months before the start of the hay fever season.
translation.ga: Déantar an chóireáil seo sa gheimhreadh de ghnáth timpeall 3 mhí sula a dtosaionn séasúr an fhiabhrais léana.

translation.en: Protect yourself and others from the coronavirus
translation.ga: Cosain tú féin agus daoine eile ón gcoróinvíreas

translation.en: There is no vaccine for the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Níl aon vacsaín ar fáil don choróinvíreas.

translation.en: Think about the way the crown virus spreads to protect you and others (covid-19).
translation.ga: Smaoinigh ar an mbealach a scaipeann an coróinvíreas chun tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint air (covid-19).

translation.en: Coronavirus is spread by sneezing or coughing.
translation.ga: Scaiptear coróinvíreas le sraothartach nó casacht.

translation.en: It must pass from the nose or mouth of an infected person into your eyes, nose or mouth to get the virus.
translation.ga: Caithfidh sé dul ó shrón nó ó bhéal duine atá ionfhabhtaithe isteach i do shúile, do shrón nó do bhéal chun go bhfaighfeá an víreas.

translation.en: This can happen directly or indirectly (on hands, objects, surfaces).
translation.ga: Is féidir leis seo tarlú go díreach nó go hindíreach (ar lámha, rudaí, dromchlaí).

translation.en: Remember this.
translation.ga: Cuimhnigh air seo.

translation.en: It will help you remember all the things you need to do to protect yourself and others from the virus.
translation.ga: Cuideoidh sé leat cuimhneamh ar na rudaí go léir a chaithfidh tú a dhéanamh chun tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint ón víreas.

translation.en: Level 3 restrictions apply in every county in the state.
translation.ga: Tá srianta leibhéal 3 i bhfeidhm i ngach contae sa stát.

translation.en: There is more information on gov.ie regarding the restriction levels throughout the state.
translation.ga: Tá tuilleadh eolais ar gov.ie maidir leis na leibhéil srianta ar fud an stáit.

translation.en: Take responsibility, stay a safe
translation.ga: Glac freagracht, fan sábháilte

translation.en: As public health restrictions are eased, hand washing and respiratory hygiene and social separation are of paramount importance.
translation.ga: De réir mar a mhaoillítear na srianta sláinte poiblí, tá níochán na lámh agus sláinteachas riosparáideach agus scaradh sóisialta thar a bheith tábhachtach.

translation.en: There is a risk of another outbreak of the virus.
translation.ga: Tá baol ann go dtiocfaidh ráig eile den víreas in athuair.

translation.en: Everyone should be sensible and follow the advice below to curb the spread of the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do gach duine a bheith ciallmhar agus an chomhairle thíos a leanacht chun srian a chur le scaipeadh an choróinvíris.

translation.en: Try not to meet so many people outside your home and don't spend too much time with them.
translation.ga: Déan iarracht gan buaileadh leis an oiread daoine lasmuigh de do theach agus ná caith an iomarca ama in éineacht leo.

translation.en: You should:
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit:

translation.en: Wearing a face mask on public transport - this is the law, and you can be fined or refused entry if you don't wear a mask
translation.ga: Clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh ar iompar poiblí – seo an hdlí agus is féidir fíneáil a ghearradh ort nó cead isteach a dhiúltú mura mbíonn masc ort

translation.en: Work away from home if possible - if you can't work from home, stay 2 months away from others
translation.ga: Oibriú as an mbaile más féidir – mura féidir leat oibriú as an mbaile, fan amach 2 mh ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Avoid crowded places as much as possible - leave if social separation is not possible.
translation.ga: Áiteanna plódaithe a sheachaint an oiread agus is féidir – fág an áit mura féidir scaradh sóisialta a chleachtadh.

translation.en: Not use public transport unless necessary - walk or cycle if you can
translation.ga: Gan iompar poiblí a úsáid mura bhfuil gá leis- siúl nó téigh ar rothar más féidir leat

translation.en: Stay clear of places where you cannot stay 2 months away from others if possible
translation.ga: Fanacht glan ar áiteanna nach féidir leat fanacht amach 2 mh ó dhaoine eile más féidir

translation.en: Wear face cover when visiting people over 70 or other vulnerable people- practice social separation for safety.
translation.ga: Clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh nuair a bhíonn tú ar cuairt ag daoine atá os cionn 70 nó ag daoine leochaileacha eile- cleacht an scaradh sóisialta ar mhaithe lena sábháilteacht.

translation.en: Can:
translation.ga: Is féidir:

translation.en: Meet people indoors and outdoors on social occasions but stay 2 meters away from others
translation.ga: Bualadh le daoine laistigh agus lasmuigh ar ócáidí sóisialta ach fan 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: To attend medical appointments and collect medicines and medical products
translation.ga: Le freastal ar choinní leighis, agus cógais agus táirgí leighis a bhailiú

translation.en: Exercise outdoors and indoors in fitness centres and sports clubs as long as public health advice is adhered to
translation.ga: Aclaíocht a dhéanamh lasmuigh agus laistigh in ionad aclaíochta agus clubanna spóirt an fhad agus go gcloítear leis an gcomhairle sláinte poiblí

translation.en: Visit outdoor areas, playgrounds and sites, if you can stay at least 2 meters away from others
translation.ga: Cuairt a thabhairt ar áiteanna faoin aeir, áiteanna súgartha agus suíomhanna, más féidir leat fanacht amach 2 mhéadar ar a laghad ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Do not ignore any delays in seeking treatment if you have unusual signs or symptoms
translation.ga: Ná déan neamhaird ná aon mhoill ag lorg cóir leighis má bhíonn comharthaí tinnis nó siomptóim neamhghnácha ort

translation.en: Social separation
translation.ga: Scaradh sóisialta

translation.en: Social separation is important to delay the spread of the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Tá scaradh sóisialta tábhachtach chun moill a chur ar scaipeadh an choróinvíris.

translation.en: Contact between infected and healthy people will be reduced.
translation.ga: Laghdófar an teagmháil a bheidh idir daoine atá ionfhabhtaithe agus daoine sláintiúla.

translation.en: Stay away 2 meters (6 feet) from others
translation.ga: Fanacht amach 2 mhéadar (6 troithe) ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Avoid shared sleeping areas
translation.ga: Seachain áiteanna codlata comhroinnte

translation.en: Avoid crowded places
translation.ga: Seachain áiteanna plódaithe

translation.en: Do not shake hands or have close contact with others, if possible
translation.ga: Ná croith lámha nó ná bíodh teagmháil dhlúth agat le daoine eile, más féidir

translation.en: There is little danger if you are just passing someone.
translation.ga: Is beag baol atá ann má tá tú díreach ag dul thar dhuine.

translation.en: But try to stay 2 meters away as much as possible.
translation.ga: Ach déan iarracht fanacht 2 mhéadar uathu an oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: Social separation at work
translation.ga: Scaradh sóisialta ag an obair

translation.en: Follow the advice on social segregation everywhere outside your home, including your workplace.
translation.ga: Lean an chomhairle maidir le scaradh sóisialta i ngach áit lasmuigh de do theach, d ’ ionad oibre san áireamh.

translation.en: If you are returning to work, read about the safe return to work.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag filleadh ar an áit oibre léigh eolas faoi fhilleadh ar an obair go sábháilte.

translation.en: Contact the health and safety authority (hsa) by email wcu @ hsa.ie or telephone 1890 289 389 if:
translation.ga: Déan teagmháil leis an údarás sláinte agus sábháilteachta (hsa) ar ríomhphost wcu @ hsa.ie nó fón 1890 289 389 má:

translation.en: You are concerned about the implementation of social segregation measures in the workplace
translation.ga: Tá imní ort faoin gcaoi a bhfuil na bearta maidir le scaradh sóisialta agus a leithéid á gcur i bhfeidhm san áit oibre

translation.en: If you are the employer and need advice on preventing crown virus in the workplace
translation.ga: Más tú an fostóir agus má theastaíonn comhairle uait maidir le coróinvíreas a chosc sa láthair oibre

translation.en: Isolate yourself if you have symptoms of coronavirus
translation.ga: Féin aonrú má tá comharthaí an choróinvíris ort

translation.en: Be very careful if you are in a group at risk from coronavirus
translation.ga: Bheith an-chúramach má tá tú i ngrúpa atá i mbaol ón gcoróinvíreas

translation.en: Cocooning of people at high risk (extremely vulnerable)
translation.ga: Cocúnú dhaoine atá i mbaol go mór (thar a bheith leochaileach)

translation.en: What to do if you live with someone who has the symptoms of coronavirus
translation.ga: Cad ba chóir a dhéanamh má tá cónaí ort le duine a bhfuil comharthaí an choróinvíris air / uirthi

translation.en: Travel and coronavirus
translation.ga: Taisteal agus coróinvíreas

translation.en: Good hygiene and hand washing
translation.ga: Sláinteachas maith agus níochán láimhe

translation.en: Good hygiene and proper handwashing will help curb the spread of the coronavirus. Follow this advice as much as possible and encourage others to do the same.
translation.ga: Cabhróidh sláinteachas maith agus níochán láimhe i gceart le srian a chur le scaipeadh an choróinvíris lean an chomhairle seo an oiread agus is féidir agus spreag daoine eile chun an rud céanna a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Wash your hands often and adequately.
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha i gceart agus go minic.

translation.en: Cover your mouth and nose with a handkerchief or sleeve when coughing and sneezing.
translation.ga: Clúdaigh do bhéal agus do shrón le ciarsúr nó le do mhuinchille, nuair a bhíonn tú ag casacht agus ag sraothartaigh.

translation.en: Put the handkerchief in a bin and wash your hands.
translation.ga: Cuir an ciarsúr i mbosca bruscair agus nigh do lámha.

translation.en: Clean and disinfect anything or surface that you touch frequently
translation.ga: Glan agus díghalraigh aon rud nó dromchla a leagan tú lámh orthu go minic

translation.en: Don't
translation.ga: Ná déan

translation.en: Do not place your hands near your eyes, nose or mouth unless they are clean.
translation.ga: Ná cuir do lámha in aice le do shúile, srón nó béal mura bhfuil siad glan.

translation.en: Do not share things that come in contact with your mouth - bottles, cups for example
translation.ga: Ná roinn rudaí a bhíonn i dteagmháil le do bhéal - buidéil, cupáin mar shampla

translation.en: When you should wash your hands
translation.ga: Cén uair ar chóir duit na lámha a ní

translation.en: You should wash your hands:
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit do lámha a ní:

translation.en: After coughing or sneezing
translation.ga: Tar éis casacht nó sraothartach

translation.en: Before and after eating
translation.ga: Roimh agus tar éis ithe

translation.en: Before and after preparing food
translation.ga: Roimh agus tar éis bia a ullmhú

translation.en: If you have been in contact with someone who has a fever or respiratory symptoms (cough, shortness of breath, difficulty breathing)
translation.ga: Má bhí tú i dteagmháil le duine a bhfuil fiabhras nó comharthaí riospráide air / uirthí (casacht, giorra anála, deacracht análaithe)

translation.en: Before and after you are on public transport
translation.ga: Roimh agus tar éis duit a bheith ar iompar poiblí

translation.en: Before and after being in a crowd (especially an indoor crowd)
translation.ga: Roimh agus tar éis a bheith i slua (go háirithe slua faoi dhíon)

translation.en: When you enter and leave buildings, your own home or anyone else ’ s house
translation.ga: Nuair a théann tú isteach agus nuair a fhágann tú foirgnimh, do theach féin nó teach aon duine eile

translation.en: If you were dealing with animals or animal waste
translation.ga: Má bhí tú ag plé le hainmhithe nó dramhaíl ainmhithe

translation.en: Before you smoke a cigarette or a cigarette
translation.ga: Sula gcaitheann tú toitín nó galthoitín

translation.en: If your hands are dirty
translation.ga: Má tá do lámha salach

translation.en: After using the toilet
translation.ga: Tar éis an leithreas a úsáid

translation.en: Take care of your hands.
translation.ga: Tabhair aire do do lámha.

translation.en: Apply moisturizer often.
translation.ga: Cuir maothóir orthu go minic.

translation.en: Any product will make a reason, a basic one without perfume or color.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh aon táirge cúis, ceann bunúsach gan cumhrán nó dath.

translation.en: Use the covid tracker
translation.ga: Úsáid an rianaire covid

translation.en: The covid tracker is a free and easy to use app and:
translation.ga: Is aip saor in aisce agus atá éasca le húsáid atá sa rianaire covid agus:

translation.en: Will alert you to close contact if someone you have had close contact with gets a positive result for covid -19
translation.ga: Cuirfidh sé foláireamh maidir le dlúth theagmháil chugat má fhaigheann duine a raibh dlúththeagmháil agat leis / léi toradh dearfach do covid -19

translation.en: It will give you advice on how to protect yourself and others
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh sé comhairle duit conas tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint

translation.en: It will alert other users of the app with whom you have had close contact if you get a positive result for the coronavirus
translation.ga: Cuirfidh sé foláireamh chuig úsáideoirí eile an aip a raibh dlúth theagmháil agat leo má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach don choróinvíreas

translation.en: The app is part of our contact tracking.
translation.ga: Is cuid dár rianú teagmhála atá san aip.

translation.en: Contact tracking is very important to curb the spread of the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Tá an rianú teagmhála an-tábhachtach chun srian a chur le scaipeadh an choróinvíris.

translation.en: The more people who find and uses the app, the better the contact tracking.
translation.ga: Más mó daoine a fhaigheann an aip agus a úsáideann é, is ea is fearr a dhéanfar an rianú teagmhála.

translation.en: It will help us stay safe when we meet people socially, at work or while traveling, if we use the app and follow the public health advice on this page.
translation.ga: Cabhróídh sé linn fanacht slán sábháilte nuair a bhuaileann muid le daoine go sóisialta, ag an obair nó ag taisteal, má úsáideann muid an aip agus má leanann muid an chomhairle sláinte poiblí ar an leathanach seo.

translation.en: Visitors
translation.ga: Cuairteoirí

translation.en: Don't meet too many people outside your home and spend too much time with them.
translation.ga: Ná buail le mórán daoine lasmuigh de do theach agus ná caith an iomarca ama in éineacht leo.

translation.en: No house should have more than ten visitors (from a maximum of 4 nets).
translation.ga: Níor cheart níos mó ná deichniúr cuairteoirí (ó 4 líontí ar a mhéad) a bheith in aon teach.

translation.en: The house should be large enough to have a distance of 2 meters between each person and plenty of air inside.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh an teach sách mór chun go mbeadh achar 2 mhéadar idir gach duine chomh maith le neart aeir a bheith istigh ann.

translation.en: Keep yourself and your visitors safe.
translation.ga: Coinnigh tú féin agus do chuairteoirí slán.

translation.en: Do not visit others if:
translation.ga: Ná téigh ar cuairt chuig daoine eile má:

translation.en: You would have any sign of the crown virus
translation.ga: Tá aon chomhartha den choróinvíreas ort

translation.en: If the contact trackers told you that you had close contact with someone who had the virus
translation.ga: Má dúirt na rianairí teagmhála leat go raibh gartheagmháil agat le duine a raibh an víreas air / uirthi

translation.en: Check with people in advance before you visit that they have no signs and are feeling well.
translation.ga: Cinntigh le daoine roimh ré sula dtéann tú ar cuairt chucu nach bhfuil aon chomhartha orthu agus go bhfuil siad ag aireachtáil go maith.

translation.en: If visitors are able to stay 2 meters apart, it is not necessary to wear a face cover.
translation.ga: Má tá cuairteoirí in ann fanacht amach 2 mhéadar óna chéile ní gá clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: If people cannot remain 2 meters apart, everyone should wear a face cover.
translation.ga: Mura féidir le daoine fanacht 2 mhéadar óna chéile, ba chóir do gach duine clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: Wear a face mask every time you visit people over 70 or others who are healthily vulnerable.
translation.ga: Cuir clúdach aghaidhe ort féin gach uair a thugann tú cuairt ar dhaoine os cionn 70 nó ar dhaoine eile atá leochaileach ó thaobh sláinte de.

translation.en: Clean your hands regularly and tell visitors to wash their hands when they enter.
translation.ga: Glan do lámha go rialta agus abair le cuairteoirí a lámha a ní nuair a thagann siad isteach.

translation.en: Do not wear disposable gloves instead of cleaning your hands.
translation.ga: Ná caith miotóga aon-uaire in ionad do lámha a ghlanadh.

translation.en: The virus affects them the same way it gets on your hands.
translation.ga: Téann an víreas orthu an bealach céanna agus a dtéann sé ar do lámha.

translation.en: Corruption can get on the hands when you remove them.
translation.ga: Is féidir le héilliú dul ar na lámha nuair a bhaineann tú díot iad.

translation.en: When your visitors disappear, clean all surfaces they have been in contact with.
translation.ga: Nuair a imíonn do chuairteoirí glan gach dromhchla a raibh siad i dteagmháil leo.

translation.en: Use for routine household cleaning and disinfectants.
translation.ga: Úsáid do ghnáth ghlantacháin tí agus díghalráin.

translation.en: Compassionate visits
translation.ga: Cuairteanna atruacha

translation.en: Returning to work safely
translation.ga: Ag filleadh ar do chuid oibre go sábháilte

translation.en: Do your work from home.
translation.ga: Déan do chuid oibre ón mbaile.

translation.en: Only essential workers should go to workplaces.
translation.ga: Is oibrithe riachtanacha amháin a chóir dul chuig láithreacha oibre.

translation.en: Only essential workers, construction workers and people who work outside should go to their workplace.
translation.ga: Níor chóir ach d ’ oibrithe riachtanacha, d ’ oibrithe tógála agus do dhaoine a oibríonn lasmuigh dul chuig a n-ionad oibre.

translation.en: The use of face masks is recommended in crowded workplaces.
translation.ga: Moltar úsáid a bhaint as clúdaigh aghaidhe i láithreacha oibre atá plódaithe.

translation.en: Before you return to work
translation.ga: Sula bhfilleann tú ar an obair

translation.en: Before you return to work, you must:
translation.ga: Sula bhfilleann tú ar an obair ní mór duit:

translation.en: Fill in a return to work form
translation.ga: Foirm a líonadh maidir le filleadh ar an obair

translation.en: Tell your employer about any relevant covid-19 circumstances they should be aware of
translation.ga: Inis do d ’ fhostóir faoi aon chúinse ábhartha a bhaineann le covid-19 ar chóir dóibh fios a bheith acu orthu

translation.en: Participate in any training provided by your employer
translation.ga: Páirt a ghlacadh in aon oiliúint a chuireann d ’ fhostóir ar fáil

translation.en: Pre-return to work form
translation.ga: Foirm um réamh-fhilleadh ar an obair

translation.en: You will need to complete this form at least 3 days before your return to work.
translation.ga: Beidh ort an fhoirm seo a líonadh 3 lá ar a laghad sula bhfilleann tú ar an obair.

translation.en: This form applies to your job and is only available from your employer.
translation.ga: Baineann an fhoirm seo le do phost agus tá sí ar fáil ó d ’ fhostóir amháin.

translation.en: The form declares:
translation.ga: Dearbhaíonn an fhoirm:

translation.en: You do not have covid-19 symptoms
translation.ga: Nach bhfuil comharthaí covid-19 ort

translation.en: Not staying alone (self-isolating)
translation.ga: Nach bhfuil tú ag fanacht asat féin (ag féin-aonrú)

translation.en: You are not waiting for covid-19 test results
translation.ga: Nach bhfuil tú ag fanacht ar thorthaí tástála covid-19

translation.en: You are not returning from some other country
translation.ga: Nach bhfuil tú ag filleadh ar ais ó thír éigin eile

translation.en: Your employer may ask you to confirm these details in the future.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadadh d ’ fhostóir iarraidh ort na sonraí sin a dheimhniú amach anseo.

translation.en: This may be because you are only occasionally at work or you have not been at work for a period of time, e.g on annual leave.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé sin a bheith de bharr nach bhfuil tú i d ’ áit oibre ach ó am go chéile nó nach raibh tú i d ’ áit oibre ar feadh tréimhse ama, m.sh ar shaoire bhliantúil.

translation.en: Protect yourself in the workplace
translation.ga: Cosain tú féin sa láthair oibre

translation.en: Adhere to the measures laid down by your employer to ensure social isolation
translation.ga: Cloí leis na bearta atá leagtha síos ag d ’ fhostóir chun aonrú scaradh sóisialta a chinntiú

translation.en: Wash your hands properly regularly
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha i gceart go rialta

translation.en: Adhere to hygiene advice for coughing and sneezing
translation.ga: Cloí le comhairle sláinteachais maidir le casachtach agus sraothartach

translation.en: Stay alone when traveling to work
translation.ga: Fan asat féin nuair atá tú ag taisteal chuig an obair

translation.en: Use your own pen to sign in
translation.ga: Úsáid do pheann féin chun síniú isteach

translation.en: Wear a face mask if there are many people in your workplace
translation.ga: Caith clúdach aghaidhe má tá go leor daoine i do láthair oibre

translation.en: Get and use the contact tracker app - -you will be alerted for immediate contact if someone close to you finds a positive result for covid -19
translation.ga: Faigh an aip rianaire teagmhála agus úsáid í - -seolfar foláireamh chugat maidir le gartheagmháil má fhaigheann duine a raibh gar duit toradh dearfach do covid -19

translation.en: Do not touch your eyes, mouth or nose
translation.ga: Ná leag do lámh ar do shúile, do bhéal ná do shrón

translation.en: Do not share anything that comes in contact with your mouths, such as bottles or cups
translation.ga: Ná roinn aon rud a bhíonn i dteagmháil le do bhéal, ar nós buidéil nó cupáin

translation.en: Do not shake hands with anyone
translation.ga: Ná croith lámha le duine ar bith

translation.en: Do not have face-to-face meetings and go on business trips if possible - use telephone or video conferencing
translation.ga: Ná bíodh cruinnithe duine le duine agat agus ná téigh ar thurais ghnó más féidir – úsáid fónchomhdháil nó físchomhdháil

translation.en: You may be worried about how your workplace is handling a covid-19 outbreak.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go bhfuil imní ort faoin gcaoi a bhfuil do láthair oibre ag láimhseáil ráig covid-19.

translation.en: If so, contact the health and safety authority.
translation.ga: Má tá, déan teagmháil leis an údarás sláinte agus sábháilteachta.

translation.en: If you get symptoms of illness at work
translation.ga: Má thagann comharthaí tinnis ort ag an obair

translation.en: Tell the manager immediately.
translation.ga: Inis don bhainisteoir láithreach.

translation.en: Your employer will have a process in place.
translation.ga: Beidh próiseas leagtha síos ag d ’ fhostóir.

translation.en: Follow the guidelines and advice available to you.
translation.ga: Lean na treoirlínte agus an chomhairle atá ann duit.

translation.en: Stay away from other staff immediately
translation.ga: Fanacht amach ó bhaill foirne eile láithreach

translation.en: Wear a face cover if one is available
translation.ga: Clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh má tá ceann ar fáil

translation.en: Stay at least 2 meters away from others
translation.ga: Fanacht ar a laghad 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Call your gp to arrange a covid-19 test
translation.ga: Glaoch ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh chun tástáil covid-19 a shocrú

translation.en: Go home as soon as it is safe to do so.
translation.ga: Téigh abhaile chomh luath agus atá sé sábháilte é sin a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Stay alone at home and call your gp.
translation.ga: Fan asat féin sa bhaile agus glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: Do not use public transport of any kind to get home.
translation.ga: Ná húsáid iompar poiblí de chineál ar bith chun dul abhaile.

translation.en: If you can't go home straight away:
translation.ga: Mura féidir leat dul abhaile láithreach:

translation.en: Stay alone in the building and call your gp
translation.ga: Fan asat féin sa bhfoirgneamh agus glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh

translation.en: Do not touch anyone, surface or anything else
translation.ga: Ná leag lámh ar dhuine, dromchla ná aon ní eile

translation.en: Cover your mouth and nose with a tissue when you cough or sneeze.
translation.ga: Clúdaigh do bhéal agus do shrón le ciarsúr páipéir nuair a bhíonn tú ag casacht nó ag sraothartach.

translation.en: Put the dirty paper towel in a trash bag.
translation.ga: Cuir an ciarsúr páipéir salach i mála bruscair.

translation.en: People at greater risk from coronavirus
translation.ga: Daoine atá i mbaol níos mó ón gcoróinvíreas

translation.en: Work from home if you are at greater risk from coronavirus.
translation.ga: Oibrigh ón mbaile má tá tú i mbaol níos mó ón gcoróinvíreas.

translation.en: If you can't work from home, talk to your gp or employer.
translation.ga: Mura féidir leat oibriú ón mbaile, labhair le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh nó d ’ fhostóir.

translation.en: Your employer may seek occupational health advice.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go lorgódh d ’ fhostóir comhairle um shláinte ceirde.

translation.en: Make sure your employer has safeguards in place where possible.
translation.ga: Cinntigh go bhfuil bearta cosanta i bhfeidhm ag d ’ fhostóir maidir le nuair is féidir.

translation.en: Advice for employers
translation.ga: Comhairle d ’ fhostóirí

translation.en: Employers should adhere to work safely protocol
translation.ga: Ba chóir d ’ fhostóirí cloí le work safely protocol

translation.en: These guidelines contain advice:
translation.ga: Tá comhairle sna treoirlínte seo maidir le:

translation.en: Stop the spread of covid-19 in the workplace
translation.ga: Stop a chur le scaipeadh an covid-19 sa láthair oibre

translation.en: Steps to reduce the risk of covid-19
translation.ga: Céimeanna chun an baol a bhaineann le covid-19 a laghdú

translation.en: What to do if an employee shows signs of the virus
translation.ga: Cad ba chóir a dhéanamh má léiríonn fostaí comharthaí an víris

translation.en: The health and safety authority (hsa) provides advice to employers and employees on workplace protection measures.
translation.ga: Cuireann an túdarás sláinte agus sábháilteachta (hsa) comhairle ar fáil d ’ fhostóirí agus d ’ fhostaithe maidir le bearta cosanta san ionad oibre.

translation.en: Checklists and templates from the hsa are available to help employers, business owners and managers prevent the spread of covid-19 in the workplace.
translation.ga: Tá seicliostaí agus teimpléid ón hsa ar fáil chun cabhrú le fostóirí, le h-úinéirí gnó agus le bainisteoirí, cosc a chur le scaipeadh covid-19 san ionad oibre.

translation.en: Advice for healthcare workers
translation.ga: Comhairle d ’ oibrithe cúraim sláinte

translation.en: Guidelines and advice for healthcare staff, managers and staff returning to work during the covid-19 outbreak are available on healthservice.hse.ie
translation.ga: Tá treoirlínte agus comhairle d ’ fhoireann cúraim sláinte, do bhainisteoirí agus do bhaill foirne a fhilleann ar an obair le linn ráig covid-19 ar healthservice.hse.ie

translation.en: Read guidelines for returning healthcare managers and healthcare staff on how to work safely
translation.ga: Léigh treoirlínte do bhainisteoirí cúraim sláinte agus d ’ fhoireann cúraim sláinte atá ag filleadh ar an obair maidir le obair go sábháilte

translation.en: Water systems
translation.ga: Córais uisce

translation.en: Read the environmental health advice for managing water systems in the event of a shutdown
translation.ga: Léigh an chomhairle um shláinte chomhshaoil chun córais uisce a bhainistiú i gcás múchadh

translation.en: That advice has included:
translation.ga: Tá na nithe seo a leanas curtha san áireamh sa gcomhairle sin:

translation.en: Hotels
translation.ga: Óstáin

translation.en: Food premises
translation.ga: Áitreabh bia

translation.en: Water recreational facilities
translation.ga: Áiseanna áineasa uisce

translation.en: Organizations that provide advice to employers and employees
translation.ga: Eagraíochtaí a chuireann comhairle ar fáil d ’ fhostóirí agus d ’ fhostaithe

translation.en: Shopping safely during the coronary virus outbreak
translation.ga: Ag siopadóireacht go sábháilte le linn ráig an choróinvíris

translation.en: The biggest danger of shopping is being in contact with an infected person.
translation.ga: An chontúirt is mó a bhaineann le bheith ag siopadóireacht ná go mbeifeá i dteagmháil le duine ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: When shopping, you should:
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn tú ag siopadóireacht, ba chóir duit:

translation.en: Wear a face cover
translation.ga: Clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh

translation.en: Practice best hygiene practices
translation.ga: Deachleachtais maidir le sláinteachais a chleachtadh

translation.en: Practice social separation
translation.ga: Scaradh sóisialta a chleachtadh

translation.en: Without contact with people outside of those who live with you
translation.ga: Gan teagmháil le daoine lasmuigh díobh sin a chónaíonn leat

translation.en: Someone who passes by in the store is not much of a danger to you.
translation.ga: Ní mórán baol duitse duine a théann tharat sa siopa.

translation.en: But stay away from 2 meters away as much as possible.
translation.ga: Ach fan amach 2 mhéadar uathu an oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: Face cover
translation.ga: Clúdach aghaidhe

translation.en: By law, you must wear a face cover while shopping because it can be difficult to practice social separation while in a store.
translation.ga: De réir dlí caithfidh tú clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh agus tú ag siopadóireacht toisc go bhféadfadh sé a bheith deacair scaradh sóisialta a chleachtadh agus tú i siopa.

translation.en: Face covers should also be worn in busy or crowded outdoor spaces, such as a shopping street.
translation.ga: Ba chóir clúdaigh aghaidh a chaitheamh freisin i spásanna gnóthacha nó plódaithe amuigh faoin aer, ar nós sráid siopadóireachta.

translation.en: However, face coverage is not suitable for everyone.
translation.ga: Níl clúdach aghaidhe oiriúnach do gach duine áfach.

translation.en: It ’ s okay if certain people choose not to wear them.
translation.ga: Tá sé ceart go leor má roghnaíonn daoine áirithe gan iad a chaitheamh.

translation.en: Facial cover is not suitable for children under 13 or for people with special needs as they may be upset or very uncomfortable to wear.
translation.ga: Níl clúdach aghaidhe oiriúnach do leanaí faoi 13 bliana d ’ aois nó do dhaoine le riachtanais speisialta mar d ’ fhéadfaidís a bheith trína chéile nó an-mhíchompordach á gcaitheamh.

translation.en: When you should stay home
translation.ga: Cén uair ar cheart duit fanacht sa bhaile

translation.en: Don ’ t go out shopping if you ’ re feeling sick
translation.ga: Ná téigh amach ag siopadóireacht má tá tú ag aireachtáil tinn

translation.en: If you are at greater risk from covid-19, consider doing your shopping online or ask someone to shop for you.
translation.ga: Má tá tú i mbaol níos mó ó covid-19, smaoinigh ar do chuid siopadóireachta a dhéanamh ar líne nó iarr ar dhuine éigin siopadóireacht a dhéanamh duit.

translation.en: If you need help, you can also contact your local county council.
translation.ga: Má theastaíonn cúnamh uait, féadfaidh tú teagmháil a dhéanamh le do chomhairle contae áitiúil freisin.

translation.en: They have community support in place to deliver essential goods.
translation.ga: Tá tacaíocht phobail i bhfeidhm acu chun earraí riachtanacha a sheachadadh.

translation.en: Read more about how local authorities can help you during the coronary virus outbreak.
translation.ga: Léigh tuilleadh faoin mbealach ar féidir le húdaráis áitiúla cabhrú leat le linn ráig an choróinvíris.

translation.en: Reduce the risk while shopping
translation.ga: Laghdaigh an baol le linn siopadóireachta

translation.en: Only go shopping when necessary.
translation.ga: Ná téigh ag siopadóireacht ach amháin nuair atá gá leis.

translation.en: This reduces the risk of contracting or spreading covid-19.
translation.ga: Laghdaíonn sé sin an baol atá ann covid-19 a tholgadh nó a scaipeadh.

translation.en: When you are shopping
translation.ga: Nuair atá tú ag siopadóireacht

translation.en: Use the disinfectant provided, on your hands, the trolley or basket.
translation.ga: Úsáid an díghalrán a chuirtear ar fáil, ar do lámha, ar an tralaí nó an ciseán.

translation.en: Remember to make no contact with your face.
translation.ga: Cuimhnigh gan aon teagmháil a dhéanamh le d ’ aghaidh.

translation.en: Wear a face mask if you're over 13 - but don't wear it if you feel uncomfortable wearing it
translation.ga: Caith clúdach aghaidhe má tá tú os cionn 13 bliana d ’ aois - ach ní gá é a chaitheamh má airíonn tú míchompordach agus tú á chaitheamh

translation.en: If you cough or sneeze, cover your mouth and nose with a tissue or your sleeve.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn tú ag casacht nó ag sraothartach, clúdaigh do bhéal agus do shrón le ciarsúr páipéir nó le do mhuinchille.

translation.en: Follow the guidelines for social separation - stay 2 meters away from others in queues when shopping.
translation.ga: Lean na treoirlínte maidir le scaradh sóisialta – fan amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile i scuainí nuair atá tú ag siopadóireacht.

translation.en: Pay by card rather than cash - a contactless payment method may reduce the risk of infection.
translation.ga: Íoc le cárta seachas le h-airgead tirim – d ’ fhéadfadh modh íocaíochta gan tadhall an baol ionfhabhtaithe a laghdú.

translation.en: If you use cash, the risk is low, especially if you clean your hands regularly after handling cash.
translation.ga: Má úsáideann tú airgead tirim, tá an riosca íseal, go háirithe má ghlanann tú do lámha go rialta tar éis airgead tirim a láimhseáil.

translation.en: After shopping
translation.ga: Tar éis siopadóireachta

translation.en: Wash your hands properly
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha i gceart

translation.en: Save your shopping
translation.ga: Cuir do chuid siopadóireachta i dtaisce

translation.en: Wash your hands again
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha arís

translation.en: Show respect for others
translation.ga: Taispeáin meas do dhaoine eile

translation.en: Only buy what you need - it is restocked in stores daily.
translation.ga: Ná ceannaigh ach na rudaí a theastaíonn uait - déantar athstocáil sna siopaí go laethúil.

translation.en: Do not go shopping during the hours set for healthcare workers and carers.
translation.ga: Ná téigh ag siopadóireacht le linn na n-uaireanta atá leagtha síos d ’ oibrithe cúraim sláinte agus do chúramóirí.

translation.en: Delivery and collection services are very important for people who are cocooning and are unable to leave their homes.
translation.ga: Tá seirbhísí seachadta agus bailiúcháin an-tábhachtach do dhaoine atá ag cocúnú agus nach bhfuil in ann a gcuid tithe a fhágáil.

translation.en: Only reserve delivery times if necessary.
translation.ga: Ná cuir amanna seachadta in áirithe ach amháin má tá gá leis.

translation.en: Shopping for a vulnerable person
translation.ga: Ag siopadóireacht do dhuine leochaileach

translation.en: How covid-19 is spread
translation.ga: Conas a scaiptear covid-19

translation.en: Direct contact
translation.ga: Gartheagmháil

translation.en: Local restrictions to stop the spread of the coronavirus
translation.ga: Srianta áitiúla chun stop a chur le scaipeadh an choróinvíreas

translation.en: You could get the virus from someone who has the virus if you have close contact with it.
translation.ga: D' fhéadfá an víreas a fháil ó dhuine a bhfuil an víreas air má bhíonn gartheagmháil agat leis.

translation.en: It is spread in droplets from your nose and mouth, e.g. when someone is talking loudly, singing, shouting, coughing or sneezing.
translation.ga: Scaiptear é i mbraoiníní ó do shrón agus do bhéal m.sh nuair a bhíonn duine ag caint os ard, ag canadh, ag béicíl, ag casacht nó ag sraothartach.

translation.en: This happens when people are 1 to 2 meters apart.
translation.ga: Tarlaíonn sé seo nuair a bhíonn daoine 1 go 2 mhéadar óna chéile.

translation.en: This is why the spread of the virus is reduced when you keep a distance of 2 meters from others.
translation.ga: Sin é an fáth go laghdaítear scaipeadh an víris nuair a choinníonn tú fad 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: Infected surfaces
translation.ga: Dromchlaí galraithe

translation.en: The virus can be found from a surface that has been infected or sneezed by a person with the virus.
translation.ga: Is féidir an víreas a fháil ó dhromhchla a ndearna duine leis an víreas casacht nó sraothartach air.

translation.en: The virus can be present in droplets that fall on surrounding surfaces.
translation.ga: Is féidir leis an víreas a bheith i mbraoiníní a thiteann ar dhromhchlaí ina dtimpeall.

translation.en: If you lay your hand on your eyes, nose or mouth, you could also get the virus.
translation.ga: Má leagann tú do lámh ar do shúile, srón nó béal, d ’ fhéadfá an víreas a fháil freisin.

translation.en: This is why it is important to wash your hands properly and often.
translation.ga: Sin é an fáth go bhfuil sé tábhachtach do lámha a ní i gceart agus go minic.

translation.en: How long the virus can survive
translation.ga: Cén fhad atá an víreas in ann maireachtáil

translation.en: Simple household disinfectants can kill the virus on surfaces.
translation.ga: Is féidir le díghalráin simplí tí an víreas a mharú ar dhromchlaí.

translation.en: Clean the surface first, and then use a disinfectant.
translation.ga: Glan an dromchla ar dtús agus ansin úsáid dífhabhtán.

translation.en: The crown virus can survive for:
translation.ga: Is féidir leis an choróinvíreas maireachtáil ar feadh:

translation.en: Up to 72 hours on plastic and stainless steel.
translation.ga: Suas le 72 uair a chloig ar phlaisteach agus cruach dhosmálta.

translation.en: Less than 4 hours on copper
translation.ga: Níos lú ná 4 uair a chloig ar chopar

translation.en: Less than 24 hours on cardboard
translation.ga: Níos lú ná 24 uair a chloig ar chairtchlár

translation.en: Airborne transmission
translation.ga: Tarchur aeriompartha

translation.en: Airborne transmission is the spread of viruses in very small water particles.
translation.ga: Is é atá i dtarchur aeriompartha ná scaipeadh víris i gcáithníní uisce an-bheag.

translation.en: This can happen over a distance longer than droplets, such as across a room.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh sé seo tarlú thar achar níos faide ná braoiníní, mar shampla trasna seomra.

translation.en: Airborne transmission does not appear to play a major role in the spread of covid-19.
translation.ga: Ní cosúil go bhfuil ról mór ag tarchur aeriompartha i scaipeadh covid-19.

translation.en: But it can happen in some cases.
translation.ga: Ach is féidir leis tarlú i gcásanna áirithe.

translation.en: To protect yourself, keep indoor spaces well ventilated (allowing fresh air in) by opening windows and doors if possible.
translation.ga: Chun tú féin a chosaint, coinnigh spásanna faoi dhíon aeráilte go maith (aer úr á ligean isteach) trí fhuinneoga agus doirse a oscailt más féidir.

translation.en: How to protect yourself
translation.ga: Conas tú féin a chosaint

translation.en: A face mask can protect you, but you should always do what is necessary to prevent the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Is féidir le clúdach aghaidhe tú a chosaint ach ba chóir duit na rudaí atá riachtanach a dhéanamh i gcónaí chun cosc a chur le scaipeadh an víris.

translation.en: These include:
translation.ga: Ina measc seo:

translation.en: Social separation
translation.ga: Scaradh sóisialta

translation.en: Cover your cough and sneeze.
translation.ga: Clúdaigh do chasacht agus do shraothartach.

translation.en: Wash your hands properly
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha i gceart

translation.en: Do not place your hands near your eyes, nose or mouth unless they are clean
translation.ga: Ná cuir do lámha in aice le do shúile, srón nó béal mura bhfuil siad glan

translation.en: The virus can quickly spread in a crowded environment.
translation.ga: Is féidir leis an víreas scaipeadh go héasca i dtimpeallacht atá plódaithe.

translation.en: Avoid crowded places as much as possible.
translation.ga: Seachain áiteanna plódaithe an oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: Leave a place if it is crowded and you cannot stay 2 meters away from others.
translation.ga: Fág áit má bhíonn sé plódaithe agus mura féidir leat fanacht amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: Pets and the crown virus
translation.ga: Peataí agus an coróinvíreas

translation.en: There is no evidence that pets such as cats and dogs can spread the coronavirus among humans.
translation.ga: Níl aon fhianaise ann gur féidir le peataí ar nós cait agus madraí an coróinvíreas a scaipeadh i measc daoine.

translation.en: To give yourself better protection, wash your hands often and adequately when in contact with pets.
translation.ga: Le cosaint níos fearr a thabhairt duit féin, nigh do lámha i gceart agus go minic nuair a bhíonn tú i dteagmháil le peataí.

translation.en: Face mask, medical mask and disposable gloves
translation.ga: Clúdach aghaidhe, masc leighis agus miotóga aon uaire

translation.en: You are required by law to wear face cover
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh de réir dlí ar

translation.en: Public transport.
translation.ga: Iompar poiblí.

translation.en: In shops, shopping centres etc - see complete list
translation.ga: I siopaí, ionaid siopadóireachta agus ‘ rl – féach an liosta iomlán

translation.en: Face cover should also be worn:
translation.ga: Ba chóir clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh freisin:

translation.en: When it is not possible to stay away 2 meters from others
translation.ga: Nuair nach féidir fanacht amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: In hospitals, doctor's dispensary, nursing homes and at the dentist and other health centers
translation.ga: In ospidéil, íoclann dochtúra, tithe altranais agus ag an bhfiaclóir agus ionaid sláinte eile

translation.en: When people are at risk from people who are at greater risk from the coronary virus - eg people over 70 years of age or people who are vulnerable to health
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn daoine ar cuairt ag daoine atá i mbaol níos mó ón choróinvíreas – m.sh daoine atá os cionn 70 bliain daoine nó daoine atá leochaileach ó thaobh na sláinte de

translation.en: There are people who should not / cannot wear face cover.
translation.ga: Tá daoine ann nár chóir dóibh / nach féidir leo clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: Here is a piece of cloth that covers your nose and mouth.
translation.ga: Seo píosa éadach a chlúdaíonn do shrón agus do bhéal.

translation.en: This coverage may restrict the spread of the coronavirus in the community.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh an clúdach seo srian a chur le scaipeadh an choróinvíris sa bpobal.

translation.en: It may help to prevent the spread of the coronavirus from sneezing or coughing in people with the virus.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé cabhrú le srian a chur le scaipeadh an choróinvíris ó shraothartach nó casacht daoine a bhfuil an víreas orthu.

translation.en: They may help people who do not know they have the virus to pass on the virus to others.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé go gcabhróidís le daoine nach bhfuil a fhios acu go bhfuil an víreas orthu an víreas a thabhairt do dhaoine eile.

translation.en: Social separation
translation.ga: Scaradh sóisialta

translation.en: Cover your mouth and nose with a handkerchief or sleeve when coughing and sneezing.
translation.ga: Clúdaigh do bhéal agus do shrón le ciarsúr nó le do mhuinchille, nuair a bhíonn tú ag casacht agus ag sraothartaigh.

translation.en: Wash your hands often and adequately
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha i gceart agus go minic

translation.en: Do not place your hands near your eyes, nose or mouth unless they are clean.
translation.ga: Ná cuir do lámha in aice le do shúile, srón nó béal mura bhfuil siad glan.

translation.en: People who should not wear face cover
translation.ga: Daoine nár chóir dóibh clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh

translation.en: You do not need to wear a mask if you have an illness or particular needs and a facial covering may upset or make you uncomfortable.
translation.ga: Ní gá duit masc a chaitheamh má tá tinneas nó riachtanais speisialta ort agus go bhféadfadh clúdach aghaidhe tú a chur trína chéile nó a dhéanamh míchompordach.

translation.en: Facial coverage is also not recommended for people with:
translation.ga: Ní mholtar clúdadh aghaidhe freisin do dhaoine a bhfuil:

translation.en: They have trouble breathing
translation.ga: Trioblóidí acu ag análú

translation.en: Unconscious person or speech
translation.ga: Duine gan aithne nó urlabhra

translation.en: A person who is unable to remove the face cover without assistance,
translation.ga: Duine nach bhfuil in ann an clúdach aghaidhe a bhaint díobh gan chabhair

translation.en: A person with special needs or hearing difficulties, or who is deaf
translation.ga: Duine le riachtanais speisialta nó le deacrachtaí éisteachta nó atá bodhar

translation.en: In such cases, the person will receive some protection from the cheater if he is able to throw cheaters.
translation.ga: I gcásanna mar seo gheobhaidh an duine cosaint áirithe ón gcealtair má tá sé in ann cealtair a chaitheamh.

translation.en: But this is the only time you should spend on cells.
translation.ga: Ach seo an t-aon am ar chóir duit cealtair a chaitheamh.

translation.en: You will get better protection against covid-19 if you wear a cloth-covered face cover.
translation.ga: Gheobhaidh tú cosaint níos fearr in aghaidh covid-19 má chaitheann tú clúdach aghaidhe déanta as éadach.

translation.en: Children under the age of 13 are not advised to wear face masks, but some children may choose to wear one.
translation.ga: Ní mholtar do pháistí faoi 13 bliana d ’ aois clúdaigh aghaidhe a chaitheamh, ach is féidir le páistí áirithe roghnú ceann a chaitheamh.

translation.en: There is a good chance that young children will not follow the advice on how to wear face masks properly.
translation.ga: Tá seans maith nach leanfadh páistí óga an chomhairle faoin gcaoi cheart le clúdaigh aghaidh a chaitheamh.

translation.en: There is also a risk that they may not understand the importance of avoiding touching the cover.
translation.ga: Tá baol ann freisin nach dtuigfeadh siad an tábhacht a bhaineann le tadhall leis an gclúdach a sheachaint.

translation.en: Children under 13 should wear a mask if recommended by their doctor or health worker.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do pháistí faoi 13 masc a chaitheamh má mholann a ndochtúir nó oibrí sláinte dóibh sin a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Children may be advised to wear a mask while attending a hospital clinic for example.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí comhairle a thabhairt do pháistí masc a chaitheamh agus iad ag freastal ar chlinic ospidéil mar shampla.

translation.en: Children under 13 only in the first year of secondary school should wear face cover while attending school.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do pháistí atá faoi 13 ach sa chéad bhliain den mheánscoil clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh agus iad ag freastal ar scoil.

translation.en: This is recommended because they are at the same stage of development as their peers and can properly follow the advice on face coverings.
translation.ga: Moltar seo toisc go bhfuil siad ag an gcéim fhorbartha chéanna lena gcomhghleacaithe agus gur féidir leo an chomhairle maidir le clúdaigh aghaidhe a leanacht i gceart.

translation.en: When one should wear
translation.ga: Cén uair ar chóir ceann a chaitheamh

translation.en: You must wear face cover on public transport, by law and in:
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh ar iompar poiblí, de réir dlí agus i:

translation.en: Shops and pharmacy
translation.ga: Siopaí agus cógaslainne

translation.en: Shopping centers
translation.ga: Ionaid siopadóireachta

translation.en: Libraries
translation.ga: Leabharlanna

translation.en: Cinemas
translation.ga: Pictiúrlanna

translation.en: Theaters
translation.ga: Amharclanna

translation.en: Concert halls
translation.ga: Hallaí coirmeacha

translation.en: Bingo halls
translation.ga: Hallaí biongó

translation.en: Museums
translation.ga: Iarsmalanna

translation.en: Nail salon
translation.ga: Salon ingne

translation.en: Hairdressers and barbers
translation.ga: Gruaigeadóirí agus bairbeoirí

translation.en: Tattoo shop and piercing
translation.ga: Siopa tatú agus pollta

translation.en: Travel agents and tour operators
translation.ga: Gníomhairí taistil agus tionscnóirí turais

translation.en: Laundry centers and dry cleaners
translation.ga: Ionaid níocháin agus tirimghlantóirí

translation.en: Bookmakers
translation.ga: Geallghlacadóirí

translation.en: Many of these places are temporarily closed due to health risk to the public.
translation.ga: Tá go leor de na háiteanna seo dúnta go sealadach mar gheall ar an mbaol sláinte don phobal.

translation.en: When you can remove the face cover
translation.ga: Cén uair ar féidir leat an clúdach aghaidhe a bhaint díot

translation.en: You can remove the face cover to
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an clúdach aghaidhe a bhaint díot chun

translation.en: Talk to someone who has communication difficulties
translation.ga: Labhairt le duine a bhfuil deacrachtaí cumarsáide aige

translation.en: Providing emergency assistance or care to a vulnerable person
translation.ga: Cúnamh nó cúram éigeandála a thabhairt do dhuine leochaileach

translation.en: Taking medication
translation.ga: Cógais leighis a thógáil

translation.en: You may be asked to remove the face cover to confirm your age or identity
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfaí iarraidh ort an clúdach aghaidhe a bhaint díot chun d ’ aois nó d ’ aitheantas a dherbhú

translation.en: You can also remove the face cover:
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an clúdach aghaidhe a bhaint díot freisin:

translation.en: At a post office, credit union or bank
translation.ga: In oifig an phoist, comharcreidmheasa nó banc

translation.en: In a restaurant or cafe while eating and drinking
translation.ga: I mbialann nó caifé agus tú ag ithe agus ag ól

translation.en: When you are receiving medical or dental treatment
translation.ga: Nuair atá cóir leighis nó fiaclóireachta á fháil agat

translation.en: Where it is made from
translation.ga: Cé as a ndéantar é

translation.en: A face cover is made of cloth such as cotton or silk.
translation.ga: Déantar clúdach aghaidhe as éadach ar nós cadás nó síoda.

translation.en: You can buy them or make them at home from items like scarves, t-shirts, fitness shirts, or towels.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat iad a cheannach nó iad a dhéanamh sa mbaile as earraí cosúil le scairfeanna, t-léinte, léinte aclaíochta, nó tuáillí.

translation.en: How you wear a face cover
translation.ga: Cén chaoi a gcaitheann tú clúdach aghaidhe

translation.en: It should cover the nose and be under the chin and:
translation.ga: Ba chóir go gclúdódh sé an tsrón agus go mbeadh sé faoin smig agus:

translation.en: That it lies quietly and comfortably on the cheek
translation.ga: Go luíonn sé go socair agus go compordach ar an leiceann

translation.en: Be secured with an ear strap or loop
translation.ga: Go mbeadh sé daingnithe le h-iall nó lúb chluaise

translation.en: There should be at least 2 pieces of cloth
translation.ga: Go mbeadh 2 phíosa éadach ar a laghad ann

translation.en: Be able to catch your breath with ease
translation.ga: Go mbeifeá ábalta d ’ anáil a tharraingt gan stró

translation.en: How to store and wash face covers
translation.ga: Conas clúdaigh aghaidh a stóráil agus a ní

translation.en: Store your face cover made of cloth properly and wash it regularly to keep it clean.
translation.ga: Stóráil do chlúdach aghaidhe déanta as éadach mar is ceart agus nigh é go rialta chun é a choinneáil glan.

translation.en: Have more than one face cover, so you have a clean one if needed.
translation.ga: Bíodh níos mó ná clúdach aghaidhe amháin agat ionas go mbeidh ceann glan agat má bhíonn sé ag teastáil.

translation.en: Remove it properly and clean or disinfect your hands after handling the face cover '
translation.ga: Bain díot é mar is ceart agus glan nó díghalraigh do lámha tar éis a bheith ag láimhseáil an chlúdaigh aghaidhe ‘

translation.en: Storing your face cover
translation.ga: Ag stóráil do chlúdach aghaidhe

translation.en: Storing wet or dirty face cover
translation.ga: Ag stóráil clúdach aghaidhe fliuch nó salach

translation.en: If your face gets wet or dirty due to sweat, saliva, make-up or anything else, put the face cover in a tightly closed bag, and then wash it.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn d ’ aghaidh fliuch nó salach de bharr allais, seile, smidiú nó aon rud eile, cuir an clúdach aghaidhe isteach i mála atá dúnta go daingean, agus nigh é ansin.

translation.en: Wash the wet or dirty face cover as soon as possible before it becomes rotten.
translation.ga: Nigh an clúdach aghaidhe fliuch nó salach chomh luath agus is féidir sula n-éireoidh sé lofa.

translation.en: Breathing through a wet face cover is not easy to breathe and is not as effective as a dry cover.
translation.ga: Níl sé furast anáil a tharraingt trí chlúdach aghaidhe fliuch agus níl sé chomh héifeachtach le clúdach atá tirim.

translation.en: Storing dry face cover
translation.ga: Ag stóráil clúdach aghaidhe tirim

translation.en: A clean face cover can be placed safely until you have to put it on again.
translation.ga: Is féidir clúdach aghaidhe atá glan a chur in áit shábháilte go dtí go mbeidh ort é a chur ort arís.

translation.en: Remove it properly and clean or disinfect your hands after handling it.
translation.ga: Bain díot é mar is ceart agus agus glan nó díghalraigh do lámha tar éis a bheith ag plé leis.

translation.en: Keep it in a dry bag to let air through (bag made of paper or cloth) to keep it clean.
translation.ga: Coinnigh é i mála tirim a ligean an t-aer tríd (mála déanta as páipéar nó éadach) chun é a choinneáil glan.

translation.en: When you put it on again, keep the same side outside.
translation.ga: Nuair a chuireann tu ort arís é, coinnigh an taobh céanna taobh amuigh.
