translation.en: The more frequent handling of the face cover without washing it, the greater the risk of contamination.
translation.ga: Más minice a bhíonn tú ag plé leis an gclúdach aghaidhe gan é a ní is sea is mó an baol go mbeidh éilliú air.

translation.en: When you remove the face cover to eat or drink something in a safe place such as your pocket, purse or paper bag.
translation.ga: Nuair a bhaineann tú an clúdach aghaidhe díot chun rud éigin a ithe nó a ól cuir in áit shábháilte é ar nós do phóca, sparán nó mála páipéir.

translation.en: Clean and disinfect your hands after removing the face mask.
translation.ga: Glan agus dighalraigh do lámha tar éis an clúdach aghaidhe a bhaint díot.

translation.en: Put on the face cover again after eating and keep the same outside.
translation.ga: Cuir an clúdach aghaidhe ort arís tar éis ithe agus coinnigh an taobh céanna taobh amuigh.

translation.en: Clean and disinfect your hands again after applying the face mask.
translation.ga: Glan agus dighalraigh do lámha aris tar éis an clúdach aghaidhe a chur ort.

translation.en: Washing your face cover
translation.ga: Ag níochán do clúdach aghaidhe

translation.en: You should wash your face cover when it is dirty or at least daily.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit do chlúdach aghaidhe a níochán nuair atá sé salach nó go laethúil ar a laghad.

translation.en: If you have a one-time face cover, throw it away after you have used it once.
translation.ga: Má tá clúdach aghaidh aon uaire agat, caith uait é tar éis duit é a úsáid uair amháin.

translation.en: You do not need to sterilize face masks.
translation.ga: Ní gá duit clúdaigh aghaidhe a steiriliú.

translation.en: Wash it in a washing machine or by hand as you would with other clothes.
translation.ga: Nigh é i meaisín níocháin nó de láimh mar a dhéanfá le héadaí eile.

translation.en: If you are using a washing machine.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag baint úsáid as meaisín níocháin.

translation.en: Add your face covers to your regular wash
translation.ga: Cuir do chlúdaigh aghaidh isteach le do níocháin rialta

translation.en: Use a regular laundry detergent and set the temperature for the type of fabric present
translation.ga: Bain úsáid as glantach níocháin rialta agus socraigh an teocht don cinéal fabraice atá ann

translation.en: If you are washing by hand
translation.ga: Más ag níochán de láimh atá tú

translation.en: Wash your face cover with water and fabric detergent or soap
translation.ga: Nigh do chlúdach aghaidh le huisce agus glantach fabrice nó galúnach

translation.en: Rinse thoroughly with clean water to remove the detergent or soap again
translation.ga: Rinseáil go maith le huisce glan chun an glantach nó gallúnach a bhaint as arís

translation.en: Fog on your glasses
translation.ga: Ceo ar do ghloiní

translation.en: There may be fog on your glasses when you wear the face cover.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh ceo a bheith ar do ghloiní nuair a chaitheann tú an clúdach aghaidhe.

translation.en: The warm air from your breath passes out through the surface of the face cover.
translation.ga: Téann an t-aer te ó d ’ anáil amach trí uachtar an chlúdaigh aghaidhe.

translation.en: This can cause fog on your glasses and make you unable to see correctly.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh ceo teacht ar do ghloiní dá bharr seo agus nach mbeifeá in ann feiceáil mar is ceart.

translation.en: Cleaning your glasses will not cause as much fog.
translation.ga: Má ghlanann tú do ghloiní ní thiocfaidh an oiread ceo orthu.

translation.en: Before you put on the face cover:
translation.ga: Sula gcuireann tú an clúdach aghaidhe ort:

translation.en: Clean your glasses with water and soap.
translation.ga: Glan do ghloiní le huisce agus gallúnach.

translation.en: Shake them to remove the water from them.
translation.ga: Croith iad chun an t-uisce a bhaint díobh.

translation.en: Leave the glasses to air dry or dry them with a clean cloth.
translation.ga: Fág na gloiní ag triomú san aer nó triomaigh iad le héadach glan.

translation.en: Make sure the face cover is well compressed
translation.ga: Cinntigh go bhfuil an clúdach aghaidhe fáiscthe go maith

translation.en: The face cover will stop the fog on your glasses if you put them on correctly.
translation.ga: Stopfaidh an clúdach aghaidhe an ceo ar do ghloiní má chuireann tú ort é mar is ceart.

translation.en: It doesn ’ t have to be uncomfortable but be perfectly squeezed with no gap around your nose.
translation.ga: Ní gá dó a bheith mí-chompordach ach bíodh sé breá fáiscthe gan aon bhearna timpeall ar do shrón.

translation.en: Place your glasses over the face cover seal to keep your breath away from your glasses.
translation.ga: Cuir do ghloiní os cionn séala an chlúdaigh aghaidhe chun d ’ anáil a choinneáil ó do ghloiní.

translation.en: You may not be able to set your face cover long up enough on your face to do this..
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir nach mbeidh tú in ann do chlúdach aghaidhe a shocrú sách fada suas ar d ’ aghaidhe chun seo a dhéanamh..

translation.en: If not, try sticking the face cover under your glasses with tape.
translation.ga: Mura féidir, déan iarracht an clúdach aghaidhe a ghreamú faoi do ghloiní, le téip.

translation.en: How to make one
translation.ga: Cén chaoi le ceann a dhéanamh

translation.en: To make a cloth cover at home:
translation.ga: Chun clúdach déanta as éadach a dhéanamh sa mbaile:

translation.en: Cut two tightly woven cotton rectangles, about 25cm x 15cm.
translation.ga: Gearr dhá dhronuilleog cadáis atá fite go daingean, thart ar 25cm x 15cm.

translation.en: Fold and sew upper and lower edges.
translation.ga: Fill agus fuáil uachtar agus íochtar an imill.

translation.en: Fold and sew the edges to the side, leaving a gap large enough to pass elastic.
translation.ga: Fill agus fuáil na himill ar an taobh, agus fág bearna sách mór le leaistic a chur tríd.

translation.en: Insert elastic 15cm long through the side edges and tie them tightly.
translation.ga: Cuir leaistic 15cm ar fhad tríd na himill ar an taobh agus ceangail go docht iad.

translation.en: A hair ribbon or twine cut long enough to tie behind the head will work.
translation.ga: Oibreoidh ribín gruaige nó sreangán atá gearrtha sách fada le ceangal taobh thiar den cheann.

translation.en: Fix the elastic knots inside the edges of the mask and grip if you need a neat finish.
translation.ga: Socraigh na snaidhmeanna leaisteacha taobh istigh d ’ imill an mhaisc agus cuir greim ann má tá críoch néata uait.

translation.en: How long will it last
translation.ga: Cén fhad a mhairfidh sé

translation.en: Facial coverage should be removed when:
translation.ga: Ba chóir fáil réidh leis an gclúdach aghaidhe nuair:

translation.en: It no longer covers the nose and mouth
translation.ga: Nach gclúdaíonn sé an tsrón agus an béal a thuilleadh

translation.en: Which are ribbon, elastic, or straps stretched or damaged
translation.ga: Atá ribín, leaistic nó strapaí sínte nó millte

translation.en: He can't stay on the front
translation.ga: Nach féidir leis fanacht ar an éadan

translation.en: Holes in the cloth or if it is torn
translation.ga: Atá poill san éadach nó má tá sé stróicthe

translation.en: How to use the face cover properly
translation.ga: Cén chaoi leis an gclúdach aghaidhe a úsáid i gceart

translation.en: Clean your hands properly before applying it.
translation.ga: Glan do lámha i gceart sula gcuirfidh tú ort é.

translation.en: Practice using it so that you are comfortable wearing and removing it.
translation.ga: Cleachtaigh é a úsáid ionas go mbeidh tú compordach á chur ort agus á bhaint díot.

translation.en: Make sure it is made of a cloth that you are comfortable with
translation.ga: Déan cinnte go bhfuil sé déanta as éadach a bhfuil tú compordach leis

translation.en: Cover your mouth and nose and make sure there are no gaps.
translation.ga: Clúdaigh do bhéal agus do shrón agus déan cinnte nach bhfuil aon bhearnaí ann.

translation.en: Tie it securely.
translation.ga: Ceangail go daingean é.

translation.en: Carry clean face covers in a sealed bag that is waterproof.
translation.ga: Iompair clúdaigh aghaidhe glan i mála séalaithe atá díonach ar uisce.

translation.en: Carry another similar bag to put used covers.
translation.ga: Iompair mála eile den chineál céanna chun clúdaigh úsáidte a chur ann.

translation.en: Do not touch your face cover when wearing it - if it does, clean your hands properly.
translation.ga: Ná déan teagmháil le do chlúdach aghaidhe nuair a bhíonn tú á chaitheamh - má dhéanann, glan do lámha i gceart.

translation.en: Do not use a wet or dirty face cover.
translation.ga: Ná húsáid clúdach aghaidhe atá fliuch nó salach.

translation.en: Do not share your face cover with others.
translation.ga: Ná roinn do chlúdach aghaidhe le daoine eile.

translation.en: Don't take off your face cover for talking, eating and / or waving - if you need to expose your nose or mouth, take off the cover and put it in your used cover bag.
translation.ga: Ná bain díot do chlúdach aghaidhe chun labhairt, ithe agus / nó vápáil - más gá duit do shrón nó do bhéal a nochtadh, bain díot an clúdach agus cuir sa mhála do chlúdaigh úsáidte é.

translation.en: Do not throw away your face covers in public places.
translation.ga: Ná caith uait do chlúdaigh aghaidhe in áiteanna poiblí.

translation.en: Removing your reusable face cover
translation.ga: Ag baint díot do chlúdach aghaidhe in-athúsáidte

translation.en: To properly remove the face cover:
translation.ga: Chun an clúdach aghaidhe a bhaint díot i gceart:

translation.en: Remove it from the back of your head - do not lay your hand on the piece in front of your face
translation.ga: Baint díot é ó chúl do chinn - ná leag do lámh ar an bpíosa os comhair d ’ éadan

translation.en: Put it in a sealed bag that is watertight or wash it immediately - put disposable masks in a bin immediately
translation.ga: Cuir isteach i mála séalaithe atá díonach ar uisce é nó nigh é ar an bpointe - cuir maisc aon uaire i mbosca bruscair láithreach

translation.en: Clean your hands properly
translation.ga: Glan do lámha i gceart

translation.en: Masks of any use
translation.ga: Mascanna aon úsáide

translation.en: How to safely dispose of a disposable mask:
translation.ga: Conas fáil réidh le masc aon uaire go sábháilte:

translation.en: Remove it from the back of your head - do not touch the front of the mask
translation.ga: Baint díot é ó chúl do chinn - ná leag do lámh ar an gcuid tosaigh den mhasc

translation.en: Throw it away immediately in a closed bin
translation.ga: Caith amach é láithreach i mbosca brúscair dúnta

translation.en: Clean your hands with an alcohol-based disinfectant or soap and water
translation.ga: Glan do lámha le díghalrán alcól-bhunaithe nó le gallúnach agus uisce

translation.en: Throw in the general bin at home or work, or in a bin if you are out
translation.ga: Caith sa bhosca bruscair ginearálta sa bhaile nó ag an obair, nó i mbosca bruscair má tá tú amuigh

translation.en: Do not throw them in the recycling bin as they cannot be recycled
translation.ga: Ná caith sa bhosca athchúrsála iad mar ní féidir iad a athchúrsáil

translation.en: Take them home if you don't have a bin - don't throw them away on the street.
translation.ga: Tabhair abhaile leat iad mura bhfuil bosca bruscair ann – ná caith uait iad ar an tsráid.

translation.en: Cheat and face shield
translation.ga: Cealtair agus sciath aghaidhe

translation.en: Cells are not the best option for protecting you and others from covid-19.
translation.ga: Ní hiad cealtair an rogha is fearr chun tusa agus daoine eile a chosaint ó covid-19.

translation.en: They can stop some of the droplets from your mouth or nose from spreading and it is better not to throw anything away.
translation.ga: Is féidir leo cuid de na braoiníní as do bhéal nó do shrón a stopadh ó scaipeadh agus is fearr é ná gan aon rud a chaitheamh.

translation.en: But you should only wear cheaters if you are ill or weakened and have difficulty wearing a face mask.
translation.ga: Ach ní cóir duit cealtair a chaitheamh ach amháin má tá tú tinn nó lagú ort agus má tá deacracht agat clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: The cellulite should cover the sides of your face (from ear to ear) and down under your chin.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go gclúdódh an cealtair taobhanna d ’ aghaidh (ó chluas go cluas) agus síos faoi do smig.

translation.en: Reusable cells should always be cleaned after wear and kept in a clean place until you need them again.
translation.ga: Ba chóir cealtair is féidir a úsáid arís a ghlanadh i gcónaí tar éis iad a chaitheamh agus iad a choinneáil in áit ghlan go dtí go gcaithfidh tú iad arís.

translation.en: You should wear a mask if
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit masc a chaitheamh má

translation.en: You have the coronavirus, if you think you have the virus or are waiting for a test result
translation.ga: Tá an coróinvíreas ort, má cheapann tú go bhfuil an víreas ort nó má tá tú ag fanacht ar thoradh tástála

translation.en: You are caring for someone who has or is suspected of having the crown virus
translation.ga: Tá tú ag tabhairt aire do dhuine a bhfuil an coróinvíreas air nó má tá amhras ann go bhfuil an víreas air

translation.en: You are waiting for yourself and if you can't stay 2 meters away from other people in the house
translation.ga: Tá tú ag fanacht asat féin agus mura féidir leat fanacht amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile sa teach

translation.en: Facial cover with valve or ventilator
translation.ga: Clúdaigh aghaidhe le comhla nó gaothaire

translation.en: A face cover with a valve or vent does not protect you from covid-19
translation.ga: Ní thugann clúdach agahidhe le comhla nó gaothaire cosaint duit ó covid-19

translation.en: Do not wear a face cover with valves or a fan.
translation.ga: Ná caith clúdach aghaidhe le comhlaí nó gaothaire.

translation.en: The face covers are not good enough to stop the spread of the virus as you could breathe in or out of the virus through the valve or through the ventilator.
translation.ga: Níl na clúdaigh aghaidh sách maith chun scaipeadh an víris a stopadh mar d ’ fheadfá an víreas a análú isteach nó amach tríd an gcomhla nó tríd an ngaothaire.

translation.en: They are usually used by construction workers or artisans for dust protection.
translation.ga: Is iondúil go n-úsáideann oibrithe tógála nó ceardaithe iad chun cosaint a fháil ó dheannach.

translation.en: They are not designed to prevent the spread of viruses.
translation.ga: Níor dearadh iad chun scaipeadh víris a chosc.

translation.en: Medical mask
translation.ga: Masc leighis

translation.en: The medical mask is for these people;
translation.ga: Is do na daoine seo an masc leighis;

translation.en: Health care workers
translation.ga: Oibrithe cúraim sláinte

translation.en: People who are self-isolated and cannot stay 2 meters away from others in their own home
translation.ga: Daoine atá ag féin-aonrú agus nach féidir leo fanacht amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile ina dteach féin

translation.en: They are also used by other workers in specific positions.
translation.ga: Úsáideann oibrithe eile iad i bpoist ar leith freisin.

translation.en: These masks are very important and are not for the general public unless a person is self-isolated and cannot stay 2 meters away from others in their home.
translation.ga: Tá na mascanna seo fíorthábhachtach agus ní don ghnáth phobal iad mura bhfuil duine ag féin-aonrú agus nach féidir leis fanacht amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile ina dteach.

translation.en: Wear a cloth-covered face mask when shopping and on public transport.
translation.ga: Cuir clúdach aghaidhe déanta as éadach ort nuair a bheidh tú ag siopadóireacht agus ar chóras iompar poiblí.

translation.en: This will ensure that the medical masks are available to those who need them.
translation.ga: Cinnteoidh sé seo go mbeidh na mascanna leighis ar fáil dóibh siúd a bhfuil siad ag teastáil uathu.

translation.en: Disposable gloves
translation.ga: Miotóga aon uaire

translation.en: Do not wear disposable gloves instead of washing your hands.
translation.ga: Ná caith miotóga aon uaire in ionad do lámha a níochán.

translation.en: The virus stays on them in the same way it stays on your hands.
translation.ga: Fanann an víreas orthu ar an mbealach céanna a bhfanann sé ar do lámha.

translation.en: Also, the virus can spread to your hands when you touch them.
translation.ga: Chomh maith leis sin, is féidir leis an víreas scaipeadh go dtí do lámha nuair a bhaineann tú díot iad.

translation.en: Disposable gloves are worn in medical settings.
translation.ga: Caitear miotóga aon uaire i suímh leighis.

translation.en: They are not as effective in everyday life.
translation.ga: Níl siad chomh héifeachtach céanna sa ngnáthshaol laethúil.

translation.en: Wearing disposable gloves may make you feel safe but this is not the case
translation.ga: Má bhíonn miotóga aon uaire á gcaitheamh agat d ’ fhéadfá mothú go bhfuil tú sábháilte ach ní hamhlaidh a bhíonn

translation.en: Sneezing or coughing into gloves - this creates a new surface on which the virus can survive
translation.ga: Sraothartach nó casacht isteach sna miotóga - cruthaíonn sé seo dromhcla nua a mbeidh an víreas in ann maireachtáil air

translation.en: Give yourself the virus when you take off your gloves or lay a hand on some surface
translation.ga: An víreas a thabhairt duit féin nuair a bhaineann tú na miotóga díot nó nuair a leagann tú lámh ar dhromchla éigin

translation.en: Not washing your hands as often as necessary and putting the contaminated gloves on your face how to wash your hands properly and avoid infection
translation.ga: Gan do lámha a níochán chomh minic agus a theastaíonn agus na miotóga éillithe a leagan ar d ’ aghaidh conas do lámha a níochán i gceart agus ionfhabhtú a sheachaint

translation.en: How to clean your hands
translation.ga: Conas do lámha a ghlanadh

translation.en: Cleaning your hands will help control the spread of bacteria and viruses that cause infections.
translation.ga: Má ghlanann tú do lámha cabhróidh tú le srian a chur le scaipeadh na mbaictéar agus na víris atá ina gcúis le hionfhabhtuithe.

translation.en: Hundreds of people become ill every day in ireland from associated healthcare infections.
translation.ga: Éiríonn na céadta daoine tinn gach lá in éirinn de bharr ionfhabhtuithe a bhaineann le cúram sláinte.

translation.en: You could get a serious illness, even death, with these infections.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfá tinneas tromchúiseach, fiú bás a fháil leis na hionfhabhtuithe seo.

translation.en: The best way to stop harmful germs from spreading is by cleaning your hands.
translation.ga: Is é an bealach is fearr le frídíní díobhálacha a stopadh ó scaipeadh ná trí do lámha a ghlanadh.

translation.en: About 30% to 50% of infections that start in hospitals can be avoided.
translation.ga: Is féidir timpeall 30% go 50% de na hionfhabhtuithe a thosaíonn in ospidéil a sheachaint.

translation.en: Clean your hands
translation.ga: Glan do lámha

translation.en: Use soap and water or alcohol hand gel to clean your hands regularly.
translation.ga: Úsáid gallúnach agus uisce nó glóthach láimhe alcóil chun do lámha a ghlanadh go rialta.

translation.en: Hand disinfectants contain alcohol and are extremely flammable.
translation.ga: Tá alcóil i ndíghalráin láimhe agus tá siad thar a bheith inlasta.

translation.en: Do not use them near heat or fire.
translation.ga: Ná húsáid iad in aice le teas nó tine.

translation.en: How to wash your hands with soap and water
translation.ga: Conas do lámha a ní le gallúnach agus uisce

translation.en: Wet your hands with warm water and soap.
translation.ga: Fliuch do lámha le huisce te agus gallúnach.

translation.en: Rub your hands together until foam is formed.
translation.ga: Cuimil do lámha le chéile go dtí go ndéantar sobal.

translation.en: Rub the top of your hands, between your fingers and under your fingers.
translation.ga: Cuimil barr do lámha, idir do mhéara agus faoi do mhéara.

translation.en: Do this for about 20 seconds.
translation.ga: Déan é seo ar feadh thart ar 20 soicind.

translation.en: Clean your hands under running water.
translation.ga: Glan do lámha faoi uisce reatha.

translation.en: Dry your hands with a clean towel or paper towel.
translation.ga: Triomaigh do lámha le tuáille glan nó tuáille páipéir.

translation.en: If you have dry skin or a problem with your skin, use a moisturizer after washing your hands and at night.
translation.ga: Má tá craiceann tirim nó fadhb agat le do chraiceann, úsáid maothóir tar éis do lámha a ní agus san oíche.

translation.en: Hand hygiene at home
translation.ga: Sláinteachas lámh sa bhaile

translation.en: Make sure you wash your hands when you are at home and not in hospital:
translation.ga: Déan cinnte go nglanann tú do lámha nuair atá tú sa bhaile agus nach bhfuil tú san ospidéal:

translation.en: After you use the toilet
translation.ga: Tar éis duit an leithreas a úsáid

translation.en: When you clean up after your pet
translation.ga: Nuair a ghlanann tú suas i ndiaidh do pheataí

translation.en: Before preparing food, before handling food or before a meal
translation.ga: Sula réitíonn tú bia, sula láimhseáileann tú bia nó roimh bhéile

translation.en: After dealing with raw meat
translation.ga: Tar éis a bheith ag plé le feoil amh

translation.en: After using public transport
translation.ga: Tar éis duit iompar poiblí a úsáid

translation.en: When you return home after meeting a lot of people
translation.ga: Nuair a fhilleann tú abhaile tar éis bualadh le go leor daoine

translation.en: Cleaning your hands will help you avoid:
translation.ga: Má ghlanann tú do lámha, cabhróidh sé leat na nithe seo a sheachaint:

translation.en: Colds and flu
translation.ga: Slaghdáin agus fliú

translation.en: Stomach aches such as norovirus diarrhea
translation.ga: Tinneas boilg ar nós buinneach noraivíreas

translation.en: Eye infections such as conjunctivitis
translation.ga: Ionfhabhtuithe súl ar nós toinníteas

translation.en: Bullfrogs such as mrsa and vre
translation.ga: Tarbhfhríd ar nós mrsa agus vre

translation.en: Children often have these infections, parents and childcare workers should always make sure that children clean their hands regularly.
translation.ga: Bíonn na hionfhabhtuithe seo ar pháistí go minic ba chóir do thuismitheoirí agus d' oibrithe cúraim leanaí a chinntiú i gcónaí go nglanann na leanaí a lámha go rialta.

translation.en: Hand hygiene in health care centres
translation.ga: Sláinteachas lámh in ionaid chúraim sláinte

translation.en: Patients
translation.ga: Othair

translation.en: If you are a patient with an infection, the staff will support you and tell you how to control the spread of bacteria (germs).
translation.ga: Más othar tú a bhfuil ionfhabhtú ort, tacóidh an fhoireann leat agus inseoidh siad duit conas srian a chur le scaipeadh baictéar (frídíní).

translation.en: Follow all the instructions given to you by your doctor or nurse to help keep your infection under control.
translation.ga: Lean gach treoir a thugann do dhochtúir nó d' altra duit chun cabhrú leat d ’ ionfhabhtú a choinneáil faoi smacht.

translation.en: The best way to avoid and prevent infection is to:
translation.ga: Is é an bealach is fearr le hionfhabhtú a sheachaint agus cosc a chur leis ná:

translation.en: Clean your hands often
translation.ga: Glan do lámha go minic

translation.en: Do not forget to clean your hands properly after going to the toilet and before a meal
translation.ga: Ná déan dearmad do lámha a ghlanadh i gceart tar éis dul go dtí an leithreas agus roimh bhéile

translation.en: Use your own soap, flannel, sponge and razor
translation.ga: Úsáid do ghallúnach, flainnín, spúinse agus do rásúr féin

translation.en: Do not share newspapers or anything personal with other patients
translation.ga: Ná roinn nuachtáin nó aon rud pearsanta le hothair eile

translation.en: Restrict any contact with patients and stay out of bed
translation.ga: Cuir srian ar aon teagmháil le hothair agus fan amach óna leaba

translation.en: Tell staff if the facilities at the hospital or clinic are not clean
translation.ga: Inis don fhoireann mura bhfuil na háiseanna san ospidéal nó sa gclinic glan

translation.en: You are less likely to spread 'germs' at home.
translation.ga: Tá baol níos lú ann go scaipfidh tú ‘ frídíní ’ sa bhaile.

translation.en: But you should always keep your hands and toilet clean.
translation.ga: Ach ba chóir duit do lámha agus leithreas a choimeád glan i gcónaí.

translation.en: Visitors
translation.ga: Cuairteoirí

translation.en: If you are visiting a patient, clean your hands when you enter and leave the ward.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag tabhairt cuairte ar othar, glan do lámha nuair a théann tú isteach sa bharda agus nuair a fhágann tú.

translation.en: If you are making a long visit or helping a patient, clean your hands regularly while you are there.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag tabhairt cuairt fhada nó ag cabhrú le hothar, glan do lámha go rialta agus tú ansin.

translation.en: You can use soap and water or alcohol gel available at the hospital / health center.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat gallúnach agus uisce nó glóthach alcóil atá ar fáil san ospidéal / ionad sláinte a úsáid.

translation.en: If there is any dirt on your hands or under your fingers, you will need to use soap and water.
translation.ga: Má tá aon salachar ar do lámha nó faoi do mhéara, beidh ort gallúnach agus uisce a úsáid.

translation.en: You can then ensure that they are properly cleaned by using alcohol gel.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat a chinntiú ansin go bhfuil siad glanta i gceart trí ghlóthach alcóil a úsáid.

translation.en: Vaccine
translation.ga: Vacsaín

translation.en: A vaccine reduces infections and protects you and your family.
translation.ga: Laghdaíonn vacsaín ionfhabhtuithe agus tugann siad cosaint duit féin agus do do theaghlach.

translation.en: Ask your doctor or pharmacist if your child has had all the appropriate injections.
translation.ga: Fiafraigh don dochtúir nó don chógaslannaí an bhfuair do pháiste gach instealladh cuí.

translation.en: Ask your doctor or pharmacist if you should get this year's flu vaccine or a vaccine to protect you from pneumonia.
translation.ga: Fiafraigh don dochtúir nó don chógaslannaí ar chóir duit vacsaín fliú na bliana seo a fháil nó vacsaín chun tú a chosaint ó niúmóine.

translation.en: This is especially important for the elderly or those with long-term health illnesses.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo thar a bheith tábhachtach do sheandaoine nó dóibh siúd le tinnis sláinte fadthéarmacha.

translation.en: Stop smoking during the coronary virus outbreak
translation.ga: Stop ag caitheamh tobac le linn ráig an choróinvíris

translation.en: Do you already have a stop plan (quit)? Sign in
translation.ga: An bhfuil plean stop (quit) agat cheana féin? Sínigh isteach

translation.en: If you smoke, you are at greater risk of developing an acute respiratory infection such as the flu.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn tú ag caitheamh tobac tá tú i mbaol níos mó go bhfaighfeá géar-ionfhabhtú riospráide ar nós an fliú.

translation.en: Smokers are at greater risk of getting the flu and getting a worse infection than non - smokers.
translation.ga: Tá daoine a chaitheann tobac i mbaol níos mó an fliú a fháil agus ionfhabhtú níos measa a bheith orthu ná mar a bheadh ar dhaoine nach gcaitheann tobac.

translation.en: Although it is a new virus, it is now clear that people are also at risk from the coronavirus, because they smoke.
translation.ga: Cé gur víreas nua é, is léir anois go bhfuil daoine i mbaol ón choróinvíreas freisin, de bharr go gcaitheann siad tobac.

translation.en: Like the flu, coronary virus may be worse for smokers,
translation.ga: Ar nós an fliú d ’ fhéadfadh an coróinvíreas a bheith níos measa ar dhaoine a chaitheann tobac,

translation.en: If you smoke, you do not need self-isolation unless you have symptoms.
translation.ga: Má chaitheann tú tobac, ní gá duit féin-aonrú mura bhfuil comharthaí ort.

translation.en: But you should follow the same advice as everyone else: Stay home and protect yourself from the crown virus.
translation.ga: Ach ba chóir duit an chomhairle chéanna le gach duine eile a leanacht: Fan sa bhaile agus cosain tú féin ón gcoróinvíreas.

translation.en: This is a good time to quit smoking.
translation.ga: Is am maith é seo le héirí as an tobac.

translation.en: Stopping smoking will strengthen your natural defenses against all types of infections, including the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Má stopann tú ag caitheamh tobac, neartófar an chosaint nádúrtha atá agat in aghaidh gach cineál ionfhabhtaithe, an coróinvíreas ina measc.

translation.en: When you stop, the hairs in your airways (cilia) will start working again.
translation.ga: Nuair a stopfaidh tú, tosóidh na ribí gruaige i d ’ aerbhealaí (cilia) ag obair arís.

translation.en: Within a day or two, the oxygen levels in your body will improve.
translation.ga: Laistigh de lá nó dhó tiocfaidh feabhas ar na leibhéil ocsaigine i do chorp.

translation.en: Your blood pressure and pulse will decrease, which will reduce the stress on your body.
translation.ga: Ísleoidh do bhrú fola agus do chuisle, rud a laghdóidh an brú ar do chorp.

translation.en: Each of these will give you protection against the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh gach ceann acu seo cosaint duit i gcoinne an choróinvíris.

translation.en: How tobacco harms you
translation.ga: Conas a dhéanann tobac dochar duit

translation.en: Weaker heart and lungs
translation.ga: Croí agus scamhóga níos laige

translation.en: Smoking affects the way your heart and lungs work, making it less easy for you to fight off an acute infection, such as the flu or the coronary virus.
translation.ga: Bíonn tionchar ag caitheamh tobac ar an mbealach a n-oibríonn do chroí agus do scamhóga, agus dá bharr ní bhíonn sé chomh héasca agat dul i ngleic le hionfhabhtú géar, ar nós an fliú nó an coróinvíreas.

translation.en: Cigarette smoke damages the natural barriers to infection in the lungs, making it easier for the virus to attach to the surface of your lung and cause infection of the lung tissues.
translation.ga: Déanann deatach toitíní dochar do na bacainní nádúrtha in aghaidh ionfhabhtaithe sna scamhóga, agus dá bharr bíonn sé níos fusa ag an víreas ceangal le dromchla do scamhóg agus a bheith ina chúis le hionfhabhtú ar fhíocháin na scamhóg.

translation.en: Laying a hand on your face
translation.ga: Ag leagan lámh ar d ’ aghaidh

translation.en: The coronary virus is spread in sneezing or coughing drops, it has to go from the infected nose or mouth and into your own eyes, nose or mouth to infect you.
translation.ga: Scaiptear an coróinvíreas i mbraonta sraothartaí nó casachta, caithfidh sé dul ó shrón nó ó bhéal an té atá ionfhabhtaithe agus isteach i do shúile, do shrón nó do bhéal féin chun tú a ionfhabhtú.

translation.en: This can happen directly or indirectly (on hands, objects, surfaces).
translation.ga: Is féidir leis seo tarlú go díreach nó go h-indíreach (ar lámha, rudaí, dromchlaí).

translation.en: Everyone is advised not to lay a hand on their face.
translation.ga: Moltar do gach duine gan lámh a leagan ar a n-aghaidh.

translation.en: But when you smoke, chances are you put your hands on your face, especially your mouth.
translation.ga: Ach nuair a chaitheann tú tobac, gach uile seans go gcuireann tú do lámha ar d ’ aghaidh, go háirithe ar do bhéal.

translation.en: This increases the risk of infection.
translation.ga: Méadaíonn sé seo an baol ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: Protect yourself and others from coronavirus
translation.ga: Cosain tú féin agus daoine eile ó choróinvíreas

translation.en: Don ’ t be too close to others
translation.ga: Ná bí ró-ghar do dhaoine eile

translation.en: Social separation is important to help curb the spread of the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Tá scaradh sóisialta tábhachtach chun cabhrú le srian a chur le scaipeadh an choróinvíris.

translation.en: This is done by restricting contact between potentially infected people and healthy people.
translation.ga: Déantar é seo trí shrian a chur ar theagmháil idir daoine a bhféadfadh ionfhabhtú a bheith orthu agus daoine sláintiúla.

translation.en: You should stay 2 meters (6.5 feet) away from others.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit fanacht amach 2 mhéadar (6.5 troithe) ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: People tend to be close to others when they are smoking.
translation.ga: Bíonn sé de nós ag daoine a bheith in aice le daoine eile nuair a bhíonn siad ag caitheamh.

translation.en: Quitting smoking will reduce the risk of infection.
translation.ga: Má éiríonn tú as an tobac, laghdóidh tú an baol ionfhabhtaithe.

translation.en: Social separation
translation.ga: Scaradh sóisialta

translation.en: Sharing cigarettes
translation.ga: Ag roinnt toitíní

translation.en: Good hygiene and handwashing are very important at the present time.
translation.ga: Tá sláinteachas maith agus níochán na lámh fíorthábhachtach san am i láthair.

translation.en: The advice of public health doctors is that we should not share things that come into our mouths, such as bottles or cups.
translation.ga: Is í comhairle na ndochtúirí sláinte poiblí ná nár cheart dúinn rudaí a mbíonn ár mbéal i dteagmháil leo a roinnt ar nós buidéil nó cupáin.

translation.en: Cigarettes should therefore not be shared with others.
translation.ga: Níor chóir toitíní a roinnt le daoine eile dá bhrí sin.

translation.en: Good hygiene and hand washing.
translation.ga: Sláinteachas maith agus níochán láimhe.

translation.en: Smoke from other people's cigarettes
translation.ga: Deatach ó thoitíní daoine eile

translation.en: Smoking indoors puts your closest people at risk because your second-hand smoke interferes with the body's natural defences to fight infections such as coronavirus.
translation.ga: Má chaitheann tú tobac taobh istigh, cuireann tú na daoine is gaire duit i mbaol mar go gcuireann do dheatach athláimhe isteach ar an chosaint nádúrtha atá ag an gcorp dul i ngleic le hionfhabhtuithe ar nós an choróinvíris.

translation.en: Children in particular are at risk of second-hand smoke because they breathe faster, and their lungs, airways and immune system are still developing.
translation.ga: Tá leanaí ach go háirithe i mbaol deataigh athláimhe toisc go mbíonn siad ag análú níos tapúla agus go bhfuil a scamhóga, aerbhealaí agus córas imdhíonachta fós ag forbairt.

translation.en: The best way to avoid this and to protect others is to quit smoking.
translation.ga: Is í an tslí is fearr chun é seo a sheachaint agus chun daoine eile a chosaint ná éirí as an tobac.

translation.en: Get advice on how to do this from the online quit supports, get started on a personal quitplan plan or join us on facebook.
translation.ga: Gheobhaidh tú comhairle ar conas é seo a dhéanamh ó na tacaíochtaí éirí as ar-líne, tosaigh ar phlean quitplan pearsanta nó bí linn ar facebook.

translation.en: If you have already registered for support from the 'stop' team
translation.ga: Má chláraigh tú cheana le haghaidh tacaíocht ón bhfoireann ‘ stop ’

translation.en: Ordinary cold
translation.ga: Gnáth shlaghdán

translation.en: Signs of the cold
translation.ga: Comharthaí an tslaghdáin

translation.en: The first sign of a cold is a sore throat.
translation.ga: Is é an chéad chomhartha go bhfuil slaghdán ort ná scornach thinn.

translation.en: Then comes a sneezing or stuffy, sick or thoughtful nose.
translation.ga: Ansin tagann sraothartach nó srón phlúchta, thinn nó smaoiseach.

translation.en: One in three people who catch a cold usually have a cough and feel sick.
translation.ga: De ghnáth, bíonn casacht ar dhuine as gach triúr a mbíonn slaghdán orthu agus airíonn siad tinn.

translation.en: A cold is caused by a virus.
translation.ga: Is víreas is cúis le slaghdán.

translation.en: Antibiotics will not cure viruses.
translation.ga: Ní chuirfidh antaibheathaigh biseach ar víris.

translation.en: Water disappears from the body when a person sweats or sneezes.
translation.ga: Imíonn uisce as an gcolainn nuair a bhíonn duine ag cur allais nó má bhíonn smaois ort.

translation.en: Therefore, it is important to drink plenty of fluids.
translation.ga: Dá bhrí sin, tá sé tábhachtach neart leachtanna a ól.

translation.en: Take a break and eat healthily.
translation.ga: Glac sos agus ith go sláintiúil.

translation.en: Do not ask your doctor for antibiotics when you have a cold.
translation.ga: Ná hiarr antaibheathaigh ar do dhochtúir nuair a bhíonn slaghdán ort.

translation.en: You usually feel worse for 2-3 days before you gradually start to recover.
translation.ga: De ghnáth, airíonn tú níos measa ar feadh 2-3 lá sula dtosaíonn biseach ag teacht ort de réir a chéile.

translation.en: The symptoms of illness usually last for a week.
translation.ga: Maireann na comharthaí tinnis ar feadh seachtaine de ghnáth.

translation.en: Cold symptoms are very similar to the symptoms of the flu, but the flu is much more serious.
translation.ga: Tá comharthaí slaghdáin an-chosúil le comharthai an fhliú ach is tromchúisí i bhfad an fliú.

translation.en: Cold
translation.ga: Slaghdán

translation.en: It comes to you gradually
translation.ga: Tagann sé ort de réir a chéile

translation.en: You usually feel it in your nose and throat
translation.ga: Airíonn tú é i do shrón agus i do scornach de ghnáth

translation.en: You feel sick but you are able to continue as normal - for example, going to work
translation.ga: Airíonn tú tinn ach bíonn tú in ann leanacht ar aghaidh mar is gnáth – mar shampla, dul ag an obair

translation.en: Flu
translation.ga: Fliú

translation.en: It comes to you quickly within a few hours
translation.ga: Tagann sé ort go tapa laistigh de chúpla uair a chloig

translation.en: You usually feel it in your nose and throat
translation.ga: Airíonn tú é i do shrón agus i do scornach de ghnáth

translation.en: You get tired and unable to continue as usual
translation.ga: Bíonn tú tuirseach agus ní bhíonn tú in ann leanacht ar aghaidh mar is gnáth

translation.en: Signs of the cold:
translation.ga: Comharthaí an tslaghdáin:

translation.en: A stuffy or smoky nose
translation.ga: Srón phlúchta nó smaoiseach

translation.en: Sore throat
translation.ga: Scornach thinn

translation.en: Headache
translation.ga: Tinneas cinn

translation.en: Muscle pains
translation.ga: Pianta sna matáin

translation.en: Cough
translation.ga: Casacht

translation.en: Sneezing
translation.ga: Sraothartach

translation.en: High temperature
translation.ga: Teocht ard

translation.en: Pressure in your ears and face
translation.ga: Brú i do chluasa agus i d ’ éadan

translation.en: You get no taste or smell of anything
translation.ga: Ní fhaigheann tú blas ná boladh ar aon rud

translation.en: Adults and children have the same symptoms.
translation.ga: Bíonn na comharthaí céanna ar dhaoine fásta agus leanaí.

translation.en: Sometimes the symptoms last longer in children.
translation.ga: Uaireanta, maireann na comharthaí níos faide ar leanaí.

translation.en: Causes of the cold
translation.ga: Cúiseanna an tslaghdáin

translation.en: A cold is caused by a virus.
translation.ga: Is víreas is cúis le slaghdán.

translation.en: They spread easily among people.
translation.ga: Scaipeann siad go héasca i measc daoine.

translation.en: You become contagious until all the symptoms are gone.
translation.ga: Bíonn tú tógálach go dtí go mbíonn na comharthaí ar fad imithe díot.

translation.en: This usually takes about a week.
translation.ga: Tógann sé seo timpeall seachtain de ghnáth.

translation.en: Coughing and sneezing spreads germs that can live on hands and surfaces for 24 hours.
translation.ga: Scaipeann casacht agus sraothartach frídíní a d ’ fhéadfadh maireachtáil ar lámha agus ar dhromchlaí ar feadh 24 uair an chloig.

translation.en: To reduce the spread of a cold, do the following:
translation.ga: Chun scaipeadh slaghdáin a laghdú, dean mar a leanas:

translation.en: Wash your hands with warm water and soap
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha le huisce te agus gallúnach

translation.en: Cough into your elbow to make sure you don't spread germs on your hands or others
translation.ga: Déan casacht isteach i d' uillinn chun a chinntiú nach mbeidh tú ag scaipeadh frídíní ar do lámha ná ar dhaoine eile

translation.en: Use a tissue to catch the germs when you cough or sneeze
translation.ga: Úsáid ciarsúr páipéir chun breith ar na frídíní nuair a dhéanann tú casacht nó sraothartach

translation.en: Throw the paper towel in the bin as soon as possible
translation.ga: Caith an ciarsúr páipéir sa mbosca bruscar chomh luath agus is féidir

translation.en: How to avoid colds
translation.ga: Conas slaghdáin a sheachaint

translation.en: The best ways to avoid colds are:
translation.ga: Is iad na bealaí is fearr chun slaghdáin a sheachaint ná:

translation.en: Wash your hands with warm water and soap, especially before meals.
translation.ga: Do lámha a ní le huisce te agus gallúnach go mór mór roimh bhéilí.

translation.en: Do not share towels or cups with a cold
translation.ga: Ná roinn tuáillí ná rudaí ar nós cupáin le duine a bhfuil slaghdán air

translation.en: Do not touch your eyes or nose.
translation.ga: Ná leag lámh ar do shúile ná do shrón.

translation.en: You could get yourself infected if you have the virus.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfá féin ionfhabhtú a fháil dá mbeadh an víreas ar do lámha.

translation.en: Keep exercising and stay healthy
translation.ga: Lean le haclaíocht agus bí folláin

translation.en: The flu vaccine protects against the flu but not the cold.
translation.ga: Tugann vacsaín an fhliú cosaint duit i gcoinne an fhliú ach ní thugann ón slaghdán..

translation.en: Treatment
translation.ga: Cóir leighis

translation.en: Most colds can be treated at home.
translation.ga: Is féidir cóir leighis a chur ar fhormhór na slaghdán sa bhaile.

translation.en: You will recover without any special treatment.
translation.ga: Tiocfaidh biseach ort gan aon choir leighis ar leith.

translation.en: Drink plenty of fluids, take a break and eat healthy food.
translation.ga: Ól do dhóthain leachtanna, glac sos agus ith bia follain.

translation.en: Continue as usual when you recover.
translation.ga: Lean ar aghaidh mar is gnách nuair a bheidh biseach ort arís.

translation.en: Talk to your pharmacist about the products and medicines that will help you.
translation.ga: Labhair le do chógaslannaí faoi na táirgí agus cógais a chabhróidh leat.

translation.en: Paracetamol or ibuprofen can be taken to relieve pain or fever.
translation.ga: Is féidir paraicéiteamól nó iobúpróifein a thógáil chun faoiseamh a fháil ón phian nó fiabhras.

translation.en: A nasal spray helps to open a stuffy nose.
translation.ga: Cabhraíonn spré sróine chun srón phlúchta a oscailt.

translation.en: You may also find relief with throat sprays, lotions and cough treatments.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfá faoiseamh a fháil le spré scornaigh, losainn agus cóir leighis do chasacht freisin.

translation.en: Be careful about taking medicines for coughs and colds if you are also taking paracetamol or ibuprofen.
translation.ga: Bí cúramach faoi chógais a thógáil do chasacht agus slaghdán má tá paraicéiteamól nó iobúpróifein á thógáil agat freisin.

translation.en: That way, you could take more than the recommended dose.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfá níos mó ná an dáileog a mholtar a thógáil ar an gcaoi sin.

translation.en: There are some medications that are not suitable for children, infants and pregnant women.
translation.ga: Tá roinnt cógas nach bhfeileann do leanaí, naíonáin agus mná torracha.

translation.en: Get advice from your pharmacist.
translation.ga: Faigh comhairle ó do chógaslannaí.

translation.en: There is little evidence that nutritional supplements such as vitamin c, zinc, echinacea or garlic help to heal.
translation.ga: Níl mórán fianaise ann go gcabhraíonn forlíonta cothaithe ar nós vitimín c, sinc, eiceanáise ná gairleog chun biseach a fhail.

translation.en: Visit your gp:
translation.ga: Tabhair cuairt ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh:

translation.en: If your symptoms of illness do not improve after 3 weeks
translation.ga: Mura dtagann feabhas ar do chomharthaí tinnis tar éis 3 seachtainí

translation.en: If you have difficulty breathing or have chest pain
translation.ga: Má bhíonn deacracht agat ag análú nó má bhíonn pian i do chliabhrach

translation.en: If your illness symptoms suddenly get worse
translation.ga: Má éiríonn do chomharthaí tinnis níos measa go tobann

translation.en: If you have a very high temperature or you feel very hot, and you are shaking
translation.ga: Má bhíonn teocht an-ard ort nó má airíonn tú an-te agus má bhíonn tú ag crith

translation.en: If you are worried about your child's symptoms of illness
translation.ga: Má bhíonn imní ort faoi chomharthaí tinnis do pháiste

translation.en: If you have a long-term illness - for example, if you have diabetes, heart, lung, kidney or neurological disease
translation.ga: Má bhíonn tinneas fadthéarmach ort – mar shampla, má bhíonn diaibéiteas, galar croí, scamhóige, duán nó néareolaíoch ort

translation.en: If you have a weakened immune system - for instance, if you have diabetes or are receiving chemotherapy
translation.ga: Má tá córas imdhíonta lag agat – mar shampla, má tá diaibéiteas ort nó má tá ceimiteiripe á fháil agat

translation.en: Antibiotics
translation.ga: Antaibheathaigh

translation.en: Antibiotics will not do you any good for your symptoms of illness, and you will not recover faster.
translation.ga: Ní dhéanfaidh antaibheathaigh aon mhaitheas do do chomharthaí tinnis agus ní bhfaigheadh tú biseach níos tapúla.

translation.en: Antibiotics are effective against bacterial infections.
translation.ga: Tá antaibheathaigh éifeachtach in aghaidh ionfhabhtuithe baictéaracha.

translation.en: Colds are a virus.
translation.ga: Is víreas is cúis le slaghdáin.

translation.en: Shortness of breath
translation.ga: Giorra anála

translation.en: Shortness of breath may not be a concern but sometimes it can be serious and may require treatment.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir nach údar imní an giorra anála ach uaireanta bíonn sé tromchúiseach agus d ’ fhéadfadh cóir leighis a bheith ag teastáil.

translation.en: You may have a heart attack or a problem with your lungs or airways.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh taom croí a bheith ort nó fadhb le scamhóga nó le d ’ aerbhealaí.

translation.en: Call a gp if you have shortness of breath:
translation.ga: Cuir glaoch ar dhochtúir teaghlaigh má tá giorra anála ort:

translation.en: Which lasted longer than a month
translation.ga: A mhair níos faide ná mí

translation.en: Which gets worse when you are active
translation.ga: A éiríonn níos measa nuair a bhíonn tú gníomhach

translation.en: Which gets worse when you lie down
translation.ga: A éiríonn níos measa nuair a luíonn tú síos

translation.en: You have been coughing for 3 weeks or more
translation.ga: Go raibh tú ag casachtaí le 3 seachtainí nó níos mó

translation.en: That your ankles are swollen
translation.ga: Go bhfuil do chuid rúitíní ata

translation.en: Shortness of breath combined with high temperature may be a sign of the coronary virus.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh giorra anála in éineacht le teocht ard a bheith ina chomhartha den choróinvíreas.

translation.en: If you have these symptoms you should call your gp.
translation.ga: Má tá na comharthaí seo ort ba chóir duit glaoch a chur ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: It is important to seek medical advice to ensure that it is not serious.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach comhairle leighis a fháil chun a chinntiú nach bhfuil sé tromchúiseach.

translation.en: You are not wasting anyone 's time checking it out.
translation.ga: Níl tú ag cur ama aon duine amú lena sheiceáil.

translation.en: Causes shortness of breath
translation.ga: Cúiseanna le giorra anála

translation.en: There are many different causes of shortness of breath.
translation.ga: Tá go leor cúiseanna éagsúla le giorra anála.

translation.en: The most common causes include a common cold or chest, asthma, being overweight or a smoker.
translation.ga: I measc na gcúiseanna is coitianta tá slaghdán nó cliabhrach gafa, asma, duine a bheith róthrom nó a chaitheann tobac.

translation.en: It can also be a sign of a panic attack.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé a bheith ina chomhartha ar thaom scaoill chomh maith.

translation.en: But sometimes it can be a sign of something more serious, such as lung cancer or the lung disease known as chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (copd).
translation.ga: Ach uaireanta d ’ fhéadfadh sé a bheith ina chomhartha de rud éigin níos tromchúisí, ar nós ailse scamhóg nó an galar scámhóige ar a dtugtar galar scamhóige toirmeascach ainsealach (copd).

translation.en: Any treatment you need will depend on what is causing your symptoms.
translation.ga: Braithfidh aon chóir leighis a theastaíonn uait ar chéard is cúis le do chuid comharthaí.

translation.en: Don't try to self-diagnose - always consult a gp.
translation.ga: Ná déan iarracht féindiagnóis a dhéanamh - déan teagmháil le dochtúir teaghlaigh i gcónaí.

translation.en: Contact tracking
translation.ga: Rianú teagmhála

translation.en: Contact tracking identifies people who have had close contact with someone with the coronary virus.
translation.ga: Aimsíonn an rianú teagmhála daoine a raibh gartheagmháil acu le duine a bhfuil an coróinvíreas air / uirthi.

translation.en: This is being done to reduce the spread of the coronavirus in the community.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo á dhéanamh chun scaipeadh an choróinvíris a laghdú sa phobal.

translation.en: The people who do this work are called “contact trackers ”.
translation.ga: Tugtar “rianairí teagmhála ” ar na daoine a dhéanann an obair seo.

translation.en: If you get a positive result
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach

translation.en: If you get a positive result the contact tracker will call you to find the contact details of anyone you have been in close contact with.
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach cuirfidh an rianaire teagmhála glaoch ort chun sonraí teagmhála aon duine a raibh gartheagmháil agat leo, a aimsiú

translation.en: If you test positive only covid-19 signals you
translation.ga: Má fhaigeann tú tástáil dearfach ach comharthaí covid-19 ort

translation.en: They will ask you about the people and places you visited 48 hours before your illness counterparts began and you began to self-isolate.
translation.ga: Cuirfidh siad ceist ort faoi na daoine agus na háiteanna ar thug tú cuairt orthu 48 uair an chloig sular thosaigh do chomharhaí tinnis agus gur thosaigh tú ag féin-aonrú.

translation.en: If you test positive but do not have covid-19 symptoms
translation.ga: Má fhaigeann tú tástáil dearfach ach nach bhfuil comharthaí covid-19 ort

translation.en: The contact tracker will only ask you about people and places you visited 24 hours before your test and until you started self-isolation.
translation.ga: Ní chuirfidh an rianaire teagmhála ceist ort ach faoi dhaoine agus faoi áiteanna a thug tú cuairt orthu 24 uair an chloig roimh do thástáil agus go dtí gur thosaigh tú ag féin-aonrú.

translation.en: They won ’ t ask you about people who passed by on the street or in shops.
translation.ga: Ní churfidh siad ceist ort faoi dhaoine a chuaigh tharat ar an tsráid nó i siopaí.

translation.en: There is little danger in such situations, especially if you are practising social separation.
translation.ga: Níl mórán baoil i gcásanna mar sin go háirithe má tá tú ag cleachtadh scaradh sóisialta.

translation.en: Contact tracking is confidential.
translation.ga: Tá an rianú teagmhála rúnda.

translation.en: No-one who calls the contact administrator will know that you provided their contact details.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh a fhios ag aon duine a nglaonn an rianaire teagmhála orthu gur tusa a thug a sonraí teagmhála dóibh.

translation.en: Covid tracker app
translation.ga: Aip rianaire covid

translation.en: The contact tracker will also ask you if you have used the covid tracker app
translation.ga: Fiafróidh an rianaire teagmhála díot freisin ar úsáid tú an aip rianaire covid

translation.en: If you have been using it, they will ask you to use the upload function again to send an alert to your immediate contacts.
translation.ga: Má bhí tú á úsáid, iarrfaidh siad ort an fheidhm uaslódla a úsáid arís chun foláireamh a chur chuig do do ghartheagmhálaithe.

translation.en: You do this with the app.
translation.ga: Déanann tú é seo leis an aip.

translation.en: It is your choice to do this.
translation.ga: Is do rogha féin é seo a dhéanamh.

translation.en: If you consent, a separate upload code will be sent to you with a text message.
translation.ga: Má thoilíonn tú, seolfar cód uaslódálaithe ar leith chugat le teachtaireacht téacs.

translation.en: This code will release the lock on the app's upload function.
translation.ga: Scaoilfidh an cód seo an glas atá ar fheidhm uaslódála an aip.

translation.en: Dehydration
translation.ga: Díhiodráitiú

translation.en: Your body loses more fluid than it absorbs when you are dehydrated.
translation.ga: Cailleann do chorp níos mo leachta ná mar a thógtar sé isteach nuair a bhíonn tú díhiodraítithe.

translation.en: This can be serious for you if you do not get medical treatment.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé seo a bheith tromchúiseach duit mura bhfaigheann tú cóir leighis.

translation.en: Children and people over 65 are at greater risk of dehydration.
translation.ga: Tá leanaí agus daoine os cionn 65 i mbaol níos mó ó dhíhiodráitiiú.

translation.en: You are more likely to become dehydrated if you have symptoms of flu or coronavirus.
translation.ga: Is dócha go mbeifeá díhiodraítithe má bhíonn comharthaí fliú nó coróinvíris ort.

translation.en: Signs of dehydration
translation.ga: Comharthaí an díhiodráitiú

translation.en: Symptoms of dehydration in adults and children include:
translation.ga: I measc na gcomharthaí díhiodráitithe i ndaoine fásta agus leanaí tá:

translation.en: Tart
translation.ga: Tart

translation.en: Dark yellow urine with a strong odor
translation.ga: Fual dorcha buí le boladh láidir

translation.en: Dizziness or confusion
translation.ga: Meadhrán nó mearbhall

translation.en: Feeling tired
translation.ga: Ag mothú tuirseach

translation.en: Dry mouth, lips and eyes
translation.ga: Béal, liopaí agus súile tirime

translation.en: Little urine, and less than four times a day
translation.ga: Beagán fuail, agus níos lú ná ceithre uair sa lá

translation.en: Dehydration can occur more easily in the following situations:
translation.ga: Is féidir le díhiodráitiú tarlú níos éasca sna cásanna seo a leanas:

translation.en: High temperatures of 38 degrees celsius or above you
translation.ga: Teocht ard 38 céim celsius nó os a chionn ort

translation.en: Diabetes
translation.ga: Diaibéiteas

translation.en: Vomiting or diarrhea
translation.ga: Urlacán nó buinneach

translation.en: Spending too much time in the sun (heat stroke)
translation.ga: Ag caitheamh an iomarca ama faoin ghrian (stróc teasa)

translation.en: If you drink too much alcohol
translation.ga: Má ólann tú an iomarca alcóil

translation.en: Sweating a lot after exercise
translation.ga: Ag cur go leor allais tar éis aclaíochta

translation.en: Urinating more often due to medication you are taking (diuretics)
translation.ga: Ag fual níos minicí de bharr cógais atá á dtógáil agat (fualbhrostaigh)

translation.en: Reduce the risk of dehydration
translation.ga: Laghdaigh an baol díhiodráitithe

translation.en: Drink liquids when you feel any sign of dehydration.
translation.ga: Ól leachtanna nuair a bhraitheann tú aon chomhartha díhiodráitithe.

translation.en: If you can ’ t drink easily because you feel sick or if you were sick, start with small bubbles and then drink more bulbs, gradually.
translation.ga: Mura féidir leat deoch a ól go héasca de bhrí go n-airíonn tú tinn nó má bhí tú tinn, tosaigh le bolgaim bheaga agus ansin ól bolgaim níos mó, de réir a chéile.

translation.en: You can use a spoon to help your child swallow the liquid.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat spúnóg a úsáid chun cabhrú le do pháiste an leacht a shlogadh.

translation.en: You should drink enough throughout the day so that your urine has a clear light color.
translation.ga: Ba chóir dóthain a ól i rith an lae ionas go mbeidh dath éadrom soiléir ar d ’ fhual.

translation.en: Drink a drink if you are at risk of dehydration.
translation.ga: Ól deoch má bhíonn tú i gcontúirt díhiodráitithe.

translation.en: For example, if you are sneezing, sweating or have diarrhea.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, má tá tú ag cur amach, ag cur allais nó má tá buinneach ort.

translation.en: Caregivers: Make sure the person in your care drinks enough
translation.ga: Cúramóirí: Déan cinnte go n-ólann an duine faoi do chúram go leor

translation.en: The person you care for may not realize that he / she is not drinking enough fluids.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé nach dtuigfeadh an duine atá faoi do chúram nach bhfuil sé / sí ag ól go leor leachtanna.

translation.en: To help them:
translation.ga: Chun cabhrú leo:

translation.en: Make sure they drink during meal time
translation.ga: Déan cinnte go n-ólann siad le linn am béilí

translation.en: Make it a social habit, like "drinking a cup of tea"
translation.ga: Déan nós sóisialta de, mar "cupán tae a ól"

translation.en: Give them plenty of water - such as soup, ice cream or jelly, or fruit like melons
translation.ga: Tabhair bia dóibh a bhfuil neart uisce iontu - mar shampla anraith, uachtar reoite nó glóthach, nó torthaí cosúil le mealbhacán

translation.en: A pharmacist can help with dehydration
translation.ga: Is féidir le cógaiseoir cabhrú leis an díhiodráitiú

translation.en: If you are vomiting or have diarrhea and are losing too much fluid, you need to replace the sugar, salts and minerals lost by your body.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag cur amach nó má tá buinneach ort agus má tá tú ag cailleadh an iomarca leachta, ní mór duit an siúcra, na salainn agus na mianraí atá caillte ag do chorp a chur ar ais.

translation.en: Your pharmacist may recommend oral rehydration pouches.
translation.ga: Is féidir le do chógaiseoir máilíní athhiodráitithe béil a mholadh.

translation.en: This is a powder that you mix with water and then drink it.
translation.ga: Is púdar atá anseo a mheascann tú le huisce agus ansin ólann tú é.

translation.en: Ask your pharmacist which ones are best for you or your child.
translation.ga: Fiafraigh de do chógaiseoir cé na cinn is oiriúnaí duit féin nó do do pháiste.

translation.en: When to seek medical help
translation.ga: Cathain a ba chóir cúnamh leighis a fháil

translation.en: Contact your gp if your symptoms do not improve with treatment and:
translation.ga: Téigh i dteagmháil le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh mura bhfeabhsaíonn do chuid comharthaí le cóir leighis agus:

translation.en: You are feeling more tired than usual
translation.ga: Tá tú ag mothú níos tuirsí ná mar is gnách

translation.en: You are confused and upset
translation.ga: Tá mearbhall ort agus tá tú trína chéile

translation.en: You have dizziness that does not go away when you stand up
translation.ga: Tá meadhrán ort nach n-imíonn nuair a sheasann tú

translation.en: You did not urinate during the day
translation.ga: Ní dhearna tú aon fhual i rith an lae

translation.en: Your pulse is weak or fast
translation.ga: Tá do chuisle lag nó tapa

translation.en: You have seizures
translation.ga: Tá taomanna ort

translation.en: These are signs of severe dehydration that urgently require medical treatment.
translation.ga: Is comharthaí iad seo de dhíhiodráitiú tromchúiseach a bhfuil cóir leighis ag teastáil uathu go práinneach.

translation.en: Dehydration in children
translation.ga: Díhiodráitiú i leanaí

translation.en: Children under five with dehydration
translation.ga: Leanaí faoi cúig bliana d ’ aois a bhfuil díhiodráitiú orthu

translation.en: Children under 5 should drink plenty of fluids to avoid dehydration.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do leanaí faoi 5 bliana d ’ aois neart leachtanna a ól chun díhiodráitiú a sheachaint.

translation.en: Dehydration is common in young children.
translation.ga: Bíonn díhiodráitiú coitianta i measc leanaí óga.

translation.en: This can be serious if not dealt with quickly.
translation.ga: Is féidir leis seo a bheith tromchúiseach mura ndéileáiltear leis go tapa.

translation.en: Contact your gp urgently if your child:
translation.ga: Téigh i dteagmháil le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh go práinneach má bhíonn do pháiste:

translation.en: Sleepy
translation.ga: Codlatach

translation.en: Breathing fast
translation.ga: Ag análú go tapaidh

translation.en: When your child is crying they have no tears or a few tears
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn do pháiste ag caoineadh ní bhíonn aon deora nó cúpla deor leo

translation.en: Fontanelle pressed in (the soft spot on the child's head)
translation.ga: Fontanelle brúite isteach (an spota boga ar chloigeann an pháiste)

translation.en: Dry mouth
translation.ga: Béal tirim

translation.en: Dark yellow urine or no urine for the last 12 hours
translation.ga: Fual buí dorcha nó gan aon fhual le 12 uair an chloig anuas

translation.en: Cold hands and feet or a stained appearance
translation.ga: Lámha agus cosa fuara nó cuma smálaithe orthu

translation.en: Once the dehydration has been treated, your baby will need to drink plenty of fluids.
translation.ga: Chomh luath agus a bheidh cóir leighis faighte don díhiodráitiú, beidh ar do leanbh neart leachtanna a ól.

translation.en: Continue breastfeeding or using formula milk - try to feed a little more often than usual
translation.ga: Lean den chothú cíche nó ag úsáid bainne foirmle - déan iarracht beagán cothaithe a thabhairt níos minice ná mar is gnách

translation.en: Give small bubbles of water to children who are on formula or dry food
translation.ga: Tabhair bolgaim bheaga uisce do leanaí atá ar bhainne foirmle nó ar bhia tirim

translation.en: Give small children the normal diet
translation.ga: Tabhair an gnáth-aiste bia do leanaí beaga

translation.en: Give a small drop of the rehydrated solution regularly to make sure they get the lost liquid, salts and sugars, - ask your pharmacist to suggest one
translation.ga: Tabhair braon beag den tuaslagán athhiodráitithe go rialta chun a chinntiú go bhfaighidh siad an leacht, salainn agus siúcraí atá caillte, - iarr ar do chógaiseoir ceann a mholadh

translation.en: Don't
translation.ga: Ná déan

translation.en: Do not make the formula weaker.
translation.ga: Ná déan an fhoirmle níos laige.

translation.en: Don't give young children fruit juice or fizzy drinks - it makes diarrhea or diarrhea worse.
translation.ga: Ná tabhair sú torthaí nó deochanna fiosaí do leanaí óga - déanann sé buinneach nó cur amach níos measa.

translation.en: Coronavirus - treatment
translation.ga: Coróinvíreas - cóir leighis

translation.en: There is no specific treatment available for coronavirus.
translation.ga: Níl aon chóir leighis ar leith ar fáil le haghaidh an choróinvíris.

translation.en: But 80% of people will be able to recover from the coronary virus at home and will not need to go into hospital.
translation.ga: Ach beidh 80% de na daoine ábalta biseach a fháil ón choróinvíreas sa bhaile agus ní bheidh aon ghá dóibh dul isteach san ospidéal.

translation.en: The vaccines will be available in stages and as a result it will take some time to vaccinate the population.
translation.ga: Beidh na vacsaíní ar fáil i gcéimeanna agus dá bharr sin tógfaidh sé roinnt ama chun an daonra a vacsaíniú.

translation.en: If you experience symptoms, you should self-isolated to prevent the spread of covid-19.
translation.ga: Má thagann comharthaí ort, ba chóir duit féin-aonrú chun cosc a chur ar scaipeadh covid-19.

translation.en: Call your gp or out of hours service immediately to discuss your symptoms and to determine if you need to have a covid-19 test.
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do dt nó seirbhís lasmuigh de ghnáthuaireanta láithreach chun do chomharthaí a phlé agus chun a chinntiú an bhfuil gá le tástáil covid-19 a dhéanamh ort.

translation.en: The most important thing is to protect others from the virus.
translation.ga: An rud is tábhachtaí ná daoine eile a chosaint ón víreas.

translation.en: Protecting those in at-risk groups from covid-19 is crucial.
translation.ga: Tá sé rí-thábhachtach iad siúd atá i ngrúpaí atá i mbaol a chosaint ó covid-19.

translation.en: Self-isolation
translation.ga: Féin-aonrú

translation.en: Get enough sleep and rest time
translation.ga: Faigh dóthain codlata agus am scíthe

translation.en: Drink plenty of water to avoid dehydration.
translation.ga: Ól neart uisce chun díhiodráitiú a sheachaint.

translation.en: Your urine should be bright yellow or bright
translation.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh d ’ fhual geal-buí nó geal

translation.en: Eat healthily
translation.ga: Ith go sláintiúil

translation.en: Do not smoke
translation.ga: Ná caith tobac

translation.en: Fan you
translation.ga: Fan te

translation.en: Keep an eye out for signs of illness and treat them
translation.ga: Coinnigh súil ar do chomharthaí tinnis agus glac cóir leighis lena n-aghaidh

translation.en: Read more about signs
translation.ga: Léigh níos mó faoi chomharthaí

translation.en: Fever
translation.ga: Fiabhras

translation.en: Cough - any kind, not just dry cough.
translation.ga: Casacht - aon saghas, ní amháin casacht thirim.

translation.en: Shortness of breath
translation.ga: Giorra anála

translation.en: Altered or lost smell
translation.ga: Boladh athraithe nó caillte

translation.en: If your symptoms of illness get worse
translation.ga: Má éiríonn do chomharthaí tinnis níos measa

translation.en: Contact your gp if your symptoms of illness do not improve
translation.ga: Déan teagmháil le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh mura dtagann feabhas ar do chomharthai tinnis

translation.en: If you are in an at-risk group over 60, you should keep a close eye on your symptoms of illness.
translation.ga: Má tá tú i ngrúpa os cionn 60 atá i mbaol, ba chóir duit súil ghéar a choimeád ar do chomharthaí tinnis.

translation.en: Contact your gp if the symptoms of illness get worse.
translation.ga: Déan teagmháil le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh má éiríonn na comharthaí tinnis níos measa.

translation.en: If you are in an at-risk group, you should keep a close eye on your signs of illness.
translation.ga: Má tá tú i ngrúpa atá i mbaol, ba chóir duit súil ghéar a choimeád ar do chomharthai tinnis.

translation.en: Contact your gp if the symptoms of illness get worse.
translation.ga: Déan teagmháil le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh má éiríonn na comharthai tinnis níos measa.

translation.en: Medication for treatment
translation.ga: Cógas um chóir leighis

translation.en: The best medication depends on your symptoms:
translation.ga: Braitheann an cógas is fearr ar do:

translation.en: Symptoms of illness
translation.ga: Comharthaí tinnis

translation.en: Other health complications
translation.ga: Deacrachtaí sláinte eile

translation.en: Any other medical treatment you are receiving
translation.ga: Aon chóir leighis eile atá á fháil agat

translation.en: Paracetamol or ibuprofen may help lower your temperature and give you relief from your pains.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh paraicéiteamól nó ibuprofen cabhrú chun do theocht a ísliú agus faoiseamh a thabhairt duit ó do phianta.

translation.en: Paracetamol is recommended as the first line of treatment for most people.
translation.ga: Moltar paraicéiteamól mar an chéad chóir leighis don chuid is mó de na daoine.

translation.en: Read all the guidelines in the package before taking any medication.
translation.ga: Léigh na treoirlínte uilig sa bpacáiste sula dtógann tú aon chógas.

translation.en: Take advice from any health professional.
translation.ga: Glac le comhairle a thugann aon ghairmí sláinte duit.

translation.en: Antibiotics
translation.ga: Antaibheathaigh

translation.en: Antibiotics do not work against covid-19 or any other viruses.
translation.ga: Ní oibríonn antaibheathaigh in aghaidh covid-19 ná aon víris eile.

translation.en: They will not give you relief from your symptoms of illness or help you to recover.
translation.ga: Ní thabharfaidh siad faoiseamh duit ó do chomharthaí tinnis ná ní chabhróidh siad leat biseach a fháil.

translation.en: Covid-19 is a virus that is not helped by antibiotics.
translation.ga: Is víreas atá sa covid-19 agus ní chabhraíonn antaibheathaigh leis.

translation.en: Iobuprofen
translation.ga: Iobúpróifein

translation.en: It is okay to take anti-inflammatory medications (nsaids) if you have covid-19.
translation.ga: Tá sé ceart go leor cógais frith-athlastacha (nsaid) a thógáil má tá covid-19 ort.

translation.en: There is no evidence that it is dangerous.
translation.ga: Níl aon fhianaise ann go bhfuil baol ag baint leis.

translation.en: Only take one anti-inflammatory medication at a time.
translation.ga: Ná tóg ach cógas frith-athlastach amháin ag aon am.

translation.en: It is okay to take paracetamol and anti-inflammatory medications such as iobuprofen together.
translation.ga: Tá sé ceart go leor paraicéiteamól agus cógas frith-athlastach ar nós iobúpróifein a thógáil le chéile.

translation.en: Anti-inflammatory medications include:
translation.ga: I measc na gcógas frith-athlastach tá:

translation.en: Iobuprofen - brand names: Nurofen, actiprofen, advil, brufen, brupro, buplex, easofen, and fenopine.
translation.ga: Iobúpróifein – ainmneacha branda: Nurofen, actiprofen, advil, brufen, brupro, buplex, easofen, agus fenopine.

translation.en: Iobuprofen gel may contain the names: Nurofen, melfen, porpain, ibugel and ibuleve
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh na hainmeacha: Nurofen, melfen, phorpain, ibugel agus ibuleve a bheith ar ghlóthach iobúpróifein

translation.en: Napkinson - brand name: Naprosyn
translation.ga: Naipraicséin – ainm branda: Naprosyn

translation.en: Dichlorophenics - brand names: Voltarol, diclo, diclac, cataflam, difene and flector
translation.ga: Déchlóifeineac – ainmneacha branda: Voltarol, diclo, diclac, cataflam, difene agus flector

translation.en: Taking care of your mental health during the coronary virus outbreak
translation.ga: Ag tabhairt aire do do mheabhairshláinte le linn ráig an choróinvíris

translation.en: Outbreaks of infectious diseases such as coronavirus (covid-19) can be of concern to us.
translation.ga: Is féidir le ráigeanna de ghalair thógálacha ar nós an choróinvíris (covid-19) imní a chur orainn.

translation.en: This can affect your mental health.
translation.ga: Is féidir leis seo cur isteach ar do mheabhairshláinte.

translation.en: But you can do many things to take care of your mental health during this time.
translation.ga: Ach is féidir leat go leor rudaí a dhéanamh le haire a thabhairt de do mheabhairshláinte le linn an ama seo.

translation.en: How this can affect your mental health
translation.ga: Conas a d ’ fhéadfadh sé seo cur as do do mheabhairshláinte

translation.en: The spread of the coronavirus is a challenging new event.
translation.ga: Is eachtra nua dhúshlánach atá i scaipeadh an choróinvíris.

translation.en: It may cause some people more anxiety than others.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé níos mó imní a chur ar dhaoine áirithe seachas daoine eile.

translation.en: Remember that medical, scientific and community health experts are doing their best to bring the virus under control.
translation.ga: Cuimhnigh go bhfuil saineolaithe leighis, eolaíochta agus sláinte pobail ag déanamh a seacht ndícheall chun an víreas a chur faoi smacht.

translation.en: Remember this when you are worried.
translation.ga: Cuimhnigh air seo nuair a bhíonn imní ort.

translation.en: Try to remember this when you feel worried.
translation.ga: Try to remember this when you feel worried.

translation.en: It has affected all our lives in some ways.
translation.ga: It has affected all our lives in some ways.

translation.en: But in time, it will pass.
translation.ga: But in time, it will pass.

translation.en: Everyone's life has changed in many ways but over time it will come to an end.
translation.ga: Tá athruithe tagtha ar shaol gach duine ar bhealaí éagsúla ach le himeacht aimsire tiocfaidh deireadh leis.

translation.en: You may notice:
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go n-aireofá:

translation.en: More anxiety
translation.ga: Níos mó imní

translation.en: Under pressure
translation.ga: Faoi bhrú

translation.en: Constantly looking for signs of illness in yourself or others
translation.ga: Tú féin ag cuardach comharthaí tinnis ort féin nó ar dhaoine eile go seasta

translation.en: More cantail on you
translation.ga: Níos mó cantail ort

translation.en: Distrustful or restless
translation.ga: Mímhuiníneach nó míshuaimhneach

translation.en: That your normal pains are the same as having the virus
translation.ga: Gur ionann do ghnáthphianta agus an víreas a bheith ort

translation.en: Difficulty sleeping
translation.ga: Deacrachtaí codlata

translation.en: That you can do nothing or that things are spiraling out of control
translation.ga: Nach féidir leat tada a dhéanamh nó go bhfuil rudaí ag imeacht ó smacht

translation.en: That you have foolish ideas
translation.ga: Go mbíonn smaointe díchéillí agat

translation.en: How to take care of your mental health at this time
translation.ga: Conas aire a thabhairt do do mheabhairshláinte ag an am seo

translation.en: You need to be prudent about this and get accurate information.
translation.ga: Ní mór duit a bheith stuama faoi seo agus eolas cruinn a fháil.

translation.en: Here are some ways you can do this.
translation.ga: Seo cuid de na bealaí ar féidir leat é seo a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Get the latest information but don't spend too much time looking at the news or social media
translation.ga: Faigh an t-eolas is úire ach ná caith iomarca ama ag féachaint ar an nuacht nó na meáin shóisialta

translation.en: All the knowledge about covid-19 can be redundant for us.
translation.ga: Is féidir leis an eolas uilig maidir le covid-19 a bheith iomarcach dúinn.

translation.en: It may worry you for no reason.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé imní a chur ort gan chúis.

translation.en: If so, choose a specific time each day or every second day to get the most important information.
translation.ga: Más amhlaidh, roghnaigh am ar leith gach lá nó gach dara lá chun an t-eolas is tábhachtaí a fháil.

translation.en: Sometimes it is not easy to distinguish between facts and rumors.
translation.ga: Uaireanta, ní bhíonn sé éasca idirdhealú a dhéanamh idir fíricí agus ráflaí.

translation.en: Get your information from reliable and reliable sources.
translation.ga: Faigh do chuid eolais ó fhoinsí iontaofa ar féidir brath orthu.

translation.en: People talk about their worries or express personal opinions about covid-19 on social media.
translation.ga: Bíonn daoine ag caint faoin imní atá orthu féin nó ag nochtadh tuairimí pearsanta faoi covid-19 ar na meáin shóisialta.

translation.en: This may add to your anxiety and worry.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh seo cur le d ’ imní agus do bhuairt.

translation.en: It is important to make a careful choice about who you contact on social media and how much time you spend on social media.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach rogha cúramach a dhéanamh faoi na daoine a ndéanann tú teagmháil leo ar na meáin sóisialta agus an méid ama a chaitheann tú ar na meáin sóisialta.

translation.en: If you feel that all the talk about the coronavirus is too much for you, talk to someone close to you about it or get help.
translation.ga: Má airíonn tú go bhfuil an chaint uilig faoin gcoróinvíreas iomarcach duit, labhair le duine atá gar duit faoi nó faigh cúnamh.

translation.en: Keep doing the usual things
translation.ga: Lean ort ag déanamh na ngnáth-rudaí

translation.en: The coronary virus outbreak can affect what you do every day in different ways.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh an ráig choróinvíris cur isteach ar na rudaí a dhéanann tú gach lá ar bhealaí éagsúla.

translation.en: But it would be better for you if you could have some kind of structure to your day in these turbulent worlds.
translation.ga: Ach b ’ fhearr duit é dá bhféadfá struchtúr de chineál éigin a bheith ar do lá sna saolta corracha seo.

translation.en: It is important to pay attention to your own needs and feelings in this stressful time, especially.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach go dtabharfá aird ar do riachtanais agus ar do mhothúcháin féin san am strusmhar seo, ach go háirithe.

translation.en: You may still be able to do things that you enjoy and that make you feel at ease.
translation.ga: B ’ fhéidir go mbeifeá fós in ann rudaí a mbaineann tú taitneamh astu agus a chuireann ar do shuaimhneas tú, a dhéanamh.

translation.en: You could, for example:
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfá, mar shampla:

translation.en: Regular exercise, and going for a walk
translation.ga: Aclaíocht rialta, agus dul ag siúl

translation.en: Go to bed at your normal bedtime
translation.ga: Téigh a chodladh ag do ghnátham codlata

translation.en: Eat healthy food
translation.ga: Ith bia sláintiúil

translation.en: Do not drink too much alcohol
translation.ga: Ná hól an iomarca alcóil

translation.en: Practice relaxation techniques such as breathing exercises
translation.ga: Cleacht teicnící suaimhnis ar nós cleachtaí análaithe

translation.en: Read a book
translation.ga: Léigh leabhar

translation.en: Search fitness or yoga classes, concerts, church services or guided tours online
translation.ga: Cuardaigh ranganna aclaíochta nó ióga, coirmeacha ceoil, seirbhísí eaglasta nó cuairteanna treoraithe ar líne

translation.en: Go to classes if you can stay away 2 mh from others
translation.ga: Téigh go dtí ranganna má bhíonn tú in ann fanacht amach 2 mh ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: You will feel better if you do something creative.
translation.ga: Aireoidh tú níos fearr má dhéanann tú rud éigin cruthaitheach.

translation.en: Keep in touch with others
translation.ga: Coinnigh i dteagmháil le daoine eile

translation.en: Your friends and family can help you when you are under pressure.
translation.ga: Is féidir le do chairde agus do chlann cúnamh a thabhairt duit nuair a bhíonn tú faoi bhrú.

translation.en: Keep in touch with them at this time.
translation.ga: Coinnigh i dteagmháil leo ag an tráth seo.

translation.en: If you have to stop moving around or if you have to stay alone, try to keep in touch with people in other ways, for example:
translation.ga: Má bhíonn ort stopadh ag bogadh thart nó má tá ort fanacht leat fein, déan iarracht coinneáil i dteagmháil le daoine ar bhealaí eile, mar shampla:

translation.en: Rphost
translation.ga: Rphost

translation.en: Social media
translation.ga: Meáin sóisialta

translation.en: Video calls
translation.ga: Glaonna físe

translation.en: Phone calls
translation.ga: Glaonna ar an bhfón

translation.en: Text messaging
translation.ga: Teachtaireachtaí téacs

translation.en: Video calls can be made to many people at the same time on different video apps.
translation.ga: Is féidir glaonna físe a dhéanamh chuig go leor daoine ag an am céanna ar aipeanna físe éagsúla.

translation.en: Talking to others will reduce your anxiety and worry.
translation.ga: Laghdóidh sé d ’ imní agus buairt má labhraíonn tú le daoine eile.

translation.en: You don ’ t have to pretend to be strong or be able to handle everything alone
translation.ga: Níl gá duit ligean ort féin go bhfuil tú láidir nó go bhfuil tú in ann déileáil le gach rud i d ’ aonar
