translation.en: Try to come before the harassment and support each other
translation.ga: Déan iarracht teacht roimh an gciapadh agus tacaigí lena chéile

translation.en: It is understandable that you would feel vulnerable or under pressure after reading or hearing news about the outbreak.
translation.ga: Tá sé intuigthe go mbraithfeá leochaileach nó faoi bhrú tar éis nuacht faoin ráig a léamh nó a chloisint.

translation.en: Identify these feelings.
translation.ga: Aithin na mothúcháin seo.

translation.en: Remind yourself and others to take care of their physical and mental health.
translation.ga: Meabhraigh duit féin agus do dhaoine eile aire a thabhairt dá sláinte choirp agus mheabhrach.

translation.en: Getting relief from smoking, drinking and food
translation.ga: Ag fáil faoiseamh ó chaitheamh tobac, ól agus bia

translation.en: If you smoke or drink, try not to smoke or drink more than usual.
translation.ga: Má chaitheann tú tobac nó má ólann tú, déan iarracht gan níos mó a chaitheamh nó a ól ná mar is gnách.

translation.en: This will not help you in the long run.
translation.ga: Ní chuideoidh sé seo leat go fadtéarmach.

translation.en: Eating habits are often related to your emotions.
translation.ga: Is minic go mbíonn baint ag nósanna itheacháin le do chuid mothúchán.

translation.en: You may eat food to get relief during a coronary virus outbreak.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfá bia a ithe chun faoiseamh a fháil le linn ráig an choróinvíris.

translation.en: Eating for relief can cause you to gain weight and impair your health.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfá meáchan a chur ort agus cur as do do shláinte de bharr a bheith ag ithe chun faoiseamh a fháil.

translation.en: It is important to distinguish between your mood and the amount of food you eat.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach idirdhealú a dhéanamh idir do mhothúchán agus an méid bia a itheann tú.

translation.en: If you already have mental health difficulties and are using the mental health services
translation.ga: Má tá deacrachtaí meabhairshláinte agat cheana agus má tá tú ag úsáid na seirbhísí meabhairshláinte

translation.en: If the horseshoe falls on the nail, it will help you if you have a plan in place.
translation.ga: Má thagann an chrú ar an táirne, cabhróidh sé leat má bhíonn plean réitithe agat.

translation.en: Things you could do:
translation.ga: Rudaí a d ’ fhéadfá a dhéanamh:

translation.en: Prepare a list of phone numbers for mental health services, relatives and friends that you can call if you need help
translation.ga: Ullmhaigh liosta d ’ uimhreacha fóin na seirbhísí meabhairshláinte, gaolta agus cairde a mbeidh tú ábalta glaoch a chur orthu má bhíonn cúnamh uait

translation.en: Keep taking any medicines and collect your prescription with the help of your doctor or psychiatrist
translation.ga: Coinnigh ort ag tógáil aon chógais leighis agus bailigh d ’ oideas le cúnamh do dhochtúra nó do shíciatraí

translation.en: Continue with any counseling or psychotherapy sessions you have
translation.ga: Lean ar aghaidh le haon seisiúin chomhairleoireachta nó síciteiripe atá agat

translation.en: Cut back on the time you spend listening to the news and use no phone but a reliable source
translation.ga: Gearr siar ar an am a chaitheann tú ag éisteacht leis an nuacht agus ná húsáid aon fhoine ach foinse iontaofa

translation.en: Practice relaxation techniques and breathing exercises
translation.ga: Cleacht teicnící suaimhnis agus cleachtaí análaithe

translation.en: If things get worse, contact your mental health team or gp.
translation.ga: Má théann rudaí chun donais, déan teagmháil le d ’ fhoireann mheabhairshláinte nó le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: If you have an intellectual disability
translation.ga: Má tá míchumas intleachtúil ort

translation.en: If you have an intellectual disability, you may feel more anxious or sad about the covid-19.
translation.ga: Má tá míchumas intleachtúil ort, b ’ fhéidir go mbraithfeá níos mó imní nó bróin mar gheall ar an covid-19.

translation.en: You may also be worried about your family or those close to you.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfá a bheith buartha freisin faoi do theaghlach nó iad siúd atá gar duit.

translation.en: It is important to take care of yourself.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach aire a thabhairt duit féin.

translation.en: Try to keep up with the normal things in your life, take a bath every day and eat healthy food.
translation.ga: Déan iarracht leanacht ar aghaidh leis na gnáth rudaí i do shaol, tóg folcadh gach lá agus ith bia folláin.

translation.en: Keep in touch with people you trust over the phone or the internet.
translation.ga: Coinnigh i dteagmháil le daoine a bhfuil muinín agat astu ar an bhfón nó ar an idirlíon.

translation.en: Read the advice on how to help someone with special needs during the coronary virus outbreak.
translation.ga: Léigh an chomhairle faoi conas cabhair a thabhairt do dhuine le riachtanais speisialta le linn ráig an choróinvíris.

translation.en: Obsessive compulsive disorder (ocd) and the coronary virus
translation.ga: Neamhord éigníoch dúghabhálach (ocd) agus an coróinvíreas

translation.en: If you have obsessive compulsive disorder (ocd), you may be very scared:
translation.ga: Má tá neamhord éigníoch dúghabhálach (ocd) ort, d ’ fhéadfadh an-eagla a bheith ort:

translation.en: That you get the coronavirus
translation.ga: Go bhfaighfeá an coróinvíreas

translation.en: That you would harm others
translation.ga: Go ndéanfá dochar do dhaoine eile

translation.en: Things are not in the right order
translation.ga: Nach bhfuil rudaí san ord ceart

translation.en: If you are worried about getting the coronavirus, you will be caught by:
translation.ga: Má bhíonn imní ort go dtógfaidh tú an coróinvíreas, beidh tú gafa le:

translation.en: Cleanliness hands
translation.ga: Glaineacht lámha

translation.en: Cleanliness
translation.ga: Glaineacht

translation.en: Avoiding things like public transport system
translation.ga: Ag seachaint rudaí ar nós córas iompar poiblí

translation.en: Washing your hands
translation.ga: Ag ní do lámha

translation.en: You may constantly be washing or cleaning your hands.
translation.ga: D ’ fhéadfadh sé go mbeifeá ag ní nó ag glanadh do lámha de shíor.

translation.en: If you have previously subdued a disorder like this, it may come back on.
translation.ga: Má d ’ éirigh leat neamhord mar seo a cheansú roimhe seo, d ’ fhéadfadh sé teacht ar ais ort.

translation.en: Follow the advice above.
translation.ga: Lean an chomhairle thuas.

translation.en: Wash your hands properly and often, but you do not need to do more than recommended.
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha i gceart agus go minic, ach ní gá duit níos mó a dhéanamh ná mar a mholtar.

translation.en: Coking
translation.ga: Cocúnú

translation.en: If you are at high risk from the coronavirus (covid-19, it is recommended that you cook.
translation.ga: Má tá tú i mbaol mór ón gcoróinvíreas (covid-19, moltar duit cocúnú.

translation.en: You should stay home as much as possible and stay away from others.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit fanacht sa bhaile an oiread agus is féidir agus fanacht amach ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: As restrictions are lifted, people will be at greater risk of contracting the virus due to activities such as:
translation.ga: De réir mar a mhaolaítear na srianta beidh daoine i mbaol níos mó an víreas a fháil de bharr gníomhaíochtaí ar nós:

translation.en: An event such as a wedding and funeral
translation.ga: Ócáid ar nós bainis agus sochraid

translation.en: Crowded places that cannot stay 2 meters away from others
translation.ga: Áiteanna plódaithe nach féidir fanacht 2 mhéadar amach ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: The more people who attend, the greater the risk.
translation.ga: Dá mhéid daoine a bheidh i láthair, is ea is mó an baol.

translation.en: You have to decide what is best for your own health.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tusa socrú cad is fearr do do shláinte féin.

translation.en: But certain things should continue to protect you from the crown virus and stay safe.
translation.ga: Ach ba chóir leanacht ar aghaidh le rudaí áirithe chun tú a chosaint ón gcoróinvíreas agus fanacht slán.

translation.en: The people that need cocooning
translation.ga: Na daoine gur gá dóibh cocúnú

translation.en: You must cocoon if you are a person who is at high risk (very vulnerable) from the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú cocúnú más duine tú atá i mbaol mór (an-leochaileachº) ón gcoróinvíreas.

translation.en: If you are unsure whether or not to cook, talk to your doctor.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil tú cinnte ar chóir duit cocúnú nó nár chóir, labhair le do dhochtúir.

translation.en: If you are an essential worker, get advice from occupational health.
translation.ga: Más oibrí riachtanach tú, faigh comhairle ó shláinte saothair.

translation.en: Talk to your gp if your child has a long-term illness and needs advice on how to protect them.
translation.ga: Labhair le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh má tá tinneas fadthéarmach ar do pháiste agus má tá comhairle uait conas iad a chosaint.

translation.en: Call your doctor if you have any signs of the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do dhochtúir má bhíonn aon chomhartha den choróinvíreas ort.

translation.en: Meeting people from other homes
translation.ga: Ag bualadh le daoine ó thithe eile

translation.en: Meet the small group of the same six.
translation.ga: Buail leis an ngrúpa beag den seisear céanna.

translation.en: This will help you stay safe from the coronavirus.
translation.ga: Cabhróidh sé seo leat fanacht slán ón gcoróinvíreas.

translation.en: If you have a long-term illness and your gp has advised you not to meet others you should always follow your doctor's advice.
translation.ga: Má tá tinneas fadthéarmach ort agus má chomhairligh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh duit gan bualadh le daoine eile ba chóir duit comhairle do dhochtúra a leanacht i gcónaí.

translation.en: Meeting people inside
translation.ga: Ag bualadh le daoine taobh istigh

translation.en: Visitors can come to your house and you can visit another house.
translation.ga: Is féidir le cuairteoirí teacht go dtí do theach agus is féidir leatsa dul ar cuairt chuig teach eile.

translation.en: Wear a face mask when you meet other people inside or when there are visitors in your house and when you visit.
translation.ga: Caith clúdach aghaidhe nuair a bhuaileann tú le daoine eile taobh istigh nó nuair a bhíonn cuairteoirí i do theach agus nuair a théann tú ar cuairt.

translation.en: The people you meet should:
translation.ga: Ba chóir do na daoine a mbuaileann tú leo:

translation.en: Stay out of 2 meters if possible
translation.ga: Fanacht amach 2 mhéadar uait más féidir

translation.en: Wear a face cover if they can't stay out 2 meters away
translation.ga: Clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh mura féidir leo fanacht amach 2 mhéadar uait

translation.en: Wash their hands and practice good hygiene
translation.ga: A lámha a ní agus sláinteachas maith a chleachtadh

translation.en: If you decide to visit another house, let them know in advance that you are going.
translation.ga: Má shocraíonn tú dul ar cuairt go dtí teach eile, inis dóibh roimh ré go bhfuil tú ag dul.

translation.en: Make sure no one is feeling sick with the symptoms of coronavirus.
translation.ga: Déan cinnte nach bhfuil éinne ag aireachtáil tinn agus comharthaí an choróinvíris orthu.

translation.en: You should stay away 2 meters from others and wash your hands when you return to your own home.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit fanacht amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile agus do lámha a ní nuair a fhilleann tú ar do theach féin.

translation.en: You should wear a face mask unless you can stay 2 meters away from others and wash your hands when you go home.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh mura féidir leat fanacht amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile agus do lámha a ní nuair a théann tú abhaile.

translation.en: People with symptoms of coronavirus should not visit you.
translation.ga: Níor chóir do dhaoine a bhfuil comharthaí an choróinvíris orthu cuairt a thabhairt ort.

translation.en: When the visitors disappear, you should clean the surfaces they have been in contact with them.
translation.ga: Nuair a imíonn na cuairteoirí, ba chóir duit na dromhchlaí a raibh teagmháil acu leo a ghlanadh.

translation.en: Use for routine household cleaning and disinfectants.
translation.ga: Úsáid do ghnáth ghlantacháin tí agus díghalráin.

translation.en: Meeting people outside
translation.ga: Ag bualadh le daoine taobh amuigh

translation.en: If you decide to meet people:
translation.ga: Má shocraíonn tú bualadh le daoine:

translation.en: Meet one small group of people
translation.ga: Buail le grúpa beag daoine amháin

translation.en: Only meet them for a short time
translation.ga: Ná buail leo ach ar feadh tamaill gearr

translation.en: Stay 2 meters away from others in the group
translation.ga: Fan amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile sa ghrúpa

translation.en: Wash your hands when you get home
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha nuair a thagann tú abhaile

translation.en: Going for a walk
translation.ga: Ag dul ar shiúlóid

translation.en: If you go for a walk, you should:
translation.ga: Má théann tú ar shiúlóid, ba chóir duit:

translation.en: Stay 2 meters away from others
translation.ga: Fanacht amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Stay away from others as much as possible
translation.ga: Fanacht amach ó dhaoine eile an oiread agus is féidir

translation.en: Stay away from surfaces
translation.ga: Fanacht amach ó dhromchlaí

translation.en: Not to shake hands with people
translation.ga: Gan lámh a chroitheadh le daoine

translation.en: Wash your hands when you enter your own home
translation.ga: Do lámha a ní nuair théann tú isteach i do theach féin

translation.en: Going on a car trip
translation.ga: Ag dul ar thuras cairr

translation.en: If you go on a car journey, you should:
translation.ga: Má théann tú ar thuras i do charr, ba chóir duit:

translation.en: Travel on your journey with someone who lives with you or someone from your social group
translation.ga: Taisteal ar do thuras in éineacht le duine a chónaíonn leat nó le duine as do ghrúpa sóisialta

translation.en: If you are in a taxi everyone should wear a face mask.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn tú i dtacsaí ba chóir do gach duine clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: Stay 2 meters away from others when you are out
translation.ga: Fanacht amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile nuair a bhíonn tú amuigh

translation.en: Wash your hands when you get home
translation.ga: Do lámha a ní nuair a thagann tú abhaile

translation.en: Travel
translation.ga: Taisteal

translation.en: You should stay home as much as possible and stay away from others.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit fanacht sa bhaile an oiread agus is féidir agus fanacht amach ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: But if you are going to travel in your own county or to another county, find out how the virus is spreading in that area.
translation.ga: Ach má tá tú chun taisteal i do chontae féin nó go dtí contae eile, faigh amach conas atá an víreas ag scaipeadh sa cheantar sin.

translation.en: Think about the best way to protect yourself before you hit the road.
translation.ga: Smaoinigh cén bealach is fearr le tú féin a chosaint sula mbuaileann tú bóthar.

translation.en: Public transport
translation.ga: Iompar poiblí

translation.en: If you have to travel by public transport:
translation.ga: Má bhíonn ort taisteal ar iompar poiblí:

translation.en: Go at times that are not busy, if possible
translation.ga: Téigh ag amanna nach bhfuil gnóthach, más féidir

translation.en: You have to wear face cover on public transport - that's the law.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh ar iompar poiblí- sin an dlí.

translation.en: Stay 2 meters away from others
translation.ga: Fan amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Wash your hands when you are at home
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha nuair a bheidh tú sa bhaile

translation.en: Restaurants
translation.ga: Bialanna

translation.en: Before you go to a restaurant, think carefully about the dangers.
translation.ga: Sula dtéann tú chuig bialann, cuimhnigh go cúramach faoi na contúirtí.

translation.en: It should be:
translation.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh:

translation.en: The restaurant is large enough to leave a 2 meter space between the tables
translation.ga: An bhialann mór go leor chun spás 2 mhéadar a fhágáil idir na boird

translation.en: Safe entrance and exit so you can stay away 2 meters from others
translation.ga: Bealach isteach agus amach sábháilte ann ionas gur féidir leat fanacht amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Strict hygiene measures are implemented
translation.ga: Bearta sláinteachais dian á gcur i bhfeidhm

translation.en: Reduce the risk:
translation.ga: An baol a laghdú:

translation.en: Just wait a short distance
translation.ga: Ná fan ach achar gearr

translation.en: Tell the server that you are coking
translation.ga: Abair leis an bhfreastalaí go bhfuil tú ag cocúnú

translation.en: Wear a face mask in the restaurant
translation.ga: Caith clúdach aghaidhe sa bhialann

translation.en: Wash your hands when you go home
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha nuair a théann tú abhaile

translation.en: Shopping
translation.ga: Ag siopadóireacht

translation.en: If you are a cook, you may want to ask your friends or relatives to do the shopping for you.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag cocúnú, b ’ fhearr duit iarraidh ar do chairde nó do ghaolta an tsiopadóireacht a dhéanamh duit.

translation.en: Because it is not easy to stay away 2 meters from others in the shops.
translation.ga: De bharr nach bhfuil sé éasca fanacht amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile sna siopaí.

translation.en: If you go shopping, you should:
translation.ga: Má théann tú ag siopadóireacht, ba chóir duit:

translation.en: Put on face cover - this is the law in shops, shopping centres and other retail outlets such as hairdressers and cinemas
translation.ga: Clúdach aghaidhe a chur ort- seo an dlí i siopaí, ionaid siopadóireachta agus ionaid mhiondíola eile ar nós gruagairí agus pictiúrlanna

translation.en: Go at the times set aside for people cooking - check these times at your local supermarket
translation.ga: Dul ag na hamanna atá leagtha amach do dhaoine atá ag cocúnú – seiceáil na hamanna seo i d ’ ollmhargadh áitiúil

translation.en: Adhere to the guidelines for social separation, and stay 2 meters away from others
translation.ga: Coinneáil leis na treoirlínte maidir le scaradh sóisialta, agus fanacht amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Using services when social separation cannot be practiced
translation.ga: Ag úsáid seirbhísí nuair nach féidir scaradh sóisialta a chleachtadh

translation.en: Sometimes it will not be possible to practice social separation eg hairdresser.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh sé indéanta uaireanta, scaradh sóisialta a chleachtadh m.sh gruagaire.

translation.en: You must assess the risk before using these services.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tusa an baol a mheas sula n-úsáideann tú na seirbhísí seo.

translation.en: To reduce the risk:
translation.ga: Chun an baol a laghdú:

translation.en: Tell the service provider that you are coaxing when booking your appointment
translation.ga: Abair leis an soláthróir seirbhíse go bhfuil tú ag cocúnú nuair a bhíonn tú ag cur do choinne in áirithe

translation.en: Don't go to places like this too often
translation.ga: Ná téigh go dtí áiteanna mar seo ró-mhinic

translation.en: Spend as little time as possible in these places
translation.ga: Caith an méid is lú ama agus is féidir sna háiteanna seo

translation.en: Arrange your appointment at a time and day when there will be few people
translation.ga: Socraigh do choinne ag am agus lá nach mbeidh mórán daoine ann

translation.en: Make sure the business follows national hygiene guidelines and understands your needs
translation.ga: Déan cinnte go bhfuil an gnó ag leanacht na treorach náisiúnta maidir le sláinteachas agus go dtuigeann siad do chuid riachtanas

translation.en: Wear a face cover
translation.ga: Caith clúdach aghaidhe

translation.en: Wash your hands when you go home
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha nuair a théann tú abhaile

translation.en: Get help while cooking
translation.ga: Faigh cúnamh agus tú ag cocúnú

translation.en: There are community supports for people who are cocooning.
translation.ga: Tá tacaíochtaí pobail do dhaoine atá ag cocúnú.

translation.en: Assistance is also available to collect these items
translation.ga: Tá cúnamh ar fáil freisin chun na nithe seo a bhailiúhe

translation.en: Groceries,
translation.ga: Earraí grósaera,

translation.en: Medication
translation.ga: Cógais a

translation.en: Other essentials:
translation.ga: Nithe riachtanacha eile:

translation.en: In some cases help is also available to get relief from social separation.
translation.ga: I roinnt cásanna tá cúnamh ar fáil freisin chun faoiseamh a fháil ón scaradh sóisialta.

translation.en: Medications and prescriptions
translation.ga: Cógais agus oidis dochtúra

translation.en: Changes have been made to make it easier for you to find your medicines and prescriptions.
translation.ga: Rinneadh athruithe chun go mbeadh sé níos éasca duit do chógais agus oidis a fháil.

translation.en: Long term residential care
translation.ga: Cúram cónaitheacha fadthéarmach

translation.en: If you live in a long-term residential center, talk to your caregiver about short walks or fitness.
translation.ga: Má tá cónaí ort in ionad cónaitheach fadthéarmach, labhair le do chúramóir faoi shiúl gearr nó aclaíocht.

translation.en: They will be able to help you decide which option is safe for you
translation.ga: Beidh siad in ann cabhrú leat cinneadh a dhéanamh faoin rogha atá sábháilte duit

translation.en: If your carer comes to visit you.
translation.ga: Má thagann do chúramóir ar cuairt chugat.

translation.en: Continue with visits from people who help you with your daily needs.
translation.ga: Lean ar aghaidh le cuairteanna ó dhaoine a thugann cúnamh duit le do riachtanais laethúla.

translation.en: These include:
translation.ga: I measc na ndaoine sin tá:

translation.en: Health care workers
translation.ga: Cúramóirí sláinte

translation.en: Personal carers and
translation.ga: Cúramóirí pearsanta agus

translation.en: Social carers.
translation.ga: Cúramóirí sóisialta.

translation.en: These people can visit you if they have no symptoms of the disease
translation.ga: Is féidir leis na daoine seo cuairt a thabhairt ort mura bhfuil comharthaí an ghalair orthu

translation.en: When carers visit, they should:
translation.ga: Nuair a thagann cúramóirí ar cuairt, ba chóir dóibh:

translation.en: Wash his hands first.
translation.ga: A lámha a ní ar dtús.

translation.en: Wash their hands often while in your house.
translation.ga: A lámha a ní go minic agus iad i do theach.

translation.en: Stay 2 meters away, if possible.
translation.ga: Fanacht amach 2 mhéadar uait, más féidir.

translation.en: If your carer develops symptoms of the disease
translation.ga: Má thagann comharthaí an ghalair ar do chúramóir

translation.en: If a carer develops symptoms of the disease, they will not be able to look after you if they become ill.
translation.ga: Má thagann comharthaí an ghalair ar chúramóir, ní bheidh siad ábalta breathnú i do dhiaidh má bhíonn siad tinn.

translation.en: They should stay away from you until:
translation.ga: Ba chóir dóibh fanacht amach uait go dtí:

translation.en: 5 days without fever
translation.ga: 5 lá gan fiabhras

translation.en: 14 days without symptoms of the disease
translation.ga: 14 lá gan comharthaí an ghalair

translation.en: Contact your carer's organizer to find you another carer.
translation.ga: Déan teagmháil leis an té a d ’ eagraigh do chúramóir chun cúramóir eile a fháil duit.

translation.en: You should have a list of other people who would look after you if your primary carer became ill
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit liosta a bheith agat de dhaoine eile a thabharfadh aire duit dá n-éireodh do phríomh-chúramóir tinn

translation.en: If you are cooking and others in the house with you
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag cocúnú agus daoine eile sa teach leat

translation.en: Although difficult, you should avoid all unnecessary contact with people in the house when cooking.
translation.ga: Cé go bhfuil sé deacair, ba chóir duit gach teagmháil nach bhfuil gá leis a sheachaint le daoine sa teach nuair a bhíonn tú ag cocúnú.

translation.en: Anyone in the house must cook if:
translation.ga: Ní mór d ’ aon duine sa teach cocúnú má:

translation.en: They are over 70 years old
translation.ga: Tá siad os cionn 70 bliain d ’ aois

translation.en: They have any of the diseases that could put them at high risk from the coronavirus
translation.ga: Tá aon cheann de na galair orthu a d ’ fhéadfadh iad a chur i mbaol mór ón gcoróinvíreas

translation.en: If someone else in the house is under 70 and they don ’ t have any illness that would endanger them, they don ’ t need to cocoon.
translation.ga: Má tá duine eile sa teach faoi 70 agus nach bhfuil aon tinneas orthu a chuirfeadh i mbaol iad, ní gá dóibh cocúnú.

translation.en: They can help you stay safe if:
translation.ga: Is féidir leo cabhrú leatsa fanacht slán má:

translation.en: They follow the advice on social separation and hand hygiene at home.
translation.ga: Leanann siad an chomhairle maidir le scaradh sóisialta agus glaineacht lámh sa mbaile.

translation.en: They spend as little time as possible in rooms with others, for example, in the kitchen and seating areas
translation.ga: Chaitheann siad an méid is lú ama agus is féidir i seomraí le daoine eile, mar shampla, sa chistin agus áiteanna suí

translation.en: Windows are opened to release fresh air into the shared spaces
translation.ga: Osclaítear fuinneoga chun aer úr a scaoileadh isteach sna spásanna roinnte

translation.en: They use their own towel to dry their hands and crockery
translation.ga: Úsáideann siad a dtuáille féin chun a lámha agus gréithre a thriomú

translation.en: Cutlery, utensils, pots and skillets are thoroughly cleaned
translation.ga: Ghlantar sceanra, soithí, potaí agus scilléid go maith

translation.en: A bathroom is well cleaned by others every time it is used, for example, all surfaces on which you have placed your hand
translation.ga: Ghlantar go maith seomra folctha a usáideann daoine eile gach uair a úsáidtear é, mar shampla, gach dromchla ar a leag tú do lámh

translation.en: Clean everything and hand-painted surfaces (eg door handles, kettles and phones) with your normal cleaning products
translation.ga: Ghlantar gach rud agus dromchla ar a leagtar lámh go minic (m.sh. lámha doirse, citil agus fóin) le do ghnáth tháirgí glantacháin

translation.en: Staying safe and sound
translation.ga: Ag fanacht slán agus folláin

translation.en: Staying at home and having little contact with others is difficult.
translation.ga: Bíonn sé deacair fanacht sa bhaile agus gan mórán teagmhála a bheith agat le daoine eile.

translation.en: It can affect your mood or emotions.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh sé cur isteach ar do ghiúmar nó ar do mhothúcháin.

translation.en: You may have low mood, anxiety or difficulty sleeping.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh ísle brí, imní nó deacrachtaí codlata a bheith agat.

translation.en: Things you can do to stay healthy:
translation.ga: Rudaí ar féidir leat a dhéanamh chun fanacht folláin:

translation.en: Move around - get up and move around as much as possible
translation.ga: Bog timpeall – éirigh suas agus bog timpeall an oiread agus is féidir

translation.en: Go for a walk or meet outdoors but stay 2 meters away from others
translation.ga: Téigh ag siúl nó buail le daoine lasmuigh ach fan amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Follow our advice on fitness at home
translation.ga: Lean ár gcomhairle maidir le aclaíocht sa teach

translation.en: Continue with your daily activities, as usual.
translation.ga: Lean ar aghaidh le do chuid gníomhaíochtaí laethúla, mar is gnách.

translation.en: Stay in touch with your friends or relatives over the phone or on social media
translation.ga: Fan i dteagmháil le do chairde nó gaolta ar an bhfón nó ar na meáin shóisialta

translation.en: If you have no work, or less work than before
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil aon obair agat, nó níos lú oibre ná riamh

translation.en: Your employer may have closed their business and sent you home.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir gur dhún d’fhostóir a ghnó agus gur cuireadh abhaile tú.

translation.en: Where this is temporary, this is called a temporary layoff.
translation.ga: Nuair atá sé seo sealadach, tugtar asleagan sealadach air seo.

translation.en: If it is permanent, you may be made redundant.
translation.ga: Má tá sé buan, féadfar go ndéanfar iomarcach tú.

translation.en: Employment Wage Subsidy Scheme
translation.ga: Scéim Fóirdheontais Pá Fostaíochta

translation.en: Your employer may be able to continue to pay you under the Employment Wage Subsidy Scheme (EWSS) and if so, you do not need to apply for a social welfare payment.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir go mbeidh d’fhostóir in ann leanúint le tú a íoc faoin Scéim Fóirdheontais Pá Fostaíochta (EWSS) agus má tá, ní gá duit iarratas a dhéanamh ar íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh.

translation.en: You cannot apply for EWSS yourself, it is administered by Revenue through your employer’s payroll.
translation.ga: Ní féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh ar EWSS tú féin, déanann na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim é a riaradh trí phárolla d’fhostóra.

translation.en: The EWSS replaced the COVID19 Temporary Wage Subsidy Scheme on 1 September 2020.
translation.ga: Tháinig an EWSS in ionad Scéim Fóirdheontais Pá Shealadach COVID19 an 1 Meán Fómhair 2020.

translation.en: If you were getting a Working Family Payment, this will continue while you are being paid under the EWSS.
translation.ga: Má bhí Íocaíocht do Teaghlaigh i bhfostaíocht á fáil agat, leanfaidh sé seo ar aghaidh agus tú á íoc faoin EWSS.

translation.en: COVID19 Pandemic Unemployment Payment
translation.ga: Íocaíocht Dífhostaíochta Phaindéimeach COVID19

translation.en: The COVID19 Pandemic Unemployment Payment (PUP) is for employees and selfemployed people living in Ireland who have lost their employment due to COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá Íocaíocht Dífhostaíochta Phaindéimeach COVID19 (PUP) ann d’fhostaithe agus do dhaoine féinfhostaithe atá ina gcónaí in Éirinn agus a chaill a gcuid fostaíochta mar gheall ar COVID19.

translation.en: If you lost your job for another reason, you can apply for a jobseeker’s payment.
translation.ga: Má chaill tú do phost ar chúis eile, féadfaidh tú iarratas a dhéanamh ar íocaíocht cuardaitheora poist.

translation.en: You can get PUP if you are on a temporary layoff from employment, or if you have been made redundant.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú PUP a fháil má tá tú ar asleagan sealadach ón bhfostaíocht, nó má rinneadh iomarcach tú.

translation.en: PUP is available to any registered employee or selfemployed worker who has lost all of their work because of COVID19 and is resident in Ireland.
translation.ga: Tá PUP ar fáil d’aon fhostaí cláraithe nó oibrí féinfhostaithe a chaill a gcuid oibre go léir mar gheall ar COVID19 agus a bhfuil cónaí air in Éirinn.

translation.en: This includes people on student visas and asylum seekers.
translation.ga: Cuimsíonn sé seo daoine ar víosaí mac léinn agus iarrthóirí tearmainn.

translation.en: If you have dependents, you may get a higher payment by applying for a jobseeker’s payment.
translation.ga: Má tá cleithiúnaithe agat, féadfaidh tú íocaíocht níos airde a fháil trí iarratas a dhéanamh ar íocaíocht cuardaitheora poist.

translation.en: You must be genuinely seeking work to qualify for PUP.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú a bheith ag lorg oibre i ndáiríre chun cáiliú do PUP.

translation.en: Jobseeker’s Allowance and Jobseeker’s Benefit
translation.ga: Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist agus Sochar Cuardaitheora Poist

translation.en: If you have lost your job and have dependents, you may get a higher payment if you apply for Jobseeker’s Benefit (JB) or Jobseeker's Allowance (JA) instead of PUP.
translation.ga: Má chaill tú do phost agus má tá cleithiúnaithe agat, féadfaidh tú íocaíocht níos airde a fháil má dhéanann tú iarratas ar Shochar Cuardaitheora Poist (JB) nó Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist (JA) in ionad PUP.

translation.en: This is because PUP does not pay anything extra for dependents.
translation.ga: Tarlaíonn sé seo toisc nach níocann PUP aon rud breise le haghaidh cleithiúnaithe.

translation.en: A dependent can be your spouse or partner if they are earning less than €350 per week, or children under 18, or under 22 and in full time education.
translation.ga: Is féidir do chéile nó do pháirtí nó leanaí faoi 18, nó faoi 22 agus in oideachas lánaimseartha a bheith mar chleithiúnaí má tá siad ag tuilleamh níos lú ná €350 in aghaidh na seachtaine.

translation.en: If you were selfemployed, you can claim Jobseeker’s Benefit (SelfEmployed) instead of JB.
translation.ga: Má bhí tú féinfhostaithe, féadfaidh tú Sochar Cuardaitheora Poist (Féinfhostaithe) a éileamh in ionad JB.

translation.en: Rates for adult dependents have increased temporarily.
translation.ga: Tá méadú sealadach tagtha ar rátaí do chleithiúnaithe fásta.

translation.en: See 'adult dependent increases' below for more details.
translation.ga: Féach ‘méaduithe do chleithiúnacha fásta’ thíos le haghaidh tuilleadh sonraí.

translation.en: JB is based on your PRSI contributions.
translation.ga: Tá JB bunaithe ar do chuid ranníocaíochtaí ÁSPC.

translation.en: JA is means tested.
translation.ga: Déantar tástáil acmhainne ar JA.

translation.en: You apply for both payments at the same time and the Department decides which one you qualify for.
translation.ga: Déanann tú iarratas ar an dá íocaíocht ag an am céanna agus socraíonn an Roinn cén ceann lena cháilíonn tú.

translation.en: If the number of days you work have decreased, you may be entitled to Short Time Work Support.
translation.ga: Má tá laghdú tagtha ar líon na laethanta a oibríonn tú, d’fhéadfadh go mbeadh tú i dteideal Tacaíochta Oibre Gearrama.

translation.en: You must be unemployed for 3 days per week (excluding Sunday) to qualify for this.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú a bheith dífhostaithe ar feadh 3 lá sa tseachtain (seachas Dé Domhnaigh) chun cáiliú dó seo.

translation.en: You can get this even if your employer is paying you through the Employment Wage Subsidy Scheme (EWSS).
translation.ga: Is féidir leat é seo a fháil fiú má tá d’fhostóir á d'íoc tríd an Scéim Fóirdheontais Pá Fostaíochta (EWSS).

translation.en: If your hours have been reduced but you continue to work for more than 3 days per week (for example, you have been asked to work 5 mornings per week), you may qualify for Supplementary Welfare Allowance.
translation.ga: Má laghdaíodh d’uaireanta ach má leanann tú ag obair ar feadh níos mó ná 3 lá sa tseachtain (mar shampla, iarradh ort 5 mhaidin a oibriú in aghaidh na seachtaine), d’fhéadfá cáiliú le haghaidh Liúntas Leasa Forlíontach.

translation.en: Family payments
translation.ga: Íocaíochtaí teaghlaigh

translation.en: If you are parenting alone you may be entitled to OneParent Family Payment.
translation.ga: Má tá tú i do thuismitheoir aonair b’fhéidir go mbeidh tú i dteideal Íocaíocht Teaghlaigh do Thuismitheoir Aonair.

translation.en: The other parent of your child may have reduced the maintenance they pay to support your child.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh gur laghdaigh tuismitheoir eile do linbh méid na cothabhála a íocann siad chun tacú le do leanbh.

translation.en: You should notify your local Intreo centre in this case.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit d’ionad Intreo áitiúil a chur ar an eolas sa chás seo.

translation.en: You can get an increase to your payment for up to 12 weeks.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú méadú ar d’íocaíocht a fháil ar feadh suas le 12 seachtain.

translation.en: After this, you payment will be reassessed.
translation.ga: Tar éis seo, déanfar d’íocaíocht a athmheasúnú.

translation.en: You should also check if you qualify for Working Family Payment if you have dependent children and your hours or pay have been reduced.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit seiceáil freisin an gcáilíonn tú d’Íocaíocht do Theaghlach atá i bhFostaíocht má tá leanaí cleithiúnacha agat agus má laghdaíodh d’uaireanta nó do phá.

translation.en: If you are pregnant and getting PUP or being paid through the Employment Wage Subsidy Scheme (EWSS), you can still apply for Maternity Benefit, Parent's Benefit and Paternity Benefit.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag iompar clainne agus ag fáil PUP nó á íoc tríd an Scéim Fóirdheontais Pá Fostaíochta (EWSS), is féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh fós ar Shochar Máithreachais, ar Shochar Tuismitheora agus ar Shochar Atharthachta.

translation.en: The time you spend on PUP or being paid through TWSS or EWSS is treated the same as a period of employment.
translation.ga: Caitear leis an am a chaitheann tú ar PUP nó á níoc trí TWSS nó EWSS mar thréimhse fostaíochta.

translation.en: If you are receiving PUP and have not returned to work before you are due to start your maternity leave, you should ask your GP to complete form MB3 (pdf).
translation.ga: Má tá PUP á fáil agat agus mura bhfilleann tú ar an obair sula mbeidh tú chun do shaoire mháithreachais a thosú, ba cheart duit iarraidh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh foirm MB3 (pdf) a chomhlánú.

translation.en: Asking for a review of your payment
translation.ga: Ag lorg athbhreithniú ar d’íocaíocht

translation.en: If you work and also get a social welfare payment, and your hours or income from work have decreased, you can ask for your payment to be reassessed.
translation.ga: Má oibríonn tú agus má fhaigheann tú íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh freisin, agus laghdú tagtha ar d’uaireanta nó d’ioncam ón obair, féadfaidh tú a iarraidh go ndéanfar d’íocaíocht a athmheas.

translation.en: If you lose all of your work, you can apply for PUP.
translation.ga: Má chailleann tú do chuid oibre go léir, féadfaidh tú iarratas a dhéanamh ar PUP.

translation.en: You can continue to get both Working Family Payment and OneParent Family Payment with your PUP.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú leanúint le hÍocaíocht do Teaghlach i bhFostaíocht agus Íocaíocht Teaghlaigh Tuismitheora Aonair a fháil chomh maith le do PUP.

translation.en: If you cannot work because you are sick
translation.ga: Mura féidir leat obair a dhéanamh toisc go bhfuil tú tinn

translation.en: If you are ill with COVID19, you can get a special form of enhanced Illness Benefit for COVID19 absences.
translation.ga: Má tá tú tinn le COVID19, féadfaidh tú foirm speisialta de Shochar Breoiteachta feabhsaithe le haghaidh neamhláithreachtaí COVID19 a fháil.

translation.en: You can claim this payment if:
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú an íocaíocht seo a éileamh más rud é:

translation.en: You are diagnosed with COVID19 or
translation.ga: Go bhfaigheann tú diagnóis COVID19 nó

translation.en: You are suspected of having COVID19 and have been told to selfisolate or restrict your movements by a doctor or the HSE
translation.ga: Go bhfuil amhras ann go bhfuil COVID19 agat agus deir dochtúir nó FSS leat do ghluaiseachtaí a shrianadh nó go gcaithfidh tú féinaonrú

translation.en: You must be in employment or selfemployment to qualify.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú a bheith i bhfostaíocht nó i bhféinfhostaíocht chun cáiliú.

translation.en: If you have been told to selfisolate or restrict your movements, you will get Illness Benefit for COVID19 absences for 2 weeks.
translation.ga: Má dúradh leat do ghluaiseachtaí a a shrianadh nó go gcaithfidh tú féinaonrú, gheobhaidh tú Sochar Breoiteachta so neamhláithreachtaí COVID19 ar feadh coicíse.

translation.en: If you have been diagnosed with COVID19, you will get up to 10 weeks of the payment.
translation.ga: Má fuair tú diagnóis COVID19, gheobhaidh tú suas le 10 seachtaine den íocaíocht.

translation.en: If you do not qualify for Illness Benefit for COVID19 absences, you may be able to receive Supplementary Welfare Allowance instead.
translation.ga: Mura gcáilíonn tú le haghaidh Sochar Breoiteachta do neamhláithreachtaí COVID19, b’fhéidir go mbeidh tú in ann Liúntas Leasa Forlíontach a fháil ina ionad.

translation.en: Illness Benefit for COVID19 absences is paid from the first day of sickness.
translation.ga: Íoctar Sochar Breoiteachta as neamhláithreachtaí COVID19 ón gcéad lá breoiteachta.

translation.en: If you cannot attend work due to illness that is not COVID19, or if you cannot go to work because you are cocooning, you can apply for standard Illness Benefit.
translation.ga: Mura féidir leat freastal ar obair mar gheall ar bhreoiteacht nach COVID19 é, nó mura féidir leat dul ag obair toisc go bhfuil tú ag cócúnú, is féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh ar Ghnáthshochar Breoiteachta.

translation.en: If your income is a mix of social welfare and pay from employment, you can continue to get your usual social welfare payment if you become sick or have to selfisolate.
translation.ga: Más meascán d’ioncam sóisialta agus pá ó fhostaíocht é d’ioncam, féadfaidh tú leanúint de do ghnáthíocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh a fháil má éiríonn tú tinn nó má bhíonn ort féinaonrú.

translation.en: If your income is less than the rate of enhanced Illness Benefit you would get, you can apply to have your income topped up to this rate.
translation.ga: Má tá d’ioncam níos lú ná an ráta Sochair Breoiteachta feabhsaithe a gheofá, is féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh go gcuirfí le d’ioncam go dtí an ráta seo.

translation.en: This top up will not affect the other payments.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh tionchar ag an mbreisiú seo ar na híocaíochtaí eile.

translation.en: If you work in the civil and public sector, you do not need to apply for Illness Benefit for COVID19 absences as separate leave arrangements are in place.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag obair san earnáil shibhialta agus phoiblí, ní gá duit iarratas a dhéanamh ar Shochar Breoiteachta le haghaidh neamhláithreachtaí COVID19 toisc go bhfuil socruithe saoire ar leithligh i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: If you cannot work because you have to look after children
translation.ga: Mura féidir leat obair toisc go gcaithfidh tú aire a thabhairt do leanaí

translation.en: If you cannot go to work because you have to look after your children, your employer may be able to continue to pay you under the Employment Wage Subsidy Scheme.
translation.ga: Mura féidir leat dul ag obair toisc go gcaithfidh tú aire a thabhairt do do leanaí, b’fhéidir go mbeidh d’fhostóir in ann leanúint le tú a íoc faoin Scéim Fóirdheontais Pá Fostaíochta.

translation.en: The Government has asked employers to be as flexible as possible in allowing staff time off to look after their children or other members of their families.
translation.ga: D'iarr an Rialtas ar fhostóirí a bheith chomh solúbtha agus is féidir maidir le ham saor a thabhairt don fhoireann chun aire a thabhairt dá leanaí nó do bhaill eile dá dteaghlaigh.

translation.en: If you left work to care for a child or another member of your family, you can get information and advice on the social welfare payments that may be available to you.
translation.ga: Má d’fhág tú do chuid oibre chun aire a thabhairt do leanbh nó do bhall eile de do theaghlach, féadfaidh tú faisnéis agus comhairle a fháil faoi na híocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh a d’fhéadfadh a bheith ar fáil duit.

translation.en: Contact your local Citizens Information Centre or the Citizens Information Phone Service on 0761 07 4000.
translation.ga: Téigh i dteagmháil le d’Ionad Faisnéise Saoránach áitiúil nó leis an tSeirbhís Faisnéise Fóin do Shaoránaigh ar 0761 07 4000.

translation.en: You can also contact the Department of Social Protection using MyWelfare or call 1890 800 024.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat teagmháil a dhéanamh freisin leis an Roinn Cosanta Sóisialta trí MyWelfare a úsáid nó cuir glaoch ar 1890 800 024.

translation.en: If you plan to take a holiday
translation.ga: Má ta sé ar intinn agat dul ar saoire

translation.en: If you are getting a jobseeker’s payment or the COVID19 Pandemic Unemployment Payment, you can go on holiday on the island of Ireland (this includes Northern Ireland) for up to 2 weeks and get your payment on your return.
translation.ga: Má tá íocaíocht cuardaitheora poist nó Íocaíocht Dífhostaíochta Phaindéimeach COVID19 á fáil agat, féadfaidh tú dul ar saoire ar oileán na hÉireann (lena náirítear Tuaisceart Éireann) ar feadh suas le coicís agus d’íocaíocht a fháil ar fhilleadh duit.

translation.en: The Government advises that you should not travel abroad except for essential reasons, for example, a bereavement or urgent family business.
translation.ga: Molann an Rialtas nár cheart duit taisteal thar lear ach ar chúiseanna riachtanacha, mar shampla, méala nó gnó práinneach teaghlaigh.

translation.en: If you cannot pay your rent
translation.ga: Mura féidir leat do chíos a íoc

translation.en: If you are having difficulty paying rent, you may be able to claim:
translation.ga: Má bhíonn deacracht agat do chíos a íoc, b’fhéidir go mbeidh tú in ann éileamh a dhéanamh ar:

translation.en: Rent Supplement or
translation.ga: Fóirdheontas Cíosa nó

translation.en: Housing Assistance Payment (HAP)
translation.ga: Íocaíocht Cúnaimh Tithíochta

translation.en: Rent Supplement is a shortterm income support to people in the private rented sector who are finding it difficult to pay their rent.
translation.ga: Is tacaíocht ioncaim ghearrthéarmach é Forlíonadh Cíosa do dhaoine san earnáil phríobháideach cíosa a mbíonn sé deacair orthu a gcíos a íoc.

translation.en: Rent Supplement means assessments have changed to allow for the higher rates of payments that claimants get with PUP and enhanced Illness Benefit.
translation.ga: Athraíodh tástálacha maoine um Fhorlíonadh Cíosa chun rátaí níos airde íocaíochtaí d' éilitheoirí PUP agus Sochair Bhreoiteachta fheabhsaithe a cheadú.

translation.en: This applies for applications lodged between 13 March 2020 and 30 June 2021.
translation.ga: Baineann sé seo le hiarratais idir 13 Márta agus 31 Márta 2021.

translation.en: You can read more about how Rent Supplement is assessed.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat níos mó a léamh faoin gcaoi a ndéantar Forlíonadh Cíosa a mheas.

translation.en: You may be able to get HAP from your local authority if you are assessed as having a housing need.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir go mbeidh tú in ann HAP a fháil ó d’údarás áitiúil má mheastar go bhfuil riachtanas tithíochta agat.

translation.en: You have to apply to your local authority’s housing section to be included on the housing list.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú iarratas a dhéanamh ar rannóg tithíochta d’údaráis áitiúil le bheith ar an liosta tithíochta.

translation.en: It is based on your means and is paid directly to your private landlord.
translation.ga: Tá sé bunaithe ar d’acmhainn agus íoctar go díreach é le do thiarna talún príobháideach.

translation.en: Going back to work
translation.ga: Ag filleadh ar an obair

translation.en: If you are returning to work you must close your COVID19 Pandemic Unemployment Payment (PUP) claim.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag filleadh ar obair ní mór duit d’éileamh ar Íocaíocht Dífhostaíochta Phaindéimeach COVID19 (PUP) a dhúnadh.

translation.en: You can do this is on MyWelfare.ie.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat é seo a dhéanamh ar mywelfare.ie.

translation.en: If you are returning to work and your hours have been reduced, you may be entitled to keep or claim another social welfare payment:
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag filleadh ar an obair agus do chuid uaireanta laghdaithe ag d'fhostóir, b’fhéidir go mbeidh tú i dteideal íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh eile a choinneáil nó a éileamh:

translation.en: Short Time Work Support if you will work 3 days or fewer
translation.ga: Tacaíocht Oibre Gearrama má oibreoidh tú 3 lá nó níos lú

translation.en: Working Family Payment if you have dependent children and will work more than 38 hours per fortnight
translation.ga: Íocaíocht do Theaghlaigh atá i bhFostaíocht má tá leanaí cleithiúnacha agat agus oibreoidh tú níos mó ná 38 uair in aghaidh na coicíse

translation.en: Supplementary Welfare Allowance if you work more than 3 days (for example, you work 5 mornings) and are earning less than the basic social welfare rate for your family size
translation.ga: Liúntas Leasa Forlíontach má oibríonn tú níos mó ná 3 lá (mar shampla, má oibríonn tú 5 mhaidin) agus má tá tú ag tuilleamh níos lú ná an bunráta leasa shóisialaigh do mhéid do theaghlaigh

translation.en: Rent Supplement based on your means
translation.ga: Forlíonadh Cíosa bunaithe ar d’acmhainn

translation.en: All of the above, except for Short Time Work Support, depend on how much you earn from your employment.
translation.ga: Braitheann gach ceann díobh thuas, seachas Tacaíocht Oibre Gearrama, ar an méid a thuilleann tú as d’fhostaíocht.

translation.en: Social welfare options when returning to work are described in more detail in our section on social welfare payments and work.
translation.ga: Déantar cur síos níos mionsonraithe ar roghanna leasa shóisialaigh dóibh siúd ata ag filleadh ar obair inár gcuid ar íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh agus obair.

translation.en: Collecting your social welfare payment
translation.ga: D’íocaíochta leasa shóisialaigh a bhailiú

translation.en: If you are unable to collect your payment from the post offices due to illness or selfisolation, you can:
translation.ga: Mura féidir leat d’íocaíocht a bhailiú ó na hoifigí poist mar gheall ar bhreoiteacht nó féinaonrú, is féidir leat:

translation.en: Leave your social welfare payment at the post office until you can collect it yourself.
translation.ga: D’íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh a fhágáil ag oifig an phoist go dtí go mbeidh tú féin in ann í a bhailiú.

translation.en: Your payment will be in the post office for at least 20 days after you were first due to collect it.
translation.ga: Beidh d’íocaíocht in oifig an phoist ar feadh 20 lá ar a laghad tar éis an chéad dáta bailithe.

translation.en: Nominate a temporary Agent to collect your payment.
translation.ga: Ainmnigh Gníomhaire sealadach chun d’íocaíocht a bhailiú.

translation.en: You can get a form for appointing a temporary Agent on the An Post website (pdf).
translation.ga: Is féidir leat foirm chun Gníomhaire sealadach a cheapadh a fháil ar Láithreán Gréasáin An Post (pdf).

translation.en: Apply to transfer your payment to your financial institution using form DIR PMT1 (pdf).
translation.ga: Déan iarratas ar d’íocaíocht a aistriú chuig d’institiúid airgeadais ag úsáid foirm DIR PMT1 (pdf).

translation.en: Your social welfare payment can be paid directly into your personal account at a bank, building society or at certain credit unions.
translation.ga: Is féidir d’íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh a íoc go díreach isteach i do chuntas pearsanta ag banc, cumann foirgníochta nó ag comhair chreidmheasa áirithe.

translation.en: You can use your expired Public Services Card for ID when collecting your social welfare payment.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú do Chárta Seirbhísí Poiblí atá imithe in éag a úsáid le haghaidh aitheantais agus d’íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh á bailiú agat.

translation.en: PRSI contributions
translation.ga: Ranníocaíochtaí ÁSPC

translation.en: If you are getting the COVID19 Pandemic Unemployment Payment or you are being paid under the Employment Wage Subsidy Scheme, when you apply for social insurance payments (for example, Maternity Benefit, Adoptive Benefit and the State Pension (Contributory), you will be treated as if you have been paying insurance contributions based on the social insurance class you were paying before you stopped working.
translation.ga: Má tá Íocaíocht Dífhostaíochta Phaindéimeach COVID19 á fháil agat nó má tá tú á íoc faoin Scéim Fóirdheontais Pá Fostaíochta, nuair a dhéanann tú iarratas ar íocaíochtaí árachais shóisialaigh (mar shampla, Sochar Máithreachais, Sochar Uchtála agus an Pinsean Stáit (Ranníocach), caithfear leat amhail is go raibh tú ag íoc ranníocaíochtaí árachais bunaithe ar an aicme árachais shóisialta a bhí á íoc agat sular stop tú ag obair.

translation.en: Free Travel Scheme
translation.ga: An Scéim Saorthaistil

translation.en: The National Transport Authority (NTA) has confirmed that all transport operators are now allowing customers with a PSC Free Travel Card to continue to avail of the Free Travel Scheme, even if their card has expired.
translation.ga: Dheimhnigh an tÚdarás Náisiúnta Iompair (NTA) go bhfuil gach oibreoir iompair anois ag ligean do chustaiméirí a bhfuil Cárta Saorthaistil PSC orthu leas a bhaint as an Scéim Saorthaistil fós, fiú má tá an cárta imithe in éag.

translation.en: Intreo centres
translation.ga: Ionaid Intreo

translation.en: You can find out when Intreo centres and branch offices are open to the public on gov.ie.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat cathain a bhíonn ionaid Intreo agus oifigí brainse oscailte don phobal a fháil amach ar gov.ie.

translation.en: You can continue to contact your Intreo centre or Social Welfare Branch Office by phone or email.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú leanúint ag dul i teagmháil le d’ionad Intreo nó d’Oifig Brainse Leasa Shóisialaigh ar an bhfón nó trí rphost.

translation.en: If you have coronavirus symptoms or you have been medically required to selfisolate, you should not visit an Intreo Centre or local Social Welfare Branch Office.
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí coróinvíris ort nó má iarradh liachleachtóir ort féinaonrú, níor cheart duit cuairt a thabhairt ar Ionad Intreo nó ar an Oifig Brainse Leasa Shóisialaigh áitiúil.

translation.en: Your employment rights during COVID19
translation.ga: Do chearta fostaíochta le linn COVID19

translation.en: This page gives an overview of the protections for employees during COVID19 and the supports you may be entitled to.
translation.ga: Tugann an doiciméad seo breacchuntas ar do chearta fostaíochta le linn na paindéime.

translation.en: If you are worried about returning to work
translation.ga: Má tá imní ort faoi fhilleadh ar an obair

translation.en: If your employer has no work for you, or less work than usual
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil aon obair ag d’fhostóir duit, nó níos lú oibre ná mar is gnách

translation.en: If your employer has closed their business during COVID19 restrictions and sent you home, this is called a temporary layoff.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir gur dhún d’fhostóir a ghnó le linn shrianta COVID19 agus gur sheol sé abhaile tú, tugtar asleagan sealadach air seo.

translation.en: During lay off you remain an employee even if you are not being paid.
translation.ga: Fanann tú i d’fhostaí le linn asleagain fiú mura bhfuil tú á íoc.

translation.en: Find out more about layoff and short time working.
translation.ga: Faigh tuilleadh eolais faoi asleagan agus obair ghearrama.

translation.en: Employers can use the Employment Wage Subsidy Scheme to help them with some of the costs of paying wages.
translation.ga: Is féidir le fostóirí an Scéim Fóirdheontais Pá Fostaíochta COVID19 a úsáid chun cabhrú leo le cuid de na costais a bhaineann le pá a íoc.

translation.en: This means that workers retain their link with employers and they do not need to personally submit a jobseeker's claim.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo go gcoinníonn oibrithe a nasc lena bhfostóirí agus nach gá dóibh féin éileamh cuardaitheora poist a dhéanamh.

translation.en: If your employer cannot pay you and you have lost all your employment, you should apply for the COVID19 Pandemic Unemployment Payment.
translation.ga: Murar féidir le d’fhostóir tú a íoc agus má chaill tú d’fhostaíocht go léir, féadfaidh tú iarratas a dhéanamh ar an Íocaíocht Dífhostaíochta Phaindéimeach COVID19.

translation.en: If your employer reduces your hours to 3 days or less per week from your normal fulltime hours, you can apply for a payment called Short Time Work Support which is a form of Jobseeker’s Benefit.
translation.ga: Má laghdaíonn d’fhostóir d’uaireanta go 3 lá in aghaidh na seachtaine nó níos lú ó do ghnáthuaireanta lánaimseartha, féadfaidh tú iarratas a dhéanamh ar íocaíocht ar a dtugtar Tacaíocht Oibre Gearrama ar cineál Sochair Cuardaitheora Poist é.

translation.en: Your employer can also put you on shorttime working which is a more formal procedure and applies where, due to a reduction in the amount of work to be done, either:
translation.ga: Féadann d’fhostóir tú a chur ar obair ghearrama ar nós imeachta níos foirmiúla é agus a bhaineann leis an gcás seo a leanas:

translation.en: Your weekly pay is less than half your normal weekly pay or
translation.ga: tá do phá seachtainiúil níos lú ná leath do ghnáthphá sheachtainiúil Mar gheall ar laghdú ar an méid oibre atá le déanamh, nó

translation.en: The hours you work are reduced to less than half your normal weekly working hours
translation.ga: Má laghdaítear d’uaireanta oibre go dtí níos lú ná leath do ghnáthuaireanta oibre seachtainiúla

translation.en: Annual leave and public holidays during lay off or shorttime working
translation.ga: Saoire bhliantúil agus saoirí poiblí le linn asleagain nó obair ghearrama

translation.en: During lay off or shorttime working, you are still employed by your employer and your contract of employment remains in force.
translation.ga: Le linn asleagain nó obair gearrama, tá tú fós fostaithe ag d’fhostóir agus fanann do chonradh fostaíochta i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: This means that you are entitled to benefit for any public holidays that occur during the first 13 weeks of lay off.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo go bhfuil tú i dteideal sochar a fháil d’aon saoire phoiblí a tharlaíonn le linn na chéad 13 seachtain den asleagan.

translation.en: You do not accrue annual leave during lay off but you are entitled to take annual leave that you accrued before being laid off.
translation.ga: Ní fhabhraíonn tú saoire bhliantúil le linn asleagain ach tá tú i dteideal saoire bhliantúil a fhabhraigh tú a ghlacadh roimh a tharlaíonn an asleagan.

translation.en: Changes to redundancy rules during COVID19
translation.ga: Athruithe ar rialacha iomarcaíochta le linn na tréimhse éigeandála COVID19

translation.en: The law on claiming redundancy from your employer if you have been temporarily laid off, or temporarily put on shorttime work has changed during the COVID19 emergency period.
translation.ga: Tá athrú an dlí maidir le hiomarcaíocht a éileamh ó d’fhostóir má rinneadh tú a asleagan go sealadach, nó má tugadh obair ghearrama ort go sealadach le linn na tréimhse éigeandála COVID19.

translation.en: Normally, if you are laid off or put on shorttime hours, you can claim redundancy from your employer after 4 weeks or more, or 6 weeks in the last 13 weeks.
translation.ga: De ghnáth, má dhéantar tú a asleagan nó má chuirtear ar uaireanta gearrama tú, féadfaidh tú iomarcaíocht a éileamh ó d’fhostóir tar éis 4 seachtaine nó níos mó, nó 6 seachtaine le linn an 13 seachtain anuas.

translation.en: If you were put on lay off or shorttime hours because of COVID19, you cannot claim redundancy.
translation.ga: Má rinneadh tú a asleagan nó a chur ar uaireanta gearrama mar gheall ar COVID19, ní féidir leat iomarcaíocht a éileamh.

translation.en: This is set out in the Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (COVID19) Act and applies from 13 March 2020.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo leagtha amach san Acht um Bearta Éigeandála ar mhaithe le Leas an Phobail (COVID19) agus tá feidhm aige ón 13 Márta 2020.

translation.en: If you are sick or have been asked to self isolate
translation.ga: Má tá tú tinn nó má iarradh ort féinaonrú

translation.en: If you are showing symptoms of COVID19, you should not go to work.
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí COVID19 á léiriú agat, níor chóir duit dul ag obair.

translation.en: You should contact your GP for advice.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit teagmháil a dhéanamh le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh chun comhairle a fháil.

translation.en: COVID19 symptoms are explained on the HSE website.
translation.ga: Mínítear comharthaí coróinvíreas ar láithreán Gréasáin FSS.

translation.en: If you are sick with COVID19, you may be entitled to sick pay from your employer.
translation.ga: Cé go bhfuil tú tinn le coronavirus, d’fhéadfadh go mbeadh tú i dteideal pá breoiteachta ó d’fhostóir.

translation.en: This depends on your contract of employment.
translation.ga: Braitheann sé seo ar do chonradh fostaíochta.

translation.en: Your employer does not have to pay you when you cannot come to work because you are sick with COVID19, unless it is part of your contract of employment.
translation.ga: Ní gá d’fhostóir tú a íoc nuair nach féidir leat teacht ag obair toisc go bhfuil tú tinn le coróinvíreas, murar cuid de do chonradh fostaíochta é.

translation.en: If your employer does not pay you, you should apply for COVID19 enhanced Illness Benefit from the Department of Social Protection.
translation.ga: Mura níocann d’fhostóir tú, ba cheart duit iarratas a dhéanamh ar Shochar Breoiteachta feabhsaithe COVID19 ón Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí.

translation.en: If you have to care for someone
translation.ga: Má tá ort aire a thabhairt do dhuine

translation.en: If you are not sick, but you cannot go to work because you have to care for a child or other relative, you can ask for paid leave.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil tú tinn, ach mura féidir leat dul ag obair toisc go gcaithfidh tú aire a thabhairt do leanbh nó do ghaol eile, féadfaidh tú saoire le pá a lorg.

translation.en: If your employer cannot give you paid leave, you can ask for statutory leave.
translation.ga: Mura féidir le d’fhostóir saoire le pá a thabhairt duit, féadfaidh tú saoire reachtúil a lorg.

translation.en: Statutory means that the leave is set out in law, for example, your right to parental leave.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn reachtúil go bhfuil an tsaoire leagtha amach sa dlí, mar shampla, do cheart chun saoire thuismitheora.

translation.en: Paid compassionate leave
translation.ga: Saoire atruach íoctha

translation.en: Employers have been asked to be as flexible as possible in assisting employees with care arrangements during the pandemic.
translation.ga: Iarradh ar fhostóirí a bheith chomh solúbtha agus is féidir maidir le cuidiú le fostaithe le socruithe cúraim le linn na paindéime.

translation.en: This could include:
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh go gcuimseodh sé seo:

translation.en: Offering paid compassionate leave
translation.ga: Saoire atruach íoctha a thairiscint

translation.en: Allowing you to work from home
translation.ga: Ag ligean duit oibriú ón mbaile

translation.en: Altering your shifts, so that you can coordinate caring between you and your partner, or another person.
translation.ga: Sealanna athruithe, ionas gur féidir leat cúram a chomhordú idir tú féin agus do pháirtí, nó duine eile.

translation.en: Allowing you to rearrange holidays
translation.ga: Ligean duit laethanta saoire a atheagrú

translation.en: Allowing you to take paid time off that you can work back at a later time
translation.ga: Ligean duit am saor le pá a thógáil gur féidir leat cúiteamh a dhéanamh air níos déanaí

translation.en: Statutory leave
translation.ga: Saoire reachtúil

translation.en: If none of the options above are available to you, and you cannot arrange for paid leave from your employer, you can apply for one of the statutory schemes below.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil aon cheann de na roghanna thuas ar fáil duit, agus mura féidir leat saoire le pá a shocrú ó d’fhostóir, féadfaidh tú iarratas a dhéanamh ar cheann de na scéimeanna reachtúla thíos.

translation.en: Force majeure leave (this is paid leave)
translation.ga: Saoire force majeure (saoire le pá é seo)

translation.en: Parental leave if you are looking after a child up to the age of 12 (or 16 if the child has a disability)
translation.ga: Saoire do thuismitheoirí má tá tú ag tabhairt aire do leanbh suas go 12 bliana d’aois (nó 16 má tá an leanbh faoi mhíchumas)

translation.en: Parent’s leave if you are caring for a child up to aged 2 who was born after 1 November 2019
translation.ga: Saoire tuismitheora má tá tú ag tabhairt aire do leanbh suas go dtí aois 1 a rugadh tar éis 1 Samhain 2019

translation.en: You are allowed to take 3 days force majeure leave in a 12month period, or 5 days in a 36 month period.
translation.ga: Tá cead agat 3 lá de shaoire force majeure a ghlacadh i dtréimhse 12 mhí, nó 5 lá i dtréimhse 36 mí.

translation.en: You can ask your employer to allow you to take the full 5 days paid force majeure leave together.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú iarraidh ar d’fhostóir cead a thabhairt duit an 5 lá de shaoire force majeure íoctha iomlán a ghlacadh le chéile.

translation.en: You normally give your employer 6 weeks’ notice if you want to take parental or parent’s leave, but you can ask your employer to waive this notice period.
translation.ga: De ghnáth tugann tú fógra 6 seachtaine d’fhostóir más mian leat saoire tuismitheora nó tuismitheora a ghlacadh, ach féadfaidh tú iarraidh ar d’fhostóir an tréimhse fógra seo a tharscaoileadh.

translation.en: Your employer does not have to pay you when you are on parental or parent’s leave.
translation.ga: Ní gá d’fhostóir tú a íoc nuair a bhíonn tú ar saoire do thuismitheoirí nó tuismitheora.

translation.en: If you are on parent’s leave you can apply for Parent’s Benefit.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ar shaoire do thuismitheoirí is féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh ar Shochar Tuismitheora.

translation.en: If you are on parental leave, you can apply for meanstested Supplementary Welfare Allowance.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ar shaoire tuismitheora, féadfaidh tú iarratas a dhéanamh ar Liúntas Leasa Forlíontach de réir tástála acmhainne.

translation.en: You can read more about the childcare supports for parents in our page on childcare and COVID19.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú níos mó a léamh faoi na tacaíochtaí cúraim leanaí do thuismitheoirí inár ndoiciméad ar chúram leanaí agus COVID19.

translation.en: If you are pregnant
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag iompar clainne

translation.en: Our page Social welfare payments and COVID19 has information about your social welfare options if you are pregnant and have been laid off or made unemployed.
translation.ga: Tá eolas inár ndoiciméad Íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh agus COVID19 maidir leo do roghanna leasa shóisialaigh má tá tú ag iompar clainne agus má rinne asleagtha nó dífhostaithe tú.

translation.en: You can read about pregnancy and coronavirus and you can read information for pregnant women on COVID19 from the National Maternity Hospital in Dublin.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat léamh faoi thoircheas agus coróinvíreas agus is féidir leat eolas ar COVID19 do mhná torracha ón Ospidéal Náisiúnta Máithreachais i mBaile Átha Cliath a léamh.

translation.en: This information is available in 5 languages.
translation.ga: Tá an fhaisnéis seo ar fáil i 5 theanga.

translation.en: School and COVID19
translation.ga: An Scoile agus COVID19

translation.en: Children attending school
translation.ga: Leanaí atá ag freastal ar an scoil

translation.en: Your child should not attend school if they are displaying any symptoms of COVID19.
translation.ga: Níor cheart do do leanbh freastal ar an scoil má tá aon chomharthaí COVID19 orthu.

translation.en: Students at school must keep their physical distance from one another outside of the classroom and work within the classroom in designated groupings or ‘bubbles’.
translation.ga: Caithfidh scoláirí ag an scoil fad fisiciúil a choimeád amach óna chéile lasmuigh den seomra ranga agus oibriú laistigh den seomra ranga i ngrúpálacha nó ‘bolgáin’ sainithe.

translation.en: Schools have introduced:
translation.ga: Tá an méid seo a leanas tugtha isteach i scoileanna:

translation.en: Increased hand washing and sanitising
translation.ga: Níochán lámh agus díghalrú méadaithe

translation.en: Enhanced cleaning regimes
translation.ga: Córais bhreise ghlantacháin

translation.en: Staggered breaks and lunch times
translation.ga: Sosanna agus amanna lóin scartha

translation.en: Rules for children using school transport
translation.ga: Rialacha nua do leanaí a úsáideann iompar scoile

translation.en: Blended learning which mixes learning at school and onlinelearning at home forms part of the school programme so that schools can respond quickly if public health circumstances change.
translation.ga: Tá foghlaim chumaisc ina ndéantar foghlaim ar scoil agus ar líne sa bhaile mar chuid den chlár scoile chun gur féidir le scoileanna freagairt go tapa má thagann athrú ar chúinsí sláinte poiblí.

translation.en: Schools can arrange classrooms, PE halls and other spaces to maximise school spaces for safe learning.
translation.ga: Is féidir le scoileanna seomraí ranga, hallaí corpoideachais agus spásanna eile a shocrú le haghaidh foghlaim shábháilte.

translation.en: Schools can manage and redistribute their teaching support resources in order to best meet the learning needs of students with complex medical needs who may not be able to return to school because public health guidelines indicate they are at “very high risk”.
translation.ga: Is féidir le scoileanna a nacmhainní tacaíochta a bhainistiú agus a athdháileadh chun an freastal is fearr a dhéanamh ar riachtanais foghlama scoláirí a bhfuil riachtanais foghlama chasta acu a mb’fhéidir nach bhfuil in ann filleadh ar an scoil mar gheall go dtugann treoirlínte sláinte poiblí le fios go bhfuil “baol anard” rompu.

translation.en: The National Educational Psychological Service (NEPS) has developed webinars and wellbeing toolkits for primary and postprimary schools to support the school community in the return to school.
translation.ga: D’fhorbair an tSeirbhís Náisiúnta Síceolaíochta Oideachais (an SNSO) seimineáir ghréasáin agus sraitheanna straitéisí folláine do bhunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna chun tacú le pobal na scoile chun filleadh ar an scoil.

translation.en: Staying safe at school
translation.ga: Bheith sábháilte ar scoil

translation.en: Guidance and supports for schools is contained in the Department of Education and Skill’s Reopening our schools: The roadmap for the full return to school.
translation.ga: Tá treoir agus tacaíochtaí do scoileanna ar fáil in Ár scoileanna a athoscailt: an treochlár chun filleadh ar an scoil go hiomlán a d’fhoilsigh an Roinn Oideachais agus Scoileanna.

translation.en: The roadmap contains detailed guidance and supports covering:
translation.ga: Tá treoir agus tacaíochtaí mionsonraithe sa treochlár, an méid seo a leanas ina measc:

translation.en: School drop off and collection
translation.ga: Scoláirí a fhágáil agus a bhailiú ag an scoil

translation.en: Hand washing and hygiene
translation.ga: Níochán lámh agus sláinteachas

translation.en: Face coverings
translation.ga: Clúdaigh aghaidhe

translation.en: Maintaining physical distancing
translation.ga: Fad fisiciúil a choimeád amach ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Classrooms, bubbles and pods
translation.ga: Seomraí ranga, bolgáin agus meithleacha

translation.en: Play and break times
translation.ga: Amanna súgartha agus sosa

translation.en: School drop off and collection
translation.ga: Scoláirí a fhágáil agus a bhailiú ag an scoil

translation.en: Many schools have staggered drop off and pick up times.
translation.ga: Beidh amanna scartha fágála agus bailithe i bhfeidhm in go leor scoileanna.

translation.en: Students should not gather when they arrive
translation.ga: Níor cheart do scoláirí bailiú thart ar a chéile nuair a thagann siad i láthair.

translation.en: They should go straight to their small designated group or classroom
translation.ga: Ba cheart dóibh dul go dtí a ngrúpa beag sainithe nó a seomra ranga láithreach.

translation.en: Parents and staff should maintain a distance of 2 metres.
translation.ga: Ba cheart do thuismitheoirí agus don fhoireann fad 2 mhéadar a choimeád amach ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: Walking and cycling to school is encouraged.
translation.ga: Spreagtar siúl agus rothaíocht chuig an scoil.

translation.en: Hand washing and hygiene at school
translation.ga: Níochán lámh agus sláinteachas ar scoil

translation.en: Staff and students should maintain hand hygiene throughout the school day.
translation.ga: Ba cheart don fhoireann agus do scoláirí leanúint le sláinteachas lámh i rith an lae scoile.

translation.en: Liquid soap and water is provided in school.
translation.ga: Cuirfear leacht gallúnaí agus uisce ar fáil ar scoil.

translation.en: Hand sanitiser can be used, however, young children should not have independent use of alcohol gel containers.
translation.ga: Is féidir díghalrán lámh a úsáid, ach níor cheart go mbeadh leanaí óga in ann úsáid neamhspleách a bhaint as coimeádáin glóthach alcóil, áfach.

translation.en: Students and staff should wash hands:
translation.ga: Ba cheart do scoláirí agus don fhoireann a lámha a ní:

translation.en: On arrival at school
translation.ga: Ar theacht chun na scoile dóibh

translation.en: Before eating or drinking
translation.ga: Sula nitheann nó sula nólann siad

translation.en: After using the toilet
translation.ga: I ndiaidh úsáid a bhaint as an leithreas

translation.en: After playing outdoors
translation.ga: Tar éis súgradh taobh amuigh

translation.en: When their hands are physically dirty
translation.ga: Nuair atá a lámha salach go fisiciúil

translation.en: When they cough or sneeze
translation.ga: Nuair a dhéanann siad casacht nó sraoth

translation.en: Moving between classes for postprimary students
translation.ga: Nuair a bhogann siad idir ranganna, i gcás scoláirí iarbhunscoile

translation.en: Read more on control measures to reopening schools safely on gov.ie.
translation.ga: Is féidir níos mó a léamh ar bhearta rialaithe maidir le scoileanna a athoscailt go sábháilte ar gov.ie.

translation.en: Face coverings
translation.ga: Clúdaigh aghaidhe

translation.en: Children under 13 years are not required to wear face coverings.
translation.ga: Níl ar leanaí faoi 13 bliana d’aois clúdaigh aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: Teachers and secondary school students must wear face coverings, when a physical distance of 2 metres cannot be maintained.
translation.ga: Caithfidh múinteoirí agus scoláirí meánscoile clúdaigh aghaidhe a chaitheamh, nuair nach féidir fad fisiciúil 2 mhéadar a choimeád amach ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: All Special Needs Assistants (SNAs) must wear face coverings, or in certain situations clear visors in the class room.
translation.ga: Caithfidh gach Cúntóir Riachtanas Speisialta (CRSanna) clúdaigh aghaidhe a chaitheamh, nó scáthláin thrédhearcacha a chaitheamh i gcásanna áirithe sa seomra ranga.

translation.en: Maintaining physical distancing at school
translation.ga: Fad fisiciúil a choimeád amach ó dhaoine eile ar scoil

translation.en: Primary and special schools
translation.ga: Bunscoileanna agus scoileanna speisialta

translation.en: Schools have reconfigured spaces to maximise physical distancing.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh scoileanna spásanna a athchumrú chun fad fisiciúil a uasmhéadú.

translation.en: The classrooms are clear of unnecessary furniture, shelves and material on the walls.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh troscán, seilfeanna agus ábhar neamhriachtanach ar na ballaí sa seomra ranga.

translation.en: The following physical distancing measures should be followed:
translation.ga: Ba cheart cloí leis na bearta seo a leanas maidir le scaradh fisiciúil:

translation.en: 1 metre distance should be maintained between desks or between individual students
translation.ga: Ba cheart fad 1 mhéadar a choimeád idir deasca nó idir scoláirí aonair.

translation.en: The teacher’s desk should be at least 1 metre (where possible 2 metres) away from a student’s desk
translation.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh deasc an mhúinteora ar a laghad 1 mhéadar (nó 2 mhéadar, sa chás gur féidir) amach ó dheasc scoláire.

translation.en: Teachers should avoid close contact at face to face level with students
translation.ga: Ba cheart do mhúinteoirí a sheachaint teagmháil dhlúth a dhéanamh ar leibhéal aghaidh ar aghaidh le scoláirí.

translation.en: Teachers should maintain a 2 metre distance in staff rooms and staff groups and should wear a face covering where they cannot maintain distance
translation.ga: Ba cheart do mhúinteoirí fad 2 mhéadar a choimeád amach ó dhaoine eile i seomraí foirne agus i ngrúpaí foirne agus ba cheart dóibh clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh nuair nach féidir leo fad a choimeád amach ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: Where possible desks should consistently be used by the same staff and children.
translation.ga: Sa chás gur féidir, ba cheart don fhoireann agus na leanaí céanna úsáid chomhsheasmhach a bhaint as deasca.

translation.en: The roadmap recognises that younger children are unlikely to maintain physical distancing indoors.
translation.ga: Aithnítear sa treochlár nach dóchúil go gcoimeádfaidh leanaí níos óige fad fisiciúil amach ó dhaoine óga taobh istigh.

translation.en: Postprimary
translation.ga: An IarBhunscoil

translation.en: At postprimary schools, schools can take a common sense approach to decreasing the contact between students.
translation.ga: Ag iarbhunscoileanna, is féidir le scoileanna glacadh le cur chuige gnáthchéile maidir le teagmháil idir scoláirí a laghdú.

translation.en: The following physical distancing measures should be followed:
translation.ga: Ba cheart cloí leis na bearta seo a leanas maidir le scaradh fisiciúil:

translation.en: Students and teachers should limit their interaction when moving between class, in hallways and other shared areas
translation.ga: Ba cheart do scoláirí agus múinteoirí teorainn a chur ar a nidirghníomhú nuair a bhíonn siad ag bogadh idir ranganna, i hallaí agus i limistéir eile chomhroinnte

translation.en: Student’s desks should be 2 metre distance apart but at least 1 metre distance from individual students or staff
translation.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh fad 2 mhéadar idir deasca scoláirí, ach ba cheart fad 1 mhéadar, ar a laghad, a bheith idir scoláirí nó foireann aonair

translation.en: Teachers should maintain a 2 metre distance in staff rooms and staff
translation.ga: Ba cheart do mhúinteoirí fad 2 mhéadar a choimeád amach ó dhaoine eile i seomraí foirne agus ón bhfoireann eile

translation.en: Classrooms, bubbles and pods
translation.ga: Seomraí ranga, bolgáin agus meithleacha

translation.en: Primary school and special schools
translation.ga: Bunscoileanna agus scoileanna speisialta

translation.en: Students may be grouped into class ‘bubbles’ and ‘pods’.
translation.ga: Is féidir scoláirí a ghrúpáil isteach in ‘bolgáin agus ‘meithleacha’ ranga.

translation.en: A ‘bubble’ is a class grouping which stays apart from other classes as much as possible.
translation.ga: Is éard is ‘bolgán’ ann ná grúpáil ranga a fhanann amach ó ranganna a mhéid agus is féidir.

translation.en: Your child may be in smaller group or ‘pod’ within the class bubble.
translation.ga: Is féidir le do leanbh a bheith i ngrúpa nó ‘meitheal’ laistigh de bholgán an ranga.

translation.en: Pods and bubbles help limit close contact and sharing of common facilities between students in different pods and bubbles.
translation.ga: Cabhraíonn meithleacha agus bolgáin le teorainn a chur ar theagmháil dhlúth a dhéanamh agus áiseanna coiteanna a roinnt idir scoláirí i meithleacha agus bolgáin éagsúla.

translation.en: While your child is in a class grouping or bubble they mix only with their own class from arrival at school in the morning until they leave at the end of the school day.
