translation.ga: Ní bheidh do leanbh timpeall ach ar a rang féin fad a bhíonn sé/sí i ngrúpáil nó bolgán ranga ón uair a thagann siad i láthair ag an scoil ar maidin go dtí go bhfágann siad an scoil ag deireadh an lae scoile.

translation.en: There should be at least 1 metre distance between individual pods within the class bubble and between individuals in the pod, whenever possible.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh fad 1 mhéadar, ar a laghad, idir meithleacha aonair laistigh de bholgán an ranga agus idir daoine aonair sa mheitheal, nuair is féidir.

translation.en: Students and teachers should be consistently in the same class bubble although this will not be possible at all times.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh scoláirí agus múinteoirí sa bholgán céanna ranga, cé nach mbeidh sé seo indéanta ag gach tráth.

translation.en: Each class bubble should have separate breaks and meal times or separate areas at break or meal times.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh amanna sosa agus béile ar leith ag gach bolgán ranga nó ba cheart go mbeadh limistéir ar leith acu ag amanna sosa nó béile.

translation.en: Post primary schools
translation.ga: IarBhunscoileanna

translation.en: In addition to reconfiguring class spaces and maximising physical distancing, schools may:
translation.ga: Anuas ar spásanna ranga a athchumrú agus scaradh fisiciúil a uasmhéadú, is féidir le scoileanna an méid seo a leanas a dhéanamh:

translation.en: Review timetables
translation.ga: Athbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar amchláir

translation.en: Reconfigure classes
translation.ga: Ranganna a athchumrú

translation.en: Consider use of live streaming within the school
translation.ga: Machnamh a dhéanamh ar shruthú beo a úsáid laistigh den scoil

translation.en: Use available spaces within the local community
translation.ga: Spásanna atá ar fáil a úsáid laistigh den phobal áitiúil

translation.en: Students should be assigned to a main class cohort, where possible.
translation.ga: Ba cheart scoláirí a shannadh do phríomhchohórt ranga, sa chás gur féidir.

translation.en: They will remain in the classroom for most subjects, with teachers moving between rooms.
translation.ga: Fanfaidh siad sa seomra ranga i gcás fhormhór na nábhar, agus is iad na múinteoirí a bhogfaidh idir na seomraí.

translation.en: Classes are planned to minimise movement during the day.
translation.ga: Déanfar ranganna a phleanáil chun gluaiseacht a íoslaghdú i rith an lae.

translation.en: If your child has an elective subject they should move quickly to the new class and sit with members of their class cohort, while maintaining physical distance.
translation.ga: Má tá ábhar roghnach á dhéanamh ag do leanbh, ba cheart dóibh bogadh go tapa chuig an rang nua agus suí le baill de chohórt a ranga, agus fad fisiciúil á choimeád acu amach ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: All students and staff should avoid sharing educational material or personal items such as pens, pencil cases and notebooks.
translation.ga: Ba cheart do na scoláirí agus an fhoireann go léir a sheachaint ábhar oideachais nó earraí pearsanta a roinnt, cosúil le pinn, cásanna pinn luaidhe agus leabhair nótaí.

translation.en: Contact areas of devices such as keyboards or tablets should be cleaned regularly.
translation.ga: Ba cheart limistéir a leagtar lámh orthu ar ghléasanna, cosúil le méarchláir nó táibléid, a ghlanadh go rialta.

translation.en: Staff and students should limit meeting in hallways and shared areas.
translation.ga: Ba cheart don fhoireann agus do scoláirí teorainn a chur ar chasadh lena chéile i hallaí agus i limistéir roinnte.

translation.en: Hand to hand greetings and hugs should be discouraged.
translation.ga: Ba cheart beannú lámh ar lámh agus barróga a dhíspreagadh.

translation.en: Where students need to move within the classroom to perform activities or share a resource it should be organised to minimise students meeting at the same time.
translation.ga: Nuair is gá do scoláirí bogadh laistigh den seomra ranga chun gníomhaíochtaí a dhéanamh nó acmhainn a roinnt, ba cheart é a eagrú ar an mbealach sin go níoslaghdaíonn sé an méid scoláirí a thagann le chéile ag an am céanna.

translation.en: Play and break times
translation.ga: Amanna súgartha agus sosa

translation.en: Primary schools and special schools, should have staggered breaks and adjust playtime to:
translation.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh sosanna i mbunscoileanna agus scoileanna speisialta atá scartha amach óna chéile agus ba cheart am súgartha a choigeartú chun na rudaí a leanas a dhéanamh:

translation.en: Reduce crowding at the entrances and exits
translation.ga: Plódú a laghdú ag na bealaí isteach agus amach

translation.en: Keep students in consistent groups when they play together, where it is not possible to maintain physical distancing
translation.ga: Scoláirí a choimeád i ngrúpaí comhsheasmhacha nuair a bhíonn siad ag súgradh le chéile, nuair nach féidir scaradh fisiciúil a dhéanamh

translation.en: Minimise sharing of equipment
translation.ga: Trealamh a roinnt a íoslaghdú

translation.en: Postprimary schools who operate a canteen should:
translation.ga: Ba cheart d’iarbhunscoileanna ina noibrítear ceaintín na rudaí a leanas a dhéanamh:

translation.en: Make sure physical distancing is applied
translation.ga: A chinntiú go gcuirtear scaradh fisiciúil i bhfeidhm

translation.en: Stagger canteen use and extend serving times to align with class groupings (where possible)
translation.ga: An úsáid a bhaintear as an gceaintín a scaradh amach agus amanna freastail a shíneadh ar aon dul le grúpálacha ranga (sa chás gur féidir)

translation.en: Implement a queue management system
translation.ga: Córas bainistíochta scuaine a chur i bhfeidhm

translation.en: If your child becomes unwell at school
translation.ga: Má éiríonn do leanbh breoite ar scoil

translation.en: You will be contacted immediately
translation.ga: Déanfar teagmháil leat láithreach

translation.en: Your child will be accompanied by a staff member to an isolation area away from other staff and students while maintaining at least 2 metres distance
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh ball foirne do leanbh go dtí limistéar aonraithe amach ón bhfoireann agus na scoláirí eile agus fad 2 mhéadar, ar a laghad, á choimeád amach aige/aici ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: If the isolation area is not a separate room your child will be kept 2 metres away from others in the room
translation.ga: Mura seomra ar leith é an limistéar aonraithe, coimeádfar do leanbh 2 mhéadar amach ó leanaí eile sa seomra

translation.en: If it is not possible to maintain 2 metre distance, the staff member caring for your child will wear a face covering.
translation.ga: Mura féidir fad 2 mhéadar a choimeád amach ó dhaoine eile, caithfidh an ball foirne a thugann aire do do leanbh clúdach aghaidhe.

translation.en: Your child should avoid touching people or surfaces and use a tissue when they cough or sneeze
translation.ga: Ba cheart do do leanbh a sheachaint lámh a leagan ar dhaoine nó ar dhromchlaí agus ciarsúr a úsáid nuair a dhéanann siad casacht nó sraoth

translation.en: Your child will be given a face covering to wear if they are in a common area with other people or while exiting the building
translation.ga: Tabharfar clúdach aghaidhe do do leanbh lena chaitheamh má tá siad i limistéar coiteann le daoine eile nó nuair a bhíonn an foirgneamh á fhágáil acu

translation.en: Your child will be assessed to see whether they can immediately go home or be brought home by you.
translation.ga: Déanfar measúnú ar an leanbh féachaint cibé acu an féidir leo dul abhaile láithreach nó an féidir leat iad a thabhairt abhaile.

translation.en: Public transport should not be used.
translation.ga: Níor cheart iompar poiblí a úsáid.

translation.en: If your child is well enough to go home, the school will arrange for them to be taken home by a family member and you will be asked to call your doctor.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil do leanbh róbhreoite le dul abhaile, socróidh an scoil go dtabharfaidh duine muinteartha abhaile iad agus iarrfar ort glaoch ar do dhochtúir.

translation.en: If your child is too unwell to go home, school staff will contact 999 or 112 and tell them that your child is suspected of having COVID19
translation.ga: Má tá do leanbh róbhreoite le dul abhaile, déanfaidh foireann na scoile teagmháil le 999 nó 112 agus inseoidh siad dóibh go gceaptar go bhfuil COVID19 ar do leanbh

translation.en: Staff and students must follow the protocol for managing a suspected case of COVID19 in school.
translation.ga: Caithfidh an fhoireann agus scoláirí cloí leis an bprótacal chun cás amhrasta COVID19 i scoil a bhainistiú.

translation.en: When to keep your child home from school
translation.ga: Cathain ba cheart do leanbh a choimeád abhaile ón scoil

translation.en: You should not send your child to school if they have:
translation.ga: Níor cheart duit do leanbh a chur ar scoil sna cásanna a leanas:

translation.en: Symptoms of COVID19
translation.ga: Tá Comharthaí COVID19 orthu

translation.en: Been in close contact with someone who has tested positive for COVID19
translation.ga: Rinne siad teagmháil dhlúth le duine éigin ar thug tástáil COVID19 le fios go bhfuil an víreas orthu

translation.en: Been living with someone who is unwell and may have COVID19
translation.ga: Bhí siad ag cónaí le duine atá breoite agus a mb’fhéidir go bhfuil COVID19 orthu

translation.en: An existing breathing condition that has recently got worse
translation.ga: Tá riocht anála orthu faoi láthair a d’imigh in olcas le déanaí

translation.en: Other symptoms such as sore throat, headaches or diarrhoea
translation.ga: Tá comharthaí eile orthu, cosúil le scornach thinn, tinnis chinn nó nó buinneach

translation.en: Returned from another country in the last 14 days
translation.ga: D’fhill siad ó thír eile le 14 lá anuas

translation.en: You can read more about when to keep your child from school and what to do if your child has symptoms on the HSE website.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat níos mó a léamh faoi cathain do leanbh a choimeád amach ón scoil agus an méid atá le déanamh má tá comharthaí ar do leanbh ar láithreán gréasáin FSS.

translation.en: Read more about how to restrict your movements and selfisolate.
translation.ga: Is féidir níos mó a léamh faoi conas do ghluaiseachtaí a shrianadh agus féinaonrú.

translation.en: Curriculum for 2021 school year
translation.ga: Curaclam do scoilbhliain 2021

translation.en: The curriculum for the 2021 school year at all school levels will take account of the:
translation.ga: Cuirfear an méid seo a leanas i gcuntas sa churaclam do scoilbhliain 2021 ar gach leibhéal scoile:

translation.en: Learning experiences of students during the school closure
translation.ga: Eispéiris foghlama scoláirí fad a bhíonn an scoil dúnta

translation.en: Likely gaps in learning
translation.ga: Bearnaí dóchúla san fhoghlaim

translation.en: Practical context in which teaching and learning will take place in the new school year
translation.ga: An comhthéacs praiticiúil ina dtitfidh múinteoireacht agus foghlaim amach sa scoilbhliain nua

translation.en: The Department has prepared curriculum guidance for primary and postprimary schools.
translation.ga: D’ullmhaigh an Roinn treoir maidir le curaclam do bhunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna.

translation.en: Schools will reprioritise certain areas of the curriculum and give greater time and attention to areas such as Social, Personal and Health Education, Physical Education, Language and Mathematics.
translation.ga: Beidh ar scoileanna tús áite a thabhairt arís eile do limistéir áirithe den churaclam agus níos mó ama a chaitheamh agus níos mó airde a thabhairt ar limistéir cosúil le hOideachas Sóisialta, Pearsanta agus Sláinte, Corpoideachas, Teanga agus Matamaitic go háirithe i rith na seachtainí tosaigh den chéad téarma.

translation.en: Schools can decide how to sequence and pace learning for students following their return to school.
translation.ga: Is féidir le scoileanna cinneadh a dhéanamh faoi conas ord a chur ar an bhfoghlaim agus an luas a shocrú ar a ndéantar é nuair a fhilleann scoláirí ar scoil.

translation.en: The Government has announced adjustments to certificate examinations in 2021.
translation.ga: D’fhógair an Rialtas go ndéanfar coigeartuithe ar scrúduithe teastais in 2021.

translation.en: The changes are set out in the Department of Education’s Assessment Arrangements for Junior Cycle and Leaving Certificate Examinations 2021 and Returning to School Transition Year 2020/21
translation.ga: Tá na hathruithe leagtha amach i Measúnú ar Shocruithe do Scrúduithe na Sraithe Sóisearaí agus na hArdteistiméireachta 2021 agus Filleadh ar an Idirbhliain 2020/21

translation.en: You can read more about changes to the Junior Cycle, Leaving Certificate, Leaving Certificate Applied and Leaving Certificate Vocational Programme.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat níos mó a léamh faoi athruithe ar an tSraith Shóisearach, an Ardteistiméireacht, an Ardteistiméireacht Fheidhmeach agus Gairmchlár na hArdteistiméireachta.

translation.en: Supporting students with Special Educational Needs (SEN)
translation.ga: Ag tacú le scoláirí a bhfuil Riachtanais Speisialta Oideachais acu (RSO)

translation.en: Students with special education needs may need support for their wellbeing or planned learning experiences to take account of the effect of school closures on their progress.
translation.ga: Teastóidh tacaíocht ó scoláirí a bhfuil riachtanais speisialta oideachais acu lena bhfolláine nó teastóidh eispéiris phleanáilte foghlama uathu a chuireann san áireamh an éifeacht a bhí ag dúnadh scoileanna ar a ndul chun cinn.

translation.en: Schools got all records of progress for children who attended July Provision to help them support planning for children’s needs.
translation.ga: Gheobhaidh scoileanna na taifid ar fad ar an dul chun cinn a rinne leanaí a d’fhreastail ar Sholáthar Mhí Iúil chun cabhrú leo tacú le pleanáil a dhéanamh do riachtanais leanaí sa téarma nua.

translation.en: Supporting students ‘at very high risk’ of COVID19
translation.ga: Tacú le scoláirí a gcruthaíonn COVID19 ‘baol anmhór’ dóibh

translation.en: Schools will provide additional support for students who are ‘very high risk’ and cannot attend school for health reasons related to COVID19.
translation.ga: Beidh ar scoileanna tacaíocht bhreise a sholáthar do scoláirí atá ‘i mbaol go hanmhór’ agus nach féidir leo freastal ar an scoil ar mhaithe le cúiseanna sláinte a bhaineann le COVID19.

translation.en: The plan continues to use 5 levels of restriction that correspond to the severity of COVID19 in a location.
translation.ga: Leagann an plean amach na 5 leibhéal a chomhfhreagraíonn do dhéine an COVID19 in áit ar bith.

translation.en: Level 1 is for locations where COVID19 is the least severe and means that restrictions on the activities of people and businesses are at their lowest level.
translation.ga: Úsáidtear Leibhéal 1 sna háiteanna is lú a bhfuil cásanna de COVID19 iontu agus ciallaíonn sé go bhfuil na srianta ar ghníomhaíochtaí dhaoine agus ar ghnólachtaí ag an leibhéal is ísle.

translation.en: Level 5 is for locations where COVID19 is most severe and means that restrictions on the activities of people and businesses are at their highest level.
translation.ga: Úsáidtear Leibhéal 5 d’áiteanna ina bhfuil an líon is airde de chásanna de COVID19 iontu agus ciallaíonn sé go bhfuil na srianta ar ghníomhaíochtaí dhaoine agus ar ghnólachtaí ag an leibhéal is airde.

translation.en: Level 5 is in place now
translation.ga: Tá Leibhéal 5 i bhfeidhm anois

translation.en: Every county in Ireland is currently on Level 5.
translation.ga: Tá srianta Leibhéal 5 i bhfeidhm i ngach contae in Éirinn faoi láthair.

translation.en: If you are fully vaccinated, you can meet with another fully vaccinated person indoors.
translation.ga: Má tá tú go hiomlán vacsaínithe, is féidir leat casadh le duine eile atá go hiomlán vacsaínithe taobh istigh.

translation.en: You are fully vaccinated:
translation.ga: Tá tú go hiomlán vacsaínithe:

translation.en: 15 days after the second AstraZenaca dose
translation.ga: 15 lá i ndiaidh duit an dara dáileog AstraZenaca a fháil

translation.en: 7 days after the second PfizerBioNtech dose
translation.ga: 7 lá i ndiaidh duit an dara dáileog PfizerBioNtech a fháil

translation.en: 14 days after the second Moderna dose
translation.ga: 14 lá i ndiaidh duit an dara dáileog Moderna a fháil

translation.en: Schools and childcare services have fully reopened.
translation.ga: Osclaíodh scoileanna agus seirbhísí cúraim leanaí go hiomlán arís.

translation.en: Restrictions on travel to Ireland are in place.
translation.ga: Tá srianta ar thaisteal go hÉirinn i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: If you travel to Ireland from certain countries you have to pay for mandatory hotel quarantine.
translation.ga: Má thaistealaíonn tú go hÉirinn ó thíortha áirithe, tá ort íoc as coraintín óstáin éigeantach.

translation.en: If you have lost your job or been laid off without pay, you can apply for the COVID19 Pandemic Unemployment Payment.
translation.ga: Má chaill tú do phost nó má leagadh as thú gan phá, is féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh ar Íocaíocht Dífhostaíochta Phaindéim COVID19.

translation.en: This has been extended until 30 June 2021.
translation.ga: Cuireadh síneadh leis an íocaíocht seo go dtí an 30 Meitheamh 2021.

translation.en: You can read more about level 5 restrictions on gov.ie.
translation.ga: Is féidir tuilleadh a léamh faoi shrianta leibhéal 5 ar gov.ie.

translation.en: Changes to COVID19 restrictions from 12 April 2021
translation.ga: Athruithe ar shrianta COVID19 ón 12 Aibreán 2021 ar aghaidh

translation.en: Some restrictions have changed from 12 April, with further changes expected later in April depending on public health advice.
translation.ga: Tá athrú tagtha ar roinnt srianta ón 12 Aibreán, agus tá súil leis go dtiocfaidh athruithe breise orthu níos déanaí in Aibreán ag brath ar chomhairle sláinte poiblí.

translation.en: Two households can meet outdoors, away from their gardens
translation.ga: Is féidir le dhá theaghlach casadh lena chéile taobh amuigh, amach óna ngairdíní

translation.en: You can travel within your county or within 20km of your home
translation.ga: Is féidir leat taisteal laistigh de do chontae nó laistigh de 20 ciliméadar de do theach

translation.en: Construction work can begin again on residential units, schools and childcare facilities
translation.ga: Is féidir tosú le hobair thógála arís ar aonaid chónaithe, scoileanna agus áiseanna cúraim leanaí

translation.en: Training for adult intercounty GAA teams can take place
translation.ga: Is féidir le traenáil d’fhoirne CLG idirchontae daoine fásta titim amach

translation.en: High performance athletics, approved by Sport Ireland, can resume
translation.ga: Is féidir le lúthchleasaíocht ardfheidhmíochta, a cheadaíonn Spórt Éireann, tosú arís

translation.en: Outdoor sport facilities can reopen, including golf courses and tennis courts.
translation.ga: Is féidir le háiseanna spóirt taobh amuigh oscailt arís, cúrsaí gailf agus cúirteanna leadóige san áireamh.

translation.en: Outdoor visitor attractions can reopen, including zoos and heritage sites but not amusement parks.
translation.ga: Is féidir le nithe is díol spéise do chuairteoirí oscailt arís, zúnna agus láithreáin oidhreachta san áireamh, seachas páirceanna siamsaíochta.

translation.en: Outdoor underage noncontact sports training can start again in pods of up to 15
translation.ga: Is féidir le traenáil do spóirt gan teagmháil tosú arís i meithleacha a mhéid le 15 dhuine

translation.en: Funerals can have 25 people in attendance
translation.ga: Is féidir le 25 duine freastal ar shochraidí

translation.en: A further review of restrictions will take place on 4 May 2021 and the following will be considered:
translation.ga: Titfidh athbhreithniú eile amach ar shrianta an 4 Bealtaine 2021 agus déanfar breithniú ar an méid seo a leanas:

translation.en: Full reopening of construction activity
translation.ga: Gníomhaíocht tógála a athoscailt go hiomlán

translation.en: Phased return of nonessential retail and outdoor retail, for example: garden centres/nurseries
translation.ga: Miondíol neamhbhunriachtanach agus taobh amuigh a oscailt de réir a chéile, mar shampla: ionaid gharraíodóireachta/plandlanna

translation.en: Restart of personal services (like hairdressers) on a staggered basis
translation.ga: Seirbhísí pearsanta (cosúil le gruagairí) a oscailt arís ar bhonn céimnithe

translation.en: Reopening of museums, galleries and libraries
translation.ga: Músaeim, dánlanna agus leabharlanna a athoscailt

translation.en: Restart of religious services on a staggered basis
translation.ga: Seirbhísí reiligiúnacha a oscailt arís ar bhonn céimnithe

translation.en: Level 5
translation.ga: Leibhéal 5

translation.en: Ireland is currently on Level 5.
translation.ga: Tá Leibhéal 5 i bhfeidhm in Éirinn go dtí 31 Eanáir 2021.

translation.en: You cannot have visitors to your home.
translation.ga: Ní féidir cuairteoirí a bheith agat i do theach tar éis meán oíche ar 30 Nollaig 2020.

translation.en: Some people who may be at risk of isolation can nominate another household to mix with.
translation.ga: Is féidir le roinnt daoine a bhfuil an baol ann go mbeidh siad scoite amach on bpobal, teaghlach eile a ainmniú chun bualadh leo.

translation.en: This is called a support bubble.
translation.ga: Tugtar bolgán tacaíochta air seo.

translation.en: You can meet with one other household outside your home (away from your gardens).
translation.ga: Is féidir leat casadh le teaghlach amháin eile lasmuigh de do theach (amach ó do ghairdíní).

translation.en: You should continue to practice social distancing.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit leanúint le scaradh sóisialta a dhéanamh.

translation.en: If you are fully vaccinated, you can meet with another fully vaccinated person indoors.
translation.ga: Má tá tú go hiomlán vacsaínithe, is féidir leat casadh le duine eile atá go hiomlán vacsaínithe taobh istigh.

translation.en: Both people must have been fully vaccinated for 2 weeks.
translation.ga: Caithfidh go bhfuil an bheirt daoine vacsaínithe go hiomlán ar feadh 2 sheachtain.

translation.en: Only essential workers should travel to work.
translation.ga: Níor chóir ach oibrithe bunriachtanacha amháin a bheith ag taisteal chun na hoibre.

translation.en: You should work from home unless you are providing an essential service and need to be physically present.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit oibriú ón mbaile mura mbíonn seirbhís bhunriachtanach á cur ar fáil ar gá a bheith i láthair go pearsanta chun í a dhéanamh.

translation.en: In addition:
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin:

translation.en: Schools have fully reopened from 12 April 2021.
translation.ga: Athosclaíodh scoileanna go hiomlán ón 12 Aibreán 2021.

translation.en: Creches and childcare services fully reopened on 29 March 2021.
translation.ga: Athosclaíodh naíolanna agus seirbhísí cúraim leanaí go hiomlán an 29 Márta 2021.

translation.en: People over 70 and people who are at very high risk and are not fully vaccinated, are advised to avoid public transport, shop during designated hours and limit their interactions to a small number of people.
translation.ga: Moltar do dhaoine atá 70 bliain d’aois nó níos sine agus do dhaoine a bhfuil riosca anard rompu agus nach bhfuil go hiomlán vacsaínithe, iompar poiblí a sheachaint, siopadóireacht a dhéanamh i rith na nuaireanta sainithe agus gan idirghníomhú a dhéanamh ach le líon beag daoine.

translation.en: Visits to nursing homes are limited to compassionate or critical circumstances only and limited to one visit by one person every 2 weeks.
translation.ga: Ní féidir cuairteanna a thabhairt ar thithe altranais ach faoi chúinsí atruacha nó criticiúla  agus ní féidir ach le duine amháin cuairt amháin a thabhairt gach 2 sheachtain.

translation.en: Two visits per week are allowed if at least 8 out of 10 residents have been fully vaccinated for at least 2 weeks.
translation.ga: Ceadaítear dhá chuairt sa tseachtain má rinneadh ar a laghad 8 as 10 gcónaitheoir a vacsaíniú ar feadh ar a laghad 2 sheachtain

translation.en: Public transport can operate with capacity restricted to 25%.
translation.ga: Beidh acmhainn an iompair phoiblí teoranta go dtí 25%

translation.en: Domestic travel
translation.ga: Taisteal Intíre

translation.en: You can travel within your county or within 20km of your home.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat taisteal laistigh de do chontae nó laistigh de 20 ciliméadar de do theach.

translation.en: You should only travel outside of this area if you have a ‘reasonable excuse’ for doing so.
translation.ga: Níor cheart duit taisteal lasmuigh den limistéar seo ach má tá ‘leithscéal réasúnta’ agat é sin a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Weddings, organised events and culture
translation.ga: Bainiseacha, imeachtaí eagraithe agus cultúir

translation.en: Up to 6 people can attend a wedding.
translation.ga: Is féidir le suas go dtí 6 duine freastal ar bhainis.

translation.en: No organised indoor events should take place.
translation.ga: Níor cheart go dtarlódh aon teacht le chéile eagraithe faoi dhíon.

translation.en: No organised outdoor events, or sporting fixtures should take place.
translation.ga: Níor cheart go dtarlódh aon teacht le chéile eagraithe, nó cluichí spóirt amuigh faoin spéir.

translation.en: Museums, galleries and other cultural attractions must close.
translation.ga: Beidh iarsmalanna, dánlanna agus ionaid eile cultúir dúnta.

translation.en: Sports and exercise
translation.ga: Spórt agus aclaíocht

translation.en: Gyms, leisure centres and pools must close.
translation.ga: Ionaid aclaíochta, ionaid fhóillíochta agus linnte snámha dúnta ó 31 Nollaig 2020.

translation.en: No indoor or outdoor exercise group activities, including those involving children.
translation.ga: Níor chóir aon ghníomhaíocht aclaíochta do ghrúpaí taobh isigh ná taobh amuigh a reáchtáil, lena náirítear gníomhaíochtaí do leanaí.

translation.en: No training or matches should take place except professional elite sports, horseracing and greyhound racing behind closed doors.
translation.ga: Níor chóir aon chluichí ná imeachtaí spóirt eile a reáchtáil, ach amháin spórt ar leibhéal gairmiúil agus sárchéime agus cluichí Gaelacha idir contaetha, rásaíocht chapall agus rásaí con a cheadaítear gan aon lucht féachana i láthair.

translation.en: Religious services and funerals
translation.ga: Seirbhísí eaglasta agus sochraidí

translation.en: Places of worship can remain open for private prayer.
translation.ga: Is féidir dul go dtí ionad adhartha chun paidreacha príobháideacha a rá.

translation.en: Religious services must be held online.
translation.ga: Ní mór seirbhísí reiligiúnacha a reáchtáil ar líne.

translation.en: Up to 10 can attend funerals.
translation.ga: Suas le 10 gcaointeoir ag sochraidí.

translation.en: Shops and business
translation.ga: Siopaí agus gnólachtaí

translation.en: Restaurants, cafes and pubs that serve food can open for take away services only.
translation.ga: Is féidir le bialanna, caiféanna agus tithe tábhairne a chuireann bia ar fáil seirbhísí le tabhairt leat amháin a sholáthar.

translation.en: Wet pubs remain closed.
translation.ga: Beidh tithe tábhairne ‘fliucha’ dúnta.

translation.en: Hotels and other accommodation can open only for essential purposes.
translation.ga: Óstáin agus lóistín eile oscailte dóibh siúd amháin a bhfuil cúis bhunriachtanach acu.

translation.en: All nonessential shops are closed.
translation.ga: Má bhí tú ag fanacht in óstán ar 30 Nollaig, is féidir leat do sheal ann a chríochnú.

translation.en: Click and collect services are suspended.
translation.ga: Ní mór do siopaí neamhriachtanacha bheith dúnta ó am scoir gnó ar 31 Nollaig 2020.

translation.en: All other personal services, such as hairdressers, beauticians and barbers, must close.
translation.ga: Beidh gach seirbhís pearsanta eile, ar nós gruagairí, sciamheolaithe agus bearbóirí dúnta..

translation.en: Further information:
translation.ga: Tuilleadh eolais:

translation.en: You can read more about Level 5.
translation.ga: Tuilleadh eolais faoi Leibhéal 5.

translation.en: Level 4
translation.ga: Leibhéal 4

translation.en: You cannot have visitors to your home.
translation.ga: Ní féidir leat cuairteoirí a bheith agat i do theach.

translation.en: You should not meet socially in other settings.
translation.ga: Níor chóir duit bualadh le haon duine go sóisialta i dtimpeallachtaí eile.

translation.en: Tradespeople can continue to go to people's homes, but should wear a face covering and keep their distance.
translation.ga: Is féidir le ceardaithe leanúint orthu ag dul isteach i dtithe eile ach ba chóir dóibh cumhdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh agus fanacht amach ó dhaoine.

translation.en: Only essential workers should go to work.
translation.ga: Níor chóir ach d’oibrithe bunriachtanacha dul chun na hoibre.

translation.en: You should not travel outside your county.
translation.ga: Níor chóir duit do chontae féin a fhágáil

translation.en: Schools, creches and outdoor play areas remain open with restrictive measures in place.
translation.ga: Beidh na scoileanna, na naíonraí agus na láithreacha súgartha oscailte le bearta cosanta i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: People over 70 and people who are medically vulnerable should avoid public transport, shop during designated hours and limit their interactions to a small number of people.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do dhaoine atá os cionn 70 agus do dhaoine atá leochaileach ó thaobh na sláinte, an iompar poiblí a sheachaint, siopadóireachta a dhéanamh le linn na nuaireanta atá leagtha síos agus gan caidreamh a bheith acu ach le dream beag.

translation.en: Visits to nursing and care homes are limited to one visit by one person per week, except in critical and compassionate circumstances.
translation.ga: Is féidir le duine amháin cuairt amháin in aghaidh na seachtaine a thabhairt ar theach altranais nó ar ionad cúraim, seachas má tá cúinsí criticiúla i gceist nó ar bhonn atrua.

translation.en: Public transport can operate with capacity restricted to 25%.
translation.ga: Beidh acmhainn an iompair phoiblí teoranta go dtí 25%.

translation.en: Weddings, organised events and culture
translation.ga: Bainiseacha, imeachtaí eagraithe agus cultúir

translation.en: Up to 6 people can attend a wedding.
translation.ga: Is féidir le suas le 6 duine freastal ar bhainis.

translation.en: No organised indoor events should take place.
translation.ga: Níor cheart go dtarlódh aon teacht le chéile eagraithe faoi dhíon.

translation.en: Up to 15 can attend organised outdoor events.
translation.ga: Is féidir le 15 duine, ar a mhéad, freastal ar imeachtaí eagraithe taobh amuigh.

translation.en: Museums, galleries and other cultural attractions must close.
translation.ga: Beidh iarsmalanna, dánlanna agus ionaid eile cultúir dúnta.

translation.en: Gyms, leisure centres and swimming pools
translation.ga: Ionaid aclaíochta, ionaid fhóillíochta agus linnte snámha

translation.en: Gyms and leisure centres are closed.
translation.ga: Beidh ionaid aclaíochta agus fóillíochta dúnta.

translation.en: No matches should take place, except professional sporting events that can be held behind closed doors.
translation.ga: Níor chóir aon chluichí ná imeachtaí spóirt eile a reáchtáil, ach amháin spórt ar leibhéal gairmiúil agus sárchéime ar féidir iad a reáchtail gan aon lucht féachana i láthair.

translation.en: Religious services and funerals
translation.ga: Seirbhísí eaglasta agus sochraidí

translation.en: Religious services are online only.
translation.ga: Beidh seirbhísí eaglasta ar líne amháin.

translation.en: Places of worship remain open for private prayer.
translation.ga: Is féidir dul go dtí ionad adhartha chun paidreacha príobháideacha a rá.

translation.en: Up to 25 can attend funerals.
translation.ga: Suas le 25 caointeoir ag sochraidí.

translation.en: Shops and business
translation.ga: Siopaí agus gnólachtaí

translation.en: Hotel services are limited to residents.
translation.ga: Beidh seirbhísí óstáin ar fáil do chónaitheoirí amháin.

translation.en: Only essential shops and services will remain open.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh ach siopaí bunriachtanacha ar oscailt agus seirbhísí bunriachtanacha ar fáil.

translation.en: See the full list of essential services
translation.ga: Féach liosta iomlán de sheirbhísí bunriachtanacha

translation.en: See the full list of essential retailers
translation.ga: Féach liosta iomlán de mhiondíotóirí bunriachtanacha

translation.en: You can read more about Level 4.
translation.ga: Tuilleadh eolais faoi Leibhéal 4.

translation.en: Level 3
translation.ga: Leibhéal 3

translation.en: You cannot have visits to your home or garden unless it is for an essential reason, like providing care to a child or to an elderly or vulnerable person.
translation.ga: Ní féidir leat cuairteoirí a bheith agat i do theach ná i do ghairdín seachas as cúis bhunriachtanach, ar nós aire a thabhairt do leanbh nó do sheanóir nó do dhuine leochaileach.

translation.en: If you are in a support bubble with another household, you can continue to visit each other.
translation.ga: Má tú tú i mbolgán tacaíochta le teaghlach eile, is féidir libh cuairt a thabhairt ar a chéile.

translation.en: Tradespeople can continue to go to people's homes, but should wear a face covering and keep their distance.
translation.ga: Is féidir le ceardaithe leanúint orthu ag dul isteach i dtithe eile ach ba chóir dóibh cumhdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh agus fanacht amach ó dhaoine.

translation.en: Up to 6 people from a maximum of 2 households can meet outdoors while maintaining physical distancing.
translation.ga: Is féidir teacht le chéile le suas le 6 duine ó 2 theaghlach eile taobh amuigh fad is a bhfuil scaradh fisiciúil á chleachtadh.

translation.en: You should continue to work from home unless it is absolutely necessary to attend in person.
translation.ga: Ba chóir leanúint ort ag obair ón mbaile mura bhfuil géarghá bheith i láthair go pearsanta.

translation.en: You should not travel outside your county.
translation.ga: Níor chóir duit do chontae féin a fhágáil

translation.en: Schools, creches and outdoor play areas remain open with restrictive measures in place.
translation.ga: Beidh na scoileanna, na naíonraí agus na láithreacha súgartha oscailte le bearta cosanta i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: People over 70 and people who are medically vulnerable should avoid public transport, shop during designated hours and limit their interactions to a small number of people.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do dhaoine atá os cionn 70 agus do dhaoine atá leochaileach ó thaobh na sláinte, an iompar poiblí a sheachaint, siopadóireachta a dhéanamh le linn na nuaireanta atá leagtha síos agus gan caidreamh a bheith acu ach le dream beag.

translation.en: Visits to nursing and care homes are limited to one visit by one person per week, except for in critical and compassionate circumstances.
translation.ga: Tuilleadh eolais faoin gcocúnú.

translation.en: Two visits per week are allowed if at least 8 out of 10 residents have been fully vaccinated for at least 2 weeks.
translation.ga: Cuairt ar theach altranais nó ionad cúraim Ní cheadaítear cuairt a thabhairt ar theach altranais nó ar ionad cúraim seachas i gcúinsí criticiúla nó ar bhonn atrua.

translation.en: Public transport can operate with capacity restricted to 50%.
translation.ga: Beidh acmhainn an iompair phoiblí teoranta go dtí 50%.

translation.en: Weddings, organised events and culture
translation.ga: Bainiseacha, imeachtaí eagraithe agus cultúir

translation.en: Up to 25 people can go to a wedding.
translation.ga: Is féidir le suas go dtí 25 duine freastal ar bhainis.

translation.en: No organised indoor events should take place, except professional sports events that can take place behind closed doors.
translation.ga: Níor chóir aon imeachtaí a reáchtáil taobh istigh, ach amháin imeachtaí spórt ar leibhéal gairmiúil ar féidir iad a reáchtail gan aon lucht féachana i láthair.

translation.en: Up to 15 can go to organised outdoor events (but not including sporting events).
translation.ga: Is féidir le suas le 15 duine freastal ar imeachtaí eagraithe lasmuigh (ach gan imeachtaí spóirt a chur san áireamh).

translation.en: Museums, galleries, cinemas and other cultural attractions can reopen.
translation.ga: Ceadófar d’iarsmalanna, do dhánlanna agus d’ionaid eile cultúir a bheith oscailte arís.

translation.en: Gyms, leisure centres and swimming pools
translation.ga: Ionaid aclaíochta, ionaid fhóillíochta agus linnte snámha

translation.en: Outdoor training sessions can take place in pods of up to 15 people.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh seisiúin thraenála a bheith ann i bhfaighneog de 15 duine ar a mhéad.

translation.en: Gyms, leisure centres and swimming pools remain open for individual training only.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh ionaid aclaíochta/ionaid fhóillíochta agus linnte snámha oscailt do dhaoine aonair amháin.

translation.en: Bowling alleys, pool halls and arcades should stay closed.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do lánaí babhlála, hallaí púil agus árais siamsaíochta fanacht dúnta.

translation.en: Religious services and funerals
translation.ga: Seirbhísí eaglasta agus sochraidí

translation.en: Religious services can take place with restrictions.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh seirbhísí eaglasta a bheith ann agus bearta srianta i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: Up to 50 people can attend religious services.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh suas le 50 duine freastal ar sheirbhísí reiligiúnacha.

translation.en: Up to 25 mourners can attend funerals.
translation.ga: Suas le 25 caointeoir ag sochraidí.

translation.en: Shops and business
translation.ga: Siopaí agus gnólachtaí

translation.en: Bars that serve food, cafes, and restaurants can open, with restrictions.
translation.ga: Is féidir le bialanna, caiféanna agus tithe tábhairne a chuireann bia ar fáil oscailt arís agus bearta srianta i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: 'Wet' pubs must remain closed, except for take away services.
translation.ga: Ní mór do thithe tábhairne ‘fliucha’ fanacht dúnta ach amháin má tá seirbhísí ‘tabhair leat’ á soláthr acu.

translation.en: Nightclubs, casinos and discos remain closed.
translation.ga: Ní mór do chlubanna oíche, casino agus dioscó fanacht dúnta.

translation.en: Hotel services are limited to residents.
translation.ga: Beidh seirbhísí óstáin ar fáil do chónaitheoirí amháin.

translation.en: Shops can open, along with hairdressers, beauticians and barbers.
translation.ga: Siopaí ar oscailt arís, mar aon le gruagairí, sciamheolaithe agus bearbóirí.

translation.en: Face coverings must be worn.
translation.ga: Ní mór cumhdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: You can read more about Level 3.
translation.ga: Tuilleadh eolais faoi Leibhéal 3.

translation.en: Level 2
translation.ga: Leibhéal 2

translation.en: You can have visitors to your home from one other household only.
translation.ga: Is féidir le cuairteoirí a bheith agat i do theach ó theaghlach amháin.

translation.en: You can meet socially outdoors in groups of up to 15 people from up to 3 households.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat casadh le daoine go sóisialta amuigh faoin spéir i ngrúpaí suas le 15 duine ó 3 teaghlach ar a mhéad.

translation.en: You should continue to work from home if possible.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit leanúint ort ag obair ón mbaile más féidir.

translation.en: You can go to work if for essential onsite meetings, inductions and training.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat dul chun na hoibre le haghaidh cruinnithe bunriachtanacha ar an láthair, mar aon le seisiúin ionduchtaithe agus oiliúna.

translation.en: People over 70 and people who are medically vulnerable should avoid public transport, shop during designated hours and limit their interactions to a small number of people.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do dhaoine atá os cionn 70 agus do dhaoine atá leochaileach ó thaobh na sláinte, an iompar poiblí a sheachaint, siopadóireachta a dhéanamh le linn na nuaireanta atá leagtha síos agus gan caidreamh a bheith acu ach le dream beag.

translation.en: Apart from protective measures that apply to individual sectors, there are no restrictions on:
translation.ga: Seachas bearta sriantacha a bhaineann le hearnálacha aonair, níl aon srian i bhfeidhm ar:

translation.en: Travel within Ireland
translation.ga: Taisteal laistigh d’Éirinn

translation.en: Schools and childcare services (protective measures must remain in place)
translation.ga: Scoileanna agus seirbhísí cúraim leanaí (bearta sriantacha i bhfeidhm i gcónaí)

translation.en: Outdoor play areas
translation.ga: Clóis shúgartha taobh amuigh

translation.en: Nursing and care homes should follow advanced protective measures.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do thithe altranais agus d’ionaid chúraim bearta sriantacha ardleibhéil a leanúint.

translation.en: Public transport can operate with capacity reduced to 50%.
translation.ga: Beidh acmhainn an iompair phoiblí teoranta go dtí 50%.

translation.en: Weddings, organised events and culture
translation.ga: Bainiseacha, imeachtaí eagraithe agus cultúir

translation.en: Up to 50 people can go to a wedding.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh suas go dtí 50 duine freastal ar bhainis.

translation.en: Up to 50 people can go to organised indoor events (including sporting events), or up to 100 in larger venues.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh suas le 50 duine freastal ar imeachtaí eagraithe taobh istigh (imeachtaí spóirt san áireamh), nó suas le 100 in ionaid níos mó.

translation.en: Specific guidance will be developed for individual sectors.
translation.ga: Déanfar treoir faoi leith a fhorbairt do na hearnálacha aonair.

translation.en: Up to 100 can go to organised outdoor events (including sporting events), or up to 200 can go to outdoor stadiums with a minimum capacity of 5000.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh suas le 100 duine freastal ar imeachtaí eagraithe lasmuigh (imeachtaí spóirt san áireamh), nó suas le 200 i staidiamaí faoin aeir a bhfuil acmhainn de 5000 duine iontu ar a laghad.

translation.en: For very large stadiums and outdoor venues, specific guidance will be developed by individual sectors.
translation.ga: Do staidiamaí anmhór agus ionaid lasmuigh, déanfar treoir faoi leith a fhorbairt de réir earnálacha aonair.

translation.en: Museums, galleries and other cultural attractions can open with social distancing in place.
translation.ga: Ceadófar d’iarsmalanna, do dhánlanna agus d’ionaid eile cultúir a bheith oscailte arís agus bearta sriantacha i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: Maximum numbers depend on the size of the venue.
translation.ga: Braithfidh líon uasta na gcuairteoirí ar mhéid an ionaid.

translation.en: Gyms, leisure centres and swimming pools
translation.ga: Ionaid aclaíochta, ionaid fhóillíochta agus linnte snámha

translation.en: Normal sports training sessions can take place and gyms, leisure centres and swimming pools can open with protective measures.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh gnathsheisiúin thraenála a bheith ann agus féadfaidh ionaid aclaíochta/ionaid fhóillíochta agus linnte snámha a bheth ar oscailt agus bearta sriantacha i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: Religious services and funerals
translation.ga: Seirbhísí eaglasta agus sochraidí

translation.en: Up to 50 can go to religious services, including funerals.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh suas le 50 freastal ar sheirbhísí eaglasta, sochraidí san áireamh.

translation.en: If the premises can safely hold more than 50, this may be permitted if protective measures are in place.
translation.ga: Más féidir le níos mó ná 50 duine dul isteach san áitreabh go sábháilte, d’fhéadfaí go gceadófar é, má tá bearta sriantacha in áit.

translation.en: Retail and business
translation.ga: Siopaí agus gnólachtaí

translation.en: Bars, cafes, hotels and restaurants can open with protective measures in place.
translation.ga: Is féidir le tithe tábhairne, bialanna agus caiféanna a bheith ar oscailt agus bearta sriantacha i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: Groups should be limited to 6 people from no more than 3 households.
translation.ga: Is í 6 duine an uasteorainn as 3 teaghlach.

translation.en: This includes wet pubs, pubs that do not serve food.
translation.ga: Áirítear tithe tábhairne fliucha leis seo mar aon le tithe tábhairne nach gcuireann bia ar fáil.

translation.en: Nightclubs, casinos and discos will remain closed.
translation.ga: Ní mór do chlubanna oíche, casino agus dioscó fanacht dúnta.

translation.en: Shops can open, along with hairdressers, beauticians and barbers.
translation.ga: Siopaí ar oscailt arís, mar aon le gruagairí, sciamheolaithe agus bearbóirí.

translation.en: Face coverings must be worn.
translation.ga: Ní mór cumhdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: You can read more about Level 2.
translation.ga: Tuilleadh eolais faoi Leibhéal 2.

translation.en: Level 1
translation.ga: Leibhéal 1

translation.en: Level 1 is the lowest level and has the fewest restrictions.
translation.ga: Is é Leibhéal 1 an leibhéal is ísle agus an leibhéal ag a bhfuil na sriantacha is lú i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: You can have 10 visitors to your home from up to 3 households.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat 10 gcuairteoirí a bheith agat i do theach as 3 theaghlach.

translation.en: You should continue to work from home if possible.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit leanúint ort ag obair ón mbaile más féidir.

translation.en: You can go to work if there is staggered attendance arrangements in place or for specific business requirements.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat dul chun na hoibre má tá socruithe ann maidir le freastal agaithe nó socruithe a bhaineann le riachtanais gnó faoi leith.

translation.en: People over 70 and people who are medically vulnerable should use their judgement on how much they interact with others.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do dhaoine os cionn 70 agus daoine atá leochaileach ó thaobh na sláinte cinneadh a dhéanamh maidir leis an méid caidrimh a bheidh acu le daoine eile.

translation.en: Apart from protective measures that apply to individual sectors, there are no restrictions on:
translation.ga: Taobh amuigh de na bearta sriantacha a bhaineann le hearnálacha aonair, níl aon srian i gceist le:

translation.en: Travel within Ireland
translation.ga: Taisteal laistigh d’Éirinn

translation.en: Schools and childcare services (protective measures must remain in place)
translation.ga: Scoileanna agus seirbhísí cúraim leanaí (is gá go mbeidh bearta sriantacha i bhfeidhm)

translation.en: Outdoor play areas
translation.ga: Clóis shúgartha taobh amuigh

translation.en: Nursing and care homes
translation.ga: Tithe altranais agus ionaid chúraim

translation.en: Public transport can operate with reduced capacity.
translation.ga: Beidh an iompar poiblí ag feidhmiú ach le hacmhainn laghdaithe.

translation.en: Weddings, organised events and culture
translation.ga: Bainiseacha, imeachtaí eagraithe agus cultúir

translation.en: Up to 50 people can meet outdoors at organised events that are not covered by other specific guidance.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh suas le 50 duine bualadh le chéile taobh amuigh ag imeachtaí eagraithe nach bhfuil clúdaithe ag treoir faoi leith eile.

translation.en: Up to 100 people can go to a wedding.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh suas le 100 duine freastal ar bhainis.

translation.en: Up to 100 people can go to organised indoor events (including sporting events), or up to 200 in larger venues.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh suas le 100 duine freastal ar imeachtaí eagraithe taobh istigh (imeachtaí spóirt san áireamh), nó suas le 200 in ionaid níos mó.

translation.en: Specific guidance will be developed for individual sectors.
translation.ga: Déanfar treoir faoi leith a fhorbairt do na hearnálacha aonair.

translation.en: Up to 200 can go to organised outdoor events (including sporting events), or up to 500 can go top outdoor stadiums with a minimum capacity of 5000.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh suas le 200 duine freastal ar imeachtaí eagraithe lasmuigh (imeachtaí spóirt san áireamh), nó suas le 500 i staidiamaí faoin aeir a bhfuil acmhainn de 5000 duine iontu ar a laghad.

translation.en: For very large stadiums and outdoor venues, specific guidance will be developed by individual sectors.
translation.ga: Do staidiamaí anmhór agus ionaid lasmuigh, déanfar treoir faoi leith a fhorbairt de réir earnálacha aonair.

translation.en: Museums, galleries and other cultural attractions can open with social distancing in place.
translation.ga: Ceadófar d’iarsmalanna, do dhánlanna agus d’ionaid eile cultúir a bheith oscailte arís agus bearta sriantacha i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: Maximum numbers depend on the size of the venue.
translation.ga: Braithfidh líon uasta na gcuairteoirí ar mhéid an ionaid.

translation.en: Gyms, leisure centres and swimming pools
translation.ga: Ionaid aclaíochta, ionaid fhóillíochta agus linnte snámha

translation.en: Normal sports training sessions can take place and gyms, leisure centres and swimming pools can open with protective measures.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh gnathsheisiúin thraenála a bheith ann agus féadfaidh ionaid aclaíochta/ionaid fhóillíochta agus linnte snámha oscailt agus bearta sriantacha i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: Religious services and funerals
translation.ga: Seirbhísí eaglasta agus sochraidí

translation.en: Up to 50 can attend religious services including funerals.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh suas le 50 freastal ar sheirbhísí eaglasta, sochraidí san áireamh.

translation.en: If the premises can safely hold more than 50, this may be permitted if protective measures are in place.
translation.ga: Más féidir le níos mó ná 50 duine dul isteach san áitreabh go sábháilte, d’fhéadfaí go gceadófar é, má tá bearta sriantacha in áit.

translation.en: Shops and business
translation.ga: Siopaí agus gnólachtaí

translation.en: Bars, cafes, hotels and restaurants can open with protective measures in place.
translation.ga: Is féidir le beáir, óstáin agus bialanna oscailt agus bearta srianta i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: This includes wet pubs (pubs that do not serve food).
translation.ga: Áirítear tithe tábhairne fliucha leis seo (tithe tábhairne nach gcuireann bia ar fáil).

translation.en: Nightclubs, casinos and discos remain closed.
translation.ga: Ní mór do chlubanna oíche, casino agus dioscó fanacht dúnta.

translation.en: Shops can open, along with hairdressers, beauticians and barbers.
translation.ga: Siopaí ar oscailt arís, mar aon le gruagairí, sciamheolaithe agus bearbóirí.

translation.en: Face coverings must be worn.
translation.ga: Ní mór cumhdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: You can read more about Level 1.
translation.ga: Tuilleadh eolais faoi Leibhéal 1.

translation.en: Public health measures for COVID19
translation.ga: Bearta sláinte poiblí i leith COVID19

translation.en: Measures currently in place
translation.ga: Bearta atá i bhfeidhm faoi láthair

translation.en: Support bubbles
translation.ga: Bolgáin tacaíochta

translation.en: Travel restrictions
translation.ga: Srianta taistil

translation.en: Emergency legislation
translation.ga: Reachtaíocht éigeandála

translation.en: Detentions and penalties
translation.ga: Coinneála agus pionóis

translation.en: Previous measures
translation.ga: Bearta roimhe seo

translation.en: Measures currently in place
translation.ga: Bearta atá i bhfeidhm faoi láthair

translation.en: The Government has introduced measures to control the spread of COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá bearta tugtha isteach ag an Rialtas chun scaipeadh COVID19 a rialú.

translation.en: You should follow public health advice to protect yourself and others, including advice on social distancing.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit comhairle sláinte poiblí a leanúint chun tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint, lena náirítear comhairle maidir le scaradh sóisialta.

translation.en: On 23 February 2021, the Government introduced a revised plan to manage COVID19 called ‘COVID19 Resilience and Recovery 2021: The Path Ahead’.
translation.ga: An 23 Feabhra 2021, thug an Rialtas isteach plean athbhreithnithe chun COVID19 a bhainistiú dar teideal 'Athléimneacht agus Athshlánú COVID19 2021: Pleanáil don Todhchaí'.

translation.en: The plan continues to set out 5 levels of restrictions.
translation.ga: Leanann an plean le 5 leibhéal srianta a leagan amach.

translation.en: Level 1 has the fewest restrictions and Level 5 has the most.
translation.ga: Tá an líon is lú srianta i Leibhéal 1 agus an líon is mó srianta i Leibhéal 5.

translation.en: The level that applies to each county depends on the current COVID19 situation in that county.
translation.ga: Braitheann an leibhéal a bhaineann le gach contae ar staid reatha COVID19 sa chontae sin.

translation.en: For more information on the different levels see Plan for living with COVID19.
translation.ga: Le haghaidh tuilleadh faisnéise ar na leibhéil éagsúla féach Plean chun maireachtáil le COVID19.

translation.en: Level 5 is in place now
translation.ga: Tá Leibhéal 5 i bhfeidhm faoi láthair

translation.en: Level 5 restrictions apply to all counties until 5 April 2021.
translation.ga: Baineann srianta Leibhéal 5 le gach contae go dtí an 5 Aibreán 2021.

translation.en: Stay at home, except:
translation.ga: Fan sa bhaile, ach amháin:

translation.en: For work, education or other essential reasons
translation.ga: Le haghaidh oibre, oideachais nó cúiseanna riachtanacha eile

translation.en: To exercise within 5km of your home
translation.ga: Chun críche aclaíochta laistigh de 5km ó do theach

translation.en: Work from home, unless your work is an essential service that cannot be done from home.
translation.ga: Oibrigh ón mbaile, mura bhfuil seirbhís bhunriachtanach á cur ar fáil nach féidir a dhéanamh ón mbaile.

translation.en: You should not visit other households except for essential purposes.
translation.ga: Níor chóir duit cuairt a thabhairt ar theaghlaigh eile ach amháin chun críocha riachtanacha.

translation.en: You can meet with people from one other household outdoors when taking exercise.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú bualadh le daoine ó theaghlach amháin eile lasmuigh agus tú i mbun aclaíochta.

translation.en: Schools are closed except for primary level special schools and special classes in mainstream primary and postprimary schools.
translation.ga: Tá scoileanna dúnta seachas scoileanna speisialta bunleibhéil agus ranganna speisialta i mbunscoileanna agus in iarbhunscoileanna príomhshrutha.

translation.en: From 1 March, all other schools will start to return on a phased basis.
translation.ga: Ón 1 Márta, tosóidh gach scoil ag oscailt ar bhonn céimnithe.

translation.en: Childcare is closed except for services for vulnerable children and the children of essential workers.
translation.ga: Tá cúram leanaí dúnta ach amháin seirbhísí do leanaí leochaileacha agus do leanaí oibrithe riachtanacha.

translation.en: From 8 March, childcare will start to return on a phased basis.
translation.ga: Ón 8 Márta, tosóidh cúram leanaí ag oscailt ar bhonn céimnithe.

translation.en: Only essential retail can open.
translation.ga: Ní féidir ach le siopaí miondíola riachtanacha oscailt.

translation.en: Bars, cafes and restaurants are closed except for takeaway food and delivery.
translation.ga: Tá beáir, caiféanna agus bialanna dúnta ach amháin bia le tabhairt leat agus seachadadh bia.

translation.en: Construction work is closed, with some exceptions.
translation.ga: Tá obair thógála dúnta, le roinnt eisceachtaí.

translation.en: There are restrictions on travel into Ireland and travel abroad.
translation.ga: Tá srianta ar thaisteal go hÉirinn agus taisteal thar lear.

translation.en: See further details on Level 5 restrictions.
translation.ga: Féach tuilleadh sonraí faoi shrianta Leibhéal 5.

translation.en: Support bubbles
translation.ga: Bolgáin tacaíochta

translation.en: Under Level 5 restrictions, you should not have visitors to your home unless they are part of your support bubble.
translation.ga: Faoi shrianta Leibhéal 5, níor cheart go mbeadh cuairteoirí i do theach mura bhfuil siad mar chuid de do bholgáin tacaíochta.

translation.en: A support bubble, also called a paired household or an extended household, is when an isolated person from one household has close contact with one other household.
translation.ga: Bíonn bolgáin tacaíochta, nó teaghlach péireáilte nó teaghlach leathnaithe ann nuair a bhíonn dlúththeagmháil ag duine atá i mbaol a bheith fágtha leo féin le teaghlach amháin eile.

translation.en: In a support bubble, the 2 households can meet indoors, even though they do not live together.
translation.ga: I mbolgáin tacaíochta, is féidir leis an 2 theaghlach bualadh le chéile, cé nach gcónaíonn siad le chéile.

translation.en: There are special rules about who can form a support bubble.
translation.ga: Tá rialacha speisialta ann maidir le cé atá in ann a bheith i mbolgáin tacaíochta.

translation.en: You can only form a support bubble if you:
translation.ga: Ní féidir leat a bheith i mbolgáin tacaíochta ach amháin:

translation.en: Live alone
translation.ga: Má tá tú i do chónaí leat féin

translation.en: Live alone with children under the age of 18
translation.ga: Má tá tú i do chónaí leat féin in éineacht le leanaí faoi 18 mbliana d'aois

translation.en: Share parenting or custody arrangements
translation.ga: Má tá socruithe comhthuismitheoireachta nó comhchaomhnóireachta á roinnt agat le duine éigin eile

translation.en: Live with an adult you provide care for
translation.ga: Má tá tú i do chónaí le duine fásta a gcuireann tú cúram ar fáil dó/di

translation.en: Live by yourself and have a carer or carers who support you, including a livein carer
translation.ga: Má tá tú i do chónaí leat féin agus cúramóir nó cúramóirí agat a thacaíonn leat, lena náirítear cúramóir atá ina chónaí leat

translation.en: If you are an essential worker and you do not have an existing childcare arrangement, you can form a bubble with another household for childcare.
translation.ga: Más oibrí riachtanach tú agus mura bhfuil socrú cúram leanaí agat cheana féin, féadfaidh tú bolgán a bhunú le teaghlach eile le haghaidh cúram leanaí.

translation.en: You can form a support bubble with one other household that is not already part of a support bubble.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú bolgán tacaíochta a bhunú le teaghlach amháin eile nach bhfuil mar chuid de bholgán tacaíochta cheana féin.

translation.en: Travel restrictions
translation.ga: Srianta taistil

translation.en: While Ireland is at Level 5, you should not leave your house, except for exercise within 5 km of your home, unless you have a reasonable excuse.
translation.ga: Agus Éire ag Leibhéal 5, níor chóir duit do theach a fhágáil, seachas chun aclaíocht a dhéanamh laistigh de 5 km ó do theach, mura bhfuil leithscéal réasúnach agat.

translation.en: The following list gives examples of reasonable excuses for leaving your home, as set out in Statutory Instrument 701 of 2020, as amended:
translation.ga: Tugann an liosta seo a leanas samplaí de leithscéalta réasúnacha chun do theach a fhágáil, mar atá leagtha amach in Ionstraim Reachtúil 701 de 2020, arna leasú:

translation.en: Traveling to work if you cannot work from home
translation.ga: Taistil chun na hoibre mura féidir leat obair ón mbaile

translation.en: Giving care to a vulnerable person or attending to other vital family matters
translation.ga: Cúram a thabhairt do dhuine leochaileach nó freastal ar chúrsaí teaghlaigh ríthábhachtacha eile

translation.en: Shopping at essential retailers
translation.ga: Siopadóireacht i miondíoltóirí riachtanacha

translation.en: Farming and other agricultural activities
translation.ga: Feirmeoireacht agus gníomhaíochtaí talmhaíochta eile

translation.en: Going to school or bringing your child to school
translation.ga: Dul ar scoil nó do leanbh a thabhairt ar scoil

translation.en: Going to college where it is necessary to attend in person
translation.ga: Dul ar choláiste nuair is gá freastal go pearsanta

translation.en: Accessing childcare services
translation.ga: Rochtain ar sheirbhísí cúram leanaí

translation.en: Travelling to visit your children as part of an access arrangement, or travelling to allow access to children
translation.ga: Taisteal chun cuairt a thabhairt ar do leanaí mar chuid de shocrú rochtana, nó ag taisteal chun rochtain ar leanaí a cheadú

translation.en: Attending a medical or dental appointment, or going to a medical or dental appointment with a vulnerable person or someone you live with
translation.ga: Freastal ar choinne leighis nó fiaclóireachta, nó dul chuig coinne leighis nó fiaclóireachta le duine leochaileach nó le duine a bhfuil cónaí ort leis nó léi

translation.en: Going to another person’s house if you are in a support bubble with them
translation.ga: Dul chuig teach duine eile má tá tú i mbolgán tacaíochta leo

translation.en: Seeking essential medical help for yourself, someone you live with or for a vulnerable person
translation.ga: Ag lorg cúnamh leighis riachtanach duit féin, do dhuine a bhfuil cónaí ort leis/léi nó do dhuine leochaileach

translation.en: Donating blood
translation.ga: Fuil a thabhairt

translation.en: Going to the vet
translation.ga: Dul chuig an tréidlia

translation.en: Going to a wedding or funeral
translation.ga: Dul chuig bainis nó sochraid

translation.en: Going to court, obeying your bail instructions, attending court offices to initiate emergency legal proceedings
translation.ga: Dul chun cúirte, ag cloí le do threoracha bannaí, ag freastal ar oifigí cúirte chun tús a chur le himeachtaí dlí éigeandála

translation.en: Moving accommodation where it is necessary
translation.ga: Bogadh chuig cóiríocht eile nuair is gá

translation.en: Travel to the airport or port to leave Ireland if you normally live in another country
translation.ga: Taisteal go dtí an taerfort nó an calafort chun Éire a fhágáil má tá cónaí ort i dtír eile de ghnáth

translation.en: Fleeing domestic abuse or escaping danger
translation.ga: Teitheadh ó dhrochíde sa teaghlach nó ag éalú ó chontúirt

translation.en: A Garda can give you a fixed charge notice of €100 for travelling without a reasonable excuse.
translation.ga: Féadann Garda fógra muirir sheasta de €100 a thabhairt duit as taisteal gan leithscéal réasúnach.

translation.en: Mandatory quarantine
translation.ga: Coraintín éigeantach

translation.en: By law, you must quarantine when you arrive into Ireland.
translation.ga: De réir an dlí, ní mór duit dul ar coraintín nuair a thagann tú go hÉirinn.

translation.en: It does not apply if your journey starts in Northern Ireland.
translation.ga: Níl feidhm leis má thosaíonn do thuras i dTuaisceart Éireann.

translation.en: Travel abroad
translation.ga: Taisteal Thar Lear

translation.en: You must only travel abroad if it is essential to do so.
translation.ga: Níor chóir taisteal thar lear ach amháin má tá sé riachtanach déanamh amhlaidh.

translation.en: The permitted reasons for travelling abroad are set out in Statutory Instrument 29 of 2021 (pdf).
translation.ga: Tá na cúiseanna a cheadaítear chun taisteal thar lear leagtha amach in Ionstraim Reachtúil 29 de 2021 (pdf).

translation.en: You can be fined €500 for unnecessary travel abroad.
translation.ga: Féadfar fíneáil €500 a ghearradh ort as taisteal thar lear gan cúis.

translation.en: Emergency legislation
translation.ga: Reachtaíocht éigeandála

translation.en: On 20 March 2020, the Health (Preservation and Protection and Other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 was signed into law.
translation.ga: An 20 Márta 2020, síníodh an tAcht Sláinte (Caomhnú agus Cosaint agus Bearta Éigeandála eile ar mhaithe le Leas an Phobail) 2020 ina dhlí.

translation.en: The Act gives the Minister for Health the power to make regulations to introduce measures to slow down the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Tugann an tAcht an chumhacht don Aire Sláinte rialacháin a dhéanamh chun bearta a thabhairt isteach chun scaipeadh an víris a mhoilliú.

translation.en: Under this Act, the Minster can make regulations to:
translation.ga: Faoin Acht seo, is féidir leis an Aire rialacháin a dhéanamh chun:

translation.en: Restrict travel to and from Ireland
translation.ga: Srian a chur le taisteal chuig agus ó Éirinn

translation.en: Restrict travel within Ireland to stop people moving to and from affected areas
translation.ga: Srian a chur ar thaisteal laistigh d’Éirinn chun stop a chur le daoine bogadh chuig agus ó cheantair a bhfuil an víreas iontu

translation.en: Stop gatherings of people from taking place, and to make organisers of these gatherings put safeguards in place to prevent the virus from spreading
translation.ga: Stop a chur le cruinnithe daoine, agus ceangail ar eagraithe na gcruinnithe sin cosaintí a chur i bhfeidhm chun scaipeadh an víris a chosc

translation.en: Make businesses (such as shops) put safeguards in place to protect their staff and customers
translation.ga: Ceangail ar ghnólachtaí (mar shiopaí) cosaintí a chur i bhfeidhm chun a bhfoireann agus a gcustaiméirí a chosaint

translation.en: Close premises, including schools
translation.ga: Áitribh, lena náirítear scoileanna, a dhúnadh

translation.en: Laws in place now
translation.ga: Dlíthe i bhfeidhm anois

translation.en: The Government continues to issue guidance to help prevent the spread of COVID19.
translation.ga: Leanann an Rialtas ar aghaidh ag eisiúint treorach chun cabhrú le scaipeadh COVID19 a chosc.

translation.en: It has also passed laws that make it an offence to do or not do certain things.
translation.ga: Rith sé dlíthe freisin a fhágann gur cion é rudaí áirithe a dhéanamh nó gan iad a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Current restrictions are set out in the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A Temporary Restrictions) (COVID19) (No.
translation.ga: Tá srianta reatha leagtha amach sna Rialacháin um an Acht Sláinte 1947 (Alt 31A Srianta Sealadacha) (COVID19) (Uimh.

translation.en: 10) Regulations 2020, as amended, which apply until 5 March 2021.
translation.ga: 10) 2020, arna leasú, a bheidh i bhfeidhm go dtí an 5 Márta 2021.

translation.en: These regulations require all nonessential services and retail outlets to close.
translation.ga: Éilíonn na rialacháin seo go ndúnfar gach seirbhís agus asraon miondíola neamhriachtanach.

translation.en: It is an offence to leave your place of residence without a reasonable excuse and you can be fined by a Garda for doing this.
translation.ga: Is cion é d’áit chónaithe a fhágáil gan leithscéal réasúnach agus féadfaidh Garda fíneáil a ghearradh ort as é seo a dhéanamh.

translation.en: A Garda can also ask you to return to your place of residence if you have left without a reasonable excuse.
translation.ga: Féadann Garda a iarraidh ort filleadh ar d’áit chónaithe má d'fhág tú gan leithscéal réasúnach.

translation.en: Failure to comply with this direction is also an offence.
translation.ga: Is cion é freisin gan cloí leis an treoir seo.

translation.en: It is unlawful to host an event in a private home unless it is just for the residents or people in a paired household.
translation.ga: Tá sé neamhdhleathach imeacht a óstáil i dteach príobháideach mura mbaineann an timeacht leis na cónaitheoirí nó le daoine i dteaghlach péireáilte.

translation.en: It is also unlawful to go to an event in someone else’s home unless you are part of a paired household.
translation.ga: Tá sé neamhdhleathach freisin dul chuig ócáid i dteach duine eile mura bhfuil tú mar chuid de theaghlach péireáilte.

translation.en: If you do not comply, it is an offence and you can get a fixed penalty notice or be prosecuted.
translation.ga: Mura gcomhlíonann tú, is cion é agus d'fhéadfá fógra um pionós socraithe a fháil nó tú a ionchúiseamh.

translation.en: Gardaí have the power under the Health (Amendment) Act 2020 to attend at the entrance of any private home where they believe an unlawful gathering is happening and direct any nonresidents to leave it or direct those approaching not to attend.
translation.ga: Tá an chumhacht ag an nGarda Síochána faoin Acht Sláinte (Leasú) 2020 a bheith i láthair ag an mbealach isteach chuig aon teach príobháideach má chreideann siad go bhfuil bailiú neamhdhleathach ag tarlú agus a ordú d’aon neamhchónaitheoirí an teach a fhágáil nó a ordú dóibh siúd atá ag druidim leis an teach gan freastal.

translation.en: The following laws apply until 9 June 2021:
translation.ga: Beidh feidhm ag na dlíthe seo a leanas go dtí an 9 Meitheamh 2021:

translation.en: You must wear a face covering on public transport unless you have a reasonable excuse for not doing so.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh ar iompar poiblí mura bhfuil leithscéal réasúnach agat gan é a dhéanamh.

translation.en: This is set out in the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (COVID19) (Face Coverings on Public Transport) Regulations 2020, extended by Statutory Instrument 512 of 2020 (pdf).
translation.ga: Tá sé seo leagtha amach sna Rialacháin um an Acht Sláinte 1947 (Alt 31A Srianta Sealadacha) (COVID19) (Clúdaigh Aghaidhe ar Iompar Poiblí) 2020 , arna leathnú ag Ionstraim Reachtúil 512 de 2020 (pdf).

translation.en: Statutory Instrument 569 of 2020 requires face coverings in taxis and in bus and rail stations.
translation.ga: Éilíonn Ionstraim Reachtúil 569 de 2020 cumhdaigh aghaidhe i dtacsaithe agus i stáisiúin bus agus iarnróid.

translation.en: You must wear a face covering in shops and other premises that are listed in the regulations, unless you have a reasonable excuse for not doing so.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh i siopaí agus áitribh eile atá liostaithe sna rialacháin, mura bhfuil leithscéal réasúnach agat gan é a dhéanamh.

translation.en: This is set out in Health Act 1947 (Section 31A Temporary Restrictions) (COVID19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) Regulations 2020, as amended, which was extended by Statutory Instrument 511 of 2020 (pdf).
translation.ga: Tá sé seo leagtha amach sna Rialacháin um an Acht Sláinte 1947 (Alt 31A Srianta Sealadacha) (COVID19) (Clúdaigh Aghaidh in Áitribh agus Gnólachtaí Áirithe) 2020, arna leasú, a leathnaíodh le hIonstraim Reachtúil 511 de 2020 (pdf).

translation.en: You must complete a Passenger Locator Form on or before your arrival in Ireland and tell the authorities if your residence details change within 14 days.
translation.ga: Ní mór duit Foirm Aimsithe Paisinéirí a chomhlánú roimh duit teacht go hÉirinn nó nuair a thagann tú go hÉirinn agus a rá leis na húdaráis má athraíonn do shonraí cónaithe laistigh de 14 lá.

translation.en: This is set out in the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Requirements) (COVID19 Passenger Locator Form) Regulations 2020, as amended.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo leagtha amach sna Rialacháin um an Acht Sláinte 1947 (Alt 31A Ceanglais Shealadacha) (Foirm Aimsithe Paisinéirí COVID19) 2020, arna leasú.

translation.en: International travel
translation.ga: Taisteal Idirnáisiúnta

translation.en: You must complete a Passenger Locator Form on or before your arrival in Ireland and tell the authorities if your residence details change within 14 days.
translation.ga: Ní mór duit Foirm Aimsithe Paisinéirí a chomhlánú roimh duit teacht go hÉirinn nó nuair a thagann tú go hÉirinn agus a rá leis na húdaráis má athraíonn do shonraí cónaithe laistigh de 14 lá.

translation.en: This is set out in the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Requirements) (COVID19 Passenger Locator Form) Regulations 2021.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo leagtha amach sna Rialacháin um an Acht Sláinte 1947 (Alt 31A Ceanglais Shealadacha) (Foirm Aimsitheoir Paisinéirí COVID19) 2020.

translation.en: You must have proof of a negative COVID19 test (PCR) when you arrive in Ireland from anywhere other than Northern Ireland, unless you are in an exempted category.
translation.ga: Ní mór duit cruthúnas a bheith agat ar thástáil dhiúltach COVID19 (PCR) nuair a thagann tú go hÉirinn ó áit ar bith seachas Tuaisceart Éireann, mura bhfuil tú i gcatagóir díolmhaithe.

translation.en: The test must have been taken no more than 72 hours before you arrived.
translation.ga: Ní mór tástáil go diúltach taobh istigh de 72 uair a chloig sula dtagann tú isteach sa tír.

translation.en: When you arrive, you must show your proof and cooperate with the requests of officials.
translation.ga: Nuair a thagann tú, caithfidh tú do chruthúnas a thaispeáint agus comhoibriú le hiarrataí oifigigh.

translation.en: If you arrive into Ireland without a PCR test result, you must take a test within 36 hours of your arrival.
translation.ga: Má thagann tú go hÉirinn gan toradh tástála PCR, caithfidh tú tástáil a dhéanamh laistigh de 36 uair an chloig tar éis duit teacht.

translation.en: It is an offence not to take the test and you can be fined up to €2,500 or receive a prison sentence of up to 6 months, or both.
translation.ga: Is cion é gan an tástáil a dhéanamh agus féadfar fíneáil suas le €2,500 a ghearradh ort nó pianbhreith príosúin suas le 6 mhí a fháil, nó iad araon.

translation.en: You must quarantine in the place specified on your passenger locator form for 14 days.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú coraintín a dhéanamh san áit a shonraítear ar d’fhoirm aimsithe paisinéirí ar feadh 14 lá.

translation.en: You can stop quarantine if you get a negative PCR test, taken no less than 5 days after arrival.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú coraintín a stopadh má fhaigheann tú tástáil dhiúltach PCR, a thógtar 5 lá ar a laghad tar éis duit teacht.

translation.en: Stricter rules apply if you have arrived from a high risk 'category 2' country.
translation.ga: Tá rialacha níos déine i bhfeidhm má tháinig tú ó thír 'chatagóir 2' ardriosca.

translation.en: You must complete the full 14 days of quarantine.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú an 14 lá iomlán de choraintín a chríochnú.

translation.en: The quarantine obligation applies if you travel to Ireland through Northern Ireland.
translation.ga: Tá feidhm ag an oibleagáid coraintín má tá tú ag taisteal go hÉirinn trí Thuaisceart Éireann.

translation.en: It does not apply if your journey starts in Northern Ireland.
translation.ga: Níl feidhm leis má thosaíonn do thuras i dTuaisceart Éireann.

translation.en: If you do not quarantine, you can be fined up to €2,500 or face 6 months in prison, or both.
translation.ga: Mura ndéanann tú coraintín, féadfar fíneáil suas le €2,500 a ghearradh ort nó 6 mhí sa phríosún, nó iad araon.

translation.en: There are very limited exceptions where you do not have to complete the quarantine.
translation.ga: Tá eisceachtaí teoranta nuair nach gá duit an coraintín a chríochnú.

translation.en: These include international transport workers and people travelling for urgent medical reasons.
translation.ga: Ina measc seo tá oibrithe iompair idirnáisiúnta agus daoine atá ag taisteal ar chúiseanna míochaine práinneacha.

translation.en: This is set out in Statutory Instrument 44 of 2021 (pdf) which applies until 5 March 2021.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo leagtha amach i Ionstraim Reachtúil 44 de 2021 (pdf) a bheidh i bhfeidhm go dtí an 5 Márta 2021.

translation.en: Detentions and penalties
translation.ga: Coinneála agus pionóis

translation.en: During COVID19, various regulations have given An Garda Síochána additional powers, including arrest without warrant.
translation.ga: Le linn COVID19, thug rialacháin éagsúla cumhachtaí breise don Gharda Síochána, lena náirítear gabháil gan bharántas.

translation.en: Offences are punishable by a fine of up to €2,500, up to six months imprisonment, or a combination of both.
translation.ga: Tá cionta inphionóis le fíneáil suas le €2,500, suas le sé mhí príosúnachta, nó meascan den dá rud.

translation.en: Fines and fixed penalty notices
translation.ga: Fíneálacha agus fógraí pionóis sheasta

translation.en: For certain offences, you can be fined a fixed amount.
translation.ga: I gcás cionta áirithe, féadfar fíneáil de mhéid sheasta a ghearradh ort.

translation.en: A Garda can give you a fixed penalty notice.
translation.ga: Féadann Garda fógra pionóis sheasta a thabhairt duit.

translation.en: If you do not pay it within 28 days, you can be prosecuted in court.
translation.ga: Mura níocann tú é laistigh de 28 lá, féadfar tú a ionchúiseamh sa chúirt.

translation.en: A Garda can issue the following fixed penalties under the Health Act 1947 (Fixed Payment Notice and Dwelling Event Provisions) (COVID19) Regulations 2020, as amended:
translation.ga: Féadann Garda na pionóis sheasta seo a leanas a eisiúint faoi na Rialacháin um an Acht Sláinte, 1947 (Fógra Íocaíochta Seasta agus Forálacha maidir le hÓcáidí i dTeaghaisí) (Covid19) (Leasú), 2020, arna leasú:

translation.en: Offence Fixed charge
translation.ga: Cionta Muirear seasta

translation.en: Not wearing a face covering on public transport, without a reasonable excuse €80
translation.ga: Gan clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh ar iompar poiblí, gan leithscéal réasúnach €80

translation.en: Not wearing a face covering in a retail outlet, or other specified premises, without a reasonable excuse €80
translation.ga: Gan clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh in asraon miondíola, nó áitreabh sonraithe eile, gan leithscéal réasúnach €80

translation.en: Travelling without a reasonable excuse €100
translation.ga: Taisteal gan leithscéal réasúnach €100

translation.en: Attending an unlawful social or recreational gathering in a home €150
translation.ga: Freastal ar chruinniú neamhdhleathach sóisialta nó áineasa i dteach €150

translation.en: Organising an unlawful social or recreational gathering in a home €500
translation.ga: Cruinniú neamhdhleathach sóisialta nó áineasa a eagrú i dteach €500

translation.en: Organising a prohibited event that is not in a home €500
translation.ga: Imeacht toirmiscthe a eagrú lasmuigh den teach €500

translation.en: Travelling to a port or airport without a reasonable excuse €500
translation.ga: Ag taisteal chuig calafort nó aerfort gan leithscéal réasúnach €500

translation.en: Detention due to health risk
translation.ga: Coinneáil de bharr riosca sláinte

translation.en: The Health (Preservation and Protection and Other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 also allows for detention of someone who is a potential source of infection and risk to public health, if it is necessary to slow the spread of COVID19.
translation.ga: Ceadaíonn an tAcht Sláinte (Caomhnú agus Cosaint agus Bearta Éigeandála Eile ar mhaithe le Leas an Phobail) 2020 duine a choinneáil a d’fhéadfadh a bheith ina fhoinse ionfhabhtaithe agus ina riosca do shláinte an phobail, más gá scaipeadh COVID19 a mhoilliú.

translation.en: You may be detained if you refuse to stay in a specified place like your home or a hospital, or you cannot be isolated in any other way.
translation.ga: Féadfar tú a choinneáil má dhiúltaíonn tú fanacht in áit shonraithe mar do theach nó ospidéal, nó mura féidir tú a choinneáil scoite amach ar bhealach ar bith eile.

translation.en: If you are detained, you will be tested as soon as possible and you can ask for a review of your detention by an independent person on the grounds you are not a source of infection.
translation.ga: Má choinnítear tú, déanfar tástáil ort a luaithe is féidir agus féadfaidh duine neamhspleách athbhreithniú ar do choinneáil a iarraidh ar an bhforas nach foinse ionfhabhtaithe tú.

translation.en: Failure to comply with a detention, or interfering with the detention of a person is a criminal offence.
translation.ga: Is cion coiriúil é gan cloí le coinneáil, nó cur isteach ar choinneáil duine.

translation.en: Previous measures
translation.ga: Bearta roimhe seo
