translation.en: The new COVID19 Business Aid Scheme (CBAS) provides grants to selfemployed, sole traders, partnerships and companies with a minimum annual turnover of €50,000.
translation.ga: Leis an Scéim nua um Chúnamh Gnó COVID19 (CBAS) tugtar deontais d’fhéinfhostaithe, do thrádálaithe aonair, do chomhpháirtíochtaí agus do chuideachtaí a bhfuil láimhdeachas bliantúil íosta de €50,000 acu.

translation.en: In order to qualify for CBAS, you must be ineligible for CRSS or Fáilte Ireland Business Continuity Scheme and have a reduction in turnover of at least 75%.
translation.ga: D’fhonn cáiliú don CBAS, ní mór duit a bheith neamhincháilithe don CRSS nó don Scéim Leanúnachais Gnó de chuid Fáilte Éireann agus laghdú láimhdeachais de 75% ar a laghad a bheith agat.

translation.en: You can read the rest of the qualifying criteria.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú an chuid eile de na critéir cháilitheacha a léamh .

translation.en: You can apply online through your local authority.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú iarratas a dhéanamh ar líne trí d’údarás áitiúil.

translation.en: Applications will open shortly.
translation.ga: Osclófar iarratais go gairid.

translation.en: COVID19 Business Loans up to €25,000 are available through Microfinance Ireland (MFI).
translation.ga: Tá Iasachtaí Gnó COVID19 suas le €25,000 ar fáil trí Microfinance Ireland (MFI) .

translation.en: There are no repayments for the first 6 months and the equivalent 12 months interestfree subject to certain terms and conditions.
translation.ga: Níl aon aisíocaíochtaí ann don chéad 6 mhí agus an coibhéis 12 mhí saor ó ús faoi réir téarmaí agus coinníollacha áirithe.

translation.en: The loan terms are typically up to 3 years and there are no fees or charges.
translation.ga: Is gnách go mbíonn téarmaí na hiasachta suas le 3 bliana agus níl aon táillí ná muirir ag gabháil leo.

translation.en: The loan is open to sole traders, partnerships and limited companies with less than 10 fulltime employees and annual turnover of up to €2m.
translation.ga: Tá an iasacht oscailte do thrádálaithe aonair, do chomhpháirtíochtaí agus do chuideachtaí teoranta a bhfuil níos lú ná 10 fostaí lánaimseartha acu agus láimhdeachas bliantúil suas le €2m.

translation.en: You can apply through the MFI website or through your Local Enterprise Office.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú iarratas a dhéanamh trí shuíomh Gréasáin MFI nó trí d’Oifig Fiontair Áitiúil.

translation.en: COVID19 Working Capital Scheme
translation.ga: Scéim Caipitil Oibre COVID19

translation.en: Loans from €25,000 to €1.5 million are available to SME’s and small MidCap enterprises (defined as businesses with up to 499 employees), who meet the eligibility criteria.
translation.ga: Tá iasachtaí idir €25,000 agus €1.5 milliún ar fáil d’fhiontair bheaga agus mheánmhéide agus d’fhiontair bheaga MidCap (a shainmhínítear mar ghnóthaí a bhfuil suas le 499 fostaí acu), a chomhlíonann na critéir incháilitheachta.

translation.en: Loans have a maximum interest rate of 4% and the first €500,000 borrowed can be unsecured.
translation.ga: Tá uasráta úis 4% ag iasachtaí agus is féidir an chéad € 500,000 a fuarthas ar iasacht a bheith neamhurraithe.

translation.en: You can apply through the SBCI website.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú iarratas a chur isteach ar an suíomh Gréasáin SBCI .

translation.en: Trading Online Voucher Scheme
translation.ga: Scéim um Dhearbhán Trádála Ar Líne

translation.en: A Trading Online Voucher Scheme worth up to €2,500 is available through to help small and microenterprises get online.
translation.ga: Tá Scéim Dearbhán Trádála Ar Líne ar fiú suas le €2,500 iad ar fáil chun cabhrú le gnóthaí beaga agus micrifhiontair tús a chur leo dul ar líne.

translation.en: A second voucher of up to €2,500 is also available.
translation.ga: Tá an dara dearbhán suas le €2,500 ar fáil freisin.

translation.en: Contact your Local Enterprise Office for more information and application details.
translation.ga: Téigh i dteagmháil le d’ Oifig Fiontar Áitiúil chun tuilleadh faisnéise agus sonraí iarratais a fháil.

translation.en: Enterprise Support Grant
translation.ga: Deontas Tacaíochta Fiontair

translation.en: If you were getting the COVID19 Pandemic Unemployment Payment (PUP), Jobseeker’s Benefit or Jobseeker’s Allowance and are reopening your business, you may qualify for the Enterprise Support Grant.
translation.ga: Má bhí Íocaíocht Dífhostaíochta um Paindéim COVID19 (PUP), Sochar Cuardaitheora Poist nó Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist á fháil agat agus má tá tú ag athoscailt do ghnó, d’fhéadfá cáiliú don Deontas Tacaíochta Fiontair .

translation.en: The grant, worth up to €1000, is aimed at sole traders who do not pay commercial rates and, therefore, do not qualify for the CRSS or similar restart grants.
translation.ga: Tá an deontas, ar fiú suas le €1000 é, dírithe ar thrádálaithe aonair nach níocann rátaí tráchtála agus, dá bhrí sin, nach gcáilíonn don CRSS ná do dheontais atosaithe dá samhail.

translation.en: To apply, download the COVID19 ESG 1 application form and return it your local Intreo Centre.
translation.ga: Chun iarratas a dhéanamh, déan foirm iarratais COVID19 ESG 1 a íoslódáil agus seol í ar ais chuig d’Ionad Intreo áitiúil.

translation.en: Future Growth Loan Scheme
translation.ga: Scéim Iasachta um Fhás sa Todhchaí

translation.en: The Future Growth Loan Scheme is available to businesses in Ireland, including those in agriculture and fishing sectors.
translation.ga: Tá an Scéim Iasachta um Fhás sa Todhchaí ar fáil do ghnóthaí in Éirinn, lena náirítear iad siúd in earnálacha na talmhaíochta agus na hiascaireachta.

translation.en: Loans are available from €25,000 up to €3,000,000 for terms of between 7 and 10 years.
translation.ga: Tá iasachtaí ar fáil atá idir €25,000 agus €3,000,000 ar feadh téarmaí idir 7 agus 10 mbliana.

translation.en: The loans have a maximum interest rate of 4.5% and the first €500,000 borrowed can be unsecured.
translation.ga: Tá uasráta úis 4.5% ag iasachtaí agus féadtar an chéad €500,000 a fuarthas ar iasacht a bheith neamhurraithe.

translation.en: You can get more information on how to apply from the SCBI website.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat tuilleadh faisnéise a fháil ar conas iarratas a dhéanamh ar shuíomh Gréasáin SCBI .

translation.en: COVID19 Business Financial Planning Grant
translation.ga: Deontas Pleanála Airgeadais Gnó COVID19

translation.en: You may be eligible for a Business Financial Planning Grant from Enterprise Ireland of up to €5,000 to help you develop a Business Sustainment Plan and to engage the services of an approved Financial Consultant.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfá a bheith incháilithe le haghaidh Deontas Pleanála Airgeadais Gnó ó Fhiontraíocht Éireann de suas le € 5000 chun cabhrú leat Plean Cothabhála Gnó a fhorbairt agus chun seirbhísí Comhairleora Airgeadais ceadaithe a fhostú.

translation.en: For more information and to apply contact Enterprise Ireland.
translation.ga: Le haghaidh tuilleadh faisnéise agus chun iarratas a dhéanamh déan teagmháil le Fiontraíocht Éireann .

translation.en: Sustaining Enterprise Fund
translation.ga: Ciste um Chothú Fiontar

translation.en: The Sustaining Enterprise Fund is aimed at firms in the manufacturing and international services sectors with 10 or more employees.
translation.ga: Tá an Ciste um Chothú Fiontar dírithe ar ghnóthaí sna hearnálacha déantúsaíochta agus seirbhísí idirnáisiúnta a bhfuil 10 bhfostaí nó níos mó acu.

translation.en: The fund is operated by Enterprise Ireland and provides advances of up to €800,000 which are only repayable when a business returns to good financial health.
translation.ga: Is í Fiontraíocht Éireann a oibríonn an ciste agus soláthraíonn sé airleacain suas le €800,000 nach bhfuil inaisíoctha ach amháin nuair a bhíonn sláinte mhaith airgeadais ag gnó arís.

translation.en: The Apprenticeship Incentivisation Scheme provides a €3,000 payment for each new apprentice, to support employers to take on new apprenticeships until the end of June 2021.
translation.ga: Soláthraíonn an Scéim Dreasachtaí Printíseachta íocaíocht de €3,000 in aghaidh gach printísigh nua, chun tacú le fostóirí printíseachtaí nua a thabhairt isteach don tréimhse suas go dtí deireadh mhí an Mheithimh 2021.

translation.en: You can get more information from Solas about how to apply.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat tuilleadh faisnéise a fháil ó Solas faoi conas iarratas a dhéanamh .

translation.en: Crossborder companies
translation.ga: Cuideachtaí trasteorann

translation.en: If you are a crossborder company, you can get professional advice on COVID19 challenges up to the value of €2,250 from InterTradeIreland’s Emergency Business Solutions.
translation.ga: Más cuideachta trasteorann tú, is féidir leat comhairle ghairmiúil a fháil ar dhúshláin COVID19 suas go luach € 2,250 ó InterTradeIreland Réitigh Éigeandála Ghnó.

translation.en: Under the EMerge programme, you can get €2,800 in consultancy support, to help your business develop online sales and eCommerce solutions.
translation.ga: Faoin gclár EMerge, is féidir leat €2,800 a fháil i dtacaíocht chomhairleachta, chun cabhrú le do ghnó díolacháin ar líne agus réitigh ríomhthráchtála a fhorbairt.

translation.en: Help for specific industries
translation.ga: Cabhair do thionscail ar leith

translation.en: There are specific supports and guidance for different sectors of industry.
translation.ga: Tá tacaíochtaí agus treoir shonrach ann d’ earnálacha éagsúla tionscail .

translation.en: You can find up to date details of the key supports and resources in Section 4 of the Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment’s Supports for businesses impacted by COVID19 booklet (pdf).
translation.ga: Is féidir leat sonraí cothrom le dáta a fháil faoi na príomhthacaí agus acmhainní i gCuid 4 den leabhrán um Thacaíochtaí do ghnóthaí a bhfuil tionchar ag COVID19 orthu (pdf) ag an Roinn Fiontar, Trádála agus Fostaíochta.

translation.en: Rates waiver and tax measures
translation.ga: Tarscaoileadh rátaí agus bearta cánach

translation.en: A number of measures are available to help businesses reduce their operational costs.
translation.ga: Tá roinnt beart ar fáil chun cabhrú le gnóthaí a gcostais oibríochta a laghdú..

translation.en: Waiving of commercial rates
translation.ga: Rátaí tráchtála a tharscaoileadh

translation.en: Rates due to local authorities were waived until 31 December 2020.
translation.ga: Tarscaoileadh, go dtí an 31 Nollaig 2020, rátaí a bhí dlite le húdaráis áitiúla.

translation.en: A commercial rates relief will apply for the first 3 months of 2021 for areas affected by Level 5 restrictions.
translation.ga: Beidh faoiseamh rátaí tráchtála i bhfeidhm don chéad 3 mhí de 2021 do réimsí a dtéann srianta Leibhéal 5 i bhfeidhm orthu.

translation.en: There are some exceptions to this, contact your Local Authority for further details.
translation.ga: Tá roinnt eisceachtaí ann maidir leis seo, déan teagmháil le d’ Údarás Áitiúil le haghaidh tuilleadh sonraí.

translation.en: Reduction of standard rate of VAT
translation.ga: Laghdú ar an ráta caighdeánach CBL

translation.en: The standard rate of VAT was reduced from 23% to 21%, on 1 September 2020 until 28 February 2021.
translation.ga: Laghdaíodh an ráta caighdeánach CBL ó 23% go 21%, don tréimhse idir 1 Meán Fómhair 2020 agus 28 Feabhra 2021.

translation.en: The VAT rate for the hospitality and tourism sector decreased from 13.5% to 9% on 1 November 2020 until 31 December 2021.
translation.ga: Tháinig laghdú ar an ráta CBL don earnáil fáilteachais agus turasóireachta ó 13.5% go 9% an 1 Samhain 2020 go dtí an 31 Nollaig 2021.

translation.en: ‘Warehousing’ of tax liabilities
translation.ga: ‘Trádstóráil' dliteanas cánach

translation.en: Debts that are warehoused are subject to 0% interest for 12 months.
translation.ga: Tá fiacha atá trádstóráilte faoi réir úis 0% ar feadh 12 mhí.

translation.en: After this 12month period, a reduced interest rate of 3% a year will apply.
translation.ga: Tar éis na tréimhse 12 mhí seo, beidh ráta úis laghdaithe 3% sa bhliain i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: You can get more information on the initiatives covering COVID19 related tax debts in Revenue’s Information Booklet (pdf).
translation.ga: Is féidir leat tuilleadh faisnéise a fháil faoi na tionscnaimh maidir le fiacha cánach a bhaineann le COVID19 i Leabhrán Faisnéise na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim (pdf) .

translation.en: Advice for taxpayers and agents
translation.ga: Comhairle do cháiníocóirí agus do ghníomhairí

translation.en: Revenue has advice for businesses experiencing trading difficulties as a result of COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá comhairle do ghnóthaí a bhfuil deacrachtaí trádála acu mar thoradh ar COVID19 á cur ar fáil ag na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim.

translation.en: This includes information on tax returns, late payment interest, debt enforcement, tax clearance and customs.
translation.ga: Cuimsítear anseo faisnéis faoi thuairisceáin chánach, ús ar íocaíocht dhéanach, forfheidhmiú fiach, imréiteach cánach agus custaim.

translation.en: Training and mentoring
translation.ga: Oiliúint agus meantóireacht

translation.en: Skillnet Ireland is running a number of initiatives aimed at helping small businesses through current business challenges.
translation.ga: Tá Skillnet Ireland ag reáchtáil roinnt tionscnamh atá dírithe ar chabhrú le gnóthaí beaga aghaidh a thabhairt ar dhúshláin ghnó reatha.

translation.en: The ReBound initiative gives small businesses online training and mentoring on implementing the return to work safely protocol.
translation.ga: Leis an tionscnamh ReBound tugtar oiliúint agus meantóireacht ar líne do ghnóthaí beaga maidir leis an bprótacal um fhilleadh ar obair go sábháilte a chur i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: You can get more information about returning to work safely after COVID19 closures.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú tuilleadh faisnéise a fháil maidir le filleadh ar an obair go sábháilte tar éis dhúnadh COVID19 .

translation.en: The MentorsWork initiative is a free 8week mentoring programme to support business recovery and help you sustain and improve your business.
translation.ga: MentorsWork Is clár meantóireachta 8 seachtaine saor in aisce é an tionscnamh chun tacú le gnóthú gnó agus chun cabhrú leat do ghnó a chothú agus a fheabhsú.

translation.en: There are 300 places available and you can apply at mentorswork.ie.
translation.ga: Tá 300 áit ar fáil agus is féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh ag mentorswork.ie .

translation.en: Support is also available from:
translation.ga: Tá tacaíocht ar fáil freisin ó:

translation.en: Enterprise Ireland
translation.ga: Fiontraíocht Éireann

translation.en: IDA Ireland
translation.ga: GFT Éireann

translation.en: Local Enterprise Offices
translation.ga: Oifigí Fiontair Áitiúil

translation.en: Údarás na Gaeltachta
translation.ga: Údarás na Gaeltachta

translation.en: The Government supports and guidance continue to develop as the COVID19 situation changes.
translation.ga: Leantar le forbairt a dhéanamh ar thacaíochtaí agus treoir an Rialtais de réir mar a athraíonn staid COVID19.

translation.en: You can get up to date information from the Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment (DETE).
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú faisnéis cothrom le dáta a fháil ón Roinn Fiontar, Trádála agus Fostaíochta (RFTF) .

translation.en: You can get details of the key supports and resources in the Supports for businesses impacted by COVID19 booklet (pdf).
translation.ga: Is féidir leat sonraí a fháil faoi na príomhthacaí agus acmhainní sa leabhrán um Thacaíochtaí do ghnóthaí a bhfuil tionchar ag COVID19 orthu (pdf) .

translation.en: Working from home during COVID19
translation.ga: Ag oibriú as baile i rith COVID19

translation.en: Employers' duties
translation.ga: Dualgais fostóirí

translation.en: Employee responsibilities
translation.ga: Freagrachtaí fostaí

translation.en: Annual leave during COVID19 restrictions
translation.ga: Saoire bhliantúil i rith shrianta COVID19

translation.en: Data protection and cybersecurity when working from home
translation.ga: Cosaint sonraí agus cibearshlándáil nuair a bhítear ag oibriú as baile

translation.en: Eworking and tax relief
translation.ga: Ríomhoibriú agus faoiseamh cánach

translation.en: Can I continue to work from home when the COVID19 restrictions have been lifted?
translation.ga: An féidir liom leanúint ag oibriú as baile nuair a baineadh srianta COVID19?

translation.en: Where to get more information
translation.ga: Cá dtiocfaidh mé ar eolas breise?

translation.en: Ireland is on Level 5 restrictions until 31 January 2021.
translation.ga: Tá srianta Leibhéal 5 i bhfeidhm in Éirinn go dtí an 31 Eanáir 2021.

translation.en: Under Level 5, only essential workers should travel to work.
translation.ga: Níor cheart ach d’oibrithe bunriachtanacha taisteal go dtí an obair faoi Leibhéal 5.

translation.en: You should work from home unless you are providing an essential service and need to be physically present.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit oibriú as baile murach go bhfuil seirbhís bhunriachtanach á soláthar agat agus más gá duit a bheith i láthair go fisiciúil.

translation.en: The Living with COVID19 plan sets out how we should live and work.
translation.ga: Leagtar amach sa Phlean maidir le Maireachtáil le COVID19 conas ba cheart dúinn maireachtáil agus oibriú.

translation.en: The Plan sets out 5 levels that correspond to the severity of COVID19 in a location.
translation.ga: Leagtar amach 5 leibhéal sa Phlean a fhreagraíonn do thromchúise COVID19 i láthair.

translation.en: Different levels can be in place in different locations in the country.
translation.ga: Bíonn leibhéil éagsúla i bhfeidhm i láithreacha éagsúla sa tír.

translation.en: Employers must ensure the safety, health and welfare at work of all their employees.
translation.ga: Caithfidh fostóirí sábháilteacht, sláinte agus leas ag an obair a chinntiú dá bhfostaithe go léir.

translation.en: Employees also have responsibilities when they are working from home.
translation.ga: Bíonn freagrachtaí ar fhostaithe freisin nuair a bhíonn siad ag oibriú as baile.

translation.en: Employers' duties
translation.ga: Dualgais fostóirí

translation.en: Employers have specific duties to ensure the safety, health and welfare at work of all their employees.
translation.ga: Tá dualgais ar leith ar fhostóirí sábháilteacht, sláinte agus leas ag an obair a chinntiú dá bhfostaithe go léir.

translation.en: These duties include the employee’s workspace if employees work from home.
translation.ga: I measc na ndualgas seo, tá spás oibre an fhostaí, má oibríonn fostaithe as baile.

translation.en: Managing and conducting all work activities to ensure, as far as reasonably practicable, the safety, health and welfare of employees
translation.ga: Gach gníomhaíocht oibre a bhainistiú agus a dhéanamh le sábháilteacht, sláinte agus leas fostaithe a chinntiú, a mhéid agus is indéanta go réasúnta.

translation.en: Providing safe work that is planned, organised, and maintained
translation.ga: Obair shábháilte a sholáthar atá pleanáilte, eagraithe, agus a dhéantar a chothabháil

translation.en: Assessing risks and implementing appropriate control measures
translation.ga: Measúnú a dhéanamh ar rioscaí agus bearta cuí rialaithe a chur i bhfeidhm

translation.en: Providing safe equipment including personal protective equipment, where necessary
translation.ga: Trealamh sábháilte a sholáthar, trealamh cosanta pearsanta san áireamh, nuair is gá

translation.en: Giving information, instruction, training and supervision about safety and health to employees
translation.ga: Eolas, teagasc, oiliúint agus maoirseacht a chur ar fáil maidir le sábháilteacht agus sláinte d’fhostaithe

translation.en: Having plans in place for emergencies
translation.ga: Pleananna a bheith i bhfeidhm i gcás éigeandálaí

translation.en: If employees have a disability, are young workers or are pregnant, employers need to ensure that the tasks and working conditions do not adversely affect their health.
translation.ga: Má tá fostaithe faoi mhíchumas, más oibrithe óga iad nó má tá siad torrach, caithfidh fostóirí a chinntiú nach nimríonn na tascanna agus na coinníollacha oibre drochthionchar ar a sláinte.

translation.en: You can get more information on sensitive risk groups.
translation.ga: Is féidir eolas breise a fháil ar ghrúpaí íogaire a bhfuil baol rompu.

translation.en: Your employer should check with you to ensure:
translation.ga: Ba cheart do d’fhostóir seiceáil leat leis an méid seo a leanas a chinntiú:

translation.en: You are aware of any specific risks when working from home
translation.ga: Tá tú ar an eolas ar aon bhaol ar leith nuair a oibríonn tú as baile

translation.en: The work activity and the temporary workspace are suitable
translation.ga: Tá an ghníomhaíocht oibre agus an spás sealadach oibre oiriúnach

translation.en: You have suitable equipment to do the work.
translation.ga: Tá trealamh oiriúnach agat chun an obair a dhéanamh.

translation.en: For example, your employer should make sure that the applications and systems you need are installed on your computer
translation.ga: Mar shampla, ba cheart do d’fhostóir a chinntiú go bhfuil na feidhmchláir agus na córais a theastaíonn uait ar fáil ar do ríomhaire

translation.en: There is a prearranged means of contact
translation.ga: Tá bealach réamhshocraithe teagmhála ann

translation.en: Equipment and your workspace at home
translation.ga: Trealamh agus do spás oibre sa bhaile

translation.en: If your employer provides equipment, for example, a laptop, mouse, keyboard and headset it must be in good condition and suitable for the activity.
translation.ga: Má chuireann d’fhostóir trealamh ar fáil, mar shampla, ríomhaire glúine, luchóg, méarchlár agus fearas cinn, caithfidh bail mhaith a bheith air agus caithfidh sé a bheith oiriúnach don ghníomhaíocht.

translation.en: If you already have suitable equipment at home, it can be used temporarily.
translation.ga: Má tá trealamh oiriúnach agat cheana féin sa bhaile, is féidir úsáid shealadach a bhaint as.

translation.en: Employers must check that your temporary home workspace is suitable for the work.
translation.ga: Caithfidh fostóirí a sheiceáil go bhfuil do spás oibre sealadach oiriúnach don obair.

translation.en: This includes things like safe access to the space, essential equipment, that the space is big enough and free of clutter, there is adequate lighting, ventilation, heat, and that electrical sockets, plugs and cords are in good condition.
translation.ga: Áirítear leis seo rudaí cosúil le teacht sábháilte a bheith agat ar an spás, trealamh bunriachtanach, tá an spás mór a dhóthain agus níl tranglam ann, tá soilsiú leordhóthanach, aerú agus teas ann agus tá deachaoi ar shoicéid, plocóidí agus cordaí leictreacha.

translation.en: Employers need to communicate regularly with employees and ensure that employees are taking adequate breaks.
translation.ga: Caithfidh fostóirí cumarsáid rialta a dhéanamh le fostaithe agus a chinntiú go bhfuil sosanna leordhóthanacha á nglacadh ag fostaithe.

translation.en: Keep in contact with employees
translation.ga: Leanúint le teagmháil a dhéanamh le fostaithe

translation.en: Give regular updates to each employee
translation.ga: Nashonruithe rialta a thabhairt do gach fostaí

translation.en: Have emergency contacts and procedures in place
translation.ga: Teagmhálaithe agus nósanna imeachta éigeandála a bheith i bhfeidhm

translation.en: Ensure employees take adequate breaks – see our document on rest periods and breaks.
translation.ga: Cinntigh go nglacann fostaithe sosanna leordhóthanacha – féach ár gcáipéis ar thréimhsí agus sosanna scíthe.

translation.en: Even though you are working from home you should have the same access to training and promotion opportunities as comparable colleagues working in the office.
translation.ga: Cé go bhfuil tú ag oibriú as baile, ba cheart go mbeadh an teacht céanna agat ar dheiseanna oiliúna agus ardaithe céime i gcomparáid le comhghleacaithe atá ag oibriú san oifig.

translation.en: Employee responsibilities
translation.ga: Freagrachtaí fostaí

translation.en: If you are working from home, you have a responsibility to take reasonable care of yourself and other people who may be affected by the work you are doing.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag oibriú as baile, tá freagracht ort aire réasúnta a thabhairt duit féin agus do dhaoine eile a bhféadfadh go ndéanann an obair a dhéanann tú difear dóibh.

translation.en: Cooperate with your employer and follow their instructions
translation.ga: Comhoibriú le d’fhostóir agus a dtreoracha a leanúint

translation.en: Protect yourself and others from harm during the course of your work.
translation.ga: Tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint ó dhíobháil fad a bhíonn d’obair á dhéanamh.

translation.en: For example, you must take care of your equipment and report any problems immediately to your employer
translation.ga: Mar shampla, caithfidh tú aire a thabhairt do do threalamh agus aon fhadhbanna a thabhairt le fios láithreach do d’fhostóir

translation.en: Report injuries to your employer immediately
translation.ga: Gortuithe a thabhairt le fios do d’fhostóir láithreach

translation.en: Follow any procedures put in place by your employer, for example, around checking in regularly
translation.ga: Aon nósanna imeachta a leanúint a chuir d’fhostóir i bhfeidhm, mar shampla, maidir le seiceáil isteach go rialta.

translation.en: Agree temporary remote working arrangements with your employer, including regular communication with them
translation.ga: Comhaontú a dhéanamh ar shocruithe cianoibre sealadacha le d’fhostóir, cumarsáid rialta a dhéanamh leo san áireamh

translation.en: Identify the work to be done at home with your employer
translation.ga: An obair a aithint atá le déanamh sa bhaile le d’fhostóir

translation.en: Identify the equipment you need to set up a safe workspace at home and agree this with your employer
translation.ga: An trealamh a shainaithint a theastaíonn uait chun spás oibre sábháilte a shocrú agus comhaontú a dhéanamh air seo le d’fhostóir

translation.en: Identify a suitable safe space within your home for home working
translation.ga: Spás sábháilte oiriúnach a shainaithint laistigh de do theach chun oibriú as baile ann

translation.en: Agree plans and contacts to be used in the event of an emergency
translation.ga: Comhaontú a dhéanamh ar phleananna agus teagmhálaithe i gcás éigeandála

translation.en: Ensure you have a suitable workspace – See good positioning at your workstation (pdf)
translation.ga: Cinntigh go bhfuil spás oibre oiriúnach agat – féach deashuíomh ag do stáisiún oibre (pdf)

translation.en: People working from home may feel reluctant to tell their employer that they are unwell.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir go mbíonn drogall ar dhaoine atá ag oibriú as baile a bhfostóir a chur ar an eolas go bhfuil siad breoite.

translation.en: It is important to note that if you are feeling unwell the normal sick leave rules still apply.
translation.ga: Is tábhachtach a thabhairt faoi deara go mbíonn na gnáthrialacha saoire bhreoiteachta i bhfeidhm go fóill má bhraitheann tú breoite.

translation.en: General tips for working from home
translation.ga: Leideanna ginearálta maidir le hoibriú as baile

translation.en: We have summarised general tips to help you look after your health and wellbeing while working from home temporarily during the COVID19 pandemic.
translation.ga: Tá achoimre tugtha againn ar leideanna ginearálta chun cabhrú leat aire a thabhairt do do shláinte agus d’fholláine fad a bhíonn tú ag oibriú as baile go sealadach i rith phaindéim COVID19.

translation.en: Stick to your normal routine as much as possible, starting your day as you normally would: shower, getting dressed and eating breakfast
translation.ga: Cloígh le do ghnáthamh a mhéid agus is féidir, cuir tús le do lá faoi mar a dhéanfá de ghnáth: cithfholcadh a ghlacadh, tú féin a ghléasadh agus bricfeasta a ithe

translation.en: Keep times for lunch, dinner as close to normal as you can
translation.ga: Bíodh am lóin agus dinnéir a ghaire don ghnátham a bhíonn siad agat, a mhéid agus is féidir leat

translation.en: When taking breaks resist the temptation to just go and make a coffee and come back to your workspace.
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn sosanna á nglacadh agat déan iarracht gan díreach cupán caife a réiteach agus filleadh ar do spás oibre.

translation.en: Make the effort to go into another room or out to the garden, if you have one
translation.ga: Déan iarracht dul isteach i seomra eile nó amach go dtí an gairdín, má tá ceann agat

translation.en: Log off for your lunch break
translation.ga: Logáil amach do shos an lóin

translation.en: If your partner is also working from home, arrange to have breaks together in another room or in the garden, if you have one
translation.ga: Má tá do pháirtnéir ag oibriú as baile freisin, socraigh go mbeidh sosanna agaibh le chéile i seomra eile nó sa ghairdín, má tá ceann agat

translation.en: Give your eyes a break, for 5 to 10 minutes every hour.
translation.ga: Tabhair sos do do shúile, ar feadh idir 5 agus 10 nóiméad gach uair an chloig.

translation.en: Get up, move around and take your eyes off the screen
translation.ga: Éirigh i do sheasamh, siúil timpeall agus bain do shúile den scáileán

translation.en: Try to limit your social and news media intake
translation.ga: Déan iarracht teorainn a chur ar an méid meáin shóisialta agus nuachta a namharcann tú orthu

translation.en: Exercise, stretch and go out for a walk if possible
translation.ga: Déan aclaíocht, sín na matáin agus imigh leat ar siúlóid, más féidir

translation.en: Make sure you rest and get a good night’s sleep
translation.ga: Cinntigh go ndéanann tú do scíth a ligean agus go mbíonn oíche mhaith chodlata agat

translation.en: Restrict the amount of alcohol you consume during the week to help you stay focused
translation.ga: Cuir srian ar an méid alcóil a ólann tú i rith na seachtaine chun cabhrú leat bheith dírithe i gcónaí

translation.en: Eat healthy foods even though as it is tempting to increase your intake of snack foods
translation.ga: Ith bianna sláintiúla, fiú cé go bhfuil sé mealltach na bianna sneaice atá á nithe agat a mhéadú

translation.en: Do take annual leave even if your travel plans have been cancelled, it may help to take even a portion of the leave planned so you can concentrate on your own health and wellbeing
translation.ga: Glac saoire bhliantúil fiú má cuireadh do phleananna taistil ar ceal, b’fhéidir go gcabhróidh sé fiú chun cuid den tsaoire a bhí beartaithe agat a ghlacadh chun gur féidir leat díriú ar do shláinte agus folláine féin

translation.en: Keep in touch with your colleagues, pick up the phone or video call colleagues that you would usually spend breaks or lunchtime with and chat to them for a few minutes
translation.ga: Lean ort agus teagmháil a dhéanamh le do chomhghleacaithe, cuir glaoch gutháin ar nó déan físchomhrá leis na comhghleacaithe a gcaithfeá sosanna nó am lóin leo de ghnáth agus a labhrófá leo ar feadh cúpla nóiméad

translation.en: Annual leave during COVID19 restrictions
translation.ga: Saoire bhliantúil i rith shrianta COVID19

translation.en: You continue to build up your annual leave when you are working from home and working your usual hours.
translation.ga: Leanann an méid saoire bhliantúil a bhíonn tú i dteideal a fháil ag dul i méid nuair a bhíonn tú ag oibriú as baile agus nuair a bhíonn do ghnáthuaireanta á noibriú agat.

translation.en: You may not want to take annual leave during the COVID19 restrictions as your travel options are limited.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir nach mian leat saoire bhliantúil a ghlacadh i rith shrianta COVID19 mar gheall go bhfuil do roghanna taistil teoranta.

translation.en: However, employers may not want you to keep all your leave until later in the year.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir nach mian le fostóirí, áfach, go gcoimeádann tú do shaoire go léir go dtí níos déanaí sa bhliain.

translation.en: Your employer may ask you to take some of your leave before a certain date.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir go niarrfaidh d’fhostóir ort glacadh le roinnt de do shaoire roimh dháta áirithe.

translation.en: The Organisation of Working Time Act 1997 provides that the timing of an employee’s annual leave can be determined by the employer having regard to work requirements.
translation.ga: Foráiltear san Acht um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997 gur féidir leis an bhfostóir cinneadh a dhéanamh faoin tráth a ghlactar le saoire bhliantúil fostaí agus aird ar riachtanais oibre.

translation.en: Under the Act, an employer can require an employee to take annual leave provided they consult with the employee or their trade union at least one month prior to the taking of annual leave.
translation.ga: Faoin Acht, is féidir le fostóir iarraidh ar fhostaí glacadh le saoire bhliantúil a fhad agus go dtéann siad i gcomhairle leis an bhfostaí nó lena gceardchumann ar a laghad uair sa mhí sula nglactar le saoire bhliantúil.

translation.en: Employers need to consider the following when deciding on annual leave:
translation.ga: Caithfidh fostóirí breithniú a dhéanamh ar an méid seo a leanas nuair a dhéantar cinneadh faoi shaoire bhliantúil:

translation.en: The need for the employee to reconcile work and family responsibilities, and
translation.ga: An gá atá leis go ndéanfaidh an fostaí freagrachtaí oibre agus teaghlaigh a réiteach, agus

translation.en: The opportunities for rest and recreation available to the employee
translation.ga: Na deiseanna le haghaidh scíthe agus caitheamh aimsire atá ar fáil don fhostaí

translation.en: It should be noted that employees should be left with a proportionate amount of annual leave for the remainder of the year to allow them avail of opportunities for rest and recreation when businesses return back to normal.
translation.ga: Ba cheart a thabhairt faoi deara gur cheart méid comhréireach de shaoire bhliantúil a bheith ag fostaithe go fóill don chuid eile den bhliain lena cheadú dóibh deiseanna scíthe agus caitheamh aimsire a thapú nuair a fhillfidh gnólachtaí ar ghnáthfheidhmiú.

translation.en: Employers are also entitled to refuse annual leave which has already been booked from being cancelled.
translation.ga: Tá fostóirí i dteideal freisin saoire bhliantúil a dhiúltú a cuireadh in áirithe cheana féin.

translation.en: Your employer may allow you to carry over annual leave until the next annual leave year.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir go gceadóidh d’fhostóir duit saoire bhliantúil a thabhairt anonn go dtí an chéad bhliain saoire bliantúla eile.

translation.en: Data protection and cybersecurity when working from home
translation.ga: Cosaint sonraí agus cibearshlándáil nuair a bhítear ag oibriú as baile

translation.en: The Data Protection Commission has given guidance on protecting personal data when working remotely.
translation.ga: Thug an Coimisiún Cosanta Sonraí treoir ar shonraí pearsanta a chosaint nuair a bhítear ag cianoibriú.

translation.en: Both employers and employees should ensure that:
translation.ga: Ba cheart d’fhostaithe agus d’fhostóirí an méid seo a leanas a chinntiú:

translation.en: Any device used has the necessary updates, such as operating system, software and antivirus updates
translation.ga: Tá na nuashonruithe riachtanacha ag aon ghléas a úsáidtear, ar nós córas oibriúcháin, bogearraí agus nuashonruithe frithvíris

translation.en: Any device is used in a safe location, and that nobody else can view the screen, particularly if working with sensitive personal data
translation.ga: Úsáidtear aon ghléas i láthair shábháilte, agus ní féidir le duine ar bith eile an scáileán a fheiceáil, go háirithe má táthar ag oibriú le sonraí pearsanta íogaire

translation.en: Devices are locked if they are left unattended for any reason and stored carefully when not in use
translation.ga: Cuirtear gléasanna faoi ghlas mura bhfuil duine i bhfeighil orthu ar chúis ar bith agus stóráiltear go cúramach iad nuair nach mbíonn siad á núsáid

translation.en: Effective access controls, such as strong passwords, and, where available, encryption are used to restrict access to the device, and to reduce the risk if a device is stolen or lost
translation.ga: Úsáidtear rialuithe éifeachtacha rochtana, ar nós pasfhocail láidre agus, nuair atá sé ar fáil, úsáidtear criptiú chun rochtain ar an ngléas a shrianadh, agus chun an baol a laghdú má dhéantar gléas a ghoid nó a chailleadh

translation.en: Work email accounts rather than personal ones are used for work related emails involving personal data.
translation.ga: Úsáidtear cuntais ríomhphoist oibre, seachas cinn phearsanta do ríomhphoist a bhaineann leis an obair nuair a bhíonn sonraí pearsanta i gceist.

translation.en: If personal email has to be used, any contents and attachments should be encrypted and personal or confidential data should be avoided in subject lines
translation.ga: Má tá ríomhphost pearsanta le húsáid, ba cheart aon ábhair agus ceangaltáin a chriptiú agus ba cheart sonraí pearsanta nó rúnda a sheachaint i línte ábhair

translation.en: Where possible only the organisation’s trusted networks or cloud services are used
translation.ga: Sa chás gur féidir, níor cheart ach líonraí nó néalseirbhísí na heagraíochta a bhfuil iontaoibh astu a úsáid, sa chás gur féidir

translation.en: Steps are taken to ensure the security and confidentiality of paper records, such as by keeping them locked in a filing cabinet or drawer when not in use and making sure they are not left somewhere where they could be read by others, lost or stolen
translation.ga: Téitear i mbun beart le slándáil agus rúndacht taifid pháipéir a chinntiú, ar nós trí iad a choimeád faoi ghlas i gcaibinéad comhad nó i dtarraiceán nuair nach bhfuil siad á núsáid agus cinntigh nach bhfágtar iad in áit éigin ina bhféadfadh daoine eile iad a léamh nó ina bhféadfaí iad a chailleadh nó a ghoid

translation.en: The National Cyber Security Centre has published Working From Home Security Advice.
translation.ga: D’fhoilsigh an tIonad Náisiúnta Cibearshlándála Comhairle Slándála faoi Oibriú as Baile.

translation.en: There are certain privacy rules that your employer must follow when monitoring you in the workplace and these rules also apply when you are working from home.
translation.ga: Tá rialacha áirithe príobháideachais ann nach mór do d’fhostóir cloí leo nuair a bhíonn monatóireacht á déanamh ort san ionad oibre agus bíonn na rialacha seo i bhfeidhm freisin nuair a bhíonn tú ag oibriú as baile.

translation.en: You can get information in our document on surveillance in the workplace.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat eolas a fháil inár gcáipéis ar fhaireachas san ionad oibre.

translation.en: Eworking and tax relief
translation.ga: Ríomhoibriú agus faoiseamh cánach

translation.en: If you are working from home, you may be eligible for tax relief on expenses like light, heat, telephone and broadband.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag oibriú as baile, b’fhéidir go bhfuil tú incháilithe faoiseamh cánach a fháil ar chostais cosúil le solas, teas, guthán agus leathanbhanda.

translation.en: If your employer pays you an allowance towards these expenses, you can get up to €3.20 per day without paying any tax, PRSI or USC on it.
translation.ga: Má íocann d’fhostóir liúntas leat i dtreo na gcostas seo, is féidir leat a mhéid le €3.20 sa lá a fháil gan aon cháin, ÁSPC nó MSU a íoc air.

translation.en: If your employer pays more than €3.20 per day to cover expenses, you pay tax, PRSI and USC as normal on the amount above €3.20.
translation.ga: Má íocann d’fhostóir breis agus €3.20 leat sa lá chun íoc as costais, íocann tú cáin, ÁSPC agus MSU mar is gnách ar an méid os cionn €3.20.

translation.en: If your employer does not pay you an allowance for your expenses, you can make a claim for tax relief at the end of the year.
translation.ga: Mura níocann d’fhostóir liúntas leat as do chostais, is féidir leat éileamh a dhéanamh ar fhaoiseamh cánach ag deireadh na bliana.

translation.en: You will get money back from the taxes you paid.
translation.ga: Gheobhaidh tú airgead ar ais ó na cánacha a d’íoc tú.

translation.en: You can read more about Eworking and tax relief.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat níos mó a léamh faoi Ríomhoibriú agus faoiseamh cánach.

translation.en: Should I pay tax on equipment from my employer?
translation.ga: Ar cheart dom cáin a íoc ar threalamh ó m’fhostóir?

translation.en: If your employer gives you equipment that you need to do your work, like a computer or printer, and you mainly use it for work, it is not considered a benefit in kind.
translation.ga: Má thugann d’fhostóir trealamh duit a theastaíonn uait chun d’obair a dhéanamh, cosúil le ríomhaire nó printéir, agus má bhaineann tú úsáid as don obair, go príomha, ní cheaptar gur sochar comhchineáil é.

translation.en: This means that you do not have to pay any tax for receiving the equipment from your employer.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn seo nach gá duit aon cháin a íoc as an trealamh a fháil ó d’fhostóir.

translation.en: Capital Gains Tax
translation.ga: Cáin Ghnóthachan Caipitiúil

translation.en: If you use only part of your home for eworking, your home remains your Principal Private Residence and you are not liable for CGT when you sell it.
translation.ga: Mura núsáideann tú ach cuid de do theach chun ríomhoibriú, is é do theach d’Áit Chónaithe Phríomha go fóill agus níl tú faoi dhliteanas CGT a íoc nuair a dhíolann tú é.

translation.en: You can get more information from Revenue.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat eolas breise a fháil ó na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim.

translation.en: Can I continue to work from home when the COVID19 restrictions have been lifted?
translation.ga: An féidir liom leanúint ag oibriú as baile nuair a baineadh srianta COVID19?

translation.en: You do not have a right to work from home.
translation.ga: Níl an ceart agat oibriú as baile.

translation.en: Your employment rights are primarily set out in your contract of employment.
translation.ga: Tá do chearta fostaíochta leagtha amach go príomha i do chonradh fostaíochta.

translation.en: Some employees may have already written into their contract of employment that they can work from home for a number of hours or days per week.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir gur luaigh roinnt fostaithe cheana féin ina gconradh fostaíochta gur féidir leo oibriú as baile ar feadh roinnt uaireanta an chloig nó laethanta sa tseachtain.

translation.en: Those entitlements will remain the same.
translation.ga: Ní thiocfaidh athrú ar na teidlíochtaí siúd.

translation.en: Most contracts of employment have a requirement that the employee must appear at a designated place of work.
translation.ga: Baineann riachtanas le formhór na gconarthaí fostaíochta go gcaithfidh an fostaí teacht i láthair ag áit oibre ainmnithe.

translation.en: It is also common for employers to have a right to change the designated place of work.
translation.ga: Bíonn an ceart ag fostóirí minic go leor freisin chun an áit oibre ainmnithe a athrú.

translation.en: In those circumstances, employers can insist on you returning to the workplace.
translation.ga: Faoi na cúinsí siúd, is féidir le fostóirí a éileamh go bhfilleann tú ar an ionad oibre.

translation.en: You should talk to your employer first to see if you can continue to work from home.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit labhairt le d’fhostóir ar dtús féachaint an féidir leat leanúint ag oibriú as baile.

translation.en: This will vary between employers.
translation.ga: Is éagsúil a bheidh seo i measc fostóirí.

translation.en: Your employment rights during the COVID19 restrictions
translation.ga: Do chearta fostaíochta i rith srianta COVID19

translation.en: FAQs for Employers and Employees in relation to HomeWorking on a temporary basis (COVID19) on HSA website
translation.ga: Ceisteanna Coitianta d’fhostóirí agus fostaithe maidir le hOibriú as Baile ar bhonn sealadach (COVID19) ar láithreán gréasáin an Údaráis Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta

translation.en: Protecting Personal Data When Working Remotely on the Data Protection Commissioner's website
translation.ga: Sonraí Pearsanta a Chosaint nuair atá Cianoibriú á Dhéanamh ar láithreán gréasáin an Choimisinéara Cosanta Sonraí.

translation.en: Changes to your contract of employment
translation.ga: Athruithe ar do chonradh fostaíochta

translation.en: COVID19 and social welfare payments
translation.ga: COVID19 agus íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh

translation.en: Health and Safety Authority
translation.ga: Údarás Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta

translation.en: Returning to work safely following COVID19 closures and work safely protocols
translation.ga: Ag filleadh ar an obair go sábháilte tar éis dhúnadh COVID19 agus prótacail oibre sábháilte

translation.en: Planning for return to work
translation.ga: Pleanáil le haghaidh filleadh ar an obair

translation.en: Getting to and from work
translation.ga: Ag dul chuig agus ag teacht ón obair

translation.en: Staying safe at work
translation.ga: Ag fanacht sábháilte ag an obair

translation.en: Where can I make a complaint?
translation.ga: Cén áit is féidir liom gearán a dhéanamh?

translation.en: The Government’s Resilience and Recovery 2020 – 2021: Plan for living with COVID19 sets out how we can live and work with COVID19.
translation.ga: Leagann an Rialtais Teacht Aniar agus Téarnamh 20202021: an Plean maidir le Maireachtáil le COVID19 amach conas is féidir linn maireachtáil agus oibriú le COVID19.

translation.en: The plan sets out 5 levels that correspond to the severity of COVID19 in a location.
translation.ga: Leagtar amach sa phlean na 5 leibhéal a fhreagraíonn do dhéine COVID19 i suíomh.

translation.en: Different levels can be in place in different locations in the country.
translation.ga: Is féidir leibhéil éagsúla a bheith i bhfeidhm in áiteanna éagsúla sa tír.

translation.en: This document is a summary of the work safely protocol published by the HSA, the HSE, the Department of Health and the Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment.
translation.ga: Is achoimre é an doiciméad seo ar an bprótacal oibre sábháilte a d’fhoilsigh an HSA, FSS, an Roinn Sláinte agus an Roinn Fiontar, Trádála agus Fostaíochta.

translation.en: The protocol describes the steps that employers and employees should take before a workplace reopens to make sure they can return to work safely.
translation.ga: Déanann an prótacal cur síos ar na bearta ba chóir d’fhostóirí agus d’fhostaithe a dhéanamh sula nathosclaíonn ionad oibre lena chinntiú go bhféadann siad filleadh ar an obair go sábháilte.

translation.en: It also covers how businesses should operate after they reopen to reduce the spread of COVID19 in the workplace.
translation.ga: Clúdaíonn sé freisin an chaoi ar cheart do ghnólachtaí oibriú tar éis dóibh athoscailt chun scaipeadh COVID19 san ionad oibre a laghdú.

translation.en: The Health Safety Authority (HSA) will carry out workplace inspections and provide guidance for employers.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh an tÚdarás Sábháilteachta Sláinte (HSA) cigireachtaí san ionad oibre agus chuirfidh sé treoir ar fail d’fhostóirí.

translation.en: If their advice is not implemented, the HSA can shut down the workplace.
translation.ga: Mura gcuirtear a gcuid comhairle i bhfeidhm, is féidir leis an HSA an tionad oibre a dhúnadh.

translation.en: The Workplace Relations Commission (WRC) will also carry out inspections and provide guidance to employers.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh an Coimisiún um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre (WRC) cigireachtaí freisin agus soláthróidh sé treoir d’fhostóirí.

translation.en: Both employers and employees should keep up to date with the latest HSE advice and guidance.
translation.ga: Ba cheart d’fhostóirí agus d’fhostaithe araon coinneáil suas chun dáta leis an gcomhairle agus an treoir is déanaí ó FSS.

translation.en: You can get more detailed information in the revised Work Safely Protocol (pdf) (Previously called the Return to Work Safely Protocol).
translation.ga: Is féidir leat faisnéis mionsonraithe a fháil sa Phrótacal Oibre Sábháilte (pdf) (Ar a dtugtaí an Prótacal um Fhilleadh ar Obair go Sábháilte roimhe seo).

translation.en: The revised protocol sets out the minimum measures needed in every workplace to manage and prevent the spread of infection.
translation.ga: Leagann an prótacal athbhreithnithe amach na íosbhearta is gá a dhéanamh i ngach ionad oibre chun leathadh an ionfhabhtaithe a bhainistiú agus a chosc.

translation.en: It gives information on the selection of hand sanitisers, the wearing of face masks, ventilation of workplaces and symptoms.
translation.ga: Tugann sé eolas faoi roghnú díghalráin láimhe, caitheamh maisc aghaidhe, aeráil áiteanna oibre agus comharthaí.

translation.en: There may be additional safeguards in different workplaces.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh go mbeadh cosaintí breise in áiteanna oibre éagsúla.

translation.en: The protocol may change or be updated over time.
translation.ga: Féadfar an prótacal a athrú nó a nuashonrú le himeacht ama.

translation.en: Please check back as we will continue to add information to this document as it is updated.
translation.ga: Seiceáil go minic le do thoil mar leanfaimid orainn ag cur leis an doiciméad seo de réir mar a dhéantar é a nuashonrú.

translation.en: Planning for return to work
translation.ga: Pleanáil le haghaidh filleadh ar an obair

translation.en: All employers must prepare and put systems and controls in place before they reopen their business and workplaces.
translation.ga: Caithfidh gach fostóir córais agus rialuithe a ullmhú agus a chur i bhfeidhm sula nathosclaíonn siad a ngnó agus a nionaid oibre.

translation.en: Appoint at least one lead worker representative to make sure safety measures are in place and being followed.
translation.ga: Príomhionadaí oibrithe amháin ar a laghad a cheapadh chun a chinntiú go bhfuil bearta sábháilteachta i bhfeidhm agus á leanúint.

translation.en: A short online course on the role of lead worker representative can be found on the HSA website.
translation.ga: Is féidir cúrsa gairid ar líne ar ról ionadaí oibrithe ceannais a dhéanamh ar Láithreáin Gréasáin HSA.

translation.en: Update business and safety plans, including the business COVID19 Response Plan, the occupational health and safety risk assessment and the safety statement.
translation.ga: Pleananna gnó agus sábháilteachta a nuashonrú, lena náirítear Plean Freagartha COVID19 do ghnó, an measúnú riosca sláinte ceirde agus sábháilteachta agus an ráiteas sábháilteachta.

translation.en: Include how to deal with a suspected case of COVID19 in the safety plans and appoint a dedicated manager in charge of dealing with suspected cases.
translation.ga: Cuir conas déileáil le cás amhrasta COVID19 san áireamh sna pleananna sábháilteachta agus ceap bainisteoir tiomnaithe i gceannas chun déileáil le cásanna amhrasta.

translation.en: Develop, consult on, communicate and implement workplace changes or policies.
translation.ga: Athruithe nó beartais san ionad oibre a fhorbairt, comhairliúchán a dhéanamh orthu, iad a chur in iúl agus a chur i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: Provide COVID19 induction training for all staff.
translation.ga: Oiliúint ionduchtaithe COVID19 a sholáthar don fhoireann go léir.

translation.en: Put in place temperature testing in line with public health advice.
translation.ga: Tástáil teochta a chur i bhfeidhm de réir na comhairle sláinte poiblí.

translation.en: Put in place any mass COVID19 testing needed in line with public health advice.
translation.ga: Cuir aon ollthástáil COVID19 i bhfeidhm a theastaíonn de réir na comhairle sláinte poiblí.

translation.en: Pre return to work form
translation.ga: Foirm roimh fhilleadh ar obair

translation.en: An employer must send out a prereturn to work form to employees before their return to work.
translation.ga: Ní mór d’fhostóir foirm Foirm roimh fhilleadh ar obair a sheoladh chuig fostaithe sula bhfillfidh siad ar an obair.

translation.en: The employee must submit the form before they return to work.
translation.ga: Caithfidh an fostaí an fhoirm a chur isteach sula bhfilleann sé/sí ar an obair.

translation.en: The form will ask employees to confirm they have not had symptoms of COVID19 in the past 14 days, have not been diagnosed or suspected of COVID19 in the past 14 days, have not been in close contact with someone confirmed or suspected of COVID19 in the past 14 days and are not restricting their movements, selfisolating or cocooning.
translation.ga: Iarrfaidh an fhoirm ar fhostaithe a dhearbhú nach raibh comharthaí COVID19 acu le 14 lá anuas, nach ndearnadh diagnóis nó nach raibh amhras orthu faoi COVID19 le 14 lá anuas, nach raibh siad i ndlúththeagmháil le duine a dearbhaíodh é/í le nó a raibh amhras ann faoi COVID19 le 14 lá anuas agus níl siad ag srianadh a gcuid gluaiseachtaí, féinaonraithe nó ag cocúnáil.

translation.en: You can get a return to work form template from the HSA website.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat teimpléad foirme um fhilleadh ar obair a fháil ó Láithreán Gréasáin HSA.

translation.en: Note: Completed forms should only be kept for as long as necessary by the employer and in line with the advice from the Data Protection Commission.
translation.ga: Nóta: Níor cheart don fhostóir foirmeacha comhlánaithe a choinneáil ach chomh fada agus is gá agus de réir na comhairle ón gCoimisiún um Chosaint Sonraí.

translation.en: Getting to and from work
translation.ga: Ag dul chuig agus ag teacht ón obair

translation.en: You should travel alone if using your personal car for work or at a maximum travel with one other passenger who should adhere to physical distancing guidelines and a face covering must be worn.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit taisteal i d’aonar má tá tú ag úsáid do chairr phearsanta chun dl arg obair nó taisteal le paisinéir amháin eile ar a mhéad ar chóir dó/di cloí le treoirlínte um fhadú fisiceach agus caithfear clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: Your employer should give you hand sanitisers and cleaning equipment for your work vehicle.
translation.ga: Ba chóir d’fhostóir díghalráin láimhe agus trealamh glantacháin a thabhairt duit d’fheithicil oibre.

translation.en: Walk or cycle where possible.
translation.ga: Siúil nó téigh ar rothar nuair is féidir.

translation.en: If you are using public transport, you must wear a face covering.
translation.ga: Má tá iompar poiblí á úsáid agat, caithfidh tú clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: Businesses should refer to the latest Government advice in relation to essential overseas travel for employees.
translation.ga: Ba cheart do ghnólachtaí tagairt a dhéanamh don chomhairle is déanaí ón Rialtas maidir le taisteal riachtanach thar lear d’fhostaithe.

translation.en: Staying safe at work
translation.ga: Ag fanacht sábháilte ag an obair

translation.en: Employers and employees should work together to help reduce the spread of COVID19 and know the symptoms of COVID19.
translation.ga: Ba cheart d’fhostóirí agus d’fhostaithe oibriú le chéile chun scaipeadh COVID19 a laghdú agus comharthaí COVID19 a bheith ar eolas acu.

translation.en: The complete list of COVID19 symptoms is available on the HSE Website.
translation.ga: Tá liosta iomlán na gcomharthaí COVID19 ar fáil ar Láithreán Gréasáin FSS.

translation.en: Employer’s responsibilities
translation.ga: Freagrachtaí an fhostóra

translation.en: Your employer must:
translation.ga: Seo thíos liosta do rudaí a chaithfidh d’fhostóir a dhéanamh:

translation.en: Have appropriate hygiene facilities in place, display posters of good hand washing practices and have proper ventilation for example open doors and windows.
translation.ga: Caithfidh sé saoráidí sláinteachais iomchuí a chur ar fáil, póstaeir de dheachleachtais níocháin láimhe a chrochadh agus aeráil cheart a chinntiú, mar shampla doirse agus fuinneoga oscailte.

translation.en: Give tissues as well as bins or bags for employee’s disposal.
translation.ga: Caithfidh sé ciarsúir a sholáthair chomh maith le boscaí bruscair nó málaí lena ndiúscairt ag an bhfostaí.

translation.en: Empty bins regularly and provide advice on good respiratory practice, including the safe use, storage and disposal of face masks.
translation.ga: Caithfidh sé boscaí bruscair a fholmhú go rialta agus comhairle a sholáthar ar dheachleachtas riospráide, lena náirítear úsáid, stóráil agus diúscairt masc aghaidhe.

translation.en: Provide for physical distancing across all work activities of at least 2 metres as much as possible.
translation.ga: Caithfidh sé socruithe a dhéanamh do fhadú fisiceach 2 mhéadar ar a laghad thar gach gníomhaíocht oibre a oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: (Staggering breaks, or place teams in pods, put in place arrangements for meetings and canteen facilities, put in place a no handshaking policy, no sharing of cups or pens, adapt sign in or sign out systems).
translation.ga: (Sosanna céimithe, nó an fhoireann a chur i ngrúpaí, socruithe a chur i bhfeidhm le haghaidh cruinnithe agus áiseanna ceaintín, beartas gan croitheadh lámha a chur i bhfeidhm, gan cupáin ná pinn a roinnt, córais sínithe isteach nó sínithe amach a oiriúnú).

translation.en: Install physical barriers, such as clear plastic sneeze guards between workers were 2 metre distancing is not possible.
translation.ga: Bacainní fisiciúla a shuiteáil, mar shampla sciatha sraotha plaisteacha soiléire idir oibrithe mura bhfuil sé indéanta fad 2 mhéadar a choinneáil.

translation.en: For guidelines on physical distancing in the hospitality sector, see ‘Returning to work in pubs, restaurants and the hospitality sector’ below.
translation.ga: Le haghaidh treoirlínte maidir le fadú fisiceach san earnáil fáilteachais, féach ‘Ag filleadh ar obair i dtithe tábhairne, i mbialanna agus san earnáil fáilteachais’ thíos.

translation.en: Keep a log of contacts to help with contact tracing.
translation.ga: Caithfidh sé loga teagmhálacha a choinneáil chun cabhrú le rianú teagmhála.

translation.en: Have regular cleaning of the workplace and provide hand sanitisers.
translation.ga: Caithfidh sé an tionad oibre a ghlanadh go rialta agus díghalrán láimhe a sholáthar.

translation.en: An alcohol based sanitiser must have a minimum of 60% alcohol.
translation.ga: Caithfidh díghalrán alcólbhunaithe 60% ar a laghad d’alcól a bheith aige.

translation.en: See the Work Safely Protocol (pdf) for more details on cleaning and advice on choosing a hand sanitiser.
translation.ga: Féach an Prótacal Oibre Sábháilte (pdf) chun tuilleadh sonraí a fháil maidir le glanadh agus comhairle maidir le díghalrán láimhe a roghnú.

translation.en: Provide Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) and protective clothing where there is an identified COVID19 exposure risk and in line with public health advice.
translation.ga: Caithfidh sé Trealamh Cosanta Pearsanta (TCP) agus éadaí cosanta a sholáthar i gcás ina bhfuil riosca nochta COVID19 aitheanta agus de réir na comhairle sláinte poiblí.

translation.en: You can get more information on PPE from the HSA.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú tuilleadh eolais ar TCP a fháil ón HSA.

translation.en: Make sure employees look after their mental health and wellbeing and are aware of any employee assistance programmes.
translation.ga: Caithfidh sé a chinntiú go dtugann fostaithe aire dá sláinte mheabhrach agus dá bhfolláine agus go bhfuil siad ar an eolas faoi aon chláir chúnaimh d’fhostaithe.

translation.en: If an employee has symptoms of COVID19
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí COVID19 ag fostaí

translation.en: If an employee has symptoms of the virus during work hours, your employer must have a designated isolation area for employees and must follow a specific procedure:
translation.ga: Má bhíonn comharthaí an víris ag fostaí le linn uaireanta oibre, caithfidh limistéar leithlisithe ainmnithe a bheith ag d’fhostóir d’fhostaithe agus caithfidh sé nós imeachta ar leith a leanúint:

translation.en: The designated manager must direct the person to a designated isolation area, along a designated route (make provisions for one or more persons displaying symptoms such as an additional isolation area or have contingency plans in place)
translation.ga: Caithfidh an bainisteoir ainmnithe an duine a threorú chuig limistéar leithlisithe ainmnithe, feadh bealach ainmnithe (déan forálacha do dhuine amháin nó níos mó a bhfuil comharthaí air mar shampla limistéar leithlisithe breise nó bíodh pleananna teagmhasacha i bhfeidhm)

translation.en: Maintain a 2 metre distance
translation.ga: Coinnigh achar 2 mhéadar eadraibh

translation.en: Provide a face mask for the person presenting with symptoms.
translation.ga: Cuir masc aghaidh ar fáil don duine a bhfuil na comharthaí air.

translation.en: The worker should wear the mask if in a common area with other people or while exiting the premises
translation.ga: Ba chóir don oibrí an masc a chaitheamh má tá sé i limistéar choiteann le daoine eile nó agus é ag imeacht ón áitreabh

translation.en: Arrange for the employee to stay in isolation before arranging for them to be transported home, or to a medical facility, public transport should not be used.
translation.ga: Socraigh go bhfanfaidh an fostaí ina (h)aonar sula socrófar go niomprófar abhaile é, nó chuig saoráid leighis, níor cheart iompar poiblí a úsáid.

translation.en: Arrange for appropriate cleaning of the isolation area and work areas
translation.ga: Socraigh go ndéanfar an limistéar leithlisithe agus na limistéir oibre a ghlanadh go cuí

translation.en: Carry out a full risk assessment of the incident to see what, if any, further action needs to be taken
translation.ga: Déan measúnú riosca iomlán ar an eachtra chun a fháil amach cén gníomh is gá a dhéanamh, más ann dó

translation.en: Employee’s responsibilities
translation.ga: Freagrachtaí an fhostaí

translation.en: As an employee, you should:
translation.ga: Mar fhostaí, ba cheart duit:

translation.en: Follow the public health advice and guidance
translation.ga: An chomhairle agus an treoir sláinte poiblí a leanúint

translation.en: Work together with your employer and follow any specific procedures and instructions from your employer to keep safe
translation.ga: Oibriú le d’fhostóir agus aon nósanna imeachta agus treoracha ar leith ó d’fhostóir a leanúint chun coinneáil slán

translation.en: Adopt good hygiene practices, such as frequent hand washing, respiratory etiquette and physical distancing
translation.ga: Glacadh le deachleachtais sláinteachais, mar shampla do lámha a ní go minic, béasaíocht riospráide agus fadú fisiceach

translation.en: Get professional healthcare advice if you are unwell
translation.ga: Comhairle cúraim sláinte ghairmiúil a fháil má tá tú tinn

translation.en: Not go to work if you have any symptoms of COVID19
translation.ga: Gan dul ag obair má tá aon chomharthaí de COVID19 agat

translation.en: Let your employer know if you believe there are reasons why it is not safe for you to be at work, or if you are concerned that you could be putting a member of your household at risk
translation.ga: D’fhostóir a chur ar an eolas má chreideann tú go bhfuil cúiseanna ann nach bhfuil sé sábháilte duit a bheith ag obair, nó má tá imní ort go bhféadfá ball de do theaghlach a chur i mbaol

translation.en: Where can I make a complaint?
translation.ga: Cén áit is féidir liom gearán a dhéanamh?

translation.en: The role of the Health and Safety Authority is to ensure compliance with Work Safely Protocol.
translation.ga: Is é ról an Údaráis Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta a chinntiú go gcomhlíontar an Prótacal Oibre Sábháilte.

translation.en: If an employee feels the workplace is not in compliance with this protocol which includes social distancing guidelines, they can raise their concerns with the HSA and they will address the concerns with their employer.
translation.ga: Má bhraitheann fostaí nach gcomhlíonann an tionad oibre an prótacal seo lena náirítear treoirlínte um fhadú sóisialta, féadfaidh siad a nimní a ardú leis an HSA agus tabharfaidh siad aghaidh ar na hábhair imní lena bhfostóir.

translation.en: You can make a complaint using the HSA’s online complaint form.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat gearán a dhéanamh trí fhoirm ghearáin ar líne an HSA a úsáid.

translation.en: You should raise your concern with your employer first to give them the opportunity to address the issue.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit d’imní a ardú le d’fhostóir ar dtús chun deis a thabhairt dóibh tabhairt faoin gceist.

translation.en: Both employers and employees can find out when various business can reopen in the Government’s Living with COVID19 plan.
translation.ga: Is féidir le fostóirí agus fostaithe araon a fháil amach cathain is féidir le gnóthais éagsúla athoscailt i bplean Maireachtála le COVID19 an Rialtais.

translation.en: Everyone should stay safe and make themselves aware of the advice in the work safely protocol (pdf).
translation.ga: Ba chóir do gach duine fanacht sábháilte agus iad féin a chur ar an eolas faoin gcomhairle sa phrótacal oibre sábháilte (pdf).

translation.en: Employers can get return to work COVID19 templates and checklists from the HSA and COVID19 posters and signs from the HSE.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh fostóirí teimpléid agus seicliostaí COVID19 un fhille ar obair agus póstaeir agus comharthaí COVID19 a fháil ón HSA.

translation.en: The HSA also have return to work safely online courses.
translation.ga: Tá tar éis cúrsaí ar líne um fhilleadh ar an obair go sábháilte ag an HSA.

translation.en: The Skillnet Ireland ReBound initiative gives small businesses online training and mentoring on implementing the return to work safely protocol.
translation.ga: Tugann tionscnamh Skillnet Ireland ReBound oiliúint agus meantóireacht ar líne do ghnólachtaí beaga maidir leis an bprótacal um fhilleadh ar obair go sábháilte a chur i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: Employers can get information on the financial supports and business advice available to help with their cash flow, payroll and longterm investments.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh fostóirí faisnéis faoi na tacaíochtaí airgeadais agus an chomhairle ghnó a chur ar fáil chun cabhrú lena sreabhadh airgid, a bpárolla agus a ninfheistíochtaí fadtéarmacha.

translation.en: The Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment has set up a business support call centre for information on the supports available for businesses affected by COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá ionad glaonna um thacaíochta gnó curtha ar bun ag an Roinn Fiontar, Trádála agus Fostaíochta chun eolas a sholáthar faoi na tacaíochtaí atá ar fáil do ghnólachtaí a bhfuil tionchar ag COVID19 orthu.

translation.en: You can call 01 631 2002 or email infobusinesssupport@enterprise.gov.ie.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat glaoch ar 01 631 2002 nó ríomhphost a sheoladh chuig infobusinesssupport@enterprise.gov.ie.

translation.en: You can also find contact details for the Health and Safety Authority.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat sonraí teagmhála a fháil freisin don Údarás Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta.

translation.en: You are encouraged to contact the HSA electronically during COVID19 as their staff are working remotely and they have limited access to post.
translation.ga: Moltar duit teagmháil a dhéanamh go leictreonach leis an HSA le linn COVID19 toisc go bhfuil a bhfoireann ag obair go cianda agus go bhfuil rochtain theoranta acu ar an bpost.

translation.en: COVID19: travel overview
translation.ga: COVID19: forbhreathnú taistil

translation.en: The Travel ‘Green List’
translation.ga: An 'Liosta Glas' Taistil

translation.en: Travel abroad
translation.ga: Taisteal thar lear

translation.en: Travel within Ireland
translation.ga: Taisteal laistigh d'Éirinn

translation.en: The Government has eased restrictions on travel within Ireland.
translation.ga: Rinne an Rialtas srianta ar thaisteal laistigh d’Éirinn a mhaolú.

translation.en: You should avoid nonessential travel abroad, apart from travel to countries on the 'Green List'.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit taisteal neamhriachtanach thar lear a sheachaint, seachas taisteal chuig tíortha ar an ‘Liosta Glas’.

translation.en: If you are coming to Ireland, this document explains the restrictions and conditions you can expect upon your arrival.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag teacht go hÉirinn, míníonn an doiciméad seo na srianta agus na coinníollacha is féidir leat a bheith ag súil leo ar theacht duit.

translation.en: Our document Driving and transport during COVID19 has the latest information on:
translation.ga: Tá an fhaisnéis is déanaí maidir le:

translation.en: License renewals
translation.ga: Athnuachan ceadúnais

translation.en: Driving tests
translation.ga: Tástálacha tiomána

translation.en: Vehicle registration
translation.ga: Clárú feithicle

translation.en: Tax and insurance
translation.ga: Cáin agus árachas

translation.en: If you have made plans to travel within Ireland or abroad and want information on your rights if your trip is cancelled, you can read our document Travel plans and COVID19.
translation.ga: Má tá pleananna agat taisteal laistigh d’Éirinn nó thar lear agus má theastaíonn faisnéis uait faoi do chearta má chuirtear do thuras ar ceal, féadfaidh tú ár ndoiciméad Pleananna taistil agus COVID19 a léamh.

translation.en: Travelling to Ireland
translation.ga: Ag taisteal go hÉirinn

translation.en: If you plan to travel to Ireland, you should read the latest travel advice from the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade.
translation.ga: Má tá sé ar intinn agat taisteal go hÉirinn, ba cheart duit an chomhairle taistil is déanaí ón Roinn Gnóthaí Eachtracha a léamh.

translation.en: Passenger Locator Form
translation.ga: Foirm Aimsitheoir Paisinéirí

translation.en: If you arrive into Ireland from another country, you must fill in a COVID19 Passenger Locator Form.
translation.ga: Má thagann tú go hÉirinn ó thír eile, ní mór duit Foirm Aimsithe Paisinéara COVID19 a chomhlánú.

translation.en: This applies to people arriving from a country that is included on the Government’s 'COVID19 green list' and people arriving from a country that is not on the 'COVID19 green list'.
translation.ga: Baineann sé seo le daoine a thagann ó thír atá ar ‘liosta glas COVID19' an Rialtais agus daoine a thagann ó thír nach bhfuil ar ‘liosta glas COVID19’.

translation.en: The COVID19 Passenger Locator Form is now an online form.
translation.ga: Is foirm ar líne anois an Fhoirm Aimsithe Paisinéara COVID19.

translation.en: If you are travelling to Ireland you can complete the form on or before your arrival in Ireland.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag taisteal go hÉirinn is féidir leat an fhoirm a chomhlánú ar theacht duit go hÉirinn nó roimhe.

translation.en: The information on the form may be used to contact you to check your location, or to contact you if there is a confirmed or suspected case of COVID19 on your flight or ferry.
translation.ga: Féadfar an fhaisnéis ar an bhfoirm a úsáid chun teagmháil a dhéanamh leat chun do shuíomh a sheiceáil, nó chun teagmháil a dhéanamh leat má tá cás dearbhaithe nó amhrasta de COVID19 ar d’eitilt nó ar do bhád farantóireachta.

translation.en: If any of the information you provide on the form changes in the next 14 days, you must email passengerlocatorform@plf.ie with updated information.
translation.ga: Má thagann athrú ar aon chuid den fhaisnéis a sholáthraíonn tú ar an bhfoirm sna 14 lá ina dhiaidh sin, ní mór duit ríomhphost a sheoladh chuig paisinéiríococformform@plf.ie le faisnéis nuashonraithe.

translation.en: You may be fined up to €2,500 or imprisoned for up to 6 months, or both if you:
translation.ga: Féadfar fíneáil suas le €2,500 nó príosúnacht ar feadh suas le 6 mhí a ghearradh ort, nó an dá rud:

translation.en: Do not fill in and submit the form to a relevant person
translation.ga: Mura gcomhlánaíonn tú an fhoirm agus í a chur faoi bhráid duine ábhartha

translation.en: Knowingly provide information that is false or misleading
translation.ga: Má sholáthraíonn tú faisnéis atá bréagach nó míthreorach go feasach

translation.en: Do not provide further information when requested
translation.ga: Mura soláthraíonn tú tuilleadh faisnéise nuair a iarrtar ort

translation.en: Do not update your residence details if these change within 14 days of your arrival.
translation.ga: Mura ndéanann tú do chuid sonraí cónaithe a nuashonrú má thagann athrú air seo laistigh de 14 lá ó tháinig tú.

translation.en: You do not have to fill in this form if you are:
translation.ga: Ní gá duit an fhoirm seo a líonadh má tá tú:

translation.en: Arriving from Northern Ireland
translation.ga: Ag teacht ó Thuaisceart Éireann

translation.en: Working in defined essential supply chain roles
translation.ga: Ag obair i róil shainithe sa slabhra soláthair

translation.en: A foreign diplomat
translation.ga: Más taidhleoir eachtrach tú

translation.en: A transit passenger who will not be leaving the port or airport
translation.ga: Má Paisinéir idirthurais tú nach mbeidh ag fágáil an chalafoirt ná an aerfoirt

translation.en: You will only need to fill in part of the form, if you are not staying overnight in the State.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh ort ach cuid den fhoirm a chomhlánú, mura bhfuil tú ag fanacht thar oíche sa Stát.

translation.en: Immigration and employment permits during COVID19
translation.ga: Ceadanna inimirce agus fostaíochta le linn COVID19

translation.en: Returning to Ireland and COVID19
translation.ga: Ag filleadh ar Éirinn agus COVID19

translation.en: Restricting your movement
translation.ga: Do ghluaiseachtaí a shrianadh

translation.en: You should restrict your movements for 14 days after your arrival.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit do ghluaiseachtaí a shrianadh ar feadh 14 lá tar éis duit teacht.

translation.en: This means you should stay at home and avoid contact with other people and social situations as much as possible.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo gur cheart duit fanacht sa bhaile agus teagmháil le daoine eile agus cásanna sóisialta a sheachaint a oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: You do not need to restrict your movements if you are:
translation.ga: Ní gá duit do ghluaiseachtaí a shrianadh má tá tú:

translation.en: Arriving from Northern Ireland
translation.ga: Ag teacht ó Thuaisceart Éireann

translation.en: Aircraft crew, including pilots, in Ireland as part of your work
translation.ga: I do bhall de criú aerárthaí, píolótaí san áireamh, in Éirinn mar chuid de do chuid oibre

translation.en: Holder of a Certificate for International Transport Workers, or heavy good vehicle drivers and are in Ireland for work
translation.ga: I do shealbhóir Teastais d’Oibrithe Iompair Idirnáisiúnta, nó i do thiománaí feithiclí tromearraí agus tú in Éirinn le haghaidh oibre

translation.en: Ship crew, including the maritime master, in Ireland as part of your work
translation.ga: I do bhall de criú loinge, an máistir muirí san áireamh, in Éirinn mar chuid de do chuid oibre

translation.en: Arriving from a ‘normal precautions’ listed country (countries on the ‘green list’)
translation.ga: Ag teacht ó thír liostaithe ‘gnáthchúraimí’ (tíortha ar an ‘liosta glas’)

translation.en: The Travel ‘Green List’
translation.ga: An 'Liosta Glas' Taistil

translation.en: On 21 July 2020, the Government published a ‘green list’ of countries with a similar or lower incidence of COVID19 to that of Ireland.
translation.ga: An 21 Iúil 2020, d’fhoilsigh an Rialtas ‘liosta glas’ de thíortha a raibh minicíocht COVID19 acu cosúil le hÉirinn nó níos ísle.

translation.en: People entering Ireland from these locations do not have to restrict their movements for 14 days.
translation.ga: Ní gá do dhaoine a thagann isteach in Éirinn ó na suíomhanna seo a ngluaiseachtaí a shrianadh ar feadh 14 lá.

translation.en: The list is intended to act as a guide to where Irish residents may travel safely for essential purposes, such as for essential work or to care for family members.
translation.ga: Tá sé i gceist go mbeidh an liosta ina threoir maidir leis na tíortha is féidir le cónaitheoirí Éireannacha taisteal chucu go sábháilte chun críocha bunriachtanacha, mar shampla le haghaidh obair riachtanach nó chun aire a thabhairt do bhaill teaghlaigh.

translation.en: Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade (DFA) travel advice for countries on the ‘green list’ is that you should take ‘normal precautions’.
translation.ga: Is í comhairle taistil na Roinne Gnóthaí Eachtracha (DFA) do thíortha ar an ‘liosta glas’ ná gur cheart duit ‘gnáthréamhchúraimí’ a ghlacadh.

translation.en: This means that the country is as safe as Ireland.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo go bhfuil an tír chomh sábháilte le hÉirinn.

translation.en: The security rating for all other locations remains unchanged at either ‘avoid nonessential travel’ (‘orange’) or to ‘do not travel’ (‘red’).
translation.ga: Níl aon athrú ar an rátáil slándála do gach láthair eile atá ag ‘seachain taisteal neamhriachtanach’ (‘oráiste’) nó ag ‘ná taisteal’ (‘dearg’).

translation.en: If you are arriving in Ireland from a country on the Government green list, you should follow public health advice while you are in Ireland.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag teacht go hÉirinn ó thír ar liosta glas an Rialtais, ba cheart duit comhairle sláinte poiblí a leanúint agus tú in Éirinn.

translation.en: This means you should:
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo gur chóir duit:

translation.en: Keep 2 metres distance from people
translation.ga: Coinnigh 2 mhéadar idir tú féin agus daoine eile

translation.en: Avoid crowded places
translation.ga: Seachain áiteanna plódaithe

translation.en: Wear a face covering if you are on public transport and when you are in a shop or other indoor space where it is difficult to keep 2 metres distance from other people
translation.ga: Caith clúdach aghaidhe má tá tú ar iompar poiblí agus má tá tú i siopa nó i spás laistigh eile ina bhfuil sé deacair achar 2 mhéadar a choinneáil ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Work from home where possible
translation.ga: Oibrigh ón mbaile nuair is féidir

translation.en: Wear a face covering when visiting someone who is over 70 or is medically vulnerable to COVID19
translation.ga: Caith clúdach aghaidhe agus tú ag tabhairt cuairte ar dhuine atá os cionn 70 nó atá leochaileach ó thaobh míochaine de COVID19

translation.en: If you have symptoms of COVID19, you should selfisolate and contact a GP by telephone.
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí COVID19 agat, ba cheart duit féinaonrú agus teagmháil a dhéanamh le dochtúir teaghlaigh ar an teileafón.

translation.en: The green list from 21 September 2020
translation.ga: An liosta glas ón 21 Meán Fómhair 2020

translation.en: An update to the green list was published on 17 September 2020 and comes into force on 21 September 2020.
translation.ga: Foilsíodh nuashonrú ar an liosta glas an 17 Meán Fómhair 2020 agus tiocfaidh sé i bhfeidhm an 21 Meán Fómhair 2020.

translation.en: After this, the list will be updated every week until a new EUwide system is agreed.
translation.ga: Ina dhiaidh seo, déanfar an liosta a nuashonrú gach seachtain go dtí go gcomhaontófar córas nua ar fud an AE.

translation.en: Ireland will support the European Commission’s proposal to promote a common approach to travel restrictions and movement within the EU/EEA.
translation.ga: Tacóidh Éire le togra an Choimisiúin Eorpaigh cur chuige coiteann a chur chun cinn maidir le srianta agus gluaiseacht taistil laistigh den AE/LEE.

translation.en: The European Commission’s proposal is still being finalised, but is expected to be approved in October 2020.
translation.ga: Tá togra an Choimisiúin Eorpaigh fós á thabhairt chun críche, ach táthar ag súil le go gceadófar é i mí Dheireadh Fómhair 2020.

translation.en: What happens if the country I am visiting is removed from the Government ‘green list’ while I’m there?
