translation.ga: Cad a tharlóidh má bhaintear an tír a bhfuil mé ag tabhairt cuairte air ó ‘liosta glas’ an Rialtais agus mé inti?

translation.en: If you travel to a country or territory on the ‘green list’ and the country is removed from the list while you are abroad, you will have to restrict your movements for 14 days to minimise your risk of spreading the virus.
translation.ga: Má thaistealaíonn tú chuig tír nó críoch ar an ‘liosta glas’ agus má bhaintear an tír den liosta agus tú thar lear, beidh ort do ghluaiseachtaí a shrianadh ar feadh 14 lá chun do riosca go scaipfidh tú an víreas a íoslaghdú.

translation.en: Travel abroad
translation.ga: Taisteal thar lear

translation.en: The Irish Government is currently advising against all nonessential travel abroad, apart from countries included on the Government's 'COVID19 green list' where the advice is to take 'normal precautions'.
translation.ga: Tá Rialtas na hÉireann ag tabhairt comhairle faoi láthair gan aon taisteal neamhriachtanach a dhéanamh thar lear, seachas go tíortha atá ar ‘liosta glas COVID19' an Rialtais arb í an chomhairle sa chás sin ‘gnáthréamhchúraimí’ a ghlacadh.

translation.en: If you have booked a trip abroad and want information on your consumer rights, you can read our document Travel plans and COVID19.
translation.ga: Má tá turas curtha in áirithe agat thar lear agus ma theastaíonn faisnéis uait faoi do chearta tomhaltóra, is féidir leat ár ndoiciméad Pleananna taistil agus COVID19 a léamh.

translation.en: Traveling abroad may affect your social welfare payment.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh taisteal thar lear dul i bhfeidhm ar d’íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh.

translation.en: You should also check with your employer whether you will continue to be paid if you have to restrict your movements on upon your return.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit seiceáil le d’fhostóir freisin an leanfar le d'íocaíochtaí má tá ort do ghluaiseachtaí a shrianadh ar fhilleadh duit.

translation.en: Passports
translation.ga: Pasanna

translation.en: The Passport Service has resumed the processing of online applications for all passport types.
translation.ga: Tá an tSeirbhís Pas tar éis próiseáil iarratas ar líne do gach cineál pas a atosú.

translation.en: You should expect delays to your application.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit tabhairt faoi deara go bhféadfadh moill a bheith ar d’iarratas.

translation.en: The processing of Passport Express applications has also recommenced in Ireland and Northern Ireland.
translation.ga: Tá tús curtha le próiseáil iarratas Passport Express in Éirinn agus i dTuaisceart Éireann freisin.

translation.en: The turnaround time for processing paper based applications is 68 weeks.
translation.ga: Tógfaidh sé 68 seachtaine chun iarratais ar pháipéar a phróiseáil.

translation.en: Passport phone lines are now open.
translation.ga: Tá línte teileafóin Oifig na bPasanna ag obair arís anois.

translation.en: If you urgently need a passport to travel (because of the death or serious illness of a family member, or you need urgent medical treatment abroad), you should contact the Passport Service through webchat.
translation.ga: Má theastaíonn pas uait go práinneach chun taistil (mar gheall ar bhás nó ar bhreoiteacht thromchúiseach baill teaghlaigh, nó má theastaíonn cóir leighis phráinneach uait thar lear), ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an tSeirbhís Pas trí chomhrá ar líne.

translation.en: Travel within Ireland
translation.ga: Taisteal laistigh d'Éirinn

translation.en: If you live in Dublin you should not travel to other parts of the country while Dublin is at level 3 of the 'Plan for Living with COVID19', unless you have to travel for work, education or essential purposes.
translation.ga: Má tá cónaí ort i mBaile Átha Cliath níor chóir duit taisteal go dtí áiteanna eile sa tír fad atá Baile Átha Cliath ag leibhéal 3 den 'Phlean maidir le Maireachtáil le COVID19' mura gcaithfidh tú taisteal chun críocha oibre, oideachais nó riachtanacha.

translation.en: If you live outside of Dublin, you should avoid travelling to Dublin while it is level 3, unless you have to travel there for work, education or essential purposes.
translation.ga: Má tá cónaí ort taobh amuigh de Bhaile Átha Cliath, ba cheart duit taisteal go Baile Átha Cliath a sheachaint agus é ag leibhéal 3, mura gcaithfidh tú taisteal ansin chun críocha oibre, oideachais nó riachtanacha.

translation.en: To encourage people to holiday at home, the Government has introduced a new ‘Stay and Spend Tax Credit’.
translation.ga: Chun daoine a spreagadh chun saoire a ghlacadh sa bhaile, tá ‘Creidmheas Cánach Fan agus Caith’ tugtha isteach ag an Rialtas.

translation.en: The scheme allows you to claim a certain amount of tax back on accommodation, food and nonalcoholic drink purchased between 1 October 2020 and 30 April 2021.
translation.ga: Ligeann an scéim duit méid áirithe cánach a éileamh ar ais ar lóistín, ar bhia agus ar deoch neamhmheisciúil a ceannaítear idir 1 Deireadh Fómhair 2020 agus 30 Aibreán 2021.

translation.en: This scheme has now opened.
translation.ga: Tá an scéim seo oscailte anois.

translation.en: Travelling to Ireland during COVID19
translation.ga: Taisteal go hÉirinn le linn COVID19

translation.en: What are essential reasons for travel?
translation.ga: Cad iad na cúiseanna riachtanacha taistil?

translation.en: Prearrival test
translation.ga: Tástáil réamhtheachta

translation.en: Passenger Locator Form
translation.ga: Foirm Aimsitheora Paisinéara

translation.en: Visas
translation.ga: Víosaí

translation.en: Who has to quarantine?
translation.ga: Cé a chaithfidh coraintín a dhéanamh?

translation.en: Travel restrictions in Ireland
translation.ga: Srianta taistil in Éirinn

translation.en: You should not travel to Ireland unless you have an essential reason for your travel.
translation.ga: Níor chóir duit taisteal go hÉirinn mura bhfuil cúis riachtanach taistil agat

translation.en: If you have to travel to Ireland, you must have proof of a negative or ‘not detected’ COVID19 Reverse Transcription Polymerase Chain Reaction (RTPCR) test taken within 72 hours of your arrival.
translation.ga: Má tá ort taisteal go hÉirinn, ní mór duit cruthúnas a bheith agat ar thástáil imoibriú slabhrúil polaiméaráise cúltrascrioptáise cainníochtúil COVID19 (RTPRC) dhiúltach nó neamhbhriate glactha laistigh de 72 uair an chloig tar éir duit teacht.

translation.en: By law, you must quarantine when you arrive into Ireland, unless your journey starts in Northern Ireland.
translation.ga: De réir an dlí, ní mór duit coraintín a dhéanamh nuair a thagann tú go Éirinn, mura dtosaíonn do thuras i dTuaisceart Éireann.

translation.en: Mandatory hotel quarantine is in place for arrivals from certain countries – see 'Who has to quarantine?’ below.
translation.ga: Tá coraintín éigeantach óstáin i bhgfeidhm do dhaoine a thagann isteach ó thíortha áirithe réach 'Cé a chaithfidh coraintín a dhéanahm?' thíos

translation.en: What are essential reasons for travel?
translation.ga: Cad iad na cúiseanna riachtanacha taistil?

translation.en: You should only travel to Ireland if you have an essential reason for doing so.
translation.ga: Níor chóir duit taisteal go hÉirinn ach amháin má tá cúis riachtanach agat leis sin a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Essential family travel does not include social visits, but may include:
translation.ga: Ní chuimsíonn taisteal riachtanach teaglaigh aon chuariteanna sóisialta, ach d'fhéadfadh go gcuimseodh sé:

translation.en: Caring for children
translation.ga: Aire a thabhairt do leanaí

translation.en: Caring for older or vulnerable people, particularly if they live alone
translation.ga: Aire a thabhairt do dhaoine scothaosta nó leochaileacha, go háirithe má tá siad ina gcónaí ina naonar

translation.en: Exercising your legal right of access to a child
translation.ga: Do cheart rochtana dlíthiúil ar leanbh a fheidhmiú

translation.en: Going to a court hearing
translation.ga: Dul chuig éisteacht cúirte

translation.en: Going to a funeral
translation.ga: Dul chuig sochraid

translation.en: Essential business travel covers people whose presence in Ireland is critical to the functioning of a business.
translation.ga: Clúdaíonn taisteal riachtanach gnó daoine a bhfuil taisteal go hÉirinn ríthábhachtach d'fheidhmiú ngnó.

translation.en: Other essential reasons for travel include:
translation.ga: I measc cúiseanna riachtanacha eile le haghaidh taistil tá:

translation.en: To go to college or school if you have to be there in person
translation.ga: Taisteal chuig an gcoláiste nó an scoil má chaithfidh tú a bheith ann go pearsanta

translation.en: To go with a child or a vulnerable adult to school if they have to be there in person
translation.ga: Taisteal le leanbh nó le duine fásta leochaileach chun na scoile má chaithfidh sé/sí a bheith ann go pearsanta

translation.en: To go to a medical or dental appointment, or to go to an appointment with someone you live with, or a vulnerable person
translation.ga: Taisteal chuig coinne leighis nó fiaclóireachta, nó Taisteal chuig coinne in éireacht le duine atá ina c(h)ónaí leat, nó le suine leochaileach

translation.en: To seek essential or urgent medical, health or dental services, or to accompany someone you live with, or a vulnerable person who needs essential treatment
translation.ga: Taisteal chun serbhísí míochaine, sláinte nó ciaclóireachta riachtanacha a lorg, nó dul in éineacht le duine atáina c(h)ónaí leat, nó le duine leochaileach a hbhfuil cóireáil riachtanach de dhíth airuirthi.

translation.en: If you have an essential reason to travel to Ireland, you may still have to quarantine.
translation.ga: Fiú má tá cúis riachtanach agat le taisteal go hÉirinn, b'fhéidir go mbeidh ort coraintín a dhéanamh fós.

translation.en: Prearrival test
translation.ga: Tástáil réamhtheachta

translation.en: Almost all passengers arriving into Ireland must have a negative or ‘not detected’ COVID19 Reverse Transcription Polymerase Chain Reaction (RTPCR test) taken no more than 72 hours before your arrival.
translation.ga: Ní mór tástáil imoibriú slabhrúil polaiméaráise cúltrascrioptáise COVID19 diúltach (tástáil RTPCR) tógtha níos mó ná 72 uair roimh theacht a bheith ag beagnach gach paisinéir ata ag teacht chun na hÉireann.

translation.en: Antigen or other test types do not meet the requirements.
translation.ga: Ní chomhlíonann tástáil antaigine nó cineálacha tástála eile na ceanglais.

translation.en: If you have been vaccinated against COVID19, you must still have a negative or 'not detected' RTPCR test taken no more than 72 hours before your arrival.
translation.ga: Má vacsaíníodh tú i gcoinne COVID19, ní mór duit tástáil RTPCR dhiúltach nó ‘neamhbhraite’ a bheith déanta ort laistigh de 72 uair an chloig roimh theacht.

translation.en: If you arrive at an Irish airport or sea port without proof of a negative or ‘not detected’ COVID19 test, you are committing an offence.
translation.ga: Tá tú ag déanamh ciona má thagann tú i dtír ag aerfort nó ag calafort Éireannach gan cruthúnas ar thástáil COVID19 diúltach nó ‘neamhbhraite’ agat.

translation.en: People arriving from any country without a negative or not detected (RTPCR) test taken within 72 hours will have to quarantine at a hotel.
translation.ga: Beidh ar dhaoine a thagann go hÉirinn ó thír ar bith gan tástáil dhiúltach nó neamhbhraite (RTPCR) déanta laistigh de 72 uair an chloig coraintín a dhéanamh in óstán.

translation.en: You do not need a COVID test if you are travelling through Ireland and transiting to another country.
translation.ga: Ní theastaíonn tástáil COVID uait má tá tú ag taisteal trí Éirinn agus ag aistriú go tír eile.

translation.en: This only applies if you do not leave the airport.
translation.ga: Ní bhaineann sé seo ach sa chás nach bhfágann tú an taerfort.

translation.en: Children under 7 do not need COVID19 tests and there are some other exceptions.
translation.ga: Ní theastaíonn tástálacha COVID19 i gcás leanaí faoi bhun 7 mbliana d'aois agus tá roinnt eisceachtaí eile ann.

translation.en: You should read the latest travel advice before travelling to Ireland.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit an chomhairle taistil is déanaí a léamh sula dtaistealaíonn tú go hÉirinn.

translation.en: Passenger Locator Form
translation.ga: Foirm Aimsitheora Paisinéara

translation.en: If you arrive into Ireland from another country, including if you are travelling onwards to Northern Ireland, you must fill in an online COVID19 Passenger Locator Form before you arrive.
translation.ga: Má thagann tú go hÉirinn ó thír eile, lena náirítear má tá tú ag taisteal ar aghaidh go Tuaisceart Éireann, ní mór duit Foirm Aimsitheora Paisinéara COVID19 a chomhlánú ar líne sula dtagann tú.

translation.en: You must also fill out this form if you arrive in Ireland through Northern Ireland and were overseas in the 14 days before your arrival in Ireland.
translation.ga: Ní mór duit an fhoirm seo a chomhlánú freisin má thagann tú go hÉirinn trí Thuaisceart Éireann agus má bhí tú thar lear sna 14 lá sular tháinig tú go hÉirinn.

translation.en: The information on the form may be used to contact you to check your location, or to contact you if there is a confirmed or suspected case of COVID19 on your flight or ferry.
translation.ga: Féadfar an fhaisnéis ar an bhfoirm a úsáid chun teagmháil a dhéanamh leat chun cá bhfuil tú a chinntiú, nó chun teagmháil a dhéanamh leat má bhí cás dearbhaithe nó amhrasta COVID19 ar d’eitilt nó ar do bhád farantóireachta.

translation.en: If any of the information you provide on the form changes over the next 14 days, you must email passengerlocatorform@plf.ie with your updated information.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn athrú ar aon chuid den fhaisnéis a chuireann tú ar an bhfoirm thar na 14 lá ina dhiaidh, ní mór duit ríomhphost a sheoladh chuig passengerlocatorform@plf.ie le do chuid faisnéise nuashonraithe.

translation.en: You do not have to fill in this form if you are:
translation.ga: Ní gá duit an fhoirm seo chomhlánú sa chás go bhfuil tú:

translation.en: Working in defined essential supply chain roles
translation.ga: Ag obair i róil shainithe sa slabhra soláthair

translation.en: A foreign diplomat
translation.ga: I do thaidhleoir coigríche

translation.en: Failure to complete this form is an offence.
translation.ga: Is cion é gan an fhoirm seo a chomhlánú.

translation.en: Visas
translation.ga: Víosaí

translation.en: You should check if you need a visa for travelling to Ireland.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit seiceáil an bhfuil víosa ag teastáil uait chun taisteal go hÉirinn.

translation.en: Some nationalities that did not previously need a visa, must now apply for a visa to come to Ireland.
translation.ga: Caithfidh roinnt náisiúntachtaí nach raibh víosa ag teastáil uathu roimhe seo, iarratas a dhéanamh anois ar víosa chun teacht go hÉirinn.

translation.en: Visa applications are only being processed for essential travel.
translation.ga: Níl iarratais ar víosaí á bpróiseáil ach le haghaidh taistil riachtanach.

translation.en: Who has to quarantine?
translation.ga: Cé a chaithfidh coraintín a dhéanamh?

translation.en: By law, you must quarantine when you arrive into Ireland from abroad.
translation.ga: De réir an dlí, ní mór duit coraintín a dhéanamh nuair a thagann tú go hÉirinn ó thar lear.

translation.en: If you arrive from certain countries, or do not have a notdetected RTPCR test as required, you have to quarantine in a designated hotel.
translation.ga: Má thagann tú ó thíortha áirithe, nó mura bhfuil tástáil RTPCR neamhbhraite agat de réir mar is gá, caithfidh tú coraintín a dhéanamh in óstán ainmnithe.

translation.en: You must quarantine if you travel to Ireland through Northern Ireland.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú coraintín a dhéanamh má thaistealaíonn tú go hÉirinn trí Thuaisceart Éireann.

translation.en: Quarantine rules do not apply if your journey starts in Northern Ireland.
translation.ga: Níl rialacha coraintín i gceist má thosaíonn do thuras i dTuaisceart Éireann.

translation.en: There are two types of quarantine:
translation.ga: Tá dhá chineál coraintín ann:

translation.en: Quarantine in your home – for all arrivals unless the person is exempt from quarantining, or arriving from a designated country.
translation.ga: Coraintín i do theach baineann sé le gach duine a thagann go hÉirinn mura bhfuil an duine díolmhaithe ó choraintín, nó ag teacht ó thír ainmnithe.

translation.en: Mandatory hotel quarantine – This is for arrivals from certain countries and for anyone who arrives from abroad without a notdetected RTPCR test.
translation.ga: Coraintín éigeantach óstáin Baineann sé le daoine a thagann isteach ó thíortha áirithe agus le haon duine a thagann ó thar lear gan tástáil RTPCR neamhbhraite.

translation.en: Quarantine in your home or place of residence
translation.ga: Coraintín i do theach nó áit chónaithe

translation.en: You must quarantine for 14 days at the place of residence stated on your Passenger Locator Form.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú coraintín a dhéanamh ar feadh 14 lá ag an áit chónaithe atá luaite ar d’Fhoirm Aimsitheora Paisinéara.

translation.en: You can stop quarantining if you get a notdetected RTPCR test, taken 5 days after your arrival or as soon as possible after those 5 days.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú deireadh a chur le coraintín má fhaigheann tú tástáil RTPCR neamhbhraite, tógtha 5 lá tar éis duit teacht nó a luaithe is féidir tar éis na 5 lá sin.

translation.en: You can book a free COVID19 test through a GP.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú tástáil COVID19 saor in aisce a chur in áirithe trí dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: If you do not have symptoms of COVID19 you can get a free test at a COVID19 walkin test centre.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil comharthaí COVID19 ort is féidir leat tástáil saor in aisce a fháil ag ionad tástála buaileadh isteach COVID19.

translation.en: You must keep the written confirmation of your test result for at least 14 days.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú an deimhniú i scríbhinn ar thoradh do thástála a choinneáil ar feadh 14 lá ar a laghad.

translation.en: If the country you arrived from is later added to the list of designated countries, (within 14 days of your arrival) you must quarantine at home or in your place of residence for up to 14 days.
translation.ga: Má chuirtear an tír as ar tháinig tú níos déanaí le liosta na dtíortha ainmnithe, (laistigh de 14 lá tar éis duit teacht) caithfidh tú coraintín a dhéanamh sa bhaile nó i d’áit chónaithe ar feadh suas le 14 lá.

translation.en: You can leave quarantine if you get a negative test after 10 days.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú coraintín a fhágáil má fhaigheann tú tástáil dhiúltach tar éis 10 lá.

translation.en: You must quarantine at home or at your place of residence even if you have been fully vaccinated against COVID19.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú coraintín a dhéanamh sa bhaile nó ag d’áit chónaithe fiú má bhí tú vacsaínithe go hiomlán i gcoinne COVID19.

translation.en: If you do not quarantine, you are committing an offence.
translation.ga: Ta tu ag déanamh ciona mura ndéanann tú coraintín.

translation.en: Mandatory hotel quarantine
translation.ga: Coraintín éigeantach óstáin

translation.en: Stricter rules apply to arrivals into Ireland from designated countries.
translation.ga: Tá rialacha níos déine i bhfeidhm maidir le daoine a thagann isteach go hÉirinn ó thíortha ainmnithe.

translation.en: This list is subject to change at short notice.
translation.ga: D'fhéadfadh an liosta seo a bheith athraithe ar ghearrfhógra.

translation.en: You must complete the full 14 days of quarantine.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú an 14 lá iomlán de choraintín a dhénamh.

translation.en: This may be reduced if you get a negative COVID19 test after 10 days.
translation.ga: Féadfar é seo a laghdú má fhaigheann tú tástáil dhiúltach COVID19 tar éis 10 lá.

translation.en: If you arrive in Ireland from a designated country you must have made a booking to stay at a quarantine hotel.
translation.ga: Má thagann tú go hÉirinn ó thír ainmnithe ní mór duit áirithint a bheith déanta agat chun fanacht in óstán coraintín.

translation.en: It is an offence to arrive in Ireland without a quarantine hotel booking if you have been in a designated country at any time in the 14 days before your arrival.
translation.ga: Is cion é teacht go hÉirinn gan óstán coraintín a chur in áirithe má bhí tú i dtír ainmnithe ag am ar bith sna 14 lá roimh do theacht.

translation.en: Summary of quarantine measures if you are travelling to Ireland
translation.ga: Achoimre ar bhearta coraintín má tá tú ag taisteal go hÉirinn

translation.en: If I am? Where do I need to quarantine?
translation.ga: Má táim? Cá háit a chaithfidh me coraintín a dhéanamh?

translation.en: Travelling from a designated country You must quarantine in a designated hotel.
translation.ga: Ag taisteal ó thír ainmnithe Caithfidh tú coraintín a dhéanamh in óstán ainmnithe.

translation.en: You may leave after 10 days if you get a negative or not detected RT PCR test.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú imeacht tar éis 10 lá má fhaigheann tú tástáil dhiúltach nó mura mbraitear RTPCR.

translation.en: Arriving into Ireland without a negative or 'not detected' RTPCR test
translation.ga: Ag teacht go hÉirinn gan tástáil dhiúltach nó neahbhraite' RTPCR

translation.en: You must quarantine in a designated hotel.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú coraintín a dhéanamh in óstán ainmnithe.

translation.en: You may leave once you get negative or not detected RT PCR test.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú imeacht nuair a gheobhaidh tú tástáil RTPCR diúltach nó mura mbraitear tú.

translation.en: You must then follow same rules as a person if arriving from any country not on the designated list (see box below) and quarantine at home for either 14 days or until you have a negative or not detected result from a RTPCR test taken 5 days after arrival.
translation.ga: Ansin caithfidh tú na rialacha céanna a leanúint le duine má thagann tú ó aon tír nach bhfuil ar an liosta ainmnithe (féach an bosca thíos) agus coraintín sa bhaile ar feadh 14 lá nó go dtí go mbeidh toradh diúltach nó neamhbhraite agat ó thástáil RTPCR a rinneadh 5 lá tar éis dóibh teacht.

translation.en: Arriving into Ireland from any other country (not on designated country list) You must quarantine at home or in your place of residence.
translation.ga: Ag teacht go hÉirinn ó aon tír eile (nach bhfuil ar liosta tíortha ainmnithe) Caithfidh tú coraintín a dhéanamh sa bhaile nó i d’áit chónaithe.

translation.en: You may stop quarantining after 5 days if you get a negative or notdetected RTPCR test.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú stop a chur le coraintín tar éis 5 lá má fhaigheann tú tástáil RTPCR diúltach nó nár braitheadh.

translation.en: Fully vaccinated
translation.ga: Vacsaínithe go hiomlán

translation.en: You must quarantine at home or in your place of residence.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú coraintín a dhéanamh sa bhaile nó i d’áit chónaithe.

translation.en: You may stop quarantining after 5 days if you get a negative or notdetected RTPCR test.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú stop a chur le coraintín tar éis 5 lá má fhaigheann tú tástáil RTPCR diúltach nó nár braitheadh.

translation.en: Exceptions from hotel quarantine
translation.ga: Eisceachtaí ó choraintín óstáin

translation.en: You do not have to complete hotel quarantine in some situations.
translation.ga: Ní gá duit coraintín óstáin a chríochnú i roinnt cásanna.

translation.en: If you have been fully vaccinated against COVID19 and have documents to prove this.
translation.ga: Má tá tú vacsaínithe go hiomlán i gcoinne COVID19 agus má tá cáipéisí agat chun é sin a chruthú.

translation.en: If you are parents of a new born baby (no more than 28 days old) including a baby born through surrogacy.
translation.ga: Más tuismitheoirí linbh nuabheirthe sibh (gan an leanbh a bheith níos mó ná 28 lá d’aois) lena náirítear leanbh a rugadh trí mháthairionadaíocht.

translation.en: Other exceptions to hotel quarantine are:
translation.ga: I measc eisceachtaí eile maidir le coraintín óstáin tá:

translation.en: People travelling to Ireland for urgent medical reasons
translation.ga: Daoine ag taisteal go hÉirinn ar chúiseanna práinneacha míochaine

translation.en: People arriving who have a mandatory legal obligation, for example, an arrest warrant or an extradition order
translation.ga: Daoine a thagann isteach a bhfuil oibleagáid dhlíthiúil éigeantach orthu, mar shampla, barántas gabhála nó ordú eiseachadta

translation.en: Gardaí or defence forces carrying out their duties
translation.ga: Gardaí nó fórsaí cosanta i mbun a gcuid dualgas

translation.en: Diplomats or elected representatives carrying out essential functions
translation.ga: Taidhleoirí nó ionadaithe tofa i mbun feidhmeanna riachtanacha

translation.en: Transit passenger who do not leave the port or airport
translation.ga: Paisinéir idirthurais nach bhfágann an calafort nó an taerfort

translation.en: International transport workers in defined essential supply chain roles
translation.ga: Oibrithe idirnáisiúnta iompair i róil shainithe riachtanacha sa slabhra soláthair

translation.en: People who have travelled in circumstances where it was impossible for you to secure a RTPCR test result before travelling and you are in possession of written confirmation from the Minister for Foreign Affairs that you have an urgent humanitarian reason for so travelling
translation.ga: Daoine a thaistil in imthosca ina raibh sé dodhéanta duit toradh tástála RTPCR a fháil sular thaisteal tú agus dearbhú i scríbhinn i do sheilbh agat ón Aire Gnóthaí Eachtracha go bhfuil cúis dhaonnúil phráinneach agat le taisteal

translation.en: Exceptions to quarantine at home
translation.ga: Eisceachtaí ó choraintín sa bhaile

translation.en: If you travel to Ireland to perform an essential function, you are allowed to leave your place of quarantine temporarily and for as long as you need to do the essential function.
translation.ga: Má thaistealaíonn tú go hÉirinn chun feidhm riachtanach a chomhlíonadh, tá cead agat d’áit coraintín a fhágáil go sealadach agus ar feadh an oiread ama agus a theastaíonn uait chun an fheidhm riachtanach a chur i gcrích.

translation.en: Workers carrying out essential repair, maintenance, construction or safety assurance of critical transport infrastructure, critical utility infrastructure, manufacturing services, information services, or communication services
translation.ga: Oibrithe a dhéanann deisiúchán, cothabháil, tógáil nó dearbhú sábháilteachta riachtanach ar bhonneagar iompair chriticiúil, bonneagar fóntas criticiúil, i seirbhísí déantúsaíochta, i seirbhísí faisnéise, nó i seirbhísí cumarsáide

translation.en: Workers of international organisations (or people invited by the organisation), who carry out functions needed for the proper functioning of the organisation that cannot be carried out remotely
translation.ga: Oibrithe eagraíochtaí idirnáisiúnta (nó daoine ar thug an eagraíocht cuireadh dóibh), a chomhlíonann feidhmeanna a theastaíonn chun go bhfeidhmeoidh an eagraíocht mar is cóir agus nach féidir an obair sin go cianda

translation.en: People with written certification by Sport Ireland related to an internationally important competitive level event
translation.ga: Daoine a bhfuil deimhniú i scríbhinn acu ó Sport Ireland a bhaineann le hócáid thábhachtach idirnáisiúnta ar leibhéal iomaíoch a bhfuil leis

translation.en: Journalists carrying out their work
translation.ga: Iriseoirí i mbun a gcuid oibre

translation.en: Proposed EU COVID19 certificate
translation.ga: Deimhniú beartaithe COVID19 an AE

translation.en: The European Commission is proposing to create an EU COVID19 certificate for travel inside the EU.
translation.ga: Tá sé beartaithe ag an gCoimisiún Eorpach Deimhniú COVID19 AE a chruthú le haghaidh taistil laistigh den AE.

translation.en: The proposal is expected to be ready before the summer.
translation.ga: Táthar ag súil le go mbeidh an togra réidh roimh an samhradh.

translation.en: It must be agreed by Member States and the European Parliament.
translation.ga: Caithfidh na Ballstáit agus Parlaimint na hEorpa é a chomhaontú.

translation.en: Travel restrictions in Ireland
translation.ga: Srianta taistil in Éirinn

translation.en: The ban on intercounty travel will be lifted on 10 May, 2021.
translation.ga: Ón 10 Bealtaine 2021 is féidir leat taisteal lasmuigh de do chontae.

translation.en: If you are leaving Ireland to return to where you normally live, you can travel to the airport or port.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú taisteal chuig an aerfort nó chuig an gcalafort má tá tú ag fágáil na hÉireann le filleadh ar an áit ina gcónaíonn tú de ghnáth.

translation.en: Travelling abroad during COVID19
translation.ga: Ag taisteal thar lear le linn COVID19

translation.en: Who can travel abroad?
translation.ga: Cé atá in ann taisteal thar lear?

translation.en: Before you travel
translation.ga: Sula dtaistealaíonn tú

translation.en: You should only travel outside Ireland (including to Northern Ireland) if you have an essential reason for doing so.
translation.ga: Níor chóir duit taisteal lasmuigh d’Éirinn (lena náirítear Tuaisceart Éireann) ach má tá cúis riachtanach agat don taisteal sin.

translation.en: Currently, most countries have high rates of COVID19 so you should find out what restrictions are in place in the country you are going to.
translation.ga: Faoi láthair, tá rátaí arda COVID19 ag formhór na dtíortha agus mar sin ba cheart duit a fháil amach cad iad na srianta atá i bhfeidhm sa tír chuig a bhfuil tú ag dul.

translation.en: Travel to Ireland during COVID19
translation.ga: Taisteal go hÉirinn le linn COVID19

translation.en: Consumer travel rights during COVID19
translation.ga: Cearta taistil tomhaltóirí le linn COVID19

translation.en: Who can travel abroad?
translation.ga: Cé atá in ann taisteal thar lear?

translation.en: You should only travel abroad if it is essential to do so.
translation.ga: Níor chóir duit taisteal thar lear ach amháin má tá sé riachtanach go ndéanfaidh tú amhlaidh.

translation.en: The following are ”reasonable excuses” for travelling to a port or airport for the purposes of travelling abroad as set out in the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) COVID19) (No 10)(Amendment)(No 2) Regulations 2021 as amended:
translation.ga: Seo a leanas “leithscéalta réasúnacha” as taisteal chuig calafort nó aerfort chun críocha taisteal thar lear mar atá leagtha amach in Rialacháin 2021 den Acht Sláinte 1947 (Alt 31A Srianta Sealadacha) (COVID19), arna leasú::

translation.en: To go to college or school if you have to be there in person
translation.ga: Chun dul chuig an gcoláiste nó an scoil má chaithfidh tú a bheith ann go pearsanta

translation.en: To go with a child or a vulnerable adult to school if they have to be there in person
translation.ga: Dul le leanbh nó le duine fásta leochaileach chun na scoile má chaithfidh siad a bheith ann go pearsanta

translation.en: To work or travel related to your business
translation.ga: Obair nó taisteal a bhaineann le do ghnó

translation.en: To go to a medical or dental appointment, or to go to an appointment with someone you live with, or a vulnerable person
translation.ga: Dul chuig coinne leighis nó fiaclóireachta, nó dul chuig coinne in éineacht le duine a chónaíonn leat, nó le duine leochaileach

translation.en: To seek essential medical, health or dental services, or to accompany someone you live with, or a vulnerable person who needs essential treatment
translation.ga: Seirbhísí míochaine, sláinte nó fiaclóireachta riachtanacha a lorg, nó dul in éineacht le duine a chónaíonn leat, nó le duine leochaileach a bhfuil cóireáil riachtanach de dhíth air/uirthi

translation.en: To care for a family member or for other vital family reasons
translation.ga: Cúram a thabhairt do bhall teaghlaigh nó ar chúiseanna ríthábhachtacha teaghlaigh eile

translation.en: To go to a funeral
translation.ga: Chun dul chuig sochraid

translation.en: To meet a legal obligation (for example, to appear in court)
translation.ga: Oibleagáid dhlíthiúil a chomhlíonadh (mar shampla, bheith i láthair sa chúirt)

translation.en: To give access to a child to the other parent of the child, or to access a child that you have a right of access to
translation.ga: Chun rochtain ar leanbh a éascú do thuismitheoir eile an linbh, nó chun rochtain a fháil ar leanbh a bhfuil ceart rochtana agat air/uirthi

translation.en: To leave Ireland if you are not resident in Ireland
translation.ga: Éire a fhágáil mura bhfuil cónaí ort in Éirinn

translation.en: A Garda may accept other reasonable excuses that are not on this list.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh Garda glacadh le leithscéalta réasúnacha eile nach bhfuil ar an liosta seo.

translation.en: You should have evidence of the reasons for your travel.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh fianaise agat ar na cúiseanna ar a bhfuil tú ag taisteal.

translation.en: You can be fined €2000 for unnecessary travel abroad.
translation.ga: Féadfar fíneáil € 2000 a ghearradh ort as taisteal gan ghá thar lear.

translation.en: Proposed EU COVID19 certificate
translation.ga: Deimhniú beartaithe COVID19 an AE

translation.en: The European Commission is proposing to create an EU COVID19 Certificate for travel inside the EU.
translation.ga: Tá sé beartaithe ag an gCoimisiún Eorpach Deimhniú COVID19 AE a chruthú le haghaidh taistil laistigh den AE.

translation.en: The proposal is expected to be ready before the summer.
translation.ga: Táthar ag súil le go mbeidh an togra réidh roimh an samhradh.

translation.en: It must be agreed by Member States and the European Parliament.
translation.ga: Caithfidh na Ballstáit agus Parlaimint na hEorpa é a chomhaontú.

translation.en: Before you travel
translation.ga: Sula dtaistealaíonn tú

translation.en: You should read the latest government advice on travelling abroad before you travel and check the travel advice on your country of destination.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit an chomhairle rialtais is déanaí maidir le taisteal thar lear a léamh sula dtaistealaíonn tú agus an chomhairle taistil ar a tír is ceann scríbe a sheiceáil.

translation.en: Some countries have closed their borders or may require you to selfisolate or restrict your movements when you arrive.
translation.ga: Tá a dteorainneacha dúnta ag tíortha áirithe nó d’fhéadfadh go niarrfaí ort go ndéanfaidh tú féinaonrú nó do ghluaiseachtaí a shrianadh nuair a thagann tú chun na tíre sin.

translation.en: If you have to travel urgently, you can contact the Passport Office through webchat.
translation.ga: Má tá gá práinneach agat taisteal, is féidir leat teagmháil a dhéanamh le hOifig na bPasanna trí chomhrá ar líne.

translation.en: Travel to the EEA
translation.ga: Taisteal go dtí an LEE

translation.en: If you are travelling to the EEA (the EU, plus Norway, Iceland and Lichtenstein), you should check the European Centre of Disease Control’s map (EU traffic lights system).
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag taisteal chuig an LEE (an AE, móide an Iorua, an Íoslainn agus Lichtenstein), ba cheart duit léarscáil an Lárionaid Eorpaigh um Ghalair a Chosc agus a Rialú (córas soilse tráchta an AE) a sheiceáil.

translation.en: This map is updated weekly by the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) and categorise regions as green, orange, red or grey depending on their COVID19 rates of infection.
translation.ga: Déanann an Lárionad Eorpach um Ghalair a Chosc agus a Rialú (ECDC) an léarscáil seo a nuashonrú go seachtainiúil agus déantar réigiúin a chatagóiriú mar ghlas, oráiste, dearg nó liath ag brath ar a rátaí ionfhabhtaithe COVID19.

translation.en: Reopen EU has information about current COVID19 restrictions and laws in EEA countries.
translation.ga: Tá faisnéis ag Reopen EU maidir le srianta agus dlíthe reatha COVID19 i dtíortha LEE.

translation.en: Laws and restrictions may change while you are away (both in the country where you have travelled to and in Ireland), and you should check for new information regularly.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh dlíthe agus srianta athrú agus tú thar lear (sa tír chuig ar thaistil tú agus in Éirinn araon), agus ba cheart duit é a sheiceáil go rialta le haghaidh nuashonrúithe.

translation.en: You should bring your European Health Insurance Card with you if you are travelling to the EEA or Switzerland.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit do Chárta Eorpach um Árachas Sláinte a thabhairt leat má tá tú ag taisteal chuig an LEE nó chuig an Eilvéis

translation.en: Travel outside the EEA
translation.ga: Taisteal lasmuigh den LEE

translation.en: If you are travelling outside the EEA, you should get travel insurance.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag taisteal lasmuigh den LEE, ba cheart duit árachas taistil a fháil.

translation.en: If you have a travel insurance policy already, or travel insurance is included in your health insurance policy, you should check that you are covered for hospital treatment for COVID19.
translation.ga: Má tá polasaí árachais taistil agat cheana féin, nó má tá árachas taistil san áireamh le do pholasaí árachais sláinte, ba cheart duit a sheiceáil go bhfuil tú clúdaithe le haghaidh cóireáil ospidéil do COVID19.

translation.en: The Irish Government advises against travelling to certain countries.
translation.ga: Molann Rialtas na hÉireann gan taisteal chuig tíortha áirithe.

translation.en: If you choose to travel to one of these countries, your travel insurance may not apply (unless you can prove your travel was for an essential reason).
translation.ga: Má roghnaíonn tú taisteal chuig ceann de na tíortha seo, b’fhéidir nach mbeidh d’árachas taistil bailí (mura féidir leat a chruthú go raibh cúis riachtanach le do thaisteal).

translation.en: Work and social welfare
translation.ga: Obair agus leas sóisialta

translation.en: Going abroad may affect your social welfare payment.
translation.ga: D'fhéadfadh taisteal thar lear dul i gcion ar d’íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh.

translation.en: You should also check with your employer whether you will be paid if you have to restrict your movements on your return.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit seiceáil le d’fhostóir freisin an íocfar tú má tá ort do ghluaiseachtaí a shrianadh ar fhilleadh duitt

translation.en: When you return
translation.ga: Nuair a fhilleann tú

translation.en: You should check the latest information on travel restrictions to Ireland before you travel back.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit an fhaisnéis is déanaí maidir le srianta taistil go hÉirinn a sheiceáil sula bhfilleann tú.

translation.en: When you arrive back into Ireland you must:
translation.ga: Nuair a fhilleann tú ar Éirinn caithfidh tú:

translation.en: Complete a Passenger Locator Form.
translation.ga: Foirm Aimsitheora Paisinéara a chomhlánú.

translation.en: Have a negative or ‘not detected’ COVID19 test (RT PCR test) taken no more than 72 hours before your arrival.
translation.ga: Tástáil COVID19 diúltach nó ‘neamhbhraite’ (tástáil RT PCR) a bheith déanta ort níos mó ná 72 uair an chloig roimh theacht duit.

translation.en: Quarantine in your home for 14 days.
translation.ga: Tabhairt faoi choraintín i do theach ar feadh 14 lá.

translation.en: You can stop selfisolating once you get a negative RT PCR test, taken no less than 5 days after arrival.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú deireadh a chur le coraintín baile a luaithe a gheobhaidh tú tástáil dhiúltach RTPCR, tógtha 5 lá ar a laghad tar éis duit teacht.

translation.en: Stricter advice applies for people arriving back from certain countries, you may have to quarantine at a hotel.
translation.ga: Tá comhairle níos déine ann maidir le daoine ag filleadh ó thíortha áirithe, b’fhéidir go mbeidh ort coraintín a dhéanamh in óstán.

translation.en: Read more about travelling to Ireland during COVID19.
translation.ga: Léigh tuilleadh faoi thaisteal go hÉirinn le linn COVID19.

translation.en: Family law during COVID19
translation.ga: Dlí teaghlaigh i rith COVID19

translation.en: COVID19 has had a big impact on the lives of families across Ireland.
translation.ga: Bhí tionchar suntasach ag COVID19 ar shaol teaghlach ar fud na hÉireann.

translation.en: The Government has introduced measures to control the spread of COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá bearta bunaithe ag an Rialtas chun leathadh COVID19 a rialú.

translation.en: You should continue to follow advice on how you can protect yourself and others, including advice on social distancing.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit an chomhairle maidir le conas is féidir leat tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint, lena náirítear an chomhairle maidir le scaradh sóisialta, a leanúint.

translation.en: This document gives practical information and advice on family law issues during the COVID19 emergency period, including:
translation.ga: Tá eolas agus comhairle phraiticiúil le fáil sa doiciméad seo maidir le ceisteanna dlí teaghlaigh i rith thréimhse éigeandáil COVID19, lena náirítear:

translation.en: Access to children
translation.ga: Rochtain ar leanaí

translation.en: Maintenance payments
translation.ga: Íocaíochtaí cothabhála

translation.en: Barring, safety and protection orders
translation.ga: Orduithe urchoisc, sábháilteachta agus cosanta

translation.en: Operation of courts during COVID19
translation.ga: Feidhmiú na gcúirteanna i rith COVID19

translation.en: Services and supports available to people at risk of domestic abuse
translation.ga: Seirbhísí agus tacaíochtaí atá ar fáil do dhaoine atá i mbaol drochíde sa teaghlach

translation.en: You can also read about:
translation.ga: Is féidir leat ábhar a léamh faoi na hábhair thíos freisin:

translation.en: Supports for children and parents during COVID19
translation.ga: Tacaíochtaí do leanaí agus do thuismitheoirí i rith COVID19

translation.en: Childcare and COVID19
translation.ga: Cúram Leanaí agus COVID19

translation.en: Getting married
translation.ga: Ag pósadh

translation.en: Access to children
translation.ga: Rochtain ar leanaí

translation.en: The Law Society of Ireland has published updated guidance on dealing with access issues (pdf) that arise during to COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá treoir nuashonraithe maidir le déileáil le ceisteanna rochtana (pdf) a thagann chun cinn i rith COVID19 foilsithe ag DlíChumann na hÉireann.

translation.en: The guidance is clear that public health restrictions could not be used as an excuse to ignore a court order and that existing orders should be complied with as much as possible in the circumstances.
translation.ga: Cuirtear in iúl go soiléir sa treoir nár cheart srianta sláinte poiblí a úsáid mar leithscéal chun neamhaird a thabhairt ar ordú cúirte agus gur cheart orduithe reatha a chomhlíonadh oiread agus is féidir sna himthosca.

translation.en: However, parents should always make decisions in the best interests of the child involved, particularly if the child has a compromised immune system.
translation.ga: Ba cheart, áfach, do thuismitheoirí cinntí a dhéanamh ar son leasa is fearr an linbh i gceist i gcónaí, go háirithe má tá córas imdhíonachta lagaithe ag an leanbh.

translation.en: The best outcome for children is for parents to contact each other to set out their concerns and suggest ideas for practical solutions that can be put in place.
translation.ga: Cinnteofar an toradh is fearr do leanaí má dhéanann tuismitheoirí teagmháil lena chéile chun na hábhair atá ag déanamh imní dóibh a shonrú agus smaointe a phlé le haghaidh réiteach praiticiúil ar féidir iad a bhunú.

translation.en: Any changes to existing court orders should be documented in a text or email so that there is a written record for future reference.
translation.ga: Ba cheart aon athruithe ar orduithe cúirte reatha a dhoiciméadú i dtéacs nó i ríomhphost ionas go bhfuil taifead i scríbhinn ar fáil ar féidir tagairt a dhéanamh dó amach anseo.

translation.en: Family mediation
translation.ga: Idirghabháil teaghlaigh

translation.en: If matters can still not be agreed, the parties should try mediation.
translation.ga: Mura féidir teacht ar chomhaontú, ba cheart do na páirtithe triail a bhaint as idirghabháil.

translation.en: Mediation is not relationship counselling.
translation.ga: Ní hionann idirghabháil agus comhairleoireacht caidrimh

translation.en: Family mediation is a free service which helps separating couples and parents whose relationship has broken down to negotiate their own agreement.
translation.ga: Is seirbhís é idirghabháil teaghlaigha chabhraíonn le lánúin agus le tuismitheoirí a bhfuil deireadh tagtha leis an gcaidreamh eatarthu teacht ar chomhaontú eatarthu féin.

translation.en: With mediation you will be helped to make your own decisions that suit your circumstances.
translation.ga: Cabhraíonn idirghabháil le daoine a gcinntí féin a dhéanamh a oireann dá ndálaí féin.

translation.en: If you decide to go to court it will be a judge who will ultimately make these decisions.
translation.ga: Má chinneann tú dul chun na cúirte is é breitheamh a dhéanfaidh na cinntí seo.

translation.en: The Family Mediation Service is a service provided by the Legal Aid Board.
translation.ga: Is seirbhís saor atá á soláthar ag an mBord um Chúnamh Dlíthiúil é An tSeirbhís Idirghabhála Teaghlaigh.

translation.en: It provides facetoface mediation and online mediation through its national network of family law mediation service offices.
translation.ga: Soláthraítear idirghabháil aghaidh ar aghaidh agus idirghabháil ar líne trí ghréasán náisiúnta d’oifigí seirbhís idirghabhála dlí teaghlaigh.

translation.en: Details of how to make an appointment and the contact details of each office are available at legalaidboard.ie.
translation.ga: Tá sonraí maidir le conas coinne a dhéanamh agus sonraí teagmhála gach oifig le fáil ag legalaidboard.ie.

translation.en: Family mediation is also available privately.
translation.ga: Is féidir tairbhe a bhaint as idirghabháil teaghlaigh ar bhonn príobháideach freisin.

translation.en: A mediator may charge in a variety of ways, such as an hourly rate, day rate or flat rate.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh idirghabhálaí táillí a ghearradh ar bhealaí éagsúla, ráta in aghaidh na huaire, ráta in aghaidh an lae nó ráta comhréidh.

translation.en: Contact details of family law mediation solicitors are available on lawsociety.ie and the Mediator's Institute of Ireland website mii.ie.
translation.ga: Tá sonraí teagmhála abhcóidí dlí idirghabháil teaghlaigh le fáil ag lawsociety.ie.

translation.en: Placement of children with relatives and temporary guardianship
translation.ga: Leanaí a shuíomh le gaolta agus caomhnóireacht shealadach

translation.en: You may be concerned about who will look after your children if you become sick.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh go mbeadh imní ort maidir le cé a thabharfaidh aire do do leanaí má éiríonn tú tinn.

translation.en: This might be of particular concern if you are parenting alone.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh gur ábhar imní ar leith é seo más tuismitheoir aonair thú.

translation.en: In many cases, other family members will be able to help.
translation.ga: In go leor cásanna, beidh baill teaghlaigh eile in ann cabhrú leat.

translation.en: If there is no obvious standin or where there is an important decision to be made in relation to the child, such as consent to medical treatment, it may be reassuring to have a plan in place.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil aon duine ar leith ar fáil chun cabhrú leo nó sa chás go bhfuil cinneadh tábhachtach le déanamh maidir leis an leanbh, cosúil le toiliú do chóir leighis, b’fhéidir go mbraithfeá ar do shuaimhneas dá mbeadh plean bunaithe.

translation.en: On 12 May 2020, temporary regulations (pdf) took effect to make it easier and quicker for a child to be placed with a relative by Tusla, the Child and Family Agency.
translation.ga: Ar an 12 Bealtaine 2020, bunaíodh rialacháin shealadacha nua (pdf) le haghaidh tréimhse 12 mhí lena chinntiú go mbeidh sé níos éasca agus níos tapa do Tusla, an Ghníomhaireacht um Leanaí agus an Teaghlach, leanbh a shuíomh le gaol.

translation.en: Tusla must be satisfied that the immediate placement of a child in its care with a relative of the child is in the interests of the child.
translation.ga: Ní mór go mbeadh Tusla sásta go bhfuil leanbh atá faoina chúram á shuíomh le gaol an linbh láithreach ar son leasa an linbh.

translation.en: These regulations have been amended to apply for a period of 12 months.
translation.ga: Ní mór gur duine oiriúnach atá os cionn 18 mbliana d’aois an duine ainmnithe.

translation.en: Temporary guardianship can be granted by the District Court to allow another adult, known as the nominated person, to care for your child or children when you are seriously unwell or need be hospitalised.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh an Chúirt Dúiche caomhnóireacht shealadach a cheadú chun deis a thabhairt d’aosach eile, ar a dtugtar an duine ainmnithe, aire a thabhairt do do leanbh nó do do leanaí nuair a bhíonn tusa go dona tinn nó nuair is gá duit seal a chaitheamh san ospidéal.

translation.en: You need to complete a special form to nominate a temporary guardian (pdf), in which you can set out your wishes or any limitations on the temporary guardian.
translation.ga: Ní mór duit foirm speisialta chun caomhnóir sealadach a ainmniú (pdf) a chomhlánú, inar féidir leat do mhianta agus aon srianta ar an gcaomhnóir sealadach a shonrú.

translation.en: The nominated person must then apply to the court if you cannot carry out your parental role due to serious illness.
translation.ga: Ansin, ní mór don duine ainmnithe iarratas a chur chuig an gcúirt mura féidir leat do ról tuismitheoireachta a chomhlíonadh mar gheall ar thinneas tromaí.

translation.en: The scope of temporary guardian’s rights will be set out in the District Court’s Order, which will usually be identical to the wishes you set out in the form.
translation.ga: Sonrófar raon chearta an chaomhnóra shealadaigh in Ordú na Cúirte Dúiche, a bheidh díreach cosúil leis na mianta atá sonraithe agat ar an bhfoirm de ghnáth.

translation.en: The District Court is currently closed for general case hearings but if your case is urgent it will be heard.
translation.ga: Níl an Chúirt Dúiche ag éisteacht le cásanna ginearálta faoi láthair ach má tá do chás práinneach, éistfear do chás.

translation.en: Support organisations for families
translation.ga: Eagraíochtaí tacaíochta do theaghlaigh

translation.en: One Family, the national support organisation for lone parents, has published a practical guide on managing access during COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá treoir phraiticiúil maidir le rochtain a bhainistiú i rith COVID19 foilsithe ag One Family, an eagraíocht náisiúnta tacaíochta do thuismitheoirí aonair.

translation.en: Treoir, the National Federation of Services for Unmarried Parents and their Children, provides information and advice on 01 670 0120, 10am – 4pm, Monday to Friday.
translation.ga: Soláthraíonn Treoir, an Chónaidhm Náisiúnta Seirbhísí do Thuismitheoirí Neamhphósta agus a Leanaí, faisnéis agus comhairle má ghlaoitear ar an uimhir 01 670 0120, 10am – 4pm, Luan go hAoine.

translation.en: Barnardos has a dedicated telephone and email service to support families through the pandemic.
translation.ga: Tá líne theileafóin agus seirbhís ríomhphoist ar leith bunaithe ag Barnardos chun tacú le teaghlaigh i rith na paindéime.

translation.en: You can read more supports for children and parents during COVID19.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat tuilleadh tacaíochtaí do leanaí agus do thuismitheoirí i rith COVID19 a léamh anseo.

translation.en: Maintenance
translation.ga: Cothabháil

translation.en: Parents who pay child maintenance should continue making payments as normal during COVID19.
translation.ga: Ba cheart do thuismitheoirí a íocann cothabháil linbh leanúint le híocaíochtaí a dhéanamh mar is iondúil i rith COVID19.

translation.en: The Legal Aid Board has published advice on dealing with maintenance issues if you have had a change in employment status or you have reduced income.
translation.ga: Tá comhairle foilsithe ag an mBord um Chúnamh Dlíthiúil maidir le déileáil le saincheisteanna cothabhála má tá athrú tagtha ar do stádas fostaíochta nó má tá d’ioncam laghdaithe.

translation.en: You are advised to:
translation.ga: Moltar duit an méid seo a leanas a dhéanamh:

translation.en: Tell the person who gets the maintenance that you will not be able to pay the agreed amount of maintenance and explain why.
translation.ga: Inis don duine a fhaigheann an chothabháil nach mbeidh tú in ann an méid comhaontaithe cothabhála a íoc agus mínigh an chúis gurb amhlaidh atá.

translation.en: This should be done before the payment is due, if possible.
translation.ga: Ba cheart é seo a dhéanamh sula mbíonn an íocaíocht dlite, más féidir.

translation.en: You should also send a letter to their solicitor (if they have one) explaining your position and include any available evidence that shows a change in your financial circumstances.
translation.ga: Chomh maith leis sin, ba cheart duit litir a sheoladh chuig aturnae an duine i gceist (má tá aturnae ag an duine sin) agus ba cheart duit gach rud a mhíniú agus aon fhianaise a léiríonn athrú ar do dhálaí airgeadais a chur san áireamh.

translation.en: You should consult your solicitor for advice, if possible, about an appropriate payment to make in the changed circumstances.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit comhairle a lorg ó d’aturnae, más féidir, maidir le híocaíocht chuí a dhéanamh ag cur na ndálaí athraithe san áireamh.

translation.en: You should tell your expartner (or the parent of your child) as soon as possible how much you intend to pay and try to reach an agreement with them.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit d’iarpháirtí (nó tuismitheoir do linbh) a chur ar an eolas, a luaithe agus is féidir, faoin méid atá beartaithe agat a íoc agus ba cheart iarracht a dhéanamh teacht ar chomhaontú eadraibh.

translation.en: If agreement cannot be reached, you should pay what you are advised or believe is the appropriate amount in the circumstances and apply for an order to vary the maintenance as soon as possible.
translation.ga: Mura féidir teacht ar chomhaontú, ba cheart duit an méid a mholtar a íoc nó an méid atá oiriúnach dar leat sna himthosca agus iarratas a dhéanamh ar ordú chun an cothabháil a athrú a luaithe agus is féidir.

translation.en: Applications to vary maintenance should be lodged as soon as possible, for whatever return date is given, so that applications can be made to backdate orders.
translation.ga: Ba cheart iarratais chun an cothabháil a athrú a thaisceadh a luaithe agus is féidir, le haghaidh cibé dáta fillte atá sonraithe, ionas gur féidir iarratais chun orduithe a shiardhátú a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Where the person receiving the maintenance is in difficulty, their circumstances should also be considered.
translation.ga: Sa chás go bhfuil deacracht ag an duine ag a bhfuil an chothabháil á fáil, ba cheart dálaí an duine sin a chur san áireamh freisin.

translation.en: If there are any issues with making mortgage payments and other joint bills, you should communicate (through your solicitor or directly) with your former partner or parent of your child.
translation.ga: Má tá deacrachtaí le híocaíochtaí morgáiste agus comhbhillí eile, ba cheart duit cumarsáid a dhéanamh (trí d’aturnae nó go díreach) le d’iarpháirtí nó le tuismitheoir do linbh.

translation.en: Both parties should work together to notify banks or other third parties that there is an issue with payment of bills.
translation.ga: Ba cheart don dá pháirtí oibriú le chéile chun fógra a chur chuig bainc agus tríú páirtithe eile maidir le haon deacracht a bhaineann le billí a íoc.

translation.en: FLAC (Free Legal Advice Centres) has published advice for people having difficulty paying maintenance during COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá comhairle foilsithe ag FLAC (Ionaid Comhairle Dlí Saor in Aisce) do dhaoine ag a bhfuil deacracht cothabháil a íoc i rith COVID19.

translation.en: You can call FLAC’s Information line on 1890 350 250 or 01 874 5690, 9.30am – 1pm, Monday to Friday, and 7pm – 9pm on Monday evenings.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat glaoch ar líne Faisnéise FLAC ag an uimhir 1890 350 250 nó 01 874 5690, 9.30am – 1pm, Luan go hAoine, agus 7pm – 9pm tráthnóna Dé Luain.

translation.en: OneParent Family Payment and Jobseeker’s Transitional Payment
translation.ga: Íocaíocht Teaghlaigh Aontuismitheora agus Íocaíocht Idirthréimhseach Cuardaitheora Poist

translation.en: If you are getting a OneParent Family Payment or Jobseeker’s Transitional Payment and the other parent of your child has reduced or stopped their maintenance payment, you may be entitled to an increase in your payment.
translation.ga: Má tá Íocaíocht Teaghlaigh Aontuismitheora nó Íocaíocht Idirthréimhseach Cuardaitheora Poist á fáil agat agus má tá a (h)íocaíocht chothabhála laghdaithe nó stoptha ag tuimsitheoir eile do linbh, b’fhéidir go mbeifeá i dteideal méadú ar d’íocaíocht.

translation.en: To get an increase, you should contact your local Intreo Centre.
translation.ga: Chun méadú ar íocaíocht a fháil, ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh le d’Ionad Intreo áitiúil.

translation.en: You will need to write a letter stating either the reduced amount, or that you are no longer getting a maintenance payment and provide it to your local Intreo Centre.
translation.ga: Beidh ort litir a scríobh ina sonrófar an méid laghdaithe, nó nach bhfuil íocaíocht chothabhála á fáil agat níos mó agus ba cheart duit an litir a chur ar fáil d’Ionad Intreo áitiúil.

translation.en: Your OneParent Family Payment or Jobseeeker's Transition Payment will be increased for a period of up to 12 weeks.
translation.ga: Méadófar d’Íocaíocht Teaghlaigh Aontuismitheora nó d’Íocaíocht Idirthréimhseach Cuardaitheora Poist le haghaidh tréimhse suas go dtí 12 sheachtain.

translation.en: After that, your payment may be reviewed and your means reassessed.
translation.ga: Ina dhiaidh sin, d’fhéadfaí d’íocaíocht a athbhreithniú agus d’ioncam a athmheas.

translation.en: Law courts
translation.ga: Cúirteanna dlí

translation.en: To find out the most up to date information on how the courts are operating or to make an appointment, you can contact the relevant office.
translation.ga: Chun teacht ar an eolas is déanaí maidir le conas atá na cúirteanna ag feidhmiú nó chun coinne a dhéanamh, is féidir leat teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an oifig ábhartha.

translation.en: Guidance has been issued on attending court safely and what measures you should take to ensure your safety and the safety of others.
translation.ga: Tá treoir eisithe maidir le freastal ar an gcúirt go sábháilte agus na bearta ba cheart a dhéanamh chun do shábháilteacht agus sábháilteacht daoine eile a chinntiú.

translation.en: The District Court will continue to deal with some family law and child care cases for the duration of the Level 5 restrictions.
translation.ga: Leanfaidh an Chúirt Dúiche ag déileáil le ceisteanna dlí teaghlaigh i rith shrianta Leibhéal 5.

translation.en: The Circuit and High Courts also continue to deal with urgent cases, particularly those involving allegations of domestic abuse and to process:
translation.ga: Chomh maith leis sin, leanfaidh na cúirteanna ag déileáil le cásanna práinneacha a bhaineann le drochíde sa teaghlach agus leis na nithe seo a leanas a phróiseáil:

translation.en: New applications for protection orders
translation.ga: Iarratais nua ar orduithe cosanta

translation.en: New applications for interim barring orders
translation.ga: Iarratais nua ar orduithe urchoisc eatramhacha

translation.en: Applications for emergency barring orders
translation.ga: Iarratais ar orduithe urchoisc éigeandála

translation.en: Extension of care orders and interim care orders and emergency care orders and exceptional or urgent interim care orders
translation.ga: Síneadh a chur le horduithe cúraim agus le horduithe cúraim eatramhacha agus orduithe cúraim eatramacha eisceachtúla nó práinneacha

translation.en: If you cannot afford to ask the court for protection from an abusive spouse or partner or another family member, you can apply for legal aid.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil ar d’acmhainn iarratas a chur faoi bhráid na cúirte ar chosaint ó chéile nó ó pháirtí drochídeach nó ó bhall teaghlaigh eile, is féidir leat iarratas ar chúnamh dlíthiúil a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Contact the Legal Aid Board on 1890 615 200, 10am – 12.30pm and 2pm – 4pm, Monday to Friday.
translation.ga: Déan teagmháil leis an mBord um Chúnamh Dlíthiúil ag an uimhir 1890 615 200, 10am – 12.30pm agus 2pm – 4pm, Luan go hAoine.

translation.en: Alternatively you can email your contact details to info@legalaidboard.ie and arrange a callback, or you can make an application for legal aid online.
translation.ga: Nó is féidir leat do shonraí teagmhála a sheoladh trí ríomhphost chuig info@legalaidboard.ie agus socrú a dhéanamh go nglaofaidh duine éigin ar ais ort, nó is féidir iarratas ar chúnamh dlíthiúil a dhéanamh ar líne.

translation.en: You can also contact the Legal Aid Board if Tusla has informed you that it intends to apply to the court to take your children into care.
translation.ga: Chomh maith leis sin, is féidir leat teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an mBord um Chúnamh Dlíthiúil má chuir Tusla in iúl duit go bhfuil sé beartaithe aige iarratas a chur chuig an gcúirt do leanaí a chur faoi chúram.

translation.en: Domestic abuse
translation.ga: Drochíde sa teaghlach

translation.en: Domestic abuse is violence or another form of abuse by a person against another person that they are, or were, in an intimate relationship with.
translation.ga: Is éard atá i gceist le drochíde sa teaghlach foréigean nó foirm drochíde eile á déanamh ag duine i gcoinne duine éigin eile a bhfuil dlúthchaidreamh aige/aici leis/léi nó a raibh dlúthchaidreamh aige/aici leis/léi.

translation.en: The abuse may be physical, sexual, psychological, emotional or financial.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh go mbeadh drochíde fisiciúil, gnéasach, síceolaíoch, mothúchánach nó airgeadais i gceist.

translation.en: Domestic abuse can affect children and other family members.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh drochíde sa teaghlach cur isteach ar leanaí agus ar bhaill teaghlaigh eile.

translation.en: Rent Supplement and domestic violence
translation.ga: Forlíonadh Cíosa agus drochíde sa teaghlach

translation.en: Victims of domestic violence referred from Tuslafunded services, An Garda Síochána and the Health Service Executive (HSE) can get immediate access to Rent Supplement.
translation.ga: Is féidir le híospartaigh drochíde sa teaghlagh atá atreoraithe ag Seirbhísí atá á maoiniú ag Tusla, An Garda Síochána agus Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS) rochtain a fháil ar Fhorlíonadh Cíosa láithreach.

translation.en: The meanstest for Rent Supplement will not apply for 3 months.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh feidhm leis an bhForlíonadh Cíosa de réir tástála acmhainne le haghaidh 3 mhí.

translation.en: Child protection
translation.ga: Cosaint leanaí

translation.en: If a child protection issue emerges during the current health crisis and you have reasonable grounds for concern that a child may have been, is being, or is at risk of being abused or neglected, you should contact Tusla or the Gardaí.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn fadhb cosanta leanaí i gceist i rith na géarchéime sláinte reatha agus má tá forais réasúnta imní agat go bhfuil drochíde tugtha do leanbh nó go bhfuil faillí déanta ar leanbh, nó go bhfuil a leithéid ag tarlú, nó go bhfuil baol ann go dtarlóidh a leithéid, ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh le Tusla nó leis na Gardaí.

translation.en: You can report your concern to Tusla in person, by telephone or in writing to the local social work service in the area where the child lives.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an méid atá ag déanamh imní díot a thuairisciú do Tusla go pearsanta, trí ghlao teileafóin nó trí litir scríofa a sheoladh chuig an tseirbhís áitiúil obair shóisialta sa cheantar ina bhfuil cónaí ar an leanbh.

translation.en: Support
translation.ga: Tacaíocht

translation.en: Many organisations have extended and adapted their services during COVID19 due to increased demand for support.
translation.ga: Tá síneadh curtha lena gcuid seirbhísí agus tá a gcuid seirbhísí oiriúnaithe ag go leor eagraíochtaí i rith COVID19 mar gheall ar bhreis éilimh ar thacaíocht.

translation.en: You can access a list of domestic abuse support services available or find out what support services are available in each county in Ireland on stillhere.ie.
translation.ga: Tá liosta iomlán de sheirbhísí tacaíochta do dhrochíde sa teaghlach ar fáil.

translation.en: The ISPCC has a support line and hub for parents and carers as well as its 24hour Childline and Teenline listening services for children and young people up to the age of 18:
translation.ga: Tá líne agus mol tacaíochta ag an ISPCC do thuismitheoirí agus do chúramóirí mar aon leis na seirbhísí éisteachta 24 uair an chloig Childline agus Teenline do leanaí agus do dhaoine óga atá faoi 18 mbliana d’aois:

translation.en: The ISPCC support line can be contacted on 01 243 2000, 9am 1pm daily, Monday to Friday
translation.ga: Is féidir glaoch ar líne thacaíochta ISPCC ag an uimhir 01 243 2000, 9am 1pm gach lá, Luan go hAoine

translation.en: Childline is available 24hours a day on 1800 666 666, by text on 50101 and by live chat
translation.ga: Tá Childline ar fáil 24 uair an chloig gach lá ag an uimhir 1800 666 666, nó is féidir téacs a sheoladh chuig 50101 agus teagmháil a dhéanamh leo trí chomhrá beo

translation.en: Teenline can be contacted 24hours a day on 1800 833 634
translation.ga: Is féidir teagmháil a dhéanamh le Teenline 24 uair an chloig gach lá ag an uimhir 1800 833 634

translation.en: If you are concerned about elder abuse, you can call the HSE helpline on 1850 241 850, 8am 8pm, Monday to Saturday.
translation.ga: Má tá drochíde duine scothaosta ag déanamh imní díot, féadfaidh tú glaoch ar líne chabhrach FSS ag an uimhir 1850 241 850, 8am 8pm, Luan go Satharn.

translation.en: If you feel in immediate danger, you should contact the Gardaí.
translation.ga: Má mhothaíonn tú i gcontúirt láithreach, ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh le An Garda Síochána.

translation.en: For further information, see the HSE’s website on elder abuse or visit Safeguarding Ireland.
translation.ga: Má theastaíonn tuilleadh faisnéise uait, féach ar shuíomh gréasáin FSS maidir le drochíde daoine scothaosta nó tabhair cuairt ar Safeguarding Ireland.

translation.en: Safeguarding Ireland has also published guidance about protecting older people from financial abuse during COVID19.
translation.ga: Chomh maith leis sin, tá treoir foilsithe ag Safeguarding Ireland maidir le daoine scothaosta a chosaint ó mhíúsáid airgeadais i rith COVID19.

translation.en: Returning to Ireland and COVID19
translation.ga: Ag filleadh ar Éirinn agus COVID19

translation.en: Travel to Ireland
translation.ga: Taisteal go hÉirinn

translation.en: Do I need to quarantine?
translation.ga: An gá dom bheith ar coraintín?

translation.en: Income supports
translation.ga: Tacaíochtaí ioncaim

translation.en: Housing
translation.ga: Tithíocht

translation.en: The COVID19 (coronavirus) pandemic has caused massive global social and economic disruption.
translation.ga: Tá paindéim COVID19 (coróinvíreas) tar éis cur isteach go hollmhór thaobh sóisialta agus eacnamaíoch de.

translation.en: Irish people living abroad have been impacted heavily by the crisis, with many concerned for relatives at home and unclear about their personal futures abroad.
translation.ga: Chuaigh an ghéarchéim i bhfeidhm go mór ar Éireannaigh a bhfuil ina gcónaí thar lear, agus imní ar go leor acu maidir le gaolta sa bhaile agus doiléir faoina dtodhchaí pearsanta thar lear.

translation.en: This document aims to give you information on returning to Ireland during the COVID19 pandemic.
translation.ga: Tá sé mar aidhm ag an doiciméad seo faisnéis a thabhairt duit maidir le filleadh ar Éirinn le linn na paindéime COVID19.

translation.en: It includes practical, uptodate information on travel advice, public health guidelines, employment rights and social welfare entitlements for people returning to Ireland.
translation.ga: Cuimsítear faisnéis phraiticiúil, suas chun dáta ar chomhairle taistil, treoirlínte sláinte poiblí, cearta fostaíochta agus teidlíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh do dhaoine atá ag filleadh ar Éirinn.

translation.en: The Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade (DFA) is advising against all nonessential travel overseas until further notice.
translation.ga: Tá an Roinn Gnóthaí Eachtracha (DFA) ag tabhairt comhairle gan taisteal neamhriachtanach a dhéanamh thar lear go dtí go dtabharfar fógra breise.

translation.en: This includes Great Britain but not Northern Ireland.
translation.ga: Áirítear leis seo an Bhreatain Mhór ach ní Tuaisceart Éireann.

translation.en: For more information, read our COVID19 travel overview.
translation.ga: Le haghaidh tuilleadh faisnéise, léigh ár bhforbhreathnú taistil COVID19.

translation.en: What to do if you are abroad
translation.ga: Cad atá le déanamh má tá tú thar lear

translation.en: If you are due to travel, contact your airline for updates.
translation.ga: Má tá tú le taisteal, déan teagmháil le d’aerlíne chun nuashonruithe a fháil.

translation.en: Download DFA’s Travelwise app and visit dfa.ie for uptodate travel advice.
translation.ga: Íoslódáil aip Travelwise RGE agus tabhair cuairt ar dfa.ie chun comhairle taistil cothrom le dáta a fháil.

translation.en: DFA advise Irish citizens abroad to follow local public health advice and stay in regular contact with their family and friends.
translation.ga: Molann an RGE do shaoránaigh na hÉireann thar lear comhairle sláinte poiblí áitiúil a leanúint agus fanacht i dteagmháil rialta lena dteaghlach agus lena gcairde.

translation.en: You can contact your local Irish embassy or consulate and register your contact details with the Department.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú teagmháil a dhéanamh le d’ambasáid nó consalacht Éireannach áitiúil agus do chuid sonraí teagmhála a chlárú leis an Roinn.

translation.en: DFA’s Consular Assistance Unit in Dublin can also be contacted by calling +353 1 408 2000.
translation.ga: Is féidir teagmháil a dhéanamh freisin le hAonad Cúnaimh Chonsalachta RGE i mBaile Átha Cliath trí +353 1 408 2000 a ghlaoch.

translation.en: You can also follow DFA on Twitter and Facebook for regular updates.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat RGE a leanúint freisin ar Twitter agus Facebook chun nuashonruithe rialta a fháil.

translation.en: A number of Irish organisations abroad support Irish emigrants.
translation.ga: Tacaíonn roinnt eagraíochtaí Éireannacha thar lear le heisimircigh Éireannacha.

translation.en: Many are continuing to operate by phone and email even if their public offices are closed.
translation.ga: Tá go leor fós ag oibriú ar an bhfón agus ar rphost fiú má tá a noifigí poiblí dúnta.

translation.en: What to do when you return to Ireland
translation.ga: Cad atá le déanamh nuair a fhillfidh tú ar Éirinn

translation.en: Since Thursday 28 May, anyone arriving in Ireland from another country is required by law to fill in a Covid19 Passenger Locator Form.
translation.ga: Ón Déardaoin 28 Bealtaine, ceanglaítear le dlí ar aon duine a thagann go hÉirinn ó thír eile Foirm Aimsithe Paisinéirí Covid19 a líonadh.

translation.en: This includes people arriving from a country on the 'COVID19 green list' and people arriving from a country not on the 'COVID19 green list'.
translation.ga: Áirítear leis seo daoine a thagann ó thír ar ‘liosta glas COVID19’ agus daoine a thagann ó thír nach bhfuil ar ‘liosta glas COVID19’.

translation.en: You fill in the form online.
translation.ga: Líonann tú an fhoirm ar líne.

translation.en: Each passenger aged 16 or over should fill in one form.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do gach paisinéir atá 16 bliana d’aois nó níos sine foirm amháin a líonadh.

translation.en: If you are travelling with children under the age of 16 you should include their details on the form.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag taisteal le leanaí faoi bhun 16 bliana d’aois ba chóir duit a gcuid sonraí a chur ar an bhfoirm.

translation.en: They do not have to fill in their own form.
translation.ga: Ní gá dóibh a bhfoirm féin a líonadh.

translation.en: The information on the form may be used to contact you to check your location, or to contact you if there is a confirmed or suspected case of COVID19 on your flight or ferry.
translation.ga: Féadfar an fhaisnéis ar an bhfoirm a úsáid chun teagmháil a dhéanamh leat chun d’áit a sheiceáil, nó chun teagmháil a dhéanamh leat má tá cás dearbhaithe nó amhrasta de COVID19 ar d’eitilt nó ar do bhád farantóireachta.

translation.en: Fill in and submit the form to a relevant person
translation.ga: Líon isteach agus cuir isteach an fhoirm chuig duine ábhartha

translation.en: Provide further information when requested
translation.ga: Cuir tuilleadh faisnéise ar fáil nuair a iarrtar é

translation.en: Update your residence details if these change within 14 days of your arrival
translation.ga: Déan do chuid sonraí cónaithe a nuashonrú má athraíonn siad seo laistigh den 14 lá tar éis duit sroicheadh.

translation.en: Not knowingly provide information that is false or misleading
translation.ga: Gan faisnéis a sholáthar a bhfuil a fhios agat go bhfuil sí míthreorach nó bréagach

translation.en: There are penalties for not filling in the form or giving accurate details – you may be fined up to €2,500 or imprisoned for up to 6 months, or both.
translation.ga: Gearrtar pionóis as gan an fhoirm a líonadh nó sonraí cruinne a thabhairt féadfar fíneáil suas le € 2,500 a ghearradh ort nó príosúnacht ar feadh suas le 6 mhí, nó iad araon.

translation.en: If any of the information you provide on the form changes in the next 14 days, you must email passengerlocatorform@plf.ie with updated information.
translation.ga: Má athraíonn aon chuid den fhaisnéis a sholáthraíonn tú ar an bhfoirm sna 14 lá amach romhainn, ní mór duit ríomhphost a sheoladh chuig passengerlocatorform@plf.ie le faisnéis nuashonraithe.

translation.en: You do not have to fill in the form if you are:
translation.ga: Ní gá duit an fhoirm a líonadh má tá tú:

translation.en: Arriving from Northern Ireland
translation.ga: Ag teacht ó Thuaisceart Éireann

translation.en: A transit passenger who will not be leaving the port or airport
translation.ga: Paisinéir idirthurais nach mbeidh ag fágáil an chalafoirt nó an aerfoirt

translation.en: Holders of a Certificate for International Transport Workers, or drivers of a heavy goods vehicle who are in Ireland for work
translation.ga: Sealbhóirí Teastas d’Oibrithe Iompair Idirnáisiúnta, nó tiománaithe feithicil earraí troma atá in Éirinn le haghaidh oibre

translation.en: Aircraft crew, including pilots, in Ireland as part of your work
translation.ga: Criú aerárthaí, píolótaí san áireamh, in Éirinn mar chuid de do chuid oibre

translation.en: Ship crew, including maritime masters, in Ireland as part of your work
translation.ga: Criú loinge, máistrí muirí san áireamh, in Éirinn mar chuid de do chuid oibre

translation.en: A foreign diplomat
translation.ga: Taidhleoir eachtrach

translation.en: You will only need to fill in part of the form, if you are not staying overnight in the State.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh ort ach cuid den fhoirm a líonadh, mura bhfuil tú ag fanacht thar oíche sa Stát.

translation.en: When you arrive, you will also need to restrict your movements for 14 days.
translation.ga: Nuair a thagann tú, beidh ort srian a chur ar do ghluaiseachtaí ar feadh 14 lá freisin.

translation.en: You should avoid using public transport to travel to your final destination and ask a relative or household member to collect you instead.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit iompar poiblí a sheachaint chun taisteal chuig do cheann scríbe deiridh agus iarraidh ar ghaol nó ball teaghlaigh tú a bhailiú ina ionad.

translation.en: Read more about restricting your movements in ’Do I need to quarantine?’ below, including exceptions.
translation.ga: Léigh tuilleadh faoi srian a chur ar do ghluaiseachtaí in 'An gá dom bheith ar coraintín?' thíos, lena náirítear eisceachtaí.

translation.en: Do I need to quarantine?
translation.ga: An gá dom bheith ar coraintín?

translation.en: Most people who arrive in Ireland from another country need to restrict their movements (sometimes called quarantining) for 14 days, including:
translation.ga: Caithfidh mórchuid na ndaoine a thagann go hÉirinn ó thír eile srian a chur ar a ngluaiseachtaí (ar a dtugtar coraintín uaireanta air ) ar feadh 14 lá, lena náirítear:

translation.en: Returning Irish emigrants
translation.ga: Eisimircigh Éireannacha ag filleadh

translation.en: People with no symptoms
translation.ga: Daoine gan aon comharthaí

translation.en: People who have tested negative for the virus in another country
translation.ga: Daoine a rinne tástáil dhiúltach don víreas i dtír eile

translation.en: The only people who do not need to restrict their movements are:
translation.ga: Is iad na daoine amháin nach gá dóibh a gcuid gluaiseachtaí a shrianadh:

translation.en: People arriving from Northern Ireland
translation.ga: Daoine ag teacht ó Thuaisceart Éireann

translation.en: Aircraft crew, including pilots, in Ireland as part of their work
translation.ga: Criú aerárthaí, píolótaí san áireamh, in Éirinn mar chuid dá gcuid oibre

translation.en: Holders of a Certificate for International Transport Workers, or heavy good vehicle drivers who are in Ireland for work
translation.ga: Sealbhóirí Teastas d’Oibrithe Iompair Idirnáisiúnta, nó tiománaithe d’fheithiclí troma atá in Éirinn le haghaidh oibre

translation.en: Ship crew, including the maritime master, in Ireland as part of their work
translation.ga: Criú loinge, an máistir muirí san áireamh, in Éirinn mar chuid dá gcuid oibre

translation.en: People arriving from a country on the 'COVID19 green list'
translation.ga: Daoine ag teacht ó thír ar ' liosta glas COVID19 '

translation.en: If you are tested for COVID19 during the first 14 days after arriving in Ireland, you must continue to restrict your movements even if you get a negative test result.
translation.ga: Má dhéantar tástáil ar COVID19 le linn na chéad 14 lá tar éis duit teacht go hÉirinn, caithfidh tú leanúint de do ghluaiseachtaí a shrianadh fiú má fhaigheann tú toradh tástála diúltach.

translation.en: During the 14 days, you should stay at home and avoid contact with other people and social situations as much as possible.
translation.ga: Le linn an 14 lá, ba cheart duit fanacht sa bhaile agus teagmháil le daoine eile agus cásanna sóisialta a sheachaint a oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: You must also avoid:
translation.ga: Ní mór duit an méid seo a leanas freisin a sheachaint:

translation.en: Using public transport
translation.ga: Iompar poiblí a úsáid

translation.en: Visiting others
translation.ga: Cuairt ar dhaoine eile

translation.en: Meeting people facetoface who are at higher risk from COVID19
translation.ga: Ag bualadh le daoine duine le duine atá i mbaol níos airde ó COVID19

translation.en: Going to the shop, unless you have to (wear a face covering if you do)
translation.ga: Ag dul go dtí an siopa, mura gcaithfidh tú (caith clúdach aghaidhe má dhéanann tú é)

translation.en: What to do if you develop symptoms of COVID19
translation.ga: Cad atá le déanamh má thagann comharthaí COVID19 ort

translation.en: If you feel ill while you are restricting your movements, you should selfisolate and call a doctor.
translation.ga: Má bhraitheann tú tinn agus tú ag srianadh do ghluaiseachtaí, ba cheart duit tú féin a leithlisiú agus glaoch ar dhochtúir.
