translation.en: Do not go to a doctor’s surgery, pharmacy or hospital.
translation.ga: Ná téigh chuig obráid dochtúra, cógaslann nó ospidéal.

translation.en: Your doctor will assess you over the phone.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh do dhochtúir measúnú ort ar an bhfón.

translation.en: If they think you need to be tested for COVID19, they will arrange a test.
translation.ga: Má cheapann siad go gcaithfidh tú tástáil COVID19 a dhéanamh, socróidh siad tástáil.

translation.en: Selfisolation means staying indoors and completely avoiding contact with other people, including people you live with.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn féinleithlisiú fanacht istigh agus gan teagmháil a dhéanamh le haon duine eile go hiomlán, lena náirítear daoine a bhfuil cónaí ort leo.

translation.en: If you live with others, they also need to restrict their movements.
translation.ga: Má tá cónaí ort le daoine eile, caithfidh siad srian a chur ar a ngluaiseachtaí freisin.

translation.en: Getting around
translation.ga: Ag dul thart

translation.en: As part of Phase 3 of the Government roadmap, you can travel anywhere in the country from 29 June 2020.
translation.ga: Mar chuid de Chéim 3 de threochlár an Rialtais, is féidir leat taisteal áit ar bith sa tír ón 29 Meitheamh 2020.

translation.en: Public transport
translation.ga: Iompar poiblí

translation.en: Public transport services are running but you should only use public transport for essential journeys.
translation.ga: Tá seirbhísí iompair phoiblí ar siúl ach níor chóir duit iompar poiblí a úsáid ach le haghaidh turas riachtanach.

translation.en: If you have to use public transport, wearing a face covering is mandatory.
translation.ga: Má tá ort iompar poiblí a úsáid, tá sé éigeantach clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh.

translation.en: Read about using public transport during COVID19.
translation.ga: Léigh faoi iompar poiblí a úsáid le linn COVID19.

translation.en: Driving
translation.ga: Tiomáint

translation.en: The COVID19 pandemic has caused disruption to driving licencing, testing and National Car Test services in Ireland.
translation.ga: Chuir paindéim COVID19 isteach ar sheirbhísí ceadúnaithe, tástála agus Tástála Carranna Náisiúnta in Éirinn.

translation.en: You can find out more about this in our document on Driving and Transport during COVID19.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat tuilleadh a fháil amach faoi seo inár ndoiciméad ar Tiomáint agus Iompar le linn COVID19.

translation.en: As part of public health measures during COVID19, if you have an Irish driving licence that is due to expire between 1 March and 30 June 2020, your licence is automatically renewed for a further 4 months.
translation.ga: Mar chuid de bhearta sláinte poiblí le linn COVID19, má tá ceadúnas tiomána Éireannach agat atá le dul in éag idir 1 Márta agus 30 Meitheamh 2020, déantar do cheadúnas a athnuachan go huathoibríoch ar feadh 4 mhí eile.

translation.en: Learner permits that are due to expire between 1 March 2020 and 31 October 2020 are automatically renewed for 4 months.
translation.ga: Déantar ceadanna foghlaimeora atá le dul in éag idir 1 Márta 2020 agus 31 Deireadh Fómhair 2020 a athnuachan go huathoibríoch ar feadh 4 mhí.

translation.en: If you have a valid full foreign driving licence, you can drive on this for up to 12 months while visiting Ireland.
translation.ga: Má tá ceadúnas tiomána bailí eachtrach iomlán agat, féadfaidh tú tiomáint air seo ar feadh suas le 12 mhí agus tú ag tabhairt cuairte ar Éirinn.

translation.en: If you plan to stay in Ireland for longer than 12 months, you should apply to convert your foreign driving licence for an Irish licence if you are eligible, or go through the driving test process to get an Irish driving licence.
translation.ga: Má tá sé ar intinn agat fanacht in Éirinn níos faide ná 12 mhí, ba cheart duit iarratas a dhéanamh chun do cheadúnas tiomána coigríche a thiontú ar cheadúnas Éireannach má tá tú incháilithe, nó dul tríd an bpróiseas tástála tiomána chun ceadúnas tiomána Éireannach a fháil .

translation.en: Importing a vehicle
translation.ga: Feithicil a iompórtáil

translation.en: All vehicles brought into Ireland are subject to Vehicle Registration Tax (VRT) and must be registered.
translation.ga: Tá gach feithicil a thugtar isteach in Éirinn faoi réir Cánach Clárúcháin Feithicle (VRT) agus ní mór iad a chlárú.

translation.en: Vehicle registration inspections are currently suspended due to the public health emergency.
translation.ga: Tá cigireachtaí ar chlárú feithiclí ar fionraí faoi láthair mar gheall ar an éigeandáil sláinte poiblí.

translation.en: For more information on importing a vehicle to Ireland, including details of VRT exemptions and when VRT testing will resume, read our document on Importing a car into Ireland.
translation.ga: Le haghaidh tuilleadh faisnéise ar fheithicil a allmhairiú go hÉirinn, lena náirítear sonraí faoi dhíolúintí CCF agus cathain a atosófar tástáil VRT, léigh ár ndoiciméad maidir le carr a Allmhairiú go hÉirinn.

translation.en: Health information
translation.ga: Faisnéis sláinte

translation.en: The HSE provides health information on COVID19, including:
translation.ga: Cuireann an FSS faisnéis sláinte ar COVID19, lena náirítear:

translation.en: The symptoms and causes of COVID19 (coronavirus)
translation.ga: Na hairíonna agus na cúiseanna atá le COVID19 (coróinvíreas)

translation.en: When to call a doctor
translation.ga: Cathain chun dochtúir a ghlaoch

translation.en: How to protect yourself and others
translation.ga: Conas tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint

translation.en: Groups at increased risk from COVID19 (coronavirus) and what they should do
translation.ga: Grúpaí atá i mbaol níos mó ó COVID19 (coróinvíreas) agus cad ba cheart dóibh a dhéanamh

translation.en: Pregnancy and coronavirus
translation.ga: Toircheas agus coróinvíreas

translation.en: If you develop symptoms on your return to Ireland, you need to selfisolate and phone any local GP.
translation.ga: Má thagann comharthaí ort nuair a fhilleann tú ar Éirinn, ní mór duit féinaonrú a dhéanamh agus glaoch ar aon Dochtúir Teaghlaigh áitiúil.

translation.en: Do not go to a GP surgery, pharmacy or hospital.
translation.ga: Ná téigh chuig obráid dochtúra, cógaslann nó ospidéal.

translation.en: The GP will assess you over the phone.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh an dochtúir teaghlaigh measúnú ort ar an bhfón.

translation.en: If they think you need to be tested for coronavirus, they will arrange a test.
translation.ga: Má cheapann siad go gcaithfear tástáil a dhéanamh ort maidir le coróinvíreas, socróidh siad tástáil.

translation.en: The HSE also provides information on minding your mental health during the COVID19 outbreak.
translation.ga: Soláthraíonn FSS faisnéis freisin maidir le cuimhneamh ar do mheabhairshláinte le linn na ráige COVID19 .

translation.en: Income supports
translation.ga: Tacaíochtaí ioncaim

translation.en: Depending on your circumstances, you may need financial assistance when you return to Ireland.
translation.ga: Ag brath ar do chúinsí, b’fhéidir go mbeidh cúnamh airgeadais de dhíth ort nuair a fhillfidh tú ar Éirinn.

translation.en: The Department of Employment Affairs and Social Protection (DEASP) has a range of social welfare payments to provide financial support.
translation.ga: Tá raon íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh ag an Roinn Gnóthaí Fostaíochta agus Cosanta Sóisialta (RCS) chun tacaíocht airgeadais a sholáthar.

translation.en: The quickest way to apply for these is online through MyWelfare.
translation.ga: Is é an bealach is tapa chun iarratas a dhéanamh orthu seo ar líne trí MyWelfare.

translation.en: To do this you will need to create a MyGovID account.
translation.ga: Chun seo a dhéanamh beidh ort cuntas MyGovID a chruthú.

translation.en: You will also need a Personal Public Service (PPS) number.
translation.ga: Teastóidh uimhir Seirbhíse Poiblí Pearsanta (PSP) uait freisin.

translation.en: PPS numbers
translation.ga: Uimhreacha PSP

translation.en: You must have a Personal Public Service (PPS) number to apply for a social welfare payment.
translation.ga: Caithfidh uimhir na Seirbhíse Poiblí Pearsanta (PSP) a bheith agat chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh.

translation.en: If you have worked in Ireland before you may already have a PPS number.
translation.ga: Má d’oibrigh tú in Éirinn roimhe seo b’fhéidir go bhfuil uimhir PSP agat cheana féin.

translation.en: You can get your PPS number from DEASP’s Client Identity Services:
translation.ga: Is féidir leat d’uimhir PSP a fháil ó Sheirbhísí Aitheantais Cliant DSP:

translation.en: If you, your partner or your children do not have a PPS number, you can apply for one by email as part of new special measures during the COVID19 outbreak.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil uimhir PSP agat féin, ag do pháirtí nó ag do leanaí, is féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh ar cheann trí ríomhphost mar chuid de bhearta speisialta nua le linn na ráige COVID19.

translation.en: You must download and fill out the REG1 form and send it to with a scanned image or photograph of your identity document (passport, driving licence, ID card) and proof of address (utility bill, letter from landlord to PPSN@welfare.ie.
translation.ga: Caithfidh tú an fhoirm REG1 a íoslódáil agus a líonadh agus í a sheoladh le híomhá scanta nó grianghraf de do dhoiciméad aitheantais (pas, ceadúnas tiomána, cárta aitheantais) agus cruthúnas ar do sheoladh (bille fóntais, litir ón tiarna talún chuig PPSN@welfare.ie.

translation.en: Applying for social welfare
translation.ga: Iarratas a dhéanamh ar leas sóisialach

translation.en: The Returning to Ireland section of our website gives information on how to access social welfare as a returning Irish emigrant.
translation.ga: Tugann an chuid um Fhilleadh ar Éirinn ar ár suíomh Gréasáin faisnéis faoi rochtain a fháil ar leas sóisialta mar eisimirceach Éireannach atá ag filleadh.

translation.en: If you are applying for a social assistance payment, you need to show that Ireland is currently your main place of residence.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag déanamh iarratais ar íocaíocht cúnaimh shóisialta, ní mór duit a thaispeáint gurb í Éire do phríomháit chónaithe faoi láthair.

translation.en: This is called the Habitual Residence Condition (HRC).
translation.ga: Tugtar an Coinníoll Cónaithe Gnáthúil (HRC) air seo.

translation.en: You do not have to have been living in Ireland for a certain period of time to be considered habitually resident.
translation.ga: Ní gá go raibh tú i do chónaí in Éirinn ar feadh tréimhse áirithe ama le go gceapfaí go bhfuil gnáthchónaí ort.

translation.en: You can read more about returning Irish emigrants and the HRC.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú níos mó a léamh faoi eisimircigh Éireannacha atá ag filleadh agus an HRC.

translation.en: Crosscare Migrant Project’s website also has useful FAQs on the HRC and you can also contact them for support if you are having difficulty with your application
translation.ga: Tá Ceisteanna Coitianta ar an HRC úsáideacha ar shuíomh Gréasáin Crosscare Migrant Project freisin agus is féidir leat teagmháil a dhéanamh leo chun tacaíocht a fháil má tá deacracht agat le d’iarratas

translation.en: People who have lost employment outside Ireland are not eligible for the new COVID19 Pandemic Unemployment Payment upon returning to Ireland because the payment is only for people who have lost employment in Ireland.
translation.ga: Níl daoine a chaill fostaíocht lasmuigh d’Éirinn incháilithe don Íocaíocht Dífhostaíochta Phaindéimeach COVID19 nua tar éis dóibh filleadh ar Éirinn toisc nach bhfuil an íocaíocht ach do dhaoine a chaill fostaíocht in Éirinn.

translation.en: They may access other social welfare payments such as Jobseeker’s Allowance and Basic Supplementary Allowance.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh siad rochtain a fháil ar íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh eile mar Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist agus Liúntas Forlíontach Bunúsach.

translation.en: Anyone in crisis, or without any income can apply for an Exceptional Needs Payment.
translation.ga: Is féidir le duine ar bith atá i ngéarchéim, nó gan aon ioncam iarratas a dhéanamh ar Íocaíocht Riachtanas Eisceachtúil.

translation.en: If you are returning from abroad it is important to try to have somewhere to stay on arrival.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag filleadh ó thar lear tá sé tábhachtach iarracht a dhéanamh áit éigin a bheith agat le fanacht.

translation.en: The Returning to Ireland section of our website has more housingrelated information and advice for returning emigrants.
translation.ga: Tá níos mó faisnéise agus comhairle a bhaineann le tithíocht le haghaidh eisimircigh atá ag teacht ar ais ar an gcuid Ag filleadh ar Éirinn ar ár suíomh Gréasáin.

translation.en: The Government has introduced a range of special measures to assist tenants impacted by the COVID19 outbreak.
translation.ga: Tá raon beart speisialta tugtha isteach ag an Rialtas chun cabhrú le tionóntaí a ndeachaigh an ráig COVID19 i bhfeidhm orthu.

translation.en: For more information, see Renting and COVID19.
translation.ga: Le haghaidh tuilleadh faisnéise, féach Cíos agus COVID19.

translation.en: Any Irish emigrants returning to Ireland who are homeless, at risk of homelessness or in any other crisis situation should contact the local council in the area they are returning to.
translation.ga: Ba cheart d’aon eisimircigh Éireannacha atá ag filleadh ar Éirinn atá gan dídean, atá i mbaol a bheith gan dídean nó in aon chás géarchéime eile teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an gcomhairle áitiúil sa cheantar a bhfuil siad ag filleadh air.

translation.en: The following support organisations may also be able to give you more information and advice by phone or email:
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh go mbeadh na heagraíochtaí tacaíochta seo a leanas in ann tuilleadh faisnéise agus comhairle a thabhairt duit ar an bhfón nó ar rphost:

translation.en: Crosscare Migrant Project is a Dublin based NGO providing information and advocacy support to Irish emigrants and people who have moved to Ireland.
translation.ga: Is ENR atá lonnaithe i mBaile Átha Cliath é Crosscare Migrant Project a sholáthraíonn faisnéis agus tacaíocht abhcóideachta d’eisimircigh Éireannacha agus do dhaoine a bhog go hÉirinn.

translation.en: Contact Crosscare here, email migrantproject@crosscare.ie or call +353 (0)1 873 2844.
translation.ga: Téigh i dteagmháil le Crosscare anseo , seol ríomhphost chuig migrantproject@crosscare.ie nó glaoigh ar +353 (0) 1 873 2844.

translation.en: Safe Home Ireland is an Irish emigrant support service that provides a range of services to more than 2,000 people each year.
translation.ga: Is seirbhís tacaíochta eisimirceach Éireannach é Safe Home Ireland a sholáthraíonn raon seirbhísí do níos mó ná 2,000 duine gach bliain.

translation.en: Safe Home provides an advice and information service, outreach visits and housing assistance to eligible applicants.
translation.ga: Soláthraíonn Safe Home seirbhís comhairle agus faisnéise, cuairteanna forrochtana agus cúnamh tithíochta d’iarratasóirí incháilithe.

translation.en: Contact Safe Home Ireland here; email info@safehomeireland.com or call +353 98 36036
translation.ga: Téigh i dteagmháil le Safe Home Ireland anseo ; seol ríomhphost chuig info@safehomeireland.com nó glaoigh ar +353 98 36036

translation.en: Employment Wage Subsidy Scheme
translation.ga: Scéim Fóirdheontais Pá Fostaíochta

translation.en: Rules for EWSS
translation.ga: Rialacha maidir le EWSS

translation.en: Rates
translation.ga: Rátaí

translation.en: How to apply
translation.ga: Conas iarratas a dhéanamh

translation.en: Under the July Jobs Stimulus Package the Employment Wage Subsidy Scheme (EWSS) has replaced the Temporary Wage Subsidy Scheme (TWSS) from 1 September 2020.
translation.ga: Faoi Phacáiste Spreagtha Poist Iúil tá an Scéim Fóirdheontais Pá Fostaíochta (EWSS) tagtha in áit na Scéime Fóirdheontais Pá Sealadaigh (TWSS) ón 1 Meán Fómhair 2020.

translation.en: It will run until 31 March 2021.
translation.ga: Mairfidh sí go dtí 31 Márta 2021.

translation.en: Under the EWSS scheme, employers and new firms in sectors impacted by COVID19 whose turnover has fallen 30% will get a flatrate subsidy per week based on the number of qualifying employees on the payroll, including seasonal staff and new employees.
translation.ga: Faoin scéim EWSS, gheobhaidh fostóirí agus gnólachtaí nua in earnálacha a ndeachaigh COVID19 i bhfeidhm orthu agus a bhfuil a láimhdeachas laghdaithe 30% fóirdheontas ar ráta comhréidh in aghaidh na seachtaine bunaithe ar líon na bhfostaithe cáilitheacha ar an bpárolla, lena náirítear foireann shéasúrach agus fostaithe nua.

translation.en: If an employee has more than one job, each employer can make a claim under the EWSS, ignoring any other employments the employee may have.
translation.ga: Má tá níos mó ná post amháin ag fostaí, is féidir le gach fostóir éileamh a dhéanamh faoin EWSS, agus neamhaird a dhéanamh ar aon fhostaíocht eile a d’fhéadfadh a bheith ag an bhfostaí.

translation.en: The TWSS finished on 31 August 2020 and no new applications can be accepted from that date.
translation.ga: Cuireadh deireadh leis an TWSS an 31 Lúnasa 2020 agus ní féidir glacadh le haon iarratais nua ón dáta sin.

translation.en: The two schemes ran in parallel from 1 July until the TWSS closed on 31 August 2020.
translation.ga: Ritheadh an dá scéim in éineacht a chéile ón 1 Iúil go dtí gur dúnadh an TWSS an 31 Lúnasa 2020.

translation.en: This page is a summary of the EWSS rules and operation.
translation.ga: Is achoimre é an leathanach seo ar rialacha agus ar oibriú EWSS.

translation.en: You can get more detailed guidance on the operation of the scheme from Revenue’s EWSS Guidelines (pdf).
translation.ga: Is féidir leat muintreoir a fháil ar oibriú na scéime ó Threoirlínte EWSS na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim (pdf).

translation.en: Rules for EWSS
translation.ga: Rialacha maidir le EWSS

translation.en: How do I qualify?
translation.ga: Conas a cháilím?

translation.en: To qualify for the scheme you must:
translation.ga: Chun cáiliú don scéim caithfidh tú:

translation.en: Have valid tax clearance
translation.ga: Imréiteach cánach bailí a bheith agat

translation.en: Meet the reduction in turnover or customer orders test
translation.ga: An tástáil laghdaithe ar láimhdeachas nó ar orduithe custaiméirí a chomhlíonadh

translation.en: Tax clearance
translation.ga: Imréiteach Cánach

translation.en: In order to receive the EWSS payments, you must:
translation.ga: D’fhonn na híocaíochtaí EWSS a fháil, ní mór duit:

translation.en: Have a valid tax clearance certificate
translation.ga: Imréiteach cánach bailí a bheith agat

translation.en: Continue to maintain tax clearance for the duration of the scheme
translation.ga: imréiteach cánach a choinneáil ar feadh ré na scéime

translation.en: You can check your current tax clearance status online through ROS.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú do stádas reatha imréitigh cánach a sheiceáil ar líne trí ROS.

translation.en: More information on tax clearance is available from Revenue.
translation.ga: Tá tuilleadh faisnéise maidir le himréiteach cánach ar fáil ó na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim.

translation.en: The July Stimulus Package included measures on ‘warehousing’ or deferral of unpaid VAT and Employers PAYE debt associated with COVID19.
translation.ga: Áiríodh i bPacáiste Spreagthaí Iúil Iúil bearta maidir le ‘trádstóráil’ nó iarchur CBL neamhíoctha agus fiachas ÍMAT Fostóirí bainteach le COVID19.

translation.en: You can get more information on the initiatives covering COVID19 related tax debts in Revenue’s Information Booklet (pdf).
translation.ga: Is féidir leat tuilleadh faisnéise a fháil faoi na tionscnaimh a chuimsíonn fiacha cánach bainteach le COVID19 i Leabhrán Faisnéise na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim (pdf).

translation.en: Reduction in turnover or customer orders test
translation.ga: An tástáil laghdaithe ar láimhdeachas nó ar orduithe custaiméirí

translation.en: You must selfdeclare to Revenue that you have experienced significant negative economic disruption due to COVID19, with a minimum of 30% decline in turnover or customer orders (between July and December 2020 compared with the same period in 2019).
translation.ga: Ní mór duit féin a dhearbhú do na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim go raibh cur isteach suntasach diúltach eacnamaíoch ort mar gheall ar COVID19, agus laghdú 30% ar a laghad ar láimhdeachas nó ar orduithe custaiméirí (idir Iúil agus Nollaig 2020 i gcomparáid leis an tréimhse chéanna in 2019).

translation.en: The review of turnover or orders should look at the period as whole, not individual months.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go bhféachfadh an tathbhreithniú ar láimhdeachas nó orduithe ar an tréimhse ina hiomláine, ní ar mhíonna aonair.

translation.en: For new businesses, this is based on a projected forward test.
translation.ga: Maidir le gnólachtaí nua, tá sé seo bunaithe ar thástáil réamhmheasta.

translation.en: If you are a registered childcare provider, you do not need to meet the 30% reduction in turnover or customer orders test.
translation.ga: Más soláthraí cláraithe cúraim leanaí tú, ní gá duit an laghdú 30% ar láimhdeachas nó tástáil orduithe custaiméirí a chomhlíonadh.

translation.en: If you have a more complex business structure and need help determining your eligibility for the scheme, you can get further guidance in Appendix I of Revenue’s EWSS Guidelines.
translation.ga: Má tá struchtúr gnó níos casta agat agus theastaíonn cabhair uait chun d’incháilitheacht don scéim a chinneadh, féadfaidh tú tuilleadh treorach a fháil in Aguisín I de Threoirlínte EWSS na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim.

translation.en: Eligible employees
translation.ga: Fostaithe incháilithe

translation.en: The scheme is available for employers who keep staff on their payroll during the pandemic.
translation.ga: Tá an scéim ar fáil d’fhostóirí a choinníonn baill foirne ar a bpárolla le linn na paindéime.

translation.en: Temporarily not working or
translation.ga: Gan a bheith ag obair ar bhonn sealadach nó

translation.en: On reduced hours or reduced pay (or both)
translation.ga: Ar uaireanta laghdaithe nó ar phá laghdaithe (nó an dá rud

translation.en: An eligible employer must be paying gross wages between €151.50 and €1,462 gross per week to qualify for EWSS (see Rates below).
translation.ga: Caithfidh fostóir incháilithe a bheith ag íoc pá comhlán idir €151.50 agus €1,462 comhlán in aghaidh na seachtaine chun cáiliú le haghaidh EWSS (féach Rátaí thíos).

translation.en: If you have a new employee (new hire or a seasonal worker), they can start the EWSS from 1 July 2020.
translation.ga: Má tá fostaí nua agat nó oibrí séasúrach, féadfaidh siad an EWSS a thosú ón 1 Iúil 2020.

translation.en: You can get more information on how to make applications for new hires and seasonal workers in Revenue’s EWSS Guidelines (pdf).
translation.ga: Is féidir leat tuilleadh faisnéise a fháil maidir le conas iarratais a dhéanamh ar fhostaí nua agus ar oibrithe séasúracha i dTreoirlínte EWSS na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim (pdf).

translation.en: Certain categories of employees are excluded from the EWSS.
translation.ga: Tá catagóirí áirithe fostaithe eisiata ón EWSS.

translation.en: Proprietary directors (with the exception of those who keep ‘ordinary’ employees on the payroll – see below)
translation.ga: Stiúrthóirí dílsithe (seachas iad siúd a choinníonn ‘gnáth’ fhostaithe ar an bpárolla féach thíos)

translation.en: Connected parties who were not on the payroll and paid at any time between July 2019 and June 2020
translation.ga: Páirtithe nasctha nach raibh ar an bpárolla agus iad íoctha am ar bith idir Iúil 2019 agus Meitheamh 2020

translation.en: Proprietary directors who keep ‘ordinary’ employees on the payroll are being reinstated to the EWSS from 1 September.
translation.ga: Beidh stiúrthóirí dílsithe a choinníonn 'gnáth'fhostaithe ar an bpárolla á gcur ar ais ar an EWSS ón 1 Meán Fómhair.

translation.en: Revenue will provide more guidance shortly and this document will be updated when more information becomes available.
translation.ga: Cuirfidh na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim tuilleadh treorach ar fáil go gairid agus déanfar uasdátú ar an doiciméad seo nuair a bheidh tuilleadh faisnéise ar fáil.

translation.en: You can read additional guidance on eligible employees and excluded categories in Revenue’s EWSS Guidelines.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú treoir bhreise a léamh ar fhostaithe incháilithe agus ar chatagóirí eisiata i dTreoirlínte EWSS na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim.

translation.en: Applications for EWSS are based on selfassessment principles.
translation.ga: Tá iarratais ar EWSS bunaithe ar phrionsabail féinmheasúnaithe.

translation.en: This means you will not have to provide proof of eligibility to Revenue at the registration stage.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo nach mbeidh ort cruthúnas incháilitheachta a sholáthar do na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim ag céim an chláraithe.

translation.en: Revenue will review eligibility in the future, based on risk criteria see ‘Compliance checks’ below.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim athbhreithniú ar incháilitheacht am éigin as seo amach, bunaithe ar chritéir riosca féach ‘Seiceálacha comhlíonta’ thíos.

translation.en: You should keep proof of your eligibility for the scheme (evidence of reduction in turnover and other evidence).
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit cruthúnas ar d’incháilitheacht don scéim a choinneáil (fianaise ar laghdú ar láimhdeachas agus fianaise eile).

translation.en: You can read detailed information on the supporting proofs in Appendix I of Revenue’s EWSS Guidelines.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú mionfhaisnéis ar na cruthúnais tacaíochta in Aguisín I de Threoirlínte EWSS na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim a léamh.

translation.en: Eligibility review
translation.ga: Athbhreithniú incháilitheachta

translation.en: On the last day of every month, you must complete a review to make sure you continue to meet the scheme’s eligibility criteria (looking at the period as a whole rather than on a monthly basis).
translation.ga: Ar an lá deireanach de gach mí, ní mór duit athbhreithniú a chur i gcrích chun a chinntiú go leanfaidh tú de chritéir incháilitheachta na scéime a chomhlíonadh (ag féachaint ar an tréimhse ina hiomláine seachas ar bhonn míosúil).

translation.en: If you no longer qualify, you must:
translation.ga: Mura gcáilíonn tú a thuilleadh, ní mór duit:

translation.en: Deregister for EWSS through ROS with effect from the 1st day of the next month
translation.ga: Díchlárú le haghaidh EWSS trí ROS le héifeacht ón 1ú lá den mhí seo chugainn

translation.en: Stop claiming the subsidy
translation.ga: Stop a chur ar éileamh an fhóirdheontais

translation.en: The requirement to do an eligibility review does not apply for July 2020 and the final month of the scheme.
translation.ga: Níl feidhm ag an gceanglas maidir le hathbhreithniú incháilitheachta a dhéanamh maidir le Iúil 2020 agus mí dheireanach na scéime.

translation.en: You can get more information on eligibility reviews in Revenue’s EWSS Guidance (pdf).
translation.ga: Is féidir leat tuilleadh faisnéise a fháil ar athbhreithnithe incháilitheachta i dTreoirlínte EWSS na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim (pdf).

translation.en: Compliance checks
translation.ga: Seiceálacha comhlíonta

translation.en: Revenue will be contacting employers in the future to check records relating to the operation of the scheme including:
translation.ga: Beidh na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim i dteagmháil le fostóirí a éigin as seo amach chun taifid a bhaineann le hoibriú na scéime a sheiceáil lena náirítear:

translation.en: Evidence that you meet the eligibility criteria, specifically the reduction in turnover or customer orders test
translation.ga: Fianaise go gcomhlíonann tú na critéir incháilitheachta, go sonrach an tástáil maidir le laghdú ar láimhdeachas nó orduithe custaiméirí

translation.en: Details of monthly eligibility reviews
translation.ga: Sonraí maidir le hathbhreithnithe incháilitheachta míosúla

translation.en: More information on compliance checks will be made available by Revenue.
translation.ga: Cuirfidh na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim tuilleadh faisnéise faoi sheiceálacha comhlíonta ar fáil.

translation.en: Rates
translation.ga: Rátaí

translation.en: The subsidy amount paid to employers will depend on the gross income of each employee.
translation.ga: Braithfidh méid an fhóirdheontais a íoctar le fostóirí ar ollioncam gach fostaí.

translation.en: EWSS will give a flatrate subsidy to qualifying employers, based on the number of qualifying employees on the payroll.
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh EWSS fóirdheontas ar ráta comhréidh d’fhostóirí cáilitheacha, bunaithe ar líon na bhfostaithe cáilitheacha ar an bpárolla.

translation.en: For every employee paid between €203 and €1,462 gross per week, the subsidy is €203.
translation.ga: Maidir le gach fostaí lena níoctar idir €203 agus €1,462 comhlán in aghaidh na seachtaine, is é an fóirdheontas ná €203.

translation.en: For every employee paid between €151.50 and €202.99 gross per week, the subsidy is €151.50.
translation.ga: Maidir le gach fostaí lena níoctar idir €151.50 agus €202.99 comhlán in aghaidh na seachtaine, is é an fóirdheontas ná €151.50

translation.en: No subsidy is paid for employees paid less than €151.50 or more than €1,462 gross per week.
translation.ga: Ní íoctar aon fhóirdheontas le haghaidh fostaithe lena níoctar níos lú ná €151.50 nó níos mó ná €1,462 comhlán in aghaidh na seachtaine.

translation.en: Income tax and PRSI deductions
translation.ga: Cáin ioncaim agus asbhaintí ÁSPC

translation.en: Under the EWSS employers will have to resume the normal requirement to operate PAYE on all payments.
translation.ga: Faoi EWSS beidh ar fhostóirí an gnáthriachtanas ÍMAT a oibriú ar gach íocaíocht a atosú.

translation.en: This means you should resume the regular deduction of income tax, USC and employee PRSI from your employees’ pay.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé seo gur cheart duit asbhaint rialta cánach ioncaim, MSU agus ÁSPC fostaí a atosú ó phá d’fhostaithe.

translation.en: If an employment is eligible for the subsidy, a 0.5% rate of employer’s PRSI will apply.
translation.ga: Má tá fostaíocht incháilithe don fhóirdheontas, beidh ráta 0.5% d'ÁSPC an fhostóra i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: Backdating of subsidy
translation.ga: Siardhátú an fhóirdheontais

translation.en: The subsidy can be backdated to 1 July in some cases.
translation.ga: Is féidir an fóirdheontas a shiardhátú go 1 Iúil i gcásanna áirithe.

translation.en: New hires or seasonal workers
translation.ga: Fostaí nua nó oibrithe séasúracha

translation.en: Employees who were not eligible for TWSS (excluding employees who were not eligible for any subsidy when their income was tapered under the rules for TWSS)
translation.ga: Fostaithe nach raibh i dteideal TWSS (seachas fostaithe nach raibh incháilithe le haghaidh aon fhóirdheontais nuair a bhí a nioncam barrchaolaithe de réir rialacha TWSS)

translation.en: New employers to the EWSS who were not claiming TWSS or were not eligible for TWSS
translation.ga: Fostóirí nua don EWSS nach raibh ag éileamh TWSS nó nach raibh i dteideal TWSS

translation.en: The payment will be made after 14 September.
translation.ga: Déanfar an íocaíocht tar éis 14 Meán Fómhair.

translation.en: You can get more information on backdated payments in Revenue’s EWSS guidance (pdf).
translation.ga: Is féidir leat tuilleadh faisnéise a fháil ar íocaíochtaí siardhátaithe i dtreoirlínte EWSS na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim (pdf).

translation.en: How to apply
translation.ga: Conas iarratas a dhéanamh

translation.en: From 18 August, you, your agent or payroll provider will be able to register for the EWSS through Revenue’s Online Service (ROS).
translation.ga: Ón 18 Lúnasa, beidh tú féin, do ghníomhaire nó do sholáthraí párolla in ann clárú don EWSS trí Sheirbhís Ar Líne na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim (ROS).

translation.en: Applications will only be processed if you:
translation.ga: Ní phróiseálfar iarratais ach:

translation.en: Are registered for Employer’s PAYE/PRSI (PREM)
translation.ga: Má tá tú cláraithe le haghaidh ÍMAT/PRSI an Fhostóra (PREM)

translation.en: Have a bank account linked to the PREM registration
translation.ga: Má tá cuntas bainc agat atá nasctha leis an gclárú PREM

translation.en: Have tax clearance
translation.ga: Má tá imréiteach cánach agat

translation.en: Registration will be through the eRegistration system.
translation.ga: Is tríd an gcóras Ríomhchlárúcháin a dhéanfar an clárú.

translation.en: You will have to make a selfdeclaration as part of this process.
translation.ga: Beidh ort féindhearbhú a dhéanamh mar chuid den phróiseas seo.

translation.en: You can get detailed instructions on the process you should follow to operate Revenue’s EWSS on your payroll in Revenue’s EWSS Guidelines.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat miontreoracha a fháil maidir leis an bpróiseas ba cheart duit a leanúint chun EWSS na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim a oibriú ar do phárolla i dTreoirlínte EWSS na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim.

translation.en: You can get more help from Revenue’s National Employer Helpdesk through the myEnquiries system or by calling the National Employer helpline Tel: 01 738 3638 (Monday to Friday, from 9.00am to 5.00pm).
translation.ga: Is féidir leat tuilleadh cabhrach a fháil ó Dheasc Chabhrach Náisiúnta um Fhostóirí na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim tríd an gcóras MyEnquiries nó trí ghlaoch a chur ar an Líne Chabhrach Náisiúnta d'fhostóirí Teil: 01 738 3638 (Luan go hAoine, ó 9.00rn go 5.00in).

translation.en: If you have a question about your situation during the COVID19 emergency period, you can request a call back from the Citizens Information Service.
translation.ga: Má tá ceist agat faoi do chás le linn na tréimhse éigeandála COVID19, féadfaidh tú glaoch ar ais a lorg ón tSeirbhís Faisnéise do Shaoránaig

translation.en: Coronavirus COVID19
translation.ga: Coróinvíreas COVID19

translation.en: Public Information Booklet
translation.ga: Leabhrán Eolais don Phobal

translation.en: Ireland is operating a delay strategy in line with WHO and ECDC advice
translation.ga: Tá straitéis leis an COVID19 a mhoilliú á fheidhmiú in Éirinn chun teacht le comhairle WHO agus ECDC

translation.en: Coronavirus
translation.ga: Coróinvíreas

translation.en: COVID19 Information

translation.ga: Maidir leis an treoir seo

translation.en: This guide explains information about Ireland and Coronavirus (COVID19).
translation.ga: Mínítear eolas faoi Éirinn agus Coróinvíreas (COVID19) sa treoir seo.

translation.en: How is the Government responding to Coronavirus (COVID19)?
translation.ga: Cén chaoi a bhfuil an Rialtas ag dul i ngleic leis an gCoróinvíreas (COVID19)?

translation.en: The Government has introduced measures to protect the public by delaying the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Tá bearta tugtha isteach ag an Rialtas chun an pobal a chosaint trí mhoill a chur ar scaipeadh an víris.

translation.en: Keep this leaflet in a safe place, follow the guidance and keep up to date with advice at www.hse.ie
translation.ga: Coinnigh an bhileog seo in áit shábháilte, lean an treoir agus faigh an chomhairle is déanaí ar www.hse.ie

translation.en: What is Coronavirus (COVID19)?
translation.ga: Cad é Coróinvíreas (COVID19)?

translation.en: COVID19 is a new illness that can affect your lungs and airways.
translation.ga: Is tinneas nua é COVID19 a d’fhéadfadh dochar a dhéanamh do na scamhóga agus d’aerbhealaí.

translation.en: It’s caused by a virus called Coronavirus.
translation.ga: Is víreas ar a dtugtar Coróinvíreas is cúis leis.

translation.en: Coronavirus (COVID19) is spread in sneeze or cough droplets.
translation.ga: Scaiptear Coróinvíreas (COVID19) i mbraoiníní sraothartaí nó casachta.

translation.en: Current evidence suggests that the virus can spread as easily as the flu virus that circulates every winter.
translation.ga: Tugann an fhianaise atá ann faoi láthair le fios gur féidir leis an víreas scaipeadh chomh héasca le víreas fliú a scaiptear gach geimhreadh.

translation.en: Viruses can be easily spread to other people and you are normally infectious until all your symptoms have gone.
translation.ga: Is féidir víris a scaipeadh go héasca ar dhaoine eile agus de ghnáth bíonn tú tógálach go dtí go mbeidh do chuid comharthaí go léir imithe.

translation.en: Coronavirus (COVID19) may survive on surfaces if someone who has it coughs or sneezes onto it.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh Coróinvíreas (COVID19) maireachtáil ar dhromchlaí má bhíonn duine a bhfuil sé air ag casacht nó ag sraothartach orthu.

translation.en: Simple household disinfectants can kill the virus on surfaces.
translation.ga: Tá díghalráin shimplí tí ábalta an víreas a mharú ar dhromchlaí.

translation.en: The evidence so far suggests that:
translation.ga: Tugann an fhianaise go dtí seo le tuiscint:

translation.en: 80% of cases Patients experience mild illness and make a full recovery within a few weeks
translation.ga: 80% de na cásanna Bíonn breoiteacht éadrom ar othair agus tiocfaidh biseach iomlán laistigh de chúpla seachtain

translation.en: 14% of cases Patients experience more severe illness
translation.ga: 14% de na cásanna Bíonn breoiteacht níos déine ar othair

translation.en: 6% of cases Patients experience critical illness
translation.ga: 6% de na cásanna Bíonn breoiteacht chriticiúil ar othair

translation.en: Coronavirus
translation.ga: Coróinvíreas

translation.en: COVID19 Public Information
translation.ga: Eolas COVID19

translation.en: What are the symptoms of Coronavirus (COVID19)?
translation.ga: Cad iad comharthaí an Choróinvíreas (COVID19)?

translation.en: It can take up to 14 days for symptoms to appear.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh sé nach bhfeicfí aon chomhartha den Choróinvíreas (COVID19) go ceann 14 lá.

translation.en: The most common symptoms are:
translation.ga: Is iad na comharthaí is coitianta:

translation.en: Cough
translation.ga: Casacht

translation.en: This can be any kind of cough, usually dry but not always
translation.ga: De ghnáth, ach ní i gcónaí, bíonn an chasacht seo tirim

translation.en: Fever
translation.ga: Fiabhras

translation.en: High temperature over 38 degrees Celsius
translation.ga: Teocht ard os cionn 38 céim Celsius

translation.en: Shortness of Breath
translation.ga: Giorra anála

translation.en: Breathing Difficulties
translation.ga: Deacrachtaí análaithe

translation.en: You may display one, some or all of these symptoms.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh comhartha amháin, cuid de na comharthaí nó gach comhartha a bheith ort.

translation.en: If you are experiencing worrying symptoms, you should contact your GP OR call HSELive 1850 24 1850.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn tú buartha faoi aon chomhartha, ba cheart duit dul i dteagmháil le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh NÓ glaoch ar HSELive ar 1850 24 1850.

translation.en: Coronavirus
translation.ga: Coróinvíreas

translation.en: COVID19 Information
translation.ga: Eolas COVID19

translation.en: How can I protect myself from getting Coronavirus (COVID19)?
translation.ga: Conas is féidir liom mé féin a chosaint ar an gCoróinvíreas (COVID19)?

translation.en: Wash your hands regularly and avoid touching your face with your hands.
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha go rialta agus ná leag do lámh ar d’aghaidh.

translation.en: Hand gels with at least 60% alcohol content can be used if soap and water are not available.
translation.ga: Is féidir glóthacha láimhe a bhfuil cion alcóil 60% ar a laghad iontu a úsáid mura bhfuil gallúnach agus uisce ar fáil.

translation.en: How to wash your hands with soap and water
translation.ga: Conas do lámha a ní le gallúnach agus le huisce

translation.en: Wet your hands with warm water and apply soap.
translation.ga: Fliuch do lámha le huisce te agus gallúnach.

translation.en: Rub your hands together until the soap forms a lather.
translation.ga: Cuimil do lámha le chéile go dtí go ndéantar sobal.

translation.en: Rub the top of your hands, between your fingers and under your fingernails.
translation.ga: Cuimil barr do lámha, idir do mhéara agus faoi do mhéar.

translation.en: Do this for about 20 seconds.
translation.ga: Déan é seo ar feadh thart ar 20 soicind.

translation.en: Rinse your hands under running water.
translation.ga: Glan do lámha faoi uisce reatha.

translation.en: Dry your hands with a clean towel or paper towel.
translation.ga: Triomaigh do lámha le tuáille glan nó tuáille páipéir.

translation.en: A video demonstration is available at hse.ie/handhygiene
translation.ga: Tá físean ar fáil ag hse.ie/handhygiene

translation.en: When coughing and sneezing, cover your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue.
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn tú ag casacht agus ag sraothartach, clúdaigh do bhéal agus do shrón le d’uillinn lúbtha nó ciarsúr páipéir.

translation.en: Put used tissues into a closed bin and wash your hands.
translation.ga: Cuir ciarsúr pháipéir i mbosca bruscair dúnta tar éis é a úsáid agus nigh do lámha.

translation.en: Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces.
translation.ga: Glan agus díghalraigh gach rud agus dromchlaí a mbíonn tú i dteagmháil leo go minic.

translation.en: Use regular household disinfectants to clean surfaces.
translation.ga: Úsáid díghalráin rialta tí chun dromchlaí a ghlanadh.

translation.en: Do not shake hands or make close contact where possible.
translation.ga: Ná croith lámh le daoine eile agus fan amach ó dhaoine eile más féidir leat.

translation.en: We recommend social distancing for all people to decrease the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Molaimid aonrú sóisialta do gach duine chun scaipeadh an víris a laghdú.

translation.en: Social distance measures work by reducing contact between sick and healthy individuals.
translation.ga: Oibríonn bearta aonraithe sóisialta trí theagmháil idir daoine breoite agus sláintiúla a laghdú.

translation.en: We also recommend that you reduce social interactions to help protect yourself from getting the virus.
translation.ga: Molaimid freisin idirghníomhaíochtaí sóisialta a laghdú chun cabhrú leat tú féin a chosaint ar an víreas.

translation.en: Reduce the number of people you meet day to day.
translation.ga: Gearr siar ar an líon daoine a mbuaileann tú leo ó lá go lá.

translation.en: Some of the things you can do include:
translation.ga: I measc cuid de na rudaí is féidir leat a dhéanamh:

translation.en: Reduce interactions with people outside the workplace and the home
translation.ga: Idirghníomhaíochtaí le daoine lasmuigh den ionad oibre agus sa bhaile a laghdú

translation.en: Increase your distance from others – keep separate by at least 1 metre (3ft), ideally at least 2 metres (6ft)
translation.ga: Fan amach ó dhaoine eile – 1 méadar (3tr) ar a laghad agus 2 mhéadar (6tr) más féidir

translation.en: Don’t shake hands
translation.ga: Ná croith lámha

translation.en: Ideally avoid communal sleeping areas
translation.ga: Más féidir, codail leat féin sa leaba

translation.en: Avoid crowded places
translation.ga: Seachain áiteanna plódaithe

translation.en: Work from home if possible
translation.ga: Oibrigh ón mbaile, más féidir

translation.en: When in crowded settings like public transport or a supermarket, practise personal protective measures by:
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn tú i suíomhanna plódaithe ar nós iompar poiblí nó ollmhargadh, cosain tú féin trí:

translation.en: Avoiding touching your eyes, nose and mouth AND
translation.ga: Ná leag do lamh ar do shúile, do shrón agus do bhéal AGUS

translation.en: Cleaning your hands often
translation.ga: Glan do lámha go minic

translation.en: Coronavirus
translation.ga: Coróinvíreas

translation.en: COVID19 Information
translation.ga: Eolas COVID19

translation.en: Who are atrisk groups?
translation.ga: Cé hiad na grúpaí atá i mbaol?

translation.en: There are some groups of people who may be more at risk of serious illness if they catch Coronavirus (COVID19).
translation.ga: Tá roinnt grúpaí daoine ann a d’fhéadfadh a bheith i mbaol níos mó go bhfaigheadh siad tinneas tromchúiseach má fhaigheann siad an Coróinvíreas (COVID19).

translation.en: These groups include:
translation.ga: I measc na ngrúpaí seo tá:

translation.en: People over 75 are particularly vulnerable
translation.ga: Daoine os cionn 75 thar a bheith leochaileach

translation.en: All people aged 60 years and over
translation.ga: Gach duine 60 bliain d’aois agus níos sine

translation.en: People (adults and children) with longterm medical conditions including people with cardiac and respiratory conditions
translation.ga: Daoine (fásta agus leanaí) le fadhbanna sláinte fadtéarmacha lena náirítear daoine le tinneas cairdiach agus riospráide

translation.en: People whose immune system is impaired due to disease or treatment including cancer patients
translation.ga: Daoine a bhfuil a gcóras imdhíonachta lagaithe mar gheall ar ghalar nó cóireáil lena náirítear othair ailse

translation.en: Patients with any condition that can affect respiratory function (breathing)
translation.ga: Othair a bhfuil aon ghalar orthu a d’fhéadfadh dochar a dhéanamh don chóras riospráide (análú)

translation.en: Residents of nursing homes and other longstay settings including disability, mental health and older persons services
translation.ga: Cónaitheoirí tithe altranais agus ionaid fhadchónaithe eile lena náirítear seirbhísí míchumais, sláinte meabhrach agus daoine scothaosta

translation.en: All over 50year olds within the specialist disability health services
translation.ga: Gach duine os cionn 50 bliain d’aois laistigh de na sainseirbhísí sláinte míchumais

translation.en: All people in the specialist disability health services with an underlying health problem
translation.ga: Gach duine sna sainseirbhísí sláinte míchumais a bhfuil fadhb bhunúsach sláinte acu

translation.en: Further support for older people
translation.ga: Tacaíocht bhreise do dhaoine scothaosta

translation.en: The charity ALONE, in partnership with the Department of Health and HSE, has a Coronavirus (COVID19) support line for older people.
translation.ga: Tá líne tacaíochta Coróinvíreas (COVID19) do dhaoine scothaosta ag an gcarthanas ALONE, i gcomhpháirtíocht leis an Roinn Sláinte agus FnaSS.

translation.en: Older people can contact ALONE on 0818 222 024.
translation.ga: Is féidir le daoine aosta teagmháil a dhéanamh le ALONE ar 0818 222 024.

translation.en: What should I do if I’m feeling unwell?
translation.ga: Cad ba cheart dom a dhéanamh má bhíonn mé tinn?

translation.en: If you are experiencing flulike symptoms like fever and/or cough, you should immediately selfisolate regardless of travel or contact history.
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí cosúil le fliú ort ar nós fiabhras agus / nó casacht, ba cheart duit fanacht i d’aonar láithreach fiú mura raibh tú ag taisteal nó i dteagmháil le duine leis an gCoróinvíreas (COVID19).

translation.en: We explain how to selfisolate on page 11.
translation.ga: Mínítear conas féinaonrú a dhéanamh ar leathanach 11.

translation.en: If you are experiencing these symptoms and are concerned you have been in contact with a person infected with Coronavirus (COVID19), selfisolate and contact your GP (family doctor) by phone.
translation.ga: Má tá na comharthaí seo ort agus má tá imní ort go raibh tú i dteagmháil le duine atá ionfhabhtaithe le Coróinvíreas (COVID19), fan i d’aonar agus déan teagmháil le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh ar an bhfón.

translation.en: Do not go to your GP surgery in person.
translation.ga: Ná téigh chuig do dhochtúir go pearsanta.

translation.en: Your GP will assess you and decide if a test for Coronavirus (COVID19) is necessary.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh measúnú ort agus socróidh sé an bhfuil gá le tástáil le haghaidh Coróinvíreas (COVID19).

translation.en: You can also call HSELive on 1850 24 1850 for further guidance.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat glaoch freisin ar HSELive ar 1850 24 1850 chun tuilleadh treorach a fháil.

translation.en: How should I limit social interaction?
translation.ga: Conas ba chóir dom srian a chur le

translation.en: Limited social interaction is avoiding contact with other people and social situations as much as possible.
translation.ga: hidirghníomhaíocht shóisialta?

translation.en: You may need to do this if you are a close contact of a confirmed case of Coronavirus (COVID19).
translation.ga: Is ionann idirghníomhaíocht shóisialta theoranta agus fanacht amach ó dhaoine eile agus ó ocáidí sóísialta an oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: This is to stop other people from getting the virus if you develop symptoms.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir go mbeidh ort é seo a dhéanamh má tá tú i ndlúththeagmháil le cás dearbhaithe Coróinvíreas (COVID19).

translation.en: If you are told to limit social interaction, you should:
translation.ga: Déantar é seo chun daoine eile a chosaint ón víreas má bhíonn comharthaí ort.

translation.en: Reduce interactions with people outside the workplace and the home
translation.ga: Má iarrtar ort idirghníomhaíocht shóisialta a theorannú, ba cheart duit: Idirghníomhaíochtaí le daoine lasmuigh den ionad oibre agus sa bhaile a laghdú

translation.en: Increase your distance from others – keep separate by at least 1 metre (3ft), ideally at least 2 metres (6ft)
translation.ga: Fan amach ó dhaoine eile – 1 méadar (3tr) ar a laghad agus 2 mhéadar (6tr) más féidir

translation.en: Don’t shake hands
translation.ga: Ná croith lámha

translation.en: Ideally avoid communal sleeping areas
translation.ga: Más féidir, codail leat féin sa leaba

translation.en: Avoid crowded places
translation.ga: Seachain áiteanna plódaithe

translation.en: Work from home if possible
translation.ga: Oibrigh ón mbaile, más féidir

translation.en: You can still go outside for walks, runs or cycles on your own.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat dul amach ag siúl, ag rith nó ag rothaíocht leat féin.

translation.en: However, you should avoid spending more than 15 minutes in close contact with other people.
translation.ga: Ná fan níos mó ná 15 nóíméad i gcomhluadar daoine eile.

translation.en: What will I need if I’m told to stay at home?
translation.ga: Cad a bheidh ag teastáil uaim má deirtear liom fanacht sa bhaile?

translation.en: To help stop the spread of Coronavirus (COVID19) you may be asked to either:
translation.ga: Chun an Coróinvíreas (COVID19) a stopadh ó scaipeadh d’fhéadfaí iarradh ort:

translation.en: Limit social interactions with other people
translation.ga: Teorainn a chur le hidirghníomhaíochtaí sóisialta le daoine eile

translation.en: Selfisolate
translation.ga: Aonrú

translation.en: Here are some practical steps you can take now which will be useful if you become unwell:
translation.ga: Seo roinnt céimeanna praiticiúla is féidir leat a thógáil anois a bheidh úsáideach má éiríonn tú tinn:

translation.en: Alert close family, friends and neighbours over the phone and tell them that you are not feeling well and are unable to receive visitors
translation.ga: Abair le do ghaolta, do chairde agus do chomharsana ar an bhfón nach bhfuil tú ag aireachtáil go maith agus nach féidir leo teacht ar cuairt

translation.en: Organise in advance to get someone to do shopping for you.
translation.ga: Déan socrú le duine éigin chun dul go dtí an siopa duit.

translation.en: If you are getting something delivered to your home, make sure it is left outside the front door for you to get it rather than bringing people into your home
translation.ga: Má tá rud éigin le tabhairt chuig do theach, déan cinnte go bhfágtar é taobh amuigh den doras tosaigh seachas daoine á thabhairt isteach i do theach

translation.en: Make an uptodate list of your medicines.
translation.ga: Déan liosta cothrom le dáta de do chógais.

translation.en: If you become unwell, this is important information especially if you need treatment from a different doctor than usual
translation.ga: Má éiríonn tú tinn, is eolas tábhachtach é seo, go háirithe má theastaíonn cóireáil uait ó dhochtúir difriúil seachas ó do ghnáth dhochtúir

translation.en: There is no need to order extra medicines over and above normal requirements.
translation.ga: Ní gá cógais bhreise a ordú de bhreis ar ghnáthriachtanais.

translation.en: Doing so will reduce supply of medicines for others.
translation.ga: Má dhéantar seo laghdófar an soláthar cógais do dhaoine eile.

translation.en: The supply of medicines will continue
translation.ga: Leanfar ag soláthar cógais

translation.en: If you have symptoms, please do not attend your pharmacy in person.
translation.ga: Má tá comharthaí ort, ná téigh go dtí do chógaslann go pearsanta.

translation.en: You can phone your pharmacist if you need to order a prescription.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat glaoch a chur ar do chógaiseoir má bhíonn oideas le hordú agat.

translation.en: If you need to collect prescription or nonprescription medicines, ask a family member or friend to do so.
translation.ga: Más gá duit cógais ar oideas nó gan oideas a bhailiú, iarr ar bhall teaghlaigh nó cara é sin a dhéanamh.

translation.en: How should I selfisolate?
translation.ga: Conas ba chóir dom féinaonrú?

translation.en: Selfisolation means staying indoors and completely avoiding contact with other people.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn féinaonrú fanacht istigh agus fanacht amach ó dhaoine ar fad.

translation.en: You may need to do this if you have symptoms of Coronavirus (COVID19).
translation.ga: B’fhéidir go mbeidh ort é seo a dhéanamh má bhíonn comharthaí an Choróinvíreas (COVID19) ort.

translation.en: This is to stop other people from getting it.
translation.ga: Déantar é seo chun daoine eile a chosaint.

translation.en: If you have symptoms then you MUST selfisolate and contact your GP by phone.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn comharthaí ort ní mór duit féinaonrú agus glaoch a chur ar do dhochtúir.

translation.en: If they think you need to get tested for the virus, they will organise this.
translation.ga: Má cheapann siad go bhfuil gá tú a thástáil don víreas, eagróidh siad é.

translation.en: While you wait for the test results or if you test positive but have mild symptoms, you can selfisolate at home.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat féinaonrú sa bhaile an fhad atá tú ag fanacht le do thorthaí nó má fhaigheann tú torthaí dearfacha ach nach bhfuil ach comharthaí éadroma ort.

translation.en: Selfisolating Guidelines
translation.ga: Treoirlínte maidir le féinaonrú

translation.en: The following guidelines 1–10 should be followed by people who have to selfisolate due to Coronavirus (COVID19).
translation.ga: Ba chóir do dhaoine ar tugadh treoir dóibh féinaonrú a dhéanamh mar gheall ar Choróinavíreas (COVID19) na treoirlínte seo a leanacht.

translation.en: Stay at home
translation.ga: Fan sa bhaile

translation.en: Do not go to work, college, school, religious services, social gatherings or public areas.
translation.ga: Ná téigh chuig obair, coláiste, scoil, seirbhísí reiligiúnacha, cruinnithe sóisialta nó áiteanna poiblí.

translation.en: Do not use public transport or taxis until you are well.
translation.ga: Ná húsáid iompar poiblí ná tacsaithe go dtí go mbeidh tú go maith.

translation.en: 2 Keep away from other people in your home as much as you can
translation.ga: 2 Fan amach ó dhaoine eile i do theach an oiread agus is féidir leat

translation.en: Avoid physical contact with other people in your household.
translation.ga: Seachain teagmháil fhisiciúil le daoine eile i do theaghlach.

translation.en: Stay in a room with the window open.
translation.ga: Fan i seomra leis an bhfuinneog ar oscailt.

translation.en: If possible, you should use a separate toilet and bathroom to the rest of the household.
translation.ga: Más féidir, ba chóir duit leithreas agus seomra folctha duit féin amháin a úsáid.

translation.en: If this is not possible, make sure these areas are kept clean.
translation.ga: Mura féidir é sin a dhéanamh, déan cinnte go gcoinnítear na háiteanna seo glan.

translation.en: Wash your hands often
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha go minic

translation.en: Keep your hands clean by washing them regularly with soap and water.
translation.ga: Coinnigh do lámha glan trí iad a ní go rialta le gallúnach agus le huisce.

translation.en: This is one of the most important things you can do.
translation.ga: Seo ceann de na rudaí is tábhachtaí is féidir leat a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Cover your coughs and sneezes
translation.ga: Clúdaigh do chuid casacht agus sraothartach

translation.en: When coughing and sneezing, cover your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue.
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn tú ag casacht agus ag sraothartach, clúdaigh do bhéal agus do shrón le d’uillinn lúbtha nó ciarsúír pháipéir.

translation.en: Put used tissues into a closed bin and wash your hands.
translation.ga: Cuir ciarsúír pháipéir i mbosca bruscair dúnta tar éis é a úsáid agus nigh do lámha.

translation.en: Avoid sharing things
translation.ga: Ná roinn rudaí

translation.en: You should avoid sharing dishes, drinking glasses, cups, eating utensils, towels, bedding or other items with other people in your home.
translation.ga: Ná roinn miasa, gloiní, cupáin, uirlisí ithe, tuáillí, cóir leapa nó earraí eile le daoine eile i do theach.

translation.en: After you use these items, they should be washed in a dishwasher or alternatively with soap and hot water.
translation.ga: Tar éis duit na rudaí seo a úsáid, ba chóir iad a nigh i miasniteoir nó le gallúnach agus uisce te.

translation.en: Don’t share games consoles or remote controls.
translation.ga: Ná roinn consóil cluichí nó cianrialtáin.

translation.en: Self isolating Guidelines Continued
translation.ga: Treoirlínte féinaonraithe ar lean

translation.en: Monitor your symptoms
translation.ga: Coinnigh súil ar do chomharthaí

translation.en: If your symptoms develop or get worse, phone your GP.
translation.ga: Má thagann comharthaí chun cinn nó má éiríonn siad níós measa, cuir glaoch ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: If it is an emergency, call an ambulance on 112 or 999 and tell them that you may have Coronavirus (COVID19).
translation.ga: Más éigeandáil é, glaoigh ar otharcharr ar 112 nó 999 agus abair leo go bhféadfadh Coróinvíreas (COVID19) a bheith ort.

translation.en: Avoid having visitors in your home
translation.ga: Ná lig daoine isteach i do theach

translation.en: If possible, do not allow visitors into your home or answer your door to callers.
translation.ga: Más féidir, ná lig cuairteoirí isteach i do theach agus ná freagair do dhoras.

translation.en: Household cleaning
translation.ga: ag Glanadh an tí

translation.en: Many cleaning and disinfectant products sold in supermarkets can kill Coronavirus (COVID19) on surfaces.
translation.ga: Is féidir le go leor táirgí glantacháin agus díghalraithe a dhíoltar in ollmhargaí Coróinvíreas (COVID19) a mharú ar dhromchlaí.

translation.en: Clean the surface as usual with a detergent, disinfectant or disinfectant wipe.
translation.ga: Glan an dromchla mar is gnách le glantach, díghalrán nó le ciarsúír díghalraithe.

translation.en: Wear disposable gloves and a plastic apron if available and throw them out afterwards.
translation.ga: Caith lámhainní aonuaire agus naprún plaisteach má tá siad ar fáil agus caith amach iad ina dhiaidh sin.

translation.en: Wash your hands after removing gloves and apron.
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha tar éis lámhainní agus naprún a bhaint díot.

translation.en: Laundry
translation.ga: Níocháin

translation.en: Wear gloves while handling dirty laundry and wash with detergent at a temperature above 60 degrees Celsius or at the highest temperature suitable for the fabric (whichever is higher).
translation.ga: Caith lámhainní agus tú ag láimhseáil éadaí salacha agus nigh iad le glantach ag teocht os cionn 60 céim Celsius nó ag teocht a oireann don éadach (pé acu is airde).

translation.en: Rubbish
translation.ga: Bruscair

translation.en: Use plastic bags for collecting rubbish including used tissues, gloves, masks and aprons.
translation.ga: Cuir an bruscar, miotóga, mascanna agus naprúin agus ciarsúir pháipéir isteach i málaí plaisteacha.

translation.en: Dispose of rubbish bags when threequarters full by tying the bag.
translation.ga: Nuair a bheidh an mála trí ceathrú lán, ceangail an barr.

translation.en: Place the first bag in a second bag, which you should then also tie.
translation.ga: Cuir an mála isteach i mála eile agus ceangail an mála sin.

translation.en: Keeping well during selfisolation
translation.ga: Ag coinneáil do mhisneach le linn féinaonraithe

translation.en: Infectious disease outbreaks, like the current Coronavirus (COVID19), can be worrying and can affect your mental health.
translation.ga: Is féidir le ráigeanna galair thógálacha, cosúil leis an Choróinvíreas (COVID19) reatha, a bheith ina ábhar buartha agus d’fhéadadh sé cur as de do shláinte mheabhrach.

translation.en: While you may be anxious, there are many things you can do to support and manage your mental health during such times.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn tú imníoch, tá go leor rudaí is féidir leat a dhéanamh chun tacú le do shláinte mheabhrach agus é a bhainistiú sa ngéarchéim seo.

translation.en: Keep yourself mobile by getting up and moving around as much as possible.
translation.ga: Lean ort ag bogadh timpeall an oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: If you have a garden or backyard go out and get some fresh air, but keep more than 2 metres away from other people.
translation.ga: Má tá gairdín nó cúlchlós agat téigh amach san aer úr, ach fan níos mó ná 2 mhéadar amach ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: Selfisolation can be boring or frustrating.
translation.ga: Is féidir le féinaonrú a bheith leadránach.

translation.en: It may affect your mood and feelings.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh sé dul i bhfeidhm ar do ghiúmar agus do mhothúcháin.

translation.en: You may feel low, worried or have problems sleeping.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir go mbeadh tú in ísle brí, buartha nó nach mbeadh tú in ann codladh mar is ceart.

translation.en: You may find it helps to stay in touch with friends or relatives by phone or on social media.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir go gcabhródh sé leat fanacht i dteagmháil le cairde nó le gaolta ar an bhfón nó ar na meáin shóisialta.

translation.en: See yourmentalhealth.ie for more advice.
translation.ga: Féach ar yourmentalhealth.ie le haghaidh tuilleadh comhairle.

translation.en: Where to go for more information?
translation.ga: Cá bhfaighidh mé tuilleadh eolais?

translation.en: If you need more information, please go to
translation.ga: Má theastaíonn tuilleadh eolais uait, téigh chuig

translation.en: ﻿Your COVID19 vaccine
translation.ga: ﻿An vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19 duitse

translation.en: If you’ve got questions about your vaccine, there are answers you can trust at www.hse.ie
translation.ga: Má bhíonn ceisteanna agat faoin vacsaín, tá freagraí ar féidir leat muinín a bheith agat astu ar www.hse.ie

translation.en: The HSE is rolling out COVID19 vaccines across Ireland, bringing hope to our communities and offering us protection from COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID19 á leathadh amach ag FSS ar fud na hÉireann, rud atá ag tabhairt dóchas dár bpobail agus atá ag tabhairt cosaint dúinn ar COVID19.

translation.en: We’re already seeing reduced illness and fewer deaths among groups who are vaccinated.
translation.ga: Tá laghdú tagtha cheana féin ar an ionfhabhtú, ar an tinneas agus ar líon na mbásanna i measc na daoine siúd a bhfuil an vacsaín faighte acu.

translation.en: Getting your vaccine protects you, once you allow time for your vaccine to work.
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú an vacsaín, déantar tú a chosaint, nuair a fhágann tú am ionas gur féidir leis an vacsaín oibriú.

translation.en: When groups of people are vaccinated, this can protect the people around you too.
translation.ga: Nuair a thugtar an vacsaín do ghrúpaí daoine, féadfaidh sé sin na daoine thart ort a chosaint chomh maith.

translation.en: This booklet tells you what you need to know about getting your COVID19 vaccine.
translation.ga: Sa leabhrán seo, tugtar an teolas atá de dhíth ort maidir leis an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19 a fháil.

translation.en: how COVID19 spreads and its symptoms
translation.ga: conas a scaipeann COVID19 agus na siomptóim a bhaineann leis

translation.en: how to register for your vaccine
translation.ga: conas clárú don vacsaín

translation.en: about how your vaccine protects you
translation.ga: maidir le conas a thugann an vacsaín cosaint duit

translation.en: about developing and approving vaccines
translation.ga: maidir le vacsaíní a fhorbairt agus a cheadú

translation.en: what to expect at a HSE vaccination centre
translation.ga: céard atá romhat ag ionad vacsaínithe FSS

translation.en: how long your vaccine takes to work and what you can do after it
translation.ga: cá fhad a thógann an vacsaín chun oibriú agus na nithe is féidir leat a dhéanamh i ndiaidh duit í a fháil

translation.en: Over the coming weeks and months, everyone in Ireland who is eligible will be able to receive a free COVID19 vaccine from the HSE.
translation.ga: Sna seachtainí agus míonna atá le teacht, beidh gach duine in Éirinn atá incháilithe ábalta vacsaín saor in aisce in aghaidh COVID19 a fháil ó FSS.

translation.en: This should offer us more options for safely returning to our health and social care services, to our education, spending time with loved ones, and reopening our society.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh tuilleadh roghanna againn dá réir sin chun filleadh go sábháilte ar ár seirbhísí sláinte agus cúraim shóisialta, ar an oideachas, ar am a chaitheamh lenár muintir agus an tsochaí a oscailt arís.

translation.en: Because the more people who are protected from COVID19, the better things will be for us all.
translation.ga: Dá mhéad daoine atá cosanta ar COVID19, is é is fearr a bheidh cúrsaí dúinn ar fad.

translation.en: How COVID19 spreads and its symptoms
translation.ga: Conas a scaipeann COVID19 agus na siomptóim a bhaineann leis

translation.en: COVID19 is an illness that can affect your lungs and airways, and sometimes other parts of your body.
translation.ga: Galar is ea COVID19 ar féidir leis dochar a dhéanamh do na scamhóga agus na feadáin anála, agus codanna eile den chorp uaireanta.

translation.en: It’s caused by a virus called SARSCoV2, a type of coronavirus.
translation.ga: Víreas a dtugtar SARSCoV2 air is cúis leis, ar saghas coróinvíris é.

translation.en: It’s highly infectious.
translation.ga: Tá sé thar a bheith ionfhabhtaíoch.

translation.en: The most common way you can get COVID19 is by coming into close contact with someone who has the virus.
translation.ga: An bealach is coitianta chun COVID19 a tholgadh ná a bheith i ndlúththeagmháil le duine a bhfuil an víreas air.

translation.en: You can spread the virus even if you do not have symptoms.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an víreas a scaipeadh fiú mura bhfuil siomptóim ort.

translation.en: It’s mainly spread through close contact and droplets that come from your nose and mouth.
translation.ga: Is mar gheall ar an dlúththeagmháil agus braoiníní a thagann as an tsrón agus béal is mó a scaiptear é.

translation.en: For example, from someone who is talking loudly, singing, shouting, coughing or sneezing.
translation.ga: Mar shampla, féadfaidh duine é a scaipeadh má bhíonn sé ag caint go hard, ag canadh, ag scairteadh, ag casacht nó ag sraothartach.

translation.en: This happens when people are within 1 to 2 metres of each other.
translation.ga: Tarlaíonn sé sin nuair atá daoine taobh istigh de mhéadar amháin go dhá mhéadar ó dhuine nó daoine eile.

translation.en: COVID19 can also spread easily in crowded or poorly ventilated areas.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh COVID19 scaipeadh go furasta chomh maith in áiteanna atá plódaithe nó nach bhfuil aeráilte go maith.

translation.en: You can get the virus from infected surfaces too.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an víreas a tholgadh ó dhromchlaí atá ionfhabhtaithe chomh maith.

translation.en: Because I have a health condition, getting the vaccine meant the world to me after a stressful and sometimes scary year of living through a pandemic.
translation.ga: Cionn is go bhfuil riocht sláinte agam, bhí sé antábhachtach ar fad dom an vacsaín a fháil i ndiaidh dúinn bliain strusmhar, agus in amanna scanrúil, a chaitheamh ag maireachtáil le linn paindéime.

translation.en: This past year has been tough.
translation.ga: Tá cúrsaí i ndiaidh a bheith deacair le bliain anuas.

translation.en: I was lucky to be able to work from home.
translation.ga: Bhí an tádh orm go raibh mé ábalta a bheith ag obair ón mbaile.

translation.en: But I still spent the year worrying about myself, my family and my friends.
translation.ga: Sin ráite, chaith mé an bhliain agus mé imníoch fúm féin, faoi mo theaghlach agus faoi mo chairde.

translation.en: I have never felt so excited to visit my GP as I did when I went to receive my first dose.
translation.ga: Ní raibh mé riamh chomh tógtha cuairt a thabhairt ar an dochtúir agus a bhí nuair a chuaigh mé leis an gcéad dáileog a fháil.

translation.en: It felt like a light at the end of a very long tunnel.
translation.ga: Bhí sé mar a tháinig dóchas sa deireadh i ndiaidh tréimhse an fhada éadóchais.

translation.en: Common symptoms
translation.ga: Siomptóim choitianta

translation.en: a fever (high temperature of 38 degrees Celsius or above)
translation.ga: fiabhras (teocht ard 38 céim Celsius nó os a chionn)

translation.en: a new cough this can be any kind of cough, not just dry
translation.ga: casacht nua féadfaidh aon chineál casachta a bheith i gceist, ní hamháin casacht thirim

translation.en: shortness of breath or breathing difficulties
translation.ga: gearranáil nó deacrachtaí análaithe

translation.en: loss or change to your sense of smell or taste
translation.ga: na céadfaí blaiseadh nó boladh a chailleadh, nó athrú a theacht orthu

translation.en: COVID19 can cause anyone, at any age, serious illness, hospitalisation and even death.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh COVID19 a bheith ina chúis le tinneas tromchúiseach, ospidéalú agus fiú leis an mbás i gcás aon duine ar aon aois.

translation.en: Pregnant women, people with certain health conditions and older people have a higher risk of getting seriously ill if they get COVID19.
translation.ga: Is iad mná atá ag iompar clainne, daoine a bhfuil riochtaí áirithe sláinte orthu agus daoine atá breacaosta is mó atá i mbaol breoiteacht thromchúiseach má tholgann siad COVID19.

translation.en: If you have any symptoms of COVID19, selfisolate (stay in your room) and phone a GP (doctor).
translation.ga: Má bhíonn aon cheann de shiomptóim COVID19 ort, déan tú féin a fhéinleithlisiú (fan i do sheomra) agus cuir glao ar dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: Your GP can arrange a COVID19 test for you.
translation.ga: Beidh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh in ann tástáil le haghaidh COVID19 a eagrú duit.

translation.en: Your test and GP assessment are free of charge.
translation.ga: Tá an tástáil agus measúnú an dochtúra saor in aisce.

translation.en: For factual, expert information you can trust on COVID19, please visit www.hse.ie/coronavirus or call HSELive on 1850 24 1850.
translation.ga: Chun eolas saineolach fíriciúil a fháil maidir le COVID19 ar féidir leat brath air, téigh chuig www.hse.ie/coronavirus nó cuir glao ar HSELive ar 1850 24 1850.

translation.en: How COVID19 vaccines protect you
translation.ga: Conas a dhéanann vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID19 tú a chosaint

translation.en: COVID19 vaccines offer you protection from COVID19.
translation.ga: Tugann vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID19 cosaint duit ar COVID19.

translation.en: Vaccines teach your immune system how to protect you from diseases.
translation.ga: Múineann vacsaíní don chóras imdhíonachta cén chaoi tú a chosaint in aghaidh galar.

translation.en: All vaccines do this, but different types of vaccine work in different ways.
translation.ga: Déanann gach vacsaín é sin, ach bíonn cineálacha difriúla vacsaíní ag oibriú ar bhealaí éagsúla.

translation.en: The surface of the virus that causes COVID19 is studded with spikes.
translation.ga: Bíonn dromchla an víris atá ina chúis le COVID19 breac le spící.

translation.en: These spikes allow the virus to attach to the cells of your body.
translation.ga: Cuireann na spící sin ar a chumas don víreas greamú de chealla an choirp.

translation.en: They’re important in how the vaccines can help protect you.
translation.ga: Tá tábhacht ag baint leo i dtaca le conas is féidir leis na vacsaíní tú a chosaint.

translation.en: When you get your vaccine, it triggers an immune response that tells your body to make antibodies.
translation.ga: Nuair a gheobhaidh tú an vacsaín, spreagfar freagairt imdhíonachta ionat agus déanfaidh an corp antasubstaintí a tháirgeadh dá bharr.

translation.en: While your vaccine doesn’t stay in your body for very long, the antibodies stay and stop virus spikes from attaching to your cells.
translation.ga: Cé nach bhfanfaidh an vacsaín i bhfad sa chorp, fanfaidh na hantasubstaintí ann a stopfaidh spící ó bheith ag greamú de na cealla.

translation.en: After your body has time to produce these antibodies, you’re less likely to get sick with COVID19.
translation.ga: Nuair a bheidh go leor ama ag an gcorp na hantasubstaintí sin a chruthú, is lú an seans go néireoidh tú tinn le COVID19.

translation.en: You’re much less likely to get seriously ill or need to go to hospital.
translation.ga: Is lú i bhfad an seans go néireoidh tú go dona tinn nó go mbeidh ort dul chuig ospidéal.

translation.en: It’s much safer to get immunity through your vaccination, than by getting COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá sé i bhfad níos sábháilte imdhíonacht a bhaint amach trí vacsaíniú ná trí COVID19 a tholgadh.

translation.en: While it’s up to you to decide to get the vaccine, the HSE, the World Health Organization and the Department of Health strongly recommend that you do so, as soon as it’s offered to you.
translation.ga: Cé gur fútsa atá sé an cinneadh a dhéanamh cibé acu an vacsaín a fháil nó gan í a fháil, molann FSS, an Eagraíocht Dhomhanda Sláinte agus an Roinn Sláinte go láidir duit í a fháil a luaithe a thairgfear duit í.

translation.en: Number of doses
translation.ga: Líon dáileog

translation.en: For most COVID19 vaccines, people need 2 doses, at separate times, to get longer lasting protection.
translation.ga: Bíonn 2 dháileog de dhíth ar dhaoine i gcás bhunús na vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID19, ag amanna éagsúla, chun cosaint a bhaint amach a mhairfidh i bhfad.

translation.en: There are also vaccines that are given in 1 dose.
translation.ga: Tá vacsaíní ann chomh maith a mbíonn dáileog amháin ag baint leo.

translation.en: If you had COVID19 in the last 6 months, you only need 1 dose of a vaccine.
translation.ga: Más rud é go raibh COVID19 ort le 6 mhí anuas, ní bheidh de dhíth ort ach dáileog amháin de vacsaín.

translation.en: Breastfeeding and pregnancy
translation.ga: Beathú cíche agus iompar clainne

translation.en: You can get the COVID19 vaccine if you’re breastfeeding.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19 a fháil má tá tú i mbun beathú cíche.

translation.en: If you’re pregnant, talk to your obstetrician or GP about getting your COVID19 vaccine.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag iompar clainne, labhair le d’obstatraí nó le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh maidir leis an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19 a fháil.

translation.en: More information is available at www.hse.ie/covidvacpreg
translation.ga: Tá tuilleadh eolais le fáil ar www.hse.ie/covidvacpreg

translation.en: If you already had COVID19
translation.ga: Má bhí COVID19 ort cheana féin

translation.en: Your vaccine reduces your risk of getting COVID19 again.
translation.ga: Laghdóidh an vacsaín an baol go dtolgfá COVID19 arís.

translation.en: It can reduce the seriousness of your symptoms if you do.
translation.ga: Má tholgann tú arís é, táthar ag súil nach mbeadh na siomptóim chomh tromchúiseach céanna mar thoradh ar an vacsaín.

translation.en: Your vaccine cannot give you COVID19
translation.ga: Ní féidir leis an vacsaín COVID19 a thabhairt duit

translation.en: If you get COVID19 soon after your vaccination, it’s possible you caught it before your appointment.
translation.ga: Má tholgann tú COVID19 go gearr i ndiaidh duit an vacsaín a fháil, tá seans ann gur tholg tú é sula raibh an choinne agat.

translation.en: Registering when it’s your turn
translation.ga: Clárú nuair a thiocfaidh an tam duit

translation.en: Look out for when you can register
translation.ga: Bí ag faire don am ar féidir leat clárú

translation.en: The HSE will let you know when it’s your turn to register through www.hse.ie, news or public advertising.
translation.ga: Nuair a thiocfaidh an tam duit clárú, cuirfidh FSS in iúl duit ar www.hse.ie, ar an nuacht nó i bhfógraíocht phoiblí.

translation.en: Most people need to register online at www.hse.ie to get their free COVID19 vaccine at a HSE vaccination centre.
translation.ga: Caithfidh an chuid is mó de dhaoine clárú ar líne ar www.hse.ie leis an vacsaín saor in aisce in aghaidh COVID19 a fháil in ionad vacsaínithe FSS.

translation.en: Some people are vaccinated elsewhere, like at their GP or local pharmacy.
translation.ga: Tugtar an vacsaín do dhaoine áirithe in áiteanna eile, i gclinic a ndochtúra teaghlaigh nó sa chógaslann áitiúil, mar shampla.

translation.en: Please do not register until it’s your turn.
translation.ga: Ná cláraigh go dtí go dtiocfaidh an tam duit clárú.

translation.en: Check what you need to register online
translation.ga: Féach na nithe a bheidh de dhíth ort chun clárú ar líne

translation.en: To register online, you need:
translation.ga: Beidh na rudaí seo de dhíth ort chun clárú ar líne:

translation.en: a mobile phone number
translation.ga: uimhir fóin póca

translation.en: an email address
translation.ga: seoladh ríomhphoist

translation.en: your Personal Public Service (PPS) number
translation.ga: an Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí (UPSP) atá agat

translation.en: your Eircode
translation.ga: d’Éirchód

translation.en: Text message is the main way the HSE communicates with you about your vaccination.
translation.ga: Téacsteachtaireacht an príomhbhealach a dhéanfaidh FSS cumarsáid leat.

translation.en: If you do not have all of these, you can still register.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil na nithe sin go léir agat, is féidir leat clárú fós.

translation.en: Call the COVID19 helpline on 1850 24 1850 to register by phone instead.
translation.ga: Cuir glao ar an líne chabhrach le haghaidh COVID19 ar 1850 24 1850 chun clárú ar an bhfón mar mhalairt rogha.

translation.en: You can use a smartphone, tablet or computer to register online.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat fón cliste, táibléad nó ríomhaire a úsáid chun clárú ar líne.

translation.en: If you do not have one of these, call the helpline to register.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil ceann díobh sin agat, cuir glao ar an líne chabhrach chun clárú.

translation.en: Register online
translation.ga: Cláraigh ar líne

translation.en: When it’s your turn, visit vaccine.hse.ie to register.
translation.ga: Nuair a thiocfaidh an tam duit, téigh chuig vaccine.hse.ie chun clárú.

translation.en: Click ‘Start now’ and choose your group
translation.ga: Cliceáil ‘Start now’ agus roghnaigh an grúpa lena mbaineann tú

translation.en: at busy times, there may be a queue.
translation.ga: tá seans ann go mbeidh scuaine ann ag amanna gnóthacha.

translation.en: Create your account you will receive a verification email.
translation.ga: Cruthaigh do chuntas gheobhaidh tú ríomhphost fíoraithe.

translation.en: Click on the link in the verification email you then get a verification text (SMS).
