translation.ga: Cliceáil ar an nasc sa ríomhphost fíoraithe gheobhaidh tú téacsteachtaireacht fíoraithe ansin (SMS).

translation.en: Enter the verification code from the text and create a password.
translation.ga: Cuir isteach an cód fíoraithe ón téacsteachtaireacht agus cruthaigh pasfhocal.

translation.en: Enter your personal details read why the HSE asks for this information at www.hse.ie
translation.ga: Cuir isteach do chuid sonraí pearsanta tá eolas ar fáil ar www.hse.ie a thugann le fios cad ina thaobh a niarrann FSS an fhaisnéis sin ort.

translation.en: Check your details and click ‘Finish’ to complete your registration.
translation.ga: Déan do chuid sonraí a sheiceáil agus cliceáil ‘Finish’ chun an clárú a chur i gcrích.

translation.en: For help with registering yourself or someone else online, visit www.hse.ie
translation.ga: Más mian leat cabhair a fháil chun tú féin nó duine eile a chlárú ar líne, téigh chuig www.hse.ie

translation.en: Wait for your appointment text
translation.ga: Fan go bhfaighidh tú téacsteachtaireacht maidir le coinne

translation.en: You do not get your appointment immediately.
translation.ga: Ní bhfaighidh tú an choinne láithreach.

translation.en: It could be a few weeks after you register.
translation.ga: Tá seans ann go bhfaighidh tú í cúpla seachtain i ndiaidh duit clárú.

translation.en: You will get a text 3 to 7 days before your appointment.
translation.ga: Gheobhaidh tú téacsteachtaireacht idir trí lá agus seachtain roimh an gcoinne.

translation.en: This tells you the date, time, HSE vaccination centre to go to and which vaccine you’re getting.
translation.ga: Sa teachtaireacht sin, cuirfear in iúl duit an dáta, an tam, ionad FSS le dul chuige agus an vacsaín a gheobhaidh tú.

translation.en: If you need to, you can request a new appointment by following the instructions in your appointment text.
translation.ga: Más gá, is féidir leat coinne nua a iarraidh ach na treoracha sa téacsteachtaireacht maidir leis an gcoinne a leanúint.

translation.en: The HSE may send you text messages with any other updates you need to know.
translation.ga: Tá seans ann go gcuirfidh FSS téacsteachtaireachtaí eile chugat ina mbeidh aon eolas nua a bheidh de dhíth ort.

translation.en: Development and approval of vaccines
translation.ga: Forbairt agus ceadú vacsaíní

translation.en: The HSE only uses COVID19 vaccines that the European Medicines Agency (EMA) has approved.
translation.ga: Ní úsáideann FSS ach vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID19 atá ceadaithe ag an nGníomhaireacht Leigheasra Eorpach (EMA).

translation.en: While COVID19 vaccine development moved fast, the vaccines have gone through the same steps as all licensed medicines.
translation.ga: Cé go ndearnadh forbairt go gasta ar na vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID19, shásaigh na vacsaíní na céimeanna go léir nach mór do gach cógas ceadúnaithe eile a shásamh.

translation.en: This included:
translation.ga: Áiríodh orthu sin:

translation.en: pharmaceutical quality checks
translation.ga: seiceálacha cáilíochta cógaisíochta

translation.en: nonclinical trials
translation.ga: trialacha réamhchliniciúla

translation.en: three phases of clinical trials with tens of thousands of people The EMA then scientifically evaluated and authorised the COVID19 vaccines for use in Europe.
translation.ga: trí chéim trialacha cliniciúla, na mílte agus na mílte daoine páirteach iontu Rinne EMA na vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID19 a mheasúnú go heolaíoch agus a údarú lena núsáid san Eoraip.

translation.en: More information on how COVID19 vaccines are approved is available at www.ema.europa.eu
translation.ga: Tá tuilleadh eolais le fáil ar www.ema.europa.eu maidir le conas a dhéantar vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID19 a cheadú.

translation.en: Speed of development
translation.ga: Luas na forbartha

translation.en: There are a few reasons why vaccines were developed quickly.
translation.ga: Tá cúpla cúis ann maidir le cén fáth a ndearnadh na vacsaíní a fhorbairt go gasta.

translation.en: There was huge global investment into researching and developing the vaccines.
translation.ga: Rinneadh infheistíocht dhomhanda anmhór ar fad sna vacsaíní, idir thaighde agus fhorbairt.

translation.en: A lot of people had COVID19 when they were developed, so scientists could learn quickly that they’re effective.
translation.ga: Bhí COVID19 ar a lán daoine nuair a forbraíodh iad, mar sin bhí eolaithe in ann foghlaim go gasta go bhfuil siad éifeachtach.

translation.en: Manufacturers started to make the vaccines, so they were ready to go if approved.
translation.ga: Chuir monaróirí tús leis na vacsaíní a dhéanamh ionas go mbeadh siad réidh le húsáid dá dtabharfadh ceadú ina dtaobh.

translation.en: Effectiveness
translation.ga: Éifeachtacht

translation.en: Worldwide, vaccines save at least 2 to 3 million lives each year, and protect many more from lifelong illnesses.
translation.ga: Déanann vacsaíní beatha ar a laghad 2 mhilliún go 3 mhilliún duine a shábháil gach bliain ar fud na cruinne, agus tugann siad cosaint do chuid mhór daoine eile ar thinnis a mhaireann ar feadh an tsaoil.

translation.en: Millions of people have received COVID19 vaccines all over the world.
translation.ga: Tá vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID19 faighte ag na milliúin daoine ar fud na cruinne faoin am seo.

translation.en: There’s strong, reliable evidence that COVID19 vaccines greatly reduce your risk of getting COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá fianaise láidir iontaofa ann a thugann le fios go laghdaítear an baol go dtolgfaidh daoine COVID19 de thoradh ar vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID19.

translation.en: They’re highly effective at preventing deaths and serious illness from COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá siad anéifeachtach ó thaobh básanna agus breoiteacht thromchúiseach mar gheall ar COVID19 a chosc de.

translation.en: In Ireland alone, we’re already seeing reduced illness and fewer deaths among people who are vaccinated.
translation.ga: Tá laghdú tagtha cheana féin, in Éirinn, t ar an ionfhabhtú, ar an mbreoiteacht agus ar líon na mbásanna i measc na ngrúpaí a fuair an vacsaín ar dtús.

translation.en: Monitoring
translation.ga: Monatóireacht

translation.en: In Ireland, the Health Products Regulatory Authority (HPRA) regulates medicines.
translation.ga: In Éirinn, déanann an tÚdarás Rialála Táirgí Sláinte cógais a rialú.

translation.en: It monitors the safety and effectiveness of COVID19 vaccines after they’re approved for use.
translation.ga: Déanann sé monatóireacht ar chomh sábháilte agus chomh héifeachtach atá vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID19 nuair a thugtar ceadú iad a úsáid.

translation.en: You can find out more at www.hpra.ie
translation.ga: Tá tuilleadh eolais le fáil ar www.hpra.ie

translation.en: Side effects
translation.ga: Foiarmhairtí

translation.en: Like all medicines, vaccines can cause side effects.
translation.ga: Amhail gach cógas, is féidir le vacsaíní a bheith ina gcúis le foiarmhairtí.

translation.en: Most of these are mild to moderate, shortterm, and not everyone gets them.
translation.ga: Tá an chuid is mó díobh sin éadrom nó measartha, gearrthéarmach, agus ní fhaigheann gach duine iad.

translation.en: When you’re getting vaccinated, the HSE gives you a detailed leaflet with information about possible side effects of your vaccine.
translation.ga: Nuair a bheidh tú ag dul leis an vacsaín a fháil, tabharfaidh FSS bileog mhionsonraithe duit ar a mbeidh faisnéis maidir leis na foiarmhairtí a d’fhéadfadh a bheith ann mar gheall ar an vacsaín.

translation.en: The vaccines are new and information about longterm side effects is limited.
translation.ga: Is vacsaín nua í agus níl fáil ach ar mhéid teoranta faisnéise maidir le foiarmhairtí fadtéarmacha.

translation.en: As with all vaccines, you can report suspected side effects to the Health Products Regulatory Authority (HPRA) at www.hpra.ie/report As more people get vaccinated, more information becomes available.
translation.ga: Mar is amhlaidh i gcás gach vacsaíne, is féidir leat foiarmhairtí amhrasta a thuairisciú don Údarás Rialála Táirgí Sláinte ar www.hpra.ie/report Mar a gheobhaidh níos mó daoine an vacsaín, beidh fáil ar a thuilleadh faisnéise.

translation.en: The HSE regularly updates both www.hse.ie and its vaccine information leaflets.
translation.ga: Déanann FSS an fhaisnéis a nuashonrú go rialta ar www.hse.ie agus ar na bileoga eolais maidir leis an vacsaín.

translation.en: At the HSE vaccination centre
translation.ga: In ionad vacsaínithe FSS

translation.en: Arrive at the HSE vaccination centre
translation.ga: Ionad vacsaínithe FSS a bhaint amach

translation.en: Appointments take about 30 minutes and are well spaced out at these large venues.
translation.ga: Maireann coinní thart ar 30 nóiméad agus bíonn neart spáis idir na daoine sna hionaid mhóra seo.

translation.en: Your appointment is at your nearest available HSE vaccination centre.
translation.ga: Beidh do choinne ar siúl in ionad vacsaínithe FSS, sa cheann is cóngaraí duit.

translation.en: When you arrive, follow the signs or instructions from the stewards.
translation.ga: Nuair a bhainfidh tú an tionad amach, lean na comharthaí nó na treoracha ó na maoirseoirí.

translation.en: Information about parking and site facilities is available at www.hse.ie/covidvaccinationcentres
translation.ga: Tá eolas le fáil maidir le páirceáil agus áiseanna na láithreacha ar fáil ar www.hse.ie/covidvaccinationcentres

translation.en: Checkin at reception
translation.ga: Seiceáil isteach ag an bhfáiltiú

translation.en: The receptionist takes your details and confirms your ID.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh an fáilteoir do chuid sonraí a ghlacadh agus do chomhartha aitheantais a dheimhniú.

translation.en: If you registered without a PPS number, you need proof of address.
translation.ga: Más rud é gur chláraigh tú gan uimhir PSP, beidh cruthúnas ar sheoladh baile de dhíth ort.

translation.en: You get a HSE vaccine information leaflet and the manufacturer’s leaflet.
translation.ga: Gheobhaidh tú bileog eolais FSS maidir leis an vacsaín chomh maith le bileog an mhonaróra.

translation.en: Remember, vaccination is by appointment only.
translation.ga: Ná déan dearmad, tá coinne ag teastáil chun vacsaín a fháil.

translation.en: Check what ID and proof of address you need at www.hse.ie
translation.ga: Féach www.hse.ie le seiceáil cén comhartha aitheantais agus cruthúnas ar sheoladh baile atá de dhíth ort.

translation.en: My vaccination day checklist
translation.ga: Seicliosta le haghaidh lá an vacsaínithe

translation.en: If I have COVID19 symptoms, selfisolate, phone my GP and request a new appointment.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn siomptóim COVID19 orm, caithfidh mé mé féin a fhéinleithlisiú, glao a chur ar mo dhochtúir teaghlaigh agus coinne nua a iarraidh.

translation.en: Bring appointment information, face covering, ID and, if needed, proof of address.
translation.ga: Eolas faoin gcoinne, cumhdach aghaidhe, comhartha aitheantais agus, más gá, cruthúnas ar sheoladh baile a thabhairt liom.

translation.en: Go alone, if possible, and arrive on time.
translation.ga: Dul liom féin, más féidir, agus an áit a bhaint amach in am.

translation.en: Ask a family member or friend to help me get there or get around, if needed.
translation.ga: Iarraidh ar bhall teaghlaigh nó cara cabhrú liom taisteal ansin nó bogadh thart, más gá.

translation.en: Wear a shortsleeved tshirt or sleeves I can roll up.
translation.ga: Tléine ghearrmhuinchilleach a chur orm nó ball éadaigh a bhfuil muinchillí air a bheidh mé in ann a chornadh.

translation.en: Move to a vaccination booth
translation.ga: Bog chuig both vacsaínithe

translation.en: A trained vaccinator can answer any questions you have.
translation.ga: Beidh vacsaíneoir oilte in ann aon cheisteanna a bheadh agat a fhreagairt.

translation.en: They check that you’re okay to get your vaccine and confirm your consent to be vaccinated.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh sé nó sí a chinntiú leat go bhfuil tú maith go leor leis an vacsaín a fháil agus go dtugann tú cead an vacsaín a thabhairt duit.

translation.en: The vaccinator gives you the COVID19 vaccine as an injection in your upper arm.
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh an vacsaíneoir an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19 duit mar instealladh in uachtar do ghéige láimhe.

translation.en: It only takes a few minutes.
translation.ga: Ní thógfaidh sé ach cúpla nóiméad.

translation.en: You then receive an aftercare advice leaflet.
translation.ga: Gheobhaidh tú bileog comhairle iarchúraim ansin.

translation.en: They also give you a vaccine record card with the name and batch number of your vaccine.
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh sé nó sí cárta taifid vacsaínithe ar a mbeidh ainm agus baiscuimhir na vacsaíne a tugadh duit.

translation.en: Go to the observation area before you leave
translation.ga: Téigh go dtí an láthair le haghaidh breathnóireachta sula nimíonn tú

translation.en: Stay here for at least 15 minutes.
translation.ga: Fan ansin 15 nóiméad ar a laghad.

translation.en: There’s someone here to make sure you’re feeling well.
translation.ga: Beidh duine ansin lena chinntiú go mbeidh tú ag mothú i gceart.

translation.en: Unless you’re asked to stay longer, you can then leave the HSE vaccination centre.
translation.ga: Beidh tú in ann ionad vacsaínithe FSS a fhágáil ansin, ach amháin má iarrtar ort fanacht tamall eile.

translation.en: After your vaccine, it’s okay to drive as long as you’re feeling okay.
translation.ga: I ndiaidh duit an vacsaín a fháil, tá sé maith go leor tiomáint, fad is go bhfuil tú ag mothú ceart go leor.

translation.en: If you need a second dose, you get a text message with another appointment.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn an dara dáileog de dhíth ort, gheobhaidh tú téacsteachtaireacht agus coinne eile.

translation.en: The time between your appointments can vary.
translation.ga: Bíonn éagsúlacht i gceist maidir leis an tréimhse idir na coinní.

translation.en: Thank you for protecting yourself and others.
translation.ga: Go raibh maith agat as tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint.

translation.en: When you’re vaccine protected
translation.ga: Nuair a bheidh tú cosanta ag an vacsaín

translation.en: Getting your COVID19 vaccine reduces your risk of getting COVID19 and protects you from serious complications of the illness.
translation.ga: Nuair a gheobhaidh tú an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19, déanfar an baol a laghdú go dtolgfaidh tú COVID19 agus déanfar thú a chosaint ar na deacrachtaí tromchúiseacha a bhaineann leis.

translation.en: In the future, you’ll also have access to a digital vaccination certificate that proves you have received your vaccine in Ireland, should you need it.
translation.ga: Amach anseo, beidh teacht agat ar dheimhniú digiteach vacsaínithe a bheidh mar chruthúnas go bhfuil an vacsaín faighte agat in Éirinn, má bhíonn a leithéid uait.

translation.en: When you have allowed time for your vaccine to work, some activities with other people are much safer than before you had vaccine protection.
translation.ga: Nuair a bheidh go leor ama ag an vacsaín tosú ag oibriú, beidh sé níos sábháilte duit tabhairt faoi ghníomhaíochtaí éagsúla le daoine eile ná mar a bhí sula raibh cosaint ó vacsaín agat.

translation.en: This is sometimes known as your vaccine bonus or vaccine dividend.
translation.ga: Tugtar buntáiste na vacsaíne nó tairbhe na vacsaíne ar an gcosaint sin, corruair.

translation.en: Meeting others after your vaccine
translation.ga: Bualadh le daoine eile i ndiaidh duit an vacsaín a fháil

translation.en: Once your vaccine has had time to work, you’re considered vaccine protected.
translation.ga: Nuair a bheidh go leor ama ag an vacsaín tosú ag oibriú, glactar leis go bhfuil tú cosanta ag an vacsaín.

translation.en: You can meet indoors with:
translation.ga: Beidh tú in ann bualadh leis na daoine seo a leanas taobh istigh:

translation.en: vaccine protected people from up to 2 other households
translation.ga: daoine atá cosanta ag an vacsaín as suas le dhá theach eile

translation.en: people who are not vaccinated from 1 other household as long as no one from that household is at high risk from COVID19
translation.ga: daoine nach bhfuil an vacsaín faighte acu ó theach amháin eile fad is nach bhfuil aon duine ón teach sin i mbaol ard dá dtolgfaidís COVID19

translation.en: You can do this without wearing face coverings or staying 2 metres apart.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat é seo a dhéanamh gan cumhdach aghaidhe oraibh agus gan dhá mhéadar a bheith idir daoine.

translation.en: Residents of longterm care facilities
translation.ga: Cónaitheoirí breacaosta in ionaid chónaithe le haghaidh cúram fadtéarmach

translation.en: If at least 8 out of 10 residents are vaccine protected, you can have:
translation.ga: Má bhíonn ar a laghad ochtar as deichniúr cónaitheoirí cosanta ag an vacsaín, is féidir:

translation.en: up to 4 visits per week with up to 2 people per visit
translation.ga: suas le ceithre chuairt a bheith ann in aghaidh na seachtaine agus suas le beirt a bheith ann ar gach cuairt

translation.en: If you and your visitor are both vaccine protected, you do not need to wear face coverings or stay 2 metres apart when you’re alone together in a room or car.
translation.ga: Más rud é go bhfuil tú féin agus an cuairteoir araon cosanta ag an vacsaín, ní gá daoibh cumhdach aghaidhe a chur oraibh ná dhá mhéadar a bheith eadraibh nuair atá sibh libh féin i seomra ná carr.

translation.en: Close contacts
translation.ga: Dlúththeagmhálaithe

translation.en: If you’re a vaccine protected close contact of a person who tests positive for COVID19, you do not need to:
translation.ga: Más dlúththeagmhálaí tú de chuid duine a fhaigheann toradh deimhneach le haghaidh COVID19, ní gá duit:

translation.en: restrict your movements (stay at home) for 14 days
translation.ga: do ghluaiseacht a shrianadh (fanacht sa bhaile) go ceann 14 lá

translation.en: be tested for COVID19
translation.ga: tástáil a fháil le haghaidh COVID19

translation.en: If you’re immunocompromised, the contact tracing team will advise you what you need to do.
translation.ga: Más rud é go bhfuil tú imdhíonlagaithe, cuirfidh an fhoireann rianaithe teagmhálaithe comhairle ort maidir céard is gá duit a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Your vaccine takes time to work
translation.ga: Tógann an vacsaín am le tosú ag oibriú

translation.en: After your vaccine, wait until it has time to work before following the vaccine bonus advice.
translation.ga: I ndiaidh duit an vacsaín a fháil, fan go dtí go mbeidh am aici tosú ag oibriú sula leanann tú comhairle bhuntáiste na vacsaíne.

translation.en: Pfizer / BioNTech 7 days after 2nd dose
translation.ga: Pfizer / BioNTech 7 lá i ndiaidh an dara dáileog

translation.en: Moderna 14 days after 2nd dose
translation.ga: Moderna 14 lá i ndiaidh an dara dáileog

translation.en: AstraZeneca 28 days after 1st dose you still need to get your 2nd dose
translation.ga: AstraZeneca 28 lá i ndiaidh na chéad dáileoige Caithfidh tú an dara dáileog a fháil go fóill

translation.en: Janssen 14 days after single dose
translation.ga: Janssen 14 lá i ndiaidh dáileog amháin

translation.en: If you had COVID19 in the last 6 months, confirmed with a laboratory test, you can also follow the vaccine bonus advice unless you’re aged 65 or older or you’re immunocompromised.
translation.ga: Má bhí COVID19 ort le 6 mhí anuas, a deimhníodh le tástáil saotharlainne, is féidir leat comhairle bhuntáiste na vacsaíne a leanúint, ach amháin má tá tú os cionn 65 bliain d’aois nó imdhíonlaghdaithe.

translation.en: Keep protecting yourself and others after your vaccine
translation.ga: Déan tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint i rith an ama i ndiaidh duit an vacsaín a fháil

translation.en: As you begin to socialise more and meet up with people who you have not seen for a long time, you should still be careful.
translation.ga: De réir mar a chuireann tú tús le bualadh le chéile le daoine, b’fhéidir daoine nach bhfuil feicthe agat le tamall fada, ba chóir duit a bheith cúramach fós.

translation.en: Remember, lots of people have not yet been vaccinated.
translation.ga: Ná déan dearmad go bhfuil cuid mhór daoine ann nach bhfuil an vacsaín faighte acu go fóill.

translation.en: This means that you still need to keep 2 metres from others, wear a face covering and wash your hands regularly.
translation.ga: Fágann sé sin go gcaithfidh tú fanacht dhá mhéadar ar shiúl ó dhaoine eile, cumhdach aghaidhe a chur ort agus do lámha a ní go rialta.

translation.en: You should also avoid crowds, poorly ventilated spaces and meeting people who are restricting their movements or selfisolating.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit sluaite agus spásanna nach bhfuil aeráilte go maith a sheachaint, agus gan bualadh le daoine atá ag cur srian ar a ngluaiseachtaí nó atá ag féinleithlisiú.

translation.en: This helps to protect you and everyone else, even when you’re vaccine protected.
translation.ga: Beidh sé sin ina chabhair chun tú féin agus gach duine eile a chosaint, fiú nuair a bheidh tú cosanta ag an vacsaín.

translation.en: As more and more people are vaccinated, pay attention to the public health advice that’s relevant to you.
translation.ga: De réir mar a gheobhaidh tuilleadh daoine an vacsaín, tabhair aire don chomhairle sláinte poiblí a bhaineann leatsa.

translation.en: Find factual, expert advice you can trust at www.hse.ie
translation.ga: Tá comhairle shaineolach fhíriciúil ar féidir leat brath uirthi le fáil ar www.hse.ie

translation.en: It’s hard to describe how uplifting the days we’re vaccinating are, both for those coming in and for all of our team.
translation.ga: Tá sé deacair a chur in iúl chomh spreagúil is atá na laethanta nuair atáimid ag tabhairt vacsaíní do dhaoine, do na daoine a thagann isteach agus don fhoireann ar fad.

translation.en: Many of our older patients, and those with chronic medical conditions, have had to give up so much.
translation.ga: B’éigean do chuid mhór dár ndaoine níos sine, mar aon leis na daoine sin a bhfuil riochtaí ainsealacha sláinte orthu, éirí as anchuid rudaí.

translation.en: Many have had no face to face contact with friends or family, or have not even felt safe going to the local shop for milk.
translation.ga: Tá a lán daoine i ndiaidh a bheith gan teagmháil duine le duine a bheith acu le cairde nó le baill teaghlaigh, agus nár mhothaigh sábháilte ag dul go dtí an siopa áitiúil le bainne a fháil.

translation.en: We’re so proud to help them get back to enjoying their life to the full.
translation.ga: Tá anbhród orainn anois gur féidir linn cabhrú leo filleadh ar an saol mar is ceart agus oiread sásaimh agus is féidir a bhaint as.

translation.en: Now that almost all of our over 70s are vaccine protected, it’s lovely to hear them making plans catching up with their friends, getting their hair done or simply hugging their grandchildren.
translation.ga: Os rud é go bhfuil bunús na ndaoine atá os cionn 70 cosanta ag an vacsaíní anois, is galánta iad a chluinstin agus pleananna á ndéanamh acu, iad ag dul i dteagmháil arís le cairde, ag dul go dtí an gruagaire nó go díreach barróg a thabhairt dá ngarpháistí.

translation.en: Most people are aware of the dangers posed by COVID19 and the overwhelming scientific evidence in favour of vaccination.
translation.ga: Tá an chuid is mó de daoine ar an eolas faoi na contúirtí de dheasca COVID19 agus faoin bhfianaise eolaíoch atá i bhfách go mór mór le vacsaíniú ina aghaidh.

translation.en: There have been some questions about side effects.
translation.ga: Ardaíodh ceisteanna maidir le foiarmhairtí.

translation.en: But in the end, having listened to all of the evidence, most decided to proceed.
translation.ga: Sa deireadh, áfach, tar éis dóibh éisteacht leis an bhfianaise go léir, rinne an chuid is mó díobh an cinneadh chun leanúint ar aghaidh.

translation.en: At the end of the day, it’s a personal choice.
translation.ga: I ndeireadh na dála, rogha phearsanta atá i gceist.

translation.en: Your GP or another health professional caring for you can answer any questions you have, so that you’re ready when it’s offered to you.
translation.ga: Beidh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh nó gairmí sláinte eile atá ag tabhairt cúram duit in ann aon cheisteanna a bheadh agat a fhreagairt, ionas go mbeidh tú réidh nuair a dhéanfar an vacsaín a thairiscint duit.

translation.en: Keep well
translation.ga: Folláine

translation.en: This is still a hard time for us all, and there are things that you can do to help yourself feel healthy and well.
translation.ga: Am deacair atá ann dúinn ar fad agus tá rudaí ann is féidir leat a dhéanamh chun cabhrú leat féin mothú go sláintiúil agus go folláin.

translation.en: Keep active and go outdoors now that summer is here, and stay in touch or make new plans to connect with a friend or family member.
translation.ga: Bí gníomhach agus téigh taobh amuigh ó tharla go bhfuil an samhradh buailte linn agus bí i dteagmháil le cara nó ball teaghlaigh, nó déan pleananna nua chun teagmháil a dhéanamh leis nó léi.

translation.en: Enjoy healthy foods, and try to get enough sleep.
translation.ga: Bain leas as bia sláintiúil agus déan iarracht go leor codlata a fháil.

translation.en: Mind your mood, doing small, simple things every day that feel good.
translation.ga: Tabhair aire don spion atá ort. Déan rudaí beaga simplí gach lá a thugann ardú croí duit.

translation.en: If you need more support, the HSE’s www.yourmentalhealth.ie is a good place to start.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn tuilleadh tacaíochta de dhíth ort, tá eolas maith ar www.yourmentalhealth.ie sa chéad dul síos.

translation.en: There are lots more tips and ideas on keeping well at www.gov.ie/healthyireland
translation.ga: Tá cuid mhór leideanna agus smaoineamh ar fáil ar www.gov.ie/healthyireland

translation.en: ﻿Covid19 Vaccine
translation.ga: ﻿An Vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19

translation.en: Important Information about the AstraZeneca vaccine, Vaxzevria
translation.ga: Eolas Tábhachtach maidir le Vacsaín AstraZeneca in aghaidh COVID19, Vaxzevria

translation.en: This leaflet tells you about the COVID19 (coronavirus) vaccine.
translation.ga: Sa bhileog seo, tugtar eolas duit faoin vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19 (coróinvíreas).

translation.en: what COVID19 is
translation.ga: céard is COVID19 ann

translation.en: what the COVID19 vaccine is
translation.ga: céard í an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19

translation.en: who should get the vaccine
translation.ga: cé na daoine ar cheart dóibh an vacsaín a fháil

translation.en: why it is important to get the vaccine
translation.ga: cén fáth a bhfuil sé tábhachtach an vacsaín a fháil

translation.en: who should not get it and who should delay getting it
translation.ga: cé na daoine nár cheart dóibh í a fháil agus cé na daoine ar cheart dóibh an vacsaíniú a chur siar

translation.en: vaccine safety and side effects
translation.ga: sábháilteacht na vacsaíne agus na foiarmhairtí

translation.en: where you can get more information
translation.ga: na háiteanna ar féidir teacht ar a thuilleadh eolais

translation.en: Please read this leaflet carefully.
translation.ga: Léigh an bhileog eolais seo go cúramach.

translation.en: You can also talk to a healthcare professional, like your GP (Doctor) or Pharmacist, about the vaccine.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat labhairt le gairmí cúraim sláinte faoin vacsaín freisin – do Dhochtúir Teaghlaigh nó do Chógaiseoir, cuir i gcás.

translation.en: What is COVID19?
translation.ga: Céard is COVID19 ann?

translation.en: COVID19 is an illness that can affect your lungs and airways, and sometimes other parts of your body.
translation.ga: Is tinneas é COVID19 a d’fhéadfadh cur isteach ar do scamhóga agus ar d’aerbhealaí, chomh maith le codanna eile de do chorp i gcásanna áirithe.

translation.en: It’s caused by a virus called coronavirus.
translation.ga: Víreas darb ainm coróinvíreas is cúis leis.

translation.en: COVID19 is highly infectious.
translation.ga: Tá COVID19 antógálach.

translation.en: It spreads through the air through droplets produced when people cough or sneeze, or when they touch surfaces where the droplets have landed and then touch their eyes, nose or mouth.
translation.ga: Is tríd an aer a scaiptear é trí na braoiníní a chuirtear amach nuair a bhíonn daoine ag casacht nó ag sraothartach, é sin nó nuair a leagann duine lámh ar dhromchlaí a bhfuil na braoiníní sin orthu agus ansin leagann an lámh chéanna ar a shúile, srón nó béal.

translation.en: COVID19 can cause serious illness, hospitalisation and even death.
translation.ga: Is féidir le COVID19 breoiteacht thromchúiseach a chur ar dhuine, é nó í a chur san ospidéal nó a bheith ina chúis le bás fiú amháin.

translation.en: Common symptoms of COVID19 include:
translation.ga: I measc shiomptóim choitianta COVID19, tá:

translation.en: a fever (high temperature of 38 degrees Celsius or above)
translation.ga: fiabhras (teocht ard 38 céim Celsius nó os a chionn)

translation.en: a new cough – this can be any kind of cough, not just dry
translation.ga: casacht nua – casacht de chineál ar bith, ní gá go mbeadh sí tirim

translation.en: shortness of breath or breathing difficulties
translation.ga: giorra anála nó deacrachtaí análaithe

translation.en: loss or change to your sense of smell or taste – this means you’ve noticed you cannot smell or taste anything, or they smell or taste differently
translation.ga: caillteanas nó athrú bolaidh nó blaiste – ciallaíonn sé seo go bhfuil sé tugtha faoi deara agat nach féidir leat aon rud a bholadh ná a bhlaiseadh, nó go bhfuil boladh nó blas difriúil air

translation.en: You may not have all of these symptoms or you may just feel generally less well than usual.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir nach mbeadh na siomptóim sin ar fad ort nó b’fhéidir nárbh ann ach go mbeifeá ag aireachtáil ní ba mheasa ná mar is gnách.

translation.en: It can take up to 14 days for symptoms to show.
translation.ga: Uaireanta tógann sé suas le 14 lá sula bhfeictear siomptóim.

translation.en: They can be similar to symptoms of cold or flu.
translation.ga: Is féidir leo a bheith cosúil le siomptóim shlaghdáin nó fliú.

translation.en: If you have any symptoms of COVID19, selfisolate (stay in your room) and phone a GP (Doctor).
translation.ga: Má tá aon siomptóim COVID19 ort, déan tú féin a fhéinleithlisiú (fan i do sheomra) agus cuir glao ar Dhochtúir Teaghlaigh.

translation.en: They can arrange a COVID19 test for you.
translation.ga: Beidh sé nó sí in ann tástáil COVID19 a shocrú duit.

translation.en: For more information on COVID19, please visit www.hse.ie/coronavirus or call HSELive on 1850 24 1850.
translation.ga: Le tuilleadh eolais a fháil maidir le COVID19, téigh chuig www.hse.ie/coronavirus nó cuir glao ar HSELive ar 1850 24 1850.

translation.en: Who is most at risk from COVID19?
translation.ga: Cé hiad na daoine is mó atá i mbaol COVID19?

translation.en: Older people and people with certain health conditions have a higher risk of getting seriously ill if they get COVID19.
translation.ga: Is iad daoine breacaosta agus daoine a bhfuil riochtaí áirithe sláinte orthu cheana féin na daoine is mó atá i mbaol breoiteacht thromchúiseach má tholgann siad COVID19.

translation.en: What is the COVID19 vaccine?
translation.ga: Céard í an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19?

translation.en: A vaccine is a substance that should improve immunity (protection) to a particular disease.
translation.ga: Is éard is vacsaín ann ná substaint arb aidhm léi imdhíonacht (cosaint) in aghaidh galar áirithe a fheabhsú.

translation.en: The COVID19 vaccine will offer you protection from COVID19.
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19 cosaint duit ar COVID19.

translation.en: If people are vaccinated, it should also reduce the numbers who become seriously ill or even die from COVID19 in our community.
translation.ga: Má dhéantar vacsaíniú ar dhaoine, ba cheart go laghdófaí líon na ndaoine inár bpobal a éireodh go dona tinn nó a gheobhadh bás fiú le COVID19.

translation.en: Vaccines teach your immune system how to protect you from diseases.
translation.ga: Múineann vacsaíní do do chóras imdhíonachta cén chaoi tú a chosaint in aghaidh galar.

translation.en: It is much safer for your immune system to learn how to protect you through vaccination than by getting COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá sé i bhfad níos sábháilte do do chóras imdhíonachta an méid sin a fhoghlaim trí vacsaíniú ná trí COVID19 a tholgadh.

translation.en: Who should get the vaccine?
translation.ga: Cé na daoine ar cheart dóibh an vacsaín a fháil?

translation.en: You can see the list of groups for vaccination on this website: www.gov.ie/covid19vaccine
translation.ga: Is féidir leat teacht ar liosta de na grúpaí atá le vacsaíniú ar an láithreán gréasáin seo: www.gov.ie/covid19vaccine

translation.en: While it is up to you to decide to get the vaccine, the HSE, the World Health Organization and the Department of Health strongly recommend that you do so as soon as it is offered to you.
translation.ga: Cé gur fútsa atá sé an cinneadh a dhéanamh cibé acu an vacsaín a fháil nó gan í a fháil, molann FSS, an Eagraíocht Dhomhanda Sláinte agus an Roinn Sláinte go láidir duit í a fháil a luaithe a thairgfear duit í.

translation.en: Vaccines will be given as the supply arrives in Ireland.
translation.ga: Tabharfar na vacsaíní do dhaoine de réir mar a thiocfaidh na soláthairtí i dtír in Éirinn.

translation.en: When it’s your turn, we will let you know how to get your vaccine through advertising or direct invitation.
translation.ga: Nuair a thiocfaidh an tam, cuirfimid in iúl duit cén chaoi an vacsaín a fháil trí fhógraíocht nó trí chuireadh a thabhairt duit go díreach.

translation.en: It is important not to contact the HSE for a vaccination before then.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach nach ndéanfá teagmháil le FSS maidir le vacsaíniú roimhe sin.

translation.en: You will need to read this leaflet and the manufacturer’s Patient Information Leaflet before you get the vaccine.
translation.ga: Beidh ort an bhileog seo agus Bileog Eolais an Mhonaróra d’Othair a léamh sula bhfaighidh tú an vacsaín.

translation.en: You can find the manufacturer’s Patient Information Leaflet on: www.hse.ie/covid19vaccinePIL
translation.ga: Is féidir leat teacht ar Bhileog Eolais an Mhonaróra d’Othair ar: www.hse.ie/covid19vaccinePIL

translation.en: You can also talk to a healthcare professional in advance.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat labhairt le gairmí cúraim sláinte roimh ré chomh maith.

translation.en: If you decide to get the vaccine, you will give your consent, which will be recorded.
translation.ga: Má dhéanann tú an cinneadh an vacsaín a fháil, beidh ort do chead a thabhairt agus cuirfear an cead sin ar taifead.

translation.en: The HSE is offering the vaccine free of charge.
translation.ga: Tá an vacsaín á cur ar fáil ag FSS saor in aisce.

translation.en: Why is it important to get the COVID19 vaccine? Getting a COVID19 vaccine should reduce your risk of getting COVID19 and protect you from serious complications of the illness.
translation.ga: Cén fáth a bhfuil sé tábhachtach an vacsaín a fháil? Ba cheart go laghdódh an vacsaín an baol go dtolgfá COVID19 agus go gcosnódh sí thú in aghaidh na ndeacrachtaí tromchúiseacha a bhaineann leis.

translation.en: Our aim in offering the vaccine to the population is to protect people and reduce the illness and deaths caused by this virus.
translation.ga: Tríd an vacsaín a thairiscint don phobal, is é an aidhm atá againn ná daoine a chosaint agus an tinneas agus na básanna arb é an víreas is cúis leo a laghdú.

translation.en: I already had COVID19, so do I need to get the vaccine? Yes.
translation.ga: Bhí COVID19 orm cheana, an gá dom an vacsaín a fháil? Tá.

translation.en: Even if you have already had COVID19, you could still get it again.
translation.ga: Fiú má bhí COVID19 ort cheana féin, d’fhéadfá é a tholgadh arís.

translation.en: The vaccine will reduce your risk of getting COVID19 again.
translation.ga: Laghdóidh an vacsaín an riosca go dtolgfá COVID19 arís.

translation.en: Even if you do get COVID19 again, the vaccine can reduce the seriousness of your symptoms.
translation.ga: Fiú má tholgann tú COVID19 arís, táthar ag súil nach mbeadh na siomptóim chomh tromchúiseach céanna mar thoradh ar an vacsaín.

translation.en: I have COVID19 now, should I get the vaccine? No.
translation.ga: Tá COVID19 orm anois, ar cheart dom an vacsaín a fháil? Níor cheart.

translation.en: You should delay getting vaccinated until you recover from COVID19.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit an vacsaíniú a chur siar go dtí go dtiocfaidh tú chugat féin ó COVID19.

translation.en: at least four weeks after you first notice symptoms or
translation.ga: ceithre seachtaine ar a laghad tar éis duit na siomptóim a thabhairt faoi deara den chéad uair nó

translation.en: four weeks since you tested positive for COVID19
translation.ga: ceithre seachtaine tar éis toradh dearfach a fháil ar thástáil le haghaidh COVID19

translation.en: Getting the vaccine
translation.ga: An vacsaín a fháil

translation.en: Who is my vaccinator?
translation.ga: Cé hé nó cé hí mo vacsaíneoir?

translation.en: Your vaccinator is the person who gives you your vaccine.
translation.ga: Is é an vacsaíneoir an duine a thabharfaidh an vacsaín duit.

translation.en: They are trained by the HSE to give COVID19 vaccines.
translation.ga: Cuireann FSS oiliúint air nó uirthi chun vacsaíní COVID19 a thabhairt.

translation.en: Can the COVID19 vaccine give you COVID19? No.
translation.ga: An féidir leis an vacsaín COVID19 a thabhairt duit?

translation.en: The COVID19 vaccine cannot give you COVID19.
translation.ga: Ní féidir leis an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19 COVID19 a thabhairt duit.

translation.en: It is possible to have caught COVID19 before getting your vaccine and not realise you have the symptoms until after your vaccination appointment.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir gur tholg tú COVID19 sula bhfuair tú an vacsaín agus nár thug tú na siomptóim faoi deara go dtí i ndiaidh do choinne vacsaínithe.

translation.en: If you have any symptoms of COVID19, it is important to selfisolate (stay in your room) and arrange a free test to find out if you have COVID19.
translation.ga: Má tá aon siomptóim COVID19 ort, is den ríthábhacht é tú féin a fhéinleithlisiú (fan i do sheomra) agus tástáil saor in aisce a shocrú lena fháil amach an bhfuil COVID19 ort.

translation.en: If you have a fever which starts more than two days after you get the vaccine, or lasts longer than two days, you should selfisolate and ask a GP (Doctor) to arrange a COVID19 test for you.
translation.ga: Má tá fiabhras ort a tháinig ort ní ba mhó ná dhá lá tar éis duit an vacsaín a fháil, nó a mhaireann níos faide ná dhá lá, ba cheart duit tú féin a fhéinleithlisiú agus iarraidh ar Dhochtúir Teaghlaigh tástáil COVID19 a shocrú duit.

translation.en: If you have COVID19 symptoms after the first dose, you still need to have the second dose.
translation.ga: Má thagann siomptóim COVID19 ort tar éis na chéad dáileoige, ní mór duit an dara dáileog a fháil go fóill.

translation.en: While you may get some protection from the first dose, having the second dose will give you the best protection against the virus.
translation.ga: Cé go bhféadfadh sé go bhfaighfeá cosaint éigin ón gcéad dáileog, is í an dara dáileog a thabharfaidh an chosaint is fearr duit in aghaidh an víris.

translation.en: Should I get the COVID19 vaccine if I have a high temperature?
translation.ga: Ar cheart dom an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19 a fháil má tá teocht ard orm?

translation.en: You should delay getting the vaccine if you have a fever (temperature of 38 degrees Celsius or above), until you feel better.
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit an vacsaíniú a chur siar má tá fiabhras ort (teocht 38 céim Celsius nó níos airde), go dtí go naireoidh tú níos fearr.

translation.en: Is it safe to get the vaccine if pregnant or breastfeeding?
translation.ga: An bhfuil sé sábháilte an vacsaín a fháil má tá tú ag iompar clainne nó i mbun beathú cíche?

translation.en: If you have had your first dose of the vaccine and are pregnant or breastfeeding you should get your second dose after 12 weeks.
translation.ga: Má tá an chéad dáileog den vacsaín faighte agat agus má tá tú ag iompar clainne nó ag beathú cíche, ba chóir duit do dhara dáileog a fháil tar éis 12 sheachtain.

translation.en: You will be at greater risk of severe illness if you do not get your second dose.
translation.ga: Is mó an baol go mbeadh breoiteacht thromchúiseach ort mura bhfaighfeá an dara dáileog.

translation.en: What vaccine am I being offered?
translation.ga: Cén vacsaín atá á tairiscint dom?

translation.en: The vaccine we are offering you is called Vaxzevria.
translation.ga: Tugtar Vaxzevria ar an vacsaín atá á tairiscint againn duit.

translation.en: The vaccine is manufactured by AstraZeneca.
translation.ga: Is é AstraZeneca a dhéanann an vacsaín áirithe seo a mhonarú.

translation.en: This viral vector vaccine contains a harmless version of a different virus (the vector).
translation.ga: Vacsaín veicteora víreasaigh is ea í, a bhfuil leagan neamhdhíobhálach de víreas eile ann (an veicteoir).

translation.en: This teaches your body how to make a protein that will trigger an immune response.
translation.ga: Múinfidh sé sin do do chorp cén chaoi próitéin a dhéanamh a spreagfaidh freagairt imdhíonachta ionat.

translation.en: Your body then makes antibodies that help fight the infection if the COVID19 virus enters your body in the future.
translation.ga: Ansin tosóidh do chorp ag táirgeadh antasubstaintí, a dhéanfaidh a gcion féin le troid in aghaidh an ionfhabhtaithe má thagann COVID19 isteach i do chorp amach anseo.

translation.en: Is the vaccine safe?
translation.ga: An bhfuil an vacsaín slán sábháilte?

translation.en: The HSE only uses vaccines when they meet the required standards of safety and effectiveness.
translation.ga: Ní úsáideann FSS ach vacsaíní a chomhlíonann na caighdeáin riachtanacha ó thaobh sábháilteachta agus éifeachtúlachta de.

translation.en: While the work to develop COVID19 vaccines has moved much faster than usual, the vaccine we are offering you has gone through all the usual steps needed to develop and approve a safe and effective vaccine.
translation.ga: Cé gur forbraíodh na vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID19 i bhfad ní ba ghasta ná mar is gnách, chuaigh an vacsaín atá á tairiscint againn duit trí na gnáthchéimeanna uile is gá lena chruthú go bhfuil sí idir shábháilte agus éifeachtach.

translation.en: In order to be approved for use, the COVID19 vaccine went through all the clinical trials and safety checks all other licensed medicines go through, following international standards of safety.
translation.ga: Le húsáid na vacsaíne in aghaidh COVID19 a cheadú, shásaigh sí na trialacha cliniciúla agus na seiceálacha sábháilteachta go léir nach mór do gach cógas ceadúnaithe eile a shásamh, agus shásaigh amhlaidh de réir caighdeáin idirnáisiúnta sábháilteachta.

translation.en: The vaccine we are offering you is called Vaxzevria, manufactured by AstraZeneca.
translation.ga: Tugtar Vaxzevria ar an vacsaín atá á tairiscint againn duit agus is é AstraZeneca a dhéanann í a mhonarú.

translation.en: It has been tested with thousands of people as part of clinical trials
translation.ga: Rinneadh í a thástáil ar na mílte daoine mar chuid de thrialacha cliniciúla

translation.en: It has met strict standards of safety, quality and effectiveness, and been approved and licensed by regulators.
translation.ga: Shásaigh sí dianchaighdeáin sábháilteachta, cháilíochta agus éifeachtúlachta, agus tá sí formheasta agus ceadaithe ag rialtóirí.

translation.en: For Ireland, the regulator is the European Medicines Agency (EMA) – visit www.ema.europa.eu for more information.
translation.ga: I gcás na hÉireann, is í an Ghníomhaireacht Leigheasra Eorpach an rialtóir – téigh chuig www.ema.europa.eu le tuilleadh eolais a fháil.

translation.en: How is the COVID19 vaccine given?
translation.ga: Cén chaoi a dtugtar an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19?

translation.en: The COVID19 vaccine is given as an injection into your upper arm.
translation.ga: Tugtar an vacsaín mar instealladh isteach in uachtar do ghéige láimhe.

translation.en: It will only take a few minutes.
translation.ga: Ní thógfaidh sé ach cúpla nóiméad.

translation.en: How many doses of the COVID19 vaccine will I need?
translation.ga: Caithfear an dara dáileog a fháil 12 sheachtain tar éis na chéad dáileoige

translation.en: You will need two doses of the COVID19 vaccine to get longer lasting protection.
translation.ga: Cé mhéad dáileog den vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19 a bheidh ag teastáil uaim?

translation.en: You need to get the second dose 12 weeks after the first dose.
translation.ga: Beidh dhá dháileog den vacsaín ag teastáil uait le cosaint fhadmharthanach a fháil.

translation.en: What are the side effects of the vaccine?
translation.ga: Beidh ort an dara dáileog a fháil 12 sheachtain tar éis na chéad dáileoige.

translation.en: Like all medicines, vaccines can cause side effects.
translation.ga: Céard iad na foiarmhairtí atá ag dul leis an vacsaín? Amhail gach cógas, is féidir le vacsaíní a bheith ina gcúis le foiarmhairtí.

translation.en: Most of these are mild to moderate, shortterm, and not everyone gets them.
translation.ga: Tá an chuid is mó díobh sin éadrom nó measartha, gearrthéarmach, agus ní fhaigheann gach duine iad.

translation.en: More than one in 10 people may experience:
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh na foiarmhairtí seo a leanas a bheith ar ní ba mhó ná duine amháin as gach deichniúr:

translation.en: feeling tired
translation.ga: tuirse

translation.en: tenderness, bruising, pain or itching in the arm where they had the vaccine injection
translation.ga: frithireacht, baill ghorma, pian nó tochas sa ghéag láimhe ar ar tugadh an tinstealladh vacsaíne

translation.en: headache
translation.ga: tinneas cinn

translation.en: muscle pain
translation.ga: pian sna matáin

translation.en: joint pain
translation.ga: pian sna hailt

translation.en: nausea
translation.ga: samhnas

translation.en: fever (temperature of 38 degrees Celsius or above)
translation.ga: fiabhras (teocht 38 céim Celsius nó os a chionn)

translation.en: More than 1 in 100 people may have redness or swelling where they had the injection, diarrhoea, vomiting or a low platelet count (that doesn’t cause any symptoms).
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh baill dhearga nó at ar láthair an insteallta, buinneach, urlacan nó líon íseal pláitíní san fhuil (nach mbíonn ina chúis le siomptóim) a bheith ann i gcás ní ba mhó ná duine amháin as gach 100 duine.

translation.en: More than 1 in 1000 people may have a reduced appetite, dizziness, sleepiness, sweating, swollen lymph glands or a rash.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh goile laghdaithe, meadhrán, tuirse, allas, faireoga limfe ata nó gríos a bheith ann i gcás ní ba mhó ná duine amháin as gach 1000 duine.

translation.en: Serious side effects, like a severe allergic reaction, are very rare, seen in approximately 1 in 100,000 people.
translation.ga: Ní fheictear foiarmhairtí tromchúiseacha, amhail frithghníomhú trom ailléirgeach, ach go hanannamh, i.e. in thart ar dhuine as gach 100,000.

translation.en: Your vaccinator is trained to treat very rare serious allergic reactions.
translation.ga: Tá oiliúint curtha ar do vacsaíneoir le cóir leighis a chur ar othair atá buailte ag frithghníomhuithe troma ailléirgeacha den sórt sin.

translation.en: Very rarely 1 in 100,000 people may develop very unusual blood clots with low platelets.
translation.ga: I gcásanna anannamh, d’fhéadfadh téachtáin fola neamhghnácha agus líon íseal pláitíní san fhuil a bheith ann i gcás duine amháin as gach 100,000 duine.

translation.en: 1 in 5 of these people may die.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh duine amháin as gach cúigear de na daoine sin bás a fháil.

translation.en: These blood clots are less likely to be reported after the second dose of the vaccine.
translation.ga: Níl an baol céanna ann go dtuairisceofaí na téachtáin fola seo tar éis an dara dáileog den vacsaín.

translation.en: The risk of this very rare condition is higher in younger people.
translation.ga: Tá baol an reachta anannamh seo níos airde i measc daoine óga.

translation.en: Your GP, Doctor or vaccinator can advise you on the risks and benefits of getting this vaccine.
translation.ga: Beidh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh, do dhochtúir nó do vacsaíneoir in ann comhairle a chur ort maidir leis na rioscaí agus na buntáistí a bhaineann leis an vacsaín seo.

translation.en: The COVID19 vaccine has gone through the same clinical trials and safety checks as all other licensed vaccines, however the vaccine is new and long term side effect information is limited.
translation.ga: Shásaigh an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19 na trialacha cliniciúla agus na seiceálacha sábháilteachta céanna agus nach mór do gach vacsaín cheadúnaithe eile a shásamh, ach is vacsaín nua í mar sin féin agus níl fáil ach ar mhéid teoranta faisnéise maidir leis na foiarmhairtí fadtéarmacha.

translation.en: As more people in Ireland and around the world get this vaccine, more information on side effects may become available.
translation.ga: Mar a gheobhaidh níos mó agus níos mó daoine in Éirinn agus ar fud an domhain an vacsaín seo, glactar leis go mbeidh fáil ar a thuilleadh faisnéise maidir leis na foiarmhairtí.

translation.en: The HSE will update this information regularly on our website, and if necessary, will update the information leaflets given to people at their first or second dose of the vaccine.
translation.ga: Nuashonróidh FSS an fhaisnéis ar ár láithreán gréasáin go rialta, agus más gá, nuashonróidh freisin na bileoga eolais a thugtar do dhaoine tráth a bhfuil an chéad nó an dara dáileog den vacsaín á fáil acu.

translation.en: Symptoms of very rare blood clots
translation.ga: Siomptóim na dtéachtán fola anannamh

translation.en: Even though the risk of blood clots with low platelets is extremely low, you should know the signs to watch out for.
translation.ga: Cé go bhfuil riosca na dtéachtán fola agus an lín ísil pláitíní san fhuil aníseal go deo, ba chóir duit a bheith ar an eolas faoi na comharthaí le bheith ag faire amach dóibh.

translation.en: Get urgent medical help if you get any of these symptoms after the Vaxzevria vaccine:
translation.ga: Faigh cabhair leighis láithreach bonn má thagann aon cheann de na siomptóim seo ort tar éis an vacsaín Vaxzevria a fháil:

translation.en: breathlessness
translation.ga: giorra anála

translation.en: pain in the chest or stomach
translation.ga: pian sa chliabhrach nó sa bholg

translation.en: swelling or coldness in a leg
translation.ga: at nó fuacht i gcos

translation.en: severe or worsening headache, blurred vision, confusion or seizures
translation.ga: tinneas cinn atá trom nó ag dul in olcas, radharc doiléir, mearbhall nó taomanna

translation.en: persistent bleeding, under the skin where there was no previous injury
translation.ga: fuiliú gan stad faoin gcraiceann nuair nach raibh aon ghortú ann roimhe sin

translation.en: multiple small bruises, reddish or purplish spots, or blood blisters under the skin
translation.ga: roinnt baill ghorma bheaga, spotaí dearga nó corcra, nó spuaiceanna fola faoi bhun an chraicinn

translation.en: The very rare blood clots with low platelets were usually reported within 14 days of getting the Vaxzevria vaccine.
translation.ga: Is gnách gur tuairiscíodh na téachtáin fola anannamh agus an líon íseal pláitíní san fhuil laistigh de 14 lá tar éis na vacsaíne Vaxzevria a fháil.

translation.en: Watch out for these symptoms in the weeks after your vaccination.
translation.ga: Bí ag faire amach do na siomptóim seo sna seachtainí tar éis do vacsaínithe.

translation.en: Fever after the vaccine
translation.ga: Fiabhras tar éis na vacsaíne

translation.en: It’s quite common to develop a fever after a vaccination.
translation.ga: Is iomaí duine a dtagann fiabhras air tar éis vacsaín a fháil.

translation.en: Usually, this happens within two days (48 hours) of getting the vaccine, and it goes away within two days.
translation.ga: Is iondúil go dtarlaíonn sé sin laistigh de dhá lá (48 uair an chloig) tar éis an vacsaín a fháil, agus imíonn sé laistigh de dhá lá.

translation.en: You are more likely to get a fever after your first dose of the vaccine.
translation.ga: Is mó seans go dtiocfaidh fiabhras ort tar éis do chéad dáileoige den vacsaín.

translation.en: If you feel uncomfortable, take paracetamol or ibuprofen as directed on the box or leaflet.
translation.ga: Má airíonn tú míchompordach, tóg paraicéiteamól nó iobúpróifein de réir na dtreoracha ar an mbosca nó ar an mbileoigín eolais.

translation.en: If you are concerned, please seek medical advice.
translation.ga: Faigh comhairle leighis má bhíonn imní ort.

translation.en: Are there some people who should not get the COVID19 vaccine?
translation.ga: An bhfuil daoine áirithe ann nár cheart dóibh an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19 a fháil?

translation.en: You should not get the COVID19 vaccine if:
translation.ga: Níor cheart duit an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19 a fháil:

translation.en: you are under 50 years of age.
translation.ga: má tá tú faoi bhun 50 bliain d’aois.

translation.en: This is because of the very rare risk of blood clots with low platelets after the vaccine.
translation.ga: Is mar sin atá toisc go bhfuil riosca anannamh ann go dtarlódh téachtáin fola nó go mbeadh líon íseal pláitíní san fhuil tar éis an vacsaín a fháil.

translation.en: You will be offered a different vaccine.
translation.ga: Cuirfear vacsaín eile ar fáil duit.

translation.en: you have had a severe allergic reaction to any of the ingredients in the vaccine (including polysorbate 80).
translation.ga: má bhí frithghníomhú trom ailléirgeach agat roimhe seo i leith aon cheann de chomhábhair na vacsaíne (polasorbáit 80 ina measc).

translation.en: Read the manufacturer’s Patient Information Leaflet to see the list of ingredients.
translation.ga: Tá liosta na gcomhábhar le fáil i mBileog Eolais an Mhonaróra d’Othair.

translation.en: you have had a severe allergic reaction to a previous dose of this vaccine.
translation.ga: má bhí frithghníomhú trom ailléirgeach agat tar éis na chéad dáileoige den vacsaín seo.

translation.en: you had blood clots with low platelets after a previous dose of this vaccine.
translation.ga: má bhí téachtáin fola ort agus líon íseal pláitíní san fhuil agat tar éis na chéad dáileoige den vacsaín seo.

translation.en: If you have had an immediate allergic reaction to any other vaccine or injectable therapy, you should talk to your Doctor before getting the COVID19 vaccine.
translation.ga: Má bhí frithghníomhú trom ailléirgeach agat díreach tar éis aon vacsaín nó teiripe ininsteallta eile a fháil, ba cheart duit labhairt le do Dhochtúir sula bhfaighidh tú an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19.

translation.en: Most people will be able to safely get the vaccine.
translation.ga: Beidh mórchuid na ndaoine in ann an vacsaín a fháil go slán sábháilte.

translation.en: The person giving you the vaccine will be happy to answer any questions you have at your appointment for the vaccine.
translation.ga: Beidh an vacsaíneoir lánsásta aon cheist a bheidh agat a fhreagairt duit ag do choinne vacsaínithe.

translation.en: They will also give you an aftercare advice leaflet, and a vaccine record card showing the name and batch number of the vaccine you have been given.
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh sé nó sí bileog comhairle iarchúraim duit freisin, chomh maith le cárta taifid vacsaínithe ar a mbeidh ainm agus baiscuimhir na vacsaíne a tugadh duit.

translation.en: Should I get a second dose of the vaccine if I am under 50? If you are under 50 and have already had your first dose of the vaccine, you should get your second dose after 12 weeks.
translation.ga: Ar cheart dom an dara dáileog den vacsaín a fháil má tá mé faoi bhun 50 bliain d’aois?

translation.en: How long does it take the vaccine to work?
translation.ga: Má tá tú faoi bhun 50 bliain d’aois agus má tá an chéad dáileog den vacsaín faighte agat cheana, ba chóir duit do dhara dáileog a fháil tar éis 12 sheachtain.

translation.en: It takes 3 weeks, after getting the first dose, for the vaccine to work.
translation.ga: Cá fhad a thógann sé ar an vacsaín tosú ag obair? Ní thosóidh an vacsaín ag obair go ceann 3 seachtaine tar éis na chéad dáileoige.

translation.en: You will have the best protection from COVID19 after the second dose, which you should get 12 weeks after your first dose.
translation.ga: Is fearr a bheidh an chosaint in aghaidh COVID19 tar éis an dara dáileog, rud ba cheart duit a fháil 12 sheachtain tar éis do chéad dáileoige.

translation.en: There is a chance you might still get Covid19, even if you have the vaccine.
translation.ga: Tá seans fós ann go dtolgfaidh tú COVID19 fiú tar éis an vacsaín a fháil.

translation.en: Does the vaccine work in everyone?
translation.ga: An oibríonn an vacsaín i ngach duine?

translation.en: Worldwide, vaccines save at least 2 to 3 million lives each year, and protect many more from lifelong illnesses.
translation.ga: Tugann vacsaíní idir 2 agus 3 mhilliún duine ar a laghad saor ón mbás gach uile bhliain ar fud na cruinne, agus cosnaíonn siad go leor leor eile ar ghalair a mhaireann ar feadh an tsaoil.

translation.en: Millions of people have now received COVID19 vaccines all over the world.
translation.ga: Tá vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID19 faighte ag na milliúin daoine ar fud an domhain.

translation.en: There’s strong, reliable evidence that COVID19 vaccines greatly reduce your risk of getting COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá fianaise láidir, iontaofa ann go laghdaíonn na vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID19 go mór an riosca go dtolgfá COVID19.

translation.en: They’re highly effective at preventing deaths and serious illness with COVID19.
translation.ga: Bealach iontach éifeachtach iad le básanna agus breoiteacht thromchúiseach de bharr COVID19 a chosc.

translation.en: If you have a weakened immune system, there is no extra risk in taking the vaccine but it may not work as well for you.
translation.ga: Má tá córas lagaithe imdhíonachta agat, níl aon riosca breise ag baint leis an vacsaín, ach b’fhéidir nach noibreodh sé chomh maith céanna duitse.

translation.en: When I get the vaccine, does that mean I won’t spread COVID19 to others?
translation.ga: Tar éis dom an vacsaín a fháil, an é nach mbeidh mé in ann COVID19 a scaipeadh ar dhaoine eile?

translation.en: We do not know yet if having the vaccine stops you spreading the COVID19 virus to others.
translation.ga: Níl a fhios againn go fóill an féidir le daoine vacsaínithe an víreas a scaipeadh ar dhaoine eile.

translation.en: That is why it is important that we all continue to follow public health advice on how to stop the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Sin an fáth a bhfuil sé chomh tábhachtach sin go leanfaimis orainn ag cloí leis an gcomhairle sláinte poiblí le stop a chur le scaipeadh an víris.

translation.en: follow social distancing guidelines
translation.ga: cloí leis na treoirlínte maidir le scaradh sóisialta

translation.en: keep two metres apart from others where possible
translation.ga: fan dhá mhéadar amach ó dhaoine eile nuair is féidir

translation.en: wear a face covering
translation.ga: cumhdach aghaidhe a chur ort

translation.en: wash your hands regularly
translation.ga: do lámha a ní go rialta

translation.en: Thank you for protecting yourself and others.
translation.ga: Go raibh maith agat as tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint.

translation.en: How long does immunity last from the vaccine?
translation.ga: Cá fhad a mhairfidh an imdhíonacht ón vacsaín?

translation.en: We do not know yet how long immunity will last.
translation.ga: Ní fios go fóill cá fhad a mhairfidh an imdhíonacht.

translation.en: Clinical trials are ongoing to find this out.
translation.ga: Tá trialacha cliniciúla ar bun faoi láthair leis an gceist sin a fhuascailt.

translation.en: For more information, read the manufacturer’s Patient Information Leaflet.
translation.ga: Léigh Bileog Eolais an Mhonaróra d’Othair le tuilleadh eolais a fháil.

translation.en: This will be printed for you on the day you get your vaccine, or you can find it on www.hse.ie/covid19vaccinePIL
translation.ga: Cuirfear í sin i gcló duit ar lá do vacsaínithe, nó is féidir leat teacht uirthi ar

translation.en: You can also talk to a health professional, like your GP (Doctor), Pharmacist or healthcare team.
translation.ga: www.hse.ie/covid19vaccinePIL

translation.en: You can also visit the HSE website at www.hse.ie/covid19vaccine or call HSELive on 1850 24 1850.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat labhairt le gairmí cúraim sláinte faoin vacsaín freisin – do Dhochtúir Teaghlaigh, do Chógaiseoir nó duine de d’fhoireann cúraim sláinte, cuir i gcás.

translation.en: For more information on the COVID19 vaccine, including materials in other formats and translation support visit
translation.ga: Is féidir leat dul chuig láithreán gréasáin FSS freisin ag

translation.en: How do I report side effects?
translation.ga: Le tuilleadh eolais a fháil maidir leis an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19, lena náirítear eolas i bhformáidí agus i dteangacha eile, téigh chuig www.hse.ie/covid19vaccinematerials

translation.en: As with all vaccines, you can report suspected side effects to the Health Products Regulatory Authority (HPRA).
translation.ga: Cén chaoi ar féidir liom foiarmhairtí a thuairisciú? Mar is amhlaidh i gcás gach vacsaíne, is féidir leat foiarmhairtí amhrasta a thuairisciú don Údarás Rialála Táirgí Sláinte.

translation.en: The HPRA is the regulatory authority in the Republic of Ireland for medicines, medical devices and other health products.
translation.ga: Is é an túdarás rialála i bPoblacht na hÉireann é maidir le cógais, gairis leighis agus táirgí sláinte eile.

translation.en: As part of its role in the safety monitoring of medicines, the HPRA operates a system through which healthcare professionals or members of the public can report any suspected adverse reactions (side effects) associated with medicines and vaccines which have occurred in Ireland.
translation.ga: Mar chuid dá ról i monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar chógais ó thaobh sábháilteachta de, oibríonn an tÚdarás córas trínar féidir le gairmithe cúraim sláinte nó baill den phobal aon fhrithghníomhú díobhálach (foiarmhairt) amhrasta a bhaineann le cógais agus vacsaíní a tharla in Éirinn a thuairisciú.

translation.en: The HPRA strongly encourages reporting of suspected adverse reactions (side effects) associated with Covid19 vaccines to support continuous monitoring of their safe and effective use.
translation.ga: Molann an tÚdarás go láidir go ndéanfaí gach frithghníomhú díobhálach (fo iarmhairt) amhrasta a bhaineann le vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID19 a thuairisciú d’fhonn tacú leis monatóireacht leanúnach a dhéanamh ar a núsáid shábháilte, éifeachtach.

translation.en: To report a suspected adverse reaction to the Covid19 vaccine, please visit www.hpra.ie/report.
translation.ga: Le frithghníomhú díobhálach amhrasta a bhaineann leis an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19 a thuairisciú, téigh chuig www.hpra.ie/report.

translation.en: You can also ask your Doctor or a family member to report this for you.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat iarraidh ar do Dhochtúir nó ar bhall teaghlaigh é sin a thuairisciú thar do cheann freisin.

translation.en: As much information as is known should be provided, and where possible, the vaccine batch number should be included.
translation.ga: Ba cheart a oiread faisnéise agus is eol a chur ar fáil, agus nuair is féidir, ba cheart baiscuimhir na vacsaíne a lua chomh maith.

translation.en: The HPRA cannot provide clinical advice on individual cases.
translation.ga: Ní féidir leis an Údarás comhairle chliniciúil a chur ar fáil maidir le cásanna ar leith.

translation.en: Members of the public should contact their healthcare professional (their Doctor or Pharmacist) with any medical concerns they may have.
translation.ga: Ba cheart do bhaill an phobail teagmháil a dhéanamh lena ngairmí cúraim sláinte (a nDochtúir nó a gCógaiseoir) má bhíonn aon cheist leighis acu.

translation.en: In order to administer the vaccine safely and to record all the necessary information to monitor and manage the vaccine, the HSE will be processing your personal information.
translation.ga: Leis an vacsaín a thabhairt do dhaoine ar bhealach slán sábháilte agus leis an bhfaisnéis uile a thaifeadadh is gá le monatóireacht agus bainistíocht a dhéanamh ar an vacsaín, beidh FSS ag próiseáil do chuid faisnéise pearsanta.

translation.en: All information processed by the HSE will be in accordance to the general laws and in particular the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) which came into force in 2018.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh FSS an fhaisnéis go léir a phróiseáil de réir na ndlíthe ginearálta agus de réir an Rialacháin Ghinearálta maidir le Cosaint Sonraí go háirithe, a tháinig i bhfeidhm in 2018.

translation.en: The processing of your data will be lawful and fair.
translation.ga: Beidh próiseáil do chuid sonraí idir dhleathach agus chothrom.

translation.en: It will only be processed for the specific purpose to manage the vaccinations.
translation.ga: Ní dhéanfar iad a phróiseáil ach amháin chun críche vacsaíniú a bhainistiú.

translation.en: The principle of Data Minimisation has been applied.
translation.ga: Tá Prionsabal an Íoslaghdaithe Sonraí i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: This means that only data that is necessary to identify you, book your appointment, record your vaccination and monitor its effects is being recorded.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé sin nach dtaifeadfar ach na sonraí a bheidh ag teastáil le tú a aithint, do choinne a chur in áirithe, do vacsaíniú a thaifeadadh agus monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar a éifeachtaí.

translation.en: You have the following rights as a data subject under the GDPR in respect of your personal data that are processed.
translation.ga: Mar dhuine is ábhar do shonraí, tá na cearta seo a leanas agat faoin Rialachán Ginearálta maidir le Cosaint Sonraí i leith na sonraí pearsanta agat a dhéantar a phróiseáil.

translation.en: Request information on and access to your personal data (commonly known as a ‘data subject access request’).
translation.ga: Faisnéis maidir le do shonraí pearsanta agus rochtain orthu a iarraidh (ar a dtugtar ‘iarratas duine ar a s(h)onraí’ de ghnáth).

translation.en: This enables you to receive a copy of the personal data we hold about you and to check that we are lawfully processing it.
translation.ga: Cuirtear ar do chumas leis sin cóip de na sonraí pearsanta atá á gcoinneáil againn maidir leat a fháil agus a chinntiú go bhfuil siad á bpróiseáil de réir an dlí againn.

translation.en: Request correction of the personal data that we hold about you.
translation.ga: A iarraidh go ndéanfaí na sonraí pearsanta atá againn maidir leat a cheartú.

translation.en: This enables you to have any incomplete or inaccurate information we hold about you corrected.
translation.ga: Cuirtear ar do chumas leis sin a iarraidh go ndéanfaí aon fhaisnéis neamhiomlán nó mhíchruinn atá againn maidir leat a cheartú.

translation.en: Request erasure of your personal data.
translation.ga: Léirscriosadh do chuid sonraí pearsanta a iarraidh.

translation.en: This enables you to ask us to delete or remove personal data where there is no good reason for us continuing to process it.
translation.ga: Cuirtear ar do chumas leis sin a iarraidh orainn sonraí pearsanta a scriosadh nó a bhaint i gcás nach mbeidh aon chúis mhaith againn le leanúint lena bpróiseáil.

translation.en: You also have the right to ask us to delete or remove your personal information where you have exercised your right to object to processing.
translation.ga: Tá sé de cheart agat chomh maith iarraidh orainn do chuid faisnéise pearsanta a scriosadh nó a bhaint i gcás gur fheidhmigh tú do cheart le cur i gcoinne a próiseála.

translation.en: Object to processing of your personal data.
translation.ga: Cur i gcoinne phróiseáil do chuid sonraí pearsanta.

translation.en: ﻿After your COVID19 Vaccine Janssen
translation.ga: ﻿Tar éis duit Vacsaín Janssen in aghaidh COVID19 a fháil

translation.en: Thank you for protecting yourself and others by getting the vaccine.
translation.ga: Go raibh maith agat as an vacsaín a fháil le tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint.

translation.en: Now that you have had your vaccine, we ask you to read this document carefully, so you know how you can expect to feel in the next few days and where to get more information.
translation.ga: Anois go bhfuil an vacsaín faighte agat, iarraimid ort an doiciméad seo a léamh go cúramach le go mbeidh a fhios agat cén chaoi a mbeidh tú ag aireachtáil as seo go ceann cúpla lá agus cá háit ar féidir leat teacht ar a thuilleadh eolais.

translation.en: Do read the COVID19 vaccine information leaflet we gave you about the vaccine too.
translation.ga: Iarrtar ort an bhileog eolais a thugamar duit maidir leis an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19 a léamh freisin.

translation.en: We are also giving you a record of your vaccination today.
translation.ga: Ar deireadh, táimid le taifead ar do vacsaíniú inniu a thabhairt duit chomh maith.

translation.en: Please keep the record card safe.
translation.ga: Iarrtar ort an cárta taifid vacsaínithe sin a choinneáil in áit shábháilte.

translation.en: What might happen in the next few days?
translation.ga: Céard a d’fhéadfadh tarlú as seo go ceann cúpla lá?

translation.en: Some people who got the vaccine that you got today will:
translation.ga: Cuid de na daoine a fuair an vacsaín chéanna agus a fuair tú inniu:

translation.en: have swelling, redness and/or pain in the arm where they had the vaccine injection
translation.ga: bhí at, baill dhearga agus/nó pian orthu sa ghéag láimhe ar ar tugadh an tinstealladh vacsaíne dóibh

translation.en: feel tired
translation.ga: bhí tuirse orthu

translation.en: get a headache
translation.ga: bhí tinneas cinn orthu

translation.en: have a cough
translation.ga: bhí casacht orthu

translation.en: have muscle pain
translation.ga: bhí pian sna matáin acu

translation.en: have joint pain
translation.ga: bhí pian sna hailt acu

translation.en: have nausea
translation.ga: bhí samhnas orthu

translation.en: get a fever (temperature of 38 degrees Celsius or above).
translation.ga: bhí fiabhras orthu (teocht 38 céim Celsius nó os a chionn).

translation.en: There have been very rare cases of unusual blood clots with low platelets in the blood in the first few weeks after vaccination.
translation.ga: I gcásanna anannamh chonacthas téachtáin fola neamhghnácha agus líon íseal pláitíní san fhuil sa chéad chúpla seachtain tar éis an vacsaínithe.

translation.en: Platelets help the blood to clot.
translation.ga: Cabhraíonn pláitíní leis an bhfuil téachtadh.

translation.en: You should seek prompt medical assistance and mention your recent vaccination if you:
translation.ga: Ba cheart duit cabhair leighis a fháil gan a thuilleadh moille agus a lua leis an ngairmí sláinte go bhfuair tú an vacsaín le déanaí má thagann aon cheann de na siomptóim seo ort:

translation.en: are breathless
translation.ga: giorra anála

translation.en: have pain in the chest or stomach
translation.ga: pian sa chliabhrach nó sa bholg

translation.en: have swelling or coldness in a leg
translation.ga: at nó fuacht i gcos

translation.en: get a severe or worsening headache (particularly 3 or more days after the vaccine)
translation.ga: tinneas cinn atá trom nó ag dul in olcas (go háirithe 3 lá nó níos mó tar éis an vacsaín a fháil)

translation.en: have blurred vision, confusion or seizures
translation.ga: radharc doiléir

translation.en: have persistent bleeding under the skin where there was no previous injury
translation.ga: fuiliú gan stad faoin gcraiceann nuair nach raibh aon ghortú ann roimhe sin

translation.en: have many small bruises, reddish or purplish spots, or blood blisters under the skin.
translation.ga: roinnt mhaith baill ghorma bheaga, spotaí dearga nó corcra, nó spuaiceanna fola faoi bhun an chraicinn.

translation.en: As with all vaccines, you can report suspected side effects to the Health Products Regulatory Authority (HPRA).
translation.ga: Mar is amhlaidh i gcás gach vacsaíne, is féidir leat foiarmhairtí amhrasta a thuairisciú don Údarás Rialála Táirgí Sláinte.

translation.en: To report side effects to a COVID19 vaccine, please visit www.hpra.ie/report What if I have a fever or have aches and pains?
translation.ga: Le foiarmhairtí aon cheann de na vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID19 a thuairisciú, téigh chuig www.hpra.ie/report

translation.en: If you have a fever or you have aches and pains, you can take paracetamol or ibuprofen to help.
translation.ga: Céard ba cheart dom a dhéanamh má bhíonn fiabhras nó tinneas agus pianta orm? Má bhíonn fiabhras nó tinneas agus pianta ort, is féidir leat paraicéiteamól nó iobúpróifein a thógáil le hiad a mhaolú.

translation.en: However, if your fever lasts more than 48 hours or if you are still concerned, please seek medical advice.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, faigh comhairle leighis má mhaireann d’fhiabhras níos mó ná 48 uair an chloig nó má bhíonn imní fós ort.

translation.en: The good news
translation.ga: An deascéala

translation.en: Getting a COVID19 vaccine should protect you from the serious complications of COVID19.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go gcosnódh an vacsaín thú in aghaidh na ndeacrachtaí tromchúiseacha a bhaineann le COVID19.

translation.en: Vaccines teach your immune system to protect you from diseases.
translation.ga: Múineann vacsaíní do do chóras imdhíonachta cén chaoi tú a chosaint in aghaidh galar.

translation.en: It is much safer for your immune system to learn this through vaccination than by getting COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá sé i bhfad níos sábháilte do do chóras imdhíonachta an méid sin a fhoghlaim trí vacsaíniú ná trí COVID19 a tholgadh.

translation.en: We are still learning
translation.ga: Táimid fós ag foghlaim

translation.en: It takes 14 days after getting your vaccine for it to work.
translation.ga: Ní thosóidh an vacsaín ag obair go ceann 14 lá tar éis duit í a fháil.

translation.en: There is a chance you might still get COVID19 even if you have the vaccine.
translation.ga: Tá seans fós ann go dtolgfaidh tú COVID19 fiú tar éis an vacsaín a fháil.

translation.en: We do not know yet if having the vaccine stops you spreading the virus to others, so you must continue to follow public health advice:
translation.ga: Ní fios go fóill an féidir le daoine vacsaínithe an víreas a scaipeadh ar dhaoine eile, mar sin ní mór duit leanúint ort ag cloí leis an gcomhairle sláinte poiblí:

translation.en: follow social distancing guidelines
translation.ga: cloí leis na treoirlínte maidir le scaradh sóisialta

translation.en: (keep two metres apart from others where possible)
translation.ga: (fan dhá mhéadar amach ó dhaoine eile nuair is féidir)

translation.en: wear a face covering
translation.ga: cumhdach aghaidhe a chur ort

translation.en: wash your hands regularly.
translation.ga: do lámha a ní go rialta.

translation.en: If you are unsure about anything, or have any questions about the COVID19 vaccine please ask your vaccinator today.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil tú cinnte faoi rud ar bith, nó má tá aon cheist agat faoin vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19, cuir ceist ar an duine atá ag tabhairt na vacsaíne duit inniu.

translation.en: Visit www.hse.ie/covid19vaccine for more information on the COVID19 vaccine.
translation.ga: Téigh chuig www.hse.ie/covid19vaccine le tuilleadh eolais a chur ar an vacsaín in aghaidh COVID19.

translation.en: Side Effects
translation.ga: Foiarmhairtí

translation.en: ﻿Keeping well this winter
translation.ga: ﻿Ag fanacht slán an geimhreadh seo

translation.en: The next few months will be hard, for all of us, as we live with the impact of COVID19 (coronavirus) on our lives.
translation.ga: Beidh an cúpla mí atá amach romhainn deacair de bharr an tionchar atá ag an gcoróinvíreas COVID19 ar ár saol.

translation.en: But there are ways we can make it a little better for ourselves.
translation.ga: Ach is féidir linn an saol a dhéanamh níos éasca ar bhealaí éagsúla.

translation.en: This season, make a plan to help and care for yourself.
translation.ga: Déan plean a chabhróidh leat aire a thabhairt duit féin an séasúr seo.

translation.en: Keeping active, getting outside and staying connected with other people can make a positive difference.
translation.ga: Is mór an leas a dhéanann sé a bheith gníomhach, dul amach faoin aer agus bheith i dteangmháil le daoine eile.

translation.en: Some days, some weeks will be harder than others.
translation.ga: Beidh cuid de na laethanta agus na seachtainí níos deacra ná a chéile.

translation.en: This is especially true at times when we are living with restrictions, have to limit our social interactions and need to keep two metres social distancing even with friends.
translation.ga: Beidh sé seo amhlaidh go háirithe le linn tréimhse ina mbeidh muid ag maireachtáil le srianta, a chuirfi dh srianta ar ár gcaidreamh sóisialta agus a mbeidh orainn fanacht amach 2 mhéadar ó chairde agus ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: Or if we have to self isolate because of symptoms or a diagnosis of COVID19.
translation.ga: nó má bhíonn orainn fanacht asainn féin de bharr comharthaí nó diagnóis COVID19.

translation.en: This booklet contains health information that you will find useful.
translation.ga: Beidh an teolas sláinte sa leabhrán seo úsáideach duit.

translation.en: The centre pages also contain space for you to note local phone numbers and contacts that you can use when you need to.
translation.ga: Tá spás sna leathanaigh láir freisin chun uimhreacha fóin agus teagmhálacha a scríobh iontu.

translation.en: Go for a walk
translation.ga: Téigh amach ag siúl

translation.ga: Gnáthsheiceálacha rialta sláinte

translation.ga: Comharthaí agus cad ba chóir duit a dhéanamh má bhíonn tú tinn

translation.ga: COVID19, slaghdáin, fliú: cén difríocht atá eatarthu?

translation.en: Minding your health
translation.ga: Aire a thabhairt do do shláinte

translation.en: Looking after your physical and mental health is more important than ever now.
translation.ga: Tá sé níos tábhachtaí ná riamh aire a thabhairt do do shláinte coirp agus intinne.

translation.en: Healthy eating and getting regular exercise are vital for health.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach dár sláinte bia sláintiúil a ithe agus aclaíocht rialta a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Eating well
translation.ga: Ith bia folláin

translation.en: Eating a variety of nourishing foods provides the energy (calories) and nutrients that you need to stay healthy.
translation.ga: Má itheann tú réimse leathan de bhia folláin gheobhaidh tú an fuinneamh agus na cothaithigh atá ag teastáil le bheith sláintiúil.

translation.en: Hot meals and drinks help to keep you warm, so have regular hot drinks and eat at least one hot meal a day if possible.
translation.ga: Más féidir, ól deochanna atá te agus ith béile te amháin ar a laghad gach lá mar coinneoidh siad te tú.

translation.en: Eating regularly helps keep energy levels up during winter.
translation.ga: Gheobhaidh tú an fuinneamh atá uait le linn an gheimhridh má itheann tú béilí go rialta.

translation.en: Unexpected weight loss
translation.ga: Ag cailleadh meáchain gan aon chúis leis

translation.en: These tips will help you have healthy eating habits throughout the coming months.
translation.ga: Seo a leanas comhairle maidir le bia folláin

translation.en: Try to eat 5 to 7 portions of fruit and veg every day.
translation.ga: Déan iarracht idir cúig agus seacht bpíosa torthaí, glasraí agus sailéad a ithe gach lá.

translation.en: Plan your meals in advance.
