translation.ga: Pleanáil do bhéilí roimh ré cuideoidh sé seo leat bianna éagsúla agus cothaitheach a ithe.

translation.en: This will help you to introduce variety and eat more nutritious foods.
translation.ga: Réitigh do bhéilí as comhábhair úra den chuid is mó agus roghnaigh torthaí, sailéid agus glasraí mar shneaiceanna.

translation.en: Prepare your meals using mostly fresh ingredients.
translation.ga: Is rogha iontach iad glasraí reoite agus torthaí cosúil le sméara a bheith agat sa reoiteoir.

translation.en: Choose foods like fruits, salads and vegetables for snacks.
translation.ga: Tá cothaithigh éagsúla le fáil i mbianna éagsúla agus dá bhrí sin ba chóir duit éagsúlacht béilí a bheith agat i rith na seachtaine más féidir.

translation.en: Frozen vegetables and fruits like berries are a great option for having in the freezer.
translation.ga: Nuair a bheidh tú ag ceannach torthaí agus glasraí, ba chóir duit dathanna éagsúla a roghnú (cuimhnigh ar an tuar ceatha) de bhrí go bhfuil vitimíní difriúla sna glasraí ar dhathanna difriúla.

translation.en: Different foods have different nutrients so if possible try to have a variety of meals throughout the week.
translation.ga: Úsáid modhanna cócaireachta níos sláintiúla cosúil le griolladh nó bácáil seachas a bheith ag friochadh nó ag róstadh le hola nó sail.

translation.en: When you are buying fruit and vegetables, try to include a range of colours (think of a rainbow) as the different coloured options have different vitamins.
translation.ga: Roghnaigh aráin caiscín agus lánghráin, gránaigh, pasta agus rís dhonn nuair is féidir.

translation.en: Use healthier cooking methods such as grilling or baking, rather than frying or roasting with oil or fat.
translation.ga: Ith bia ar nós éanlaith chlóis, iasc, uibheacha, cnónna, pónairí nó feoil atá lán le próitéin dhá uair sa lá.

translation.en: Choose wholemeal and wholegrain breads, cereals, pasta and brown rice where possible.
translation.ga: Tá próitéín ag teastáil ó dhaoine aosta i ngach béile chun na matáin a choinneáil láidir.

translation.en: Include a small amount of lean protein foods such as poultry, fish, eggs, nuts, beans or meat at two meals in the day.
translation.ga: Déan iarracht idir cúig agus seacht bpíosa torthaí, glasraí agus sailéad a ithe gach lá.

translation.en: For older people, protein foods are important at all meals to help keep muscles strong.
translation.ga: Bíodh glasraí nó sailéad ar leath do phláta.

translation.en: Try to eat five to seven portions of fruit, vegetables and salad each day.
translation.ga: Déan ócáid ar leith as na béilí má tá tú i d’aonar nó le daoine eile.

translation.en: At mealtimes, aim for half of your plate to be vegetables or salad.
translation.ga: Suigh ag an mbord agus bain sult as do bhéilí.

translation.en: Make mealtimes special, whether you are eating on your own or with others.
translation.ga: Déan iarracht gan a bheith ag ithe os comhair na teilifíse nó ag scrolladh ar d’fhón.

translation.en: Enjoy your meals at a table and focus on your food rather than watching TV or scrolling on your phone.
translation.ga: Seachain bianna a bhfuil go leor calraí, siúcra agus saille iontu gach lá.

translation.en: Avoid having foods that are high in calories, sugar and fat every day.
translation.ga: Níl mórán cothaithe iontu agus d’fheadfadh go leor calraí a bheith sna bianna seo.

translation.en: They contain very little nutrition and can be very high in calories.
translation.ga: Tá tuilleadh eolais faoi bhia folláin ar fáil anseo hse.ie/healthyeatingguidelines.

translation.en: Visit hse.ie/healthyeatingguidelines for more info on healthy eating.
translation.ga: Déan cuardach ar líne le haghaidh oidis bhlasta, cothaitheacha ‘Safefood 101 Square Meals cookbook’.

translation.en: For easy to prepare, tasty and nutritious recipes, search online for ‘Safefood 101 Square Meals cookbook’.
translation.ga: Má thosaíonn tusa nó duine a bhfuil aithne agat air nó uirthi ag cailleadh meáchain de bharr tinnis, scaradh sóisialta nó easpa goile, ba chóir duit labhairt le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh nó d’altra sláinte pobail.

translation.en: If you or someone you know is experiencing unplanned weight loss that might be related to illness, social isolation or reduced appetite, it is important to tell your GP or public health nurse.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh siad acmhainní a mholadh ar nós an leabhair cócaireachta Making the Most of Every Bite ina bhfuil oidis atá lán le próitéin agus fuinneamh.

translation.en: They can recommend some dietary resources that can help, such as a highenergy highprotein cookbook called Making the Most of Every Bite.
translation.ga: Tá an leabhar cócaireachta agus acmhainní eile ar fáil ar hse.ie/nutritionsupports ach déan cinnte go lorgaíonn tú comhairle ó do dhochtúir teaghlaigh, altra nó diaitéiteach ar dtús.

translation.en: The cookbook and other resources are available on hse.ie/nutritionsupports but make sure you seek advice from your GP, nurse or dietitian first.
translation.ga: Ag cur suas meáchain gan aon chúis leis

translation.en: Unplanned weight gain
translation.ga: Is féidir le hathruithe i ngnáthchúrsaí an lae ar nós obair ón mbaile, strus, aclaíocht fhisiciúil, codladh agus ithe cur isteach ar do mheáchan.

translation.en: Changes in everyday routines, like working from home, stress, physical activity, sleep and eating can affect your weight.
translation.ga: Tabhair cuairt ar hse.ie/healthyeatingguidelines chun eolas a fháil faoin méid bia ba chóir a chur ar do phláta agus smaointe faoi bhéilí, nó labhair le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh nó gairmí sláinte.

translation.en: Visit hse.ie/healthyeatingguidelines for information on portion sizes and meal ideas, or talk to your GP or healthcare professional.
translation.ga: Cleachtadh agus aclaíocht coirp

translation.en: Exercise and physical activity
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach do do shláinte coirp agus intinne aclaíocht a dhéanamh gach lá, taobh amuigh más féidir.

translation.en: Getting some exercise every day, ideally outdoors, is important for both physical and mental health.
translation.ga: Ní bhíonn sé chomh éasca ag duine fásta atá níos sine nó a bhfuil tinneas fadtéarmach nó míchumas air nó uirthi aclaíocht a dhéanamh.

translation.en: If you are an older adult or if you have an underlying health condition or a disability, exercise and activity may feel harder to do.
translation.ga: Ach tá siad thar a bheith tábhachtach do neartú matán agus sláinte na gcnámh, agus d’fheadfadh siad cabhrú leat chun do neart agus solúbthacht a choinneáil agus chun tú a chosaint ó thitim.

translation.en: But they are really important for things like muscle strength and bone health, which can help to maintain strength, flexibility and prevent falls.
translation.ga: Cé mhéad aclaíochta ba chóir dom a dhéanamh?

translation.en: How much exercise do I need?
translation.ga: Déan plean aclaíochta.

translation.en: Make an exercise plan.
translation.ga: Cabhróidh an chomhairle thíos leat taitneamh a bhaint as tuilleadh aclaíochta an geimhreadh seo.

translation.en: These tips will help you to enjoy being more active this winter.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh leanaí agus daoine óga idir 2 agus 18 mbliana d’aois i mbun aclaíochta go measartha nó go tréan, ar feadh 60 nóiméad ar a laghad gach lá.

translation.en: Children and young people aged 2 to 18 should be active, at a moderate to vigorous level, for at least 60 minutes every day.
translation.ga: Beidh do chroí ag bualadh níos tapúla ná mar a bhíonn de ghnáth agus beidh tú ag análú níos tapúla ná mar a bhíonn de ghnáth le linn aclaíochta measartha.

translation.en: Moderate activity means your heart is beating faster than normal and breathing is harder than normal.
translation.ga: Beidh do chroí ag bualadh i bhfad níos tapúla ná mar a bhíonn de ghnáth agus beidh tú ag análú i bhfad níos tapúla ná mar a bhíonn de ghnáth le linn aclaíochta tréan.

translation.en: Vigorous activity means your heart is beating much faster than normal and breathing is much harder than normal.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh gach duine fásta gníomhach ag leibhéal measartha ar feadh 30 nóiméad sa lá ar a laghad 5 lá sa tseachtain.

translation.en: Every adult should be active at a moderate level at least 30 minutes a day 5 days a week.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn gníomhaíocht mheasartha go nardóidh do ráta análaithe agus ráta croí, cé go bhfuil tú fós in ann comhrá a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Moderate activity means your breathing and heart rate increase, but you are still able to carry on a conversation.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go mbraithfeá te nó go mbeifeá ag cur beagán allais agus tú ar luas compordach.

translation.en: You should feel warm or be sweating slightly at a comfortable pace.
translation.ga: Ullmhaigh plean ina mbeidh an aclaíocht mar chuid de do gnáthchúrsa laethúil.

translation.en: Make a plan to include exercise in your daily routine.
translation.ga: Téigh ag siúl ar feadh 20 nó 30 nóiméad gach lá agus déan aclaíocht fhisiciúil eile ar nós rang aclaíochta nó spórt ar líne faoi dhó nó trí huaire gach seachtain, má tá tú ábalta.

translation.en: Think about a 20 or 30minute walk each day and also include some other physical activity, such as an online exercise class or sport, two to three times a week if you can.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn deacracht agat ag déanamh na haclaíochta go rialta, déan iarracht bualadh le cara nó le duine sa chlann chun tú féin a spreagadh.

translation.en: If you are finding it hard to get into a routine of regular exercise, try to arrange meeting up with a friend or family member, this can help to encourage you.
translation.ga: Is féidir obair tí ar nós folúsghlanadh, glanadh na bhfuinneog agus cófraí a atheagrú a chur san áireamh mar chuid den aclaíocht coirp laethúil.

translation.en: Household activities like vacuuming, washing windows, and reorganising cupboards all add up to daily
translation.ga: Bíodh plean agat chun aclaíocht a dhéanamh nuair a bhíonn sé fliuch nó gaofar.

translation.en: Plan for how you can exercise even when the weather is wet or windy outside.
translation.ga: An bhféadfá éadach uiscedhíonach agus bróga a cheannach chun dul amach sa doineann? Faigh moltaí ó do chairde nó do chlann maidir le haclaíocht a d’fhéadfá a dhéanamh taobh istigh aon lá nach bhfuil fonn ort dul amach.

translation.en: Can you invest in waterproof clothing and shoes so that you can still go outdoors? Ask friends or family members for recommendations that you can do indoors on those days when you don’t feel like going outside.
translation.ga: Bainfidh go leor daoine fásta agus páistí a bhfuil míchumas orthu taitneamh agus sásamh as an aclaíocht.

translation.en: Many adults and children who have a disability will also find some exercise enjoyable and helpful for overall physical and mental health.
translation.ga: Cabhróidh an aclaíocht seo lena sláinte coirp agus intinne.

translation.en: If you have a disability aim to be as active as the disability allows in order to meet the guideline for your age group.
translation.ga: Má tá míchumas ort déan iarracht a bheith chomh haclaí agus is féidir chun teacht leis an treoir a moltar do d’aoisghrúpa.

translation.en: If you are supporting someone who has a disability, you can check in with their healthcare provider for ideas on what type of activity or exercise is most suitable and safe.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag tacú le duine faoi mhíchumas, is féidir leat fiafraí dá sholáthraí cúram sláinte cén cineál gníomhaíochta nó aclaíochta a bheadh oiriúnach agus sábháilte.

translation.en: Children’s activity should also include musclestrengthening, flexibility and bonestrengthening exercises three times a week.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do pháistí aclaíocht a dhéanamh trí huaire sa tseachtain chun na matáin agus cnámha a neartú.

translation.en: Adults also need to include activities which increase muscular strength and endurance on two to three days per week.
translation.ga: Ní mór do dhaoine fásta gníomhaíochtaí a dhéanamh dhá nó trí lá sa tseachtain chun na matáin a neartú.

translation.en: The HSE website features a range of indoor exercises suitable for older people.
translation.ga: Tá réimse cleachtaí faoi dhíon ar shuíomh gréasáin FSS atá oiriúnach do dhaoine scothaosta.

translation.en: Search online for ‘HSE indoor exercises’.
translation.ga: Cuardaigh ‘HSE indoor exercises’ ar líne.

translation.en: Or ask a family member, friend or practice nurse if they can print these for you.
translation.ga: Nó iarr ar bhall teaghlaigh, cara nó altra cleachtais an féidir leo iad seo a phriontáil duitse.

translation.en: Examples of musclestrengthening exercises
translation.ga: Samplaí de chleachtaí i gcomhair neartú na matáin

translation.en: Situps, squats, push ups, lunges, carrying shopping, pushing a lawn mower or lifting hand weights.
translation.ga: Suí aniar, gróigeadh, brúnna aníos, fáinneál, ag iompar málaí, ag brú lomaire féir, ag tógáil meáchain.

translation.en: Examples of bonestrengthening exercises
translation.ga: Samplaí de chleachtaí i gcomhair neartú na gcnámh

translation.en: All weight bearing activity like running, jogging, jumping or skipping.
translation.ga: Rith, bogshodar, ag léim, scipeáil.

translation.en: Minding your mental health
translation.ga: Aire a thabhairt do do mheabhairshláinte

translation.en: Lots of us are finding all of the changes to our lives as a result of COVID19 upsetting and difficult to deal with.
translation.ga: Tá na hathruithe uilig a tharla inár saol de bharr COVID19 ag cur as do chuid mhór daoine agus níl sé éasca iad a láimhseáil.

translation.en: Here are some tips to help you mind your mental health during this time.
translation.ga: Tá comhairle thíos a chabhróidh leat aire a thabhairt do do mheabhairshláinte ag an tráth seo.

translation.en: Daily routine
translation.ga: Gnáth rudaí laethúla

translation.en: Having a healthy daily routine is really important for mental health.
translation.ga: Tá gnáthamh laethúil thar a bheith tábhachtach don mheabhairshláinte.

translation.en: During difficult times like this, it’s best if you can keep some structure in your day.
translation.ga: Is fearr struchtúr a bheith ar do lá na laethanta corracha seo.

translation.en: This means eating well, physical activity and exercise, regular sleep habits, and things that you like or enjoy, such as reading a book or being creative.
translation.ga: Sa struchtúr seo ba chóir duit bia ceart a ithe, aclaíocht agus aclaíocht coirp a dhéanamh agus rudaí a thaitníonn leat, ar nós, leabhar a léamh nó obair chruthaitheach a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Stay connected
translation.ga: Coinnigh i dteagmháil

translation.en: Stay connected with other people in ways that are safe for you.
translation.ga: Coinnigh i dteagmháil le daoine eile ar bhealach atá sábháilte.

translation.en: If you are not able to meet family or friends because of restrictions, stay in regular contact by phone, letter or email.
translation.ga: Mura féidir leat bualadh le cairde nó le do chlann de bharr na srianta, coinnigh i dteagmháil leo go rialta ar an bhfón, le litir nó le ríomhphost.

translation.en: Try to listen only to the facts
translation.ga: Ná tabhair aird ar aon rud ach ar na fíricí

translation.en: Keep a realistic perspective of the situation based on facts.
translation.ga: Bí ciallmhar agus tabhair aird ar na fíricí.

translation.en: Stay informed but set times and limits for news.
translation.ga: Coinnigh tú féin ar an eolas ach cuir teorainn leis an méid ama a chaitheann tú ag éisteacht leis an nuacht.

translation.en: If you find yourself becoming overwhelmed by the news, try to talk about it with someone.
translation.ga: Má airíonn tú go bhfuil an nuacht iomarcach duit labhair le duine éigin faoi.

translation.en: Be mindful
translation.ga: Coinnigh tú féin ar an eolas

translation.en: If you smoke or drink, try to avoid doing this more than usual.
translation.ga: Más duine tú a chaitheann tabac, nó a ólann, ná caith níos mó tobac nó ná hól níos mó ná mar is gnách.

translation.en: Both can affect your mood and overall health and won’t help you in the longterm.
translation.ga: Is féidir leo seo cur as do do ghiúmar agus do shláinte agus ní chabhróidh siad leat sa bhfadtéarma.

translation.en: If you would like help to stop smoking, Freephone 1800 201 203 or visit quit.ie
translation.ga: Má tá cúnamh uait chun stopadh, glaoigh ar Saorghlao 1800 201 203 nó féach ar quit.ie

translation.en: Stay connected and do something you enjoy.
translation.ga: Connigh i dteagmháil le daoine agus déan rudaí a thaitníonn leat.

translation.en: Try to keep a healthy routine, eat well, exercise and get enough sleep.
translation.ga: Cleacht nósanna sláintiúla, ith bia folláin, déan aclaíocht agus codail do dhóthain.

translation.en: Changes that you may have noticed
translation.ga: Athruithe a thug tú faoi deara

translation.en: Over the last few months you may have noticed some of the following changes or difficulties for you or someone you care about:
translation.ga: B’fhéidir gur thug tú cuid de na hathruithe nó deacrachtaí seo faoi deara ionat féin nó i nduine a bhfuil cion agat air nó uirthi le cúpla mí anuas:

translation.en: increased anxiety
translation.ga: níos mó imní

translation.en: feeling stressed
translation.ga: strus

translation.en: finding yourself excessively checking for symptoms, in yourself, or others becoming irritable more easily
translation.ga: ag faire amach do chomharthaí ort féin nó ar dhaoine eile an tam ar fad níos cantalaí

translation.en: feeling insecure or unsettled
translation.ga: éiginnte ionat féin nó míshuaimhneach

translation.en: fearing that normal aches and pains might be the virus
translation.ga: ag ceapadh gur ionann gnáthphianta agus an víreas

translation.en: having trouble sleeping
translation.ga: deacrachtaí codlata

translation.en: feeling helpless or a lack of control
translation.ga: lagmhisneach nó easpa smachta ar do shaol

translation.en: having irrational thoughts
translation.ga: smaointe míreasúnacha

translation.en: Supports are available.
translation.ga: Tá tacaíocht ar fáil.

translation.en: If you need support
translation.ga: Má tá cúnamh uait

translation.en: GPs are available and can help if you are experiencing mental health problems.
translation.ga: Tá dochtúirí teaghlaigh ar fáil chun cabhrú le aon fhadhb meabhairshláinte atá agat.

translation.en: You can phone to make an appointment and they can arrange a phone or video consultation if that suits you better.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat glaoch orthu chun coinne a shocrú agus beidh siad in ann comhairle a chur ort ar an bhfón nó ar fhíschomhdháil más fearr leat.

translation.en: Mental health helplines, including the Samaritans, can be a support through crisis or distress.
translation.ga: Má tú i gcruachás nó in anacair beidh tú in ann cabhair a fháil ó línte cabhrach meabhairshláinte, m.sh. na Samáraigh.

translation.en: You can call the Samaritans on 116 123 and calls are free from landline phone or mobile.
translation.ga: Is féidir glaoch fóin saor in aisce a chur ar na Samáraigh ag 116 123.

translation.en: Text support services are also an option.
translation.ga: Tá seirbhísí tacaíochta téacs ar fáil freisin.

translation.en: You can text HELLO to 50808 for a calming chat and immediate support if you are going through a mental health or emotional crisis.
translation.ga: Is féidir HELLO a sheoladh chuig 50808 chun comhrá suaimhneasach agus tacaíochta a fháil láithreach, má tá géarchéim meabhairshláinte nó mothúchánach agat.

translation.en: This is a HSE funded service.
translation.ga: Tá an tseirbhís seo á maoiniú ag FnaSS.

translation.en: For more information on mental health and services, please visit the HSE website yourmentalhealth.ie or call the Your Mental Health Information Line on 1800 111 888.
translation.ga: Chun breis eolais a fháil faoi na seirbhisí meabhairshláinte, féach ar shuíomh gréasáin FnaSS hse.ie nó cuir glaoch ar an Líne Eolais Meabhairshláinte ag 1800 111 888.

translation.en: Suicidal thoughts and feelings can sometimes be part of a mental health crisis.
translation.ga: Uaireanta is féidir le smaointe agus mothúcháin féinmharaithe a bheith mar chuid de ghéarchéim meabhairshláinte.

translation.en: Please remember that if you are in crisis or feeling suicidal, or if you know someone who is at immediate risk of harm, you can call the emergency services on 112 or 999 for help.
translation.ga: Cuimhnigh, le do thoil, má tá tú i gcruachás mar seo nó réidh le lámh a chur i do bhás féin, nó má tá aithne agat ar dhuine atá i mbaol den chineál seo, is féidir leat glaoch ar na seirbhísí éigeandála ar 112 nó 999 chun cabhair a fháil.

translation.en: General health checks and essentials
translation.ga: Gnáthsheiceálacha sláinte agus nithe riachtanacha

translation.en: Flu vaccine
translation.ga: Vacsaín an fhliú

translation.en: Flu season lasts from October to April.
translation.ga: Maireann séasúr an fhliú ó Dheireadh Fómhair go hAibreáin.

translation.en: Flu can cause serious illness for some people.
translation.ga: Bíonn cuid de na daoine antinn leis an bhfliú.

translation.en: The flu vaccine is available free of charge from GPs and pharmacists for people who are at risk of complications from the flu.
translation.ga: Tá vacsaín an fhliú ar fáil saor in aisce ó dhochtúirí teaghlaigh agus cógaiseoirí do dhaoine atá i mbaol ón bhfliú.

translation.en: This includes adults aged 65 and over, anyone who is pregnant, those with a longterm illness, and for the first time children aged 2 to age 12.
translation.ga: Áirítear anseo daoine fásta os cionn 65 bliana d’aois; duine ar bith atá ag iompar clainne, iad siúd a bhfuil tinneas fadtéarmach orthu, agus (don chéad uair) leanaí 2 go 12 bliana d’aois.

translation.en: Regular and routine health checks
translation.ga: Gnáthsheiceálacha rialta sláinte

translation.en: If you have a longterm health condition like diabetes, epilepsy, or high blood pressure think about any health checks that you might need to have over the coming months.
translation.ga: Má tá tinneas fadtéarmach ar nós diaibéiteas, titeamas nó brú fola ard ort ba chóir duit smaoineamh ar na seiceálacha sláinte a bheidh le déanamh agat sna míonna atá romhainn.

translation.en: Contact your GP to arrange a suitable and safe consultation time.
translation.ga: Déan teagmháil le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh chun coinne ag am oiriúnach agus sábháilte a shocrú duit.

translation.en: If you need to speak with your GP about any other health concern, please don’t delay.
translation.ga: Ná bí ag moilleadóireacht má bhíonn ort labhairt le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh faoi aon údar imní sláinte atá agat.

translation.en: GPs, hospitals and other health services are open and ready to take care of you.
translation.ga: Tá dochtúirí teaghlaigh, ospidéil agus seirbhísí sláinte eile oscailte agus réidh le freastal ort.

translation.en: Most GPs now offer phone or video consultations.
translation.ga: Tá comhairle ar fáil ó fhormhór na ndochtúirí ar an bhfón nó le físchomhdháil agus ní gá duit an teach a fhágáil chun labhairt leo.

translation.en: This means you can talk to your GP without leaving your home.
translation.ga: Tabhair d’uimhir do chlinic an dochtúra chun gur féidir leat comhairle a fháil ar do fón.

translation.en: For a phone consultation, you just need to give your phone number to the surgery.
translation.ga: Beidh fóin cliste agus nasc idirlín ar féidir brath air agus ceamara gréasáin uait chun físchomhdháil a bheith agat le do dhochtúir.

translation.en: For a video consultation, you will need a smartphone or computer with a reliable internet connection and webcam.
translation.ga: Ná téigh chuig clinic do dhochtúra má tá aon chomhartha COVID19 ort.

translation.en: Please remember that if you have any symptoms of COVID19, you should not go to your GP surgery.
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh chun comhairle a fháil.

translation.en: Phone your GP for advice instead.
translation.ga: Ag freastal ar choinní sláinte

translation.en: Attending healthcare appointments
translation.ga: Ní bheidh comhairle fóin nó físeáin oiriúnach i gcásanna leighis áirithe.

translation.en: There may be some health concerns where a phone or video consultation won’t be suitable.
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil d’fhéadfadh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh moladh duit teacht isteach sa chlinic.

translation.en: In this case, there are a few things to remember:
translation.ga: Má tharlaíonn sé seo cuimhnigh ar na nithe seo:

translation.en: Arrive at the time of your appointment.
translation.ga: Tar ag an am atá socraithe.

translation.en: If you arrive early, you may be asked to wait in another area or in your car if you travelled that way.
translation.ga: Má thagann tú róluath d’fhéadfaí iarraidh ort fanacht áit éigin eile nó sa charr inar tháinig tú.

translation.en: This is to help maintain social distancing within the clinic.
translation.ga: Déantar é seo ar mhaithe le scaradh sóisialta sa gclinic.

translation.en: Wear a face mask and use the hand sanitiser which is available in the clinic.
translation.ga: Caith clúdach aghaidhe agus úsáid an díghalrán lámh sa gclinic.

translation.en: f the clinic has specific ‘entry’ and ‘exit’ doors, use these.
translation.ga: Má tá doirse ar leith ann le dul isteach agus dul amach as an gclinic úsáid iad.

translation.en: This will help to reduce the number of people you come into contact with.
translation.ga: Ní bhuailfidh tú leis an oiread céanna daoine dá bharr.

translation.en: Go into the clinic on your own, unless you need to have someone with you.
translation.ga: Téigh isteach sa gclinic leat féin mura gcaithfidh tú duine eile a bheith in éineacht leat.

translation.en: A parent or guardian can accompany a child to their appointment.
translation.ga: Is féidir le duine fásta nó caomhnóir dul isteach chuig an gcoinne le páiste.

translation.en: Antibiotics do not work for viral infections such as COVID19, colds and flu.
translation.ga: Ní oibríonn antaibheathaigh i gcoinne ionfhabhtuithe víreasacha ar nós COVID19, slaghdáin nó fliú.

translation.en: Antibiotics and other medicines
translation.ga: Antaibheathaigh agus cógais eile

translation.en: COVID19 Information
translation.ga: Eolas faoi COVID19

translation.en: How to prevent the spread
translation.ga: Conas srian a chur leis

translation.en: Antibiotics are medicines used to treat infections caused by bacteria.
translation.ga: Baintear úsáid as antaibheathaigh chun cóir leighis a chur ar ionfhabhtuithe baictéarach.

translation.en: You may need antibiotics if you have a bacterial infection that is unlikely to go away without them.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh antaibheathaigh a bheith ag teastáil uait má tá ionfhabhtú baictéarach ort nach nimeoidh gan iad.

translation.en: Antibiotics do not work for viral infections such as COVID19, colds and flu, and most coughs and sore throats.
translation.ga: Ní oibríonn antaibheathaigh in aghaidh ionfhabhtuithe víreasacha ar nós COVID19, slaghdáin ná fliú, ná furmhór na gcásanna casachta nó scornach tinn.

translation.en: Taking antibiotics when we don’t need them puts us at risk of harm such as skin rash, diarrhoea and other side effects.
translation.ga: Nuair a thógann muid antaibheathaigh nuair nach bhfuil siad de dhíth orainn, d’fhéadfaí díobháil a dhéanamh dár gcorp, ar nós, gríos ar an gcraiceann, buinneach agus iarmhairtí eile.

translation.en: Tell your GP if you are prescribed antibiotics and are taking other medication.
translation.ga: Inis do do dhochtúir má tá antaibheathaigh ar oideas agat agus má tá tú ag tógáil cógais eile.

translation.en: Some antibiotics don’t mix well with other medicines.
translation.ga: Ní oibríonn roinnt antaibheathaigh go maith le cógais eile.

translation.en: Your doctor may not know all the medicines that you are taking as they may have been prescribed by different doctors.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir nach bhfuil a fhios ag do dhochtúir cad iad na cógais go léir atá á dtógáil agat de bhrí gur ordaigh dochtúirí eile iad.

translation.en: Ask your GP or pharmacist if the antibiotic is safe to take with your other medicine.
translation.ga: Fiafraigh de do dhochtúir nó cógaiseoir an bhfuil sé sábháilte an tantaibheathach a thógáil le do chógas eile.

translation.en: Prescriptions
translation.ga: Oidis

translation.en: If you are on regular medication for a health condition, keep a list of your medicines in a safe place.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag togáil cógais go rialta le haghaidh tinneas atá ort, coinnigh liosta de do chógais in áit shábháilte.

translation.en: This is really helpful if you need to go to the doctor or to the pharmacist.
translation.ga: Cabhróidh sé seo leat má bhíonn ort dul chuig an dochtúir nó an chógaslann.

translation.en: There is space in this booklet to keep your list, see page 19, or you can just keep it on a piece of paper at home.
translation.ga: Tá áit sa leabhrán seo chun an liosta a choinneáil ann, féach lth 19, nó is féidir leat é a bhreacadh síos ar phíosa páipéir.

translation.en: If you have a mobile phone, take and keep a photo of your list.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfá pictiúir a thógáil den liosta agus é a choinneáil ar d’fhón.

translation.en: You don’t have to go to your GP in order to get a repeat prescription.
translation.ga: Ní gá duit dul chuig do dhochtúir teaghlaigh chun athoideas a fháil.

translation.en: You can phone and tell them what you need.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat glaoch a chur ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh chun é a fháil.

translation.en: They can arrange to send the prescription to your local pharmacy for you.
translation.ga: Beidh siad in ann an toideas a sheoladh chuig do chógaslann áitiúil.

translation.en: You or someone you trust can collect it from there.
translation.ga: Tig leatsa nó le duine iontaofa é a bháiliú ansin.

translation.en: Medical cards and GP visit cards
translation.ga: Cartaí leighis agus cártaí cuairte dochtúra

translation.en: For information about medical cards and other health payment supports, search online for ‘HSE schemes and allowances’.
translation.ga: Chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil faoi chártaí leighis agus tacaíochtaí eile féach ar líne ar ‘HSE schemes and allowances’.

translation.en: Distance yourself at least 2 metres (6 feet) away from other people, especially those who might be unwell
translation.ga: Fan amach 2 mhéadar (6 troithe) ó dhaoine eile agus ó dhaoine atá tinn ach go háirithe

translation.en: Wear a face covering at all times when shopping, on public transport, in a healthcare setting and when in close contact with people
translation.ga: Caith clúdach aghaidhe i gcónaí nuair a bhíonn tú ag siopadóireacht nó ar iompar poiblí, in ionaid sláinte nó má bhíonn tú i ngartheagmháil le daoine

translation.en: Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces
translation.ga: Glan agus díghalraigh aon rud nó dromchla a leagan tú lámh orthu go minic

translation.en: Minimise the number of people in your social network
translation.ga: Gearr siar ar an líon daoine a gcasann tú leo

translation.en: Avoid crowds and crowded places
translation.ga: Seachain sluaite agus áiteanna plódaithe

translation.en: Don’t share food or other items such as mugs or glasses
translation.ga: Ná roinn bia nó rudaí eile ar nós mugaí nó gloiní

translation.en: Wash your hands well and often to avoid contamination
translation.ga: Nigh do lámha i gceart agus go minic chun éilliú a sheachaint

translation.en: Don’t shake hands or hug when saying hello or greeting other people
translation.ga: Ná croith lámha nó ná tabhair croí isteach do dhaoine nuair a bhuaileann tú leo

translation.en: Know the symptoms.
translation.ga: Bí ar an eolas faoi na comharthaí.

translation.en: If you have them self isolate and contact your GP immediately
translation.ga: Má bhíonn comharthaí ort fan asat féin agus glaoigh ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh

translation.en: Cover your mouth and nose with a tissue or sleeve when coughing or sneezing and discard used tissue safely
translation.ga: Clúdaigh do bhéal agus do shrón le ciarsúr nó le do mhuinchille, nuair a bhíonn tú ag casacht agus ag sraothartaigh, agus cuir an ciarsúr i mbosca bruscair

translation.en: Avoid touching eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands
translation.ga: Ná cuir do lámha in aice le do shúile, srón nó béal mura bhfuil siad glan

translation.en: Download the COVID tracker app
translation.ga: Íoslódáil an aip rianaire teagmhála COVID

translation.en: COVID19 Symptoms and what to do if you’re sick
translation.ga: Covid19 Comharthaí agus cad ba chóir duit a dhéanamh má thagann comharthaí ort

translation.en: It can take up to 14 days for symptoms to appear.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh sé nach mbeadh aon chomhartha ort go ceann 14 lá.

translation.en: The most common symptoms are:
translation.ga: Is iad na comharthaí is coitianta ná:

translation.en: Free HSE COVID19 testing
translation.ga: Tástáil COVID19 saor in aisce

translation.en: You will be referred for a free COVID19 test if you have symptoms and, following a phone consultation, your GP advises that you need a test.
translation.ga: Cuirfear le haghaidh tástáil tú má bhíonn comharthaí ort agus má mholann do dhochtúir teaghlaigh duit an tástáil COVID19 a dhéanamh tar éis plé ar an bhfón.

translation.en: If you have been in close contact with someone who has tested positive for the virus, the HSE public health tracing team might contact you and arrange for you to be tested.
translation.ga: Má bhí tú i do ghartheagmhálaí ag duine a fuair toradh dhearfach ar thástáil, d’fhéadfadh foireann rianaithe teagmhála FnaSS coinne tástála a shocrú duit.

translation.en: Keep your phone close to you and make sure it is switched on.
translation.ga: Coinnigh d’fhón in aice leat agus ná cas as é.

translation.en: You will find more detailed information on testing on the HSE website, search for ‘HSE COVID testing’.
translation.ga: Gheobhaidh tú níos mo eolais ar shuíomh FnaSS ‘HSE COVID testing’.

translation.en: Or you can Freephone HSELive on 1850 24 1850 for information.
translation.ga: Nó is féidir glaoch saor in aisce a chur ar HSELive ar 1850 24 1850.

translation.en: Cough
translation.ga: Casacht

translation.en: This can be any kind of cough, usually dry but not always
translation.ga: Aon saghas casacht, ní gá go mbeadh sé tirim

translation.en: Sudden loss of smell
translation.ga: Boladh caillte

translation.en: Fever
translation.ga: Fiabhras

translation.en: High temperature over 38 degrees celsius
translation.ga: Teocht ard 38 céim Celsius nó níos mó

translation.en: Sudden loss of taste
translation.ga: Blas caillte

translation.en: Shortness of breath
translation.ga: Giorra anála

translation.en: You may display one, some or all of these symptoms.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh cuid de na comharthaí nó gach comhartha a bheith ort.

translation.en: Breathing difficulties
translation.ga: Deacrachtaí anála

translation.en: Self isolation
translation.ga: Féinaonrú

translation.en: Self isolation means staying indoors and completely avoiding contact with other people, including the people you live with.
translation.ga: Is ionann é agus fanacht sa bhaile an tam ar fad, gan aon teagmháil le daoine eile agus daoine i do theach.

translation.en: If you live with other people, stay on your own in a room with a window that you can open for fresh air, if possible.
translation.ga: Má tá cónaí ort le daoine eile, fan leat féin i do sheomra agus oscail an fhuinneog más féidir.

translation.en: If you develop symptoms, you should selfisolate to protect other people, and phone your GP.
translation.ga: Ba chóir duit féinaonrú chun daoine eile a chosaint má thagann comharthaí ort agus glaoch a chur ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh.

translation.en: See the next pages for information on self isolating.
translation.ga: Féach ar an eolas maidir le féin aonrú ar na chéad leathanaigh eile.

translation.en: Other people you live with will need to restrict their movements
translation.ga: Beidh ar na daoine eile a gcónaíonn tú leo srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí

translation.en: Your GP consultation is free of charge if you have any of these symptoms.
translation.ga: Glaoigh ar do dhochtúr teaghlaigh chun comhairle COVID19 saor in aisce a fháil má bhíonn aon cheann de na comharthaí seo ort.

translation.en: Please phone your GP and do not go to your GP surgery, because if you do have the virus you could pass it on to someone else.
translation.ga: Ná téigh go dtí clinic do dhochtúra mar d’fhéadfá an víreas a thabhairt do dhaoine eile.

translation.en: Your GP will advise over the phone if you need to have a test.
translation.ga: Cuirfidh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh comhairle ort faoi thástáil, má bhíonn gá leis.

translation.en: If you need a test, it is also free of charge.
translation.ga: Tá an tástáil seo saor in aisce.

translation.en: You have to self isolate when there is a high risk that you could spread the virus to other people.
translation.ga: Beidh ort fanacht asat féin má tá baol ann go bhféadfá an víreas a scaipeadh ar dhaoine eile.

translation.en: Self isolate:
translation.ga: Fan asat féin:

translation.en: if you have symptoms of COVID19
translation.ga: má tá comharthaí tinnis COVID19 ort

translation.en: while you wait for a test appointment and your test results, if you have symptoms of COVID19.
translation.ga: má tá tú ag fanacht ar choinne tástála nó ar do thorthaí tástála, de bharr go bhfuil comharthaí COVID19 ort.

translation.en: If you are being tested as a close contact and you don’t have any symptoms, you should restrict your movements instead (see next page)
translation.ga: Má táthar do do thástáil mar ghartheagmhálaí agus mura bhfuil aon chomhartha ort ba chóir duit srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí

translation.en: if you have had a positive test result for COVID19, even if you have mild symptoms or no symptoms
translation.ga: má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach ar an tástáil, fiú mura bhfuil ort ach comharthaí tinnis éadroma nó mura bhfuil aon chomhartha tinnis ort

translation.en: People in your household will need to restrict their movements (stay at home) for 14 days.
translation.ga: Ní mhór do dhaoine atá ina gcónaí leat srian a chur ar a gcuid gluaiseachtaí (fanacht sa bhaile) ar feadh 14 lá,

translation.en: This is because it can take up to two weeks for symptoms of COVID19 to show.
translation.ga: de bhrí go bhféadfadh sé nach bhfeicfí comharthaí COVID19 go ceann coicíse.

translation.en: When you can stop self isolation:
translation.ga: Cén uair ar féidir leat éirí as féinaonrú

translation.en: Most people can stop self isolating when both of these apply:
translation.ga: Is féidir le formhór na ndaoine stopadh den fhéinaonrú sa dá chás a leanas:

translation.en: you have had no fever for five days
translation.ga: mura raibh aon fhiabhras ort le 5 lá

translation.en: it has been ten days since you first developed symptoms
translation.ga: má tá sé 10 lá ó fuair tú do chéad chomharthaí tinnis

translation.en: If you tested positive because you are a close contact, you may have no symptoms.
translation.ga: Má bhí toradh dearfach agat ar do thástáil de bharr gur gartheagmhalaí tú, d’fhéadfadh sé nach mbeadh comharthaí tinnis ort.

translation.en: In this case, you can stop selfisolating ten days from the date of your test.
translation.ga: Sa chás seo is féidir leat stopadh den fhéinaonrú 10 lá ó dháta do thástála.

translation.en: Restricted movements
translation.ga: Srian ar ghluaiseachtaí

translation.en: Restricting your movements means staying at home to avoid contact with other people.
translation.ga: Is ionann é agus fanacht sa bhaile i gcónaí, gan aon teagmháil le daoine eile.

translation.en: Restricting your movements helps to stop the spread of COVID19.
translation.ga: Déantar é seo chun stop a chur le scaipeadh COVID19.

translation.en: You can still go outside to exercise by yourself as long as you keep 2 metres away from other people.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú dul amach faoin aer chun freastal ar choinne leighis nó chun aclaíocht a dhéanamh i d’aonar ach fan amach 2 mhéadar ó dhaoine eile.

translation.en: Restrict your movements for 14 days if you:
translation.ga: Cuir srian ar do ghluaiseachtaí ar feadh 14 lá:

translation.en: are a close contact of a confirmed case of COVID19
translation.ga: má bhí tú i ngartheagmháil le duine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil COVID19

translation.en: live with someone who has symptoms of COVID19 but you feel well
translation.ga: má tá tú i do chónaí le duine a bhfuil comharthaí COVID19 air nó uirthi cé go nairíonn tú go maith

translation.en: arrive in Ireland from a country that is not on the green list
translation.ga: má thagann tú go hÉirinn ó thír nach bhfuil ar an liosta glas

translation.en: If you are caring for someone who cannot self isolate you should restrict your movements for 17 days.
translation.ga: Má tá tú ag tabhairt aire do dhuine nach bhfuil in ann fanacht as féin, ba chóir duit srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí ar feadh 17 lá.

translation.en: Restrict your movements for 14 days if you are a close contact of a person who tested positive for COVID19.
translation.ga: Más gartheagmhálaí tú le duine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil COVID19 beidh ort srian a chur le do ghluaiseachtaí ar feadh 14 lá.

translation.en: Do this from when you were last in contact with that person.
translation.ga: Déan é seo ón dáta a raibh an teagmháil dheiridh agat leis an duine sin.

translation.en: You must do this even if your test comes back negative.
translation.ga: Beidh ort é seo a dhéanamh fiú má fhaigheann tú toradh diúltach

translation.en: This is because it can take up to 14 days for the virus to show up in your system after you have been exposed to it.
translation.ga: de bhrí go bhféadfadh sé nach bhfeicfí an víreas i do chóras go ceann 14 lá ó bhí tú i dteagmháil leis an duine sin.

translation.en: For more detailed information, please visit hse.ie/coronavirus or call HSELive
translation.ga: Le haghaidh tuilleadh eolais faoin tástáil féach ar hse.ie/coronavirus nó glaoigh ar HSELive

translation.en: Self isolation means staying indoors and completely avoiding contact with other people.
translation.ga: Is ionann féinaonrú agus fanacht istigh an tam ar fad gan aon teagmháil le daoine eile.

translation.en: COVID19, colds, flu: What’s the difference?
translation.ga: COVID19, slaghdáin, fliú: cén difríocht atá eatarthu?

translation.en: Colds, coughs and flu are common in winter time.
translation.ga: Bíonn slaghdáin, casacht agus fliú ar dhaoine go minic sa gheimhreadh.

translation.en: Flu season generally lasts from October to April.
translation.ga: Maireann séasúr an fhliú ó Dheireadh Fómhair go hAibreáin.

translation.en: This year, we should all make a particular effort to avoid getting coughs, colds and flu.
translation.ga: Caithfidh muid aniarracht a dhéanamh i mbliana gan casacht, slaghdán nó fliú a fháil.

translation.en: We can help to do this by washing hands, keeping social distance, eating a healthy, nutritious diet, and getting regular exercise.
translation.ga: Beidh muid in ann é seo a dhéanamh má ghlanann muid ár lámha, má fhanann muid amach ó dhaoine eile, má itheann muid bia folláin agus má dhéanann muid aclaíocht ar bhonn rialta.

translation.en: If you are at risk of serious complications from the flu you can also get the flu vaccine free of charge from your GP or pharmacist.
translation.ga: Má tá tú i gcontúirt go mbeadh deacrachtaí móra agat de bharr an fhliú, is féidir leat vacsaín an fhliú a fháil saor in aisce ó do dhochtúir teaghlaigh nó do chógaiseoir.

translation.en: You are at higher risk if you are aged 65 or over, if you have a longterm illness, if you are pregnant, and for children aged 2 to 12 years old.
translation.ga: Tá tú i mbaol níos mó má tá tú os cionn 65, má tá tinneas fadtéarmach ort, má tá tú ag súil le páiste nó más páiste tú atá idir 2 bhliain agus 12 bliain d’aois.

translation.en: If someone around you has a cold or flu, try to avoid becoming infected yourself by keeping away from them, and cleaning and disinfecting any shared surfaces or items, such as cutlery.
translation.ga: Fan amach ó dhuine a bhfuil slaghdán nó fliú air nó uirthi chun ionfhabhtú a sheachaint, agus glan agus díghalraigh aon dromhcla nó rudaí ar nós sceanra.

translation.en: Avoid sharing toothbrushes, food items or drinks with other people in your home.
translation.ga: Ná roinn do scuab fiacla, bia nó deochanna le daoine eile i do theach.

translation.en: The actions we take to protect ourselves and others from COVID19 (hand washing, washing and disinfecting surfaces regularly, cough and sneeze etiquette) will also help to protect us from colds and flu.
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh na rudaí a dhéanann muid le muid féin agus daoine eile a chosaint i gcoinne COVID19 (níochán lámha, glanadh agus ag díghalrú dromchlaí go rialta, ag casacht agus sraothartach ar bhealach sábhailte) cosaint dúinn freisin i gcoinne slaghdáin agus an fliú.

translation.en: Helpful resources
translation.ga: Acmhainní cabhracha

translation.en: Get outside every day, if it is safe to do so and I am well enough.
translation.ga: Dul amach gach lá má tá sé sábháilte agus má airím sách maith.

translation.en: Stick to a regular healthy routine of diet, exercise and sleep and eat lots of fruit and vegetables.
translation.ga: Bia folláin a ithe, aclaíocht a dhéanamh agus codladh ceart a fháil agus neart torthaí agus glasraí a ithe.

translation.en: Get a good night’s sleep.
translation.ga: Codladh ceart a fháil.

translation.en: Connect with at least one family member, friend or neighbour every day, if possible.
translation.ga: Labhair le duine eile sa gclann, le cara nó comharsa gach lá más féidir.

translation.en: Have a list of medicines and my Eircode in a very handy place, in case I need them.
translation.ga: Coinnigh liosta de mo chógais agus m’éirchód in áit áisiúl ar eagla go mbeadh siad ag teastáil uaim.

translation.en: Find something that I enjoy, watching tv, reading a book, doing some art, cooking, knitting or sewing, listening to audiobooks or podcasts.
translation.ga: Rudaí a thaitníonn liom a dhéanamh ar nós féachaint ar an teilifís, leabhar a léamh, ealaín, cócaireacht, cniotáil nó fuáil, éisteacht le closleabhar nó podchraoladh.

translation.en: Notice and acknowledge good things that happen each day, write them down if it helps.
translation.ga: Suntas a thabhairt do na rudaí maithe a tharlaíonn gach lá agus iad a scríobh síos má chabhraíonn sé sin liom.

translation.en: My contacts
translation.ga: Mo theagmhálacha

translation.en: My family and friends
translation.ga: Mo chlann agus mo chairde

translation.en: My list of medicines
translation.ga: Mo liosta cógais

translation.en: Medicine Dosage How often
translation.ga: Cógais Dáileog Cé chomh minic

translation.en: My GP and pharmacy
translation.ga: Mo dhochtúir teaghlaigh agus mo chógaiseoir

translation.en: ﻿COVID Tracker app Help us reduce the spread of COVID19 in Ireland
translation.ga: ﻿COVID Tracker app Cuidigh linn srian a chur le scaipeadh COVID19 in Éirinn

translation.en: The HSE has made a free smartphone app that helps improve contact tracing for COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá aip fón saor in aisce déanta ag FSS a chuidíonn le rianú teagmhála do COVID19.

translation.en: If you use the app, you can help protect people you come into contact with and reduce the spread of coronavirus.
translation.ga: Má úsáideann tú an aip, is féidir leat daoine a dtagann tú i dteagmháil leo a chosaint agus srian a chur le scaipeadh an choróinvíris.

translation.en: The app protects your privacy and you keep control of your information.
translation.ga: Cosnaíonn an aip do phríobháideacht agus is agat féin amháin a bheidh aon eolas a chuireann tú ar an aip.

translation.en: What is an app?
translation.ga: Cad is aip ann?

translation.en: An app or application allows a mobile phone to do certain tasks.
translation.ga: Ligeann aip nó feidhmchlár d’fhón póca tascanna áirithe a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Apps on your phone might include Facebook, Instagram or WhatsApp.
translation.ga: Is aipeanna iad Facebook, Instagram agus WhatsApp.

translation.en: If you use the app, you can:
translation.ga: Má úsáideann tú an aip, is féidir leat:

translation.en: get an alert if you have been in close contact with someone who tests positive for COVID19
translation.ga: foláireamh a fháil má bhí tú i ndlúth theagmháil le duine a fuair toradh dearfach ar thástáil do COVID19

translation.en: alert others if you test positive for coronavirus – this will help keep other people safe
translation.ga: foláireamh a thabhairt do dhaoine eile má fuair tú toradh dearfach ar thástáil don choróinvíreas – cuideoidh sé seo chun daoine eile a choinneáil slán

translation.en: track your symptoms and get advice on what to do if you’re sick
translation.ga: do chuid comharthaí a rianú agus comhairle a fháil maidir le céard ba cheart a dhéanamh má tá tú tinn

translation.en: get regular updates, and protect yourself and others as we learn to live with COVID19
translation.ga: uasdátú a fháil go rialta, agus tú féin agus daoine eile a chosaint agus muid ag foghlaim le maireachtáil le COVID19

translation.en: What does the COVID Tracker app do?
translation.ga: Cad a dhéanann an aip Rianaithe COVID?

translation.en: Contact tracing
translation.ga: Rianú teagmhálaithe

translation.en: It helps speed up contact tracing and reach more people with the right advice.
translation.ga: Cuidíonn sé le rianú teagmhála a bhrostú agus comhairle cheart a chur ar níos mó daoine.

translation.en: When someone tests positive for COVID19, HSE contact tracing teams identify their close contacts.
translation.ga: Nuair a fhaigheann duine toradh dearfach do COVID19, bíonn foirne rianaithe teagmhála FSS ábalta iad siúd a bhí i ndlúth theagmháil leis an duine sin a aimsiú.

translation.en: This could be family, friends or others that you have spent time with.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh sé gur teaghlaigh, cairde nó daoine eile ar chaith an duine am leo a bheadh i gceist.

translation.en: The contact tracing team tells these close contacts what to do and advises on testing for COVID19.
translation.ga: Déarfaidh an fhoireann rianaithe teagmhála leis na dlúththeagmhálaithe seo cad ba chóir dóibh a dhéanamh agus tabharfar comhairle maidir le tástáil don COVID19.

translation.en: The app helps to find close contacts you might have forgotten, or who are unknown to you.
translation.ga: Fiú má dhéanann tusa dearmad ar aon dhlúththeagmhálaí, nó nach bhfuil aithne agat orthu, cuideoidh an aip chun iad seo a aimsiú.

translation.en: The app does this while protecting your privacy.
translation.ga: Déantar é seo ach coinnítear do phríobháideacht slán ag an am céanna.

translation.en: COVID CheckIn
translation.ga: Seiceáil Isteach COVID

translation.en: You can use the app to record any symptoms you have of COVID19 and get advice on what to do.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an aip a úsáid chun aon chomharthaí de COVID19 atá ort a thaifeadadh agus comhairle a fháil faoi cad atá le déanamh.

translation.en: This information is anonymous and will be used to help us understand how COVID19 is spreading and affecting people in Ireland.
translation.ga: Bíonn an teolas seo gan ainm agus úsáidfear é chun cabhrú linn tuiscint a fháil ar an gcaoi a bhfuil COVID19 ag scaipeadh agus ag dul i bhfeidhm ar dhaoine in Éirinn.

translation.en: Updates on COVID19
translation.ga: Uasdátú maidir le COVID19

translation.en: App users will have access to the latest information about COVID19 in Ireland.
translation.ga: Beidh úsáideoirí na haipe ábalta teacht ar an eolas is déanaí faoi COVID19 in Éirinn.

translation.en: How will you protect my privacy?
translation.ga: Conas a chosnófar mo phríobháideacht?

translation.en: The app exchanges secure, anonymous records when people using the app are in close contact with each other.
translation.ga: Malartaíonn an aip taifid shlán, anaithnid nuair a bhíonn daoine a úsáideann an aip i ndlúththeagmháil lena chéile.

translation.en: The app will never identify you to other app users and you cannot access each other’s information.
translation.ga: Ní roinnfidh an aip aon eolas fút le húsáideoirí eile choíche, agus ní bheidh teacht ag úsáideoirí ar aon eolas faoina chéile.

translation.en: The app does not collect your name, location or movements.
translation.ga: Ní bhíonn d’ainm, d’áit ná do ghluaiseachtaí ar an aip.

translation.en: Your records are collected anonymously and stored on your mobile phone.
translation.ga: Bíonn do thaifid gan ainm agus stóráiltear iad ar d’fhón póca.

translation.en: If you test positive for COVID19, you can choose to upload your records to anonymously alert your close contacts.
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann tú toradh dearfach ar thástáil do COVID19, is féidir leat do thaifid a uaslódáil chun foláireamh anaithnid a thabhairt do do dhlúth theagmhálaithe.

translation.en: You can choose to put your mobile phone number into the app.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh tú d’uimhir fón póca a chur san aip.

translation.en: The contact tracing team will call you, if you receive a close contact alert, to give you advice and arrange a test, if needed.
translation.ga: Glaofaidh an fhoireann rianaithe teagmhála ort, má fhaigheann tú foláireamh dlúththeagmhála chun comhairle a thabhairt duit agus tástáil a shocrú, más gá.

translation.en: If you choose to use the COVID CheckIn function to record any symptoms you have, you can share your town or county, age group and sex, to help the HSE understand the spread of COVID19 in Ireland.
translation.ga: Má roghnaíonn tú feidhm Seiceála Isteach COVID a úsáid chun aon chomharthaí atá ort a thaifeadadh, féadfaidh tú an baile nó an contae ina bhfuil tú i do chónaí, d’aoisghrúpa agus d’inscne a roinnt, chun cabhrú le FSS scaipeadh COVID19 in Éirinn a thuiscint.

translation.en: How do I download the COVID Tracker app?
translation.ga: Conas is féidir liom an aip Rianaithe COVID a íoslódáil?

translation.en: There are two ways to download the app.
translation.ga: Tá dhá bhealach ann chun an aip a íoslódáil.

translation.en: Go to www.covidtracker.ie on your phone and follow the steps on the page.
translation.ga: Téigh chuig www.covidtracker.ie ar do ghuthán agus lean na céimeanna ar an leathanach.

translation.en: Go to the Google Play Store or Apple App Store on your mobile phone.
translation.ga: Téigh go dtí an Google Play Store nó Apple App Store ar d’fhón póca.

translation.en: Search ‘COVID Tracker Ireland’ and click ‘Install’ or ‘Get’.
translation.ga: Cuardaigh ‘COVID Tracker Ireland’ agus cliceáil ‘Install’ nó ‘Get’.

translation.en: When you do this, the COVID Tracker yellow icon will appear on your phone screen.
translation.ga: Nuair a dhéanann tú é seo, beidh deilbhín buí COVID tracker le feiceáil ar scáileán do ghutháin.

translation.en: Follow the steps in the app to set it up.
translation.ga: Lean na céimeanna san aip chun é a chur ar siúl.

translation.en: Can I delete the COVID Tracker app from my phone?
translation.ga: An féidir liom an aip COVID Tracker a scriosadh de mo ghuthán?

translation.en: You can uninstall the app at any time.
translation.ga: Is féidir leat an aip a dhíshuiteáil ag am ar bith.

translation.en: This will delete the data that the app has stored on your phone.
translation.ga: Scriosfaidh sé seo na sonraí atá stóráilte ag an aip ar do fón.

translation.en: The data that you have shared with other phones will also be deleted.
translation.ga: Scriosfar na sonraí a roinn tú le fóin eile freisin.

translation.en: Stopping the spread of COVID19
translation.ga: Stop a chur le scaipeadh COVID19

translation.en: The app will help us to track and stop the spread of COVID19 as we continue to reopen services and communities.
translation.ga: Cuideoidh an aip linn scaipeadh COVID19 a rianú agus a stopadh agus muid ag athoscailt seirbhísí agus pobail.

translation.en: It goes hand in hand with the other important steps we can all take.
translation.ga: Úsáidfear an aip i dteannta na gcéimeanna tábhachtacha eile ar féidir linn go léir a ghlacadh.

translation.en: Everyone should continue to:
translation.ga: Ba chóir do gach duine leanúint ar aghaidh ag:

translation.en: wash hands regularly
translation.ga: ní a lámha go rialta

translation.en: cover coughs and sneezes
translation.ga: clúdach casacht agus sraothartach

translation.en: practice social distancing
translation.ga: cleachtadh scaradh sóisialta

translation.en: wear face coverings in shops, public transport and other places difficult to keep our distance
translation.ga: ag caitheamh clúdach aghaidhe i siopaí, iompar poiblí agus áiteanna eile a mbíonn sé deacair coinneáil amach ó dhaoine eile

translation.en: We have all helped to reduce the spread of COVID19 in Ireland.
translation.ga: Chabhraíomar go léir le srian a chur le scaipeadh COVID19 in Éirinn.

translation.en: The more people who download and use the app, the more it will help to reduce the spread of COVID19.
translation.ga: Dá mhéad daoine a íoslódálann agus a úsáideann an aip, is amhlaidh is mó a chabhróidh sé le srian a chur le scaipeadh COVID19.

translation.en: Download the app today and help us to quickly trace and help those with COVID19.
translation.ga: Íoslódáil an aip inniu agus cuidigh linn iad siúd a bhfuil COVID19 orthu a aimsiú agus cabhrú leo go tapa.

translation.en: For more information, go to covidtracker.ie
translation.ga: Le haghaidh tuilleadh faisnéise, téigh chuig covidtracker.ie

translation.en: Stay safe.
translation.ga: Bí sábháilte.

translation.en: Protect each other.
translation.ga: Coinnigí a chéile slán.

translation.en: ﻿Updated FAQs for School Principals or Designated Contact Person
translation.ga: ﻿Nuashonrú ar Cheisteanna Coitianta le haghaidh Príomhoidí Scoileanna nó Duine Teagmhála Ainmnithe

translation.en: This leaflet was developed for school principals or designated contact person by the HSE in collaboration with the Department of Education.
translation.ga: Ba í FSS a rinne an bhileog seo a fhorbairt do phríomhoidí scoile nó do dhuine teagmhála ainmnithe i gcomhar leis an Roinn Oideachais.

translation.en: New or significantly changed information:
translation.ga: Eolas úrnua nó a bhfuil athrú suntasach i gceist leis:

translation.en: Close contact testing:
translation.ga: Tástáil na ndlúththeagmhálaithe:

translation.en: What is the period of restricted movements required of a pupil/student or staff member deemed to be a “close contact”?
translation.ga: Cad í an tréimhse gluaiseachtaí srianta nach mór do dhalta/scoláire nó ball foirne a mheastar a bheith mar “dhlúththeagmhálaí” cloí léi?

translation.en: Pupils/students will be asked to restrict their movements.
translation.ga: Iarrfar ar dhaltaí/ar scoláirí srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí.

translation.en: In line with national recommendations for close contacts, testing is offered at Day 0 and Day 10.
translation.ga: De réir na moltaí náisiúnta i dtaca le dlúththeagmhálaithe, tairgtear an tástáil ar Lá 0 agus Lá 10.

translation.en: If a close contact received a ‘not detected’ result from both tests, then they can end their restricted movements and return to school.
translation.ga: Má fuair dlúththeagmhálaí amháin toradh ‘neamhbhraite’ ón dá thástáil, is féidir leo deireadh a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí srianta agus filleadh ar an scoil.

translation.en: If they have a ‘detected’ test result, they will then be managed as a case of COVID19.
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann siad toradh tástála ‘braite’, déanfar iad a bhainistiú amhail cás na haicíde COVID19.

translation.en: If they do not undertake COVID19 testing, then they are required to restrict their movements for a full 14 days.
translation.ga: Mura dtugann siad faoin tástáil COVID19, cuirtear iallach orthu srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí go cionn 14 lá ar fad.

translation.en: Anyone who is a close contact of a person that tested positive for COVID19 has to restrict their movements and follow the process as above.
translation.ga: Ní foláir do dhuine ar bith ar dlúththeagmhálaí é le duine a fuair toradh deimhneach i leith na haicíde COVID19 srian a chur lena ghluaiseachtaí agus an próiseas a leanúint de mar a leagtar amach thuas.

translation.en: Restricted movements start from the last date they were in contact with a confirmed case of COVID19.
translation.ga: Tosaítear na gluaiseachtaí srianta ón dáta deiridh a rabhadar i dteagmháil le cás deimhnithe na haicíde COVID19.

translation.en: As several close contacts are usually identified in an education setting, the date of D10 testing can change, depending on the results public health receives from everyone’s Day 0 testing.
translation.ga: Toisc gur iondúil go naithnítear roinnt dlúththeagmhálaithe i suíomh oideachais, féadtar dáta na tástála L10 a athrú, ag brath ar thorthaí a fhaigheann an tsláinte phoiblí ó thástálacha an uile dhuine a Lá 0.

translation.en: Often the date of D10 testing will be pushed out.
translation.ga: Is minic go gcuirtear tástáil L10 ar athló.

translation.en: All close contacts will be informed of their new date of D10 testing and prolonged restricted movements, if this is the case.
translation.ga: Cuirfear an uile dhlúththeagmhálaí ar an eolas faoina dháta nua tástála le haghaidh L10 agus faoina ghluaiseachtaí srianta faidréiseach, más amhlaidh atá an cás.

translation.en: A close contact can stop restricting their movement and return to school when both of the following apply:
translation.ga: Is féidir le dlúththeagmhálaí amháin deireadh a chur lena shrianta ar ghluaiseacht agus filleadh ar an scoil más fíor do dá rud seo a leanas:

translation.en: They have a negative test (COVID19 not detected) 10 days after they were last in contact with a person who tested positive for COVID19.
translation.ga: Fuair sé tástáil dhiúltach (an aicíd COVID19 a bheith neamhbhraite) 10 lá tar éis dó bheith i dteagmháil an uair dheiridh le duine eile a fuair tástáil dheimhneach i leith na haicíde COVID19.

translation.en: They do not have any symptoms of COVID19
translation.ga: Níl airíonna na haicíde COVID19 le sonrú orthu.

translation.en: As per data protection regulations, a school cannot confirm the name of the pupil/student and/or staff member who tested positive (‘detected’) for COVID19.
translation.ga: De réir rialacháin um chosaint sonraí, ní féidir le scoil ainm an dalta/scoláire agus/nó an bhaill foirne a tástáladh deimhneach (‘braite’) le haghaidh COVID19 a dheimhniú.

translation.en: Do ‘close contacts’ of close contacts need to be excluded from schools?
translation.ga: An gcaithfear ‘dlúththeagmhálaithe’ na ndlúththeagmhálaithe a dhíbirt as na scoileanna?

translation.en: Nationally it is not recommended the close contacts of close contacts need to also restrict their movements, and therefore siblings of close contacts identified through the schools setting can still attend school.
translation.ga: Ar bhonn náisiúnta, ní mholtar go gcaithfaidh dlúththeagmhálaithe na ndlúththeagmhálaithe srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí, agus dá bhrí sin, is féidir le siblíní na ndlúththeagmhálaithe a aithníodh tríd an suíomh scoile freastal ar an scoil fós.

translation.en: If there are particular concerns following the case and school PHRA being undertaken, the public health doctor may sometimes request siblings also restrict their movements, but this will be a specific clinical recommendation.
translation.ga: Má tá ceisteanna ar leith maidir leis an gcás agus Measúnú Riosca Sláinte Poiblí (MRSP) de chuid na scoile curtha i gcrích, féadfar go niarrfaidh an dochtúir sláinte poiblí ar siblíní srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí chomh maith, ach bheadh sé sin ina shainmholadh cliniciúil.

translation.en: It is not routine and siblings of schools close contacts identified should not be excluded by schools.
translation.ga: Ní mar ghnáthnós é agus níor chóir siblíní na ndlúth theagmhálaithe a aithníodh a dhíbirt as na scoileanna.

translation.en: Previous infection with COVID19
translation.ga: Ionfhabhtú COVID19 roimhe seo

translation.en: What if a staff or student says they have had COVID19 previously?
translation.ga: Cad a tharlaíonn má deir ball foirne nó dalta go raibh an aicíd COVID19 acu cheana féin?

translation.en: Staff / students and in the case of young children, the parents should be told to discuss with the HSE schools teams.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go ninseofaí do bhaill foirne/do dhaltaí, agus i gcás na bpáistí óga, do na tuismitheoirí go bpléidís é sin le foirne scoileanna FSS.

translation.en: If there is clear evidence of a confirmed infection with COVID19 within the past 6 months, as per national guidelines, then as long as staff/student has no symptoms, then they are not determined as a close contact and do not need to restrict their movements.
translation.ga: Más ann d’fhianaise shoiléir go raibh infhabhtú COVID19 le 6 mhí anuas, de réir na dtreoirlínte, mura bhduil airíonna le sonrú ar na baill foirne/ar na daltaí, ní mheastar iad a bheith ina ndlúth theagmhálaithe agus ní chaithfidh siad srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí.

translation.en: This does not apply if there are specific concerns the case may have a particular variant of concern e.g.
translation.ga: Ní sé sin ábhartha má tá saincheisteanna ann d’fhéadfaí go mbeidh leagan faoi leith ar cúis imní é m.sh.

translation.en: Brazilian P1 variant or South African B.1.351.
translation.ga: P1 ón mBrasaíl, nó B.1.351 ón Afraic Theas.

translation.en: In these circumstances restricted movements will apply, but public health teams will determine this.
translation.ga: Sna cúinsí sin, cuirfear srianta i bhfeidhm ar ghluaiseachtaí, ach is iad na foirne sláinte poiblí a dheimhneofar é sin.

translation.en: For the majoriy of staff and students who have had a confirmed case of COVID19 within the last six months, they will not need to restrict their movements and can return to school.
translation.ga: Do bhunús na mball foirne agus do bhunús na ndaltaí a raibh cás deimhnieth den aicíd COVID19 le sé mhí anuas, ní chuirfear iallach orthu srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí agus is féidir leo filleadh ar an scoil.

translation.en: Singing
translation.ga: An Amhránaíocht

translation.en: Guidance for singing / wind instruments at primary level
translation.ga: Treoir i dtaca leis an amhránaíocht / le huirlisí gaoithe ar leibhéal na bunscoile

translation.en: Guidance with regard to singing at primary school level remains the same as circulated before Christmas.
translation.ga: Tá an treoir maidir leis an amhránaíocht sa bhunscoil go díreach mar a bhí de réir an chiorcláin roimh thréimhse na Nollag.

translation.en: This stated that ‘singing whilst maintaining social distancing and within normal pod structures can take place outdoors.
translation.ga: Dá réir sin, ‘ceadaítear an amhránaíocht a tharlú amuigh faoin aer ach cloí leis an scaradh sóisialta agus í a dhéanamh laistigh de na gnáthstruchtúir suíocháin.

translation.en: Unfortunately, no parents / guardians will be allowed to attend these outdoor events either’.
translation.ga: Ar an drochuair, ní cheadófar d’aon tuismitheoirí /chaomhnóirí freastal ar an hócáidí sin amuigh faoin aer ach an oiread’.

translation.en: It is important that this advice continues, especially as we move closer to end of term festivities.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach go leanfar leis an gcomhairle sin, ach go háirithe agus muid ag bogadh i dtreo imeachtaí ceiliúrtha deiridh téarma.

translation.en: Guidance for singing / wind instruments at postprimary level
translation.ga: Treoir i dtaca leis an amhránaíocht / le huirlisí gaoithe ar leibhéal na hiar bhunscoile

translation.en: Guidance for singing / wind instruments at post primary level are outlined within the document ‘Return to School Guidance for Practical Subjects in Post Primary Schools and Centres for Education; March 2021’ and should be followed.
translation.ga: Déantar an treoir maidir leis an amhránaíocht / le huirlisí gaoithe ar leibhéal na hiarbhunscoile a achoimriú taobh istigh den cháipéis ‘Treoir don Fhilleadh ar an Scoil d’Ábhair Phraiticiúla in IarBhunscoileanna agus i Lárionaid Oideachais; Márta 2021’ agus ba cheart í a leanúint.

translation.en: Travel
translation.ga: Taisteal

translation.en: What’s the advice for people travelling into Ireland?
translation.ga: Céard í an chomhairle do dhaoine atá ag teacht isteacht go hÉirinn?

translation.en: There is a Government Advisory in operation against all nonessential international travel.
translation.ga: Tá Comhairle an Rialtais i bhfeidhm in éadan an taistil idirnáisiúnta neamhriachtanach.

translation.en: If travel is essential, then the advice needs to be followed, depending on whether travel was from a category 1 or category 2 country.
translation.ga: Má tá an taisteal riachtanach, ní mór an chomhairle a leanúint, ag brath ar cé acu an as tír chatagóir 1 nó as tír chatagóir 2 atá an taisteal.

translation.en: Testing / restriction requirements for people returning from countries are explained on the gov.ie website.
translation.ga: Tugtar míniú maidir leis na riachtanais a bhaineann le daoine a fhileann as tíortha ar an suíomh gréasáin gov.ie .

translation.en: These apply to staff and students who might be returning after travel.
translation.ga: Baineann na rialacha sin le baill foirne agus le daltaí a d’fhéadfaidís bheith ag filleadh tar éis taistil.

translation.en: These are legal requirements, and apply to all citizens and residents returning to Ireland.
translation.ga: Is ceanglais dlí iad agus cuirtear i bhfeidhm iad ar shaoránaigh agus ar chónaitheoirí atá ag filleadh ar Éirinn.

translation.en: The requirements as of 17.3.21 state that returning travellers from category 1 countries ‘may leave to take a RTPCR test no less than 5 days after your arrival – if you receive written confirmation that the result of this test is negative/ ‘not detected’ your period of quarantine can end.
translation.ga: De réir na gceanglas ar 17.3.21 maidir le taistealaithe ó tghíorthaí Chatagóir 1 ‘is féidir an teach a fhágáil chun an tástáil RTPCR a fháil tar éis 5 lá ar an laghad i ndiaidh do theacht isteach chun na tíre – má fhaigheann tú deimhniú scríofa go raibh toradh na tástála diúltach/’neamhbhraite’ is féidir deireadh a chur le do thréimhse coraintín.

translation.en: You must retain the written confirmation of your test result for at least 14 days.
translation.ga: Ní foláir duit deimhniú scríofa de do thoradh tástála a choinneáil ar feadh 14 lá ar a laghad.

translation.en: If your journey began in any of the Category 2 countries , you must complete the full 14 days of quarantine – regardless of whether you have a negative test result.’
translation.ga: Má tosaíodh do thuras in aon cheann de na tíortha Chatagóir 2, ní mór duit 14 lá a chaitheamh i mbun coraintín – beag beann ar cé acu an bhfuil nó nach bhfuil tástáil dhiúltach faoghde agat.’

translation.en: As these measures and countries included as Category 1 or category 2 will change, up to date advice should always be sought from here.
translation.ga: As siocair go dtiocfaidh athrú ar na bearta agus ar na tíortha sin a chuimsítear i gCatagóir 1 nó i gCatagóir 2, ba chóir an chomhairle is déanaí a lorg i gcónaí uaidh seo.

translation.en: HSE schools teams will have no different advice to this national advice.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh comhairle dhifriúil ag foirne scoileanna FFS i gcomparáid leis an gcomhairle náisiúnta seo.

translation.en: Data
translation.ga: Sonraí

translation.en: Schools data is presented weekly on the HSE website here.
translation.ga: Cuirtear sonraí na scoileanna i láthair gach seachtain ar láithreán gréasáin FSS anseo.

translation.en: It presents information on the number of facilities a PHRA and onward testing has been undertaken and the close contact positivity ie.
translation.ga: Cuirtear eolas i láthair maidir le líon na saoráidí inar tharla Measúnuithe Riosca Sláinte Phoiblí (MRSP) agus an tástáil leanúnach agus eolas maidir le deimhneacht dlúththeagmhálaithe .i.

translation.en: For each index case identified to us who attended school in their infectious time period, how many of the identified close contacts tested positive for Covid19.
translation.ga: I gcás gach duine faoinar cuireadh in iúl a d’fhreastail ar an scoil le linn a thréimhse tógálaí, cé mhéad duine de na dhlúth theagmhálaithe a fuair tástáil dheimhneach i leith na haicíde COVID19.

translation.en: So far, since schools phased return from 8th February, data up to 13th March shows 118 facilities across SEN, Primary and Post primary have had a PHRA and onward testing undertaken; identifying 2,625 close contacts with 61 cases (2.3%) subsequently testing positive for Covid19.
translation.ga: Go dtí seo, ó tosaíodh an filleadh céimnithe ar an scoil ar an 8 Feabhra, sna sonraí suas leis an 13 Márta léirítear gur tharla MRSP agus an tástáil leanúnach in 118 saoráid ar fud Riachtanas Speisialta Oideachais, na mBunscoileanna agus na nIarbhunscoileanna; inar aithníodh 2,625 dlúththeagmhálaí agus 61 cás (2.3%) acu a fuair tástáil dheimhneach i leith na haicíde COVID19.

translation.en: The reports also present the total number of children who have tested positive for Covid19 in the week, and since Covid19 were first notifiable.
translation.ga: Léirítear sna tuarascálacha freisin líon iomlán na bpáistí a fuair tástáil dheimhneach i leith na haicíde COVID19 le seachtain anuas, agus ó rinneadh aicíd infhógartha den COVID19 den chéaduair.

translation.en: Between March 2020 and 13th March 2021, 24,900 5 18 year olds have had a confirmed diagnosis of Covid19.
translation.ga: Idir Márta 2020 agus 13 Márta 2021, tugadh diagnóis dheimhnithe na haicíde COVID19 do 24,900 duine idir 5 agus 18 mbliana d’aois.

translation.en: This is 2.7% of all children aged 518 years.
translation.ga: Sin agus 2.7% de na páistí go léir atá idir 5 agus 18 mbliana d’aois.

translation.en: The reports are uploaded weekly on to the website.
translation.ga: Déantar na tuarascálacha a uaslódáil ar an láithreán gréasáin gach seachtain.

translation.en: Pregnancy
translation.ga: An Toircheas

translation.en: Pregnancy related guidelines for the Education Sector have been published and are available on the HSE website here.
translation.ga: Foilsíodh treoirlínte maidir leis an toircheas faoi choinne na hEarnála Oideachais agus tá siad ar fáil ar láithreáin gréasáin FSS anseo.

translation.en: Detected result confirmation
translation.ga: Deimhniú na dTorthaí Braite

translation.en: If the school is informed of a positive case, what should the school do?
translation.ga: Má chuirtear cás deimhneach in iúl don scoil, cad ba chóir don scoil a dhéanamh?

translation.en: Await instructions from public health don’t panic – classes do not need to be sent home or told not to come in to school.
translation.ga: Fan le treoracha ón tsláinte phoiblí fanaigí socair – ní chaithfear na ranganna a sheoladh abhaile ná insint dóibh gan teacht isteach sa scoil.

translation.en: It is important to remember that the confirmed case is no longer within the school and therefore the risk of onward transmission from that person has been removed from the school setting.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach cuimhneamh air nach bhfuil an cás deimhnithe sa scoil a thuilleadh agus, mar sin, go bhfuil an riosca a bhaineann le trasseoladh an ghalair ón duine seo bainte de thimpeallacht na scoile.

translation.en: If the case was not in the school setting whilst infectious, then public health will not routinely call the school because there is no significant risk that the case has spread the infection in the school setting.
translation.ga: Mura raibh an cás laistigh de thimpeallacht na scoile nuair a bhí sé tógálach, ní chuirfidh sláinte phoiblí glao ar an scoil de ghnáth mar níl aon riosca suntasach ann go bhfuil an cás tar éis an galar a scaipeadh i dtimpeallacht na scoile.

translation.en: If the case of COVID19 was in the school during the infectious period the school should await a call from the Department of Public Health.
translation.ga: Más rud é go raibh an aicíd COVID19 sa scoil le linn na tréimhse tágálaí, ba chóir go bhfanfadh an Scoil le glao ó Roinn na Sláinte Poiblí.

translation.en: This will usually be on the same day but may be the next day.
translation.ga: Tarlóidh sé sin ar an lá céanna de ghnáth ach d’fhéadfadh sé tarlú an lá ina dhiaidh.

translation.en: The ‘infectious period’ is the timeframe during which someone with an infectious disease can spread it to other people – the ‘infectious period’ for COVID19 includes the 24 hours before testing for asymptomatic cases, or the 48 hours before symptom onset for symptomatic cases.
translation.ga: Is í an "tréimhse thógálachW an fráma ama inar féidir le duine a bhfuil galar tógálach air/uirthi é a scaipeadh do dhaoine eile san áireamh sa "tréimhse thógálach" do COVID19 tá na 24 huaire roimh thástáil i leith cásanna aisiomptómacha, nó na 48 nuaire roimh thús siomptóm i leith cásanna siomptómacha).

translation.en: The ‘incubation period’ (when someone might be infected with the virus but not unwell) is 14 days (average 47 days) and therefore even if a staff member or student was in the school within the infectious time period, it takes an average of 47 days before any other person might become unwell from becoming infected.
translation.ga: Maireann an ‘tréimhse goir’ (is é sin le rá má tá duine infhabtaithe leis an víreas ach mothaíonn siad ar bharr a sláinte) ar feadh 14 lá (idir 4 agus 7 lá ar an meán), agus dá bhrí sin, dá mba rud élego raibh ball foirne nó dalta i láthair sa scoil le linn na tréimhse tógálaí, tógann sé idir 4 agus 7 lá ar an meán sula dtagann tinneas ar dhuine ar bith eile mar gheall ar an infhabhtú.

translation.en: This allows Public Health the time to undertake the Public Health Risk Assessment (PHRA), through same day or following day response.
translation.ga: Dá thoradh sin tugtar an tam cuí don tSláinte Phoiblí tabhairt faoin Mheasúnú Riosca Sláinte Poiblí (MRSP), trí fhreagra aon lae nó trí fhreagra an lá dar gcionn.

translation.en: When public health doctors make contact with the school they will proceed to ask several questions and undertake a PHRA with the school.
translation.ga: Nuair a dhéanfaidh na dochtúirí sláinte poiblí teagmháil leis an scoil cuirfidh siad roinnt ceisteanna agus tabharfaidh siad faoi Mheasúnú Riosca Sláinte Poiblí (MRSP) leis an scoil.

translation.en: What should I expect when Public Health call me?
translation.ga: Cad is féidir liom a bheith ag dréim leis nuair a chuirfidh Sláinte Phoiblí glao orm?

translation.en: The regional Department of Public Health will ask several questions and carry out a risk assessment.
translation.ga: Cuirfidh an Rannóg Sláinte Poiblí réigiúnach roinnt ceisteanna agus déanfaidh siad measúnú riosca.

translation.en: Public Health will identify any close contacts from the school setting with you, through the process of the Public Health Risk Assessment (PHRA).
translation.ga: Sainaithneoidh Sláinte Phoiblí aon dlúththeagmhálaithe ó thimpeallacht na scoile leat, trí phróiseas an Mheasúnaithe Riosca Sláinte Phoiblí (MRSP).

translation.en: You will be asked by the Department of Public Health to provide information on the close contacts identified.
translation.ga: Iarrfaidh an Rannóg Sláinte Poiblí ort faisnéis maidir leis na dlúththeagmhálaithe aitheanta a chur ar fáil.

translation.en: This information will be required in a specific excel format.
translation.ga: Beidh an fhaisnéis seo ag teastáil i bhformáid Excel shonrach.
