translation.en: The legal basis for sharing requested data with Public Health (Medical Officers of Health and staff in Departments of Public Health) is the Infectious Diseases Regulations 1981 as amended which provides the legal responsibility for Public Health in Article 11 and the authority in Article 19 which states that ‘Any person who refuses to comply with a requirement or direction given or a request for information made in pursuance of any of the provisions of these Regulations shall be guilty of a contravention of these Regulations’.
translation.ga: Is é an bunús dlí le sonraí iarrtha a chomhroinnt le Sláinte Phoiblí (Oifigigh Leighis Sláinte agus baill foirne i Rannóga Sláinte Poiblí) ná na Rialacháin um Ghalair Thógálacha 1981 arna leasú agus lena gcuirtear ar fáil an fhreagracht dhlíthiúil as Sláinte Phoiblí in Airteagal 11 agus an túdarás in Airteagal 19 ina sloinntear ‘"Aon duine a dhiúltaíonn cloí le ceanglas nó treoir a thugtar nó iarratas ar fhaisnéis déanta de bhun aon cheann d’fhorálacha na Rialachán seo; beidh an duine sin freagrach as sárú na Rialachán seo".

translation.en: This legislation fulfils GDPR Article 6 conditions c, d, and e regarding lawfulness of processing, and processing of special categories of personal data is allowed under Article 9 2 (i).
translation.ga: Comhlíonann an reachtaíocht seo coinníollacha c, d agus e d’Airteagal 6 RGCS maidir le dlíthiúlacht na próiseála, agus ceadaítear próiseáil catagóirí speisialta sonraí pearsanta faoi Airteagal 9 2 (i).

translation.en: What is a Public Health Risk Assessment?
translation.ga: Cad is Measúnú Riosca Sláinte Poiblí ann?

translation.en: Schools teams within regional departments of Public Health will undertake a PHRA with the school to explore the following:
translation.ga: Is iad na foirne scoileanna laistigh de ranna régiúnacha na Sláinte Poblí a thabhairfaidh faoi Mheasúnú Riosca Sláinte Poiblí (MRSP) leis an scoil chun breis eolais a fháil maidir leis na nithe seo a leanas:

translation.en: unique information and factors relevant to the case and that particular educational facility and its infrastructure, with regard to infection transmission
translation.ga: eolas leithleach agus tosca ábhartha maidir leis an gcás agus maidir leis an tsaoráid oideachasúil áirithe sin agus an bonneagar a bhaineann léi, i dtaca le haistriú an infhabhtaithe

translation.en: interactions of the community of pupils and teachers both within the school and how they interlink within the wider community
translation.ga: idirghníomhaíochtaí phobal na ndaltaí agus na múinteoirí, laistigh den scoil agus conas a nasctar iad leis an mórphobal máguaird araon

translation.en: patterns of infection within the wider local community and
translation.ga: pátrúin an infhabhtaithe taobh istigh den mhórphobal áitiúil máguaird agus

translation.en: consider general community infection rates in the regions serviced by the educational facility.
translation.ga: rátaí ginearálta infhabtaithe sa mórphobal a mheas sna réigiúin a mbíonn an tsaoráid oideachasúil ag freastal orthu.

translation.en: This information will inform the decisions regarding the identification of close contact and any further action required including the need for full, or partial, closure of any school.
translation.ga: Leis an eolas sin, cuirfear leis na cinntí maidir le dlúththeagmhálaithe a aithint agus maidir le haon ghníomhaíocht eile ar gá léi, lena náirítear an gá le druidim iomlán nó páirteach aon scoile.

translation.en: The definition of close contacts is on the hpsc website, and this is used, with the information identified through the PHRA to determine who the close contacts are within the school setting.
translation.ga: Tá sainmhíniú na ndlúththeagmhálaithe ar fáil ar láithreán gréasáin an Lárionaid Faire um Chosaint Sláinte, agus baintear leas as sin agus as an eolas a bhailítear tríd an MRSP chun na dlúththeagmhálaithe a aimsiú laistogh de shuíomh na scoile.

translation.en: It will not be automatically assumed that a whole class will be deemed as close contacts.
translation.ga: Ní ghlacfar leis go huathoibríoch go measfar rang iomlán mar dhlúththeagmhálaithe.

translation.en: This is because the school settings are so varied e.g.
translation.ga: Baineann sé sin le cé chomh héagsúil óna chéile is atá na suíomhanna scoile m.sh.

translation.en: in young primary school children, ‘pods’ will likely be deemed close contacts and all removed.
translation.ga: i measc na bpáiste óga bunscoile, is dócha go measfar na struchtúir suíocháin a bheith mar ghrúpa dlúththeagmhálaithe agus bainfear amach iad ar fad atá sa ghrúpa.

translation.en: In secondary settings where there is social distancing rather than a ‘pod’ per se, close contacts will be determined by proximity and interaction with the index case; class placement; classroom structure; common travel; social networks and friendship groups etc.
translation.ga: I suíomhanna meánscoile, i gcásanna a bhfuil an scaradh sóisialta i bhfeidhm seachas na struchtúir suíocháin per se, aimseofar na dlúththeagmhálaithe ag brath ar an gcóngaracht agus ar na hidirghníomhíochtaí leis an gcás innéacs; socrúchán an ranga, struchtúr an tseomra ranga, an taisteal comhchoitianta; na líonraí sóisialta agus grúpaí cairdis srl.

translation.en: What happens if teachers or students receive notifications of the HSE COVID Tracker App?
translation.ga: Cad a tharlaíonn má fhaigheann múinteoirí nó scoláirí fógraí ar Aip Rianaire COVID FSS?

translation.en: Close contacts within the school setting are identified by Departments of Public Health following a Public Health Risk Assessment (PHRA).
translation.ga: Aithníonn na Rannóga Sláinte Poiblí dlúththeagmhálaithe laistigh de thimpeallacht na scoile tar éis Measúnú Riosca Shláinte Phoiblí (MRSP).

translation.en: If there is any information from the HSE COVID Tracker App, this information will be considered in the risk assessment.
translation.ga: Má tá aon fhaisnéis ann ó Aip Rianaire COVID FSS, measfar an fhaisnéis seo sa mheasúnú riosca.

translation.en: However, it may be that not all people who are alerted through the App are actually deemed close contacts, or vice versa – Public Health might determine that some people who have not been notified by the App are close contacts.
translation.ga: Ach d’fhéadfadh sé nach measfar gach duine a fhaigheann fógra tríd an Aip mar dhlúththeagmhálaithe, nó a mhalairt – féadfaidh Sláinte Phoiblí a chinneadh gur dlúththeagmhálaithe iad roinnt daoine nach bhfuair fógra ón Aip.

translation.en: While the COVID tracker App is a very useful tool for collecting information on potential close contacts, Public Health risk assessment and advice overrides the App.
translation.ga: Cé gur uirlis an úsáideach í an Aip chun faisnéis ar dhlúththeagmhálaithe féideartha a bhailiú, gabhann measúnú riosca agus comhairle Shláinte Phoiblí treis ar an Aip.

translation.en: This is because the Public Health Risk Assessment (PHRA) collects more nuanced, composite information to better appraise infection transmission risk in defined circumstances.
translation.ga: Tá sé seo amhlaidh de bhrí go mbailíonn Measúnú Riosca Shláinte Phoiblí (MRSP) faisnéis níos caolchúisí agus níos ilghnéithí chun breithmheas a thabhairt ar riosca an tras seolta i dtosca sainithe.

translation.en: Will the Department of Public Health provide instructions to the school as to how to proceed?
translation.ga: An gcuirfidh an Rannóg Sláinte Poiblí treoracha ar fáil don scoil maidir le conas leanúint ar aghaidh?

translation.en: Once the Public Health Risk Assessment is complete, the Department of Public Health will then advise you of the public health instructions.
translation.ga: Nuair a bheidh Measúnú Riosca Shláinte Phoiblí curtha i gcrích, tabharfaidh an Rannóg Sláinte Poiblí comhairle duit ansin maidir le treoracha um shláinte phoiblí.

translation.en: These instructions are delivered by the Medical Officer of Health/ Health officer on the advice of the MOH, under Infectious Diseases legislation.
translation.ga: Is é an tOifigeach Leighis Sláinte/Oifigeach sláinte a chuirfidh ar fáil na treoracha sin ar chomhairle an OLS, de réir na reachtaíochta um ghalair thógálacha.

translation.en: The advice will typically include asking the school principal to:
translation.ga: Mar chuid den chomhairle de ghnáth iarrfar ar phríomhoide na scoile:

translation.en: Contact the parents/guardians of the pupils/students, who are determined by Public Health to be ‘close contacts’.
translation.ga: Teagmháil a dhéanamh le tuismitheoirí/caomhnóirí na ndaltaí/scoláirí, a dheimhníonn Sláinte Phoiblí a bheith ina "ndlúththeagmhálaithe".

translation.en: Parents of these pupils/students will be asked by the school principal to collect them from school as soon as is safely and practically possible, so they can start restricting their movements.
translation.ga: Iarrfaidh príomhoide na scoile ar thuismitheoirí na ndaltaí/scoláirí sin iad a thógáil ón scoil a luaithe is atá sábháilte agus is féidir, ionas gur féidir leo tosú ag srianadh a ngluaiseachtaí.

translation.en: This may still be at the end of the school day.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh sé fós gur deireadh an lae scoile atá ann.

translation.en: Public Health may also ask the school to issue a letter / text message or written guidance to these parents/guardians, prepared and provided by Public Health.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh Sláinte Phoiblí a iarraidh ar an scoil freisin litir/teachtaireacht téacs nó treoir i scríbhinn a chur chuig na tuismitheoir/caomhnóirí seo, arna nullmhú agus arna gcur ar fáil ag Sláinte Phoiblí.

translation.en: Contact any staff member who may be determined by Public Health to be a “close contact” and ask him/her to go home to start restricting their movements.
translation.ga: Déan teagmháil le haon bhall foirne a d’fhéadfadh a bheith deimhnithe ag Sláinte Phoiblí mar “dhlúththeagmhálaí” agus iarr air/uirthi dul abhaile agus tús a chur le srianadh a ngluaiseachtaí.

translation.en: If there is a case identified how far back do Public Health go to consider close contacts?
translation.ga: Má dheimhnítear cás cá fhad siar a htéann Sláinte Phoiblí chun dlúth theagmhálaithe a mheas?

translation.en: For a confirmed case of COVID19 who was symptomatic, Public Health will identify close contacts in the 48hour period before the person became symptomatic.
translation.ga: I dtaca le cás deimhnithe a raibh airíonna na haicíde COVID19 le sonrú air, is tríd an tSláinte Phoiblí a aithneofar na dlúththeagmhálaithe sa tréimhse 48 uair a’ chloig sula raibh airíonna le sonrú air.

translation.en: If the confirmed case was asymptomatic, then public health will identify close contacts for the 24hour period before the test was taken.
translation.ga: Má bhí an cás deimhnithe aisiomptómach, sainaithneoidh an tsláinte phoiblí dlúth theagmhálaithe don tréimhse 24 uair a’ chloig sula ndearnadh an tástáil.

translation.en: Is contact tracing within the school community always required?
translation.ga: An dteastaíonn rianú teagmhála laistigh de phobal na scoile i gcónaí?

translation.en: It may well be that for someone who is identified as a confirmed case of COVID19 there is no need to do any contact tracing within the school setting.
translation.ga: B'fhéidir nach gá aon rianú teagmhála a dhéanamh laistigh de thimpeallacht na scoile do dhuine a shainaithnítear mar chás deimhnithe COVID19.

translation.en: This would be because the person was not in school while infectious and therefore no contact tracing of other persons within the school will be required.
translation.ga: Is amhlaidh atá toisc nach raibh an duine i láthair na scoile agus é ionfhabhtaíoch, agus dá bhrí sin ní bheidh aon ghá le rianú teagmhála a dhéanamh le daoine eile laistigh den scoil.

translation.en: In this instance Public Health would not contact the school.
translation.ga: Sa chás sin ní dhéanfadh Sláinte Phoiblí teagmháil leis an scoil.

translation.en: I have heard that someone from the school has been identified as a confirmed case of COVID19 – why has Public Health not contacted me?
translation.ga: Chuala mé go bhfuil duine éigin ón scoil sainaitheanta mar chás deimhnithe COVID19 cén fáth nach ndearna Sláinte Phoiblí teagmháil liom?

translation.en: It may have already been determined that there are no close contacts or onward transmission risk within the school setting, for example if the individual was not in the school during the infectious period.
translation.ga: Tá seans ann gur deimhníodh nach bhfuil aon dlúththeagmhálaithe ná aon bhaol aistrithe leanúnaigh ann laistigh de shuíomh na scoile, mar shampa mura raibh an duine aonair i láthair na scoile le linn na tréimhse tógálaí.

translation.en: When Public Health do need to contact a school, they will usually do so the same day, or following day.
translation.ga: Nuair is gá do Shláinte Phoiblí teagmháil a dhéanamh le scoil, déanfaidh siad é sin an lá céanna de ghnáth, nó an lá ina dhiaidh.

translation.en: This is safe practice, as the case is no longer within the school setting, and therefore the risk of onward transmission from this case is no longer present.
translation.ga: Is cleachtas sábháilte é sin, mar níl an cás i dtimpeallacht na scoile a thuilleadh, agus mar sin níl an riosca a bhaineann le trasseoladh ón gcás i láthair a thuilleadh.

translation.en: Can the school share a name of the pupil/student or staff member who is a confirmed case of COVID19?
translation.ga: An féidir leis an scoil ainm an dalta/scoláire nó an bhaill foirne ar cás deimhnithe COVID19 é/í a chomhroinnt?

translation.en: No, the school cannot share the name of the person who has tested positive for COVID19 (Covid19 detected).
translation.ga: Ní féidir, ní féidir leis an scoil ainm an duine a thástáil deimhneach le haghaidh COVID19 (Covid19 braite) a chomhroinnt.

translation.en: This information is private and confidential.
translation.ga: Tá an fhaisnéis sin príobháideach agus faoi rún.

translation.en: Close contacts will not be told the name of the confirmed case.
translation.ga: Ní inseofar ainm an cháis dheimhnithe do dhlúththeagmhálaithe.

translation.en: Is the school complying with GDPR requirements when collecting and sharing information on complex/close contacts with the HSE?
translation.ga: An bhfuil an scoil ag cloí le riachtanais RGCS nuair a bhailíonn sí agus a chomhroinneann sí faisnéis ar dhlúththeagmhálaithe/teagmhálaithe casta le FSS?

translation.en: Yes, under the Infectious Diseases Regulations 1981, as amended, Medical Officers of Health ask that you collect the data, keep it secure and release it only to Public Health when requested to do so as part of the investigations into a confirmed or suspected case of COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá, faoi na Rialacháin um Ghalair Thógálacha 1981, arna leasú, iarrann Oifigigh Leighis Sláinte go mbaileoidh tú na sonraí, iad a choinneáil slán agus gan iad a scaoileadh do Shláinte Phoiblí ach amháin nuair a iarrtar ort é sin a dhéanamh mar chuid de na fiosruithe ar chás deimhnithe nó amhrasta COVID19.

translation.en: Processing of these data by the MOH is provided for under GDPR, special category data 9 2(i).
translation.ga: Déantar foráil le haghaidh phróiseáil na sonraí seo ag an OLS faoi RGCS, catagóir sonraí speisialta 9 2(i).

translation.en: What if the press media or wider school community contact the school?
translation.ga: Cad faoi má dhéanann an preas, na meáin nó mórphobal na scoile teagmháil leis an scoil?

translation.en: The following is a generic statement that schools may wish to consider using in full or part in response to press/media queries.
translation.ga: Is é atá sa mhéid seo a leanas ráiteas cineálach as a bhféadfadh scoileanna leas a bhaint ina iomláine nó i bpáirt chun freagairt ar cheisteanna ón bpreas nó ó na meáin.

translation.en: “The school cannot comment on individual cases or outbreaks of COVID19 to protect the privacy and confidentiality of those involved.
translation.ga: “Ní féidir leis an scoil aon tráchtaireacht a dhéanamh ar chásannaaonair ná ar ráigeannaCOVID19, ar mhaithe le príobháideachas agus rúndacht na ndaoine i gceist a chosaint.

translation.en: The school can confirm that we have engaged with the HSE.
translation.ga: Is féidir leis an scoil a dhearbhú go rabhamar i dteagmháil le FSS.

translation.en: The HSE’s role includes carrying out a Public Health Risk Assessment.
translation.ga: Mar chuid de ról FSS is fúthusan atá sé tabhairt faoi Mheasúnú Riosca Sláinte Poiblí.

translation.en: As part of this risk assessment, all close contacts will be identified, contacted and advised of the next steps.
translation.ga: Mar chuid den mheasúnú riosca sin, sainaithneofar gach dlúththeagmhálaí, déanfar teagmháil leo agus cuirfear in iúl dóibh na chéad chéimeanna eile.

translation.en: Close contacts are requested not to come to school, in line with HSE Public Health advice.
translation.ga: Iarrtar ar dhlúththeagmhálaithe gan teacht ar scoil, de réir chomhairle Shláinte Phoiblí FSS.

translation.en: If Public Health does not make contact with you, you are not impacted and can continue to attend school.
translation.ga: Mura ndéanann Sláinte Phoiblí teagmháil leat, ní bheidh tionchar ort agus is féidir leat leanúint ar aghaidh ag freastal ar scoil.

translation.en: The school will continue to work with the HSE in ensuring all necessary hygiene, health and safety protocols are in place at the school for the prevention and containment of COVID19.”
translation.ga: Coinneoidh an scoil uirthi ag comhoibriú le FSS lena chinntiú go bhfuil prótacail uile atá riachtanach i bhfeidhm sa scoil maidir leis an sláinteachas, leis an tsláinte agus leis an tsábháilteacht ar mhaithe le seachaint agus srianadh na haicíde COVID19.

translation.en: If a pupil/student and/or staff member develops symptoms
translation.ga: Má fhorbraíonn dalta/scoláire agus/nó ball foirne siomptóim

translation.en: What should the school do if a pupil/student is displaying symptoms while at school?
translation.ga: Cad ba cheart don scoil a dhéanamh má tá siomptóim ar dhalta/scoláire agus é/í ar scoil?

translation.en: The pupil/student should be immediately brought to the designated isolation area in the school, which should have good ventilation and preferably a window to the outside that opens.
translation.ga: Ba chóir an dalta/scoláire a thabhairt láithreach chuig an limistéar leithlisithe ainmnithe sa scoil, ar cheart aeráil mhaith a bheith ann agus, más féidir, fuinneog inoscailte ar an taobh amuigh.

translation.en: The school should contact the parents/ guardians and ask them to collect their child as soon as possible.
translation.ga: Ba chóir don scoil teagmháil a dhéanamh le tuismitheoirí/caomhnóirí agus iarraidh orthu a bpáiste a thógáil chomh luath agus is féidir.

translation.en: The pupil/student should be cared for appropriately by a designated staff member until they are collected.
translation.ga: Ba chóir ball foirne ainmnithe a bheith ag tabhairt aire don dalta/scoláire go dtí go dtógfar iad.

translation.en: The staff member who is caring for the child should take all necessary precautions as outlined in the public health guidance document.
translation.ga: Ba chóir don bhall foirne atá ag tabhairt aire don pháiste gach réamhchúram riachtanach a ghlacadh mar a bhfuil breacchuntas air sa doiciméad um threoir ar shláinte phoiblí.

translation.en: The staff member assisting with the pupil/student does not need to go home unless they develop symptoms themselves, or are later advised to by public health.
translation.ga: Ní gá don bhall foirne atá ag cabhrú i leith an dalta/scoláire dul abhaile ach amháin má fhorbraíonn siad siomptóim iad féin, nó má thugann sláinte phoiblí comhairle dóibh é sin a dhéanamh.

translation.en: After the symptomatic pupil/student has left the isolation space, it should be cleaned and contact surfaces disinfected.
translation.ga: Tar éis don dalta/scoláire siomptómach an limistéar leithlisithe a fhágáil, ba chóir é a ghlanadh agus dromchlaí teagmhála a dhíghalrú.

translation.en: What should the school do if a staff member is displaying symptoms while at school?
translation.ga: Cad ba cheart don scoil a dhéanamh má tá siomptóim ar bhall foirne agus é/í ar scoil?

translation.en: The onus is on the staff member to immediately inform the principal that s/he is displaying symptoms.
translation.ga: Is ar an mball foirne atá an fhreagracht a chur in iúl don phríomhoide láithreach go bhfuil siomptóim air/uirthi.

translation.en: The staff member should immediately go home, self isolate and seek medical review by their GP (phone the GP if you have symptoms of COVID19, do not attend in person.
translation.ga: Ba chóir don bhall foirne dul abhaile láithreach, féinaonrú a dhéanamh agus athbhreithniú leighis a lorg óna ndochtúir (cuir glao ar an dochtúir má tá siomptóim COVID19 ort, ná téigh go dtí an dochtúir.

translation.en: GP assessment for COVID19, and COVID testing if required, are free of cost.)
translation.ga: Is saor in aisce é athbhreithniú dochtúra le haghaidh COVID19, agus tástáil COVID má tá siad riachtanach.)

translation.en: What should the school do if they are informed over the phone that a pupil/student is symptomatic?
translation.ga: Cad ba cheart don scoil a dhéanamh má chuirtear in iúl dóibh ar an nguthán go bhfuil siomptóim ar dhalta/scoláire?

translation.en: The Principal is asked only to make a note of the pupil/student’s absence.
translation.ga: Iarrtar ar an bPríomhoide díreach nóta a dhéanamh de neamhláithreacht an dalta/scoláire.

translation.en: The principal may note a brief description of the pupil/student’s symptoms, if they are disclosed by the parent.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh an príomhoide cur síos achomair a dhéanamh ar shiomptóim an dalta/scoláire, má chuireann an tuismitheoir in iúl iad.

translation.en: However, the principal is not required or entitled to ask about clinical symptoms.
translation.ga: Níl sé de dhualgas ná de cheart ag an bpríomhoide ceisteanna a chur maidir le hairíonna áfach.

translation.en: Schools can remind parents that if they are concerned a child may have symptoms of COVID19, the child should not attend school and they should contact their GP without delay.
translation.ga: Is féidir le scoileanna a mheabhrú do thuismitheoirí, má tá imní orthu go bhféadfadh siomptóim COVID19 a bheith ar pháiste, nár cheart don pháiste freastal ar scoil, agus gur cheart dóibh teagmháil a dhéanamh lena ndochtúir gan mhoill.

translation.en: No further actions are required of the school at this stage.
translation.ga: Níl aon ghníomh eile ón scoil ag teastáil ag an gcéim sin.

translation.en: Should a school advise the school community that a staff or pupil/student is symptomatic?
translation.ga: Ar cheart do scoil a chur in iúl do phobal na scoile go bhfuil siomptóim ar bhall foirne nó dalta/scoláire?

translation.en: Schools are asked to note that they should not inform other parents or staff members that a pupil/student or staff member has gone home due to their symptoms.
translation.ga: Iarrtar ar scoileanna a thabhairt dá naire nár cheart dóibh a chur in iúl do thuismitheoirí eile nó do bhaill foirne go bhfuil dalta/scoláire nó ball foirne tar éis dul abhaile mar gheall ar a siomptóim.

translation.en: Other pupils/students or staff do not need to be removed from class.
translation.ga: Ní gá daltaí/scoláirí eile nó baill foirne a bhaint amach as ranganna.

translation.en: This includes siblings or other household members of staff or pupils/students.
translation.ga: Áirítear leis sin deartháireacha agus deirfiúracha nó baill teaghlaigh eile ag baill foirne nó daltaí/scoláirí.

translation.en: Should siblings/household members of someone with symptoms be removed from the school setting?
translation.ga: Ar cheart deartháireacha agus deirfiúracha/baill teaghlaigh de chuid duine a bhfuil siomptóim orthu a bhaint amach ó thimpeallacht na scoile?

translation.en: Only under certain circumstances: if the GP of the pupil/student/ staff member decides that their symptoms are consistent with COVID19, (for example, fever OR a new cough, shortness of breath, deterioration of existing respiratory condition any loss of or changes to the sense of smell or taste), that person becomes a suspected case of COVID19 and will be referred for a test.
translation.ga: Níor cheart ach amháin faoi thosca áirithe: má chinntíonn dochtúir ginearálta an dalta/an scoláire/an bhaill foirne go bhfuil a airíonna ag teacht leis an aicíd COVID 19, (mar shampla, fiabhras NÓ casacht nua, an ghearranáil, meathlúchán ar fhadhb riospráide atá ann cheana féin, aon chailleadh nó aithrú sa bholadh nó sa bhlas), meastar gur cás amhrasta na haicíde COVID19 é an duine sin agus tabharfar ar aghaidh chuig an tástáil é.

translation.en: It is at this point that members of the symptomatic person’s household, including siblings or children of staff members, should be withdrawn from school by their parents or guardians and start restricting their movements, until the test results are known.
translation.ga: Is ag an bpointe sin gur chóir baill teaghlaigh an duine a bhfuil siomptóim air/uirthi, deartháireacha agus deirfiúracha nó leanaí baill foirne, a thógáil amach ón scoil ag a dtuismitheoirí nó caomhnóirí.

translation.en: How will a test be set up for these pupils/student and/or /staff members?
translation.ga: agus tús a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí a shrianadh, go dtí gur eol torthaí na tástála.

translation.en: The pupil/student or staff member will be advised to contact their GP.
translation.ga: Conas a dhéanfar tástáil a shocrú do na daltaí/scoláirí agus/nó baill foirne sin?

translation.en: Their GP will assess them and determine whether they should be referred for a COVID19 test.
translation.ga: Tabharfar comhairle don dalta/scoláire nó ball foirne teagmháil a dhéanamh lena ndochtúir.

translation.en: If an individual is referred for a COVID19 test, s/he will receive a text message with information of the appointment (time and place).
translation.ga: Déanfaidh a ndochtúir measúnú orthu agus cinnfidh sé/sí ar chóir iad a chur ar aghaidh le haghaidh thástáil COVID19.

translation.en: If a pupil/student has symptoms which may be consistent with COVID19 – what does the parents/ guardian need to do?
translation.ga: Má chuirtear duine ar aghaidh le haghaidh thástáil COVID19, gheobhaidh sé/sí teachtaireacht téacs le heolas maidir leis an gcoinne (am agus áit).

translation.en: If a child has symptoms which could be consistent with COVID19, the parents/guardians should call their GP.
translation.ga: Má tá siomptóim ar dhalta/scoláire a d’fhéadfadh a bheith comhsheasmhach le COVID19 – cad is gá do na tuismitheoirí/caomhnóirí a dhéanamh?

translation.en: Their GP will decide whether they should be tested for COVID19.
translation.ga: Má tá siomptóim ar pháiste a d’fhéadfadh a bheith comhsheasmhach le COVID 19, ba chóir do na tuismitheoirí/caomhnóirí glao a chur ar a ndochtúir.

translation.en: If the GP determines that the child does need a COVID19 test, it is at this point that all of their household contacts are asked to restrict their movements.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh a ndochtúir cinneadh ar chóir dóibh tástáil le haghaidh COVID19 a fháil.

translation.en: This means that siblings or staff members in the same household as the person who has symptoms should be removed from the school setting.
translation.ga: Má chinneann an dochtúir nach dteastaíonn tástáil COVID19 ón bpáiste, is ag an bpointe sin a iarrfar ar gach duine ina dteagmhálaithe teaghlaigh a ngluaiseachtaí a shrianadh.

translation.en: Only the symptomatic case is asked to selfisolate.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé sin gur chóir deartháireacha agus deirfiúracha nó baill foirne sa teaghlach céanna leis an duine a bhfuil siomptóim air/uirthi a bhaint amach as timpeallacht na scoile.

translation.en: Note: there will be many cases where testing is determined not to be required, for example, because the GP thinks that the child’s symptoms are not due to COVID19 and might be due to another cause..
translation.ga: Ní iarrtar ach ar an gcás siomptómach féinaonrú a dhéanamh.

translation.en: If the GP does not recommend COVID testing, and it is early in the child’s illness, the recommendation is to observe the child for 48 hours and if no further symptoms develop, then they can return to school.
translation.ga: Nóta: Beidh neart cásanna ann faoina meastar nach dteastaíonn an tástáil, mar shampla, toisc nach gceapann an DG go mbaineann airíonna an pháiste leis an aicíd COVID19 agus go bhféadfaidís bheith bainteach le cúis eile.

translation.en: If the GP has made a different diagnosis, parents/guardians should follow advice and recommendations on exclusion depending on this diagnosis.
translation.ga: Mura molann an dochtúir tástáil COVID, agus má tá tinneas an pháiste ina thús, is é an moladh atá ann breathnú ar an bpáiste ar feadh 48 nuaire agus gur féidir leo filleadhar scoil mura bhforbróidh aon siomptóim eile.

translation.en: How soon will the pupil/student or staff member receive a test? A: The person will receive an automated notification of a scheduled appointment at a testing centre at the next possible free slot for testing.
translation.ga: Má tá diagnóis éagsúil déanta ag an dochtúir, ba chóir do thuismitheoirí/chaomhnóirí comhairle agus moltaí a leanúint maidir le heisiamh ag brath ar an diagnóis sin.

translation.en: Will the pupil/student or staff member receive one test or more than one test on the basis of being symptomatic? If the latter, why?
translation.ga: Cé chomh luath agus a gheobhaidh dalta/scoláire nó ball foirne tástáil? A: Gheobhaidh an duine fógra uathoibríoch maidir le coinne sceidealaithe ag ionad tástála ag an gcéad gcoinne shaor eile le haghaidh tástála.

translation.en: If the pupil/student or staff member is experiencing symptoms and has been referred for testing by their GP, they will receive one test.
translation.ga: An bhfaighidh an dalta/scoláire nó ball foirne tástáil amháin nó níos mó ná tástáil amháin mar gheall ar a bheith siomptómach? Más é an dara cás atá amhlaidh, cén fáth?

translation.en: If a pupil/student/ staff member is identified as a close contact
translation.ga: Má tá siomptóim ar an dalta/scoláire nó ball foirne agus má chuir a ndochtúir ar aghaidh iad le haghaidh tástála, gheobhaidh siad tástáil amháin.

translation.en: How will a test be set up for persons identified as a close contact?
translation.ga: Má shainaithnítear dalta/scoláire/ball foirne mar dhlúththeagmhálaí

translation.en: The HSE will send an SMS with the appointment date, time and location of the free COVID19 test(s)
translation.ga: Conas a dhéanfar tástáil a shocrú do dhaoine a shainaithnítear mar dhlúth theagmhálaí?

translation.en: How soon will the pupil/student/staff member receive a test after being identified as a close contact?
translation.ga: Cuirfidh FSS teachtaireacht téacs le dáta, am agus áit le haghaidh coinne do thástáil nó thástálacha COVID19 saor(a) in aisce.

translation.en: Public Health will advise on the timing of a test for close contacts.
translation.ga: Cé chomh luath agus a gheobhaidh an dalta/scoláire nó ball foirne tástáil tar éis a bheith sainaitheanta mar dhlúththeagmhálaí?

translation.en: This will depend on when the pupil/student/staff member was last in contact with the positive case.
translation.ga: Is í Sláinte Phoiblí a chuirfidh in iúl uainiú na tástála do dhlúththeagmhálaithe.

translation.en: Testing will be arranged within 12 days.
translation.ga: Braithfidh sé sin ar an uair go deireanach a raibh an dalta/scoláire/ball foirne i dteagmháil leis an gcás deimhneach.

translation.en: Close contacts are recommended to have two tests; one at day 0 and the second at day 10.
translation.ga: Socrófar tástáil laistigh de 12 lá Moltar do dhlúththeagmhálaithe tabhairt faoi dhá thástáil; ceann amháin ar lá 0 agus an dara ceann ar lá 10.

translation.en: Will the pupil/student/staff member receive one test or more than one test? If the latter, why?
translation.ga: An bhfaighidh an dalta/scoláire nó ball foirne tástáil amháin nó níos mó ná tástáil amháin? Más é an dara cás atá amhlaidh, cén fáth?

translation.en: Public Health will advise whether a pupil/student/staff member needs one or more tests for COVID19.
translation.ga: Cuirfidh Sláinte Phoiblí in iúl an bhfuil tástáil amháin le haghaidh COVID19 nó níos mó ag teastáil ó dhalta/scoláire/bhall foirne.

translation.en: They will usually require testing on Day 0 and Day 10 since their last exposure to the confirmed case, but there may be circumstances whereby Public Health require only one test to be undertaken, for example.
translation.ga: Beidh tástáil ag teastáil uathu de ghnáth ar Lá 0 agus ar Lá 10 ó nochtadh iad go deireanach don chás deimhnithe, ach féadfaidh tosca a bheith ann nach néileoidh Sláinte Phoiblí ach tástáil amháin a dhéanamh m.sh.

translation.en: if sufficient time has elapsed such that the first test for close contacts will be 7 days since they were last exposed to the individual they will only require one test.
translation.ga: má tá dótháin ama imithe ionas go mbeidh an chéad tástáil do dhlúththeagmhálaithe ann 7 lá ó bhí sé/sí go deireanach i gcuideachta an duine, ní theastóidh ach tástáil amháin orthu.

translation.en: Public Health doctors will make this judgement following the risk assessment.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh dochtúirí Sláinte Phoiblí an breithiúnas sin tar éis an mheasúnaithe riosca.

translation.en: If a test comes back as “not detected” for a symptomatic pupil/student/staff member, will the person still be required to restrict their movements and why?
translation.ga: Má thagann tástáil ar ais mar “nneamhbhraitedo dhalta/scoláire/bhall foirne siomptómach, an mbeidh iallach ar an duine fós a ngluaiseachtaí a shrianadh agus cén fáth?

translation.en: If the person receives a negative / ‘not detected’ test result, the person should remain at home until they are well enough to return to school, unless parents/guardians of (pupil/students) or staff members are specifically asked by HSE public health to remain excluded because of further investigation.
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann an duine toradh tástála diúltach / "níor braitheadh", ba chóir don duine fanacht sa bhaile go dtí go mbeidh siad ar fónamh a ndóthain le filleadh ar scoil, ach amháin gur iarr FSS go sonrach ar thuismitheoirí/chaomhnóirí (de chuid daltaí/scoláirí) nó ar bhaill foirne fanacht eisiata mar gheall ar fhiosrú breise.

translation.en: A pupil/student /staff member can return to their normal activities, once they have been given either:
translation.ga: Is féidir le dalta/scoláire/ball foirne filleadh ar a ngnáthghníomhaíochtaí má thugtar dóibh:

translation.en: a negative (‘notdetected’) test result and are 48 hours without symptoms
translation.ga: toradh tástála diúltach ("níor braitheadh") agus má tá siad 48 nuaire gan siomptóim

translation.en: another diagnosis, which is not COVID19.
translation.ga: diagnóis eile, nach COVID19 é.

translation.en: Those who live with the person will then no longer need to restrict their movements.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh ar na daoine eile atá ina gcónaí leis an duine srian a chur lena ngluaiseachtaí.

translation.en: If a test comes back ‘SARSCoV2 detected’ (confirmed case of COVID19) will the pupil /student/staff member still be required to selfisolate?
translation.ga: Má thagann tástáil ar ais ‘SARSCoV2 braite’ (cás COVID19 deimhnithe) an mbeidh ar an dalta/scoláire/ball foirne féinaonrú?

translation.en: If a person was symptomatic for COVID19 they should already be selfisolating.
translation.ga: Má bhí siomptóim COVID19 ar dhuine ba chóir dóibh a bheith ag féinaonrú.

translation.en: If a close contact who was restricting their movements receives a positive COVID19 test result (SARSCoV2 detected), they are now a confirmed case of COVID19 and must selfisolate; additionally, their close contacts including household contacts must now also start restricting their movements.
translation.ga: Má fhaigheann dlúththeagmhálaí a bhí ag srianadh a ngluaiseachtaí toradh tástála deimhneach COVID19 (SARSCoV2 braite), is cás deimhnithe COVID19 anois iad agus caithfidh siad féinaonrú; chomh maith leis sin, caithfidh a ndlúth theagmhálaithe, lena náirítear teagmhálaithe teaghlaigh, tú a chur le srianadh a ngluaiseachtaí chomh maith.

translation.en: They may already have been restricting their movements, however if only one person in the house was deemed a close contact from an exposure outside the house e.g.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir go raibh siad ag srianadh a ngluaiseachtaí cheana féin, ach murar measadh ach duine amháin sa teach a bheith ina ndlúth theagmhálaí mar gheall a bheith i gcuideachta duine lasmuigh den teach e.g.

translation.en: in the school, then the other family members would not have been restricting their movements until this point.
translation.ga: sa scoil, ansin ní bheadh na baill teaghlaigh eile tar éis a bheith ag srianadh a ngluaiseachtaí go dtí an pointe seo.

translation.en: If a pupil/student//staff member has tested positive for COVID19 and self isolated for 10 days thereafter, can they return to school/work?
translation.ga: Más rud é go bhfuair dalta/scoláire/ball foirne tástáil dheimhneach i leith na haicíde COVID19 agus go ndearnadar siad an féinaonrú ar feadh 10 lá ina dhiaidh sin, an féidir leo filleadh ar an scoil/ar an obair?

translation.en: Yes, provided the following applies:
translation.ga: Is féidir, ach an méid seo a leanas a bheith cinnte:

translation.en: they have selfisolated for 10 days from onset of symptoms with last 5 days without a fever (high temperature (38 degrees Celsius or over)
translation.ga: go ndearna siad an féinaonrú ar feadh 10 lá ó theacht na nairíonna orthu agus ní raibh teocht ard acu (38 gcéim Celsius nó níos airde) le 5 lá anuas.

translation.en: if they were asymptomatic they must have selfisolated for 10 days from date of test)
translation.ga: má bhí siad aisiomptómach, níorbh fholáir dóibh 10 lá a chaitheamh i mbun féinaonraithe ó dháta na tástála.

translation.en: Close contact information
translation.ga: Faisnéis dlúththeagmhálaithe

translation.en: What is the definition of a close contact?
translation.ga: Cad é an sainmhíniú do dhlúththeagmhálaí?

translation.en: A person is deemed to be a close contact within an education setting if s/he has
translation.ga: Meastar gur dlúththeagmhálaí é duine laistigh den suíomh oideachais más amhlaidh:

translation.en: had face to face contact for <1m with a confirmed case of COVID19 for >15 minutes in a school day.
translation.ga: go raibh teagmháil aghaidharaghaidh aige le cás deimhnithe na haicíde COVID19 ar feadh breis is 15 nóiméad <1 mhéadar ar shiúl uaidh i rith lá scoile.

translation.en: been between 1 and 2 metres from a confirmed case of COVID19 for >15 minutes in a school day with consideration of other mitigation measures e.g.
translation.ga: go raibh sé idir 1 agus 2 mhéadar ar shiúl ó chás deimhnithe na haicíde COVID19 ar feadh breis is 15 nóiméad i rith lá scoile, ach bearta eile maolaithe á meas m.sh.

translation.en: facecoverings, pods, ventilation, IPC measures or uncertain compliance with mitigation measures in place (assessed through clinical PHRA)
translation.ga: na clúdaigh aghaidhe, na struchtúir suíocháin, an aeráil, bearta IPC nó comhlíonadh éiginnte le bearta maolaithe atá ann (agus rochtain orthu trí MRSP cliniciúil).

translation.en: Contacts are assessed from contact with a confirmed case of COVID19 during their infectious period 48 hours before the onset of symptoms if symptomatic, or 24 hours before the test for COVID19 was taken in those who are asymptomatic.
translation.ga: Déantar teagmhálaithe a mheas ón teagmháil le cás deimhnithe na haicíde COVID 19 le linn a dtréimhse tógálaí 48 uair a’ chloig sula dtagann airíonna orthu má tá siad siomptómach, nó 24 uair a’ chloig sula ndearnadh an tástáil COVID19 má tá siad aisiomptómach.

translation.en: Can the class of a confirmed Covid19 case attend school?
translation.ga: An féidir le rang ina bhfuil cás deimhnithe Covid19 freastal ar scoil?

translation.en: The HSE will have carried out a Public Health Risk Assessment (PHRA).
translation.ga: Beidh Measúnú Riosca Sláinte Poiblí (MRSP) déanta ag FSS.

translation.en: The only individuals who cannot attend school are those who have been identified as close contacts by Public Health.
translation.ga: Is iad na daoine a shainaithníonn Sláinte Phoiblí mar dhlúththeagmhálaithe an taon dream nach féidir leo freastal ar scoil.

translation.en: This may be a small number, for example a ‘pod’, or it could be a full class.
translation.ga: Féadfar gur líon beag daoine atá i gceist, amhail struchtúr suíochán mar eismealáir, nó féadfar gur rang iomlán atá i gceist.

translation.en: However, if a pupil/student /staff member develops symptoms which could be consisted with Covid19, they should selfisolate immediately and discuss the matter with their GP.
translation.ga: Dá bhforbróh dalta/scoláire/ball foirne siomptóim a d'fhéadfadh a bheith comhsheasmhach le Covid19 ámh, ba chóir dóibh féinaonrú láithreach bonn agus an tábhar a phlé lena ndochtúir.

translation.en: What message can be communicated to the wider school? (if required) or What should the principal do if parents of pupils/students or staff members, that have not been identified as close contact, ring the school for information on the confirmed (positive) case and other close contacts?
translation.ga: Cén teachtaireacht is féidir a chur in iúl don scoil ar fad? (más gá) nó Cad ba chóir don Phríomhoide a dhéanamh má chuireann tuismitheoirí daltaí/scoláirí nó baill foirne, nár sainaithníodh mar dhlúththeagmhálaí iad, glao ar an scoil ag fiafraí eolais ar an gcás deimhnithe (deimhneach) agus dlúththeagmhálaithe eile?

translation.en: A suggested communication would include “The HSE is guiding our school through the actions we need to take to protect staff, students and our school community.
translation.ga: Bheadh an méid seo i leanas i dteachtaireacht mholta: "Tá FSS ag treorú ár scoile trí na gníomhartha nach mór dúinn a dhéanamh chun baill foirne, scoláirí agus ár bpobal scoile a chosaint.

translation.en: A Public Health Risk Assessment has been carried out.
translation.ga: Tá Measúnú Riosca Sláinte Poiblí déanta.

translation.en: All close contacts have been identified and sent home from school to restrict their movements for 14 days.
translation.ga: Tá gach dlúth theagmhálaí curtha ar an eolas agus curtha abhaile ó scoil chun a ngluaiseachtaí a shrianadh ar feadh 14 lá.

translation.en: The school community will continue to engage with and implement Public Health advice to protect ourselves and the school community from Covid19“
translation.ga: Leanfaidh pobal na scoile ar aghaidh ag dul i ngleic le comhairle Shláinte Phoiblí agus á cur i bhfeidhm chun sinn féin agus pobal na scoile a chosaint ó Covid19."

translation.en: Can siblings or children of a staff member who is a close contact attend school?
translation.ga: An féidir le deartháireacha agus deirfiúracha nó páistí baill foirne ar dlúth theagmhálaí é nó í freastal ar scoil?

translation.en: Only the pupil/student/staff member who is a close contact needs to restrict their movements, even though they have no symptoms.
translation.ga: Ní hé ach an dalta/scoláire/ball foirne amháin ar dlúththeagmhálaí é a chaithfidh srian a chur lena ghluaiseachtaí, fiú amháin mura bhfuil airíonna le sonrú air.

translation.en: However, no other family member is required to do so – unless also identified as a close contact.
translation.ga: Ach ní chaithfidh aon bhall teaghlaigh eile é sin a dhéanamh – ach amháin go naithnítear iadsan mar dhlúththeagmhálaí freisin.

translation.en: If however the pupil/student/staff member who is a close contact develops symptoms, of COVID19 then they are a suspected case of COVID19 and should now selfisolate and contact their GP, explaining that they have been identified as a close contact of a confirmed case of COVID19 and they now have symptoms too.
translation.ga: Má thagann airíonna na haicíde COVID19 ar an dalta/ar an scoláire/ar an mball foirne ar dlúththeagmhálaí é, measfar gur cás amhrasta COVID19 é agus ba chóir dó dul i mbun féinaonraithe agus teaghmháil a dhéanamh lena DG, agus ba cheart go míneodh sé dó gur aithníodh mar dhlúththeagmhálaí de chuid cás deimhnithe na haicíde COVID19 é agus bhfuil airíonna tar éis teacht air.

translation.en: If the GP determines they are now a suspected case of COVID19, they will arrange testing and the close contact should:
translation.ga: Má chinneann an dochtúir gur cás amhrasta COVID19 anois é/í, déanfaidh sé/sí socrú le haghaidh tástála agus ba chóir don dlúththeagmhálaí na nithe seo a leanas a dhéanamh:

translation.en: continue to self isolate; and
translation.ga: leanúint ar aghaidh ag féinaonrú; agus

translation.en: household members should restrict their movements, as per guidance for household contacts of a suspected case of COVID19.
translation.ga: ba chóir do bhaill teaghlaigh a ngluaiseachtaí a shrianadh, de réir na treorach do theagmhálaithe teaghlaigh de chuid cáis amhrasta COVID19.

translation.en: Will a pupil/student’s / staff members result be shared with the educational facility?
translation.ga: An gcomhroinnfear toradh dalta/scoláire/baill foirne leis an áis oideachais?

translation.en: COVID19 tests remain confidential as per patient – doctor confidentiality.
translation.ga: Fanann torthaí thástálacha COVID19 faoi rún de réir na rúndachta idir othar agus dochtúir.

translation.en: No other pupil/student, parent, family or teacher will be informed of the results.
translation.ga: Ní chuirfear na torthaí in iúl d’aon dalta/scoláire, tuismitheoir, teaghlach ná múinteoir eile.

translation.en: However, parents should be advised at the point of testing, that if their child’s result is positive for COVID19(SARSCoV219 detected) then it will likely need to be shared with an appropriate named individual within the school/educational facility, if this is deemed necessary by the Medical Officer of Health for onward safe management of the situation.
translation.ga: Ach ba chóir a chur in iúl do thuismitheoirí ag pointe na tástála, má tá toradh a bpáiste deimhneach le haghaidh COVID19 (SARSCoV219 braite); is dócha ansin go gcaithfear é a chomhroinnt le duine ainmnithe cuí laistigh den scoil/áis oideachais, má mheasann an tOifigeach Leighis Sláinte é sin a bheith riachtanach le haghaidh bainistíocht shábháilte an cháis feasta.

translation.en: Up to date information and advice on coronavirus is available on hse.ie
translation.ga: Cuirtear ar fáil an teolas is déanaí maidir leis an gcoróinvíreas ar hse.ie

translation.ga: Ábhair chun tacú le scoláirí, tuismitheoirí agus pobail scoile maidir le filleadh go sábháilte

translation.en: Direct Communication Channels for Schools
