translation.en: What will schools be like when they reopen?
translation.ga: Conas a bheidh scoileanna nuair a athosclófar iad?

translation.en: Roadmap for the Full Return to School
translation.ga: Treochlár chun Filleadh go hiomlán ar an scoil

translation.en: There are almost 1 million students attending school in the primary and post primary sectors, across approximately 4,000 schools, in which close to 100,000 staff are employed.
translation.ga: Tá beagnach 1 mhilliún scoláire ag freastal ar scoil in earnáil na bunscoile agus na hiar bhunscoile, ar fud tuairim is 4,000 scoil, agus beagnach 100,000 ball foirne fostaithe iontu.

translation.en: The announcement on March 12th of the closure of all schools, colleges, universities and other training and learning facilities was the commencement of a series of challenges across the education sector as a result of COVID19.
translation.ga: Nuair a fógraíodh ar an 12 Márta go raibh na scoileanna, na coláistí, na hollscoileanna agus na háiseanna foghlama go léir á ndúnadh, cuireadh tús le sraith dúshlán ar fud earnáil an oideachais mar thoradh ar COVID19.

translation.en: The interests of students and their families, as well as the safety of the staff, have always been paramount as we have worked through these challenges.
translation.ga: Agus sinn ag déanamh ár mbealaigh trí na dúshláin sin, bhí leas na scoláirí agus a dteaghlach, chomh maith le leas na foirne, mar phríomhthosaíocht againn i gcónaí.

translation.en: This Roadmap set outs how schools will reopen for all students from the end of August and what the operation of our schools will look like and be sustainable in a COVID19 context.
translation.ga: Leagtar amach sa Treochlár seo an bealach a mbeidh scoileanna ag athoscailt do gach scoláire ag deireadh mhí Lúnasa agus conas a bheidh ár scoileanna ag feidhmiú agus inbhuanaithe i gcomhthéacs COVID19.

translation.en: It has been developed in line with public health advice issued by the Health Protection Surveillance Centre (HPSC), the Roadmap for Society and Business1, and follows comprehensive and intensive engagement with education stakeholders including the school management bodies and staff representatives.
translation.ga: Rinneadh é a fhorbairt ag teacht le comhairle sláinte poiblí a d’eisigh an tIonad Faireachais um Chosaint Sláinte (HPSC), dar teideal Treochlár don tSochaí agus don Ghnó1, agus i ndiaidh dul i mbun dianchomhráite cuimsitheacha leis na páirtithe leasmhara, lena náirítear comhlachtaí bainistíochta scoile agus ionadaithe foirne.

translation.en: It also reflects a consideration of approaches adopted in other jurisdictions, which have been finalised in recent weeks.
translation.ga: Tá cuir chuige a glacadh i ndlínsí eile, a tugadh chun críche le cúpla seachtain anuas, á léiriú ann freisin.

translation.en: The reopening process is a massive logistical operation, on both a national basis and local level for individual schools.
translation.ga: Oibríocht ollmhór lóistíochtúil is ea próiseas na hathoscailte, ar bhonn náisiúnta agus ar bhonn áitiúil do scoileanna aonair.

translation.en: The Public Health Advice related to reopening of schools provided by the HPSC;
translation.ga: An Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí a bhaineann le hathoscailt scoileanna atá curtha ar fáil ag HPSC;

translation.en: The COVID19 Response Plans for Primary and Special Schools and Post Primary Schools, in line with the Return to Work Safely Protocol, to be implemented in advance of schools reopening.
translation.ga: Na Pleananna um Fhreagairt do COVID19 do Bhunscoileanna, do Scoileanna Speisialta agus d’Iarbhunscoileanna, ag teacht leis an bPrótacal chun Filleadh go Sábháilte ar an Obair, atá le cur i bhfeidhm roimh athoscailt na scoileanna.

translation.en: The Roadmap for Reopening Society and Business sets out 6 overriding principles as follows:
translation.ga: Tá sé cinn de phríomhphrionsabail leagtha amach sa Treochlár chun an tSochaí agus an Gnó a Athoscailt mar seo a leanas:

translation.en: Safe informed and guided by a public health assessment of risk
translation.ga: Sábháilte faoi threoir measúnú sláinte poiblí ar riosca

translation.en: Rational includes consideration of the social and economic benefits and impacts of any modifications of restrictions and their feasibility
translation.ga: Réasúnach lena náirítear breithniú ar na buntáistí agus na tionchair shóisialta agus gheilleagracha a bheadh ag aon mhaolú ar shrianta agus an fhéidearthacht a bhaineann leis

translation.en: Evidence informed uses all of the data and research available to us to guide thinking
translation.ga: Bunaithe ar Fhianaise úsáidtear na sonraí agus an taighde go léir atá ar fáil dúinn chun an smaointeoireacht a threorú

translation.en: Fair ethical and respects human dignity, autonomy and supports equality
translation.ga: Cóir tá sé eiticiúil agus léiríonn sé meas ar dhínit an duine, ar neamhspleáchas agus tacaíonn sé le comhionannas

translation.en: Open & transparent decisions are clear, well communicated and subject to the necessary checks and balances
translation.ga: Oscailte agus trédhearcach tá na cinntí soiléir, cuirtear in iúl go maith iad agus tá siad faoi réir na srianta agus na gceartúchán atá riachtanach

translation.en: Whole of Society based on the concept of solidarity and supporting cohesion as we exit over time
translation.ga: An tSochaí ina hIomláine bunaithe ar choincheap na dlúthpháirtíochta agus ag tacú le comhtháthú de réir mar a fhágaimid le himeacht ama

translation.en: The Measures to be implemented in Schools to (i) minimise the risk of introduction of infection in our schools; and
translation.ga: Na Bearta atá le Cur i bhfeidhm sna Scoileanna chun (i) an baol a bhaineann le hionfhabhtú a thabhairt isteach inár scoileanna a íoslaghdú; agus

translation.en: managing risk of spread if introduced through:
translation.ga: bainistiú a dhéanamh ar an mbaol go scaipfidh sé trí:

translation.en: Regular and good hand hygiene;
translation.ga: Sláinteachas lámh atá rialta agus go maith;

translation.en: Good respiratory hygiene and cough etiquette;
translation.ga: Sláinteachas maith riospráide agus deabhéasa i dtaca le casacht;

translation.en: Enhanced cleaning regimes; and
translation.ga: Réimeanna glantacháin breisithe; agus

translation.en: Maintaining physical distancing in the classroom and within schools;
translation.ga: Cloí le scaradh fisiciúil sa seomra ranga agus laistigh de scoileanna;

translation.en: The suite of Additional Supports available to schools to implement their Covid 19 Response Plan and operate in a sustainable way;
translation.ga: an fhoireann de Thacaíochtaí Breise atá ar fáil do scoileanna chun a bPlean um Fhreagairt do COVID19 a chur i bhfeidhm agus feidhmiú ar bhealach inbhuanaithe;

translation.en: The arrangements to Get Children Safely to our Schools;
translation.ga: Na socruithe chun Leanaí a Thabhairt chuig ár Scoileanna ar Bhealach Sábháilte;

translation.en: How the Mental Health and Wellbeing of Students and Staff will be supported throughout the reopening process,
translation.ga: An bealach a dtabharfar tacaíocht do Mheabhairshláinte agus d’Fholláine ár Scoláirí agus ár bhFoirne le linn phróiseas na hathoscailte,

translation.en: Guidance on Learning and School Programmes in 2020/21;
translation.ga: Treoir maidir le Foghlaim agus Cláir Scoile in 2020/21

translation.en: How schools can support those staff and students who cannot attend school for health reasons related to COVID19 and in the event of a school closure in the future;
translation.ga: Conas a fhéadfaidh scoileanna tacú leis na baill foirne agus leis na scoláirí nach bhfuil ar a gcumas freastal ar scoil ar chúiseanna sláinte a bhaineann le COVID 19 agus i gcás dúnadh scoile amach anseo;

translation.en: The Communication Arrangements in place to ensure schools, school communities and all stakeholders have clear, relevant and timely information to support the reopening and continued operation of schools; and
translation.ga: Na Socruithe Cumarsáide atá i bhfeidhm lena chinntiú go mbeidh eolas atá soiléir, ábhartha agus tráthúil ag scoileanna, ag pobail scoile agus ag na páirtithe leasmhara go léir chun tacú le hathoscailt agus le feidhmiú leanúnach scoileanna; agus

translation.en: A summary on what schools will be like when they reopen.
translation.ga: Achoimre ghairid ar an mbealach a mbeidh scoileanna nuair a athosclófar iad.

translation.en: Schools will reopen for all students from the end of August.
translation.ga: Athosclófar na scoileanna do na scoláirí go léir ó dheireadh mhí Lúnasa.

translation.en: Public Health Advice
translation.ga: Comhairle Sláinte Poiblí

translation.en: On June 24th 2020, the HPSC issued COVID19 recommendations for the reopening of schools and educational facilities (the ‘Public Health Advice’) to the Department of Education to inform the development of sector specific guidance for educational settings.
translation.ga: Ar an 24 Meitheamh 2020, d'eisigh HPSC COVID19 Moltaí Eatramhacha chun scoileanna agus áiseanna oideachais a athoscailt (an ‘Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí’) chuig an Roinn Oideachais chun bonn eolais a chur faoi threoir do shuíomhanna oideachais a bhainfeadh go díreach leis an earnáil.

translation.en: The interim Public Health Advice was developed in the context of the current COVID19 epidemiology in Ireland, and it specifically notes that it will be updated to reflect the changing situation.
translation.ga: Forbraíodh an Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí eatramhach agus eipidéimeolaíocht reatha COVID19 in Éirinn mar chomhthéacs aici, agus luaitear go sonrach inti go ndéanfar í a uasdátú chun an cás a léiriú de réir mar a athraíonn sé.

translation.en: The Department and Minister has continued to engage with health authorities since the publication of the interim recommendations.
translation.ga: Lean an Roinn agus an tAire de bheith i mbun teagmhála leis na húdaráis sláinte ó foilsíodh na moltaí eatramhacha.

translation.en: The Department will continue to work with the health authorities and implement as appropriate any changes necessary to support school reopening in line with any changes to public health advice to manage the spread of COVID19.
translation.ga: Leanfaidh an Roinn ar aghaidh ag obair leis na húdaráis sláinte agus cuirfidh sí aon athruithe atá riachtanach chun tacú le hathoscailt scoileanna i bhfeidhm de réir mar is cuí ag teacht le hathruithe ar bith a thiocfaidh ar an gcomhairle sláinte poiblí chun scaipeadh COVID19 a bhainistiú.

translation.en: It has been confirmed that at the current time, there is no change to the public health advice for the reopening of schools and educational facilities that was provided at the end of June 2020 by the HPSC.
translation.ga: Tá sé deimhnithe nach bhfuil aon athrú faoi láthair ar an gcomhairle sláinte poiblí a thug HPSC ag deireadh mhí an Mheithimh 2020 maidir le hathoscailt scoileanna agus áiseanna oideachais.

translation.en: The public health authorities will keep this under review as evidence emerges from other countries where schools have reopened.
translation.ga: Déanfaidh na húdaráis sláinte athbhreithniú air seo de réir mar a thiocfaidh fianaise chun cinn ó thíortha eile a ndearnadh scoileanna a athoscailt iontu.

translation.en: The measures set out in the Public Health Advice are “aimed at risk minimization of COVID19, for young people, teachers, other staff, their families and the wider community, recognizing the importance of education for health and wellbeing and that free primary education provided by the State is a fundamental right guaranteed by the constitution” and provides clear guidance for safe school operation through the prevention, early detection and control of COVID19 in schools, predicated on two general recommendations:
translation.ga: Tá sé mar aidhm ag na bearta a leagadh amach sa Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí “íoslaghdú a dhéanamh ar an riosca a bhaineann le COVID19 i gcás daoine óga, múinteoirí, agus baill foirne eile, a dteaghlaigh agus an pobal i gcoitinne, agus aitheantas á thabhairt don tábhacht a bhaineann leis an oideachas i dtaca le sláinte agus folláine agus go bhfuil an toideachas saor in aisce a chuireann an Stát ar fáil mar cheart bunúsach faoin mbunreacht” agus cuirtear treoir shoiléir ar fáil maidir le feidhmiú sábháilte scoileanna trí COVID19 a chosc, a bhrath go luath agus a smachtú i scoileanna, agus é sin bunaithe ar dhá mholadh ginearálta.

translation.en: Minimising the risk of introduction of COVID19 into the school community; and
translation.ga: An riosca a bhaineann le COVID19 a thabhairt isteach i bpobal na scoile a íoslaghdú agus

translation.en: Managing the risk of spread if introduced through:
translation.ga: An riosca a bhaineann lena scaipeadh a bhainistiú trí:

translation.en: Regular hand hygiene;
translation.ga: Shláinteachas rialta lámh;

translation.en: Maintaining physical distancing;
translation.ga: Cloí le scaradh fisiciúil;

translation.en: Application of respiratory hygiene and cough etiquette; and
translation.ga: Sláinteachas riospráide agus béasa i dtaca le casacht a chur i bhfeidhm; agus

translation.en: Environmental hygiene.
translation.ga: Sláinteachas timpeallachta.

translation.en: All Departmental Guidance Documents referred to in the Roadmap, specifically the COVID19 Response Plans and Templates, have been developed in line with the Public Health Advice.
translation.ga: Rinneadh na Doiciméid Threoracha go léir de chuid na Roinne dá dtagraítear sa Treochlár, go háirithe na Pleananna agus na Teimpléid um Fhreagairt do COVID19, a fhorbairt chun teacht leis an gComhairle Sláinte Poiblí.

translation.en: Beyond the specific detailed guidance within the Public Health Advice, there are a number of broad themes outlined in the advice which are critical to our ability to minimising risk associated with COVID19 in our schools:
translation.ga: Treochlár chun Filleadh go hIomlán ar Scoileanna

translation.en: Roadmap for Full Return to Schools
translation.ga: Taobh amuigh den treoir shonrach mhionsonraithe taobh istigh den Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí, tá roinnt téamaí leathana léirithe sa chomhairle, ar téamaí iad atá fíorthábhachtach maidir lenár gcumas an riosca a bhaineann le COVID19 inár scoileanna a íoslaghdú:

translation.en: A Balanced Approach
translation.ga: Cur Chuige Cothrom

translation.en: “One of the key challenges for schools during this pandemic is to balance the need for a practical and sensible level of caution with the need to provide a supportive environment for pupils/students and where teachers feel able to engage with pupils in a way that supports their learning”
translation.ga: “Ceann de na príomhdhúshláin atá roimh scoileanna le linn na paindéime seo is ea cothromaíocht a aimsiú idir an gá atá le leibhéal cúraim atá praiticiúil agus ciallmhar agus an gá atá le timpeallacht chuiditheach a chur ar fáil do dhaltaí/scoláirí agus ina bhféadfaidh múinteoirí dul i mbun caidrimh le daltaí ar bhealach a thacaíonn lena gcuid foghlama.

translation.en: Apply CommonSense
translation.ga: Ciall Choiteann a Úsáid

translation.en: “An atmosphere of fear and an overwhelming preoccupation with infection and hygiene can be harmful to teachers and pupils and to the quality of the educational experience without materially reducing the risk of infection beyond what can be achieved with a commonsense approach”
translation.ga: “D'fhéadfadh an iomarca imní faoi ionfhabhtú agus faoi shláinteachas dochar a dhéanamh do mhúinteoirí agus do dhaltaí agus do chaighdeán an eispéiris foghlama agus ag an am céanna nach laghdófaí an baol ionfhabhtaithe níos mó ná mar a dhéanfaí dá mbeadh cur chuige ciallmhar i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: Create Awareness
translation.ga: Cruthaigh Feasacht

translation.en: “A heightened awareness by staff, parents and children (where age appropriate) is required so that they know how to protect themselves and each other and how to recognise and report symptoms of COVID19 infection”
translation.ga: “Tá feasacht níos mó ag teastáil i measc baill foirne, tuismitheoirí agus leanaí (nuair atá sin oiriúnach de réir aoise) ionas go mbeidh a fhios acu conas iad féin agus a chéile a chosaint agus conas na comharthaí a bhaineann le hionfhabhtú COVID19 a aithint agus a thuairisciú.

translation.en: Do Everything Practical to Avoid Introduction of COVID19 into the school “The most critical part of managing the risks of COVID19 related to schools is doing everything practical to avoid introduction of COVID19 into the school.
translation.ga: Déan gach rud atá praiticiúil chun nach dtabharfar COVID19 isteach sa scoil “Is í an chuid is tábhachtaí ar fad de bhainistiú rioscaí COVID19 faoi mar a bhaineann siad le scoileanna ná gach rud atá praiticiúil a dhéanamh ionas nach dtabharfar COVID19 isteach sa scoil.

translation.en: If the infection is not introduced it cannot spread.
translation.ga: Mura dtugtar isteach an tionfhabhtú ní féidir leis scaipeadh.

translation.en: The risk of introduction is related to how common the infection is in the community served by the school at a given time.
translation.ga: Tá gaol idir an riosca a bhaineann lena thabhairt isteach agus chomh forleathan agus atá an tionfhabhtú sa phobal a ndéanann an scoil freastal air ag am faoi leith.

translation.en: If the infection is uncommon in the community then the likelihood of introduction is much lower”
translation.ga: Mura bhfuil an t ionfhabhtú forleathan sa phobal, is lú an seans go dtabharfar isteach é”

translation.en: Stay at Home if Unwell
translation.ga: Fan sa Bhaile mura bhfuil tú ar Fónamh

translation.en: “No person (child, teacher or parent) should attend an educational setting if unwell or any members of their household are unwell with symptoms consistent with COVID19”
translation.ga: “Níor cheart do dhuine ar bith (leanbh, múinteoir nó tuismitheoir) freastal ar shuíomh oideachais má tá sé/sí tinn nó má tá aon duine sa teach tinn agus comharthaí atá ag teacht le COVID19 á léiriú aige/aici.

translation.en: Keep doing the key measures to keep us all safe
translation.ga: Lean ort ag déanamh na bpríomhbheart chun muid go léir a choinneáil slán

translation.en: “Social (Physical) distancing, hand hygiene and good respiratory etiquette should be observed by all (children, teachers, parents and visitors)”
translation.ga: Ba cheart go gcloífeadh gach duine le scaradh Sóisialta (Fisiciúil), sláinteachas lámh agus deabhéasa riospráide (leanaí, múinteoirí, tuismitheoirí agus cuairteoirí)”

translation.en: Roadmap for Full Return to Schools
translation.ga: Treochlár chun Filleadh go hIomlán ar Scoileanna

translation.en: A key element to ensuring that school remain open once they reopen is for everyone in the school community (students, their families and staff) to continue to play their role in keeping the virus out of their school by adopting behaviours in harmony with these broad themes.
translation.ga: Ionas go bhfanfaidh na scoileanna ar oscailt nuair a athosclófar iad, tá sé ríthábhachtach go leanfadh gach duine i bpobal na scoile (scoláirí, a dteaghlaigh, agus an fhoireann) den ról atá acu maidir leis an víreas a choinneáil amach as a scoil féin agus nósanna iompair a ghlacadh chucu féin atá ag teacht leis na téamaí leathana sin.

translation.en: The Return to Work Safely Protocol, prepared by the Department of Business, Enterprise and Innovation and the Department of Health, is designed to:
translation.ga: Tá an Prótacal chun Filleadh go Sábháilte ar an Obair, a d’ullmhaigh an Roinn Gnó, Fiontar agus Nuálaíochta agus an Roinn Sláinte, ceaptha chun:

translation.en: support employers and workers to put measures in place that will prevent the spread of COVID19 in the workplace; and
translation.ga: tacú le fostóirí agus le hoibrithe bearta a dhéanamh a choiscfidh scaipeadh COVID19 san ionad oibre; agus

translation.en: to adapt their workplace procedures and practices to comply fully with the COVID 19 related public health protection measures identified as necessary by the HSE.
translation.ga: a nósanna imeachta agus a gcleachtais san ionad oibre a oiriúnú chun cloí go hiomlán leis na bearta um chosaint sláinte phoiblí a bhaineann le COVID19 agus a mheas Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte go raibh siad riachtanach.

translation.en: It sets out the steps that must be taken before a workplace reopens, and through its operation, including:
translation.ga: Leagtar amach ann na céimeanna nach mór a ghlacadh sula ndéantar ionad oibre a athoscailt, agus trína chuid oibríochta, lena náirítear:

translation.en: mandatory COVID19 induction training;
translation.ga: oiliúint ionduchtaithe éigeantach maidir le COVID19;

translation.en: the appointment of at least one lead worker representative charged with ensuring that COVID19 measures are strictly adhered to in their place of work; and
translation.ga: príomhionadaí amháin ar a laghad ó na hoibrithe a cheapadh a mbeidh sé de chúram air nó uirthi a chinntiú go gcloífear go docht le bearta COVID19 ina n ionad oibre; agus

translation.en: processes to deal with suspected cases of COVID19.
translation.ga: Próisis chun déileáil le cásanna amhrasta de COVID19.

translation.en: Schools are places of learning for students whilst all schools are also places of work.
translation.ga: Is ionaid foghlama do scoláirí iad scoileanna ach chomh maith leis sin is ionaid oibre iad.

translation.en: The Return to Work Safely Protocol will be implemented in all schools.
translation.ga: Cuirfear an Prótacal chun Filleadh go Sábháilte ar an Obair i bhfeidhm i ngach scoil.

translation.en: To support schools to implement the Protocol the Department has developed COVID19 Response Plan template documentation tailored to reflect the differences between Post Primary Schools and Primary and Special Schools.
translation.ga: Chun tacú le scoileanna agus an Prótacal á chur i bhfeidhm acu, tá doiciméid a bhaineann leis an teimpléad don Phlean um Fhreagairt do COVID19 ullmhaithe ag an Roinn, ar doiciméid iad atá saincheaptha chun na difríochtaí idir Iarbhunscoileanna, Bunscoileanna agus Scoileanna Speisialta a léiriú.

translation.en: The completion and implementation of the Covid19 Response Plan by a school is the means through which schools can best prevent the introduction and spread of Covid19 in the school environment.
translation.ga: Is é cur i gcrích agus feidhmiú an Phlean um Fhreagairt do Covid19 ag scoil an bealach is fearr ina bhféadfaidh scoileanna tabhairt isteach agus scaipeadh Covid19 a chosc i dtimpeallacht na scoile.

translation.en: It is a very important living document which will be adapted over time to reflect the evolving COVID19 context.
translation.ga: Is doiciméad beo é atá antábhachtach é agus déanfar é a oiriúnú thar thréimhse ama chun comhthéacs COVID19 a léiriú agus an comhthéacs sin ag athrú.

translation.en: The COVID19 Response Plan templates has been developed in line with Public Health Advice, the guidance provided by the Health and Safety Authority (HSA).
translation.ga: Forbraíodh na teimpléid don Phlean um Fhreagairt do COVID19 ag teacht le Comhairle Sláinte Poiblí, an treoir a chuir an tÚdarás Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta (HSA) ar fáil.

translation.en: They have been prepared and shared with the education partners.
translation.ga: Rinneadh iad a ullmhú agus a roinnt leis na comhpháirtithe oideachais.

translation.en: This centralised approach was adopted to reduce the administrative burden on schools and enable a consistency of approach across the sector.
translation.ga: Glacadh an cur chuige láraithe sin chun an tualach riaracháin ar scoileanna a laghdú agus chun cur chuige comhsheasmhach a chumasú ar fud na hearnála.

translation.en: a draft COVID19 Policy Document to be updated by each school;
translation.ga: Dréacht de Dhoiciméad Polasaí COVID19 atá le huasdátú ag gach scoil;

translation.en: the relevant prereturn to work steps to be completed by both the school management and staff;
translation.ga: Na céimeanna cuí atá le glacadh sula bhfillfear ar an obair agus iad le cur i gcrích ag bainistíocht agus ag foireann na scoile;

translation.en: the process for the appointment of a ‘Lead Worker Representative’ at school level, as agreed by the Department and staff representatives;
translation.ga: An próiseas chun Príomhionadaí de chuid na nOibrithe a cheapadh ag leibhéal na scoile, faoi mar atá comhaontaithe idir an Roinn agus ionadaithe na foirne;

translation.en: a risk assessment template to identify any risks to be managed at school level (developed in conjunction with the HSA);
translation.ga: teimpléad measúnaithe riosca chun aon rioscaí a aithint, ar rioscaí iad atá le bainistiú ag leibhéal na scoile (a forbraíodh i gcomhar leis an HSA);

translation.en: various checklists to allow for planning and reopening of schools, including induction training, dealing with suspected cases and cleaning of schools are also included;
translation.ga: seicliostaí éagsúla chun go bhféadfar pleanáil agus athoscailt scoileanna a dhéanamh, lena náirítear oiliúint ionduchtaithe, tá dul i ngleic le cásanna amhrasta agus glanadh scoileanna etc san áireamh freisin;

translation.en: Guidance on restricted access to the school facility for persons other than staff and students for essential purposes and limited to those who have prior approval from the Principal; and
translation.ga: Treoir maidir le rochtain shrianta ar áis na scoile do dhaoine seachas foireann agus scoláirí chun críocha fíorriachtanacha agus í teoranta dóibh siúd a bhfuil cead faighte ón bPríomhoide roimh ré acu agus

translation.en: Guidance related to the prompt identification and isolation of potentially infectious individuals whereby schools will be required to maintain a log of staff and pupil/student contacts and a detailed sign in/sign out log of those visiting the school facility will require to be maintained.
translation.ga: Treoir a bhaineann le daoine a d'fhéadfadh a bheith ionfhabhtaíoch a aithint agus a leithlisiú go pras agus caithfidh scoileanna freisin loga a choinneáil de theagmhálaithe na foirne agus na ndaltaí/scoláirí agus loga mionsonraithe um shíniú isteach/shíniú amach a choinneáil díobh siúd a thagann ar cuairt chuig an scoil.

translation.en: Where there is a suspected case of COVID19 in a school, the COVID19 Response Plan Guidance also sets out steps schools should take as follows:
translation.ga: Más rud é go bhfuil cás amhrasta de COVID19 i scoil, leagtar amach freisin sa Treoir don Phlean um Fhreagairt do COVID19 na céimeanna ba cheart do scoileanna a ghlacadh mar seo a leanas:

translation.en: Bring the person to the designated isolation area available in each school;
translation.ga: Tabhair an duine chuig an limistéar leithlisithe ainmnithe atá ar fáil sa scoil;

translation.en: Arrangements to contact parents/guardians in the event of a suspected case in a pupil/student;
translation.ga: Socruithe chun teagmháil a dhéanamh le tuismitheoirí/caomhnóirí i gcás go bhfuiltear den tuairim go bhféadfadh an galar a bheith tolgtha ag dalta/scoláire;

translation.en: Facilitate the person remaining in isolation if they cannot go home immediately;
translation.ga: Freastal a dhéanamh ar an duine atá leithlisithe mura bhféadfaidh sé/sí dul abhaile láithreach;

translation.en: Supporting the making of arrangements for transport home or if they are too unwell to go home to contact 999 or 112 to advise it is a COVID19 suspected case;
translation.ga: Tacú le socruithe a dhéanamh chun an duine a iompar abhaile nó má tá sé/sí róbhreoite chun dul abhaile teagmháil a dhéanamh le 999 nó 112 chun a chur in iúl gur cás amhrasta de COVID19 atá ann;

translation.en: Carrying out an assessment of the incident to determine follow up actions; and
translation.ga: Measúnú a dhéanamh ar an eachtra chun gníomhartha leantacha a chinneadh; agus

translation.en: Arrangements for the appropriate cleaning of the isolation and work areas.
translation.ga: Socruithe chun glantachán cuí a dhéanamh ar na limistéir leithlisithe agus oibre.

translation.en: Where there is a suspected or confirmed case of COVID19 amongst school staff or pupils, schools need to maintain both staff and pupil confidentiality at all times and must follow the instructions of HSE Public Health.
translation.ga: Nuair atá cás amhrasta nó deimhnithe de COVID19 i measc fhoireann nó scoláirí na scoile, ní mór go gcosnódh scoileanna rúndacht na foirne agus na scoláirí i gcónaí agus ní mór go leanfaidís Treoir Sláinte Poiblí FSS.

translation.en: inform any staff/parents or students who come into close contact with a diagnosed case via the contact tracing process;
translation.ga: cuirfidh siad aon bhaill foirne/tuismitheoirí nó scoláirí a raibh dlúththeagmháil acu leis an gcás atá diagnóisithe ar an eolas tríd an bpróiseas um rianú teagmhálaithe; agus

translation.en: contact all relevant persons where a diagnosis of COVID19 is made; and
translation.ga: rachaidh siad i dteagmháil leis na daoine ábhartha go léir más rud é go ndéantar COVID19 a dhiagnóisiú;

translation.en: advise on the appropriate action, on a casebycase basis, that should be taken visàvis the operation of the school.
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh siad treoir, cás ar chás, maidir leis an ngníomh cuí ba cheart a dhéanamh maidir le feidhmiú na scoile.

translation.en: Measures and Operational Changes to be implemented in Schools
translation.ga: Bearta agus Athruithe Oibríochta atá le feidhmiú i Scoileanna

translation.en: The measures set out in the Public Health Advice are predicated on two general recommendations:
translation.ga: Tá na bearta atá leagtha amach sa Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí bunaithe ar dhá mholadh ginearálta:

translation.en: Minimising the risk of introduction of COVID19 into the school community; and
translation.ga: An riosca a bhaineann le COVID19 a thabhairt isteach i bpobal na scoile a íoslaghdú; agus

translation.en: Managing the risk of spread if introduced through:
translation.ga: An riosca a bhaineann lena scaipeadh a bhainistiú trí:

translation.en: Regular hand hygiene;
translation.ga: Shláinteachas rialta lámh;

translation.en: Maintaining physical distancing;
translation.ga: Cloí le scaradh fisiciúil;

translation.en: Application of respiratory hygiene and cough etiquette; and
translation.ga: Sláinteachas riospráide agus béasa i dtaca le casacht a chur i bhfeidhm; agus

translation.en: Environmental hygiene.
translation.ga: Sláinteachas timpeallachta.

translation.en: In terms of Minimising the risk of introduction of COVID19 into the school community, it is critical that people stay at home if unwell.
translation.ga: Maidir leis an riosca a bhaineann le COVID19 a thabhairt isteach i bpobal na scoile a íoslaghdú, tá sé fíorthábhachtach go bhfanfadh daoine sa bhaile mura bhfuil siad ar fónamh.

translation.en: Nobody should go to school if they are unwell or any members of their household are unwell with symptoms consistent with COVID19.
translation.ga: Níor cheart do dhuine ar bith dul ar scoil má tá an duine sin nó aon bhaill de líon tí an duine sin tinn agus comharthaí á léiriú aige nó aici atá ag teacht le COVID19.

translation.en: In managing the risk of spread of COVID19 if introduced into the school community, this section sets out the specific guidance and supports available to schools relating to:
translation.ga: Agus an riosca a bhaineann le scaipeadh COVID19, má thugtar isteach i bpobal na scoile é, á bhainistiú, leagtar amach sa chuid seo an treoir shonrach agus na tacaíochtaí atá ar fáil do scoileanna maidir le:

translation.en: Supporting and promoting good hand hygiene;
translation.ga: Tacú le deashláinteachas lámh agus é a chur chun cinn;

translation.en: Enhanced cleaning regimes within our schools;
translation.ga: Réimeanna glantacháin breisithe laistigh dár scoileanna;

translation.en: Maintaining physical distancing within schools and in the classroom; and
translation.ga: Cloí le scaradh fisiciúil laistigh de scoileanna agus sa seomra ranga; agus

translation.en: The use of face coverings/masks in schools.
translation.ga: Úsáid clúdach aghaidhe / masc i scoileanna.

translation.en: Supporting and Promoting Good Hand Hygiene
translation.ga: Tacú le Deashláinteachas Lámh agus é a Chur Chun Cinn

translation.en: Section 5.1 of the Public Health Advice stresses the importance of regular and good hand hygiene as a key control measure to minimise the risk of spread of COVID19 in infection is introduced.
translation.ga: Leagtar béim i gCuid 5.1 den Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí ar an tábhacht a bhaineann le deashláinteachas lámh mar phríomhbheart rialaithe chun an riosca a bhaineann le scaipeadh COVID19 a íoslaghdú má thugtar an tionfhabhtú isteach.

translation.en: The Public Health Advice provides practical guidance on:
translation.ga: Cuireann an Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí comhairle phraiticiúil ar fáil maidir le:

translation.en: Frequency of hand hygiene;
translation.ga: Minicíocht sláinteachais lámh;

translation.en: Measures to support and promote good hand hygiene;
translation.ga: Bearta chun tacú le deashláinteachas lámh agus é a chur chun cinn;

translation.en: Guidance on hand washing facilities, hand washing products and hand sanitiser.
translation.ga: Treoir maidir le háiseanna chun lámha a ní, táirgí a bhaineann le níochán lámh agus díghalrán lámh.

translation.en: Schools should carefully consider how best to apply this section of the Public Health Advice on hand hygiene in their school.
translation.ga: Ba cheart do scoileanna breithniú cúramach a dhéanamh ar an mbealach is fearr chun an chuid sin den Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí a bhaineann le sláinteachas lámh a chur i bhfeidhm ina scoil féin.

translation.en: In support of this work, schools will be provided by the Department with:
translation.ga: Chun tacú leis an obair sin, cuirfidh an Roinn na nithe seo a leanas ar fáil do scoileanna:

translation.en: access to training on when to wash hands and how to wash them properly.
translation.ga: rochtain ar oiliúint faoin uair ba cheart lámha a ní agus conas iad a ní i gceart.

translation.en: posters for display throughout the school to promote good hand hygiene; and
translation.ga: póstaeir le cur ar taispeáint ar fud na scoile chun deashláinteachas lámh a chur chun cinn; agus

translation.en: access to hand hygiene products and consumables through a centralised drawdown framework (as described later in this Roadmap).
translation.ga: Rochtain ar tháirgí agus ar thomhaltáin maidir le sláinteachas lámh trí chreat soláthair íostarraingthe láraithe (a bhfuil cur síos air níos faide ar aghaidh sa Treochlár seo).

translation.en: In addition, in primary schools a focus will be placed on the use of the Social, Personal and Health Education (SPHE) programme as a way to promote personal hygiene including proper hand hygiene for younger pupils.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, sna bunscoileanna, díreofar ar úsáid a bhaint as an gclár don Oideachas Sóisialta, Pearsanta agus Sláinte (OSPS) mar bhealach chun sláinteachas pearsanta a chur chun cinn, lena náirítear sláinteachas ceart lámh do dhaltaí óga.

translation.en: As noted in the Public Health Advice “Hand hygiene can be achieved by hand washing or use of a sanitiser (when hands look clean)”.
translation.ga: Faoi mar a luadh sa Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí “Féadfar sláinteachas lámh a bhaint amach trí lámha a ní nó díghalrán a úsáid (nuair a fhéachann na lámha glan)”.

translation.en: As existing handwashing facilities in schools were not designed for the enhanced level of handwashing envisaged necessary in a post COVID19 environment without significantly impacting on educational class time, funding will be provided to augment hand hygiene facilities in schools.
translation.ga: De bhrí nár dearadh na háiseanna chun lámha a ní i scoileanna don leibhéal breisithe maidir le níochán lámh atá riachtanach i dtimpeallacht iarCOVID19 gan cur isteach go suntasach ar am oideachais sa rang, cuirfear maoiniú ar fáil chun cur leis na háiseanna i gcomhair sláinteachas lámh i scoileanna.

translation.en: Given that hand sanitisers can be deployed more readily at entry and exit points of schools and for classrooms, the Department will provide funding to schools to install and use hand sanitisers for each classroom and other key locations (entry/exit points) in their school.
translation.ga: Ó tharla go bhfuil sé níos éasca díghalráin lámh a lonnú ag an mbealach isteach agus ag an mbealach amach sa scoil agus sna seomraí ranga, cuirfidh an Roinn maoiniú ar fáil do scoileanna ionas go ndéanfaidh siad díghalráin lámh a shuiteáil agus a úsáid do gach seomra ranga agus do phríomhshuíomhanna eile (bealaí isteach/amach) ina scoil féin.

translation.en: Schools will have access to hand sanitiser dispensers, and the ongoing supply of sanitiser for each school through a centralised drawdown framework.
translation.ga: Beidh rochtain ag scoileanna ar dháileoirí díghalrán lámh, agus ar sholáthar leanúnach de leacht díghalráin trí chreat íostarraingthe láraithe.

translation.en: The framework will be available for drawdown from early August and detailed guidance will issue to schools on how to use it.
translation.ga: Beidh an creat ar fáil le híostarraingt ó thús mhí Lúnasa agus eiseofar treoir mhionsonraithe chuig scoileanna faoin mbealach lena úsáid.

translation.en: The above measures will be important elements in ensuring that best practice in hand hygiene is applied in schools.
translation.ga: Beidh na gnéithe thuas mar ghnéithe tábhachtacha lena chinntiú go gcuirfear dea chleachtas i dtaca le sláinteachas lámh i bhfeidhm i scoileanna

translation.en: Enhanced Cleaning Regimes in our Schools
translation.ga: Réimeanna Glantacháin Breisithe inár Scoileanna

translation.en: In line with the Public Health Advice, more regular and enhanced cleaning regimes will need to be implemented in each school to manage the risk of introduction and spread of COVID19.
translation.ga: Ag teacht le Comhairle Sláinte Poiblí, beidh sé riachtanach réimeanna glantacháin atá níos rialta agus níos fearr a chur i bhfeidhm i ngach scoil chun bainistíocht a dhéanamh ar an riosca a bhaineann le COVID19 a thabhairt isteach agus a scaipeadh.

translation.en: Section 5.5 and 5.6 of the Public Health Advice provides relevant guidance to schools on effective school cleaning including:
translation.ga: I gcuid 5.5 agus 5.6 den Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí, cuirtear treoir chuí ar fáil do scoileanna maidir le glantachán éifeachtach lena náirítear:

translation.en: steps to be taken before reopening the school;
translation.ga: na céimeanna atá le glacadh sula ndéanfar an scoil a athoscailt;

translation.en: how to clean;
translation.ga: conas glantachán a dhéanamh;

translation.en: the options for both routine and post COVID19 case cleaning for surfaces, toilets and equipment;
translation.ga: na roghanna maidir le gnáthghlantachán ar dhromchlaí, ar leithris agus ar threalamh agus glantachán i ndiaidh cáis de COVID19.

translation.en: guidance on cleaning of shared equipment in schools such as musical instruments, art materials, electronic and sports equipment.
translation.ga: treoir maidir le trealamh comhroinnte i scoileanna a ghlanadh amhail gléasanna ceoil, ábhair ealaíne, trealamh leictreonach agus spóirt.

translation.en: guidance on how to manage cleaning of toys for young children and for the care of equipment and aids for pupils with special educational needs;
translation.ga: treoir maidir leis an mbealach chun glantachán bréagán do leanaí óga a bhainistiú agus aire a thabhairt do threalamh agus d’áiseanna do dhaltaí a bhfuil riachtanais speisialta oideachais acu.

translation.en: the PPE to be used for cleaning in schools as well as the waste management treatment of materials resulting from routine cleaning and post COVID19 cases.
translation.ga: an Trealamh Cosanta Pearsanta (PPE) a úsáidfear i gcomhair glantacháin i scoileanna chomh maith le bainistíocht dramhaíola a dhéanamh ar na hábhair a bhíonn fágtha mar thoradh ar ghnáthghlantachán agus i ndiaidh cásanna de COVID19.

translation.en: that each setting in a school should be cleaned at least once per day and where there is access to additional cleaning support during school hours it should be focused on frequently touched objects and surfaces; and
translation.ga: gur cheart gach suíomh sa scoil a ghlanadh uair amháin in aghaidh an lae ar a laghad agus má tá rochtain ar thacaíocht ghlantacháin sa bhreis le linn uaireanta scoile ba cheart an glantachán a dhíriú ar nithe agus ar dhromchlaí a dteagmhaítear leo go minic; agus

translation.en: the cleaning steps that should take place in a school room where an individual with suspected or confirmed COVID19 was present as well as the arrangements needed for communal areas the person may have visited/used.
translation.ga: na céimeanna glantacháin ba cheart a ghlacadh i seomra scoile ina raibh duine a bhfuil amhras ann nó a bhfuil sé deimhnithe go bhfuil COVID19 tolgtha aige nó aici chomh maith leis na socruithe atá riachtanach do limistéir chomhchoiteanna a bhféadfadh sé gur thug an duine sin cuairt orthu nó gur úsáid sé/sí iad.

translation.en: In support of schools implementing this enhanced cleaning regime in line with the Public Health Advice and the COVID19 Response Plan, schools will be provided with:
translation.ga: Chun tacaíocht a thabhairt do scoileanna agus an réim ghlantacháin bhreisithe seo á feidhmiú acu ag teacht leis an gComhairle Sláinte Poiblí agus leis an bPlean um Fhreagairt do COVID19, cuirfear na nithe seo a leanas ar fáil do scoileanna:

translation.en: A template checklist within the COVIDResponse Plan related to cleaning;
translation.ga: seicliosta teimpléid a bhaineann le glantachán laistigh den Phlean um Fhreagairt do COVID19;

translation.en: A module in the Induction Training Programme which focuses on cleaning; and
translation.ga: Modúl sa Chlár Oiliúna Ionduchtaithe atá dírithe ar ghlantachán; agus

translation.en: A COVID19 capitation grant to fund the cost of enhanced cleaning regimes within schools.
translation.ga: Deontas caipitíochta do COVID19 chun an costas a bhaineann le réimeanna glantacháin breisithe laistigh de scoileanna a mhaoiniú.

translation.en: Maintaining Physical Distancing in Schools
translation.ga: Cloí le Scaradh Fisiciúil i Scoileanna

translation.en: The Public Health Advice sets out the
translation.ga: Leagtar amach sa Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí

translation.en: “..the principle of distancing can be usefully applied in the school setting, allowing for some flexibility when needed whilst noting that it must be applied in a practical way, recognising that the learning environment cannot be dominated by a potentially counterproductive focus on this issue”.
translation.ga: “.. gur féidir an prionsabal a bhaineann le scaradh a fheidhmiú ar bhealach atá úsáideach i suíomh na scoile, agus roinnt solúbthachta á cheadú nuair is gá agus ag an am céanna luaitear nach mór é a fheidhmiú ar bhealach praiticiúil, agus admhaítear nach bhféadfar bheith ag ródhíriú ar an gceist i dtimpeallacht foghlama mar gur mó dochar ná maitheas a d'fhéadfadh sé sin a dhéanamh”.

translation.en: In terms of maintaining physical distancing, measures outlined in the Public Health Advice fall into two broad categories:
translation.ga: Maidir le cloí le scaradh fisiciúil baineann na bearta a bhfuil breacchuntas orthu sa Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí le dhá aicme leathana:

translation.en: Increasing separation;
translation.ga: Scaradh a mhéadú;

translation.en: Decreasing interaction between students themselves, between students and staff and between staff when they are together;
translation.ga: Laghdú a dhéanamh ar an idirghníomhaíocht idir na scoláirí féin, idir scoláirí agus an fhoireann agus idir na baill foirne agus iad le chéile;

translation.en: the implementation of physical distancing will look different across the various ages and stages of learning;
translation.ga: go mbeidh feidhmiú an scartha fhisiciúil éagsúil ar fud na naoiseanna agus na gcéimeanna faoi leith a bhaineann leis an bhfoghlaim;

translation.en: care should be taken to avoid generating tension or potential conflict and some flexibility in the implementation of measures may be required at times; and
translation.ga: gur cheart bheith cúramach maidir le teannas nó coimhlint a d'fhéadfadh teacht chun cinn a sheachaint agus d'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh gá le solúbthacht i dtaca le feidhmiú na mbeart anois agus arís; agus

translation.en: staff will not always be able to maintain physical distance from their students and it is not appropriate that they would be expected to do so where this could have a detrimental impact on the student or the learning and health and safety of other students.
translation.ga: nach i gcónaí a bheidh an fhoireann ábalta scaradh fisiciúil a choinneáil óna gcuid scoláirí agus nár cheart go mbeifí ag súil go ndéanfaidís sin sa chás go mbeadh tionchar diúltach aige sin ar an scoláire nó ar fhoghlaim agus ar shláinte agus sábháilteacht scoláirí eile.

translation.en: Given that each school setting is different in terms of (i) location; (ii) physical layout (iii) available space within the school; and (iv) student numbers
translation.ga: Ó tharla go bhfuil suíomh éagsúil i ngach scoil maidir le (i) láthair; (ii) leagan amach fisiciúil (iii) an spás atá ar fáil laistigh den scoil; agus (iv) líon na scoláirí;

translation.en: schools themselves are best placed to decide on the appropriate reconfigurations / operational changes necessary to maintain physical distancing.
translation.ga: is ag an scoil féin is fearr atá a fhios cén cinneadh ba cheart a dhéanamh maidir le hathchumrú cuí /maidir leis na hathruithe oibríochta atá riachtanach chun scaradh fisiciúil a choinneáil.

translation.en: Section 5.3 of the Public Health Advice outlines the practical measures that should be considered and, if appropriate, implemented in schools at both primary and post primary level.
translation.ga: Tá breacchuntas i gcuid 5.3 den Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí ar na bearta praiticiúla ba cheart a bhreithniú agus, más cuí, a fheidhmiú i scoileanna ag leibhéal na bunscoile agus na hiarbhunscoile araon.

translation.en: The implementation of physical reconfiguration measures in schools, allied to the additional supports set out later in this Roadmap, provide the operational means through which physical distancing within schools can be maintained.
translation.ga: Cuireann feidhmiú na mbeart a bhaineann le hathchumrú fisiciúil i scoileanna, chomh maith leis na tacaíochtaí breise atá leagtha amach níos faide ar aghaidh sa Treochlár seo, modh oibríochta ar fáil trína bhféadfar cloí le scaradh fisiciúil laistigh de scoileanna.

translation.en: Specific additional guidance on the matter on maintaining physical distancing within the classroom at both primary and post primary level is set out below.
translation.ga: Leagtar amach thios treoir shonrach bhreise i dtaca le cloí le scaradh fisiciúil laistigh den seomra ranga ag leibhéal na bunscoile agus na hiarbhunscoile araon.

translation.en: Maintaining physical distance in the classroom Primary
translation.ga: Cloí le scaradh fisiciúil sa seomra ranga Bunscoileanna

translation.en: The Public Health Advice sets out the guidelines for maintaining physical distance in the classroom as primary level:
translation.ga: Leagtar amach sa Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí na treoirlínte maidir le cloí le scaradh fisiciúil sa seomra ranga ag leibhéal na bunscoile:

translation.en: A distance of 1 metre should be maintained between desks or between individual pupils.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go gcoinneofaí achar aon mhéadar idir na deasca nó idir daltaí aonair.

translation.en: It is recognised that younger children are unlikely to maintain physical distancing indoors.
translation.ga: Aithnítear nach dócha go gcloífidh leanaí óga le scaradh fisiciúil agus iad taobh istigh.

translation.en: Therefore, achieving this recommendation in the first 4 years of primary school, is not a prerequisite to reopening a primary school for all pupils.
translation.ga: Dá bhrí sin, ní gá go mbainfí amach an moladh sin sna chéad cheithre bliana sa bhunscoil, le go nathosclófaí bunscoil do na daltaí go léir.

translation.en: Where possible, workstations should be allocated consistently to the same staff and children rather than having spaces that are shared.
translation.ga: Nuair is féidir sin a dhéanamh, ba cheart stáisiúin oibre a dháileadh ar na baill foirne agus ar na leanaí céanna i gcónaí seachas spásanna comhroinnte a bheith ann.

translation.en: The risk of spread of infection may be reduced by structuring pupils and their teachers into Class Bubbles (i.e.
translation.ga: Féadfar laghdú a dhéanamh ar an riosca a bhaineann le hionfhabhtú a scaipeadh má dhéantar daltaí agus a gcuid múinteoirí a shocrú mar Bholgáin Ranga (i.e.

translation.en: a class grouping which stays apart from other classes as much as possible) and discrete groups or ‘Pods’ within those class bubbles, to the extent that this is practical.
translation.ga: rangghrúpa a fhanann deighilte ó ranganna eile a oiread agus is féidir) agus grúpaí discréideacha nó ‘Faighneogal’ laistigh de na bolgáin ranga sin, a oiread agus atá sin indéanta.

translation.en: If a class is divided into Pods, there should be at least 1m distance between individual Pods within the Class Bubble and between individuals in the pod, whenever possible.
translation.ga: Má roinntear rang ina Fhaighneog, ba cheart go mbeadh méadar amháin ar a laghad idir gach Faighneog laistigh den Bholgán Ranga agus idir daoine aonair sa chochall, aon uair is féidir.

translation.en: Generally speaking the objective is to limit contact and sharing of common facilities between people in different Class Bubbles (and Pods within those Class Bubbles) as much as possible, rather than to avoid all contact between Pods, as the latter will not always be possible.
translation.ga: Tríd is tríd, is é an cuspóir atá leis ná teagmháil agus roinnt áiseanna comhchoiteanna idir daoine i mBolgáin Ranga éagsúla (agus idir Faighneoga laistigh de na Bolgáin Ranga sin) a theorannú a oiread agus is féidir, seachas gach teagmháil idir Bolgáin a sheachaint, mar nach i gcónaí is féidir é sin a dhéanamh.

translation.en: The aim of the system within the school, is that each class grouping mix only with their own class from arrival at school in the morning until departure at the end of the school day.
translation.ga: Is é atá mar aidhm ag an gcóras laistigh den scoil ná nach mbeadh gach rang ghrúpa ag measadh ach amháin lena rang féin ón uair a shroicheann siad an scoil ar maidin go dtí go bhfágann siad ag deireadh an lae scoile.

translation.en: The Pods within those Class Bubbles is an additional measure, to limit the extent of close contact within the Class Bubble.
translation.ga: Beart breise is ea na Faighneoga laistigh de na Bolgáin Ranga, chun méid na dlúththeagmhála laistigh den Bholgán Ranga a theorannú.

translation.en: Pod sizes should be kept as small as is likely to be reasonably practical in the specific classroom context.
translation.ga: Ba cheart méid na bhFaighneoga a choinneáil chomh beag agus is féidir de réir réasúin sa chomhthéacs ar leith a bhaineann leis an seomra ranga.

translation.en: To the greatest extent possible, pupils and teaching staff should consistently be in the same Class Bubbles although this will not be possible at all times.
translation.ga: A mhéid agus is féidir, ba cheart go bhfanfadh daltaí agus an fhoireann teagaisc sna Bolgáin Ranga céanna, cé nach i gcónaí a bheidh sé sin indéanta.

translation.en: Different Class Bubbles should where possible have separate breaks and meal times or separate areas at break or meal times [or this could be different class years i.e.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh sosanna agus amanna lóin éagsúla ag Bolgáin Ranga ar leith, nuair is féidir, nó go mbeadh limistéir éagsúla acu ag am sosa nó ag am lóin [nó d'fhéadfadh sé gur rangbhlianta éagsúla a bheadh anseo i.e.

translation.en: Sharing educational material between Pods should be avoided/minimised where possible.
translation.ga: Ba cheart roinnt ábhair oideachasúil idir Faighneogal a sheachaint/a laghdú aon uair is féidir.

translation.en: Staff members who move from class bubble to class bubble should be limited as much as possible
translation.ga: Ba cheart gluaiseacht foirne ó bholgán ranga amháin go bolgán ranga eile a theorannú a oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: To maintain physical distancing in the classroom, primary schools and special schools should:
translation.ga: Chun cloí le scaradh fisiciúil sa seomra ranga, ba cheart go ndéanfadh bunscoileanna agus scoileanna speisialta na nithe seo a leanas:

translation.en: Reconfigure class spaces to maximise physical distancing
translation.ga: spásanna ranga a athchumrú chun scaradh fisiciúil a uasmhéadú

translation.en: Utilise and reconfigure all available space in the school in order to maximise physical distancing
translation.ga: gach spás atá ar fáil sa scoil a úsáid agus a athchumrú chun scaradh fisiciúil a uasmhéadú

translation.en: To support primary schools and special schools in the implementation of physical distancing in the classroom, the Department has developed a suite of illustrative classroom layouts of potential options (including arrangements for special classes) which are in accordance with the public health advice, and assumes
translation.ga: Chun tacú le bunscoileanna agus le scoileanna speisialta agus scaradh fisiciúil á fheidhmiú acu sa seomra ranga, tá foireann de bhealaí léiritheacha forbartha ag an Roinn ina dtaispeántar roghanna a d'fhéadfaí a úsáid chun an seomra ranga a leagan amach (lena náirítear socruithe do ranganna speisialta), agus atá ag teacht leis an gcomhairle sláinte poiblí, agus glactar leis

translation.en: Room is clear of any unnecessary furniture/shelves etc. on the walls
translation.ga: Go bhfuil aon troscán/seilfeanna etc ar na ballaí nach bhfuil riachtanach tógtha as an seomra

translation.en: A variety of classroom sizes.
translation.ga: Go bhfuil méideanna éagsúla sna seomraí ranga.

translation.en: A link to the suite of illustrative primary classroom layouts is available here.
translation.ga: Tá nasc chuig an bhfoireann léiritheach de na bealaí ina bhféadfaí seomraí ranga i mbunscoileanna agus i súiomhanna RSO a leagan amach ar fáil anseo.

translation.en: Funding will be provided under the enhanced minor works grant to facilitate this classroom reconfiguration works.
translation.ga: Cuirfear maoiniú ar fáil faoin deontas breisithe do mhionoibreacha chun na hoibreacha a bhaineann leis an athchumrú seo ar sheomraí ranga a éascú.

translation.en: This funding will be provided to schools by mid August.
translation.ga: Cuirfear an maoiniú ar fáil do scoileanna faoi lár mhí Lúnasa.

translation.en: Maintaining physical distance in the classroom Post Primary
translation.ga: Cloí le scaradh fisiciúil sa seomra ranga Iarbhunscoileanna

translation.en: In implementing the public health advice within post primary school classrooms, it is acknowledged that each school setting is different in terms of (i) location; (ii) physical layout (iii) available space within the school; (iv) student numbers; (v) class configuration; and (vi) ease of potential access to space outside the school.
translation.ga: Agus an Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí á feidhmiú laistigh de sheomraí ranga san iar bhunscoil, aithnítear go bhfuil gach suíomh scoile éagsúil maidir le (i) láthair (ii) leagan amach fisiciúil (iii) an spás atá ar fáil laistigh den scoil (ii) an líon scoláirí (v) cumrú na ranganna; rochtain éasca ar spás lasmuigh den scoil.

translation.en: In recognition that a ‘one size fits all’ approach would not be appropriate as schools themselves are best placed to decide on the appropriate configuration for their school, the Department has developed a Framework to maintain Physical Distancing in the Classroom in Post Primary Schools with a full return of all Students for the 2020/21 School Year.
translation.ga: De bhrí go naithnítear nach mbeadh an cur chuige céanna oiriúnach do gach scoil agus gurb iad na scoileanna féin is fearr a d'fhéadfadh an cumrú a bheadh oiriúnach dá scoil féin a chinneadh, d'fhorbair an Roinn Creat chun cloí le Scaradh Fisiciúil sa Seomra Ranga in Iarbhunscoileanna agus na Scoláirí go léir ag filleadh go hiomlán don Scoilbhliain 2020/21.

translation.en: The Framework sets out a suite of available measures that must be implemented at individual school level to the greatest possible extent.
translation.ga: Leagtar amach sa chreat foireann de bhearta atá ar fáil, ar bearta iad nach mór a fheidhmiú ag leibhéal na scoile aonair a oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: The suite of measures set out in the Framework are:
translation.ga: Leagtar amach an fhoireann beart seo a leanas sa chreat:

translation.en: Reconfigure class spaces to maximise physical distancing;
translation.ga: Spásanna ranga a athchumrú chun scaradh fisiciúil a uasmhéadú;

translation.en: Utilising and reconfiguring all available space in the school in order to maximise physical distancing;
translation.ga: gach spás atá ar fáil sa scoil a úsáid agus a athchumrú chun scaradh fisiciúil a uasmhéadú;

translation.en: Reconfiguring Classes;
translation.ga: Ranganna a athchumrú;

translation.en: Consider Use of Live Streaming within the School; and
translation.ga: Breithniú a dhéanamh ar an úsáid a d'fhéadfaí a bhaint as beoshruthú laistigh den Scoil; agus

translation.en: Accessing available spaces within the local community
translation.ga: Rochtain a fháil ar spásanna atá ar fáil sa phobal áitiúil

translation.en: These suite of measures provides a practical framework for schools to use to maintain physical distancing in the classroom with the full return of all students for the 2020/21 school year.
translation.ga: Cuireann an fhoireann beart seo creat praiticiúil ar fáil do scoileanna le húsáid chun cloí le scaradh fisiciúil sa seomra ranga nuair a fhillfidh na scoláirí go léir ar an scoil don scoilbhliain 2020/21.

translation.en: In exceptional circumstances, where notwithstanding the application of these measures, physical distancing by organisational means for a larger class proves not to be possible, then the school must consider the use of face covering/visors in that larger class.
translation.ga: I gcúinsí eisceachtúla, nuair nach féidir cloí le scaradh fisiciúil i rang mór ainneoin feidhmiú na mbeart seo, ansin ní mór don scoil úsáid clúdach aghaidhe/scáthlán a bhreithniú don rang mór sin.

translation.en: This exceptional measure should be kept continually under review by the school, who should continue to make every effort to devise an alternative solution using the measures set out at 1 to 6 above.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go ndéanfadh an scoil athbhreithniú leanúnach ar an mbeart eisceachtúil seo, agus ba cheart go ndéanfadh sí gach iarracht réiteach eile a fháil agus na bearta a leagtar amach ag 1 go dtí 6 thuas á núsáid.

translation.en: Staff or students who cannot wear face coverings or visors for health reasons should be based in other classrooms or areas wherever possible.
translation.ga: Ba cheart go lonnófaí baill foirne nó scoláirí nach bhféadann clúdaigh aghaidhe a chaitheamh ar chúiseanna sláinte i seomraí ranga nó i limistéir eile aon uair is féidir.

translation.en: Students should not be required to wear face coverings or visors for the duration of the whole school day.
translation.ga: Níor cheart go mbeadh ar scoláirí clúdaigh aghaidhe nó scáthláin a chaitheamh ar feadh an lae scoile ar fad.

translation.en: A link to the Framework to maintain Physical Distancing in the Classroom in Post Primary Schools with a full return of all Students for the 2020/21 School Year can be found here.
translation.ga: Tá nasc chuig an gCreat chun cloí le Scaradh Fisiciúil sa Seomra Ranga in Iarbhunscoileanna agus na Scoláirí go léir ag filleadh go hiomlán don Scoilbhliain 2020/21ar fáil anseo (NASC).

translation.en: Use of Face Coverings/Masks within Schools
translation.ga: Úsáid Clúdach Aghaidhe/Masc laistigh de Scoileanna

translation.en: On the use of face coverings/masks in schools, the Public Health Advice states that:
translation.ga: Maidir le húsáid clúdach aghaidhe/masc i scoileanna sonraítear an méid seo a leanas sa Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí:

translation.en: “Nonmedical masks may reduce transmission from individuals who are shedding the virus.
translation.ga: D'fhéadfadh sé go laghdódh maisc neamhmhíochaine seachadadh ó dhaoine a bhfuil an víreas á shileadh acu.

translation.en: However, the extent of this benefit is unknown (especially in children) and would only be potentially beneficial if done properly.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, ní fios go baileach cé mhéad tairbhe a bhaineann leis sin (go háirithe i gcás leanaí) agus ní bhainfeadh tairbhe leis ach amháin sa chás go ndéanfaí i gceart é.

translation.en: It is not practical for many students to wear a mask properly for the duration of a school day.
translation.ga: Níl sé praiticiúil, i gcás mórán scoláirí, go gcaithfidís masc mar is ceart ar feadh an lae scoile ar fad.

translation.en: Cloth face coverings are not suitable for children under the age of 13 and anyone who:
translation.ga: Níl clúdaigh aghaidhe atá déanta as éadach oiriúnach do leanaí atá faoi bhun trí bliana déag d'aois ná do dhuine ar bith:

translation.en: has trouble breathing
translation.ga: a bhfuil trioblóid aige/aici maidir le hanálú

translation.en: is unconscious or incapacitated
translation.ga: atá gan aithne ná urlabhra nó atá ar éagumas

translation.en: is unable to remove it without help
translation.ga: nach bhfuil ábalta é a bhaint dó/di gan cúnamh a fháil

translation.en: has special needs and who may feel upset or very uncomfortable wearing the face covering
translation.ga: a bhfuil riachtanais speisialta aige nó aici agus a d’fhéadfadh a bheith míshuaimhneach nó anmhíchompordach agus clúdach aghaidhe á chaitheamh aige/aici.

translation.en: Older students should not be requested to wear a facial covering but those who may wish to wear a facial covering where physical distancing is difficult to maintain should not be discouraged.
translation.ga: Níor cheart go niarrfaí ar scoláirí atá níos sine clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh ach níor cheart bac a chur orthu siúd ar mian leo clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh áit a bhfuil sé deacair cloí le scaradh sóisialta.

translation.en: It is essential that those wearing a cloth face covering understand
translation.ga: Tá sé ríthábhachtach go dtuigfidís siúd a bhfuil clúdach aghaidhe atá déanta as éadach á chaitheamh acu

translation.en: The purpose is not to protect themselves but to reduce onward transmission and the benefit is reliant on ensuring the mask is worn appropriately see guidance on mask wearing
translation.ga: nach bhfuil sé mar chuspóir aige iadsan a chosaint ach seachadadh chuig daoine eile a laghdú agus go mbraitheann an tairbhe a bhaineann leis ar an masc a bheith á chaitheamh mar is ceart féach an treoir maidir le masc a chaitheamh

translation.en: Wearing a face covering or mask does not negate the need to stay at home if symptomatic.
translation.ga: Fiú má tá masc á chaitheamh ag duine, ní chiallaíonn sé sin nach gá fanacht sa bhaile má tá comharthaí á léiriú ag an duine sin.

translation.en: It is not a teachers responsibility to enforce mask use by pupils
translation.ga: Níl sé de fhreagracht ar mhúinteoirí iallach a chur ar dhaltaí maisc a úsáid

translation.en: In line with the Public Health Advice, the use of face coverings/masks by pupils in primary schools by pupils should not occur.
translation.ga: Ag teacht leis an gComhairle Sláinte Poiblí, níor cheart go mbeadh clúdaigh aghaidhe/maisc á núsáid ag daltaí sa bhunscoil.

translation.en: In post primary schools, the use of face coverings/masks by students may be a feature where:
translation.ga: In iarbhunscoileanna, d'fhéadfadh úsáid clúdach aghaidhe/masc teacht i gceist:

translation.en: The student themselves wishes to wear a facial covering in circumstances where physical distancing is difficult to maintain within the school; and/or
translation.ga: Nuair is mian leis an scoláire féin clúdach aghaidhe a chaitheamh áit a bhfuil sé deacair cloí le scaradh fisiciúil laistigh den scoil; agus/nó

translation.en: In the exceptional circumstances, where notwithstanding the application of the measures in the Framework to maintain Physical Distancing in the Classroom in Post Primary Schools with a full return of all Students for the 2020/21 School Year, physical distancing by organisational means for a larger class proves not to be possible.
translation.ga: I gcúinsí eisceachtúla, i gcás, ainneoin feidhmiú na mbeart sa Chreat chun cloí le Scaradh Fisiciúil sa Seomra Ranga in Iarbhunscoileanna agus na Scoláirí go léir ag filleadh go hiomlán don Scoilbhliain 2020/21, go bhféadfadh sé nach mbeifí ábalta scaradh fisiciúil a dhéanamh ar mhodhanna eagraíochtúla i ranganna móra.

translation.en: Additional Supports Available to Schools
translation.ga: Tacaíochtaí Breise atá ar Fáil do Scoileanna

translation.en: The Department is providing capital and current funding now of an additional €377 million to support the safe and sustainable reopening of schools under the Roadmap.
translation.ga: Tá €377 milliún sa bhreis á chur ar fáil ag an Roinn anois mar chaipitil agus mhaoiniú reatha chun tacú le scoileanna ionas go mbeidh ar a gcumas athoscailt ar bhealach sábháilte agus inbhuanaithe faoin dTreochlár.

translation.en: Further funding for school costs related to hand hygiene measures and PPE needs under the COVID19 Response Plan, will be confirmed post the establishment of the drawdown framework of suppliers, which schools will have access to, described at the end of this section.
translation.ga: Déanfar maoiniú breise do riachtanais mar a bhaineann le sláinteachas lámh agus PPE faoin bPlean um Fhreagairt do COVID 19 a dheimhniú agus creat íostarraingte soláthraithe bunaithe, ag a mbeidh rochtain ar scoileanna agus ar a ndéantar cur síos níos faide ar aghaidh sa chuid seo.

translation.en: In providing these additional supports, the Department is conscious that schools need to have certainty that what is provided not only allows them to reopen safely but to remain open.
translation.ga: Is eol don Roinn, agus na tacaíochtaí breise seo á gcur ar fáil aici, gur gá do scoileanna a bheith cinnte go gceadóidh an méid atá á chur ar fáil dóibh ní hamháin athoscailt go sábháilte ach fanacht oscailte.

translation.en: The Department recognises that given the size and scale of the schools system and the inherent differences between primary, and post primary schools and the particular challenges for special schools and special classes, that a “one size fits all” approach would not be appropriate and schools should be provided with some flexibility to manage the suite of resources now available from the Department.
translation.ga: Aithníonn an Roinn, i bhfianaise mhéid agus scála an chórais scoile agus na difríochtaí bunúsacha idir bunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna agus na dúshláin ar leith a bhaineann le scoileanna agus ranganna speisialta, nach mbeadh an cur chuige céanna oiriúnach do gach scoil agus gur cheart go gceadófaí roinnt solúbthachta do scoileanna maidir leis an bhfoireann tacaíochtaí atá ar fáil anois ón Roinn a bhainistiú.

translation.en: The section sets out the additional supports and measures available to primary, post primary and special schools/special classes.
translation.ga: Leagtar amach sa chuid seo na tacaíochtaí agus na bearta breise atá ar fáil do bhunscoileanna, d’iarbhunscoileanna agus do scoileanna/ranganna speisialta.

translation.en: The range of additional supports available to Primary Schools are:
translation.ga: Is iad seo a leanas na tacaíochtaí breise éagsúla atá ar fáil do bhunscoileanna:

translation.en: An enhanced Minor Works Grant to support full implementation of COVID19 response plans;
translation.ga: Deontas breisithe do Mhionoibreacha chun tacú le feidhmiú iomlán na bpleananna um fhreagairt do COVID;

translation.en: Employing an aide to help with the school reopening logistics;
translation.ga: Cúntóir a fhostú chun cuidiú le lóistíocht athoscailte na scoile;

translation.en: Increased management support to schools;
translation.ga: Tacaíocht bhreise bhainistíochta do scoileanna;

translation.en: Extending the current pilot supply panel for substitute teachers on a nationwide basis; and
translation.ga: An painéal píolótach soláthair do mhúinteoirí ionaid a leathnú ar bhonn náisiúnta; agus

translation.en: Additional financial supports to provide for additional cleaning, hand hygiene and PPE costs under the COVID19 Response Plans.
translation.ga: Tacaíochtaí breise airgid chun soláthar a dhéanamh do na costais bhreise a bhaineann le ghlantachán, sláinteachas lámh agus PPE faoi na Pleananna um Fhreagairt do COVID19.

translation.en: Enhanced Minor Works to Support Full Implementation of COVID19 Response Plans
translation.ga: Mionoibreacha Breisithe chun Tacú le Feidhmiú Iomlán na bPleananna um Fhreagairt do COVID

translation.en: The full implementation of the COVID19 Response Plans for Schools, and the Public Health Advice, may require some reconfiguration works within schools including:
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh gá le roinnt oibreacha athchumraithe laistigh de scoileanna ionas go bhféadfar na Pleananna do Scoileanna um Fhreagairt do COVID19 agus an Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí a fheidhmiú go hiomlán lena náirítear

translation.en: Ensuring that all available space in the school should be availed of in order to safely maximising physical distancing; and
translation.ga: A chinntiú go bhfuil leas á bhaint as gach spás atá ar fáil sa scoil chun scaradh fisiciúil a uasmhéadú go sábháilte; agus

translation.en: the class space should be reconfigured to maximise physical distancing
translation.ga: gur cheart an spás ranga a athchumrú chun scaradh fisiciúil a uasmhéadú

translation.en: Given that each school setting is different in terms of (i) location; (ii) physical layout (iii) available space within the school and (iv) student numbers; individual schools are best placed to decide on the appropriate reconfiguration works for their school.
translation.ga: Ó tharla go bhfuil suíomh éagsúil i ngach scoil maidir le (i) láthair; (ii) leagan amach fisiciúil (iii) an spás atá ar fáil laistigh den scoil; agus (iv) líon na scoláirí; is ag na scoileanna aonair is fearr atá a fhios cén cinneadh ba cheart a dhéanamh maidir leis na hoibreacha athchumraithe atá oiriúnach dá scoil féin.

translation.en: To support this work, a once off enhanced minor works grant will paid to all primary schools by midAugust.
translation.ga: Chun tacú leis an obair sin, íocfar deontas breisithe aon uaire i leith mionoibreacha le gach bunscoil faoi lár mhí Lúnasa.

translation.en: By providing funding to schools in this way, schools will have the necessary flexibility to implement necessary physical measures in their school quickly in compliance with the Public Health Advice and this Roadmap.
translation.ga: De bharr go bhfuil maoiniú á chur ar fáil do scoileanna ar an mbealach sin, beidh an tsolúbthacht is gá ag scoileanna chun na bearta fisiciúla atá riachtanach a fheidhmiú go tapa ina scoil féin i gcomhréir leis an gComhairle Sláinte Poiblí agus leis an Treochlár seo.

translation.en: The Minor Works Grant is based on a flat rate of €5,500 plus a per capita rate of €18.50 for each pupil (€74 in the case of pupils in special schools or special classes).
translation.ga: Tá an Deontas i leith Mionoibreacha bunaithe ar bhunráta €5,500 móide ráta de €18.50 in aghaidh an dalta (€74 i gcás daltaí i scoileanna agus i ranganna speisialta).

translation.en: The enhanced element of the minor work grant will match this (therefore doubling the minor works grant to schools).
translation.ga: Beidh an ghné bhreisithe den deontas i leith mionoibreacha ar aon dul leis sin (agus dá bhrí sin, an deontas do scoileanna i leith mionoibreacha á dhúbailt).

translation.en: The table below provides an illustrative example of the value of the minor works grant for primary schools of various sizes.
translation.ga: Tugann an tábla thíos sampla léiritheach den luach a bhaineann le deontas i leith mionoibreacha do bhunscoileanna a bhfuil méideanna éagsúla iontu.

translation.en: Current Minor Works Grant
translation.ga: An Deontas Reatha i leith Mionoibreacha

translation.en: Enhanced COVID 19 element
translation.ga: An Ghné Mhéadaithe a bhaineann le COVID19

translation.en: Total Minor Works Grant
translation.ga: Iomlán an Deontais i leith Mionoibreacha

translation.en: Calculations in this table based on number of mainstream pupils only;
translation.ga: Tá na ríomhanna sa tábla seo bunaithe ar líon na ndaltaí príomhshrutha agus orthu siúd amháin;

translation.en: Employing an aide to help with school reopening logistics
translation.ga: Cúntóir a fhostú chun cuidiú le lóistíocht athoscailte na scoile

translation.en: Funding will be provided to primary schools to employ an aide to assist with the physical and logistical arrangements necessary for school reopening including movement of furniture, setting up hand sanitising stations, signage, training, engaging with parents and Funding will be provided to each primary school on a sliding scale to facilitate this work.
translation.ga: Cuirfear maoiniú ar fáil do bhunscoileanna chun cúntóir a fhostú chun cuidiú leis na socruithe fisiciúla agus lóistíochtúla atá riachtanach d’athoscailt na scoile, lena náirítear troscán a bhogadh, stáisiúin díghalraithe lámh a bhunú, comharthaíocht, oiliúint, cumarsáid le tuismitheoirí agus cuirfear maoiniú ar fáil do gach bunscoil ar scála aistritheach chun an obair sin a éascú.

translation.en: The level of funding is based on the size of the schools and is set out in the following table:
translation.ga: Tá leibhéal an mhaoinithe bunaithe ar mhéid na scoileanna agus leagtar amach é sa tábla thíos:

translation.en: Increased Management Supports to Schools
translation.ga: Tacaíochtaí Breise Bainistíochta do Scoileanna

translation.en: The Department is providing funding for 1 release day per week for teaching principals and for those primary schools with an admin principal, there will also be release days for the deputy principal.
translation.ga: Tá maoiniú á chur ar fáil ag an Roinn do lá amháin scaoilte in aghaidh na seachtaine i gcomhair príomhoidí atá ag teagasc agus i gcás na mbunscoileanna sin a bhfuil príomhoide riaracháin acu, beidh laethanta scaoilte ann don phríomhoide tánaisteach.

translation.en: This additional provision is set out in the tables below.
translation.ga: Leagtar amach an soláthar breise seo sna táblaí thíos.

translation.en: Additional Financial supports to schools to cover additional cleaning, hand hygiene and PPE costs
translation.ga: Tacaíochtaí Breise Airgid do scoileanna chun costais a bhaineann le glantachán breise, sláinteachas lámh agus PPE a íoc

translation.en: To support the implementation of enhanced cleaning regimes in schools, a COVID19 capitation payment will be used as the mechanism to support the implementation of enhanced cleaning regimes in Primary schools, including special schools and special classes, with close to an additional €40 million for this purpose.
translation.ga: Chun tacú le réimeanna glantacháin breisithe a fheidhmiú i scoileanna, bainfear feidhm as íocaíocht chaipitíochta do COVID19 mar chóras chun tacú le réimeanna glantacháin breisithe a fheidhmiú i mBunscoileanna, lena náirítear scoileanna agus ranganna speisialta, agus beagnach €40 milliún sa bhreis ar fáil dó sin.

translation.en: This will be provided on a sliding scale in line with pupil enrolments.
translation.ga: Cuirfear é sin ar fáil ar scála aistritheach ag teacht le rolluithe daltaí.

translation.en: Enhanced support will be provided for special schools and classes.
translation.ga: Cuirfear tacaíocht bhreisithe ar fáil do scoileanna agus do ranganna speisialta.

translation.en: Examples of the amount payable to schools of various sizes is provided in the table below.
translation.ga: Tá samplaí den mhéid atá iníoctha le scoileanna a bhfuil méideanna éagsúla iontu ar fáil sa tábla thíos.

translation.en: Primary schools supplemental COVID19 Grant for cleaning costs
translation.ga: Deontas forlíontach Covid do Bhunscoileanna i gcomhair costais ghlantacháin

translation.en: The COVID19 capitation grant will also be the mechanism through which additional funding will be provided to cater for school costs related to hand hygiene measures and PPE requirements under the COVID19 Response Plan.
translation.ga: Is é an deontas caipitíochta do COVID19 an córas a úsáidfear freisin le maoiniú breise a chur ar fáil chun freastal ar chostais scoile do bhearta a bhaineann le sláinteachas lámh agus le riachtanais PPE faoin bPlean um Fhreagairt do COVID19.

translation.en: Additional provision for this purpose will be confirmed with the establishment of the drawdown framework of suppliers described later in this section.
translation.ga: Déanfar maoiniú breise chun na críche sin a dheimhniú nuair a bhunófar an creat íostarraingthe soláthraithe a ndéantar cur síos air níos faide ar aghaidh sa chuid seo.

translation.en: Additional Support for Post Primary Schools
translation.ga: Tacaíocht Bhreise d’Iarbhunscoileanna

translation.en: The range of additional supports available to post primary schools are:
translation.ga: Is iad seo a leanas na tacaíochtaí breise éagsúla atá ar fáil d’iarbhunscoileanna:

translation.en: A new Minor Works Grant to post primary schools to support full implementation of COVID19 response plans;
translation.ga: Deontas nua i leith Mionoibreacha chun tacú le feidhmiú iomlán na bpleananna um fhreagairt do COVID19;

translation.en: Employing an aide to help with the school reopening logistics;
translation.ga: Cúntóir a fhostú chun cuidiú le lóistíocht athoscailte na scoile;

translation.en: 1,080 additional teaching posts including 120 guidance posts;
translation.ga: 1,080 post múinteoireachta sa bhreis lena náirítear 120 post treorach; Tacaíochtaí breisithe i gcomhair maoirseachta; agus

translation.en: Enhanced supervision supports; and
translation.ga: Tacaíochtaí breise airgid do scoileanna chun soláthar a dhéanamh do na costais bhreise a bhaineann le ghlantachán, sláinteachas lámh agus PPE faoi na pleananna um fhreagairt do COVID19.

translation.en: Additional financial supports to schools to cover additional cleaning, hand hygiene and PPE costs under COVID19 Response Plans.
translation.ga: Deontas nua i leith Mionoibreacha d’Iarbhunscoileanna chun Tacú le Feidhmiú Iomlán na bPleananna um Fhreagairt do COVID19

translation.en: A new Minor Works Grant to Post Primary School to Support Full Implementation of COVID19 Response Plans
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh gá le roinnt oibreacha athchumraithe laistigh de scoileanna ionas go bhféadfar na Pleananna do Scoileanna um Fhreagairt do COVID19 agus an Chomhairle Sláinte Poiblí a fheidhmiú go hiomlán lena náirítear

translation.en: The full implementation of the COVID19 Response Plans for Schools, and the Public Health Advice, may require some reconfiguration works within schools including: Ensuring that all available space in the school should be availed of in order to safely maximising physical distancing; and
translation.ga: A chinntiú go bhfuil leas á bhaint as gach spás atá ar fáil sa scoil chun scaradh fisiciúil a uasmhéadú go sábháilte; agus

translation.en: the class space should be reconfigured to maximise physical distancing
translation.ga: gur cheart an spás ranga a athchumrú chun scaradh fisiciúil a uasmhéadú
