translation.ga: Cumas an dalta/scoláire a bheith ina f(h)oghlaimeoir féinstiúrtha a fheabhsú;

translation.en: Support the development of the pupil/student digital competency;
translation.ga: Tacú le forbairt a dhéanamh ar inniúlacht dhigiteach an dalta/scoláire;

translation.en: Avail of the communication/learning platform used by the school to ensure ongoing contact with classmates and class teacher.
translation.ga: Leas a bhaint as an ardán cumarsáide/foghlama atá á úsáid ag an scoil chun teagmháil leanúnach le comhscoláirí agus leis an múinteoir ranga a chinntiú.

translation.en: Supporting Teaching and Learning in the home where there is localised school closure
translation.ga: Ag Tacú le Teagasc agus Foghlaim sa bhaile i gcás dúnadh scoile ar bhonn áitiúil

translation.en: During the period of school closures the Department provided schools in the primary and special school sector and at postprimary level with a series of “Continuity of Schooling Guidance” documents to help education professionals and parents to support children learning in a remote environment.
translation.ga: Le linn na tréimhse ina raibh na scoileanna dúnta chuir an Roinn sraith doiciméad ar fáil do scoileanna in earnáil na bunscolaíochta agus na scoileanna speisialta dar teideal “Treoir do Leanúnachas Scolaíochta” chun cuidiú le gairmithe oideachais agus le tuismitheoirí tacú le leanaí chun foghlaim a dhéanamh i dtimpeallacht chianda.

translation.en: The events surrounding COVID19 and the public health restrictions which resulted in the emergency closure of schools to learners has highlighted the absolute necessity for schools to be agile in how they can provide for continuity of teaching and learning in the future.
translation.ga: Tharraing na himeachtaí a bhain le COVID19 agus na srianta sláinte poiblí a raibh dúnadh scoileanna ar bhonn éigeandála mar thoradh orthu aird ar an bhfíorriachtanas a bhaineann le scoileanna a bheith gasta maidir leis an mbealach inar féidir leo soláthar a dhéanamh don leanúnachas sa teagasc agus san fhoghlaim amach anseo.

translation.en: The continuity of teaching and learning during the emergency period was achieved with significant additional effort from all school staff working remotely to ensure students were supported during this time.
translation.ga: Baineadh amach leanúnachas sa teagasc agus san fhoghlaim le linn na tréimhse éigeandála de bharr na niarrachtaí suntasacha a rinne foireann uile na scoileanna agus iad ag obair ó chian lena chinntiú go dtacófaí le scoláirí ag an am sin.

translation.en: Most schools put in place arrangements to communicate with students and parents demonstrating innovation and resilience by providing flexible local responses.
translation.ga: Rinne formhór na scoileanna socruithe chun dul i mbun cumarsáide le scoláirí agus tuismitheoirí agus nuálaíocht agus teacht aniar á léiriú acu maidir le freagairtí solúbtha a chur ar fáil go háitiúil.

translation.en: As a contingency for any such reoccurrence of closures whether localised or at a bigger scale to ensure compliance with any public health restrictions, it is vital that schools are prepared.
translation.ga: Ar fhaitíos go dtarlódh sé go ndúnfaí scoileanna arís ar bhonn áitiúil nó ar bhonn níos forleithne chun cloí le srianta sláinte poiblí, tá sé ríthábhachtach go mbeadh scoileanna ullamh chuige sin.

translation.en: The Department is updating its Continuity of Schooling Guidance documents to support schools in responding in an agile way in the event of localised school closure.
translation.ga: Tá uasdátú á dhéanamh ag an Roinn ar na doiciméid dá cuid a bhaineann le Treoir do Leanúnachas Scolaíochta chun tacú le scoileanna agus iad ag freagairt ar bhealach gasta sa chás go dtarlódh dúnadh scoile ar bhonn áitiúil.

translation.en: Specifically schools will be provided with guidance and support to put in place arrangements to facilitate communication with and between staff, between staff and learners and to facilitate development of online approaches to remote and blended learning in the event that such is required.
translation.ga: Go sonrach, cuirfear treoir agus tacaíocht ar fáil do scoileanna chun socruithe a chur i bhfeidhm, ar socruithe iad a éascóidh cumarsáid le agus idir baill foirne, idir an fhoireann agus na foghlaimeoirí agus chun cuir chuige ar líne maidir le foghlaim ó chian agus foghlaim chumaisc a fhorbairt sa chás go mbeadh gá lena leithid.

translation.en: In circumstances where there is clear public health advice from HSE Public Health that a school should close, schools will be supported to:
translation.ga: Sa chás go dtagann comhairle sláinte poiblí ó Shláinte Poibí FSS ina léirítear go soiléir gur cheart scoil a dhúnadh, tabharfar tacaíocht do scoileanna chun:

translation.en: Make best use of guidance materials which were already provided to all schools during the period of school closures and will be further updated to reflect learning during the emergency period,
translation.ga: An úsáid is fearr is féidir a bhaint as na hábhair threorach a cuireadh ar fáil do gach scoil le linn na tréimhse ina raibh na scoileanna dúnta agus déanfar iad a uasdátú tuilleadh chun an fhoghlaim le linn na tréimhse éigeandála a léiriú,

translation.en: Alert parents/guardians to where pupils/students are at in terms of their learning,
translation.ga: Tuismithoirí/caomhnóirí a chur ar an eolas faoin áit ina bhfuil daltaí/scoláirí maidir lena gcuid foghlama,

translation.en: Develop daily contact lesson activities to be carried out at home for primary pupils
translation.ga: Gníomhaíochtaí ceachta ar bhonn teagmháil laethúil a fhorbairt a bheidh le déanamh ag daltaí bunscoile sa bhaile

translation.en: Develop subject specific lessons at post primary level to be carried out at home by students,
translation.ga: Ceachtanna a bhaineann go sonrach le hábhar ar leith a fhorbairt ag leibhéal na hiarbhunscoile a bheidh le déanamh ag scoláirí sa bhaile,

translation.en: Contact parents regularly to offer support and feedback,
translation.ga: Teagmháil rialta a dhéanamh le tuismitheoirí chun tacaíocht agus aiseolas a thabhairt,

translation.en: Have a system in place to engage with pupils/students daily; and where possible to make arrangements to support students who do not have access to digital technology,
translation.ga: Córas a bheith i bhfeidhm chun teagmháil a dhéanamh le daltaí/scoláirí ar bhonn laethúil agus nuair is féidir, tacaíocht a thabhairt do scoláirí nach bhfuil teacht acu ar theicneolaíocht dhigiteach,

translation.en: Make best use of digital technologies to allow continued engagement with pupils/students and their learning.
translation.ga: An úsáid is fearr is féidir a bhaint as teicneolaíochtaí digiteacha chun go bhféadfar teagmháil a choinneáil le daltaí/scoláirí agus lena gcuid foghlama ar bhonn leanúnach.

translation.en: Ongoing Communication Arrangements
translation.ga: Socruithe Leanúnacha i gComhair Cumarsáide

translation.en: The communications for school reopening focuses on ensuring that schools, school communities and all stakeholders have clear, relevant and timely information to support the reopening process and continued operation of schools.
translation.ga: Dírítear sa chumarsáid maidir le hathoscailt scoileanna ar a chinntiú go bhfuil eolas atá soiléir, ábhartha agus tráthúil ag scoileanna, ag pobail scoile agus ag na páirtithe leasmhara go léir chun tacú le hathoscailt agus le feidhmiú leanúnach scoileanna.

translation.en: Continued Stakeholder Engagement;
translation.ga: Rannpháirtíocht Leanúnach na bPáirtithe Leasmhara

translation.en: Provision of Support Materials for Schools
translation.ga: Soláthar Ábhar Tacaíochta do Scoileanna

translation.en: Provision of Support Materials for students, parents and school communities; and Direct access to the Department for Schools during the Reopening process
translation.ga: Soláthar Ábhar Tacaíochta do scoláirí, tuisimitheoirí agus pobail scoile; agus Rochtain dhíreach ag Scoileanna ar an Roinn le linn an Phróisis Athoscailte

translation.en: Planning for school reopening has been undertaken in collaboration with stakeholders.
translation.ga: Rinneadh an phleanáil d'athoscailt scoileanna i gcomhar leis na páirtithe leasmhara.

translation.en: The process has included both meetings of the stakeholders together, and individual bilateral meetings with the department with specific groups on pertinent issues.
translation.ga: San áireamh sa phróiseas bhí cruinnithe leis na páirtithe leasmhara le chéile, agus cruinnithe déthaobhacha ar leith leis an roinn agus le grúpaí aonair faoi cheisteanna ábhartha.

translation.en: The Department would like to acknowledge the constructive and collaborative approach taken by the education partners and wider stakeholders, including other Government Departments and Agencies.
translation.ga: Is mian leis an Roinn aitheantas a thabhairt don chur chuige cuiditheach agus comhoibríoch a ghlac na comhpháirtithe oideachais agus na páirtithe leasmhara forleathana, lena náirítear Ranna Rialtais agus Gníomhaireachtaí eile.

translation.en: Stakeholders are fully engaged with the Department to develop the shape and design of solutions that are both workable and supported by sufficient and appropriately targeted resources.
translation.ga: Tá na páirtithe leasmhara rannpháirteach go hiomlán leis an Roinn chun réitigh a mhúnlú agus a dhearadh, ar réitigh iad atá inoibrithe agus a bhfuil tacaíocht acu ó acmhainní atá dóthanach agus spriocdhírithe go cuí.

translation.en: A shared goal of all stakeholders is to provide certainty wherever possible, to communicate fully and in a timely fashion, and to have the wellbeing of the school community in mind in all communications.
translation.ga: Tá sé mar aidhm ag na páirtithe leasmhara go léir cinnteacht a sholáthar aon uair is féidir, dul i mbun cumarsáide go hiomlán agus go tráthúil, agus aird a thabhairt ar fholláine phobal na scoile i ngach cumarsáid.

translation.en: The Department will continue to engage closely and intensively with education partners and other key stakeholders on the refinement of remaining elements of guidance related to the reopening and operation of schools, and the implementation of the measures set out in this Roadmap.
translation.ga: Leanfaidh an Roinn ar aghaidh i mbun dlúthchumarsáide leis na comhpháirtithe oideachais agus leis na príomhpháirtithe leasmhara eile maidir leis na gnéithe den treoir atá fanta agus a bhaineann le hathoscailt agus feidhmiú scoileanna, agus le cur i bhfeidhm na mbeart a leagtar amach sa Treochlár seo.

translation.en: The Department is preparing and will disseminate a series of materials for schools to use in planning for reopening and in communicating with their communities in advance of schools reopening.
translation.ga: Tá sraith ábhar á nullmhú ag an Roinn agus scaipfear ar scoileanna iad lena núsáid agus pleanáil á déanamh don athoscailt agus chun dul i mbun cumarsáide lena bpobail sula ndéanfar na scoileanna a athoscailt.

translation.en: Induction training programmes for school staff produced by the Department – webinars on health and safety, returning to work safely, managing school return and wellbeing.
translation.ga: Cláir oiliúna ionduchtaithe don fhoireann scoile arna soláthar ag an Roinn – seimineáir ghréasáin ar shláinte agus ar shábháilteacht, ag filleadh ar an obair go sábháilte, filleadh ar an scoil a bhainistiú agus folláine.

translation.en: Tailored training is in development for different categories of school staff: teachers, lead worker representatives, SNAs, cleaners etc.
translation.ga: Tá oiliúint shaincheaptha á forbairt do chatagóirí éagsúla foirne scoile: múinteoirí, ionadaithe príomhoibrithe, Cúntóirí Riachtanas Speisialta, glantóirí etc.

translation.en: Guidance and support information on curriculum matters;
translation.ga: Treoir agus eolas tacaíochta ar ábhair churaclaim;

translation.en: Distribution to schools of printed posters with ageappropriate key health messages: hand washing, sneeze and cough etiquette etc.
translation.ga: Póstaeir chlóite a scaipeadh ar scoileanna ar a bhfuil teachtaireachtaí tábhachtacha sláinte agus iad aoisoiriúnach: glanadh lámh, béasa maidir le sraothartach agus casachtach etc.

translation.en: Provision to schools of digital versions of these for additional supply to be sourced locally if required.
translation.ga: Leaganacha digiteacha díobh sin a sholáthar do scoileanna agus soláthar breise a fhoinsiú go háitiúil más gá.

translation.en: Distribution to schools of the materials for their school communities.
translation.ga: Na hábhair dá bpobail scoile a scaipeadh ar scoileanna.

translation.en: Guidance for schools and ideas on communicating effectively on school re opening to their pupils and families.
translation.ga: Treoir do scoileanna agus smaointe maidir le cumarsáid éifeachtach a dhéanamh le daltaí agus lena dtuismitheoirí i dtaca le hathoscailt na scoileanna.

translation.en: Materials to support students, parents and school communities in returning safely
translation.ga: Ábhair chun tacú le scoláirí, tuismitheoirí agus pobail scoile maidir le filleadh go sábháilte

translation.en: The Department is preparing and will disseminate a series of materials for schools to provide to their returning students and their families in advance of schools reopening.
translation.ga: Tá sraith ábhar á nullmhú ag an Roinn agus scaipfear ar scoileanna iad chun iad a chur ar fáil do scoláirí atá ag filleadh agus dá dteaghlaigh sula ndéanfar na scoileanna a athoscailt.

translation.en: These will include:
translation.ga: Ina measc sin beidh:

translation.en: Short guidance for parents at both primary and postprimary level for children’s return to school, emphasising public health and wellbeing information
translation.ga: Treoir ghairid do thuismitheoirí ag leibhéal na bunscoile agus na hiarbhunscoile maidir le filleadh leanaí ar an scoil, agus béim á leagan ar eolas sláinte poiblí agus folláine

translation.en: Ageappropriate communications material for students on returning to school, emphasising public health and wellbeing information.
translation.ga: Ábhar cumarsáide aoisoiriúnach do scoláirí maidir le filleadh ar an scoil, agus béim á leagan ar eolas sláinte poiblí agus folláine.

translation.en: Schools will be provided with material for distribution, and distribution will also be augmented by the Department using digital channels.
translation.ga: Cuirfear ábhar ar fáil don scoileanna lena scaipeadh, agus bainfidh an Roinn úsáid as modhanna digiteacha chun cuidiú leis an scaipeadh.

translation.en: All materials will be produced with an emphasis on wellbeing, accessibility and inclusion.
translation.ga: Leagfar béim ar fholláine, ar rochtain agus ar chuimsiú sna hábhair go léir a chuirfear ar fáil.

translation.en: Schools will be asked to disseminate schoolspecific information to their pupils’ families and provided with templates to do so.
translation.ga: Iarrfar ar scoileanna eolas a bhaineann go sonrach lena scoil a scaipeadh ar theaghlaigh a gcuid daltaí agus cuirfear teimpléid ar fáil dóibh chun é sin a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Appropriate use will be made of media channels and gov.ie to ensure that the school community and their families have been reached with the important information that they need in returning to school.
translation.ga: Bainfear feidhm mar is cuí as bealaí na meán agus as gov.ie lena chinntiú go bhfuair pobal na scoile agus a dteaghlaigh an teolas tábhachtach atá de dhíth orthu agus iad ag filleadh chun na scoile.

translation.en: The Department will implement a number of specific communication initiatives to directly support schools in the reopening process including:
translation.ga: Cuirfidh an Roinn líon tionscnamh cumarsáide ar leith i bhfeidhm chun tacú go díreach le scoileanna sa phróiseas athoscailte, lena náirítear:

translation.en: A dedicated webpage to enable the sharing of information and updates in an open and transparent manner; and
translation.ga: Leathanach gréasáin tiomnaithe chun comhroinnt eolais agus nuashonruithe a chumasú ar bhealach atá oscailte agus trédhearcach; agus

translation.en: A dedicated team within the Department to detail with specific queries of schools in relation to the Roadmap, available supports etc.
translation.ga: Foireann thiomnaithe laistigh den Roinn chun déileáil le ceisteanna sonracha ó scoileanna i dtaca leis an Treochlár, na tacaíochtaí atá ar fáil etc.

translation.en: The dedicated team within the Department will provide a onestop shop for queries of school management on all elements of the implementation of the Roadmap as it pertains to their school.
translation.ga: Cuirfidh an fhoireann thiomnaithe laistigh den Roinn ionad ilfhreastail ar fáil i gcomhair ceisteanna ó bhainistíocht scoileanna maidir le gach gné d'fheidhmiú an Treochláir faoi mar a bhaineann sé lena scoil féin.

translation.en: What will schools be like when they reopen?
translation.ga: Conas a bheidh scoileanna nuair a athosclófar iad?

translation.en: Schools will reopen for all students from the end of August.
translation.ga: Athosclófar na scoileanna do na scoláirí go léir ó dheireadh mhí Lúnasa.

translation.en: While everyone wants schools to operate as normally as possible from August this year, it is recognised by all that it will be a different environment to how schools operated in March of this year.
translation.ga: Cé gur mian le gach duine go bhfeidhmeodh scoileanna mar is gnách a oiread agus is féidir ó mhí Lúnasa na bliana seo, aithníonn gach duine go mbeidh siad ag feidhmiú i dtimpeallacht a bheidh anéagsúil ón timpeallacht ina raibh siad ag feidhmiú i Márta na bliana seo.

translation.en: Physical distancing, much less interaction between classes and class groups, staggered breaks and lunch times and a lot of flexibility within schools to maximise school spaces (including the use of PE Halls and GP Rooms as classrooms) will be a feature.
translation.ga: Beidh scaradh fisiciúil, i bhfad níos lú idirghníomhaíochta idir ranganna agus idir rang ghrúpaí, sosanna agaithe agus mórán solúbthachta laistigh de scoileanna chun spásanna scoile a uasmhéadú (lena náirítear Hallaí Corpoideachais agus Seomraí Ilfhóinteacha a úsáid mar sheomraí ranga) mar ghnéithe de thimpeallacht na scoile.

translation.en: Recognising that there will a broad range of responses when the school community go back to school, ranging from children and their parents being happy and relieved to get back to school to some children being fearful and nervous, there will be specific emphasis on the wellbeing of the school community and our students and pupils as schools navigate through the reopening process.
translation.ga: De bhrí go naithnítear go mbeidh réimsí móra freagairtí ann nuair a fhillfidh pobal na scoile ar an scoil, idir áthas a bheith ar leanaí agus ar thuismitheoirí agus é mar údar faoisimh acu go bhfuiltear ag filleadh ar an scoil, agus leanaí eile a bheith faiteach agus neirbhíseach, cuirfear béim go sonrach ar folláine phobal na scoile agus ár ndaltaí agus scoláirí agus scoileanna ag déanamh a mbealaigh tríd an bpróiseas athoscailte.

translation.en: Specific supports will be also be available for those children who struggle to come back to school, vulnerable groups and those children who may experience loss, grief and bereavement during the period of school closure.
translation.ga: Beidh tacaíochtaí ar leith ar fáil do na leanaí sin atá ag streachailt le filleadh ar an scoil, do ghrúpaí leochaileacha agus do na leanaí sin a d’fhulaing caillteanas, briseadh croí agus bás le linn na tréimhse ina raibh na scoileanna dúnta.

translation.en: A significant cultural shift in the behaviours of students, their families and staff is expected with each playing their roles in keeping the virus out of their school by ensuring
translation.ga: Táthar ag súil le hathrú cultúir in iompar scoláirí, a dteaghlach agus na foirne agus a róil féin á nglacadh acu go léir chun an víreas a choinneáil amach as a scoil féin trína chinntiú

translation.en: those who have symptoms or suspect they have the virus stay out of school,
translation.ga: go bhfanfaidh siad siúd a bhfuil comharthaí á léiriú acu nó a cheapann go bhfuil an víreas tolgtha acu sa bhaile ón scoil,

translation.en: by maintaining best practice in terms of hand hygiene and respiratory etiquette in school, and
translation.ga: trí chloí leis an deachleachtas i dtaca le sláinteachas lámh agus béasa riospráideacha sa scoil, chomh maith le

translation.en: as well as by minimising social contacts and respecting physical distancing practices.
translation.ga: teagmháil shóisialta a íoslaghdú agus cloí leis na cleachtais i leith scaradh fisiciúil.

translation.en: As part of the school reopening process, extensive communication by the school with the school community on the specific arrangements that will apply in the school is expected to support their cultural shift.
translation.ga: Mar chuid den phróiseas athoscailte scoile, táthar ag súil go dtacóidh cumarsáid fhairsing na scoile le pobal na scoile maidir leis na socruithe sonracha a bheidh i bhfeidhm sa scoil, leis an athrú cultúir.

translation.en: Reopening our schools is not just a matter of achieving a certain minimum physical distancing.
translation.ga: Tá níos mó i gceist le hathoscailt ár scoileanna ná íosscaradh fisiciúil ar leith a bhaint amach.

translation.en: It is also about getting students reengaged fully with learning, socialising with their peers, and for some preparing for examinations, for others transitioning to school life or a different level in terms of moving from primary to postprimary.
translation.ga: Baineann sé freisin le scoláirí a bheith páirteach go hiomlán arís ina gcuid foghlama, a bheith ag bualadh lena gcomhpháirtithe, agus i gcás roinnt acu beidh ullmhú do scrúduithe i gceist, i gcás roinnt eile beidh an taistriú chuig saol na scoile i gceist nó aistriú leibhéil ón mbunscoil go dtí an iarbhunscoil.

translation.en: Students will need the support of their families, teachers and school staff in readjusting to school life and physical learning environments again.
translation.ga: Beidh tacaíocht óna dteaghlaigh, ó mhúinteoirí agus ó fhoireann na scoile de dhíth ar scoláirí agus iad á gcur féin in oiriúint an athuair do shaol na scoile agus do thimpeallachtaí foghlama fisiciúla.

translation.en: School communities will rise to this challenge, and the key themes of the Public Health Advice necessary to keep us all safe will permeate throughout the school community, with everyone:
translation.ga: Rachaidh pobail na scoileanna i ngleic leis na dúshláin agus leathfaidh príomhthéamaí na Comhairle Sláinte Poiblí atá riachtanach chun muid ar fad a choinneáil slán síos trí phobal na scoile, agus gach duine

translation.en: Applying common sense,
translation.ga: Ag úsáid ciall choiteann,

translation.en: Adopting a balanced approach,
translation.ga: Ag glacadh cur chuige cothrom,

translation.en: Doing everything practical to avoid the introduction of COVID19 into the school,
translation.ga: Ag déanamh gach rud atá praiticiúil chun nach dtabharfar COVID19 isteach sa scoil,

translation.en: Being Aware of
translation.ga: Bheith Feasach ar

translation.en: o what we can all do to protect ourselves and each other,
translation.ga: o an méid is féidir linn ar fad a dhéanamh chun muid féin agus a chéile a chosaint

translation.en: o how to recognise and report the symptoms of COVID19, and o the need to stay at home if we feel unwell, and
translation.ga: o an mbealach chun comharthaí COVID19 a aithint agus a thuairisciú o an ngá atá le fanacht sa bhaile mura bhfuilimid ar fónamh, agus

translation.en: Continuing to observe physical distancing, good hand hygiene and good respiratory etiquette.
translation.ga: Leanúint de bheith ag cloí le scaradh fisiciúil, le deashláinteachas lámh agus deabhéasa riospráide.

translation.en: EPS Education Procurement Service

translation.en: A revision of the COVID19 Response Plan for the safe and sustainable operation of Post Primary Schools is necessary to ensure that it is in compliance with the Government’s Resilience and Recovery 20202021: Plan for Living with COVID19 and the ‘Work Safely Protocol’ which has been developed by the Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment and the Department of Health with guidance documents provided by the Health and Safety Authority (HSA).
translation.ga: Tá gá le hathbhreithniú ar phlean freagartha COVID19 d'fheidhmiú sábháilte agus inbhuanaithe IarBhunscoileanna chun a chinntiú go bhfuil sé i gcomhréir le hAcmhainneacht agus le hAisghabháil 20202021 an Rialtais: Plean chun Maireachtáil le COVID19 agus an 'Prótacal um Obair a Dhéanamh go Sábháilte' a d'fhorbair an Roinn Gnó, Fiontar agus Nuálaíochta agus an Roinn Sláinte le doiciméid treorach a chuir an tÚdarás Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta (HSA) ar fáil..

translation.en: The ‘Work Safely Protocol’ is a revised version of the ‘Return to Work Safely Protocol’ and contains many of the elements and features of the original guidance but is updated to reflect the latest advice issued by Government and National Health Emergency Team (NPHET) to reduce the spread of COVID19 in the workplace.
translation.ga: Is leagan athbhreithnithe den 'Phrótacal Um Fhilleadh ar Obair shábháilte' é an 'Prótacal um Obair a Dhéanamh go Sábháilte' agus tá go leor de na heilimintí agus de na gnéithe ón treoir bhunaidh le fáil ann ach tá nuashonrú déanta air chun an chomhairle is déanaí a d'eisigh an Rialtas agus an Fhoireann Náisiúnta Éigeandála Sláinte Poiblí (NPHET) a léiriú chun scaipeadh COVID19 san ionad oibre a laghdú.

translation.en: Each workplace is required to have a COVID19 Response Plan.
translation.ga: Ní mór Plean Freagartha COVID19 a bheith ag gach ionad oibre.

translation.en: In addition to being places of learning, schools are also places of work.
translation.ga: Chomh maith le bheith ina n áiteanna foghlama, is áiteanna oibre iad scoileanna freisin.

translation.en: This document sets out the information that post primary schools need to review their school COVID19 Response Plan, including a COVID 19 policy, lead worker representative(s) and process to deal with a suspected case of COVID19.
translation.ga: Leagtar amach sa doiciméad seo an t eolas a theastaíonn ó iarbhunscoileanna chun athbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar a bPlean Freagartha COVID19 scoile, lena náirítear polasaí COVID19, príomhionadaí / ionadaithe na noibrithe agus próiseas chun déileáil le cás amhrasta COVID19.

translation.en: The purpose of this document is to provide clear and helpful guidance for the safe operation through the prevention, early detection and control of COVID19 in post primary schools.
translation.ga: Is é cuspóir an doiciméid seo treoir shoiléir agus chabhrach a chur ar fáil don fheidhmiú sábháilte trí COVID19 a chosc, a bhrath go luath agus a choimeád faoi smacht in iarbhunscoileanna.

translation.en: It provides key messages to minimise the risk of COVID19 for staff, students, families and the wider community while recognising the importance of education for the health and wellbeing of students and society as a whole.
translation.ga: Tugtar ann príomhtheachtaireachtaí chun baol COVID19 a íoslaghdú don fhoireann, do scoláirí, do theaghlaigh agus don phobal i gcoitinne agus ag an am céanna aitheantas a thabhairt don tábhacht a bhaineann le hoideachas ar mhaithe le sláinte agus le folláine na scoláirí agus na sochaí ina hiomláine.

translation.en: This document focuses on the practical steps which can be taken in post primary schools to minimise the risk of the introduction of the infection into schools while recognising that no interpersonal activity is without risk of transmission of infection at any time.
translation.ga: Sa doiciméad seo dírítear ar na céimeanna praiticiúla is féidir a ghlacadh in iarbhunscoileanna chun an baol go dtabharfaí an tionfhabhtú isteach i scoileanna a íoslaghdú agus ag an am céanna a aithint nach bhfuil aon ghníomhaíocht idirphearsanta ann nach mbaineann aon bhaol léi go dtarchuirfí ionfhabhtú am ar bith.

translation.en: The documentation and templates in this booklet are supported by the public health advice provided by the Health Protection Surveillance Centre (HPSC) for the safe reopening of schools and educational facilities.
translation.ga: Tacaíonn an chomhairle sláinte poiblí a sholáthraíonn an Lárionad Faire um Chosaint Sláinte (HPSC) leis na doiciméid agus na teimpléid sa leabhrán seo chun scoileanna agus áiseanna oideachais a athoscailt go sábháilte.

translation.en: Further advice from the HPSC on the use of face coverings in educational settings was received on the 6th August.
translation.ga: Fuarthas tuilleadh comhairle ón Lárionad Faire um Chosaint Sláinte (HPSC) maidir le húsáid clúdaigh aghaidhe i suíomhanna oideachais ar an 6ú Lúnasa.

translation.en: This advice is available here.
translation.ga: Tá an chomhairle ar fáil anseo.

translation.en: One of the key challenges is to balance the need for a practical and sensible level of caution with the need to provide a supportive environment for teaching and learning.
translation.ga: Ceann de na príomhdhúshláin is ea cothromaíocht a bhaint amach idir an gá atá le leibhéal aire praiticiúil ciallmhar agus an gá le timpeallacht thacúil a chur ar fáil don teagasc agus don fhoghlaim.

translation.en: This document identifies the steps schools can take to do everything practical to avoid the introduction of COVID19 into the school and the steps that can be taken to reduce the likelihood of the spread within the school itself.
translation.ga: Aithnítear sa doiciméad seo na céimeanna is féidir le scoileanna a ghlacadh chun gach rud praiticiúil a dhéanamh chun a sheachaint go dtabharfaí COVID19 isteach sa scoil agus na céimeanna is féidir a ghlacadh chun an dóchúlacht go scaipfí laistigh den scoil féin é a laghdú sa chás go dtabharfaí COVID19 isteach sa scoil.

translation.en: The Department has worked intensively with the education partners to develop consistent plans, advice, protocols and guidance for schools, including the School COVID19 Response plan.
translation.ga: D'oibrigh an Roinn go dian leis na comhpháirtithe oideachais chun pleananna, comhairle, prótacail agus treoir chomhsheasmhacha a fhorbairt do scoileanna, lena náirítear Plean Freagartha COVID19 Scoile.

translation.en: There is a suite of documentation available to support schools to continue to operate safely and fully including guidance on learning, school programmes and wellbeing for the 2020/21 school year.
translation.ga: Tá sraith cáipéisí ar fáil chun tacú le scoileanna leanúint ar aghaidh ag feidhmiú go sábháilte agus go hiomlán lena n áirítear treoir maidir le foghlaim, cláir scoile agus folláine don scoilbhliain 2020/21.

translation.en: There is also information on funding, staffing and resources to schools to support COVID19 measures.
translation.ga: Tá eolas ann freisin ar mhaoiniú, ar sholáthar foirne agus ar acmhainní do scoileanna chun tacú le bearta COVID19.

translation.en: Schools are advised to familiarise themselves with these documents.
translation.ga: Moltar do scoileanna eolas a chur ar na doiciméid seo.

translation.en: All of the documents will be available at gov.ie/backtoschool
translation.ga: Beidh na doiciméid go léir ar fáil ag gov.ie/filleadharscoil

translation.en: What is a COVID19 Response Plan?
translation.ga: Cad is Plean Freagartha COVID19 ann?

translation.en: A COVID19 Response Plan is designed to support the staff and Board of Management (BOM)/Education Training Board (ETB) in putting measures in place that aim to prevent the spread of COVID19 in the school environment
translation.ga: Tá Plean Freagartha Covid19 deartha chun tacú leis an bhfoireann agus leis an mBord Bainistíochta / Bord Oiliúna agus Oideachais (BOO) chun bearta a chur i bhfeidhm atá dírithe ar scaipeadh Covid19 a chosc i dtimpeallacht na scoile.

translation.en: The COVID19 Response Plan details the policies and practices necessary for a school to meet the Government’s ‘Work Safely Protocol’, to prevent the introduction and spread of COVID19 in the school environment.
translation.ga: Sonraítear i bPlean Freagartha Covid19 na polasaithe agus na cleachtais is gá do scoil a bheith aici chun 'Prótacal Obair go Sábháilte' an Rialtais chomhlíonadh a chun tabhairt isteach agus scaipeadh Covid19 i dtimpeallacht na scoile a chosc.

translation.en: It is important that schoolbased teaching and learning and the operation of school facilities complies with the public health advice and guidance documents prepared by the Department.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach go mbeadh teagasc agus foghlaim scoilbhunaithe agus feidhmiú scoileanna ag teacht leis na doiciméid chomhairle agus treorach maidir le sláinte phoiblí a d'ullmhaigh an Roinn.

translation.en: Doing so minimises the risk to students, staff and others.
translation.ga: Laghdaíonn sé sin an riosca do scoláirí, don fhoireann agus do dhaoine eile.

translation.en: The response plan supports the sustainable operation of schools where the overriding objective is to protect the health of staff and students while promoting the educational and development needs of the students in the school.
translation.ga: Tacaíonn an plean freagartha le feidhmiú inbhuanaithe scoileanna inarb é an príomhchuspóir sláinte na foirne agus na scoláirí a chosaint agus riachtanais oideachais agus forbartha na scoláirí sa scoil á gcur chun cinn ag an am céanna.

translation.en: The COVID19 response plan is a living document and will be updated in line with the public health advice as appropriate for post primary schools.
translation.ga: Is doiciméad beo é plean freagartha COVID19 agus déanfar é a nuashonrú de réir na comhairle sláinte phoiblí mar is cuí d’iarbhunscoileanna.

translation.en: In line with the Work Safely Protocol, the key to maintaining a safe school requires strong communication and a shared collaborative approach between the BOM/ETB, staff, students and parents.
translation.ga: I gcomhréir leis an bPrótacal um Obair a Dhéanamh go Sábháilte, tá cumarsáid láidir agus cur chuige comhoibritheach comhroinnte idir an BB/BOO, an fhoireann, na daltaí agus na tuismitheoirí fíorthábhachtach chun a chinntiú gur áit shábháilte.í an scoil

translation.en: The assistance and cooperation of all staff, students, parents, contractors and visitors is critical to the success of the plan.
translation.ga: Tá cúnamh agus comhoibriú na foirne, na scoláirí, na dtuismitheoirí, na gconraitheoirí agus na gcuairteoirí go léir ríthábhachtach chun go néireoidh leis an bplean.

translation.en: Every effort is made to ensure the accuracy of the information provided in this document.
translation.ga: Déantar gach iarracht cruinneas na faisnéise a chuirtear ar fáil sa doiciméad seo a chinntiú.

translation.en: However, should errors or omissions be identified, please notify us so that appropriate measures can be taken to rectify same.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, má aithnítear earráidí nó easnaimh, cuir in iúl dúinn iad ionas gur féidir bearta iomchuí a dhéanamh chun iad a cheartú.

translation.en: School COVID19 Policy
translation.ga: Polasaí COVID19 na Scoile

translation.en: A COVID19 policy outlines the ongoing commitment of the school to implementing the plan and help prevent the introduction and spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Leagtar amach i bpolasaí COVID19 tiomantas leanúnach na scoile an plean a chur i bhfeidhm agus cabhrú chun tabhairt isteach agus scaipeadh an víris a chosc.

translation.en: The revised updated policy will be signed and dated by the chairperson and principal of the BOM/ETB and brought to the attention of the staff, students, parents and others.
translation.ga: Síneoidh cathaoirleach agus príomhoide an Bhoird Bhainistíochta / an BOO polasaí nuashonraithe athbhreithnithe agus cuirfidh siad dáta leis, agus díreofar aird na foirne, na scoláirí, na dtuismitheoirí agus aird daoine eile air.

translation.en: A template of a School COVID19 policy can be found at Appendix 1.
translation.ga: Tá teimpléad polasaí Scoile COVID19 ar fáil ag Aguisín 1.

translation.en: Reviewing the safe operation of schools
translation.ga: Athbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar fheidhmiú sábháilte scoileanna

translation.en: The BOM/ETB aims to facilitate the continuation of school based teaching and learning and a safe working environment for staff.
translation.ga: Tá sé mar aidhm ag an BOM / BOO leanúint orthu ag éascú an teagaisc agus na foghlama scoilbhunaithe agus ag cinntiú timpeallacht shábháilte oibre don fhoireann.

translation.en: The operation of schools must be done safely and in strict adherence to the public health advice and any guidance issued by the Department of Education.
translation.ga: Ní mór feidhmiú scoileanna a dhéanamh go sábháilte agus cloí go docht leis an gcomhairle sláinte phoiblí agus le haon treoir a eisíonn an Roinn Oideachais.

translation.en: Details for the safe operation of a school facility and the applicable controls are outlined in this document.
translation.ga: Tá sonraí maidir le feidhmiú sábháilte na scoileanna agus na rialuithe is infheidhme leagtha amach sa doiciméad seo.

translation.en: Each school will need to review their current processes to ensure that they include the following:
translation.ga: Beidh ar gach scoil a gcuid próisis reatha a athbhreithniú lena chinntiú go náireofar an méid seo a leanas iontu:

translation.en: Arrangements to keep up to date with public health advice, changes to any Government plans for living with COVID19 and Department of Education updates;
translation.ga: Socruithe chun coinneáil cothrom le dáta le comhairle sláinte phoiblí, le hathruithe ar aon phleananna Rialtais maidir le maireachtáil le Covid19 agus le nuashonruithe de chuid na Roinne Oideachais;

translation.en: Arrangements to pass on this information in a timely manner to staff, students, parents and others as required;
translation.ga: Socruithe chun an teolas seo a chur ar aghaidh go tráthúil chuig an bhfoireann, scoláirí, tuismitheoirí agus daoine eile de réir mar is gá;

translation.en: Ensured that staff have reviewed the training materials provided by the Department of Education (details at Section 4.1);
translation.ga: Cinntithe go bhfuil athbhreithniú déanta ag an bhfoireann ar na hábhair oiliúna a chuireann an Roinn Oideachais ar fáil (sonraí ag Cuid 4.1);

translation.en: Provided staff with access to the Return to Work (RTW) form (details at Section 4.2);
translation.ga: Rochtain tugtha don fhoireann ar an bhfoirm um Fhilleadh ar an Obair (sonraí ag Cuid 4.2);

translation.en: Identified a Lead Worker representative(s) (details at Section 4.3);
translation.ga: Príomhionadaí / príomhionadaithe na noibrithe a bheith aitheanta (sonraí ag Cuid 4.3);

translation.en: Displayed posters and other signage to prevent introduction and spread of COVID19 (details at Section 4.4);
translation.ga: Póstaeir agus comharthaí eile curtha ar taispeáint chun cosc a chur ar thabhairt isteach agus scaipeadh COVID19 (sonraí ag Cuid 4.4);

translation.en: Made the necessary changes to the school or classroom layout if necessary to support the redesign of classrooms to support physical distancing (details at Section 4.5);
translation.ga: Na hathruithe riachtanacha ar leagan amach na scoile nó an tseomra ranga a bheith déanta más gá chun tacú le hathdhearadh seomraí ranga a chabhróidh le scaradh fisiciúil (sonraí ag Cuid 4.5);

translation.en: Removed unnecessary clutter to facilitate ongoing cleaning of the school taking into account the importance of having educational materials to create a stimulating learning environment;
translation.ga: Tranglam nach bhfuil gá leis a bheith tóghtha ar shiúl chun glanadh leanúnach na scoile a éascú ag tabhairt san áireamh an tábhacht a bhaineann le hábhair oideachais a bheith ann chun timpeallacht spreagúil foghlama a chruthú;

translation.en: Updated the health and safety risk assessment (details at Section 4.6);
translation.ga: An measúnú riosca sláinte agus sábháilteachta a bheith tughta cothrom le dáta (sonraí ag Cuid 4.6);

translation.en: Made necessary arrangements to limit access to the school to necessary visitors and maintain records of contacts to the school (details at 4.7);
translation.ga: Socruithe riachtanacha a bheith déanta chun rochtain ar an scoil a shrianadh go cuairteoirí riachtanacha agus taifid teagmhálacha leis an scoil a choinneáil (sonraí ag 4.7);

translation.en: Reviewed the school buildings to check the following after any period of closure:
translation.ga: Athbhreithniú a bheith déanta ar fhoirgnimh na scoile chun an méid seo a leanas a sheiceáil tar éis aon tréimhse dhúnta:

translation.en: Does the water system need flushing at outlets following low usage to prevent Legionella disease?
translation.ga: An bhfuil gá leis an gcóras uisce a shruthlú ag na poill éalaithe tar éis úsáid íseal chun galar Legionella a chosc;

translation.en: Has school equipment and mechanical ventilation been checked for signs of deterioration or damage before being used again?
translation.ga: An ndearnadh trealamh scoile agus aeráil mheicniúil a sheiceáil le fáil amach an bhfuil aon chomharthaí meathlaithe nó damáiste air sula núsáidtear arís é;

translation.en: Have bin collections and other essential services resumed?
translation.ga: Ar cuireadh tús arís le bailiúcháin araidí agus seirbhísí riachtanacha eile?

translation.en: There are checklists in place to assist schools on the details of what is needed for these arrangements in the Appendices of this plan.
translation.ga: Tá seicliostaí ar fáil in Aguisíní an phlean seo chun cabhrú le scoileanna maidir le sonraí ar a bhfuil ag teastáil le haghaidh na socruithe seo.

translation.en: Induction Training
translation.ga: Oiliúint Ionduchtúcháin

translation.en: All staff will undertake and complete COVID19 Induction Training prior to returning to the school building.
translation.ga: Tabharfaidh an fhoireann ar fad faoi Oiliúint Ionduchtúcháin COVID19 agus críochnóidh siad í sula bhfillfidh siad ar fhoirgneamh na scoile.

translation.en: The aim of such training is to ensure that staff have full knowledge and understanding of the following:
translation.ga: Is é is aidhm don oiliúint sin a chinntiú go mbeidh eolas agus tuiscint iomlán ag an bhfoireann ar na nithe seo a leanas:

translation.en: Latest up todate advice and guidance on public health
translation.ga: Comhairle agus treoir is déanaí maidir le sláinte phoiblí

translation.en: COVID19 symptoms
translation.ga: Comharthaí Covid19

translation.en: What to do if a staff member or pupil develops symptoms of COVID19 while at school
translation.ga: Cad atá le déanamh má thagann comharthaí Covid19 ar bhall foirne nó ar scoláire agus iad ar scoil

translation.en: Outline of the COVID19 response plan
translation.ga: Breacchuntas ar an bplean freagartha Covid19

translation.en: Staff will be kept fully informed of the control measures in place in the school and their duties and responsibilities in preventing the spread of COVID19 and will be updated with any changes to the control measures or guidance available from the public health authorities.
translation.ga: Coimeádfar an fhoireann go hiomlán ar an eolas faoi na bearta rialaithe atá i bhfeidhm sa scoil agus faoina ndualgais agus a bhfreagrachtaí maidir le scaipeadh COVID19 a chosc agus déanfar iad a nuashonrú le haon athruithe ar na bearta rialaithe nó ar an treoir atá ar fáil ó na húdaráis sláinte poiblí.

translation.en: If a staff member is unsure about any aspect of the COVID19 Response Plan, the associated control measures, or his/her duties, he/she should immediately seek guidance from the Principal who is supported in this role by the BOM/ETB.
translation.ga: Más rud é nach bhfuil ball foirne cinnte faoi ghné ar bith den Phlean Freagartha COVID19, na bearta rialaithe a ghabhann leis nó faoina c(h)uid dualgas ba cheart dó / di treoir a lorg láithreach ón bPríomhoide a fhaigheann tacaíocht sa ról seo ón mBord Bainistíochta / BOO.

translation.en: Procedure for Returning to Work (RTW)
translation.ga: Nós Imeachta um Fhilleadh ar an Obair

translation.en: In order to return to the workplace, staff must complete a Return to Work (RTW) form.
translation.ga: Chun filleadh ar an ionad oibre, ní mór don fhoireann foirm Um Fhilleadh ar an Obair (RTW) a chomhlánú.

translation.en: It is available online or from the principal.
translation.ga: Tá sí ar fáil go leictreonach nó ón bpríomhoide.

translation.en: A RTW form should be completed and returned to the school before returning to work.
translation.ga: Ba chóir foirm RTW a chomhlánú agus a sheoladh ar ais chun na scoile roimh fhilleadh ar an obair.

translation.en: Schools should request staff to confirm that the details in the Return to Work Form remain unchanged following subsequent periods of closure such as school holidays.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do scoileanna a iarraidh ar fhoireann na scoile a dheimhniú nach bhfuil aon athrú ar na mionsonraí san Fhoirm Filleadh ar an Obair i ndiaidh tréimhsí eile dúnta amhail laethanta saoire scoile.

translation.en: The principal will also provide details of the Induction Training for completion by staff and details of any additional health and safety measures in place in the school to facilitate the staff member’s return to the school facility.
translation.ga: Soláthróidh an príomhoide sonraí faoin Oiliúint Ionduchtúcháin atá le críochnú ag an bhfoireann agus sonraí faoi aon bhearta sláinte agus sábháilteachta breise atá i bhfeidhm sa scoil chun filleadh an bhaill foirne ar an scoil a éascú.

translation.en: There are some school staff who may be unable to return to school.
translation.ga: Tá roinnt baill foirne scoile ann arbh fhéidir nach mbeadh siad in ann filleadh ar scoil.

translation.en: Current public health guidelines have identified these people as being in groups who are defined as being at very high risk.
translation.ga: De réir na dtreoirlínte sláinte phoiblí reatha aithnítear na daoine seo ina ndaoine a bhaineann le grúpaí a shainmhínítear mar ghrúpaí atá i mbaol anard.

translation.en: This will be updated in line with public health advice.
translation.ga: Déanfar é seo a nuashonrú de réir na comhairle sláinte poiblí.

translation.en: People at very high risk (extremely vulnerable):
translation.ga: Daoine i bhfíorbhaol (thar a bheith leochaileach):

translation.en: The list of people in very high risk groups include people who:
translation.ga: Cuimsítear na daoine seo a leanas ar liosta na ndaoine i bhfíorbhaol:

translation.en: are over 70 years of age – even if fit and well
translation.ga: os cionn 70 bliain d'aois– fiú más aclaí agus go maith atá siad

translation.en: have had an organ transplant
translation.ga: má bhí trasphlandú orgáin acu

translation.en: are undergoing active chemotherapy for cancer
translation.ga: má tá siad ag dul faoi cheimiteiripe ghníomhach i gcoinne ailse

translation.en: are having radical radiotherapy for lung cancer
translation.ga: má tá siad ag dul faoi radaiteiripe radacach i gcoinne ailse na scamhóg

translation.en: have cancers of the blood or bone marrow such as leukaemia, lymphoma or myeloma who are at any stage of treatment
translation.ga: má tá ailse na fola nó smeara ar nós leoicéime, liomfóma nó mialóma orthu, ag céim ar bith den chóireáil

translation.en: are having immunotherapy or other continuing antibody treatments for cancer
translation.ga: má tá imdhíonteiripe nó cóireálacha leanúnacha antasubstainte eile i gcoinne ailse ar siúl acu

translation.en: are having other targeted cancer treatments which can affect the immune system, such as protein kinase inhibitors or PARP inhibitors
translation.ga: má tá cóireálacha ailse spriocdhírithe eile acu a d'fhéadfadh tionchar a imirt ar an gcóras imdhíonachta, amhail coscairí cionáis próitéine nó coscairí PARP

translation.en: have had bone marrow or stem cell transplants in the last 6 months, or who are still taking immunosuppression drugs
translation.ga: má bhí trasphlanduithe smeara nó gascheall acu le 6 mhí anuas, nó má tá siad fós ag glacadh drugaí imdhíonsochta

translation.en: have severe respiratory conditions including cystic fibrosis, severe asthma, pulmonary fibrosis, lung fibrosis, interstitial lung disease and severe COPD
translation.ga: má tá drochbhail riospráide thromchúiseach orthu lena náirítear fiobróis chisteach, plúchadh dian, fiobróis scamhógach, fiobróis scamhóige, galar scamhóige scáineach agus (COPD) dian

translation.en: have a condition that means they have a very high risk of getting infections (such as SCID, homozygous sickle cell)
translation.ga: má tá fadhb shláinte acu a chiallaíonn go bhfuil siad i bhfíorbhaol ionfhabhtú a tholgadh (mar shampla SCID, corránchill homaisigeach)

translation.en: are taking medicine that makes you much more likely to get infections (such as high doses of steroids or immunosuppression therapies)
translation.ga: má tá siad ag glacadh leighis a fhágann gur dóichí go dtolgfadh siad ionfhabhtú (amhail dáileoga arda stéaróideach nó teiripí imdhíonsochta)

translation.en: have a serious heart condition and are pregnant
translation.ga: má tá riocht croí tromchúiseach orthu agus má tá siad ag iompar clainne

translation.en: The advice for this group is available from the HSE.
translation.ga: Tá comhairle don ghrúpa seo ar fáil ó FSS.

translation.en: Details of the working arrangements that apply to the very high risk school staff, is in accordance with those applying for the public service generally, and is detailed in the relevant Department of Education circulars available on the Department’s website.
translation.ga: Na sonraí faoi na socruithe oibre a bheidh i bhfeidhm maidir leis na baill foirne atá i mbaol anard, tá siad de réir na socruithe siúd a bhaineann leis an tseirbhís phoiblí i gcoitinne, agus tá sonraí fúthu i gciorcláin chuí na Roinne Oideachais atá ar fáil ar shuíomh idirlín na Roinne.

translation.en: The protocol provides for the appointment of a Lead Worker Representative (LWR) in each workplace.
translation.ga: Déantar foráil sa phrótacal go gceapfar Príomionadaí na nOibrithe i ngach ionad oibre.

translation.en: The LWR will work in collaboration with the employer to assist in the implementation of measures to prevent the spread of COVID 19 and monitor adherence to those measures and to be involved in communicating the health advice around COVID19 in the workplace.
translation.ga: Oibreoidh Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe i gcomhar leis an bhfostóir chun cabhrú le cur i bhfeidhm beart chun scaipeadh COVID19 a chosc agus monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar chomhlíonadh na mbeart sin agus chun páirt a ghlacadh maidir leis an gcomhairle sláinte faoi COVID19 a chur in iúl do dhaoine san ionad oibre.

translation.en: The process for appointment of the lead worker representative in schools has been agreed centrally between the Department of Education and the education partners.
translation.ga: Aontaíodh go lárnach idir an Roinn Oideachais agus na comhpháirtithe oideachais an próiseas chun príomhionadaí na noibrithe a cheapadh i scoileanna.

translation.en: Responsibility for the development, updating and implementation of the COVID19 Response Plan and the associated control measures lies primarily with the Board of Management/ Education and Training Board and school management.
translation.ga: Tá an fhreagracht as forbairt, nuashonrú agus cur i bhfeidhm Phlean Freagartha Covid19 agus na mbeart rialaithe a ghabhann leis ar an mBord Bainistíochta / BOO agus ar fhoireann bainistíochta na scoile.

translation.en: Strong communication and a shared collaborative approach is key to protecting against the spread of COVID19 in schools, and looking after the health, safety and wellbeing of staff and students.
translation.ga: Tá cumarsáid láidir agus cur chuige comhoibritheach comhroinnte ríthábhachtach chun cur i gcoinne scaipeadh COVID19 i scoileanna, agus aire a thabhairt do shláinte, sábháilteacht agus folláine na foirne agus na scoláirí.

translation.en: Adherence to the Work Safely Protocol will only be achieved if everyone has a shared responsibility in implementing the measures contained within the Protocol in their place of work.
translation.ga: Ní éireoidh linn cloí leis an bPrótacal um Obair a Dhéanamh go Sábháilte ach amháin má bhíonn freagracht chomhroinnte ar gach duine na bearta atá sa Phrótacal a chur i bhfeidhm ina náit oibre.

translation.en: If a staff member has any concerns or observations in relation to the COVID19 Response Plan, control measures or the adherence to such measures by staff, students or others he/she should contact the lead worker(s) who will engage with the principal/BOM.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn aon imní ar aon bhall den fhoireann, nó má bhíonn aon tuairimí acu maidir le Plean Freagartha COVID19, bearta rialaithe nó an chaoi a bhfuil baill foirne, scoláirí nó daoine eile, ag cloí leis na bearta sin, ba chóir dóibh teagmháil a dhéanamh le Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe.

translation.en: In summary, the role of the LWR is to:
translation.ga: Go hachomair, is é ról Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe:

translation.en: Represent all staff in the workplace regardless of role, and be aware of specific issues that may arise in respect of different staff cohorts;
translation.ga: Ionadaíocht a dhéanamh ar an bhfoireann uile san ionad oibre beag beann ar ról, agus a bheith ar an eolas faoi shaincheisteanna sonracha a d'fhéadfadh teacht chun cinn i leith cohórt foirne éagsúla;

translation.en: Work collaboratively with school management to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the safety, health and welfare of employees in relation to COVID19;
translation.ga: Oibriú i gcomhar le bainistíocht na scoile chun sábháilteacht, sláinte agus leas fostaithe a chinntiú, a mhéid agus is indéanta le réasún, maidir le COVID19;

translation.en: Keep up to date with the latest COVID19 public health advice;
translation.ga: Coinneáil bord ar bord leis an gcomhairle sláinte phoiblí is déanaí i leith COVID19;

translation.en: In conjunction with school management, promote good hygiene practices such as washing hands regularly and maintaining good respiratory etiquette along with maintaining social distancing in accordance with public health advice;
translation.ga: Deachleachtais sláinteachais a chur chun cinn i gcomhar le bainistíocht na scoile, cosúil le lámha a ní go rialta agus deabhéasaíocht riospráide a choimeád chomh maith le bheith ag cloí le scaradh sóisialta de réir comhairle sláinte phoiblí.

translation.en: Assist school management with implementing infection prevention control measures to suppress COVID19 in the workplace in line with the Work Safely Protocol and current public health advice;
translation.ga: Cabhrú le bainistíocht na scoile bearta a chur i bhfeidhm chun COVID19 a choimeád faoi chois san áit oibre de réir an Phrótacail um Obair a Dhéanamh go Sábháilte agus comhairle sláinte phoiblí reatha;

translation.en: In conjunction with school management, monitor adherence to measures put in place to prevent the spread of COVID19;
translation.ga: Monatóireacht a dhéanamh, i gcomhar le bainistíocht na scoile, ar chomhlíonadh na mbeart a cuireadh i bhfeidhm chun scaipeadh COVID19 a chosc.

translation.en: Conduct regular reviews of safety measures;
translation.ga: Athbhreithnithe rialta a dhéanamh ar bhearta sábháilteachta atá i bhfeidhm

translation.en: Report any issues of concern immediately to school management and keep records of such issues and actions taken to rectify them;
translation.ga: Aon ábhar imní a thuairisciú láithreach do bhainistíocht na scoile agus taifid a choinneáil ar a leithéid de shaincheisteanna agus ar na bearta a glacadh chun iad a chur i gceart.

translation.en: Consult with the school management on the school’s COVID19 Response Plan in the event of someone developing COVID19 while in school including the location of an isolation area and a safe route to that area;
translation.ga: Dul i gcomhairle le bainistíocht na scoile maidir le Plean Freagartha COVID19 na scoile más rud é go dtagann COVID19 ar dhuine le linn dó / di a bheith ar scoil, lena náirítear suíomh limistéar leithlisithe agus bealach sábháilte chuig an limistéar seo;

translation.en: Following any incident, assess with the school management any follow up action that is required;
translation.ga: Tar éis teagmhas ar bith, measúnú a dhéanamh i gcomhar le bainistíocht na scoile, ar obair leantach ar bith atá riachtanach;

translation.en: Consult with colleagues on matters relating to COVID19 in the workplace;
translation.ga: Dul i gcomhairle le comhghleacaithe maidir le hábhair a bhaineann le COVID19 san ionad oibre.

translation.en: Make representations to school management on behalf of their colleagues on matters relating to COVID19 in the workplace.
translation.ga: Uiríll a dhéanamh chuig bainistíocht na scoile thar ceann a gcomhghleacaithe maidir le hábhair a bhaineann le COVID19 san ionad oibre.

translation.en: All staff, students, parents, contractors and visitors have a responsibility both as individuals and collectively to have due regard for their own health and safety and that of others and to assist with the implementation of the COVID19 Response Plan and associated infection prevention control measures.
translation.ga: Tá freagracht ar gach ball foirne, scoláire, tuismitheoir, conraitheoir agus cuairteoir, mar dhaoine aonair agus i dteannta a chéile araon, aird chuí a thabhairt ar a sláinte agus a sábháilteacht féin agus ar shláinte agus sábháilteacht daoine eile agus cabhrú chun Plean Freagartha COVID19 agus na bearta cosc agus rialú ionfhabhtuithe a ghabhann leis a chur i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: Full details of the arrangements which apply for the LWR in post primary schools is set out at Appendix 3.
translation.ga: Tá sonraí iomlána na socruithe a bhaineann le Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe in iarbhunscoileanna leagtha amach ag Aguisín 3.

translation.en: Signage
translation.ga: Comharthaíocht

translation.en: Schools will be required to display signage outlining the signs and symptoms of COVID19 and to support good hand and respiratory hygiene.
translation.ga: Beidh ar scoileanna comharthaíocht a thaispeáint ina mínítear comharthaí agus airí COVID19 agus tacú le sláinteachas maith lámh agus riospráide.

translation.en: The Department will provide printed posters to schools with age appropriate key health messages – hand washing, sneeze and cough etiquette etc.
translation.ga: Cuirfidh an Roinn póstaeir chlóite ar fáil do scoileanna ina bhfuil príomhtheachtaireachtaí sláinte arna oiriúnú d’aois na scoláirí ní lámh, béasaíocht maidir le casachtach agus sraoth a ligean srl.

translation.en: Please see link below to these posters which will allow schools who may wish to have an additional supply of posters available.
translation.ga: Féach an nasc thíos chuig na póstaeir seo a ligfidh do scoileanna ar mian leo é soláthar breise póstaer a bheith acu.

translation.en: Any such supply can be sourced locally.
translation.ga: Is féidir aon soláthar den sórt sin a fháil go háitiúil.

translation.en: Schools can then arrange to display the posters in prominent areas such as offices, corridors, staffroom area, classrooms and toilets.
translation.ga: Is féidir le scoileanna socrú a dhéanamh chun na póstaeir a thaispeáint i mbaill fheiceálacha ar nós oifigí, dorchlaí, limistéar an tseomra fhoirne, seomraí ranga agus leithris.

translation.en: Making Changes to School Layout
translation.ga: Athruithe a dhéanamh ar leagan amach na Scoile

translation.en: Maintaining physical distancing in the school environment is recommended as one of the key infection prevention control measures to minimize the risk of the introduction and spread of COVID19.
translation.ga: Moltar scaradh fisiciúil a choinneáil i dtimpeallacht na scoile mar cheann de na príomhbhearta rialaithe chun an baol go dtabharfaí isteach agus go scaipfí COVID19 a íoslaghdú.

translation.en: Further information on how physical distancing can be used in the school environment is found at Section 5.4 below including a link to the suite of illustrative post primary classroom layouts.
translation.ga: Tá tuilleadh eolais ar an tslí inar féidir scaradh fisiciúil a úsáid i dtimpeallacht na scoile ar fáil i gCuid 5.4 thíos mar aon le nasc chuig an tsraith de leaganacha amach le léaráidí den seomra ranga iar bhunscoile.

translation.en: Schools should reconfigure classrooms and other areas as necessary to support physical distancing in line with the guidance in advance of school reopening.
translation.ga: Ní mór do scoileanna leagan amach seomraí ranga agus réimsí eile a oiriúnú mar is gá chun tacú le scaradh fisiciúil de réir na treorach roimh athoscailt na scoile.

translation.en: Health and Safety Risk Assessment
translation.ga: Measúnú Riosca Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta

translation.en: COVID19 represents a hazard in the context of health and safety in the school environment.
translation.ga: Is guais é COVID19 i gcomhthéacs sláinte agus sábháilteachta i dtimpeallacht na scoile.

translation.en: A template risk assessment to identify the control measures required to mitigate the risk of COVID19 in school settings is attached at Appendix 4.
translation.ga: Tá teimpléad measúnú riosca chun na bearta rialaithe riachtanacha chun an baol COVID19 i suíomhanna scoile a mhaolú ceangailte ag Aguisín 4.

translation.en: It is important that schools review their emergency procedures involving, fire safety, first aid, accidents and dangerous occurrences to consider any new risks that arise due to the school’s COVID19 Response Plan.
translation.ga: Tá sé tábhachtach go ndéanfadh scoileanna athbhreithniú ar a nósanna imeachta éigeandála a bhaineann le sábháilteacht dóiteáin, garchabhair, timpistí agus tarluithe contúirteacha chun aon rioscaí nua a thagann chun cinn mar gheall ar Phlean Freagartha COVID19 na scoile a mheas.

translation.en: Any changes to the schools existing emergency procedures should be documented and incorporated into the school’s safety statement.
translation.ga: Ba cheart aon athruithe ar nósanna imeachta éigeandála atá ann cheana féin a dhoiciméadú agus a chur san áireamh i ráiteas sábháilteachta na scoile.

translation.en: Schools should also review their existing risk assessments to consider any new risks that arise due to the school’s COVID19 Response Plan.
translation.ga: Ba cheart do scoileanna athbhreithniú a dhéanamh freisin ar a measúnuithe riosca atá ann cheana féin chun aon rioscaí nua a thagann chun cinn mar gheall ar Phlean Freagartha COVID19 na scoile a mheas.

translation.en: Any changes to the school’s current risk assessments should also be documented and be incorporated into the schools safety statement.
translation.ga: Ba cheart aon athruithe ar mheasúnuithe riosca reatha na scoile a dhoiciméadú agus a chur san áireamh i ráiteas sábháilteachta na scoile

translation.en: First Aid/emergency procedure
translation.ga: Garchabhair/nós imeachta éigeandála

translation.en: The standard First Aid/emergency procedure shall continue to apply in schools.
translation.ga: Leanfaidh an nós imeachta caighdeánach Garchabhrach / éigeandála de bheith i bhfeidhm i scoileanna.

translation.en: In an emergency or in case of a serious incident, schools should call for an ambulance or the fire brigade on 112/999 giving details of location and type of medical incident.
translation.ga: I gcás éigeandála nó i gcás teagmhas tromchúiseach, ba cheart do scoileanna glaoch ar otharcharr nó ar an mbriogáid dóiteáin ag 112 / 999 agus sonraí a thabhairt faoi shuíomh agus cineál an teagmhais leighis.

translation.en: Access to School and Contact Log
translation.ga: Rochtain ar an Scoil agus Loga Teagmhála

translation.en: Access to the school building will be in line with agreed school procedures.
translation.ga: Beidh rochtain ar fhoirgneamh na scoile ag teacht le nósanna imeachta scoile comhaontaithe.

translation.en: Arrangement for necessary visitors such as contractors and parents will be restricted to essential purposes and limited to those who have obtained prior approval from the principal.
translation.ga: Beidh socrú srianta ann do chuairteoirí riachtanacha ar nós conraitheoirí agus tuismitheoirí sa mhéid nach gceadaítear cuairteanna ach chun críche cuspóirí fíorriachtanacha agus dóibh siúd amháin a fuair cead roimh ré ón bpríomhoide.

translation.en: The Department of Education Inspectorate may also need to visit schools and centres for education to support them as appropriate in the implementation of public health advice relating to creating a safe learning and working environment for all.
translation.ga: D'fhéadfadh go mbeadh ar Chigireacht na Roinne Oideachais cuairt a thabhairt ar scoileanna agus ar ionaid oideachais freisin chun tacú leo de réir mar is cuí i gcur i bhfeidhm na comhairle sláinte poiblí a bhaineann le timpeallacht shábháilte foghlama agus oibre a chruthú do chách.

translation.en: The prompt identification and isolation of potentially infectious individuals is a crucial step in restricting the spread of the virus and protecting the health and safety of the individuals themselves and other staff, contractors and visitors at the workplace.
translation.ga: Is céim ríthábhachtach é daoine ionfhabhtaíocha a aithint agus a leithlisiú chun scaipeadh an víris a shrianadh agus sláinte agus sábháilteacht na ndaoine iad féin agus na mball foirne, na gconraitheoirí agus na gcuairteoirí uile a chosaint san ionad oibre.

translation.en: A detailed sign in/sign out log of those entering the school facilities should be maintained.
translation.ga: Is ceart loga mionsonraithe síniú isteach / amach a choinneáil de dhaoine a thagann isteach i saoráidí na scoile.

translation.en: The school should maintain a log of staff and students contacts.
translation.ga: Ba chóir don scoil loga a choinneáil faoi theagmhálacha foirne agus scoláirí.

translation.en: A sample contact log is available at Appendix 5.
translation.ga: Tá loga teagmhála samplach ar fáil ag Aguisín 5.

translation.en: The Data Protection Commission has provided guidance on the data protection implications of the return to work protocols.
translation.ga: Tá treoir tugtha ag an gCoimisiún um Chosaint Sonraí maidir leis na himpleachtaí a bhaineann le cosaint sonraí i ndáil leis na prótacail um fhilleadh ar an obair.

translation.en: Schools are reminded that all school records and data must be maintained and processed in compliance with the GDPR and the Data Protection Acts.
translation.ga: Cuirtear i gcuimhne do scoileanna nach mór gach taifead agus sonraí scoile a choinneáil agus a phróiseáil i gcomhréir leis an RGCS agus leis na hAchtanna um Chosaint Sonraí.

translation.en: The responsibility for compliance with the legislation rests with each school (or ETB) in their role as data controller.
translation.ga: Is ar gach scoil (nó BOO) atá an fhreagracht an reachtaíocht a chomhlíonadh ina gcáil mar rialaitheoir sonraí.

translation.en: Infection Prevention Control Measures To prevent Introduction and Spread of COVID19 in Schools
translation.ga: Bearta um Chosc agus Rialú Ionfhabhtuithe Chun Tabhairt isteach agus Scaipeadh COVID19 i Scoileanna a chosc

translation.en: One of the key messages to manage the risks of COVID19 is to do everything practical to avoid the introduction of COVID19 into the school.
translation.ga: Ar cheann de na príomhtheachtaireachtaí chun rioscaí COVID19 a bhainistiú áirítear gach rud praiticiúil a dhéanamh chun tabhairt isteach COVID19 sa scoil a sheachaint.

translation.en: If infection is not introduced it cannot be spread.
translation.ga: Mura dtugtar ionfhabhtú isteach ní féidir é a scaipeadh.

translation.en: The risk of spreading the infection once introduced exists in all interpersonal interactions; student student, teacher teacher and teacher student, and must be managed in all settings.
translation.ga: Tá an baol ann go scaipfear an tionfhabhtú nuair a thugtar isteach é i ngach idirghníomhaíocht idirphearsanta; scoláire scoláire, múinteoir múinteoir agus múinteoir scoláire, agus ní mór é a bhainistiú i ngach suíomh.

translation.en: A range of essential control measures have been implemented to reduce the risk of the spread of COVID 19 virus and to protect the safety, health and welfare of staff, students, parents and visitors as far as possible within the school.
translation.ga: Cuireadh réimse beart rialaithe riachtanach i bhfeidhm chun an baol go scaipfear víreas COVID 19 a laghdú agus chun sábháilteacht, sláinte agus leas na foirne, na scoláirí, na dtuismitheoirí agus na gcuairteoirí a chosaint a mhéid is féidir laistigh den scoil.

translation.en: The control measures shall continue to be reviewed and updated as required on an ongoing basis.
translation.ga: Leanfar de na bearta rialaithe a athbhreithniú agus a nuashonrú de réir mar is gá ar bhonn leanúnach.

translation.en: It is critical that staff, students, parents and visitors are aware of, and adhere to, the control measures outlined and that they fully cooperate with all health and safety requirements.
translation.ga: Tá sé ríthábhachtach go mbeadh an fhoireann, na scoláirí, na tuismitheoirí agus na cuairteoirí ar an eolas faoi na bearta rialaithe atá leagtha amach, go gcloíonn siad leo agus go gcomhoibríonn siad go hiomlán le gach riachtanas sláinte agus sábháilteachta.

translation.en: Staff, should note that they have a legal obligation under Section 13 of the Safety, Health and Welfare at Work Act 2005 to comply with health and safety requirements and to take reasonable care for the health and safety of themselves, their colleagues and other parties within the workplace.
translation.ga: Ba chóir don fhoireann tabhairt faoi deara go bhfuil oibleagáid dhlíthiúil orthu faoi Alt 13 den Acht um Shábháilteacht, Sláinte agus Leas ag an Obair 2005 ceanglais sláinte agus sábháilteachta a chomhlíonadh agus cúram réasúnach a ghlacadh ar mhaithe lena sláinte agus sábháilteacht féin, a gcomhghleacaithe agus páirtithe eile san ionad oibre.

translation.en: Promote awareness of COVID19 symptoms (details at Section 5.1);
translation.ga: Feasacht ar chomharthaí COVID19 a chur chun cinn (sonraí ag Cuid 5.1);

translation.en: Advise staff and students that have symptoms not to attend school, to phone their doctor and to follow HSE guidance on selfisolation;
translation.ga: A iarraidh ar bhaill foirne agus ar scoláirí a bhfuil comharthaí acu gan freastal ar scoil, glaoch a chur ar a ndochtúir agus treoir FSS a leanúint maidir le féinleithlisiú;

translation.en: Advise staff and students to selfisolate or restrict their movements at home if they display any signs or symptoms of COVID19 and contact their family doctor to arrange a test
translation.ga: A iarraidh ar an bhfoireann agus ar na scoláirí féinleithlisiú nó srian a chur ar a ngluaiseachtaí sa bhaile má thagann aon chomharthaí nó comharthaí COVID19 orthu agus teagmháil a dhéanamh lena ndochtúir teaghlaigh chun tástáil a shocrú

translation.en: Advise staff and students not to return to or attend school in the event of the following:
translation.ga: A iarraidh ar bhaill foirne agus ar scoláirí gan filleadh ar scoil sna cásanna seo a leanas:

translation.en: if they are identified by the HSE as a close contact of a confirmed case of COVID 19
translation.ga: má d'aithin an FSS iad mar gharteagmhálaí le cás deimhnithe COVID19;

translation.en: if they live with someone who has symptoms of the virus
translation.ga: má chónaíonn siad le duine a bhfuil comharthaí an víris aige

translation.en: If they have travelled outside of Ireland; in such instances staff are advised to consult and follow latest Government advice in relation to foreign travel.
translation.ga: Má thaistil siad lasmuigh d'Éirinn; i gcásanna den sórt sin moltar don fhoireann chomhairle rialtais is déanaí maidir le taisteal eachtrach a fhiosrú agus a leanúint.

translation.en: Advise staff and students that develop symptoms at school to bring this to the attention of the Principal promptly;
translation.ga: A iarraidh ar bhaill foirne agus ar na scoláirí a dtagann comharthaí orthu agus iad ar scoil, é sin a chur ar a shúile don phríomhoide go pras;

translation.en: Ensure that staff and students know the protocol for managing a suspected case of COVID19 in school (details at Section 8);
translation.ga: A chinntiú go bhfuil an prótacal chun cás amhrasta COVID19 a bhainistiú ar scoil ar eolas ag an bhfoireann agus ag na scoláirí (sonraí ag Cuid 8);

translation.en: Advise staff and students to cooperate with any public health officials and the school for contact tracing purposes and follow any public health advice in the event of a case or outbreak in the school;
translation.ga: A iarraidh ar bhaill foirne agus ar scoláirí comhoibriú le haon oifigigh sláinte phoiblí agus leis an scoil chun críocha rianú teagmhála agus aon chomhairle sláinte phoiblí a leanúint má tharlaíonn cás nó ráig sa scoil;

translation.en: Everyone entering the school building needs to perform hand hygiene with a hand sanitiser;
translation.ga: Ní mór do gach duine a thagann isteach i bhfoirgneamh na scoile sláinteachas lámh a dhéanamh leis an díghalrán lámh.

translation.en: Visitors to the school during the day should be by prior arrangement and should be received at a specific contract point;
translation.ga: A thabhairt le fios gur chóir chuairteanna ar an scoil i rith an lae a shocrú roimh ré agus gur chóir bualadh le cuairteoirí ag pointe teagmhála ar leith;

translation.en: Physical distancing of 2 metres should be maintained between staff and visitors where possible.
translation.ga: Ba chóir scaradh fisiciúil 2 mhéadar a choinneáil idir baill foirne agus cuairteoirí nuair is féidir.

translation.en: Know the Symptoms of COVID19
translation.ga: Bíodh Comharthaí COVID19 ar eolas agat

translation.en: In order to prevent the spread of COVID19 it is important to know and recognise the symptoms.
translation.ga: D'fhonn cosc a chur ar scaipeadh COVID19 tá sé tábhachtach go bhfuil na comharthaí ar eolas agat agus gur féidir leat iad a aithint.

translation.en: High temperature
translation.ga: Teocht ard

translation.en: Cough
translation.ga: Casacht

translation.en: Shortness of breath or breathing difficulties
translation.ga: Gearranáil nó deacrachtaí anála

translation.en: Loss of smell, of taste or distortion of taste
translation.ga: Cailliúint bolaidh, blaiste nó saobhadh blaiste

translation.en: Infection with the virus that causes COVID19 can cause illness, ranging from mild to severe, and, in some cases, can be fatal.
translation.ga: Is féidir le hionfhabhtú leis an víreas is cúis le COVID19 tinneas a chruthú, ó éadrom go dian, agus, i gcásanna áirithe, is féidir leis a bheith marfach.

translation.en: It can take up to 14 days for symptoms to show.
translation.ga: Is féidir leis suas le 14 lá a ghlacadh le haghaidh comharthaí a thaispeáint.

translation.en: They can be similar to symptoms of cold and flu.
translation.ga: Is féidir leo a bheith cosúil le hairíonna slaghdáin agus fliú.

translation.en: Common symptoms of coronavirus include:
translation.ga: I measc na nairíonna coitianta a bhaineann leis an gcoróinvíreas tá:

translation.en: a fever (high temperature 38 degrees Celsius or above).
translation.ga: fiabhras (teocht ard 38 céim Celsius nó os a chionn).

translation.en: a new cough this can be any kind of cough, not just dry.
translation.ga: casacht nua is féidir gur casacht de chineál ar bith é sin, ní hamháin ceann tirim.

translation.en: shortness of breath or breathing difficulties.
translation.ga: ganntanas anála nó deacrachtaí análaithe.

translation.en: loss or change in your sense of smell or taste – this means you’ve noticed you cannot smell or taste anything, or things smell or taste different to normal
translation.ga: caillteanas nó athrú i do bholadh nó i do bhlas ciallaíonn sé sin thug tú faoi deara nach féidir leat rud ar bith a bholadh ná a bhlaiseadh, nó nach mbíonn an gnáthbholadh ná an gnáthbhlas ar rudaí

translation.en: If you have any common symptoms of COVID19 (coronavirus), selfisolate (stay in your room) and phone your family doctor straight away to see if you need a COVID19 test.
translation.ga: Má bhíonn aon chomharthaí coitianta de COVID19 (coróinvíreas ) ort, déan féinleithlisigh (fan i do sheomra) agus glaoigh ar dhoctúir an teaghlaigh láithreach go bhfeice tú an dteastaíonn tástáil COVID19 uait.

translation.en: Other people in your household will need to restrict their movements (stay at home).
translation.ga: Beidh ar dhaoine eile i do theaghlach srian a chur ar a gcuid gluaiseachtaí (fanacht sa bhaile).

translation.en: Getting an early diagnosis means, you can get the help you need and take steps to avoid spreading the virus, if you have it.
translation.ga: Nuair a dhéantar diagnóis luath ort, is féidir leat an chabhair a theastaíonn uait a fháil agus céimeanna a ghlacadh chun scaipeadh an víris a sheachaint, má tá sé ort.

translation.en: For the complete list of symptoms, please refer to the HSE Website.
translation.ga: Chun liosta iomlán na nairíonna a fháil, féach ar Láithreán Gréasáin an FSS.

translation.en: COVID19 Tracker App
translation.ga: Aip Rianaithe COVID19

translation.en: COVID Tracker app is a free and easytouse mobile phone app that will:
translation.ga: Is aip fón póca saor in aisce í aip Lorgaire COVID atá éasca le húsáid agus déanfaidh sí é seo:

translation.en: alert you if you have been in close contact with someone who has tested positive for COVID19 (coronavirus)
translation.ga: tú a chur ar an eolas má bhí tú i ndlúththeagmháil le duine a thástáil deimhneach do COVID 19 (coróinvíreas)

translation.en: keep other app users safe by alerting them if you test positive for COVID19 give you advice on what to do if you have symptoms
translation.ga: úsáideoirí aipe eile a choinneáil sábháilte trína gcur ar an eolas má thástáil tú féin deimhneach do COVID19

translation.en: You can download the free app from Apple's AppStore or the GooglePlay store
translation.ga: comhairle a thabhairt duit ar na rudaí atá le déanamh má bhíonn comharthaí ort Is féidir leat an tiarratas saor in aisce a íoslódáil ó Stóras Aipeanna Apple nó ó Stóras GooglePlay

translation.en: Respiratory Hygiene
translation.ga: Sláinteachas Riospráide

translation.en: Make sure you, and the people around you, follow good respiratory hygiene.
translation.ga: Bí cinnte go gcloíonn tú, agus na daoine timpeall ort, le sláinteachas maith riospráide.

translation.en: This means covering your mouth and nose with a tissue or your bent elbow when you cough or sneeze.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé sin go gclúdaíonn tú do bhéal agus do shrón le ciarsúr páipéir nó le d’uillinn lúbtha agus tú ag casacht nó ag ligean sraoth.

translation.en: Then dispose of the used tissue immediately and safely into a nearby bin.
translation.ga: Ansin cuir an ciarsúr páipéir úsáidte de láimh láithreach go sábháilte i mbosca bruscair in aice leat.

translation.en: By following good respiratory hygiene, you protect the people around you from viruses such as cold, flu and COVID19.
translation.ga: Trí shláinteachas riospráide maith a leanúint, cosnaíonn tú na daoine timpeall ort ar víris ar nós fuachta, fliú agus Covid19.

translation.en: Hand Hygiene
translation.ga: Sláinteachas Lámh

translation.en: Staff and students should understand why hand hygiene is important.
translation.ga: Ba chóir don fhoireann agus do na scoláirí a thuiscint cén fáth go bhfuil sláinteachas lámh tábhachtach.

translation.en: Schools should promote good hygiene and display posters throughout the schools on how to wash your hands.
