translation.ga: Ba chóir do scoileanna deashláinteachas a chur chun cinn agus póstaeir a thaispeáint ar fud na scoileanna maidir leis an tslí cheart chun do lámha a ní.

translation.en: Follow the HSE guidelines on handwashing:
translation.ga: Cloígh le treoirlínte FSS maidir le lámha a ní:

translation.en: Hand hygiene can be achieved by hand washing or use of a hand sanitiser (when hands look clean).
translation.ga: Is féidir sláinteachas Lámh a bhaint amach trí lámha a ní nó díghalrán lámh a úsáid (nuair atá dealramh glan ar na lámha).

translation.en: Use of hand hygiene facilities including wash hand basins needs to be managed so as to avoid congregation of students and staff waiting to use wash hand basins and hand sanitisers.
translation.ga: Ní mór úsáid saoráidí sláinteachais lámh lena náirítear báisíní níocháin a bhainistiú chun a chinntiú nach mbíonn lear mór scoláirí agus baill foirne ag fanacht le báisíní níocháin agus díghalrán lámh a úsáid.

translation.en: There is a requirement for access to hand washing facilities after activities that are likely to soil hands, for example playing outside or certain sporting activities as hand sanitiser does not work on dirty hands.
translation.ga: Tá ceanglas ann maidir le rochtain ar shaoráidí níochán láimhe tar éis gníomhaíochtaí ar dócha go salóidh siad na lámha, mar shampla ag súgradh lasmuigh nó gníomhaíochtaí spóirt áirithe mar nach noibríonn díghalrán láimhe ar lámha atá salach.

translation.en: Hand sanitiser dispensers can be deployed more readily at exit and entry points of schools and classrooms and care should be taken to clean up any hand sanitizer spills to prevent risks of falls.
translation.ga: Is féidir dáileoirí díghalrán lámh a chur ar fáil go héasca ag pointí imeachta agus iontrála scoileanna agus seomraí ranga agus ba chóir aire a thabhairt go nglanfar aon doirteadh díghalráin lámh ar eagla go dtitfeadh duine.

translation.en: Warm water is preferable to hot or cold water for hand washing but if the plumbing system only supplies cold water, a soap that emulsifies easily in cold water should be used.
translation.ga: Is fearr uisce bog a úsáid seachas uisce te nó fuar chun na lámha a ní ach mura soláthraíonn an córas pluiméireachta ach uisce fuar, ba chóir gallúnach a eiblíonn go héasca in uisce fuar a úsáid.

translation.en: Wash hand basins, running water, liquid soap and hand drying facilities should be provided in all toilets, kitchens and any food preparation areas.
translation.ga: Ba chóir báisíní chun lámha a ní, uisce reatha, gallúnach leachtach agus saoráidí triomaithe lámh a chur ar fáil ag gach leithreas, cistin agus aon limistéir ina nullmhaítear bia.

translation.en: Hand washing facilities should be maintained in good condition and supplies of soap and towels should be topped up regularly to encourage everyone to use them.
translation.ga: Ba chóir saoráidí níocháin lámh a choinneáil i mbail mhaith agus ba chóir soláthairtí gallúnach agus tuáillí a líonadh go rialta chun gach duine a spreagadh lena a núsáid.

translation.en: Hot air dryers are an acceptable alternative for hand drying but must be regularly maintained.
translation.ga: Is rogha eile inghlactha iad triomadóirí aeir chun lámha a thriomú ach ní mór iad a chothabháil go rialta.

translation.en: There is no evidence that hand dryers are associated with increased risk of transmission of COVID19.
translation.ga: Níl aon fhianaise ann go méadaíonn triomadóirí lámh an baol tarchuir COVID19.

translation.en: Posters displaying hand washing techniques and promoting hand washing should be placed on walls adjacent to washing facilities and can be laminated or placed in a plastic sleeve.
translation.ga: Ba chóir póstaeir a thaispeánann teicnící níocháin lámh agus a chuireann níochán lámh chun cinn a chur ar na ballaí in aice le saoráidí níocháin agus is féidir iad a lannú nó a chur i gclúdach plaisteach.

translation.en: Hand sanitiser is suitable for use for hand hygiene when hands are not visibly soiled (look clean).
translation.ga: Is féidir díghalrán lámh a úsáid le haghaidh sláinteachais lámh nuair nach féidir salachar a fheiceáil ar na lámha (dealramh glan orthu).

translation.en: Evidence of effectiveness is best for alcohol based hand rubs but nonalcohol based hand rubs can be used too.
translation.ga: Tá an fhianaise is fearr ann ar éifeachtacht glóthach lámh atá alcóilbhunaithe ach is féidir glóthach lámh neamhalcóil a úsáid freisin.

translation.en: When hand rubs/gels are being used in school care should be taken to ensure that students do not ingest them as they are flammable and toxic.
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn leachtanna cuimilte / glóthacha lámh á núsáid ar scoil ba chóir a chinntiú nach n ionghabhann scoláirí iad mar go bhfuil siad inlasta agus tocsaineach.

translation.en: Alcohol based sanitiser must not be stored or used near heat or naked flame
translation.ga: Níor chóir díghalrán alcól bhunaithe a stóráil ná a úsáid in aice le teas nó lasair gan chosaint.

translation.en: Frequency of Hand Hygiene
translation.ga: Minicíocht Sláinteachas Lámh

translation.en: Students and staff should perform hand hygiene:
translation.ga: Ba chóir do scoláirí agus don fhoireann sláinteachas lámh a dhéanamh:

translation.en: On arrival at school;
translation.ga: Ar theacht ar scoil dóibh;

translation.en: Before eating or drinking;
translation.ga: Sula nitheann nó sula nólann siad;

translation.en: After using the toilet;
translation.ga: Tar éis an leithreas a úsáid;

translation.en: After playing outdoors;
translation.ga: Tar éis dóibh súgradh lasmuigh;

translation.en: When their hands are physically dirty;
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn a lámha salach go fisiciúil;

translation.en: When they cough or sneeze.
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn siad ag casacht nó ag ligean sraoth.

translation.en: The Department has arranged for a drawdown framework to be established to enable schools purchase handsanitisers and any other necessary PPE supplies for use in the school.
translation.ga: Tá sé socraithe ag an Roinn creat tarraingthe anuas a bhunú chun a chur ar chumas scoileanna díghalráin lámh agus aon soláthairtí TCP riachtanacha eile a cheannach lena núsáid sa scoil.

translation.en: The Department will provide funding for the costs associated with the hand sanitising and PPE requirements in schools.
translation.ga: Cuirfidh an Roinn maoiniú ar fáil chun íoc as na costais a bhaineann le dhíghalrú lámh agus riachtanais TCP i scoileanna.

translation.en: Physical Distancing
translation.ga: Scaradh Fisiciúil

translation.en: Physical distancing can be usefully applied in a post primary school setting allowing for some flexibility when needed.
translation.ga: Is féidir tairbhe a bhaint as scaradh fisiciúil a chur i bhfeidhm i suíomh iarbhunscoile agus roinnt solúbthachta a cheadú nuair is gá.

translation.en: It must be applied in a practical way to recognise that the learning environment cannot be dominated by a potentially counterproductive focus on this issue.
translation.ga: Ní mór é a chur i bhfeidhm ar bhealach praiticiúil chun a aithint nár cheart go mbeadh an timpeallacht foghlama faoi smacht ag fócas ar an cheist seo a d’fhéadfadh níos mó dochar ná maitheas a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Care should be taken to avoid generating tension or potential conflict.
translation.ga: Ba cheart a chinntiú nach spreagtar teannas ná coimhlint, rud a d’fhéadfadh tarlú.

translation.en: It is also recognised that it is not always possible for staff to maintain physical distance from students and it is not appropriate that they would always be expected to do so where this could have a detrimental impact on the student
translation.ga: Aithnítear freisin nach féidir leis an bhfoireann scaradh fisiciúil a choinneáil ó scoláirí i gcónaí agus nach cuí go mbeifí ag súil go ndéanfaidís é sin i gcónaí i gcás ina bhféadfadh tionchar díobhálach a bheith aige sin ar an scoláire

translation.en: if a student sustains an injury and requires first aid.
translation.ga: má thagann gortú ar scoláire agus go dteastaíonn garchabhair uathu.

translation.en: However where possible staff should maintain a minimum of 1m distance and where possible 2m.
translation.ga: Mar sin féin, nuair is féidir é, ba cheart don fhoireann achar 1m ar a laghad a choinneáil agus 2m nuair is féidir.

translation.en: They should also take measures to avoid close contact at face to face level such as remaining standing rather than sitting beside/crouching down.
translation.ga: Ba cheart dóibh bearta a ghlacadh freisin chun dlúththeagmháil a sheachaint ag leibhéal duine le duine, mar shampla fanacht ina seasamh seachas suí in aice le scoláire / cromadh anuas.

translation.en: Physical distancing falls into two categories:
translation.ga: Tá dhá chatagóir scartha fhisiciúil ann:

translation.en: Increasing separation
translation.ga: Scaradh a mhéadú

translation.en: Decreasing interaction
translation.ga: Idirghníomhaíocht a laghdú

translation.en: Given that each school setting is different in terms of (i) location; (ii) physical layout (iii) available space within the school; and (iv) student numbers; schools themselves are best placed to decide on the appropriate reconfigurations / operational changes necessary to maintain physical distancing.
translation.ga: Ós rud é go bhfuil gach suíomh scoile difriúil ó thaobh (i) suímh; (ii) leagan amach fisiciúil (iii) spás atá ar fáil laistigh den scoil; agus (iv) líon na scoláirí is fearr a bhíonn scoileanna iad féin in ann cinneadh a dhéanamh maidir leis na hathruithe ar leagan amach / na hathruithe oibríochtúla cuí is gá chun scaradh fisiciúil a choinneáil.

translation.en: In recognition that a ‘one size fits all’ approach would not be appropriate as schools themselves are best placed to decide on the appropriate configuration for their school, the Department has developed a Framework to maintain Physical Distancing in the Classroom in Post Primary Schools with a full return of all Students for the 2020/21 School Year.
translation.ga: Mar aitheantas nach mbeadh an cur chuige 'déanann an toise céanna an gnó do chách’ oiriúnach mar is fearr do scoileanna iad féin cinneadh a dhéanamh ar an leagan amach cuí dóibh féin, tá Creat forbartha ag an Roinn chun Scaradh Fisiciúil a choinneáil sa Seomra Ranga in Iar bhunscoileanna nuair a fhillfidh scoláirí go hiomlán le haghaidh na Scoilbhliana 2020 / 21.

translation.en: The Framework sets out a suite of available measures that must be implemented at individual school level to the greatest possible extent.
translation.ga: Leagtar amach sa Chreat sraith beart atá ar fáil nach mór a chur i bhfeidhm ar leibhéal na scoile aonair a mhéid is féidir.

translation.en: The suite of measures set out in the Framework are:
translation.ga: Tá an méid seo a leanas sa tsraith beart atá leagtha amach sa Chreat:

translation.en: Reconfigure class spaces to maximise physical distancing;
translation.ga: Leagan amach nua a chur ar spásanna sa rang chun scaradh fisiciúil a uasmhéadú;

translation.en: Utilising and reconfiguring all available space in the school in order to maximise physical distancing;
translation.ga: Leagan amach nua a chur ar gach spás atá ar fáil sa scoil agus gach spás a úsáid chun scaradh fisiciúil a uasmhéadú;

translation.en: Review Timetables;
translation.ga: Athbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar Amchláir;

translation.en: Reconfiguring Classes;
translation.ga: Leagan amach nua a chur ar Ranganna;

translation.en: Consider Use of Live Streaming within the School; and
translation.ga: Smaoinigh ar Úsáid Sruthú Beo laistigh den Scoil; agus

translation.en: Accessing available spaces within the local community
translation.ga: Rochtain a fháil ar spásanna atá ar fáil laistigh den phobal áitiúil

translation.en: A link to the “Framework to maintain Physical Distancing in the Classroom in Post Primary Schools with a full return of all Students for the 2020/21 School Year” is provided here.
translation.ga: Tá nasc chuig an “Creat chun Scaradh Fisiciúil a choinneáil sa Seomra Ranga in Iarbhunscoileanna nuair a fhillfidh na scoláirí go léir le haghaidh na Scoilbhliana 2020 / 21” ar fáil anseo.

translation.en: You can see a link to illustrated classroom layouts to maintain social distancing here.
translation.ga: Tá nasc anseo chuig leagan amach seomraí ranga le léaráidí chun scaradh fisiciúil a choinneáil.

translation.en: Decreasing interaction
translation.ga: Idirghníomhaíocht a laghdú

translation.en: The extent to which decreasing interaction is possible in a post primary school will depend on the school setting and a commonsense approach is required recognising the limits to which this can be achieved between students.
translation.ga: Braitheann an méid inar féidir idirghníomhaíocht a laghdú in iarbhunscoil ar shuíomh na scoile agus tá gá le cur chuige stuama chun na teorainneacha a aithint atá i gceist maidir lena leithéid a bhaint amach i measc scoláirí.

translation.en: In post primary schools physical distancing of 2m where possible or at least 1m should be maintained between desks or between individual students or staff.
translation.ga: I iarbhunscoileanna ba chóir scaradh fisiciúil 2 m a choinneáil nuair is féidir nó 1 m ar a laghad, idir binsí nó idir scoláirí nó baill foirne aonair.

translation.en: As far as possible and practical, students would remain in the classroom and teachers would move between rooms.
translation.ga: Sa mhéid agus is féidir agus indéanta, d'fhanfadh scoláirí sa seomra ranga agus bhogfadh múinteoirí idir seomraí.

translation.en: As far as possible and practical students would be assigned to a main class cohort which would remain in the classroom for most subjects, with teachers moving between rooms.
translation.ga: Sa mhéid agus is féidir agus indéanta dhéanfaí scoláirí a shannadh do phríomhchohórt ranga a d’fhanfadh sa seomra ranga don chuid is mó d’ábhair agus bheadh na múinteoirí ag aistriú idir seomraí.

translation.en: Where possible and practical double classes should be planned to minimise movement during the day.
translation.ga: Sa mhéid agus is féidir agus indéanta ba chóir ranganna dúbailte a phleanáil chun gluaiseacht a íoslaghdú i gcaitheamh an lae.

translation.en: Where students have an elective subject they would move quickly into the new class and would be seated with members of their class cohort, observing as much physical distance as possible.
translation.ga: Sa chás go bhfuil ábhar roghnach ag scoláirí, bhogfaidís go tapa isteach sa rang nua agus shuífidís in éineacht le baill dá gcohórt ranga, agus iad ag coinneáil an oiread scartha fhisiciúil agus is féidir.

translation.en: Hand washing and/or sanitising would be required when moving between classes by teachers and students.
translation.ga: Theastódh níochán / díghalrú lámh nuair a bhogann múinteoirí agus scoláirí idir ranganna.

translation.en: Physical distancing between the teacher and class would be observed.
translation.ga: Choinneofaí scaradh fisiciúil idir an múinteoir agus an rang.

translation.en: Where movement of class groups between rooms is required it should be planned to minimise interaction with other class groups.
translation.ga: Sa chás go bhfuil gá le grúpaí ranga a bhogadh idir seomraí, ba cheart é a phleanáil chun idirghníomhaíocht le grúpaí ranga eile a íoslaghdú.

translation.en: Limit interaction on arrival and departure and in hallways and other shared areas.
translation.ga: Cuir teorainn le hidirghníomhaíocht ag am teachta agus imeachta agus i ndorchlaí agus i limistéir chomhroinnte eile.

translation.en: Social physical contact (hand to hand greetings, hugs) should be discouraged.
translation.ga: Ba chóir teagmháil fhisiciúil shóisialta (beannachtaí lámh le láimh, barróga) a dhíspreagadh.

translation.en: Where students need to move about within the classroom to perform activities (access to a shared resource) it should be organized to the greatest degree possible to minimise congregation at the shared resource.
translation.ga: Sa chás gur gá do scoláirí bogadh thart laistigh den seomra ranga chun gníomhaíochtaí a dhéanamh (rochtain ar acmhainn chomhroinnte) ba cheart é a eagrú an oiread agus is féidir chun plód daoine a íoslaghdú ag an acmhainn chomhroinnte.

translation.en: Staff and students should avoid sharing of personal items.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do bhaill foirne agus do scoláirí iarracht a dhéanamh gan rudaí pearsanta a roinnt.

translation.en: Where teaching and learning involves use of keyboards or tablets, the contact surface of the device should be cleaned regularly and hand hygiene encouraged.
translation.ga: Sa chás go mbaineann úsáid méarchláir nó táibléid le teagasc agus foghlaim ba cheart dromchla teagmhála an ghléis a ghlanadh go rialta agus sláinteachas lámh a spreagadh.

translation.en: Physical Distancing outside of the classroom and within the school
translation.ga: Scaradh fisiciúil lasmuigh den seomra ranga agus laistigh den scoil

translation.en: School drop off/collection
translation.ga: Scoláirí a fhágáil / a bhailiú ón scoil

translation.en: Arrangements for dropping off/collecting students should be arranged to maintain physical distancing of 2m where possible.
translation.ga: Ba cheart socruithe chun scoláirí a fhágáil / a bhailiú a dhéanamh chun scaradh fisiciúil 2 m a choinneáil nuair is féidir.

translation.en: Walking/cycling to school should be encouraged as much as possible.
translation.ga: Ba chóir siúl / rothaíocht chuig an scoil a spreagadh a oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: Aim of any arrangements is to avoid congregation of people at the school gates where physical distancing requirements may not be respected.
translation.ga: Is é is cuspóir do shocruithe ar bith plód daoine ag geataí na scoile a sheachaint má tá seans nach ngéillfí do riachtanais maidir le scaradh fisiciúil.

translation.en: Staggered drop off/pick up should be considered where practical and feasible.
translation.ga: Ba chóir amanna fágála / bailithe céimnithe a bhreithniú nuair a bhíonn sé sin praiticiúil agus indéanta.

translation.en: If schools have additional access points, consideration may be given to whether they can be used to reduce congestion.
translation.ga: Má tá pointí rochtana breise ag scoileanna, féadfar cuimhneamh ar shlí chun iad a úsáid d’fhonn brú tráchta a laghdú más féidir.

translation.en: Students should head straight to their designated learning space/classroom.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do scoláirí dul díreach chuig a spás foghlama / seomra ranga ainmnithe.

translation.en: A distance of 2m is recommended for physical distancing by staff.
translation.ga: Moltar achar 2 m le haghaidh scartha fhisiciúil don fhoireann.

translation.en: This is particularly relevant to distancing between adults when they are not engaged in teaching such as the staff room and arriving to work.
translation.ga: Baineann sé seo go háirithe le scaradh idir daoine fásta nuair nach mbíonn siad i mbun teagaisc, cosúil leis an seomra foirne agus nuair a bhíonn siad ag teacht chuig an obair.

translation.en: If 2m cannot be maintained in staff groups, as much as distance as is possible and updated guidance on face covering should be observed.
translation.ga: Mura féidir cloí le hachar 2 m i ngrúpaí foirne ba chóir achar chomh mór agus is féidir a choinneáil agus cloí le treoir maidir le clúdach aghaidhe.

translation.en: Physical distancing should be observed between staff members within the staff room through the use of staggered breaks etc.
translation.ga: Ba chóir achar fisiciúil a choinneáil idir baill foirne laistigh den seomra foirne trí shosanna agaithe srl. a úsáid.

translation.en: At post primary level consideration could be given to formation of staff “pods” or teams who work together and take breaks together.
translation.ga: Ag an leibhéal iarbhunscoile d'fhéadfaí cuimhneamh ar “fheadhnóga” foirne a bhunú nó ar mheithleacha foirne a oibríonn le chéile agus a ghlacann sosanna le chéile.

translation.en: Staff meetings should be held remotely or in small groups or in large spaces to facilitate physical distancing.
translation.ga: Ba cheart cruinnithe foirne a reáchtáil go cianda nó i ngrúpaí beaga nó i spásanna móra chun scaradh fisiciúil a éascú.

translation.en: Implement no hand shaking policy.
translation.ga: Beartas gan lámha a chroitheadh a chur i ngníomh.

translation.en: Minimise gathering of school staff at the beginning or end of the school day.
translation.ga: Cruinnithe baill foirne a íoslaghdú ag tús agus ag deireadh an lae scoile.

translation.en: Staff can rotate between areas/classes but this should be minimized where possible.
translation.ga: Is féidir leis an bhfoireann gluaiseacht idir ionaid/seomraí ranga ach ba chóir seo a laghdú oiread agus is féidir.

translation.en: Ensure physical distancing is applied in canteen facilities
translation.ga: Cinntigh go gcuirtear scaradh fisiciúil i bhfeidhm i saoráidí ceaintín

translation.en: Stagger canteen use and extend serving times to align with class groupings.
translation.ga: Déan úsáid ceaintín a chéimniú agus sínigh amanna freastail más féidir chun go mbeidh siad ar aon dul le grúpálacha ranga.

translation.en: Implement a queue management system.
translation.ga: Cuir córas bainistiú scuainí i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: Make sure students clean their hands before and after entering the canteen area.
translation.ga: Cinntigh gur féidir le scoláirí a lámha a ghlanadh tar éis dul isteach i limistéar an cheaintín.

translation.en: Briefly passing someone in a hall is very unlikely to contribute significantly to the spread of infection if people do not have physical contact and avoid informal group discussions.
translation.ga: Má ghabhtar thart ar dhuine i ndorchla go gasta ní dócha go scaipfí ionfhabhtuithe go mór mura mbíonn teagmháil fhisiciúil ag daoine agus má sheachnaíonn siad plé neamhfhoirmiúil i ngrúpaí.

translation.en: Ventilation
translation.ga: Aeráil

translation.en: The Department has published guidance setting out the practical steps for good ventilation in accordance with public health advice ‘Practical Steps for the Deployment of Good Ventilation Practices in Schools’ The guidance sets out an overall approach for schools that windows should be open as fully as possible when classrooms are not in use (e.g.
translation.ga: Tá treoir foilsithe ag an Roinn ina leagtar amach na céimeanna praiticiúla le haghaidh deaaerála de réir na comhairle sláinte phoiblí ‘Céimeanna Praiticiúla chun Feidhm a Bhaint as Dea Chleachtais Aerála i Scoileanna’.

translation.en: during breaktimes or lunchtimes (assuming not in use) and also at the end of each school day) and partially open when classrooms are in use.
translation.ga: Leagtar amach sa treoir cur chuige foriomlán do scoileanna, gur chóir fuinneoga a bheith chomh hoscailte agus is féidir nuair nach bhfuil seomraí ranga in úsáid (m.sh.le linn amanna sosa nó amanna lóin (ag glacadh leis nach bhfuil siad in úsáid) agus ag deireadh gach lae scoile) agus ar leathoscailt nuair a bhíonn na seomraí ranga in úsáid.

translation.en: The guidance provides that good ventilation can be achieved in classrooms without causing discomfort, particularly during cold weather.
translation.ga: Foráileann an treoir gur féidir aeráil mhaith a bhaint amach i seomraí ranga gan cur isteach ar scoláirí, go háirithe le linn aimsir fhuar.

translation.en: Use of PPE in Schools
translation.ga: Úsáid TCP i Scoileanna

translation.en: The Department has published “Guidance to Post Primary Schools on PPE consumables and equipment” on gov.ie/backtoschool.
translation.ga: Tá "Treoir d’IarBhunscoileanna maidir le TCP, Tomhaltáin agus Trealamh" foilsithe ag an Roinn ar gov.ie/filleadharscoil.

translation.en: This provides schools with the information needed on the appropriate quantities of PPE consumables and equipment to support the full and safe reopening of schools.
translation.ga: Cuireann sé seo an fhaisnéis is gá ar fáil do scoileanna maidir leis na cainníochtaí cuí tomhaltáin agus trealamh TCP chun tacú le hathoscailt iomlán agus shábháilte scoileanna.

translation.en: The updated advice from the HPSC to the Department of Education has recommended that face coverings should be worn by staff members where it is not possible to maintain a physical distance of 2 metres from other staff, parents, essential visitors or students.
translation.ga: Sa chomhairle is déanaí ón Lárionad Faire um Chosaint Sláinte chuig an Roinn Oideachais moltar gur chóir do bhaill foirne clúdaigh aghaidhe a chaitheamh i gcás nach féidir achar fisiciúil 2 mhéadar a choinneáil ó bhaill foirne eile, tuismitheoirí, cuairteoirí riachtanacha nó ó dhaltaí.

translation.en: The Department has accepted this recommendation.
translation.ga: Ghlac an Roinn leis an moladh seo.

translation.en: Accordingly, it is now a requirement for face coverings to be worn by staff members where it is not possible to maintain a physical distance of 2 metres from other staff, parents, essential visitors or students.
translation.ga: Dá réir sin, is gá anois do bhaill foirne clúdaigh aghaidhe a chaitheamh i gcás nach féidir achar fisiciúil 2 mhéadar a choinneáil ó bhaill foirne eile, tuismitheoirí, cuairteoirí riachtanacha nó ó dhaltaí.

translation.en: Please see note re medical grade masks.
translation.ga: Féach an nóta maidir le maisc ghrád liachta.

translation.en: PPE will also need to be used at certain work activities or work areas.
translation.ga: Ní mór TCP a úsáid freisin ag gníomhaíochtaí oibre nó i limistéir oibre áirithe.

translation.en: These might include roles such as:
translation.ga: D’fhéadfaidís seo a leanas a bheith san áireamh:

translation.en: Performing intimate care
translation.ga: Cúram dlúthphearsanta a dhéanamh

translation.en: Where a suspected case of COVID19 is identified while the school is in operation Where staff are particularly vulnerable to infection but are not in the list of those categorised as people in very high risk groups, or may be living with people who are in a very high risk category;
translation.ga: Má aithnítear cás amhrasta COVID19 le linn don scoil a bheith ag feidhmiú Sa chás go bhfuil ball foirne anleochaileach maidir le hionfhabhtú ach nach bhfuil siad i liosta na ndaoine a rangaítear mar dhaoine i ngrúpaí atá i bhfíorbhaol, nó go bhféadfaidís a bheith ina gcónaí le daoine atá i gcatagóir na ndaoine atá i bhfíorbhaol.

translation.en: Administering first aid
translation.ga: Garchabhair a thabhairt

translation.en: Parent Teacher meetings
translation.ga: Cruinnithe Tuismitheoirí Múinteoirí.

translation.en: Where staff provide healthcare to children with medical needs in the school environment they should apply standard precautions as per usual practice.
translation.ga: Sa chás go gcuireann an fhoireann cúram sláinte ar fáil do leanaí a bhfuil riachtanais leighis acu i dtimpeallacht na scoile, ba cheart dóibh réamhchúraimí caighdeánacha a chur i bhfeidhm de réir gnáthchleachtais.

translation.en: Reception Areas
translation.ga: Limistéir Fáiltithe

translation.en: Consideration should be given to the use of Perspex in reception areas where it is not possible for staff to maintain a physical distance of 2m from other staff or students.
translation.ga: Ba chóir cuimhneamh ar scáthláin chosanta pheirspéacs a úsáid i limistéir fáiltithe nuair nach féidir leis an bhfoireann achar fisiciúil 2m a choinneáil ó bhaill foirne eile nó ó scoláirí.

translation.en: Minor works funding grant can be used for this purpose.
translation.ga: Is féidir airgead ón deontas mionoibreacha a úsáid chuige sin.

translation.en: Masks/Face Coverings
translation.ga: Maisc / Clúdaigh Aghaidhe

translation.en: Cloth face coverings act as a barrier to help prevent respiratory droplets from travelling into the air and onto other people when the person wearing the face covering coughs, sneezes, talks or raises their voice.
translation.ga: Feidhmíonn clúdaigh aghaidhe éadaigh mar bhac chun braoiníní riospráide a chosc ó dhul san aer agus ar dhaoine eile nuair a bhíonn an duine atá ag caitheamh clúdach aghaidhe ag casachtach, ag sraothartach, ag caint nó ag ardú a ghutha / a gutha.

translation.en: Cloth face coverings are therefore intended to prevent transmission of the virus from the wearer (who may not know that they are infected) to those with whom they come into close contact.
translation.ga: Dá bhrí sin úsáidfear clúdaigh aghaidhe éadaigh chun cosc a chur ar scaipeadh an víris ón duine a chaitheann é (agus níl a fhios aige / aici, b’fhéidir, go bhfuil sé / sí ionfhabhtaithe) chucu siúd a dtagann sé / sí i ndlúththeagmháil leo.

translation.en: It is therefore a requirement that teachers, staff and students attending post primary schools wear a face covering when a physical distance of 2m from other staff or students cannot be maintained.
translation.ga: Dá bhrí sin, is gá anois do mhúinteoirí, baill foirne agus scoláirí atá ag freastal ar iar bhunscoileanna clúdach aghaidhe nuair nach féidir achar fisiciúil 2 mhéadar ó bhaill foirne eile nó ó scoláirí eile a choinneáil.

translation.en: In certain situations the use of clear visors should be considered, for example staff interacting with students with hearing difficulties or learning difficulties.
translation.ga: I gcásanna áirithe, ba cheart cuimhneamh ar scáthláin thrédhearcacha ar úsáid, mar shampla baill foirne a bhíonn ag plé le scoláirí a bhfuil deacrachtaí éisteachta nó deacrachtaí foghlama acu.

translation.en: All students on the post primary transport scheme should be asked to wear face coverings unless there is a good reason not to do so.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go niarrfaí ar gach scoláire a úsáideann an scéim iompair iarbhunscoile clúdaigh aghaidhe a chaitheamh mura bhfuil cúis mhaith ann gan é sin a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Cloth face coverings should not be worn by any of the following groups:
translation.ga: Níor chóir go gcaithfeadh aon cheann de na grúpaí seo a leanas clúdaigh aghaidhe éadaigh:

translation.en: Any person with difficulty breathing
translation.ga: Duine ar bith ag a bhfuil deacrachtaí análaithe

translation.en: Any person who is unconscious or incapacitated
translation.ga: Duine ar bith atá gan aithne gan urlabhra nó éagumasaithe

translation.en: Any person who is unable to remove the facecovering without assistance
translation.ga: Duine ar bith nach bhfuil ar a c(h)umas an clúdach aghaidhe a bhaint gan chúnamh

translation.en: Any person who has special needs and who may feel upset or very uncomfortable wearing the face covering, for example persons with intellectual or developmental disabilities, mental health conditions, sensory concerns or tactile sensitivity.
translation.ga: Aon duine a bhfuil riachtanais speisialta aige agus a d'fhéadfadh a bheith trína chéile nó an mhíchompordach agus é / í ag caitheamh clúdach aghaidhe, mar shampla duine faoi mhíchumas intleachtúil nó forbartha, duine ag a bhfuil fadhbanna meabhairshláinte, fadhbanna céadfacha nó mothálacht thadhlach.

translation.en: All staff and students wearing face coverings should be reminded to not touch the face covering and to wash or sanitise their hands (using hand sanitiser) before putting on and after taking off the face covering.
translation.ga: Ba chóir meabhrú don fhoireann agus do na scoláirí go léir a chaitheann clúdaigh aghaidhe gan lámh a chur ar an gclúdach aghaidhe agus a lámha a ní nó a dhíghalrú (trí díghalrán lámh a úsáid) sula gcuireann siad an clúdach aghaidhe orthu agus tar éis é a bhaint.

translation.en: Information should be provided on the proper use, removal, and washing of cloth face coverings
translation.ga: Ba chóir eolas a chur ar fáil maidir leis an tslí cheart chun clúdaigh aghaidhe éadaigh a úsáid, a bhaint agus a ní

translation.en: All teachers and staff should be aware that they should wash or sanitize hands (using a hand sanitizer) before and after helping a student put on or adjust a face covering.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh a fhios ag gach múinteoir agus ball foirne gur chóir dóibh a lámha a ní nó a dhíghalrú (ag baint úsáide as díghalrán lámh) roimh agus tar éis dóibh cabhrú le scoláire clúdach aghaidhe a chur air / uirthi ar nó an clúdach aghaidhe a shocrú.

translation.en: Face coverings should be stored in a space designated for each student that is separate from others when not being worn (e.g., in individually labelled containers or bags).
translation.ga: Ba chóir clúdaigh aghaidhe a stóráil i spás ainmnithe ar leithligh do gach scoláire nuair nach bhfuiltear á gcaitheamh (m.sh., i gcoimeádáin nó i málaí lipéadaithe ar leith).

translation.en: Cloth face coverings should be washed after every day of use and/or before being used again, or if visibly soiled.
translation.ga: Ba chóir clúdaigh aghaidhe éadaigh a ní tar éis gach lá úsáide agus / nó sula núsáidtear arís iad, nó más léir go bhfuil siad salaithe.

translation.en: Face coverings should not be worn if they are wet.
translation.ga: Níor chóir clúdaigh aghaidhe a chaitheamh nuair a bhíonn siad fliuch.

translation.en: A wet cloth face covering may make it difficult to breathe.
translation.ga: D’fhéadfadh sé bheith deacair anáil a tharraingt trí chlúdach aghaidhe atá fliuch.

translation.en: Schools should consider having additional disposable face coverings available for students, teachers, and staff in case a backup face covering is needed during the day.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do scoileanna machnamh a dhéanamh ar chlúdaigh aghaidhe bhreise indiúscartha a chur ar fáil do scoláirí, do mhúinteoirí agus don fhoireann sa chás go bhfuil gá le clúdach aghaidhe breise i rith an lae.

translation.en: Whilst staff may wish to utilize their own face covering on a daytoday basis, schools should have available a stock of additional disposable or multiuse face coverings, or if appropriate face visors, available for staff in case a backup face covering is needed throughout the day or where required on an ongoing basis.
translation.ga: B’fhéidir gur mhaith leis an bhfoireann a gclúdach aghaidhe féin a úsáid ar bhonn laethúil, ach ba cheart go mbeadh soláthar clúdach breise indiúscartha nó ilúsáide nó, más cuí, scáthláin aghaidhe a bheith ar fáil ag scoileanna don fhoireann más rud é go mbeidh gá le clúdach aghaidhe cúltaca i rith an lae nó ar bhonn leanúnach más gá.

translation.en: Medical Grade Masks
translation.ga: Maisc Ghrád Leighis

translation.en: Schools must provide medical grade masks in the EN14683 category to all SNAs and teachers in special schools and special classes and those staff by necessity that need to be in close and continued proximity with pupils with intimate care needs.
translation.ga: Ní mór do scoileanna maisc ghrád leighis sa chatagóir EN14683 a sholáthar do gach CRS agus do mhúinteoirí i scoileanna speisialta agus ranganna speisialta agus do na baill foirne sin, de réir mar is gá, a chaithfidh a bheith go leanúnach in aice le daltaí a bhfuil riachtanais chúraim phearsanta acu.

translation.en: Wearing a face covering or mask does not negate the need to stay at home if symptomatic.
translation.ga: Ní chuireann clúdach aghaidhe nó masc a chaitheamh deireadh leis an ngá fanacht sa bhaile má tá airíonna breoiteachta ar dhuine.

translation.en: Gloves
translation.ga: Lámhainní

translation.en: The use of disposable gloves in the school by students or staff is not generally appropriate but may be necessary for matters such as cleaning, intimate care settings or when administering first aid.
translation.ga: De ghnáth, ní bhíonn úsáid lámhainní indiúscartha sa scoil oiriúnach ach d'fhéadfadh sé a bheith riachtanach le haghaidh nithe ar nós glanadh, suíomhanna cúraim phearsanta nó nuair a bhíonn garchabhair á tabhairt.

translation.en: Routine use does not protect the wearer and may expose others to risk from contaminated gloves.
translation.ga: Ní chosnaíonn gnáthúsáid an duine féin agus d'fhéadfadh go nochtfadh sé daoine eile do riosca ó lámhainní éillithe.

translation.en: Routine use of disposable gloves is not a substitute for hand hygiene.
translation.ga: Ní féidir gnáthúsáid lámhainní indiúscartha a chur in ionad sláinteachais lámh.

translation.en: Aprons
translation.ga: Naprúin

translation.en: Aprons may also be appropriate in certain circumstances including for intimate care needs or for staff assigned to cleaning an area where a suspected or confirmed case of COVID19 was present.
translation.ga: D'fhéadfadh naprúin a bheith oiriúnach freisin i gcúinsí áirithe lena náirítear chun freastal ar riachtanais chúraim phearsanta nó don fhoireann atá sannta do limistéar a ghlanadh ina raibh cás amhrasta nó deimhnithe COVID19.

translation.en: Impact of COVID19 on certain school activities
translation.ga: Tionchar COVID19 ar ghníomhaíochtaí scoile áirithe

translation.en: The Department will work with stakeholders to provide more detailed advice on certain school activities in advance of school reopening.
translation.ga: Oibreoidh an Roinn le páirtithe leasmhara chun comhairle níos mionsonraithe a chur ar fáil maidir le gníomhaíochtaí scoile áirithe roimh athoscailt na scoile.

translation.en: Choir/Music Performance
translation.ga: Cór / Léiriú Ceoil

translation.en: Choir practices/performances and music practices/performances involving wind instruments may pose a higher level of risk and special consideration should be given to how they are held ensuring that the room is wellventilated and the distance between performers is maintained.
translation.ga: D'fhéadfadh leibhéal riosca níos airde a bheith i gceist i gcás cleachtaí / léiriú cóir agus cleachtaí / léiriú ceoil le gaothuirlisí agus ba chóir machnaimh ar leith a dhéanamh ar an tslí a reáchtálfar iad siúd chun a chinntiú go bhfuil an seomra aeráilte a dhóthain agus go gcoinnítear an tachar idir na ceoltóirí.

translation.en: Sport Activities
translation.ga: Gníomhaíochtaí Spóirt

translation.en: Schools should refer to the HPSC guidance on Return to Sport.
translation.ga: Ba chóir do scoileanna tagairt a dhéanamh don treoir ón Lárionad Faire um Chosaint Sláinte maidir le Filleadh ar an Spórt.

translation.en: Shared Equipment
translation.ga: Trealamh Roinnte

translation.en: Art – Where possible students should be encouraged to have their own individual art and equipment supplies.
translation.ga: Ealaín – Nuair is féidir ba chóir scoláirí a spreagadh chun a gcuid soláthairtí ealaíne agus trealaimh féin a bheith acu.

translation.en: Electronics – Shared electronic devices such as tablets, touch screens, keyboards should be cleaned between use and consideration could be given to the use of wipeable covers for electronics to facilitate cleaning.
translation.ga: Leictreonaic – Ba chóir gléasanna leictreonacha comhroinnte amhail táibléid, scáileáin tadhaill, méarchláir a ghlanadh idir úsáidí agus d’fhéadfaí cuimhneamh ar chlúdaigh a fhéadfar a ghlanadh a úsáid le haghaidh leictreonaic chun glanadh a éascú.

translation.en: Musical Equipment/Instruments – To the greatest extent possible, instruments should not be shared between students and if sharing is required, the instruments should be
translation.ga: Trealamh / Uirlisí Ceoil – A mhéid is féidir, níor cheart uirlisí a roinnt idir scoláirí agus má tá comhroinnt ag teastáil, ba cheart na huirlisí a ghlanadh sula núsáidfidh an chéad duine eile iad.

translation.en: Library Policy – Where practical students should have their own books.
translation.ga: Beartas Leabharlainne – Más praiticiúil é ba chóir go mbeadh a gcuid leabhar féin ag na scoláirí.

translation.en: Textbooks that are shared should be covered in a wipeable plastic covering that can be wiped with a suitable household cleaning agent between uses.
translation.ga: Téacsleabhair a roinntear ba chóir clúdach plaisteach a fhéadfar a ghlanadh le glantachán tí oiriúnach idir úsáidí a chur orthu.

translation.en: Students should be encouraged to perform hand hygiene after using any shared item.
translation.ga: Ba chóir scoláirí a spreagadh chun sláinteachas lámh a dhéanamh tar éis aon rud comhroinnte a úsáid.

translation.en: Shared Sports Equipment – Minimise equipment sharing and clean shared equipment between uses by different people.
translation.ga: Trealamh Spóirt Comhroinnte Íoslaghdaigh comhroinnt trealaimh agus glan tar éis úsáidí ag daoine éagsúla.

translation.en: Hygiene and Cleaning in Schools
translation.ga: Sláinteachas agus Glantachán sa Scoil

translation.en: The Department of Education has provide additional funding to schools to support the enhanced cleaning required to minimise the risks of COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá maoiniú breise curtha ar fáil ag an Roinn Oideachais do scoileanna chun tacú leis an nglanadh breise atá riachtanach chun na rioscaí a bhaineann le COVID19 a íoslaghdú.

translation.en: Details of the funding supports will be provided to schools by way of circular and will be updated as required.
translation.ga: Cuirfear sonraí faoi na tacaíochtaí maoinithe ar fáil do scoileanna trí chiorclán agus déanfar iad a nuashonrú de réir mar is gá.

translation.en: The specific advice in relation to school cleaning is set out in the HPSC advice and is covered in the induction training.
translation.ga: Tá an chomhairle shonrach maidir le glanadh scoile leagtha amach sa chomhairle ón Lárionad Faire um Chosaint Sláinte agus pléifear í san oiliúint ionduchtúcháin.

translation.en: This advice sets out the cleaning regime required to support schools to prevent COVID19 infections and the enhanced cleaning required in the event of a suspected cases of COVID19.
translation.ga: Leagtar amach sa chomhairle seo an córas glantacháin is gá chun tacú le scoileanna chun ionfhabhtú COVID19 a chosc agus an glanadh breise a theastaíonn i gcásanna amhrasta COVID19.

translation.en: Schools are asked to carefully read and understand the cleaning advice and to apply that to all areas of the school as appropriate.
translation.ga: Iarrtar ar scoileanna an chomhairle ghlantacháin a léamh go cúramach agus a thuiscint agus é a chur i bhfeidhm ar gach réimse den scoil de réir mar is cuí.

translation.en: Schools are reminded to take particular care of the hygiene arrangements for hand washing and toilet facilities.
translation.ga: Cuirtear i gcuimhne do scoileanna aire ar leith a thabhairt do na socruithe sláinteachais le haghaidh saoráidí níochán lámh agus leithreas.

translation.en: In summary, each school setting should be cleaned at least once per day.
translation.ga: Go hachomair, ba chóir gach suíomh scoile a ghlanadh uair sa lá ar a laghad.

translation.en: Additional cleaning if available should be focused on frequently touched surfaces – door handles, hand rails, chairs/arm rests, communal eating areas, sink and toilet facilities.
translation.ga: Ba chóir glanadh breise, má tá sé ar fáil, a dhíriú ar dhromchlaí a mbaintear dóibh go minic murláin dorais, ráillí láimhe, cathaoireacha / uillinn cathaoireacha, limistéir itheacháin chomhchoiteanna, áiseanna doirtil agus leithris.

translation.en: If students are moving between classrooms consideration may be given to appropriate cleaning products being provided to enable them to wipe down their desk, chair and surface before leaving the room.
translation.ga: Má tá scoláirí ag bogadh idir seomraí ranga, d’fhéadfaí cuimhneamh ar tháirgí glantacháin cuí a chur ar fáil chun cur ar a gcumas a mbinse, a gcathaoir agus a ndromchla a ghlanadh sula bhfágann siad an seomra.

translation.en: All staff will have access to cleaning products and will be required to maintain cleanliness of their own work area.
translation.ga: Beidh rochtain ag an bhfoireann ar fad ar tháirgí glantacháin agus beidh orthu glaineacht a limistéar oibre féin a chothabháil.

translation.en: Under no circumstances should these cleaning materials be removed from the building.
translation.ga: Níor cheart na hábhair ghlantacháin seo a thabhairt amach as an bhfoirgneamh ar chúinsí ar bith;

translation.en: Staff should thoroughly clean and disinfect their work area before and after use each day.
translation.ga: Ba chóir don fhoireann a limistéar oibre a ghlanadh agus a dhíghalrú go maith roimh iad a úsáid agus tar éis iad a úsáid, gach lá.

translation.en: There will be regular collection of used waste disposal bags from offices and other areas within the school facility.
translation.ga: Baileofar málaí diúscartha dramhaíola úsáidte go rialta ó oifigí agus ó cheantair eile laistigh den áis scoile.

translation.en: Shower facilities shall not be available for use by staff or students due to the increased risk associated with communal shower facilities and areas.
translation.ga: Ní bheidh saoráidí cithfholctha ar fáil don fhoireann ná do scoláirí mar gheall ar an riosca méadaithe a bhaineann le saoráidí agus limistéir chithfholctha comhchoiteanna.

translation.en: This shall be reviewed in line with government guidance.
translation.ga: Déanfar é sin a athbhreithniú de réir threoir an rialtais.

translation.en: Staff must use and clean their own equipment and utensils (cup, cutlery, plate etc.).
translation.ga: Ní mór don fhoireann a dtrealamh agus a nuirlisí féin a úsáid agus a ghlanadh (cupán, sceanra, pláta srl.).

translation.en: Cleaning/Disinfecting rooms where a student/staff member with suspected COVID19 was present
translation.ga: Seomraí ina raibh scoláirí / ball foirne a raibh amhras ann go raibh COVID19 orthu a ghlanadh / dhíghalrú

translation.en: The rooms should be cleaned as soon as practicable possible.
translation.ga: Ba chóir na seomraí a ghlanadh chomh luath agus is féidir.

translation.en: Once the room is vacated the room should not be reused until it has been thoroughly cleaned and disinfected and all surfaces are dry.
translation.ga: Nuair a bheidh an seomra folamh níor chóir an seomra a athúsáid go dtí go mbeidh sé glanta agus díghalraithe go hiomlán agus go bhfuil gach dromchla tirim.

translation.en: Disinfection only works on things that are clean.
translation.ga: Ní oibríonn díghalrú ach ar rudaí atá glan.

translation.en: When disinfection is required it is always in addition to cleaning.
translation.ga: Nuair a bhíonn díghalrú ag teastáil, déantar é seo i gcónaí de bhreis ar ghlanadh.

translation.en: Person/s assigned to cleaning should avoid touching their face while they are cleaning and household gloves and a plastic apron.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go seachnódh duine / daoine a shanntar do ghlanadh baint dá (h)aghaidh agus é / í ag glanadh agus ba chóir dó / di lámhainní tí agus ag naprún plaisteach a úsáid.

translation.en: Clean the environment and furniture using disposable cleaning cloths and a household detergent followed by disinfection with a chlorine based product (household bleach).
translation.ga: Glan an timpeallacht agus an troscán ag baint úsáide as ceirteacha glantacháin indiúscartha agus glantach tí agus ina dhiaidh sin déan díghalrú le táirge clóirínbhunaithe (tuarthóir tí).

translation.en: Pay special attention to frequently touched surfaces, the back of chairs, couches, door handles and any surfaces that are visibly soiled with body fluids.
translation.ga: Tabhair aird ar leith ar dhromchlaí a mbaintear dóibh go minic, cúl cathaoireacha, toilg, murláin dorais agus aon dromchlaí atá salaithe go feiceálach le sreabháin choirp.

translation.en: Once the room has been cleaned and disinfected and all surfaces are dry, the room can be reused.
translation.ga: Nuair a bheidh an seomra glanta agus díghalraithe agus nuair atá gach dromchla tirim, is féidir an seomra a athúsáid.

translation.en: If a student or staff diagnosed with COVID19 spent time in a communal area like a canteen, play area or if they used the toilet or bathroom facilities, then the areas should be cleaned with household detergent followed by a disinfectant (as outlined in the HPSC interim health advice) as soon as is practically possible.
translation.ga: Má chaith scoláirí nó ball foirne a diagnóisíodh le COVID19 seal i spás comónta amhail ceaintín, áit súgartha nó má d'úsáid siad na háiseanna leithris nó seomra folctha, ansin ba chóir na limistéir sin a ghlanadh le glantach tí agus díghalrán (mar atá leagtha amach i dtreoir eatramhach sláinte an HPSC) a luaithe is féidir.

translation.en: Dealing with a Suspected Case of COVID19
translation.ga: Déileáil le Cás Amhrasta COVID19

translation.en: Staff or students should not attend school if displaying any symptoms of COVID19.
translation.ga: Níor chóir do bhaill foirne ná do scoláirí freastal ar scoil má léiríonn siad aon chomharthaí COVID 19.

translation.en: The following outlines how a school should deal with a suspected case that may arise in a school setting.
translation.ga: Tugtar breacchuntas sa mhéid seo a leanas ar conas ba chóir do scoil déileáil le cás amhrasta a d'fhéadfadh teacht chun cinn i suíomh scoile.

translation.en: A designated isolation area should be identified within the school building.
translation.ga: Ba chóir limistéar leithlisithe ainmnithe a aithint laistigh den fhoirgneamh scoile.

translation.en: The possibility of having more than one person displaying signs of COVID19 should be considered and a contingency plan for dealing with additional cases put in place.
translation.ga: Ba cheart cuimhneamh ar an bhféidearthacht go mbeadh níos mó ná duine amháin ag léiriú comharthaí COVID19 agus ba chóir plean teagmhasach chun déileáil le cásanna breise a chur i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: The designated isolation area should be behind a closed door and away from other staff and students.
translation.ga: Ba chóir go mbeadh an limistéar leithlisithe ainmnithe taobh thiar de dhoras dúnta agus amach ó bhaill foirne agus scoláirí eile.

translation.en: If a staff member/student displays symptoms of COVID19 while at school the following are the procedures to be implemented:
translation.ga: Má léiríonn ball foirne / scoláire comharthaí COVID19 agus iad ar scoil is iad seo a leanas na nósanna imeachta atá le cur i bhfeidhm:

translation.en: If the person with the suspected case is a student, the parents/guardians should be contacted immediately;
translation.ga: Más scoláire an duine a bhfuil amhras faoi / fúithi, ba cheart teagmháil a dhéanamh láithreach leis na tuismitheoirí / caomhnóirí;

translation.en: Isolate the person and have a procedure in place to accompany the individual to the designated isolation area via the isolation route, keeping at least 2 metres away from the symptomatic person and also making sure that others maintain a distance of at least 2 metres from the symptomatic person at all times;
translation.ga: Leithlisigh an duine agus bíodh nós imeachta i bhfeidhm chun dul leis an duine sin chuig an limistéar leithlisithe ainmnithe tríd an mbealach leithlisithe, ag coinneáil achar 2 mhéadar ar bhunscoileanna

translation.en: The isolation area does not have to be a room but if it is not a room it should be 2m away from others in the room;
translation.ga: a laghad ón duine ar a bhfuil comharthaí agus a chinntiú freisin go gcoinníonn daoine eile achar 2 mhéadar ar a laghad ón duine ar a bhfuil comharthaí, gach uile thráth; Ní gá go mbeadh an limistéar leithlisithe ina sheomra ach mura seomra é ba chóir go mbeadh sé achar 2m amach ó dhaoine eile sa seomra;

translation.en: If it is not possible to maintain a distance of 2m a staff member caring for a student should wear a face covering or mask.
translation.ga: Mura féidir achar 2m a choinneáil ba chóir do bhall foirne atá ag tabhairt aire do scoláire clúdach aghaidhe nó masc a chaitheamh.

translation.en: Gloves should not be used as the virus does not pass through skin;
translation.ga: Níor chóir lámhainní a úsáid toisc nach dtéann an víreas trí chraiceann;

translation.en: Provide a mask for the person presenting with symptoms.
translation.ga: Cuir masc ar fáil don duine a léiríonn comharthaí.

translation.en: He/she should wear the mask if in a common area with other people or while exiting the premises; Assess whether the individual who is displaying symptoms can immediately be directed to go home/be brought home by parents who call their doctor and continue selfisolation at home;
translation.ga: Déan measúnú ar cibé an féidir iarraidh ar an duine atá ag léiriú comharthaí dul abhaile láithreach / gur féidir lena thuismitheoirí / chaomhnóirí é / í a thabhairt abhaile go gcuirfidh siad glaoch ar a ndochtúir agus leanúint de bheith ag féinleithlisiú sa bhaile;

translation.en: Facilitate the person presenting with symptoms remaining in isolation if they cannot immediately go home and facilitate them calling their doctor.
translation.ga: Déan éascaíocht don duine a bhfuil comharthaí air / uirthi fanacht ar leithlis mura féidir leis / léi dul abhaile láithreach agus cabhraigh leis / léi glaoch ar an dochtúir.

translation.en: The individual should avoid touching people, surfaces and objects.
translation.ga: Ba chóir don duine teagmháil le daoine, dromchlaí agus rudaí a sheachaint.

translation.en: Advice should be given to the person presenting with symptoms to cover their mouth and nose with the disposable tissue provided when they cough or sneeze and put the tissue in the waste bag provided;
translation.ga: Ba chóir iarraidh ar an duine a léiríonn comharthaí a bhéal agus a shrón a chlúdach leis an gciarsúr páipéir indiúscartha a sholáthraítear nuair a bhíonn siad ag casacht nó ag sraothartach agus an ciarsúr a chur sa mhála dramhaíola a sholáthraítear;

translation.en: If the person is well enough to go home, arrange for them to be transported home by a family member, as soon as possible and advise them to inform their general practitioner by phone of their symptoms.
translation.ga: Má tá an duine maith go leor chun dul abhaile, déan socrú go niompródh ball den teaghlach abhaile é / í, a luaithe is féidir agus iarr air / uirthi an cleachtóir ginearálta a chur ar an eolas faoi na comharthaí tríd an bhfón.

translation.en: Public transport of any kind should not be used;
translation.ga: Níor cheart iompar poiblí de chineál ar bith a úsáid;

translation.en: If they are too unwell to go home or advice is required, contact 999 or 112 and inform them that the sick person is a COVID19 suspect;
translation.ga: Má tá sé nó sí róbhreoite chun dul abhaile nó má tá comhairle ag teastáil, déan teagmháil le 999 nó 112 agus cuir ar an eolas iad gur cás amhrasta COVID19 é an duine breoite; Déan measúnú ar an eachtra a bheidh mar chuid de ghníomhaíochtaí leantacha agus téarnamh a chinneadh;

translation.en: Carry out an assessment of the incident which will form part of determining followup actions and recovery;
translation.ga: Déan socrú chun an limistéar leithlise agus na réimsí oibre atá i gceist a ghlanadh go cuí – (sonraí ag Alt 7)

translation.en: Arrange for appropriate cleaning of the isolation area and work areas involved – (details at Section 7)
translation.ga: Cuirfidh FSS aon bhall foirne / tuismitheoirí a tháinig i ndlúththeagmháil le cás diagnóisithe ar an eolas tríd an bpróiseas rianaithe teagmhála.

translation.en: The HSE will inform any staff/parents who have come into close contact with a diagnosed case via the contact tracing process.
translation.ga: Rachaidh FSS i dteagmháil leis na daoine ábhartha go léir mar a ndéantar diagnóis COVID19.

translation.en: The HSE will contact all relevant persons where a diagnosis of COVID19 is made.
translation.ga: Ba cheart treoracha FSS a leanúint agus tá rúndacht

translation.en: The instructions of the HSE should be followed and staff and student confidentiality is essential at all times.
translation.ga: na foirne agus na scoláirí ríthábhachtach gach uile thráth.

translation.en: School staff should be encouraged to download the HSE COVID19 tracker app to assist Public Health for contract tracing purposes.
translation.ga: Ba chóir foireann scoile a spreagadh chun lorgaire rianaithe COVID19 an FSS a íoslódáil chun cabhrú le Sláinte Phoiblí chun críocha rianaithe teagmhála.

translation.en: Both in and out of the school setting (see section 5.1).
translation.ga: Ar shuíomh na scoile agus taobh amuigh de (féach alt 5.1).

translation.en: Staff Duties
translation.ga: Dualgais na Foirne

translation.en: Staff have a statutory obligation to take reasonable care for their own health and safety and that of their colleagues and other parties.
translation.ga: Tá dualgas reachtúil ar an bhfoireann aire réasúnta a thabhairt dá sláinte agus dá sábháilteacht féin agus do shláinte a gcomhghleacaithe agus páirtithe eile.

translation.en: The cooperation and assistance of all staff is essential to reduce the risk of spread of COVID19 and to protect health and safety as far as possible within the school.
translation.ga: Tá comhoibriú agus cúnamh na foirne go léir riachtanach chun an baol go scaipfí COVID19 a laghdú agus chun sláinte agus sábháilteacht a chosaint a mhéid is féidir laistigh den scoil.

translation.en: All staff have a key role to play.
translation.ga: Tá ról lárnach le comhlíonadh ag gach ball den fhoireann.

translation.en: In this regard and in order to facilitate a safe return to work, these duties include, but are not limited to, the following:
translation.ga: Maidir leis sin agus chun filleadh sábháilte ar an obair a éascú, áirítear iad seo a leanas ar na dualgais seo, gan a bheith teoranta dóibh:

translation.en: Adhere to the School COVID19 Response Plan and the control measures outlined.
translation.ga: Cloí leis an bPlean Freagartha COVID19 Scoile agus na bearta rialaithe atá leagtha amach.

translation.en: Complete the RTW form before they return to work.
translation.ga: An fhoirm RTW (Filleadh ar an Obair) a chomhlánú sula bhfilleann siad ar an obair.

translation.en: Must inform the Principal if there are any other circumstances relating to COVID19, not included in the form, which may need to be disclosed to facilitate their safe return to the workplace.
translation.ga: Ní mór dóibh an Príomhoide a chur ar an eolas má tá aon chúinsí eile ann a bhaineann le COVID19 nach bhfuil san áireamh san fhoirm agus ar gá iad a nochtadh chun gur féidir leo filleadh ar an ionad oibre go sábháilte.

translation.en: Must complete COVID19 Induction Training and any other training required prior to their return to school.
translation.ga: Ní mór dóibh oiliúint ionduchtúcháin COVID19 a chomhlánú agus aon oiliúint eile a theastaíonn sula bhfillfidh siad ar scoil.

translation.en: Must be aware of, and adhere to, good hygiene and respiratory etiquette.
translation.ga: Ní mór dóibh a bheith ar an eolas faoi deashláinteachas agus béasaíocht riospráide agus cloí leo .

translation.en: Coordinate practices and work with their colleagues to ensure that physical distancing is maintained.
translation.ga: Cleachtais a chomhordú agus oibriú lena gcomhghleacaithe chun a chinntiú go gcoinnítear scaradh fisiciúil.

translation.en: Make themselves aware of the symptoms of COVID19 and monitor their own wellbeing.
translation.ga: Iad féin a chur ar an eolas faoi chomharthaí COVID19 agus monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar a bhfolláine féin.

translation.en: Selfisolate at home and contact their GP promptly for further advice if they display any symptoms of COVID19.
translation.ga: Féinleithlisiú sa bhaile agus teagmháil a dhéanamh go pras lena ndochtúir chun tuilleadh comhairle a fháil má léiríonn siad aon chomharthaí Covid19.

translation.en: Not return to or attend school if they have symptoms of COVID19 under any circumstances.
translation.ga: Gan filleadh ar an scoil ná freastal uirthi má tá comharthaí COVID19 orthu ar chúinse ar bith.

translation.en: Not to return to or attend school in the event of the following:
translation.ga: Gan filleadh ar an scoil ná freastal ar an scoil sna cásanna seo a leanas:

translation.en: if they are identified as a close contact of a confirmed case of COVID19
translation.ga: má aithnítear gur gartheagmhálaí iad le cás deimhnithe COVID19

translation.en: if they live with someone who has symptoms of the virus
translation.ga: má chónaíonn siad le duine a bhfuil comharthaí an víris air

translation.en: If they have travelled outside of Ireland; in such instances staff are advised to consult and follow latest Government advice in relation to foreign travel.
translation.ga: Má thaistil siad lasmuigh d'Éirinn; i gcásanna den sórt sin moltar don fhoireann an chomhairle rialtais is déanaí maidir le taisteal eachtrach a fhiosrú agus a leanúint.

translation.en: If they develop any symptoms of COVID19 whilst within the school facility, they should adhere to the procedure outlined above.
translation.ga: Má thagann aon chomharthaí de COVID19 orthu agus iad laistigh den scoil, ba cheart dóibh cloí leis an nós imeachta atá leagtha amach thuas.

translation.en: Keep informed of the updated advice of the public health authorities and comply with same.
translation.ga: Fanacht ar an eolas faoi chomhairle nuashonraithe na núdarás sláinte phoiblí agus cloí leo.

translation.en: Cooperate with any public health personnel and their school for contact tracing purposes and follow any public health advice given in the event of a case or outbreak in their school
translation.ga: Comhoibriú le haon phearsanra sláinte phoiblí agus lena scoil chun críocha rianaithe teagmhála agus aon chomhairle sláinte phoiblí a thugtar a leanúint má tharlaíonn cás nó ráig ina scoil

translation.en: Undergo any COVID19 testing that may be required as part of mass or serial testing as advised by Public Health
translation.ga: Dul faoi aon tástáil COVID19 a d'fhéadfadh a bheith ag teastáil mar chuid de mhórthástáil nó de thástáil shrathach mar a chuireann an tSláinte Phoiblí in iúl

translation.en: COVID19 related absence management
translation.ga: Bainistíocht neamhláithreachta a bhaineann le Covid19

translation.en: The management of a COVID19 related absence will be managed in line with agreed procedures with the Department of Education.
translation.ga: Déanfar bainistiú ar neamhláithreacht a bhaineann le COVID19 a bhainistiú de réir na nósanna imeachta atá comhaontaithe leis an Roinn Oideachais.

translation.en: Employee Assistance Service
translation.ga: Seirbhís Chúnaimh d’Fhostaithe

translation.en: The Department recognises the need for school staff wellbeing and collective selfcare.
translation.ga: Aithníonn an Roinn an gá atá le folláine na foirne scoile agus le féinchúram , lena náirítear an tSeirbhís um Fhorbairt Ghairmiúil do Mhúinteoirí (PDST) agus an Lárionad um Cheannaireacht Scoile (CSL), chomh maith leis an tacaíocht a thabharfaidh Foireann Cur Chun Cinn Sláinte an FSS.

translation.en: Support for school staff wellbeing will be provided by Department Support Services including the PDST and CSL, as well as by the HSE’s Health Promotion Team.
translation.ga: Tá Straitéis Sláinte Ceirde i bhfeidhm mar acmhainn thacúil do bhaill foirne aonair i scoileanna.

translation.en: An Occupational Health Strategy is in place as a supportive resource for individual staff members in schools.
translation.ga: Is é aidhm na Straitéise Sláinte Ceirde sláinte agus folláine na bhfostaithe san ionad oibre a chur chun cinn, agus béim láidir á cur aici ar chosc.

translation.en: The aim of the Occupational Health Strategy is to promote the health and wellbeing of employees in the workplace, with a strong focus on prevention.
translation.ga: Cuimsíonn an Straitéis Sláinte Ceirde an tSeirbhís Cúnaimh d'Fhostaithe agus an tSeirbhís Sláinte Ceirde.

translation.en: The Occupational Health Strategy comprises the Employee Assistance Service and the Occupational Health Service.
translation.ga: Is é Spectrum.Life a chuireann an tSeirbhís Cúnaimh d'Fhostaithe ar fáil faoin lógó 'Wellbeing Together: Folláine le Chéile'.

translation.en: The Employee Assistance Service (EAS) is provided by Spectrum.Life under the logo of ‘Wellbeing Together: Folláinne Le Chéile’.
translation.ga: Faoin tSeirbhís Cúnaimh d’Fhostaithe (EAS), tá líne chabhrach rúnda saor in aisce ar fáil d’fhostaithe 24 uair an chloig sa lá, 365 lá sa bhliain ag 1800 411 057.

translation.en: The EAS is a selfreferral service where employees have access to a dedicated freephone confidential helpline 1800 411 057 available 24 hours a day, 365 days a year providing advice on a range of issues such as wellbeing, legal, financial, mediation, management support etc.
translation.ga: Soláthraítear comhairle ar réimse saincheisteanna amhail folláine, dlí, airgeadas, eadráin, tacaíocht bhainistíochta srl.

translation.en: The service is also available via SMS, WhatsApp, email, live chat and call back request.
translation.ga: Tá an tseirbhís ar fáil freisin trí SMS, WhatsApp, rphost, comhrá beo agus iarratas glaoigh ar ais.

translation.en: All points of contact for the service are qualified, accredited and experienced mental health professionals.
translation.ga: Is gairmithe meabhairshláinte cáilithe, creidiúnaithe a bhfuil taithí acu gach duine teagmhála sa tseirbhís.

translation.en: Where required, shortterm counselling is available to employees and their families (over the age of 18 years and living at home).
translation.ga: Nuair is gá, tá comhairleoireacht ghearrthéarmach ar fáil d'fhostaithe agus dá dteaghlaigh (os cionn 18 mbliana d'aois agus a chónaíonn sa bhaile).

translation.en: The EAS also provides advice and support to managers and delivers interventions to help them deal with health and wellbeing issues in the workplace.
translation.ga: Cuireann EAS comhairle agus tacaíocht ar fáil do bhainisteoirí freisin agus déanann sé idirghabhálacha chun cabhrú leo déileáil le saincheisteanna sláinte agus folláine san ionad oibre.

translation.en: A bespoke wellbeing portal and app is available which offers access to podcasts, blogs, live chats and videos on topics around wellbeing and mental health, family life, exercise and nutrition.
translation.ga: Tá tairseach folláine saincheaptha ann mar aon le haip a thairgeann rochtain ar phodchraoltaí, blaganna, comhráite beo agus físeáin ar thopaicí a bhaineann le folláine agus meabhairshláinte, saol an teaghlaigh, corpacmhainne agus cothú.

translation.en: ELearning programmes across mental health, sleep and a range of wellbeing topics are also available.
translation.ga: Tá cláir rFhoghlama ar mheabhairshláinte, codladh agus réimse topaicí folláine ar fáil freisin.

translation.en: In addition online cognitive behavioural therapy is provided.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin cuirtear teiripe iompraíocht chognaíoch ar líne ar fáil.

translation.en: As part of the services provided by Spectrum.Life, a Mental Health Promotion Manager is available to develop and deliver evidence based mental health and wellbeing initiatives to reduce stigma and improve mental health literacy and to increase engagement with the service.
translation.ga: Mar chuid de na seirbhísí a sholáthraíonn Spectrum.Life, tá Bainisteoir Um Chur Chun Cinn Meabhairshláinte ar fáil chun tionscnaimh mheabhairshláinte agus folláine atá bunaithe ar fhianaise a fhorbairt agus a sheachadadh chun stiogma a laghdú agus litearthacht meabhairshláinte a fheabhsú agus chun rannpháirtíocht sa tseirbhís a mhéadú.

translation.en: Spectrum.Life also provides a series of webinars and presentations to promote wellbeing in schools.
translation.ga: Beidh sraith de sheimineáir ghréasáin agus de láithreoireachtaí á gcur ar fáil acu freisin chun folláine a chur chun cinn i scoileanna

translation.en: APPENDIX 1 COVID19 Policy Statement
translation.ga: AGUISÍN 1 Ráiteas Polasaí COVID 19

translation.en: [School name] is committed to providing a safe and healthy workplace for all our staff and a safe learning environment for all our students.
translation.ga: Geallann [Ainm na Scoile] láthair oibre sábháilte agus sláintiúil a chur ar fáil dár bhfoireann go léir agus timpeallacht foghlama shábháilte dár scoláirí go léir.

translation.en: To ensure that, we have developed and updated the following COVID19 Response Plan.
translation.ga: Chun é sin chinntiú, tá an Plean seo a leanas Freagartha COVID19 forbartha agus nuashonraithe againn.

translation.en: The BOM/ETB and all school staff are responsible for the implementation of this plan and a combined effort will help contain the spread of the virus.
translation.ga: Tá an Bord Bainistíochta / BOO agus foireann uile na scoile freagrach as an bplean seo a chur i bhfeidhm agus cabhróidh comhiarracht chun scaipeadh an víris a choimeád faoi smacht.

translation.en: continue to monitor our COVID19 response and amend this plan in consultation with our staff
translation.ga: leanúint ar aghaidh ag déanamh monatóireachta ar ár bhfreagra ar COVID19 agus an plean seo a leasú i gcomhairle lenár bhfoireann

translation.en: provide up to date information to our staff and students on the Public Health advice issued by the HSE and Gov.ie
translation.ga: eolas cothrom le dáta a chur ar fáil dár bhfoireann agus dár scoláirí ar an gcomhairle Sláinte Poiblí a d'eisigh FSS agus Gov.ie

translation.en: display information on the signs and symptoms of COVID19 and correct hand washing techniques
translation.ga: faisnéis a thaispeáint faoi chomharthaí agus airíonna COVID19 agus faoi theicnící cearta níochán lámh

translation.en: agree with staff, a worker representative who is easily identifiable to carry out the role outlined in this plan
translation.ga: ionadaí oibrithe is féidir a aithint go héasca a chomhaontú leis an bhfoireann chun an ról atá leagtha amach sa phlean seo a chur i gcrích i ndáil le soláthar samhraidh

translation.en: inform all staff and students of essential hygiene and respiratory etiquette and physical distancing requirements
translation.ga: gach ball foirne agus scoláirí a chur ar an eolas faoi bhéasaíocht riachtanach maidir le sláinteachas agus riospráide agus faoi riachtanais maidir le scaradh fisiciúil

translation.en: adapt the school to facilitate physical distancing as appropriate in line with the public health guidance and direction of the Department of Education
translation.ga: an scoil a chur in oiriúint do scaradh fisiciúil de réir mar is cuí de réir threoir sláinte poiblí agus treoir na Roinne Oideachais

translation.en: keep a contact log to help with contact tracing
translation.ga: loga teagmhála a choinneáil chun cabhrú le rianú teagmhála

translation.en: ensure staff and students engage with the induction / familiarisation briefing provided by the Department of Education
translation.ga: a chinntiú go nglacfaidh an fhoireann agus na scoláirí páirt san ionduchtúchán / seisiún faisnéise a chuireann an Roinn Oideachais ar fáil

translation.en: implement the agreed procedures to be followed in the event of someone showing symptoms of COVID19 while at school
translation.ga: nósanna imeachta comhaontaithe a chur chun feidhme i gcás duine a léiríonn comharthaí COVID19 agus iad ar scoil

translation.en: provide instructions for staff and students to follow if they develop signs and symptoms of COVID19 during school time
translation.ga: treoracha a chur ar fáil don fhoireann agus do scoláirí a gcloífear leo má thagann comharthaí agus airíonna COVID19 orthu le linn am scoile

translation.en: implement cleaning in line with Department of Education advice
translation.ga: glanadh a chur i bhfeidhm i gcomhréir le comhairle na Roinne Oideachais

translation.en: All school staff will be consulted on an ongoing basis and feedback is encouraged on any concerns, issues or suggestions.
translation.ga: Rachfar i gcomhairle le foireann uile na scoile ar bhonn leanúnach agus spreagtar aiseolas maidir le haon imní, saincheisteanna nó moltaí.

translation.en: This can be done through the Lead Worker Representative(s), who will be supported in line with the agreement between the Department and education partners.
translation.ga: Is féidir é seo a dhéanamh trí Ionadaí / Ionadaithe na nOibrithe a dtacófar leis / léi de réir an chomhaontaithe idir an Roinn agus comhpháirtithe oideachais.

translation.en: Appendix 2 Return to Work Form
translation.ga: Aguisín 2 Foirm um Fhilleadh ar an Obair

translation.en: This form must be completed by staff in advance of returning to work.
translation.ga: Ní mór don fhoireann an fhoirm seo a chomhlánú roimh fhilleadh ar an obair.

translation.en: If the answer is Yes to any of the below questions, you are advised to seek medical advice before returning to work.
translation.ga: Má tá freagra dearfach ar aon cheann de na ceisteanna thíos, moltar duit comhairle leighis a lorg sula bhfillfidh tú ar an obair.

translation.en: Do you have symptoms of cough, fever, high temperature, difficulty breathing, loss or change in your sense of smell or taste now or in the past 14 days?
translation.ga: An bhfuil comharthaí casachta, fiabhrais, teocht ard, deacracht análaithe, cailleadh nó athrú i do bholadh nó i do bhlaiseadh le 14 lá anuas?

translation.en: Have you been diagnosed with confirmed or suspected COVID19 infection in the last 14 days?
translation.ga: Ar diagnóisíodh le 14 lá anuas go bhfuil ionfhabhtú COVID19 deimhnithe nó amhrasta ort?

translation.en: Are you awaiting the results of a COVID19 test?
translation.ga: An bhfuil tú ag fanacht le torthaí tástála COVID19?

translation.en: In the past 14 days, have you been in contact with a person who is a confirmed or suspected case of COVID19?
translation.ga: Le 14 lá anuas, an raibh tú i dteagmháil le duine atá deimhnithe nó atá ina chás amhrasta COVID19?

translation.en: Have you been advised by a doctor to self isolate at this time?
translation.ga: Ar iarr dochtúir ort féin leithlisiú ag an am seo?

translation.en: Have you been advised to restrict your movements at this time?
translation.ga: Ar tugadh comhairle duit do ghluaiseachtaí a shrianadh ag an bpointe seo?

translation.en: Have you been advised to cocoon at this time?
translation.ga: Ar tugadh comhairle duit cocún a dhéanamh ag an am seo?

translation.en: Note: if you’re at very high risk (extremely vulnerable) from COVID19 you may be advised to cocoon.
translation.ga: Tabhair faoi deara: má tá tú i mbaol anard (thar a bheith leochaileach) ó COVID19 is féidir go niarrfaí ort cocúnú.

translation.en: I confirm, to the best of my knowledge that I have no symptoms of COVID19, am not selfisolating or awaiting results of a COVID19 test and have not been advised to restrict my movements.
translation.ga: Deimhním, ar feadh m’eolais, nach bhfuil aon chomharthaí COVID19 orm, níl mé ag féinleithlisiú, ag fanacht le torthaí tástála COVID19 ná níor iarradh orm mo ghluaiseachtaí a shrianadh.

translation.en: Please note: The school is collecting this sensitive personal data for the purposes of maintaining safety within the workplace in light of the COVID19 pandemic.
translation.ga: Tabhair do d’aire, le do thoil: Tá an scoil ag bailiú na sonraí pearsanta íogaire seo chun sábháilteacht a chaomhnú laistigh den ionad oibre i bhfianaise phaindéim Covid19.

translation.en: The legal basis for collecting this data is based on vital public health interests and maintaining occupational health and this data will be held securely in line with our retention policy.
translation.ga: Tá an bunús dlí maidir leis na sonraí seo a bhailiú bunaithe ar leasanna ríthábhachtacha sláinte phoiblí agus ar shláinte ceirde a chaomhnú agus coinneofar faoi ghlas iad i gcomhréir lenár mbeartas coinneála.

translation.en: Appendix 3 Lead Worker Representative – Post primary Schools
translation.ga: Aguisín 3 Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe Iarbhunscoileanna

translation.en: The Work Safely Protocol is designed to support employers and workers to put measures in place that will prevent the spread of COVID19 in the workplace.
translation.ga: Is é is cuspóir don Phrótacal um Obair go Sábháilte tacú le fostóirí agus le hoibrithe bearta a chur i bhfeidhm a chuirfidh cosc ar scaipeadh COVID19 san ionad oibre.

translation.en: The Protocol was developed following discussion and agreement between the Government, Trade Unions and Employers at the Labour Employer Economic Forum.
translation.ga: Forbraíodh an Prótacal tar éis plé agus comhaontú idir an Rialtas, Ceardchumainn agus Fostóirí ag an bhFóram Eacnamaíoch Fostóra agus Lucht Saothair.

translation.en: The Protocol provides for the appointment of a Lead Worker Representative (LWR) in each workplace.
translation.ga: Déantar foráil sa Phrótacal maidir le Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe a cheapadh i ngach ionad oibre.

translation.en: The LWR will work in collaboration with the employer to assist in the implementation of measures to prevent the spread of COVID 19 and monitor adherence to those measures and to be involved in communicating the health advice around COVID19 in the workplace.
translation.ga: Oibreoidh Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe i gcomhar leis an bhfostóir chun cabhrú le cur i bhfeidhm beart chun scaipeadh COVID19 a chosc agus monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar chomhlíonadh na mbeart sin agus chun páirt a ghlacadh maidir leis an gcomhairle sláinte faoi COVID19 a chur in iúl do dhaoine san ionad oibre.

translation.en: The purpose of this section is to set out the provisions in respect of the LWR in schools.
translation.ga: Is é cuspóir leis an gcuid seo na forálacha maidir le Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe scoile a leagan amach.

translation.en: The operation of these arrangements will operate for the 2020/21 school year and will be kept under review by the parties.
translation.ga: Beidh feidhmiú na socruithe seo i gceist don scoilbhliain 2020 / 21 agus beidh athbhreithniú á dhéanamh orthu ag na páirtithe ar bhonn leanúnach.

translation.en: This document should be read in conjunction with:
translation.ga: Ba chóir an doiciméad seo a léamh i dteannta leis na nithe seo a leanas:

translation.en: The Work Safely Protocol;
translation.ga: an Prótacal um Obair go Sábháilte

translation.en: the Guidance and FAQs for Public Service Employers during COVID19;
translation.ga: an Treoir agus Ceisteanna Coitianta d’Fhostóirí na Seirbhíse Poiblí le linn COVID19;

translation.en: COVID19 Response Plan for Post primary Schools (available on the Department of Education website).
translation.ga: Plean Freagartha COVID19 d’Iarbhunscoileanna (ar fáil ar shuíomh gréasáin na Roinne Oideachais).

translation.en: Collaborative Approach
translation.ga: Cur chuige Comhoibritheach

translation.en: Responsibility for the development and implementation of the COVID19 Response Plan and the associated infection prevention control measures lies primarily with the Board of Management/ Education and Training Board and school management.
translation.ga: Tá an fhreagracht as forbairt agus cur i bhfeidhm Phlean Freagartha Covid19 agus na mbeart um chosc agus rialú ar ionfhabhtú a ghabhann leis go príomha ar an mBord Bainistíochta / BOO agus ar fhoireann bainistíochta na scoile.

translation.en: Strong communication and a shared collaborative approach is key to protecting against the spread of COVID19 in schools, and looking after the health, safety and wellbeing of staff and students.
translation.ga: Tá cumarsáid láidir agus cur chuige comhoibritheach comhroinnte ríthábhachtach chun cosaint a dhéanamh ar scaipeadh COVID19 i scoileanna, agus aire a thabhairt do shláinte, sábháilteacht agus folláine na foirne agus na scoláirí.

translation.en: Adherence to the Work Safety Protocol will only be achieved if everyone has a shared obligation in implementing the measures contained within the Protocol in their place of work.
translation.ga: Ní éireoidh linn cloí leis an bPrótacal um Obair a Dhéanamh go Sábháilte ach amháin má tá oibleagáid chomhroinnte ar gach duine na bearta atá sa Phrótacal ina (h)áit oibre a chur i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: If a staff member has any concerns or observations in relation to the COVID19 Response Plan, control measures or the adherence to such measures by staff, students or others, they should contact the Lead Worker Representative who will engage with school management.
