translation.ga: Má tá aon imní ar aon bhall den fhoireann, nó má tá aon tuairimí acu maidir leis an bPlean Freagartha COVID19, maidir le bearta rialaithe nó maidir le cloí leis na bearta sin ó thaobh baill foirne, scoláirí nó daoine eile de, ba chóir dóibh teagmháil a dhéanamh le bPríomhionadaí na nOibrithe.

translation.en: Role of the Lead Worker Representative
translation.ga: Ról Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe

translation.en: Represent all staff in the workplace regardless of role, and be aware of specific issues that may arise in respect of different staff cohorts;
translation.ga: Ionadaíocht a dhéanamh ar an bhfoireann uile san ionad oibre beag beann ar ról, agus a bheith ar an eolas faoi shaincheisteanna sonracha a d'fhéadfadh teacht chun cinn i leith cohórt foirne éagsúla;

translation.en: Work collaboratively with school management to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the safety, health and welfare of employees in relation to COVID19; Keep up to date with the latest COVID19 public health advice;
translation.ga: A oibriú i gcomhar le bainistíocht na scoile chun sábháilteacht, sláinte agus leas fostaithe a chinntiú, a mhéid agus is indéanta le réasún, maidir le COVID19;

translation.en: In conjunction with school management, promote good hygiene practices such as washing hands regularly and maintaining good respiratory etiquette along with maintaining social distancing in accordance with public health advice;
translation.ga: Coinneáil bord ar bord leis an gcomhairle sláinte phoiblí is déanaí ar COVID19; Deachleachtais sláinteachais a chur chun cinn i gcomhar le bainistíocht na scoile, cosúil le lámha a ní go rialta agus deabhéasaíocht riospráide a choimeád chomh maith le scaradh sóisialta de réir na comhairle sláinte phoiblí.

translation.en: Assist school management with the implementation of measures to suppress COVID 19 in the workplace in line with the Work Safely Protocol and current public health advice;
translation.ga: Cabhrú le bainistíocht na scoile bearta a chur i bhfeidhm chun COVID19 a choimeád faoi chois san áit oibre de réir an Phrótacail um Obair a Dhéanamh go Sábháilte agus na comhairle sláinte phoiblí reatha;

translation.en: In conjunction with school management, monitor adherence to infection prevention control measures put in place to prevent the spread of COVID19;
translation.ga: Monatóireacht a dhéanamh, i gcomhar le bainistíocht na scoile, ar chomhlíonadh na mbeart a cuireadh i bhfeidhm chun scaipeadh COVID19 a chosc.

translation.en: Conduct regular reviews of safety measures;
translation.ga: Athbhreithnithe rialta a dhéanamh ar bhearta sábháilteachta atá i bhfeidhm;

translation.en: Report any issues of concern immediately to school management and keep records of such issues and actions taken to rectify them;
translation.ga: Aon ábhar imní a thuairisciú láithreach do bhainistíocht na scoile agus taifid a choinneáil ar a leithéid de shaincheisteanna agus ar na bearta a glacadh chun iad a chur i gceart.

translation.en: Consult with the school management on the school’s COVID19 Response Plan in the event of someone developing COVID19 while in school including the location of an isolation area and a safe route to that area;
translation.ga: Dul i gcomhairle le bainistíocht na scoile maidir le Plean Freagartha COVID19 na scoile más rud é go dtagann COVID19 ar dhuine le linn dó / di a bheith ar scoil, lena náirítear suíomh limistéar leithlisithe agus bealach sábháilte chuig an limistéar sin;

translation.en: Following any incident assess with the school management any follow up action that is required;
translation.ga: Tar éis teagmhas ar bith, measúnú a dhéanamh i gcomhar le bainistíocht na scoile, ar obair leantach ar bith atá riachtanach;

translation.en: Consult with colleagues on matters relating to COVID19 in the workplace;
translation.ga: Dul i gcomhairle le comhghleacaithe maidir le hábhair a bhaineann le COVID19 san ionad oibre.

translation.en: Make representations to school management on behalf of their colleagues on matters relating to COVID19 in the workplace.
translation.ga: Uiríll a dhéanamh chuig bainistíocht na scoile thar ceann a gcomhghleacaithe maidir le hábhair a bhaineann le COVID19 san ionad oibre.

translation.en: What can a Lead Worker Representative Do?
translation.ga: Cad is féidir le Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe a dhéanamh?

translation.en: The LWR may consult with, and make representations to, school management on any issue of concern in relation to COVID19.
translation.ga: Féadfaidh Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe dul i gcomhairle leis an mbainistíocht scoile, agus uiríll a dhéanamh, maidir le haon ábhar imní i dtaobh COVID19.

translation.en: These include issues in relation to:
translation.ga: Áirítear air seo ceisteanna maidir le:

translation.en: Cleaning protocols and their implementation
translation.ga: Prótacail ghlantacháin agus iad a chur i bhfeidhm

translation.en: Physical Distancing
translation.ga: Scaradh Fisiciúil

translation.en: Configuration/reconfiguration of the school facilities, including classrooms, corridors, halls, open areas, entry and exit points, school grounds etc.
translation.ga: Cumraíocht / athchumraíocht áiseanna na scoile, lena náirítear seomraí ranga, conairí, hallaí, limistéir oscailte, pointí iontrála agus imeachta, tailte scoile srl.

translation.en: Implementation of oneway systems in the school to ensure social distancing including when entering and exiting the school
translation.ga: Córais aonbhealaigh sa scoil a chur i bhfeidhm chun a chinntiú go mbeidh scaradh sóisialta ann, rud lena náirítear dul isteach agus imeacht ón scoil

translation.en: Hand Hygiene facilities including their location and whether they are stocked and maintained
translation.ga: Saoráidí Sláinteachas Lámh, rud lena náirítear a suíomhanna agus go bhfuil siad líonta agus á gcothabháil

translation.en: Hand sanitising
translation.ga: Díghalrú lámh

translation.en: Staff awareness around hand hygiene in the school
translation.ga: Feasacht na foirne maidir le sláinteachas lámh sa scoil

translation.en: Respiratory hygiene
translation.ga: Sláinteachas riospráide

translation.en: Personal Protective Equipment
translation.ga: Trealamh Cosanta Pearsanta

translation.en: At Risk Groups
translation.ga: Grúpaí i mBaol

translation.en: Visitors/Contractors
translation.ga: Cuairteoirí / Conraitheoirí

translation.en: Does a LWR have any legal responsibilities?
translation.ga: An bhfuil aon fhreagrachtaí dlí ar Phríomhionadaí na nOibrithe?

translation.en: A Lead Worker Representative does not have any duties in relation to COVID19 other than those that apply to employees generally.
translation.ga: Níl aon dualgais ag Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe maidir le COVID19 seachas na dualgais siúd a bhaineann le fostaithe i gcoitinne.

translation.en: In other words, the LWR is not responsible for the control measures within an organisation, which remains the employer’s responsibility.
translation.ga: Ciallaíonn sé sin nach bhfuil Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe freagrach as na bearta rialaithe laistigh d'eagraíocht.

translation.en: Every school will appoint one Lead Worker Representative.
translation.ga: Ceapfaidh gach scoil Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe amháin.

translation.en: In schools with more than 40 staff, a second Lead Worker Representative will be appointed.
translation.ga: I scoileanna ina bhfuil níos mó ná 40 ball foirne, ceapfar an dara Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe.

translation.en: Selection of Lead Worker Representative(s)
translation.ga: Príomhionadaí(ithe) na nOibrithe a Roghnú

translation.en: The school staff are entitled to select staff members for the LWR position(s).
translation.ga: Tá foireann na scoile i dteideal baill foirne a roghnú do pho(i)st Phríomhionadaí na nOibrithe.

translation.en: The LWR(s) represent all staff in the workplace regardless of role and must be aware of specific issues that may arise in respect of different staff cohorts.
translation.ga: Déanann Príomhionadaí(ithe) na nOibrithe ionadaíocht ar an bhfoireann ar fad san ionad oibre beag beann ar ról agus ní mór dóibh a bheith ar an eolas faoi shaincheisteanna sonracha a d'fhéadfadh teacht chun cinn i leith cohórt foirne éagsúla.

translation.en: In this regard, where a school has two LWRs, the roles should be spread between teaching and nonteaching staff where feasible
translation.ga: Maidir leis seo, i gcás ina bhfuil beirt Phríomhionadaithe na nOibrithe ag scoil, ba cheart na róil a roinnt idir foireann teagaisc agus neamhtheagaisc nuair is féidir.

translation.en: All staff are entitled to volunteer for the LWR role and have their name put forward for election where necessary.
translation.ga: Tá gach ball foirne I dteideal glacadh le ról mar Phríomhiondaí na nOibirithe ar bhonn deonach agus a bheith ainmnithe lena t(h)oghadh más gá.

translation.en: The process for the selection and appointment of the LWR(s) is that management will seek expressions of interest from all staff in the first instance.
translation.ga: Is é an próiseas chun Príomhionadaí(ithe) na nOibrithe a roghnú agus a cheapadh ná go lorgóidh an bhainistíocht léirithe spéise ón bhfoireann ar fad ar an gcéad dul síos.

translation.en: A template email for this purpose is attached.
translation.ga: Tá teimpléad i gcomhair ríomhphoist chuige seo ceangailte.

translation.en: If an election is necessary, all school staff members will have an equal vote to select the LWR(s).”
translation.ga: Má tá gá le toghchán, beidh an vóta céanna ag gach ball foirne scoile chun Príomhionadaí(ithe) na nOibrithe a roghnú.

translation.en: Supports for the Lead Worker Representative/s
translation.ga: Tacaíochtaí do Phríomhionadaí(ithe) na nOibrithe

translation.en: The LWR(s) shall be entitled to:
translation.ga: Beidh Príomhionadaí(ithe) na nOibrithe i dteideal na rudaí seo a leanas:

translation.en: Be provided with information and training in respect of their role [further detail to be provided];
translation.ga: Faisnéis agus oiliúint a fháil maidir lena ról [cuirfear tuilleadh sonraí ar fáil]; Rachfar i gcomhairle leis an mbainistíocht scoile maidir leis na bearta rialaithe atá á gcur i bhfeidhm ag an scoil chun an baol go mbeidh siad nochta do COVID19 a íoslaghdú; Cumarsáid rialta leis an mbainistíocht scoile maidir le saincheisteanna a bhaineann le COVID19;

translation.en: Be consulted by school management on the control measures being put in place by the school to minimise the risk of being exposed to COVID19;
translation.ga: A bheith ar an eolas faoi athruithe sa chleachtas a eascraíonn as bearta freagartha COVID 19;

translation.en: Regular communication with school management on issues related to COVID19; Be informed of changes in practice arising from COVID19 response measures; Have access to any risk assessments prepared or carried out in relation to COVID19 and to details of incidents of suspected COVID19 cases that have been notified to the HSE, where they occurred and any actions taken.
translation.ga: Rochtain a bheith acu ar aon mheasúnuithe riosca a ullmhaíodh nó a rinneadh i ndáil le COVID19 agus ar shonraí faoi theagmhais a bhain le cásanna amhrasta COVID19 a cuireadh in iúl do FSS, faoin áit ar tharla siad agus faoi aon bhearta a rinneadh.

translation.en: Be provided with the necessary facilities to enable them to consult with employees or prepare any submissions or reports.
translation.ga: Áiseanna riachtanacha a fháil a chuirfidh ar a gcumas dul i gcomhairle le fostaithe nó aon aighneachtaí nó tuarascálacha a ullmhú.

translation.en: These might include access to a meeting room, photocopier, communications and equipment.
translation.ga: D'fhéadfadh rochtain ar sheomra cruinnithe, fótachóipeálaí, trealamh cumarsáide a bheith san áireamh iontu seo.

translation.en: Where the LWR is a teacher, the LWR will receive protected time of 2 hours per week from timetable to enable them to carry out their duties in that role.
translation.ga: Sa chás gur múinteoir é Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe, gheobhaidh sé / sí am faoi chosaint 2 uair sa tseachtain ón amchlár chun cur ar chumas a chuid dualgas a chomhlíonadh sa ról sin.

translation.en: In the rare instances where the appointment of a teacher selected for the LWR would cause curricular/timetabling difficulties which cannot be resolved, school management will examine internal and external possibilities to enable the teacher’s appointment as LWR.
translation.ga: Sna cásanna neamhchoitianta ina mbeadh ceapachán múinteora a roghnaíodh mar Phríomhionadaí na nOibrithe ina chúis le deacrachtaí curaclaim / ama nach féidir a réiteach, scrúdóidh bainistíocht scoile réitigh inmheánacha agus seachtracha chun ceapachán an mhúinteora mar Phríomhionadaí na nOibrithe a chumasú.

translation.en: Where the matter cannot be resolved, management will set out the reasons why this is the case.
translation.ga: Sa chás nach féidir an tábhar a réiteach, leagfaidh an bhainistíocht amach na cúiseanna atá leis.

translation.en: In this circumstance, an alternative individual must be appointed as LWR.
translation.ga: Sa chás seo, ní mór duine eile a cheapadh mar Phríomhionadaí na nOibrithe.

translation.en: Where the LWR is an SNA, 66 of the “72 hours” will be utilised by the LWR to carry out their duties in that role.
translation.ga: Sa chás gur CRS é Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe, bainfidh sé / sí siúd úsáid as 66 den "72 uair an chloig" chun a c(h)uid dualgas a chomhlíonadh sa ról sin.

translation.en: Where the LWR is a Secretary or Caretaker, a reprioritisation of duties by school management should be carried out to afford the staff member sufficient time to carry out their duties in that role within the scope of their normal contracted hours.
translation.ga: Sa chás gur Rúnaí nó Feighlí é Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe, ba cheart don bhainistíocht scoile beartú tosaíochta nua a dhéanamh ar dhualgais chun dóthain ama a thabhairt don bhall foirne a chuid dualgas a chomhlíonadh sa ról sin laistigh de raon feidhme a ghnáthuaireanta conartha.

translation.en: Where an issue of concern is identified by the LWR (or is notified to the LWR by a staff member), the LWR should bring this to the attention of the Principal.
translation.ga: Sa chás go naithníonn Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe saincheist atá ina ábhar imní maidir le rialú COVID19 (nó má chuireann ball den fhoireann a leithéid ar a shúile dó / di), ba cheart dó / di é seo a chur in iúl don Phríomhoide.

translation.en: Action points for addressing the issue should where possible be agreed between the LWR and the Principal.
translation.ga: Ba cheart pointí gníomhaíochta chun aghaidh a thabhairt ar an tsaincheist a chomhaontú, nuair is féidir, idir Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe agus an Príomhoide.

translation.en: Staff should be informed of the outcome.
translation.ga: Ba cheart an fhoireann a chur ar an eolas faoin toradh.

translation.en: If agreement cannot be reached, the LWR should notify the Board of Management (Chairperson of the BoM in the first instance)/ Education and Training Board head office of the issue.
translation.ga: Mura féidir teacht ar chomhaontú, ba cheart do Phríomhionadaí na nOibrithe fógra a thabhairt don Bhord Bainistíochta (Cathaoirleach an BB ar an gcéad dul síos)/Ceannoifig an Bhoird Oideachais agus Oiliúna faoin gceist.

translation.en: Action points for addressing the issue should where possible be agreed between the LWR and the BoM/ETB head office.
translation.ga: Ba cheart pointí gníomhaíochta chun aghaidh a thabhairt ar an tsaincheist a chomhaontú, nuair is féidir, idir Príomhionadaí na nOibrithe agus an Bord Bainistíochta / ceannoifig an BOO.

translation.en: Staff should be informed of the outcome.
translation.ga: Ba cheart an fhoireann a chur ar an eolas faoin toradh.

translation.en: COVID19 Response Plan: plan designed to support the staff and BOM/ ETB in putting infection prevention control measures in place that will prevent the spread of COVID19 in the school environment.
translation.ga: Plean Freagartha COVID19: plean atá deartha chun tacú leis an bhfoireann agus leis an mBord Bainistíochta / BOO chun bearta um chosc agus rialú ionfhabhtuithe a chur i bhfeidhm a chuirfidh cosc ar scaipeadh Covid19 i dtimpeallacht na scoile.

translation.en: The plan details the policies and practices necessary for a school to meet the Work Safely Protocol, Department of Education and public health guidance to prevent the introduction and spread of COVID19 in the school environment.
translation.ga: Sonraítear sa phlean na beartais agus na cleachtais atá riachtanach do scoil chun freastal ar an bPrótacal um Obair a Dhéanamh go Sábháilte, treoir na Roinne Oideachais agus na sláinte poiblí chun cosc a chur ar thabhairt isteach agus ar scaipeadh COVID19 i dtimpeallacht na scoile.

translation.en: COVID19 Response Plans for Post primary Schools are available on the Department’s website.
translation.ga: Tá Pleananna Freagartha COVID19 do Iarbhunscoileanna ar fáil ar shuíomh gréasáin na Roinne.

translation.en: Labour Employer Economic Forum (LEEF): the forum for high level dialogue between Government, Trade Union and Employer representatives on matters of strategic national importance involves the Irish Congress of Trade Unions, Government & Employers.
translation.ga: Fóram Eacnamaíoch Fostóra agus Lucht Saothair (LEEF): an fóram le haghaidh idirphlé ardleibhéil idir ionadaithe Rialtais, Ceardchumann agus Fostóirí maidir le hábhair a bhfuil tábhacht straitéiseach náisiúnta ag baint leo baineann Comhdháil na gCeardchumann, an Rialtais agus Fostóirí leis.

translation.en: Work Safety Protocol: national protocol designed to support employers and workers to put measures in place that will prevent the spread of COVID19 in the workplace.
translation.ga: Prótacal um Obair a Dhéanamh go Sábháilte: prótacal náisiúnta atá ceaptha chun tacú le fostóirí agus le hoibrithe bearta a chur i bhfeidhm a chuirfidh cosc ar scaipeadh COVID19 san ionad oibre.

translation.en: Safety Representative: Section 25 of the Safety, Health and Welfare at Work Act 2005 sets out the selection and role of the Safety Representative in the workplace.
translation.ga: Ionadaí Sábháilteachta: Leagtar amach in Alt 25 den Acht um Shábháilteacht, Sláinte agus Leas ag an Obair 2005 roghnú agus ról an Ionadaí Sábháilteachta san ionad oibre.

translation.en: The rights of the Safety Representative are set out in legislation.
translation.ga: Tá cearta an Ionadaí Sábháilteachta leagtha amach sa reachtaíocht.

translation.en: (Note: A Safety Representative has rights and not duties under the 2005 Act).
translation.ga: (Nóta: Tá cearta ag Ionadaí Sábháilteachta agus ní dualgais de réir an Achta 2005).

translation.en: This role is separate to the LWR under COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá an ról seo ar leithligh ó Phríomhionadaí na nOibrithe faoi COVID19.

translation.en: Appendix 4 Risk Assessment
translation.ga: Aguisín 4 Measúnú Riosca

translation.en: COVID19 Risk Template (List identifies COVID19 as the hazard and outlines infection prevention control measures required to deal with this risk)
translation.ga: Teimpléad Riosca COVID19 (Aithnítear COVID19 sa liosta mar an ghuais agus tugann sé breacchuntas ar bhearta um chosc agus rialú ionfhabhtuithe atá riachtanach chun déileáil leis an riosca seo)

translation.en: Hazards Is the hazard present?
translation.ga: Guaiseacha An bhfuil an ghuais ann?

translation.en: What is the risk?
translation.ga: Cad é an riosca?

translation.en: Risk rating
translation.ga: Rátáil Riosca

translation.en: Is this control in place?
translation.ga: An bhfuil an rialú i bhfeidhm?

translation.en: Action/to do list/outstanding controls
translation.ga: Bearta / rudaí atá le déanamh / rialuithe gan déanamh fós

translation.en: Person responsible
translation.ga: Duine freagrach

translation.en: Examples of Actions
translation.ga: Bearta Samplacha

translation.en: Follow public health guidance from HSE re hygiene and respiratory etiquette
translation.ga: Cloígh le treoir sláinte phoiblí ó FSS maidir le sláinteachas agus béasaíocht riospráide

translation.en: Complete School COVID19 Policy Statement
translation.ga: Comhlánaigh Ráiteas Beartais COVID19 na Scoile

translation.en: Return to Work Forms received and reviewed
translation.ga: Foirmeacha um Fhilleadh ar an Obair faighte agus léite

translation.en: Induction Training provided Contact log in place
translation.ga: Oiliúint ionduchtúcháin tugtha Logleabhar Teagmhála in áit

translation.en: Complete checklists as required: School Management
translation.ga: Líon isteach seicliostaí de réir mar is gá: Bainistíocht Scoile

translation.en: If there is one or more High Risk (H) actions needed, then the risk of injury could be high and immediate action should be taken.
translation.ga: Má tá beart ardriosca H amháin nó níos mó ag teastáil , d’fhéadfadh riosca ard gortaithe a bheith i gceist agus ba chóir beart a dhéanamh láithreach.

translation.en: Medium Risk (M) actions should be dealt with as soon as possible.
translation.ga: Ba chóir déileáil le bearta Meánriosca (M) a luaithe agus is féidir.

translation.en: Low Risk (L) actions should be dealt with as soon as practicable.
translation.ga: Ba chóir déileáil le bearta riosca íseal (Í) a luaithe agus is indéanta.

translation.en: Risk Assessment carried out by:
translation.ga: Measúnú Riosca déanta ag:

translation.en: Who the visitor met (separate line required for each person the visitor met)
translation.ga: Na Daoine a bhí i dteagmháil leis an gcuairteoir (ní mór do gach ainm a bheith ar líne dhifriúil)

translation.en: Length of time spent with each person in the school
translation.ga: Cá mhéad ama a chaith an cuairteoir le gach duine sa scoil

translation.en: Appendix 6 Checklist for School Management
translation.ga: Aguisín 6 Seicliosta do Bhainisteoirí Scoile

translation.en: Composite Checklist for Schools
translation.ga: Seicliosta ilchodach do scoileanna

translation.en: This checklist supports planning and preparation, control measures and induction needed to support a safe return to school for students, staff, parents and others.
translation.ga: Tacaíonn an seicliosta seo leis an bpleanáil agus ullmhúchán, agus leis na bearta rialaithe agus ionduchtúchán a theastaíonn chun cabhrú le sábháilteacht scoláirí, foirne, tuismitheoirí agus eile is iad ag filleadh ar scoil.

translation.en: For completion by the agreed person with overall responsibility of managing the implementation of the COVID19 Response plan in line with the supports as agreed with Department of Education.
translation.ga: Le comhlánú ag an duine comhaontaithe a bhfuil freagracht fhoriomlán air / uirthi bainistiú a dhéanamh ar chur i bhfeidhm phlean Freagartha COVID19 i gcomhréir leis na tacaí mar a comhaontaíodh leis an Roinn Oideachais.

translation.en: Planning and Systems
translation.ga: Pleanáil agus Córais

translation.en: Is there a system in place to keep up to date with the latest advice from Government and Department of Education, to ensure that advice is made available in a timely manner to staff and students and to adjust your plans and procedures in line with that advice?
translation.ga: An bhfuil córas i bhfeidhm chun fanacht ar an eolas faoin gcomhairle is déanaí ón Rialtas agus ó ROS, lena chinntiú go dtugtar comhairle a ar bhonn tráthúil don fhoireann do agus do na scoláirí agus go ndéantar do nósanna imeachta a choigeartú de réir na comhairle sin?

translation.en: Have you prepared a school COVID19 response plan and made it available to staff and students? Department guidance and templates provided
translation.ga: Ar ullmhaigh tú plean freagartha scoile COVID19 agus chuir tú ar fáil don fhoireann agus do na scoláirí é? Treoir agus teimpléid na Roinne ar fáil

translation.en: Have you a system in place to provide staff and students with information and guidance on the measures that have been put in place to help prevent the spread of the virus and what is expected of them?
translation.ga: An bhfuil córas i bhfeidhm chun eolas agus treoir a thabhairt don fhoireann agus scoláirí maidir leis na bearta atá i bhfeidhm chun scaipeadh an víris a chosc agus na gníomhartha a mbeifear ag súil leo uathusan?

translation.en: Have you displayed the COVID19 posters in suitable locations highlighting the signs and symptoms of COVID19?
translation.ga: An bhfuil na póstaeir COVID19 in áiteanna oiriúnacha chun aird a tharraingt ar chomharthaí agus ar airíonna COVID19?

translation.en: Have you told staff of the purpose of the COVID19 contact log?
translation.ga: Ar inis tú don fhoireann agus do scoláirí cén fáth a bhfuil gá le loga teagmhála COVID19?

translation.en: Have you a COVID19 contact log in place to support HSE tracing efforts if required? (Contact log template attached).
translation.ga: An bhfuil loga teagmhála COVID19 i bhfeidhm chun tacú le hiarrachtaí rianaithe an FSS más gá? (Tá teimpléad den loga teagmhála ceangailte).

translation.en: Have you informed staff on the measures and provided a system for them to raise issues or concerns and to have them responded to?
translation.ga: Ar chuir tú an fhoireann ar an eolas faoi na bearta agus ar chuir tú córas in áit dóibh chun ceisteanna nó imní a lua is chun freagraí a fháil ar na ceisteanna sin?

translation.en: Have you reviewed and updated risk assessments in line with DES advice to take account of any controls to help prevent the spread of COVID19? (Risk template attached)
translation.ga: An ndearna tú athbhreithniú agus uasdátú ar mheasúnaithe riosca de réir chomhairle na Roinne, a chuirfeadh san áireamh aon rialuithe a chabhródh leis an gcosc ar COVID19? (Tá teimpléad riosca ceangailte).

translation.en: Have you updated emergency plans, if necessary to take account of the COVID19 response plan?
translation.ga: An ndearna tú uasdátú ar phleananna éigeandála, más gá, chun plean freagartha COVID19 a chur san áireamh?

translation.en: Have you made available to each staff member a COVID19 returntowork form to be completed and returned before they return to the workplace? (Template attached)
translation.ga: Plean Freagartha COVID19 le haghaidh Athoscailt Shábháilte Inbhuanaithe IarAr cuireadh foirm filleadharanobair COVID19 ar fáil do gach ball foirne le comhlánú agus a sheoladh ar ais 3 lá sula bhfillfidh siad ar an láthair oibre? (Teimpléad ceangailte)

translation.en: Have you requested confirmation that the details in the Return to Work Form remain unchanged following periods of closure such as school holidays.
translation.ga: Ar iarr tú deimhniú nach bhfuil aon athrú ar na sonraí san Fhoirm um Fhilleadh ar Obair tar éis tréimhsí dúnta ar nós laethanta saoire scoile.

translation.en: Are you aware of staff members who are at very high risk under the HSE guidance on people most at risk (HSE guidance on people most atrisk) and advised them of the DES agreed arrangements for management of those staff?
translation.ga: An bhfuil tú ar an eolas faoi bhaill foirne atá i mbaol anard faoi threoir an FSS maidir leis na daoine is mó atá i mbaol (treoir FSS maidir leis na daoine is mó atá i mbaol) agus ar mhínigh tú dóibh faoi shocruithe comhaontaithe an ROS maidir le bainistiú na mball foirne sin?

translation.en: Have you advised staff and students they must stay at home if sick or if they have any symptoms of COVID19?
translation.ga: Ar chuir tú in iúl don fhoireann agus do na scoláirí nach mór dóibh fanacht sa bhaile má bhíonn siad tinn nó má bhíonn aon chomharthaí COVID19 orthu?

translation.en: Have you advised staff and students not to return to or attend school if they are identified by the HSE as a close contact of a confirmed case of COVID19 or if they live with someone who has symptoms of the virus.
translation.ga: Ar iarr tú ar an bhfoireann agus ar na scoláirí gan filleadh ar scoil ná freastal uirthi má aithnítear iad ag an FSS mar ghartheagmhálaí le cás deimhnithe COVID19 nó má chónaíonn siad le duine a bhfuil comharthaí an víris orthu.

translation.en: Have you advised staff and students not to return or attend school if they have travelled outside of Ireland; in such instances staff are advised to consult and follow latest Government advice in relation to foreign travel.
translation.ga: Ar iarr tú ar an bhfoireann agus ar na scoláirí gan filleadh ar scoil ná freastal uirthi má thaistil siad lasmuigh d'Éirinn; i gcásanna den sórt sin moltar don fhoireann an chomhairle rialtais is déanaí maidir le taisteal eachtrach a fhiosrú agus a leanúint.

translation.en: Have you told staff and students what to do and what to expect if they start to develop symptoms of COVID19 in school, including where the isolation area is?
translation.ga: Ar inis tú don fhoireann agus do na scoláirí cad é atá le déanamh agus cad é ar chóir dóibh a bheith ag súil leis má thosaíonn comharthaí COVID19 ag teacht orthu ar scoil, lena náirítear an áit a bhfuil an limistéar leithlis?

translation.en: Have you advised staff and pupils to cooperate with any public health officials and the school for contact tracing purposes and follow any public health advice in the event of a case or outbreak in the school;
translation.ga: Ar iarr tú ar an bhfoireann agus ar na scoláirí comhoibriú le haon oifigigh sláinte phoiblí agus leis an scoil chun críocha rianú teagmhála agus aon chomhairle sláinte phoiblí a leanúint má tharlaíonn cás nó ráig sa scoil;

translation.en: Have you advised staff of the availability of the supports of the occupational health and wellbeing programme through Spectrum Life?
translation.ga: Ar chuir tú in iúl do bhaill foirne go bhfuil tacaíocht an chláir sláinte agus folláine ceirde ar fáil trí Spectrum Life?

translation.en: Has a lead worker representative been identified (in line with the process agreed with the DES and education partners) and detailed at Section 4.3 of this plan to help advise staff and to monitor compliance with COVID19 control measures in the school and taken measures to ensure all staff know who the representative is?
translation.ga: Ar aithníodh ionadaí príomhoibrí (i gcomhréir leis an bpróiseas a comhaontaíodh leis an ROS agus le comhpháirtithe oideachais) agus atá sonraithe ag Alt 4.3 den phlean seo chun cabhrú le foireann comhairle a chur ar an bhfoireann agus chun monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar chomhlíonadh bearta rialaithe COVID19 sa scoil agus bearta a dhéanamh chun a chinntiú go bhfuil a fhios ag an bhfoireann go léir cé hé an tionadaí?

translation.en: Training and Induction
translation.ga: Oiliúint agus Ionduchtúchán

translation.en: Have you advised staff and students to view the Department of Education’s training materials which are available online?
translation.ga: An ndúradh le foireann agus le scoláirí féachaint ar na hábhair oiliúna atá ar fáil ón Roinn Oideachais ar líne?

translation.en: Have you taken the necessary steps to update your school induction / familiarisation training to include any additional information relating to COVID19 for your school? 22.
translation.ga: An ndearna tú na bearta cuí chun d’ionduchtúchán scoile / oiliúint chleachtaidh a uasdátú ionas go gcuimsítear aon eolas breise a bhaineann le COVID19?

translation.en: Have first aiders, if available, been given updated training on infection prevention and control re: hand hygiene and use of PPE as appropriate?
translation.ga: Má tá lucht garchabhrach ar fáil, an bhfuair siad oiliúint uasdátaithe ar ionfhabhtú a chosc agus a rialú trí shláinteachas lámh agus TCP a úsáid nuair is cuí?

translation.en: Buildings / Equipment
translation.ga: Foirgnimh / Trealamh

translation.en: If you have mechanical ventilation does it need cleaning or maintenance before the school reopens after periods of closure?
translation.ga: Má tá aeráil mheicniúil sa scoil an bhfuil glantachán nó cothabháil le déanamh uirthi sula nathosclóidh an scoil i ndiaidh tréimhsí dúnta?

translation.en: Does your water system need flushing at outlets following low usage to prevent Legionnaire’s Disease?
translation.ga: An dteastaíonn sruthú ó do chóras uisce ag na poill éalaithe tar éis úsáid íseal chun an Galar Legionnaire a chosc?

translation.en: Have you visually checked, or had someone check, all equipment in the school for signs of deterioration or damage before being used again?
translation.ga: An ndearna tú féin, nó ar thug tú ar dhuine oiriúnach, seiceáil ar an bhfearas ar fad atá sa scoil chun teacht ar chomharthaí meatha nó damáiste sula núsáidfear arís é?

translation.en: Have you arranged for the school, including all equipment, desks, benches, doors and frequent touched surfaces points, to be cleaned once a day
translation.ga: Ar socraíodh go nglantar an scoil ar fad uair amháin sa lá, lena náirítear fearas, deasca, binsí agus doirse mar aon le pointí dromchla a mbaintear go minic leo?

translation.en: Infection Prevention Control Measures in place
translation.ga: Bearta um Chosc agus Rialú ar Ionfhabhtuithe i bhfeidhm

translation.en: Hand / respiratory hygiene
translation.ga: Sláinteachas lámh / riospráide

translation.en: Have you accessed supplies of hand sanitisers and any necessary PPE equipment in line with the interim HPSC health guidance from the national framework provided by the Department?
translation.ga: An bhfuil tú tar éis teacht ar sholáthar díghalrán lámh agus aon fhearas riachtanach eile TCP de réir treoir sláinte eatramhach an Lárionaid Faire um Chosaint Sláinte ón gcreat náisiúnta a chuir an Roinn ar fáil?

translation.en: Are there hand washing/hand sanitising stations in place to accommodate staff, students and visitors adhering to hand hygiene measures in accordance with Department guidance?
translation.ga: An bhfuil stáisiúin nite lámh / díghalrú lámh agaibh chun freastal ar fhoireann, scoláirí agus cuairteoirí is iad ag cloí leis na bearta díghalrú lámh de réir treoir ón Roinn?

translation.en: Have arrangements been made for staff and students to have regular access to hand washing/hand sanitising facilities as appropriate?
translation.ga: An ndearnadh socruithe do rochtain rialta ag foireann agus scoláirí ar áiseanna nite / díghalrú lámh mar is cuí?

translation.en: Are hand sanitisers easily available and accessible for all staff, students and visitors – e.g. in each classroom and at entry and exit points to school buildings?
translation.ga: An bhfuil teacht go héasca ar na díghalráin lámh ag an bhfoireann iomlán, scoláirí agus cuairteoirí – m.sh. i ngach seomra ranga agus ag pointí isteach is amach sna foirgnimh scoile?

translation.en: Have you made arrangements to ensure hand hygiene facilities are regularly checked and wellstocked?
translation.ga: An ndearna tú socruithe lena chinntiú go ndéantar seiceáil rialta ar áiseanna um shláinteachas lámh agus go bhfuil dóthain soláthar díobh ann do chách?

translation.en: Does the alcohol based hand sanitiser have at least 60% ethanol or 70% isopropanol as the active ingredient?
translation.ga: An bhfuil ar a laghad 60% eatánól nó 70% iseaprópánól mar chógas gníomhach sa díghalrán alcólbunaithe?

translation.en: Have you informed staff about the importance of hand washing?
translation.ga: An bhfuil foireann agus scoláirí ar aon ar an eolas faoin tábhacht a bhaineann leis na lámha a ní?

translation.en: Have you arranged for staff to view how to wash their hands (with soap and water for at least 20 seconds) and dry them correctly through the use of the HSE video resource?
translation.ga: Ar lig tú don fhoireann agus do scoláirí féachaint ar conas a lámha a ní (le gallúnach agus uisce go ceann 20 soicind ar a laghad) agus iad a thriomú mar is cóir tríd an acmhainn físeáin FSS a úsáid?

translation.en: Have you shown staff and students how to use hand sanitiser correctly and where hand sanitising stations are located?
translation.ga: Ar taispeáin tú don fhoireann agus do scoláirí conas an díghalrán lámh a úsáid mar is ceart agus an áit a bhfuil na stáisiúin díghalraithe suite?

translation.en: Have you displayed posters on how to wash hands correctly in appropriate locations?
translation.ga: Ar chuir tú póstaeir ar taispeáint i mbaill chuí a léiríonn conas lámha a ní mar is cóir?

translation.en: Have you told staff and students when they need to wash their hands or use hand sanitiser?
translation.ga: Ar inis tú don fhoireann agus do scoláirí cén uair is gá dóibh a lámha a ní nó leas a bhaint as an díghalrán lámh?

translation.en: before and after eating and preparing food
translation.ga: roimh agus i ndiaidh bia a ullmhú is a ithe

translation.en: after coughing or sneezing
translation.ga: tar éis casachtach nó sraoth a ligean

translation.en: after using the toilet
translation.ga: tar éis dul chuig an leithreas

translation.en: where hands are dirty
translation.ga: má tá na lámha salach

translation.en: before and after wearing gloves
translation.ga: roimh agus i ndiaidh lámhainní a chaitheamh

translation.en: before and after being on public transport
translation.ga: roimh agus i ndiaidh a bheith ar iompar poiblí

translation.en: before leaving home
translation.ga: sula bhfágtar an teach

translation.en: when arriving/leaving the school /other sites
translation.ga: nuair a shroichtear / fhágtar an scoil / ionaid eile

translation.en: when entering and exiting vehicles
translation.ga: ag dul isteach i bhfeithiclí agus amach astu

translation.en: after touching potentially contaminated surfaces
translation.ga: tar éis teagmháil a dhéanamh le dromchlaí a d'fhéadfadh a bheith éillithe

translation.en: if in contact with someone displaying any COVID19 symptoms
translation.ga: má tá tú i dteagmháil le duine ar a bhfuil aon chomharthaí COVID19

translation.en: Have you told staff and students of the importance of good respiratory measures to limit the spread of the virus?
translation.ga: Ar mhínigh tú don fhoireann agus do scoláirí an tábhacht a bhaineann le bearta maithe riospráide chun teorainn a chur leis an víreas a scaipeadh, áirítear orthu sin?

translation.en: avoid touching the face, eyes, nose and mouth
translation.ga: gan lámh a chur ar d’aghaidh, súile, srón ná béal

translation.en: cover coughs and sneezes with an elbow or a tissue
translation.ga: casachtach nó sraoth a chlúdach le huillinn nó le ciarsúr páipéir

translation.en: dispose of tissues in a covered bin
translation.ga: ciarsúir a chur i mbosca bruscair clúdaithe

translation.en: Physical Distancing:
translation.ga: Scaradh Fisiciúil

translation.en: Have you identified all available school space to be used to maximise physical distancing
translation.ga: Ar aithníodh an spás iomlán scoile atá ar fáil chun an leas is fearr a bhaint as scaradh fisiciúil?

translation.en: Have you reviewed the templates provided by the Department of Education which show options for revised layout of school rooms to meet physical distancing requirements?
translation.ga: Ar tharla athbhreithniú ar na teimpléid ón Roinn Oideachais a léiríonn roghanna do leagan amach difriúil seomraí ranga chun cloí leis na riachtanais um scaradh fisiciúil?

translation.en: Have you arranged to revise the layout of the rooms and furniture as per the Department guidelines?
translation.ga: n ndearnadh socrú maidir le leagan amach na seomraí agus troscán de réir na dtreoracha ón Roinn?

translation.en: Have you arranged in each room that the teacher’s desk should be at least 1m (and where possible 2m) away from student desks?
translation.ga: Ar socraíodh i ngach seomra go mbeidh binse an mhúinteora ar a laghad 1m (agus 2m más féidir) ó bhinsí na scoláirí?

translation.en: Have you arranged in each room that students would be, at least 1m and (where possible 2m) away from each other?
translation.ga: Ar socraíodh i ngach seomra go mbeidh na scoláirí ar a laghad 1m (agus 2m más féidir) óna chéile?

translation.en: Have you where possible and practicable assigned students to main class cohorts to minimise the risk of infection from COVID19?
translation.ga: Nuair is féidir agus is praiticiúil ar dáileadh scoláirí i bpríomhchohóirt ranga chun an riosca galrú ó COVID19 a laghdú?

translation.en: Have you arranged the timetable to facilitate double classes where possible and practicable?
translation.ga: Nuair is féidir agus is praiticiúil ar socraíodh an tráthchlár chun ranganna dúbailte a éascú?

translation.en: Have you advised staff and students that when students are moving to an elective subject they would, where practicable be seated with members of their main class cohort?
translation.ga: Maidir le bheith ag bogadh chuig ábhair roghnacha, ar míníodh don fhoireann agus scoláirí go mbeidh siad, nuair is féidir, ina suí in aice le baill dá bpríomhchohórt ranga féin?

translation.en: Have you made arrangements to limit interaction on arrival and departure from school and in other shared areas?
translation.ga: An ndearnadh socruithe chun teorainn a chur le plé lena chéile is iad ag teacht is ag imeacht ón scoil agus ar láithreacha eile i bpáirt?

translation.en: Have you encouraged walking or cycling to school as much as possible?
translation.ga: Ar spreagadh na scoláirí chun siúl ar scoil nó dul ar rothar chomh minic agus is féidir?

translation.en: Have you made arrangements, in so far as possible, to open additional access points to school to reduce congestion?
translation.ga: An ndearnadh socruithe, chomh fada agus is féidir, go nosclaítear pointí eile rochtana chun brú a laghdú?

translation.en: Can you provide a one system for entering and exiting the school, where practical?
translation.ga: An féidir, más praiticiúil, córas amháin a bhunú chun teacht ar scoil agus chun imeachta?

translation.en: Have you arranged for staff meetings to be held remotely or in small groups or in large spaces to facilitate physical distancing?
translation.ga: Ar socraíodh go dtarlóidh cruinnithe foirne go cianda nó i ngrúpaí beaga nó i spásanna móra chun scaradh fisiciúil a éascú?

translation.en: Have you taken steps to minimise rotation of staff between classes where possible?
translation.ga: An bhfuil córas i bhfeidhm chun gluaiseacht foirne idir ranganna a laghdú chomh fada agus is féidir?

translation.en: Have you a system to regularly remind staff and students to maintain physical distancing?
translation.ga: An bhfuil córas i bhfeidhm chun a chuir i gcuimhne don fhoireann agus do scoláirí gan dearmad a dhéanamh ar scaradh fisiciúil?

translation.en: Have you advised staff and students not to shake hands and to avoid any physical contact?
translation.ga: An ndúradh leis an bhfoireann agus scoláirí gan lámha a chroitheadh lena chéile agus gach teagmháil fhisiciúil a sheachaint?

translation.en: Have you stopped all nonessential travel for school activities?
translation.ga: Ar cuireadh ar ceal gach aon taisteal chuig gníomhaíochtaí scoile nach bhfuil riachtanach?

translation.en: Visitors to Schools
translation.ga: Cuairteoirí sna Scoileanna

translation.en: Have you identified the activities that involve interacting with essential visitors to the school, made arrangements to minimise the number of such visitors and put in place measures to prevent physical contact, as far as possible?
translation.ga: Ar aithníodh na gníomhaíochtaí ar fad a bhaineann le cuairteoirí chun na scoile a chaithfidh teacht go dtí an scoil, ar socraíodh an líon dá leithéid a laghdú agus an bhfuil bearta i bhfeidhm chun teagmháil fhisiciúil a chosc, chomh fada agus is féidir?

translation.en: Are there arrangements in place to inform essential visitors to schools of the measures to help prevent the spread of infection?
translation.ga: An bhfuil socruithe déanta chun na bearta atá i bhfeidhm maidir le cosc a chur le scaipeadh an ionfhabhtaithe a chur in iúl do chuairteoirí riachtanacha?

translation.en: Have you a system in place for all visitors who do need to come to the school to make appointment, arrange to contact a central point and to record their visit using the contact tracing log?
translation.ga: An bhfuil córas i bhfeidhm do na cuairteoirí ar fad a chaithfidh teacht go dtí an scoil a ligfidh do choinne a dhéanamh, teagmháil a aontú ar láthair lárnach agus a gcuairt a thaifeadadh tríd an loga rianú teagmhála a úsáid?

translation.en: Appendix 7 Checklist for dealing with a suspected case of COVID19
translation.ga: Aguisín 7 Seicliosta chun déileáil le cás amhrasta COVID19

translation.en: Staff members will be required to manage a suspected case in line with the protocol and training.
translation.ga: Beidh ar bhaill foirne cás amhrasta a bhainistiú de réir prótacail agus oiliúna.

translation.en: A nominated member of the school management team will be nominated as the designated contact person for ensuring that all aspects of the protocol to deal with suspected cases have been adhered to.
translation.ga: Ainmneofar ball ainmnithe d’fhoireann bainistíochta na scoile mar theagmhálaí ainmnithe chun a chinntiú gur cloíodh le gach ghné den phrótacal chun déileáil le cásanna amhrasta.

translation.en: Isolation Area
translation.ga: Limistéar Leithlisithe

translation.en: Have you identified a place that can be used as an isolation area, preferably with a door that can close?
translation.ga: An bhfuil láthair aitheanta agat a bheadh oiriúnach mar ionad leithlisithe, de rogha bheifeá in ann doras a dhúnadh uirthi?

translation.en: The isolation area does not have to be a separate room but if it is not a room it should be 2m away from others in the room.
translation.ga: Ní gá gur seomra ar leith a bheidh san ionad leithlisithe ach murar seomra ar leith é ba chóir a bheith 2m ó dhaoine eile sa tseomra.

translation.en: Is the isolation area accessible, including to staff and students with disabilities?
translation.ga: An féidir le cách teacht ar an láthair leithlisithe, foireann agus scoláirí faoi mhíchumas san áireamh?

translation.en: Is the route to the isolation area accessible?
translation.ga: An féidir le cách teacht ar an mbealach go dtí an láthair leithlisithe?

translation.en: Have you a contingency plan for dealing with more than one suspected case of COVID19?
translation.ga: An bhfuil plean teagmhasach ann chun plé le breis is cás amháin amhrasta COVID19 amháin?

translation.en: Are the following available in the isolation area(s)?
translation.ga: An bhfuil an méid seo a leanas ar fáil s(n)a láthair(láithreacha) leithlisithe?

translation.en: Tissues
translation.ga: Ciarsúir pháipéir

translation.en: Hand sanitiser
translation.ga: Díghalrán lámh

translation.en: Disinfectant/wipes
translation.ga: Díghalrán lámh / ceirteacha cuimilte

translation.en: Gloves/Masks
translation.ga: Lámhainní / Maisc

translation.en: Waste Bags
translation.ga: Málaí Dramhaíola

translation.en: Bins
translation.ga: Boscaí Bruscair

translation.en: Isolating a Person
translation.ga: Duine a leithlisiú

translation.en: Are procedures in place to accompany the infected person to the isolation area, along the isolation route with physical distancing from them?
translation.ga: An bhfuil cleachtais i bhfeidhm chun dul in éineacht le duine ionfhabhtaithe go dtí an láthair leithlisithe, ar feadh an bhealaigh leithlisithe agus cloí le scaradh fisiciúil uathu?

translation.en: Are staff familiar with this procedure?
translation.ga: An bhfuil an fhoireann eolach ar an nós imeachta seo?

translation.en: Have others been advised to maintain a distance of at least 2m from the affected person at all times?
translation.ga: Ar cuireadh comhairle ar dhaoine eile fanacht ar a laghad 2m ón nduine ar a bhfuil an bhreoiteacht i gcónaí? (tá sé i gceist plé leis seo mar chuid den oiliúint ar líne ag an ROS)

translation.en: Is there a disposable mask to wear for the affected person while in the common area and when exiting the building?
translation.ga: An bhfuil masc indiúscartha le caitheamh ag duine ar a bhfuil an bhreoiteacht fad is atá sé / sí sa limistéar comhchoiteann agus nuair atá sé / sí ag fágáil an fhoirgnimh?

translation.en: Arranging for the affected person to leave the School
translation.ga: Socruithe don duine ionfhabhtaithe imeacht ón Scoil

translation.en: Staff – have you established by asking them if the staff members feel well enough to travel home?
translation.ga: Foireann – ar cuireadh ceist orthu an bhfuil na baill fhoirne maith go leor le taisteal abhaile?

translation.en: Student – have you immediately contacted their parents/guardians and arranged for them to collect their student? Under no circumstances can a student use public or school transport to travel home if they are a suspected case of COVID19.
translation.ga: Scoláire – ar chuathas i dteagmháil láithreach lena dtuismitheoirí / caomhnóirí is an ndearnadh socrú go dtiocfaidís chun an scoláire a bhailiú? Níl cead ar bith ag scoláire iompar poiblí ná scoile a úsáid chun dul abhaile má mheastar gur cás amhrasta COVID19 iad.

translation.en: The affected person should be advised to avoid touching other people, surfaces and objects.
translation.ga: Ba chóir a rá leis an duine ionfhabhtaithe gan bhaint le daoine eile, dromchlaí ná rud ar bith eile.

translation.en: The affected person should be advised to cover their mouth and nose with disposable tissue(s) when they cough or sneeze, and to put the tissue in the bin.
translation.ga: Ba chóir a rá leis an duine ionfhabhtaithe an béal agus srón a chlúdach le ciarsú(i)r indiúscartha nuair a dhéantar casachtach nó sraoth, agus an ciarsúr a chaitheamh sa bhosca bruscair.

translation.en: Has transport home or to an assessment centre been arranged if the affected person has been directed to go there by their GP?
translation.ga: Má mhol an dochtúir teaghlaigh go gcuirfí an duine ionfhabhtaithe abhaile nó go dtí ionad measúnaithe, ar socraíodh an tiompar dá réir?

translation.en: Has the affected person been advised not to go to their GP’s surgery or any pharmacy or hospital?
translation.ga: Ar moladh don duine ionfhabhtaithe gan dul go dtí áras máinliachta an dochtúra teaghlaigh ná aon chógaslann ná ospidéal?

translation.en: Has the affected person been advised they must not use public transport?
translation.ga: Ar moladh don duine ionfhabhtaithe gan iompar poiblí a úsáid?

translation.en: Has the affected person been advised to continue wearing the face mask until they reach home?
translation.ga: Ar moladh don duine ionfhabhtaithe an masc a choimeád ar an aghaidh go sroichtear an baile?

translation.en: Have you carried out an assessment of the incident to identify any followup actions needed?
translation.ga: An ndearna tú measúnú ar an eachtra chun aon ghníomh leantach riachtanach a aithint?

translation.en: Are you available to provide advice and assistance if contacted by the HSE?
translation.ga: An bhfuil tú ar fáil chun comhairle agus cabhair a sholáthar má théann an FSS i dteagmháil leat?

translation.en: Have you taken the isolation area outofuse until cleaned and disinfected?
translation.ga: Ar dhún tú an láthair leithlisithe go dtí go ndéantar glantachán agus díghalrú uirthi?

translation.en: Have you made arrangements to clean and disinfect any classroom space where the staff or pupils were located?
translation.ga: Ar chinntigh tú go nglantar is go ndéantar díghalrú ar aon spás seomra ranga mar a raibh na baill foirne nó na scoláirí?

translation.en: Have you arranged for cleaning and disinfection of the isolation area and any other areas involved, as soon as practical after the affected person has left the building?
translation.ga: Ar eagraigh tú glantachán is díghalrú ar an láthair leithlisithe agus aon áit bhainteach eile, chomh luath agus is praiticiúil tar éis don duine ionfhabhtaithe imeacht ón bhfoirgneamh?

translation.en: Have the cleaners been trained in dealing with contaminated areas and supplied with the appropriate PPE?
translation.ga: Ar cuireadh oiliúint ar na glantóirí maidir le plé le limistéir thruaillithe agus ar dáileadh an TCP cuí orthu?

translation.en: Appendix 8 Checklist Lead Worker Representative
translation.ga: Aguisín 8 Seicliosta do Phríomhionadaí na nOibrithe

translation.en: Have you agreed with your school to act as a Lead worker representative for your school?
translation.ga: Ar aontaigh tú le do scoil gníomhú mar Phríomhionadaí na noibrithe do do scoil?

translation.en: Have you been provided with information and training in relation to the role of lead worker representative? (Training for this role is currently being explored with the HSA).
translation.ga: Ar tugadh eolas agus oiliúint duit maidir le ról Phríomhionadaí na nOibrithe? (Tá an FSS ag plé faoi láthair le hoiliúint don ról seo).

translation.en: Are you keeping up to date with the latest COVID19 advice from Government?
translation.ga: An bhfuil tú ar an eolas maidir leis an gcomhairle is déanaí ón Rialtas i leith COVID19?

translation.en: Are you aware of the signs and symptoms of COVID19?
translation.ga: An bhfuil tú ar an eolas faoi chomharthaí agus faoi airíonna COVID19?

translation.en: Do you know how the virus is spread?
translation.ga: An dtuigeann tú conas a scaiptear an víreas?

translation.en: Do you know how to help prevent the spread of COVID19?
translation.ga: An dtuigeann tú conas is féidir cabhrú chun scaipeadh COVID19 a chosc?

translation.en: Have you watched and do you understand the online Induction Training provided by the Department of Education before returning to school?
translation.ga: Ar fhéach tú ar an oiliúint ar líne ón Roinn Oideachais agus an dtuigeann tú í agus ar tugadh oiliúint ionduchtúcháin duit sular fhill tú ar an scoil?

translation.en: Are you helping in keeping your fellow workers up to date with the latest COVID19 advice from Government?
translation.ga: An bhfuil tú ag cabhrú maidir le do chomhghleacaithe a choimeád ar an eolas leis an gcomhairle is déanaí ón rialtas faoi COVID19?

translation.en: Have you completed the COVID19 return to work form and given it to your school? (Department template ReturntoWork form available)
translation.ga: Ar líon tú an fhoirm um fhilleadh ar an obair COVID19 agus ar thug tú don scoil í? (Teimpléad um Fhilleadh ar an Obair ar fáil ón ROS)

translation.en: Are you aware of the control measures your school has put in place to minimise the risk of you and others being exposed to COVID19? (Checklist for School Management available)
translation.ga: An dtuigeann tú na bearta rialaithe atá i bhfeidhm sa scoil chun an riosca a laghdú maidir leat féin agus le daoine eile a bheith i gcontúirt a ngalraithe ag COVID19? (Seicliosta don Bhainistíocht Scoile ar fáil)

translation.en: Did your school consult with you when putting control measures in place? Control measures have been agreed centrally between the Department and education partners.
translation.ga: An ndeachaigh do scoil i gcomhairle leat nuair a bhí na bearta rialaithe á gcur i bhfeidhm? Aontaíodh na bearta rialaithe ar bhonn lárnach idir an Roinn agus na páirtithe oideachais.

translation.en: Consultation at school level should take place on any specific local arrangements necessary to implement the protocol
translation.ga: Ba chóir comhairliúchán a dhéanamh ag leibhéal scoile má bhíonn gá le haon socruithe áitiúla ar leith chun an prótacal a chur i bhfeidhm

translation.en: Have you a means of regular communication with the person with overall responsibility for the school COVID19 plan?
translation.ga: An bhfuil modh cumarsáide rialta agat leis an duine ar a bhfuil freagracht fhoriomlán as an bplean scoile COVID19?

translation.en: Are you cooperating with your school to make sure these control measures are maintained?
translation.ga: An bhfuil tú ag comhoibriú leis an scoil lena chinntiú go gcloítear leis na bearta rialaithe úd?

translation.en: Have you familiarised yourself with the cleaning requirements needed to help prevent cross contamination? (Checklist for Cleaning and Disinfection available)
translation.ga: An bhfuil eolas cruinn agat ar na riachtanais ghlantacháin a bhfuil gá leo chun traséilliú a sheachaint? (Tá Seicliosta ar fáil don Ghlantachán agus don Díghalrú)

translation.en: Have you been asked to walk around and check that the control measures are in place and are being maintained?
translation.ga: Ar iarradh ort siúl thart agus seiceáil go bhfuil na bearta rialaithe i bhfeidhm agus go bhfuiltear ag cloí leo?

translation.en: Are you reporting immediately to the person with overall responsibility for the school COVID19 plan any problems, areas of noncompliance or defects that you see?
translation.ga: An bhfuil tú ag tuairisciú láithreach don té ag a bhfuil freagracht iomlán as an bplean scoile do COVID19 maidir le fadhbanna, réimsí neamhghéilliúlachta nó laigí atá feicthe agat?

translation.en: Are you keeping a record of any problems, areas of noncompliance or defects and what action was taken to remedy the issue?
translation.ga: An bhfuil taifead á choimeád agat ar aon fhadhbanna, réimsí neamhghéilliúlachta nó laigí agus cén gníomh a tharla chun an scéal a réiteach?

translation.en: Are you familiar with what to do in the event of someone developing the symptoms of COVID19 while at school?
translation.ga: An dtuigeann tú cad é a ba chóir a dhéanamh má thagann comharthaí COVID19 ar dhuine agus iad ar scoil?

translation.en: Are you cooperating with your school in identifying an isolation area and a safe route to that area? (Checklist for dealing with suspected case of COVID19 available)
translation.ga: An bhfuil tú ag comhoibriú leis an scoil maidir le láthair leithlisithe agus bealach slán go dtí an láthair chéanna a aithint? (Tá seicliosta ar fáil chun plé le cás amhrasta COVID19)

translation.en: Are you helping in the management of someone developing symptoms of COVID19 while at school?
translation.ga: An gcabhraíonn tú leis an mbainistíocht a dhéantar ar dhuine a bhfuil comharthaí COVID19 ag teacht air is é ar scoil?

translation.en: Once the affected person has left the school, are you helping in assessing what followup action is needed?
translation.ga: Ach an duine sin a bheith imithe ón scoil, an dtugann tú cúnamh maidir le measúnú ar aon ghníomh riachtanach chun obair leantach a dhéanamh ar an gcás?

translation.en: Are you helping in maintaining the contact log?
translation.ga: An gcabhraíonn tú chun an loga teagmhála a choimeád?

translation.en: Have you been made aware of any changes to the emergency plans or first aid procedures for your school?
translation.ga: Ar cuireadh in iúl duit gur tharla aon athrú ar phleananna éigeandála nó ar nósanna imeachta garchabhrach sa scoil?

translation.en: Are you making yourself available to fellow staff to listen to any COVID19 control concerns or suggestions they may have?
translation.ga: An mbíonn tú ar fáil ag baill eile foirne chun éisteacht le haon cheisteanna nó moltaí um rialú COVID19 a bheadh acu?

translation.en: Are you raising those control concerns or suggestions with your school and feeding back the response to the worker who raised the issue?
translation.ga: An luann tú na ceisteanna nó na moltaí rialaithe úd le Príomhoide na scoile agus an dtugtar aiseolas don bhall / do na baill a d’ardaigh an cheist?

translation.en: Are you aware of the availability of the Spectrum Life Wellbeing Together Programme?
translation.ga: An bhfuil a fhios agat gur féidir teacht ar an gclár Folláine le Chéile atá ag Spectrum Life?

translation.en: Have you been provided by the Principal/ school management with the supports to which you are entitled in your role as Lead Worker Representative?
translation.ga: Ar thug an Príomhoide / bainistíocht na scoile na tacaí duit atá ag dul duit toisc go bhfuil ról agat mar Phríomhionadaí na nOibrithe?

translation.en: If you are a teacher, have you been provided with the 2 hours per week of protected time off class contact hours, as provided for in the protocol?
translation.ga: Más múinteoir tú, an bhfuair tú an 2 uair a chloig in aghaidh na seachtaine cosanta ó na huaireanta teagmháil ranga, mar a bhforáiltear dó sa phrótacal?

translation.en: If you are a school secretary or a caretaker have your duties been reprioritised by school management to afford you sufficient time to carry out your duties as LWR within the scope of your normal contracted hours, as provide for in the protocol?
translation.ga: Más rúnaí nó feighlí scoile tú ar chuir an bhainistíocht scoile athrú ar thosaíochtaí do chuid dualgas chun dóthain ama a bheith ann do na dualgais atá ort mar Phríomhionadaí na nOibrithe a chomhlíonadh laistigh de do ghnáthuaireanta conartha, mar a bhforáiltear dó sa phrótacal?

translation.en: Appendix 9 Checklist for Cleaning
translation.ga: Aguisín 9 Seicliosta don Ghlantachán

translation.en: Have you a system in place for checking and keeping up to date with the latest public health advice from Government and the Department of Education, to ensure that advice is made available in a timely manner in order to adjust your cleaning procedures in line with that advice?
translation.ga: An bhfuil córas i bhfeidhm agat chun teacht ar an gcomhairle sláinte phoiblí is déanaí ón Rialtas agus ón Roinn Oideachais, lena chinntiú go scaiptear an t eolas sin in am trátha d’fhonn do chleachtais ghlantacháin a choigeartú de réir na comhairle céanna?

translation.en: Have you reviewed the HPSC interim health advice for the safe reopening of schools, in particular Section 5.6 Environmental Hygiene?
translation.ga: An ndearna tú athbhreithniú ar an gcomhairle sláinte ón Lárionad Faire um Chosaint Sláinte d’athoscailt shábháilte scoileanna, go háirithe Cuid 5.6 Sláinteachas Comhshaoil?

translation.en: Have you explained the need for the enhanced cleaning regime to staff?
translation.ga: Ar mhínigh tú an gá atá le córas feabhsaithe glantacháin don fhoireann?

translation.en: Are you aware that cleaning is best achieved using a general purpose detergent and warm water, clean cloths, mops and the mechanical action of wiping and cleaning, following by rinsing and drying?
translation.ga: An bhfuil a fhios agat gurb é an córas glantacháin is fearr glantóir ilfheidhmeach agus uisce te, ceirteacha glana, strailleáin, agus gníomh meicniúil mar chuimilt agus glanadh, ansin rinseáil agus triomú?

translation.en: Have you sufficient cleaning materials in place to support the enhanced cleaning regime?
translation.ga: An bhfuil dóthain ábhair ghlantacháin in áit agat chun tacú leis an gcóras feabhsaithe glantacháin?

translation.en: Have you provided training for cleaning staff on the enhanced cleaning regime?
translation.ga: Ar chuir tú traenáil ar fáil don fhoireann glantacháin don chóras feabhsaithe glantacháin?

translation.en: Have you made arrangements for the regular and safe emptying of bins?
translation.ga: An ndearna tú socruithe maidir le boscaí bruscair a fholmhú go rialta ar bhonn sábháilte?

translation.en: Are you familiar with the cleaning options for school settings set out in the interim HPSC health advice for schools for surfaces, toilets, cleaning equipment, PPE and waste management?
translation.ga: An bhfuil cur amach agat ar na roghanna glantacháin do shuíomhanna scoile mar a leagtar amach sa chomhairle ón Lárionad Faire um Chosaint Sláinte do scoileanna maidir le dromchlaí, leithris, fearas glantacháin, TCP agus bainistiú bruscair?

translation.en: Are you aware that each school setting should be cleaned once per day?
translation.ga: An dtuigeann tú go mba chóir gach suíomh scoile a ghlanadh uair amháin sa lá?

translation.en: Have you provided cleaning materials to staff so that they can clean their own desk or immediate workspace?
translation.ga: Ar thug tú ábhair ghlantacháin do bhaill fhoirne agus do scoláirí chun gur féidir leo a mbinse agus a láthair oibre féin a ghlanadh?

translation.en: Have you advised staff that they are responsible for cleaning personal items that have been brought to work and are likely to be handled at work or during breaks (for example, mobile phone and laptops) and to avoid leaving them down on communal surfaces or they will need to clean the surface after the personal item is removed?
translation.ga: Ar mhínigh tú don fhoireann gurb iad féin atá freagrach as rudaí pearsanta a thugann siad isteach is a bheadh idir lámha le linn oibre nó sosa a ghlanadh? (m.sh. fón póca agus ríomhairí glúine) agus gan iad a chur síos ar dhromchla comónta mar caithfear an dromchla a ghlanadh i ndiaidh dóibh an gléas pearsanta a thógáil.

translation.en: Have you advised staff and students to avoid sharing items such as cups, bottles, cutlery, and pens?
translation.ga: Ar iarradh ar fhoireann agus ar scoláirí gan rudaí mar chupáin, buidéil, sceanra agus pinn a roinnt

translation.en: Have you put in place a written cleaning schedule to be made available to cleaning staff including:
translation.ga: An bhfuil sceideal scríofa glantacháin réidh lena thabhairt don fhoireann glantacháin, lena náirítear:

translation.en: Items and areas to be cleaned
translation.ga: Rudaí agus limistéir a bheidh le glanadh

translation.en: Frequency of cleaning
translation.ga: Minicíocht an ghlantacháin

translation.en: Cleaning materials to be used
translation.ga: Na hábhair ghlantacháin a bheidh le húsáid

translation.en: Cleaning of frequently touched surfaces such as vending machines, coffee machines and door handles
translation.ga: Glanadh dromchlaí a dteagmhaítear leo go minic amhail meaisíní díola, meaisíní caife agus murláin doirse

translation.en: Equipment to be used and method of operation?
translation.ga: Fearas atá le húsáid agus modh a oibrithe

translation.en: Details of how to clean following a suspected case of COVID19 are at Section 7 of the Plan above
translation.ga: Tá sonraí maidir le glantachán tar éis cás amhrasta COVID19 i gCuid 7 den Phlean anseo thuas

translation.en: If disinfection of contaminated surfaces is required, is a system in place to do this following cleaning?
translation.ga: Má bhíonn gá le dromchlaí truaillithe a dhíghalrú, an bhfuil córas i bhfeidhm chuige sin i ndiaidh glantacháin?

translation.en: If cleaning staff have been instructed to wear gloves when cleaning are they aware of the need to wash their hands thoroughly with soap and water, both before and after wearing gloves?
translation.ga: Má dúradh le foireann glantacháin lámhainní a chaitheamh agus iad ag glanadh an dtuigeann siad go gcaithfear na lámha a ní go maith le huisce is gallúnach, sula gcuirtear na lámhainní orthu is arís nuair a bhaintear iad?

translation.en: Have you a system in place for disposing personal waste such as cleaning cloths and used wipes in a rubbish bag? The Protocol advises that personal waste such as cleaning waste, tissues etc.
translation.ga: An bhfuil córas i bhfeidhm chun dramhaíl phearsanta ar nós ceirteacha glanta agus cuimilteáin úsáidte a chur de láimh i mála bruscair? Moltar sa Phrótacal go gcuirtear bruscar pearsanta amhail dramhaíl ghlantacháin, ciarsúir srl.

translation.en: should be double bagged and stored in a secure area for 72 hours before being presented for general waste collection.
translation.ga: i mála dúbailte chun é a stóráil in áit shábháilte go ceann 72 uair a chloig sula gcuirtear amach é sa bhailiúchán ginearálta dramhaíola.

translation.en: Have you ensured there is a system in place to make sure reusable cleaning equipment including mop heads and nondisposable cloths are clean before reuse?
translation.ga: Ar chinntigh tú go bhfuil córas i bhfeidhm lena chinntiú go mbíonn fearas glanta, mar chloigne strailleáin agus ceirteacha inathúsáide, glan sula n úsáidtear arís iad?

translation.en: Have you ensured there is a system in place to ensure that equipment such as buckets are emptied and cleaned with a fresh solution of disinfectant before reuse?
translation.ga: Ar chinntigh tú go bhfuil córas i bhfeidhm lena chinntiú go bhfolmhaítear fearas mar bhuicéid is go nglantar iad le tuaslagán úr díghalraithe sula n úsáidtear arís iad?

translation.en: Supports from Revenue
translation.ga: Tacaí ó na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim

translation.en: Employment Wage Support Scheme (EWSS)
translation.ga: Scéim Fóirdheontais Pá Fostaíochta (EWSS)

translation.en: COVID Restrictions Support Scheme (CRSS)
translation.ga: Scéim Tacaíochta Srianta COVID (CRSS)

translation.en: Revenue ‘Warehousing’ of COVID19 related tax debt for businesses
translation.ga: ‘Trádstóráil’ de chuid na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim d’fhiachas cánach a bhaineann le COVID19 do ghnólachtaí

translation.en: Reduction of VAT Rates
translation.ga: Laghdú sna Rátaí CBL

translation.en: Supports from the Department of Social Protection
translation.ga: Tacaí ón Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí

translation.en: COVID19 Pandemic Unemployment Payment
translation.ga: Íocaíocht Dífhostaíochta Phaindéimeach COVID19

translation.en: Enterprise Support Grant
translation.ga: Deontas Tacaíochta Fiontar

translation.en: ShortTime Work Support
translation.ga: Tacaíocht Oibre GearrAma

translation.en: Business Supports – Loans, Grants, Vouchers, Training & Mentoring
translation.ga: Tacaí Gnó – Iasachtaí, Deontais, Dearbháin, Oiliúint & Meantóireacht

translation.en: Online Retail Scheme
translation.ga: Scéim Miondíola Ar Líne

translation.en: €450m Strategic Banking Corporation Ireland (SBCI)
translation.ga: €450m COVID19 Chorparáid Baincéireachta Straitéisí na hÉireann (SBCI)

translation.en: COVID19 Working Capital Scheme
translation.ga: COVID19 Scéim Caipitil Oibre

translation.en: Additional €500m COVID19 Funding for Future Growth Loan Scheme for SME’s, Farmers and Fishing
translation.ga: Maoiniú Breise COVID19 €500m don Scéim Iasachta d’Fhás sa Todhchaí do FBManna, Feirmeoirí agus Iascaireacht

translation.en: €2 billion COVID19 Credit Guarantee Scheme
translation.ga: Scéim Ráthaíochta Creidmheasa €2 bhilliún COVID19

translation.en: Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment – Enterprise Information Centre
translation.ga: Roinn Fiontar, Trádála agus Fostaíochta – Lárionad Faisnéise Fiontar

translation.en: The personal and economic toll that COVID19 has taken on every family, community and business is unprecedented.
translation.ga: Níor tharla ríomh roimhe seo an cur isteach pearsanta agus eacnamaíoch atá déanta ag COVID19 ar gach teaghlach, gach pobal agus gach gnólacht.

translation.en: We have seen businesses throughout the country respond with determination and an ability to adapt in what have been extremely difficult circumstances.
translation.ga: Chonaiceamar gnólachtaí ar fud na tíre ag freagairt le diongbháilteacht agus leis an gcumas le cur in oiriúint do chúinsí iontach deacra.

translation.en: The government must do everything it can to help these businesses reopen and get people back to work.
translation.ga: Ní mór don rialtas gach is féidir leis a dhéanamh chun cuidiú leis na gnólachtaí seo athoscailt agus daoine a chur ar ais ag obair.

translation.en: The July Stimulus will form a major part of our response.
translation.ga: Beidh Pacáiste Spreagtha Iúil ina chuid thábhachtach dár bhfreagra.

translation.en: It is our plan to help our country recover, to repair the damage that has been done and to restore confidence and prosperity.
translation.ga: Is é ár bplean le cuidiú lenár dtír teacht chuige féin, an damáiste atá déanta a dheisiú agus muinín agus rachmas a athbhunú.

translation.en: Step by step, we will help businesses get back on their feet.
translation.ga: De réir a chéile, cuideoimid le gnólachtaí teacht chucu féin.

translation.en: This document is intended to act as a practical guide to help businesses contend with the challenges posed by COVID19, by setting out all the relevant information in one place.
translation.ga: Tá an doiciméad seo ceaptha le feidhmiú mar theoir phraiticiúil chun cuidiú le gnólachtaí dul i ngleic leis na dúshláin a chuireann COVID19 os a gcomhair, tríd an eolas ábhartha go léir a leagan amach in aon áit amháin.

translation.en: It includes information on grants, low cost loans, vouchers and training opportunities and I hope you find it useful.
translation.ga: Áirítear ann eolas faoi dheontais, iasachtaí ar chostas íseal, dearbháin agus deiseanna oiliúna agus tá súil agam go mbeidh sé úsáideach duit.

translation.en: My Department is also operating an Enterprise Information Centre call centre to advise businesses that are affected by COVID19.
translation.ga: Tá Lárionad Faisnéise Fiontar á oibriú ag an Roinn agamsa freisin le comhairle a chur ar ghnólachtaí a ndeachaigh COVID19 i gcion orthu.

translation.en: The Call Centre can be contacted at
translation.ga: Is féidir dul i dteagmháil leis an Lárionad Glaonna ag

translation.en: Supports for Businesses Impacted by COVID19
translation.ga: Tacaí do Ghnólachtaí a ndeachaigh COVID19 i gcion orthu

translation.en: The COVID19 pandemic has presented unprecedented challenges for businesses in Ireland and across the globe.
translation.ga: Le paindéim COVID19 cuireadh dúshláin gan fasach os comhair roimh ghnólachtaí in Éirinn agus ar fud na cruinne.

translation.en: These circumstances have presented great difficulties for employers and employees alike.
translation.ga: De bharr na gcúinsí nua tá deacrachtaí ollmhóra ann d’fhostóirí agus d’fhostaithe freisin.

translation.en: The Government is continuing to address the changing situation and to assist companies and has introduced a range of measures and supports in this regard.
translation.ga: Tá an Rialtas ag leanúint d’aghaidh a thabhairt ar an staid atá de shíor ag athrú agus ag cabhrú le cuideachtaí agus tá raon de bhearta agus tacaí tugtha isteach aige ina leith seo.

translation.en: This online, downloadable Guide was compiled to provide a comprehensive resource for businesses trying to manage their way through this current situation.
translation.ga: Cuireadh an Treoir iníoslódáilte ar líne seo le chéile chun acmhainn chuimsitheach a chur ar fáil do ghnólachtaí atá ag iarraidh a mbealach a bhainistiú tríd an staid reatha seo.

translation.en: This Guide contains detailed information on a huge range of supports from this Department and other Government Departments and Agencies.
translation.ga: Sa Treoir seo tá eolas mionsonraithe ar raon ollmhór tacaí ón Roinn seo agus ó Ranna Rialtais agus Gníomhaireachtaí eile agus comhairle faoi ghníomhaíochtaí praiticiúla eile is féidir le gnólachtaí a dhéanamh ag an am seo.

translation.en: To ensure ease of access to this information, the Guide is divided into 6 sections and also includes an Appendix which contains a COVID19 Business Continuity Checklist which outlines some of the key risks to businesses as well as preparatory actions that can be taken to respond.
translation.ga: D’fhonn a chinntiú go mbeidh sé éasca teacht ar an eolas seo, tá an Treoir roinnte i 6 roinn agus tá Aguisín leis freisin ina bhfuil Seicliosta Leanúnachais Gnó COVID19 a thugann cur síos ar chuid de na príomhrioscaí do ghnólachtaí chomh maith le gníomhaíochtaí ullmhúcháin is féidir a dhéanamh mar fhreagra.

translation.en: Part 1 highlights the supports available from Revenue, such as Warehousing of COVID19 debt, Reduction in VAT rates, the Employment Wage Subsidy Scheme (EWSS) and the COVID Restrictions Support Scheme (CRSS).
translation.ga: I Roinn 1 aibhsítear na tacaí atá ar fáil ó na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim, amhail Ollstóráil ar fhiacha COVID 19, Laghdú i rátaí CBL, an Scéim Fóirdheontais Pá Fostaíochta (EWSS) agus an Scéim Tacaíochta Srianta COVID (CRSS).

translation.en: Part 2 provides information on the supports available from the Department of Social Protection.
translation.ga: I Roinn 2 tugtar eolas ar na tacaí atá ar fáil ón Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí.

translation.en: The supports include the Pandemic Unemployment Payment, the Enterprise Support Grant and the Short Time Work Support.
translation.ga: Áirítear leis na tacaí an Íocaíocht Dífhostaíochta Phaindéimeach, an Scéim Fóirdheontais Shealadaigh Pá agus an Tacaíocht OIbre Gearrama.

translation.en: Part 3 sets out in detail the business supports that are available, ranging from loans to grants to vouchers to mentoring.
translation.ga: I Roinn 3 leagtar amach go mionsonrach na tacaí gnó atá ar fáil, ag dul ó iasachtaí go deontais go dearbháin go meantóireacht.

translation.en: These include the €450m Strategic Banking Corporation Ireland (SBCI) COVID19 Working Capital Scheme, Enterprise Ireland supports the €5,000 Business Financial Planning Grant as well as supports from the Local Enterprise Offices (LEOs) like the Trading Online Voucher and the Mentor Programme.
translation.ga: Áirítear leo seo Scéim Caipitil Oibre €450m COVID19 Chorparáid Baincéireachta Straitéisí na hÉireann (SBCI), tacaí ó Fiontraíocht Éireann lena náirítear an Dearbhán €2,500 do Leanúnachas do Ghnó Barainneach agus an Deontas €5,000 do Phleanáil Airgeadais Gnó chomh maith le tacaí ó na hOifigí Fiontair Áitiúla (LEOnna) amhail an Dearbhán do Thrádáil Ar Líne agus an Clár Meantóireachta.

translation.en: Part 4 of the Guide outlines other Government supports that are available to businesses.
translation.ga: I Roinn 4 den Treoir tugtar cur síos ar thacaí eile Rialtais atá ar fáil do ghnólachtaí.

translation.en: Details are provided on the Commercial Rates Waiver and the Annual Filing of Returns.
translation.ga: Tugtar sonraí faoin Díolúine ó Rátaí Tráchtála agus Comhdú Bliantúi ar Thuairisceáin.

translation.en: In addition, links are provided to other important resources like the NSAI Workplace and Retail Protection and Improvement Guides.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, tugtar naisc le hacmhainní tábhachtacha eile amhail Treoracha ón NSAI i dtaca leis an Ionad Oibre agus le Cosaint agus Feabhsú Miondíola.

translation.en: in Part 5 this section highlights the Resilience and Recovery 20202021: Plan for Living with COVID 19, the Return to Work Safely Protocol and the Health and Safety Authority (HSA) COVID19 Templates, Guides and Checklists.
translation.ga: I Roinn 5 aibhsítear Teacht Aniar agus Athshlánú 20202021: Plean le Maireachtáil le COVID19, an Prótacal um Fhilleadh ar an Obair go Sábháilte agus Teimpléid agus Seicliostaí COVID19 ón Údarás Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta (HSA).

translation.en: Part 6 of the Guide highlights those websites where uptodate official information is available.
translation.ga: I Roinn 6 den Treoir aibhsítear na suíomhanna gréasáin ar a bhfuil eolas oifigiúil cothrom le dáta ar fáil.

translation.en: In addition, details of the DETE Enterprise Information Centre, the Occupational Health and Safety Helpline and the NSAI COVID19 helpline are also provided.
translation.ga: Ina theannta sin, tugtar sonraí faoi Lárionad Faisnéise Fiontar DETE, an líne chabhrach do Shláinte Cheirde agus Sábháilteacht agus líne chabhrach COVID19 de chuid NSAI.

translation.en: As the COVID19 situation changes, Government supports also change to address new difficulties and provide solutions and guidance.
translation.ga: De réir mar a athraíonn an staid COVID19, athraíonn na tacaí Rialtais freisin chun aghaidh a thabhairt ar dheacrachtaí nua agus chun réitigh agus treoir a sholáthar.

translation.en: Engage with Revenue
translation.ga: Déan Teagmháil leis na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim

translation.en: If you have concerns about your ability to pay your tax liabilities speak to the Revenue Commissioners, who have advised:
translation.ga: Má tá imní ort faoi bheith ábalta do dhliteanais cánach a íoc, labhair leis na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim, a thug moladh mar seo a leanas:

translation.en: On an ongoing basis, Revenue engages with viable businesses experiencing temporary cashflow or trading difficulties that affect the timely payment of tax.
translation.ga: Ar bhonn leanúnach, déanann na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim caidreamh le gnólachtaí inmharthana a bhfuil deacrachtaí sealadacha acu le sreabhadh airgid nó le trádáil a chuireann isteach ar íocaíocht cánach thráthúil.

translation.en: Revenue works very successfully with businesses that engage early to resolve their tax payment difficulties.
translation.ga: Oibríonn na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim go hanrathúil le gnólachtaí a théann i dteagmháil go luath chun a gcuid deacrachtaí maidir le cánacha a íoc a réiteach.
