translation.ga: Scrúdú a dhéanamh ar an tionchar is dócha a bheidh ag COVID19 ar do mhargadh agus ar riachtanais do chustaiméirí

translation.en: Identify and agree strategic imperatives
translation.ga: Riachtanais straitéiseacha a shainaithint agus a aontú

translation.en: Understand the business need for facetoface meetings should there be community transmission of COVID19 with a risk of person to person spread.
translation.ga: Tuiscint a fháil ar an riachtanas gnó le cruinnithe aghaidh le haghaidh dá mbeadh trasseoladh pobail COVID19 ann leis an riosca go scaipfí an víreas ó dhuine go duine.

translation.en: Consider the potential for remote working.
translation.ga: Smaoinigh ar an gcumas le cianobair a dhéanamh.

translation.en: Establish authorities, triggers and procedures for implementing plan.
translation.ga: Údaráis, cúiseanna agus nósanna imeachta a bhunú chun an plean a chur i bhfeidhm.

translation.en: Consider the issues for business related travel due to COVID19
translation.ga: Smaoineamh ar na saincheisteanna i dtaca le taisteal a bhaineann le gnó mar thoradh ar COVID

translation.en: Consider the financial management implications due to COVID19
translation.ga: Machnamh a dhéanamh ar na himpleachtaí do bhainistíocht airgeadais de bharr COVID19

translation.en: Examine the extent to which others will be dependent on your business due to COVID19
translation.ga: Scrúdú a dhéanamh ar a oiread agus a bheidhdaoine eile ag brath ar do ghnólacht de bharr COVID19

translation.en: Consider the circumstances under which you might decide to scale back or suspend operations due to COVID19
translation.ga: Smaoineamh ar na cúinsí ina bhféadfá cinneadh oibríochtaí a laghdú nó a chur ar fionraí de bharr COVID19

translation.en: Crosstrain, and identify alternative sources of labour
translation.ga: Trasoiliúint a dhéanamh, agus foinsí roghnacha saothair a shainaithint

translation.en: Communicate with staff in a manner appropriate to the current state of COVID19 phase as guided by national recommendations
translation.ga: Cumarsáid a dhéanamh le baill foirne ar bhealach atá in oiriúint don staid reatha den chéim COVID19 mar a threoraíonn moltaí náisiúnta

translation.en: Prepare emergency communications plan
translation.ga: Plean cumarsáide éigeandála a ullmhú

translation.en: Plan for increased takeup of employee welfare services
translation.ga: Pleanáil do mhéadú ar úsáid seirbhísí leasa d’fhostaithe

translation.en: Prepare policies on sick leave and compassionate leave due to COVID19
translation.ga: Polasaithe a ullmhú maidir le saoire bhreoiteachta agus saoire atruach de bharr COVID 19

translation.en: Prepare policies on foreign travel during COVID19 event
translation.ga: Polasaithe a ullmhú maidir le taisteal thar lear le linn COVID19

translation.en: Plan for the needs of staff overseas
translation.ga: Pleanáil do riachtanais foirne thar lear

translation.en: Make arrangements to assure supplies during the COVID19 event
translation.ga: Socruithe a dhéanamh chun soláthairtí a dheimhniú le linn COVID19

translation.en: Consider the possibility of changes to your product, your service, or your interaction with customers, due to COVID19, and plan for any changes you consider appropriate
translation.ga: Smaoineamh ar an bhféidearthacht d’athruithe ar do tháirge, do sheirbhís, nó d’idirghníomhaíocht le custaiméirí, de bharr COVID19, agus pleanáil d’athruithe ar bith a mheasann tú a bheith cuí

translation.en: Review insurance coverage
translation.ga: Athbhreithniú ar chlúdach árachais

translation.en: Responding to Workplace Risks due to COVID19
translation.ga: Ag Freagairt do Rioscaí san Ionad Oibre mar thoradh ar COVID19

translation.en: Prepare policies on hygienic behaviour for employees and visitors to premises as guided by national recommendations.
translation.ga: Polasaithe a ullmhú i dtaca le hiompraíocht sláinteach d’fhostaithe agus cuairteoirí ar áitribh mar a threoraíonn moltaí náisiúnta.

translation.en: Adhere to respiratory etiquette and hand hygiene policies.
translation.ga: Cloí le béasa riospráide agus polasaithe i dtaca le sláinteachas lámh.

translation.en: Plan to provide for hand washing, hand hygiene, tissue disposal and other facilities as per national recommendations
translation.ga: Pleanáil le soláthar a dhéanamh d’áiseanna níocháin lámh, sláinteachas lámh, diúscairt ciarsúr agus áiseanna eile de réir moltaí náisiúnta.

translation.en: Plan for frequent and effective cleaning of the workplace as per national recommendations
translation.ga: Pleanáil do ghlanadh minic agus éifeachtach den ionad oibre de réir moltaí náisiúnta.

translation.en: Prepare policies as per national recommendations to advise those who are infected, or are suspected to be infected with COVID19
translation.ga: Polasaithe a ullmhú de réir moltaí náisiúnta le comhairle a chur orthu siúd a bhfuil COVID19 tógtha acu, nó a mheastar go bhfuil.

translation.en: Plan measures to reduce facetoface contact with customers / suppliers and between employees from different sites
translation.ga: Bearta a phleanáil chun laghdú a dhéanamh ar theagmháil aghaidh le haghaidh le custaiméirí / soláthraithe agus idir fhostaithe ó láithreáin éagsúla.

translation.en: Identify work organisation measures that can be taken to reduce potential for employees who are in the workplace to infect each other
translation.ga: Bearta eagraíochta oibre a shainaithint is féidir a dhéanamh chun laghdú a dhéanamh ar an seans gur féidir le fostaithe san ionad oibre an galar a chur ar a chéile.

translation.en: Prepare policies on flexible work locations (e.g. teleworking) and flexible working times (e.g. shiftworking)
translation.ga: Polasaithe a ullmhú maidir le suíomhanna solúbtha oibre (e.g. cianobair) agus amanna oibre solúbtha (e.g. uainobair).

translation.en: Provide ICT infrastructure to support teleworking and remote customer interaction
translation.ga: Infreastruchtúr TFC a sholáthar chun tacú le cianobair agus cianidirghníomhaíocht le custaiméirí.
